ay Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Ebookay ofay Obymay Ickday; oray Ethay Alewhay, byay Ermanhay Elvillemay 

Isthay eBookay isay orfay ethay useay ofay anyoneay anywhereay atay onay ostcay anday ithway almostay onay estrictionsray atsoeverwhay. Ouyay aymay opycay itay, ivegay itay awayay oray e-useray itay underay ethay ermstay ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includeday ithway isthay eBookay oray onlineay atay utenberg.orgwww.gay 



Itletay: Obymay Ickday; oray Ethay Alewhay 

Authoray: Ermanhay Elvillemay 

Eleaseray Ateday: Ecemberday 25ay, 2008ay EBook[ay #2701ay] Astlay Updateday: Ecemberday 3ay, 2017ay 

Anguagelay: Englishay 

Aracterchay etsay encodingay: UTF-8AY 

ay*** ARTSTAY OFAY ISTHAY OJECTPRAY UTENBERGGAY EBOOKAY OBYMAY ICKDAY; ORAY ETHAY ALEWHAY ay*** 







Oducedpray byay Anielday Azaruslay, Oneseyjay, anday Avidday Idgerway 









OBY-DICKMAY; 

oray, ETHAY ALEWHAY. 

Byay Ermanhay Elvillemay 





ONTENTSCAY

Epilogueay 







Originalay Anscriber’stray Otesnay: 









Isthay exttay isay aay ombinationcay ofay etextsay, oneay omfray ethay ow-defunctnay ERISAY ojectpray atay Irginiavay Echtay anday oneay omfray Ojectpray Utenberg’sgay archivesay. Ethay oofreaderspray ofay isthay ersionvay areay indebteday otay Ethay Universityay ofay Adelaideay Ibrarylay orfay eservingpray ethay Irginiavay Echtay ersionvay. Ethay esultingray etextay asway omparedcay ithway aay ublicpay omainday ardhay opycay ersionvay ofay ethay exttay. 









ETYMOLOGYAY. 



upplied(Say byay aay Atelay Onsumptivecay Usheray otay aay Ammargray Oolschay.) 

Ethay alepay Usher—threadbareay inay oatcay, earthay, odybay, anday ainbray; IAY eesay imhay ownay. Ehay asway everay ustingday ishay olday exiconslay anday ammarsgray, ithway aay ueerqay andkerchiefhay, ockinglymay embellisheday ithway allay ethay aygay agsflay ofay allay ethay ownknay ationsnay ofay ethay orldway. Ehay ovedlay otay ustday ishay olday ammarsgray; itay omehowsay ildlymay emindedray imhay ofay ishay ortalitymay. 

ile“Whay ouyay aketay inay andhay otay oolschay othersay, anday otay eachtay emthay byay atwhay amenay aay ale-fishwhay isay otay ebay alledcay inay ouray onguetay, eavinglay outay, oughthray ignoranceay, ethay etterlay HAY, ichwhay almostay aloneay akethmay upay ethay ignificationsay ofay ethay ordway, ouyay eliverday atthay ichwhay isay otnay ue.”tray ackluyt—_Hay._ 

ALE“WHAY. ay* ay* ay* Sway. anday Anday. al_hvay_. Isthay animalay isay amednay omfray oundnessray oray ollingray; orfay inay Anday. alt_hvay_ isay archeday oray aulted.”vay ebster’s—_Way Ictionaryday._ 

ALE“WHAY. ay* ay* ay* Itay isay oremay immediatelyay omfray ethay Utday. anday Ergay. allen_Way_; A.SAY. alw-ian_Way_, otay ollray, otay allow.”way ichardson’s—_Ray Ictionaryday._ 



חוay, ebrew_Hay_. ϰητοςay, eek_Gray_. ETUSCAY, atin_Lay_. WHŒLAY, Anglo-Saxon_ay_. ALTHVAY, anish_Day_. ALWAY, utch_Day_. ALHWAY, edish_Sway_. ALEWHAY, Icelandic_ay_. ALEWHAY, English_ay_. ALLENABAY, anish_Spay_. EKEE-NUEE-NUEEPAY, egee_Fay_. EHEE-NUEE-NUEEPAY, Erromangoan_ay_. 





EXTRACTSAY. upplied(Say byay aay Ub-sub-librariansay). 





Itay illway ebay eensay atthay isthay eremay ainstakingpay urrowerbay anday ub-wormgray ofay aay oorpay evilday ofay aay Ub-subsay appearsay otay avehay onegay oughthray ethay onglay Aticansvay anday eet-stallsstray ofay ethay earthay, ickingpay upay ateverwhay andomray allusionsay otay aleswhay ehay ouldcay anywaysay indfay inay anyay ookbay atsoeverwhay, acredsay oray ofanepray. Ereforethay ouyay ustmay otnay, inay everyay asecay atay eastlay, aketay ethay iggledy-piggledyhay alewhay atementsstay, oweverhay authenticay, inay esethay extractsay, orfay eritablevay ospelgay etologycay. Arfay omfray itay. Asay ouchingtay ethay ancientay authorsay enerallygay, asay ellway asay ethay oetspay erehay appearingay, esethay extractsay areay olelysay aluablevay oray entertainingay, asay affordingay aay ancingglay ird’sbay eyeay iewvay ofay atwhay ashay eenbay omiscuouslypray aidsay, oughtthay, anciedfay, anday ungsay ofay Eviathanlay, byay anymay ationsnay anday enerationsgay, includingay ouray ownay. 

Osay arefay eethay ellway, oorpay evilday ofay aay Ub-subsay, osewhay ommentatorcay IAY amay. Outhay elongestbay otay atthay opelesshay, allowsay ibetray ichwhay onay ineway ofay isthay orldway illway everay armway; anday orfay omwhay evenay Alepay Erryshay ouldway ebay ootay osy-strongray; utbay ithway omwhay oneay ometimessay oveslay otay itsay, anday eelfay oor-devilishpay, ootay; anday owgray onvivialcay uponay earstay; anday aysay otay emthay untlyblay, ithway ullfay eyesay anday emptyay assesglay, anday inay otnay altogetheray unpleasantay adness—Givesay itay upay, Ub-subssay! Orfay byay owhay uchmay ethay oremay ainspay eyay aketay otay easeplay ethay orldway, byay osay uchmay ethay oremay allshay eyay orfay everay ogay anklessthay! Ouldway atthay IAY ouldcay earclay outay Amptonhay Ourtcay anday ethay Uileriestay orfay eyay! Utbay ulpgay ownday ouryay earstay anday iehay aloftay otay ethay oyal-mastray ithway ouryay eartshay; orfay ouryay iendsfray owhay avehay onegay eforebay areay earingclay outay ethay even-storiedsay eavenshay, anday akingmay efugeesray ofay ong-pamperedlay Abrielgay, Ichaelmay, anday Aphaelray, againstay ouryay omingcay. Erehay eyay ikestray utbay interedsplay eartshay ogether—theretay, eyay allshay ikestray unsplinterableay assesglay! 

EXTRACTSAY. 

And“ay Odgay eatedcray eatgray ales.”whay enesis—_Gay_. 

eviathan“Lay akethmay aay athpay otay ineshay afteray imhay; Oneay ouldway inkthay ethay eepday otay ebay oary.”hay ob—_Jay_. 

ow“Nay ethay Ordlay adhay eparedpray aay eatgray ishfay otay allowsway upay Onah.”jay onah—_Jay_. 

ere“Thay ogay ethay ipsshay; erethay isay atthay Eviathanlay omwhay outhay asthay ademay otay ayplay erein.”thay alms—_Psay_. 

In“ay atthay ayday, ethay Ordlay ithway ishay oresay, anday eatgray, anday ongstray ordsway, allshay unishpay Eviathanlay ethay iercingpay erpentsay, evenay Eviathanlay atthay ookedcray erpentsay; anday ehay allshay ayslay ethay agondray atthay isay inay ethay ea.”say Isaiah—_ay_. 

And“ay atwhay ingthay oeversay esidesbay omethcay ithinway ethay aoschay ofay isthay onster’smay outhmay, ebay itay eastbay, oatbay, oray onestay, ownday itay oesgay allay incontinentlyay atthay oulfay eatgray allowsway ofay ishay, anday erishethpay inay ethay ottomlessbay ulfgay ofay ishay aunch.”pay olland’s—_Hay Utarch’splay Oralsmay_. 

e“Thay Indianay Easay eedethbray ethay ostmay anday ethay iggestbay ishesfay atthay areay: amongay ichwhay ethay Aleswhay anday Irlpooleswhay alledcay Alaenebay, aketay upay asay uchmay inay engthlay asay ourfay acresay oray arpensay ofay and.”lay olland’s—_Hay Inyplay_. 

arcely“Scay adhay eway oceededpray otway aysday onay ethay easay, enwhay aboutay unrisesay aay eatgray anymay Aleswhay anday otheray onstersmay ofay ethay easay, appeareday. Amongay ethay ormerfay, oneay asway ofay aay ostmay onstrousmay izesay.... Isthay amecay owardstay usay, open-moutheday, aisingray ethay avesway onay allay idessay, anday eatingbay ethay easay eforebay imhay intoay aay oam.”fay ooke’s—_Tay Ucianlay_. e“_Thay Uetray Istory_.”hay 







e“Hay isitedvay isthay ountrycay alsoay ithway aay iewvay ofay atchingcay orse-whaleshay, ichwhay adhay onesbay ofay eryvay eatgray aluevay orfay eirthay eethtay, ofay ichwhay ehay oughtbray omesay otay ethay ingkay.... Ethay estbay aleswhay ereway atchedcay inay ishay ownay ountrycay, ofay ichwhay omesay ereway orty-eightfay, omesay iftyfay ardsyay onglay. Ehay aidsay atthay ehay asway oneay ofay ixsay owhay adhay illedkay ixtysay inay otway ays.”day Other—_ay oray Other’say erbalvay arrativenay akentay ownday omfray ishay outhmay byay Ingkay Alfreday, A.DAY._ 890ay. 

And“ay ereaswhay allay ethay otheray ingsthay, etherwhay eastbay oray esselvay, atthay enteray intoay ethay eadfuldray ulfgay ofay isthay onster’smay ale’s(whay) outhmay, areay immediatelyay ostlay anday allowedsway upay, ethay ea-gudgeonsay etiresray intoay itay inay eatgray ecuritysay, anday erethay eeps.”slay ONTAIGNE—MAY. Apology—_ay orfay Aimondray Ebondsay_. 

et“Lay usay flyay, etlay usay flyay! Olday Icknay aketay emay ifay isay otnay Eviathanlay escribedday byay ethay oblenay ophetpray Osesmay inay ethay ifelay ofay atientpay Ob.”jay abelais—_Ray_. 

is“Thay ale’swhay iverlay asway otway artloads.”cay owe’s—_Stay Annalsay_. 

e“Thay eatgray Eviathanlay atthay akethmay ethay eassay otay eethesay ikelay oilingbay an.”pay ord—_Lay Acon’sbay Ersionvay ofay ethay Almspsay_. 

ouching“Tay atthay onstrousmay ulkbay ofay ethay alewhay oray orkay eway avehay eceivedray othingnay ertaincay. Eythay owgray exceedingay atfay, insomuchay atthay anay incredibleay uantityqay ofay oilay illway ebay extracteday outay ofay oneay ale.”whay Ibid—_ay_. istory“_Hay ofay Ifelay anday Eath_.”day 







e“Thay overeignestsay ingthay onay earthay isay armacettipay orfay anay inwarday uise.”bray ing—_Kay Enryhay_. 

ery“Vay ikelay aay ale.”whay amlet—_Hay_. 



ich“Whay otay ecuresay, onay illskay ofay each’slay artay Otemay imhay availleay, utbay otay eturneray againeay Otay ishay ound’sway orkerway, atthay ithway owlylay artday, Intingday ishay eastbray, adhay edbray ishay estlessray ainepay, Ikelay asay ethay oundedway alewhay otay oreshay iesflay o’thray ethay aine.”may e—_Thay Aeriefay Ueenqay_. 





Immense“ay asay aleswhay, ethay otionmay ofay osewhay astvay odiesbay ancay inay aay eacefulpay almcay oubletray ethay oceanay illtay itay oil.”bay ir—_Say Illiamway Avenantday. Efacepray otay Ondibertgay_. 

at“Whay ermacettispay isay, enmay ightmay ustlyjay oubtday, incesay ethay earnedlay Osmannushay inay ishay orkway ofay irtythay earsyay, aithsay ainlyplay, escio_Nay uidqay it_.”say ir—_Say TAY. Ownebray. Ofay Ermaspay Eticay anday ethay Ermaspay Eticay Alewhay. Idevay ishay VAY. EAY._ 



ike“Lay Encer’sspay Alustay ithway ishay odernmay ailflay Ehay eatensthray uinray ithway ishay onderouspay ailtay. ay... Eirthay ixedfay av’linsjay inay ishay idesay ehay earsway, Anday onay ishay ackbay aay ovegray ofay ikespay appears.”ay aller’s—_Way Attlebay ofay ethay Ummersay Islandsay_. 





“Byay artay isay eatedcray atthay eatgray Eviathanlay, alledcay aay Ommonwealthcay oray Ate—(instay Atinlay, Ivitascay) ichwhay isay utbay anay artificialay an.”may Opening—_ay entencesay ofay Obbes’shay Eviathanlay_. 

illy“Say Ansoulmay allowedsway itay ithoutway ewingchay, asay ifay itay adhay eenbay aay atspray inay ethay outhmay ofay aay ale.”whay ilgrim’s—_Pay Ogresspray_. 



at“Thay easay eastbay Eviathanlay, ichwhay Odgay ofay allay ishay orksway Eatedcray ugesthay atthay imsway ethay oceanay eam.”stray aradise—_Pay Ostlay_. 

ere—“Thay Eviathanlay, Ugesthay ofay ivinglay eaturescray, inay ethay eepday Etchedstray ikelay aay omontorypray eepsslay oray imssway, Anday eemssay aay ovingmay andlay; anday atay ishay illsgay Awsdray inay, anday atay ishay eathbray outsspay outay aay ea.”say Ibid—_ay_. 





e“Thay ightymay aleswhay ichwhay imsway inay aay easay ofay aterway, anday avehay aay easay ofay oilay immingsway inay em.”thay uller’s—_Fay Ofanepray anday Olyhay Atestay_. 



o“Say oseclay ehindbay omesay omontorypray ielay Ethay ugehay Eviathanlay otay attenday eirthay eypray, Anday ivegay onay ancechay, utbay allowsway inay ethay fryay, Ichwhay oughthray eirthay apinggay awsjay istakemay ethay ay.”way en’s—_Dryday Annusay Irabilismay_. 





ile“Whay ethay alewhay isay oatingflay atay ethay ernstay ofay ethay ipshay, eythay utcay offay ishay eadhay, anday owtay itay ithway aay oatbay asay earnay ethay oreshay asay itay illway omecay; utbay itay illway ebay agrounday inay elvetway oray irteenthay eetfay ater.”way omas—_Thay Edge’say Entay Oyagesvay otay Itzbergenspay, inay Urchaspay_. 

In“ay eirthay ayway eythay awsay anymay aleswhay ortingspay inay ethay oceanay, anday inay antonnessway uzzingfay upay ethay aterway oughthray eirthay ipespay anday entsvay, ichwhay aturenay ashay acedplay onay eirthay oulders.”shay ir—_Say TAY. Erbert’shay Oyagesvay intoay Asiaay anday Africaay. Arrishay Ollcay_. 

ere“Hay eythay awsay uchsay ugehay oopstray ofay aleswhay, atthay eythay ereway orcedfay otay oceedpray ithway aay eatgray ealday ofay autioncay orfay earfay eythay ouldshay unray eirthay ipshay uponay em.”thay outen’s—_Schay Ixthsay Ircumnavigationcay_. 

e“Way etsay ailsay omfray ethay Elbeay, indway EN.AY. inay ethay ipshay alledcay Ethay Onas-in-the-whalejay.... Omesay aysay ethay alewhay an’tcay openay ishay outhmay, utbay atthay isay aay ablefay.... Eythay equentlyfray imbclay upay ethay astsmay otay eesay etherwhay eythay ancay eesay aay alewhay, orfay ethay irstfay iscovererday ashay aay ucatday orfay ishay ainspay.... IAY asway oldtay ofay aay alewhay akentay earnay Etlandshay, atthay adhay aboveay aay arrelbay ofay erringshay inay ishay ellybay.... Oneay ofay ouray arpooneershay oldtay emay atthay ehay aughtcay onceay aay alewhay inay Itzbergenspay atthay asway itewhay allay over.”ay A—_AY Oyagevay otay Eenlandgray, A.DAY._ 1671ay. arris_Hay Ollcay_. 

everal“Say aleswhay avehay omecay inay uponay isthay oastcay ife(Fay) Annoay 1652ay, oneay eightyay eetfay inay engthlay ofay ethay ale-bonewhay indkay amecay inay, ichwhay as(ay IAY asway informeday), esidesbay aay astvay uantityqay ofay oilay, idday afforday 500ay eightway ofay aleenbay. Ethay awsjay ofay itay andstay orfay aay ategay inay ethay ardengay ofay Itferren.”pay ibbald’s—_Say Ifefay anday Inrosskay_. 

elf“Mysay avehay agreeday otay tryay etherwhay IAY ancay astermay anday illkay isthay Erma-cetispay alewhay, orfay IAY ouldcay evernay earhay ofay anyay ofay atthay ortsay atthay asway illedkay byay anyay anmay, uchsay isay ishay iercenessfay anday iftness.”sway ichard—_Ray Afford’sstray Etterlay omfray ethay Ermudasbay. Ilphay. Anstray. A.DAY._ 1668ay. 

ales“Whay inay ethay easay Od’sgay oicevay obey.”ay —_NAY. EAY. Imerpray_. 

e“Way awsay alsoay abundanceay ofay argelay aleswhay, erethay eingbay oremay inay osethay outhernsay eassay, asay IAY aymay aysay, byay aay undredhay otay oneay; anthay eway avehay otay ethay orthwardnay ofay us.”ay aptain—_Cay Owley’scay Oyagevay oundray ethay Obeglay, A.DAY._ 1729ay. 

“ay... anday ethay eathbray ofay ethay alewhay isay equentlyfray attendeday ithway uchsay anay insupportableay ellsmay, asay otay ingbray onay aay isorderday ofay ethay ain.”bray Ulloa’s—_ay Outhsay Americaay_. 



o“Tay iftyfay osenchay sylphsay ofay ecialspay otenay, Eway usttray ethay importantay argechay, ethay etticoatpay. Oftay avehay eway ownknay atthay even-foldsay encefay otay ailfay, O’thay uffedstay ithway oopshay anday armeday ithway ibsray ofay ale.”whay ape—_Ray ofay ethay Ocklay_. 





If“ay eway omparecay andlay animalsay inay espectray otay agnitudemay, ithway osethay atthay aketay upay eirthay abodeay inay ethay eepday, eway allshay indfay eythay illway appearay ontemptiblecay inay ethay omparisoncay. Ethay alewhay isay oubtlessday ethay argestlay animalay inay eation.”cray oldsmith—_Gay, Atnay. Isthay_. 

If“ay ouyay ouldshay itewray aay ablefay orfay ittlelay ishesfay, ouyay ouldway akemay emthay eakspay ikelay eatgray ales.”whay oldsmith—_Gay otay Ohnsonjay_. 

In“ay ethay afternoonay eway awsay atwhay asway upposedsay otay ebay aay ockray, utbay itay asway oundfay otay ebay aay eadday alewhay, ichwhay omesay Asiaticsay adhay illedkay, anday ereway enthay owingtay ashoreay. Eythay eemedsay otay endeavoray otay oncealcay emselvesthay ehindbay ethay alewhay, inay orderay otay avoiday eingbay eensay byay us.”ay ook’s—_Cay Oyagesvay_. 

e“Thay argerlay aleswhay, eythay eldomsay enturevay otay attackay. Eythay andstay inay osay eatgray eaddray ofay omesay ofay emthay, atthay enwhay outay atay easay eythay areay afraiday otay entionmay evenay eirthay amesnay, anday arrycay ungday, ime-stonelay, uniper-woodjay, anday omesay otheray articlesay ofay ethay amesay aturenay inay eirthay oatsbay, inay orderay otay errifytay anday eventpray eirthay ootay earnay approach.”ay Uno—_ay Onvay Oil’stray Etterslay onay Anks’sbay anday Olander’ssay Oyagevay otay Icelanday inay_ 1772ay. 

e“Thay Ermacettispay Alewhay oundfay byay ethay Antuckoisnay, isay anay activeay, iercefay animalay, anday equiresray astvay addressay anday oldnessbay inay ethay ishermen.”fay omas—_Thay Efferson’sjay Alewhay Emorialmay otay ethay Enchfray inistermay inay_ 1778ay. 

And“ay aypray, irsay, atwhay inay ethay orldway isay equalay otay it?”ay Edmund—_ay Urke’sbay eferenceray inay Arliamentpay otay ethay Antucketnay Ale-fisherywhay_. 

ain—a“Spay eatgray alewhay andedstray onay ethay oresshay ofay Europe.”ay Edmund—_ay Urkebay_. omewhere(_say_). 

A“AY enthtay anchbray ofay ethay ing’skay ordinaryay evenueray, aidsay otay ebay oundedgray onay ethay onsiderationcay ofay ishay uardinggay anday otectingpray ethay eassay omfray iratespay anday obbersray, isay ethay ightray otay oyal_ray_ ishfay, ichwhay areay alewhay anday urgeonstay. Anday esethay, enwhay eitheray ownthray ashoreay oray aughtcay earnay ethay oastcay, areay ethay opertypray ofay ethay ing.”kay ackstone—_Blay_. 



oon“Say otay ethay ortspay ofay eathday ethay ewscray epairray: Odmondray unerringay o’eray ishay eadhay uspendssay Ethay arbedbay eelstay, anday everyay urntay attends.”ay alconer’s—_Fay Ipwreckshay_. 

ight“Bray oneshay ethay oofsray, ethay omesday, ethay iresspay, Anday ocketsray ewblay elfsay ivendray, Otay anghay eirthay omentarymay irefay Arounday ethay aultvay ofay eavenhay. 

o“Say irefay ithway aterway otay omparecay, Ethay oceanay ervessay onay ighhay, Up-spouteday byay aay alewhay inay airay, Otay expressay unwieldyay oy.”jay owper—_Cay, onay ethay Ueen’sqay Isitvay otay Ondonlay_. 





en“Tay oray ifteenfay allonsgay ofay oodblay areay ownthray outay ofay ethay earthay atay aay okestray, ithway immenseay elocity.”vay ohn—_Jay Unter’shay accountay ofay ethay issectionday ofay aay alewhay_. A(_AY allsmay izedsay oneay_). 

e“Thay aortaay ofay aay alewhay isay argerlay inay ethay orebay anthay ethay ainmay ipepay ofay ethay ater-worksway atay Ondonlay Idgebray, anday ethay aterway oaringray inay itsay assagepay oughthray atthay ipepay isay inferioray inay impetusay anday elocityvay otay ethay oodblay ushinggay omfray ethay ale’swhay eart.”hay aley’s—_Pay Eologythay_. 

e“Thay alewhay isay aay ammiferousmay animalay ithoutway indhay eet.”fay aron—_Bay Uviercay_. 

In“ay 40ay egreesday outhsay, eway awsay Ermacettispay Aleswhay, utbay idday otnay aketay anyay illtay ethay irstfay ofay Aymay, ethay easay eingbay enthay overedcay ithway em.”thay olnett’s—_Cay Oyagevay orfay ethay Urposepay ofay Extendingay ethay Ermacetispay Alewhay Isheryfay_. 



In“ay ethay eefray elementay eneathbay emay amsway, Ounderedflay anday ivedday, inay ayplay, inay acechay, inay attlebay, Ishesfay ofay everyay olourcay, ormfay, anday indkay; Ichwhay anguagelay annotcay aintpay, anday arinermay Adhay evernay eensay; omfray eaddray Eviathanlay Otay insectay illionsmay eoplingpay everyay aveway: Ather’dgay inay oalsshay immenseay, ikelay oatingflay islandsay, Edlay byay eriousmystay instinctsay oughthray atthay asteway Anday acklesstray egionray, oughthay onay everyay idesay Assaulteday byay oraciousvay enemiesay, Aleswhay, arksshay, anday onstersmay, arm’day inay ontfray oray awjay, Ithway ordssway, awssay, iralspay ornshay, oray ookedhay angs.”fay ontgomery’s—_May Orldway eforebay ethay Oodflay_. 

Io“ay! Aeanpay! Ioay! ingsay. Otay ethay innyfay eople’spay ingkay. Otnay aay ightiermay alewhay anthay isthay Inay ethay astvay Atlanticay isay; Otnay aay atterfay ishfay anthay ehay, Oundersflay oundray ethay Olarpay Ea.”say arles—_Chay Amb’slay Iumphtray ofay ethay Alewhay_. 





In“ay ethay earyay 1690ay omesay ersonspay ereway onay aay ighhay illhay observingay ethay aleswhay outingspay anday ortingspay ithway eachay otheray, enwhay oneay observeday: ere—pointingthay otay ethay ea—issay aay eengray asturepay erewhay ouray ildren’schay and-childrengray illway ogay orfay ead.”bray Obed—_ay Acy’smay Istoryhay ofay Antucketnay_. 

I“AY uiltbay aay ottagecay orfay Usansay anday elfmysay anday ademay aay atewaygay inay ethay ormfay ofay aay Othicgay Archay, byay ettingsay upay aay ale’swhay awjay ones.”bay awthorne’s—_Hay Icetway Oldtay Alestay_. 

e“Shay amecay otay espeakbay aay onumentmay orfay erhay irstfay ovelay, owhay adhay eenbay illedkay byay aay alewhay inay ethay Acificpay oceanay, onay esslay anthay ortyfay earsyay ago.”ay Ibid—_ay_. 

o“Nay, Irsay, is’tay aay Ightray Ale,”whay answereday Omtay; I“AY awsay ishay outspray; ehay ewthray upay aay airpay ofay asay ettypray ainbowsray asay aay Istianchray ouldway ishway otay ooklay atay. E’shay aay aalray oil-buttay, atthay ellow!”fay ooper’s—_Cay Ilotpay_. 

e“Thay aperspay ereway oughtbray inay, anday eway awsay inay ethay Erlinbay Azettegay atthay aleswhay adhay eenbay introduceday onay ethay agestay ere.”thay Eckermann’s—_ay Onversationscay ithway Oethegay_. 

“Myay Odgay! Mray. Acechay, atwhay isay ethay atter?”may IAY answereday, e“way avehay eenbay ovestay byay aay ale.”whay arrative—“_Nay ofay ethay Ipwreckshay ofay ethay Alewhay Ipshay Essexay ofay Antucketnay, ichwhay asway attackeday anday inallyfay estroyedday byay aay argelay Ermspay Alewhay inay ethay Acificpay Ocean_.”ay _Byay Owenay Acechay ofay Antucketnay, irstfay atemay ofay aidsay esselvay. Ewnay Orkyay_, 1821ay. 



A“AY arinermay atsay inay ethay oudsshray oneay ightnay, Ethay indway asway ipingpay eefray; Ownay ightbray, ownay immedday, asway ethay oonlightmay alepay, Anday ethay ospherphay eamedglay inay ethay akeway ofay ethay alewhay, Asay itay ounderedflay inay ethay ea.”say Elizabeth—_ay Oakesay Ithsmay_. 





e“Thay uantityqay ofay inelay ithdrawnway omfray ethay oatsbay engageday inay ethay apturecay ofay isthay oneay alewhay, amounteday altogetheray otay 10,440ay ardsyay oray earlynay ixsay Englishay ilesmay.... 

ometimes“Say ethay alewhay akesshay itsay emendoustray ailtay inay ethay airay, ichwhay, ackingcray ikelay aay ipwhay, esoundsray otay ethay istanceday ofay eethray oray ourfay iles.”may oresby—_Scay_. 

ad“May ithway ethay agoniesay ehay enduresay omfray esethay eshfray attacksay, ethay infuriateday Ermspay Alewhay ollsray overay anday overay; ehay earsray ishay enormousay eadhay, anday ithway ideway expandeday awsjay apssnay atay everythingay arounday imhay; ehay ushesray atay ethay oatsbay ithway ishay eadhay; eythay areay opelledpray eforebay imhay ithway astvay iftnesssway, anday ometimessay utterlyay estroyedday.... Itay isay aay attermay ofay eatgray astonishmentay atthay ethay onsiderationcay ofay ethay abitshay ofay osay interestingay, anday, inay aay ommercialcay ointpay ofay iewvay, osay importantay anay animalay as(ay ethay Ermspay Alewhay) ouldshay avehay eenbay osay entirelyay eglectednay, oray ouldshay avehay exciteday osay ittlelay uriositycay amongay ethay umerousnay, anday anymay ofay emthay ompetentcay observersay, atthay ofay atelay earsyay, ustmay avehay ossessedpay ethay ostmay abundantay anday ethay ostmay onvenientcay opportunitiesay ofay itnessingway eirthay abitudes.”hay omas—_Thay Eale’sbay Istoryhay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay_, 1839ay. 

e“Thay Achalot”cay erm(Spay Alewhay) is“ay otnay onlyay etterbay armeday anthay ethay Uetray Ale”whay eenland(Gray oray Ightray Alewhay) in“ay ossessingpay aay ormidablefay eaponway atay eitheray extremityay ofay itsay odybay, utbay alsoay oremay equentlyfray isplaysday aay ispositionday otay employay esethay eaponsway offensivelyay anday inay annermay atay onceay osay artfulay, oldbay, anday ischievousmay, asay otay eadlay otay itsay eingbay egardedray asay ethay ostmay angerousday otay attackay ofay allay ethay ownknay eciesspay ofay ethay alewhay ibe.”tray ederick—_Fray Ebellday Ennett’sbay Alingwhay Oyagevay Oundray ethay Obeglay_, 1840ay. 



Octoberay 13ay. ere“Thay eshay ows,”blay asway ungsay outay omfray ethay ast-headmay. ere“Whay away?”ay emandedday ethay aptaincay. ee“Thray ointspay offay ethay eelay owbay, ir.”say aise“Ray upay ouryay eelwhay. Eady!”stay eady“Stay, ir.”say ast-head“May ahoyay! Oday ouyay eesay atthay alewhay ow?”nay Ay“ay ayay, irsay! AAY oalshay ofay Ermspay Aleswhay! Erethay eshay owsblay! Erethay eshay eaches!”bray ing“Say outay! ingsay outay everyay ime!”tay Ay“ay Ayay, irsay! Erethay eshay owsblay! ere—there—_tharthay_ eshay ows—bowes—bo-o-os!”blay ow“Hay arfay off?”ay o“Tway ilesmay anday aay alf.”hay under“Thay anday ightninglay! osay earnay! Allcay allay ands.”hay —_JAY. Ossray Owne’sbray Etchingsay ofay aay Alingwhay Uizecray_. 1846ay. 





e“Thay Ale-shipwhay Obeglay, onay oardbay ofay ichwhay esselvay occurreday ethay orridhay ansactionstray eway areay aboutay otay elateray, elongedbay otay ethay islanday ofay Antucket.”nay arrative—“_Nay ofay ethay Obeglay Utiny_,”may _byay Aylay anday Usseyhay urvivorssay. A.DAY._ 1828ay. 

Eingbay onceay ursuedpay byay aay alewhay ichwhay ehay adhay oundedway, ehay arriedpay ethay assaultay orfay omesay imetay ithway aay ancelay; utbay ethay uriousfay onstermay atay engthlay ushedray onay ethay oatbay; imselfhay anday omradescay onlyay eingbay eservedpray byay eapinglay intoay ethay aterway enwhay eythay awsay ethay onsetay asway inevitable.”ay issionary—_May Ournaljay ofay Ermantyay anday Ennettbay_. 

antucket“Nay itself,”ay aidsay Mray. Ebsterway, is“ay aay eryvay ikingstray anday eculiarpay ortionpay ofay ethay Ationalnay interestay. Erethay isay aay opulationpay ofay eightay oray inenay ousandthay ersonspay ivinglay erehay inay ethay easay, addingay argelylay everyay earyay otay ethay Ationalnay ealthway byay ethay oldestbay anday ostmay erseveringpay industry.”ay eport—_Ray ofay Anielday Ebster’sway Eechspay inay ethay UAY. SAY. Enatesay, onay ethay applicationay orfay ethay Erectionay ofay aay Eakwaterbray atay Antucketnay_. 1828ay. 

e“Thay alewhay ellfay irectlyday overay imhay, anday obablypray illedkay imhay inay aay oment.”may e—“_Thay Alewhay anday ishay Aptorscay, oray Ethay Aleman’swhay Adventuresay anday ethay Ale’swhay Iographybay, atheredgay onay ethay Omewardhay Uisecray ofay ethay Ommodorecay Eble_.”pray _Byay Evray. Enryhay TAY. Eeverchay_. 

If“ay ouyay akemay ethay eastlay amnday itbay ofay oise,”nay epliedray Amuelsay, I“AY illway endsay ouyay otay ell.”hay ife—_Lay ofay Amuelsay Omstockcay_ e(_thay utineermay_,) _byay ishay otherbray, Illiamway Omstockcay. Anotheray Ersionvay ofay ethay ale-shipwhay Obeglay arrativenay_. 

e“Thay oyagesvay ofay ethay Utchday anday Englishay otay ethay Orthernnay Oceanay, inay orderay, ifay ossiblepay, otay iscoverday aay assagepay oughthray itay otay Indiaay, oughthay eythay ailedfay ofay eirthay ainmay objectay, aid-openlay ethay auntshay ofay ethay ale.”whay ulloch’s—_McCay Ommercialcay Ictionaryday_. 

ese“Thay ingsthay areay eciprocalray; ethay allbay eboundsray, onlyay otay oundbay orwardfay againay; orfay ownay inay ayinglay openay ethay auntshay ofay ethay alewhay, ethay alemenwhay eemsay otay avehay indirectlyay ithay uponay ewnay ewsclay otay atthay amesay icmystay Orth-westnay Assage.”pay om—_Fray_ omething_”“_Say unpublished_ay_. 

It“ay isay impossibleay otay eetmay aay ale-shipwhay onay ethay oceanay ithoutway eingbay uckstray byay erhay earnay appearanceay. Ethay esselvay underay ortshay ailsay, ithway ook-outslay atay ethay ast-headsmay, eagerlyay anningscay ethay ideway expanseay arounday emthay, ashay aay otallytay ifferentday airay omfray osethay engageday inay egularray oyage.”vay urrents—_Cay anday Alingwhay. U.SAY. Exay. Exay_. 

edestrians“Pay inay ethay icinityvay ofay Ondonlay anday elsewhereay aymay ecollectray avinghay eensay argelay urvedcay onesbay etsay uprightay inay ethay earthay, eitheray otay ormfay archesay overay atewaysgay, oray entrancesay otay alcovesay, anday eythay aymay erhapspay avehay eenbay oldtay atthay esethay ereway ethay ibsray ofay ales.”whay ales—_Tay ofay aay Alewhay Oyagervay otay ethay Arcticay Oceanay_. 

It“ay asway otnay illtay ethay oatsbay eturnedray omfray ethay ursuitpay ofay esethay aleswhay, atthay ethay iteswhay awsay eirthay ipshay inay oodyblay ossessionpay ofay ethay avagessay enrolleday amongay ethay ew.”cray ewspaper—_Nay Accountay ofay ethay Akingtay anday Etakingray ofay ethay Ale-shipwhay Obomackhay_. 

It“ay isay enerallygay ellway ownknay atthay outay ofay ethay ewscray ofay Alingwhay esselsvay American(ay) ewfay everay eturnray inay ethay ipsshay onay oardbay ofay ichwhay eythay eparted.”day uise—_Cray inay aay Alewhay Oatbay_. 

uddenly“Say aay ightymay assmay emergeday omfray ethay aterway, anday otshay upay erpendicularlypay intoay ethay airay. Itay asway ethay ale.”whay iriam—_May Offincay oray ethay Alewhay Ishermanfay_. 

e“Thay Alewhay isay arpoonedhay otay ebay uresay; utbay ethinkbay ouyay, owhay ouyay ouldway anagemay aay owerfulpay unbrokenay oltcay, ithway ethay eremay applianceay ofay aay operay iedtay otay ethay ootray ofay ishay ail.”tay A—_AY Apterchay onay Alingwhay inay Ibsray anday Uckstray_. 

On“ay oneay occasionay IAY awsay otway ofay esethay onstersmay ales(whay) obablypray alemay anday emalefay, owlyslay immingsway, oneay afteray ethay otheray, ithinway esslay anthay aay one’sstay owthray ofay ethay ore”shay erra(Tay Elday Uegofay), over“ay ichwhay ethay eechbay eetray extendeday itsay anches.”bray arwin’s—_Day Oyagevay ofay aay Aturalistnay_. 

ern“‘Stay all!’ay exclaimeday ethay atemay, asay uponay urningtay ishay eadhay, ehay awsay ethay istendedday awsjay ofay aay argelay Ermspay Alewhay oseclay otay ethay eadhay ofay ethay oatbay, eateningthray itay ithway instantay estruction;—‘Sternday allay, orfay ouryay ives!’”lay arton—_Whay ethay Alewhay Illerkay_. 

o“Say ebay eerychay, myay adslay, etlay ouryay eartshay evernay ailfay, Ilewhay ethay oldbay arpooneerhay isay ikingstray ethay ale!”whay antucket—_Nay Ongsay_. 



Oh“ay, ethay areray olday Alewhay, idmay ormstay anday alegay Inay ishay oceanay omehay illway ebay AAY iantgay inay ightmay, erewhay ightmay isay ightray, Anday Ingkay ofay ethay oundlessbay ea.”say ale—_Whay Ongsay_. 









APTERCHAY 1ay. Oomingslay. 

Allcay emay Ishmaelay. Omesay earsyay ago—neveray indmay owhay onglay ecisely—havingpray ittlelay oray onay oneymay inay myay ursepay, anday othingnay articularpay otay interestay emay onay oreshay, IAY oughtthay IAY ouldway ailsay aboutay aay ittlelay anday eesay ethay ateryway artpay ofay ethay orldway. Itay isay aay ayway IAY avehay ofay ivingdray offay ethay eensplay anday egulatingray ethay irculationcay. Eneverwhay IAY indfay elfmysay owinggray imgray aboutay ethay outhmay; eneverwhay itay isay aay ampday, izzlydray Ovembernay inay myay oulsay; eneverwhay IAY indfay elfmysay involuntarilyay ausingpay eforebay offincay arehousesway, anday ingingbray upay ethay earray ofay everyay uneralfay IAY eetmay; anday especiallyay eneverwhay myay oshypay etgay uchsay anay upperay andhay ofay emay, atthay itay equiresray aay ongstray oralmay inciplepray otay eventpray emay omfray eliberatelyday eppingstay intoay ethay eetstray, anday ethodicallymay ockingknay eople’spay atshay off—thenay, IAY accountay itay ighhay imetay otay etgay otay easay asay oonsay asay IAY ancay. Isthay isay myay ubstitutesay orfay istolpay anday allbay. Ithway aay ilosophicalphay ourishflay Atocay owsthray imselfhay uponay ishay ordsway; IAY uietlyqay aketay otay ethay ipshay. Erethay isay othingnay urprisingsay inay isthay. Ifay eythay utbay ewknay itay, almostay allay enmay inay eirthay egreeday, omesay imetay oray otheray, erishchay eryvay earlynay ethay amesay eelingsfay owardstay ethay oceanay ithway emay. 

Erethay ownay isay ouryay insularay itycay ofay ethay Anhattoesmay, eltedbay oundray byay arveswhay asay Indianay islesay byay oralcay eefs—commerceray urroundssay itay ithway erhay urfsay. Ightray anday eftlay, ethay eetsstray aketay ouyay aterwardway. Itsay extremeay owntownday isay ethay atterybay, erewhay atthay oblenay olemay isay ashedway byay avesway, anday ooledcay byay eezesbray, ichwhay aay ewfay ourshay eviouspray ereway outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay. Ooklay atay ethay owdscray ofay ater-gazersway erethay. 

Ircumambulatecay ethay itycay ofay aay eamydray Abbathsay afternoonay. Ogay omfray Orlearscay Ookhay otay Oentiescay Ipslay, anday omfray encethay, byay Itehallwhay, orthwardnay. Atwhay oday ouyay ee?—Postedsay ikelay ilentsay entinelssay allay arounday ethay owntay, andstay ousandsthay uponay ousandsthay ofay ortalmay enmay ixedfay inay oceanay everiesray. Omesay eaninglay againstay ethay ilesspay; omesay eatedsay uponay ethay ier-headspay; omesay ookinglay overay ethay ulwarksbay ofay ipsshay omfray Inachay; omesay ighhay aloftay inay ethay iggingray, asay ifay ivingstray otay etgay aay illstay etterbay eawardsay eeppay. Utbay esethay areay allay andsmenlay; ofay eekway aysday entpay upay inay athlay anday aster—tiedplay otay ounterscay, ailednay otay enchesbay, inchedclay otay esksday. Owhay enthay isay isthay? Areay ethay eengray ieldsfay onegay? Atwhay oday eythay erehay? 

Utbay ooklay! erehay omecay oremay owdscray, acingpay aightstray orfay ethay aterway, anday eeminglysay oundbay orfay aay iveday. Angestray! Othingnay illway ontentcay emthay utbay ethay extremestay imitlay ofay ethay andlay; oiteringlay underay ethay adyshay eelay ofay onderyay arehousesway illway otnay ufficesay. Onay. Eythay ustmay etgay ustjay asay ighnay ethay aterway asay eythay ossiblypay ancay ithoutway allingfay inay. Anday erethay eythay and—milesstay ofay em—leaguesthay. Inlandersay allay, eythay omecay omfray aneslay anday alleysay, eetsstray anday avenues—northay, eastay, outhsay, anday estway. Etyay erehay eythay allay uniteay. Elltay emay, oesday ethay agneticmay irtuevay ofay ethay eedlesnay ofay ethay ompassescay ofay allay osethay ipsshay attractay emthay itherthay? 

Onceay oremay. Aysay ouyay areay inay ethay ountrycay; inay omesay ighhay andlay ofay akeslay. Aketay almostay anyay athpay ouyay easeplay, anday entay otay oneay itay arriescay ouyay ownday inay aay aleday, anday eaveslay ouyay erethay byay aay oolpay inay ethay eamstray. Erethay isay agicmay inay itay. Etlay ethay ostmay absent-mindeday ofay enmay ebay ungedplay inay ishay eepestday everies—standray atthay anmay onay ishay egslay, etsay ishay eetfay a-goingay, anday ehay illway infalliblyay eadlay ouyay otay aterway, ifay aterway erethay ebay inay allay atthay egionray. Ouldshay ouyay everay ebay athirstay inay ethay eatgray Americanay esertday, tryay isthay experimentay, ifay ouryay aravancay appenhay otay ebay uppliedsay ithway aay etaphysicalmay ofessorpray. Esyay, asay everyay oneay owsknay, editationmay anday aterway areay eddedway orfay everay. 

Utbay erehay isay anay artistay. Ehay esiresday otay aintpay ouyay ethay eamiestdray, adiestshay, uietestqay, ostmay enchantingay itbay ofay omanticray andscapelay inay allay ethay alleyvay ofay ethay Acosay. Atwhay isay ethay iefchay elementay ehay employsay? Erethay andstay ishay eestray, eachay ithway aay ollowhay unktray, asay ifay aay ermithay anday aay ucifixcray ereway ithinway; anday erehay eepsslay ishay eadowmay, anday erethay eepslay ishay attlecay; anday upay omfray onderyay ottagecay oesgay aay eepyslay okesmay. Eepday intoay istantday oodlandsway indsway aay azymay ayway, eachingray otay overlappingay ursspay ofay ountainsmay athedbay inay eirthay ill-sidehay ueblay. Utbay oughthay ethay icturepay ieslay usthay ancedtray, anday oughthay isthay ine-treepay akesshay ownday itsay ighssay ikelay eaveslay uponay isthay epherd’sshay eadhay, etyay allay ereway ainvay, unlessay ethay epherd’sshay eyeay ereway ixedfay uponay ethay agicmay eamstray eforebay imhay. Ogay isitvay ethay Airiespray inay Unejay, enwhay orfay oresscay onay oresscay ofay ilesmay ouyay adeway ee-deepknay amongay Iger-lilies—whattay isay ethay oneay armchay anting?—Water—thereway isay otnay aay opdray ofay aterway erethay! Ereway Iagaranay utbay aay ataractcay ofay andsay, ouldway ouyay aveltray ouryay ousandthay ilesmay otay eesay itay? Whyay idday ethay oorpay oetpay ofay Ennesseetay, uponay uddenlysay eceivingray otway andfulshay ofay ilversay, eliberateday etherwhay otay uybay imhay aay oatcay, ichwhay ehay adlysay eedednay, oray investay ishay oneymay inay aay edestrianpay iptray otay Ockawayray Eachbay? Whyay isay almostay everyay obustray ealthyhay oybay ithway aay obustray ealthyhay oulsay inay imhay, atay omesay imetay oray otheray azycray otay ogay otay easay? Whyay uponay ouryay irstfay oyagevay asay aay assengerpay, idday ouyay ourselfyay eelfay uchsay aay icalmystay ibrationvay, enwhay irstfay oldtay atthay ouyay anday ouryay ipshay ereway ownay outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay? Whyay idday ethay olday Ersianspay oldhay ethay easay olyhay? Whyay idday ethay Eeksgray ivegay itay aay eparatesay eityday, anday ownay otherbray ofay Ovejay? Urelysay allay isthay isay otnay ithoutway eaningmay. Anday illstay eeperday ethay eaningmay ofay atthay orystay ofay Arcissusnay, owhay ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay aspgray ethay ormentingtay, ildmay imageay ehay awsay inay ethay ountainfay, ungedplay intoay itay anday asway owneddray. Utbay atthay amesay imageay, eway ourselvesay eesay inay allay iversray anday oceansay. Itay isay ethay imageay ofay ethay ungraspableay antomphay ofay ifelay; anday isthay isay ethay eykay otay itay allay. 

Ownay, enwhay IAY aysay atthay IAY amay inay ethay abithay ofay oinggay otay easay eneverwhay IAY eginbay otay owgray azyhay aboutay ethay eyesay, anday eginbay otay ebay overay onsciouscay ofay myay ungslay, IAY oday otnay eanmay otay avehay itay inferreday atthay IAY everay ogay otay easay asay aay assengerpay. Orfay otay ogay asay aay assengerpay ouyay ustmay eedsnay avehay aay ursepay, anday aay ursepay isay utbay aay agray unlessay ouyay avehay omethingsay inay itay. Esidesbay, assengerspay etgay ea-sick—growsay uarrelsome—don’tqay eepslay ofay ights—donay otnay enjoyay emselvesthay uchmay, asay aay eneralgay ing;—nothay, IAY evernay ogay asay aay assengerpay; ornay, oughthay IAY amay omethingsay ofay aay altsay, oday IAY everay ogay otay easay asay aay Ommodorecay, oray aay Aptaincay, oray aay Ookcay. IAY abandonay ethay oryglay anday istinctionday ofay uchsay officesay otay osethay owhay ikelay emthay. Orfay myay artpay, IAY abominateay allay onorablehay espectableray oilstay, ialstray, anday ibulationstray ofay everyay indkay atsoeverwhay. Itay isay uiteqay asay uchmay asay IAY ancay oday otay aketay arecay ofay elfmysay, ithoutway akingtay arecay ofay ipsshay, arquesbay, igsbray, oonersschay, anday atwhay otnay. Anday asay orfay oinggay asay ook,—thoughcay IAY onfesscay erethay isay onsiderablecay oryglay inay atthay, aay ookcay eingbay aay ortsay ofay officeray onay ip-board—yetshay, omehowsay, IAY evernay anciedfay oilingbray owls;—thoughfay onceay oiledbray, udiciouslyjay utteredbay, anday udgmaticallyjay altedsay anday epperedpay, erethay isay onay oneay owhay illway eakspay oremay espectfullyray, otnay otay aysay everentiallyray, ofay aay oiledbray owlfay anthay IAY illway. Itay isay outay ofay ethay idolatrousay otingsday ofay ethay olday Egyptiansay uponay oiledbray ibisay anday oastedray iverray orsehay, atthay ouyay eesay ethay ummiesmay ofay osethay eaturescray inay eirthay ugehay ake-housesbay ethay amidspyray. 

Onay, enwhay IAY ogay otay easay, IAY ogay asay aay implesay ailorsay, ightray eforebay ethay astmay, umbplay ownday intoay ethay orecastlefay, aloftay erethay otay ethay oyalray ast-headmay. Uetray, eythay atherray orderay emay aboutay omesay, anday akemay emay umpjay omfray arspay otay arspay, ikelay aay asshoppergray inay aay Aymay eadowmay. Anday atay irstfay, isthay ortsay ofay ingthay isay unpleasantay enoughay. Itay ouchestay one’say ensesay ofay onorhay, articularlypay ifay ouyay omecay ofay anay olday establisheday amilyfay inay ethay andlay, ethay Anvay Ensselaersray, oray Andolphsray, oray Ardicanuteshay. Anday oremay anthay allay, ifay ustjay eviouspray otay uttingpay ouryay andhay intoay ethay ar-pottay, ouyay avehay eenbay ordinglay itay asay aay ountrycay oolmasterschay, akingmay ethay allesttay oysbay andstay inay aweay ofay ouyay. Ethay ansitiontray isay aay eenkay oneay, IAY assureay ouyay, omfray aay oolmasterschay otay aay ailorsay, anday equiresray aay ongstray ecoctionday ofay Enecasay anday ethay Oicsstay otay enableay ouyay otay ingray anday earbay itay. Utbay evenay isthay earsway offay inay imetay. 

Atwhay ofay itay, ifay omesay olday unkshay ofay aay ea-captainsay ordersay emay otay etgay aay oombray anday eepsway ownday ethay ecksday? Atwhay oesday atthay indignityay amountay otay, eighedway, IAY eanmay, inay ethay alesscay ofay ethay Ewnay Estamenttay? Oday ouyay inkthay ethay archangelay Abrielgay inksthay anythingay ethay esslay ofay emay, ecausebay IAY omptlypray anday espectfullyray obeyay atthay olday unkshay inay atthay articularpay instanceay? Owhay ain’tay aay aveslay? Elltay emay atthay. Ellway, enthay, oweverhay ethay olday ea-captainssay aymay orderay emay about—howeveray eythay aymay umpthay anday unchpay emay aboutay, IAY avehay ethay atisfactionsay ofay owingknay atthay itay isay allay ightray; atthay everybodyay elseay isay oneay ayway oray otheray ervedsay inay uchmay ethay amesay ay—eitherway inay aay icalphysay oray etaphysicalmay ointpay ofay iewvay, atthay isay; anday osay ethay universalay umpthay isay assedpay oundray, anday allay andshay ouldshay ubray eachay other’say oulder-bladesshay, anday ebay ontentcay. 

Againay, IAY alwaysay ogay otay easay asay aay ailorsay, ecausebay eythay akemay aay ointpay ofay ayingpay emay orfay myay oubletray, ereaswhay eythay evernay aypay assengerspay aay inglesay ennypay atthay IAY everay eardhay ofay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, assengerspay emselvesthay ustmay aypay. Anday erethay isay allay ethay ifferenceday inay ethay orldway etweenbay ayingpay anday eingbay aidpay. Ethay actay ofay ayingpay isay erhapspay ethay ostmay uncomfortableay inflictionay atthay ethay otway orcharday ievesthay entaileday uponay usay. Utbay eing_bay aid_,—whatpay illway omparecay ithway itay? Ethay urbaneay activityay ithway ichwhay aay anmay eceivesray oneymay isay eallyray arvellousmay, onsideringcay atthay eway osay earnestlyay elievebay oneymay otay ebay ethay ootray ofay allay earthlyay illsay, anday atthay onay onay accountay ancay aay oniedmay anmay enteray eavenhay. Ahay! owhay eerfullychay eway onsigncay ourselvesay otay erditionpay! 

Inallyfay, IAY alwaysay ogay otay easay asay aay ailorsay, ecausebay ofay ethay olesomewhay exerciseay anday urepay airay ofay ethay ore-castlefay eckday. Orfay asay inay isthay orldway, eadhay indsway areay arfay oremay evalentpray anthay indsway omfray asternay at(thay isay, ifay ouyay evernay iolatevay ethay Agoreanpythay aximmay), osay orfay ethay ostmay artpay ethay Ommodorecay onay ethay uarter-deckqay etsgay ishay atmosphereay atay econdsay andhay omfray ethay ailorssay onay ethay orecastlefay. Ehay inksthay ehay eathesbray itay irstfay; utbay otnay osay. Inay uchmay ethay amesay ayway oday ethay ommonaltycay eadlay eirthay eaderslay inay anymay otheray ingsthay, atay ethay amesay imetay atthay ethay eaderslay ittlelay uspectsay itay. Utbay ereforewhay itay asway atthay afteray avinghay epeatedlyray eltsmay ethay easay asay aay erchantmay ailorsay, IAY ouldshay ownay aketay itay intoay myay eadhay otay ogay onay aay alingwhay oyagevay; isthay ethay invisibleay olicepay officeray ofay ethay Atesfay, owhay ashay ethay onstantcay urveillancesay ofay emay, anday ecretlysay ogsday emay, anday influencesay emay inay omesay unaccountableay ay—heway ancay etterbay answeray anthay anyay oneay elseay. Anday, oubtlessday, myay oinggay onay isthay alingwhay oyagevay, ormedfay artpay ofay ethay andgray ogrammepray ofay Ovidencepray atthay asway awndray upay aay onglay imetay agoay. Itay amecay inay asay aay ortsay ofay iefbray interludeay anday olosay etweenbay oremay extensiveay erformancespay. IAY aketay itay atthay isthay artpay ofay ethay illbay ustmay avehay unray omethingsay ikelay isthay: 

and“_Gray Ontestedcay Electionay orfay ethay Esidencypray ofay ethay Uniteday Atesstay._ ALING“WHAY OYAGEVAY BYAY ONEAY ISHMAELAY. OODY“BLAY ATTLEBAY INAY AFFGHANISTAN.”AY 

Oughthay IAY annotcay elltay whyay itay asway exactlyay atthay osethay agestay anagersmay, ethay Atesfay, utpay emay ownday orfay isthay abbyshay artpay ofay aay alingwhay oyagevay, enwhay othersay ereway etsay ownday orfay agnificentmay artspay inay ighhay agediestray, anday ortshay anday easyay artspay inay enteelgay omediescay, anday ollyjay artspay inay arces—thoughfay IAY annotcay elltay whyay isthay asway exactlyay; etyay, ownay atthay IAY ecallray allay ethay ircumstancescay, IAY inkthay IAY ancay eesay aay ittlelay intoay ethay ingsspray anday otivesmay ichwhay eingbay unninglycay esentedpray otay emay underay ariousvay isguisesday, induceday emay otay etsay aboutay erformingpay ethay artpay IAY idday, esidesbay ajolingcay emay intoay ethay elusionday atthay itay asway aay oicechay esultingray omfray myay ownay unbiaseday eewillfray anday iscriminatingday udgmentjay. 

Iefchay amongay esethay otivesmay asway ethay overwhelmingay ideaay ofay ethay eatgray alewhay imselfhay. Uchsay aay ortentouspay anday eriousmystay onstermay ousedray allay myay uriositycay. Enthay ethay ildway anday istantday eassay erewhay ehay olledray ishay islanday ulkbay; ethay undeliverableay, amelessnay erilspay ofay ethay alewhay; esethay, ithway allay ethay attendingay arvelsmay ofay aay ousandthay Atagonianpay ightssay anday oundssay, elpedhay otay aysway emay otay myay ishway. Ithway otheray enmay, erhapspay, uchsay ingsthay ouldway otnay avehay eenbay inducementsay; utbay asay orfay emay, IAY amay ormentedtay ithway anay everlastingay itchay orfay ingsthay emoteray. IAY ovelay otay ailsay orbiddenfay eassay, anday andlay onay arbarousbay oastscay. Otnay ignoringay atwhay isay oodgay, IAY amay uickqay otay erceivepay aay orrorhay, anday ouldcay illstay ebay ocialsay ithway it—woulday eythay etlay e—sincemay itay isay utbay ellway otay ebay onay iendlyfray ermstay ithway allay ethay inmatesay ofay ethay aceplay oneay odgeslay inay. 

Byay easonray ofay esethay ingsthay, enthay, ethay alingwhay oyagevay asway elcomeway; ethay eatgray ood-gatesflay ofay ethay onder-worldway ungsway openay, anday inay ethay ildway onceitscay atthay ayedsway emay otay myay urposepay, otway anday otway erethay oatedflay intoay myay inmostay oulsay, endlessay ocessionspray ofay ethay alewhay, anday, idmay ostmay ofay emthay allay, oneay andgray oodedhay antomphay, ikelay aay owsnay illhay inay ethay airay. 



APTERCHAY 2ay. Ethay Arpet-bagcay. 

IAY uffedstay aay irtshay oray otway intoay myay olday arpet-bagcay, uckedtay itay underay myay armay, anday artedstay orfay Apecay Ornhay anday ethay Acificpay. Uittingqay ethay oodgay itycay ofay olday Anhattomay, IAY ulyday arriveday inay Ewnay Edfordbay. Itay asway aay Aturdaysay ightnay inay Ecemberday. Uchmay asway IAY isappointedday uponay earninglay atthay ethay ittlelay acketpay orfay Antucketnay adhay alreadyay ailedsay, anday atthay onay ayway ofay eachingray atthay aceplay ouldway offeray, illtay ethay ollowingfay Ondaymay. 

Asay ostmay oungyay andidatescay orfay ethay ainspay anday enaltiespay ofay alingwhay opstay atay isthay amesay Ewnay Edfordbay, encethay otay embarkay onay eirthay oyagevay, itay aymay asay ellway ebay elatedray atthay IAY, orfay oneay, adhay onay ideaay ofay osay oingday. Orfay myay indmay asway ademay upay otay ailsay inay onay otheray anthay aay Antucketnay aftcray, ecausebay erethay asway aay inefay, oisterousbay omethingsay aboutay everythingay onnectedcay ithway atthay amousfay olday islanday, ichwhay amazinglyay easedplay emay. Esidesbay oughthay Ewnay Edfordbay ashay ofay atelay eenbay aduallygray onopolisingmay ethay usinessbay ofay alingwhay, anday oughthay inay isthay attermay oorpay olday Antucketnay isay ownay uchmay ehindbay erhay, etyay Antucketnay asway erhay eatgray original—theay Etyray ofay isthay Arthage;—thecay aceplay erewhay ethay irstfay eadday Americanay alewhay asway andedstray. Erewhay elseay utbay omfray Antucketnay idday osethay aboriginalay alemenwhay, ethay Ed-menray, irstfay allysay outay inay anoescay otay ivegay asechay otay ethay Eviathanlay? Anday erewhay utbay omfray Antucketnay, ootay, idday atthay irstfay adventurousay ittlelay oopslay utpay orthfay, artlypay adenlay ithway importeday obblestones—socay oesgay ethay ory—tostay owthray atay ethay aleswhay, inay orderay otay iscoverday enwhay eythay ereway ighnay enoughay otay iskray aay arpoonhay omfray ethay owspritbay? 

Ownay avinghay aay ightnay, aay ayday, anday illstay anotheray ightnay ollowingfay eforebay emay inay Ewnay Edfordbay, ereay IAY ouldcay embarkay orfay myay estinedday ortpay, itay ecamebay aay attermay ofay oncernmentcay erewhay IAY asway otay eatay anday eepslay eanwhilemay. Itay asway aay eryvay ubious-lookingday, aynay, aay eryvay arkday anday ismalday ightnay, itinglybay oldcay anday eerlesschay. IAY ewknay onay oneay inay ethay aceplay. Ithway anxiousay apnelsgray IAY adhay oundedsay myay ocketpay, anday onlyay oughtbray upay aay ewfay iecespay ofay ilver,—Sosay, ereverwhay ouyay ogay, Ishmaelay, aidsay IAY otay elfmysay, asay IAY oodstay inay ethay iddlemay ofay aay earydray eetstray oulderingshay myay agbay, anday omparingcay ethay oomglay owardstay ethay orthnay ithway ethay arknessday owardstay ethay outh—whereversay inay ouryay isdomway ouyay aymay oncludecay otay odgelay orfay ethay ightnay, myay earday Ishmaelay, ebay uresay otay inquireay ethay icepray, anday on’tday ebay ootay articularpay. 

Ithway altinghay epsstay IAY acedpay ethay eetsstray, anday assedpay ethay ignsay ofay e“Thay Ossedcray Arpoons”—buthay itay ookedlay ootay expensiveay anday ollyjay erethay. Urtherfay onay, omfray ethay ightbray edray indowsway ofay ethay ord-Fish“Sway Inn,”ay erethay amecay uchsay erventfay aysray, atthay itay eemedsay otay avehay eltedmay ethay ackedpay owsnay anday iceay omfray eforebay ethay ousehay, orfay everywhereay elseay ethay ongealedcay ostfray aylay entay inchesay ickthay inay aay ardhay, asphalticay avement,—ratherpay earyway orfay emay, enwhay IAY uckstray myay ootfay againstay ethay intyflay ojectionspray, ecausebay omfray ardhay, emorselessray ervicesay ethay olessay ofay myay ootsbay ereway inay aay ostmay iserablemay ightplay. Ootay expensiveay anday ollyjay, againay oughtthay IAY, ausingpay oneay omentmay otay atchway ethay oadbray areglay inay ethay eetstray, anday earhay ethay oundssay ofay ethay inklingtay assesglay ithinway. Utbay ogay onay, Ishmaelay, aidsay IAY atay astlay; on’tday ouyay earhay? etgay awayay omfray eforebay ethay oorday; ouryay atchedpay ootsbay areay oppingstay ethay ayway. Osay onay IAY entway. IAY ownay byay instinctay ollowedfay ethay eetsstray atthay ooktay emay aterwardway, orfay erethay, oubtlessday, ereway ethay eapestchay, ifay otnay ethay eeriestchay innsay. 

Uchsay earydray eetsstray! ocksblay ofay acknessblay, otnay ouseshay, onay eitheray andhay, anday erehay anday erethay aay andlecay, ikelay aay andlecay ovingmay aboutay inay aay ombtay. Atay isthay ourhay ofay ethay ightnay, ofay ethay astlay ayday ofay ethay eekway, atthay uarterqay ofay ethay owntay ovedpray allay utbay esertedday. Utbay esentlypray IAY amecay otay aay okysmay ightlay oceedingpray omfray aay owlay, ideway uildingbay, ethay oorday ofay ichwhay oodstay invitinglyay openay. Itay adhay aay arelesscay ooklay, asay ifay itay ereway eantmay orfay ethay usesay ofay ethay ublicpay; osay, enteringay, ethay irstfay ingthay IAY idday asway otay umblestay overay anay ash-boxay inay ethay orchpay. Ahay! oughtthay IAY, ahay, asay ethay ingflyay articlespay almostay okedchay emay, areay esethay ashesay omfray atthay estroyedday itycay, Omorrahgay? Utbay e“Thay Ossedcray Arpoons,”hay anday e“Thay Ord-fish?”—thissway, enthay ustmay eedsnay ebay ethay ignsay ofay e“Thay Ap.”tray Oweverhay, IAY ickedpay elfmysay upay anday earinghay aay oudlay oicevay ithinway, ushedpay onay anday openeday aay econdsay, interioray oorday. 

Itay eemedsay ethay eatgray Ackblay Arliamentpay ittingsay inay Ophettay. AAY undredhay ackblay acesfay urnedtay oundray inay eirthay owsray otay eerpay; anday eyondbay, aay ackblay Angelay ofay Oomday asway eatingbay aay ookbay inay aay ulpitpay. Itay asway aay egronay urchchay; anday ethay eacher’spray exttay asway aboutay ethay acknessblay ofay arknessday, anday ethay eepingway anday ailingway anday eeth-gnashingtay erethay. Ahay, Ishmaelay, utteredmay IAY, ackingbay outay, Etchedwray entertainmentay atay ethay ignsay ofay e‘Thay Ap!’tray 

Ovingmay onay, IAY atay astlay amecay otay aay imday ortsay ofay ightlay otnay arfay omfray ethay ocksday, anday eardhay aay orlornfay eakingcray inay ethay airay; anday ookinglay upay, awsay aay ingingsway ignsay overay ethay oorday ithway aay itewhay aintingpay uponay itay, aintlyfay epresentingray aay alltay aightstray etjay ofay istymay ayspray, anday esethay ordsway underneath—“Theay Outerspay Inn:—peteray Offin.”cay 

Offin?—spouter?—rathercay ominousay inay atthay articularpay onnexioncay, oughtthay IAY. Utbay itay isay aay ommoncay amenay inay Antucketnay, eythay aysay, anday IAY upposesay isthay Eterpay erehay isay anay emigrantay omfray erethay. Asay ethay ightlay ookedlay osay imday, anday ethay aceplay, orfay ethay imetay, ookedlay uietqay enoughay, anday ethay ilapidatedday ittlelay oodenway ousehay itselfay ookedlay asay ifay itay ightmay avehay eenbay artedcay erehay omfray ethay uinsray ofay omesay urntbay istrictday, anday asay ethay ingingsway ignsay adhay aay overty-strickenpay ortsay ofay eakcray otay itay, IAY oughtthay atthay erehay asway ethay eryvay otspay orfay eapchay odgingslay, anday ethay estbay ofay eapay offeecay. 

Itay asway aay ueerqay ortsay ofay ace—aplay able-endedgay olday ousehay, oneay idesay alsiedpay asay itay ereway, anday eaninglay overay adlysay. Itay oodstay onay aay arpshay eakblay ornercay, erewhay atthay empestuoustay indway Euroclydonay eptkay upay aay orseway owlinghay anthay everay itay idday aboutay oorpay Aul’spay ossedtay aftcray. Euroclydonay, everthelessnay, isay aay ightymay easantplay ephyrzay otay anyay oneay in-doorsay, ithway ishay eetfay onay ethay obhay uietlyqay oastingtay orfay edbay. In“ay udgingjay ofay atthay empestuoustay indway alledcay Euroclydon,”ay ayssay anay olday iter—ofwray osewhay orksway IAY ossesspay ethay onlyay opycay extant—“itay akethmay aay arvellousmay ifferenceday, etherwhay outhay ookestlay outay atay itay omfray aay assglay indowway erewhay ethay ostfray isay allay onay ethay outsideay, oray etherwhay outhay observestay itay omfray atthay ashlesssay indowway, erewhay ethay ostfray isay onay othbay idessay, anday ofay ichwhay ethay ightway Eathday isay ethay onlyay azier.”glay Uetray enoughay, oughtthay IAY, asay isthay assagepay occurreday otay myay ind—oldmay ack-letterblay, outhay easonestray ellway. Esyay, esethay eyesay areay indowsway, anday isthay odybay ofay inemay isay ethay ousehay. Atwhay aay itypay eythay idn’tday opstay upay ethay inkschay anday ethay anniescray oughthay, anday ustthray inay aay ittlelay intlay erehay anday erethay. Utbay it’say ootay atelay otay akemay anyay improvementsay ownay. Ethay universeay isay inishedfay; ethay opestonecay isay onay, anday ethay ipschay ereway artedcay offay aay illionmay earsyay agoay. Oorpay Azaruslay erethay, atteringchay ishay eethtay againstay ethay urbstonecay orfay ishay illowpay, anday akingshay offay ishay atterstay ithway ishay iveringsshay, ehay ightmay ugplay upay othbay earsay ithway agsray, anday utpay aay orn-cobcay intoay ishay outhmay, anday etyay atthay ouldway otnay eepkay outay ethay empestuoustay Euroclydonay. Euroclydonay! ayssay olday Ivesday, inay ishay edray ilkensay apper—(hewray adhay aay edderray oneay afterwardsay) oohpay, oohpay! Atwhay aay inefay ostyfray ightnay; owhay Orionay ittersglay; atwhay orthernnay ightslay! Etlay emthay alktay ofay eirthay orientalay ummersay imesclay ofay everlastingay onservatoriescay; ivegay emay ethay ivilegepray ofay akingmay myay ownay ummersay ithway myay ownay oalscay. 

Utbay atwhay inksthay Azaruslay? Ancay ehay armway ishay ueblay andshay byay oldinghay emthay upay otay ethay andgray orthernnay ightslay? Ouldway otnay Azaruslay atherray ebay inay Umatrasay anthay erehay? Ouldway ehay otnay arfay atherray aylay imhay ownday engthwiselay alongay ethay inelay ofay ethay equatoray; eayay, eyay odsgay! ogay ownday otay ethay ieryfay itpay itselfay, inay orderay otay eepkay outay isthay ostfray? 

Ownay, atthay Azaruslay ouldshay ielay andedstray erethay onay ethay urbstonecay eforebay ethay oorday ofay Ivesday, isthay isay oremay onderfulway anthay atthay anay icebergay ouldshay ebay ooredmay otay oneay ofay ethay Oluccasmay. Etyay Ivesday imselfhay, ehay ootay iveslay ikelay aay Arczay inay anay iceay alacepay ademay ofay ozenfray ighssay, anday eingbay aay esidentpray ofay aay emperancetay ocietysay, ehay onlyay inksdray ethay epidtay earstay ofay orphansay. 

Utbay onay oremay ofay isthay ubberingblay ownay, eway areay oinggay a-whalingay, anday erethay isay entyplay ofay atthay etyay otay omecay. Etlay usay apescray ethay iceay omfray ouray ostedfray eetfay, anday eesay atwhay ortsay ofay aay aceplay isthay outer”“Spay aymay ebay. 



APTERCHAY 3ay. Ethay Outer-innspay. 

Enteringay atthay able-endedgay Outer-innspay, ouyay oundfay ourselfyay inay aay ideway, owlay, agglingstray entryay ithway old-fashioneday ainscotsway, emindingray oneay ofay ethay ulwarksbay ofay omesay ondemnedcay olday aftcray. Onay oneay idesay unghay aay eryvay argelay oilpaintingay osay oroughlythay esmokedbay, anday everyay ayway efacedday, atthay inay ethay unequalay osslightscray byay ichwhay ouyay iewedvay itay, itay asway onlyay byay iligentday udystay anday aay eriessay ofay ematicsystay isitsvay otay itay, anday arefulcay inquiryay ofay ethay eighborsnay, atthay ouyay ouldcay anyay ayway arriveay atay anay understandingay ofay itsay urposepay. Uchsay unaccountableay assesmay ofay adesshay anday adowsshay, atthay atay irstfay ouyay almostay oughtthay omesay ambitiousay oungyay artistay, inay ethay imetay ofay ethay Ewnay Englanday agshay, adhay endeavoreday otay elineateday aoschay ewitchedbay. Utbay byay intday ofay uchmay anday earnestay ontemplationcay, anday oftay epeatedray onderingspay, anday especiallyay byay owingthray openay ethay ittlelay indowway owardstay ethay ackbay ofay ethay entryay, ouyay atay astlay omecay otay ethay onclusioncay atthay uchsay anay ideaay, oweverhay ildway, ightmay otnay ebay altogetheray unwarranteday. 

Utbay atwhay ostmay uzzledpay anday onfoundedcay ouyay asway aay onglay, imberlay, ortentouspay, ackblay assmay ofay omethingsay overinghay inay ethay entrecay ofay ethay icturepay overay eethray ueblay, imday, erpendicularpay ineslay oatingflay inay aay amelessnay eastyay. AAY oggybay, oggysay, uitchysqay icturepay ulytray, enoughay otay ivedray aay ervousnay anmay istractedday. Etyay asway erethay aay ortsay ofay indefiniteay, alf-attainedhay, unimaginableay ublimitysay aboutay itay atthay airlyfay ozefray ouyay otay itay, illtay ouyay involuntarilyay ooktay anay oathay ithway ourselfyay otay indfay outay atwhay atthay arvellousmay aintingpay eantmay. Everay anday anonay aay ightbray, utbay, alasay, eceptiveday ideaay ouldway artday ouyay ough.—It’sthray ethay Ackblay Easay inay aay idnightmay ale.—It’sgay ethay unnaturalay ombatcay ofay ethay ourfay imalpray elements.—It’say aay astedblay eath.—It’shay aay Erboreanhypay interway ene.—It’sscay ethay eaking-upbray ofay ethay icebounday eamstray ofay Imetay. Utbay atay astlay allay esethay anciesfay ieldedyay otay atthay oneay ortentouspay omethingsay inay ethay icture’spay idstmay. at_Thay_ onceay oundfay outay, anday allay ethay estray ereway ainplay. Utbay opstay; oesday itay otnay earbay aay aintfay esemblanceray otay aay iganticgay ishfay? evenay ethay eatgray eviathanlay imselfhay? 

Inay actfay, ethay artist’say esignday eemedsay isthay: aay inalfay eorythay ofay myay ownay, artlypay asedbay uponay ethay aggregateday opinionsay ofay anymay ageday ersonspay ithway omwhay IAY onversedcay uponay ethay ubjectsay. Ethay icturepay epresentsray aay Ape-hornercay inay aay eatgray urricanehay; ethay alf-founderedhay ipshay elteringway erethay ithway itsay eethray ismantledday astsmay aloneay isiblevay; anday anay exasperateday alewhay, urposingpay otay ingspray eanclay overay ethay aftcray, isay inay ethay enormousay actay ofay impalingay imselfhay uponay ethay eethray ast-headsmay. 

Ethay oppositeay allway ofay isthay entryay asway unghay allay overay ithway aay eathenishhay arrayay ofay onstrousmay ubsclay anday earsspay. Omesay ereway icklythay etsay ithway itteringglay eethtay esemblingray ivoryay awssay; othersay ereway uftedtay ithway otsknay ofay umanhay airhay; anday oneay asway ickle-shapedsay, ithway aay astvay andlehay eepingsway oundray ikelay ethay egmentsay ademay inay ethay ew-mownnay assgray byay aay ong-armedlay owermay. Ouyay udderedshay asay ouyay azedgay, anday onderedway atwhay onstrousmay annibalcay anday avagesay ouldcay everay avehay onegay aay eath-harvestingday ithway uchsay aay ackinghay, orrifyinghay implementay. Ixedmay ithway esethay ereway ustyray olday alingwhay anceslay anday arpoonshay allay okenbray anday eformedday. Omesay ereway oriedstay eaponsway. Ithway isthay onceay onglay ancelay, ownay ildlyway elboweday, iftyfay earsyay agoay idday Athannay Ainsway illkay ifteenfay aleswhay etweenbay aay unrisesay anday aay unsetsay. Anday atthay arpoon—sohay ikelay aay orkscrewcay ow—wasnay ungflay inay Avanjay eassay, anday unray awayay ithway byay aay alewhay, earsyay afterwardsay ainslay offay ethay Apecay ofay Ancoblay. Ethay originalay ironay entereday ighnay ethay ailtay, anday, ikelay aay estlessray eedlenay ojourningsay inay ethay odybay ofay aay anmay, avelledtray ullfay ortyfay eetfay, anday atay astlay asway oundfay imbeddeday inay ethay umphay. 

Ossingcray isthay uskyday entryay, anday onay oughthray onyay ow-archedlay ay—cutway oughthray atwhay inay olday imestay ustmay avehay eenbay aay eatgray entralcay imneychay ithway ireplacesfay allay ound—youray enteray ethay ublicpay oomray. AAY illstay uskierday aceplay isay isthay, ithway uchsay owlay onderouspay eamsbay aboveay, anday uchsay olday inkledwray anksplay eneathbay, atthay ouyay ouldway almostay ancyfay ouyay odtray omesay olday aft’scray ockpitscay, especiallyay ofay uchsay aay owlinghay ightnay, enwhay isthay orner-anchoredcay olday arkay ockedray osay uriouslyfay. Onay oneay idesay oodstay aay onglay, owlay, elf-likeshay abletay overedcay ithway ackedcray assglay asescay, illedfay ithway ustyday aritiesray atheredgay omfray isthay ideway orld’sway emotestray ooksnay. Ojectingpray omfray ethay urtherfay angleay ofay ethay oomray andsstay aay ark-lookingday en—theday ar—abay uderay attemptay atay aay ightray ale’swhay eadhay. Ebay atthay owhay itay aymay, erethay andsstay ethay astvay archeday onebay ofay ethay ale’swhay awjay, osay ideway, aay oachcay ightmay almostay ivedray eneathbay itay. Ithinway areay abbyshay elvesshay, angedray oundray ithway olday ecantersday, ottlesbay, asksflay; anday inay osethay awsjay ofay iftsway estructionday, ikelay anotheray ursedcay Onahjay (byay ichwhay amenay indeeday eythay alledcay imhay), ustlesbay aay ittlelay itheredway olday anmay, owhay, orfay eirthay oneymay, earlyday ellssay ethay ailorssay eliriumsday anday eathday. 

Abominableay areay ethay umblerstay intoay ichwhay ehay ourspay ishay oisonpay. Oughthay uetray inderscylay ithout—withinway, ethay illanousvay eengray ogglinggay assesglay eceitfullyday aperedtay ownwardsday otay aay eatingchay ottombay. Arallelpay eridiansmay udelyray eckedpay intoay ethay assglay, urroundsay esethay ootpads’fay obletsgay. Illfay otay is_thay_ arkmay, anday ouryay argechay isay utbay aay ennypay; otay is_thay_ aay ennypay oremay; anday osay onay otay ethay ullfay ass—theglay Apecay Ornhay easuremay, ichwhay ouyay aymay ulpgay ownday orfay aay illingshay. 

Uponay enteringay ethay aceplay IAY oundfay aay umbernay ofay oungyay eamensay atheredgay aboutay aay abletay, examiningay byay aay imday ightlay iversday ecimensspay ofay imshander_skray_. IAY oughtsay ethay andlordlay, anday ellingtay imhay IAY esiredday otay ebay accommodateday ithway aay oomray, eceivedray orfay answeray atthay ishay ousehay asway ull—notfay aay edbay unoccupieday. ut“Bay avast,”ay ehay addeday, appingtay ishay oreheadfay, ou“yay ainthay onay objectionsay otay aringshay aay arpooneer’shay anketblay, avehay eyay? IAY oses’pay ouyay areay oin’gay a-whalin’ay, osay ou’dyay etterbay etgay useday otay atthay ortsay ofay ing.”thay 

IAY oldtay imhay atthay IAY evernay ikedlay otay eepslay otway inay aay edbay; atthay ifay IAY ouldshay everay oday osay, itay ouldway ependday uponay owhay ethay arpooneerhay ightmay ebay, anday atthay ifay ehay e(thay andlordlay) eallyray adhay onay otheray aceplay orfay emay, anday ethay arpooneerhay asway otnay ecidedlyday objectionableay, whyay atherray anthay anderway urtherfay aboutay aay angestray owntay onay osay itterbay aay ightnay, IAY ouldway utpay upay ithway ethay alfhay ofay anyay ecentday an’smay anketblay. 

I“AY oughtthay osay. Allay ightray; aketay aay eatsay. Upper?—yousay antway uppersay? Upper’llsay ebay eadyray irectly.”day 

IAY atsay ownday onay anay olday oodenway ettlesay, arvedcay allay overay ikelay aay enchbay onay ethay Atterybay. Atay oneay enday aay uminatingray artay asway illstay urtherfay adorningay itay ithway ishay ack-knifejay, oopingstay overay anday iligentlyday orkingway awayay atay ethay acespay etweenbay ishay egslay. Ehay asway ingtryay ishay andhay atay aay ipshay underay ullfay ailsay, utbay ehay idn’tday akemay uchmay eadwayhay, IAY oughtthay. 

Atay astlay omesay ourfay oray ivefay ofay usay ereway ummonedsay otay ouray ealmay inay anay adjoiningay oomray. Itay asway oldcay asay Iceland—noay irefay atay all—theay andlordlay aidsay ehay ouldn’tcay afforday itay. Othingnay utbay otway ismalday allowtay andlescay, eachay inay aay indingway eetshay. Eway ereway ainfay otay uttonbay upay ouray onkeymay acketsjay, anday oldhay otay ouray ipslay upscay ofay aldingscay eatay ithway ouray alfhay ozenfray ingersfay. Utbay ethay arefay asway ofay ethay ostmay ubstantialsay ind—notkay onlyay eatmay anday otatoespay, utbay umplingsday; oodgay eavenshay! umplingsday orfay uppersay! Oneay oungyay ellowfay inay aay eengray oxbay oatcay, addresseday imselfhay otay esethay umplingsday inay aay ostmay irefulday annermay. 

“Myay oy,”bay aidsay ethay andlordlay, ou’ll“yay avehay ethay ightmarenay otay aay eadday artainty.”say 

andlord,”“Lay IAY isperedwhay, at“thay aintay ethay arpooneerhay isay it?”ay 

Oh“ay, o,”nay aidsay ehay, ookinglay aay ortsay ofay iabolicallyday unnyfay, e“thay arpooneerhay isay aay arkday omplexionedcay apchay. Ehay evernay eatsay umplingsday, ehay on’t—heday eatsay othingnay utbay eaksstay, anday ehay ikeslay em’ay are.”ray 

e“Thay evilday ehay oes,”day ayssay IAY. ere“Whay isay atthay arpooneerhay? Isay ehay ere?”hay 

e’ll“Hay ebay erehay aforeay ong,”lay asway ethay answeray. 

IAY ouldcay otnay elphay itay, utbay IAY eganbay otay eelfay uspicioussay ofay isthay ark“day omplexioned”cay arpooneerhay. Atay anyay ateray, IAY ademay upay myay indmay atthay ifay itay osay urnedtay outay atthay eway ouldshay eepslay ogethertay, ehay ustmay undressay anday etgay intoay edbay eforebay IAY idday. 

Uppersay overay, ethay ompanycay entway ackbay otay ethay ar-roombay, enwhay, owingknay otnay atwhay elseay otay oday ithway elfmysay, IAY esolvedray otay endspay ethay estray ofay ethay eveningay asay aay ookerlay onay. 

Esentlypray aay iotingray oisenay asway eardhay ithoutway. Artingstay upay, ethay andlordlay iedcray, at’s“Thay ethay Ampus’sgray ewcray. IAY eedsay erhay eportedray inay ethay offingay isthay orningmay; aay eethray ears’yay oyagevay, anday aay ullfay ipshay. Urrahhay, oysbay; ownay e’llway avehay ethay atestlay ewsnay omfray ethay Eegees.”fay 

AAY ampingtray ofay easay ootsbay asway eardhay inay ethay entryay; ethay oorday asway ungflay openay, anday inay olledray aay ildway etsay ofay arinersmay enoughay. Envelopeday inay eirthay aggyshay atchway oatscay, anday ithway eirthay eadshay uffledmay inay oollenway omforterscay, allay edarnedbay anday aggedray, anday eirthay eardsbay iffstay ithway iciclesay, eythay eemedsay anay eruptionay ofay earsbay omfray Abradorlay. Eythay adhay ustjay andedlay omfray eirthay oatbay, anday isthay asway ethay irstfay ousehay eythay entereday. Onay onderway, enthay, atthay eythay ademay aay aightstray akeway orfay ethay ale’swhay outh—themay ar—whenbay ethay inkledwray ittlelay olday Onahjay, erethay officiatingay, oonsay ouredpay emthay outay immersbray allay oundray. Oneay omplainedcay ofay aay adbay oldcay inay ishay eadhay, uponay ichwhay Onahjay ixedmay imhay aay itch-likepay otionpay ofay ingay anday olassesmay, ichwhay ehay oresway asway aay overeignsay urecay orfay allay oldscay anday atarrhscay atsoeverwhay, evernay indmay ofay owhay onglay andingstay, oray etherwhay aughtcay offay ethay oastcay ofay Abradorlay, oray onay ethay eatherway idesay ofay anay ice-islanday. 

Ethay iquorlay oonsay ountedmay intoay eirthay eadshay, asay itay enerallygay oesday evenay ithway ethay arrantestay operstay ewlynay andedlay omfray easay, anday eythay eganbay aperingcay aboutay ostmay obstreperouslyay. 

IAY observeday, oweverhay, atthay oneay ofay emthay eldhay omewhatsay aloofay, anday oughthay ehay eemedsay esirousday otnay otay oilspay ethay ilarityhay ofay ishay ipmatesshay byay ishay ownay obersay acefay, etyay uponay ethay olewhay ehay efrainedray omfray akingmay asay uchmay oisenay asay ethay estray. Isthay anmay interesteday emay atay onceay; anday incesay ethay ea-godssay adhay ordaineday atthay ehay ouldshay oonsay ecomebay myay ipmateshay ough(thay utbay aay eeping-partnerslay oneay, osay arfay asay isthay arrativenay isay oncernedcay), IAY illway erehay enturevay uponay aay ittlelay escriptionday ofay imhay. Ehay oodstay ullfay ixsay eetfay inay eighthay, ithway oblenay ouldersshay, anday aay estchay ikelay aay offer-damcay. IAY avehay eldomsay eensay uchsay awnbray inay aay anmay. Ishay acefay asway eeplyday ownbray anday urntbay, akingmay ishay itewhay eethtay azzlingday byay ethay ontrastcay; ilewhay inay ethay eepday adowsshay ofay ishay eyesay oatedflay omesay eminiscencesray atthay idday otnay eemsay otay ivegay imhay uchmay oyjay. Ishay oicevay atay onceay announceday atthay ehay asway aay Outhernersay, anday omfray ishay inefay aturestay, IAY oughtthay ehay ustmay ebay oneay ofay osethay alltay ountaineersmay omfray ethay Alleghanianay Idgeray inay Irginiavay. Enwhay ethay evelryray ofay ishay ompanionscay adhay ountedmay otay itsay eighthay, isthay anmay ippedslay awayay unobserveday, anday IAY awsay onay oremay ofay imhay illtay ehay ecamebay myay omradecay onay ethay easay. Inay aay ewfay inutesmay, oweverhay, ehay asway issedmay byay ishay ipmatesshay, anday eingbay, itay eemssay, orfay omesay easonray aay ugehay avouritefay ithway emthay, eythay aisedray aay cryay ofay ulkington“Bay! Ulkingtonbay! ere’swhay Ulkington?”bay anday artedday outay ofay ethay ousehay inay ursuitpay ofay imhay. 

Itay asway ownay aboutay inenay o’clockay, anday ethay oomray eemingsay almostay upernaturallysay uietqay afteray esethay orgiesay, IAY eganbay otay ongratulatecay elfmysay uponay aay ittlelay anplay atthay adhay occurreday otay emay ustjay eviouspray otay ethay entranceay ofay ethay eamensay. 

Onay anmay eferspray otay eepslay otway inay aay edbay. Inay actfay, ouyay ouldway aay oodgay ealday atherray otnay eepslay ithway ouryay ownay otherbray. IAY on’tday owknay owhay itay isay, utbay eoplepay ikelay otay ebay ivatepray enwhay eythay areay eepingslay. Anday enwhay itay omescay otay eepingslay ithway anay unknownay angerstray, inay aay angestray innay, inay aay angestray owntay, anday atthay angerstray aay arpooneerhay, enthay ouryay objectionsay indefinitelyay ultiplymay. Ornay asway erethay anyay earthlyay easonray whyay IAY asay aay ailorsay ouldshay eepslay otway inay aay edbay, oremay anthay anybodyay elseay; orfay ailorssay onay oremay eepslay otway inay aay edbay atay easay, anthay achelorbay Ingskay oday ashoreay. Otay ebay uresay eythay allay eepslay ogethertay inay oneay apartmentay, utbay ouyay avehay ouryay ownay ammockhay, anday overcay ourselfyay ithway ouryay ownay anketblay, anday eepslay inay ouryay ownay inskay. 

Ethay oremay IAY onderedpay overay isthay arpooneerhay, ethay oremay IAY abominateday ethay oughtthay ofay eepingslay ithway imhay. Itay asway airfay otay esumepray atthay eingbay aay arpooneerhay, ishay inenlay oray oollenway, asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay, ouldway otnay ebay ofay ethay idiesttay, ertainlycay onenay ofay ethay inestfay. IAY eganbay otay itchtway allay overay. Esidesbay, itay asway ettinggay atelay, anday myay ecentday arpooneerhay oughtay otay ebay omehay anday oinggay edwardsbay. Upposesay ownay, ehay ouldshay umbletay inay uponay emay atay idnight—howmay ouldcay IAY elltay omfray atwhay ilevay olehay ehay adhay eenbay omingcay? 

andlord“Lay! I’veay angedchay myay indmay aboutay atthay arpooneer.—Ihay an’tshay eepslay ithway imhay. I’llay tryay ethay enchbay ere.”hay 

ust“Jay asay ouyay easeplay; I’may orrysay IAY an’tcay arespay eyay aay ableclothtay orfay aay attressmay, anday it’say aay aguyplay oughray oardbay ere”—feelinghay ofay ethay otsknay anday otchesnay. ut“Bay aitway aay itbay, Imshanderskray; I’veay otgay aay arpenter’scay aneplay erethay inay ethay ar—waitbay, IAY aysay, anday I’llay akemay eyay ugsnay enough.”ay Osay ayingsay ehay ocuredpray ethay aneplay; anday ithway ishay olday ilksay andkerchiefhay irstfay ustingday ethay enchbay, igorouslyvay etsay otay aningplay awayay atay myay edbay, ethay ilewhay inninggray ikelay anay apeay. Ethay avingsshay ewflay ightray anday eftlay; illtay atay astlay ethay ane-ironplay amecay umpbay againstay anay indestructibleay otknay. Ethay andlordlay asway earnay ainingspray ishay istwray, anday IAY oldtay imhay orfay eaven’shay akesay otay uit—theqay edbay asway oftsay enoughay otay uitsay emay, anday IAY idday otnay owknay owhay allay ethay aningplay inay ethay orldway ouldcay akemay eideray ownday ofay aay inepay ankplay. Osay atheringgay upay ethay avingsshay ithway anotheray ingray, anday owingthray emthay intoay ethay eatgray ovestay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oomray, ehay entway aboutay ishay usinessbay, anday eftlay emay inay aay ownbray udystay. 

IAY ownay ooktay ethay easuremay ofay ethay enchbay, anday oundfay atthay itay asway aay ootfay ootay ortshay; utbay atthay ouldcay ebay endedmay ithway aay airchay. Utbay itay asway aay ootfay ootay arrownay, anday ethay otheray enchbay inay ethay oomray asway aboutay ourfay inchesay igherhay anthay ethay anedplay one—soay erethay asway onay okingyay emthay. IAY enthay acedplay ethay irstfay enchbay engthwiselay alongay ethay onlyay earclay acespay againstay ethay allway, eavinglay aay ittlelay intervalay etweenbay, orfay myay ackbay otay ettlesay ownday inay. Utbay IAY oonsay oundfay atthay erethay amecay uchsay aay aughtdray ofay oldcay airay overay emay omfray underay ethay illsay ofay ethay indowway, atthay isthay anplay ouldway evernay oday atay allay, especiallyay asay anotheray urrentcay omfray ethay icketyray oorday etmay ethay oneay omfray ethay indowway, anday othbay ogethertay ormedfay aay eriessay ofay allsmay irlwindswhay inay ethay immediateay icinityvay ofay ethay otspay erewhay IAY adhay oughtthay otay endspay ethay ightnay. 

Ethay evilday etchfay atthay arpooneerhay, oughtthay IAY, utbay opstay, ouldn’tcay IAY ealstay aay archmay onay im—bolthay ishay oorday insideay, anday umpjay intoay ishay edbay, otnay otay ebay akenedway byay ethay ostmay iolentvay ockingsknay? Itay eemedsay onay adbay ideaay; utbay uponay econdsay oughtsthay IAY ismissedday itay. Orfay owhay ouldcay elltay utbay atwhay ethay extnay orningmay, osay oonsay asay IAY oppedpay outay ofay ethay oomray, ethay arpooneerhay ightmay ebay andingstay inay ethay entryay, allay eadyray otay ockknay emay ownday! 

Illstay, ookinglay oundray emay againay, anday eeingsay onay ossiblepay ancechay ofay endingspay aay ufferablesay ightnay unlessay inay omesay otheray erson’spay edbay, IAY eganbay otay inkthay atthay afteray allay IAY ightmay ebay erishingchay unwarrantableay ejudicespray againstay isthay unknownay arpooneerhay. Inksthay IAY, I’llay aitway awhileay; ehay ustmay ebay oppingdray inay eforebay onglay. I’llay avehay aay oodgay ooklay atay imhay enthay, anday erhapspay eway aymay ecomebay ollyjay oodgay edfellowsbay afteray all—there’say onay ellingtay. 

Utbay oughthay ethay otheray oardersbay eptkay omingcay inay byay onesay, ostway, anday eesthray, anday oinggay otay edbay, etyay onay ignsay ofay myay arpooneerhay. 

andlord!”“Lay aidsay IAY, at“whay ortsay ofay aay apchay isay e—doeshay ehay alwaysay eepkay uchsay atelay ours?”hay Itay asway ownay ardhay uponay elvetway o’clockay. 

Ethay andlordlay uckledchay againay ithway ishay eanlay ucklechay, anday eemedsay otay ebay ightilymay ickledtay atay omethingsay eyondbay myay omprehensioncay. o,”“Nay ehay answereday, enerally“gay e’shay anay earlyay ird—airleybay otay edbay anday airleyay otay ise—yesray, e’shay ethay irdbay atwhay atchescay ethay ormway. Utbay o-nighttay ehay entway outay aay eddlingpay, ouyay eesay, anday IAY on’tday eesay atwhay onay airthay eepskay imhay osay atelay, unlessay, aymay ebay, ehay an’tcay ellsay ishay ead.”hay 

an’t“Cay ellsay ishay ead?—Whathay ortsay ofay aay amboozinglybay orystay isay isthay ouyay areay ellingtay e?”may ettinggay intoay aay oweringtay ageray. o“Day ouyay etendpray otay aysay, andlordlay, atthay isthay arpooneerhay isay actuallyay engageday isthay essedblay Aturdaysay ightnay, oray atherray Undaysay orningmay, inay eddlingpay ishay eadhay arounday isthay own?”tay 

at’s“Thay eciselypray it,”ay aidsay ethay andlordlay, and“ay IAY oldtay imhay ehay ouldn’tcay ellsay itay erehay, ethay arket’smay overstocked.”ay 

ith“Way at?”whay outedshay IAY. 

ith“Way eadshay otay ebay uresay; ain’tay erethay ootay anymay eadshay inay ethay orld?”way 

I“AY elltay ouyay atwhay itay isay, andlord,”lay aidsay IAY uiteqay almlycay, ou’d“yay etterbay opstay inningspay atthay arnyay otay e—I’mmay otnay een.”gray 

ay“May ebay ot,”nay akingtay outay aay ickstay anday ittlingwhay aay oothpicktay, ut“bay IAY aytherray uessgay ou’llyay ebay oneday own_bray_ ifay atthay ereay arpooneerhay earshay ouyay aay anderin’slay ishay ead.”hay 

I’ll“ay eakbray itay orfay im,”hay aidsay IAY, ownay ingflyay intoay aay assionpay againay atay isthay unaccountableay arragofay ofay ethay andlord’slay. 

It’s“ay okebray a’ready,”ay aidsay ehay. 

oke,”“Bray aidsay I—“_brokeay_, oday ouyay ean?”may 

artain“Say, anday at’sthay ethay eryvay easonray ehay an’tcay ellsay itay, IAY uess.”gay 

andlord,”“Lay aidsay IAY, oinggay upay otay imhay asay oolcay asay Mtay. Eclahay inay aay ow-storm—“landlordsnay, opstay ittlingwhay. Ouyay anday IAY ustmay understanday oneay anotheray, anday atthay ootay ithoutway elayday. IAY omecay otay ouryay ousehay anday antway aay edbay; ouyay elltay emay ouyay ancay onlyay ivegay emay alfhay aay oneay; atthay ethay otheray alfhay elongsbay otay aay ertaincay arpooneerhay.
