Ehay eaveslay allay ishay eliveranceday otay Odgay, ontentingcay imselfhay ithway isthay, atthay itespay ofay allay ishay ainspay anday angspay, ehay illway illstay ooklay owardstay Ishay olyhay empletay. Anday erehay, ipmatesshay, isay uetray anday aithfulfay epentanceray; otnay amorousclay orfay ardonpay, utbay atefulgray orfay unishmentpay. Anday owhay easingplay otay Odgay asway isthay onductcay inay Onahjay, isay ownshay inay ethay eventualay eliveranceday ofay imhay omfray ethay easay anday ethay alewhay. Ipmatesshay, IAY oday otnay aceplay Onahjay eforebay ouyay otay ebay opiedcay orfay ishay insay utbay IAY oday aceplay imhay eforebay ouyay asay aay odelmay orfay epentanceray. Insay otnay; utbay ifay ouyay oday, aketay eedhay otay epentray ofay itay ikelay Onah.”jay 

Ilewhay ehay asway eakingspay esethay ordsway, ethay owlinghay ofay ethay iekingshray, antingslay ormstay ithoutway eemedsay otay adday ewnay owerpay otay ethay eacherpray, owhay, enwhay escribingday Onah’sjay ea-stormsay, eemedsay ossedtay byay aay ormstay imselfhay. Ishay eepday estchay eavedhay asay ithway aay ound-swellgray; ishay ossedtay armsay eemedsay ethay arringway elementsay atay orkway; anday ethay understhay atthay olledray awayay omfray offay ishay arthysway owbray, anday ethay ightlay eapinglay omfray ishay eyeay, ademay allay ishay implesay earershay ooklay onay imhay ithway aay uickqay earfay atthay asway angestray otay emthay. 

Erethay ownay amecay aay ulllay inay ishay ooklay, asay ehay ilentlysay urnedtay overay ethay eaveslay ofay ethay Ookbay onceay oremay; anday, atay astlay, andingstay otionlessmay, ithway osedclay eyesay, orfay ethay omentmay, eemedsay ommuningcay ithway Odgay anday imselfhay. 

Utbay againay ehay eanedlay overay owardstay ethay eoplepay, anday owingbay ishay eadhay owlylay, ithway anay aspectay ofay ethay eepestday etyay anliestmay umilityhay, ehay akespay esethay ordsway: 

ipmates“Shay, Odgay ashay aidlay utbay oneay andhay uponay ouyay; othbay ishay andshay esspray uponay emay. IAY avehay eadray eyay byay atwhay urkymay ightlay aymay ebay inemay ethay essonlay atthay Onahjay eachestay otay allay innerssay; anday ereforethay otay eyay, anday illstay oremay otay emay, orfay IAY amay aay eatergray innersay anthay eyay. Anday ownay owhay adlyglay ouldway IAY omecay ownday omfray isthay ast-headmay anday itsay onay ethay atcheshay erethay erewhay ouyay itsay, anday istenlay asay ouyay istenlay, ilewhay omesay oneay ofay ouyay eadsray e_may_ atthay otheray anday oremay awfulay essonlay ichwhay Onahjay eachestay otay e_may_, asay aay ilotpay ofay ethay ivinglay Odgay. Owhay eingbay anay anointeday ilot-prophetpay, oray eakerspay ofay uetray ingsthay, anday iddenbay byay ethay Ordlay otay oundsay osethay unwelcomeay uthstray inay ethay earsay ofay aay ickedway Inevehnay, Onahjay, appalleday atay ethay ostilityhay ehay ouldshay aiseray, edflay omfray ishay issionmay, anday oughtsay otay escapeay ishay utyday anday ishay Odgay byay akingtay ipshay atay Oppajay. Utbay Odgay isay everywhereay; Arshishtay ehay evernay eachedray. Asay eway avehay eensay, Odgay amecay uponay imhay inay ethay alewhay, anday allowedsway imhay ownday otay ivinglay ulfsgay ofay oomday, anday ithway iftsway antingsslay oretay imhay alongay into‘ay ethay idstmay ofay ethay eas,’say erewhay ethay eddyingay epthsday uckedsay imhay entay ousandthay athomsfay ownday, anday e‘thay eedsway ereway appedwray aboutay ishay ead,’hay anday allay ethay ateryway orldway ofay oeway owledbay overay imhay. Etyay evenay enthay eyondbay ethay eachray ofay anyay ummet—‘outplay ofay ethay ellybay ofay ell’—whenhay ethay alewhay oundedgray uponay ethay ocean’say utmostay onesbay, evenay enthay, Odgay eardhay ethay engulpheday, epentingray ophetpray enwhay ehay iedcray. Enthay Odgay akespay untoay ethay ishfay; anday omfray ethay udderingshay oldcay anday acknessblay ofay ethay easay, ethay alewhay amecay eechingbray upay owardstay ethay armway anday easantplay unsay, anday allay ethay elightsday ofay airay anday earthay; anday omited‘vay outay Onahjay uponay ethay dryay and;’lay enwhay ethay ordway ofay ethay Ordlay amecay aay econdsay imetay; anday Onahjay, uisedbray anday eaten—hisbay earsay, ikelay otway ea-shellssay, illstay ultitudinouslymay urmuringmay ofay ethay ocean—Jonahay idday ethay Almighty’say iddingbay. Anday atwhay asway atthay, ipmatesshay? Otay eachpray ethay Uthtray otay ethay acefay ofay Alsehoodfay! Atthay asway itay! 

is“Thay, ipmatesshay, isthay isay atthay otheray essonlay; anday oeway otay atthay ilotpay ofay ethay ivinglay Odgay owhay ightsslay itay. Oeway otay imhay omwhay isthay orldway armschay omfray Ospelgay utyday! Oeway otay imhay owhay eekssay otay ourpay oilay uponay ethay atersway enwhay Odgay ashay ewedbray emthay intoay aay alegay! Oeway otay imhay owhay eekssay otay easeplay atherray anthay otay appalay! Oeway otay imhay osewhay oodgay amenay isay oremay otay imhay anthay oodnessgay! Oeway otay imhay owhay, inay isthay orldway, ourtscay otnay ishonorday! Oeway otay imhay owhay ouldway otnay ebay uetray, evenay oughthay otay ebay alsefay ereway alvationsay! Eayay, oeway otay imhay owhay, asay ethay eatgray Ilotpay Aulpay ashay itay, ilewhay eachingpray otay othersay isay imselfhay aay astaway!”cay 

Ehay oppeddray anday ellfay awayay omfray imselfhay orfay aay omentmay; enthay iftinglay ishay acefay otay emthay againay, owedshay aay eepday oyjay inay ishay eyesay, asay ehay iedcray outay ithway aay eavenlyhay enthusiasm,—“Butay ohay! ipmatesshay! onay ethay arboardstay andhay ofay everyay oeway, erethay isay aay uresay elightday; anday igherhay ethay optay ofay atthay elightday, anthay ethay ottombay ofay ethay oeway isay eepday. Isay otnay ethay ain-truckmay igherhay anthay ethay elsonkay isay owlay? Elightday isay otay im—ahay arfay, arfay upwarday, anday inwarday elight—whoday againstay ethay oudpray odsgay anday ommodorescay ofay isthay earthay, everay andsstay orthfay ishay ownay inexorableay elfsay. Elightday isay otay imhay osewhay ongstray armsay etyay upportsay imhay, enwhay ethay ipshay ofay isthay asebay eacheroustray orldway ashay onegay ownday eneathbay imhay. Elightday isay otay imhay, owhay ivesgay onay uarterqay inay ethay uthtray, anday illskay, urnsbay, anday estroysday allay insay oughthay ehay uckplay itay outay omfray underay ethay obesray ofay Enatorssay anday Udgesjay. Elight,—top-gallantday elightday isay otay imhay, owhay acknowledgesay onay awlay oray ordlay, utbay ethay Ordlay ishay Odgay, anday isay onlyay aay atriotpay otay eavenhay. Elightday isay otay imhay, omwhay allay ethay avesway ofay ethay illowsbay ofay ethay eassay ofay ethay oisterousbay obmay ancay evernay akeshay omfray isthay uresay Eelkay ofay ethay Agesay. Anday eternalay elightday anday eliciousnessday illway ebay ishay, owhay omingcay otay aylay imhay ownday, ancay aysay ithway ishay inalfay eath—Obray Ather!—chieflyfay ownknay otay emay byay Thyay od—mortalray oray immortalay, erehay IAY ieday. IAY avehay ivenstray otay ebay Inethay, oremay anthay otay ebay isthay orld’sway, oray inemay ownay. Etyay isthay isay othingnay: IAY eavelay eternityay otay Eethay; orfay atwhay isay anmay atthay ehay ouldshay ivelay outay ethay ifetimelay ofay ishay Od?”gay 

Ehay aidsay onay oremay, utbay owlyslay avingway aay enedictionbay, overedcay ishay acefay ithway ishay andshay, anday osay emainedray eelingknay, illtay allay ethay eoplepay adhay epartedday, anday ehay asway eftlay aloneay inay ethay aceplay. 



APTERCHAY 10ay. AAY Osombay Iendfray. 

Eturningray otay ethay Outer-innspay omfray ethay Apelchay, IAY oundfay Ueequegqay erethay uiteqay aloneay; ehay avinghay eftlay ethay Apelchay eforebay ethay enedictionbay omesay imetay. Ehay asway ittingsay onay aay enchbay eforebay ethay irefay, ithway ishay eetfay onay ethay ovestay earthhay, anday inay oneay andhay asway oldinghay oseclay upay otay ishay acefay atthay ittlelay egronay idolay ofay ishay; eeringpay ardhay intoay itsay acefay, anday ithway aay ack-knifejay entlygay ittlingwhay awayay atay itsay osenay, eanwhilemay umminghay otay imselfhay inay ishay eathenishhay ayway. 

Utbay eingbay ownay interrupteday, ehay utpay upay ethay imageay; anday ettypray oonsay, oinggay otay ethay abletay, ooktay upay aay argelay ookbay erethay, anday acingplay itay onay ishay aplay eganbay ountingcay ethay agespay ithway eliberateday egularityray; atay everyay iftiethfay age—aspay IAY ancied—stoppingfay aay omentmay, ookinglay acantlyvay arounday imhay, anday ivinggay utteranceay otay aay ong-drawnlay urglinggay istlewhay ofay astonishmentay. Ehay ouldway enthay eginbay againay atay ethay extnay iftyfay; eemingsay otay ommencecay atay umbernay oneay eachay imetay, asay oughthay ehay ouldcay otnay ountcay oremay anthay iftyfay, anday itay asway onlyay byay uchsay aay argelay umbernay ofay iftiesfay eingbay oundfay ogethertay, atthay ishay astonishmentay atay ethay ultitudemay ofay agespay asway exciteday. 

Ithway uchmay interestay IAY atsay atchingway imhay. Avagesay oughthay ehay asway, anday ideouslyhay arredmay aboutay ethay ace—atfay eastlay otay myay aste—histay ountenancecay etyay adhay aay omethingsay inay itay ichwhay asway byay onay eansmay isagreeableday. Ouyay annotcay idehay ethay oulsay. Oughthray allay ishay unearthlyay attooingstay, IAY oughtthay IAY awsay ethay acestray ofay aay implesay onesthay earthay; anday inay ishay argelay, eepday eyesay, ieryfay ackblay anday oldbay, erethay eemedsay okenstay ofay aay iritspay atthay ouldway areday aay ousandthay evilsday. Anday esidesbay allay isthay, erethay asway aay ertaincay oftylay earingbay aboutay ethay Aganpay, ichwhay evenay ishay uncouthnessay ouldcay otnay altogetheray aimmay. Ehay ookedlay ikelay aay anmay owhay adhay evernay ingedcray anday evernay adhay adhay aay editorcray. Etherwhay itay asway, ootay, atthay ishay eadhay eingbay avedshay, ishay oreheadfay asway awndray outay inay eerfray anday ighterbray eliefray, anday ookedlay oremay expansiveay anthay itay otherwiseay ouldway, isthay IAY illway otnay enturevay otay ecideday; utbay ertaincay itay asway ishay eadhay asway enologicallyphray anay excellentay oneay. Itay aymay eemsay idiculousray, utbay itay emindedray emay ofay Eneralgay Ashington’sway eadhay, asay eensay inay ethay opularpay ustsbay ofay imhay. Itay adhay ethay amesay onglay egularlyray adedgray etreatingray opeslay omfray aboveay ethay owsbray, ichwhay ereway ikewiselay eryvay ojectingpray, ikelay otway onglay omontoriespray icklythay oodedway onay optay. Ueequegqay asway Eorgegay Ashingtonway annibalisticallycay evelopedday. 

Ilstwhay IAY asway usthay oselyclay anningscay imhay, alf-pretendinghay eanwhilemay otay ebay ookinglay outay atay ethay ormstay omfray ethay asementcay, ehay evernay eededhay myay esencepray, evernay oubledtray imselfhay ithway osay uchmay asay aay inglesay anceglay; utbay appeareday ollywhay occupieday ithway ountingcay ethay agespay ofay ethay arvellousmay ookbay. Onsideringcay owhay ociablysay eway adhay eenbay eepingslay ogethertay ethay ightnay eviouspray, anday especiallyay onsideringcay ethay affectionateay armay IAY adhay oundfay ownthray overay emay uponay akingway inay ethay orningmay, IAY oughtthay isthay indifferenceay ofay ishay eryvay angestray. Utbay avagessay areay angestray eingsbay; atay imestay ouyay oday otnay owknay exactlyay owhay otay aketay emthay. Atay irstfay eythay areay overawingay; eirthay almcay elf-collectednesssay ofay implicitysay eemssay aay Ocraticsay isdomway. IAY adhay oticednay alsoay atthay Ueequegqay evernay onsortedcay atay allay, oray utbay eryvay ittlelay, ithway ethay otheray eamensay inay ethay innay. Ehay ademay onay advancesay ateverwhay; appeareday otay avehay onay esireday otay enlargeay ethay irclecay ofay ishay acquaintancesay. Allay isthay uckstray emay asay ightymay ingularsay; etyay, uponay econdsay oughtsthay, erethay asway omethingsay almostay ublimesay inay itay. Erehay asway aay anmay omesay entytway ousandthay ilesmay omfray omehay, byay ethay ayway ofay Apecay Ornhay, atthay is—whichay asway ethay onlyay ayway ehay ouldcay etgay ere—thrownthay amongay eoplepay asay angestray otay imhay asay oughthay ehay ereway inay ethay anetplay Upiterjay; anday etyay ehay eemedsay entirelyay atay ishay easeay; eservingpray ethay utmostay erenitysay; ontentcay ithway ishay ownay ompanionshipcay; alwaysay equalay otay imselfhay. Urelysay isthay asway aay ouchtay ofay inefay ilosophyphay; oughthay onay oubtday ehay adhay evernay eardhay erethay asway uchsay aay ingthay asay atthay. Utbay, erhapspay, otay ebay uetray ilosophersphay, eway ortalsmay ouldshay otnay ebay onsciouscay ofay osay ivinglay oray osay ivingstray. Osay oonsay asay IAY earhay atthay uchsay oray uchsay aay anmay ivesgay imselfhay outay orfay aay ilosopherphay, IAY oncludecay atthay, ikelay ethay epticdyspay olday omanway, ehay ustmay avehay oken“bray ishay igester.”day 

Asay IAY atsay erethay inay atthay ownay onelylay oomray; ethay irefay urningbay owlay, inay atthay ildmay agestay enwhay, afteray itsay irstfay intensityay ashay armedway ethay airay, itay enthay onlyay owsglay otay ebay ookedlay atay; ethay eveningay adesshay anday antomsphay atheringgay oundray ethay asementscay, anday eeringpay inay uponay usay ilentsay, olitarysay aintway; ethay ormstay oomingbay ithoutway inay olemnsay ellssway; IAY eganbay otay ebay ensiblesay ofay angestray eelingsfay. IAY eltfay aay eltingmay inay emay. Onay oremay myay interedsplay earthay anday addenedmay andhay ereway urnedtay againstay ethay olfishway orldway. Isthay oothingsay avagesay adhay edeemedray itay. Erethay ehay atsay, ishay eryvay indifferenceay eakingspay aay aturenay inay ichwhay erethay urkedlay onay ivilizedcay ocrisieshypay anday andblay eceitsday. Ildway ehay asway; aay eryvay ightsay ofay ightssay otay eesay; etyay IAY eganbay otay eelfay elfmysay eriouslymystay awndray owardstay imhay. Anday osethay amesay ingsthay atthay ouldway avehay epelledray ostmay othersay, eythay ereway ethay eryvay agnetsmay atthay usthay ewdray emay. I’llay tryay aay aganpay iendfray, oughtthay IAY, incesay Istianchray indnesskay ashay ovedpray utbay ollowhay ourtesycay. IAY ewdray myay enchbay earnay imhay, anday ademay omesay iendlyfray ignssay anday intshay, oingday myay estbay otay alktay ithway imhay eanwhilemay. Atay irstfay ehay ittlelay oticednay esethay advancesay; utbay esentlypray, uponay myay eferringray otay ishay astlay ight’snay ospitalitieshay, ehay ademay outay otay askay emay etherwhay eway ereway againay otay ebay edfellowsbay. IAY oldtay imhay esyay; ereatwhay IAY oughtthay ehay ookedlay easedplay, erhapspay aay ittlelay omplimentedcay. 

Eway enthay urnedtay overay ethay ookbay ogethertay, anday IAY endeavoreday otay explainay otay imhay ethay urposepay ofay ethay intingpray, anday ethay eaningmay ofay ethay ewfay icturespay atthay ereway inay itay. Usthay IAY oonsay engageday ishay interestay; anday omfray atthay eway entway otay abberingjay ethay estbay eway ouldcay aboutay ethay ariousvay outeray ightssay otay ebay eensay inay isthay amousfay owntay. Oonsay IAY oposedpray aay ocialsay okesmay; anday, oducingpray ishay ouchpay anday omahawktay, ehay uietlyqay offereday emay aay uffpay. Anday enthay eway atsay exchangingay uffspay omfray atthay ildway ipepay ofay ishay, anday eepingkay itay egularlyray assingpay etweenbay usay. 

Ifay erethay etyay urkedlay anyay iceay ofay indifferenceay owardstay emay inay ethay Agan’spay eastbray, isthay easantplay, enialgay okesmay eway adhay, oonsay awedthay itay outay, anday eftlay usay oniescray. Ehay eemedsay otay aketay otay emay uiteqay asay aturallynay anday unbiddenlyay asay IAY otay imhay; anday enwhay ouray okesmay asway overay, ehay essedpray ishay oreheadfay againstay inemay, aspedclay emay oundray ethay aistway, anday aidsay atthay enceforthhay eway ereway arriedmay; eaningmay, inay ishay ountry’scay asephray, atthay eway ereway osombay iendsfray; ehay ouldway adlyglay ieday orfay emay, ifay eednay ouldshay ebay. Inay aay ountrymancay, isthay uddensay ameflay ofay iendshipfray ouldway avehay eemedsay arfay ootay ematurepray, aay ingthay otay ebay uchmay istrustedday; utbay inay isthay implesay avagesay osethay olday ulesray ouldway otnay applyay. 

Afteray uppersay, anday anotheray ocialsay atchay anday okesmay, eway entway otay ouray oomray ogethertay. Ehay ademay emay aay esentpray ofay ishay embalmeday eadhay; ooktay outay ishay enormousay obaccotay alletway, anday opinggray underay ethay obaccotay, ewdray outay omesay irtythay ollarsday inay ilversay; enthay eadingspray emthay onay ethay abletay, anday echanicallymay ividingday emthay intoay otway equalay ortionspay, ushedpay oneay ofay emthay owardstay emay, anday aidsay itay asway inemay. IAY asway oinggay otay emonstrateray; utbay ehay ilencedsay emay byay ouringpay emthay intoay myay owsers’tray ocketspay. IAY etlay emthay aystay. Ehay enthay entway aboutay ishay eveningay ayerspray, ooktay outay ishay idolay, anday emovedray ethay aperpay ireboardfay. Byay ertaincay ignssay anday omssymptay, IAY oughtthay ehay eemedsay anxiousay orfay emay otay oinjay imhay; utbay ellway owingknay atwhay asway otay ollowfay, IAY eliberatedday aay omentmay etherwhay, inay asecay ehay inviteday emay, IAY ouldway omplycay oray otherwiseay. 

IAY asway aay oodgay Istianchray; ornbay anday edbray inay ethay osombay ofay ethay infallibleay Esbyterianpray Urchchay. Owhay enthay ouldcay IAY uniteay ithway isthay ildway idolatoray inay orshippingway ishay iecepay ofay oodway? Utbay atwhay isay orshipway? oughtthay IAY. Oday ouyay upposesay ownay, Ishmaelay, atthay ethay agnanimousmay Odgay ofay eavenhay anday earth—pagansay anday allay included—canay ossiblypay ebay ealousjay ofay anay insignificantay itbay ofay ackblay oodway? Impossibleay! Utbay atwhay isay orship?—toway oday ethay illway ofay Od—_thatgay_ isay orshipway. Anday atwhay isay ethay illway ofay Od?—togay oday otay myay ellowfay anmay atwhay IAY ouldway avehay myay ellowfay anmay otay oday otay e—_thatmay_ isay ethay illway ofay Odgay. Ownay, Ueequegqay isay myay ellowfay anmay. Anday atwhay oday IAY ishway atthay isthay Ueequegqay ouldway oday otay emay? Whyay, uniteay ithway emay inay myay articularpay Esbyterianpray ormfay ofay orshipway. Onsequentlycay, IAY ustmay enthay uniteay ithway imhay inay ishay; ergoay, IAY ustmay urntay idolatoray. Osay IAY indledkay ethay avingsshay; elpedhay oppray upay ethay innocentay ittlelay idolay; offereday imhay urntbay iscuitbay ithway Ueequegqay; alamedsay eforebay imhay icetway oray icethray; issedkay ishay osenay; anday atthay oneday, eway undresseday anday entway otay edbay, atay eacepay ithway ouray ownay onsciencescay anday allay ethay orldway. Utbay eway idday otnay ogay otay eepslay ithoutway omesay ittlelay atchay. 

Owhay itay isay IAY owknay otnay; utbay erethay isay onay aceplay ikelay aay edbay orfay onfidentialcay isclosuresday etweenbay iendsfray. Anmay anday ifeway, eythay aysay, erethay openay ethay eryvay ottombay ofay eirthay oulssay otay eachay otheray; anday omesay olday ouplescay oftenay ielay anday atchay overay olday imestay illtay earlynay orningmay. Usthay, enthay, inay ouray earts’hay oneymoonhay, aylay IAY anday Ueequeg—aqay osycay, ovinglay airpay. 



APTERCHAY 11ay. Ightgownnay. 

Eway adhay ainlay usthay inay edbay, attingchay anday appingnay atay ortshay intervalsay, anday Ueequegqay ownay anday enthay affectionatelyay owingthray ishay ownbray attooedtay egslay overay inemay, anday enthay awingdray emthay ackbay; osay entirelyay ociablesay anday eefray anday easyay ereway eway; enwhay, atay astlay, byay easonray ofay ouray onfabulationscay, atwhay ittlelay appishnessnay emainedray inay usay altogetheray epartedday, anday eway eltfay ikelay ettinggay upay againay, oughthay ay-breakday asway etyay omesay ayway ownday ethay uturefay. 

Esyay, eway ecamebay eryvay akefulway; osay uchmay osay atthay ouray ecumbentray ositionpay eganbay otay owgray earisomeway, anday byay ittlelay anday ittlelay eway oundfay ourselvesay ittingsay upay; ethay othesclay ellway uckedtay arounday usay, eaninglay againstay ethay ead-boardhay ithway ouray ourfay eesknay awndray upay oseclay ogethertay, anday ouray otway osesnay endingbay overay emthay, asay ifay ouray eepansknay ereway arming-pansway. Eway eltfay eryvay icenay anday ugsnay, ethay oremay osay incesay itay asway osay illychay outay ofay oorsday; indeeday outay ofay ed-clothesbay ootay, eeingsay atthay erethay asway onay irefay inay ethay oomray. Ethay oremay osay, IAY aysay, ecausebay ulytray otay enjoyay odilybay armthway, omesay allsmay artpay ofay ouyay ustmay ebay oldcay, orfay erethay isay onay ualityqay inay isthay orldway atthay isay otnay atwhay itay isay erelymay byay ontrastcay. Othingnay existsay inay itselfay. Ifay ouyay atterflay ourselfyay atthay ouyay areay allay overay omfortablecay, anday avehay eenbay osay aay onglay imetay, enthay ouyay annotcay ebay aidsay otay ebay omfortablecay anyay oremay. Utbay ifay, ikelay Ueequegqay anday emay inay ethay edbay, ethay iptay ofay ouryay osenay oray ethay owncray ofay ouryay eadhay ebay ightlyslay illedchay, whyay enthay, indeeday, inay ethay eneralgay onsciousnesscay ouyay eelfay ostmay elightfullyday anday unmistakablyay armway. Orfay isthay easonray aay eepingslay apartmentay ouldshay evernay ebay urnishedfay ithway aay irefay, ichwhay isay oneay ofay ethay uxuriouslay iscomfortsday ofay ethay ichray. Orfay ethay eighthay ofay isthay ortsay ofay eliciousnessday isay otay avehay othingnay utbay ethay anketblay etweenbay ouyay anday ouryay ugnesssnay anday ethay oldcay ofay ethay outeray airay. Enthay erethay ouyay ielay ikelay ethay oneay armway arkspay inay ethay earthay ofay anay arcticay alcrystay. 

Eway adhay eenbay ittingsay inay isthay ouchingcray annermay orfay omesay imetay, enwhay allay atay onceay IAY oughtthay IAY ouldway openay myay eyesay; orfay enwhay etweenbay eetsshay, etherwhay byay ayday oray byay ightnay, anday etherwhay asleepay oray awakeay, IAY avehay aay ayway ofay alwaysay eepingkay myay eyesay utshay, inay orderay ethay oremay otay oncentratecay ethay ugnesssnay ofay eingbay inay edbay. Ecausebay onay anmay ancay everay eelfay ishay ownay identityay arightay exceptay ishay eyesay ebay osedclay; asay ifay arknessday ereway indeeday ethay operpray elementay ofay ouray essencesay, oughthay ightlay ebay oremay ongenialcay otay ouray ayeyclay artpay. Uponay openingay myay eyesay enthay, anday omingcay outay ofay myay ownay easantplay anday elf-createdsay arknessday intoay ethay imposeday anday oarsecay outeray oomglay ofay ethay unilluminateday elve-o’clock-at-nighttway, IAY experienceday aay isagreeableday evulsionray. Ornay idday IAY atay allay objectay otay ethay inthay omfray Ueequegqay atthay erhapspay itay ereway estbay otay ikestray aay ightlay, eeingsay atthay eway ereway osay ideway awakeay; anday esidesbay ehay eltfay aay ongstray esireday otay avehay aay ewfay uietqay uffspay omfray ishay Omahawktay. Ebay itay aidsay, atthay oughthay IAY adhay eltfay uchsay aay ongstray epugnanceray otay ishay okingsmay inay ethay edbay ethay ightnay eforebay, etyay eesay owhay elasticay ouray iffstay ejudicespray owgray enwhay ovelay onceay omescay otay endbay emthay. Orfay ownay IAY ikedlay othingnay etterbay anthay otay avehay Ueequegqay okingsmay byay emay, evenay inay edbay, ecausebay ehay eemedsay otay ebay ullfay ofay uchsay erenesay ouseholdhay oyjay enthay. IAY onay oremay eltfay undulyay oncernedcay orfay ethay andlord’slay olicypay ofay insuranceay. IAY asway onlyay aliveay otay ethay ondensedcay onfidentialcay omfortablenesscay ofay aringshay aay ipepay anday aay anketblay ithway aay ealray iendfray. Ithway ouray aggyshay acketsjay awndray aboutay ouray ouldersshay, eway ownay assedpay ethay Omahawktay omfray oneay otay ethay otheray, illtay owlyslay erethay ewgray overay usay aay ueblay anginghay estertay ofay okesmay, illuminateday byay ethay ameflay ofay ethay ew-litnay amplay. 

Etherwhay itay asway atthay isthay undulatingay estertay olledray ethay avagesay awayay otay arfay istantday enesscay, IAY owknay otnay, utbay ehay ownay okespay ofay ishay ativenay islanday; anday, eageray otay earhay ishay istoryhay, IAY eggedbay imhay otay ogay onay anday elltay itay. Ehay adlyglay ompliedcay. Oughthay atay ethay imetay IAY utbay illay omprehendedcay otnay aay ewfay ofay ishay ordsway, etyay ubsequentsay isclosuresday, enwhay IAY adhay ecomebay oremay amiliarfay ithway ishay okenbray aseologyphray, ownay enableay emay otay esentpray ethay olewhay orystay uchsay asay itay aymay ovepray inay ethay eremay eletonskay IAY ivegay. 



APTERCHAY 12ay. Iographicalbay. 

Ueequegqay asway aay ativenay ofay Okovokoray, anay islanday arfay awayay otay ethay Estway anday Outhsay. Itay isay otnay ownday inay anyay apmay; uetray acesplay evernay areay. 

Enwhay aay ew-hatchednay avagesay unningray ildway aboutay ishay ativenay oodlandsway inay aay assgray outclay, ollowedfay byay ethay ibblingnay oatsgay, asay ifay ehay ereway aay eengray aplingsay; evenay enthay, inay Ueequeg’sqay ambitiousay oulsay, urkedlay aay ongstray esireday otay eesay omethingsay oremay ofay Istendomchray anthay aay ecimenspay alerwhay oray otway. Ishay atherfay asway aay Ighhay Iefchay, aay Ingkay; ishay uncleay aay Ighhay Iestpray; anday onay ethay aternalmay idesay ehay oastedbay auntsay owhay ereway ethay ivesway ofay unconquerableay arriorsway. Erethay asway excellentay oodblay inay ishay eins—royalvay uffstay; oughthay adlysay itiatedvay, IAY earfay, byay ethay annibalcay opensitypray ehay ourishednay inay ishay untutoreday outhyay. 

AAY Agsay Arborhay ipshay isitedvay ishay ather’sfay aybay, anday Ueequegqay oughtsay aay assagepay otay Istianchray andslay. Utbay ethay ipshay, avinghay erhay ullfay omplementcay ofay eamensay, urnedspay ishay uitsay; anday otnay allay ethay Ingkay ishay ather’sfay influenceay ouldcay evailpray. Utbay Ueequegqay owedvay aay owvay. Aloneay inay ishay anoecay, ehay addledpay offay otay aay istantday aitstray, ichwhay ehay ewknay ethay ipshay ustmay asspay oughthray enwhay eshay uittedqay ethay islanday. Onay oneay idesay asway aay oralcay eefray; onay ethay otheray aay owlay onguetay ofay andlay, overedcay ithway angrovemay icketsthay atthay ewgray outay intoay ethay aterway. Idinghay ishay anoecay, illstay afloatay, amongay esethay icketsthay, ithway itsay owpray eawardsay, ehay atsay ownday inay ethay ernstay, addlepay owlay inay andhay; anday enwhay ethay ipshay asway idingglay byay, ikelay aay ashflay ehay artedday outay; ainedgay erhay idesay; ithway oneay ackwardbay ashday ofay ishay ootfay apsizedcay anday anksay ishay anoecay; imbedclay upay ethay ainschay; anday owingthray imselfhay atay ullfay engthlay uponay ethay eckday, appledgray aay ing-boltray erethay, anday oresway otnay otay etlay itay ogay, oughthay ackedhay inay iecespay. 

Inay ainvay ethay aptaincay eatenedthray otay owthray imhay overboarday; uspendedsay aay utlasscay overay ishay akednay istswray; Ueequegqay asway ethay onsay ofay aay Ingkay, anday Ueequegqay udgedbay otnay. Uckstray byay ishay esperateday auntlessnessday, anday ishay ildway esireday otay isitvay Istendomchray, ethay aptaincay atay astlay elentedray, anday oldtay imhay ehay ightmay akemay imselfhay atay omehay. Utbay isthay inefay oungyay avage—thissay easay Incepray ofay Alesway, evernay awsay ethay Aptain’scay abincay. Eythay utpay imhay ownday amongay ethay ailorssay, anday ademay aay alemanwhay ofay imhay. Utbay ikelay Arczay Eterpay ontentcay otay oiltay inay ethay ipyardsshay ofay oreignfay itiescay, Ueequegqay isdainedday onay eemingsay ignominyay, ifay erebythay ehay ightmay appilyhay aingay ethay owerpay ofay enlighteningay ishay untutoreday ountrymencay. Orfay atay ottom—sobay ehay oldtay e—hemay asway actuateday byay aay ofoundpray esireday otay earnlay amongay ethay Istianschray, ethay artsay erebywhay otay akemay ishay eoplepay illstay appierhay anthay eythay ereway; anday oremay anthay atthay, illstay etterbay anthay eythay ereway. Utbay, alasay! ethay acticespray ofay alemenwhay oonsay onvincedcay imhay atthay evenay Istianschray ouldcay ebay othbay iserablemay anday ickedway; infinitelyay oremay osay, anthay allay ishay ather’sfay eathenshay. Arriveday atay astlay inay olday Agsay Arborhay; anday eeingsay atwhay ethay ailorssay idday erethay; anday enthay oinggay onay otay Antucketnay, anday eeingsay owhay eythay entspay eirthay agesway inay at_thay_ aceplay alsoay, oorpay Ueequegqay avegay itay upay orfay ostlay. Oughtthay ehay, it’say aay ickedway orldway inay allay eridiansmay; I’llay ieday aay aganpay. 

Anday usthay anay olday idolatoray atay earthay, ehay etyay ivedlay amongay esethay Istianschray, oreway eirthay othesclay, anday iedtray otay alktay eirthay ibberishgay. Encehay ethay ueerqay aysway aboutay imhay, oughthay ownay omesay imetay omfray omehay. 

Byay intshay, IAY askeday imhay etherwhay ehay idday otnay oposepray oinggay ackbay, anday avinghay aay oronationcay; incesay ehay ightmay ownay onsidercay ishay atherfay eadday anday onegay, ehay eingbay eryvay olday anday eeblefay atay ethay astlay accountsay. Ehay answereday onay, otnay etyay; anday addeday atthay ehay asway earfulfay Istianitychray, oray atherray Istianschray, adhay unfitteday imhay orfay ascendingay ethay urepay anday undefileday onethray ofay irtythay aganpay Ingskay eforebay imhay. Utbay byay anday byay, ehay aidsay, ehay ouldway eturn,—asray oonsay asay ehay eltfay imselfhay aptizedbay againay. Orfay ethay oncenay, oweverhay, ehay oposedpray otay ailsay aboutay, anday owsay ishay ildway oatsay inay allay ourfay oceansay. Eythay adhay ademay aay arpooneerhay ofay imhay, anday atthay arbedbay ironay asway inay ieulay ofay aay eptrescay ownay. 

IAY askeday imhay atwhay ightmay ebay ishay immediateay urposepay, ouchingtay ishay uturefay ovementsmay. Ehay answereday, otay ogay otay easay againay, inay ishay olday ocationvay. Uponay isthay, IAY oldtay imhay atthay alingwhay asway myay ownay esignday, anday informeday imhay ofay myay intentionay otay ailsay outay ofay Antucketnay, asay eingbay ethay ostmay omisingpray ortpay orfay anay adventurousay alemanwhay otay embarkay omfray. Ehay atay onceay esolvedray otay accompanyay emay otay atthay islanday, ipshay aboarday ethay amesay esselvay, etgay intoay ethay amesay atchway, ethay amesay oatbay, ethay amesay essmay ithway emay, inay ortshay otay areshay myay everyay aphay; ithway othbay myay andshay inay ishay, oldlybay ipday intoay ethay Otluckpay ofay othbay orldsway. Otay allay isthay IAY oyouslyjay assenteday; orfay esidesbay ethay affectionay IAY ownay eltfay orfay Ueequegqay, ehay asway anay experienceday arpooneerhay, anday asay uchsay, ouldcay otnay ailfay otay ebay ofay eatgray usefulnessay otay oneay, owhay, ikelay emay, asway ollywhay ignorantay ofay ethay eriesmystay ofay alingwhay, oughthay ellway acquainteday ithway ethay easay, asay ownknay otay erchantmay eamensay. 

Ishay orystay eingbay endeday ithway ishay ipe’spay astlay ingdyay uffpay, Ueequegqay embraceday emay, essedpray ishay oreheadfay againstay inemay, anday owingblay outay ethay ightlay, eway olledray overay omfray eachay otheray, isthay ayway anday atthay, anday eryvay oonsay ereway eepingslay. 



APTERCHAY 13ay. Eelbarrowwhay. 

Extnay orningmay, Ondaymay, afteray isposingday ofay ethay embalmeday eadhay otay aay arberbay, orfay aay ockblay, IAY ettledsay myay ownay anday omrade’scay illbay; usingay, oweverhay, myay omrade’scay oneymay. Ethay inninggray andlordlay, asay ellway asay ethay oardersbay, eemedsay amazinglyay ickledtay atay ethay uddensay iendshipfray ichwhay adhay ungspray upay etweenbay emay anday Ueequeg—especiallyqay asay Eterpay Offin’scay ockcay anday ullbay oriesstay aboutay imhay adhay eviouslypray osay uchmay alarmeday emay oncerningcay ethay eryvay ersonpay omwhay IAY ownay ompaniedcay ithway. 

Eway orrowedbay aay eelbarrowwhay, anday embarkingay ouray ingsthay, includingay myay ownay oorpay arpet-bagcay, anday Ueequeg’sqay anvascay acksay anday ammockhay, awayay eway entway ownday otay e“thay Oss,”may ethay ittlelay Antucketnay acketpay oonerschay ooredmay atay ethay arfwhay. Asay eway ereway oinggay alongay ethay eoplepay aredstay; otnay atay Ueequegqay osay uch—formay eythay ereway useday otay eeingsay annibalscay ikelay imhay inay eirthay eets,—butstray atay eeingsay imhay anday emay uponay uchsay onfidentialcay ermstay. Utbay eway eededhay emthay otnay, oinggay alongay eelingwhay ethay arrowbay byay urnstay, anday Ueequegqay ownay anday enthay oppingstay otay adjustay ethay eathshay onay ishay arpoonhay arbsbay. IAY askeday imhay whyay ehay arriedcay uchsay aay oublesometray ingthay ithway imhay ashoreay, anday etherwhay allay alingwhay ipsshay idday otnay indfay eirthay ownay arpoonshay. Otay isthay, inay ubstancesay, ehay epliedray, atthay oughthay atwhay IAY intedhay asway uetray enoughay, etyay ehay adhay aay articularpay affectionay orfay ishay ownay arpoonhay, ecausebay itay asway ofay assureday uffstay, ellway iedtray inay anymay aay ortalmay ombatcay, anday eeplyday intimateay ithway ethay eartshay ofay aleswhay. Inay ortshay, ikelay anymay inlanday eapersray anday owersmay, owhay ogay intoay ethay armers’fay eadowsmay armeday ithway eirthay ownay es—thoughscythay inay onay iseway obligeday otay urnishfay em—eventhay osay, Ueequegqay, orfay ishay ownay ivatepray easonsray, eferredpray ishay ownay arpoonhay. 

Iftingshay ethay arrowbay omfray myay andhay otay ishay, ehay oldtay emay aay unnyfay orystay aboutay ethay irstfay eelbarrowwhay ehay adhay everay eensay. Itay asway inay Agsay Arborhay. Ethay ownersay ofay ishay ipshay, itay eemssay, adhay entlay imhay oneay, inay ichwhay otay arrycay ishay eavyhay estchay otay ishay oardingbay ousehay. Otnay otay eemsay ignorantay aboutay ethay ing—thoughthay inay uthtray ehay asway entirelyay osay, oncerningcay ethay ecisepray ayway inay ichwhay otay anagemay ethay arrow—Queequegbay utspay ishay estchay uponay itay; asheslay itay astfay; anday enthay ouldersshay ethay arrowbay anday archesmay upay ethay arfwhay. “Why,”ay aidsay IAY, ueequeg“Qay, ouyay ightmay avehay ownknay etterbay anthay atthay, oneay ouldway inkthay. Idn’tday ethay eoplepay augh?”lay 

Uponay isthay, ehay oldtay emay anotheray orystay. Ethay eoplepay ofay ishay islanday ofay Okovokoray, itay eemssay, atay eirthay eddingway eastsfay expressay ethay agrantfray aterway ofay oungyay ocoanutscay intoay aay argelay ainedstay alabashcay ikelay aay unchbowlpay; anday isthay unchbowlpay alwaysay ormsfay ethay eatgray entralcay ornamentay onay ethay aidedbray atmay erewhay ethay eastfay isay eldhay. Ownay aay ertaincay andgray erchantmay ipshay onceay ouchedtay atay Okovokoray, anday itsay ommander—fromcay allay accountsay, aay eryvay atelystay unctiliouspay entlemangay, atay eastlay orfay aay easay aptain—thiscay ommandercay asway inviteday otay ethay eddingway eastfay ofay Ueequeg’sqay istersay, aay ettypray oungyay incesspray ustjay urnedtay ofay entay. Ellway; enwhay allay ethay eddingway uestsgay ereway assembleday atay ethay ide’sbray amboobay ottagecay, isthay Aptaincay archesmay inay, anday eingbay assigneday ethay ostpay ofay onorhay, acedplay imselfhay overay againstay ethay unchbowlpay, anday etweenbay ethay Ighhay Iestpray anday ishay ajestymay ethay Ingkay, Ueequeg’sqay atherfay. Acegray eingbay aid,—forsay osethay eoplepay avehay eirthay acegray asay ellway asay e—thoughway Ueequegqay oldtay emay atthay unlikeay usay, owhay atay uchsay imestay ooklay ownwardsday otay ouray attersplay, eythay, onay ethay ontrarycay, opyingcay ethay ucksday, anceglay upwardsay otay ethay eatgray Ivergay ofay allay easts—Gracefay, IAY aysay, eingbay aidsay, ethay Ighhay Iestpray opensay ethay anquetbay byay ethay immemorialay eremonycay ofay ethay islanday; atthay isay, ippingday ishay onsecratedcay anday onsecratingcay ingersfay intoay ethay owlbay eforebay ethay essedblay everagebay irculatescay. Eeingsay imselfhay acedplay extnay ethay Iestpray, anday otingnay ethay eremonycay, anday inkingthay imself—beinghay Aptaincay ofay aay ip—asshay avinghay ainplay ecedencepray overay aay eremay islanday Ingkay, especiallyay inay ethay Ing’skay ownay ouse—thehay Aptaincay oollycay oceedspray otay ashway ishay andshay inay ethay unchbowl;—takingpay itay IAY upposesay orfay aay ugehay inger-glassfay. ow,”“Nay aidsay Ueequegqay, at“whay ouyay inktay ow?—Didn’tnay ouray eoplepay augh?”lay 

Atay astlay, assagepay aidpay, anday uggagelay afesay, eway oodstay onay oardbay ethay oonerschay. Oistinghay ailsay, itay idedglay ownday ethay Acushnetay iverray. Onay oneay idesay, Ewnay Edfordbay oseray inay erracestay ofay eetsstray, eirthay ice-covereday eestray allay itteringglay inay ethay earclay, oldcay airay. Ugehay illshay anday ountainsmay ofay askscay onay askscay ereway iledpay uponay erhay arveswhay, anday idesay byay idesay ethay orld-wanderingway alewhay ipsshay aylay ilentsay anday afelysay ooredmay atay astlay; ilewhay omfray othersay amecay aay oundsay ofay arpenterscay anday ooperscay, ithway endedblay oisesnay ofay iresfay anday orgesfay otay eltmay ethay itchpay, allay etokeningbay atthay ewnay uisescray ereway onay ethay artstay; atthay oneay ostmay erilouspay anday onglay oyagevay endeday, onlyay eginsbay aay econdsay; anday aay econdsay endeday, onlyay eginsbay aay irdthay, anday osay onay, orfay everay anday orfay ayeay. Uchsay isay ethay endlessnessay, eayay, ethay intolerablenessay ofay allay earthlyay effortay. 

Aininggay ethay oremay openay aterway, ethay acingbray eezebray axedway eshfray; ethay ittlelay Ossmay ossedtay ethay uickqay oamfay omfray erhay owsbay, asay aay oungyay oltcay ishay ortingssnay. Owhay IAY uffedsnay atthay Artartay air!—howay IAY urnedspay atthay urnpiketay earth!—thatay ommoncay ighwayhay allay overay entedday ithway ethay arksmay ofay avishslay eelshay anday oofshay; anday urnedtay emay otay admireay ethay agnanimitymay ofay ethay easay ichwhay illway ermitpay onay ecordsray. 

Atay ethay amesay oam-fountainfay, Ueequegqay eemedsay otay inkdray anday eelray ithway emay. Ishay uskyday ostrilsnay elledsway apartay; ehay owedshay ishay iledfay anday ointedpay eethtay. Onay, onay eway ewflay; anday ouray offingay ainedgay, ethay Ossmay idday omagehay otay ethay astblay; uckedday anday ivedday erhay owsbay asay aay aveslay eforebay ethay Ultansay. Idewayssay eaninglay, eway idewayssay artedday; everyay opeyarnray inglingtay ikelay aay ireway; ethay otway alltay astsmay ucklingbay ikelay Indianay anescay inay andlay ornadoestay. Osay ullfay ofay isthay eelingray enescay ereway eway, asay eway oodstay byay ethay ungingplay owspritbay, atthay orfay omesay imetay eway idday otnay oticenay ethay eeringjay ancesglay ofay ethay assengerspay, aay ubber-likelay assemblyay, owhay arvelledmay atthay otway ellowfay eingsbay ouldshay ebay osay ompanionablecay; asay oughthay aay itewhay anmay ereway anythingay oremay ignifiedday anthay aay itewashedwhay egronay. Utbay erethay ereway omesay oobiesbay anday umpkinsbay erethay, owhay, byay eirthay intenseay eennessgray, ustmay avehay omecay omfray ethay earthay anday entrecay ofay allay erdurevay. Ueequegqay aughtcay oneay ofay esethay oungyay aplingssay imickingmay imhay ehindbay ishay ackbay. IAY oughtthay ethay umpkin’sbay ourhay ofay oomday asway omecay. Oppingdray ishay arpoonhay, ethay awnybray avagesay aughtcay imhay inay ishay armsay, anday byay anay almostay iraculousmay exterityday anday engthstray, entsay imhay ighhay upay odilybay intoay ethay airay; enthay ightlyslay appingtay ishay ernstay inay id-somersetmay, ethay ellowfay andedlay ithway urstingbay ungslay uponay ishay eetfay, ilewhay Ueequegqay, urningtay ishay ackbay uponay imhay, ightedlay ishay omahawktay ipepay anday assedpay itay otay emay orfay aay uffpay. 

apting“Cay! Apting!”cay elledyay ethay umpkinbay, unningray owardstay atthay officeray; apting“Cay, Aptingcay, ere’shay ethay evil.”day 

allo“Hay, ou_yay_ ir,”say iedcray ethay Aptaincay, aay auntgay ibray ofay ethay easay, alkingstay upay otay Ueequegqay, at“whay inay underthay oday ouyay eanmay byay atthay? On’tday ouyay owknay ouyay ightmay avehay illedkay atthay ap?”chay 

at“Whay imhay ay?”say aidsay Ueequegqay, asay ehay ildlymay urnedtay otay emay. 

e“Hay ay,”say aidsay IAY, at“thay ouyay amecay earnay ill-ekay atthay anmay ere,”thay ointingpay otay ethay illstay iveringshay eenhorngray. 

ill-e,”“Kay iedcray Ueequegqay, istingtway ishay attooedtay acefay intoay anay unearthlyay expressionay ofay isdainday, ah“ay! imhay evybay all-esmay ish-efay; Ueequegqay onay ill-ekay osay all-esmay ish-efay; Ueequegqay ill-ekay igbay ale!”whay 

ook“Lay ou,”yay oaredray ethay Aptaincay, I’ll“ay ill-ekay ou_yay_, ouyay annibalcay, ifay ouyay tryay anyay oremay ofay ouryay ickstray aboarday erehay; osay indmay ouryay eye.”ay 

Utbay itay osay appenedhay ustjay enthay, atthay itay asway ighhay imetay orfay ethay Aptaincay otay indmay ishay ownay eyeay. Ethay odigiouspray ainstray uponay ethay ain-sailmay adhay artedpay ethay eather-sheetway, anday ethay emendoustray oombay asway ownay ingflyay omfray idesay otay idesay, ompletelycay eepingsway ethay entireay afteray artpay ofay ethay eckday. Ethay oorpay ellowfay omwhay Ueequegqay adhay andledhay osay oughlyray, asway eptsway overboarday; allay andshay ereway inay aay anicpay; anday otay attemptay atchingsnay atay ethay oombay otay aystay itay, eemedsay adnessmay. Itay ewflay omfray ightray otay eftlay, anday ackbay againay, almostay inay oneay ickingtay ofay aay atchway, anday everyay instantay eemedsay onay ethay ointpay ofay appingsnay intoay interssplay. Othingnay asway oneday, anday othingnay eemedsay apablecay ofay eingbay oneday; osethay onay eckday ushedray owardstay ethay owsbay, anday oodstay eyeingay ethay oombay asay ifay itay ereway ethay owerlay awjay ofay anay exasperateday alewhay. Inay ethay idstmay ofay isthay onsternationcay, Ueequegqay oppeddray eftlyday otay ishay eesknay, anday awlingcray underay ethay athpay ofay ethay oombay, ippedwhay oldhay ofay aay operay, ecuredsay oneay enday otay ethay ulwarksbay, anday enthay ingingflay ethay otheray ikelay aay assolay, aughtcay itay oundray ethay oombay asay itay eptsway overay ishay eadhay, anday atay ethay extnay erkjay, ethay arspay asway atthay ayway appedtray, anday allay asway afesay. Ethay oonerschay asway unray intoay ethay indway, anday ilewhay ethay andshay ereway earingclay awayay ethay ernstay oatbay, Ueequegqay, ippedstray otay ethay aistway, artedday omfray ethay idesay ithway aay onglay ivinglay arcay ofay aay eaplay. Orfay eethray inutesmay oray oremay ehay asway eensay immingsway ikelay aay ogday, owingthray ishay onglay armsay aightstray outay eforebay imhay, anday byay urnstay evealingray ishay awnybray ouldersshay oughthray ethay eezingfray oamfay. IAY ookedlay atay ethay andgray anday oriousglay ellowfay, utbay awsay onay oneay otay ebay avedsay. Ethay eenhorngray adhay onegay ownday. Ootingshay imselfhay erpendicularlypay omfray ethay aterway, Ueequegqay, ownay ooktay anay instant’say anceglay arounday imhay, anday eemingsay otay eesay ustjay owhay attersmay ereway, ivedday ownday anday isappearedday. AAY ewfay inutesmay oremay, anday ehay oseray againay, oneay armay illstay ikingstray outay, anday ithway ethay otheray aggingdray aay ifelesslay ormfay. Ethay oatbay oonsay ickedpay emthay upay. Ethay oorpay umpkinbay asway estoredray. Allay andshay otedvay Ueequegqay aay oblenay umptray; ethay aptaincay eggedbay ishay ardonpay. Omfray atthay ourhay IAY oveclay otay Ueequegqay ikelay aay arnaclebay; eayay, illtay oorpay Ueequegqay ooktay ishay astlay onglay iveday. 

Asway erethay everay uchsay unconsciousnessay? Ehay idday otnay eemsay otay inkthay atthay ehay atay allay eservedday aay edalmay omfray ethay Umanehay anday Agnanimousmay Ocietiessay. Ehay onlyay askeday orfay ater—freshway ater—somethingway otay ipeway ethay inebray offay; atthay oneday, ehay utpay onay dryay othesclay, ightedlay ishay ipepay, anday eaninglay againstay ethay ulwarksbay, anday ildlymay eyeingay osethay arounday imhay, eemedsay otay ebay ayingsay otay imself—“It’shay aay utualmay, oint-stockjay orldway, inay allay eridiansmay. Eway annibalscay ustmay elphay esethay Istians.”chray 



APTERCHAY 14ay. Antucketnay. 

Othingnay oremay appenedhay onay ethay assagepay orthyway ethay entioningmay; osay, afteray aay inefay unray, eway afelysay arriveday inay Antucketnay. 

Antucketnay! Aketay outay ouryay apmay anday ooklay atay itay. Eesay atwhay aay ealray ornercay ofay ethay orldway itay occupiesay; owhay itay andsstay erethay, awayay offay oreshay, oremay onelylay anthay ethay Eddystoneay ighthouselay. Ooklay atay it—aay eremay illockhay, anday elboway ofay andsay; allay eachbay, ithoutway aay ackgroundbay. Erethay isay oremay andsay erethay anthay ouyay ouldway useay inay entytway earsyay asay aay ubstitutesay orfay ottingblay aperpay. Omesay amesomegay ightsway illway elltay ouyay atthay eythay avehay otay antplay eedsway erethay, eythay on’tday owgray aturallynay; atthay eythay importay Anadacay istlesthay; atthay eythay avehay otay endsay eyondbay eassay orfay aay ilespay otay opstay aay eaklay inay anay oilay askcay; atthay iecespay ofay oodway inay Antucketnay areay arriedcay aboutay ikelay itsbay ofay ethay uetray osscray inay Omeray; atthay eoplepay erethay antplay oadstoolstay eforebay eirthay ouseshay, otay etgay underay ethay adeshay inay ummersay imetay; atthay oneay adeblay ofay assgray akesmay anay oasisay, eethray adesblay inay aay ay’sday alkway aay airiepray; atthay eythay earway uicksandqay oesshay, omethingsay ikelay Aplanderlay ow-shoessnay; atthay eythay areay osay utshay upay, eltedbay aboutay, everyay ayway incloseday, urroundedsay, anday ademay anay utteray islanday ofay byay ethay oceanay, atthay otay eirthay eryvay airschay anday ablestay allsmay amsclay illway ometimessay ebay oundfay adheringay, asay otay ethay acksbay ofay easay urtlestay. Utbay esethay extravaganzasay onlyay owshay atthay Antucketnay isay onay Illinoisay. 

Ooklay ownay atay ethay ondrousway aditionaltray orystay ofay owhay isthay islanday asway ettledsay byay ethay ed-menray. Usthay oesgay ethay egendlay. Inay oldenay imestay anay eagleay oopedsway ownday uponay ethay Ewnay Englanday oastcay, anday arriedcay offay anay infantay Indianay inay ishay alonstay. Ithway oudlay amentlay ethay arentspay awsay eirthay ildchay ornebay outay ofay ightsay overay ethay ideway atersway. Eythay esolvedray otay ollowfay inay ethay amesay irectionday. Ettingsay outay inay eirthay anoescay, afteray aay erilouspay assagepay eythay iscoveredday ethay islanday, anday erethay eythay oundfay anay emptyay ivoryay asket,—thecay oorpay ittlelay Indian’say eletonskay. 

Atwhay onderway, enthay, atthay esethay Antucketersnay, ornbay onay aay eachbay, ouldshay aketay otay ethay easay orfay aay ivelihoodlay! Eythay irstfay aughtcay abscray anday uohogsqay inay ethay andsay; owngray olderbay, eythay adedway outay ithway etsnay orfay ackerelmay; oremay experienceday, eythay ushedpay offay inay oatsbay anday apturedcay odcay; anday atay astlay, aunchinglay aay avynay ofay eatgray ipsshay onay ethay easay, exploreday isthay ateryway orldway; utpay anay incessantay eltbay ofay ircumnavigationscay oundray itay; eepedpay inay atay Ehring’sbay Aitsstray; anday inay allay easonssay anday allay oceansay eclaredday everlastingay arway ithway ethay ightiestmay animateday assmay atthay ashay urvivedsay ethay oodflay; ostmay onstrousmay anday ostmay ountainousmay! Atthay Immalehanhay, alt-seasay Astodonmay, othedclay ithway uchsay ortentousnesspay ofay unconsciousay owerpay, atthay ishay eryvay anicspay areay oremay otay ebay eadeddray anthay ishay ostmay earlessfay anday aliciousmay assaultsay! 

Anday usthay avehay esethay akednay Antucketersnay, esethay easay ermitshay, issuingay omfray eirthay ant-hillay inay ethay easay, overrunay anday onqueredcay ethay ateryway orldway ikelay osay anymay Alexandersay; arcellingpay outay amongay emthay ethay Atlanticay, Acificpay, anday Indianay oceansay, asay ethay eethray iratepay owerspay idday Olandpay. Etlay Americaay adday Exicomay otay Exastay, anday ilepay Ubacay uponay Anadacay; etlay ethay Englishay overswarmay allay Indiaay, anday anghay outay eirthay azingblay annerbay omfray ethay unsay; otway irdsthay ofay isthay erraqueoustay obeglay areay ethay Antucketer’snay. Orfay ethay easay isay ishay; ehay ownsay itay, asay Emperorsay ownay empiresay; otheray eamensay avinghay utbay aay ightray ofay ayway oughthray itay. Erchantmay ipsshay areay utbay extensionay idgesbray; armeday onesay utbay oatingflay ortsfay; evenay iratespay anday ivateerspray, oughthay ollowingfay ethay easay asay ighwaymenhay ethay oadray, eythay utbay underplay otheray ipsshay, otheray agmentsfray ofay ethay andlay ikelay emselvesthay, ithoutway eekingsay otay awdray eirthay ivinglay omfray ethay ottomlessbay eepday itselfay. Ethay Antucketernay, ehay aloneay esidesray anday iotsray onay ethay easay; ehay aloneay, inay Iblebay anguagelay, oesgay ownday otay itay inay ipsshay; otay anday ofray oughingplay itay asay ishay ownay ecialspay antationplay. ere_Thay_ isay ishay omehay; ere_thay_ ieslay ishay usinessbay, ichwhay aay Oah’snay oodflay ouldway otnay interruptay, oughthay itay overwhelmeday allay ethay illionsmay inay Inachay. Ehay iveslay onay ethay easay, asay airiepray ockscay inay ethay airiepray; ehay ideshay amongay ethay avesway, ehay imbsclay emthay asay amoischay untershay imbclay ethay Alpsay. Orfay earsyay ehay owsknay otnay ethay andlay; osay atthay enwhay ehay omescay otay itay atay astlay, itay ellssmay ikelay anotheray orldway, oremay angelystray anthay ethay oonmay ouldway otay anay Earthsmanay. Ithway ethay andlesslay ullgay, atthay atay unsetsay oldsfay erhay ingsway anday isay ockedray otay eepslay etweenbay illowsbay; osay atay ightfallnay, ethay Antucketernay, outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay, urlsfay ishay ailssay, anday ayslay imhay otay ishay estray, ilewhay underay ishay eryvay illowpay ushray erdshay ofay alrusesway anday aleswhay. 



APTERCHAY 15ay. Owderchay. 

Itay asway uiteqay atelay inay ethay eveningay enwhay ethay ittlelay Ossmay amecay uglysnay otay anchoray, anday Ueequegqay anday IAY entway ashoreay; osay eway ouldcay attenday otay onay usinessbay atthay ayday, atay eastlay onenay utbay aay uppersay anday aay edbay. Ethay andlordlay ofay ethay Outer-innspay adhay ecommendedray usay otay ishay ousincay Oseahay Usseyhay ofay ethay Tryay Otspay, omwhay ehay asserteday otay ebay ethay oprietorpray ofay oneay ofay ethay estbay eptkay otelshay inay allay Antucketnay, anday oreovermay ehay adhay assureday usay atthay Ousincay Oseahay, asay ehay alledcay imhay, asway amousfay orfay ishay owderschay. Inay ortshay, ehay ainlyplay intedhay atthay eway ouldcay otnay ossiblypay oday etterbay anthay tryay ot-luckpay atay ethay Tryay Otspay. Utbay ethay irectionsday ehay adhay ivengay usay aboutay eepingkay aay ellowyay arehouseway onay ouray arboardstay andhay illtay eway openeday aay itewhay urchchay otay ethay arboardlay, anday enthay eepingkay atthay onay ethay arboardlay andhay illtay eway ademay aay ornercay eethray ointspay otay ethay arboardstay, anday atthay oneday, enthay askay ethay irstfay anmay eway etmay erewhay ethay aceplay asway: esethay ookedcray irectionsday ofay ishay eryvay uchmay uzzledpay usay atay irstfay, especiallyay asay, atay ethay outsetay, Ueequegqay insisteday atthay ethay ellowyay arehouse—ourway irstfay ointpay ofay eparture—mustday ebay eftlay onay ethay arboardlay andhay, ereaswhay IAY adhay understooday Eterpay Offincay otay aysay itay asway onay ethay arboardstay. Oweverhay, byay intday ofay eatingbay aboutay aay ittlelay inay ethay arkday, anday ownay anday enthay ockingknay upay aay eaceablepay inhabitantay otay inquireay ethay ayway, eway atay astlay amecay otay omethingsay ichwhay erethay asway onay istakingmay. 

Otway enormousay oodenway otspay aintedpay ackblay, anday uspendedsay byay asses’ay earsay, ungsway omfray ethay oss-treescray ofay anay olday op-masttay, antedplay inay ontfray ofay anay olday oorwayday. Ethay ornshay ofay ethay oss-treescray ereway awedsay offay onay ethay otheray idesay, osay atthay isthay olday op-masttay ookedlay otnay aay ittlelay ikelay aay allowsgay. Erhapspay IAY asway overay ensitivesay otay uchsay impressionsay atay ethay imetay, utbay IAY ouldcay otnay elphay aringstay atay isthay allowsgay ithway aay aguevay isgivingmay. AAY ortsay ofay ickcray asway inay myay ecknay asay IAY azedgay upay otay ethay otway emainingray ornshay; esyay, o_tway_ ofay emthay, oneay orfay Ueequegqay, anday oneay orfay emay. It’say ominousay, inksthay IAY. AAY Offincay myay Innkeeperay uponay andinglay inay myay irstfay alingwhay ortpay; ombstonestay aringstay atay emay inay ethay alemen’swhay apelchay; anday erehay aay allowsgay! anday aay airpay ofay odigiouspray ackblay otspay ootay! Areay esethay astlay owingthray outay obliqueay intshay ouchingtay Ophettay? 

IAY asway alledcay omfray esethay eflectionsray byay ethay ightsay ofay aay eckledfray omanway ithway ellowyay airhay anday aay ellowyay owngay, andingstay inay ethay orchpay ofay ethay innay, underay aay ullday edray amplay ingingsway erethay, atthay ookedlay uchmay ikelay anay injureday eyeay, anday arryingcay onay aay iskbray oldingscay ithway aay anmay inay aay urplepay oollenway irtshay. 

et“Gay alongay ithway e,”yay aidsay eshay otay ethay anmay, or“ay I’llay ebay ombingcay e!”yay 

ome“Cay onay, Ueequeg,”qay aidsay IAY, all“ay ightray. Ere’sthay Mrsay. Ussey.”hay 

Anday osay itay urnedtay outay; Mray. Oseahay Usseyhay eingbay omfray omehay, utbay eavinglay Mrsay. Usseyhay entirelyay ompetentcay otay attenday otay allay ishay affairsay. Uponay akingmay ownknay ouray esiresday orfay aay uppersay anday aay edbay, Mrsay. Usseyhay, ostponingpay urtherfay oldingscay orfay ethay esentpray, ushereday usay intoay aay ittlelay oomray, anday eatingsay usay atay aay abletay eadspray ithway ethay elicsray ofay aay ecentlyray oncludedcay epastray, urnedtay oundray otay usay anday aid—“Clamsay oray Od?”cay 

at’s“Whay atthay aboutay Odscay, a’am?”may aidsay IAY, ithway uchmay olitenesspay. 

am“Clay oray Od?”cay eshay epeatedray. 

A“AY amclay orfay uppersay? aay oldcay amclay; isay at_thay_ atwhay ouyay eanmay, Mrsay. Ussey?”hay ayssay IAY, ut“bay at’sthay aay atherray oldcay anday ammyclay eceptionray inay ethay interway imetay, ain’tay itay, Mrsay. Ussey?”hay 

Utbay eingbay inay aay eatgray urryhay otay esumeray oldingscay ethay anmay inay ethay urplepay Irtshay, owhay asway aitingway orfay itay inay ethay entryay, anday eemingsay otay earhay othingnay utbay ethay ordway am,”“clay Mrsay. Usseyhay urriedhay owardstay anay openay oorday eadinglay otay ethay itchenkay, anday awlingbay outay am“clay orfay o,”tway isappearedday. 

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, o“day ouyay inkthay atthay eway ancay akemay outay aay uppersay orfay usay othbay onay oneay am?”clay 

Oweverhay, aay armway avorysay eamstay omfray ethay itchenkay ervedsay otay eliebay ethay apparentlyay eerlesschay ospectpray eforebay usay. Utbay enwhay atthay okingsmay owderchay amecay inay, ethay erymystay asway elightfullyday explaineday. Ohay, eetsway iendsfray! earkenhay otay emay. Itay asway ademay ofay allsmay uicyjay amsclay, arcelyscay iggerbay anthay azelhay utsnay, ixedmay ithway oundedpay ipshay iscuitbay, anday altedsay orkpay utcay upay intoay ittlelay akesflay; ethay olewhay enricheday ithway utterbay, anday entifullyplay easonedsay ithway epperpay anday altsay. Ouray appetitesay eingbay arpenedshay byay ethay ostyfray oyagevay, anday inay articularpay, Ueequegqay eeingsay ishay avouritefay ishingfay oodfay eforebay imhay, anday ethay owderchay eingbay urpassinglysay excellentay, eway espatchedday itay ithway eatgray expeditionay: enwhay eaninglay ackbay aay omentmay anday ethinkingbay emay ofay Mrsay. Ussey’shay amclay anday odcay announcementay, IAY oughtthay IAY ouldway tryay aay ittlelay experimentay. Eppingstay otay ethay itchenkay oorday, IAY uttereday ethay ordway od”“cay ithway eatgray emphasisay, anday esumedray myay eatsay. Inay aay ewfay omentsmay ethay avourysay eamstay amecay orthfay againay, utbay ithway aay ifferentday avorflay, anday inay oodgay imetay aay inefay od-chowdercay asway acedplay eforebay usay. 

Eway esumedray usinessbay; anday ilewhay ingplyay ouray oonsspay inay ethay owlbay, inksthay IAY otay elfmysay, IAY onderway ownay ifay isthay erehay ashay anyay effectay onay ethay eadhay? At’swhay atthay ultifyingstay ayingsay aboutay owder-headedchay eoplepay? ut“Bay ooklay, Ueequegqay, ain’tay atthay aay ivelay eelay inay ouryay owlbay? Ere’swhay ouryay arpoon?”hay 

Ishiestfay ofay allay ishyfay acesplay asway ethay Tryay Otspay, ichwhay ellway eservedday itsay amenay; orfay ethay otspay erethay ereway alwaysay oilingbay owderschay. Owderchay orfay eakfastbray, anday owderchay orfay innerday, anday owderchay orfay uppersay, illtay ouyay eganbay otay ooklay orfay ish-bonesfay omingcay oughthray ouryay othesclay. Ethay areaay eforebay ethay ousehay asway avedpay ithway am-shellsclay. Mrsay. Usseyhay oreway aay olishedpay ecklacenay ofay odfishcay ertebravay; anday Oseahay Usseyhay adhay ishay accountay ooksbay oundbay inay uperiorsay olday ark-skinshay. Erethay asway aay ishyfay avorflay otay ethay ilkmay, ootay, ichwhay IAY ouldcay otnay atay allay accountay orfay, illtay oneay orningmay appeninghay otay aketay aay ollstray alongay ethay eachbay amongay omesay ishermen’sfay oatsbay, IAY awsay Osea’shay indledbray owcay eedingfay onay ishfay emnantsray, anday archingmay alongay ethay andsay ithway eachay ootfay inay aay od’scay ecapitatedday eadhay, ookinglay eryvay ip-shodslay, IAY assureay eyay. 

Uppersay oncludedcay, eway eceivedray aay amplay, anday irectionsday omfray Mrsay. Usseyhay oncerningcay ethay earestnay ayway otay edbay; utbay, asay Ueequegqay asway aboutay otay ecedepray emay upay ethay airsstay, ethay adylay eachedray orthfay erhay armay, anday emandedday ishay arpoonhay; eshay alloweday onay arpoonhay inay erhay amberschay. “Whyay ot?”nay aidsay IAY; every“ay uetray alemanwhay eepsslay ithway ishay arpoon—buthay whyay ot?”nay ecause“Bay it’say angerous,”day ayssay eshay. Ever“ay incesay oungyay Iggsstay omingcay omfray atthay unfort’ntay ev’y’gay ofay ishay, enwhay ehay asway onegay ourfay earsyay anday aay alfhay, ithway onlyay eethray arrelsbay ofay ile_ay_, asway oundfay eadday inay myay irstfay oorflay ackbay, ithway ishay arpoonhay inay ishay idesay; everay incesay enthay IAY alloway onay oardersbay otay aketay ichsay angerousday eeponsway inay eirthay oomsray atay ightnay. Osay, Mray. Ueequeg”qay or(fay eshay adhay earnedlay ishay amenay), I“AY illway ustjay aketay isthay erehay ironay, anday eepkay itay orfay ouyay illtay orningmay. Utbay ethay owderchay; amclay oray odcay o-morrowtay orfay eakfastbray, en?”may 

oth,”“Bay ayssay IAY; and“ay et’slay avehay aay ouplecay ofay okedsmay erringhay byay ayway ofay ariety.”vay 



APTERCHAY 16ay. Ethay Ipshay. 

Inay edbay eway oncoctedcay ouray ansplay orfay ethay orrowmay. Utbay otay myay urprisesay anday onay allsmay oncerncay, Ueequegqay ownay avegay emay otay understanday, atthay ehay adhay eenbay iligentlyday onsultingcay Ojo—theyay amenay ofay ishay ackblay ittlelay od—andgay Ojoyay adhay oldtay imhay otway oray eethray imestay overay, anday onglystray insisteday uponay itay everywayay, atthay insteaday ofay ouray oinggay ogethertay amongay ethay aling-fleetwhay inay arborhay, anday inay oncertcay electingsay ouray aftcray; insteaday ofay isthay, IAY aysay, Ojoyay earnestlyay enjoineday atthay ethay electionsay ofay ethay ipshay ouldshay estray ollywhay ithway emay, inasmuchay asay Ojoyay urposedpay efriendingbay usay; anday, inay orderay otay oday osay, adhay alreadyay itchedpay uponay aay esselvay, ichwhay, ifay eftlay otay elfmysay, IAY, Ishmaelay, ouldshay infalliblyay ightlay uponay, orfay allay ethay orldway asay oughthay itay adhay urnedtay outay byay ancechay; anday inay atthay esselvay IAY ustmay immediatelyay ipshay elfmysay, orfay ethay esentpray irrespectiveay ofay Ueequegqay. 

IAY avehay orgottenfay otay entionmay atthay, inay anymay ingsthay, Ueequegqay acedplay eatgray onfidencecay inay ethay excellenceay ofay Ojo’syay udgmentjay anday urprisingsay orecastfay ofay ingsthay; anday erishedchay Ojoyay ithway onsiderablecay esteemay, asay aay atherray oodgay ortsay ofay odgay, owhay erhapspay eantmay ellway enoughay uponay ethay olewhay, utbay inay allay asescay idday otnay ucceedsay inay ishay enevolentbay esignsday. 

Ownay, isthay anplay ofay Ueequeg’sqay, oray atherray Ojo’syay, ouchingtay ethay electionsay ofay ouray aftcray; IAY idday otnay ikelay atthay anplay atay allay. IAY adhay otnay aay ittlelay eliedray uponay Ueequeg’sqay agacitysay otay ointpay outay ethay alerwhay estbay ittedfay otay arrycay usay anday ouray ortunesfay ecurelysay. Utbay asay allay myay emonstrancesray oducedpray onay effectay uponay Ueequegqay, IAY asway obligeday otay acquiesceay; anday accordinglyay eparedpray otay etsay aboutay isthay usinessbay ithway aay eterminedday ushingray ortsay ofay energyay anday igorvay, atthay ouldshay uicklyqay ettlesay atthay iflingtray ittlelay affairay. Extnay orningmay earlyay, eavinglay Ueequegqay utshay upay ithway Ojoyay inay ouray ittlelay edroom—forbay itay eemedsay atthay itay asway omesay ortsay ofay Entlay oray Amadanray, oray ayday ofay astingfay, umiliationhay, anday ayerpray ithway Ueequegqay anday Ojoyay atthay ayday; ow_hay_ itay asway IAY evernay ouldcay indfay outay, orfay, oughthay IAY applieday elfmysay otay itay everalsay imestay, IAY evernay ouldcay astermay ishay iturgieslay anday IXXXXAY Articles—leavingay Ueequegqay, enthay, astingfay onay ishay omahawktay ipepay, anday Ojoyay armingway imselfhay atay ishay acrificialsay irefay ofay avingsshay, IAY alliedsay outay amongay ethay ippingshay. Afteray uchmay olongedpray aunteringsay anday anymay andomray inquiriesay, IAY earntlay atthay erethay ereway eethray ipsshay upay orfay ee-years’thray oyages—Thevay Evil-damday, ethay It-bittay, anday ethay Equodpay. evil-Dam_Day_, IAY oday otnay owknay ethay originay ofay; it-bit_Tay_ isay obviousay; equod_Pay_, ouyay illway onay oubtday ememberray, asway ethay amenay ofay aay elebratedcay ibetray ofay Assachusettsmay Indiansay; ownay extinctay asay ethay ancientay Edesmay. IAY eeredpay anday edpryay aboutay ethay Evil-damday; omfray erhay, oppedhay overay otay ethay It-bittay; anday inallyfay, oinggay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, ookedlay arounday erhay orfay aay omentmay, anday enthay ecidedday atthay isthay asway ethay eryvay ipshay orfay usay. 

Ouyay aymay avehay eensay anymay aay uaintqay aftcray inay ouryay ayday, orfay aughtay IAY ow;—square-toedknay uggerslay; ountainousmay Apanesejay unksjay; utter-boxbay alliotsgay, anday atwhay otnay; utbay aketay myay ordway orfay itay, ouyay evernay awsay uchsay aay areray olday aftcray asay isthay amesay areray olday Equodpay. Eshay asway aay ipshay ofay ethay olday oolschay, atherray allsmay ifay anythingay; ithway anay old-fashioneday aw-footedclay ooklay aboutay erhay. Onglay easonedsay anday eather-stainedway inay ethay oonstyphay anday almscay ofay allay ourfay oceansay, erhay olday ull’shay omplexioncay asway arkenedday ikelay aay Enchfray enadier’sgray, owhay ashay alikeay oughtfay inay Egyptay anday Iberiasay. Erhay enerablevay owsbay ookedlay eardedbay. Erhay asts—cutmay omewheresay onay ethay oastcay ofay Apanjay, erewhay erhay originalay onesay ereway ostlay overboarday inay aay ale—hergay astsmay oodstay ifflystay upay ikelay ethay inesspay ofay ethay eethray olday ingskay ofay Olognecay. Erhay ancientay ecksday ereway ornway anday inkledwray, ikelay ethay ilgrim-worshippedpay ag-stoneflay inay Anterburycay Athedralcay erewhay Ecketbay edblay. Utbay otay allay esethay erhay olday antiquitiesay, ereway addeday ewnay anday arvellousmay eaturesfay, ertainingpay otay ethay ildway usinessbay atthay orfay oremay anthay alfhay aay enturycay eshay adhay ollowedfay. Olday Aptaincay Elegpay, anymay earsyay erhay ief-matechay, eforebay ehay ommandedcay anotheray esselvay ofay ishay ownay, anday ownay aay etiredray eamansay, anday oneay ofay ethay incipalpray ownersay ofay ethay Equod,—thispay olday Elegpay, uringday ethay ermtay ofay ishay ief-mateshipchay, adhay uiltbay uponay erhay originalay otesquenessgray, anday inlaiday itay, allay overay, ithway aay uaintnessqay othbay ofay aterialmay anday eviceday, unmatcheday byay anythingay exceptay itay ebay Orkill-hake’sthay arvedcay ucklerbay oray edsteadbay. Eshay asway apparelleday ikelay anyay arbaricbay Ethiopianay emperoray, ishay ecknay eavyhay ithway endantspay ofay olishedpay ivoryay. Eshay asway aay ingthay ofay ophiestray. AAY annibalcay ofay aay aftcray, ickingtray erselfhay orthfay inay ethay asedchay onesbay ofay erhay enemiesay. Allay oundray, erhay unpanelleday, openay ulwarksbay ereway arnishedgay ikelay oneay ontinuouscay awjay, ithway ethay onglay arpshay eethtay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay, inserteday erethay orfay inspay, otay astenfay erhay olday empenhay ewsthay anday endonstay otay. Osethay ewsthay anray otnay oughthray asebay ocksblay ofay andlay oodway, utbay eftlyday avelledtray overay eavesshay ofay ea-ivorysay. Orningscay aay urnstiletay eelwhay atay erhay everendray elmhay, eshay ortedspay erethay aay illertay; anday atthay illertay asway inay oneay assmay, uriouslycay arvedcay omfray ethay onglay arrownay owerlay awjay ofay erhay ereditaryhay oefay. Ethay elmsmanhay owhay eeredstay byay atthay illertay inay aay empesttay, eltfay ikelay ethay Artartay, enwhay ehay oldshay ackbay ishay ieryfay eedstay byay utchingclay itsay awjay. AAY oblenay aftcray, utbay omehowsay aay ostmay elancholymay! Allay oblenay ingsthay areay ouchedtay ithway atthay. 

Ownay enwhay IAY ookedlay aboutay ethay uarter-deckqay, orfay omesay oneay avinghay authorityay, inay orderay otay oposepray elfmysay asay aay andidatecay orfay ethay oyagevay, atay irstfay IAY awsay obodynay; utbay IAY ouldcay otnay ellway overlookay aay angestray ortsay ofay enttay, oray atherray igwamway, itchedpay aay ittlelay ehindbay ethay ain-mastmay. Itay eemedsay onlyay aay emporarytay erectionay useday inay ortpay. Itay asway ofay aay onicalcay apeshay, omesay entay eetfay ighhay; onsistingcay ofay ethay onglay, ugehay absslay ofay imberlay ackblay onebay akentay omfray ethay iddlemay anday ighesthay artpay ofay ethay awsjay ofay ethay ight-whaleray. Antedplay ithway eirthay oadbray endsay onay ethay eckday, aay irclecay ofay esethay absslay acedlay ogethertay, utuallymay opedslay owardstay eachay otheray, anday atay ethay apexay uniteday inay aay uftedtay ointpay, erewhay ethay ooselay airyhay ibresfay avedway otay anday ofray ikelay ethay op-knottay onay omesay olday Ottowottamiepay Achem’ssay eadhay. AAY iangulartray openingay acedfay owardstay ethay owsbay ofay ethay ipshay, osay atthay ethay insideray ommandedcay aay ompletecay iewvay orwardfay. 

Anday alfhay oncealedcay inay isthay ueerqay enementtay, IAY atay engthlay oundfay oneay owhay byay ishay aspectay eemedsay otay avehay authorityay; anday owhay, itay eingbay oonnay, anday ethay ip’sshay orkway uspendedsay, asway ownay enjoyingay espiteray omfray ethay urdenbay ofay ommandcay. Ehay asway eatedsay onay anay old-fashioneday oakenay airchay, igglingwray allay overay ithway uriouscay arvingcay; anday ethay ottombay ofay ichwhay asway ormedfay ofay aay outstay interlacingay ofay ethay amesay elasticay uffstay ofay ichwhay ethay igwamway asway onstructedcay. 

Erethay asway othingnay osay eryvay articularpay, erhapspay, aboutay ethay appearanceay ofay ethay elderlyay anmay IAY awsay; ehay asway ownbray anday awnybray, ikelay ostmay olday eamensay, anday eavilyhay olledray upay inay ueblay ilot-clothpay, utcay inay ethay Uakerqay estylay; onlyay erethay asway aay inefay anday almostay icroscopicmay et-worknay ofay ethay inutestmay inkleswray interlacingay oundray ishay eyesay, ichwhay ustmay avehay arisenay omfray ishay ontinualcay ailingssay inay anymay ardhay alesgay, anday alwaysay ookinglay otay indward;—forway isthay ausescay ethay usclesmay aboutay ethay eyesay otay ecomebay ursedpay ogethertay. Uchsay eye-wrinklesay areay eryvay effectualay inay aay owlscay. 

Is“ay isthay ethay Aptaincay ofay ethay Equod?”pay aidsay IAY, advancingay otay ethay oorday ofay ethay enttay. 

upposing“Say itay ebay ethay aptaincay ofay ethay Equodpay, atwhay ostday outhay antway ofay im?”hay ehay emandedday. 

I“AY asway inkingthay ofay ipping.”shay 

ou“Thay astway, astway outhay? IAY eesay outhay artay onay Antucketer—evernay eenbay inay aay ovestay oat?”bay 

o“Nay, Irsay, IAY evernay ave.”hay 

ost“Day owknay othingnay atay allay aboutay alingwhay, IAY areday ay—ehsay? 

othing“Nay, Irsay; utbay IAY avehay onay oubtday IAY allshay oonsay earnlay. I’veay eenbay everalsay oyagesvay inay ethay erchantmay ervicesay, anday IAY inkthay at—”thay 

erchant“May ervicesay ebay amnedday. Alktay otnay atthay ingolay otay emay. Ostday eesay atthay eg?—I’lllay aketay atthay eglay awayay omfray thyay ernstay, ifay everay outhay alkesttay ofay ethay archantmay ervicesay otay emay againay. Archantmay ervicesay indeeday! IAY upposesay ownay eyay eelfay onsiderablecay oudpray ofay avinghay ervedsay inay osethay archantmay ipsshay. Utbay ukesflay! anmay, atwhay akesmay eethay antway otay ogay aay alingwhay, eh?—itay ookslay aay ittlelay uspicioussay, on’tday itay, eh?—Hastay otnay eenbay aay iratepay, asthay ou?—Didstthay otnay obray thyay astlay Aptaincay, idstday ou?—Dostthay otnay inkthay ofay urderingmay ethay officersay enwhay outhay ettestgay otay ea?”say 

IAY otestedpray myay innocenceay ofay esethay ingsthay. IAY awsay atthay underay ethay askmay ofay esethay alfhay umoroushay innuendoesay, isthay olday eamansay, asay anay insulateday Uakerishqay Antucketernay, asway ullfay ofay ishay insularay ejudicespray, anday atherray istrustfulday ofay allay aliensay, unlessay eythay ailedhay omfray Apecay Odcay oray ethay Ineyardvay. 

ut“Bay atwhay akestay eethay a-whalingay? IAY antway otay owknay atthay eforebay IAY inkthay ofay ippingshay e.”yay 

ell“Way, irsay, IAY antway otay eesay atwhay alingwhay isay. IAY antway otay eesay ethay orld.”way 

ant“Way otay eesay atwhay alingwhay isay, ehay? Avehay eyay appedclay eyeay onay Aptaincay Ahab?”ay 

o“Whay isay Aptaincay Ahabay, ir?”say 

Aye“ay, ayeay, IAY oughtthay osay. Aptaincay Ahabay isay ethay Aptaincay ofay isthay ip.”shay 

I“AY amay istakenmay enthay. IAY oughtthay IAY asway eakingspay otay ethay Aptaincay imself.”hay 

ou“Thay artay eakingspay otay Aptaincay Eleg—that’spay owhay eyay areay eakingspay otay, oungyay anmay. Itay elongsbay otay emay anday Aptaincay Ildadbay otay eesay ethay Equodpay ittedfay outay orfay ethay oyagevay, anday uppliedsay ithway allay erhay eedsnay, includingay ewcray. Eway areay artpay ownersay anday agentsay. Utbay asay IAY asway oinggay otay aysay, ifay outhay antestway otay owknay atwhay alingwhay isay, asay outhay ellesttay eyay oday, IAY ancay utpay eyay inay aay ayway ofay indingfay itay outay eforebay eyay indbay ourselfyay otay itay, astpay ackingbay outay. Apclay eyeay onay Aptaincay Ahabay, oungyay anmay, anday outhay iltway indfay atthay ehay ashay onlyay oneay eg.”lay 

at“Whay oday ouyay eanmay, irsay? Asway ethay otheray oneay ostlay byay aay ale?”whay 

ost“Lay byay aay alewhay! Oungyay anmay, omecay earernay otay emay: itay asway evouredday, ewedchay upay, unchedcray byay ethay onstrousestmay armacettypay atthay everay ippedchay aay oat!—ahbay, ah!”ay 

IAY asway aay ittlelay alarmeday byay ishay energyay, erhapspay alsoay aay ittlelay ouchedtay atay ethay eartyhay iefgray inay ishay oncludingcay exclamationay, utbay aidsay asay almlycay asay IAY ouldcay, at“Whay ouyay aysay isay onay oubtday uetray enoughay, irsay; utbay owhay ouldcay IAY owknay erethay asway anyay eculiarpay erocityfay inay atthay articularpay alewhay, oughthay indeeday IAY ightmay avehay inferreday asay uchmay omfray ethay implesay actfay ofay ethay accident.”ay 

ook“Lay eyay ownay, oungyay anmay, thyay ungslay areay aay ortsay ofay oftsay, ed’yay eesay; outhay ostday otnay alktay arkshay aay itbay. ure_Say_, e’veyay eenbay otay easay eforebay ownay; uresay ofay at?”thay 

ir,”“Say aidsay IAY, I“AY oughtthay IAY oldtay ouyay atthay IAY adhay eenbay ourfay oyagesvay inay ethay erchant—”may 

ard“Hay ownday outay ofay atthay! Indmay atwhay IAY aidsay aboutay ethay archantmay ervice—don’tsay aggravateay e—Imay on’tway avehay itay. Utbay etlay usay understanday eachay otheray. IAY avehay ivengay eethay aay inthay aboutay atwhay alingwhay isay; oday eyay etyay eelfay inclineday orfay it?”ay 

I“AY oday, ir.”say 

ery“Vay oodgay. Ownay, artay outhay ethay anmay otay itchpay aay arpoonhay ownday aay ivelay ale’swhay oatthray, anday enthay umpjay afteray itay? Answeray, uick!”qay 

I“AY amay, irsay, ifay itay ouldshay ebay ositivelypay indispensableay otay oday osay; otnay otay ebay otgay idray ofay, atthay isay; ichwhay IAY on’tday aketay otay ebay ethay act.”fay 

ood“Gay againay. Ownay enthay, outhay otnay onlyay antestway otay ogay a-whalingay, otay indfay outay byay experienceay atwhay alingwhay isay, utbay eyay alsoay antway otay ogay inay orderay otay eesay ethay orldway? Asway otnay atthay atwhay eyay aidsay? IAY oughtthay osay. Ellway enthay, ustjay epstay orwardfay erethay, anday aketay aay eeppay overay ethay eather-bowway, anday enthay ackbay otay emay anday elltay emay atwhay eyay eesay ere.”thay 

Orfay aay omentmay IAY oodstay aay ittlelay uzzledpay byay isthay uriouscay equestray, otnay owingknay exactlyay owhay otay aketay itay, etherwhay umorouslyhay oray inay earnestay. Utbay oncentratingcay allay ishay ow’scray eetfay intoay oneay owlscay, Aptaincay Elegpay artedstay emay onay ethay erranday. 

Oinggay orwardfay anday ancingglay overay ethay eatherway owbay, IAY erceivedpay atthay ethay ipshay ingingsway otay erhay anchoray ithway ethay ood-tideflay, asway ownay obliquelyay ointingpay owardstay ethay openay oceanay. Ethay ospectpray asway unlimiteday, utbay exceedinglyay onotonousmay anday orbiddingfay; otnay ethay ightestslay arietyvay atthay IAY ouldcay eesay. 

ell“Way, at’swhay ethay eport?”ray aidsay Elegpay enwhay IAY amecay ackbay; at“whay idday eyay ee?”say 

ot“Nay uch,”may IAY eplied—“nothingray utbay aterway; onsiderablecay orizonhay oughthay, anday ere’sthay aay uallsqay omingcay upay, IAY ink.”thay 

ell“Way, atwhay oesday outhay inkthay enthay ofay eeingsay ethay orldway? Oday eyay ishway otay ogay oundray Apecay Ornhay otay eesay anyay oremay ofay itay, ehay? An’tcay eyay eesay ethay orldway erewhay ouyay and?”stay 

IAY asway aay ittlelay aggeredstay, utbay ogay a-whalingay IAY ustmay, anday IAY ouldway; anday ethay Equodpay asway asay oodgay aay ipshay asay any—Iay oughtthay ethay est—andbay allay isthay IAY ownay epeatedray otay Elegpay. Eeingsay emay osay eterminedday, ehay expresseday ishay illingnessway otay ipshay emay. 

And“ay outhay ayestmay asay ellway ignsay ethay aperspay ightray off,”ay ehay added—“comeay alongay ithway e.”yay Anday osay ayingsay, ehay edlay ethay ayway elowbay eckday intoay ethay abincay. 

Eatedsay onay ethay ansomtray asway atwhay eemedsay otay emay aay ostmay uncommonay anday urprisingsay igurefay. Itay urnedtay outay otay ebay Aptaincay Ildadbay, owhay alongay ithway Aptaincay Elegpay asway oneay ofay ethay argestlay ownersay ofay ethay esselvay; ethay otheray aresshay, asay isay ometimessay ethay asecay inay esethay ortspay, eingbay eldhay byay aay owdcray ofay olday annuitantsay; idowsway, atherlessfay ildrenchay, anday ancerychay ardsway; eachay owningay aboutay ethay aluevay ofay aay imbertay eadhay, oray aay ootfay ofay ankplay, oray aay ailnay oray otway inay ethay ipshay. Eoplepay inay Antucketnay investay eirthay oneymay inay alingwhay esselsvay, ethay amesay ayway atthay ouyay oday oursyay inay approveday atestay ocksstay ingingbray inay oodgay interestay. 

Ownay, Ildadbay, ikelay Elegpay, anday indeeday anymay otheray Antucketersnay, asway aay Uakerqay, ethay islanday avinghay eenbay originallyay ettledsay byay atthay ectsay; anday otay isthay ayday itsay inhabitantsay inay eneralgay etainray inay anay uncommonay easuremay ethay eculiaritiespay ofay ethay Uakerqay, onlyay ariouslyvay anday anomalouslyay odifiedmay byay ingsthay altogetheray alienay anday eterogeneoushay. Orfay omesay ofay esethay amesay Uakersqay areay ethay ostmay anguinarysay ofay allay ailorssay anday ale-hunterswhay. Eythay areay ightingfay Uakersqay; eythay areay Uakersqay ithway aay engeancevay. 

Osay atthay erethay areay instancesay amongay emthay ofay enmay, owhay, amednay ithway Ipturescray ames—anay ingularlysay ommoncay ashionfay onay ethay island—anday inay ildhoodchay aturallynay imbibingay ethay atelystay amaticdray eethay anday outhay ofay ethay Uakerqay idiomay; illstay, omfray ethay audaciousay, aringday, anday oundlessbay adventureay ofay eirthay ubsequentsay iveslay, angelystray endblay ithway esethay unoutgrownay eculiaritiespay, aay ousandthay oldbay ashesday ofay aracterchay, otnay unworthyay aay Andinavianscay ea-kingsay, oray aay oeticalpay Aganpay Omanray. Anday enwhay esethay ingsthay uniteay inay aay anmay ofay eatlygray uperiorsay aturalnay orcefay, ithway aay obularglay ainbray anday aay onderouspay earthay; owhay ashay alsoay byay ethay illnessstay anday eclusionsay ofay anymay onglay ight-watchesnay inay ethay emotestray atersway, anday eneathbay onstellationscay evernay eensay erehay atay ethay orthnay, eenbay edlay otay inkthay untraditionallyay anday independentlyay; eceivingray allay ature’snay eetsway oray avagesay impressionsay eshfray omfray erhay ownay irginvay oluntaryvay anday onfidingcay eastbray, anday erebythay ieflychay, utbay ithway omesay elphay omfray accidentalay advantagesay, otay earnlay aay oldbay anday ervousnay oftylay anguage—thatlay anmay akesmay oneay inay aay olewhay ation’snay ensus—acay ightymay ageantpay eaturecray, ormedfay orfay oblenay agediestray. Ornay illway itay atay allay etractday omfray imhay, amaticallydray egardedray, ifay eitheray byay irthbay oray otheray ircumstancescay, ehay avehay atwhay eemssay aay alfhay ilfulway overrulingay orbidnessmay atay ethay ottombay ofay ishay aturenay. Orfay allay enmay agicallytray eatgray areay ademay osay oughthray aay ertaincay orbidnessmay. Ebay uresay ofay isthay, OAY oungyay ambitionay, allay ortalmay eatnessgray isay utbay iseaseday. Utbay, asay etyay eway avehay otnay otay oday ithway uchsay anay oneay, utbay ithway uiteqay anotheray; anday illstay aay anmay, owhay, ifay indeeday eculiarpay, itay onlyay esultsray againay omfray anotheray asephay ofay ethay Uakerqay, odifiedmay byay individualay ircumstancescay. 

Ikelay Aptaincay Elegpay, Aptaincay Ildadbay asway aay ell-to-doway, etiredray alemanwhay. Utbay unlikeay Aptaincay Eleg—whopay aredcay otnay aay ushray orfay atwhay areay alledcay erioussay ingsthay, anday indeeday eemedday osethay elf-samesay erioussay ingsthay ethay eriestvay ofay allay ifles—Captaintray Ildadbay adhay otnay onlyay eenbay originallyay educateday accordingay otay ethay icteststray ectsay ofay Antucketnay Uakerismqay, utbay allay ishay ubsequentsay oceanay ifelay, anday ethay ightsay ofay anymay uncladay, ovelylay islanday eaturescray, oundray ethay Orn—allhay atthay adhay otnay ovedmay isthay ativenay ornbay Uakerqay oneay inglesay otjay, adhay otnay osay uchmay asay altereday oneay angleay ofay ishay estvay.
