Illstay, orfay allay isthay immutablenessay, asway erethay omesay acklay ofay ommoncay onsistencycay aboutay orthyway Aptaincay Ildadbay. Oughthay efusingray, omfray onscientiouscay uplesscray, otay earbay armsay againstay andlay invadersay, etyay imselfhay adhay illimitablyay invadeday ethay Atlanticay anday Acificpay; anday oughthay aay ornsway oefay otay umanhay oodshedblay, etyay adhay ehay inay ishay aight-bodiedstray oatcay, illedspay unstay uponay unstay ofay eviathanlay oregay. Owhay ownay inay ethay ontemplativecay eveningay ofay ishay aysday, ethay iouspay Ildadbay econciledray esethay ingsthay inay ethay eminiscenceray, IAY oday otnay owknay; utbay itay idday otnay eemsay otay oncerncay imhay uchmay, anday eryvay obablypray ehay adhay onglay incesay omecay otay ethay agesay anday ensiblesay onclusioncay atthay aay an’smay eligionray isay oneay ingthay, anday isthay acticalpray orldway uiteqay anotheray. Isthay orldway ayspay ividendsday. Isingray omfray aay ittlelay abin-boycay inay ortshay othesclay ofay ethay abbestdray abdray, otay aay arpooneerhay inay aay oadbray ad-belliedshay aistcoatway; omfray atthay ecomingbay oat-headerbay, ief-matechay, anday aptaincay, anday inallyfay aay ipshay owneray; Ildadbay, asay IAY intedhay eforebay, adhay oncludedcay ishay adventurousay areercay byay ollywhay etiringray omfray activeay ifelay atay ethay oodlygay ageay ofay ixtysay, anday edicatingday ishay emainingray aysday otay ethay uietqay eceivingray ofay ishay ell-earnedway incomeay. 

Ownay, Ildadbay, IAY amay orrysay otay aysay, adhay ethay eputationray ofay eingbay anay incorrigibleay olday unkshay, anday inay ishay ea-goingsay aysday, aay itterbay, ardhay ask-mastertay. Eythay oldtay emay inay Antucketnay, oughthay itay ertainlycay eemssay aay uriouscay orystay, atthay enwhay ehay ailedsay ethay olday Ategutcay alemanwhay, ishay ewcray, uponay arrivingay omehay, ereway ostlymay allay arriedcay ashoreay otay ethay ospitalhay, oresay exhausteday anday ornway outay. Orfay aay iouspay anmay, especiallyay orfay aay Uakerqay, ehay asway ertainlycay atherray ard-heartedhay, otay aysay ethay eastlay. Ehay evernay useday otay earsway, oughthay, atay ishay enmay, eythay aidsay; utbay omehowsay ehay otgay anay inordinateay uantityqay ofay uelcray, unmitigateday ardhay orkway outay ofay emthay. Enwhay Ildadbay asway aay ief-matechay, otay avehay ishay ab-coloureddray eyeay intentlyay ookinglay atay ouyay, ademay ouyay eelfay ompletelycay ervousnay, illtay ouyay ouldcay utchclay omething—asay ammerhay oray aay arling-spikemay, anday ogay otay orkway ikelay admay, atay omethingsay oray otheray, evernay indmay atwhay. Indolenceay anday idlenessay erishedpay eforebay imhay. Ishay ownay ersonpay asway ethay exactay embodimentay ofay ishay utilitarianay aracterchay. Onay ishay onglay, auntgay odybay, ehay arriedcay onay arespay eshflay, onay uperfluoussay eardbay, ishay inchay avinghay aay oftsay, economicalay apnay otay itay, ikelay ethay ornway apnay ofay ishay oad-brimmedbray athay. 

Uchsay, enthay, asway ethay ersonpay atthay IAY awsay eatedsay onay ethay ansomtray enwhay IAY ollowedfay Aptaincay Elegpay ownday intoay ethay abincay. Ethay acespay etweenbay ethay ecksday asway allsmay; anday erethay, olt-uprightbay, atsay olday Ildadbay, owhay alwaysay atsay osay, anday evernay eanedlay, anday isthay otay avesay ishay oatcay ailstay. Ishay oad-brimbray asway acedplay esidebay imhay; ishay egslay ereway ifflystay ossedcray; ishay abdray esturevay asway uttonedbay upay otay ishay inchay; anday ectaclesspay onay osenay, ehay eemedsay absorbeday inay eadingray omfray aay onderouspay olumevay. 

ildad,”“Bay iedcray Aptaincay Elegpay, at“ay itay againay, Ildadbay, ehay? Eyay avehay eenbay udyingstay osethay Ipturesscray, ownay, orfay ethay astlay irtythay earsyay, otay myay ertaincay owledgeknay. Owhay arfay eyay otgay, Ildad?”bay 

Asay ifay onglay abituatedhay otay uchsay ofanepray alktay omfray ishay olday ipmateshay, Ildadbay, ithoutway oticingnay ishay esentpray irreverenceay, uietlyqay ookedlay upay, anday eeingsay emay, ancedglay againay inquiringlyay owardstay Elegpay. 

e“Hay ayssay e’shay ouray anmay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay, e“hay antsway otay ip.”shay 

ost“Day ee?”thay aidsay Ildadbay, inay aay ollowhay onetay, anday urningtay oundray otay emay. 

I“AY ost_,”_day aidsay IAY unconsciouslyay, ehay asway osay intenseay aay Uakerqay. 

at“Whay oday eyay inkthay ofay imhay, Ildad?”bay aidsay Elegpay. 

e’ll“Hay o,”day aidsay Ildadbay, eyeingay emay, anday enthay entway onay ellingspay awayay atay ishay ookbay inay aay umblingmay onetay uiteqay audibleay. 

IAY oughtthay imhay ethay ueerestqay olday Uakerqay IAY everay awsay, especiallyay asay Elegpay, ishay iendfray anday olday ipmateshay, eemedsay uchsay aay ustererblay. Utbay IAY aidsay othingnay, onlyay ookinglay oundray emay arplyshay. Elegpay ownay ewthray openay aay estchay, anday awingdray orthfay ethay ip’sshay articlesay, acedplay enpay anday inkay eforebay imhay, anday eatedsay imselfhay atay aay ittlelay abletay. IAY eganbay otay inkthay itay asway ighhay imetay otay ettlesay ithway elfmysay atay atwhay ermstay IAY ouldway ebay illingway otay engageay orfay ethay oyagevay. IAY asway alreadyay awareay atthay inay ethay alingwhay usinessbay eythay aidpay onay agesway; utbay allay andshay, includingay ethay aptaincay, eceivedray ertaincay aresshay ofay ethay ofitspray alledcay ays_lay_, anday atthay esethay ayslay ereway oportionedpray otay ethay egreeday ofay importanceay ertainingpay otay ethay espectiveray utiesday ofay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay. IAY asway alsoay awareay atthay eingbay aay eengray andhay atay alingwhay, myay ownay aylay ouldway otnay ebay eryvay argelay; utbay onsideringcay atthay IAY asway useday otay ethay easay, ouldcay eerstay aay ipshay, icesplay aay operay, anday allay atthay, IAY ademay onay oubtday atthay omfray allay IAY adhay eardhay IAY ouldshay ebay offereday atay eastlay ethay 275thay ay—thatlay isay, ethay 275thay artpay ofay ethay earclay etnay oceedspray ofay ethay oyagevay, ateverwhay atthay ightmay eventuallyay amountay otay. Anday oughthay ethay 275thay aylay asway atwhay eythay allcay aay atherray ong_lay aylay_, etyay itay asway etterbay anthay othingnay; anday ifay eway adhay aay uckylay oyagevay, ightmay ettypray earlynay aypay orfay ethay othingclay IAY ouldway earway outay onay itay, otnay otay eakspay ofay myay eethray ears’yay eefbay anday oardbay, orfay ichwhay IAY ouldway otnay avehay otay aypay oneay iverstay. 

Itay ightmay ebay oughtthay atthay isthay asway aay oorpay ayway otay accumulateay aay incelypray ortune—andfay osay itay asway, aay eryvay oorpay ayway indeeday. Utbay IAY amay oneay ofay osethay atthay evernay aketay onay aboutay incelypray ortunesfay, anday amay uiteqay ontentcay ifay ethay orldway isay eadyray otay oardbay anday odgelay emay, ilewhay IAY amay uttingpay upay atay isthay imgray ignsay ofay ethay Underthay Oudclay. Uponay ethay olewhay, IAY oughtthay atthay ethay 275thay aylay ouldway ebay aboutay ethay airfay ingthay, utbay ouldway otnay avehay eenbay urprisedsay adhay IAY eenbay offereday ethay 200thay, onsideringcay IAY asway ofay aay oad-shoulderedbray akemay. 

Utbay oneay ingthay, everthelessnay, atthay ademay emay aay ittlelay istrustfulday aboutay eceivingray aay enerousgay areshay ofay ethay ofitspray asway isthay: Ashoreay, IAY adhay eardhay omethingsay ofay othbay Aptaincay Elegpay anday ishay unaccountableay olday onycray Ildadbay; owhay atthay eythay eingbay ethay incipalpray oprietorspray ofay ethay Equodpay, ereforethay ethay otheray anday oremay inconsiderableay anday atteredscay ownersay, eftlay earlynay ethay olewhay anagementmay ofay ethay ip’sshay affairsay otay esethay otway. Anday IAY idday otnay owknay utbay atwhay ethay ingystay olday Ildadbay ightmay avehay aay ightymay ealday otay aysay aboutay ippingshay andshay, especiallyay asay IAY ownay oundfay imhay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, uiteqay atay omehay erethay inay ethay abincay, anday eadingray ishay Iblebay asay ifay atay ishay ownay iresidefay. Ownay ilewhay Elegpay asway ainlyvay ingtryay otay endmay aay enpay ithway ishay ack-knifejay, olday Ildadbay, otay myay onay allsmay urprisesay, onsideringcay atthay ehay asway uchsay anay interesteday artypay inay esethay oceedingspray; Ildadbay evernay eededhay usay, utbay entway onay umblingmay otay imselfhay outay ofay ishay ookbay, ay“_Lay_ otnay upay orfay ourselvesyay easurestray uponay earthay, erewhay oth—”may 

ell“Way, Aptaincay Ildad,”bay interrupteday Elegpay, at“whay ed’yay aysay, atwhay aylay allshay eway ivegay isthay oungyay an?”may 

ou“Thay owestknay est,”bay asway ethay epulchralsay eplyray, e“thay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay ouldn’tway ebay ootay uchmay, ouldway it?—‘whereay othmay anday ustray oday orruptcay, utbay ay_—’”_lay 

ay_Lay_, indeeday, oughtthay IAY, anday uchsay aay aylay! ethay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay! Ellway, olday Ildadbay, ouyay areay eterminedday atthay IAY, orfay oneay, allshay otnay ay_lay_ upay anymay ays_lay_ erehay elowbay, erewhay othmay anday ustray oday orruptcay. Itay asway anay exceedinglyay ong_lay aylay_ atthay, indeeday; anday oughthay omfray ethay agnitudemay ofay ethay igurefay itay ightmay atay irstfay eceiveday aay andsmanlay, etyay ethay ightestslay onsiderationcay illway owshay atthay oughthay evensay undredhay anday eventy-sevensay isay aay ettypray argelay umbernay, etyay, enwhay ouyay omecay otay akemay aay eenth_tay_ ofay itay, ouyay illway enthay eesay, IAY aysay, atthay ethay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay artpay ofay aay arthingfay isay aay oodgay ealday esslay anthay evensay undredhay anday eventy-sevensay oldgay oubloonsday; anday osay IAY oughtthay atay ethay imetay. 

“Whyay, astblay ouryay eyesay, Ildad,”bay iedcray Elegpay, ou“thay ostday otnay antway otay indlesway isthay oungyay anmay! ehay ustmay avehay oremay anthay at.”thay 

even“Say undredhay anday eventy-seventh,”say againay aidsay Ildadbay, ithoutway iftinglay ishay eyesay; anday enthay entway onay umbling—“formay erewhay ouryay easuretray isay, erethay illway ouryay earthay ebay also.”ay 

I“AY amay oinggay otay utpay imhay ownday orfay ethay eethray undredth,”hay aidsay Elegpay, o“day eyay earhay atthay, Ildadbay! Ethay eethray undredthhay aylay, IAY ay.”say 

Ildadbay aidlay ownday ishay ookbay, anday urningtay olemnlysay owardstay imhay aidsay, aptain“Cay Elegpay, outhay asthay aay enerousgay earthay; utbay outhay ustmay onsidercay ethay utyday outhay owestay otay ethay otheray ownersay ofay isthay ip—widowsshay anday orphansay, anymay ofay em—andthay atthay ifay eway ootay abundantlyay ewardray ethay aborslay ofay isthay oungyay anmay, eway aymay ebay akingtay ethay eadbray omfray osethay idowsway anday osethay orphansay. Ethay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay aylay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay 

ou“Thay Ildad!”bay oaredray Elegpay, artingstay upay anday atteringclay aboutay ethay abincay. ast“Blay eyay, Aptaincay Ildadbay, ifay IAY adhay ollowedfay thyay adviceay inay esethay attersmay, IAY ouldway aforeay ownay adhay aay onsciencecay otay uglay aboutay atthay ouldway ebay eavyhay enoughay otay ounderfay ethay argestlay ipshay atthay everay ailedsay oundray Apecay Orn.”hay 

aptain“Cay Eleg,”pay aidsay Ildadbay eadilystay, “thyay onsciencecay aymay ebay awingdray entay inchesay ofay aterway, oray entay athomsfay, IAY an’tcay elltay; utbay asay outhay artay illstay anay impenitentay anmay, Aptaincay Elegpay, IAY eatlygray earfay estlay thyay onsciencecay ebay utbay aay eakylay oneay; anday illway inay ethay enday inksay eethay ounderingfay ownday otay ethay ieryfay itpay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay 

iery“Fay itpay! ieryfay itpay! eyay insultay emay, anmay; astpay allay aturalnay earingbay, eyay insultay emay. It’say anay all-fireday outrageay otay elltay anyay umanhay eaturecray atthay e’shay oundbay otay ellhay. Ukesflay anday amesflay! Ildadbay, aysay atthay againay otay emay, anday artstay myay oul-boltssay, utbay I’ll—i’ll—yesay, I’llay allowsway aay ivelay oatgay ithway allay ishay airhay anday ornshay onay. Outay ofay ethay abincay, eyay antingcay, ab-coloureddray onsay ofay aay oodenway un—agay aightstray akeway ithway e!”yay 

Asay ehay underedthay outay isthay ehay ademay aay ushray atay Ildadbay, utbay ithway aay arvellousmay obliqueay, idingslay eleritycay, Ildadbay orfay atthay imetay eludeday imhay. 

Alarmeday atay isthay erribletay outburstay etweenbay ethay otway incipalpray anday esponsibleray ownersay ofay ethay ipshay, anday eelingfay alfhay aay indmay otay ivegay upay allay ideaay ofay ailingsay inay aay esselvay osay uestionablyqay owneday anday emporarilytay ommandedcay, IAY eppedstay asideay omfray ethay oorday otay ivegay egressay otay Ildadbay, owhay, IAY ademay onay oubtday, asway allay eagernessay otay anishvay omfray eforebay ethay awakeneday athwray ofay Elegpay. Utbay otay myay astonishmentay, ehay atsay ownday againay onay ethay ansomtray eryvay uietlyqay, anday eemedsay otay avehay otnay ethay ightestslay intentionay ofay ithdrawingway. Ehay eemedsay uiteqay useday otay impenitentay Elegpay anday ishay aysway. Asay orfay Elegpay, afteray ettinglay offay ishay ageray asay ehay adhay, erethay eemedsay onay oremay eftlay inay imhay, anday ehay, ootay, atsay ownday ikelay aay amblay, oughthay ehay itchedtway aay ittlelay asay ifay illstay ervouslynay agitateday. ew!”“Whay ehay istledwhay atay ast—“thelay uall’ssqay onegay offay otay eewardlay, IAY inkthay. Ildadbay, outhay useday otay ebay oodgay atay arpeningshay aay ancelay, endmay atthay enpay, illway eyay. Myay ack-knifejay erehay eedsnay ethay indstonegray. At’sthay ehay; ankthay eyay, Ildadbay. Ownay enthay, myay oungyay anmay, Ishmael’say thyay amenay, idn’tday eyay aysay? Ellway enthay, ownday eyay ogay erehay, Ishmaelay, orfay ethay eethray undredthhay ay.”lay 

aptain“Cay Eleg,”pay aidsay IAY, I“AY avehay aay iendfray ithway emay owhay antsway otay ipshay oo—shalltay IAY ingbray imhay ownday o-morrow?”tay 

o“Tay ebay ure,”say aidsay Elegpay. etch“Fay imhay alongay, anday e’llway ooklay atay im.”hay 

at“Whay aylay oesday ehay ant?”way oanedgray Ildadbay, ancingglay upay omfray ethay ookbay inay ichwhay ehay adhay againay eenbay uryingbay imselfhay. 

Oh“ay! evernay eethay indmay aboutay atthay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay. as“Hay ehay everay aledwhay itay any?”ay urningtay otay emay. 

illed“Kay oremay aleswhay anthay IAY ancay ountcay, Aptaincay Eleg.”pay 

ell“Way, ingbray imhay alongay en.”thay 

Anday, afteray igningsay ethay aperspay, offay IAY entway; othingnay oubtingday utbay atthay IAY adhay oneday aay oodgay orning’smay orkway, anday atthay ethay Equodpay asway ethay identicalay ipshay atthay Ojoyay adhay ovidedpray otay arrycay Ueequegqay anday emay oundray ethay Apecay. 

Utbay IAY adhay otnay oceededpray arfay, enwhay IAY eganbay otay ethinkbay emay atthay ethay Aptaincay ithway omwhay IAY asway otay ailsay etyay emainedray unseenay byay emay; oughthay, indeeday, inay anymay asescay, aay ale-shipwhay illway ebay ompletelycay ittedfay outay, anday eceiveray allay erhay ewcray onay oardbay, ereay ethay aptaincay akesmay imselfhay isiblevay byay arrivingay otay aketay ommandcay; orfay ometimessay esethay oyagesvay areay osay olongedpray, anday ethay oreshay intervalsay atay omehay osay exceedinglyay iefbray, atthay ifay ethay aptaincay avehay aay amilyfay, oray anyay absorbingay oncernmentcay ofay atthay ortsay, ehay oesday otnay oubletray imselfhay uchmay aboutay ishay ipshay inay ortpay, utbay eaveslay erhay otay ethay ownersay illtay allay isay eadyray orfay easay. Oweverhay, itay isay alwaysay asay ellway otay avehay aay ooklay atay imhay eforebay irrevocablyay ommittingcay ourselfyay intoay ishay andshay. Urningtay ackbay IAY accosteday Aptaincay Elegpay, inquiringay erewhay Aptaincay Ahabay asway otay ebay oundfay. 

And“ay atwhay ostday outhay antway ofay Aptaincay Ahabay? It’say allay ightray enoughay; outhay artay ipped.”shay 

es“Yay, utbay IAY ouldshay ikelay otay eesay im.”hay 

ut“Bay IAY on’tday inkthay outhay iltway ebay ableay otay atay esentpray. IAY on’tday owknay exactlyay at’swhay ethay attermay ithway imhay; utbay ehay eepskay oseclay insideay ethay ousehay; aay ortsay ofay icksay, anday etyay ehay on’tday ooklay osay. Inay actfay, ehay ain’tay icksay; utbay onay, ehay isn’tay ellway eitheray. Anyay owhay, oungyay anmay, ehay on’tway alwaysay eesay emay, osay IAY on’tday upposesay ehay illway eethay. E’shay aay ueerqay anmay, Aptaincay Ahab—soay omesay ink—butthay aay oodgay oneay. Ohay, ou’ltthay ikelay imhay ellway enoughay; onay earfay, onay earfay. E’shay aay andgray, ungodlyay, od-likegay anmay, Aptaincay Ahabay; oesn’tday eakspay uchmay; utbay, enwhay ehay oesday eakspay, enthay ouyay aymay ellway istenlay. Arkmay eyay, ebay orewarnedfay; Ahab’say aboveay ethay ommoncay; Ahab’say eenbay inay ollegescay, asay ellway asay ong’may ethay annibalscay; eenbay useday otay eeperday ondersway anthay ethay avesway; ixedfay ishay ieryfay ancelay inay ightiermay, angerstray oesfay anthay aleswhay. Ishay ancelay! ayeay, ethay eenestkay anday ethay urestsay atthay outay ofay allay ouray isleay! Ohay! ehay ain’tay Aptaincay Ildadbay; onay, anday ehay ain’tay Aptaincay Elegpay; e’s_hay Ahabay_, oybay; anday Ahabay ofay olday, outhay owestknay, asway aay ownedcray ing!”kay 

And“ay aay eryvay ilevay oneay. Enwhay atthay ickedway ingkay asway ainslay, ethay ogsday, idday eythay otnay icklay ishay ood?”blay 

ome“Cay itherhay otay e—hithermay, ither,”hay aidsay Elegpay, ithway aay ignificancesay inay ishay eyeay atthay almostay artledstay emay. ook“Lay eyay, adlay; evernay aysay atthay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay. Evernay aysay itay anywhereay. Aptaincay Ahabay idday otnay amenay imselfhay. as’Tway aay oolishfay, ignorantay imwhay ofay ishay azycray, idowedway othermay, owhay iedday enwhay ehay asway onlyay aay elvemonthtway olday. Anday etyay ethay olday uawsqay Istigtay, atay Ayheadgay, aidsay atthay ethay amenay ouldway omehowsay ovepray opheticpray. Anday, erhapspay, otheray oolsfay ikelay erhay aymay elltay eethay ethay amesay. IAY ishway otay arnway eethay. It’say aay ielay. IAY owknay Aptaincay Ahabay ellway; I’veay ailedsay ithway imhay asay atemay earsyay agoay; IAY owknay atwhay ehay is—aay oodgay an—notmay aay iouspay, oodgay anmay, ikelay Ildadbay, utbay aay earingsway oodgay an—somethingmay ikelay e—onlymay ere’sthay aay oodgay ealday oremay ofay imhay. Ayeay, ayeay, IAY owknay atthay ehay asway evernay eryvay ollyjay; anday IAY owknay atthay onay ethay assagepay omehay, ehay asway aay ittlelay outay ofay ishay indmay orfay aay ellspay; utbay itay asway ethay arpshay ootingshay ainspay inay ishay eedingblay umpstay atthay oughtbray atthay aboutay, asay anyay oneay ightmay eesay. IAY owknay, ootay, atthay everay incesay ehay ostlay ishay eglay astlay oyagevay byay atthay accurseday alewhay, e’shay eenbay aay indkay ofay oody—desperatemay oodymay, anday avagesay ometimessay; utbay atthay illway allay asspay offay. Anday onceay orfay allay, etlay emay elltay eethay anday assureay eethay, oungyay anmay, it’say etterbay otay ailsay ithway aay oodymay oodgay aptaincay anthay aay aughinglay adbay oneay. Osay ood-byegay otay ee—andthay ongwray otnay Aptaincay Ahabay, ecausebay ehay appenshay otay avehay aay ickedway amenay. Esidesbay, myay oybay, ehay ashay aay ife—notway eethray oyagesvay edded—away eetsway, esignedray irlgay. Inkthay ofay atthay; byay atthay eetsway irlgay atthay olday anmay ashay aay ildchay: oldhay eyay enthay erethay ancay ebay anyay utteray, opelesshay armhay inay Ahabay? Onay, onay, myay adlay; ickenstray, astedblay, ifay ehay ebay, Ahabay ashay ishay umanities!”hay 

Asay IAY alkedway awayay, IAY asway ullfay ofay oughtfulnessthay; atwhay adhay eenbay incidentallyay evealedray otay emay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay, illedfay emay ithway aay ertaincay ildway aguenessvay ofay ainfulnesspay oncerningcay imhay. Anday omehowsay, atay ethay imetay, IAY eltfay aay athysympay anday aay orrowsay orfay imhay, utbay orfay IAY on’tday owknay atwhay, unlessay itay asway ethay uelcray osslay ofay ishay eglay. Anday etyay IAY alsoay eltfay aay angestray aweay ofay imhay; utbay atthay ortsay ofay aweay, ichwhay IAY annotcay atay allay escribeday, asway otnay exactlyay aweay; IAY oday otnay owknay atwhay itay asway. Utbay IAY eltfay itay; anday itay idday otnay isinclineday emay owardstay imhay; oughthay IAY eltfay impatienceay atay atwhay eemedsay ikelay erymystay inay imhay, osay imperfectlyay asay ehay asway ownknay otay emay enthay. Oweverhay, myay oughtsthay ereway atay engthlay arriedcay inay otheray irectionsday, osay atthay orfay ethay esentpray arkday Ahabay ippedslay myay indmay. 



APTERCHAY 17ay. Ethay Amadanray. 

Asay Ueequeg’sqay Amadanray, oray Astingfay anday Umiliationhay, asway otay ontinuecay allay ayday, IAY idday otnay oosechay otay isturbday imhay illtay owardstay ight-fallnay; orfay IAY erishchay ethay eatestgray espectray owardstay everybody’say eligiousray obligationsay, evernay indmay owhay omicalcay, anday ouldcay otnay indfay itay inay myay earthay otay undervalueay evenay aay ongregationcay ofay antsay orshippingway aay oad-stooltay; oray osethay otheray eaturescray inay ertaincay artspay ofay ouray earthay, owhay ithway aay egreeday ofay ootmanismfay uiteqay unprecedenteday inay otheray anetsplay, owbay ownday eforebay ethay orsotay ofay aay eceasedday andedlay oprietorpray erelymay onay accountay ofay ethay inordinateay ossessionspay etyay owneday anday entedray inay ishay amenay. 

IAY aysay, eway oodgay Esbyterianpray Istianschray ouldshay ebay aritablechay inay esethay ingsthay, anday otnay ancyfay ourselvesay osay astlyvay uperiorsay otay otheray ortalsmay, aganspay anday atwhay otnay, ecausebay ofay eirthay alf-crazyhay onceitscay onay esethay ubjectssay. Erethay asway Ueequegqay, ownay, ertainlycay entertainingay ethay ostmay absurday otionsnay aboutay Ojoyay anday ishay Amadan;—butray atwhay ofay atthay? Ueequegqay oughtthay ehay ewknay atwhay ehay asway aboutay, IAY upposesay; ehay eemedsay otay ebay ontentcay; anday erethay etlay imhay estray. Allay ouray arguingay ithway imhay ouldway otnay availay; etlay imhay ebay, IAY aysay: anday Eavenhay avehay ercymay onay usay all—Presbyteriansay anday Aganspay alike—foray eway areay allay omehowsay eadfullydray ackedcray aboutay ethay eadhay, anday adlysay eednay endingmay. 

Owardstay eveningay, enwhay IAY eltfay assureday atthay allay ishay erformancespay anday itualsray ustmay ebay overay, IAY entway upay otay ishay oomray anday ockedknay atay ethay oorday; utbay onay answeray. IAY iedtray otay openay itay, utbay itay asway astenedfay insideay. ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY oftlysay oughthray ethay ey-hole:—allkay ilentsay. I“AY aysay, Ueequegqay! whyay on’tday ouyay eakspay? It’say I—ishmael.”ay Utbay allay emainedray illstay asay eforebay. IAY eganbay otay owgray alarmeday. IAY adhay alloweday imhay uchsay abundantay imetay; IAY oughtthay ehay ightmay avehay adhay anay apoplecticay itfay. IAY ookedlay oughthray ethay ey-holekay; utbay ethay oorday openingay intoay anay odday ornercay ofay ethay oomray, ethay ey-holekay ospectpray asway utbay aay ookedcray anday inistersay oneay. IAY ouldcay onlyay eesay artpay ofay ethay oot-boardfay ofay ethay edbay anday aay inelay ofay ethay allway, utbay othingnay oremay. IAY asway urprisedsay otay eholdbay estingray againstay ethay allway ethay oodenway aftshay ofay Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay, ichwhay ethay andladylay ethay eveningay eviouspray adhay akentay omfray imhay, eforebay ouray ountingmay otay ethay amberchay. At’sthay angestray, oughtthay IAY; utbay atay anyay ateray, incesay ethay arpoonhay andsstay onderyay, anday ehay eldomsay oray evernay oesgay abroaday ithoutway itay, ereforethay ehay ustmay ebay insideay erehay, anday onay ossiblepay istakemay. 

ueequeg!—Queequeg!”—all“Qay illstay. Omethingsay ustmay avehay appenedhay. Apoplexyay! IAY iedtray otay urstbay openay ethay oorday; utbay itay ubbornlystay esistedray. Unningray ownday airsstay, IAY uicklyqay atedstay myay uspicionssay otay ethay irstfay ersonpay IAY et—themay amber-maidchay. a“Lay! a!”lay eshay iedcray, I“AY oughtthay omethingsay ustmay ebay ethay attermay. IAY entway otay akemay ethay edbay afteray eakfastbray, anday ethay oorday asway ockedlay; anday otnay aay ousemay otay ebay eardhay; anday it’say eenbay ustjay osay ilentsay everay incesay. Utbay IAY oughtthay, aymay ebay, ouyay adhay othbay onegay offay anday ockedlay ouryay aggagebay inay orfay afesay eepingkay. Alay! alay, a’am!—Mistressmay! urdermay! Mrsay. Usseyhay! apoplexy!”—anday ithway esethay iescray, eshay anray owardstay ethay itchenkay, IAY ollowingfay. 

Mrsay. Usseyhay oonsay appeareday, ithway aay ustard-potmay inay oneay andhay anday aay inegar-cruetvay inay ethay otheray, avinghay ustjay okenbray awayay omfray ethay occupationay ofay attendingay otay ethay astorscay, anday oldingscay erhay ittlelay ackblay oybay eantimemay. 

ood-house!”“Way iedcray IAY, ich“whay ayway otay itay? Unray orfay Od’sgay akesay, anday etchfay omethingsay otay pryay openay ethay oor—theday axe!—theay axeay! e’shay adhay aay okestray; ependday uponay it!”—anday osay ayingsay IAY asway unmethodicallyay ushingray upay airsstay againay empty-handeday, enwhay Mrsay. Usseyhay interposeday ethay ustard-potmay anday inegar-cruetvay, anday ethay entireay astorcay ofay erhay ountenancecay. 

at’s“Whay ethay attermay ithway ouyay, oungyay an?”may 

et“Gay ethay axeay! Orfay Od’sgay akesay, unray orfay ethay octorday, omesay oneay, ilewhay IAY pryay itay open!”ay 

ook“Lay ere,”hay aidsay ethay andladylay, uicklyqay uttingpay ownday ethay inegar-cruetvay, osay asay otay avehay oneay andhay eefray; ook“lay erehay; areay ouyay alkingtay aboutay ingpryay openay anyay ofay myay oors?”—andday ithway atthay eshay eizedsay myay armay. at’s“Whay ethay attermay ithway ouyay? At’swhay ethay attermay ithway ouyay, ipmate?”shay 

Inay asay almcay, utbay apidray aay annermay asay ossiblepay, IAY avegay erhay otay understanday ethay olewhay asecay. Unconsciouslyay appingclay ethay inegar-cruetvay otay oneay idesay ofay erhay osenay, eshay uminatedray orfay anay instantay; enthay exclaimed—“Noay! IAY aven’thay eensay itay incesay IAY utpay itay ere.”thay Unningray otay aay ittlelay osetclay underay ethay andinglay ofay ethay airsstay, eshay ancedglay inay, anday eturningray, oldtay emay atthay Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay asway issingmay. e’s“Hay illedkay imself,”hay eshay iedcray. It’s“ay unfort’nateay Iggsstay oneday overay again—thereay oesgay anotheray ounterpane—Godcay itypay ishay oorpay other!—itmay illway ebay ethay uinray ofay myay ousehay. Ashay ethay oorpay adlay aay istersay? Ere’swhay atthay irl?—theregay, Ettybay, ogay otay Arlessnay ethay Ainterpay, anday elltay imhay otay aintpay emay aay ignsay, ith—“noway uicidessay ermittedpay erehay, anday onay okingsmay inay ethay arlor;”—mightpay asay ellway illkay othbay irdsbay atay onceay. Illkay? Ethay Ordlay ebay ercifulmay otay ishay ostghay! At’swhay atthay oisenay erethay? Ouyay, oungyay anmay, avastay ere!”thay 

Anday unningray upay afteray emay, eshay aughtcay emay asay IAY asway againay ingtryay otay orcefay openay ethay oorday. 

I“AY on’tday alloway itay; IAY on’tway avehay myay emisespray oiledspay. Ogay orfay ethay ocksmithlay, ere’sthay oneay aboutay aay ilemay omfray erehay. Utbay avast!”ay uttingpay erhay andhay inay erhay ide-pocketsay, ere’s“hay aay eykay at’llthay itfay, IAY uessgay; et’slay ee.”say Anday ithway atthay, eshay urnedtay itay inay ethay ocklay; utbay, alasay! Ueequeg’sqay upplementalsay oltbay emainedray unwithdrawnay ithinway. 

ave“Hay otay urstbay itay open,”ay aidsay IAY, anday asway unningray ownday ethay entryay aay ittlelay, orfay aay oodgay artstay, enwhay ethay andladylay aughtcay atay emay, againay owingvay IAY ouldshay otnay eakbray ownday erhay emisespray; utbay IAY oretay omfray erhay, anday ithway aay uddensay odilybay ushray ashedday elfmysay ullfay againstay ethay arkmay. 

Ithway aay odigiouspray oisenay ethay oorday ewflay openay, anday ethay obknay ammingslay againstay ethay allway, entsay ethay asterplay otay ethay eilingcay; anday erethay, oodgay eavenshay! erethay atsay Ueequegqay, altogetheray oolcay anday elf-collectedsay; ightray inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oomray; uattingsqay onay ishay amshay, anday oldinghay Ojoyay onay optay ofay ishay eadhay. Ehay ookedlay eithernay oneay ayway ornay ethay otheray ayway, utbay atsay ikelay aay arvedcay imageay ithway arcescay aay ignsay ofay activeay ifelay. 

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, oinggay upay otay imhay, ueequeg“Qay, at’swhay ethay attermay ithway ou?”yay 

e“Hay ain’thay eenbay aay ittin’say osay allay ayday, ashay e?”hay aidsay ethay andladylay. 

Utbay allay eway aidsay, otnay aay ordway ouldcay eway agdray outay ofay imhay; IAY almostay eltfay ikelay ushingpay imhay overay, osay asay otay angechay ishay ositionpay, orfay itay asway almostay intolerableay, itay eemedsay osay ainfullypay anday unnaturallyay onstrainedcay; especiallyay, asay inay allay obabilitypray ehay adhay eenbay ittingsay osay orfay upwardsay ofay eightay oray entay ourshay, oinggay ootay ithoutway ishay egularray ealsmay. 

“Mrsay. Ussey,”hay aidsay IAY, e’s“hay alive_ay_ atay allay eventsay; osay eavelay usay, ifay ouyay easeplay, anday IAY illway eesay otay isthay angestray affairay elf.”mysay 

Osingclay ethay oorday uponay ethay andladylay, IAY endeavoreday otay evailpray uponay Ueequegqay otay aketay aay airchay; utbay inay ainvay. Erethay ehay atsay; anday allay ehay ouldcay o—forday allay myay olitepay artsay anday andishments—heblay ouldway otnay ovemay aay egpay, ornay aysay aay inglesay ordway, ornay evenay ooklay atay emay, ornay oticenay myay esencepray inay ethay ightestslay ayway. 

IAY onderway, oughtthay IAY, ifay isthay ancay ossiblypay ebay aay artpay ofay ishay Amadanray; oday eythay astfay onay eirthay amshay atthay ayway inay ishay ativenay islanday. Itay ustmay ebay osay; esyay, it’say artpay ofay ishay eedcray, IAY upposesay; ellway, enthay, etlay imhay estray; e’llhay etgay upay oonersay oray aterlay, onay oubtday. Itay an’tcay astlay orfay everay, ankthay Odgay, anday ishay Amadanray onlyay omescay onceay aay earyay; anday IAY on’tday elievebay it’say eryvay unctualpay enthay. 

IAY entway ownday otay uppersay. Afteray ittingsay aay onglay imetay isteninglay otay ethay onglay oriesstay ofay omesay ailorssay owhay adhay ustjay omecay omfray aay um-puddingplay oyagevay, asay eythay alledcay itay at(thay isay, aay ortshay aling-voyagewhay inay aay oonerschay oray igbray, onfinedcay otay ethay orthnay ofay ethay inelay, inay ethay Atlanticay Oceanay onlyay); afteray isteninglay otay esethay um-puddingersplay illtay earlynay elevenay o’clockay, IAY entway upay airsstay otay ogay otay edbay, eelingfay uiteqay uresay byay isthay imetay Ueequegqay ustmay ertainlycay avehay oughtbray ishay Amadanray otay aay erminationtay. Utbay onay; erethay ehay asway ustjay erewhay IAY adhay eftlay imhay; ehay adhay otnay irredstay anay inchay. IAY eganbay otay owgray exedvay ithway imhay; itay eemedsay osay ownrightday enselesssay anday insaneay otay ebay ittingsay erethay allay ayday anday alfhay ethay ightnay onay ishay amshay inay aay oldcay oomray, oldinghay aay iecepay ofay oodway onay ishay eadhay. 

or“Fay eaven’shay akesay, Ueequegqay, etgay upay anday akeshay ourselfyay; etgay upay anday avehay omesay uppersay. Ou’llyay arvestay; ou’llyay illkay ourselfyay, Ueequeg.”qay Utbay otnay aay ordway idday ehay eplyray. 

Espairingday ofay imhay, ereforethay, IAY eterminedday otay ogay otay edbay anday otay eepslay; anday onay oubtday, eforebay aay eatgray ilewhay, ehay ouldway ollowfay emay. Utbay eviouspray otay urningtay inay, IAY ooktay myay eavyhay earskinbay acketjay, anday ewthray itay overay imhay, asay itay omisedpray otay ebay aay eryvay oldcay ightnay; anday ehay adhay othingnay utbay ishay ordinaryay oundray acketjay onay. Orfay omesay imetay, oday allay IAY ouldway, IAY ouldcay otnay etgay intoay ethay aintestfay ozeday. IAY adhay ownblay outay ethay andlecay; anday ethay eremay oughtthay ofay Ueequeg—notqay ourfay eetfay off—sittingay erethay inay atthay uneasyay ositionpay, arkstay aloneay inay ethay oldcay anday arkday; isthay ademay emay eallyray etchedwray. Inkthay ofay itay; eepingslay allay ightnay inay ethay amesay oomray ithway aay ideway awakeay aganpay onay ishay amshay inay isthay earydray, unaccountableay Amadanray! 

Utbay omehowsay IAY oppeddray offay atay astlay, anday ewknay othingnay oremay illtay eakbray ofay ayday; enwhay, ookinglay overay ethay edsidebay, erethay uattedsqay Ueequegqay, asay ifay ehay adhay eenbay ewedscray ownday otay ethay oorflay. Utbay asay oonsay asay ethay irstfay impseglay ofay unsay entereday ethay indowway, upay ehay otgay, ithway iffstay anday atinggray ointsjay, utbay ithway aay eerfulchay ooklay; impedlay owardstay emay erewhay IAY aylay; essedpray ishay oreheadfay againay againstay inemay; anday aidsay ishay Amadanray asway overay. 

Ownay, asay IAY eforebay intedhay, IAY avehay onay objectionay otay anyay erson’spay eligionray, ebay itay atwhay itay aymay, osay onglay asay atthay ersonpay oesday otnay illkay oray insultay anyay otheray ersonpay, ecausebay atthay otheray ersonpay on’tday elievebay itay alsoay. Utbay enwhay aay an’smay eligionray ecomesbay eallyray anticfray; enwhay itay isay aay ositivepay ormenttay otay imhay; anday, inay inefay, akesmay isthay earthay ofay oursay anay uncomfortableay innay otay odgelay inay; enthay IAY inkthay itay ighhay imetay otay aketay atthay individualay asideay anday argueay ethay ointpay ithway imhay. 

Anday ustjay osay IAY ownay idday ithway Ueequegqay. ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, et“gay intoay edbay ownay, anday ielay anday istenlay otay e.”may IAY enthay entway onay, eginningbay ithway ethay iseray anday ogresspray ofay ethay imitivepray eligionsray, anday omingcay ownday otay ethay ariousvay eligionsray ofay ethay esentpray imetay, uringday ichwhay imetay IAY aboredlay otay owshay Ueequegqay atthay allay esethay Entslay, Amadansray, anday olongedpray am-squattingshay inay oldcay, eerlesschay oomsray ereway arkstay onsensenay; adbay orfay ethay ealthhay; uselessay orfay ethay oulsay; opposeday, inay ortshay, otay ethay obviousay awslay ofay Ienehygay anday ommoncay ensesay. IAY oldtay imhay, ootay, atthay ehay eingbay inay otheray ingsthay uchsay anay extremelyay ensiblesay anday agacioussay avagesay, itay ainedpay emay, eryvay adlybay ainedpay emay, otay eesay imhay ownay osay eplorablyday oolishfay aboutay isthay idiculousray Amadanray ofay ishay. Esidesbay, argueday IAY, astingfay akesmay ethay odybay avecay inay; encehay ethay iritspay avescay inay; anday allay oughtsthay ornbay ofay aay astfay ustmay ecessarilynay ebay alf-starvedhay. Isthay isay ethay easonray whyay ostmay epticdyspay eligionistsray erishchay uchsay elancholymay otionsnay aboutay eirthay ereaftershay. Inay oneay ordway, Ueequegqay, aidsay IAY, atherray igressivelyday; ellhay isay anay ideaay irstfay ornbay onay anay undigesteday apple-dumplingay; anday incesay enthay erpetuatedpay oughthray ethay ereditaryhay epsiasdyspay urturednay byay Amadansray. 

IAY enthay askeday Ueequegqay etherwhay ehay imselfhay asway everay oubledtray ithway epsiadyspay; expressingay ethay ideaay eryvay ainlyplay, osay atthay ehay ouldcay aketay itay inay. Ehay aidsay onay; onlyay uponay oneay emorablemay occasionay. Itay asway afteray aay eatgray eastfay ivengay byay ishay atherfay ethay ingkay, onay ethay aininggay ofay aay eatgray attlebay ereinwhay iftyfay ofay ethay enemyay adhay eenbay illedkay byay aboutay otway o’clockay inay ethay afternoonay, anday allay ookedcay anday eatenay atthay eryvay eveningay. 

o“Nay oremay, Ueequeg,”qay aidsay IAY, udderingshay; at“thay illway o;”day orfay IAY ewknay ethay inferencesay ithoutway ishay urtherfay intinghay emthay. IAY adhay eensay aay ailorsay owhay adhay isitedvay atthay eryvay islanday, anday ehay oldtay emay atthay itay asway ethay ustomcay, enwhay aay eatgray attlebay adhay eenbay ainedgay erethay, otay arbecuebay allay ethay ainslay inay ethay ardyay oray ardengay ofay ethay ictorvay; anday enthay, oneay byay oneay, eythay ereway acedplay inay eatgray oodenway encherstray, anday arnishedgay oundray ikelay aay ilaupay, ithway eadfruitbray anday ocoanutscay; anday ithway omesay arsleypay inay eirthay outhsmay, ereway entsay oundray ithway ethay ictor’svay omplimentscay otay allay ishay iendsfray, ustjay asay oughthay esethay esentspray ereway osay anymay Istmaschray urkeystay. 

Afteray allay, IAY oday otnay inkthay atthay myay emarksray aboutay eligionray ademay uchmay impressionay uponay Ueequegqay. Ecausebay, inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ehay omehowsay eemedsay ullday ofay earinghay onay atthay importantay ubjectsay, unlessay onsideredcay omfray ishay ownay ointpay ofay iewvay; anday, inay ethay econdsay aceplay, ehay idday otnay oremay anthay oneay irdthay understanday emay, ouchcay myay ideasay implysay asay IAY ouldway; anday, inallyfay, ehay onay oubtday oughtthay ehay ewknay aay oodgay ealday oremay aboutay ethay uetray eligionray anthay IAY idday. Ehay ookedlay atay emay ithway aay ortsay ofay ondescendingcay oncerncay anday ompassioncay, asay oughthay ehay oughtthay itay aay eatgray itypay atthay uchsay aay ensiblesay oungyay anmay ouldshay ebay osay opelesslyhay ostlay otay evangelicalay aganpay ietypay. 

Atay astlay eway oseray anday esseddray; anday Ueequegqay, akingtay aay odigiouslypray eartyhay eakfastbray ofay owderschay ofay allay ortssay, osay atthay ethay andladylay ouldshay otnay akemay uchmay ofitpray byay easonray ofay ishay Amadanray, eway alliedsay outay otay oardbay ethay Equodpay, aunteringsay alongay, anday ickingpay ouray eethtay ithway alibuthay onesbay. 



APTERCHAY 18ay. Ishay Arkmay. 

Asay eway ereway alkingway ownday ethay enday ofay ethay arfwhay owardstay ethay ipshay, Ueequegqay arryingcay ishay arpoonhay, Aptaincay Elegpay inay ishay uffgray oicevay oudlylay ailedhay usay omfray ishay igwamway, ayingsay ehay adhay otnay uspectedsay myay iendfray asway aay annibalcay, anday urthermorefay announcingay atthay ehay etlay onay annibalscay onay oardbay atthay aftcray, unlessay eythay eviouslypray oducedpray eirthay aperspay. 

at“Whay oday ouyay eanmay byay atthay, Aptaincay Eleg?”pay aidsay IAY, ownay umpingjay onay ethay ulwarksbay, anday eavinglay myay omradecay andingstay onay ethay arfwhay. 

I“AY ean,”may ehay epliedray, e“hay ustmay owshay ishay apers.”pay 

es,”“Yay aidsay Aptaincay Ildadbay inay ishay ollowhay oicevay, ickingstay ishay eadhay omfray ehindbay Eleg’spay, outay ofay ethay igwamway. e“Hay ustmay owshay atthay e’shay onvertedcay. Onsay ofay arkness,”day ehay addeday, urningtay otay Ueequegqay, art“ay outhay atay esentpray inay ommunioncay ithway anyay Istianchray urch?”chay 

“Why,”ay aidsay IAY, e’s“hay aay embermay ofay ethay irstfay Ongregationalcay Urch.”chay Erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay anymay attooedtay avagessay ailingsay inay Antucketnay ipsshay atay astlay omecay otay ebay onvertedcay intoay ethay urcheschay. 

irst“Fay Ongregationalcay Urch,”chay iedcray Ildadbay, at“whay! atthay orshipsway inay Eaconday Euteronomyday Oleman’scay eeting-house?”may anday osay ayingsay, akingtay outay ishay ectaclesspay, ehay ubbedray emthay ithway ishay eatgray ellowyay andanabay andkerchiefhay, anday uttingpay emthay onay eryvay arefullycay, amecay outay ofay ethay igwamway, anday eaninglay ifflystay overay ethay ulwarksbay, ooktay aay oodgay onglay ooklay atay Ueequegqay. 

ow“Hay onglay athhay ehay eenbay aay ember?”may ehay enthay aidsay, urningtay otay emay; ot“nay eryvay onglay, IAY atherray uessgay, oungyay an.”may 

o,”“Nay aidsay Elegpay, and“ay ehay asn’thay eenbay aptizedbay ightray eitheray, oray itay ouldway avehay ashedway omesay ofay atthay evil’sday ueblay offay ishay ace.”fay 

o“Day elltay, ow,”nay iedcray Ildadbay, is“ay isthay Ilistinephay aay egularray embermay ofay Eaconday Euteronomy’sday eetingmay? IAY evernay awsay imhay oinggay erethay, anday IAY asspay itay everyay Ord’slay ay.”day 

I“AY on’tday owknay anythingay aboutay Eaconday Euteronomyday oray ishay eeting,”may aidsay IAY; all“ay IAY owknay isay, atthay Ueequegqay erehay isay aay ornbay embermay ofay ethay Irstfay Ongregationalcay Urchchay. Ehay isay aay eaconday imselfhay, Ueequegqay is.”ay 

oung“Yay an,”may aidsay Ildadbay ernlystay, ou“thay artay arkingskylay ithway e—explainmay elfthysay, outhay oungyay Ittitehay. Atwhay urchchay ostday eethay eanmay? answeray e.”may 

Indingfay elfmysay usthay ardhay ushedpay, IAY epliedray. I“AY eanmay, irsay, ethay amesay ancientay Atholiccay Urchchay otay ichwhay ouyay anday IAY, anday Aptaincay Elegpay erethay, anday Ueequegqay erehay, anday allay ofay usay, anday everyay other’smay onsay anday oulsay ofay usay elongbay; ethay eatgray anday everlastingay Irstfay Ongregationcay ofay isthay olewhay orshippingway orldway; eway allay elongbay otay atthay; onlyay omesay ofay usay erishchay omesay ueerqay otchetscray onay aysway ouchingtay ethay andgray eliefbay; inay at_thay_ eway allay oinjay ands.”hay 

ice“Splay, outhay ean’stmay ice_splay_ ands,”hay iedcray Elegpay, awingdray earernay. oung“Yay anmay, ou’dyay etterbay ipshay orfay aay issionarymay, insteaday ofay aay ore-mastfay andhay; IAY evernay eardhay aay etterbay ermonsay. Eaconday Euteronomy—whyday Atherfay Applemay imselfhay ouldn’tcay eatbay itay, anday e’shay eckonedray omethingsay. Omecay aboarday, omecay aboarday; evernay indmay aboutay ethay aperspay. IAY aysay, elltay Uohogqay ere—what’sthay atthay ouyay allcay imhay? elltay Uohogqay otay epstay alongay. Byay ethay eatgray anchoray, atwhay aay arpoonhay e’shay otgay erethay! ookslay ikelay oodgay uffstay atthay; anday ehay andleshay itay aboutay ightray. IAY aysay, Uohogqay, oray ateverwhay ouryay amenay isay, idday ouyay everay andstay inay ethay eadhay ofay aay ale-boatwhay? idday ouyay everay ikestray aay ish?”fay 

Ithoutway ayingsay aay ordway, Ueequegqay, inay ishay ildway ortsay ofay ayway, umpedjay uponay ethay ulwarksbay, omfray encethay intoay ethay owsbay ofay oneay ofay ethay ale-boatswhay anginghay otay ethay idesay; anday enthay acingbray ishay eftlay eeknay, anday oisingpay ishay arpoonhay, iedcray outay inay omesay uchsay ayway asay is:—thay 

ap’ain“Cay, ouyay eesay imhay allsmay opdray artay onay aterway ereday? Ouyay eesay imhay? ellway, osespay imhay oneay alewhay eyeay, ellway, en!”day anday akingtay arpshay aimay atay itay, ehay artedday ethay ironay ightray overay olday Ildad’sbay oadbray imbray, eanclay acrossay ethay ip’sshay ecksday, anday uckstray ethay isteningglay artay otspay outay ofay ightsay. 

ow,”“Nay aidsay Ueequegqay, uietlyqay aulinghay inay ethay inelay, os-ee“spay imhay ale-ewhay eyeay; whyay, adday alewhay ead.”day 

uick“Qay, Ildad,”bay aidsay Elegpay, ishay artnerpay, owhay, aghastay atay ethay oseclay icinityvay ofay ethay ingflyay arpoonhay, adhay etreatedray owardstay ethay abincay angwaygay. uick“Qay, IAY aysay, ouyay Ildadbay, anday etgay ethay ip’sshay aperspay. Eway ustmay avehay Edgehoghay erethay, IAY eanmay Uohogqay, inay oneay ofay ouray oatsbay. Ooklay eyay, Uohogqay, e’llway ivegay eyay ethay inetiethnay aylay, anday at’sthay oremay anthay everay asway ivengay aay arpooneerhay etyay outay ofay Antucket.”nay 

Osay ownday eway entway intoay ethay abincay, anday otay myay eatgray oyjay Ueequegqay asway oonsay enrolleday amongay ethay amesay ip’sshay ompanycay otay ichwhay IAY elfmysay elongedbay. 

Enwhay allay eliminariespray ereway overay anday Elegpay adhay otgay everythingay eadyray orfay igningsay, ehay urnedtay otay emay anday aidsay, I“AY uessgay, Uohogqay erethay on’tday owknay owhay otay itewray, oesday ehay? IAY aysay, Uohogqay, astblay eyay! ostday outhay ignsay thyay amenay oray akemay thyay ark?”may 

Utbay atay isthay uestionqay, Ueequegqay, owhay adhay icetway oray icethray eforebay akentay artpay inay imilarsay eremoniescay, ookedlay onay aysway abasheday; utbay akingtay ethay offereday enpay, opiedcay uponay ethay aperpay, inay ethay operpray aceplay, anay exactay ounterpartcay ofay aay ueerqay oundray igurefay ichwhay asway attooedtay uponay ishay armay; osay atthay oughthray Aptaincay Eleg’spay obstinateay istakemay ouchingtay ishay appellativeay, itay oodstay omethingsay ikelay is:—thay 

Uohogqay. ishay XAY arkmay. 

Eanwhilemay Aptaincay Ildadbay atsay earnestlyay anday eadfastlystay eyeingay Ueequegqay, anday atay astlay isingray olemnlysay anday umblingfay inay ethay ugehay ocketspay ofay ishay oad-skirtedbray abdray oatcay, ooktay outay aay undlebay ofay actstray, anday electingsay oneay entitleday e“Thay Atterlay Ayday Omingcay; oray Onay Imetay otay Ose,”lay acedplay itay inay Ueequeg’sqay andshay, anday enthay aspinggray emthay anday ethay ookbay ithway othbay ishay, ookedlay earnestlyay intoay ishay eyesay, anday aidsay, on“Say ofay arknessday, IAY ustmay oday myay utyday byay eethay; IAY amay artpay owneray ofay isthay ipshay, anday eelfay oncernedcay orfay ethay oulssay ofay allay itsay ewcray; ifay outhay illstay ingestclay otay thyay Aganpay aysway, ichwhay IAY adlysay earfay, IAY eseechbay eethay, emainray otnay orfay ayeay aay Elialbay ondsmanbay. Urnspay ethay idolay Ellbay, anday ethay ideoushay agondray; urntay omfray ethay athwray otay omecay; indmay inethay eyeay, IAY aysay; ohay! oodnessgay aciousgray! eerstay earclay ofay ethay ieryfay it!”pay 

Omethingsay ofay ethay altsay easay etyay ingeredlay inay olday Ildad’sbay anguagelay, eterogeneouslyhay ixedmay ithway Ipturalscray anday omesticday asesphray. 

Avast“ay erethay, avastay erethay, Ildadbay, avastay ownay oilingspay ouray arpooneer,”hay iedcray Elegpay. ious“Pay arpooneershay evernay akemay oodgay oyagers—itvay akestay ethay arkshay outay ofay em’ay; onay arpooneerhay isay orthway aay awstray owhay aintay ettypray arkishshay. Erethay asway oungyay Atnay Ainesway, onceay ethay avestbray oat-headerbay outay ofay allay Antucketnay anday ethay Ineyardvay; ehay oinedjay ethay eetingmay, anday evernay amecay otay oodgay. Ehay otgay osay ightenedfray aboutay ishay aguyplay oulsay, atthay ehay inkedshray anday eeredshay awayay omfray aleswhay, orfay earfay ofay after-clapsay, inay asecay ehay otgay ovestay anday entway otay Avyday Ones.”jay 

eleg“Pay! Eleg!”pay aidsay Ildadbay, iftinglay ishay eyesay anday andshay, ou“thay elfthysay, asay IAY elfmysay, asthay eensay anymay aay erilouspay imetay; outhay owestknay, Elegpay, atwhay itay isay otay avehay ethay earfay ofay eathday; owhay, enthay, an’stcay outhay atepray inay isthay ungodlyay uisegay. Outhay eliestbay inethay ownay earthay, Elegpay. Elltay emay, enwhay isthay amesay Equodpay erehay adhay erhay eethray astsmay overboarday inay atthay oontyphay onay Apanjay, atthay amesay oyagevay enwhay outhay entway atemay ithway Aptaincay Ahabay, id’stday outhay otnay inkthay ofay Eathday anday ethay Udgmentjay en?”thay 

ear“Hay imhay, earhay imhay ow,”nay iedcray Elegpay, archingmay acrossay ethay abincay, anday ustingthray ishay andshay arfay ownday intoay ishay ockets,—“hearpay imhay, allay ofay eyay. Inkthay ofay atthay! Enwhay everyay omentmay eway oughtthay ethay ipshay ouldway inksay! Eathday anday ethay Udgmentjay enthay? Atwhay? Ithway allay eethray astsmay akingmay uchsay anay everlastingay underingthay againstay ethay idesay; anday everyay easay eakingbray overay usay, orefay anday aftay. Inkthay ofay Eathday anday ethay Udgmentjay enthay? Onay! onay imetay otay inkthay aboutay Eathday enthay. Ifelay asway atwhay Aptaincay Ahabay anday IAY asway inkingthay ofay; anday owhay otay avesay allay ands—howhay otay igray ury-masts—howjay otay etgay intoay ethay earestnay ortpay; atthay asway atwhay IAY asway inkingthay of.”ay 

Ildadbay aidsay onay oremay, utbay uttoningbay upay ishay oatcay, alkedstay onay eckday, erewhay eway ollowedfay imhay. Erethay ehay oodstay, eryvay uietlyqay overlookingay omesay ailmakerssay owhay ereway endingmay aay op-sailtay inay ethay aistway. Ownay anday enthay ehay oopedstay otay ickpay upay aay atchpay, oray avesay anay enday ofay arredtay inetway, ichwhay otherwiseay ightmay avehay eenbay astedway. 



APTERCHAY 19ay. Ethay Ophetpray. 

ipmates“Shay, avehay eyay ippedshay inay atthay ip?”shay 

Ueequegqay anday IAY adhay ustjay eftlay ethay Equodpay, anday ereway aunteringsay awayay omfray ethay aterway, orfay ethay omentmay eachay occupieday ithway ishay ownay oughtsthay, enwhay ethay aboveay ordsway ereway utpay otay usay byay aay angerstray, owhay, ausingpay eforebay usay, evelledlay ishay assivemay orefingerfay atay ethay esselvay inay uestionqay. Ehay asway utbay abbilyshay apparelleday inay adedfay acketjay anday atchedpay owserstray; aay agray ofay aay ackblay andkerchiefhay investingay ishay ecknay. AAY onfluentcay all-poxsmay adhay inay allay irectionsday owedflay overay ishay acefay, anday eftlay itay ikelay ethay omplicatedcay ibbedray edbay ofay aay orrenttay, enwhay ethay ushingray atersway avehay eenbay ieddray upay. 

ave“Hay eyay ippedshay inay er?”hay ehay epeatedray. 

ou“Yay eanmay ethay ipshay Equodpay, IAY uppose,”say aidsay IAY, ingtryay otay aingay aay ittlelay oremay imetay orfay anay uninterrupteday ooklay atay imhay. 

Aye“ay, ethay Equod—thatpay ipshay ere,”thay ehay aidsay, awingdray ackbay ishay olewhay armay, anday enthay apidlyray ovingshay itay aightstray outay omfray imhay, ithway ethay ixedfay ayonetbay ofay ishay ointedpay ingerfay artedday ullfay atay ethay objectay. 

es,”“Yay aidsay IAY, e“way avehay ustjay ignedsay ethay articles.”ay 

Anything“ay ownday erethay aboutay ouryay ouls?”say 

About“ay at?”whay 

Oh“ay, erhapspay ouyay av’n’thay otgay any,”ay ehay aidsay uicklyqay. o“Nay attermay oughthay, IAY owknay anymay apschay atthay av’n’thay otgay any,—gooday ucklay otay em’ay; anday eythay areay allay ethay etterbay offay orfay itay. AAY oul’ssay aay ortsay ofay aay ifthfay eelwhay otay aay agon.”way 

at“Whay areay ouyay abberingjay aboutay, ipmate?”shay aidsay IAY. 

e’s“_Hay_ otgay enoughay, oughthay, otay akemay upay orfay allay eficienciesday ofay atthay ortsay inay otheray aps,”chay abruptlyay aidsay ethay angerstray, acingplay aay ervousnay emphasisay uponay ethay ordway e_hay_. 

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, et’s“lay ogay; isthay ellowfay ashay okenbray ooselay omfray omewheresay; e’shay alkingtay aboutay omethingsay anday omebodysay eway on’tday ow.”knay 

op!”“Stay iedcray ethay angerstray. e“Yay aidsay ue—yetray av’n’thay eensay Olday Underthay etyay, avehay e?”yay 

o’s“Whay Olday Under?”thay aidsay IAY, againay ivetedray ithway ethay insaneay earnestnessay ofay ishay annermay. 

aptain“Cay Ahab.”ay 

at“Whay! ethay aptaincay ofay ouray ipshay, ethay Equod?”pay 

Aye“ay, amongay omesay ofay usay olday ailorsay apschay, ehay oesgay byay atthay amenay. Eyay av’n’thay eensay imhay etyay, avehay e?”yay 

o“Nay, eway av’n’thay. E’shay icksay eythay aysay, utbay isay ettinggay etterbay, anday illway ebay allay ightray againay eforebay ong.”lay 

All“ay ightray againay eforebay ong!”lay aughedlay ethay angerstray, ithway aay olemnlysay erisiveday ortsay ofay aughlay. ook“Lay eyay; enwhay Aptaincay Ahabay isay allay ightray, enthay isthay eftlay armay ofay inemay illway ebay allay ightray; otnay efore.”bay 

at“Whay oday ouyay owknay aboutay im?”hay 

at“Whay idday eythay ell_tay_ ouyay aboutay imhay? Aysay at!”thay 

ey“Thay idn’tday elltay uchmay ofay anythingay aboutay imhay; onlyay I’veay eardhay atthay e’shay aay oodgay ale-hunterwhay, anday aay oodgay aptaincay otay ishay ew.”cray 

at’s“Thay uetray, at’sthay ue—yestray, othbay uetray enoughay. Utbay ouyay ustmay umpjay enwhay ehay ivesgay anay orderay. Epstay anday owlgray; owlgray anday o—that’sgay ethay ordway ithway Aptaincay Ahabay. Utbay othingnay aboutay atthay ingthay atthay appenedhay otay imhay offay Apecay Ornhay, onglay agoay, enwhay ehay aylay ikelay eadday orfay eethray aysday anday ightsnay; othingnay aboutay atthay eadlyday immageskray ithway ethay Aniardspay aforeay ethay altaray inay Anta?—heardsay othingnay aboutay atthay, ehay? Othingnay aboutay ethay ilversay alabashcay ehay atspay intoay? Anday othingnay aboutay ishay osinglay ishay eglay astlay oyagevay, accordingay otay ethay ophecypray. Idn’tday eyay earhay aay ordway aboutay emthay attersmay anday omethingsay oremay, ehay? Onay, IAY on’tday inkthay eyay idday; owhay ouldcay eyay? Owhay owsknay itay? Otnay allay Antucketnay, IAY uessgay. Utbay ows’everhay, ayhapmay, e’veyay eardhay elltay aboutay ethay eglay, anday owhay ehay ostlay itay; ayeay, eyay avehay eardhay ofay atthay, IAY areday aysay. Ohay esyay, at_thay_ everyay oneay owsknay a’most—Iay eanmay eythay owknay e’shay onlyay oneay eglay; anday atthay aay armacettipay ooktay ethay otheray off.”ay 

“Myay iend,”fray aidsay IAY, at“whay allay isthay ibberishgay ofay oursyay isay aboutay, IAY on’tday owknay, anday IAY on’tday uchmay arecay; orfay itay eemssay otay emay atthay ouyay ustmay ebay aay ittlelay amagedday inay ethay eadhay. Utbay ifay ouyay areay eakingspay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay, ofay atthay ipshay erethay, ethay Equodpay, enthay etlay emay elltay ouyay, atthay IAY owknay allay aboutay ethay osslay ofay ishay eg.”lay 

All“_ay_ aboutay itay, eh—sureay ouyay o?—all?”day 

etty“Pray ure.”say 

Ithway ingerfay ointedpay anday eyeay evelledlay atay ethay Equodpay, ethay eggar-likebay angerstray oodstay aay omentmay, asay ifay inay aay oubledtray everieray; enthay artingstay aay ittlelay, urnedtay anday aid:—“Ye’vesay ippedshay, avehay eyay? Amesnay ownday onay ethay aperspay? Ellway, ellway, at’swhay ignedsay, isay ignedsay; anday at’swhay otay ebay, illway ebay; anday enthay againay, erhapspay itay on’tway ebay, afteray allay. Anyhoway, it’say allay ixedfay anday arrangeday a’readyay; anday omesay ailorssay oray otheray ustmay ogay ithway imhay, IAY upposesay; asay ellway esethay asay anyay otheray enmay, Odgay itypay em’ay! Orningmay otay eyay, ipmatesshay, orningmay; ethay ineffableay eavenshay essblay eyay; I’may orrysay IAY oppedstay e.”yay 

ook“Lay erehay, iend,”fray aidsay IAY, if“ay ouyay avehay anythingay importantay otay elltay usay, outay ithway itay; utbay ifay ouyay areay onlyay ingtryay otay amboozlebay usay, ouyay areay istakenmay inay ouryay amegay; at’sthay allay IAY avehay otay ay.”say 

And“ay it’say aidsay eryvay ellway, anday IAY ikelay otay earhay aay apchay alktay upay atthay ayway; ouyay areay ustjay ethay anmay orfay im—thehay ikeslay ofay eyay. Orningmay otay eyay, ipmatesshay, orningmay! Ohay! enwhay eyay etgay erethay, elltay em’ay I’veay oncludedcay otnay otay akemay oneay ofay em.”’ay 

Ah“ay, myay earday ellowfay, ouyay an’tcay oolfay usay atthay ay—youway an’tcay oolfay usay. Itay isay ethay easiestay ingthay inay ethay orldway orfay aay anmay otay ooklay asay ifay ehay adhay aay eatgray ecretsay inay im.”hay 

orning“May otay eyay, ipmatesshay, orning.”may 

orning“May itay is,”ay aidsay IAY. ome“Cay alongay, Ueequegqay, et’slay eavelay isthay azycray anmay. Utbay opstay, elltay emay ouryay amenay, illway ou?”yay 

Elijah.”“ay 

Elijahay! oughtthay IAY, anday eway alkedway awayay, othbay ommentingcay, afteray eachay other’say ashionfay, uponay isthay aggedray olday ailorsay; anday agreeday atthay ehay asway othingnay utbay aay umbughay, ingtryay otay ebay aay ugbearbay. Utbay eway adhay otnay onegay erhapspay aboveay aay undredhay ardsyay, enwhay ancingchay otay urntay aay ornercay, anday ookinglay ackbay asay IAY idday osay, owhay ouldshay ebay eensay utbay Elijahay ollowingfay usay, oughthay atay aay istanceday. Omehowsay, ethay ightsay ofay imhay uckstray emay osay, atthay IAY aidsay othingnay otay Ueequegqay ofay ishay eingbay ehindbay, utbay assedpay onay ithway myay omradecay, anxiousay otay eesay etherwhay ethay angerstray ouldway urntay ethay amesay ornercay atthay eway idday. Ehay idday; anday enthay itay eemedsay otay emay atthay ehay asway oggingday usay, utbay ithway atwhay intentay IAY ouldcay otnay orfay ethay ifelay ofay emay imagineay. Isthay ircumstancecay, oupledcay ithway ishay ambiguousay, alf-hintinghay, alf-revealinghay, oudedshray ortsay ofay alktay, ownay egatbay inay emay allay indskay ofay aguevay ondermentsway anday alf-apprehensionshay, anday allay onnectedcay ithway ethay Equodpay; anday Aptaincay Ahabay; anday ethay eglay ehay adhay ostlay; anday ethay Apecay Ornhay itfay; anday ethay ilversay alabashcay; anday atwhay Aptaincay Elegpay adhay aidsay ofay imhay, enwhay IAY eftlay ethay ipshay ethay ayday eviouspray; anday ethay edictionpray ofay ethay uawsqay Istigtay; anday ethay oyagevay eway adhay oundbay ourselvesay otay ailsay; anday aay undredhay otheray adowyshay ingsthay. 

IAY asway esolvedray otay atisfysay elfmysay etherwhay isthay aggedray Elijahay asway eallyray oggingday usay oray otnay, anday ithway atthay intentay ossedcray ethay ayway ithway Ueequegqay, anday onay atthay idesay ofay itay etracedray ouray epsstay. Utbay Elijahay assedpay onay, ithoutway eemingsay otay oticenay usay. Isthay elievedray emay; anday onceay oremay, anday inallyfay asay itay eemedsay otay emay, IAY onouncedpray imhay inay myay earthay, aay umbughay. 



APTERCHAY 20ay. Allay Astiray. 

AAY ayday oray otway assedpay, anday erethay asway eatgray activityay aboarday ethay Equodpay. Otnay onlyay ereway ethay olday ailssay eingbay endedmay, utbay ewnay ailssay ereway omingcay onay oardbay, anday oltsbay ofay anvascay, anday oilscay ofay iggingray; inay ortshay, everythingay etokenedbay atthay ethay ip’sshay eparationspray ereway urryinghay otay aay oseclay. Aptaincay Elegpay eldomsay oray evernay entway ashoreay, utbay atsay inay ishay igwamway eepingkay aay arpshay ook-outlay uponay ethay andshay: Ildadbay idday allay ethay urchasingpay anday ovidingpray atay ethay oresstay; anday ethay enmay employeday inay ethay oldhay anday onay ethay iggingray ereway orkingway illtay onglay afteray ight-fallnay. 

Onay ethay ayday ollowingfay Ueequeg’sqay igningsay ethay articlesay, ordway asway ivengay atay allay ethay innsay erewhay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay ereway oppingstay, atthay eirthay estschay ustmay ebay onay oardbay eforebay ightnay, orfay erethay asway onay ellingtay owhay oonsay ethay esselvay ightmay ebay ailingsay. Osay Ueequegqay anday IAY otgay ownday ouray apstray, esolvingray, oweverhay, otay eepslay ashoreay illtay ethay astlay. Utbay itay eemssay eythay alwaysay ivegay eryvay onglay oticenay inay esethay asescay, anday ethay ipshay idday otnay ailsay orfay everalsay aysday. Utbay onay onderway; erethay asway aay oodgay ealday otay ebay oneday, anday erethay isay onay ellingtay owhay anymay ingsthay otay ebay oughtthay ofay, eforebay ethay Equodpay asway ullyfay equippeday. 

Everyay oneay owsknay atwhay aay ultitudemay ofay ings—bedsthay, auce-panssay, ivesknay anday orksfay, ovelsshay anday ongstay, apkinsnay, ut-crackersnay, anday atwhay otnay, areay indispensableay otay ethay usinessbay ofay ousekeepinghay. Ustjay osay ithway alingwhay, ichwhay ecessitatesnay aay ee-years’thray ousekeepinghay uponay ethay ideway oceanay, arfay omfray allay ocersgray, ostermongerscay, octorsday, akersbay, anday ankersbay. Anday oughthay isthay alsoay oldshay uetray ofay erchantmay esselsvay, etyay otnay byay anyay eansmay otay ethay amesay extentay asay ithway alemenwhay. Orfay esidesbay ethay eatgray engthlay ofay ethay alingwhay oyagevay, ethay umerousnay articlesay eculiarpay otay ethay osecutionpray ofay ethay isheryfay, anday ethay impossibilityay ofay eplacingray emthay atay ethay emoteray arborshay usuallyay equentedfray, itay ustmay ebay ememberedray, atthay ofay allay ipsshay, alingwhay esselsvay areay ethay ostmay exposeday otay accidentsay ofay allay indskay, anday especiallyay otay ethay estructionday anday osslay ofay ethay eryvay ingsthay uponay ichwhay ethay uccesssay ofay ethay oyagevay ostmay ependsday. Encehay, ethay arespay oatsbay, arespay arsspay, anday arespay ineslay anday arpoonshay, anday arespay everythingsay, almostay, utbay aay arespay Aptaincay anday uplicateday ipshay. 

Atay ethay eriodpay ofay ouray arrivalay atay ethay Islanday, ethay eaviesthay oragestay ofay ethay Equodpay adhay eenbay almostay ompletedcay; omprisingcay erhay eefbay, eadbray, aterway, uelfay, anday ironay oopshay anday avesstay. Utbay, asay eforebay intedhay, orfay omesay imetay erethay asway aay ontinualcay etchingfay anday arryingcay onay oardbay ofay iversday oddsay anday endsay ofay ingsthay, othbay argelay anday allsmay. 

Iefchay amongay osethay owhay idday isthay etchingfay anday arryingcay asway Aptaincay Ildad’sbay istersay, aay eanlay olday adylay ofay aay ostmay eterminedday anday indefatigableay iritspay, utbay ithalway eryvay indheartedkay, owhay eemedsay esolvedray atthay, ifay e_shay_ ouldcay elphay itay, othingnay ouldshay ebay oundfay antingway inay ethay Equodpay, afteray onceay airlyfay ettinggay otay easay. Atay oneay imetay eshay ouldway omecay onay oardbay ithway aay arjay ofay icklespay orfay ethay eward’sstay antrypay; anotheray imetay ithway aay unchbay ofay uillsqay orfay ethay iefchay ate’smay eskday, erewhay ehay eptkay ishay oglay; aay irdthay imetay ithway aay ollray ofay annelflay orfay ethay allsmay ofay omesay one’say eumaticrhay ackbay. Evernay idday anyay omanway etterbay eserveday erhay amenay, ichwhay asway Arity—auntchay Aritychay, asay everybodyay alledcay erhay. Anday ikelay aay istersay ofay aritychay idday isthay aritablechay Auntay Aritychay ustlebay aboutay itherhay anday itherthay, eadyray otay urntay erhay andhay anday earthay otay anythingay atthay omisedpray otay ieldyay afetysay, omfortcay, anday onsolationcay otay allay onay oardbay aay ipshay inay ichwhay erhay elovedbay otherbray Ildadbay asway oncernedcay, anday inay ichwhay eshay erselfhay owneday aay orescay oray otway ofay ell-savedway ollarsday. 

Utbay itay asway artlingstay otay eesay isthay excellentay eartedhay Uakeressqay omingcay onay oardbay, asay eshay idday ethay astlay ayday, ithway aay onglay oil-ladleay inay oneay andhay, anday aay illstay ongerlay alingwhay ancelay inay ethay otheray. Ornay asway Ildadbay imselfhay ornay Aptaincay Elegpay atay allay ackwardbay. Asay orfay Ildadbay, ehay arriedcay aboutay ithway imhay aay onglay istlay ofay ethay articlesay eedednay, anday atay everyay eshfray arrivalay, ownday entway ishay arkmay oppositeay atthay articleay uponay ethay aperpay. Everyay onceay inay aay ilewhay Elegpay amecay obblinghay outay ofay ishay alebonewhay enday, oaringray atay ethay enmay ownday ethay atchwayshay, oaringray upay otay ethay iggersray atay ethay ast-headmay, anday enthay oncludedcay byay oaringray ackbay intoay ishay igwamway. 

Uringday esethay aysday ofay eparationpray, Ueequegqay anday IAY oftenay isitedvay ethay aftcray, anday asay oftenay IAY askeday aboutay Aptaincay Ahabay, anday owhay ehay asway, anday enwhay ehay asway oinggay otay omecay onay oardbay ishay ipshay. Otay esethay uestionsqay eythay ouldway answeray, atthay ehay asway ettinggay etterbay anday etterbay, anday asway expecteday aboarday everyay ayday; eantimemay, ethay otway aptainscay, Elegpay anday Ildadbay, ouldcay attenday otay everythingay ecessarynay otay itfay ethay esselvay orfay ethay oyagevay. Ifay IAY adhay eenbay ownrightday onesthay ithway elfmysay, IAY ouldway avehay eensay eryvay ainlyplay inay myay earthay atthay IAY idday utbay alfhay ancyfay eingbay ommittedcay isthay ayway otay osay onglay aay oyagevay, ithoutway onceay ayinglay myay eyesay onay ethay anmay owhay asway otay ebay ethay absoluteay ictatorday ofay itay, osay oonsay asay ethay ipshay ailedsay outay uponay ethay openay easay. Utbay enwhay aay anmay uspectssay anyay ongwray, itay ometimessay appenshay atthay ifay ehay ebay alreadyay involveday inay ethay attermay, ehay insensiblyay ivesstray otay overcay upay ishay uspicionssay evenay omfray imselfhay. Anday uchmay isthay ayway itay asway ithway emay. IAY aidsay othingnay, anday iedtray otay inkthay othingnay. 

Atay astlay itay asway ivengay outay atthay omesay imetay extnay ayday ethay ipshay ouldway ertainlycay ailsay. Osay extnay orningmay, Ueequegqay anday IAY ooktay aay eryvay earlyay artstay. 



APTERCHAY 21ay. Oinggay Aboarday. 

Itay asway earlynay ixsay o’clockay, utbay onlyay eygray imperfectay istymay awnday, enwhay eway ewdray ighnay ethay arfwhay. 

ere“Thay areay omesay ailorssay unningray aheaday erethay, ifay IAY eesay ight,”ray aidsay IAY otay Ueequegqay, it“ay an’tcay ebay adowsshay; e’sshay offay byay unrisesay, IAY uessgay; omecay on!”ay 

Avast!”“ay iedcray aay oicevay, osewhay owneray atay ethay amesay imetay omingcay oseclay ehindbay usay, aidlay aay andhay uponay othbay ouray ouldersshay, anday enthay insinuatingay imselfhay etweenbay usay, oodstay oopingstay orwardfay aay ittlelay, inay ethay uncertainay ilighttway, angelystray eeringpay omfray Ueequegqay otay emay. Itay asway Elijahay. 

oing“Gay aboard?”ay 

ands“Hay offay, illway ou,”yay aidsay IAY. 

ookee“Lay ere,”hay aidsay Ueequegqay, akingshay imselfhay, o“gay ay!”’way 

Ain’t“ay oinggay aboarday, en?”thay 

es“Yay, eway are,”ay aidsay IAY, ut“bay atwhay usinessbay isay atthay ofay oursyay? Oday ouyay owknay, Mray. Elijahay, atthay IAY onsidercay ouyay aay ittlelay impertinent?”ay 

o“Nay, onay, onay; IAY asn’tway awareay ofay at,”thay aidsay Elijahay, owlyslay anday onderinglyway ookinglay omfray emay otay Ueequegqay, ithway ethay ostmay unaccountableay ancesglay. 

Elijah,”“ay aidsay IAY, ou“yay illway obligeay myay iendfray anday emay byay ithdrawingway. Eway areay oinggay otay ethay Indianay anday Acificpay Oceansay, anday ouldway eferpray otnay otay ebay etained.”day 

e“Yay ebay, ebay eyay? Omingcay ackbay aforeay eakfast?”bray 

e’s“Hay ackedcray, Ueequeg,”qay aidsay IAY, ome“cay on.”ay 

olloa!”“Hay iedcray ationarystay Elijahay, ailinghay usay enwhay eway adhay emovedray aay ewfay acespay. 

ever“Nay indmay im,”hay aidsay IAY, ueequeg“Qay, omecay on.”ay 

Utbay ehay olestay upay otay usay againay, anday uddenlysay appingclay ishay andhay onay myay ouldershay, aid—“Didsay eyay eesay anythingay ookinglay ikelay enmay oinggay owardstay atthay ipshay aay ilewhay ago?”ay 

Uckstray byay isthay ainplay atter-of-factmay uestionqay, IAY answereday, ayingsay, es“Yay, IAY oughtthay IAY idday eesay ourfay oray ivefay enmay; utbay itay asway ootay imday otay ebay ure.”say 

ery“Vay imday, eryvay im,”day aidsay Elijahay. orning“May otay e.”yay 

Onceay oremay eway uittedqay imhay; utbay onceay oremay ehay amecay oftlysay afteray usay; anday ouchingtay myay ouldershay againay, aidsay, ee“Say ifay ouyay ancay indfay em’ay ownay, illway eyay? 

ind“Fay o?”whay 

orning“May otay eyay! orningmay otay e!”yay ehay ejoinedray, againay ovingmay offay. Oh“ay! IAY asway oinggay otay arnway eyay against—butay evernay indmay, evernay ind—it’smay allay oneay, allay inay ethay amilyfay oo;—sharptay ostfray isthay orningmay, ain’tay itay? Ood-byegay otay eyay. An’tshay eesay eyay againay eryvay oonsay, IAY uessgay; unlessay it’say eforebay ethay Andgray Ury.”jay Anday ithway esethay ackedcray ordsway ehay inallyfay epartedday, eavinglay emay, orfay ethay omentmay, inay onay allsmay ondermentway atay ishay anticfray impudenceay. 

Atay astlay, eppingstay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, eway oundfay everythingay inay ofoundpray uietqay, otnay aay oulsay ovingmay. Ethay abincay entranceay asway ockedlay ithinway; ethay atcheshay ereway allay onay, anday umberedlay ithway oilscay ofay iggingray. Oinggay orwardfay otay ethay orecastlefay, eway oundfay ethay ideslay ofay ethay uttlescay openay. Eeingsay aay ightlay, eway entway ownday, anday oundfay onlyay anay olday iggerray erethay, appedwray inay aay atteredtay ea-jacketpay. Ehay asway ownthray atay olewhay engthlay uponay otway estschay, ishay acefay ownwardsday anday incloseday inay ishay oldedfay armsay. Ethay ofoundestpray umberslay eptslay uponay imhay. 

ose“Thay ailorssay eway awsay, Ueequegqay, erewhay ancay eythay avehay onegay o?”tay aidsay IAY, ookinglay ubiouslyday atay ethay eeperslay. Utbay itay eemedsay atthay, enwhay onay ethay arfwhay, Ueequegqay adhay otnay atay allay oticednay atwhay IAY ownay alludeday otay; encehay IAY ouldway avehay oughtthay elfmysay otay avehay eenbay opticallyay eceivedday inay atthay attermay, ereway itay otnay orfay Elijah’say otherwiseay inexplicableay uestionqay. Utbay IAY eatbay ethay ingthay ownday; anday againay arkingmay ethay eeperslay, ocularlyjay intedhay otay Ueequegqay atthay erhapspay eway adhay estbay itsay upay ithway ethay odybay; ellingtay imhay otay establishay imselfhay accordinglyay. Ehay utpay ishay andhay uponay ethay eeper’sslay earray, asay oughthay eelingfay ifay itay asway oftsay enoughay; anday enthay, ithoutway oremay adoay, atsay uietlyqay ownday erethay. 

acious“Gray! Ueequegqay, on’tday itsay ere,”thay aidsay IAY. 

Oh“ay! errypay oodday eat,”say aidsay Ueequegqay, “myay ountrycay ayway; on’tway urthay imhay ace.”fay 

ace!”“Fay aidsay IAY, all“cay atthay ishay acefay? eryvay enevolentbay ountenancecay enthay; utbay owhay ardhay ehay eathesbray, e’shay eavinghay imselfhay; etgay offay, Ueequegqay, ouyay areay eavyhay, it’say indinggray ethay acefay ofay ethay oorpay. Etgay offay, Ueequegqay! Ooklay, e’llhay itchtway ouyay offay oonsay. IAY onderway ehay on’tday ake.”way 

Ueequegqay emovedray imselfhay otay ustjay eyondbay ethay eadhay ofay ethay eeperslay, anday ightedlay ishay omahawktay ipepay. IAY atsay atay ethay eetfay. Eway eptkay ethay ipepay assingpay overay ethay eeperslay, omfray oneay otay ethay otheray. Eanwhilemay, uponay uestioningqay imhay inay ishay okenbray ashionfay, Ueequegqay avegay emay otay understanday atthay, inay ishay andlay, owingay otay ethay absenceay ofay etteessay anday ofassay ofay allay ortssay, ethay ingkay, iefschay, anday eatgray eoplepay enerallygay, ereway inay ethay ustomcay ofay atteningfay omesay ofay ethay owerlay ordersay orfay ottomansay; anday otay urnishfay aay ousehay omfortablycay inay atthay espectray, ouyay adhay onlyay otay uybay upay eightay oray entay azylay ellowsfay, anday aylay emthay oundray inay ethay ierspay anday alcovesay. Esidesbay, itay asway eryvay onvenientcay onay anay excursionay; uchmay etterbay anthay osethay arden-chairsgay ichwhay areay onvertiblecay intoay alking-sticksway; uponay occasionay, aay iefchay allingcay ishay attendantay, anday esiringday imhay otay akemay aay etteesay ofay imselfhay underay aay eadingspray eetray, erhapspay inay omesay ampday arshymay aceplay. 

Ilewhay arratingnay esethay ingsthay, everyay imetay Ueequegqay eceivedray ethay omahawktay omfray emay, ehay ourishedflay ethay atchet-sidehay ofay itay overay ethay eeper’sslay eadhay. 

at’s“Whay atthay orfay, Ueequeg?”qay 

erry“Pay easyay, ill-ekay; ohay! errypay easy!”ay 

Ehay asway oinggay onay ithway omesay ildway eminiscencesray aboutay ishay omahawk-pipetay, ichwhay, itay eemedsay, adhay inay itsay otway usesay othbay ainedbray ishay oesfay anday oothedsay ishay oulsay, enwhay eway ereway irectlyday attracteday otay ethay eepingslay iggerray. Ethay ongstray aporvay ownay ompletelycay illingfay ethay ontractedcay olehay, itay eganbay otay elltay uponay imhay. Ehay eathedbray ithway aay ortsay ofay ufflednessmay; enthay eemedsay oubledtray inay ethay osenay; enthay evolvedray overay onceay oray icetway; enthay atsay upay anday ubbedray ishay eyesay. 

olloa!”“Hay ehay eathedbray atay astlay, o“whay ebay eyay okers?”smay 

ipped“Shay en,”may answereday IAY, en“whay oesday eshay ail?”say 

Aye“ay, ayeay, eyay areay oinggay inay erhay, ebay eyay? Eshay ailssay o-daytay. Ethay Aptaincay amecay aboarday astlay ight.”nay 

at“Whay Aptain?—ahab?”cay 

o“Whay utbay imhay indeed?”ay 

IAY asway oinggay otay askay imhay omesay urtherfay uestionsqay oncerningcay Ahabay, enwhay eway eardhay aay oisenay onay eckday. 

olloa“Hay! Arbuck’sstay astir,”ay aidsay ethay iggerray. e’s“Hay aay ivelylay iefchay atemay, atthay; oodgay anmay, anday aay iouspay; utbay allay aliveay ownay, IAY ustmay urntay o.”tay Anday osay ayingsay ehay entway onay eckday, anday eway ollowedfay. 

Itay asway ownay earclay unrisesay. Oonsay ethay ewcray amecay onay oardbay inay ostway anday eesthray; ethay iggersray estirredbay emselvesthay; ethay atesmay ereway activelyay engageday; anday everalsay ofay ethay oreshay eoplepay ereway usybay inay ingingbray ariousvay astlay ingsthay onay oardbay. Eanwhilemay Aptaincay Ahabay emainedray invisiblyay enshrineday ithinway ishay abincay. 



APTERCHAY 22ay. Errymay Istmaschray. 

Atay engthlay, owardstay oonnay, uponay ethay inalfay ismissalday ofay ethay ip’sshay iggersray, anday afteray ethay Equodpay adhay eenbay auledhay outay omfray ethay arfwhay, anday afteray ethay ever-thoughtfulay Aritychay adhay omecay offay inay aay ale-boatwhay, ithway erhay astlay ift—agay ight-capnay orfay Ubbstay, ethay econdsay atemay, erhay other-in-lawbray, anday aay arespay Iblebay orfay ethay eward—afterstay allay isthay, ethay otway Aptainscay, Elegpay anday Ildadbay, issueday omfray ethay abincay, anday urningtay otay ethay iefchay atemay, Elegpay aidsay: 

ow“Nay, Mray. Arbuckstay, areay ouyay uresay everythingay isay ightray? Aptaincay Ahabay isay allay eady—justray okespay otay im—nothinghay oremay otay ebay otgay omfray oreshay, ehay? Ellway, allcay allay andshay, enthay. Ustermay em’ay aftay ere—blasthay em!”’ay 

o“Nay eednay ofay ofanepray ordsway, oweverhay eatgray ethay urryhay, Eleg,”pay aidsay Ildadbay, ut“bay awayay ithway eethay, iendfray Arbuckstay, anday oday ouray idding.”bay 

Owhay ownay! Erehay uponay ethay eryvay ointpay ofay artingstay orfay ethay oyagevay, Aptaincay Elegpay anday Aptaincay Ildadbay ereway oinggay itay ithway aay ighhay andhay onay ethay uarter-deckqay, ustjay asay ifay eythay ereway otay ebay oint-commandersjay atay easay, asay ellway asay otay allay appearancesay inay ortpay. Anday, asay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay, onay ignsay ofay imhay asway etyay otay ebay eensay; onlyay, eythay aidsay ehay asway inay ethay abincay. Utbay enthay, ethay ideaay asway, atthay ishay esencepray asway byay onay eansmay ecessarynay inay ettinggay ethay ipshay underay eighway, anday eeringstay erhay ellway outay otay easay. Indeeday, asay atthay asway otnay atay allay ishay operpray usinessbay, utbay ethay ilot’spay; anday asay ehay asway otnay etyay ompletelycay ecovered—soray eythay aid—thereforesay, Aptaincay Ahabay ayedstay elowbay. Anday allay isthay eemedsay aturalnay enoughay; especiallyay asay inay ethay erchantmay ervicesay anymay aptainscay evernay owshay emselvesthay onay eckday orfay aay onsiderablecay imetay afteray eavinghay upay ethay anchoray, utbay emainray overay ethay abincay abletay, avinghay aay arewellfay erry-makingmay ithway eirthay oreshay iendsfray, eforebay eythay uitqay ethay ipshay orfay oodgay ithway ethay ilotpay. 

Utbay erethay asway otnay uchmay ancechay otay inkthay overay ethay attermay, orfay Aptaincay Elegpay asway ownay allay aliveay. Ehay eemedsay otay oday ostmay ofay ethay alkingtay anday ommandingcay, anday otnay Ildadbay. 

Aft“ay erehay, eyay onssay ofay achelors,”bay ehay iedcray, asay ethay ailorssay ingeredlay atay ethay ain-mastmay. “Mray. Arbuckstay, ivedray em’ay aft.”ay 

ike“Stray ethay enttay ere!”—wasthay ethay extnay orderay. Asay IAY intedhay eforebay, isthay alebonewhay arqueemay asway evernay itchedpay exceptay inay ortpay; anday onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, orfay irtythay earsyay, ethay orderay otay ikestray ethay enttay asway ellway ownknay otay ebay ethay extnay ingthay otay eavinghay upay ethay anchoray. 

an“May ethay apstancay! Oodblay anday under!—jump!”—wasthay ethay extnay ommandcay, anday ethay ewcray angspray orfay ethay andspikeshay. 

Ownay inay ettinggay underay eighway, ethay ationstay enerallygay occupieday byay ethay ilotpay isay ethay orwardfay artpay ofay ethay ipshay. Anday erehay Ildadbay, owhay, ithway Elegpay, ebay itay ownknay, inay additionay otay ishay otheray officersay, asway oneay ofay ethay icensedlay ilotspay ofay ethay ort—hepay eingbay uspectedsay otay avehay otgay imselfhay ademay aay ilotpay inay orderay otay avesay ethay Antucketnay ilot-feepay otay allay ethay ipsshay ehay asway oncernedcay inay, orfay ehay evernay ilotedpay anyay otheray aft—Bildadcray, IAY aysay, ightmay ownay ebay eensay activelyay engageday inay ookinglay overay ethay owsbay orfay ethay approachingay anchoray, anday atay intervalsay ingingsay atwhay eemedsay aay ismalday avestay ofay almodypsay, otay eerchay ethay andshay atay ethay indlassway, owhay oaredray orthfay omesay ortsay ofay aay oruschay aboutay ethay irlsgay inay Ooblebay Alleyay, ithway eartyhay oodgay illway. Everthelessnay, otnay eethray aysday eviouspray, Ildadbay adhay oldtay emthay atthay onay ofanepray ongssay ouldway ebay alloweday onay oardbay ethay Equodpay, articularlypay inay ettinggay underay eighway; anday Aritychay, ishay istersay, adhay acedplay aay allsmay oicechay opycay ofay Attsway inay eachay eaman’ssay erthbay. 

Eantimemay, overseeingay ethay otheray artpay ofay ethay ipshay, Aptaincay Elegpay ippedray anday oresway asternay inay ethay ostmay ightfulfray annermay. IAY almostay oughtthay ehay ouldway inksay ethay ipshay eforebay ethay anchoray ouldcay ebay otgay upay; involuntarilyay IAY ausedpay onay myay andspikehay, anday oldtay Ueequegqay otay oday ethay amesay, inkingthay ofay ethay erilspay eway othbay anray, inay artingstay onay ethay oyagevay ithway uchsay aay evilday orfay aay ilotpay. IAY asway omfortingcay elfmysay, oweverhay, ithway ethay oughtthay atthay inay iouspay Ildadbay ightmay ebay oundfay omesay alvationsay, itespay ofay ishay evensay undredhay anday eventy-seventhsay aylay; enwhay IAY eltfay aay uddensay arpshay okepay inay myay earray, anday urningtay oundray, asway orrifiedhay atay ethay apparitionay ofay Aptaincay Elegpay inay ethay actay ofay ithdrawingway ishay eglay omfray myay immediateay icinityvay. Atthay asway myay irstfay ickkay. 

Is“ay atthay ethay ayway eythay eavehay inay ethay archantmay ervice?”say ehay oaredray. ing“Spray, outhay eep-headshay; ingspray, anday eakbray thyay ackbonebay! Whyay on’tday eyay ingspray, IAY aysay, allay ofay e—springyay! Uohogqay! ingspray, outhay apchay ithway ethay edray iskerswhay; ingspray erethay, Otch-capscay; ingspray, outhay eengray antspay. Ingspray, IAY aysay, allay ofay eyay, anday ingspray ouryay eyesay out!”ay Anday osay ayingsay, ehay ovedmay alongay ethay indlassway, erehay anday erethay usingay ishay eglay eryvay eelyfray, ilewhay imperturbableay Ildadbay eptkay eadinglay offay ithway ishay almodypsay. Inksthay IAY, Aptaincay Elegpay ustmay avehay eenbay inkingdray omethingsay o-daytay. 

Atay astlay ethay anchoray asway upay, ethay ailssay ereway etsay, anday offay eway idedglay. Itay asway aay ortshay, oldcay Istmaschray; anday asay ethay ortshay orthernnay ayday ergedmay intoay ightnay, eway oundfay ourselvesay almostay oadbray uponay ethay intryway oceanay, osewhay eezingfray ayspray asedcay usay inay iceay, asay inay olishedpay armoray. Ethay onglay owsray ofay eethtay onay ethay ulwarksbay istenedglay inay ethay oonlightmay; anday ikelay ethay itewhay ivoryay uskstay ofay omesay ugehay elephantay, astvay urvingcay iciclesay ependedday omfray ethay owsbay. 

Anklay Ildadbay, asay ilotpay, eadedhay ethay irstfay atchway, anday everay anday anonay, asay ethay olday aftcray eepday ivedday intoay ethay eengray eassay, anday entsay ethay iveringshay ostfray allay overay erhay, anday ethay indsway owledhay, anday ethay ordagecay angray, ishay eadystay otesnay ereway eard,—hay
