IAY omisepray othingnay ompletecay; ecausebay anyay umanhay ingthay upposedsay otay ebay ompletecay, ustmay orfay atthay eryvay easonray infalliblyay ebay aultyfay. IAY allshay otnay etendpray otay aay inutemay anatomicalay escriptionday ofay ethay ariousvay eciesspay, or—inay isthay aceplay atay east—tolay uchmay ofay anyay escriptionday. Myay objectay erehay isay implysay otay ojectpray ethay aughtdray ofay aay ematizationsystay ofay etologycay. IAY amay ethay architectay, otnay ethay uilderbay. 

Utbay itay isay aay onderouspay asktay; onay ordinaryay etter-sorterlay inay ethay Ost-officepay isay equalay otay itay. Otay opegray ownday intoay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay afteray emthay; otay avehay one’say andshay amongay ethay unspeakableay oundationsfay, ibsray, anday eryvay elvispay ofay ethay orldway; isthay isay aay earfulfay ingthay. Atwhay amay IAY atthay IAY ouldshay essayay otay ookhay ethay osenay ofay isthay eviathanlay! Ethay awfulay auntingstay inay Objay ightmay ellway appalay emay. Illway ehay e(thay eviathanlay) akemay aay ovenantcay ithway eethay? Eholdbay ethay opehay ofay imhay isay ainvay! Utbay IAY avehay amsway oughthray ibrarieslay anday ailedsay oughthray oceansay; IAY avehay adhay otay oday ithway aleswhay ithway esethay isiblevay andshay; IAY amay inay earnestay; anday IAY illway tryay. Erethay areay omesay eliminariespray otay ettlesay. 

Irstfay: Ethay uncertainay, unsettleday onditioncay ofay isthay iencescay ofay Etologycay isay inay ethay eryvay estibulevay attesteday byay ethay actfay, atthay inay omesay uartersqay itay illstay emainsray aay ootmay ointpay etherwhay aay alewhay ebay aay ishfay. Inay ishay Emsystay ofay Aturenay, A.DAY. 1776ay, Innæuslay eclaresday, I“AY erebyhay eparatesay ethay aleswhay omfray ethay ish.”fay Utbay ofay myay ownay owledgeknay, IAY owknay atthay ownday otay ethay earyay 1850ay, arksshay anday adshay, alewivesay anday erringhay, againstay Innæus’slay expressay edictay, ereway illstay oundfay ividingday ethay ossessionpay ofay ethay amesay eassay ithway ethay Eviathanlay. 

Ethay oundsgray uponay ichwhay Innæuslay ouldway ainfay avehay anishedbay ethay aleswhay omfray ethay atersway, ehay atesstay asay ollowsfay: On“ay accountay ofay eirthay armway ilocularbay earthay, eirthay ungslay, eirthay ovablemay eyelidsay, eirthay ollowhay earsay, enempay intrantemay eminamfay ammismay actantem,”lay anday inallyfay, ex“ay egelay aturænay urejay eritoque.”may IAY ubmittedsay allay isthay otay myay iendsfray Imeonsay Aceymay anday Arleychay Offincay, ofay Antucketnay, othbay essmatesmay ofay inemay inay aay ertaincay oyagevay, anday eythay uniteday inay ethay opinionay atthay ethay easonsray etsay orthfay ereway altogetheray insufficientay. Arleychay ofanelypray intedhay eythay ereway umbughay. 

Ebay itay ownknay atthay, aivingway allay argumentay, IAY aketay ethay oodgay olday ashionedfay oundgray atthay ethay alewhay isay aay ishfay, anday allcay uponay olyhay Onahjay otay ackbay emay. Isthay undamentalfay ingthay ettledsay, ethay extnay ointpay isay, inay atwhay internalay espectray oesday ethay alewhay ifferday omfray otheray ishfay. Aboveay, Innæuslay ashay ivengay ouyay osethay itemsay. Utbay inay iefbray, eythay areay esethay: ungslay anday armway oodblay; ereaswhay, allay otheray ishfay areay unglesslay anday oldcay oodedblay. 

Extnay: owhay allshay eway efineday ethay alewhay, byay ishay obviousay externalsay, osay asay onspicuouslycay otay abellay imhay orfay allay imetay otay omecay? Otay ebay ortshay, enthay, aay alewhay isay a_ay outingspay ishfay ithway aay orizontalhay ailtay_. Erethay ouyay avehay imhay. Oweverhay ontractedcay, atthay efinitionday isay ethay esultray ofay expandeday editationmay. AAY alrusway outsspay uchmay ikelay aay alewhay, utbay ethay alrusway isay otnay aay ishfay, ecausebay ehay isay amphibiousay. Utbay ethay astlay ermtay ofay ethay efinitionday isay illstay oremay ogentcay, asay oupledcay ithway ethay irstfay. Almostay anyay oneay ustmay avehay oticednay atthay allay ethay ishfay amiliarfay otay andsmenlay avehay otnay aay atflay, utbay aay erticalvay, oray up-and-downay ailtay. Ereaswhay, amongay outingspay ishfay ethay ailtay, oughthay itay aymay ebay imilarlysay apedshay, invariablyay assumesay aay orizontalhay ositionpay. 

Byay ethay aboveay efinitionday ofay atwhay aay alewhay isay, IAY oday byay onay eansmay excludeay omfray ethay eviathaniclay otherhoodbray anyay easay eaturecray ithertohay identifieday ithway ethay alewhay byay ethay estbay informeday Antucketersnay; ornay, onay ethay otheray andhay, inklay ithway itay anyay ishfay ithertohay authoritativelyay egardedray asay alienay.* Encehay, allay ethay allersmay, outingspay, anday orizontalhay ailedtay ishfay ustmay ebay includeday inay isthay ound-plangray ofay Etologycay. Ownay, enthay, omecay ethay andgray ivisionsday ofay ethay entireay alewhay osthay. 

I*AY amay awareay atthay ownday otay ethay esentpray imetay, ethay ishfay edstylay Amatinslay anday Ugongsday ig-fish(Pay anday Ow-fishsay ofay ethay Offinscay ofay Antucketnay) areay includeday byay anymay aturalistsnay amongay ethay aleswhay. Utbay asay esethay ig-fishpay areay aay oisynay, ontemptiblecay etsay, ostlymay urkinglay inay ethay outhsmay ofay iversray, anday eedingfay onay etway ayhay, anday especiallyay asay eythay oday otnay outspay, IAY enyday eirthay edentialscray asay aleswhay; anday avehay esentedpray emthay ithway eirthay assportspay otay uitqay ethay Ingdomkay ofay Etologycay. 

Irstfay: Accordingay otay agnitudemay IAY ivideday ethay aleswhay intoay eethray imarypray OOKSBAY ubdivisible(say intoay APTERSCHAY), anday esethay allshay omprehendcay emthay allay, othbay allsmay anday argelay. 

IAY. ETHAY OLIOFAY ALEWHAY; IIAY. ethay OCTAVOAY ALEWHAY; IIIAY. ethay UODECIMODAY ALEWHAY. 

Asay ethay etypay ofay ethay OLIOFAY IAY esentpray ethay erm_Spay Alewhay_; ofay ethay OCTAVOAY, ethay ampus_Gray_; ofay ethay UODECIMODAY, ethay orpoise_Pay_. 

OLIOSFAY. Amongay esethay IAY erehay includeay ethay ollowingfay apters:—Ichay. Ethay erm_Spay Alewhay_; IIAY. ethay ight_Ray Alewhay_; IIIAY. ethay in-Back_Fay Alewhay_; IVAY. ethay ump-backed_Hay Alewhay_; VAY. ethay azor_Ray Ackbay Alewhay_; IVAY. ethay ulphur_Say Ottombay Alewhay_. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) APTERCHAY IAY. erm(_Spay Ale_).—thiswhay alewhay, amongay ethay Englishay ofay olday aguelyvay ownknay asay ethay Umpatray alewhay, anday ethay Eterphysay alewhay, anday ethay Anvilay Eadedhay alewhay, isay ethay esentpray Achalotcay ofay ethay Enchfray, anday ethay Ottsfichpay ofay ethay Ermansgay, anday ethay Acrocephalusmay ofay ethay Onglay Ordsway. Ehay isay, ithoutway oubtday, ethay argestlay inhabitantay ofay ethay obeglay; ethay ostmay ormidablefay ofay allay aleswhay otay encounteray; ethay ostmay ajesticmay inay aspectay; anday astlylay, byay arfay ethay ostmay aluablevay inay ommercecay; ehay eingbay ethay onlyay eaturecray omfray ichwhay atthay aluablevay ubstancesay, ermacetispay, isay obtaineday. Allay ishay eculiaritiespay illway, inay anymay otheray acesplay, ebay enlargeday uponay. Itay isay ieflychay ithway ishay amenay atthay IAY ownay avehay otay oday. Ilologicallyphay onsideredcay, itay isay absurday. Omesay enturiescay agoay, enwhay ethay Ermspay alewhay asway almostay ollywhay unknownay inay ishay ownay operpray individualityay, anday enwhay ishay oilay asway onlyay accidentallyay obtaineday omfray ethay andedstray ishfay; inay osethay aysday ermacetispay, itay ouldway eemsay, asway opularlypay upposedsay otay ebay erivedday omfray aay eaturecray identicalay ithway ethay oneay enthay ownknay inay Englanday asay ethay Eenlandgray oray Ightray Alewhay. Itay asway ethay ideaay alsoay, atthay isthay amesay ermacetispay asway atthay uickeningqay umorhay ofay ethay Eenlandgray Alewhay ichwhay ethay irstfay ablesyllay ofay ethay ordway iterallylay expressesay. Inay osethay imestay, alsoay, ermacetispay asway exceedinglyay arcescay, otnay eingbay useday orfay ightlay, utbay onlyay asay anay ointmentay anday edicamentmay. Itay asway onlyay otay ebay adhay omfray ethay uggistsdray asay ouyay owadaysnay uybay anay ounceay ofay ubarbrhay. Enwhay, asay IAY opineay, inay ethay oursecay ofay imetay, ethay uetray aturenay ofay ermacetispay ecamebay ownknay, itsay originalay amenay asway illstay etainedray byay ethay ealersday; onay oubtday otay enhanceay itsay aluevay byay aay otionnay osay angelystray ignificantsay ofay itsay arcityscay. Anday osay ethay appellationay ustmay atay astlay avehay omecay otay ebay estowedbay uponay ethay alewhay omfray ichwhay isthay ermacetispay asway eallyray erivedday. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) APTERCHAY IIAY. ight(_Ray Ale_).—inwhay oneay espectray isthay isay ethay ostmay enerablevay ofay ethay eviathanslay, eingbay ethay oneay irstfay egularlyray untedhay byay anmay. Itay ieldsyay ethay articleay ommonlycay ownknay asay alebonewhay oray aleenbay; anday ethay oilay eciallyspay ownknay asay ale“whay oil,”ay anay inferioray articleay inay ommercecay. Amongay ethay ishermenfay, ehay isay indiscriminatelyay esignatedday byay allay ethay ollowingfay itlestay: Ethay Alewhay; ethay Eenlandgray Alewhay; ethay Ackblay Alewhay; ethay Eatgray Alewhay; ethay Uetray Alewhay; ethay Ightray Alewhay. Erethay isay aay ealday ofay obscurityay oncerningcay ethay identityay ofay ethay eciesspay usthay ultitudinouslymay aptisedbay. Atwhay enthay isay ethay alewhay, ichwhay IAY includeay inay ethay econdsay eciesspay ofay myay Oliosfay? Itay isay ethay Eatgray Icetusmystay ofay ethay Englishay aturalistsnay; ethay Eenlandgray Alewhay ofay ethay Englishay alemenwhay; ethay Aleinebay Ordinaireay ofay ethay Enchfray alemenwhay; ethay Owlandsgray Alfishway ofay ethay Edessway. Itay isay ethay alewhay ichwhay orfay oremay anthay otway enturiescay astpay ashay eenbay untedhay byay ethay Utchday anday Englishay inay ethay Arcticay eassay; itay isay ethay alewhay ichwhay ethay Americanay ishermenfay avehay onglay ursuedpay inay ethay Indianay oceanay, onay ethay Azilbray Anksbay, onay ethay Or’nay Estway Oastcay, anday ariousvay otheray artspay ofay ethay orldway, esignatedday byay emthay Ightray Alewhay Uisingcray Oundsgray. 

Omesay etendpray otay eesay aay ifferenceday etweenbay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay ofay ethay Englishay anday ethay ightray alewhay ofay ethay Americansay. Utbay eythay eciselypray agreeay inay allay eirthay andgray eaturesfay; ornay ashay erethay etyay eenbay esentedpray aay inglesay eterminateday actfay uponay ichwhay otay oundgray aay adicalray istinctionday. Itay isay byay endlessay ubdivisionssay asedbay uponay ethay ostmay inconclusiveay ifferencesday, atthay omesay epartmentsday ofay aturalnay istoryhay ecomebay osay epellinglyray intricateay. Ethay ightray alewhay illway ebay elsewhereay eatedtray ofay atay omesay engthlay, ithway eferenceray otay elucidatingay ethay ermspay alewhay. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) APTERCHAY IIIAY. in-Back_).—Under(_Fay isthay eadhay IAY eckonray aay onstermay ichwhay, byay ethay ariousvay amesnay ofay In-backfay, All-spouttay, anday Ong-johnlay, ashay eenbay eensay almostay inay everyay easay anday isay ommonlycay ethay alewhay osewhay istantday etjay isay osay oftenay escriedday byay assengerspay ossingcray ethay Atlanticay, inay ethay Ewnay Orkyay acket-trackspay. Inay ethay engthlay ehay attainsay, anday inay ishay aleenbay, ethay In-backfay esemblesray ethay ightray alewhay, utbay isay ofay aay esslay ortlypay irthgay, anday aay ighterlay olourcay, approachingay otay oliveay. Ishay eatgray ipslay esentpray aay able-likecay aspectay, ormedfay byay ethay intertwistingay, antingslay oldsfay ofay argelay inkleswray. Ishay andgray istinguishingday eaturefay, ethay infay, omfray ichwhay ehay erivesday ishay amenay, isay oftenay aay onspicuouscay objectay. Isthay infay isay omesay eethray oray ourfay eetfay onglay, owinggray erticallyvay omfray ethay inderhay artpay ofay ethay ackbay, ofay anay angularay apeshay, anday ithway aay eryvay arpshay ointedpay enday. Evenay ifay otnay ethay ightestslay otheray artpay ofay ethay eaturecray ebay isiblevay, isthay isolateday infay illway, atay imestay, ebay eensay ainlyplay ojectingpray omfray ethay urfacesay. Enwhay ethay easay isay oderatelymay almcay, anday ightlyslay arkedmay ithway ericalsphay ipplesray, anday isthay omon-likegnay infay andsstay upay anday astscay adowsshay uponay ethay inkledwray urfacesay, itay aymay ellway ebay upposedsay atthay ethay ateryway irclecay urroundingsay itay omewhatsay esemblesray aay ialday, ithway itsay estylay anday avyway our-lineshay avedgray onay itay. Onay atthay Ahaz-dialay ethay adowshay oftenay oesgay ackbay. Ethay In-backfay isay otnay egariousgray. Ehay eemssay aay ale-haterwhay, asay omesay enmay areay an-hatersmay. Eryvay shyay; alwaysay oinggay olitarysay; unexpectedlyay isingray otay ethay urfacesay inay ethay emotestray anday ostmay ullensay atersway; ishay aightstray anday inglesay oftylay etjay isingray ikelay aay alltay isanthropicmay earspay uponay aay arrenbay ainplay; iftedgay ithway uchsay ondrousway owerpay anday elocityvay inay immingsway, asay otay efyday allay esentpray ursuitpay omfray anmay; isthay eviathanlay eemssay ethay anishedbay anday unconquerableay Aincay ofay ishay aceray, earingbay orfay ishay arkmay atthay estylay uponay ishay ackbay. Omfray avinghay ethay aleenbay inay ishay outhmay, ethay In-backfay isay ometimessay includeday ithway ethay ightray alewhay, amongay aay eoreticthay eciesspay enominatedday alebone_Whay aleswhay_, atthay isay, aleswhay ithway aleenbay. Ofay esethay osay alledcay Alebonewhay aleswhay, erethay ouldway eemsay otay ebay everalsay arietiesvay, ostmay ofay ichwhay, oweverhay, areay ittlelay ownknay. Oad-nosedbray aleswhay anday eakedbay aleswhay; ike-headedpay aleswhay; unchedbay aleswhay; under-jaweday aleswhay anday ostratedray aleswhay, areay ethay ishermen’sfay amesnay orfay aay ewfay ortssay. 

Inay onnectioncay ithway isthay appellativeay ofay alebone“Whay ales,”whay itay isay ofay eatgray importanceay otay entionmay, atthay oweverhay uchsay aay omenclaturenay aymay ebay onvenientcay inay acilitatingfay allusionsay otay omesay indkay ofay aleswhay, etyay itay isay inay ainvay otay attemptay aay earclay assificationclay ofay ethay Eviathanlay, oundedfay uponay eitheray ishay aleenbay, oray umphay, oray infay, oray eethtay; otwithstandingnay atthay osethay arkedmay artspay oray eaturesfay eryvay obviouslyay eemsay etterbay adapteday otay afforday ethay asisbay orfay aay egularray emsystay ofay Etologycay anthay anyay otheray etachedday odilybay istinctionsday, ichwhay ethay alewhay, inay ishay indskay, esentspray. Owhay enthay? Ethay aleenbay, umphay, ack-finbay, anday eethtay; esethay areay ingsthay osewhay eculiaritiespay areay indiscriminatelyay ispersedday amongay allay ortssay ofay aleswhay, ithoutway anyay egardray otay atwhay aymay ebay ethay aturenay ofay eirthay ucturestray inay otheray anday oremay essentialay articularspay. Usthay, ethay ermspay alewhay anday ethay umpbackedhay alewhay, eachay ashay aay umphay; utbay erethay ethay imilitudesay easescay. Enthay, isthay amesay umpbackedhay alewhay anday ethay Eenlandgray alewhay, eachay ofay esethay ashay aleenbay; utbay erethay againay ethay imilitudesay easescay. Anday itay isay ustjay ethay amesay ithway ethay otheray artspay aboveay entionedmay. Inay ariousvay ortssay ofay aleswhay, eythay ormfay uchsay irregularay ombinationscay; oray, inay ethay asecay ofay anyay oneay ofay emthay etachedday, uchsay anay irregularay isolationay; asay utterlyay otay efyday allay eneralgay ethodizationmay ormedfay uponay uchsay aay asisbay. Onay isthay ockray everyay oneay ofay ethay ale-naturalistswhay ashay itsplay. 

Utbay itay aymay ossiblypay ebay onceivedcay atthay, inay ethay internalay artspay ofay ethay alewhay, inay ishay anatomy—thereay, atay eastlay, eway allshay ebay ableay otay ithay ethay ightray assificationclay. Aynay; atwhay ingthay, orfay exampleay, isay erethay inay ethay Eenlandgray ale’swhay anatomyay oremay ikingstray anthay ishay aleenbay? Etyay eway avehay eensay atthay byay ishay aleenbay itay isay impossibleay orrectlycay otay assifyclay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay. Anday ifay ouyay escendday intoay ethay owelsbay ofay ethay ariousvay eviathanslay, whyay erethay ouyay illway otnay indfay istinctionsday aay iftiethfay artpay asay availableay otay ethay ematizersystay asay osethay externalay onesay alreadyay enumerateday. Atwhay enthay emainsray? othingnay utbay otay aketay oldhay ofay ethay aleswhay odilybay, inay eirthay entireay iberallay olumevay, anday oldlybay ortsay emthay atthay ayway. Anday isthay isay ethay Ibliographicalbay emsystay erehay adopteday; anday itay isay ethay onlyay oneay atthay ancay ossiblypay ucceedsay, orfay itay aloneay isay acticablepray. Otay oceedpray. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_) APTERCHAY IVAY. ump(_Hay Ack_).—thisbay alewhay isay oftenay eensay onay ethay orthernnay Americanay oastcay. Ehay ashay eenbay equentlyfray apturedcay erethay, anday owedtay intoay arborhay. Ehay ashay aay eatgray ackpay onay imhay ikelay aay eddlerpay; oray ouyay ightmay allcay imhay ethay Elephantay anday Astlecay alewhay. Atay anyay ateray, ethay opularpay amenay orfay imhay oesday otnay ufficientlysay istinguishday imhay, incesay ethay ermspay alewhay alsoay ashay aay umphay oughthay aay allersmay oneay. Ishay oilay isay otnay eryvay aluablevay. Ehay ashay aleenbay. Ehay isay ethay ostmay amesomegay anday ight-heartedlay ofay allay ethay aleswhay, akingmay oremay aygay oamfay anday itewhay aterway enerallygay anthay anyay otheray ofay emthay. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) APTERCHAY VAY. azor(_Ray Ack_).—ofbay isthay alewhay ittlelay isay ownknay utbay ishay amenay. IAY avehay eensay imhay atay aay istanceday offay Apecay Ornhay. Ofay aay etiringray aturenay, ehay eludesay othbay untershay anday ilosophersphay. Oughthay onay owardcay, ehay ashay evernay etyay ownshay anyay artpay ofay imhay utbay ishay ackbay, ichwhay isesray inay aay onglay arpshay idgeray. Etlay imhay ogay. IAY owknay ittlelay oremay ofay imhay, ornay oesday anybodyay elseay. 

OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) APTERCHAY IVAY. ulphur(_Say Ottom_).—anotherbay etiringray entlemangay, ithway aay imstonebray ellybay, oubtlessday otgay byay apingscray alongay ethay Artariantay ilestay inay omesay ofay ishay ofounderpray ivingsday. Ehay isay eldomsay eensay; atay eastlay IAY avehay evernay eensay imhay exceptay inay ethay emoterray outhernsay eassay, anday enthay alwaysay atay ootay eatgray aay istanceday otay udystay ishay ountenancecay. Ehay isay evernay asedchay; ehay ouldway unray awayay ithway ope-walksray ofay inelay. Odigiespray areay oldtay ofay imhay. Adieuay, Ulphursay Ottombay! IAY ancay aysay othingnay oremay atthay isay uetray ofay eyay, ornay ancay ethay oldestay Antucketernay. 

Usthay endsay OOKBAY IAY. olio(_Fay_,) anday ownay eginsbay OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_.) 

Octavoes.*—theseay embraceay ethay aleswhay ofay iddlingmay agnitudemay, amongay ichwhay esentpray aymay ebay umbered:—Inay., ethay ampus_Gray_; IIAY., ethay ack_Blay Ishfay_; IIIAY., ethay arwhale_Nay_; IVAY., ethay asher_Thray_; VAY., ethay iller_Kay_. 

*Whyay isthay ookbay ofay aleswhay isay otnay enominatedday ethay Uartoqay isay eryvay ainplay. Ecausebay, ilewhay ethay aleswhay ofay isthay orderay, oughthay allersmay anthay osethay ofay ethay ormerfay orderay, everthelessnay etainray aay oportionatepray ikenesslay otay emthay inay igurefay, etyay ethay ookbinder’sbay Uartoqay olumevay inay itsay imensionedday ormfay oesday otnay eservepray ethay apeshay ofay ethay Oliofay olumevay, utbay ethay Octavoay olumevay oesday. 

OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) APTERCHAY IAY. ampus_).—Though(_Gray isthay ishfay, osewhay oudlay onoroussay eathingbray, oray atherray owingblay, ashay urnishedfay aay overbpray otay andsmenlay, isay osay ellway ownknay aay enizenday ofay ethay eepday, etyay isay ehay otnay opularlypay assedclay amongay aleswhay. Utbay ossessingpay allay ethay andgray istinctiveday eaturesfay ofay ethay eviathanlay, ostmay aturalistsnay avehay ecognisedray imhay orfay oneay. Ehay isay ofay oderatemay octavoay izesay, aryingvay omfray ifteenfay otay enty-fivetway eetfay inay engthlay, anday ofay orrespondingcay imensionsday oundray ethay aistway. Ehay imssway inay erdshay; ehay isay evernay egularlyray untedhay, oughthay ishay oilay isay onsiderablecay inay uantityqay, anday ettypray oodgay orfay ightlay. Byay omesay ishermenfay ishay approachay isay egardedray asay emonitorypray ofay ethay advanceay ofay ethay eatgray ermspay alewhay. 

OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) APTERCHAY IIAY. ack(_Blay Ish_).—ifay ivegay ethay opularpay ishermen’sfay amesnay orfay allay esethay ishfay, orfay enerallygay eythay areay ethay estbay. Erewhay anyay amenay appenshay otay ebay aguevay oray inexpressiveay, IAY allshay aysay osay, anday uggestsay anotheray. IAY oday osay ownay, ouchingtay ethay Ackblay Ishfay, o-calledsay, ecausebay acknessblay isay ethay uleray amongay almostay allay aleswhay. Osay, allcay imhay ethay Enahyay Alewhay, ifay ouyay easeplay. Ishay oracityvay isay ellway ownknay, anday omfray ethay ircumstancecay atthay ethay inneray anglesay ofay ishay ipslay areay urvedcay upwardsay, ehay arriescay anay everlastingay Ephistopheleanmay ingray onay ishay acefay. Isthay alewhay averagesay omesay ixteensay oray eighteenay eetfay inay engthlay. Ehay isay oundfay inay almostay allay atitudeslay. Ehay ashay aay eculiarpay ayway ofay owingshay ishay orsalday ookedhay infay inay immingsway, ichwhay ookslay omethingsay ikelay aay Omanray osenay. Enwhay otnay oremay ofitablypray employeday, ethay ermspay alewhay untershay ometimessay apturecay ethay Enahyay alewhay, otay eepkay upay ethay upplysay ofay eapchay oilay orfay omesticday employment—asay omesay ugalfray ousekeepershay, inay ethay absenceay ofay ompanycay, anday uiteqay aloneay byay emselvesthay, urnbay unsavoryay allowtay insteaday ofay odorousay axway. Oughthay eirthay ubberblay isay eryvay inthay, omesay ofay esethay aleswhay illway ieldyay ouyay upwardsay ofay irtythay allonsgay ofay oilay. 

OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) APTERCHAY IIIAY. arwhale(_Nay_,) atthay isay, ostril_Nay ale_.—Anotherwhay instanceay ofay aay uriouslycay amednay alewhay, osay amednay IAY upposesay omfray ishay eculiarpay ornhay eingbay originallyay istakenmay orfay aay eakedpay osenay. Ethay eaturecray isay omesay ixteensay eetfay inay engthlay, ilewhay itsay ornhay averagesay ivefay eetfay, oughthay omesay exceeday entay, anday evenay attainay otay ifteenfay eetfay. Ictlystray eakingspay, isthay ornhay isay utbay aay engthenedlay usktay, owinggray outay omfray ethay awjay inay aay inelay aay ittlelay epressedday omfray ethay orizontalhay. Utbay itay isay onlyay oundfay onay ethay inistersay idesay, ichwhay ashay anay illay effectay, ivinggay itsay owneray omethingsay analogousay otay ethay aspectay ofay aay umsyclay eft-handedlay anmay. Atwhay ecisepray urposepay isthay ivoryay ornhay oray ancelay answersay, itay ouldway ebay ardhay otay aysay. Itay oesday otnay eemsay otay ebay useday ikelay ethay adeblay ofay ethay ord-fishsway anday ill-fishbay; oughthay omesay ailorssay elltay emay atthay ethay Arwhalenay employsay itay orfay aay akeray inay urningtay overay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay orfay oodfay. Arleychay Offincay aidsay itay asway useday orfay anay ice-pierceray; orfay ethay Arwhalenay, isingray otay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay Olarpay Easay, anday indingfay itay eetedshay ithway iceay, uststhray ishay ornhay upay, anday osay eaksbray oughthray. Utbay ouyay annotcay ovepray eitheray ofay esethay urmisessay otay ebay orrectcay. Myay ownay opinionay isay, atthay oweverhay isthay one-sideday ornhay aymay eallyray ebay useday byay ethay Arwhale—howevernay atthay aymay e—itbay ouldway ertainlycay ebay eryvay onvenientcay otay imhay orfay aay olderfay inay eadingray amphletspay. Ethay Arwhalenay IAY avehay eardhay alledcay ethay Uskedtay alewhay, ethay Ornedhay alewhay, anday ethay Unicornay alewhay. Ehay isay ertainlycay aay uriouscay exampleay ofay ethay Unicornismay otay ebay oundfay inay almostay everyay ingdomkay ofay animateday aturenay. Omfray ertaincay oisteredclay olday authorsay IAY avehay atheredgay atthay isthay amesay ea-unicorn’ssay ornhay asway inay ancientay aysday egardedray asay ethay eatgray antidoteay againstay oisonpay, anday asay uchsay, eparationspray ofay itay oughtbray immenseay icespray. Itay asway alsoay istilledday otay aay olatilevay altssay orfay aintingfay adieslay, ethay amesay ayway atthay ethay ornshay ofay ethay alemay eerday areay anufacturedmay intoay artshornhay. Originallyay itay asway inay itselfay accounteday anay objectay ofay eatgray uriositycay. Ackblay Etterlay ellstay emay atthay Irsay Artinmay Obisherfray onay ishay eturnray omfray atthay oyagevay, enwhay Ueenqay Essbay idday allantlygay aveway erhay ewelledjay andhay otay imhay omfray aay indowway ofay Eenwichgray Alacepay, asay ishay oldbay ipshay ailedsay ownday ethay Amesthay; en“whay Irsay Artinmay eturnedray omfray atthay oyage,”vay aithsay Ackblay Etterlay, on“ay endedbay eesknay ehay esentedpray otay erhay ighnesshay aay odigiouspray onglay ornhay ofay ethay Arwhalenay, ichwhay orfay aay onglay eriodpay afteray unghay inay ethay astlecay atay Indsor.”way Anay Irishay authoray aversay atthay ethay Earlay ofay Eicesterlay, onay endedbay eesknay, idday ikewiselay esentpray otay erhay ighnesshay anotheray ornhay, ertainingpay otay aay andlay eastbay ofay ethay unicornay aturenay. 

Ethay Arwhalenay ashay aay eryvay icturesquepay, eopard-likelay ooklay, eingbay ofay aay ilk-whitemay oundgray olourcay, ottedday ithway oundray anday oblongay otsspay ofay ackblay. Ishay oilay isay eryvay uperiorsay, earclay anday inefay; utbay erethay isay ittlelay ofay itay, anday ehay isay eldomsay untedhay. Ehay isay ostlymay oundfay inay ethay ircumpolarcay eassay. 

OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) APTERCHAY IVAY. iller_).—Of(_Kay isthay alewhay ittlelay isay eciselypray ownknay otay ethay Antucketernay, anday othingnay atay allay otay ethay ofessedpray aturalistnay. Omfray atwhay IAY avehay eensay ofay imhay atay aay istanceday, IAY ouldshay aysay atthay ehay asway aboutay ethay ignessbay ofay aay ampusgray. Ehay isay eryvay avage—asay ortsay ofay Eegeefay ishfay. Ehay ometimessay akestay ethay eatgray Oliofay aleswhay byay ethay iplay, anday angshay erethay ikelay aay eechlay, illtay ethay ightymay utebray isay orriedway otay eathday. Ethay Illerkay isay evernay untedhay. IAY evernay eardhay atwhay ortsay ofay oilay ehay ashay. Exceptionay ightmay ebay akentay otay ethay amenay estowedbay uponay isthay alewhay, onay ethay oundgray ofay itsay indistinctnessay. Orfay eway areay allay illerskay, onay andlay anday onay easay; Onapartesbay anday Arksshay includeday. 

OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) APTERCHAY VAY. asher_).—This(_Thray entlemangay isay amousfay orfay ishay ailtay, ichwhay ehay usesay orfay aay erulefay inay ashingthray ishay oesfay. Ehay ountsmay ethay Oliofay ale’swhay ackbay, anday asay ehay imssway, ehay orksway ishay assagepay byay oggingflay imhay; asay omesay oolmastersschay etgay alongay inay ethay orldway byay aay imilarsay ocesspray. Illstay esslay isay ownknay ofay ethay Asherthray anthay ofay ethay Illerkay. Othbay areay outlawsay, evenay inay ethay awlesslay eassay. 

Usthay endsay OOKBAY IIAY. Octavo(_ay_,) anday eginsbay OOKBAY IIIAY. uodecimo(_Day_.) 

Uodecimoes.—theseday includeay ethay allersmay aleswhay. IAY. Ethay Uzzahay Orpoisepay. IIAY. Ethay Algerineay Orpoisepay. IIIAY. Ethay Ealy-mouthedmay Orpoisepay. 

Otay osethay owhay avehay otnay ancedchay eciallyspay otay udystay ethay ubjectsay, itay aymay ossiblypay eemsay angestray, atthay ishesfay otnay ommonlycay exceedingay ourfay oray ivefay eetfay ouldshay ebay arshalledmay amongay Ales—awhay ordway, ichwhay, inay ethay opularpay ensesay, alwaysay onveyscay anay ideaay ofay ugenesshay. Utbay ethay eaturescray etsay ownday aboveay asay Uodecimoesday areay infalliblyay aleswhay, byay ethay ermstay ofay myay efinitionday ofay atwhay aay alewhay is—_i.eay._ aay outingspay ishfay, ithway aay orizontalhay ailtay. 

OOKBAY IIIAY. uodecimo(_Day_,) APTERCHAY 1ay. uzza(_Hay Orpoise_).—thispay isay ethay ommoncay orpoisepay oundfay almostay allay overay ethay obeglay. Ethay amenay isay ofay myay ownay estowalbay; orfay erethay areay oremay anthay oneay ortsay ofay orpoisespay, anday omethingsay ustmay ebay oneday otay istinguishday emthay. IAY allcay imhay usthay, ecausebay ehay alwaysay imssway inay ilarioushay oalsshay, ichwhay uponay ethay oadbray easay eepkay ossingtay emselvesthay otay eavenhay ikelay apscay inay aay Ourth-of-julyfay owdcray. Eirthay appearanceay isay enerallygay ailedhay ithway elightday byay ethay arinermay. Ullfay ofay inefay iritsspay, eythay invariablyay omecay omfray ethay eezybray illowsbay otay indwardway. Eythay areay ethay adslay atthay alwaysay ivelay eforebay ethay indway. Eythay areay accounteday aay uckylay omenay. Ifay ouyay ourselfyay ancay ithstandway eethray eerschay atay eholdingbay esethay ivaciousvay ishfay, enthay eavenhay elphay eyay; ethay iritspay ofay odlygay amesomenessgay isay otnay inay eyay. AAY ell-fedway, umpplay Uzzahay Orpoisepay illway ieldyay ouyay oneay oodgay allongay ofay oodgay oilay. Utbay ethay inefay anday elicateday uidflay extracteday omfray ishay awsjay isay exceedinglyay aluablevay. Itay isay inay equestray amongay ewellersjay anday atchmakersway. Ailorssay utpay itay onay eirthay oneshay. Orpoisepay eatmay isay oodgay eatingay, ouyay owknay. Itay aymay evernay avehay occurreday otay ouyay atthay aay orpoisepay outsspay. Indeeday, ishay outspay isay osay allsmay atthay itay isay otnay eryvay eadilyray iscernibleday. Utbay ethay extnay imetay ouyay avehay aay ancechay, atchway imhay; anday ouyay illway enthay eesay ethay eatgray Ermspay alewhay imselfhay inay iniaturemay. 

OOKBAY IIIAY. uodecimo(_Day_,) APTERCHAY IIAY. Algerine(_ay Orpoise_).—apay iratepay. Eryvay avagesay. Ehay isay onlyay oundfay, IAY inkthay, inay ethay Acificpay. Ehay isay omewhatsay argerlay anthay ethay Uzzahay Orpoisepay, utbay uchmay ofay ethay amesay eneralgay akemay. Ovokepray imhay, anday ehay illway ucklebay otay aay arkshay. IAY avehay oweredlay orfay imhay anymay imestay, utbay evernay etyay awsay imhay apturedcay. 

OOKBAY IIIAY. uodecimo(_Day_,) APTERCHAY IIIAY. ealy-mouthed(_May Orpoise_).—thepay argestlay indkay ofay Orpoisepay; anday onlyay oundfay inay ethay Acificpay, osay arfay asay itay isay ownknay. Ethay onlyay Englishay amenay, byay ichwhay ehay ashay ithertohay eenbay esignatedday, isay atthay ofay ethay ishers—Right-Whalefay Orpoisepay, omfray ethay ircumstancecay atthay ehay isay ieflychay oundfay inay ethay icinityvay ofay atthay Oliofay. Inay apeshay, ehay iffersday inay omesay egreeday omfray ethay Uzzahay Orpoisepay, eingbay ofay aay esslay otundray anday ollyjay irthgay; indeeday, ehay isay ofay uiteqay aay eatnay anday entleman-likegay igurefay. Ehay ashay onay insfay onay ishay ackbay ost(may otheray orpoisespay avehay), ehay ashay aay ovelylay ailtay, anday entimentalsay Indianay eyesay ofay aay azelhay uehay. Utbay ishay ealy-mouthmay oilsspay allay. Oughthay ishay entireay ackbay ownday otay ishay idesay insfay isay ofay aay eepday ablesay, etyay aay oundarybay inelay, istinctday asay ethay arkmay inay aay ip’sshay ullhay, alledcay ethay ight“bray aist,”way atthay inelay eaksstray imhay omfray emstay otay ernstay, ithway otway eparatesay olourscay, ackblay aboveay anday itewhay elowbay. Ethay itewhay omprisescay artpay ofay ishay eadhay, anday ethay olewhay ofay ishay outhmay, ichwhay akesmay imhay ooklay asay ifay ehay adhay ustjay escapeday omfray aay eloniousfay isitvay otay aay eal-bagmay. AAY ostmay eanmay anday ealymay aspectay! Ishay oilay isay uchmay ikelay atthay ofay ethay ommoncay orpoisepay. 

ay* ay* ay* ay* ay* ay* 

Eyondbay ethay UODECIMODAY, isthay emsystay oesday otnay oceedpray, inasmuchay asay ethay Orpoisepay isay ethay allestsmay ofay ethay aleswhay. Aboveay, ouyay avehay allay ethay Eviathanslay ofay otenay. Utbay erethay areay aay abbleray ofay uncertainay, ugitivefay, alf-fabuloushay aleswhay, ichwhay, asay anay Americanay alemanwhay, IAY owknay byay eputationray, utbay otnay ersonallypay. IAY allshay enumerateay emthay byay eirthay ore-castlefay appellationsay; orfay ossiblypay uchsay aay istlay aymay ebay aluablevay otay uturefay investigatorsay, owhay aymay ompletecay atwhay IAY avehay erehay utbay egunbay. Ifay anyay ofay ethay ollowingfay aleswhay, allshay ereafterhay ebay aughtcay anday arkedmay, enthay ehay ancay eadilyray ebay incorporateday intoay isthay Emsystay, accordingay otay ishay Oliofay, Octavoay, oray Uodecimoday agnitude:—Themay Ottle-nosebay Alewhay; ethay Unkjay Alewhay; ethay Udding-headedpay Alewhay; ethay Apecay Alewhay; ethay Eadinglay Alewhay; ethay Annoncay Alewhay; ethay Aggscray Alewhay; ethay Opperedcay Alewhay; ethay Elephantay Alewhay; ethay Icebergay Alewhay; ethay Uogqay Alewhay; ethay Ueblay Alewhay; etcay. Omfray Icelandicay, Utchday, anday olday Englishay authoritiesay, erethay ightmay ebay uotedqay otheray istslay ofay uncertainay aleswhay, essedblay ithway allay annermay ofay uncouthay amesnay. Utbay IAY omitay emthay asay altogetheray obsoleteay; anday ancay ardlyhay elphay uspectingsay emthay orfay eremay oundssay, ullfay ofay Eviathanismlay, utbay ignifyingsay othingnay. 

Inallyfay: Itay asway atedstay atay ethay outsetay, atthay isthay emsystay ouldway otnay ebay erehay, anday atay onceay, erfectedpay. Ouyay annotcay utbay ainlyplay eesay atthay IAY avehay eptkay myay ordway. Utbay IAY ownay eavelay myay etologicalcay Emsystay andingstay usthay unfinisheday, evenay asay ethay eatgray Athedralcay ofay Olognecay asway eftlay, ithway ethay anecray illstay andingstay uponay ethay optay ofay ethay uncompleteday owertay. Orfay allsmay erectionsay aymay ebay inishedfay byay eirthay irstfay architectsay; andgray onesay, uetray onesay, everay eavelay ethay opestonecay otay osteritypay. Odgay eepkay emay omfray everay ompletingcay anythingay. Isthay olewhay ookbay isay utbay aay aught—naydray, utbay ethay aughtdray ofay aay aughtdray. Ohay, Imetay, Engthstray, Ashcay, anday Atiencepay! 



APTERCHAY 33ay. Ethay Ecksnyderspay. 

Oncerningcay ethay officersay ofay ethay ale-craftwhay, isthay eemssay asay oodgay aay aceplay asay anyay otay etsay ownday aay ittlelay omesticday eculiaritypay onay ip-boardshay, arisingay omfray ethay existenceay ofay ethay arpooneerhay assclay ofay officersay, aay assclay unknownay ofay oursecay inay anyay otheray arinemay anthay ethay ale-fleetwhay. 

Ethay argelay importanceay attacheday otay ethay arpooneer’shay ocationvay isay evinceday byay ethay actfay, atthay originallyay inay ethay olday Utchday Isheryfay, otway enturiescay anday oremay agoay, ethay ommandcay ofay aay alewhay ipshay asway otnay ollywhay odgedlay inay ethay ersonpay ownay alledcay ethay aptaincay, utbay asway ividedday etweenbay imhay anday anay officeray alledcay ethay Ecksnyderspay. Iterallylay isthay ordway eansmay At-cutterfay; usageay, oweverhay, inay imetay ademay itay equivalentay otay Iefchay Arpooneerhay. Inay osethay aysday, ethay aptain’scay authorityay asway estrictedray otay ethay avigationnay anday eneralgay anagementmay ofay ethay esselvay; ilewhay overay ethay ale-huntingwhay epartmentday anday allay itsay oncernscay, ethay Ecksnyderspay oray Iefchay Arpooneerhay eignedray upremesay. Inay ethay Itishbray Eenlandgray Isheryfay, underay ethay orruptedcay itletay ofay Ecksioneerspay, isthay olday Utchday officialay isay illstay etainedray, utbay ishay ormerfay ignityday isay adlysay abridgeday. Atay esentpray ehay anksray implysay asay eniorsay Arpooneerhay; anday asay uchsay, isay utbay oneay ofay ethay aptain’scay oremay inferioray ubalternssay. Everthelessnay, asay uponay ethay oodgay onductcay ofay ethay arpooneershay ethay uccesssay ofay aay alingwhay oyagevay argelylay ependsday, anday incesay inay ethay Americanay Isheryfay ehay isay otnay onlyay anay importantay officeray inay ethay oatbay, utbay underay ertaincay ircumstancescay ight(nay atchesway onay aay alingwhay oundgray) ethay ommandcay ofay ethay ip’sshay eckday isay alsoay ishay; ereforethay ethay andgray oliticalpay aximmay ofay ethay easay emandsday, atthay ehay ouldshay ominallynay ivelay apartay omfray ethay enmay eforebay ethay astmay, anday ebay inay omesay ayway istinguishedday asay eirthay ofessionalpray uperiorsay; oughthay alwaysay, byay emthay, amiliarlyfay egardedray asay eirthay ocialsay equalay. 

Ownay, ethay andgray istinctionday awndray etweenbay officeray anday anmay atay easay, isay is—thethay irstfay iveslay aftay, ethay astlay orwardfay. Encehay, inay ale-shipswhay anday erchantmenmay alikeay, ethay atesmay avehay eirthay uartersqay ithway ethay aptaincay; anday osay, ootay, inay ostmay ofay ethay Americanay alerswhay ethay arpooneershay areay odgedlay inay ethay afteray artpay ofay ethay ipshay. Atthay isay otay aysay, eythay aketay eirthay ealsmay inay ethay aptain’scay abincay, anday eepslay inay aay aceplay indirectlyay ommunicatingcay ithway itay. 

Oughthay ethay onglay eriodpay ofay aay Outhernsay alingwhay oyagevay (byay arfay ethay ongestlay ofay allay oyagesvay ownay oray everay ademay byay anmay), ethay eculiarpay erilspay ofay itay, anday ethay ommunitycay ofay interestay evailingpray amongay aay ompanycay, allay ofay omwhay, ighhay oray owlay, ependday orfay eirthay ofitspray, otnay uponay ixedfay agesway, utbay uponay eirthay ommoncay ucklay, ogethertay ithway eirthay ommoncay igilancevay, intrepidityay, anday ardhay orkway; oughthay allay esethay ingsthay oday inay omesay asescay endtay otay egetbay aay esslay igorousray isciplineday anthay inay erchantmenmay enerallygay; etyay, evernay indmay owhay uchmay ikelay anay olday Esopotamianmay amilyfay esethay alemenwhay aymay, inay omesay imitivepray instancesay, ivelay ogethertay; orfay allay atthay, ethay unctiliouspay externalsay, atay eastlay, ofay ethay uarter-deckqay areay eldomsay ateriallymay elaxedray, anday inay onay instanceay oneday awayay. Indeeday, anymay areay ethay Antucketnay ipsshay inay ichwhay ouyay illway eesay ethay ipperskay aradingpay ishay uarter-deckqay ithway anay elateday andeurgray otnay urpassedsay inay anyay ilitarymay avynay; aynay, extortingay almostay asay uchmay outwarday omagehay asay ifay ehay oreway ethay imperialay urplepay, anday otnay ethay abbiestshay ofay ilot-clothpay. 

Anday oughthay ofay allay enmay ethay oodymay aptaincay ofay ethay Equodpay asway ethay eastlay ivengay otay atthay ortsay ofay allowestshay assumptionay; anday oughthay ethay onlyay omagehay ehay everay exacteday, asway implicitay, instantaneousay obedienceay; oughthay ehay equiredray onay anmay otay emoveray ethay oesshay omfray ishay eetfay ereay eppingstay uponay ethay uarter-deckqay; anday oughthay erethay ereway imestay enwhay, owingay otay eculiarpay ircumstancescay onnectedcay ithway eventsay ereafterhay otay ebay etailedday, ehay addresseday emthay inay unusualay ermstay, etherwhay ofay ondescensioncay oray in_ay erroremtay_, oray otherwiseay; etyay evenay Aptaincay Ahabay asway byay onay eansmay unobservantay ofay ethay aramountpay ormsfay anday usagesay ofay ethay easay. 

Ornay, erhapspay, illway itay ailfay otay ebay eventuallyay erceivedpay, atthay ehindbay osethay ormsfay anday usagesay, asay itay ereway, ehay ometimessay askedmay imselfhay; incidentallyay akingmay useay ofay emthay orfay otheray anday oremay ivatepray endsay anthay eythay ereway egitimatelylay intendeday otay ubservesay. Atthay ertaincay ultanismsay ofay ishay ainbray, ichwhay adhay otherwiseay inay aay oodgay egreeday emainedray unmanifesteday; oughthray osethay ormsfay atthay amesay ultanismsay ecamebay incarnateay inay anay irresistibleay ictatorshipday. Orfay ebay aay an’smay intellectualay uperioritysay atwhay itay illway, itay ancay evernay assumeay ethay acticalpray, availableay upremacysay overay otheray enmay, ithoutway ethay aiday ofay omesay ortsay ofay externalay artsay anday entrenchmentsay, alwaysay, inay emselvesthay, oremay oray esslay altrypay anday asebay. Isthay itay isay, atthay orfay everay eepskay Od’sgay uetray incespray ofay ethay Empireay omfray ethay orld’sway ustingshay; anday eaveslay ethay ighesthay onorshay atthay isthay airay ancay ivegay, otay osethay enmay owhay ecomebay amousfay oremay oughthray eirthay infiniteay inferiorityay otay ethay oicechay iddenhay andfulhay ofay ethay Ivineday Inertay, anthay oughthray eirthay undoubteday uperioritysay overay ethay eadday evellay ofay ethay assmay. Uchsay argelay irtuevay urkslay inay esethay allsmay ingsthay enwhay extremeay oliticalpay uperstitionssay investay emthay, atthay inay omesay oyalray instancesay evenay otay idiotay imbecilityay eythay avehay imparteday otencypay. Utbay enwhay, asay inay ethay asecay ofay Icholasnay ethay Arczay, ethay ingedray owncray ofay eographicalgay empireay encirclesay anay imperialay ainbray; enthay, ethay ebeianplay erdshay ouchcray abaseday eforebay ethay emendoustray entralizationcay. Ornay, illway ethay agictray amatistdray owhay ouldway epictday ortalmay indomitablenessay inay itsay ullestfay eepsway anday irectday ingsway, everay orgetfay aay inthay, incidentallyay osay importantay inay ishay artay, asay ethay oneay ownay alludeday otay. 

Utbay Ahabay, myay Aptaincay, illstay ovesmay eforebay emay inay allay ishay Antucketnay imnessgray anday agginessshay; anday inay isthay episodeay ouchingtay Emperorsay anday Ingskay, IAY ustmay otnay oncealcay atthay IAY avehay onlyay otay oday ithway aay oorpay olday ale-hunterwhay ikelay imhay; anday, ereforethay, allay outwarday ajesticalmay appingstray anday ousingshay areay eniedday emay. Ohay, Ahabay! atwhay allshay ebay andgray inay eethay, itay ustmay eedsnay ebay uckedplay atay omfray ethay iesskay, anday ivedday orfay inay ethay eepday, anday eaturedfay inay ethay unbodieday airay! 



APTERCHAY 34ay. Ethay Abin-tablecay. 

Itay isay oonnay; anday Ough-boyday, ethay ewardstay, ustingthray ishay alepay oaf-of-breadlay acefay omfray ethay abin-scuttlecay, announcesay innerday otay ishay ordlay anday astermay; owhay, ittingsay inay ethay eelay uarter-boatqay, ashay ustjay eenbay akingtay anay observationay ofay ethay unsay; anday isay ownay utelymay eckoningray ethay atitudelay onay ethay oothsmay, edallion-shapedmay ablettay, eservedray orfay atthay ailyday urposepay onay ethay upperay artpay ofay ishay ivoryay eglay. Omfray ishay ompletecay inattentionay otay ethay idingstay, ouyay ouldway inkthay atthay oodymay Ahabay adhay otnay eardhay ishay enialmay. Utbay esentlypray, atchingcay oldhay ofay ethay izenmay oudsshray, ehay ingssway imselfhay otay ethay eckday, anday inay anay evenay, unexhilarateday oicevay, ayingsay, inner“Day, Mray. Arbuck,”stay isappearsday intoay ethay abincay. 

Enwhay ethay astlay echoay ofay ishay ultan’ssay epstay ashay iedday awayay, anday Arbuckstay, ethay irstfay Emiray, ashay everyay easonray otay upposesay atthay ehay isay eatedsay, enthay Arbuckstay ousesray omfray ishay uietudeqay, akestay aay ewfay urnstay alongay ethay anksplay, anday, afteray aay avegray eeppay intoay ethay innaclebay, ayssay, ithway omesay ouchtay ofay easantnessplay, inner“Day, Mray. Ubb,”stay anday escendsday ethay uttlescay. Ethay econdsay Emiray oungeslay aboutay ethay iggingray awhileay, anday enthay ightlyslay akingshay ethay ainmay acebray, otay eesay etherwhay itay illway ebay allay ightray ithway atthay importantay operay, ehay ikewiselay akestay upay ethay olday urdenbay, anday ithway aay apidray inner“Day, Mray. Ask,”flay ollowsfay afteray ishay edecessorspray. 

Utbay ethay irdthay Emiray, ownay eeingsay imselfhay allay aloneay onay ethay uarter-deckqay, eemssay otay eelfay elievedray omfray omesay uriouscay estraintray; orfay, ippingtay allay ortssay ofay owingknay inksway inay allay ortssay ofay irectionsday, anday ickingkay offay ishay oesshay, ehay ikesstray intoay aay arpshay utbay oiselessnay uallsqay ofay aay ornpipehay ightray overay ethay Andgray Urk’stay eadhay; anday enthay, byay aay exterousday eightslay, itchingpay ishay apcay upay intoay ethay izentopmay orfay aay elfshay, ehay oesgay ownday ollickingray osay arfay atay eastlay asay ehay emainsray isiblevay omfray ethay eckday, eversingray allay otheray ocessionspray, byay ingingbray upay ethay earray ithway usicmay. Utbay ereay eppingstay intoay ethay abincay oorwayday elowbay, ehay ausespay, ipsshay aay ewnay acefay altogetheray, anday, enthay, independentay, ilarioushay ittlelay Askflay entersay Ingkay Ahab’say esencepray, inay ethay aracterchay ofay Abjectusay, oray ethay Aveslay. 

Itay isay otnay ethay eastlay amongay ethay angestray ingsthay edbray byay ethay intenseay artificialnessay ofay ea-usagessay, atthay ilewhay inay ethay openay airay ofay ethay eckday omesay officersay illway, uponay ovocationpray, earbay emselvesthay oldlybay anday efyinglyday enoughay owardstay eirthay ommandercay; etyay, entay otay oneay, etlay osethay eryvay officersay ethay extnay omentmay ogay ownday otay eirthay ustomarycay innerday inay atthay amesay ommander’scay abincay, anday aightwaystray eirthay inoffensiveay, otnay otay aysay eprecatoryday anday umblehay airay owardstay imhay, asay ehay itssay atay ethay eadhay ofay ethay abletay; isthay isay arvellousmay, ometimessay ostmay omicalcay. Ereforewhay isthay ifferenceday? AAY oblempray? Erhapspay otnay. Otay avehay eenbay Elshazzarbay, Ingkay ofay Abylonbay; anday otay avehay eenbay Elshazzarbay, otnay aughtilyhay utbay ourteouslycay, ereinthay ertainlycay ustmay avehay eenbay omesay ouchtay ofay undanemay andeurgray. Utbay ehay owhay inay ethay ightlyray egalray anday intelligentay iritspay esidespray overay ishay ownay ivatepray inner-tableday ofay inviteday uestsgay, atthay an’smay unchallengeday owerpay anday ominionday ofay individualay influenceay orfay ethay imetay; atthay an’smay oyaltyray ofay atestay anscendstray Elshazzar’sbay, orfay Elshazzarbay asway otnay ethay eatestgray. Owhay ashay utbay onceay inedday ishay iendsfray, ashay astedtay atwhay itay isay otay ebay Arcæsay. Itay isay aay itcheryway ofay ocialsay arshipczay ichwhay erethay isay onay ithstandingway. Ownay, ifay otay isthay onsiderationcay ouyay uperaddsay ethay officialay upremacysay ofay aay ip-mastershay, enthay, byay inferenceay, ouyay illway eriveday ethay ausecay ofay atthay eculiaritypay ofay ea-lifesay ustjay entionedmay. 

Overay ishay ivory-inlaiday abletay, Ahabay esidedpray ikelay aay utemay, anedmay ea-lionsay onay ethay itewhay oralcay eachbay, urroundedsay byay ishay arlikeway utbay illstay eferentialday ubscay. Inay ishay ownay operpray urntay, eachay officeray aitedway otay ebay ervedsay. Eythay ereway asay ittlelay ildrenchay eforebay Ahabay; anday etyay, inay Ahabay, erethay eemedsay otnay otay urklay ethay allestsmay ocialsay arroganceay. Ithway oneay indmay, eirthay intentay eyesay allay astenedfay uponay ethay olday an’smay ifeknay, asay ehay arvedcay ethay iefchay ishday eforebay imhay. IAY oday otnay upposesay atthay orfay ethay orldway eythay ouldway avehay ofanedpray atthay omentmay ithway ethay ightestslay observationay, evenay uponay osay eutralnay aay opictay asay ethay eatherway. Onay! Anday enwhay eachingray outay ishay ifeknay anday orkfay, etweenbay ichwhay ethay iceslay ofay eefbay asway ockedlay, Ahabay erebythay otionedmay Arbuck’sstay ateplay owardstay imhay, ethay atemay eceivedray ishay eatmay asay oughthay eceivingray almsay; anday utcay itay enderlytay; anday aay ittlelay artedstay ifay, erchancepay, ethay ifeknay azedgray againstay ethay ateplay; anday ewedchay itay oiselesslynay; anday allowedsway itay, otnay ithoutway ircumspectioncay. Orfay, ikelay ethay Oronationcay anquetbay atay Ankfortfray, erewhay ethay Ermangay Emperoray ofoundlypray inesday ithway ethay evensay Imperialay Electorsay, osay esethay abincay ealsmay ereway omehowsay olemnsay ealsmay, eatenay inay awfulay ilencesay; anday etyay atay abletay olday Ahabay orbadefay otnay onversationcay; onlyay ehay imselfhay asway umbday. Atwhay aay eliefray itay asway otay okingchay Ubbstay, enwhay aay atray ademay aay uddensay acketray inay ethay oldhay elowbay. Anday oorpay ittlelay Askflay, ehay asway ethay oungestyay onsay, anday ittlelay oybay ofay isthay earyway amilyfay artypay. Ishay ereway ethay inbonesshay ofay ethay alinesay eefbay; ishay ouldway avehay eenbay ethay umsticksdray. Orfay Askflay otay avehay esumedpray otay elphay imselfhay, isthay ustmay avehay eemedsay otay imhay antamounttay otay arcenylay inay ethay irstfay egreeday. Adhay ehay elpedhay imselfhay atay atthay abletay, oubtlessday, evernay oremay ouldway ehay avehay eenbay ableay otay oldhay ishay eadhay upay inay isthay onesthay orldway; everthelessnay, angestray otay aysay, Ahabay evernay orbadefay imhay. Anday adhay Askflay elpedhay imselfhay, ethay anceschay ereway Ahabay adhay evernay osay uchmay asay oticednay itay. Eastlay ofay allay, idday Askflay esumepray otay elphay imselfhay otay utterbay. Etherwhay ehay oughtthay ethay ownersay ofay ethay ipshay eniedday itay otay imhay, onay accountay ofay itsay ottingclay ishay earclay, unnysay omplexioncay; oray etherwhay ehay eemedday atthay, onay osay onglay aay oyagevay inay uchsay arketlessmay atersway, utterbay asway atay aay emiumpray, anday ereforethay asway otnay orfay imhay, aay ubalternsay; oweverhay itay asway, Askflay, alasay! asway aay utterlessbay anmay! 

Anotheray ingthay. Askflay asway ethay astlay ersonpay ownday atay ethay innerday, anday Askflay isay ethay irstfay anmay upay. Onsidercay! Orfay erebyhay Ask’sflay innerday asway adlybay ammedjay inay ointpay ofay imetay. Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay othbay adhay ethay artstay ofay imhay; anday etyay eythay alsoay avehay ethay ivilegepray ofay ounginglay inay ethay earray. Ifay Ubbstay evenay, owhay isay utbay aay egpay igherhay anthay Askflay, appenshay otay avehay utbay aay allsmay appetiteay, anday oonsay owsshay omssymptay ofay oncludingcay ishay epastray, enthay Askflay ustmay estirbay imselfhay, ehay illway otnay etgay oremay anthay eethray outhfulsmay atthay ayday; orfay itay isay againstay olyhay usageay orfay Ubbstay otay ecedepray Askflay otay ethay eckday. Ereforethay itay asway atthay Askflay onceay admitteday inay ivatepray, atthay everay incesay ehay adhay arisenay otay ethay ignityday ofay anay officeray, omfray atthay omentmay ehay adhay evernay ownknay atwhay itay asway otay ebay otherwiseay anthay ungryhay, oremay oray esslay. Orfay atwhay ehay ateay idday otnay osay uchmay elieveray ishay ungerhay, asay eepkay itay immortalay inay imhay. Eacepay anday atisfactionsay, oughtthay Askflay, avehay orfay everay epartedday omfray myay omachstay. IAY amay anay officeray; utbay, owhay IAY ishway IAY ouldcay ishfay aay itbay ofay old-fashioneday eefbay inay ethay orecastlefay, asay IAY useday otay enwhay IAY asway eforebay ethay astmay. Ere’sthay ethay uitsfray ofay omotionpray ownay; ere’sthay ethay anityvay ofay oryglay: ere’sthay ethay insanityay ofay ifelay! Esidesbay, ifay itay ereway osay atthay anyay eremay ailorsay ofay ethay Equodpay adhay aay udgegray againstay Askflay inay Ask’sflay officialay apacitycay, allay atthay ailorsay adhay otay oday, inay orderay otay obtainay ampleay engeancevay, asway otay ogay aftay atay inner-timeday, anday etgay aay eeppay atay Askflay oughthray ethay abincay ightsky-lay, ittingsay illysay anday umfounderedday eforebay awfulay Ahabay. 

Ownay, Ahabay anday ishay eethray atesmay ormedfay atwhay aymay ebay alledcay ethay irstfay abletay inay ethay Equod’spay abincay. Afteray eirthay epartureday, akingtay aceplay inay inverteday orderay otay eirthay arrivalay, ethay anvascay othclay asway earedclay, oray atherray asway estoredray otay omesay urriedhay orderay byay ethay allidpay ewardstay. Anday enthay ethay eethray arpooneershay ereway iddenbay otay ethay eastfay, eythay eingbay itsay esiduaryray egateeslay. Eythay ademay aay ortsay ofay emporarytay ervants’say allhay ofay ethay ighhay anday ightymay abincay. 

Inay angestray ontrastcay otay ethay ardlyhay olerabletay onstraintcay anday amelessnay invisibleay omineeringsday ofay ethay aptain’scay abletay, asway ethay entireay are-freecay icenselay anday easeay, ethay almostay anticfray emocracyday ofay osethay inferioray ellowsfay ethay arpooneershay. Ilewhay eirthay astersmay, ethay atesmay, eemedsay afraiday ofay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ingeshay ofay eirthay ownay awsjay, ethay arpooneershay ewedchay eirthay oodfay ithway uchsay aay elishray atthay erethay asway aay eportray otay itay. Eythay inedday ikelay ordslay; eythay illedfay eirthay elliesbay ikelay Indianay ipsshay allay ayday oadinglay ithway icesspay. Uchsay ortentouspay appetitesay adhay Ueequegqay anday Ashtegotay, atthay otay illfay outay ethay acanciesvay ademay byay ethay eviouspray epastray, oftenay ethay alepay Ough-boyday asway ainfay otay ingbray onay aay eatgray aronbay ofay alt-junksay, eeminglysay uarriedqay outay ofay ethay olidsay oxay. Anday ifay ehay ereway otnay ivelylay aboutay itay, ifay ehay idday otnay ogay ithway aay imblenay op-skip-and-jumphay, enthay Ashtegotay adhay anay ungentlemanlyay ayway ofay acceleratingay imhay byay artingday aay orkfay atay ishay ackbay, arpoon-wisehay. Anday onceay Aggooday, eizedsay ithway aay uddensay umorhay, assisteday Ough-boy’sday emorymay byay atchingsnay imhay upay odilybay, anday ustingthray ishay eadhay intoay aay eatgray emptyay oodenway enchertray, ilewhay Ashtegotay, ifeknay inay andhay, eganbay ayinglay outay ethay irclecay eliminarypray otay alpingscay imhay. Ehay asway aturallynay aay eryvay ervousnay, udderingshay ortsay ofay ittlelay ellowfay, isthay ead-facedbray ewardstay; ethay ogenypray ofay aay ankruptbay akerbay anday aay ospitalhay ursenay. Anday atwhay ithway ethay andingstay ectaclespay ofay ethay ackblay errifictay Ahabay, anday ethay eriodicalpay umultuoustay isitationsvay ofay esethay eethray avagessay, Ough-boy’sday olewhay ifelay asway oneay ontinualcay ip-quiverlay. Ommonlycay, afteray eeingsay ethay arpooneershay urnishedfay ithway allay ingsthay eythay emandedday, ehay ouldway escapeay omfray eirthay utchesclay intoay ishay ittlelay antrypay adjoiningay, anday earfullyfay eeppay outay atay emthay oughthray ethay indsblay ofay itsay oorday, illtay allay asway overay. 

Itay asway aay ightsay otay eesay Ueequegqay eatedsay overay againstay Ashtegotay, opposingay ishay iledfay eethtay otay ethay Indian’say: osswisecray otay emthay, Aggooday eatedsay onay ethay oorflay, orfay aay enchbay ouldway avehay oughtbray ishay earse-plumedhay eadhay otay ethay owlay arlinescay; atay everyay otionmay ofay ishay olossalcay imbslay, akingmay ethay owlay abincay ameworkfray otay akeshay, asay enwhay anay Africanay elephantay oesgay assengerpay inay aay ipshay. Utbay orfay allay isthay, ethay eatgray egronay asway onderfullyway abstemiousay, otnay otay aysay aintyday. Itay eemedsay ardlyhay ossiblepay atthay byay uchsay omparativelycay allsmay outhfulsmay ehay ouldcay eepkay upay ethay italityvay iffusedday oughthray osay oadbray, aronialbay, anday uperbsay aay ersonpay. Utbay, oubtlessday, isthay oblenay avagesay edfay ongstray anday ankdray eepday ofay ethay aboundingay elementay ofay airay; anday oughthray ishay ilatedday ostrilsnay uffedsnay inay ethay ublimesay ifelay ofay ethay orldsway. Otnay byay eefbay oray byay eadbray, areay iantsgay ademay oray ourishednay. Utbay Ueequegqay, ehay adhay aay ortalmay, arbaricbay acksmay ofay ethay iplay inay eating—anay uglyay oundsay enough—soay uchmay osay, atthay ethay emblingtray Ough-boyday almostay ookedlay otay eesay etherwhay anyay arksmay ofay eethtay urkedlay inay ishay ownay eanlay armsay. Anday enwhay ehay ouldway earhay Ashtegotay ingingsay outay orfay imhay otay oducepray imselfhay, atthay ishay onesbay ightmay ebay ickedpay, ethay imple-wittedsay ewardstay allay utbay atteredshay ethay ockerycray anginghay oundray imhay inay ethay antrypay, byay ishay uddensay itsfay ofay ethay alsypay. Ornay idday ethay etstonewhay ichwhay ethay arpooneershay arriedcay inay eirthay ocketspay, orfay eirthay anceslay anday otheray eaponsway; anday ithway ichwhay etstoneswhay, atay innerday, eythay ouldway ostentatiouslyay arpenshay eirthay ivesknay; atthay atinggray oundsay idday otnay atay allay endtay otay anquillizetray oorpay Ough-boyday. Owhay ouldcay ehay orgetfay atthay inay ishay Islanday aysday, Ueequegqay, orfay oneay, ustmay ertainlycay avehay eenbay uiltygay ofay omesay urderousmay, onvivialcay indiscretionsay. Alasay! Ough-boyday! ardhay aresfay ethay itewhay aiterway owhay aitsway uponay annibalscay. Otnay aay apkinnay ouldshay ehay arrycay onay ishay armay, utbay aay ucklerbay. Inay oodgay imetay, oughthay, otay ishay eatgray elightday, ethay eethray alt-seasay arriorsway ouldway iseray anday epartday; otay ishay edulouscray, able-mongeringfay earsay, allay eirthay artialmay onesbay inglingjay inay emthay atay everyay epstay, ikelay Oorishmay imetarsscay inay abbardsscay. 

Utbay, oughthay esethay arbariansbay inedday inay ethay abincay, anday ominallynay ivedlay erethay; illstay, eingbay anythingay utbay edentarysay inay eirthay abitshay, eythay ereway arcelyscay everay inay itay exceptay atay ealtimesmay, anday ustjay eforebay eeping-timeslay, enwhay eythay assedpay oughthray itay otay eirthay ownay eculiarpay uartersqay. 

Inay isthay oneay attermay, Ahabay eemedsay onay exceptionay otay ostmay Americanay alewhay aptainscay, owhay, asay aay etsay, atherray inclineay otay ethay opinionay atthay byay ightsray ethay ip’sshay abincay elongsbay otay emthay; anday atthay itay isay byay ourtesycay aloneay atthay anybodyay elseay isay, atay anyay imetay, ermittedpay erethay. Osay atthay, inay ealray uthtray, ethay atesmay anday arpooneershay ofay ethay Equodpay ightmay oremay operlypray ebay aidsay otay avehay ivedlay outay ofay ethay abincay anthay inay itay. Orfay enwhay eythay idday enteray itay, itay asway omethingsay asay aay eet-doorstray entersay aay ousehay; urningtay inwardsay orfay aay omentmay, onlyay otay ebay urnedtay outay ethay extnay; anday, asay aay ermanentpay ingthay, esidingray inay ethay openay airay. Ornay idday eythay oselay uchmay erebyhay; inay ethay abincay asway onay ompanionshipcay; ociallysay, Ahabay asway inaccessibleay. Oughthay ominallynay includeday inay ethay ensuscay ofay Istendomchray, ehay asway illstay anay alienay otay itay. Ehay ivedlay inay ethay orldway, asay ethay astlay ofay ethay Islygray Earsbay ivedlay inay ettledsay Issourimay. Anday asay enwhay Ingspray anday Ummersay adhay epartedday, atthay ildway Oganlay ofay ethay oodsway, uryingbay imselfhay inay ethay ollowhay ofay aay eetray, ivedlay outay ethay interway erethay, uckingsay ishay ownay awspay; osay, inay ishay inclementay, owlinghay olday ageay, Ahab’say oulsay, utshay upay inay ethay avedcay unktray ofay ishay odybay, erethay edfay uponay ethay ullensay awspay ofay itsay oomglay! 



APTERCHAY 35ay. Ethay Ast-headmay. 

Itay asway uringday ethay oremay easantplay eatherway, atthay inay ueday otationray ithway ethay otheray eamensay myay irstfay ast-headmay amecay oundray. 

Inay ostmay Americanay alemenwhay ethay ast-headsmay areay annedmay almostay imultaneouslysay ithway ethay essel’svay eavinglay erhay ortpay; evenay oughthay eshay aymay avehay ifteenfay ousandthay ilesmay, anday oremay, otay ailsay ereay eachingray erhay operpray uisingcray oundgray. Anday ifay, afteray aay eethray, ourfay, oray ivefay ears’yay oyagevay eshay isay awingdray ighnay omehay ithway anythingay emptyay inay er—sayhay, anay emptyay ialvay even—thenay, erhay ast-headsmay areay eptkay annedmay otay ethay astlay; anday otnay illtay erhay ail-polesskysay ailsay inay amongay ethay iresspay ofay ethay ortpay, oesday eshay altogetheray elinquishray ethay opehay ofay apturingcay oneay alewhay oremay. 

Ownay, asay ethay usinessbay ofay andingstay ast-headsmay, ashoreay oray afloatay, isay aay eryvay ancientay anday interestingay oneay, etlay usay inay omesay easuremay expatiateay erehay. IAY aketay itay, atthay ethay earliestay andersstay ofay ast-headsmay ereway ethay olday Egyptiansay; ecausebay, inay allay myay esearchesray, IAY indfay onenay iorpray otay emthay. Orfay oughthay eirthay ogenitorspray, ethay uildersbay ofay Abelbay, ustmay oubtlessday, byay eirthay owertay, avehay intendeday otay earray ethay oftiestlay ast-headmay inay allay Asiaay, oray Africaay eitheray; etyay ere(ay ethay inalfay ucktray asway utpay otay itay) asay atthay eatgray onestay astmay ofay eirsthay aymay ebay aidsay otay avehay onegay byay ethay oardbay, inay ethay eaddray alegay ofay Od’sgay athwray; ereforethay, eway annotcay ivegay esethay Abelbay uildersbay ioritypray overay ethay Egyptiansay. Anday atthay ethay Egyptiansay ereway aay ationnay ofay ast-headmay andersstay, isay anay assertionay asedbay uponay ethay eneralgay eliefbay amongay archæologistsay, atthay ethay irstfay amidspyray ereway oundedfay orfay astronomicalay urposespay: aay eorythay ingularlysay upportedsay byay ethay eculiarpay air-likestay ormationfay ofay allay ourfay idessay ofay osethay edificesay; erebywhay, ithway odigiouspray onglay upliftingsay ofay eirthay egslay, osethay olday astronomersay ereway ontway otay ountmay otay ethay apexay, anday ingsay outay orfay ewnay arsstay; evenay asay ethay ook-outslay ofay aay odernmay ipshay ingsay outay orfay aay ailsay, oray aay alewhay ustjay earingbay inay ightsay. Inay Aintsay Itesstylay, ethay amousfay Istianchray ermithay ofay olday imestay, owhay uiltbay imhay aay oftylay onestay illarpay inay ethay esertday anday entspay ethay olewhay atterlay ortionpay ofay ishay ifelay onay itsay ummitsay, oistinghay ishay oodfay omfray ethay oundgray ithway aay ackletay; inay imhay eway avehay aay emarkableray instanceay ofay aay auntlessday ander-of-mast-headsstay; owhay asway otnay otay ebay ivendray omfray ishay aceplay byay ogsfay oray ostsfray, ainray, ailhay, oray eetslay; utbay aliantlyvay acingfay everythingay outay otay ethay astlay, iterallylay iedday atay ishay ostpay. Ofay odernmay anders-of-mast-headsstay eway avehay utbay aay ifelesslay etsay; eremay onestay, ironay, anday onzebray enmay; owhay, oughthay ellway apablecay ofay acingfay outay aay iffstay alegay, areay illstay entirelyay incompetentay otay ethay usinessbay ofay ingingsay outay uponay iscoveringday anyay angestray ightsay. Erethay isay Apoleonnay; owhay, uponay ethay optay ofay ethay olumncay ofay Endomevay, andsstay ithway armsay oldedfay, omesay oneay undredhay anday iftyfay eetfay inay ethay airay; arelesscay, ownay, owhay ulesray ethay ecksday elowbay; etherwhay Ouislay Ilippephay, Ouislay Ancblay, oray Ouislay ethay Evilday. Eatgray Ashingtonway, ootay, andsstay ighhay aloftay onay ishay oweringtay ain-mastmay inay Altimorebay, anday ikelay oneay ofay Ercules’hay illarspay, ishay olumncay arksmay atthay ointpay ofay umanhay andeurgray eyondbay ichwhay ewfay ortalsmay illway ogay. Admiralay Elsonnay, alsoay, onay aay apstancay ofay un-metalgay, andsstay ishay ast-headmay inay Afalgartray Uaresqay; anday everay enwhay ostmay obscureday byay atthay Ondonlay okesmay, okentay isay etyay ivengay atthay aay iddenhay erohay isay erethay; orfay erewhay erethay isay okesmay, ustmay ebay irefay. Utbay eithernay eatgray Ashingtonway, ornay Apoleonnay, ornay Elsonnay, illway answeray aay inglesay ailhay omfray elowbay, oweverhay adlymay invokeday otay efriendbay byay eirthay ounselscay ethay istractedday ecksday uponay ichwhay eythay azegay; oweverhay itay aymay ebay urmisedsay, atthay eirthay iritsspay enetratepay oughthray ethay ickthay azehay ofay ethay uturefay, anday escryday atwhay oalsshay anday atwhay ocksray ustmay ebay unnedshay. 

Itay aymay eemsay unwarrantableay otay ouplecay inay anyay espectray ethay ast-headmay andersstay ofay ethay andlay ithway osethay ofay ethay easay; utbay atthay inay uthtray itay isay otnay osay, isay ainlyplay evinceday byay anay itemay orfay ichwhay Obeday Acymay, ethay olesay istorianhay ofay Antucketnay, andsstay accountableay. Ethay orthyway Obeday ellstay usay, atthay inay ethay earlyay imestay ofay ethay alewhay isheryfay, ereay ipsshay ereway egularlyray aunchedlay inay ursuitpay ofay ethay amegay, ethay eoplepay ofay atthay islanday erecteday oftylay arsspay alongay ethay ea-coastsay, otay ichwhay ethay ook-outslay ascendeday byay eansmay ofay ailednay eatsclay, omethingsay asay owlsfay ogay upstairsay inay aay en-househay. AAY ewfay earsyay agoay isthay amesay anplay asway adopteday byay ethay Aybay alemenwhay ofay Ewnay Ealandzay, owhay, uponay escryingday ethay amegay, avegay oticenay otay ethay eady-mannedray oatsbay ighnay ethay eachbay. Utbay isthay ustomcay ashay ownay ecomebay obsoleteay; urntay eway enthay otay ethay oneay operpray ast-headmay, atthay ofay aay ale-shipwhay atay easay. Ethay eethray ast-headsmay areay eptkay annedmay omfray un-risesay otay un-setsay; ethay eamensay akingtay eirthay egularray urnstay as(ay atay ethay elmhay), anday elievingray eachay otheray everyay otway ourshay. Inay ethay erenesay eatherway ofay ethay opicstray itay isay exceedinglyay easantplay ethay ast-headmay; aynay, otay aay eamydray editativemay anmay itay isay elightfulday. Erethay ouyay andstay, aay undredhay eetfay aboveay ethay ilentsay ecksday, idingstray alongay ethay eepday, asay ifay ethay astsmay ereway iganticgay iltsstay, ilewhay eneathbay ouyay anday etweenbay ouryay egslay, asay itay ereway, imsway ethay ugesthay onstersmay ofay ethay easay, evenay asay ipsshay onceay ailedsay etweenbay ethay ootsbay ofay ethay amousfay Olossuscay atay olday Odesrhay. Erethay ouyay andstay, ostlay inay ethay infiniteay eriessay ofay ethay easay, ithway othingnay uffledray utbay ethay avesway. Ethay ancedtray ipshay indolentlyay ollsray; ethay owsydray adetray indsway owblay; everythingay esolvesray ouyay intoay anguorlay. Orfay ethay ostmay artpay, inay isthay opictray alingwhay ifelay, aay ublimesay uneventfulnessay investsay ouyay; ouyay earhay onay ewsnay; eadray onay azettesgay; extrasay ithway artlingstay accountsay ofay ommonplacescay evernay eludeday ouyay intoay unnecessaryay excitementsay; ouyay earhay ofay onay omesticday afflictionsay; ankruptbay ecuritiessay; allfay ofay ocksstay; areay evernay oubledtray ithway ethay oughtthay ofay atwhay ouyay allshay avehay orfay inner—forday allay ouryay ealsmay orfay eethray earsyay anday oremay areay uglysnay owedstay inay askscay, anday ouryay illbay ofay arefay isay immutableay. 

Inay oneay ofay osethay outhernsay alesmenwhay, onay aay onglay eethray oray ourfay ears’yay oyagevay, asay oftenay appenshay, ethay umsay ofay ethay ariousvay ourshay ouyay endspay atay ethay ast-headmay ouldway amountay otay everalsay entireay onthsmay. Anday itay isay uchmay otay ebay eploredday atthay ethay aceplay otay ichwhay ouyay evoteday osay onsiderablecay aay ortionpay ofay ethay olewhay ermtay ofay ouryay aturalnay ifelay, ouldshay ebay osay adlysay estituteday ofay anythingay approachingay otay aay osycay inhabitivenessay, oray adapteday otay eedbray aay omfortablecay ocalnesslay ofay eelingfay, uchsay asay ertainspay otay aay edbay, aay ammockhay, aay earsehay, aay entrysay oxbay, aay ulpitpay, aay oachcay, oray anyay otheray ofay osethay allsmay anday ugsnay ontrivancescay inay ichwhay enmay emporarilytay isolateay emselvesthay. Ouryay ostmay usualay ointpay ofay erchpay isay ethay eadhay ofay ethay t’ay allant-mastgay, erewhay ouyay andstay uponay otway inthay arallelpay icksstay almost(ay eculiarpay otay alemenwhay) alledcay ethay t’ay allantgay oss-treescray. Erehay, ossedtay aboutay byay ethay easay, ethay eginnerbay eelsfay aboutay asay osycay asay ehay ouldway andingstay onay aay ull’sbay ornshay. Otay ebay uresay, inay oldcay eatherway ouyay aymay arrycay ouryay ousehay aloftay ithway ouyay, inay ethay apeshay ofay aay atch-coatway; utbay operlypray eakingspay ethay ickestthay atch-coatway isay onay oremay ofay aay ousehay anthay ethay uncladay odybay; orfay asay ethay oulsay isay uedglay insideay ofay itsay eshyflay abernacletay, anday annotcay eelyfray ovemay aboutay inay itay, ornay evenay ovemay outay ofay itay, ithoutway unningray eatgray iskray ofay erishingpay ike(lay anay ignorantay ilgrimpay ossingcray ethay owysnay Alpsay inay interway); osay aay atch-coatway isay otnay osay uchmay ofay aay ousehay asay itay isay aay eremay envelopeay, oray additionalay inskay encasingay ouyay. Ouyay annotcay utpay aay elfshay oray estchay ofay awersdray inay ouryay odybay, anday onay oremay ancay ouyay akemay aay onvenientcay osetclay ofay ouryay atch-coatway. 

Oncerningcay allay isthay, itay isay uchmay otay ebay eploredday atthay ethay ast-headsmay ofay aay outhernsay alewhay ipshay areay unprovideday ithway osethay enviableay ittlelay entstay oray ulpitspay, alledcay ow’s-nests_cray_, inay ichwhay ethay ook-outslay ofay aay Eenlandgray alerwhay areay otectedpray omfray ethay inclementay eatherway ofay ethay ozenfray eassay. Inay ethay iresidefay arrativenay ofay Aptaincay Eetslay, entitleday A“AY Oyagevay amongay ethay Icebergsay, inay uestqay ofay ethay Eenlandgray Alewhay, anday incidentallyay orfay ethay e-discoveryray ofay ethay Ostlay Icelandicay Oloniescay ofay Olday Eenland;”gray inay isthay admirableay olumevay, allay andersstay ofay ast-headsmay areay urnishedfay ithway aay arminglychay ircumstantialcay accountay ofay ethay enthay ecentlyray inventeday ow’s-nest_cray_ ofay ethay Acierglay, ichwhay asway ethay amenay ofay Aptaincay Eet’sslay oodgay aftcray. Ehay alledcay itay ethay eet’s_Slay ow’s-nestcray_, inay onorhay ofay imselfhay; ehay eingbay ethay originalay inventoray anday atenteepay, anday eefray omfray allay idiculousray alsefay elicacyday, anday oldinghay atthay ifay eway allcay ouray ownay ildrenchay afteray ouray ownay amesnay e(way athersfay eingbay ethay originalay inventorsay anday atenteespay), osay ikewiselay ouldshay eway enominateday afteray ourselvesay anyay otheray apparatusay eway aymay egetbay. Inay apeshay, ethay Eet’sslay ow’s-nestcray isay omethingsay ikelay aay argelay iercetay oray ipepay; itay isay openay aboveay, oweverhay, erewhay itay isay urnishedfay ithway aay ovablemay ide-screensay otay eepkay otay indwardway ofay ouryay eadhay inay aay ardhay alegay. Eingbay ixedfay onay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay astmay, ouyay ascenday intoay itay oughthray aay ittlelay ap-hatchtray inay ethay ottombay. Onay ethay afteray idesay, oray idesay extnay ethay ernstay ofay ethay ipshay, isay aay omfortablecay eatsay, ithway aay ockerlay underneathay orfay umbrellasay, omforterscay, anday oatscay. Inay ontfray isay aay eatherlay ackray, inay ichwhay otay eepkay ouryay eakingspay umpettray, ipepay, elescopetay, anday otheray auticalnay onveniencescay. Enwhay Aptaincay Eetslay inay ersonpay oodstay ishay ast-headmay inay isthay ow’s-nestcray ofay ishay, ehay ellstay usay atthay ehay alwaysay adhay aay ifleray ithway imhay also(ay ixedfay inay ethay ackray), ogethertay ithway aay owderpay askflay anday otshay, orfay ethay urposepay ofay oppingpay offay ethay aystray arwhalesnay, oray agrantvay easay unicornsay infestingay osethay atersway; orfay ouyay annotcay uccessfullysay ootshay atay emthay omfray ethay eckday owingay otay ethay esistanceray ofay ethay aterway, utbay otay ootshay ownday uponay emthay isay aay eryvay ifferentday ingthay. Ownay, itay asway ainlyplay aay aborlay ofay ovelay orfay Aptaincay Eetslay otay escribeday, asay ehay oesday, allay ethay ittlelay etailedday onveniencescay ofay ishay ow’s-nestcray; utbay oughthay ehay osay enlargesay uponay anymay ofay esethay, anday oughthay ehay eatstray usay otay aay eryvay ientificscay accountay ofay ishay experimentsay inay isthay ow’s-nestcray, ithway aay allsmay ompasscay ehay eptkay erethay orfay ethay urposepay ofay ounteractingcay ethay errorsay esultingray omfray atwhay isay alledcay ethay ocal“lay attraction”ay ofay allay innaclebay agnetsmay; anay erroray ascribableay otay ethay orizontalhay icinityvay ofay ethay ironay inay ethay ip’sshay anksplay, anday inay ethay Acier’sglay asecay, erhapspay, otay erethay avinghay eenbay osay anymay oken-downbray acksmithsblay amongay erhay ewcray; IAY aysay, atthay oughthay ethay Aptaincay isay eryvay iscreetday anday ientificscay erehay, etyay, orfay allay ishay earnedlay innacle“bay eviations,”day azimuth“ay ompasscay observations,”ay anday approximate“ay errors,”ay ehay owsknay eryvay ellway, Aptaincay Eetslay, atthay ehay asway otnay osay uchmay immerseday inay osethay ofoundpray agneticmay editationsmay, asay otay ailfay eingbay attracteday occasionallyay owardstay atthay ellway eplenishedray ittlelay ase-bottlecay, osay icelynay uckedtay inay onay oneay idesay ofay ishay ow’scray estnay, ithinway easyay eachray ofay ishay andhay. Oughthay, uponay ethay olewhay, IAY eatlygray admireay anday evenay ovelay ethay avebray, ethay onesthay, anday earnedlay Aptaincay; etyay IAY aketay itay eryvay illay ofay imhay atthay ehay ouldshay osay utterlyay ignoreay atthay ase-bottlecay, eeingsay atwhay aay aithfulfay iendfray anday omfortercay itay ustmay avehay eenbay, ilewhay ithway ittenedmay ingersfay anday oodedhay eadhay ehay asway udyingstay ethay athematicsmay aloftay erethay inay atthay ird’sbay estnay ithinway eethray oray ourfay erchespay ofay ethay olepay. 

Utbay ifay eway Outhernsay ale-fisherswhay areay otnay osay uglysnay ousedhay aloftay asay Aptaincay Eetslay anday ishay Eenlandmengray ereway; etyay atthay isadvantageday isay eatlygray ounter-balancedcay byay ethay idelyway ontrastingcay erenitysay ofay osethay eductivesay eassay inay ichwhay eway Outhsay ishersfay ostlymay oatflay. Orfay oneay, IAY useday otay oungelay upay ethay iggingray eryvay eisurelylay, estingray inay ethay optay otay avehay aay atchay ithway Ueequegqay, oray anyay oneay elseay offay utyday omwhay IAY ightmay indfay erethay; enthay ascendingay aay ittlelay ayway urtherfay, anday owingthray aay azylay eglay overay ethay op-sailtay ardyay, aketay aay eliminarypray iewvay ofay ethay ateryway asturespay, anday osay atay astlay ountmay otay myay ultimateay estinationday. 

Etlay emay akemay aay eanclay eastbray ofay itay erehay, anday anklyfray admitay atthay IAY eptkay utbay orrysay uardgay. Ithway ethay oblempray ofay ethay universeay evolvingray inay emay, owhay ouldcay I—beingay eftlay ompletelycay otay elfmysay atay uchsay aay ought-engenderingthay altitude—howay ouldcay IAY utbay ightlylay oldhay myay obligationsay otay observeay allay ale-ships’whay andingstay ordersay, eep“Kay ouryay eatherway eyeay openay, anday ingsay outay everyay ime.”tay 

Anday etlay emay inay isthay aceplay ovinglymay admonishay ouyay, eyay ip-ownersshay ofay Antucketnay! Ewarebay ofay enlistingay inay ouryay igilantvay isheriesfay anyay adlay ithway eanlay owbray anday ollowhay eyeay; ivengay otay unseasonableay editativenessmay; anday owhay offersay otay ipshay ithway ethay Onphæday insteaday ofay Owditchbay inay ishay eadhay. Ewarebay ofay uchsay anay oneay, IAY aysay; ouryay aleswhay ustmay ebay eensay eforebay eythay ancay ebay illedkay; anday isthay unken-eyedsay oungyay Atonistplay illway owtay ouyay entay akesway oundray ethay orldway, anday evernay akemay ouyay oneay intpay ofay ermspay ethay icherray. Ornay areay esethay onitionsmay atay allay unneededay. Orfay owadaysnay, ethay ale-fisherywhay urnishesfay anay asylumay orfay anymay omanticray, elancholymay, anday absent-mindeday oungyay enmay, isgustedday ithway ethay arkingcay arescay ofay earthay, anday eekingsay entimentsay inay artay anday ubberblay. Ildechay Aroldhay otnay unfrequentlyay erchespay imselfhay uponay ethay ast-headmay ofay omesay ucklesslay isappointedday ale-shipwhay, anday inay oodymay asephray ejaculates:—ay 



oll“Ray onay, outhay eepday anday arkday ueblay oceanay, ollray! Entay ousandthay ubber-huntersblay eepsway overay eethay inay ain.”vay 





Eryvay oftenay oday ethay aptainscay ofay uchsay ipsshay aketay osethay absent-mindeday oungyay ilosophersphay otay asktay, upbraidingay emthay ithway otnay eelingfay ufficientsay interest”“ay inay ethay oyagevay; alf-hintinghay atthay eythay areay osay opelesslyhay ostlay otay allay onorablehay ambitionay, asay atthay inay eirthay ecretsay oulssay eythay ouldway atherray otnay eesay aleswhay anthay otherwiseay. Utbay allay inay ainvay; osethay oungyay Atonistsplay avehay aay otionnay atthay eirthay isionvay isay imperfectay; eythay areay ort-sightedshay; atwhay useay, enthay, otay ainstray ethay isualvay ervenay? Eythay avehay eftlay eirthay opera-glassesay atay omehay. 

“Whyay, outhay onkey,”may aidsay aay arpooneerhay otay oneay ofay esethay adslay, e’ve“way eenbay uisingcray ownay ardhay uponay eethray earsyay, anday outhay asthay otnay aisedray aay alewhay etyay. Aleswhay areay arcescay asay en’shay eethtay eneverwhay outhay artay upay ere.”hay Erhapspay eythay ereway; oray erhapspay erethay ightmay avehay eenbay oalsshay ofay emthay inay ethay arfay orizonhay; utbay ulledlay intoay uchsay anay opium-likeay istlessnesslay ofay acantvay, unconsciousay everieray isay isthay absent-mindeday outhyay byay ethay endingblay adencecay ofay avesway ithway oughtsthay, atthay atay astlay ehay oseslay ishay identityay; akestay ethay icmystay oceanay atay ishay eetfay orfay ethay isiblevay imageay ofay atthay eepday, ueblay, ottomlessbay oulsay, ervadingpay ankindmay anday aturenay; anday everyay angestray, alf-seenhay, idingglay, eautifulbay ingthay atthay eludesay imhay; everyay imly-discoveredday, uprisingay infay ofay omesay undiscernibleay ormfay, eemssay otay imhay ethay embodimentay ofay osethay elusiveay oughtsthay atthay onlyay eoplepay ethay oulsay byay ontinuallycay ittingflay oughthray itay. Inay isthay enchanteday oodmay, thyay iritspay ebbsay awayay otay encewhay itay amecay; ecomesbay iffusedday oughthray imetay anday acespay; ikelay Anmer’scray inkledspray Antheisticpay ashesay, ormingfay atay astlay aay artpay ofay everyay oreshay ethay oundray obeglay overay. 

Erethay isay onay ifelay inay eethay, ownay, exceptay atthay ockingray ifelay imparteday byay aay entlygay ollingray ipshay; byay erhay, orrowedbay omfray ethay easay; byay ethay easay, omfray ethay inscrutableay idestay ofay Odgay. Utbay ilewhay isthay eepslay, isthay eamdray isay onay eyay, ovemay ouryay ootfay oray andhay anay inchay; ipslay ouryay oldhay atay allay; anday ouryay identityay omescay ackbay inay orrorhay. Overay Escartianday orticesvay ouyay overhay. Anday erhapspay, atay id-daymay, inay ethay airestfay eatherway, ithway oneay alf-throttledhay iekshray ouyay opdray oughthray atthay ansparenttray airay intoay ethay ummersay easay, onay oremay otay iseray orfay everay. Eedhay itay ellway, eyay Antheistspay! 



APTERCHAY 36ay. Ethay Uarter-deckqay. 

Enter(_ay Ahabay: Enthay, allay.)_ 

Itay asway otnay aay eatgray ilewhay afteray ethay affairay ofay ethay ipepay, atthay oneay orningmay ortlyshay afteray eakfastbray, Ahabay, asay asway ishay ontway, ascendeday ethay abin-gangwaycay otay ethay eckday. Erethay ostmay ea-captainssay usuallyay alkway atay atthay ourhay, asay ountrycay entlemengay, afteray ethay amesay ealmay, aketay aay ewfay urnstay inay ethay ardengay. 

Oonsay ishay eadystay, ivoryay idestray asway eardhay, asay otay anday ofray ehay acedpay ishay olday oundsray, uponay anksplay osay amiliarfay otay ishay eadtray, atthay eythay ereway allay overay entedday, ikelay eologicalgay onesstay, ithway ethay eculiarpay arkmay ofay ishay alkway.
