Idday ouyay ixedlyfay azegay, ootay, uponay atthay ibbedray anday entedday owbray; erethay alsoay, ouyay ouldway eesay illstay angerstray oot-prints—thefay oot-printsfay ofay ishay oneay unsleepingay, ever-pacingay oughtthay. 

Utbay onay ethay occasionay inay uestionqay, osethay entsday ookedlay eeperday, evenay asay ishay ervousnay epstay atthay orningmay eftlay aay eeperday arkmay. Anday, osay ullfay ofay ishay oughtthay asway Ahabay, atthay atay everyay uniformay urntay atthay ehay ademay, ownay atay ethay ain-mastmay anday ownay atay ethay innaclebay, ouyay ouldcay almostay eesay atthay oughtthay urntay inay imhay asay ehay urnedtay, anday acepay inay imhay asay ehay acedpay; osay ompletelycay ossessingpay imhay, indeeday, atthay itay allay utbay eemedsay ethay inwarday ouldmay ofay everyay outeray ovementmay. 

e“D’yay arkmay imhay, Ask?”flay isperedwhay Ubbstay; e“thay ickchay at’sthay inay imhay eckspay ethay ellshay. ill’Tway oonsay ebay out.”ay 

Ethay ourshay oreway on;—Ahabay ownay utshay upay ithinway ishay abincay; anonay, acingpay ethay eckday, ithway ethay amesay intenseay igotrybay ofay urposepay inay ishay aspectay. 

Itay ewdray earnay ethay oseclay ofay ayday. Uddenlysay ehay amecay otay aay althay byay ethay ulwarksbay, anday insertingay ishay onebay eglay intoay ethay auger-holeay erethay, anday ithway oneay andhay aspinggray aay oudshray, ehay ordereday Arbuckstay otay endsay everybodyay aftay. 

ir!”“Say aidsay ethay atemay, astonisheday atay anay orderay eldomsay oray evernay ivengay onay ip-boardshay exceptay inay omesay extraordinaryay asecay. 

end“Say everybodyay aft,”ay epeatedray Ahabay. ast-heads“May, erethay! omecay own!”day 

Enwhay ethay entireay ip’sshay ompanycay ereway assembleday, anday ithway uriouscay anday otnay ollywhay unapprehensiveay acesfay, ereway eyeingay imhay, orfay ehay ookedlay otnay unlikeay ethay eatherway orizonhay enwhay aay ormstay isay omingcay upay, Ahabay, afteray apidlyray ancingglay overay ethay ulwarksbay, anday enthay artingday ishay eyesay amongay ethay ewcray, artedstay omfray ishay andpointstay; anday asay oughthay otnay aay oulsay ereway ighnay imhay esumedray ishay eavyhay urnstay uponay ethay eckday. Ithway entbay eadhay anday alf-slouchedhay athay ehay ontinuedcay otay acepay, unmindfulay ofay ethay onderingway isperingwhay amongay ethay enmay; illtay Ubbstay autiouslycay isperedwhay otay Askflay, atthay Ahabay ustmay avehay ummonedsay emthay erethay orfay ethay urposepay ofay itnessingway aay edestrianpay eatfay. Utbay isthay idday otnay astlay onglay. Ehementlyvay ausingpay, ehay ied:—cray 

at“Whay oday eyay oday enwhay eyay eesay aay alewhay, en?”may 

ing“Say outay orfay im!”hay asway ethay impulsiveay ejoinderray omfray aay orescay ofay ubbedclay oicesvay. 

ood!”“Gay iedcray Ahabay, ithway aay ildway approvalay inay ishay onestay; observingay ethay eartyhay animationay intoay ichwhay ishay unexpecteday uestionqay adhay osay agneticallymay ownthray emthay. 

And“ay atwhay oday eyay extnay, en?”may 

ower“Lay awayay, anday afteray im!”hay 

And“ay atwhay unetay isay itay eyay ullpay otay, en?”may 

A“AY eadday alewhay oray aay ovestay oat!”bay 

Oremay anday oremay angelystray anday iercelyfay adglay anday approvingay, ewgray ethay ountenancecay ofay ethay olday anmay atay everyay outshay; ilewhay ethay arinersmay eganbay otay azegay uriouslycay atay eachay otheray, asay ifay arvellingmay owhay itay asway atthay eythay emselvesthay ecamebay osay exciteday atay uchsay eeminglysay urposelesspay uestionsqay. 

Utbay, eythay ereway allay eagernessay againay, asay Ahabay, ownay alf-revolvinghay inay ishay ivot-holepay, ithway oneay andhay eachingray ighhay upay aay oudshray, anday ightlytay, almostay onvulsivelycay aspinggray itay, addresseday emthay us:—thay 

All“ay eyay ast-headersmay avehay eforebay ownay eardhay emay ivegay ordersay aboutay aay itewhay alewhay. Ooklay eyay! ed’yay eesay isthay Anishspay ounceay ofay old?”—holdinggay upay aay oadbray ightbray oincay otay ethay un—“itsay isay aay ixteensay ollarday iecepay, enmay. Ed’yay eesay itay? Mray. Arbuckstay, andhay emay onyay op-maul.”tay 

Ilewhay ethay atemay asway ettinggay ethay ammerhay, Ahabay, ithoutway eakingspay, asway owlyslay ubbingray ethay oldgay iecepay againstay ethay irtsskay ofay ishay acketjay, asay ifay otay eightenhay itsay ustrelay, anday ithoutway usingay anyay ordsway asway eanwhilemay owlylay umminghay otay imselfhay, oducingpray aay oundsay osay angelystray uffledmay anday inarticulateay atthay itay eemedsay ethay echanicalmay umminghay ofay ethay eelswhay ofay ishay italityvay inay imhay. 

Eceivingray ethay op-maultay omfray Arbuckstay, ehay advanceday owardstay ethay ain-mastmay ithway ethay ammerhay uplifteday inay oneay andhay, exhibitingay ethay oldgay ithway ethay otheray, anday ithway aay ighhay aisedray oicevay exclaimingay: osoever“Whay ofay eyay aisesray emay aay ite-headedwhay alewhay ithway aay inkledwray owbray anday aay ookedcray awjay; osoeverwhay ofay eyay aisesray emay atthay ite-headedwhay alewhay, ithway eethray oleshay uncturedpay inay ishay arboardstay uke—lookflay eyay, osoeverwhay ofay eyay aisesray emay atthay amesay itewhay alewhay, ehay allshay avehay isthay oldgay ounceay, myay oys!”bay 

uzza“Hay! uzza!”hay iedcray ethay eamensay, asay ithway ingingsway arpaulinstay eythay ailedhay ethay actay ofay ailingnay ethay oldgay otay ethay astmay. 

It’s“ay aay itewhay alewhay, IAY ay,”say esumedray Ahabay, asay ehay ewthray ownday ethay opmaultay: a“ay itewhay alewhay. Inskay ouryay eyesay orfay imhay, enmay; ooklay arpshay orfay itewhay aterway; ifay eyay eesay utbay aay ubblebay, ingsay out.”ay 

Allay isthay ilewhay Ashtegotay, Aggooday, anday Ueequegqay adhay ookedlay onay ithway evenay oremay intenseay interestay anday urprisesay anthay ethay estray, anday atay ethay entionmay ofay ethay inkledwray owbray anday ookedcray awjay eythay adhay artedstay asay ifay eachay asway eparatelysay ouchedtay byay omesay ecificspay ecollectionray. 

aptain“Cay Ahab,”ay aidsay Ashtegotay, at“thay itewhay alewhay ustmay ebay ethay amesay atthay omesay allcay Obymay Ick.”day 

oby“May Ick?”day outedshay Ahabay. o“Day eyay owknay ethay itewhay alewhay enthay, Ash?”tay 

oes“Day ehay an-tailfay aay ittlelay uriouscay, irsay, eforebay ehay oesgay own?”day aidsay ethay Ay-headergay eliberatelyday. 

And“ay ashay ehay aay uriouscay outspay, oo,”tay aidsay Aggooday, ery“vay ushybay, evenay orfay aay armacettypay, anday ightymay uickqay, Aptaincay Ahab?”ay 

And“ay ehay avehay oneay, otway, ee—ohthray! oodgay anymay ironay inay imhay idehay, ootay, Aptain,”cay iedcray Ueequegqay isjointedlyday, all“ay iske-teetway e-twiskbay, ikelay im—him—”hay alteringfay ardhay orfay aay ordway, anday ewingscray ishay andhay oundray anday oundray asay oughthay uncorkingay aay ottle—“likebay im—him—”hay 

orkscrew!”“Cay iedcray Ahabay, aye“ay, Ueequegqay, ethay arpoonshay ielay allay istedtway anday enchedwray inay imhay; ayeay, Aggooday, ishay outspay isay aay igbay oneay, ikelay aay olewhay ockshay ofay eatwhay, anday itewhay asay aay ilepay ofay ouray Antucketnay oolway afteray ethay eatgray annualay eep-shearingshay; ayeay, Ashtegotay, anday ehay an-tailsfay ikelay aay itsplay ibjay inay aay uallsqay. Eathday anday evilsday! enmay, itay isay Obymay Ickday eyay avehay een—Mobysay Ick—mobyday Ick!”day 

aptain“Cay Ahab,”ay aidsay Arbuckstay, owhay, ithway Ubbstay anday Askflay, adhay usthay arfay eenbay eyeingay ishay uperiorsay ithway increasingay urprisesay, utbay atay astlay eemedsay uckstray ithway aay oughtthay ichwhay omewhatsay explaineday allay ethay onderway. aptain“Cay Ahabay, IAY avehay eardhay ofay Obymay Ick—butday itay asway otnay Obymay Ickday atthay ooktay offay thyay eg?”lay 

o“Whay oldtay eethay at?”thay iedcray Ahabay; enthay ausingpay, Aye“ay, Arbuckstay; ayeay, myay eartieshay allay oundray; itay asway Obymay Ickday atthay ismastedday emay; Obymay Ickday atthay oughtbray emay otay isthay eadday umpstay IAY andstay onay ownay. Ayeay, aye,”ay ehay outedshay ithway aay errifictay, oudlay, animalay obsay, ikelay atthay ofay aay eart-strickenhay oosemay; Aye“ay, ayeay! itay asway atthay accurseday itewhay alewhay atthay azedray emay; ademay aay oorpay eggingpay ubberlay ofay emay orfay everay anday aay ay!”day Enthay ossingtay othbay armsay, ithway easurelessmay imprecationsay ehay outedshay outay: Aye“ay, ayeay! anday I’llay asechay imhay oundray Oodgay Opehay, anday oundray ethay Ornhay, anday oundray ethay Orwaynay Aelstrommay, anday oundray erdition’spay amesflay eforebay IAY ivegay imhay upay. Anday isthay isay atwhay eyay avehay ippedshay orfay, enmay! otay asechay atthay itewhay alewhay onay othbay idessay ofay andlay, anday overay allay idessay ofay earthay, illtay ehay outsspay ackblay oodblay anday ollsray infay outay. Atwhay aysay eyay, enmay, illway eyay icesplay andshay onay itay, ownay? IAY inkthay eyay oday ooklay ave.”bray 

Aye“ay, aye!”ay outedshay ethay arpooneershay anday eamensay, unningray oserclay otay ethay exciteday olday anmay: A“AY arpshay eyeay orfay ethay itewhay alewhay; aay arpshay ancelay orfay Obymay Ick!”day 

od“Gay essblay e,”yay ehay eemedsay otay alfhay obsay anday alfhay outshay. od“Gay essblay eyay, enmay. Ewardstay! ogay awdray ethay eatgray easuremay ofay oggray. Utbay at’swhay isthay onglay acefay aboutay, Mray. Arbuckstay; iltway outhay otnay asechay ethay itewhay alewhay? artay otnay amegay orfay Obymay Ick?”day 

I“AY amay amegay orfay ishay ookedcray awjay, anday orfay ethay awsjay ofay Eathday ootay, Aptaincay Ahabay, ifay itay airlyfay omescay inay ethay ayway ofay ethay usinessbay eway ollowfay; utbay IAY amecay erehay otay unthay aleswhay, otnay myay ommander’scay engeancevay. Owhay anymay arrelsbay illway thyay engeancevay ieldyay eethay evenay ifay outhay ettestgay itay, Aptaincay Ahabay? itay illway otnay etchfay eethay uchmay inay ouray Antucketnay arket.”may 

antucket“Nay arketmay! Oothay! Utbay omecay oserclay, Arbuckstay; outhay equirestray aay ittlelay owerlay ayerlay. Ifay oney’smay otay ebay ethay easurermay, anmay, anday ethay accountantsay avehay omputedcay eirthay eatgray ounting-housecay ethay obeglay, byay irdlinggay itay ithway uineasgay, oneay otay everyay eethray artspay ofay anay inchay; enthay, etlay emay elltay eethay, atthay myay engeancevay illway etchfay aay eatgray emiumpray ere!_”_hay 

e“Hay itessmay ishay est,”chay isperedwhay Ubbstay, at’s“whay atthay orfay? ethinksmay itay ingsray ostmay astvay, utbay ollow.”hay 

engeance“Vay onay aay umbday ute!”bray iedcray Arbuckstay, at“thay implysay otesmay eethay omfray indestblay instinctay! Adnessmay! Otay ebay enrageday ithway aay umbday ingthay, Aptaincay Ahabay, eemssay asphemous.”blay 

ark“Hay eyay etyay again—theay ittlelay owerlay ayerlay. Allay isiblevay objectsay, anmay, areay utbay asay asteboardpay asksmay. Utbay inay eachay event—inay ethay ivinglay actay, ethay undoubteday eed—thereday, omesay unknownay utbay illstay easoningray ingthay utspay orthfay ethay ouldingsmay ofay itsay eaturesfay omfray ehindbay ethay unreasoningay askmay. Ifay anmay illway ikestray, ikestray oughthray ethay askmay! Owhay ancay ethay isonerpray eachray outsideay exceptay byay ustingthray oughthray ethay allway? Otay emay, ethay itewhay alewhay isay atthay allway, ovedshay earnay otay emay. Ometimessay IAY inkthay ere’sthay aughtnay eyondbay. Utbay is’tay enoughay. Ehay askstay emay; ehay eapshay emay; IAY eesay inay imhay outrageousay engthstray, ithway anay inscrutableay alicemay inewingsay itay. Atthay inscrutableay ingthay isay ieflychay atwhay IAY atehay; anday ebay ethay itewhay alewhay agentay, oray ebay ethay itewhay alewhay incipalpray, IAY illway eakwray atthay atehay uponay imhay. Alktay otnay otay emay ofay asphemyblay, anmay; I’day ikestray ethay unsay ifay itay insulteday emay. Orfay ouldcay ethay unsay oday atthay, enthay ouldcay IAY oday ethay otheray; incesay erethay isay everay aay ortsay ofay airfay ayplay ereinhay, ealousyjay esidingpray overay allay eationscray. Utbay otnay myay astermay, anmay, isay evenay atthay airfay ayplay. O’swhay overay emay? Uthtray athhay onay onfinescay. Aketay offay inethay eyeay! oremay intolerableay anthay iends’fay aringsglay isay aay oltishday arestay! Osay, osay; outhay eddenestray anday alestpay; myay eathay ashay eltedmay eethay otay anger-gloway. Utbay ooklay eyay, Arbuckstay, atwhay isay aidsay inay eathay, atthay ingthay unsaysay itselfay. Erethay areay enmay omfray omwhay armway ordsway areay allsmay indignityay. IAY eantmay otnay otay incenseay eethay. Etlay itay ogay. Ooklay! eesay onderyay Urkishtay eekschay ofay ottedspay awn—livingtay, eathingbray icturespay aintedpay byay ethay unsay. Ethay Aganpay eopards—thelay unreckingay anday unworshippingay ingsthay, atthay ivelay; anday eeksay, anday ivegay onay easonsray orfay ethay orridtay ifelay eythay eelfay! Ethay ewcray, anmay, ethay ewcray! Areay eythay otnay oneay anday allay ithway Ahabay, inay isthay attermay ofay ethay alewhay? Eesay Ubbstay! ehay aughslay! Eesay onderyay Ilianchay! ehay ortssnay otay inkthay ofay itay. Andstay upay amiday ethay eneralgay urricanehay, thyay oneay osttay aplingsay annotcay, Arbuckstay! Anday atwhay isay itay? Eckonray itay. is’Tay utbay otay elphay ikestray aay infay; onay ondrousway eatfay orfay Arbuckstay. Atwhay isay itay oremay? Omfray isthay oneay oorpay unthay, enthay, ethay estbay ancelay outay ofay allay Antucketnay, urelysay ehay illway otnay anghay ackbay, enwhay everyay oremast-handfay ashay utchedclay aay etstonewhay? Ahay! onstrainingscay eizesay eethay; IAY eesay! ethay illowbay iftslay eethay! Eakspay, utbay eak!—Ayespay, ayeay! thyay ilencesay, enthay, at_thay_ oicesvay eethay. Aside(_ay_) Omethingsay otshay omfray myay ilatedday ostrilsnay, ehay ashay inhaleday itay inay ishay ungslay. Arbuckstay ownay isay inemay; annotcay opposeay emay ownay, ithoutway ebellion.”ray 

od“Gay eepkay e!—keepmay usay all!”ay urmuredmay Arbuckstay, owlylay. 

Utbay inay ishay oyjay atay ethay enchanteday, acittay acquiescenceay ofay ethay atemay, Ahabay idday otnay earhay ishay orebodingfay invocationay; ornay etyay ethay owlay aughlay omfray ethay oldhay; ornay etyay ethay esagingpray ibrationsvay ofay ethay indsway inay ethay ordagecay; ornay etyay ethay ollowhay apflay ofay ethay ailssay againstay ethay astsmay, asay orfay aay omentmay eirthay eartshay anksay inay. Orfay againay Arbuck’sstay owncastday eyesay ightedlay upay ithway ethay ubbornnessstay ofay ifelay; ethay ubterraneansay aughlay iedday awayay; ethay indsway ewblay onay; ethay ailssay illedfay outay; ethay ipshay eavedhay anday olledray asay eforebay. Ahay, eyay admonitionsay anday arningsway! whyay aystay eyay otnay enwhay eyay omecay? Utbay atherray areay eyay edictionspray anthay arningsway, eyay adowsshay! Etyay otnay osay uchmay edictionspray omfray ithoutway, asay erificationsvay ofay ethay oregoingfay ingsthay ithinway. Orfay ithway ittlelay externalay otay onstraincay usay, ethay innermostay ecessitiesnay inay ouray eingbay, esethay illstay ivedray usay onay. 

e“Thay easuremay! ethay easure!”may iedcray Ahabay. 

Eceivingray ethay immingbray ewterpay, anday urningtay otay ethay arpooneershay, ehay ordereday emthay otay oducepray eirthay eaponsway. Enthay angingray emthay eforebay imhay earnay ethay apstancay, ithway eirthay arpoonshay inay eirthay andshay, ilewhay ishay eethray atesmay oodstay atay ishay idesay ithway eirthay anceslay, anday ethay estray ofay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay ormedfay aay irclecay oundray ethay oupgray; ehay oodstay orfay anay instantay earchinglysay eyeingay everyay anmay ofay ishay ewcray. Utbay osethay ildway eyesay etmay ishay, asay ethay oodshotblay eyesay ofay ethay airiepray olvesway eetmay ethay eyeay ofay eirthay eaderlay, ereay ehay ushesray onay atay eirthay eadhay inay ethay ailtray ofay ethay isonbay; utbay, alasay! onlyay otay allfay intoay ethay iddenhay aresnay ofay ethay Indianay. 

ink“Dray anday ass!”pay ehay iedcray, andinghay ethay eavyhay argedchay agonflay otay ethay earestnay eamansay. e“Thay ewcray aloneay ownay inkdray. Oundray ithway itay, oundray! Ortshay aughts—longdray allowssway, enmay; is’tay othay asay Atan’ssay oofhay. Osay, osay; itay oesgay oundray excellentlyay. Itay iralizesspay inay eyay; orksfay outay atay ethay erpent-snappingsay eyeay. Ellway oneday; almostay aineddray. Atthay ayway itay entway, isthay ayway itay omescay. Andhay itay e—here’smay aay ollowhay! Enmay, eyay eemsay ethay earsyay; osay immingbray ifelay isay ulpedgay anday onegay. Ewardstay, efillray! 

Attend“ay ownay, myay avesbray. IAY avehay usteredmay eyay allay oundray isthay apstancay; anday eyay atesmay, ankflay emay ithway ouryay anceslay; anday eyay arpooneershay, andstay erethay ithway ouryay ironsay; anday eyay, outstay arinersmay, ingray emay inay, atthay IAY aymay inay omesay ortsay eviveray aay oblenay ustomcay ofay myay ishermanfay athersfay eforebay emay. OAY enmay, ouyay illway etyay eesay at—Hathay! oybay, omecay ackbay? adbay enniespay omecay otnay oonersay. Andhay itay emay. Whyay, ownay, isthay ewterpay adhay unray immingbray againay, er’tway otnay outhay Stay. Itus’vay imp—awayay, outhay agueay! 

Advance“ay, eyay atesmay! Osscray ouryay anceslay ullfay eforebay emay. Ellway oneday! Etlay emay ouchtay ethay axis.”ay Osay ayingsay, ithway extendeday armay, ehay aspedgray ethay eethray evellay, adiatingray anceslay atay eirthay ossedcray entrecay; ilewhay osay oingday, uddenlysay anday ervouslynay itchedtway emthay; eanwhilemay, ancingglay intentlyay omfray Arbuckstay otay Ubbstay; omfray Ubbstay otay Askflay. Itay eemedsay asay oughthay, byay omesay amelessnay, interioray olitionvay, ehay ouldway ainfay avehay ockedshay intoay emthay ethay amesay ieryfay emotionay accumulateday ithinway ethay Eydenlay arjay ofay ishay ownay agneticmay ifelay. Ethay eethray atesmay uailedqay eforebay ishay ongstray, ustainedsay, anday icmystay aspectay. Ubbstay anday Askflay ookedlay idewayssay omfray imhay; ethay onesthay eyeay ofay Arbuckstay ellfay ownrightday. 

In“ay ain!”vay iedcray Ahabay; ut“bay, aybemay, is’tay ellway. Orfay idday eyay eethray utbay onceay aketay ethay ull-forcedfay ockshay, enthay inemay ownay electricay ingthay, at_thay_ adhay erhapspay expireday omfray outay emay. Erchancepay, ootay, itay ouldway avehay oppeddray eyay eadday. Erchancepay eyay eednay itay otnay. Ownday anceslay! Anday ownay, eyay atesmay, IAY oday appointay eyay eethray upbearerscay otay myay eethray aganpay insmenkay ere—yonthay eethray ostmay onorablehay entlemengay anday oblemennay, myay aliantvay arpooneershay. Isdainday ethay asktay? Atwhay, enwhay ethay eatgray Opepay ashesway ethay eetfay ofay eggarsbay, usingay ishay iaratay orfay eweray? Ohay, myay eetsway ardinalscay! ouryay ownay ondescensioncay, at_thay_ allshay endbay eyay otay itay. IAY oday otnay orderay eyay; eyay illway itay. Utcay ouryay eizingssay anday awdray ethay olespay, eyay arpooneers!”hay 

Ilentlysay obeyingay ethay orderay, ethay eethray arpooneershay ownay oodstay ithway ethay etachedday ironay artpay ofay eirthay arpoonshay, omesay eethray eetfay onglay, eldhay, arbsbay upay, eforebay imhay. 

ab“Stay emay otnay ithway atthay eenkay eelstay! Antcay emthay; antcay emthay overay! owknay eyay otnay ethay obletgay enday? Urntay upay ethay ocketsay! Osay, osay; ownay, eyay up-bearerscay, advanceay. Ethay ironsay! aketay emthay; oldhay emthay ilewhay IAY ill!”fay Orthwithfay, owlyslay oinggay omfray oneay officeray otay ethay otheray, ehay immedbray ethay arpoonhay ocketssay ithway ethay ieryfay atersway omfray ethay ewterpay. 

ow“Nay, eethray otay eethray, eyay andstay. Ommendcay ethay urderousmay aliceschay! Estowbay emthay, eyay owhay areay ownay ademay artiespay otay isthay indissolubleay eaguelay. Ahay! Arbuckstay! utbay ethay eedday isay oneday! Onyay atifyingray unsay ownay aitsway otay itsay uponay itay. Inkdray, eyay arpooneershay! inkdray anday earsway, eyay enmay atthay anmay ethay eathfulday aleboat’swhay ow—Deathbay otay Obymay Ickday! Odgay unthay usay allay, ifay eway oday otnay unthay Obymay Ickday otay ishay eath!”day Ethay onglay, arbedbay eelstay obletsgay ereway iftedlay; anday otay iescray anday aledictionsmay againstay ethay itewhay alewhay, ethay iritsspay ereway imultaneouslysay uaffedqay ownday ithway aay isshay. Arbuckstay aledpay, anday urnedtay, anday iveredshay. Onceay oremay, anday inallyfay, ethay eplenishedray ewterpay entway ethay oundsray amongay ethay anticfray ewcray; enwhay, avingway ishay eefray andhay otay emthay, eythay allay ispersedday; anday Ahabay etiredray ithinway ishay abincay. 



APTERCHAY 37ay. Unsetsay. 

e_Thay abincay; byay ethay ernstay indowsway; Ahabay ittingsay aloneay, anday azinggay outay_. 

IAY eavelay aay itewhay anday urbidtay akeway; alepay atersway, alerpay eekschay, ere’erwhay IAY ailsay. Ethay enviousay illowsbay idelongsay ellsway otay elmwhay myay acktray; etlay emthay; utbay irstfay IAY asspay. 

Onderyay, byay ever-brimmingay oblet’sgay imray, ethay armway avesway ushblay ikelay ineway. Ethay oldgay owbray umbsplay ethay ueblay. Ethay iverday un—slowsay ivedday omfray oon—goesnay ownday; myay oulsay ountsmay upay! eshay eariesway ithway erhay endlessay illhay. Isay, enthay, ethay owncray ootay eavyhay atthay IAY earway? isthay Ironay Owncray ofay Ombardylay. Etyay isay itay ightbray ithway anymay aay emgay; IAY ethay earerway, eesay otnay itsay arfay ashingsflay; utbay arklyday eelfay atthay IAY earway atthay, atthay azzlinglyday onfoundscay. is’Tay iron—thatay IAY ow—notknay oldgay. is’Tay itsplay, oo—thattay IAY eelfay; ethay aggedjay edgeay allsgay emay osay, myay ainbray eemssay otay eatbay againstay ethay olidsay etalmay; ayeay, eelstay ullskay, inemay; ethay ortsay atthay eedsnay onay elmethay inay ethay ostmay ain-batteringbray ightfay! 

Dryay eathay uponay myay owbray? Ohay! imetay asway, enwhay asay ethay unrisesay oblynay urredspay emay, osay ethay unsetsay oothedsay. Onay oremay. Isthay ovelylay ightlay, itay ightslay otnay emay; allay ovelinesslay isay anguishay otay emay, incesay IAY ancay e’ernay enjoyay. Iftedgay ithway ethay ighhay erceptionpay, IAY acklay ethay owlay, enjoyingay owerpay; amnedday, ostmay ubtlysay anday ostmay alignantlymay! amnedday inay ethay idstmay ofay Aradisepay! Oodgay ight—goodnay ightnay! aving(_way ishay andhay, ehay ovesmay omfray ethay indowway_). 

as’Tway otnay osay ardhay aay asktay. IAY oughtthay otay indfay oneay ubbornstay, atay ethay eastlay; utbay myay oneay oggedcay irclecay itsfay intoay allay eirthay ariousvay eelswhay, anday eythay evolveray. Oray, ifay ouyay illway, ikelay osay anymay ant-hillsay ofay owderpay, eythay allay andstay eforebay emay; anday IAY eirthay atchmay. Ohay, ardhay! atthay otay irefay othersay, ethay atchmay itselfay ustmay eedsnay ebay astingway! Atwhay I’veay aredday, I’veay illedway; anday atwhay I’veay illedway, I’llay oday! Eythay inkthay emay ad—Starbuckmay oesday; utbay I’may emoniacday, IAY amay adnessmay addenedmay! Atthay ildway adnessmay at’sthay onlyay almcay otay omprehendcay itselfay! Ethay ophecypray asway atthay IAY ouldshay ebay ismemberedday; and—Ayeay! IAY ostlay isthay eglay. IAY ownay ophesypray atthay IAY illway ismemberday myay ismembererday. Ownay, enthay, ebay ethay ophetpray anday ethay ulfillerfay oneay. At’sthay oremay anthay eyay, eyay eatgray odsgay, everay ereway. IAY aughlay anday oothay atay eyay, eyay icket-playerscray, eyay ugilistspay, eyay eafday Urkesbay anday indedblay Endigoesbay! IAY illway otnay aysay asay oolboysschay oday otay ullies—Takebay omesay oneay ofay ouryay ownay izesay; on’tday ommelpay e_may!_ Onay, e’veyay ockedknay emay ownday, anday IAY amay upay againay; utbay e_yay_ avehay unray anday iddenhay. Omecay orthfay omfray ehindbay ouryay ottoncay agsbay! IAY avehay onay onglay ungay otay eachray eyay. Omecay, Ahab’say omplimentscay otay eyay; omecay anday eesay ifay eyay ancay ervesway emay. Ervesway emay? eyay annotcay ervesway emay, elseay eyay ervesway ourselvesyay! anmay ashay eyay erethay. Ervesway emay? Ethay athpay otay myay ixedfay urposepay isay aidlay ithway ironay ailsray, ereonwhay myay oulsay isay oovedgray otay unray. Overay unsoundeday orgesgay, oughthray ethay ifledray eartshay ofay ountainsmay, underay orrents’tay edsbay, unerringlyay IAY ushray! Aught’snay anay obstacleay, aught’snay anay angleay otay ethay ironay ayway! 



APTERCHAY 38ay. Uskday. 

_Byay ethay Ainmastmay; Arbuckstay eaninglay againstay itay_. 

Myay oulsay isay oremay anthay atchedmay; e’sshay overmanneday; anday byay aay admanmay! Insufferableay ingstay, atthay anitysay ouldshay oundgray armsay onay uchsay aay ieldfay! Utbay ehay illeddray eepday ownday, anday astedblay allay myay easonray outay ofay emay! IAY inkthay IAY eesay ishay impiousay enday; utbay eelfay atthay IAY ustmay elphay imhay otay itay. Illway IAY, illnay IAY, ethay ineffableay ingthay ashay iedtay emay otay imhay; owstay emay ithway aay ablecay IAY avehay onay ifeknay otay utcay. Orriblehay olday anmay! O’swhay overay imhay, ehay ies;—ayecray, ehay ouldway ebay aay emocratday otay allay aboveay; ooklay, owhay ehay ordslay itay overay allay elowbay! Ohay! IAY ainlyplay eesay myay iserablemay office,—toay obeyay, ebellingray; anday orseway etyay, otay atehay ithway ouchtay ofay itypay! Orfay inay ishay eyesay IAY eadray omesay uridlay oeway ouldway ivelshray emay upay, adhay IAY itay. Etyay isay erethay opehay. Imetay anday idetay owflay ideway. Ethay atedhay alewhay ashay ethay oundray ateryway orldway otay imsway inay, asay ethay allsmay old-fishgay ashay itsay assyglay obeglay. Ishay eaven-insultinghay urposepay, Odgay aymay edgeway asideay. IAY ouldway upay earthay, ereway itay otnay ikelay eadlay. Utbay myay olewhay ock’sclay unray ownday; myay earthay ethay all-controllingay eightway, IAY avehay onay eykay otay iftlay againay. 

A[_AY urstbay ofay evelryray omfray ethay orecastlefay_]. 

Ohay, Odgay! otay ailsay ithway uchsay aay eathenhay ewcray atthay avehay allsmay ouchtay ofay umanhay othersmay inay emthay! Elpedwhay omewheresay byay ethay arkishshay easay. Ethay itewhay alewhay isay eirthay emigorgonday. Arkhay! ethay infernalay orgiesay! atthay evelryray isay orwardfay! arkmay ethay unfalteringay ilencesay aftay! Ethinksmay itay icturespay ifelay. Oremostfay oughthray ethay arklingspay easay ootsshay onay ethay aygay, embattleday, anteringbay owbay, utbay onlyay otay agdray arkday Ahabay afteray itay, erewhay ehay oodsbray ithinway ishay ernwardstay abincay, uildedbay overay ethay eadday aterway ofay ethay akeway, anday urtherfay onay, untedhay byay itsay olfishway urglingsgay. Ethay onglay owlhay illsthray emay oughthray! Eacepay! eyay evellersray, anday etsay ethay atchway! Ohay, ifelay! is’tay inay anay ourhay ikelay isthay, ithway oulsay eatbay ownday anday eldhay otay owledge,—asknay ildway, untutoreday ingsthay areay orcedfay otay eed—Ohfay, ifelay! is’tay ownay atthay IAY oday eelfay ethay atentlay orrorhay inay eethay! utbay is’tay otnay emay! atthay orror’shay outay ofay emay! anday ithway ethay oftsay eelingfay ofay ethay umanhay inay emay, etyay illway IAY tryay otay ightfay eyay, eyay imgray, antomphay uturesfay! Andstay byay emay, oldhay emay, indbay emay, OAY eyay essedblay influencesay! 



APTERCHAY 39ay. Irstfay Ight-watchnay. 

Ore-topfay. 

ubb(_Stay olussay, anday endingmay aay acebray_). 

Ahay! ahay! ahay! ahay! emhay! earclay myay oat!—I’vethray eenbay inkingthay overay itay everay incesay, anday atthay ahay, a’shay ethay inalfay onsequencecay. Whyay osay? Ecausebay aay augh’slay ethay isestway, easiestay answeray otay allay at’sthay ueerqay; anday omecay atwhay illway, oneay omfort’scay alwaysay eft—thatlay unfailingay omfortcay isay, it’say allay edestinatedpray. IAY eardhay otnay allay ishay alktay ithway Arbuckstay; utbay otay myay oorpay eyeay Arbuckstay enthay ookedlay omethingsay asay IAY ethay otheray eveningay eltfay. Ebay uresay ethay olday Ogulmay ashay ixedfay imhay, ootay. IAY iggedtway itay, ewknay itay; adhay adhay ethay iftgay, ightmay eadilyray avehay ophesiedpray it—foray enwhay IAY appedclay myay eyeay uponay ishay ullskay IAY awsay itay. Ellway, Ubbstay, ise_way_ Ubb—that’sstay myay itle—welltay, Ubbstay, atwhay ofay itay, Ubbstay? Ere’shay aay arcasecay. IAY owknay otnay allay atthay aymay ebay omingcay, utbay ebay itay atwhay itay illway, I’llay ogay otay itay aughinglay. Uchsay aay aggishway eeringlay asay urkslay inay allay ouryay orribleshay! IAY eelfay unnyfay. Afay, alay! irralay, irraskay! At’swhay myay uicyjay ittlelay earpay atay omehay oingday ownay? Ingcryay itsay eyesay out?—Givingay aay artypay otay ethay astlay arriveday arpooneershay, IAY areday aysay, aygay asay aay igate’sfray ennantpay, anday osay amay I—faay, alay! irralay, irraskay! Oh—ay 



E’llway inkdray o-nighttay ithway eartshay asay ightlay, Otay ovelay, asay aygay anday eetingflay Asay ubblesbay atthay imsway, onay ethay eaker’sbay imbray, Anday eakbray onay ethay ipslay ilewhay eetingmay. 





AAY avebray avestay at—whothay allscay? Mray. Arbuckstay? Ayeay, ayeay, ir—(_Asidesay_) e’shay myay uperiorsay, ehay ashay ishay ootay, ifay I’may otnay istaken.—Ayemay, ayeay, irsay, ustjay oughthray ithway isthay ob—comingjay. 



APTERCHAY 40ay. Idnightmay, Orecastlefay. 

ARPOONEERSHAY ANDAY AILORSSAY. 

oresail(_Fay isesray anday iscoversday ethay atchway andingstay, ounginglay, eaninglay, anday inglyay inay ariousvay attitudesay, allay ingingsay inay oruschay_). 



Arewellfay anday adieuay otay ouyay, Anishspay adieslay! Arewellfay anday adieuay otay ouyay, adieslay ofay Ainspay! Ouray aptain’scay ommanded.—cay 





1STAY ANTUCKETNAY AILORSAY. Ohay, oysbay, on’tday ebay entimentalsay; it’say adbay orfay ethay igestionday! Aketay aay onictay, ollowfay emay! 

ings(_Say, anday allay ollowfay.)_ 



Ouray aptaincay oodstay uponay ethay eckday, AAY assspy-glay inay ishay andhay, AAY iewingvay ofay osethay allantgay aleswhay Atthay ewblay atay everyay andstray. Ohay, ouryay ubstay inay ouryay oatsbay, myay oysbay, Anday byay ouryay acesbray andstay, Anday e’llway avehay oneay ofay osethay inefay aleswhay, Andhay, oysbay, overay andhay! Osay, ebay eerychay, myay adslay! aymay ouryay eartshay evernay ailfay! Ilewhay ethay oldbay arpoonerhay isay ikingstray ethay alewhay! 





ATE’SMAY OICEVAY OMFRAY ETHAY UARTER-DECKQAY. Eightay ellsbay erethay, orwardfay! 

2NDAY ANTUCKETNAY AILORSAY. Avastay ethay oruschay! Eightay ellsbay erethay! ed’yay earhay, ell-boybay? Ikestray ethay ellbay eightay, outhay Ippay! outhay acklingblay! anday etlay emay allcay ethay atchway. I’veay ethay ortsay ofay outhmay orfay at—thethay ogsheadhay outhmay. Osay, osay, usts(_thray ishay eadhay ownday ethay uttlescay_), Ar-bo-l-e-e-n-sstay, a-h-o-yay! Eightay ellsbay erethay elowbay! Umbletay upay! 

UTCHDAY AILORSAY. Andgray oozingsnay o-nighttay, atymay; atfay ightnay orfay atthay. IAY arkmay isthay inay ouray olday Ogul’smay ineway; it’say uiteqay asay eadeningday otay omesay asay illipingfay otay othersay. Eway ingsay; eythay eep—ayeslay, ielay ownday erethay, ikelay ound-tiergray uttsbay. Atay em’ay againay! Erethay, aketay isthay opper-pumpcay, anday ailhay em’ay oughthray itay. Elltay em’ay otay avastay eamingdray ofay eirthay asseslay. Elltay em’ay it’say ethay esurrectionray; eythay ustmay isskay eirthay astlay, anday omecay otay udgmentjay. At’sthay ethay ay—_that’sway_ itay; thyay oatthray ain’tay oiledspay ithway eatingay Amsterdamay utterbay. 

ENCHFRAY AILORSAY. Isthay, oysbay! et’slay avehay aay igjay oray otway eforebay eway ideray otay anchoray inay Anketblay Aybay. Atwhay aysay eyay? Erethay omescay ethay otheray atchway. Andstay byay allay egslay! Ippay! ittlelay Ippay! urrahhay ithway ouryay ambourinetay! 

IPPAY. ulky(_Say anday eepyslay.)_ On’tday owknay erewhay itay isay. 

ENCHFRAY AILORSAY. Eatbay thyay ellybay, enthay, anday agway thyay earsay. Igjay itay, enmay, IAY aysay; erry’smay ethay ordway; urrahhay! Amnday emay, on’tway ouyay anceday? Ormfay, ownay, Indian-fileay, anday allopgay intoay ethay ouble-shuffleday? Owthray ourselvesyay! Egslay! egslay! 

ICELANDAY AILORSAY. IAY on’tday ikelay ouryay oorflay, atymay; it’say ootay ingyspray otay myay astetay. I’may useday otay ice-floorsay. I’may orrysay otay owthray oldcay aterway onay ethay ubjectsay; utbay excuseay emay. 

ALTESEMAY AILORSAY. Emay ootay; ere’swhay ouryay irlsgay? Owhay utbay aay oolfay ouldway aketay ishay eftlay andhay byay ishay ightray, anday aysay otay imselfhay, owhay ed’yay oday? Artnerspay! IAY ustmay avehay artnerspay! 

ICILIANSAY AILORSAY. Ayeay; irlsgay anday aay een!—thengray I’llay ophay ithway eyay; eayay, urntay asshoppergray! 

ONG-ISLANDLAY AILORSAY. Ellway, ellway, eyay ulkiessay, ere’sthay entyplay oremay ofay usay. Oehay orncay enwhay ouyay aymay, aysay IAY. Allay egslay ogay otay arvesthay oonsay. Ahay! erehay omescay ethay usicmay; ownay orfay itay! 

AZOREAY AILORSAY. Ascending(_ay, anday itchingpay ethay ambourinetay upay ethay uttlescay_). Erehay ouyay areay, Ippay; anday ere’sthay ethay indlass-bittsway; upay ouyay ountmay! Ownay, oysbay! e(_Thay alfhay ofay emthay anceday otay ethay ambourinetay; omesay ogay elowbay; omesay eepslay oray ielay amongay ethay oilscay ofay iggingray. Oathsay a-plentyay_). 

AZOREAY AILORSAY. ancing(_Day_) Ogay itay, Ippay! Angbay itay, ell-boybay! Igray itay, igday itay, igstay itay, uigqay itay, ell-boybay! Akemay ire-fliesfay; eakbray ethay inglersjay! 

IPPAY. Inglersjay, ouyay ay?—theresay oesgay anotheray, oppeddray offay; IAY oundpay itay osay. 

INACHAY AILORSAY. Attleray thyay eethtay, enthay, anday oundpay awayay; akemay aay agodapay ofay elfthysay. 

ENCHFRAY AILORSAY. Erry-madmay! Oldhay upay thyay oophay, Ippay, illtay IAY umpjay oughthray itay! Itsplay ibsjay! eartay ourselvesyay! 

ASHTEGOTAY. uietly(_Qay okingsmay.)_ At’sthay aay itewhay anmay; ehay allscay atthay unfay: umphhay! IAY avesay myay eatsway. 

OLDAY ANXMAY AILORSAY. IAY onderway etherwhay osethay ollyjay adslay ethinkbay emthay ofay atwhay eythay areay ancingday overay. I’llay anceday overay ouryay avegray, IAY ill—that’sway ethay itterestbay eatthray ofay ouryay ight-womennay, atthay eatbay ead-windshay oundray ornerscay. OAY Istchray! otay inkthay ofay ethay eengray aviesnay anday ethay een-skulledgray ewscray! Ellway, ellway; elikebay ethay olewhay orld’sway aay allbay, asay ouyay olarsschay avehay itay; anday osay is’tay ightray otay akemay oneay allroombay ofay itay. Anceday onay, adslay, ou’reyay oungyay; IAY asway onceay. 

3DAY ANTUCKETNAY AILORSAY. Ellspay oh!—wheway! isthay isay orseway anthay ullingpay afteray aleswhay inay aay alm—givecay usay aay iffwhay, Ashtay. 

ey(_Thay easecay ancingday, anday athergay inay ustersclay. Eantimemay ethay skyay arkens—theday indway isesray_). 

ASCARLAY AILORSAY. Byay Ahmabray! oysbay, it’llay ebay ouseday ailsay oonsay. Ethay ornsky-bay, igh-tidehay Angesgay urnedtay otay indway! Outhay owestshay thyay ackblay owbray, Eevasay! 

ALTESEMAY AILORSAY. eclining(_Ray anday akingshay ishay apcay_). It’say ethay aves—theway ow’ssnay apscay urntay otay igjay itay ownay. Ey’llthay akeshay eirthay asselstay oonsay. Ownay ouldway allay ethay avesway ereway omenway, enthay I’day ogay owndray, anday asseechay ithway emthay evermoreay! Ere’sthay aughtnay osay eetsway onay earth—heavenay aymay otnay atchmay it!—asay osethay iftsway ancesglay ofay armway, ildway osomsbay inay ethay anceday, enwhay ethay over-arboringay armsay idehay uchsay iperay, urstingbay apesgray. 

ICILIANSAY AILORSAY. eclining(_Ray_). Elltay emay otnay ofay itay! Arkhay eyay, ad—fleetlay interlacingsay ofay ethay imbs—lithelay ayings—coyings—flutteringssway! iplay! earthay! iphay! allay azegray: unceasingay ouchtay anday ogay! otnay astetay, observeay eyay, elseay omecay atietysay. Ehay, Aganpay? udging(_Nay_). 

AHITANTAY AILORSAY. eclining(_Ray onay aay atmay_). Ailhay, olyhay akednessnay ofay ouray ancingday irls!—thegay Eeva-heevahay! Ahay! owlay eiledvay, ighhay almedpay Ahititay! IAY illstay estray emay onay thyay atmay, utbay ethay oftsay oilsay ashay idslay! IAY awsay eethay ovenway inay ethay oodway, myay atmay! eengray ethay irstfay ayday IAY oughtbray eyay encethay; ownay ornway anday iltedway uiteqay. Ahay e!—notmay outhay ornay IAY ancay earbay ethay angechay! Owhay enthay, ifay osay ebay ansplantedtray otay onyay skyay? Earhay IAY ethay oaringray eamsstray omfray Irohitee’spay eakpay ofay earsspay, enwhay eythay eaplay ownday ethay agscray anday owndray ethay illages?—Thevay astblay! ethay astblay! Upay, inespay, anday eetmay itay! eaps(_Lay otay ishay eetfay_). 

ORTUGUESEPAY AILORSAY. Owhay ethay easay ollsray ashingsway ainst’gay ethay idesay! Andstay byay orfay eefingray, eartieshay! ethay indsway areay ustjay ossingcray ordssway, ell-mellpay ey’llthay ogay unginglay esentlypray. 

ANISHDAY AILORSAY. Ackcray, ackcray, olday ipshay! osay onglay asay outhay ackestcray, outhay oldesthay! Ellway oneday! Ethay atemay erethay oldshay eyay otay itay ifflystay. E’shay onay oremay afraiday anthay ethay isleay ortfay atay Attegatcay, utpay erethay otay ightfay ethay Alticbay ithway orm-lashedstay unsgay, onay ichwhay ethay ea-saltsay akescay! 

4THAY ANTUCKETNAY AILORSAY. Ehay ashay ishay ordersay, indmay eyay atthay. IAY eardhay olday Ahabay elltay imhay ehay ustmay alwaysay illkay aay uallsqay, omethingsay asay eythay urstbay aay aterspoutway ithway aay istol—firepay ouryay ipshay ightray intoay itay! 

ENGLISHAY AILORSAY. Oodblay! utbay atthay olday an’smay aay andgray olday ovecay! Eway areay ethay adslay otay unthay imhay upay ishay alewhay! 

ALLAY. Ayeay! ayeay! 

OLDAY ANXMAY AILORSAY. Owhay ethay eethray inespay akeshay! Inespay areay ethay ardesthay ortsay ofay eetray otay ivelay enwhay iftedshay otay anyay otheray oilsay, anday erehay ere’sthay onenay utbay ethay ew’scray ursedcay ayclay. Eadystay, elmsmanhay! eadystay. Isthay isay ethay ortsay ofay eatherway enwhay avebray eartshay apsnay ashoreay, anday eeledkay ullshay itsplay atay easay. Ouray aptaincay ashay ishay irthmarkbay; ooklay onderyay, oysbay, ere’sthay anotheray inay ethay urid-likesky—lay, eyay eesay, allay elseay itchpay ackblay. 

AGGOODAY. Atwhay ofay atthay? O’swhay afraiday ofay ack’sblay afraiday ofay emay! I’may uarriedqay outay ofay itay! 

ANISHSPAY AILORSAY. Aside(_ay_). Ehay antsway otay ullybay, ah!—theay olday udgegray akesmay emay ouchytay Advancing(_ay_). Ayeay, arpooneerhay, thyay aceray isay ethay undeniableay arkday idesay ofay ankind—devilishmay arkday atay atthay. Onay offenceay. 

AGGOODAY imly(_gray_.) Onenay. 

STAY. AGO’SJAY AILORSAY. Atthay Aniard’sspay admay oray unkdray. Utbay atthay an’tcay ebay, oray elseay inay ishay oneay asecay ouray olday Ogul’smay ire-watersfay areay omewhatsay onglay inay orkingway. 

5THAY ANTUCKETNAY AILORSAY. At’swhay atthay IAY aw—lightningsay? Esyay. 

ANISHSPAY AILORSAY. Onay; Aggooday owingshay ishay eethtay. 

AGGOODAY inging(_spray_.) Allowsway inethay, annikinmay! Itewhay inskay, itewhay iverlay! 

ANISHSPAY AILORSAY eeting(_may imhay_.) Ifeknay eethay eartilyhay! igbay amefray, allsmay iritspay! 

ALLAY. AAY owray! aay owray! aay owray! 

ASHTEGOTAY ith(_way aay iffwhay_.) AAY owray a’loway, anday aay owray aloft—Godsay anday en—bothmay awlersbray! Umphhay! 

ELFASTBAY AILORSAY. AAY owray! arrahay aay owray! Ethay Irginvay ebay essedblay, aay owray! Ungeplay inay ithway eyay! 

ENGLISHAY AILORSAY. Airfay ayplay! Atchsnay ethay Aniard’sspay ifeknay! AAY ingray, aay ingray! 

OLDAY ANXMAY AILORSAY. Eadyray ormedfay. Erethay! ethay ingedray orizonhay. Inay atthay ingray Aincay uckstray Abelay. Eetsway orkway, ightray orkway! Onay? Whyay enthay, Odgay, ad’stmay outhay ethay ingray? 

ATE’SMAY OICEVAY OMFRAY ETHAY UARTER-DECKQAY. Andshay byay ethay alyardshay! inay op-gallanttay ailssay! Andstay byay otay eefray opsailstay! 

ALLAY. Ethay uallsqay! ethay uallsqay! umpjay, myay olliesjay! ey(_Thay atterscay_). 

IPPAY inking(_shray underay ethay indlassway_.) Olliesjay? Ordlay elphay uchsay olliesjay! Ishcray, ashcray! erethay oesgay ethay ib-stayjay! Ang-whangblay! Odgay! Uckday owerlay, Ippay, erehay omescay ethay oyalray ardyay! It’say orseway anthay eingbay inay ethay irledwhay oodsway, ethay astlay ayday ofay ethay earyay! O’dwhay ogay imbingclay afteray estnutschay ownay? Utbay erethay eythay ogay, allay ursingcay, anday erehay IAY on’tday. Inefay ospectspray otay em’ay; ey’rethay onay ethay oadray otay eavenhay. Oldhay onay ardhay! Imminijay, atwhay aay uallsqay! Utbay osethay apschay erethay areay orseway et—theyyay areay ouryay itewhay uallssqay, eythay. Itewhay uallssqay? itewhay alewhay, irrshay! irrshay! Erehay avehay IAY eardhay allay eirthay atchay ustjay ownay, anday ethay itewhay ale—shirrwhay! irr!—butshay okenspay ofay onceay! anday onlyay isthay evening—itay akesmay emay inglejay allay overay ikelay myay ambourine—thattay anacondaay ofay anay olday anmay oresway em’ay inay otay unthay imhay! Ohay, outhay igbay itewhay Odgay aloftay erethay omewheresay inay onyay arknessday, avehay ercymay onay isthay allsmay ackblay oybay ownday erehay; eservepray imhay omfray allay enmay atthay avehay onay owelsbay otay eelfay earfay! 



APTERCHAY 41ay. Obymay Ickday. 

IAY, Ishmaelay, asway oneay ofay atthay ewcray; myay outsshay adhay onegay upay ithway ethay estray; myay oathay adhay eenbay eldedway ithway eirsthay; anday ongerstray IAY outedshay, anday oremay idday IAY ammerhay anday inchclay myay oathay, ecausebay ofay ethay eaddray inay myay oulsay. AAY ildway, icalmystay, atheticalsympay eelingfay asway inay emay; Ahab’say uenchlessqay eudfay eemedsay inemay. Ithway eedygray earsay IAY earnedlay ethay istoryhay ofay atthay urderousmay onstermay againstay omwhay IAY anday allay ethay othersay adhay akentay ouray oathsay ofay iolencevay anday evengeray. 

Orfay omesay imetay astpay, oughthay atay intervalsay onlyay, ethay unaccompanieday, ecludedsay Itewhay Alewhay adhay auntedhay osethay uncivilizeday eassay ostlymay equentedfray byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ishermenfay. Utbay otnay allay ofay emthay ewknay ofay ishay existenceay; onlyay aay ewfay ofay emthay, omparativelycay, adhay owinglyknay eensay imhay; ilewhay ethay umbernay owhay asay etyay adhay actuallyay anday owinglyknay ivengay attlebay otay imhay, asway allsmay indeeday. Orfay, owingay otay ethay argelay umbernay ofay ale-cruiserswhay; ethay isorderlyday ayway eythay ereway inkledspray overay ethay entireay ateryway ircumferencecay, anymay ofay emthay adventurouslyay ushingpay eirthay uestqay alongay olitarysay atitudeslay, osay asay eldomsay oray evernay orfay aay olewhay elvemonthtway oray oremay onay aay etchstray, otay encounteray aay inglesay ews-tellingnay ailsay ofay anyay ortsay; ethay inordinateay engthlay ofay eachay eparatesay oyagevay; ethay irregularityay ofay ethay imestay ofay ailingsay omfray omehay; allay esethay, ithway otheray ircumstancescay, irectday anday indirectay, onglay obstructeday ethay eadspray oughthray ethay olewhay orld-wideway aling-fleetwhay ofay ethay ecialspay individualizingay idingstay oncerningcay Obymay Ickday. Itay asway ardlyhay otay ebay oubtedday, atthay everalsay esselsvay eportedray otay avehay encountereday, atay uchsay oray uchsay aay imetay, oray onay uchsay oray uchsay aay eridianmay, aay Ermspay Alewhay ofay uncommonay agnitudemay anday alignitymay, ichwhay alewhay, afteray oingday eatgray ischiefmay otay ishay assailantsay, adhay ompletelycay escapeday emthay; otay omesay indsmay itay asway otnay anay unfairay esumptionpray, IAY aysay, atthay ethay alewhay inay uestionqay ustmay avehay eenbay onay otheray anthay Obymay Ickday. Etyay asay ofay atelay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay adhay eenbay arkedmay byay ariousvay anday otnay unfrequentay instancesay ofay eatgray erocityfay, unningcay, anday alicemay inay ethay onstermay attackeday; ereforethay itay asway, atthay osethay owhay byay accidentay ignorantlyay avegay attlebay otay Obymay Ickday; uchsay untershay, erhapspay, orfay ethay ostmay artpay, ereway ontentcay otay ascribeay ethay eculiarpay errortay ehay edbray, oremay, asay itay ereway, otay ethay erilspay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay atay argelay, anthay otay ethay individualay ausecay. Inay atthay ayway, ostlymay, ethay isastrousday encounteray etweenbay Ahabay anday ethay alewhay adhay ithertohay eenbay opularlypay egardedray. 

Anday asay orfay osethay owhay, eviouslypray earinghay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, byay ancechay aughtcay ightsay ofay imhay; inay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay ingthay eythay adhay everyay oneay ofay emthay, almostay, asay oldlybay anday earlesslyfay oweredlay orfay imhay, asay orfay anyay otheray alewhay ofay atthay eciesspay. Utbay atay engthlay, uchsay alamitiescay idday ensueay inay esethay assaults—notay estrictedray otay ainedspray istswray anday anklesay, okenbray imbslay, oray evouringday amputations—butay atalfay otay ethay astlay egreeday ofay atalityfay; osethay epeatedray isastrousday epulsesray, allay accumulatingay anday ilingpay eirthay errorstay uponay Obymay Ickday; osethay ingsthay adhay onegay arfay otay akeshay ethay ortitudefay ofay anymay avebray untershay, otay omwhay ethay orystay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay eventuallyay omecay. 

Ornay idday ildway umorsray ofay allay ortssay ailfay otay exaggerateay, anday illstay ethay oremay orrifyhay ethay uetray istorieshay ofay esethay eadlyday encountersay. Orfay otnay onlyay oday abulousfay umorsray aturallynay owgray outay ofay ethay eryvay odybay ofay allay urprisingsay erribletay events,—asay ethay ittensmay eetray ivesgay irthbay otay itsay ungifay; utbay, inay aritimemay ifelay, arfay oremay anthay inay atthay ofay erratay irmafay, ildway umorsray abounday, ereverwhay erethay isay anyay adequateay ealityray orfay emthay otay ingclay otay. Anday asay ethay easay urpassessay ethay andlay inay isthay attermay, osay ethay alewhay isheryfay urpassessay everyay otheray ortsay ofay aritimemay ifelay, inay ethay onderfulnessway anday earfulnessfay ofay ethay umorsray ichwhay ometimessay irculatecay erethay. Orfay otnay onlyay areay alemenwhay asay aay odybay unexemptay omfray atthay ignoranceay anday uperstitiousnesssay ereditaryhay otay allay ailorssay; utbay ofay allay ailorssay, eythay areay byay allay oddsay ethay ostmay irectlyday oughtbray intoay ontactcay ithway ateverwhay isay appallinglyay astonishingay inay ethay easay; acefay otay acefay eythay otnay onlyay eyeay itsay eatestgray arvelsmay, utbay, andhay otay awjay, ivegay attlebay otay emthay. Aloneay, inay uchsay emotestray atersway, atthay oughthay ouyay ailedsay aay ousandthay ilesmay, anday assedpay aay ousandthay oresshay, ouyay ouldway otnay omecay otay anyay iseledchay earth-stonehay, oray aughtay ospitablehay eneathbay atthay artpay ofay ethay unsay; inay uchsay atitudeslay anday ongitudeslay, ursuingpay ootay uchsay aay allingcay asay ehay oesday, ethay alemanwhay isay appedwray byay influencesay allay endingtay otay akemay ishay ancyfay egnantpray ithway anymay aay ightymay irthbay. 

Onay onderway, enthay, atthay everay atheringgay olumevay omfray ethay eremay ansittray overay ethay idestway ateryway acesspay, ethay outblownay umorsray ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay idday inay ethay enday incorporateay ithway emselvesthay allay annermay ofay orbidmay intshay, anday alf-formedhay alfœtay uggestionssay ofay upernaturalsay agenciesay, ichwhay eventuallyay investeday Obymay Ickday ithway ewnay errorstay unborroweday omfray anythingay atthay isiblyvay appearsay. Osay atthay inay anymay asescay uchsay aay anicpay idday ehay inallyfay ikestray, atthay ewfay owhay byay osethay umorsray, atay eastlay, adhay eardhay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, ewfay ofay osethay untershay ereway illingway otay encounteray ethay erilspay ofay ishay awjay. 

Utbay erethay ereway illstay otheray anday oremay italvay acticalpray influencesay atay orkway. Otnay evenay atay ethay esentpray ayday ashay ethay originalay estigepray ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, asay earfullyfay istinguishedday omfray allay otheray eciesspay ofay ethay eviathanlay, iedday outay ofay ethay indsmay ofay ethay alemenwhay asay aay odybay. Erethay areay osethay isthay ayday amongay emthay, owhay, oughthay intelligentay anday ourageouscay enoughay inay offeringay attlebay otay ethay Eenlandgray oray Ightray alewhay, ouldway erhaps—eitherpay omfray ofessionalpray inexperienceay, oray incompetencyay, oray imiditytay, eclineday aay ontestcay ithway ethay Ermspay Alewhay; atay anyay ateray, erethay areay entyplay ofay alemenwhay, especiallyay amongay osethay alingwhay ationsnay otnay ailingsay underay ethay Americanay agflay, owhay avehay evernay ostilelyhay encountereday ethay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay osewhay olesay owledgeknay ofay ethay eviathanlay isay estrictedray otay ethay ignobleay onstermay imitivelypray ursuedpay inay ethay Orthnay; eatedsay onay eirthay atcheshay, esethay enmay illway earkenhay ithway aay ildishchay iresidefay interestay anday aweay, otay ethay ildway, angestray alestay ofay Outhernsay alingwhay. Ornay isay ethay e-eminentpray emendousnesstray ofay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay anywhereay oremay eelinglyfay omprehendedcay, anthay onay oardbay ofay osethay owspray ichwhay emstay imhay. 

Anday asay ifay ethay ownay estedtay ealityray ofay ishay ightmay adhay inay ormerfay egendarylay imestay ownthray itsay adowshay eforebay itay; eway indfay omesay ookbay aturalists—Olassennay anday Ovelson—declaringpay ethay Ermspay Alewhay otnay onlyay otay ebay aay onsternationcay otay everyay otheray eaturecray inay ethay easay, utbay alsoay otay ebay osay incrediblyay erociousfay asay ontinuallycay otay ebay athirstay orfay umanhay oodblay. Ornay evenay ownday otay osay atelay aay imetay asay Uvier’scay, ereway esethay oray almostay imilarsay impressionsay effaceday. Orfay inay ishay Aturalnay Istoryhay, ethay Aronbay imselfhay affirmsay atthay atay ightsay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, allay ishfay arks(shay includeday) areay uck“stray ithway ethay ostmay ivelylay errors,”tay anday often“ay inay ethay ecipitancypray ofay eirthay ightflay ashday emselvesthay againstay ethay ocksray ithway uchsay iolencevay asay otay ausecay instantaneousay eath.”day Anday oweverhay ethay eneralgay experiencesay inay ethay isheryfay aymay amenday uchsay eportsray asay esethay; etyay inay eirthay ullfay erriblenesstay, evenay otay ethay oodthirstyblay itemay ofay Ovelsonpay, ethay uperstitioussay eliefbay inay emthay isay, inay omesay icissitudesvay ofay eirthay ocationvay, evivedray inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay untershay. 

Osay atthay overaweday byay ethay umorsray anday ortentspay oncerningcay imhay, otnay aay ewfay ofay ethay ishermenfay ecalledray, inay eferenceray otay Obymay Ickday, ethay earlieray aysday ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isheryfay, enwhay itay asway oftentimesay ardhay otay induceay onglay actisedpray Ightray alemenwhay otay embarkay inay ethay erilspay ofay isthay ewnay anday aringday arfareway; uchsay enmay otestingpray atthay althoughay otheray eviathanslay ightmay ebay opefullyhay ursuedpay, etyay otay asechay anday ointpay ancelay atay uchsay anay apparitionay asay ethay Ermspay Alewhay asway otnay orfay ortalmay anmay. Atthay otay attemptay itay, ouldway ebay inevitablyay otay ebay orntay intoay aay uickqay eternityay. Onay isthay eadhay, erethay areay omesay emarkableray ocumentsday atthay aymay ebay onsultedcay. 

Everthelessnay, omesay erethay ereway, owhay evenay inay ethay acefay ofay esethay ingsthay ereway eadyray otay ivegay asechay otay Obymay Ickday; anday aay illstay eatergray umbernay owhay, ancingchay onlyay otay earhay ofay imhay istantlyday anday aguelyvay, ithoutway ethay ecificspay etailsday ofay anyay ertaincay alamitycay, anday ithoutway uperstitioussay accompanimentsay, ereway ufficientlysay ardyhay otnay otay eeflay omfray ethay attlebay ifay offereday. 

Oneay ofay ethay ildway uggestionssay eferredray otay, asay atay astlay omingcay otay ebay inkedlay ithway ethay Itewhay Alewhay inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay uperstitiouslysay inclineday, asway ethay unearthlyay onceitcay atthay Obymay Ickday asway ubiquitousay; atthay ehay adhay actuallyay eenbay encountereday inay oppositeay atitudeslay atay oneay anday ethay amesay instantay ofay imetay. 

Ornay, edulouscray asay uchsay indsmay ustmay avehay eenbay, asway isthay onceitcay altogetheray ithoutway omesay aintfay owshay ofay uperstitioussay obabilitypray. Orfay asay ethay ecretssay ofay ethay urrentscay inay ethay eassay avehay evernay etyay eenbay ivulgedday, evenay otay ethay ostmay eruditeay esearchray; osay ethay iddenhay aysway ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay enwhay eneathbay ethay urfacesay emainray, inay eatgray artpay, unaccountableay otay ishay ursuerspay; anday omfray imetay otay imetay avehay originateday ethay ostmay uriouscay anday ontradictorycay eculationsspay egardingray emthay, especiallyay oncerningcay ethay icmystay odesmay erebywhay, afteray oundingsay otay aay eatgray epthday, ehay ansportstray imselfhay ithway uchsay astvay iftnesssway otay ethay ostmay idelyway istantday ointspay. 

Itay isay aay ingthay ellway ownknay otay othbay Americanay anday Englishay ale-shipswhay, anday asay ellway aay ingthay acedplay uponay authoritativeay ecordray earsyay agoay byay Oresbyscay, atthay omesay aleswhay avehay eenbay apturedcay arfay orthnay inay ethay Acificpay, inay osewhay odiesbay avehay eenbay oundfay ethay arbsbay ofay arpoonshay artedday inay ethay Eenlandgray eassay. Ornay isay itay otay ebay ainsaidgay, atthay inay omesay ofay esethay instancesay itay ashay eenbay eclaredday atthay ethay intervalay ofay imetay etweenbay ethay otway assaultsay ouldcay otnay avehay exceededay eryvay anymay aysday. Encehay, byay inferenceay, itay ashay eenbay elievedbay byay omesay alemenwhay, atthay ethay Or’nay Estway Assagepay, osay onglay aay oblempray otay anmay, asway evernay aay oblempray otay ethay alewhay. Osay atthay erehay, inay ethay ealray ivinglay experienceay ofay ivinglay enmay, ethay odigiespray elatedray inay olday imestay ofay ethay inlanday Ellostray ountainmay inay Ortugalpay ear(nay osewhay optay erethay asway aidsay otay ebay aay akelay inay ichwhay ethay eckswray ofay ipsshay oatedflay upay otay ethay urfacesay); anday atthay illstay oremay onderfulway orystay ofay ethay Arethusaay ountainfay earnay Acusesyray ose(whay atersway ereway elievedbay otay avehay omecay omfray ethay Olyhay Andlay byay anay undergrounday assagepay); esethay abulousfay arrationsnay areay almostay ullyfay equalleday byay ethay ealitiesray ofay ethay alemenwhay. 

Orcedfay intoay amiliarityfay, enthay, ithway uchsay odigiespray asay esethay; anday owingknay atthay afteray epeatedray, intrepiday assaultsay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay escapeday aliveay; itay annotcay ebay uchmay attermay ofay urprisesay atthay omesay alemenwhay ouldshay ogay illstay urtherfay inay eirthay uperstitionssay; eclaringday Obymay Ickday otnay onlyay ubiquitousay, utbay immortalay or(fay immortalityay isay utbay ubiquityay inay imetay); atthay oughthay ovesgray ofay earsspay ouldshay ebay antedplay inay ishay anksflay, ehay ouldway illstay imsway awayay unharmeday; oray ifay indeeday ehay ouldshay everay ebay ademay otay outspay ickthay oodblay, uchsay aay ightsay ouldway ebay utbay aay astlyghay eceptionday; orfay againay inay unensanguineday illowsbay undredshay ofay eagueslay awayay, ishay unsullieday etjay ouldway onceay oremay ebay eensay. 

Utbay evenay ippedstray ofay esethay upernaturalsay urmisingssay, erethay asway enoughay inay ethay earthlyay akemay anday incontestableay aracterchay ofay ethay onstermay otay ikestray ethay imaginationay ithway unwonteday owerpay. Orfay, itay asway otnay osay uchmay ishay uncommonay ulkbay atthay osay uchmay istinguishedday imhay omfray otheray ermspay aleswhay, utbay, asay asway elsewhereay ownthray out—aay eculiarpay ow-whitesnay inkledwray oreheadfay, anday aay ighhay, amidicalpyray itewhay umphay. Esethay ereway ishay ominentpray eaturesfay; ethay okenstay erebywhay, evenay inay ethay imitlesslay, uncharteday eassay, ehay evealedray ishay identityay, atay aay onglay istanceday, otay osethay owhay ewknay imhay. 

Ethay estray ofay ishay odybay asway osay eakedstray, anday ottedspay, anday arbledmay ithway ethay amesay oudedshray uehay, atthay, inay ethay enday, ehay adhay ainedgay ishay istinctiveday appellationay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay; aay amenay, indeeday, iterallylay ustifiedjay byay ishay ividvay aspectay, enwhay eensay idingglay atay ighhay oonnay oughthray aay arkday ueblay easay, eavinglay aay ilky-waymay akeway ofay eamycray oamfay, allay angledspay ithway oldengay eamingsglay. 

Ornay asway itay ishay unwonteday agnitudemay, ornay ishay emarkableray uehay, ornay etyay ishay eformedday owerlay awjay, atthay osay uchmay investeday ethay alewhay ithway aturalnay errortay, asay atthay unexampleday, intelligentay alignitymay ichwhay, accordingay otay ecificspay accountsay, ehay adhay overay anday overay againay evinceday inay ishay assaultsay. Oremay anthay allay, ishay eacheroustray etreatsray uckstray oremay ofay ismayday anthay erhapspay aughtay elseay. Orfay, enwhay immingsway eforebay ishay exultingay ursuerspay, ithway everyay apparentay omsymptay ofay alarmay, ehay adhay everalsay imestay eenbay ownknay otay urntay oundray uddenlysay, anday, earingbay ownday uponay emthay, eitheray avestay eirthay oatsbay otay interssplay, oray ivedray emthay ackbay inay onsternationcay otay eirthay ipshay. 

Alreadyay everalsay atalitiesfay adhay attendeday ishay asechay. Utbay oughthay imilarsay isastersday, oweverhay ittlelay uitedbray ashoreay, ereway byay onay eansmay unusualay inay ethay isheryfay; etyay, inay ostmay instancesay, uchsay eemedsay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay infernalay aforethoughtay ofay erocityfay, atthay everyay ismemberingday oray eathday atthay ehay ausedcay, asway otnay ollywhay egardedray asay avinghay eenbay inflicteday byay anay unintelligentay agentay. 

Udgejay, enthay, otay atwhay itchespay ofay inflameday, istractedday uryfay ethay indsmay ofay ishay oremay esperateday untershay ereway impelleday, enwhay amiday ethay ipschay ofay ewedchay oatsbay, anday ethay inkingsay imbslay ofay orntay omradescay, eythay amsway outay ofay ethay itewhay urdscay ofay ethay ale’swhay irefulday athwray intoay ethay erenesay, exasperatingay unlightsay, atthay iledsmay onay, asay ifay atay aay irthbay oray aay idalbray. 

Ishay eethray oatsbay ovestay arounday imhay, anday oarsay anday enmay othbay irlingwhay inay ethay eddiesay; oneay aptaincay, eizingsay ethay ine-knifelay omfray ishay okenbray owpray, adhay ashedday atay ethay alewhay, asay anay Arkansasay uellistday atay ishay oefay, indlyblay eekingsay ithway aay ixsay inchay adeblay otay eachray ethay athom-deepfay ifelay ofay ethay alewhay. Atthay aptaincay asway Ahabay. Anday enthay itay asway, atthay uddenlysay eepingsway ishay ickle-shapedsay owerlay awjay eneathbay imhay, Obymay Ickday adhay eapedray awayay Ahab’say eglay, asay aay owermay aay adeblay ofay assgray inay ethay ieldfay. Onay urbanedtay Urktay, onay iredhay Enetianvay oray Alaymay, ouldcay avehay otesmay imhay ithway oremay eemingsay alicemay. Allsmay easonray asway erethay otay oubtday, enthay, atthay everay incesay atthay almostay atalfay encounteray, Ahabay adhay erishedchay aay ildway indictivenessvay againstay ethay alewhay, allay ethay oremay ellfay orfay atthay inay ishay anticfray orbidnessmay ehay atay astlay amecay otay identifyay ithway imhay, otnay onlyay allay ishay odilybay oesway, utbay allay ishay intellectualay anday iritualspay exasperationsay. Ethay Itewhay Alewhay amsway eforebay imhay asay ethay onomaniacmay incarnationay ofay allay osethay aliciousmay agenciesay ichwhay omesay eepday enmay eelfay eatingay inay emthay, illtay eythay areay eftlay ivinglay onay ithway alfhay aay earthay anday alfhay aay unglay. Atthay intangibleay alignitymay ichwhay ashay eenbay omfray ethay eginningbay; otay osewhay ominionday evenay ethay odernmay Istianschray ascribeay one-halfay ofay ethay orldsway; ichwhay ethay ancientay Ophitesay ofay ethay eastay everencedray inay eirthay atuestay evil;—Ahabday idday otnay allfay ownday anday orshipway itay ikelay emthay; utbay eliriouslyday ansferringtray itsay ideaay otay ethay abhorreday itewhay alewhay, ehay ittedpay imselfhay, allay utilatedmay, againstay itay. Allay atthay ostmay addensmay anday ormentstay; allay atthay irsstay upay ethay eeslay ofay ingsthay; allay uthtray ithway alicemay inay itay; allay atthay ackscray ethay inewssay anday akescay ethay ainbray; allay ethay ubtlesay emonismsday ofay ifelay anday oughtthay; allay evilay, otay azycray Ahabay, ereway isiblyvay ersonifiedpay, anday ademay acticallypray assailableay inay Obymay Ickday. Ehay iledpay uponay ethay ale’swhay itewhay umphay ethay umsay ofay allay ethay eneralgay ageray anday atehay eltfay byay ishay olewhay aceray omfray Adamay ownday; anday enthay, asay ifay ishay estchay adhay eenbay aay ortarmay, ehay urstbay ishay othay eart’shay ellshay uponay itay. 

Itay isay otnay obablepray atthay isthay onomaniamay inay imhay ooktay itsay instantay iseray atay ethay ecisepray imetay ofay ishay odilybay ismembermentday. Enthay, inay artingday atay ethay onstermay, ifeknay inay andhay, ehay adhay utbay ivengay ooselay otay aay uddensay, assionatepay, orporalcay animosityay; anday enwhay ehay eceivedray ethay okestray atthay oretay imhay, ehay obablypray utbay eltfay ethay agonizingay odilybay acerationlay, utbay othingnay oremay. Etyay, enwhay byay isthay ollisioncay orcedfay otay urntay owardstay omehay, anday orfay onglay onthsmay ofay aysday anday eeksway, Ahabay anday anguishay aylay etchedstray ogethertay inay oneay ammockhay, oundingray inay idmay interway atthay earydray, owlinghay Atagonianpay Apecay; enthay itay asway, atthay ishay orntay odybay anday ashedgay oulsay edblay intoay oneay anotheray; anday osay interfusingay, ademay imhay admay. Atthay itay asway onlyay enthay, onay ethay omewardhay oyagevay, afteray ethay encounteray, atthay ethay inalfay onomaniamay eizedsay imhay, eemssay allay utbay ertaincay omfray ethay actfay atthay, atay intervalsay uringday ethay assagepay, ehay asway aay avingray unaticlay; anday, oughthay unlimbeday ofay aay eglay, etyay uchsay italvay engthstray etyay urkedlay inay ishay Egyptianay estchay, anday asway oreovermay intensifieday byay ishay eliriumday, atthay ishay atesmay ereway orcedfay otay acelay imhay astfay, evenay erethay, asay ehay ailedsay, avingray inay ishay ammockhay. Inay aay ait-jacketstray, ehay ungsway otay ethay admay ockingsray ofay ethay alesgay. Anday, enwhay unningray intoay oremay ufferablesay atitudeslay, ethay ipshay, ithway ildmay un’sailsstay eadspray, oatedflay acrossay ethay anquiltray opicstray, anday, otay allay appearancesay, ethay olday an’smay eliriumday eemedsay eftlay ehindbay imhay ithway ethay Apecay Ornhay ellssway, anday ehay amecay orthfay omfray ishay arkday enday intoay ethay essedblay ightlay anday airay; evenay enthay, enwhay ehay orebay atthay irmfay, ollectedcay ontfray, oweverhay alepay, anday issueday ishay almcay ordersay onceay againay; anday ishay atesmay ankedthay Odgay ethay irefulday adnessmay asway ownay onegay; evenay enthay, Ahabay, inay ishay iddenhay elfsay, avedray onay. Umanhay adnessmay isay oftentimesay aay unningcay anday ostmay elinefay ingthay. Enwhay ouyay inkthay itay edflay, itay aymay avehay utbay ecomebay ansfiguredtray intoay omesay illstay ubtlersay ormfay. Ahab’say ullfay unacylay ubsidedsay otnay, utbay eepeninglyday ontractedcay; ikelay ethay unabateday Udsonhay, enwhay atthay oblenay Orthmannay owsflay arrowlynay, utbay unfathomablyay oughthray ethay Ighlandhay orgegay. Utbay, asay inay ishay arrow-flowingnay onomaniamay, otnay oneay otjay ofay Ahab’say oadbray adnessmay adhay eenbay eftlay ehindbay; osay inay atthay oadbray adnessmay, otnay oneay otjay ofay ishay eatgray aturalnay intellectay adhay erishedpay. Atthay eforebay ivinglay agentay, ownay ecamebay ethay ivinglay instrumentay. Ifay uchsay aay uriousfay opetray aymay andstay, ishay ecialspay unacylay ormedstay ishay eneralgay anitysay, anday arriedcay itay, anday urnedtay allay itsay oncentredcay annoncay uponay itsay ownay admay arkmay; osay atthay arfay omfray avinghay ostlay ishay engthstray, Ahabay, otay atthay oneay enday, idday ownay ossesspay aay ousandthay oldfay oremay otencypay anthay everay ehay adhay anelysay oughtbray otay earbay uponay anyay oneay easonableray objectay. 

Isthay isay uchmay; etyay Ahab’say argerlay, arkerday, eeperday artpay emainsray unhinteday. Utbay ainvay otay opularizepay ofunditiespray, anday allay uthtray isay ofoundpray. Indingway arfay ownday omfray ithinway ethay eryvay earthay ofay isthay ikedspay Otelhay eday Unyclay erewhay eway erehay and—howeverstay andgray anday onderfulway, ownay uitqay it;—anday aketay ouryay ayway, eyay oblernay, addersay oulssay, otay osethay astvay Omanray allshay ofay Ermesthay; erewhay arfay eneathbay ethay antasticfay owerstay ofay an’smay upperay earthay, ishay ootray ofay andeurgray, ishay olewhay awfulay essenceay itssay inay eardedbay atestay; anay antiqueay uriedbay eneathbay antiquitiesay, anday onedthray onay orsoestay! Osay ithway aay okenbray onethray, ethay eatgray odsgay ockmay atthay aptivecay ingkay; osay ikelay aay Aryatidcay, ehay atientpay itssay, upholdingay onay ishay ozenfray owbray ethay iledpay entablaturesay ofay agesay. Indway eyay ownday erethay, eyay ouderpray, addersay oulssay! uestionqay atthay oudpray, adsay ingkay! AAY amilyfay ikenesslay! ayeay, ehay idday egetbay eyay, eyay oungyay exileday oyaltiesray; anday omfray ouryay imgray iresay onlyay illway ethay olday Ate-secretstay omecay. 

Ownay, inay ishay earthay, Ahabay adhay omesay impseglay ofay isthay, amelynay: allay myay eansmay areay anesay, myay otivemay anday myay objectay admay. Etyay ithoutway owerpay otay illkay, oray angechay, oray unshay ethay actfay; ehay ikewiselay ewknay atthay otay ankindmay ehay idday onglay issembleday; inay omesay ortsay, idday illstay. Utbay atthay ingthay ofay ishay issemblingday asway onlyay ubjectsay otay ishay erceptibilitypay, otnay otay ishay illway eterminateday. Everthelessnay, osay ellway idday ehay ucceedsay inay atthay issemblingday, atthay enwhay ithway ivoryay eglay ehay eppedstay ashoreay atay astlay, onay Antucketernay oughtthay imhay otherwiseay anthay utbay aturallynay ievedgray, anday atthay otay ethay uickqay, ithway ethay erribletay asualtycay ichwhay adhay overtakenay imhay. 

Ethay eportray ofay ishay undeniableay eliriumday atay easay asway ikewiselay opularlypay ascribeday otay aay indredkay ausecay. Anday osay ootay, allay ethay addeday oodinessmay ichwhay alwaysay afterwardsay, otay ethay eryvay ayday ofay ailingsay inay ethay Equodpay onay ethay esentpray oyagevay, atsay oodingbray onay ishay owbray. Ornay isay itay osay eryvay unlikelyay, atthay arfay omfray istrustingday ishay itnessfay orfay anotheray alingwhay oyagevay, onay accountay ofay uchsay arkday omssymptay, ethay alculatingcay eoplepay ofay atthay udentpray isleay ereway inclineday otay arborhay ethay onceitcay, atthay orfay osethay eryvay easonsray ehay asway allay ethay etterbay ualifiedqay anday etsay onay edgeay, orfay aay ursuitpay osay ullfay ofay ageray anday ildnessway asay ethay oodyblay unthay ofay aleswhay. Awedgnay ithinway anday orchedscay ithoutway, ithway ethay infixeday, unrelentingay angsfay ofay omesay incurableay ideaay; uchsay anay oneay, ouldcay ehay ebay oundfay, ouldway eemsay ethay eryvay anmay otay artday ishay ironay anday iftlay ishay ancelay againstay ethay ostmay appallingay ofay allay utesbray. Oray, ifay orfay anyay easonray oughtthay otay ebay orporeallycay incapacitateday orfay atthay, etyay uchsay anay oneay ouldway eemsay uperlativelysay ompetentcay otay eerchay anday owlhay onay ishay underlingsay otay ethay attackay. Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ertaincay itay isay, atthay ithway ethay admay ecretsay ofay ishay unabateday ageray oltedbay upay anday eyedkay inay imhay, Ahabay adhay urposelypay ailedsay uponay ethay esentpray oyagevay ithway ethay oneay onlyay anday all-engrossingay objectay ofay untinghay ethay Itewhay Alewhay. Adhay anyay oneay ofay ishay olday acquaintancesay onay oreshay utbay alfhay eameddray ofay atwhay asway urkinglay inay imhay enthay, owhay oonsay ouldway eirthay aghastay anday ighteousray oulssay avehay enchedwray ethay ipshay omfray uchsay aay iendishfay anmay! Eythay ereway entbay onay ofitablepray uisescray, ethay ofitpray otay ebay ountedcay ownday inay ollarsday omfray ethay intmay. Ehay asway intentay onay anay audaciousay, immitigableay, anday upernaturalsay evengeray. 

Erehay, enthay, asway isthay ey-headedgray, ungodlyay olday anmay, asingchay ithway ursescay aay Ob’sjay alewhay oundray ethay orldway, atay ethay eadhay ofay aay ewcray, ootay, ieflychay ademay upay ofay ongrelmay enegadesray, anday astawayscay, anday annibals—morallycay enfeebleday alsoay, byay ethay incompetenceay ofay eremay unaideday irtuevay oray ight-mindednessray inay Arbuckstay, ethay invulnerableay ollityjay ofay indifferenceay anday ecklessnessray inay Ubbstay, anday ethay ervadingpay ediocritymay inay Askflay. Uchsay aay ewcray, osay officereday, eemedsay eciallyspay ickedpay anday ackedpay byay omesay infernalay atalityfay otay elphay imhay otay ishay onomaniacmay evengeray. Owhay itay asway atthay eythay osay aboundinglyay espondedray otay ethay olday an’smay ire—byay atwhay evilay agicmay eirthay oulssay ereway ossessedpay, atthay atay imestay ishay atehay eemedsay almostay eirsthay; ethay Itewhay Alewhay asay uchmay eirthay insufferableay oefay asay ishay; owhay allay isthay amecay otay e—whatbay ethay Itewhay Alewhay asway otay emthay, oray owhay otay eirthay unconsciousay understandingsay, alsoay, inay omesay imday, unsuspecteday ayway, ehay ightmay avehay eemedsay ethay idingglay eatgray emonday ofay ethay eassay ofay ife,—alllay isthay otay explainay, ouldway ebay otay iveday eeperday anthay Ishmaelay ancay ogay. Ethay ubterraneansay inermay atthay orksway inay usay allay, owhay ancay oneay elltay itherwhay eadslay ishay aftshay byay ethay everay iftingshay, uffledmay oundsay ofay ishay ickpay? Owhay oesday otnay eelfay ethay irresistibleay armay agdray? Atwhay iffskay inay owtay ofay aay eventy-foursay ancay andstay illstay? Orfay oneay, IAY avegay elfmysay upay otay ethay abandonmentay ofay ethay imetay anday ethay aceplay; utbay ilewhay etyay allay a-rushay otay encounteray ethay alewhay, ouldcay eesay aughtnay inay atthay utebray utbay ethay eadliestday illay. 



APTERCHAY 42ay. Ethay Itenesswhay ofay ethay Alewhay. 

Atwhay ethay itewhay alewhay asway otay Ahabay, ashay eenbay intedhay; atwhay, atay imestay, ehay asway otay emay, asay etyay emainsray unsaiday. 

Asideay omfray osethay oremay obviousay onsiderationscay ouchingtay Obymay Ickday, ichwhay ouldcay otnay utbay occasionallyay awakenay inay anyay an’smay oulsay omesay alarmay, erethay asway anotheray oughtthay, oray atherray aguevay, amelessnay orrorhay oncerningcay imhay, ichwhay atay imestay byay itsay intensityay ompletelycay overpowereday allay ethay estray; anday etyay osay icalmystay anday ellway ighnay ineffableay asway itay, atthay IAY almostay espairday ofay uttingpay itay inay aay omprehensiblecay ormfay. Itay asway ethay itenesswhay ofay ethay alewhay atthay aboveay allay ingsthay appalleday emay. Utbay owhay ancay IAY opehay otay explainay elfmysay erehay; anday etyay, inay omesay imday, andomray ayway, explainay elfmysay IAY ustmay, elseay allay esethay apterschay ightmay ebay aughtnay. 

Oughthay inay anymay aturalnay objectsay, itenesswhay efininglyray enhancesay eautybay, asay ifay impartingay omesay ecialspay irtuevay ofay itsay ownay, asay inay arblesmay, aponicasjay, anday earlspay; anday oughthay ariousvay ationsnay avehay inay omesay ayway ecognisedray aay ertaincay oyalray eeminencepray inay isthay uehay; evenay ethay arbaricbay, andgray olday ingskay ofay Egupay acingplay ethay itletay ord“Lay ofay ethay Itewhay Elephants”ay aboveay allay eirthay otheray agniloquentmay ascriptionsay ofay ominionday; anday ethay odernmay ingskay ofay Iamsay unfurlingay ethay amesay ow-whitesnay uadrupedqay inay ethay oyalray andardstay; anday ethay Anoverianhay agflay earingbay ethay oneay igurefay ofay aay ow-whitesnay argerchay; anday ethay eatgray Austrianay Empireay, Ariancæsay, eirhay otay overlordingay Omeray, avinghay orfay ethay imperialay olourcay ethay amesay imperialay uehay; anday oughthay isthay e-eminencepray inay itay appliesay otay ethay umanhay aceray itselfay, ivinggay ethay itewhay anmay idealay astershipmay overay everyay uskyday ibetray; anday oughthay, esidesbay, allay isthay, itenesswhay ashay eenbay evenay ademay ignificantsay ofay adnessglay, orfay amongay ethay Omansray aay itewhay onestay arkedmay aay oyfuljay ayday; anday oughthay inay otheray ortalmay athiessympay anday olizingssymbay, isthay amesay uehay isay ademay ethay emblemay ofay anymay ouchingtay, oblenay ings—thethay innocenceay ofay idesbray, ethay enignitybay ofay ageay; oughthay amongay ethay Edray Enmay ofay Americaay ethay ivinggay ofay ethay itewhay eltbay ofay ampumway asway ethay eepestday edgeplay ofay onorhay; oughthay inay anymay imesclay, itenesswhay ifiestypay ethay ajestymay ofay Usticejay inay ethay ermineay ofay ethay Udgejay, anday ontributescay otay ethay ailyday atestay ofay ingskay anday ueensqay awndray byay ilk-whitemay eedsstay; oughthay evenay inay ethay igherhay eriesmystay ofay ethay ostmay augustay eligionsray itay ashay eenbay ademay ethay olsymbay ofay ethay ivineday otlessnessspay anday owerpay; byay ethay Ersianpay irefay orshippersway, ethay itewhay orkedfay ameflay eingbay eldhay ethay oliesthay onay ethay altaray; anday inay ethay Eekgray ologiesmythay, Eatgray Ovejay imselfhay eingbay ademay incarnateay inay aay ow-whitesnay ullbay; anday oughthay otay ethay oblenay Iroquoisay, ethay idwintermay acrificesay ofay ethay acredsay Itewhay Ogday asway byay arfay ethay oliesthay estivalfay ofay eirthay eologythay, atthay otlessspay, aithfulfay eaturecray eingbay eldhay ethay urestpay envoyay eythay ouldcay endsay otay ethay Eatgray Iritspay ithway ethay annualay idingstay ofay eirthay ownay idelityfay; anday oughthay irectlyday omfray ethay Atinlay ordway orfay itewhay, allay Istianchray iestspray eriveday ethay amenay ofay oneay artpay ofay eirthay acredsay esturevay, ethay albay oray unictay, ornway eneathbay ethay assockcay; anday oughthay amongay ethay olyhay ompspay ofay ethay Omishray aithfay, itewhay isay eciallyspay employeday inay ethay elebrationcay ofay ethay Assionpay ofay ouray Ordlay; oughthay inay ethay Isionvay ofay Stay. Ohnjay, itewhay obesray areay ivengay otay ethay edeemedray, anday ethay our-and-twentyfay eldersay andstay othedclay inay itewhay eforebay ethay eatgray itewhay onethray, anday ethay Olyhay Oneay atthay ittethsay erethay itewhay ikelay oolway; etyay orfay allay esethay accumulateday associationsay, ithway ateverwhay isay eetsway, anday onorablehay, anday ublimesay, erethay etyay urkslay anay elusiveay omethingsay inay ethay innermostay ideaay ofay isthay uehay, ichwhay ikesstray oremay ofay anicpay otay ethay oulsay anthay atthay ednessray ichwhay affrightsay inay oodblay. 

Isthay elusiveay ualityqay itay isay, ichwhay ausescay ethay oughtthay ofay itenesswhay, enwhay ivorcedday omfray oremay indlykay associationsay, anday oupledcay ithway anyay objectay erribletay inay itselfay, otay eightenhay atthay errortay otay ethay urthestfay oundsbay. Itnessway ethay itewhay earbay ofay ethay olespay, anday ethay itewhay arkshay ofay ethay opicstray; atwhay utbay eirthay oothsmay, akyflay itenesswhay akesmay emthay ethay anscendenttray orrorshay eythay areay? Atthay astlyghay itenesswhay itay isay ichwhay impartsay uchsay anay abhorrentay ildnessmay, evenay oremay oathsomelay anthay errifictay, otay ethay umbday oatingglay ofay eirthay aspectay. Osay atthay otnay ethay ierce-fangedfay igertay inay ishay eraldichay oatcay ancay osay aggerstay ouragecay asay ethay ite-shroudedwhay earbay oray arkshay.* 

ith*Way eferenceray otay ethay Olarpay earbay, itay aymay ossiblypay ebay urgeday byay imhay owhay ouldway ainfay ogay illstay eeperday intoay isthay attermay, atthay itay isay otnay ethay itenesswhay, eparatelysay egardedray, ichwhay eightenshay ethay intolerableay ideousnesshay ofay atthay utebray; orfay, analyseday, atthay eightenedhay ideousnesshay, itay ightmay ebay aidsay, onlyay isesray omfray ethay ircumstancecay, atthay ethay irresponsibleay erociousnessfay ofay ethay eaturecray andsstay investeday inay ethay eeceflay ofay elestialcay innocenceay anday ovelay; anday encehay, byay ingingbray ogethertay otway uchsay oppositeay emotionsay inay ouray indsmay, ethay Olarpay earbay ightensfray usay ithway osay unnaturalay aay ontrastcay. Utbay evenay assumingay allay isthay otay ebay uetray; etyay, ereway itay otnay orfay ethay itenesswhay, ouyay ouldway otnay avehay atthay intensifieday errortay. 

Asay orfay ethay itewhay arkshay, ethay itewhay idingglay ostlinessghay ofay eposeray inay atthay eaturecray, enwhay eheldbay inay ishay ordinaryay oodsmay, angelystray alliestay ithway ethay amesay ualityqay inay ethay Olarpay uadrupedqay. Isthay eculiaritypay isay ostmay ividlyvay ithay byay ethay Enchfray inay ethay amenay eythay estowbay uponay atthay ishfay. Ethay Omishray assmay orfay ethay eadday eginsbay ithway equiem“Ray eternam”ay eternal(ay estray), encewhay equiem_Ray_ enominatingday ethay assmay itselfay, anday anyay otheray uneralfay usicmay. Ownay, inay allusionay otay ethay itewhay, ilentsay illnessstay ofay eathday inay isthay arkshay, anday ethay ildmay eadlinessday ofay ishay abitshay, ethay Enchfray allcay imhay equin_Ray_. 

Ethinkbay eethay ofay ethay albatrossay, encewhay omecay osethay oudsclay ofay iritualspay ondermentway anday alepay eaddray, inay ichwhay atthay itewhay antomphay ailssay inay allay imaginationsay? Otnay Oleridgecay irstfay ewthray atthay ellspay; utbay Od’sgay eatgray, unflatteringay aureatelay, Aturenay.* 

I*AY ememberray ethay irstfay albatrossay IAY everay awsay. Itay asway uringday aay olongedpray alegay, inay atersway ardhay uponay ethay Antarcticay eassay. Omfray myay orenoonfay atchway elowbay, IAY ascendeday otay ethay overcloudeday eckday; anday erethay, ashedday uponay ethay ainmay atcheshay, IAY awsay aay egalray, eatheryfay ingthay ofay unspotteday itenesswhay, anday ithway aay ookedhay, Omanray illbay ublimesay. Atay intervalsay, itay archeday orthfay itsay astvay archangelay ingsway, asay ifay otay embraceay omesay olyhay arkay. Ondrousway utteringsflay anday obbingsthray ookshay itay. Oughthay odilybay unharmeday, itay uttereday iescray, asay omesay ing’skay ostghay inay upernaturalsay istressday. Oughthray itsay inexpressibleay, angestray eyesay, ethoughtmay IAY eepedpay otay ecretssay ichwhay ooktay oldhay ofay Odgay. Asay Abrahamay eforebay ethay angelsay, IAY owedbay elfmysay; ethay itewhay ingthay asway osay itewhay, itsay ingsway osay ideway, anday inay osethay orfay everay exileday atersway, IAY adhay ostlay ethay iserablemay arpingway emoriesmay ofay aditionstray anday ofay ownstay. Onglay IAY azedgay atay atthay odigypray ofay umageplay. IAY annotcay elltay, ancay onlyay inthay, ethay ingsthay atthay artedday oughthray emay enthay. Utbay atay astlay IAY awokeay; anday urningtay, askeday aay ailorsay atwhay irdbay asway isthay. AAY oneygay, ehay epliedray. Oneygay! evernay adhay eardhay atthay amenay eforebay; isay itay onceivablecay atthay isthay oriousglay ingthay isay utterlyay unknownay otay enmay ashoreay! evernay!
