Utbay omesay imetay afteray, IAY earnedlay atthay oneygay asway omesay eaman’ssay amenay orfay albatrossay. Osay atthay byay onay ossibilitypay ouldcay Oleridge’scay ildway Erhymay avehay adhay aughtay otay oday ithway osethay icalmystay impressionsay ichwhay ereway inemay, enwhay IAY awsay atthay irdbay uponay ouray eckday. Orfay eithernay adhay IAY enthay eadray ethay Erhymay, ornay ewknay ethay irdbay otay ebay anay albatrossay. Etyay, inay ayingsay isthay, IAY oday utbay indirectlyay urnishbay aay ittlelay ighterbray ethay oblenay eritmay ofay ethay oempay anday ethay oetpay. 

IAY assertay, enthay, atthay inay ethay ondrousway odilybay itenesswhay ofay ethay irdbay ieflychay urkslay ethay ecretsay ofay ethay ellspay; aay uthtray ethay oremay evinceday inay isthay, atthay byay aay olecismsay ofay ermstay erethay areay irdsbay alledcay eygray albatrossesay; anday esethay IAY avehay equentlyfray eensay, utbay evernay ithway uchsay emotionsay asay enwhay IAY eheldbay ethay Antarcticay owlfay. 

Utbay owhay adhay ethay icmystay ingthay eenbay aughtcay? Isperwhay itay otnay, anday IAY illway elltay; ithway aay eacheroustray ookhay anday inelay, asay ethay owlfay oatedflay onay ethay easay. Atay astlay ethay Aptaincay ademay aay ostmanpay ofay itay; ingtyay aay etteredlay, eathernlay allytay oundray itsay ecknay, ithway ethay ip’sshay imetay anday aceplay; anday enthay ettinglay itay escapeay. Utbay IAY oubtday otnay, atthay eathernlay allytay, eantmay orfay anmay, asway akentay offay inay Eavenhay, enwhay ethay itewhay owlfay ewflay otay oinjay ethay ing-foldingway, ethay invokingay, anday adoringay erubimchay! 

Ostmay amousfay inay ouray Esternway annalsay anday Indianay aditionstray isay atthay ofay ethay Itewhay Eedstay ofay ethay Airiespray; aay agnificentmay ilk-whitemay argerchay, arge-eyedlay, all-headedsmay, uff-chestedblay, anday ithway ethay ignityday ofay aay ousandthay onarchsmay inay ishay oftylay, overscorningay arriagecay. Ehay asway ethay electeday Erxesxay ofay astvay erdshay ofay ildway orseshay, osewhay asturespay inay osethay aysday ereway onlyay encedfay byay ethay Ockyray Ountainsmay anday ethay Alleghaniesay. Atay eirthay amingflay eadhay ehay estwardway oopedtray itay ikelay atthay osenchay arstay ichwhay everyay eveningay eadslay onay ethay ostshay ofay ightlay. Ethay ashingflay ascadecay ofay ishay anemay, ethay urvingcay ometcay ofay ishay ailtay, investeday imhay ithway ousingshay oremay esplendentray anthay oldgay anday ilver-beaterssay ouldcay avehay urnishedfay imhay. AAY ostmay imperialay anday archangelicalay apparitionay ofay atthay unfallenay, esternway orldway, ichwhay otay ethay eyesay ofay ethay olday apperstray anday untershay evivedray ethay oriesglay ofay osethay imevalpray imestay enwhay Adamay alkedway ajesticmay asay aay odgay, uff-browedblay anday earlessfay asay isthay ightymay eedstay. Etherwhay archingmay amiday ishay aidesay anday arshalsmay inay ethay anvay ofay ountlesscay ohortscay atthay endlesslyay eamedstray itay overay ethay ainsplay, ikelay anay Ohioay; oray etherwhay ithway ishay ircumambientcay ubjectssay owsingbray allay arounday atay ethay orizonhay, ethay Itewhay Eedstay allopinglygay eviewedray emthay ithway armway ostrilsnay eddeningray oughthray ishay oolcay ilkinessmay; inay ateverwhay aspectay ehay esentedpray imselfhay, alwaysay otay ethay avestbray Indiansay ehay asway ethay objectay ofay emblingtray everenceray anday aweay. Ornay ancay itay ebay uestionedqay omfray atwhay andsstay onay egendarylay ecordray ofay isthay oblenay orsehay, atthay itay asway ishay iritualspay itenesswhay ieflychay, ichwhay osay othedclay imhay ithway ivinenessday; anday atthay isthay ivinenessday adhay atthay inay itay ichwhay, oughthay ommandingcay orshipway, atay ethay amesay imetay enforceday aay ertaincay amelessnay errortay. 

Utbay erethay areay otheray instancesay erewhay isthay itenesswhay oseslay allay atthay accessoryay anday angestray oryglay ichwhay investsay itay inay ethay Itewhay Eedstay anday Albatrossay. 

Atwhay isay itay atthay inay ethay Albinoay anmay osay eculiarlypay epelsray anday oftenay ocksshay ethay eyeay, asay atthay ometimessay ehay isay oathedlay byay ishay ownay ithkay anday inkay! Itay isay atthay itenesswhay ichwhay investsay imhay, aay ingthay expresseday byay ethay amenay ehay earsbay. Ethay Albinoay isay asay ellway ademay asay otheray en—hasmay onay ubstantivesay eformity—andday etyay isthay eremay aspectay ofay all-pervadingay itenesswhay akesmay imhay oremay angelystray ideoushay anthay ethay ugliestay abortionay. Whyay ouldshay isthay ebay osay? 

Ornay, inay uiteqay otheray aspectsay, oesday Aturenay inay erhay eastlay alpablepay utbay otnay ethay esslay aliciousmay agenciesay, ailfay otay enlistay amongay erhay orcesfay isthay owningcray attributeay ofay ethay erribletay. Omfray itsay owysnay aspectay, ethay auntletedgay ostghay ofay ethay Outhernsay Eassay ashay eenbay enominatedday ethay Itewhay Uallsqay. Ornay, inay omesay istorichay instancesay, ashay ethay artay ofay umanhay alicemay omitteday osay otentpay anay auxiliaryay. Owhay ildlyway itay eightenshay ethay effectay ofay atthay assagepay inay Oissartfray, enwhay, askedmay inay ethay owysnay olsymbay ofay eirthay actionfay, ethay esperateday Itewhay Oodshay ofay Entghay urdermay eirthay ailiffbay inay ethay arket-placemay! 

Ornay, inay omesay ingsthay, oesday ethay ommoncay, ereditaryhay experienceay ofay allay ankindmay ailfay otay earbay itnessway otay ethay upernaturalismsay ofay isthay uehay. Itay annotcay ellway ebay oubtedday, atthay ethay oneay isiblevay ualityqay inay ethay aspectay ofay ethay eadday ichwhay ostmay appalsay ethay azergay, isay ethay arblemay allorpay ingeringlay erethay; asay ifay indeeday atthay allorpay ereway asay uchmay ikelay ethay adgebay ofay onsternationcay inay ethay otheray orldway, asay ofay ortalmay epidationtray erehay. Anday omfray atthay allorpay ofay ethay eadday, eway orrowbay ethay expressiveay uehay ofay ethay oudshray inay ichwhay eway apwray emthay. Ornay evenay inay ouray uperstitionssay oday eway ailfay otay owthray ethay amesay owysnay antlemay oundray ouray antomsphay; allay ostsghay isingray inay aay ilk-whitemay og—Yeafay, ilewhay esethay errorstay eizesay usay, etlay usay adday, atthay evenay ethay ingkay ofay errorstay, enwhay ersonifiedpay byay ethay evangelistay, idesray onay ishay allidpay orsehay. 

Ereforethay, inay ishay otheray oodsmay, olizesymbay ateverwhay andgray oray aciousgray ingthay ehay illway byay itenesswhay, onay anmay ancay enyday atthay inay itsay ofoundestpray idealizeday ignificancesay itay allscay upay aay eculiarpay apparitionay otay ethay oulsay. 

Utbay oughthay ithoutway issentday isthay ointpay ebay ixedfay, owhay isay ortalmay anmay otay accountay orfay itay? Otay analyseay itay, ouldway eemsay impossibleay. Ancay eway, enthay, byay ethay itationcay ofay omesay ofay osethay instancesay ereinwhay isthay ingthay ofay iteness—thoughwhay orfay ethay imetay eitheray ollywhay oray inay eatgray artpay ippedstray ofay allay irectday associationsay alculatedcay otay impartay otay itay aughtay earfulfay, utbay everthelessnay, isay oundfay otay exertay overay usay ethay amesay orcerysay, oweverhay odified;—canmay eway usthay opehay otay ightlay uponay omesay ancechay ueclay otay onductcay usay otay ethay iddenhay ausecay eway eeksay? 

Etlay usay tryay. Utbay inay aay attermay ikelay isthay, ubtletysay appealsay otay ubtletysay, anday ithoutway imaginationay onay anmay ancay ollowfay anotheray intoay esethay allshay. Anday oughthay, oubtlessday, omesay atay eastlay ofay ethay imaginativeay impressionsay aboutay otay ebay esentedpray aymay avehay eenbay aredshay byay ostmay enmay, etyay ewfay erhapspay ereway entirelyay onsciouscay ofay emthay atay ethay imetay, anday ereforethay aymay otnay ebay ableay otay ecallray emthay ownay. 

Whyay otay ethay anmay ofay untutoreday idealityay, owhay appenshay otay ebay utbay ooselylay acquainteday ithway ethay eculiarpay aracterchay ofay ethay ayday, oesday ethay arebay entionmay ofay Itsuntidewhay arshalmay inay ethay ancyfay uchsay onglay, earydray, eechlessspay ocessionspray ofay ow-pacingslay ilgrimspay, own-castday anday oodedhay ithway ew-fallennay owsnay? Oray, otay ethay unreaday, unsophisticateday Otestantpray ofay ethay Iddlemay Americanay Atesstay, whyay oesday ethay assingpay entionmay ofay aay Itewhay Iarfray oray aay Itewhay Unnay, evokeay uchsay anay eyelessay atuestay inay ethay oulsay? 

Oray atwhay isay erethay apartay omfray ethay aditionstray ofay ungeonedday arriorsway anday ingskay ich(whay illway otnay ollywhay accountay orfay itay) atthay akesmay ethay Itewhay Owertay ofay Ondonlay elltay osay uchmay oremay onglystray onay ethay imaginationay ofay anay untravelleday Americanay, anthay osethay otheray oriedstay ucturesstray, itsay eighbors—thenay Ardbyway Owertay, oray evenay ethay Oodyblay? Anday osethay ublimersay owerstay, ethay Itewhay Ountainsmay ofay Ewnay Ampshirehay, encewhay, inay eculiarpay oodsmay, omescay atthay iganticgay ostlinessghay overay ethay oulsay atay ethay arebay entionmay ofay atthay amenay, ilewhay ethay oughtthay ofay Irginia’svay Ueblay Idgeray isay ullfay ofay aay oftsay, ewyday, istantday eaminessdray? Oray whyay, irrespectiveay ofay allay atitudeslay anday ongitudeslay, oesday ethay amenay ofay ethay Itewhay Easay exertay uchsay aay ectralnessspay overay ethay ancyfay, ilewhay atthay ofay ethay Ellowyay Easay ullslay usay ithway ortalmay oughtsthay ofay onglay acqueredlay ildmay afternoonsay onay ethay avesway, ollowedfay byay ethay audiestgay anday etyay eepiestslay ofay unsetssay? Oray, otay oosechay aay ollywhay unsubstantialay instanceay, urelypay addresseday otay ethay ancyfay, whyay, inay eadingray ethay olday airyfay alestay ofay Entralcay Europeay, oesday e“thay alltay alepay an”may ofay ethay Artzhay orestsfay, osewhay angelesschay allorpay unrustlinglyay idesglay oughthray ethay eengray ofay ethay oves—whygray isay isthay antomphay oremay erribletay anthay allay ethay oopingwhay impsay ofay ethay Ocksburgblay? 

Ornay isay itay, altogetheray, ethay emembranceray ofay erhay athedral-topplingcay earthquakesay; ornay ethay ampedoesstay ofay erhay anticfray eassay; ornay ethay earlessnesstay ofay ariday iesskay atthay evernay ainray; ornay ethay ightsay ofay erhay ideway ieldfay ofay eaninglay iresspay, enchedwray ope-stonescay, anday ossescray allay adroopay ike(lay antedcay ardsyay ofay anchoreday eetsflay); anday erhay uburbansay avenuesay ofay ouse-wallshay inglyay overay uponay eachay otheray, asay aay ossedtay ackpay ofay ards;—itcay isay otnay esethay ingsthay aloneay ichwhay akemay earlesstay Imalay, ethay angeststray, addestsay itycay outhay an’stcay eesay. Orfay Imalay ashay akentay ethay itewhay eilvay; anday erethay isay aay igherhay orrorhay inay isthay itenesswhay ofay erhay oeway. Olday asay Izarropay, isthay itenesswhay eepskay erhay uinsray orfay everay ewnay; admitsay otnay ethay eerfulchay eennessgray ofay ompletecay ecayday; eadsspray overay erhay okenbray ampartsray ethay igidray allorpay ofay anay apoplexyay atthay ixesfay itsay ownay istortionsday. 

IAY owknay atthay, otay ethay ommoncay apprehensionay, isthay enomenonphay ofay itenesswhay isay otnay onfessedcay otay ebay ethay imepray agentay inay exaggeratingay ethay errortay ofay objectsay otherwiseay erribletay; ornay otay ethay unimaginativeay indmay isay erethay aughtay ofay errortay inay osethay appearancesay osewhay awfulnessay otay anotheray indmay almostay olelysay onsistscay inay isthay oneay enomenonphay, especiallyay enwhay exhibiteday underay anyay ormfay atay allay approachingay otay utenessmay oray universalityay. Atwhay IAY eanmay byay esethay otway atementsstay aymay erhapspay ebay espectivelyray elucidateday byay ethay ollowingfay examplesay. 

Irstfay: Ethay arinermay, enwhay awingdray ighnay ethay oastscay ofay oreignfay andslay, ifay byay ightnay ehay earhay ethay oarray ofay eakersbray, artsstay otay igilancevay, anday eelsfay ustjay enoughay ofay epidationtray otay arpenshay allay ishay acultiesfay; utbay underay eciselypray imilarsay ircumstancescay, etlay imhay ebay alledcay omfray ishay ammockhay otay iewvay ishay ipshay ailingsay oughthray aay idnightmay easay ofay ilkymay iteness—aswhay ifay omfray encirclingay eadlandshay oalsshay ofay ombedcay itewhay earsbay ereway immingsway oundray imhay, enthay ehay eelsfay aay ilentsay, uperstitioussay eaddray; ethay oudedshray antomphay ofay ethay itenedwhay atersway isay orriblehay otay imhay asay aay ealray ostghay; inay ainvay ethay eadlay assuresay imhay ehay isay illstay offay oundingssay; earthay anday elmhay eythay othbay ogay ownday; ehay evernay estsray illtay ueblay aterway isay underay imhay againay. Etyay erewhay isay ethay arinermay owhay illway elltay eethay, ir“Say, itay asway otnay osay uchmay ethay earfay ofay ikingstray iddenhay ocksray, asay ethay earfay ofay atthay ideoushay itenesswhay atthay osay irredstay e?”may 

Econdsay: Otay ethay ativenay Indianay ofay Erupay, ethay ontinualcay ightsay ofay ethay ow-howdahedsnay Andesay onveyscay aughtnay ofay eaddray, exceptay, erhapspay, inay ethay eremay ancyingfay ofay ethay eternalay ostedfray esolatenessday eigningray atay uchsay astvay altitudesay, anday ethay aturalnay onceitcay ofay atwhay aay earfulnessfay itay ouldway ebay otay oselay oneselfay inay uchsay inhumanay olitudessay. Uchmay ethay amesay isay itay ithway ethay ackwoodsmanbay ofay ethay Estway, owhay ithway omparativecay indifferenceay iewsvay anay unboundeday airiepray eetedshay ithway ivendray owsnay, onay adowshay ofay eetray oray igtway otay eakbray ethay ixedfay ancetray ofay itenesswhay. Otnay osay ethay ailorsay, eholdingbay ethay eneryscay ofay ethay Antarcticay eassay; erewhay atay imestay, byay omesay infernalay icktray ofay egerdemainlay inay ethay owerspay ofay ostfray anday airay, ehay, iveringshay anday alfhay ipwreckedshay, insteaday ofay ainbowsray eakingspay opehay anday olacesay otay ishay iserymay, iewsvay atwhay eemssay aay oundlessbay urchyardchay inninggray uponay imhay ithway itsay eanlay iceay onumentsmay anday interedsplay ossescray. 

Utbay outhay ayestsay, ethinksmay atthay ite-leadwhay apterchay aboutay itenesswhay isay utbay aay itewhay agflay unghay outay omfray aay avencray oulsay; outhay urrenderestsay otay aay ohypay, Ishmaelay. 

Elltay emay, whyay isthay ongstray oungyay oltcay, oaledfay inay omesay eacefulpay alleyvay ofay Ermontvay, arfay emovedray omfray allay eastsbay ofay ey—whypray isay itay atthay uponay ethay unniestsay ayday, ifay ouyay utbay akeshay aay eshfray uffalobay oberay ehindbay imhay, osay atthay ehay annotcay evenay eesay itay, utbay onlyay ellssmay itsay ildway animalay uskiness—whymay illway ehay artstay, ortsnay, anday ithway urstingbay eyesay awpay ethay oundgray inay ensiesphray ofay affrightay? Erethay isay onay emembranceray inay imhay ofay anyay oringsgay ofay ildway eaturescray inay ishay eengray orthernnay omehay, osay atthay ethay angestray uskinessmay ehay ellssmay annotcay ecallray otay imhay anythingay associateday ithway ethay experienceay ofay ormerfay erilspay; orfay atwhay owsknay ehay, isthay Ewnay Englanday oltcay, ofay ethay ackblay isonsbay ofay istantday Oregonay? 

Onay: utbay erehay outhay eholdestbay evenay inay aay umbday utebray, ethay instinctay ofay ethay owledgeknay ofay ethay emonismday inay ethay orldway. Oughthay ousandsthay ofay ilesmay omfray Oregonay, illstay enwhay ehay ellssmay atthay avagesay uskmay, ethay endingray, oringgay isonbay erdshay areay asay esentpray asay otay ethay esertedday ildway oalfay ofay ethay airiespray, ichwhay isthay instantay eythay aymay ebay amplingtray intoay ustday. 

Usthay, enthay, ethay uffledmay ollingsray ofay aay ilkymay easay; ethay eakblay ustlingsray ofay ethay estoonedfay ostsfray ofay ountainsmay; ethay esolateday iftingsshay ofay ethay indrowedway owssnay ofay airiespray; allay esethay, otay Ishmaelay, areay asay ethay akingshay ofay atthay uffalobay oberay otay ethay ightenedfray oltcay! 

Oughthay eithernay owsknay erewhay ielay ethay amelessnay ingsthay ofay ichwhay ethay icmystay ignsay ivesgay orthfay uchsay intshay; etyay ithway emay, asay ithway ethay oltcay, omewheresay osethay ingsthay ustmay existay. Oughthay inay anymay ofay itsay aspectsay isthay isiblevay orldway eemssay ormedfay inay ovelay, ethay invisibleay eressphay ereway ormedfay inay ightfray. 

Utbay otnay etyay avehay eway olvedsay ethay incantationay ofay isthay itenesswhay, anday earnedlay whyay itay appealsay ithway uchsay owerpay otay ethay oulsay; anday oremay angestray anday arfay oremay ortentous—whypay, asay eway avehay eensay, itay isay atay onceay ethay ostmay eaningmay olsymbay ofay iritualspay ingsthay, aynay, ethay eryvay eilvay ofay ethay Istian’schray Eityday; anday etyay ouldshay ebay asay itay isay, ethay intensifyingay agentay inay ingsthay ethay ostmay appallingay otay ankindmay. 

Isay itay atthay byay itsay indefinitenessay itay adowsshay orthfay ethay eartlesshay oidsvay anday immensitiesay ofay ethay universeay, anday usthay absstay usay omfray ehindbay ithway ethay oughtthay ofay annihilationay, enwhay eholdingbay ethay itewhay epthsday ofay ethay ilkymay ayway? Oray isay itay, atthay asay inay essenceay itenesswhay isay otnay osay uchmay aay olourcay asay ethay isiblevay absenceay ofay olourcay; anday atay ethay amesay imetay ethay oncretecay ofay allay olourscay; isay itay orfay esethay easonsray atthay erethay isay uchsay aay umbday anknessblay, ullfay ofay eaningmay, inay aay ideway andscapelay ofay ows—asnay olourlesscay, all-colouray ofay atheismay omfray ichwhay eway inkshray? Anday enwhay eway onsidercay atthay otheray eorythay ofay ethay aturalnay ilosophersphay, atthay allay otheray earthlyay ues—everyhay atelystay oray ovelylay emblazoning—theay eetsway ingestay ofay unsetsay iesskay anday oodsway; eayay, anday ethay ildedgay elvetsvay ofay utterfliesbay, anday ethay utterflybay eekschay ofay oungyay irlsgay; allay esethay areay utbay ubtilesay eceitsday, otnay actuallyay inherentay inay ubstancessay, utbay onlyay aidlay onay omfray ithoutway; osay atthay allay eifiedday Aturenay absolutelyay aintspay ikelay ethay arlothay, osewhay allurementsay overcay othingnay utbay ethay arnel-housechay ithinway; anday enwhay eway oceedpray urtherfay, anday onsidercay atthay ethay icalmystay osmeticcay ichwhay oducespray everyay oneay ofay erhay ueshay, ethay eatgray inciplepray ofay ightlay, orfay everay emainsray itewhay oray olorlesscay inay itselfay, anday ifay operatingay ithoutway ediummay uponay attermay, ouldway ouchtay allay objectsay, evenay ulipstay anday osesray, ithway itsay ownay ankblay inge—ponderingtay allay isthay, ethay alsiedpay universeay ieslay eforebay usay aay eperlay; anday ikelay ilfulway avellerstray inay Aplandlay, owhay efuseray otay earway olouredcay anday olouringcay assesglay uponay eirthay eyesay, osay ethay etchedwray infidelay azesgay imselfhay indblay atay ethay onumentalmay itewhay oudshray atthay apswray allay ethay ospectpray arounday imhay. Anday ofay allay esethay ingsthay ethay Albinoay alewhay asway ethay olsymbay. Onderway eyay enthay atay ethay ieryfay unthay? 



APTERCHAY 43ay. Arkhay! 

IST“HAY! Idday ouyay earhay atthay oisenay, Abaco?”cay 

Itay asway ethay iddle-watchmay: aay airfay oonlightmay; ethay eamensay ereway andingstay inay aay ordoncay, extendingay omfray oneay ofay ethay esh-waterfray uttsbay inay ethay aistway, otay ethay uttle-buttscay earnay ethay affrailtay. Inay isthay annermay, eythay assedpay ethay ucketsbay otay illfay ethay uttle-buttscay. Andingstay, orfay ethay ostmay artpay, onay ethay allowedhay ecinctspray ofay ethay uarter-deckqay, eythay ereway arefulcay otnay otay eakspay oray ustleray eirthay eetfay. Omfray andhay otay andhay, ethay ucketsbay entway inay ethay eepestday ilencesay, onlyay okenbray byay ethay occasionalay apflay ofay aay ailsay, anday ethay eadystay umhay ofay ethay unceasinglyay advancingay eelkay. 

Itay asway inay ethay idstmay ofay isthay eposeray, atthay Archyay, oneay ofay ethay ordoncay, osewhay ostpay asway earnay ethay after-hatchesay, isperedwhay otay ishay eighbornay, aay Olochay, ethay ordsway aboveay. 

ist“Hay! idday ouyay earhay atthay oisenay, Abaco?”cay 

ake“Tay ethay ucketbay, illway eyay, Archyay? atwhay oisenay ed’yay ean?”may 

ere“Thay itay isay again—underay ethay atches—don’thay ouyay earhay it—aay ough—itcay oundedsay ikelay aay ough.”cay 

ough“Cay ebay amnedday! Asspay alongay atthay eturnray ucket.”bay 

ere“Thay again—thereay itay is!—itay oundssay ikelay otway oray eethray eepersslay urningtay overay, ow!”nay 

aramba“Cay! avehay oneday, ipmateshay, illway eyay? It’say ethay eethray oakedsay iscuitsbay eyay eatay orfay uppersay urningtay overay insideay ofay e—nothingyay elseay. Ooklay otay ethay ucket!”bay 

ay“Say atwhay eyay illway, ipmateshay; I’veay arpshay ears.”ay 

Aye“ay, ouyay areay ethay apchay, ain’tay eyay, atthay eardhay ethay umhay ofay ethay olday Uakeress’sqay itting-needlesknay iftyfay ilesmay atay easay omfray Antucketnay; ou’reyay ethay ap.”chay 

in“Gray awayay; e’llway eesay atwhay urnstay upay. Arkhay eyay, Abacocay, erethay isay omebodysay ownday inay ethay after-holday atthay ashay otnay etyay eenbay eensay onay eckday; anday IAY uspectsay ouray olday Ogulmay owsknay omethingsay ofay itay ootay. IAY eardhay Ubbstay elltay Askflay, oneay orningmay atchway, atthay erethay asway omethingsay ofay atthay ortsay inay ethay ind.”way 

ish“Tay! ethay ucket!”bay 



APTERCHAY 44ay. Ethay Artchay. 

Adhay ouyay ollowedfay Aptaincay Ahabay ownday intoay ishay abincay afteray ethay uallsqay atthay ooktay aceplay onay ethay ightnay ucceedingsay atthay ildway atificationray ofay ishay urposepay ithway ishay ewcray, ouyay ouldway avehay eensay imhay ogay otay aay ockerlay inay ethay ansomtray, anday ingingbray outay aay argelay inkledwray ollray ofay ellowishyay easay artschay, eadspray emthay eforebay imhay onay ishay ewed-downscray abletay. Enthay eatingsay imselfhay eforebay itay, ouyay ouldway avehay eensay imhay intentlyay udystay ethay ariousvay ineslay anday adingsshay ichwhay erethay etmay ishay eyeay; anday ithway owslay utbay eadystay encilpay acetray additionalay oursescay overay acesspay atthay eforebay ereway ankblay. Atay intervalsay, ehay ouldway eferray otay ilespay ofay olday og-bookslay esidebay imhay, ereinwhay ereway etsay ownday ethay easonssay anday acesplay inay ichwhay, onay ariousvay ormerfay oyagesvay ofay ariousvay ipsshay, ermspay aleswhay adhay eenbay apturedcay oray eensay. 

Ilewhay usthay employeday, ethay eavyhay ewterpay amplay uspendedsay inay ainschay overay ishay eadhay, ontinuallycay ockedray ithway ethay otionmay ofay ethay ipshay, anday orfay everay ewthray iftingshay eamsglay anday adowsshay ofay ineslay uponay ishay inkledwray owbray, illtay itay almostay eemedsay atthay ilewhay ehay imselfhay asway arkingmay outay ineslay anday oursescay onay ethay inkledwray artschay, omesay invisibleay encilpay asway alsoay acingtray ineslay anday oursescay uponay ethay eeplyday arkedmay artchay ofay ishay oreheadfay. 

Utbay itay asway otnay isthay ightnay inay articularpay atthay, inay ethay olitudesay ofay ishay abincay, Ahabay usthay onderedpay overay ishay artschay. Almostay everyay ightnay eythay ereway oughtbray outay; almostay everyay ightnay omesay encilpay arksmay ereway effaceday, anday othersay ereway ubstitutedsay. Orfay ithway ethay artschay ofay allay ourfay oceansay eforebay imhay, Ahabay asway eadingthray aay azemay ofay urrentscay anday eddiesay, ithway aay iewvay otay ethay oremay ertaincay accomplishmentay ofay atthay onomaniacmay oughtthay ofay ishay oulsay. 

Ownay, otay anyay oneay otnay ullyfay acquainteday ithway ethay aysway ofay ethay eviathanslay, itay ightmay eemsay anay absurdlyay opelesshay asktay usthay otay eeksay outay oneay olitarysay eaturecray inay ethay unhoopeday oceansay ofay isthay anetplay. Utbay otnay osay idday itay eemsay otay Ahabay, owhay ewknay ethay etssay ofay allay idestay anday urrentscay; anday erebythay alculatingcay ethay iftingsdray ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay oodfay; anday, alsoay, allingcay otay indmay ethay egularray, ascertaineday easonssay orfay untinghay imhay inay articularpay atitudeslay; ouldcay arriveay atay easonableray urmisessay, almostay approachingay otay ertaintiescay, oncerningcay ethay imeliesttay ayday otay ebay uponay isthay oray atthay oundgray inay earchsay ofay ishay eypray. 

Osay assureday, indeeday, isay ethay actfay oncerningcay ethay eriodicalnesspay ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay esortingray otay ivengay atersway, atthay anymay untershay elievebay atthay, ouldcay ehay ebay oselyclay observeday anday udiedstay oughoutthray ethay orldway; ereway ethay ogslay orfay oneay oyagevay ofay ethay entireay alewhay eetflay arefullycay ollatedcay, enthay ethay igrationsmay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay ouldway ebay oundfay otay orrespondcay inay invariabilityay otay osethay ofay ethay erring-shoalshay oray ethay ightsflay ofay allowssway. Onay isthay inthay, attemptsay avehay eenbay ademay otay onstructcay elaborateay igratorymay artschay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay.* 



ince*Say ethay aboveay asway ittenwray, ethay atementstay isay appilyhay ornebay outay byay anay officialay ircularcay, issueday byay Ieutenantlay Aurymay, ofay ethay Ationalnay Observatoryay, Ashingtonway, Aprilay 16thay, 1851ay. Byay atthay ircularcay, itay appearsay atthay eciselypray uchsay aay artchay isay inay oursecay ofay ompletioncay; anday ortionspay ofay itay areay esentedpray inay ethay ircularcay. is“Thay artchay ividesday ethay oceanay intoay istrictsday ofay ivefay egreesday ofay atitudelay byay ivefay egreesday ofay ongitudelay; erpendicularlypay oughthray eachay ofay ichwhay istrictsday areay elvetway olumnscay orfay ethay elvetway onthsmay; anday orizontallyhay oughthray eachay ofay ichwhay istrictsday areay eethray ineslay; oneay otay owshay ethay umbernay ofay aysday atthay avehay eenbay entspay inay eachay onthmay inay everyay istrictday, anday ethay otway othersay otay owshay ethay umbernay ofay aysday inay ichwhay aleswhay, ermspay oray ightray, avehay eenbay een.”say 







Esidesbay, enwhay akingmay aay assagepay omfray oneay eeding-groundfay otay anotheray, ethay ermspay aleswhay, uidedgay byay omesay infallibleay instinct—sayay, atherray, ecretsay intelligenceay omfray ethay Eity—mostlyday imsway inay eins_vay_, asay eythay areay alledcay; ontinuingcay eirthay ayway alongay aay ivengay ocean-lineay ithway uchsay undeviatingay exactitudeay, atthay onay ipshay everay ailedsay erhay oursecay, byay anyay artchay, ithway oneay ithetay ofay uchsay arvellousmay ecisionpray. Oughthay, inay esethay asescay, ethay irectionday akentay byay anyay oneay alewhay ebay aightstray asay aay urveyor’ssay arallelpay, anday oughthay ethay inelay ofay advanceay ebay ictlystray onfinedcay otay itsay ownay unavoidableay, aightstray akeway, etyay ethay arbitraryay ein_vay_ inay ichwhay atay esethay imestay ehay isay aidsay otay imsway, enerallygay embracesay omesay ewfay ilesmay inay idthway ore(may oray esslay, asay ethay einvay isay esumedpray otay expanday oray ontractcay); utbay evernay exceedsay ethay isualvay eepsway omfray ethay ale-ship’swhay ast-headsmay, enwhay ircumspectlycay idingglay alongay isthay agicmay onezay. Ethay umsay isay, atthay atay articularpay easonssay ithinway atthay eadthbray anday alongay atthay athpay, igratingmay aleswhay aymay ithway eatgray onfidencecay ebay ookedlay orfay. 

Anday encehay otnay onlyay atay ubstantiatedsay imestay, uponay ellway ownknay eparatesay eeding-groundsfay, ouldcay Ahabay opehay otay encounteray ishay eypray; utbay inay ossingcray ethay idestway expansesay ofay aterway etweenbay osethay oundsgray ehay ouldcay, byay ishay artay, osay aceplay anday imetay imselfhay onay ishay ayway, asay evenay enthay otnay otay ebay ollywhay ithoutway ospectpray ofay aay eetingmay. 

Erethay asway aay ircumstancecay ichwhay atay irstfay ightsay eemedsay otay entangleay ishay eliriousday utbay illstay ethodicalmay emeschay. Utbay otnay osay inay ethay ealityray, erhapspay. Oughthay ethay egariousgray ermspay aleswhay avehay eirthay egularray easonssay orfay articularpay oundsgray, etyay inay eneralgay ouyay annotcay oncludecay atthay ethay erdshay ichwhay auntedhay uchsay anday uchsay aay atitudelay oray ongitudelay isthay earyay, aysay, illway urntay outay otay ebay identicallyay ethay amesay ithway osethay atthay ereway oundfay erethay ethay ecedingpray easonsay; oughthay erethay areay eculiarpay anday unquestionableay instancesay erewhay ethay ontrarycay ofay isthay ashay ovedpray uetray. Inay eneralgay, ethay amesay emarkray, onlyay ithinway aay esslay ideway imitlay, appliesay otay ethay olitariessay anday ermitshay amongay ethay aturedmay, ageday ermspay aleswhay. Osay atthay oughthay Obymay Ickday adhay inay aay ormerfay earyay eenbay eensay, orfay exampleay, onay atwhay isay alledcay ethay Eychellesay oundgray inay ethay Indianay oceanay, oray Olcanovay Aybay onay ethay Apanesejay Oastcay; etyay itay idday otnay ollowfay, atthay ereway ethay Equodpay otay isitvay eitheray ofay osethay otsspay atay anyay ubsequentsay orrespondingcay easonsay, eshay ouldway infalliblyay encounteray imhay erethay. Osay, ootay, ithway omesay otheray eedingfay oundsgray, erewhay ehay adhay atay imestay evealedray imselfhay. Utbay allay esethay eemedsay onlyay ishay asualcay opping-placesstay anday ocean-innsay, osay otay eakspay, otnay ishay acesplay ofay olongedpray abodeay. Anday erewhay Ahab’say anceschay ofay accomplishingay ishay objectay avehay ithertohay eenbay okenspay ofay, allusionay ashay onlyay eenbay ademay otay ateverwhay ay-sideway, antecedentay, extraay ospectspray ereway ishay, ereay aay articularpay etsay imetay oray aceplay ereway attaineday, enwhay allay ossibilitiespay ouldway ecomebay obabilitiespray, anday, asay Ahabay ondlyfay oughtthay, everyay ossibilitypay ethay extnay ingthay otay aay ertaintycay. Atthay articularpay etsay imetay anday aceplay ereway onjoinedcay inay ethay oneay echnicaltay ase—thephray Eason-on-the-linesay. Orfay erethay anday enthay, orfay everalsay onsecutivecay earsyay, Obymay Ickday adhay eenbay eriodicallypay escriedday, ingeringlay inay osethay atersway orfay awhileay, asay ethay unsay, inay itsay annualay oundray, oiterslay orfay aay edictedpray intervalay inay anyay oneay ignsay ofay ethay Odiaczay. Erethay itay asway, ootay, atthay ostmay ofay ethay eadlyday encountersay ithway ethay itewhay alewhay adhay akentay aceplay; erethay ethay avesway ereway oriedstay ithway ishay eedsday; erethay alsoay asway atthay agictray otspay erewhay ethay onomaniacmay olday anmay adhay oundfay ethay awfulay otivemay otay ishay engeancevay. Utbay inay ethay autiouscay omprehensivenesscay anday unloiteringay igilancevay ithway ichwhay Ahabay ewthray ishay oodingbray oulsay intoay isthay unfalteringay unthay, ehay ouldway otnay ermitpay imselfhay otay estray allay ishay opeshay uponay ethay oneay owningcray actfay aboveay entionedmay, oweverhay atteringflay itay ightmay ebay otay osethay opeshay; ornay inay ethay eeplessnessslay ofay ishay owvay ouldcay ehay osay anquillizetray ishay unquietay earthay asay otay ostponepay allay interveningay uestqay. 

Ownay, ethay Equodpay adhay ailedsay omfray Antucketnay atay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ethay Eason-on-the-linesay. Onay ossiblepay endeavoray enthay ouldcay enableay erhay ommandercay otay akemay ethay eatgray assagepay outhwardssay, oubleday Apecay Ornhay, anday enthay unningray ownday ixtysay egreesday ofay atitudelay arriveay inay ethay equatorialay Acificpay inay imetay otay uisecray erethay. Ereforethay, ehay ustmay aitway orfay ethay extnay ensuingay easonsay. Etyay ethay ematurepray ourhay ofay ethay Equod’spay ailingsay adhay, erhapspay, eenbay orrectlycay electedsay byay Ahabay, ithway aay iewvay otay isthay eryvay omplexioncay ofay ingsthay. Ecausebay, anay intervalay ofay eethray undredhay anday ixty-fivesay aysday anday ightsnay asway eforebay imhay; anay intervalay ichwhay, insteaday ofay impatientlyay enduringay ashoreay, ehay ouldway endspay inay aay iscellaneousmay unthay; ifay byay ancechay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, endingspay ishay acationvay inay eassay arfay emoteray omfray ishay eriodicalpay eeding-groundsfay, ouldshay urntay upay ishay inkledwray owbray offay ethay Ersianpay Ulfgay, oray inay ethay Engalbay Aybay, oray Inachay Eassay, oray inay anyay otheray atersway auntedhay byay ishay aceray. Osay atthay Onsoonsmay, Ampaspay, Or’-westersnay, Armattanshay, Adestray; anyay indway utbay ethay Evanterlay anday Imoonsay, ightmay owblay Obymay Ickday intoay ethay eviousday ig-zagzay orld-circleway ofay ethay Equod’spay ircumnavigatingcay akeway. 

Utbay antinggray allay isthay; etyay, egardedray iscreetlyday anday oollycay, eemssay itay otnay utbay aay admay ideaay, isthay; atthay inay ethay oadbray oundlessbay oceanay, oneay olitarysay alewhay, evenay ifay encountereday, ouldshay ebay oughtthay apablecay ofay individualay ecognitionray omfray ishay unterhay, evenay asay aay ite-beardedwhay Uftimay inay ethay ongedthray oroughfaresthay ofay Onstantinoplecay? Esyay. Orfay ethay eculiarpay ow-whitesnay owbray ofay Obymay Ickday, anday ishay ow-whitesnay umphay, ouldcay otnay utbay ebay unmistakableay. Anday avehay IAY otnay alliedtay ethay alewhay, Ahabay ouldway uttermay otay imselfhay, asay afteray oringpay overay ishay artschay illtay onglay afteray idnightmay ehay ouldway owthray imselfhay ackbay inay everies—talliedray imhay, anday allshay ehay escapeay? Ishay oadbray insfay areay oredbay, anday allopedscay outay ikelay aay ostlay eep’sshay earay! Anday erehay, ishay admay indmay ouldway unray onay inay aay eathlessbray aceray; illtay aay earinessway anday aintnessfay ofay onderingpay amecay overay imhay; anday inay ethay openay airay ofay ethay eckday ehay ouldway eeksay otay ecoverray ishay engthstray. Ahay, Odgay! atwhay ancestray ofay ormentstay oesday atthay anmay endureay owhay isay onsumedcay ithway oneay unachieveday evengefulray esireday. Ehay eepsslay ithway enchedclay andshay; anday akesway ithway ishay ownay oodyblay ailsnay inay ishay almspay. 

Oftenay, enwhay orcedfay omfray ishay ammockhay byay exhaustingay anday intolerablyay ividvay eamsdray ofay ethay ightnay, ichwhay, esumingray ishay ownay intenseay oughtsthay oughthray ethay ayday, arriedcay emthay onay amiday aay ashingclay ofay ensiesphray, anday irledwhay emthay oundray anday oundray anday oundray inay ishay azingblay ainbray, illtay ethay eryvay obbingthray ofay ishay ife-spotlay ecamebay insufferableay anguishay; anday enwhay, asay asway ometimessay ethay asecay, esethay iritualspay oesthray inay imhay eavedhay ishay eingbay upay omfray itsay asebay, anday aay asmchay eemedsay openingay inay imhay, omfray ichwhay orkedfay amesflay anday ightningslay otshay upay, anday accurseday iendsfay eckonedbay imhay otay eaplay ownday amongay emthay; enwhay isthay ellhay inay imselfhay awnedyay eneathbay imhay, aay ildway cryay ouldway ebay eardhay oughthray ethay ipshay; anday ithway aringglay eyesay Ahabay ouldway urstbay omfray ishay atestay oomray, asay oughthay escapingay omfray aay edbay atthay asway onay irefay. Etyay esethay, erhapspay, insteaday ofay eingbay ethay unsuppressableay omssymptay ofay omesay atentlay eaknessway, oray ightfray atay ishay ownay esolveray, ereway utbay ethay ainestplay okenstay ofay itsay intensityay. Orfay, atay uchsay imestay, azycray Ahabay, ethay emingschay, unappeasedlyay eadfaststay unterhay ofay ethay itewhay alewhay; isthay Ahabay atthay adhay onegay otay ishay ammockhay, asway otnay ethay agentay atthay osay ausedcay imhay otay urstbay omfray itay inay orrorhay againay. Ethay atterlay asway ethay eternalay, ivinglay inciplepray oray oulsay inay imhay; anday inay eepslay, eingbay orfay ethay imetay issociatedday omfray ethay aracterizingchay indmay, ichwhay atay otheray imestay employeday itay orfay itsay outeray ehiclevay oray agentay, itay ontaneouslyspay oughtsay escapeay omfray ethay orchingscay ontiguitycay ofay ethay anticfray ingthay, ofay ichwhay, orfay ethay imetay, itay asway onay ongerlay anay integralay. Utbay asay ethay indmay oesday otnay existay unlessay eaguedlay ithway ethay oulsay, ereforethay itay ustmay avehay eenbay atthay, inay Ahab’say asecay, ieldingyay upay allay ishay oughtsthay anday anciesfay otay ishay oneay upremesay urposepay; atthay urposepay, byay itsay ownay eershay inveteracyay ofay illway, orcedfay itselfay againstay odsgay anday evilsday intoay aay indkay ofay elf-assumedsay, independentay eingbay ofay itsay ownay. Aynay, ouldcay imlygray ivelay anday urnbay, ilewhay ethay ommoncay italityvay otay ichwhay itay asway onjoinedcay, edflay orror-strickenhay omfray ethay unbiddenay anday unfathereday irthbay. Ereforethay, ethay ormentedtay iritspay atthay aredglay outay ofay odilybay eyesay, enwhay atwhay eemedsay Ahabay ushedray omfray ishay oomray, asway orfay ethay imetay utbay aay acatedvay ingthay, aay ormlessfay omnambulisticsay eingbay, aay ayray ofay ivinglay ightlay, otay ebay uresay, utbay ithoutway anay objectay otay olourcay, anday ereforethay aay anknessblay inay itselfay. Odgay elphay eethay, olday anmay, thyay oughtsthay avehay eatedcray aay eaturecray inay eethay; anday ehay osewhay intenseay inkingthay usthay akesmay imhay aay Ometheuspray; aay ulturevay eedsfay uponay atthay earthay orfay everay; atthay ulturevay ethay eryvay eaturecray ehay eatescray. 



APTERCHAY 45ay. Ethay Affidavitay. 

Osay arfay asay atwhay erethay aymay ebay ofay aay arrativenay inay isthay ookbay; anday, indeeday, asay indirectlyay ouchingtay oneay oray otway eryvay interestingay anday uriouscay articularspay inay ethay abitshay ofay ermspay aleswhay, ethay oregoingfay apterchay, inay itsay earlieray artpay, isay asay importantay aay oneay asay illway ebay oundfay inay isthay olumevay; utbay ethay eadinglay attermay ofay itay equiresray otay ebay illstay urtherfay anday oremay amiliarlyfay enlargeday uponay, inay orderay otay ebay adequatelyay understooday, anday oreovermay otay aketay awayay anyay incredulityay ichwhay aay ofoundpray ignoranceay ofay ethay entireay ubjectsay aymay induceay inay omesay indsmay, asay otay ethay aturalnay erityvay ofay ethay ainmay ointspay ofay isthay affairay. 

IAY arecay otnay otay erformpay isthay artpay ofay myay asktay ethodicallymay; utbay allshay ebay ontentcay otay oducepray ethay esiredday impressionay byay eparatesay itationscay ofay itemsay, acticallypray oray eliablyray ownknay otay emay asay aay alemanwhay; anday omfray esethay itationscay, IAY aketay it—theay onclusioncay aimeday atay illway aturallynay ollowfay ofay itselfay. 

Irstfay: IAY avehay ersonallypay ownknay eethray instancesay erewhay aay alewhay, afteray eceivingray aay arpoonhay, ashay effecteday aay ompletecay escapeay; anday, afteray anay intervalay in(ay oneay instanceay ofay eethray earsyay), ashay eenbay againay uckstray byay ethay amesay andhay, anday ainslay; enwhay ethay otway ironsay, othbay arkedmay byay ethay amesay ivatepray ercyphay, avehay eenbay akentay omfray ethay odybay. Inay ethay instanceay erewhay eethray earsyay interveneday etweenbay ethay ingingflay ofay ethay otway arpoonshay; anday IAY inkthay itay aymay avehay eenbay omethingsay oremay anthay atthay; ethay anmay owhay artedday emthay appeninghay, inay ethay intervalay, otay ogay inay aay adingtray ipshay onay aay oyagevay otay Africaay, entway ashoreay erethay, oinedjay aay iscoveryday artypay, anday enetratedpay arfay intoay ethay interioray, erewhay ehay avelledtray orfay aay eriodpay ofay earlynay otway earsyay, oftenay endangereday byay erpentssay, avagessay, igerstay, oisonouspay iasmasmay, ithway allay ethay otheray ommoncay erilspay incidentay otay anderingway inay ethay earthay ofay unknownay egionsray. Eanwhilemay, ethay alewhay ehay adhay uckstray ustmay alsoay avehay eenbay onay itsay avelstray; onay oubtday itay adhay icethray ircumnavigatedcay ethay obeglay, ushingbray ithway itsay anksflay allay ethay oastscay ofay Africaay; utbay otay onay urposepay. Isthay anmay anday isthay alewhay againay amecay ogethertay, anday ethay oneay anquishedvay ethay otheray. IAY aysay IAY, elfmysay, avehay ownknay eethray instancesay imilarsay otay isthay; atthay isay inay otway ofay emthay IAY awsay ethay aleswhay uckstray; anday, uponay ethay econdsay attackay, awsay ethay otway ironsay ithway ethay espectiveray arksmay utcay inay emthay, afterwardsay akentay omfray ethay eadday ishfay. Inay ethay ee-yearthray instanceay, itay osay ellfay outay atthay IAY asway inay ethay oatbay othbay imestay, irstfay anday astlay, anday ethay astlay imetay istinctlyday ecognisedray aay eculiarpay ortsay ofay ugehay olemay underay ethay ale’swhay eyeay, ichwhay IAY adhay observeday erethay eethray earsyay eviouspray. IAY aysay eethray earsyay, utbay IAY amay ettypray uresay itay asway oremay anthay atthay. Erehay areay eethray instancesay, enthay, ichwhay IAY ersonallypay owknay ethay uthtray ofay; utbay IAY avehay eardhay ofay anymay otheray instancesay omfray ersonspay osewhay eracityvay inay ethay attermay erethay isay onay oodgay oundgray otay impeachay. 

Econdlysay: Itay isay ellway ownknay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay Isheryfay, oweverhay ignorantay ethay orldway ashoreay aymay ebay ofay itay, atthay erethay avehay eenbay everalsay emorablemay istoricalhay instancesay erewhay aay articularpay alewhay inay ethay oceanay ashay eenbay atay istantday imestay anday acesplay opularlypay ognisablecay. Whyay uchsay aay alewhay ecamebay usthay arkedmay asway otnay altogetheray anday originallyay owingay otay ishay odilybay eculiaritiespay asay istinguishedday omfray otheray aleswhay; orfay oweverhay eculiarpay inay atthay espectray anyay ancechay alewhay aymay ebay, eythay oonsay utpay anay enday otay ishay eculiaritiespay byay illingkay imhay, anday oilingbay imhay ownday intoay aay eculiarlypay aluablevay oilay. Onay: ethay easonray asway isthay: atthay omfray ethay atalfay experiencesay ofay ethay isheryfay erethay unghay aay erribletay estigepray ofay erilousnesspay aboutay uchsay aay alewhay asay erethay idday aboutay Inaldoray Inaldiniray, insomuchay atthay ostmay ishermenfay ereway ontentcay otay ecogniseray imhay byay erelymay ouchingtay eirthay arpaulinstay enwhay ehay ouldway ebay iscoveredday ounginglay byay emthay onay ethay easay, ithoutway eekingsay otay ultivatecay aay oremay intimateay acquaintanceay. Ikelay omesay oorpay evilsday ashoreay atthay appenhay otay owknay anay irascibleay eatgray anmay, eythay akemay istantday unobtrusiveay alutationssay otay imhay inay ethay eetstray, estlay ifay eythay ursuedpay ethay acquaintanceay urtherfay, eythay ightmay eceiveray aay ummarysay umpthay orfay eirthay esumptionpray. 

Utbay otnay onlyay idday eachay ofay esethay amousfay aleswhay enjoyay eatgray individualay elebrity—Naycay, ouyay aymay allcay itay anay ocean-wideay enownray; otnay onlyay asway ehay amousfay inay ifelay anday ownay isay immortalay inay orecastlefay oriesstay afteray eathday, utbay ehay asway admitteday intoay allay ethay ightsray, ivilegespray, anday istinctionsday ofay aay amenay; adhay asay uchmay aay amenay indeeday asay Ambysescay oray Arcæsay. Asway itay otnay osay, OAY Imortay Omtay! outhay amedfay eviathanlay, arredscay ikelay anay icebergay, owhay osay onglay id’stday urklay inay ethay Orientalay aitsstray ofay atthay amenay, osewhay outspay asway oftay eensay omfray ethay almypay eachbay ofay Ombayay? Asway itay otnay osay, OAY Ewnay Ealandzay Ackjay! outhay errortay ofay allay uiserscray atthay ossedcray eirthay akesway inay ethay icinityvay ofay ethay Attootay Andlay? Asway itay otnay osay, OAY Orquanmay! Ingkay ofay Apanjay, osewhay oftylay etjay eythay aysay atay imestay assumeday ethay emblancesay ofay aay ow-whitesnay osscray againstay ethay skyay? Asway itay otnay osay, OAY Onday Iguelmay! outhay Ilianchay alewhay, arkedmay ikelay anay olday ortoisetay ithway icmystay ieroglyphicshay uponay ethay ackbay! Inay ainplay osepray, erehay areay ourfay aleswhay asay ellway ownknay otay ethay udentsstay ofay Etaceancay Istoryhay asay Ariusmay oray Asyllay otay ethay assicclay olarschay. 

Utbay isthay isay otnay allay. Ewnay Ealandzay Omtay anday Onday Iguelmay, afteray atay ariousvay imestay eatingcray eatgray avochay amongay ethay oatsbay ofay ifferentday esselsvay, ereway inallyfay onegay inay uestqay ofay, ematicallysystay untedhay outay, asedchay anday illedkay byay aliantvay alingwhay aptainscay, owhay eavedhay upay eirthay anchorsay ithway atthay expressay objectay asay uchmay inay iewvay, asay inay ettingsay outay oughthray ethay Arragansettnay Oodsway, Aptaincay Utlerbay ofay olday adhay itay inay ishay indmay otay apturecay atthay otoriousnay urderousmay avagesay Annawonay, ethay eadmosthay arriorway ofay ethay Indianay Ingkay Ilipphay. 

IAY oday otnay owknay erewhay IAY ancay indfay aay etterbay aceplay anthay ustjay erehay, otay akemay entionmay ofay oneay oray otway otheray ingsthay, ichwhay otay emay eemsay importantay, asay inay intedpray ormfay establishingay inay allay espectsray ethay easonablenessray ofay ethay olewhay orystay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, oremay especiallyay ethay atastrophecay. Orfay isthay isay oneay ofay osethay ishearteningday instancesay erewhay uthtray equiresray ullfay asay uchmay olsteringbay asay erroray. Osay ignorantay areay ostmay andsmenlay ofay omesay ofay ethay ainestplay anday ostmay alpablepay ondersway ofay ethay orldway, atthay ithoutway omesay intshay ouchingtay ethay ainplay actsfay, istoricalhay anday otherwiseay, ofay ethay isheryfay, eythay ightmay outscay atay Obymay Ickday asay aay onstrousmay ablefay, oray illstay orseway anday oremay etestableday, aay ideoushay anday intolerableay allegoryay. 

Irstfay: Oughthay ostmay enmay avehay omesay aguevay ittingflay ideasay ofay ethay eneralgay erilspay ofay ethay andgray isheryfay, etyay eythay avehay othingnay ikelay aay ixedfay, ividvay onceptioncay ofay osethay erilspay, anday ethay equencyfray ithway ichwhay eythay ecurray. Oneay easonray erhapspay isay, atthay otnay oneay inay iftyfay ofay ethay actualay isastersday anday eathsday byay asualtiescay inay ethay isheryfay, everay indsfay aay ublicpay ecordray atay omehay, oweverhay ansienttray anday immediatelyay orgottenfay atthay ecordray. Oday ouyay upposesay atthay atthay oorpay ellowfay erethay, owhay isthay omentmay erhapspay aughtcay byay ethay ale-linewhay offay ethay oastcay ofay Ewnay Uineagay, isay eingbay arriedcay ownday otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay byay ethay oundingsay eviathan—dolay ouyay upposesay atthay atthay oorpay ellow’sfay amenay illway appearay inay ethay ewspapernay obituaryay ouyay illway eadray o-morrowtay atay ouryay eakfastbray? Onay: ecausebay ethay ailsmay areay eryvay irregularay etweenbay erehay anday Ewnay Uineagay. Inay actfay, idday ouyay everay earhay atwhay ightmay ebay alledcay egularray ewsnay irectday oray indirectay omfray Ewnay Uineagay? Etyay IAY elltay ouyay atthay uponay oneay articularpay oyagevay ichwhay IAY ademay otay ethay Acificpay, amongay anymay othersay eway okespay irtythay ifferentday ipsshay, everyay oneay ofay ichwhay adhay adhay aay eathday byay aay alewhay, omesay ofay emthay oremay anthay oneay, anday eethray atthay adhay eachay ostlay aay oat’sbay ewcray. Orfay Od’sgay akesay, ebay economicalay ithway ouryay ampslay anday andlescay! otnay aay allongay ouyay urnbay, utbay atay eastlay oneay opdray ofay an’smay oodblay asway illedspay orfay itay. 

Econdlysay: Eoplepay ashoreay avehay indeeday omesay indefiniteay ideaay atthay aay alewhay isay anay enormousay eaturecray ofay enormousay owerpay; utbay IAY avehay everay oundfay atthay enwhay arratingnay otay emthay omesay ecificspay exampleay ofay isthay o-foldtway enormousnessay, eythay avehay ignificantlysay omplimentedcay emay uponay myay acetiousnessfay; enwhay, IAY eclareday uponay myay oulsay, IAY adhay onay oremay ideaay ofay eingbay acetiousfay anthay Osesmay, enwhay ehay otewray ethay istoryhay ofay ethay aguesplay ofay Egyptay. 

Utbay ortunatelyfay ethay ecialspay ointpay IAY erehay eeksay ancay ebay establisheday uponay estimonytay entirelyay independentay ofay myay ownay. Atthay ointpay isay isthay: Ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay inay omesay asescay ufficientlysay owerfulpay, owingknay, anday udiciouslyjay aliciousmay, asay ithway irectday aforethoughtay otay avestay inay, utterlyay estroyday, anday inksay aay argelay ipshay; anday atwhay isay oremay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay as_hay_ oneday itay. 

Irstfay: Inay ethay earyay 1820ay ethay ipshay Essexay, Aptaincay Ollardpay, ofay Antucketnay, asway uisingcray inay ethay Acificpay Oceanay. Oneay ayday eshay awsay outsspay, oweredlay erhay oatsbay, anday avegay asechay otay aay oalshay ofay ermspay aleswhay. Ereay onglay, everalsay ofay ethay aleswhay ereway oundedway; enwhay, uddenlysay, aay eryvay argelay alewhay escapingay omfray ethay oatsbay, issueday omfray ethay oalshay, anday orebay irectlyday ownday uponay ethay ipshay. Ashingday ishay oreheadfay againstay erhay ullhay, ehay osay ovestay erhay inay, atthay inay esslay anthay en“tay inutes”may eshay ettledsay ownday anday ellfay overay. Otnay aay urvivingsay ankplay ofay erhay ashay eenbay eensay incesay. Afteray ethay everestsay exposureay, artpay ofay ethay ewcray eachedray ethay andlay inay eirthay oatsbay. Eingbay eturnedray omehay atay astlay, Aptaincay Ollardpay onceay oremay ailedsay orfay ethay Acificpay inay ommandcay ofay anotheray ipshay, utbay ethay odsgay ipwreckedshay imhay againay uponay unknownay ocksray anday eakersbray; orfay ethay econdsay imetay ishay ipshay asway utterlyay ostlay, anday orthwithfay orswearingfay ethay easay, ehay ashay evernay emptedtay itay incesay. Atay isthay ayday Aptaincay Ollardpay isay aay esidentray ofay Antucketnay. IAY avehay eensay Owenay Acechay, owhay asway iefchay atemay ofay ethay Essexay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay agedytray; IAY avehay eadray ishay ainplay anday aithfulfay arrativenay; IAY avehay onversedcay ithway ishay onsay; anday allay isthay ithinway aay ewfay ilesmay ofay ethay enescay ofay ethay atastrophecay.* 

e*Thay ollowingfay areay extractsay omfray Ace’schay arrativenay: Every“ay actfay eemedsay otay arrantway emay inay oncludingcay atthay itay asway anythingay utbay ancechay ichwhay irectedday ishay operationsay; ehay ademay otway everalsay attacksay uponay ethay ipshay, atay aay ortshay intervalay etweenbay emthay, othbay ofay ichwhay, accordingay otay eirthay irectionday, ereway alculatedcay otay oday usay ethay ostmay injuryay, byay eingbay ademay aheaday, anday erebythay ombiningcay ethay eedspay ofay ethay otway objectsay orfay ethay ockshay; otay effectay ichwhay, ethay exactay anœuvresmay ichwhay ehay ademay ereway ecessarynay. Ishay aspectay asway ostmay orriblehay, anday uchsay asay indicateday esentmentray anday uryfay. Ehay amecay irectlyday omfray ethay oalshay ichwhay eway adhay ustjay eforebay entereday, anday inay ichwhay eway adhay uckstray eethray ofay ishay ompanionscay, asay ifay iredfay ithway evengeray orfay eirthay ufferings.”say Againay: At“ay allay eventsay, ethay olewhay ircumstancescay akentay ogethertay, allay appeninghay eforebay myay ownay eyesay, anday oducingpray, atay ethay imetay, impressionsay inay myay indmay ofay ecidedday, alculatingcay ischiefmay, onay ethay artpay ofay ethay alewhay any(may ofay ichwhay impressionsay IAY annotcay ownay ecallray), induceay emay otay ebay atisfiedsay atthay IAY amay orrectcay inay myay opinion.”ay 

Erehay areay ishay eflectionsray omesay imetay afteray uittingqay ethay ipshay, uringday aay ackblay ightnay inay anay openay oatbay, enwhay almostay espairingday ofay eachingray anyay ospitablehay oreshay. e“Thay arkday oceanay anday ellingsway atersway ereway othingnay; ethay earsfay ofay eingbay allowedsway upay byay omesay eadfuldray empesttay, oray ashedday uponay iddenhay ocksray, ithway allay ethay otheray ordinaryay ubjectssay ofay earfulfay ontemplationcay, eemedsay arcelyscay entitleday otay aay oment’smay oughtthay; ethay ismalday ookinglay eckwray, anday e_thay orridhay aspectay anday evengeray ofay ethay alewhay_, ollywhay engrosseday myay eflectionsray, untilay ayday againay ademay itsay appearance.”ay 

Inay anotheray ace—pplay. e45,—hay eaksspay ofay e“_thay eriousmystay anday ortalmay attackay ofay ethay animal_.”ay 

Econdlysay: Ethay ipshay Unionay, alsoay ofay Antucketnay, asway inay ethay earyay 1807ay otallytay ostlay offay ethay Azoresay byay aay imilarsay onsetay, utbay ethay authenticay articularspay ofay isthay atastrophecay IAY avehay evernay ancedchay otay encounteray, oughthay omfray ethay alewhay untershay IAY avehay ownay anday enthay eardhay asualcay allusionsay otay itay. 

Irdlythay: Omesay eighteenay oray entytway earsyay agoay Ommodorecay J——AY, enthay ommandingcay anay Americanay oop-of-warslay ofay ethay irstfay assclay, appenedhay otay ebay iningday ithway aay artypay ofay alingwhay aptainscay, onay oardbay aay Antucketnay ipshay inay ethay arborhay ofay Oahuay, Andwichsay Islandsay. Onversationcay urningtay uponay aleswhay, ethay Ommodorecay asway easedplay otay ebay epticalscay ouchingtay ethay amazingay engthstray ascribeday otay emthay byay ethay ofessionalpray entlemengay esentpray. Ehay eremptorilypay eniedday orfay exampleay, atthay anyay alewhay ouldcay osay itesmay ishay outstay oop-of-warslay asay otay ausecay erhay otay eaklay osay uchmay asay aay imblefulthay. Eryvay oodgay; utbay erethay isay oremay omingcay. Omesay eeksway afteray, ethay Ommodorecay etsay ailsay inay isthay impregnableay aftcray orfay Alparaisovay. Utbay ehay asway oppedstay onay ethay ayway byay aay ortlypay ermspay alewhay, atthay eggedbay aay ewfay oments’may onfidentialcay usinessbay ithway imhay. Atthay usinessbay onsistedcay inay etchingfay ethay Ommodore’scay aftcray uchsay aay ackthway, atthay ithway allay ishay umpspay oinggay ehay ademay aightstray orfay ethay earestnay ortpay otay eavehay ownday anday epairray. IAY amay otnay uperstitioussay, utbay IAY onsidercay ethay Ommodore’scay intervieway ithway atthay alewhay asay ovidentialpray. Asway otnay Aulsay ofay Arsustay onvertedcay omfray unbeliefay byay aay imilarsay ightfray? IAY elltay ouyay, ethay ermspay alewhay illway andstay onay onsensenay. 

IAY illway ownay eferray ouyay otay Angsdorff’slay Oyagesvay orfay aay ittlelay ircumstancecay inay ointpay, eculiarlypay interestingay otay ethay iterwray ereofhay. Angsdorfflay, ouyay ustmay owknay byay ethay ayway, asway attacheday otay ethay Ussianray Admiralay Usenstern’skray amousfay Iscoveryday Expeditionay inay ethay eginningbay ofay ethay esentpray enturycay. Aptaincay Angsdorfflay usthay eginsbay ishay eventeenthsay apterchay: 

“Byay ethay irteenththay ofay Aymay ouray ipshay asway eadyray otay ailsay, anday ethay extnay ayday eway ereway outay inay ethay openay easay, onay ouray ayway otay Ochotshay. Ethay eatherway asway eryvay earclay anday inefay, utbay osay intolerablyay oldcay atthay eway ereway obligeday otay eepkay onay ouray urfay othingclay. Orfay omesay aysday eway adhay eryvay ittlelay indway; itay asway otnay illtay ethay ineteenthnay atthay aay iskbray alegay omfray ethay orthwestnay angspray upay. Anay uncommonay argelay alewhay, ethay odybay ofay ichwhay asway argerlay anthay ethay ipshay itselfay, aylay almostay atay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay aterway, utbay asway otnay erceivedpay byay anyay oneay onay oardbay illtay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay ipshay, ichwhay asway inay ullfay ailsay, asway almostay uponay imhay, osay atthay itay asway impossibleay otay eventpray itsay ikingstray againstay imhay. Eway ereway usthay acedplay inay ethay ostmay imminentay angerday, asay isthay iganticgay eaturecray, ettingsay upay itsay ackbay, aisedray ethay ipshay eethray eetfay atay eastlay outay ofay ethay aterway. Ethay astsmay eeledray, anday ethay ailssay ellfay altogetheray, ilewhay eway owhay ereway elowbay allay angspray instantlyay uponay ethay eckday, oncludingcay atthay eway adhay uckstray uponay omesay ockray; insteaday ofay isthay eway awsay ethay onstermay ailingsay offay ithway ethay utmostay avitygray anday olemnitysay. Aptaincay Olfd’way applieday immediatelyay otay ethay umpspay otay examineay etherwhay oray otnay ethay esselvay adhay eceivedray anyay amageday omfray ethay ockshay, utbay eway oundfay atthay eryvay appilyhay itay adhay escapeday entirelyay uninjured.”ay 

Ownay, ethay Aptaincay Olfd’way erehay alludeday otay asay ommandingcay ethay ipshay inay uestionqay, isay aay Ewnay Englanderay, owhay, afteray aay onglay ifelay ofay unusualay adventuresay asay aay ea-captainsay, isthay ayday esidesray inay ethay illagevay ofay Orchesterday earnay Ostonbay. IAY avehay ethay onorhay ofay eingbay aay ephewnay ofay ishay. IAY avehay articularlypay uestionedqay imhay oncerningcay isthay assagepay inay Angsdorfflay. Ehay ubstantiatessay everyay ordway. Ethay ipshay, oweverhay, asway byay onay eansmay aay argelay oneay: aay Ussianray aftcray uiltbay onay ethay Iberiansay oastcay, anday urchasedpay byay myay uncleay afteray arteringbay awayay ethay esselvay inay ichwhay ehay ailedsay omfray omehay. 

Inay atthay upay anday ownday anlymay ookbay ofay old-fashioneday adventureay, osay ullfay, ootay, ofay onesthay onders—theway oyagevay ofay Ionellay Aferway, oneay ofay ancientay Ampier’sday olday ums—Ichay oundfay aay ittlelay attermay etsay ownday osay ikelay atthay ustjay uotedqay omfray Angsdorfflay, atthay IAY annotcay orbearfay insertingay itay erehay orfay aay orroborativecay exampleay, ifay uchsay ebay eedednay. 

Ionellay, itay eemssay, asway onay ishay ayway otay ohn“Jay Erdinando,”fay asay ehay allscay ethay odernmay Uanjay Ernandesfay. In“ay ouray ayway ither,”thay ehay ayssay, about“ay ourfay o’clockay inay ethay orningmay, enwhay eway ereway aboutay oneay undredhay anday iftyfay eagueslay omfray ethay Ainmay ofay Americaay, ouray ipshay eltfay aay erribletay ockshay, ichwhay utpay ouray enmay inay uchsay onsternationcay atthay eythay ouldcay ardlyhay elltay erewhay eythay ereway oray atwhay otay inkthay; utbay everyay oneay eganbay otay eparepray orfay eathday. Anday, indeeday, ethay ockshay asway osay uddensay anday iolentvay, atthay eway ooktay itay orfay antedgray ethay ipshay adhay uckstray againstay aay ockray; utbay enwhay ethay amazementay asway aay ittlelay overay, eway astcay ethay eadlay, anday oundedsay, utbay oundfay onay oundgray. ay* ay* ay* ay* ay* Ethay uddennesssay ofay ethay ockshay ademay ethay unsgay eaplay inay eirthay arriagescay, anday everalsay ofay ethay enmay ereway akenshay outay ofay eirthay ammockshay. Aptaincay Avisday, owhay aylay ithway ishay eadhay onay aay ungay, asway ownthray outay ofay ishay abin!”cay Ionellay enthay oesgay onay otay imputeay ethay ockshay otay anay earthquakeay, anday eemssay otay ubstantiatesay ethay imputationay byay atingstay atthay aay eatgray earthquakeay, omewheresay aboutay atthay imetay, idday actuallyay oday eatgray ischiefmay alongay ethay Anishspay andlay. Utbay IAY ouldshay otnay uchmay onderway ifay, inay ethay arknessday ofay atthay earlyay ourhay ofay ethay orningmay, ethay ockshay asway afteray allay ausedcay byay anay unseenay alewhay erticallyvay umpingbay ethay ullhay omfray eneathbay. 

IAY ightmay oceedpray ithway everalsay oremay examplesay, oneay ayway oray anotheray ownknay otay emay, ofay ethay eatgray owerpay anday alicemay atay imestay ofay ethay ermspay alewhay. Inay oremay anthay oneay instanceay, ehay ashay eenbay ownknay, otnay onlyay otay asechay ethay assailingay oatsbay ackbay otay eirthay ipsshay, utbay otay ursuepay ethay ipshay itselfay, anday onglay ithstandway allay ethay anceslay urledhay atay imhay omfray itsay ecksday. Ethay Englishay ipshay Usiepay Allhay ancay elltay aay orystay onay atthay eadhay; anday, asay orfay ishay engthstray, etlay emay aysay, atthay erethay avehay eenbay examplesay erewhay ethay ineslay attacheday otay aay unningray ermspay alewhay avehay, inay aay almcay, eenbay ansferredtray otay ethay ipshay, anday ecuredsay erethay; ethay alewhay owingtay erhay eatgray ullhay oughthray ethay aterway, asay aay orsehay alksway offay ithway aay artcay. Againay, itay isay eryvay oftenay observeday atthay, ifay ethay ermspay alewhay, onceay uckstray, isay alloweday imetay otay allyray, ehay enthay actsay, otnay osay oftenay ithway indblay ageray, asay ithway ilfulway, eliberateday esignsday ofay estructionday otay ishay ursuerspay; ornay isay itay ithoutway onveyingcay omesay eloquentay indicationay ofay ishay aracterchay, atthay uponay eingbay attackeday ehay illway equentlyfray openay ishay outhmay, anday etainray itay inay atthay eaddray expansionay orfay everalsay onsecutivecay inutesmay. Utbay IAY ustmay ebay ontentcay ithway onlyay oneay oremay anday aay oncludingcay illustrationay; aay emarkableray anday ostmay ignificantsay oneay, byay ichwhay ouyay illway otnay ailfay otay eesay, atthay otnay onlyay isay ethay ostmay arvellousmay eventay inay isthay ookbay orroboratedcay byay ainplay actsfay ofay ethay esentpray ayday, utbay atthay esethay arvelsmay ike(lay allay arvelsmay) areay eremay epetitionsray ofay ethay agesay; osay atthay orfay ethay illionthmay imetay eway aysay amenay ithway Olomon—verilysay erethay isay othingnay ewnay underay ethay unsay. 

Inay ethay ixthsay Istianchray enturycay ivedlay Ocopiuspray, aay Istianchray agistratemay ofay Onstantinoplecay, inay ethay aysday enwhay Ustinianjay asway Emperoray anday Elisariusbay eneralgay. Asay anymay owknay, ehay otewray ethay istoryhay ofay ishay ownay imestay, aay orkway everyay ayway ofay uncommonay aluevay. Byay ethay estbay authoritiesay, ehay ashay alwaysay eenbay onsideredcay aay ostmay ustworthytray anday unexaggeratingay istorianhay, exceptay inay omesay oneay oray otway articularspay, otnay atay allay affectingay ethay attermay esentlypray otay ebay entionedmay. 

Ownay, inay isthay istoryhay ofay ishay, Ocopiuspray entionsmay atthay, uringday ethay ermtay ofay ishay efecturepray atay Onstantinoplecay, aay eatgray ea-monstersay asway apturedcay inay ethay eighboringnay Opontispray, oray Easay ofay Armoramay, afteray avinghay estroyedday esselsvay atay intervalsay inay osethay atersway orfay aay eriodpay ofay oremay anthay iftyfay earsyay. AAY actfay usthay etsay ownday inay ubstantialsay istoryhay annotcay easilyay ebay ainsaidgay. Ornay isay erethay anyay easonray itay ouldshay ebay. Ofay atwhay ecisepray eciesspay isthay ea-monstersay asway, isay otnay entionedmay. Utbay asay ehay estroyedday ipsshay, asay ellway asay orfay otheray easonsray, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay aay alewhay; anday IAY amay onglystray inclineday otay inkthay aay ermspay alewhay. Anday IAY illway elltay ouyay whyay. Orfay aay onglay imetay IAY anciedfay atthay ethay ermspay alewhay adhay eenbay alwaysay unknownay inay ethay Editerraneanmay anday ethay eepday atersway onnectingcay ithway itay. Evenay ownay IAY amay ertaincay atthay osethay eassay areay otnay, anday erhapspay evernay ancay ebay, inay ethay esentpray onstitutioncay ofay ingsthay, aay aceplay orfay ishay abitualhay egariousgray esortray. Utbay urtherfay investigationsay avehay ecentlyray ovedpray otay emay, atthay inay odernmay imestay erethay avehay eenbay isolateday instancesay ofay ethay esencepray ofay ethay ermspay alewhay inay ethay Editerraneanmay. IAY amay oldtay, onay oodgay authorityay, atthay onay ethay Arbarybay oastcay, aay Ommodorecay Avisday ofay ethay Itishbray avynay oundfay ethay eletonskay ofay aay ermspay alewhay. Ownay, asay aay esselvay ofay arway eadilyray assespay oughthray ethay Ardanellesday, encehay aay ermspay alewhay ouldcay, byay ethay amesay outeray, asspay outay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay intoay ethay Opontispray. 

Inay ethay Opontispray, asay arfay asay IAY ancay earnlay, onenay ofay atthay eculiarpay ubstancesay alledcay it_bray_ isay otay ebay oundfay, ethay alimentay ofay ethay ightray alewhay. Utbay IAY avehay everyay easonray otay elievebay atthay ethay oodfay ofay ethay ermspay ale—squidwhay oray uttle-fish—lurkscay atay ethay ottombay ofay atthay easay, ecausebay argelay eaturescray, utbay byay onay eansmay ethay argestlay ofay atthay ortsay, avehay eenbay oundfay atay itsay urfacesay. Ifay, enthay, ouyay operlypray utpay esethay atementsstay ogethertay, anday easonray uponay emthay aay itbay, ouyay illway earlyclay erceivepay atthay, accordingay otay allay umanhay easoningray, Ocopius’spray ea-monstersay, atthay orfay alfhay aay enturycay ovestay ethay ipsshay ofay aay Omanray Emperoray, ustmay inay allay obabilitypray avehay eenbay aay ermspay alewhay. 



APTERCHAY 46ay. Urmisessay. 

Oughthay, onsumedcay ithway ethay othay irefay ofay ishay urposepay, Ahabay inay allay ishay oughtsthay anday actionsay everay adhay inay iewvay ethay ultimateay apturecay ofay Obymay Ickday; oughthay ehay eemedsay eadyray otay acrificesay allay ortalmay interestsay otay atthay oneay assionpay; everthelessnay itay aymay avehay eenbay atthay ehay asway byay aturenay anday onglay abituationhay arfay ootay eddedway otay aay ieryfay aleman’swhay aysway, altogetheray otay abandonay ethay ollateralcay osecutionpray ofay ethay oyagevay. Oray atay eastlay ifay isthay ereway otherwiseay, erethay ereway otnay antingway otheray otivesmay uchmay oremay influentialay ithway imhay. Itay ouldway ebay efiningray ootay uchmay, erhapspay, evenay onsideringcay ishay onomaniamay, otay inthay atthay ishay indictivenessvay owardstay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ightmay avehay ossiblypay extendeday itselfay inay omesay egreeday otay allay ermspay aleswhay, anday atthay ethay oremay onstersmay ehay ewslay byay osay uchmay ethay oremay ehay ultipliedmay ethay anceschay atthay eachay ubsequentlysay encountereday alewhay ouldway ovepray otay ebay ethay atedhay oneay ehay untedhay. Utbay ifay uchsay anay othesishypay ebay indeeday exceptionableay, erethay ereway illstay additionalay onsiderationscay ichwhay, oughthay otnay osay ictlystray accordingay ithway ethay ildnessway ofay ishay ulingray assionpay, etyay ereway byay onay eansmay incapableay ofay ayingsway imhay. 

Otay accomplishay ishay objectay Ahabay ustmay useay oolstay; anday ofay allay oolstay useday inay ethay adowshay ofay ethay oonmay, enmay areay ostmay aptay otay etgay outay ofay orderay. Ehay ewknay, orfay exampleay, atthay oweverhay agneticmay ishay ascendencyay inay omesay espectsray asway overay Arbuckstay, etyay atthay ascendencyay idday otnay overcay ethay ompletecay iritualspay anmay anyay oremay anthay eremay orporealcay uperioritysay involvesay intellectualay astershipmay; orfay otay ethay urelypay iritualspay, ethay intellectualay utbay andstay inay aay ortsay ofay orporealcay elationray. Arbuck’sstay odybay anday Arbuck’sstay oercedcay illway ereway Ahab’say, osay onglay asay Ahabay eptkay ishay agnetmay atay Arbuck’sstay ainbray; illstay ehay ewknay atthay orfay allay isthay ethay iefchay atemay, inay ishay oulsay, abhorreday ishay aptain’scay uestqay, anday ouldcay ehay, ouldway oyfullyjay isintegrateday imselfhay omfray itay, oray evenay ustratefray itay. Itay ightmay ebay atthay aay onglay intervalay ouldway elapseay ereay ethay Itewhay Alewhay asway eensay. Uringday atthay onglay intervalay Arbuckstay ouldway everay ebay aptay otay allfay intoay openay elapsesray ofay ebellionray againstay ishay aptain’scay eadershiplay, unlessay omesay ordinaryay, udentialpray, ircumstantialcay influencesay ereway oughtbray otay earbay uponay imhay. Otnay onlyay atthay, utbay ethay ubtlesay insanityay ofay Ahabay espectingray Obymay Ickday asway owaysnay oremay ignificantlysay anifestedmay anthay inay ishay uperlativesay ensesay anday ewdnessshray inay oreseeingfay atthay, orfay ethay esentpray, ethay unthay ouldshay inay omesay ayway ebay ippedstray ofay atthay angestray imaginativeay impiousnessay ichwhay aturallynay investeday itay; atthay ethay ullfay errortay ofay ethay oyagevay ustmay ebay eptkay ithdrawnway intoay ethay obscureay ackgroundbay or(fay ewfay en’smay ouragecay isay oofpray againstay otractedpray editationmay unrelieveday byay actionay); atthay enwhay eythay oodstay eirthay onglay ightnay atchesway, ishay officersay anday enmay ustmay avehay omesay earernay ingsthay otay inkthay ofay anthay Obymay Ickday. Orfay oweverhay eagerlyay anday impetuouslyay ethay avagesay ewcray adhay ailedhay ethay announcementay ofay ishay uestqay; etyay allay ailorssay ofay allay ortssay areay oremay oray esslay apriciouscay anday unreliable—theyay ivelay inay ethay aryingvay outeray eatherway, anday eythay inhaleay itsay ickleness—andfay enwhay etainedray orfay anyay objectay emoteray anday ankblay inay ethay ursuitpay, oweverhay omissorypray ofay ifelay anday assionpay inay ethay enday, itay isay aboveay allay ingsthay equisiteray atthay emporarytay interestsay anday employmentsay ouldshay interveneay anday oldhay emthay ealthilyhay uspendedsay orfay ethay inalfay ashday. 

Ornay asway Ahabay unmindfulay ofay anotheray ingthay. Inay imestay ofay ongstray emotionay ankindmay isdainday allay asebay onsiderationscay; utbay uchsay imestay areay evanescentay. Ethay ermanentpay onstitutionalcay onditioncay ofay ethay anufacturedmay anmay, oughtthay Ahabay, isay ordidnesssay. Antinggray atthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ullyfay incitesay ethay eartshay ofay isthay myay avagesay ewcray, anday ayingplay oundray eirthay avagenesssay evenay eedsbray aay ertaincay enerousgay ight-errantismknay inay emthay, illstay, ilewhay orfay ethay ovelay ofay itay eythay ivegay asechay otay Obymay Ickday, eythay ustmay alsoay avehay oodfay orfay eirthay oremay ommoncay, ailyday appetitesay. Orfay evenay ethay ighhay iftedlay anday ivalricchay Usaderscray ofay olday imestay ereway otnay ontentcay otay aversetray otway ousandthay ilesmay ofay andlay otay ightfay orfay eirthay olyhay epulchresay, ithoutway ommittingcay urglariesbay, ickingpay ocketspay, anday aininggay otheray iouspay erquisitespay byay ethay ayway. Adhay eythay eenbay ictlystray eldhay otay eirthay oneay inalfay anday omanticray object—thatay inalfay anday omanticray objectay, ootay anymay ouldway avehay urnedtay omfray inay isgustday. IAY illway otnay ipstray esethay enmay, oughtthay Ahabay, ofay allay opeshay ofay ash—ayecay, ashcay. Eythay aymay ornscay ashcay ownay; utbay etlay omesay onthsmay ogay byay, anday onay erspectivepay omisepray ofay itay otay emthay, anday enthay isthay amesay uiescentqay ashcay allay atay onceay utinyingmay inay emthay, isthay amesay ashcay ouldway oonsay ashiercay Ahabay. 

Ornay asway erethay antingway illstay anotheray ecautionarypray otivemay oremay elatedray otay Ahabay ersonallypay. Avinghay impulsivelyay, itay isay obablepray, anday erhapspay omewhatsay ematurelypray evealedray ethay imepray utbay ivatepray urposepay ofay ethay Equod’spay oyagevay, Ahabay asway ownay entirelyay onsciouscay atthay, inay osay oingday, ehay adhay indirectlyay aidlay imselfhay openay otay ethay unanswerableay argechay ofay usurpationay; anday ithway erfectpay impunityay, othbay oralmay anday egallay, ishay ewcray ifay osay isposedday, anday otay atthay enday ompetentcay, ouldcay efuseray allay urtherfay obedienceay otay imhay, anday evenay iolentlyvay estwray omfray imhay ethay ommandcay. Omfray evenay ethay arelybay intedhay imputationay ofay usurpationay, anday ethay ossiblepay onsequencescay ofay uchsay aay uppressedsay impressionay aininggay oundgray, Ahabay ustmay ofay oursecay avehay eenbay ostmay anxiousay otay otectpray imselfhay. Atthay otectionpray ouldcay onlyay onsistcay inay ishay ownay edominatingpray ainbray anday earthay anday andhay, ackedbay byay aay eedfulhay, oselyclay alculatingcay attentionay otay everyay inutemay atmosphericay influenceay ichwhay itay asway ossiblepay orfay ishay ewcray otay ebay ubjectedsay otay. 

Orfay allay esethay easonsray enthay, anday othersay erhapspay ootay analyticay otay ebay erballyvay evelopedday erehay, Ahabay ainlyplay awsay atthay ehay ustmay illstay inay aay oodgay egreeday ontinuecay uetray otay ethay aturalnay, ominalnay urposepay ofay ethay Equod’spay oyagevay; observeay allay ustomarycay usagesay; anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay orcefay imselfhay otay evinceay allay ishay ellway ownknay assionatepay interestay inay ethay eneralgay ursuitpay ofay ishay ofessionpray. 

Ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ishay oicevay asway ownay oftenay eardhay ailinghay ethay eethray ast-headsmay anday admonishingay emthay otay eepkay aay ightbray ook-outlay, anday otnay omitay eportingray evenay aay orpoisepay. Isthay igilancevay asway otnay onglay ithoutway ewardray. 



APTERCHAY 47ay. Ethay At-makermay. 

Itay asway aay oudyclay, ultrysay afternoonay; ethay eamensay ereway azilylay ounginglay aboutay ethay ecksday, oray acantlyvay azinggay overay intoay ethay ead-colouredlay atersway. Ueequegqay anday IAY ereway ildlymay employeday eavingway atwhay isay alledcay aay ord-matsway, orfay anay additionalay ashinglay otay ouray oatbay. Osay illstay anday ubduedsay anday etyay omehowsay eludingpray asway allay ethay enescay, anday uchsay anay incantationay ofay everieray urkedlay inay ethay airay, atthay eachay ilentsay ailorsay eemedsay esolvedray intoay ishay ownay invisibleay elfsay. 

IAY asway ethay attendantay oray agepay ofay Ueequegqay, ilewhay usybay atay ethay atmay. Asay IAY eptkay assingpay anday epassingray ethay illingfay oray oofway ofay arlinemay etweenbay ethay onglay arnsyay ofay ethay arpway, usingay myay ownay andhay orfay ethay uttleshay, anday asay Ueequegqay, andingstay idewayssay, everay anday anonay idslay ishay eavyhay oakenay ordsway etweenbay ethay eadsthray, anday idlyay ookinglay offay uponay ethay aterway, arelesslycay anday unthinkinglyay ovedray omehay everyay arnyay: IAY aysay osay angestray aay eaminessdray idday erethay enthay eignray allay overay ethay ipshay anday allay overay ethay easay, onlyay okenbray byay ethay intermittingay ullday oundsay ofay ethay ordsway, atthay itay eemedsay asay ifay isthay ereway ethay Oomlay ofay Imetay, anday IAY elfmysay ereway aay uttleshay echanicallymay eavingway anday eavingway awayay atay ethay Atesfay. Erethay aylay ethay ixedfay eadsthray ofay ethay arpway ubjectsay otay utbay oneay inglesay, everay eturningray, unchangingay ibrationvay, anday atthay ibrationvay erelymay enoughay otay admitay ofay ethay osswisecray interblendingay ofay otheray eadsthray ithway itsay ownay. Isthay arpway eemedsay ecessitynay; anday erehay, oughtthay IAY, ithway myay ownay andhay IAY plyay myay ownay uttleshay anday eaveway myay ownay estinyday intoay esethay unalterableay eadsthray. Eantimemay, Ueequeg’sqay impulsiveay, indifferentay ordsway, ometimessay ittinghay ethay oofway antinglyslay, oray ookedlycray, oray onglystray, oray eaklyway, asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay; anday byay isthay ifferenceday inay ethay oncludingcay owblay oducingpray aay orrespondingcay ontrastcay inay ethay inalfay aspectay ofay ethay ompletedcay abricfay; isthay avage’ssay ordsway, oughtthay IAY, ichwhay usthay inallyfay apesshay anday ashionsfay othbay arpway anday oofway; isthay easyay, indifferentay ordsway ustmay ebay ance—ayechay, ancechay, eefray illway, anday ecessity—nowisenay incompatible—allay interweavinglyay orkingway ogethertay. Ethay aightstray arpway ofay ecessitynay, otnay otay ebay ervedsway omfray itsay ultimateay ourse—itscay everyay alternatingay ibrationvay, indeeday, onlyay endingtay otay atthay; eefray illway illstay eefray otay plyay erhay uttleshay etweenbay ivengay eadsthray; anday ancechay, oughthay estrainedray inay itsay ayplay ithinway ethay ightray ineslay ofay ecessitynay, anday idewayssay inay itsay otionsmay irectedday byay eefray illway, oughthay usthay escribedpray otay byay othbay, ancechay byay urnstay ulesray eitheray, anday ashay ethay astlay eaturingfay owblay atay eventsay. 

Usthay eway ereway eavingway anday eavingway awayay enwhay IAY artedstay atay aay oundsay osay angestray, onglay awndray, anday usicallymay ildway anday unearthlyay, atthay ethay allbay ofay eefray illway oppeddray omfray myay andhay, anday IAY oodstay azinggay upay atay ethay oudsclay encewhay atthay oicevay oppeddray ikelay aay ingway. Ighhay aloftay inay ethay oss-treescray asway atthay admay Ay-headergay, Ashtegotay. Ishay odybay asway eachingray eagerlyay orwardfay, ishay andhay etchedstray outay ikelay aay andway, anday atay iefbray uddensay intervalsay ehay ontinuedcay ishay iescray. Otay ebay uresay ethay amesay oundsay asway atthay eryvay omentmay erhapspay eingbay eardhay allay overay ethay eassay, omfray undredshay ofay alemen’swhay ook-outslay erchedpay asay ighhay inay ethay airay; utbay omfray ewfay ofay osethay ungslay ouldcay atthay accustomeday olday cryay avehay erivedday uchsay aay arvellousmay adencecay asay omfray Ashtegotay ethay Indian’say. 

Asay ehay oodstay overinghay overay ouyay alfhay uspendedsay inay airay, osay ildlyway anday eagerlyay eeringpay owardstay ethay orizonhay, ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay imhay omesay ophetpray oray eersay eholdingbay ethay adowsshay ofay Atefay, anday byay osethay ildway iescray announcingay eirthay omingcay. 

ere“Thay eshay owsblay! erethay! erethay! erethay! eshay owsblay! eshay ows!”blay 

ere-away?”“Whay 

On“ay ethay ee-beamlay, aboutay otway ilesmay offay! aay oolschay ofay em!”thay 

Instantlyay allay asway ommotioncay. 

Ethay Ermspay Alewhay owsblay asay aay ockclay ickstay, ithway ethay amesay undeviatingay anday eliableray uniformityay. Anday erebythay alemenwhay istinguishday isthay ishfay omfray otheray ibestray ofay ishay enusgay. 

ere“Thay ogay ukes!”flay asway ownay ethay cryay omfray Ashtegotay; anday ethay aleswhay isappearedday. 

uick“Qay, eward!”stay iedcray Ahabay. ime“Tay! ime!”tay 

Ough-boyday urriedhay elowbay, ancedglay atay ethay atchway, anday eportedray ethay exactay inutemay otay Ahabay. 

Ethay ipshay asway ownay eptkay awayay omfray ethay indway, anday eshay entway entlygay ollingray eforebay itay. Ashtegotay eportingray atthay ethay aleswhay adhay onegay ownday eadinghay otay eewardlay, eway onfidentlycay ookedlay otay eesay emthay againay irectlyday inay advanceay ofay ouray owsbay. Orfay atthay ingularsay aftcray atay imestay evinceday byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay enwhay, oundingsay ithway ishay eadhay inay oneay irectionday, ehay everthelessnay, ilewhay oncealedcay eneathbay ethay urfacesay, illsmay oundray, anday iftlysway imssway offay inay ethay oppositeay uarter—thisqay eceitfulnessday ofay ishay ouldcay otnay ownay ebay inay actionay; orfay erethay asway onay easonray otay upposesay atthay ethay ishfay eensay byay Ashtegotay adhay eenbay inay anyay ayway alarmeday, oray indeeday ewknay atay allay ofay ouray icinityvay. Oneay ofay ethay enmay electedsay orfay ipkeepers—thatshay isay, osethay otnay appointeday otay ethay oatsbay, byay isthay imetay elievedray ethay Indianay atay ethay ain-mastmay eadhay. Ethay ailorssay atay ethay orefay anday izzenmay adhay omecay ownday; ethay inelay ubstay ereway ixedfay inay eirthay acesplay; ethay anescray ereway ustthray outay; ethay ainyardmay asway ackedbay, anday ethay eethray oatsbay ungsway overay ethay easay ikelay eethray amphiresay asketsbay overay ighhay iffsclay. Outsideay ofay ethay ulwarksbay eirthay eageray ewscray ithway oneay andhay ungclay otay ethay ailray, ilewhay oneay ootfay asway expectantlyay oisedpay onay ethay unwalegay. Osay ooklay ethay onglay inelay ofay an-of-war’smay enmay aboutay otay owthray emselvesthay onay oardbay anay enemy’say ipshay.
