Utbay atay isthay iticalcray instantay aay uddensay exclamationay asway eardhay atthay ooktay everyay eyeay omfray ethay alewhay. Ithway aay artstay allay aredglay atay arkday Ahabay, owhay asway urroundedsay byay ivefay uskyday antomsphay atthay eemedsay eshfray ormedfay outay ofay airay. 



APTERCHAY 48ay. Ethay Irstfay Oweringlay. 

Ethay antomsphay, orfay osay eythay enthay eemedsay, ereway ittingflay onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay eckday, anday, ithway aay oiselessnay eleritycay, ereway astingcay ooselay ethay acklestay anday andsbay ofay ethay oatbay ichwhay ungsway erethay. Isthay oatbay adhay alwaysay eenbay eemedday oneay ofay ethay arespay oatsbay, oughthay echnicallytay alledcay ethay aptain’scay, onay accountay ofay itsay anginghay omfray ethay arboardstay uarterqay. Ethay igurefay atthay ownay oodstay byay itsay owsbay asway alltay anday artsway, ithway oneay itewhay oothtay evillyay otrudingpray omfray itsay eel-likestay ipslay. AAY umpledray Inesechay acketjay ofay ackblay ottoncay unereallyfay investeday imhay, ithway ideway ackblay owserstray ofay ethay amesay arkday uffstay. Utbay angelystray owningcray isthay ebonnessay asway aay isteningglay itewhay aitedplay urbantay, ethay ivinglay airhay aidedbray anday oiledcay oundray anday oundray uponay ishay eadhay. Esslay artsway inay aspectay, ethay ompanionscay ofay isthay igurefay ereway ofay atthay ividvay, iger-yellowtay omplexioncay eculiarpay otay omesay ofay ethay aboriginalay ativesnay ofay ethay Anillas;—amay aceray otoriousnay orfay aay ertaincay iabolismday ofay ubtiltysay, anday byay omesay onesthay itewhay arinersmay upposedsay otay ebay ethay aidpay iesspay anday ecretsay onfidentialcay agentsay onay ethay aterway ofay ethay evilday, eirthay ordlay, osewhay ounting-roomcay eythay upposesay otay ebay elsewhereay. 

Ilewhay etyay ethay onderingway ip’sshay ompanycay ereway azinggay uponay esethay angersstray, Ahabay iedcray outay otay ethay ite-turbanedwhay olday anmay atay eirthay eadhay, All“ay eadyray erethay, Edallah?”fay 

eady,”“Ray asway ethay alf-hissedhay eplyray. 

ower“Lay awayay enthay; ed’yay ear?”hay outingshay acrossay ethay eckday. ower“Lay awayay erethay, IAY ay.”say 

Uchsay asway ethay underthay ofay ishay oicevay, atthay itespay ofay eirthay amazementay ethay enmay angspray overay ethay ailray; ethay eavesshay irledwhay oundray inay ethay ocksblay; ithway aay allowway, ethay eethray oatsbay oppeddray intoay ethay easay; ilewhay, ithway aay exterousday, off-handeday aringday, unknownay inay anyay otheray ocationvay, ethay ailorssay, oat-likegay, eapedlay ownday ethay ollingray ip’sshay idesay intoay ethay ossedtay oatsbay elowbay. 

Ardlyhay adhay eythay ulledpay outay omfray underay ethay ip’sshay eelay, enwhay aay ourthfay eelkay, omingcay omfray ethay indwardway idesay, ulledpay oundray underay ethay ernstay, anday owedshay ethay ivefay angersstray owingray Ahabay, owhay, andingstay erectay inay ethay ernstay, oudlylay ailedhay Arbuckstay, Ubbstay, anday Askflay, otay eadspray emselvesthay idelyway, osay asay otay overcay aay argelay expanseay ofay aterway. Utbay ithway allay eirthay eyesay againay ivetedray uponay ethay artsway Edallahfay anday ishay ewcray, ethay inmatesay ofay ethay otheray oatsbay obeyeday otnay ethay ommandcay. 

aptain“Cay Ahab?—”ay aidsay Arbuckstay. 

ead“Spray ourselves,”yay iedcray Ahabay; ive“gay ayway, allay ourfay oatsbay. Outhay, Askflay, ullpay outay oremay otay eeward!”lay 

Aye“ay, ayeay, ir,”say eerilychay iedcray ittlelay Ing-postkay, eepingsway oundray ishay eatgray eeringstay oaray. ay“Lay ack!”bay addressingay ishay ewcray. ere!—there!—there“Thay againay! Erethay eshay owsblay ightray aheaday, oys!—laybay ack!”bay 

ever“Nay eedhay onderyay ellowyay oysbay, Archy.”ay 

Oh“ay, IAY on’tday indmay em’ay, ir,”say aidsay Archyay; I“AY ewknay itay allay eforebay ownay. Idn’tday IAY earhay em’ay inay ethay oldhay? Anday idn’tday IAY elltay Abacocay erehay ofay itay? Atwhay aysay eyay, Abacocay? Eythay areay owawaysstay, Mray. Ask.”flay 

ull“Pay, ullpay, myay inefay earts-alivehay; ullpay, myay ildrenchay; ullpay, myay ittlelay ones,”ay awlinglydray anday oothinglysay ighedsay Ubbstay otay ishay ewcray, omesay ofay omwhay illstay owedshay ignssay ofay uneasinessay. “Whyay on’tday ouyay eakbray ouryay ackbonesbay, myay oysbay? Atwhay isay itay ouyay arestay atay? Osethay apschay inay onderyay oatbay? Uttay! Eythay areay onlyay ivefay oremay andshay omecay otay elphay us—neveray indmay omfray ere—thewhay oremay ethay erriermay. Ullpay, enthay, oday ullpay; evernay indmay ethay imstone—devilsbray areay oodgay ellowsfay enoughay. Osay, osay; erethay ouyay areay ownay; at’sthay ethay okestray orfay aay ousandthay oundspay; at’sthay ethay okestray otay eepsway ethay akesstay! Urrahhay orfay ethay oldgay upcay ofay ermspay oilay, myay eroeshay! Eethray eerschay, en—allmay eartshay aliveay! Easyay, easyay; on’tday ebay inay aay urry—don’thay ebay inay aay urryhay. Whyay on’tday ouyay apsnay ouryay oarsay, ouyay ascalsray? Itebay omethingsay, ouyay ogsday! Osay, osay, osay, en:—softlythay, oftlysay! At’sthay it—that’say itay! onglay anday ongstray. Ivegay ayway erethay, ivegay ayway! Ethay evilday etchfay eyay, eyay agamuffinray apscallionsray; eyay areay allay asleepay. Opstay oringsnay, eyay eepersslay, anday ullpay. Ullpay, illway eyay? ullpay, an’tcay eyay? ullpay, on’tway eyay? Whyay inay ethay amenay ofay udgeonsgay anday inger-cakesgay on’tday eyay ull?—pullpay anday eakbray omethingsay! ullpay, anday artstay ouryay eyesay outay! Ere!”hay ippingwhay outay ethay arpshay ifeknay omfray ishay irdlegay; every“ay other’smay onsay ofay eyay awdray ishay ifeknay, anday ullpay ithway ethay adeblay etweenbay ishay eethtay. At’sthay it—that’say itay. Ownay eyay oday omethingsay; atthay ookslay ikelay itay, myay eel-bitsstay. Artstay er—starthay erhay, myay ilver-spoonssay! Artstay erhay, arling-spikes!”may 

Ubb’sstay exordiumay otay ishay ewcray isay ivengay erehay atay argelay, ecausebay ehay adhay atherray aay eculiarpay ayway ofay alkingtay otay emthay inay eneralgay, anday especiallyay inay inculcatingay ethay eligionray ofay owingray. Utbay ouyay ustmay otnay upposesay omfray isthay ecimenspay ofay ishay ermonizingssay atthay ehay everay ewflay intoay ownrightday assionspay ithway ishay ongregationcay. Otnay atay allay; anday ereinthay onsistedcay ishay iefchay eculiaritypay. Ehay ouldway aysay ethay ostmay errifictay ingsthay otay ishay ewcray, inay aay onetay osay angelystray ompoundedcay ofay unfay anday uryfay, anday ethay uryfay eemedsay osay alculatedcay erelymay asay aay icespay otay ethay unfay, atthay onay oarsmanay ouldcay earhay uchsay ueerqay invocationsay ithoutway ullingpay orfay earday ifelay, anday etyay ullingpay orfay ethay eremay okejay ofay ethay ingthay. Esidesbay ehay allay ethay imetay ookedlay osay easyay anday indolentay imselfhay, osay ounginglylay anagedmay ishay eering-oarstay, anday osay oadlybray aped—open-mouthedgay atay imes—thattay ethay eremay ightsay ofay uchsay aay awningyay ommandercay, byay eershay orcefay ofay ontrastcay, acteday ikelay aay armchay uponay ethay ewcray. Enthay againay, Ubbstay asway oneay ofay osethay odday ortsay ofay umoristshay, osewhay ollityjay isay ometimessay osay uriouslycay ambiguousay, asay otay utpay allay inferiorsay onay eirthay uardgay inay ethay attermay ofay obeyingay emthay. 

Inay obedienceay otay aay ignsay omfray Ahabay, Arbuckstay asway ownay ullingpay obliquelyay acrossay Ubb’sstay owbay; anday enwhay orfay aay inutemay oray osay ethay otway oatsbay ereway ettypray earnay otay eachay otheray, Ubbstay ailedhay ethay atemay. 

“Mray. Arbuckstay! arboardlay oatbay erethay, ahoyay! aay ordway ithway eyay, irsay, ifay eyay ease!”play 

alloa!”“Hay eturnedray Arbuckstay, urningtay oundray otnay aay inglesay inchay asay ehay okespay; illstay earnestlyay utbay isperinglywhay urgingay ishay ewcray; ishay acefay etsay ikelay aay intflay omfray Ubb’sstay. 

at“Whay inkthay eyay ofay osethay ellowyay oysbay, ir!”say 

uggled“Smay onay oardbay, omehowsay, eforebay ethay ipshay ailedsay. ong(Stray, ongstray, oys!)”bay inay aay isperwhay otay ishay ewcray, enthay eakingspay outay oudlay againay: A“AY adsay usinessbay, Mray. Ubbstay! eethe(say erhay, eethesay erhay, myay adslay!) utbay evernay indmay, Mray. Ubbstay, allay orfay ethay estbay. Etlay allay ouryay ewcray ullpay ongstray, omecay atwhay illway. ing(Spray, myay enmay, ingspray!) Ere’sthay ogsheadshay ofay ermspay aheaday, Mray. Ubbstay, anday at’sthay atwhay eyay amecay orfay. ull(Pay, myay oysbay!) Ermspay, erm’sspay ethay ayplay! Isthay atay eastlay isay utyday; utyday anday ofitpray andhay inay and.”hay 

Aye“ay, ayeay, IAY oughtthay asay uch,”may oliloquizedsay Ubbstay, enwhay ethay oatsbay ivergedday, as“ay oonsay asay IAY aptclay eyeay onay em’ay, IAY oughtthay osay. Ayeay, anday at’sthay atwhay ehay entway intoay ethay afteray oldhay orfay, osay oftenay, asay Ough-boyday onglay uspectedsay. Eythay ereway iddenhay ownday erethay. Ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay atay ethay ottombay ofay itay. Ellway, ellway, osay ebay itay! An’tcay ebay elpedhay! Allay ightray! Ivegay ayway, enmay! Itay ain’tay ethay Itewhay Alewhay o-daytay! Ivegay ay!”way 

Ownay ethay adventay ofay esethay outlandishay angersstray atay uchsay aay iticalcray instantay asay ethay oweringlay ofay ethay oatsbay omfray ethay eckday, isthay adhay otnay unreasonablyay awakeneday aay ortsay ofay uperstitioussay amazementay inay omesay ofay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay; utbay Archy’say anciedfay iscoveryday avinghay omesay imetay eviouspray otgay abroaday amongay emthay, oughthay indeeday otnay editedcray enthay, isthay adhay inay omesay allsmay easuremay eparedpray emthay orfay ethay eventay. Itay ooktay offay ethay extremeay edgeay ofay eirthay onderway; anday osay atwhay ithway allay isthay anday Ubb’sstay onfidentcay ayway ofay accountingay orfay eirthay appearanceay, eythay ereway orfay ethay imetay eedfray omfray uperstitioussay urmisingssay; oughthay ethay affairay illstay eftlay abundantay oomray orfay allay annermay ofay ildway onjecturescay asay otay arkday Ahab’say ecisepray agencyay inay ethay attermay omfray ethay eginningbay. Orfay emay, IAY ilentlysay ecalledray ethay eriousmystay adowsshay IAY adhay eensay eepingcray onay oardbay ethay Equodpay uringday ethay imday Antucketnay awnday, asay ellway asay ethay enigmaticalay intingshay ofay ethay unaccountableay Elijahay. 

Eantimemay, Ahabay, outay ofay earinghay ofay ishay officersay, avinghay idedsay ethay urthestfay otay indwardway, asway illstay angingray aheaday ofay ethay otheray oatsbay; aay ircumstancecay espeakingbay owhay otentpay aay ewcray asway ullingpay imhay. Osethay igertay ellowyay eaturescray ofay ishay eemedsay allay eelstay anday alebonewhay; ikelay ivefay ip-hammerstray eythay oseray anday ellfay ithway egularray okesstray ofay engthstray, ichwhay eriodicallypay artedstay ethay oatbay alongay ethay aterway ikelay aay orizontalhay urstbay oilerbay outay ofay aay Ississippimay eamerstay. Asay orfay Edallahfay, owhay asway eensay ullingpay ethay arpooneerhay oaray, ehay adhay ownthray asideay ishay ackblay acketjay, anday isplayedday ishay akednay estchay ithway ethay olewhay artpay ofay ishay odybay aboveay ethay unwalegay, earlyclay utcay againstay ethay alternatingay epressionsday ofay ethay ateryway orizonhay; ilewhay atay ethay otheray enday ofay ethay oatbay Ahabay, ithway oneay armay, ikelay aay encer’sfay, ownthray alfhay ackwardbay intoay ethay airay, asay ifay otay ounterbalancecay anyay endencytay otay iptray; Ahabay asway eensay eadilystay anagingmay ishay eeringstay oaray asay inay aay ousandthay oatbay oweringslay ereay ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay orntay imhay. Allay atay onceay ethay outstretcheday armay avegay aay eculiarpay otionmay anday enthay emainedray ixedfay, ilewhay ethay oat’sbay ivefay oarsay ereway eensay imultaneouslysay eakedpay. Oatbay anday ewcray atsay otionlessmay onay ethay easay. Instantlyay ethay eethray eadspray oatsbay inay ethay earray ausedpay onay eirthay ayway. Ethay aleswhay adhay irregularlyay ettledsay odilybay ownday intoay ethay ueblay, usthay ivinggay onay istantlyday iscernibleday okentay ofay ethay ovementmay, oughthay omfray ishay oserclay icinityvay Ahabay adhay observeday itay. 

Every“ay anmay ooklay outay alongay ishay oars!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. ou“Thay, Ueequegqay, andstay up!”ay 

Imblynay ingingspray upay onay ethay iangulartray aisedray oxbay inay ethay owbay, ethay avagesay oodstay erectay erethay, anday ithway intenselyay eageray eyesay azedgay offay owardstay ethay otspay erewhay ethay asechay adhay astlay eenbay escriedday. Ikewiselay uponay ethay extremeay ernstay ofay ethay oatbay erewhay itay asway alsoay iangularlytray atformedplay evellay ithway ethay unwalegay, Arbuckstay imselfhay asway eensay oollycay anday adroitlyay alancingbay imselfhay otay ethay erkingjay ossingstay ofay ishay ipchay ofay aay aftcray, anday ilentlysay eyeingay ethay astvay ueblay eyeay ofay ethay easay. 

Otnay eryvay arfay istantday Ask’sflay oatbay asway alsoay inglyay eathlesslybray illstay; itsay ommandercay ecklesslyray andingstay uponay ethay optay ofay ethay oggerheadlay, aay outstay ortsay ofay ostpay ootedray inay ethay eelkay, anday isingray omesay otway eetfay aboveay ethay evellay ofay ethay ernstay atformplay. Itay isay useday orfay atchingcay urnstay ithway ethay alewhay inelay. Itsay optay isay otnay oremay aciousspay anthay ethay almpay ofay aay an’smay andhay, anday andingstay uponay uchsay aay asebay asay atthay, Askflay eemedsay erchedpay atay ethay ast-headmay ofay omesay ipshay ichwhay adhay unksay otay allay utbay erhay uckstray. Utbay ittlelay Ing-postkay asway allsmay anday ortshay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay ittlelay Ing-postkay asway ullfay ofay aay argelay anday alltay ambitionay, osay atthay isthay oggerheadlay and-pointstay ofay ishay idday byay onay eansmay atisfysay Ing-postkay. 

I“AY an’tcay eesay eethray eassay offay; iptay usay upay anay oaray erethay, anday etlay emay onay otay at.”thay 

Uponay isthay, Aggooday, ithway eitheray andhay uponay ethay unwalegay otay eadystay ishay ayway, iftlysway idslay aftay, anday enthay erectingay imselfhay olunteeredvay ishay oftylay ouldersshay orfay aay edestalpay. 

ood“Gay aay ast-headmay asay anyay, irsay. Illway ouyay ount?”may 

at“Thay IAY illway, anday ankthay eyay eryvay uchmay, myay inefay ellowfay; onlyay IAY ishway ouyay iftyfay eetfay aller.”tay 

Ereuponwhay antingplay ishay eetfay irmlyfay againstay otway oppositeay anksplay ofay ethay oatbay, ethay iganticgay egronay, oopingstay aay ittlelay, esentedpray ishay atflay almpay otay Ask’sflay ootfay, anday enthay uttingpay Ask’sflay andhay onay ishay earse-plumedhay eadhay anday iddingbay imhay ingspray asay ehay imselfhay ouldshay osstay, ithway oneay exterousday ingflay andedlay ethay ittlelay anmay ighhay anday dryay onay ishay ouldersshay. Anday erehay asway Askflay ownay andingstay, Aggooday ithway oneay iftedlay armay urnishingfay imhay ithway aay eastbandbray otay eanlay againstay anday eadystay imselfhay byay. 

Atay anyay imetay itay isay aay angestray ightsay otay ethay otyray otay eesay ithway atwhay ondrousway abitudehay ofay unconsciousay illskay ethay alemanwhay illway aintainmay anay erectay osturepay inay ishay oatbay, evenay enwhay itchedpay aboutay byay ethay ostmay iotouslyray erversepay anday oss-runningcray eassay. Illstay oremay angestray otay eesay imhay iddilygay erchedpay uponay ethay oggerheadlay itselfay, underay uchsay ircumstancescay. Utbay ethay ightsay ofay ittlelay Askflay ountedmay uponay iganticgay Aggooday asway etyay oremay uriouscay; orfay ustainingsay imselfhay ithway aay oolcay, indifferentay, easyay, unthoughtay ofay, arbaricbay ajestymay, ethay oblenay egronay otay everyay ollray ofay ethay easay armoniouslyhay olledray ishay inefay ormfay. Onay ishay oadbray ackbay, axen-hairedflay Askflay eemedsay aay ow-flakesnay. Ethay earerbay ookedlay oblernay anthay ethay iderray. Oughthay ulytray ivaciousvay, umultuoustay, ostentatiousay ittlelay Askflay ouldway ownay anday enthay ampstay ithway impatienceay; utbay otnay oneay addeday eavehay idday ehay erebythay ivegay otay ethay egro’snay ordlylay estchay. Osay avehay IAY eensay Assionpay anday Anityvay ampingstay ethay ivinglay agnanimousmay earthay, utbay ethay earthay idday otnay alteray erhay idestay anday erhay easonssay orfay atthay. 

Eanwhilemay Ubbstay, ethay irdthay atemay, etrayedbay onay uchsay ar-gazingfay olicitudessay. Ethay aleswhay ightmay avehay ademay oneay ofay eirthay egularray oundingssay, otnay aay emporarytay iveday omfray eremay ightfray; anday ifay atthay ereway ethay asecay, Ubbstay, asay ishay ontway inay uchsay asescay, itay eemssay, asway esolvedray otay olacesay ethay anguishinglay intervalay ithway ishay ipepay. Ehay ithdrewway itay omfray ishay atbandhay, erewhay ehay alwaysay oreway itay aslantay ikelay aay eatherfay. Ehay oadedlay itay, anday ammedray omehay ethay oadinglay ithway ishay umb-endthay; utbay ardlyhay adhay ehay igniteday ishay atchmay acrossay ethay oughray andpapersay ofay ishay andhay, enwhay Ashtegotay, ishay arpooneerhay, osewhay eyesay adhay eenbay ettingsay otay indwardway ikelay otway ixedfay arsstay, uddenlysay oppeddray ikelay ightlay omfray ishay erectay attitudeay otay ishay eatsay, ingcryay outay inay aay uickqay ensyphray ofay urryhay, own“Day, ownday allay, anday ivegay ay!—thereway eythay are!”ay 

Otay aay andsmanlay, onay alewhay, ornay anyay ignsay ofay aay erringhay, ouldway avehay eenbay isiblevay atay atthay omentmay; othingnay utbay aay oubledtray itbay ofay eenishgray itewhay aterway, anday inthay atteredscay uffspay ofay aporvay overinghay overay itay, anday uffusinglysay owingblay offay otay eewardlay, ikelay ethay onfusedcay udscay omfray itewhay ollingray illowsbay. Ethay airay arounday uddenlysay ibratedvay anday ingledtay, asay itay ereway, ikelay ethay airay overay intenselyay eatedhay atesplay ofay ironay. Eneathbay isthay atmosphericay avingway anday urlingcay, anday artiallypay eneathbay aay inthay ayerlay ofay aterway, alsoay, ethay aleswhay ereway immingsway. Eensay inay advanceay ofay allay ethay otheray indicationsay, ethay uffspay ofay aporvay eythay outedspay, eemedsay eirthay orerunningfay ourierscay anday etachedday ingflyay outridersay. 

Allay ourfay oatsbay ereway ownay inay eenkay ursuitpay ofay atthay oneay otspay ofay oubledtray aterway anday airay. Utbay itay adebay airfay otay outstripay emthay; itay ewflay onay anday onay, asay aay assmay ofay interblendingay ubblesbay ornebay ownday aay apidray eamstray omfray ethay illshay. 

ull“Pay, ullpay, myay oodgay oys,”bay aidsay Arbuckstay, inay ethay owestlay ossiblepay utbay intensestay oncentratedcay isperwhay otay ishay enmay; ilewhay ethay arpshay ixedfay anceglay omfray ishay eyesay artedday aightstray aheaday ofay ethay owbay, almostay eemedsay asay otway isiblevay eedlesnay inay otway unerringay innaclebay ompassescay. Ehay idday otnay aysay uchmay otay ishay ewcray, oughthay, ornay idday ishay ewcray aysay anythingay otay imhay. Onlyay ethay ilencesay ofay ethay oatbay asway atay intervalsay artlinglystay iercedpay byay oneay ofay ishay eculiarpay isperswhay, ownay arshhay ithway ommandcay, ownay oftsay ithway entreatyay. 

Owhay ifferentday ethay oudlay ittlelay Ing-postkay. ing“Say outay anday aysay omethingsay, myay eartieshay. Oarray anday ullpay, myay underboltsthay! Eachbay emay, eachbay emay onay eirthay ackblay acksbay, oysbay; onlyay oday atthay orfay emay, anday I’llay ignsay overay otay ouyay myay Artha’smay Ineyardvay antationplay, oysbay; includingay ifeway anday ildrenchay, oysbay. Aylay emay on—layay emay onay! OAY Ordlay, Ordlay! utbay IAY allshay ogay arkstay, aringstay admay! Eesay! eesay atthay itewhay ater!”way Anday osay outingshay, ehay ulledpay ishay athay omfray ishay eadhay, anday ampedstay upay anday ownday onay itay; enthay ickingpay itay upay, irtedflay itay arfay offay uponay ethay easay; anday inallyfay ellfay otay earingray anday ungingplay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay ikelay aay azedcray oltcay omfray ethay airiepray. 

ook“Lay atay atthay apchay ow,”nay ilosophicallyphay awleddray Ubbstay, owhay, ithway ishay unlighteday ortshay ipepay, echanicallymay etainedray etweenbay ishay eethtay, atay aay ortshay istanceday, ollowedfay after—“He’say otgay itsfay, atthay Askflay ashay. Itsfay? esyay, ivegay imhay its—that’sfay ethay eryvay ord—pitchway itsfay intoay em’ay. Errilymay, errilymay, earts-alivehay. Uddingpay orfay uppersay, ouyay ow;—merry’sknay ethay ordway. Ullpay, abes—pullbay, ucklings—pullsay, allay. Utbay atwhay ethay evilday areay ouyay urryinghay aboutay? Oftlysay, oftlysay, anday eadilystay, myay enmay. Onlyay ullpay, anday eepkay ullingpay; othingnay oremay. Ackcray allay ouryay ackbonesbay, anday itebay ouryay ivesknay inay o—that’stway allay. Aketay itay easy—whyay on’tday eyay aketay itay easyay, IAY aysay, anday urstbay allay ouryay iverslay anday ungs!”lay 

Utbay atwhay itay asway atthay inscrutableay Ahabay aidsay otay atthay iger-yellowtay ewcray ofay is—thesehay ereway ordsway estbay omitteday erehay; orfay ouyay ivelay underay ethay essedblay ightlay ofay ethay evangelicalay andlay. Onlyay ethay infidelay arksshay inay ethay audaciousay eassay aymay ivegay earay otay uchsay ordsway, enwhay, ithway ornadotay owbray, anday eyesay ofay edray urdermay, anday oam-gluedfay ipslay, Ahabay eapedlay afteray ishay eypray. 

Eanwhilemay, allay ethay oatsbay oretay onay. Ethay epeatedray ecificspay allusionsay ofay Askflay otay at“thay ale,”whay asay ehay alledcay ethay ictitiousfay onstermay ichwhay ehay eclaredday otay ebay incessantlyay antalizingtay ishay oat’sbay owbay ithway itsay ail—thesetay allusionsay ofay ishay ereway atay imestay osay ividvay anday ife-likelay, atthay eythay ouldway ausecay omesay oneay oray otway ofay ishay enmay otay atchsnay aay earfulfay ooklay overay ethay ouldershay. Utbay isthay asway againstay allay uleray; orfay ethay oarsmenay ustmay utpay outay eirthay eyesay, anday amray aay ewerskay oughthray eirthay ecksnay; usageay onouncingpray atthay eythay ustmay avehay onay organsay utbay earsay, anday onay imbslay utbay armsay, inay esethay iticalcray omentsmay. 

Itay asway aay ightsay ullfay ofay uickqay onderway anday aweay! Ethay astvay ellssway ofay ethay omnipotentay easay; ethay urgingsay, ollowhay oarray eythay ademay, asay eythay olledray alongay ethay eightay unwalesgay, ikelay iganticgay owlsbay inay aay oundlessbay owling-greenbay; ethay iefbray uspendedsay agonyay ofay ethay oatbay, asay itay ouldway iptay orfay anay instantay onay ethay ife-likeknay edgeay ofay ethay arpershay avesway, atthay almostay eemedsay eateningthray otay utcay itay inay otway; ethay uddensay ofoundpray ipday intoay ethay ateryway ensglay anday ollowshay; ethay eenkay urringsspay anday oadingsgay otay aingay ethay optay ofay ethay oppositeay illhay; ethay eadlonghay, ed-likeslay ideslay ownday itsay otheray ide;—allsay esethay, ithway ethay iescray ofay ethay eadsmenhay anday arpooneershay, anday ethay udderingshay aspsgay ofay ethay oarsmenay, ithway ethay ondrousway ightsay ofay ethay ivoryay Equodpay earingbay ownday uponay erhay oatsbay ithway outstretcheday ailssay, ikelay aay ildway enhay afteray erhay eamingscray ood;—allbray isthay asway illingthray. 

Otnay ethay awray ecruitray, archingmay omfray ethay osombay ofay ishay ifeway intoay ethay everfay eathay ofay ishay irstfay attlebay; otnay ethay eadday an’smay ostghay encounteringay ethay irstfay unknownay antomphay inay ethay otheray orld;—neitherway ofay esethay ancay eelfay angerstray anday ongerstray emotionsay anthay atthay anmay oesday, owhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay indsfay imselfhay ullingpay intoay ethay armedchay, urnedchay irclecay ofay ethay untedhay ermspay alewhay. 

Ethay ancingday itewhay aterway ademay byay ethay asechay asway ownay ecomingbay oremay anday oremay isiblevay, owingay otay ethay increasingay arknessday ofay ethay unday oud-shadowsclay ungflay uponay ethay easay. Ethay etsjay ofay aporvay onay ongerlay endedblay, utbay iltedtay everywhereay otay ightray anday eftlay; ethay aleswhay eemedsay eparatingsay eirthay akesway. Ethay oatsbay ereway ulledpay oremay apartay; Arbuckstay ivinggay asechay otay eethray aleswhay unningray eadday otay eewardlay. Ouray ailsay asway ownay etsay, anday, ithway ethay illstay isingray indway, eway ushedray alongay; ethay oatbay oinggay ithway uchsay adnessmay oughthray ethay aterway, atthay ethay eelay oarsay ouldcay arcelyscay ebay orkedway apidlyray enoughay otay escapeay eingbay orntay omfray ethay ow-locksray. 

Oonsay eway ereway unningray oughthray aay uffusingsay ideway eilvay ofay istmay; eithernay ipshay ornay oatbay otay ebay eensay. 

ive“Gay ayway, en,”may isperedwhay Arbuckstay, awingdray illstay urtherfay aftay ethay eetshay ofay ishay ailsay; ere“thay isay imetay otay illkay aay ishfay etyay eforebay ethay uallsqay omescay. Ere’sthay itewhay aterway again!—closeay otay! Ing!”spray 

Oonsay afteray, otway iescray inay uickqay uccessionsay onay eachay idesay ofay usay enotedday atthay ethay otheray oatsbay adhay otgay astfay; utbay ardlyhay ereway eythay overhearday, enwhay ithway aay ightning-likelay urtlinghay isperwhay Arbuckstay aidsay: and“Stay up!”ay anday Ueequegqay, arpoonhay inay andhay, angspray otay ishay eetfay. 

Oughthay otnay oneay ofay ethay oarsmenay asway enthay acingfay ethay ifelay anday eathday erilpay osay oseclay otay emthay aheaday, etyay ithway eirthay eyesay onay ethay intenseay ountenancecay ofay ethay atemay inay ethay ernstay ofay ethay oatbay, eythay ewknay atthay ethay imminentay instantay adhay omecay; eythay eardhay, ootay, anay enormousay allowingway oundsay asay ofay iftyfay elephantsay irringstay inay eirthay itterlay. Eanwhilemay ethay oatbay asway illstay oomingbay oughthray ethay istmay, ethay avesway urlingcay anday issinghay arounday usay ikelay ethay erecteday estscray ofay enrageday erpentssay. 

at’s“Thay ishay umphay. ere_Thay_, ere_thay_, ivegay itay otay im!”hay isperedwhay Arbuckstay. 

AAY ortshay ushingray oundsay eapedlay outay ofay ethay oatbay; itay asway ethay artedday ironay ofay Ueequegqay. Enthay allay inay oneay eldedway ommotioncay amecay anay invisibleay ushpay omfray asternay, ilewhay orwardfay ethay oatbay eemedsay ikingstray onay aay edgelay; ethay ailsay ollapsedcay anday explodeday; aay ushgay ofay aldingscay aporvay otshay upay earnay byay; omethingsay olledray anday umbledtay ikelay anay earthquakeay eneathbay usay. Ethay olewhay ewcray ereway alfhay uffocatedsay asay eythay ereway ossedtay elter-skelterhay intoay ethay itewhay urdlingcay eamcray ofay ethay uallsqay. Uallsqay, alewhay, anday arpoonhay adhay allay endedblay ogethertay; anday ethay alewhay, erelymay azedgray byay ethay ironay, escapeday. 

Oughthay ompletelycay ampedsway, ethay oatbay asway earlynay unharmeday. Immingsway oundray itay eway ickedpay upay ethay oatingflay oarsay, anday ashinglay emthay acrossay ethay unwalegay, umbledtay ackbay otay ouray acesplay. Erethay eway atsay upay otay ouray eesknay inay ethay easay, ethay aterway overingcay everyay ibray anday ankplay, osay atthay otay ouray ownwardday azinggay eyesay ethay uspendedsay aftcray eemedsay aay oralcay oatbay owngray upay otay usay omfray ethay ottombay ofay ethay oceanay. 

Ethay indway increaseday otay aay owlhay; ethay avesway ashedday eirthay ucklersbay ogethertay; ethay olewhay uallsqay oaredray, orkedfay, anday ackledcray arounday usay ikelay aay itewhay irefay uponay ethay airiepray, inay ichwhay, unconsumeday, eway ereway urningbay; immortalay inay esethay awsjay ofay eathday! Inay ainvay eway ailedhay ethay otheray oatsbay; asay ellway oarray otay ethay ivelay oalscay ownday ethay imneychay ofay aay amingflay urnacefay asay ailhay osethay oatsbay inay atthay ormstay. Eanwhilemay ethay ivingdray udscay, ackray, anday istmay, ewgray arkerday ithway ethay adowsshay ofay ightnay; onay ignsay ofay ethay ipshay ouldcay ebay eensay. Ethay isingray easay orbadefay allay attemptsay otay alebay outay ethay oatbay. Ethay oarsay ereway uselessay asay opellerspray, erformingpay ownay ethay officeay ofay ife-preserverslay. Osay, uttingcay ethay ashinglay ofay ethay aterproofway atchmay egkay, afteray anymay ailuresfay Arbuckstay ontrivedcay otay igniteay ethay amplay inay ethay anternlay; enthay etchingstray itay onay aay aifway olepay, andedhay itay otay Ueequegqay asay ethay andard-bearerstay ofay isthay orlornfay opehay. Erethay, enthay, ehay atsay, oldinghay upay atthay imbecileay andlecay inay ethay earthay ofay atthay almightyay orlornnessfay. Erethay, enthay, ehay atsay, ethay ignsay anday olsymbay ofay aay anmay ithoutway aithfay, opelesslyhay oldinghay upay opehay inay ethay idstmay ofay espairday. 

Etway, encheddray oughthray, anday iveringshay oldcay, espairingday ofay ipshay oray oatbay, eway iftedlay upay ouray eyesay asay ethay awnday amecay onay. Ethay istmay illstay eadspray overay ethay easay, ethay emptyay anternlay aylay ushedcray inay ethay ottombay ofay ethay oatbay. Uddenlysay Ueequegqay artedstay otay ishay eetfay, ollowinghay ishay andhay otay ishay earay. Eway allay eardhay aay aintfay eakingcray, asay ofay opesray anday ardsyay ithertohay uffledmay byay ethay ormstay. Ethay oundsay amecay earernay anday earernay; ethay ickthay istsmay ereway imlyday artedpay byay aay ugehay, aguevay ormfay. Affrighteday, eway allay angspray intoay ethay easay asay ethay ipshay atay astlay oomedlay intoay iewvay, earingbay ightray ownday uponay usay ithinway aay istanceday ofay otnay uchmay oremay anthay itsay engthlay. 

Oatingflay onay ethay avesway eway awsay ethay abandoneday oatbay, asay orfay oneay instantay itay ossedtay anday apedgay eneathbay ethay ip’sshay owsbay ikelay aay ipchay atay ethay asebay ofay aay ataractcay; anday enthay ethay astvay ullhay olledray overay itay, anday itay asway eensay onay oremay illtay itay amecay upay elteringway asternay. Againay eway amsway orfay itay, ereway ashedday againstay itay byay ethay eassay, anday ereway atay astlay akentay upay anday afelysay andedlay onay oardbay. Ereay ethay uallsqay amecay oseclay otay, ethay otheray oatsbay adhay utcay ooselay omfray eirthay ishfay anday eturnedray otay ethay ipshay inay oodgay imetay. Ethay ipshay adhay ivengay usay upay, utbay asway illstay uisingcray, ifay aplyhay itay ightmay ightlay uponay omesay okentay ofay ouray erishing,—anpay oaray oray aay ancelay olepay. 



APTERCHAY 49ay. Ethay Enahyay. 

Erethay areay ertaincay ueerqay imestay anday occasionsay inay isthay angestray ixedmay affairay eway allcay ifelay enwhay aay anmay akestay isthay olewhay universeay orfay aay astvay acticalpray okejay, oughthay ethay itway ereofthay ehay utbay imlyday iscernsday, anday oremay anthay uspectssay atthay ethay okejay isay atay obody’snay expenseay utbay ishay ownay. Oweverhay, othingnay ispiritsday, anday othingnay eemssay orthway ilewhay isputingday. Ehay oltsbay ownday allay eventsay, allay eedscray, anday eliefsbay, anday ersuasionspay, allay ardhay ingsthay isiblevay anday invisibleay, evernay indmay owhay obbyknay; asay anay ostrichay ofay otentpay igestionday obblesgay ownday ulletsbay anday ungay intsflay. Anday asay orfay allsmay ifficultiesday anday orryingsway, ospectspray ofay uddensay isasterday, erilpay ofay ifelay anday imblay; allay esethay, anday eathday itselfay, eemsay otay imhay onlyay slyay, ood-naturedgay itshay, anday ollyjay unchespay inay ethay idesay estowedbay byay ethay unseenay anday unaccountableay olday okerjay. Atthay odday ortsay ofay aywardway oodmay IAY amay eakingspay ofay, omescay overay aay anmay onlyay inay omesay imetay ofay extremeay ibulationtray; itay omescay inay ethay eryvay idstmay ofay ishay earnestnessay, osay atthay atwhay ustjay eforebay ightmay avehay eemedsay otay imhay aay ingthay ostmay omentousmay, ownay eemssay utbay aay artpay ofay ethay eneralgay okejay. Erethay isay othingnay ikelay ethay erilspay ofay alingwhay otay eedbray isthay eefray anday easyay ortsay ofay enialgay, esperadoday ilosophyphay; anday ithway itay IAY ownay egardedray isthay olewhay oyagevay ofay ethay Equodpay, anday ethay eatgray Itewhay Alewhay itsay objectay. 

ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, enwhay eythay adhay aggeddray emay, ethay astlay anmay, otay ethay eckday, anday IAY asway illstay akingshay elfmysay inay myay acketjay otay ingflay offay ethay aterway; ueequeg“Qay, myay inefay iendfray, oesday isthay ortsay ofay ingthay oftenay appen?”hay Ithoutway uchmay emotionay, oughthay oakedsay oughthray ustjay ikelay emay, ehay avegay emay otay understanday atthay uchsay ingsthay idday oftenay appenhay. 

“Mray. Ubb,”stay aidsay IAY, urningtay otay atthay orthyway, owhay, uttonedbay upay inay ishay oil-jacketay, asway ownay almlycay okingsmay ishay ipepay inay ethay ainray; “Mray. Ubbstay, IAY inkthay IAY avehay eardhay ouyay aysay atthay ofay allay alemenwhay ouyay everay etmay, ouray iefchay atemay, Mray. Arbuckstay, isay byay arfay ethay ostmay arefulcay anday udentpray. IAY upposesay enthay, atthay oinggay umpplay onay aay ingflyay alewhay ithway ouryay ailsay etsay inay aay oggyfay uallsqay isay ethay eighthay ofay aay aleman’swhay iscretion?”day 

ertain“Cay. I’veay oweredlay orfay aleswhay omfray aay eakinglay ipshay inay aay alegay offay Apecay Orn.”hay 

“Mray. Ask,”flay aidsay IAY, urningtay otay ittlelay Ing-postkay, owhay asway andingstay oseclay byay; ou“yay areay experienceday inay esethay ingsthay, anday IAY amay otnay. Illway ouyay elltay emay etherwhay itay isay anay unalterableay awlay inay isthay isheryfay, Mray. Askflay, orfay anay oarsmanay otay eakbray ishay ownay ackbay ullingpay imselfhay ack-foremostbay intoay eath’sday aws?”jay 

an’t“Cay ouyay isttway atthay aller?”smay aidsay Askflay. es“Yay, at’sthay ethay awlay. IAY ouldshay ikelay otay eesay aay oat’sbay ewcray ackingbay aterway upay otay aay alewhay acefay oremostfay. Ahay, ahay! ethay alewhay ouldway ivegay emthay uintsqay orfay uintsqay, indmay at!”thay 

Erehay enthay, omfray eethray impartialay itnessesway, IAY adhay aay eliberateday atementstay ofay ethay entireay asecay. Onsideringcay, ereforethay, atthay uallssqay anday apsizingscay inay ethay aterway anday onsequentcay ivouacksbay onay ethay eepday, ereway attersmay ofay ommoncay occurrenceay inay isthay indkay ofay ifelay; onsideringcay atthay atay ethay uperlativelysay iticalcray instantay ofay oinggay onay otay ethay alewhay IAY ustmay esignray myay ifelay intoay ethay andshay ofay imhay owhay eeredstay ethay oat—oftentimesbay aay ellowfay owhay atay atthay eryvay omentmay isay inay ishay impetuousnessay uponay ethay ointpay ofay uttlingscay ethay aftcray ithway ishay ownay anticfray ampingsstay; onsideringcay atthay ethay articularpay isasterday otay ouray ownay articularpay oatbay asway ieflychay otay ebay imputeday otay Arbuck’sstay ivingdray onay otay ishay alewhay almostay inay ethay eethtay ofay aay uallsqay, anday onsideringcay atthay Arbuckstay, otwithstandingnay, asway amousfay orfay ishay eatgray eedfulnesshay inay ethay isheryfay; onsideringcay atthay IAY elongedbay otay isthay uncommonlyay udentpray Arbuck’sstay oatbay; anday inallyfay onsideringcay inay atwhay aay evil’sday asechay IAY asway implicateday, ouchingtay ethay Itewhay Alewhay: akingtay allay ingsthay ogethertay, IAY aysay, IAY oughtthay IAY ightmay asay ellway ogay elowbay anday akemay aay oughray aftdray ofay myay illway. ueequeg,”“Qay aidsay IAY, ome“cay alongay, ouyay allshay ebay myay awyerlay, executoray, anday egatee.”lay 

Itay aymay eemsay angestray atthay ofay allay enmay ailorssay ouldshay ebay inkeringtay atay eirthay astlay illsway anday estamentstay, utbay erethay areay onay eoplepay inay ethay orldway oremay ondfay ofay atthay iversionday. Isthay asway ethay ourthfay imetay inay myay auticalnay ifelay atthay IAY adhay oneday ethay amesay ingthay. Afteray ethay eremonycay asway oncludedcay uponay ethay esentpray occasionay, IAY eltfay allay ethay easieray; aay onestay asway olledray awayay omfray myay earthay. Esidesbay, allay ethay aysday IAY ouldshay ownay ivelay ouldway ebay asay oodgay asay ethay aysday atthay Azaruslay ivedlay afteray ishay esurrectionray; aay upplementarysay eanclay aingay ofay osay anymay onthsmay oray eeksway asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay. IAY urvivedsay elfmysay; myay eathday anday urialbay ereway ockedlay upay inay myay estchay. IAY ookedlay oundray emay anquillytray anday ontentedlycay, ikelay aay uietqay ostghay ithway aay eanclay onsciencecay ittingsay insideay ethay arsbay ofay aay ugsnay amilyfay aultvay. 

Ownay enthay, oughtthay IAY, unconsciouslyay ollingray upay ethay eevesslay ofay myay ockfray, erehay oesgay orfay aay oolcay, ollectedcay iveday atay eathday anday estructionday, anday ethay evilday etchfay ethay indmosthay. 



APTERCHAY 50ay. Ahab’say Oatbay anday Ewcray. Edallahfay. 

o“Whay ouldway avehay oughtthay itay, Ask!”flay iedcray Ubbstay; if“ay IAY adhay utbay oneay eglay ouyay ouldway otnay atchcay emay inay aay oatbay, unlessay aybemay otay opstay ethay ug-holeplay ithway myay imbertay oetay. Ohay! e’shay aay onderfulway olday an!”may 

I“AY on’tday inkthay itay osay angestray, afteray allay, onay atthay account,”ay aidsay Askflay. If“ay ishay eglay ereway offay atay ethay iphay, ownay, itay ouldway ebay aay ifferentday ingthay. Atthay ouldway isableday imhay; utbay ehay ashay oneay eeknay, anday oodgay artpay ofay ethay otheray eftlay, ouyay ow.”knay 

I“AY on’tday owknay atthay, myay ittlelay anmay; IAY evernay etyay awsay imhay eel.”knay 

Amongay ale-wisewhay eoplepay itay ashay oftenay eenbay argueday etherwhay, onsideringcay ethay aramountpay importanceay ofay ishay ifelay otay ethay uccesssay ofay ethay oyagevay, itay isay ightray orfay aay alingwhay aptaincay otay eopardizejay atthay ifelay inay ethay activeay erilspay ofay ethay asechay. Osay Amerlane’stay oldierssay oftenay argueday ithway earstay inay eirthay eyesay, etherwhay atthay invaluableay ifelay ofay ishay oughtay otay ebay arriedcay intoay ethay ickestthay ofay ethay ightfay. 

Utbay ithway Ahabay ethay uestionqay assumeday aay odifiedmay aspectay. Onsideringcay atthay ithway otway egslay anmay isay utbay aay obblinghay ightway inay allay imestay ofay angerday; onsideringcay atthay ethay ursuitpay ofay aleswhay isay alwaysay underay eatgray anday extraordinaryay ifficultiesday; atthay everyay individualay omentmay, indeeday, enthay omprisescay aay erilpay; underay esethay ircumstancescay isay itay iseway orfay anyay aimedmay anmay otay enteray aay ale-boatwhay inay ethay unthay? Asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ethay oint-ownersjay ofay ethay Equodpay ustmay avehay ainlyplay oughtthay otnay. 

Ahabay ellway ewknay atthay althoughay ishay iendsfray atay omehay ouldway inkthay ittlelay ofay ishay enteringay aay oatbay inay ertaincay omparativelycay armlesshay icissitudesvay ofay ethay asechay, orfay ethay akesay ofay eingbay earnay ethay enescay ofay actionay anday ivinggay ishay ordersay inay ersonpay, etyay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay otay avehay aay oatbay actuallyay apportioneday otay imhay asay aay egularray eadsmanhay inay ethay unt—abovehay allay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay otay ebay uppliedsay ithway ivefay extraay enmay, asay atthay amesay oat’sbay ewcray, ehay ellway ewknay atthay uchsay enerousgay onceitscay evernay entereday ethay eadshay ofay ethay ownersay ofay ethay Equodpay. Ereforethay ehay adhay otnay olicitedsay aay oat’sbay ewcray omfray emthay, ornay adhay ehay inay anyay ayway intedhay ishay esiresday onay atthay eadhay. Everthelessnay ehay adhay akentay ivatepray easuresmay ofay ishay ownay ouchingtay allay atthay attermay. Untilay Abaco’scay ublishedpay iscoveryday, ethay ailorssay adhay ittlelay oreseenfay itay, oughthay otay ebay uresay enwhay, afteray eingbay aay ittlelay ilewhay outay ofay ortpay, allay andshay adhay oncludedcay ethay ustomarycay usinessbay ofay ittingfay ethay aleboatswhay orfay ervicesay; enwhay omesay imetay afteray isthay Ahabay asway ownay anday enthay oundfay estirringbay imselfhay inay ethay attermay ofay akingmay ole-pinsthay ithway ishay ownay andshay orfay atwhay asway oughtthay otay ebay oneay ofay ethay arespay oatsbay, anday evenay olicitouslysay uttingcay ethay allsmay oodenway ewersskay, ichwhay enwhay ethay inelay isay unningray outay areay innedpay overay ethay oovegray inay ethay owbay: enwhay allay isthay asway observeday inay imhay, anday articularlypay ishay olicitudesay inay avinghay anay extraay oatcay ofay eathingshay inay ethay ottombay ofay ethay oatbay, asay ifay otay akemay itay etterbay ithstandway ethay ointedpay essurepray ofay ishay ivoryay imblay; anday alsoay ethay anxietyay ehay evinceday inay exactlyay apingshay ethay ighthay oardbay, oray umsyclay eatclay, asay itay isay ometimessay alledcay, ethay orizontalhay iecepay inay ethay oat’sbay owbay orfay acingbray ethay eeknay againstay inay artingday oray abbingstay atay ethay alewhay; enwhay itay asway observeday owhay oftenay ehay oodstay upay inay atthay oatbay ithway ishay olitarysay eeknay ixedfay inay ethay emi-circularsay epressionday inay ethay eatclay, anday ithway ethay arpenter’scay iselchay ougedgay outay aay ittlelay erehay anday aightenedstray itay aay ittlelay erethay; allay esethay ingsthay, IAY aysay, adhay awakeneday uchmay interestay anday uriositycay atay ethay imetay. Utbay almostay everybodyay upposedsay atthay isthay articularpay eparativepray eedfulnesshay inay Ahabay ustmay onlyay ebay ithway aay iewvay otay ethay ultimateay asechay ofay Obymay Ickday; orfay ehay adhay alreadyay evealedray ishay intentionay otay unthay atthay ortalmay onstermay inay ersonpay. Utbay uchsay aay uppositionsay idday byay onay eansmay involveay ethay emotestray uspicionsay asay otay anyay oat’sbay ewcray eingbay assigneday otay atthay oatbay. 

Ownay, ithway ethay ubordinatesay antomsphay, atwhay onderway emainedray oonsay anedway awayay; orfay inay aay alerwhay ondersway oonsay aneway. Esidesbay, ownay anday enthay uchsay unaccountableay oddsay anday endsay ofay angestray ationsnay omecay upay omfray ethay unknownay ooksnay anday ash-holesay ofay ethay earthay otay anmay esethay oatingflay outlawsay ofay alerswhay; anday ethay ipsshay emselvesthay oftenay ickpay upay uchsay ueerqay astawaycay eaturescray oundfay ossingtay aboutay ethay openay easay onay anksplay, itsbay ofay eckwray, oarsay, aleboatswhay, anoescay, own-offblay Apanesejay unksjay, anday atwhay otnay; atthay Eelzebubbay imselfhay ightmay imbclay upay ethay idesay anday epstay ownday intoay ethay abincay otay atchay ithway ethay aptaincay, anday itay ouldway otnay eatecray anyay unsubduableay excitementay inay ethay orecastlefay. 

Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay, ertaincay itay isay atthay ilewhay ethay ubordinatesay antomsphay oonsay oundfay eirthay aceplay amongay ethay ewcray, oughthay illstay asay itay ereway omehowsay istinctday omfray emthay, etyay atthay air-turbanedhay Edallahfay emainedray aay uffledmay erymystay otay ethay astlay. Encewhay ehay amecay inay aay annerlymay orldway ikelay isthay, byay atwhay ortsay ofay unaccountableay ietay ehay oonsay evinceday imselfhay otay ebay inkedlay ithway Ahab’say eculiarpay ortunesfay; aynay, osay arfay asay otay avehay omesay ortsay ofay aay alf-hintedhay influenceay; Eavenhay owsknay, utbay itay ightmay avehay eenbay evenay authorityay overay imhay; allay isthay onenay ewknay. Utbay oneay annotcay ustainsay anay indifferentay airay oncerningcay Edallahfay. Ehay asway uchsay aay eaturecray asay ivilizedcay, omesticday eoplepay inay ethay emperatetay onezay onlyay eesay inay eirthay eamsdray, anday atthay utbay imlyday; utbay ethay ikelay ofay omwhay ownay anday enthay ideglay amongay ethay unchangingay Asiaticay ommunitiescay, especiallyay ethay Orientalay islesay otay ethay eastay ofay ethay ontinent—thosecay insulateday, immemorialay, unalterableay ountriescay, ichwhay evenay inay esethay odernmay aysday illstay eservepray uchmay ofay ethay ostlyghay aboriginalnessay ofay earth’say imalpray enerationsgay, enwhay ethay emorymay ofay ethay irstfay anmay asway aay istinctday ecollectionray, anday allay enmay ishay escendantsday, unknowingay encewhay ehay amecay, eyeday eachay otheray asay ealray antomsphay, anday askeday ofay ethay unsay anday ethay oonmay whyay eythay ereway eatedcray anday otay atwhay enday; enwhay oughthay, accordingay otay Enesisgay, ethay angelsay indeeday onsortedcay ithway ethay aughtersday ofay enmay, ethay evilsday alsoay, adday ethay uncanonicalay Abbinsray, indulgeday inay undanemay amoursay. 



APTERCHAY 51ay. Ethay Irit-spoutspay. 

Aysday, eeksway assedpay, anday underay easyay ailsay, ethay ivoryay Equodpay adhay owlyslay eptsway acrossay ourfay everalsay uising-groundscray; atthay offay ethay Azoresay; offay ethay Apecay eday Erdesvay; onay ethay Ateplay o(say alledcay), eingbay offay ethay outhmay ofay ethay Ioray eday alay Ataplay; anday ethay Arrolcay Oundgray, anay unstakeday, ateryway ocalitylay, outherlysay omfray Stay. Elenahay. 

Itay asway ilewhay idingglay oughthray esethay atterlay atersway atthay oneay erenesay anday oonlightmay ightnay, enwhay allay ethay avesway olledray byay ikelay ollsscray ofay ilversay; anday, byay eirthay oftsay, uffusingsay eethingssay, ademay atwhay eemedsay aay ilverysay ilencesay, otnay aay olitudesay; onay uchsay aay ilentsay ightnay aay ilverysay etjay asway eensay arfay inay advanceay ofay ethay itewhay ubblesbay atay ethay owbay. Itlay upay byay ethay oonmay, itay ookedlay elestialcay; eemedsay omesay umedplay anday itteringglay odgay uprisingay omfray ethay easay. Edallahfay irstfay escriedday isthay etjay. Orfay ofay esethay oonlightmay ightsnay, itay asway ishay ontway otay ountmay otay ethay ain-mastmay eadhay, anday andstay aay ook-outlay erethay, ithway ethay amesay ecisionpray asay ifay itay adhay eenbay ayday. Anday etyay, oughthay erdshay ofay aleswhay ereway eensay byay ightnay, otnay oneay alemanwhay inay aay undredhay ouldway enturevay aay oweringlay orfay emthay. Ouyay aymay inkthay ithway atwhay emotionsay, enthay, ethay eamensay eheldbay isthay olday Orientalay erchedpay aloftay atay uchsay unusualay ourshay; ishay urbantay anday ethay oonmay, ompanionscay inay oneay skyay. Utbay enwhay, afteray endingspay ishay uniformay intervalay erethay orfay everalsay uccessivesay ightsnay ithoutway utteringay aay inglesay oundsay; enwhay, afteray allay isthay ilencesay, ishay unearthlyay oicevay asway eardhay announcingay atthay ilverysay, oon-litmay etjay, everyay ecliningray arinermay artedstay otay ishay eetfay asay ifay omesay ingedway iritspay adhay ightedlay inay ethay iggingray, anday ailedhay ethay ortalmay ewcray. ere“Thay eshay ows!”blay Adhay ethay umptray ofay udgmentjay ownblay, eythay ouldcay otnay avehay uiveredqay oremay; etyay illstay eythay eltfay onay errortay; atherray easureplay. Orfay oughthay itay asway aay ostmay unwonteday ourhay, etyay osay impressiveay asway ethay cryay, anday osay eliriouslyday excitingay, atthay almostay everyay oulsay onay oardbay instinctivelyay esiredday aay oweringlay. 

Alkingway ethay eckday ithway uickqay, ide-lungingsay idesstray, Ahabay ommandedcay ethay allantt’gay ailssay anday oyalsray otay ebay etsay, anday everyay unsailstay eadspray. Ethay estbay anmay inay ethay ipshay ustmay aketay ethay elmhay. Enthay, ithway everyay ast-headmay annedmay, ethay iled-uppay aftcray olledray ownday eforebay ethay indway. Ethay angestray, upheavingay, iftinglay endencytay ofay ethay affrailtay eezebray illingfay ethay ollowshay ofay osay anymay ailssay, ademay ethay uoyantbay, overinghay eckday otay eelfay ikelay airay eneathbay ethay eetfay; ilewhay illstay eshay ushedray alongay, asay ifay otway antagonisticay influencesay ereway ugglingstray inay er—onehay otay ountmay irectday otay eavenhay, ethay otheray otay ivedray awinglyyay otay omesay orizontalhay oalgay. Anday adhay ouyay atchedway Ahab’say acefay atthay ightnay, ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay atthay inay imhay alsoay otway ifferentday ingsthay ereway arringway. Ilewhay ishay oneay ivelay eglay ademay ivelylay echoesay alongay ethay eckday, everyay okestray ofay ishay eadday imblay oundedsay ikelay aay offin-tapcay. Onay ifelay anday eathday isthay olday anmay alkedway. Utbay oughthay ethay ipshay osay iftlysway edspay, anday oughthay omfray everyay eyeay, ikelay arrowsay, ethay eageray ancesglay otshay, etyay ethay ilverysay etjay asway onay oremay eensay atthay ightnay. Everyay ailorsay oresway ehay awsay itay onceay, utbay otnay aay econdsay imetay. 

Isthay idnight-spoutmay adhay almostay owngray aay orgottenfay ingthay, enwhay, omesay aysday afteray, olay! atay ethay amesay ilentsay ourhay, itay asway againay announceday: againay itay asway escriedday byay allay; utbay uponay akingmay ailsay otay overtakeay itay, onceay oremay itay isappearedday asay ifay itay adhay evernay eenbay. Anday osay itay ervedsay usay ightnay afteray ightnay, illtay onay oneay eededhay itay utbay otay onderway atay itay. Eriouslymystay ettedjay intoay ethay earclay oonlightmay, oray arlightstay, asay ethay asecay ightmay ebay; isappearingday againay orfay oneay olewhay ayday, oray otway aysday, oray eethray; anday omehowsay eemingsay atay everyay istinctday epetitionray otay ebay advancingay illstay urtherfay anday urtherfay inay ouray anvay, isthay olitarysay etjay eemedsay orfay everay alluringay usay onay. 

Ornay ithway ethay immemorialay uperstitionsay ofay eirthay aceray, anday inay accordanceay ithway ethay eternaturalnesspray, asay itay eemedsay, ichwhay inay anymay ingsthay investeday ethay Equodpay, ereway erethay antingway omesay ofay ethay eamensay owhay oresway atthay eneverwhay anday ereverwhay escriedday; atay oweverhay emoteray imestay, oray inay oweverhay arfay apartay atitudeslay anday ongitudeslay, atthay unnearableay outspay asway astcay byay oneay elf-samesay alewhay; anday atthay alewhay, Obymay Ickday. Orfay aay imetay, erethay eignedray, ootay, aay ensesay ofay eculiarpay eaddray atay isthay ittingflay apparitionay, asay ifay itay ereway eacherouslytray eckoningbay usay onay anday onay, inay orderay atthay ethay onstermay ightmay urntay oundray uponay usay, anday endray usay atay astlay inay ethay emotestray anday ostmay avagesay eassay. 

Esethay emporarytay apprehensionsay, osay aguevay utbay osay awfulay, erivedday aay ondrousway otencypay omfray ethay ontrastingcay erenitysay ofay ethay eatherway, inay ichwhay, eneathbay allay itsay ueblay andnessblay, omesay oughtthay erethay urkedlay aay evilishday armchay, asay orfay aysday anday aysday eway oyagedvay alongay, oughthray eassay osay earilyway, onesomelylay ildmay, atthay allay acespay, inay epugnanceray otay ouray engefulvay erranday, eemedsay acatingvay itselfay ofay ifelay eforebay ouray urn-likeay owpray. 

Utbay, atay astlay, enwhay urningtay otay ethay eastwarday, ethay Apecay indsway eganbay owlinghay arounday usay, anday eway oseray anday ellfay uponay ethay onglay, oubledtray eassay atthay areay erethay; enwhay ethay ivory-tuskeday Equodpay arplyshay owedbay otay ethay astblay, anday oredgay ethay arkday avesway inay erhay adnessmay, illtay, ikelay owersshay ofay ilversay ipschay, ethay oam-flakesfay ewflay overay erhay ulwarksbay; enthay allay isthay esolateday acuityvay ofay ifelay entway awayay, utbay avegay aceplay otay ightssay oremay ismalday anthay eforebay. 

Oseclay otay ouray owsbay, angestray ormsfay inay ethay aterway artedday itherhay anday itherthay eforebay usay; ilewhay ickthay inay ouray earray ewflay ethay inscrutableay ea-ravenssay. Anday everyay orningmay, erchedpay onay ouray aysstay, owsray ofay esethay irdsbay ereway eensay; anday itespay ofay ouray ootingshay, orfay aay onglay imetay obstinatelyay ungclay otay ethay emphay, asay oughthay eythay eemedday ouray ipshay omesay iftingdray, uninhabiteday aftcray; aay ingthay appointeday otay esolationday, anday ereforethay itfay oosting-placeray orfay eirthay omelesshay elvessay. Anday eavedhay anday eavedhay, illstay unrestinglyay eavedhay ethay ackblay easay, asay ifay itsay astvay idestay ereway aay onsciencecay; anday ethay eatgray undanemay oulsay ereway inay anguishay anday emorseray orfay ethay onglay insay anday ufferingsay itay adhay edbray. 

Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay, oday eythay allcay eyay? Atherray Apecay Ormentosotay, asay alledcay ofay oreyay; orfay onglay allureday byay ethay erfidiouspay ilencessay atthay eforebay adhay attendeday usay, eway oundfay ourselvesay aunchedlay intoay isthay ormentedtay easay, erewhay uiltygay eingsbay ansformedtray intoay osethay owlsfay anday esethay ishfay, eemedsay ondemnedcay otay imsway onay everlastinglyay ithoutway anyay avenhay inay orestay, oray eatbay atthay ackblay airay ithoutway anyay orizonhay. Utbay almcay, ow-whitesnay, anday unvaryingay; illstay irectingday itsay ountainfay ofay eathersfay otay ethay skyay; illstay eckoningbay usay onay omfray eforebay, ethay olitarysay etjay ouldway atay imestay ebay escriedday. 

Uringday allay isthay acknessblay ofay ethay elementsay, Ahabay, oughthay assumingay orfay ethay imetay ethay almostay ontinualcay ommandcay ofay ethay encheddray anday angerousday eckday, anifestedmay ethay oomiestglay eserveray; anday oremay eldomsay anthay everay addresseday ishay atesmay. Inay empestuoustay imestay ikelay esethay, afteray everythingay aboveay anday aloftay ashay eenbay ecuredsay, othingnay oremay ancay ebay oneday utbay assivelypay otay awaitay ethay issueay ofay ethay alegay. Enthay Aptaincay anday ewcray ecomebay acticalpray atalistsfay. Osay, ithway ishay ivoryay eglay inserteday intoay itsay accustomeday olehay, anday ithway oneay andhay irmlyfay aspinggray aay oudshray, Ahabay orfay ourshay anday ourshay ouldway andstay azinggay eadday otay indwardway, ilewhay anay occasionalay uallsqay ofay eetslay oray owsnay ouldway allay utbay ongealcay ishay eryvay eyelashesay ogethertay. Eantimemay, ethay ewcray ivendray omfray ethay orwardfay artpay ofay ethay ipshay byay ethay erilouspay eassay atthay urstinglybay okebray overay itsay owsbay, oodstay inay aay inelay alongay ethay ulwarksbay inay ethay aistway; anday ethay etterbay otay uardgay againstay ethay eapinglay avesway, eachay anmay adhay ippedslay imselfhay intoay aay ortsay ofay owlinebay ecuredsay otay ethay ailray, inay ichwhay ehay ungsway asay inay aay oosenedlay eltbay. Ewfay oray onay ordsway ereway okenspay; anday ethay ilentsay ipshay, asay ifay annedmay byay aintedpay ailorssay inay axway, ayday afteray ayday oretay onay oughthray allay ethay iftsway adnessmay anday adnessglay ofay ethay emoniacday avesway. Byay ightnay ethay amesay utenessmay ofay umanityhay eforebay ethay ieksshray ofay ethay oceanay evailedpray; illstay inay ilencesay ethay enmay ungsway inay ethay owlinesbay; illstay ordlessway Ahabay oodstay upay otay ethay astblay. Evenay enwhay eariedway aturenay eemedsay emandingday eposeray ehay ouldway otnay eeksay atthay eposeray inay ishay ammockhay. Evernay ouldcay Arbuckstay orgetfay ethay olday an’smay aspectay, enwhay oneay ightnay oinggay ownday intoay ethay abincay otay arkmay owhay ethay arometerbay oodstay, ehay awsay imhay ithway osedclay eyesay ittingsay aightstray inay ishay oor-screwedflay airchay; ethay ainray anday alf-meltedhay eetslay ofay ethay ormstay omfray ichwhay ehay adhay omesay imetay eforebay emergeday, illstay owlyslay ippingdray omfray ethay unremoveday athay anday oatcay. Onay ethay abletay esidebay imhay aylay unrolleday oneay ofay osethay artschay ofay idestay anday urrentscay ichwhay avehay eviouslypray eenbay okenspay ofay. Ishay anternlay ungsway omfray ishay ightlytay enchedclay andhay. Oughthay ethay odybay asway erectay, ethay eadhay asway ownthray ackbay osay atthay ethay osedclay eyesay ereway ointedpay owardstay ethay eedlenay ofay ethay ell-taletay atthay ungsway omfray aay eambay inay ethay eilingcay.* 

e*Thay abin-compasscay isay alledcay ethay ell-taletay, ecausebay ithoutway oinggay otay ethay ompasscay atay ethay elmhay, ethay Aptaincay, ilewhay elowbay, ancay informay imselfhay ofay ethay oursecay ofay ethay ipshay. 

Erribletay olday anmay! oughtthay Arbuckstay ithway aay uddershay, eepingslay inay isthay alegay, illstay outhay eadfastlystay eyestay thyay urposepay. 



APTERCHAY 52ay. Ethay Albatrossay. 

Outh-eastwardsay omfray ethay Apecay, offay ethay istantday Ozettscray, aay oodgay uisingcray oundgray orfay Ightray Alemenwhay, aay ailsay oomedlay aheaday, ethay Oneygay Albatross(ay) byay amenay. Asay eshay owlyslay ewdray ighnay, omfray myay oftylay erchpay atay ethay ore-mast-headfay, IAY adhay aay oodgay iewvay ofay atthay ightsay osay emarkableray otay aay otyray inay ethay arfay oceanay isheries—afay alerwhay atay easay, anday onglay absentay omfray omehay. 

Asay ifay ethay avesway adhay eenbay ullersfay, isthay aftcray asway eachedblay ikelay ethay eletonskay ofay aay andedstray alrusway. Allay ownday erhay idessay, isthay ectralspay appearanceay asway acedtray ithway onglay annelschay ofay eddenedray ustray, ilewhay allay erhay arsspay anday erhay iggingray ereway ikelay ethay ickthay anchesbray ofay eestray urredfay overay ithway oar-frosthay. Onlyay erhay owerlay ailssay ereway etsay. AAY ildway ightsay itay asway otay eesay erhay ong-beardedlay ook-outslay atay osethay eethray ast-headsmay. Eythay eemedsay adclay inay ethay insskay ofay eastsbay, osay orntay anday epatchedbay ethay aimentray atthay adhay urvivedsay earlynay ourfay earsyay ofay uisingcray. Andingstay inay ironay oopshay ailednay otay ethay astmay, eythay ayedsway anday ungsway overay aay athomlessfay easay; anday oughthay, enwhay ethay ipshay owlyslay idedglay oseclay underay ouray ernstay, eway ixsay enmay inay ethay airay amecay osay ighnay otay eachay otheray atthay eway ightmay almostay avehay eapedlay omfray ethay ast-headsmay ofay oneay ipshay otay osethay ofay ethay otheray; etyay, osethay orlorn-lookingfay ishermenfay, ildlymay eyeingay usay asay eythay assedpay, aidsay otnay oneay ordway otay ouray ownay ook-outslay, ilewhay ethay uarter-deckqay ailhay asway eingbay eardhay omfray elowbay. 

ip“Shay ahoyay! Avehay eyay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

Utbay asay ethay angestray aptaincay, eaninglay overay ethay allidpay ulwarksbay, asway inay ethay actay ofay uttingpay ishay umpettray otay ishay outhmay, itay omehowsay ellfay omfray ishay andhay intoay ethay easay; anday ethay indway ownay isingray amainay, ehay inay ainvay ovestray otay akemay imselfhay eardhay ithoutway itay. Eantimemay ishay ipshay asway illstay increasingay ethay istanceday etweenbay. Ilewhay inay ariousvay ilentsay aysway ethay eamensay ofay ethay Equodpay ereway evincingay eirthay observanceay ofay isthay ominousay incidentay atay ethay irstfay eremay entionmay ofay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay amenay otay anotheray ipshay, Ahabay orfay aay omentmay ausedpay; itay almostay eemedsay asay oughthay ehay ouldway avehay oweredlay aay oatbay otay oardbay ethay angerstray, adhay otnay ethay eateningthray indway orbadefay. Utbay akingtay advantageay ofay ishay indwardway ositionpay, ehay againay eizedsay ishay umpettray, anday owingknay byay erhay aspectay atthay ethay angerstray esselvay asway aay Antucketernay anday ortlyshay oundbay omehay, ehay oudlylay ailed—“Ahoyhay erethay! Isthay isay ethay Equodpay, oundbay oundray ethay orldway! Elltay emthay otay addressay allay uturefay etterslay otay ethay Acificpay oceanay! anday isthay imetay eethray earsyay, ifay IAY amay otnay atay omehay, elltay emthay otay addressay emthay otay ——”ay 

Atay atthay omentmay ethay otway akesway ereway airlyfay ossedcray, anday instantlyay, enthay, inay accordanceay ithway eirthay ingularsay aysway, oalsshay ofay allsmay armlesshay ishfay, atthay orfay omesay aysday eforebay adhay eenbay acidlyplay immingsway byay ouray idesay, artedday awayay ithway atwhay eemedsay udderingshay insfay, anday angedray emselvesthay orefay anday aftay ithway ethay anger’sstray anksflay. Oughthay inay ethay oursecay ofay ishay ontinualcay oyagingsvay Ahabay ustmay oftenay eforebay avehay oticednay aay imilarsay ightsay, etyay, otay anyay onomaniacmay anmay, ethay eriestvay iflestray apriciouslycay arrycay eaningsmay. 

im“Sway awayay omfray emay, oday e?”yay urmuredmay Ahabay, azinggay overay intoay ethay aterway. Erethay eemedsay utbay ittlelay inay ethay ordsway, utbay ethay onetay onveyedcay oremay ofay eepday elplesshay adnesssay anthay ethay insaneay olday anmay adhay everay eforebay evinceday. Utbay urningtay otay ethay eersmanstay, owhay usthay arfay adhay eenbay oldinghay ethay ipshay inay ethay indway otay iminishday erhay eadwayhay, ehay iedcray outay inay ishay olday ionlay oice,—“Upvay elmhay! Eepkay erhay offay oundray ethay orld!”way 

Oundray ethay orldway! Erethay isay uchmay inay atthay oundsay otay inspireay oudpray eelingsfay; utbay eretowhay oesday allay atthay ircumnavigationcay onductcay? Onlyay oughthray umberlessnay erilspay otay ethay eryvay ointpay encewhay eway artedstay, erewhay osethay atthay eway eftlay ehindbay ecuresay, ereway allay ethay imetay eforebay usay. 

Ereway isthay orldway anay endlessay ainplay, anday byay ailingsay eastwarday eway ouldcay orfay everay eachray ewnay istancesday, anday iscoverday ightssay oremay eetsway anday angestray anthay anyay Adescyclay oray Islandsay ofay Ingkay Olomonsay, enthay erethay ereway omisepray inay ethay oyagevay. Utbay inay ursuitpay ofay osethay arfay eriesmystay eway eamdray ofay, oray inay ormentedtay asechay ofay atthay emonday antomphay atthay, omesay imetay oray otheray, imssway eforebay allay umanhay eartshay; ilewhay asingchay uchsay overay isthay oundray obeglay, eythay eitheray eadlay usay onay inay arrenbay azesmay oray idwaymay eavelay usay elmedwhay. 



APTERCHAY 53ay. Ethay Amgay. 

Ethay ostensibleay easonray whyay Ahabay idday otnay ogay onay oardbay ofay ethay alerwhay eway adhay okenspay asway isthay: ethay indway anday easay etokenedbay ormsstay. Utbay evenay adhay isthay otnay eenbay ethay asecay, ehay ouldway otnay afteray allay, erhapspay, avehay oardedbay er—judginghay byay ishay ubsequentsay onductcay onay imilarsay occasions—ifay osay itay adhay eenbay atthay, byay ethay ocesspray ofay ailinghay, ehay adhay obtaineday aay egativenay answeray otay ethay uestionqay ehay utpay. Orfay, asay itay eventuallyay urnedtay outay, ehay aredcay otnay otay onsortcay, evenay orfay ivefay inutesmay, ithway anyay angerstray aptaincay, exceptay ehay ouldcay ontributecay omesay ofay atthay informationay ehay osay absorbinglyay oughtsay. Utbay allay isthay ightmay emainray inadequatelyay estimateday, ereway otnay omethingsay aidsay erehay ofay ethay eculiarpay usagesay ofay aling-vesselswhay enwhay eetingmay eachay otheray inay oreignfay eassay, anday especiallyay onay aay ommoncay uising-groundcray. 

Ifay otway angersstray ossingcray ethay Inepay Arrensbay inay Ewnay Orkyay Atestay, oray ethay equallyay esolateday Alisburysay Ainplay inay Englanday; ifay asuallycay encounteringay eachay otheray inay uchsay inhospitableay ildsway, esethay aintway, orfay ethay ifelay ofay emthay, annotcay ellway avoiday aay utualmay alutationsay; anday oppingstay orfay aay omentmay otay interchangeay ethay ewsnay; anday, erhapspay, ittingsay ownday orfay aay ilewhay anday estingray inay oncertcay: enthay, owhay uchmay oremay aturalnay atthay uponay ethay illimitableay Inepay Arrensbay anday Alisburysay Ainsplay ofay ethay easay, otway alingwhay esselsvay escryingday eachay otheray atay ethay endsay ofay ethay earth—offay onelay Anning’sfay Islanday, oray ethay arfay awayay Ing’skay Illsmay; owhay uchmay oremay aturalnay, IAY aysay, atthay underay uchsay ircumstancescay esethay ipsshay ouldshay otnay onlyay interchangeay ailshay, utbay omecay intoay illstay oserclay, oremay iendlyfray anday ociablesay ontactcay. Anday especiallyay ouldway isthay eemsay otay ebay aay attermay ofay oursecay, inay ethay asecay ofay esselsvay owneday inay oneay eaportsay, anday osewhay aptainscay, officersay, anday otnay aay ewfay ofay ethay enmay areay ersonallypay ownknay otay eachay otheray; anday onsequentlycay, avehay allay ortssay ofay earday omesticday ingsthay otay alktay aboutay. 

Orfay ethay onglay absentay ipshay, ethay outward-bounderay, erhapspay, ashay etterslay onay oardbay; atay anyay ateray, eshay illway ebay uresay otay etlay erhay avehay omesay aperspay ofay aay ateday aay earyay oray otway aterlay anthay ethay astlay oneay onay erhay urredblay anday umb-wornthay ilesfay. Anday inay eturnray orfay atthay ourtesycay, ethay outward-bounday ipshay ouldway eceiveray ethay atestlay alingwhay intelligenceay omfray ethay uising-groundcray otay ichwhay eshay aymay ebay estinedday, aay ingthay ofay ethay utmostay importanceay otay erhay. Anday inay egreeday, allay isthay illway oldhay uetray oncerningcay alingwhay esselsvay ossingcray eachay other’say acktray onay ethay uising-groundcray itselfay, evenay oughthay eythay areay equallyay onglay absentay omfray omehay. Orfay oneay ofay emthay aymay avehay eceivedray aay ansfertray ofay etterslay omfray omesay irdthay, anday ownay arfay emoteray esselvay; anday omesay ofay osethay etterslay aymay ebay orfay ethay eoplepay ofay ethay ipshay eshay ownay eetsmay. Esidesbay, eythay ouldway exchangeay ethay alingwhay ewsnay, anday avehay anay agreeableay atchay. Orfay otnay onlyay ouldway eythay eetmay ithway allay ethay athiessympay ofay ailorssay, utbay ikewiselay ithway allay ethay eculiarpay ongenialitiescay arisingay omfray aay ommoncay ursuitpay anday utuallymay aredshay ivationspray anday erilspay. 

Ornay ouldway ifferenceday ofay ountrycay akemay anyay eryvay essentialay ifferenceday; atthay isay, osay onglay asay othbay artiespay eakspay oneay anguagelay, asay isay ethay asecay ithway Americansay anday Englishay. Oughthay, otay ebay uresay, omfray ethay allsmay umbernay ofay Englishay alerswhay, uchsay eetingsmay oday otnay eryvay oftenay occuray, anday enwhay eythay oday occuray erethay isay ootay aptay otay ebay aay ortsay ofay essshynay etweenbay emthay; orfay ouryay Englishmanay isay atherray eservedray, anday ouryay Ankeeyay, ehay oesday otnay ancyfay atthay ortsay ofay ingthay inay anybodyay utbay imselfhay. Esidesbay, ethay Englishay alerswhay ometimessay affectay aay indkay ofay etropolitanmay uperioritysay overay ethay Americanay alerswhay; egardingray ethay onglay, eanlay Antucketernay, ithway ishay ondescriptnay ovincialismspray, asay aay ortsay ofay ea-peasantsay. Utbay erewhay isthay uperioritysay inay ethay Englishay alemenwhay oesday eallyray onsistcay, itay ouldway ebay ardhay otay aysay, eeingsay atthay ethay Ankeesyay inay oneay ayday, ollectivelycay, illkay oremay aleswhay anthay allay ethay Englishay, ollectivelycay, inay entay earsyay. Utbay isthay isay aay armlesshay ittlelay oiblefay inay ethay Englishay ale-hunterswhay, ichwhay ethay Antucketernay oesday otnay aketay uchmay otay earthay; obablypray, ecausebay ehay owsknay atthay ehay ashay aay ewfay oiblesfay imselfhay. 

Osay, enthay, eway eesay atthay ofay allay ipsshay eparatelysay ailingsay ethay easay, ethay alerswhay avehay ostmay easonray otay ebay ociable—andsay eythay areay osay. Ereaswhay, omesay erchantmay ipsshay ossingcray eachay other’say akeway inay ethay id-Atlanticmay, illway oftentimesay asspay onay ithoutway osay uchmay asay aay inglesay ordway ofay ecognitionray, utuallymay uttingcay eachay otheray onay ethay ighhay eassay, ikelay aay acebray ofay andiesday inay Oadwaybray; anday allay ethay imetay indulgingay, erhapspay, inay inicalfay iticismcray uponay eachay other’say igray. Asay orfay En-of-warmay, enwhay eythay ancechay otay eetmay atay easay, eythay irstfay ogay oughthray uchsay aay ingstray ofay illysay owingsbay anday apingsscray, uchsay aay uckingday ofay ensignsay, atthay erethay oesday otnay eemsay otay ebay uchmay ight-downray eartyhay ood-willgay anday otherlybray ovelay aboutay itay atay allay. Asay ouchingtay Ave-shipsslay eetingmay, whyay, eythay areay inay uchsay aay odigiouspray urryhay, eythay unray awayay omfray eachay otheray asay oonsay asay ossiblepay. Anday asay orfay Iratespay, enwhay eythay ancechay otay osscray eachay other’say oss-bonescray, ethay irstfay ailhay is—“Howay anymay ulls?”—theskay amesay ayway atthay alerswhay ail—“Howhay anymay arrels?”bay Anday atthay uestionqay onceay answereday, iratespay aightwaystray eerstay apartay, orfay eythay areay infernalay illainsvay onay othbay idessay, anday on’tday ikelay otay eesay overmuchay ofay eachay other’say illanousvay ikenesseslay. 

Utbay ooklay atay ethay odlygay, onesthay, unostentatiousay, ospitablehay, ociablesay, ee-and-easyfray alerwhay! Atwhay oesday ethay alerwhay oday enwhay eshay eetsmay anotheray alerwhay inay anyay ortsay ofay ecentday eatherway? Eshay ashay aay am_,”“_Gay aay ingthay osay utterlyay unknownay otay allay otheray ipsshay atthay eythay evernay eardhay ofay ethay amenay evenay; anday ifay byay ancechay eythay ouldshay earhay ofay itay, eythay onlyay ingray atay itay, anday epeatray amesomegay uffstay aboutay outers”“spay anday ubber-boilers,”“blay anday uchsay ikelay ettypray exclamationsay. Whyay itay isay atthay allay Erchant-seamenmay, anday alsoay allay Iratespay anday An-of-war’smay enmay, anday Ave-shipslay ailorssay, erishchay uchsay aay ornfulscay eelingfay owardstay Ale-shipswhay; isthay isay aay uestionqay itay ouldway ebay ardhay otay answeray. Ecausebay, inay ethay asecay ofay iratespay, aysay, IAY ouldshay ikelay otay owknay etherwhay atthay ofessionpray ofay eirsthay ashay anyay eculiarpay oryglay aboutay itay. Itay ometimessay endsay inay uncommonay elevationay, indeeday; utbay onlyay atay ethay allowsgay. Anday esidesbay, enwhay aay anmay isay elevateday inay atthay odday ashionfay, ehay ashay onay operpray oundationfay orfay ishay uperiorsay altitudeay. Encehay, IAY oncludecay, atthay inay oastingbay imselfhay otay ebay ighhay iftedlay aboveay aay alemanwhay, inay atthay assertionay ethay iratepay ashay onay olidsay asisbay otay andstay onay. 

Utbay atwhay isay aay am_Gay?_ Ouyay ightmay earway outay ouryay index-fingeray unningray upay anday ownday ethay olumnscay ofay ictionariesday, anday evernay indfay ethay ordway. Dray. Ohnsonjay evernay attaineday otay atthay eruditionay; Oahnay Ebster’sway arkay oesday otnay oldhay itay. Everthelessnay, isthay amesay expressiveay ordway ashay ownay orfay anymay earsyay eenbay inay onstantcay useay amongay omesay ifteenfay ousandthay uetray ornbay Ankeesyay. Ertainlycay, itay eedsnay aay efinitionday, anday ouldshay ebay incorporateday intoay ethay Exiconlay. Ithway atthay iewvay, etlay emay earnedlylay efineday itay. 

AMGAY. OUN—_ANAY ocialsay eetingmay ofay otway_ or(_ay oremay_) aleships_Whay, enerallygay onay aay uising-groundcray; enwhay, afteray exchangingay ailshay, eythay exchangeay isitsvay byay oats’bay ewscray: ethay otway aptainscay emainingray, orfay ethay imetay, onay oardbay ofay oneay ipshay, anday ethay otway iefchay atesmay onay ethay otheray._ 

Erethay isay anotheray ittlelay itemay aboutay Amminggay ichwhay ustmay otnay ebay orgottenfay erehay. Allay ofessionspray avehay eirthay ownay ittlelay eculiaritiespay ofay etailday; osay ashay ethay alewhay isheryfay. Inay aay iratepay, an-of-warmay, oray aveslay ipshay, enwhay ethay aptaincay isay owedray anywhereay inay ishay oatbay, ehay alwaysay itssay inay ethay ernstay eetsshay onay aay omfortablecay, ometimessay ushionedcay eatsay erethay, anday oftenay eersstay imselfhay ithway aay ettypray ittlelay illiner’smay illertay ecoratedday ithway aygay ordscay anday ibbonsray. Utbay ethay ale-boatwhay ashay onay eatsay asternay, onay ofasay ofay atthay ortsay ateverwhay, anday onay illertay atay allay. Ighhay imestay indeeday, ifay alingwhay aptainscay ereway eeledwhay aboutay ethay aterway onay astorscay ikelay outygay olday aldermenay inay atentpay airschay. Anday asay orfay aay illertay, ethay ale-boatwhay evernay admitsay ofay anyay uchsay effeminacyay; anday ereforethay asay inay amminggay aay ompletecay oat’sbay ewcray ustmay eavelay ethay ipshay, anday encehay asay ethay oatbay eererstay oray arpooneerhay isay ofay ethay umbernay, atthay ubordinatesay isay ethay eersmanstay uponay ethay occasionay, anday ethay aptaincay, avinghay onay aceplay otay itsay inay, isay ulledpay offay otay ishay isitvay allay andingstay ikelay aay inepay eetray. Anday oftenay ouyay illway oticenay atthay eingbay onsciouscay ofay ethay eyesay ofay ethay olewhay isiblevay orldway estingray onay imhay omfray ethay idessay ofay ethay otway ipsshay, isthay andingstay aptaincay isay allay aliveay otay ethay importanceay ofay ustainingsay ishay ignityday byay aintainingmay ishay egslay. Ornay isay isthay anyay eryvay easyay attermay; orfay inay ishay earray isay ethay immenseay ojectingpray eeringstay oaray ittinghay imhay ownay anday enthay inay ethay allsmay ofay ishay ackbay, ethay after-oaray eciprocatingray byay appingray ishay eesknay inay ontfray. Ehay isay usthay ompletelycay edgedway eforebay anday ehindbay, anday ancay onlyay expanday imselfhay idewayssay byay ettlingsay ownday onay ishay etchedstray egslay; utbay aay uddensay, iolentvay itchpay ofay ethay oatbay illway oftenay ogay arfay otay oppletay imhay, ecausebay engthlay ofay oundationfay isay othingnay ithoutway orrespondingcay eadthbray. Erelymay akemay aay eadspray angleay ofay otway olespay, anday ouyay annotcay andstay emthay upay. Enthay, againay, itay ouldway evernay oday inay ainplay ightsay ofay ethay orld’sway ivetedray eyesay, itay ouldway evernay oday, IAY aysay, orfay isthay addlingstray aptaincay otay ebay eensay eadyingstay imselfhay ethay ightestslay articlepay byay atchingcay oldhay ofay anythingay ithway ishay andshay; indeeday, asay okentay ofay ishay entireay, uoyantbay elf-commandsay, ehay enerallygay arriescay ishay andshay inay ishay owsers’tray ocketspay; utbay erhapspay eingbay enerallygay eryvay argelay, eavyhay andshay, ehay arriescay emthay erethay orfay allastbay. Everthelessnay erethay avehay occurreday instancesay, ellway authenticateday onesay ootay, erewhay ethay aptaincay ashay eenbay ownknay orfay anay uncommonlyay iticalcray omentmay oray otway, inay aay uddensay uallsqay ay—tosay eizesay oldhay ofay ethay earestnay oarsman’say airhay, anday oldhay onay erethay ikelay imgray eathday. 



APTERCHAY 54ay. Ethay Own-ho’stay Orystay. 

As(_ay oldtay atay ethay Oldengay Innay.)_ 

Ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay, anday allay ethay ateryway egionray oundray aboutay erethay, isay uchmay ikelay omesay otednay ourfay ornerscay ofay aay eatgray ighwayhay, erewhay ouyay eetmay oremay avellerstray anthay inay anyay otheray artpay. 

Itay asway otnay eryvay onglay afteray eakingspay ethay Oneygay atthay anotheray omeward-boundhay alemanwhay, ethay Own-hotay,* asway encountereday. Eshay asway annedmay almostay ollywhay byay Olynesianspay. Inay ethay ortshay amgay atthay ensueday eshay avegay usay ongstray ewsnay ofay Obymay Ickday. Otay omesay ethay eneralgay interestay inay ethay Itewhay Alewhay asway ownay ildlyway eightenedhay byay aay ircumstancecay ofay ethay Own-ho’stay orystay, ichwhay eemedsay obscurelyay otay involveay ithway ethay alewhay aay ertaincay ondrousway, inverteday isitationvay ofay oneay ofay osethay osay alledcay udgmentsjay ofay Odgay ichwhay atay imestay areay aidsay otay overtakeay omesay enmay. Isthay atterlay ircumstancecay, ithway itsay ownay articularpay accompanimentsay, ormingfay atwhay aymay ebay alledcay ethay ecretsay artpay ofay ethay agedytray aboutay otay ebay arratednay, evernay eachedray ethay earsay ofay Aptaincay Ahabay oray ishay atesmay. Orfay atthay ecretsay artpay ofay ethay orystay asway unknownay otay ethay aptaincay ofay ethay Own-hotay imselfhay. Itay asway ethay ivatepray opertypray ofay eethray onfederatecay itewhay eamensay ofay atthay ipshay, oneay ofay omwhay, itay eemssay, ommunicatedcay itay otay Ashtegotay ithway Omishray injunctionsay ofay ecrecysay, utbay ethay ollowingfay ightnay Ashtegotay ambledray inay ishay eepslay, anday evealedray osay uchmay ofay itay inay atthay ayway, atthay enwhay ehay asway akenedway ehay ouldcay otnay ellway ithholdway ethay estray. Everthelessnay, osay otentpay anay influenceay idday isthay ingthay avehay onay osethay eamensay inay ethay Equodpay owhay amecay otay ethay ullfay owledgeknay ofay itay, anday byay uchsay aay angestray elicacyday, otay allcay itay osay, ereway eythay overnedgay inay isthay attermay, atthay eythay eptkay ethay ecretsay amongay emselvesthay osay atthay itay evernay anspiredtray abaftay ethay Equod’spay ain-mastmay. Interweavingay inay itsay operpray aceplay isthay arkerday eadthray ithway ethay orystay asay ubliclypay arratednay onay ethay ipshay, ethay olewhay ofay isthay angestray affairay IAY ownay oceedpray otay utpay onay astinglay ecordray. 

e*Thay ancientay ale-crywhay uponay irstfay ightingsay aay alewhay omfray ethay ast-headmay, illstay useday byay alemenwhay inay untinghay ethay amousfay Allipagosgay errapintay. 

Orfay myay umor’shay akesay, IAY allshay eservepray ethay estylay inay ichwhay IAY onceay arratednay itay atay Imalay, otay aay ounginglay irclecay ofay myay Anishspay iendsfray, oneay aint’ssay eveay, okingsmay uponay ethay ick-giltthay iledtay iazzapay ofay ethay Oldengay Innay. Ofay osethay inefay avalierscay, ethay oungyay Onsday, Edropay anday Ebastiansay, ereway onay ethay oserclay ermstay ithway emay; anday encehay ethay interludingay uestionsqay eythay occasionallyay utpay, anday ichwhay areay ulyday answereday atay ethay imetay. 

ome“Say otway earsyay iorpray otay myay irstfay earninglay ethay eventsay ichwhay IAY amay aboutay ehearsingray otay ouyay, entlemengay, ethay Own-hotay, Ermspay Alerwhay ofay Antucketnay, asway uisingcray inay ouryay Acificpay erehay, otnay eryvay anymay ays’day ailsay eastwarday omfray ethay eavesay ofay isthay oodgay Oldengay Innay. Eshay asway omewheresay otay ethay orthwardnay ofay ethay Inelay. Oneay orningmay uponay andlinghay ethay umpspay, accordingay otay ailyday usageay, itay asway observeday atthay eshay ademay oremay aterway inay erhay oldhay anthay ommoncay. Eythay upposedsay aay ord-fishsway adhay abbedstay erhay, entlemengay. Utbay ethay aptaincay, avinghay omesay unusualay easonray orfay elievingbay atthay areray oodgay ucklay awaiteday imhay inay osethay atitudeslay; anday ereforethay eingbay eryvay averseay otay uitqay emthay, anday ethay eaklay otnay eingbay enthay onsideredcay atay allay angerousday, oughthay, indeeday, eythay ouldcay otnay indfay itay afteray earchingsay ethay oldhay asay owlay ownday asay asway ossiblepay inay atherray eavyhay eatherway, ethay ipshay illstay ontinuedcay erhay uisingscray, ethay arinersmay orkingway atay ethay umpspay atay ideway anday easyay intervalsay; utbay onay oodgay ucklay amecay; oremay aysday entway byay, anday otnay onlyay asway ethay eaklay etyay undiscovereday, utbay itay ensiblysay increaseday. Osay uchmay osay, atthay ownay akingtay omesay alarmay, ethay aptaincay, akingmay allay ailsay, oodstay awayay orfay ethay earestnay arborhay amongay ethay islandsay, erethay otay avehay ishay ullhay ovehay outay anday epairedray. 

ough“Thay onay allsmay assagepay asway eforebay erhay, etyay, ifay ethay ommonestcay ancechay avouredfay, ehay idday otnay atay allay earfay atthay ishay ipshay ouldway ounderfay byay ethay ayway, ecausebay ishay umpspay ereway ofay ethay estbay, anday eingbay eriodicallypay elievedray atay emthay, osethay ix-and-thirtysay enmay ofay ishay ouldcay easilyay eepkay ethay ipshay eefray; evernay indmay ifay ethay eaklay ouldshay oubleday onay erhay.
