Inay uthtray, ellway ighnay ethay olewhay ofay isthay assagepay eingbay attendeday byay eryvay osperouspray eezesbray, ethay Own-hotay adhay allay utbay ertainlycay arriveday inay erfectpay afetysay atay erhay ortpay ithoutway ethay occurrenceay ofay ethay eastlay atalityfay, adhay itay otnay eenbay orfay ethay utalbray overbearingay ofay Adneyray, ethay atemay, aay Ineyardervay, anday ethay itterlybay ovokedpray engeancevay ofay Eelkiltstay, aay Akemanlay anday esperadoday omfray Uffalobay. 

akeman!—Buffalo“‘Lay! Aypray, atwhay isay aay Akemanlay, anday erewhay isay Uffalo?’bay aidsay Onday Ebastiansay, isingray inay ishay ingingsway atmay ofay assgray. 

On“ay ethay easternay oreshay ofay ouray Akelay Erieay, Onday; ut—Ibay avecray ouryay ourtesy—maycay ebay, ouyay allshay oonsay earhay urtherfay ofay allay atthay. Ownay, entlemengay, inay uare-sailsqay igsbray anday ee-mastedthray ipsshay, ell-nighway asay argelay anday outstay asay anyay atthay everay ailedsay outay ofay ouryay olday Allaocay otay arfay Anillamay; isthay Akemanlay, inay ethay and-lockedlay earthay ofay ouray Americaay, adhay etyay eenbay urturednay byay allay osethay agrarianay eebootingfray impressionsay opularlypay onnectedcay ithway ethay openay oceanay. Orfay inay eirthay interflowingay aggregateay, osethay andgray esh-waterfray eassay ofay ours,—Erieay, anday Ontarioay, anday Uronhay, anday Uperiorsay, anday Ichigan,—possessmay anay ocean-likeay expansivenessay, ithway anymay ofay ethay ocean’say oblestnay aitstray; ithway anymay ofay itsay immedray arietiesvay ofay acesray anday ofay imesclay. Eythay ontaincay oundray archipelagoesay ofay omanticray islesay, evenay asay ethay Olynesianpay atersway oday; inay argelay artpay, areay oredshay byay otway eatgray ontrastingcay ationsnay, asay ethay Atlanticay isay; eythay urnishfay onglay aritimemay approachesay otay ouray umerousnay erritorialtay oloniescay omfray ethay Eastay, ottedday allay oundray eirthay anksbay; erehay anday erethay areay ownedfray uponay byay atteriesbay, anday byay ethay oat-likegay aggycray unsgay ofay oftylay Ackinawmay; eythay avehay eardhay ethay eetflay underingsthay ofay avalnay ictoriesvay; atay intervalsay, eythay ieldyay eirthay eachesbay otay ildway arbariansbay, osewhay edray aintedpay acesfay ashflay omfray outay eirthay eltrypay igwamsway; orfay eagueslay anday eagueslay areay ankedflay byay ancientay anday unentereday orestsfay, erewhay ethay auntgay inespay andstay ikelay erriedsay ineslay ofay ingskay inay Othicgay enealogiesgay; osethay amesay oodsway arboringhay ildway Africay eastsbay ofay eypray, anday ilkensay eaturescray osewhay exporteday ursfay ivegay obesray otay Artartay Emperorsay; eythay irrormay ethay avedpay apitalscay ofay Uffalobay anday Evelandclay, asay ellway asay Innebagoway illagesvay; eythay oatflay alikeay ethay ull-riggedfay erchantmay ipshay, ethay armeday uisercray ofay ethay Atestay, ethay eamerstay, anday ethay eechbay anoecay; eythay areay eptsway byay Oreanbay anday ismastingday astsblay asay irefulday asay anyay atthay ashlay ethay altedsay aveway; eythay owknay atwhay ipwrecksshay areay, orfay outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay, oweverhay inlanday, eythay avehay owneddray ullfay anymay aay idnightmay ipshay ithway allay itsay iekingshray ewcray. Usthay, entlemengay, oughthay anay inlanderay, Eelkiltstay asway ild-oceanway ornbay, anday ild-oceanway urturednay; asay uchmay ofay anay audaciousay arinermay asay anyay. Anday orfay Adneyray, oughthay inay ishay infancyay ehay aymay avehay aidlay imhay ownday onay ethay onelay Antucketnay eachbay, otay ursenay atay ishay aternalmay easay; oughthay inay afteray ifelay ehay adhay onglay ollowedfay ouray austereay Atlanticay anday ouryay ontemplativecay Acificpay; etyay asway ehay uiteqay asay engefulvay anday ullfay ofay ocialsay uarrelqay asay ethay ackwoodsbay eamansay, eshfray omfray ethay atitudeslay ofay uck-hornbay andledhay Owie-knivesbay. Etyay asway isthay Antucketernay aay anmay ithway omesay ood-heartedgay aitstray; anday isthay Akemanlay, aay arinermay, owhay oughthay aay ortsay ofay evilday indeeday, ightmay etyay byay inflexibleay irmnessfay, onlyay emperedtay byay atthay ommoncay ecencyday ofay umanhay ecognitionray ichwhay isay ethay eanestmay ave’sslay ightray; usthay eatedtray, isthay Eelkiltstay adhay onglay eenbay etainedray armlesshay anday ocileday. Atay allay eventsay, ehay adhay ovedpray osay usthay arfay; utbay Adneyray asway oomedday anday ademay admay, anday Eelkilt—butstay, entlemengay, ouyay allshay earhay. 

It“ay asway otnay oremay anthay aay ayday oray otway atay ethay urthestfay afteray ointingpay erhay owpray orfay erhay islanday avenhay, atthay ethay Own-ho’stay eaklay eemedsay againay increasingay, utbay onlyay osay asay otay equireray anay ourhay oray oremay atay ethay umpspay everyay ayday. Ouyay ustmay owknay atthay inay aay ettledsay anday ivilizedcay oceanay ikelay ouray Atlanticay, orfay exampleay, omesay ippersskay inkthay ittlelay ofay umpingpay eirthay olewhay ayway acrossay itay; oughthay ofay aay illstay, eepyslay ightnay, ouldshay ethay officeray ofay ethay eckday appenhay otay orgetfay ishay utyday inay atthay espectray, ethay obabilitypray ouldway ebay atthay ehay anday ishay ipmatesshay ouldway evernay againay ememberray itay, onay accountay ofay allay andshay entlygay ubsidingsay otay ethay ottombay. Ornay inay ethay olitarysay anday avagesay eassay arfay omfray ouyay otay ethay estwardway, entlemengay, isay itay altogetheray unusualay orfay ipsshay otay eepkay angingclay atay eirthay ump-handlespay inay ullfay oruschay evenay orfay aay oyagevay ofay onsiderablecay engthlay; atthay isay, ifay itay ielay alongay aay olerablytay accessibleay oastcay, oray ifay anyay otheray easonableray etreatray isay affordeday emthay. Itay isay onlyay enwhay aay eakylay esselvay isay inay omesay eryvay outay ofay ethay ayway artpay ofay osethay atersway, omesay eallyray andlesslay atitudelay, atthay erhay aptaincay eginsbay otay eelfay aay ittlelay anxiousay. 

uch“May isthay ayway adhay itay eenbay ithway ethay Own-hotay; osay enwhay erhay eaklay asway oundfay aininggay onceay oremay, erethay asway inay uthtray omesay allsmay oncerncay anifestedmay byay everalsay ofay erhay ompanycay; especiallyay byay Adneyray ethay atemay. Ehay ommandedcay ethay upperay ailssay otay ebay ellway oistedhay, eetedshay omehay aneway, anday everyay ayway expandeday otay ethay eezebray. Ownay isthay Adneyray, IAY upposesay, asway asay ittlelay ofay aay owardcay, anday asay ittlelay inclineday otay anyay ortsay ofay ervousnay apprehensivenessay ouchingtay ishay ownay ersonpay asay anyay earlessfay, unthinkingay eaturecray onay andlay oray onay easay atthay ouyay ancay onvenientlycay imagineay, entlemengay. Ereforethay enwhay ehay etrayedbay isthay olicitudesay aboutay ethay afetysay ofay ethay ipshay, omesay ofay ethay eamensay eclaredday atthay itay asway onlyay onay accountay ofay ishay eingbay aay artpay owneray inay erhay. Osay enwhay eythay ereway orkingway atthay eveningay atay ethay umpspay, erethay asway onay isthay eadhay onay allsmay amesomenessgay ilyslay oinggay onay amongay emthay, asay eythay oodstay ithway eirthay eetfay ontinuallycay overfloweday byay ethay ipplingray earclay aterway; earclay asay anyay ountainmay ingspray, entlemen—thatgay ubblingbay omfray ethay umpspay anray acrossay ethay eckday, anday ouredpay itselfay outay inay eadystay outsspay atay ethay eelay upper-holesscay. 

ow“Nay, asay ouyay ellway owknay, itay isay otnay eldomsay ethay asecay inay isthay onventionalcay orldway ofay ours—wateryay oray otherwiseay; atthay enwhay aay ersonpay acedplay inay ommandcay overay ishay ellow-menfay indsfay oneay ofay emthay otay ebay eryvay ignificantlysay ishay uperiorsay inay eneralgay idepray ofay anhoodmay, aightwaystray againstay atthay anmay ehay onceivescay anay unconquerableay islikeday anday itternessbay; anday ifay ehay avehay aay ancechay ehay illway ullpay ownday anday ulverizepay atthay ubaltern’ssay owertay, anday akemay aay ittlelay eaphay ofay ustday ofay itay. Ebay isthay onceitcay ofay inemay asay itay aymay, entlemengay, atay allay eventsay Eelkiltstay asway aay alltay anday oblenay animalay ithway aay eadhay ikelay aay Omanray, anday aay owingflay oldengay eardbay ikelay ethay asseledtay ousingshay ofay ouryay astlay iceroy’svay ortingsnay argerchay; anday aay ainbray, anday aay earthay, anday aay oulsay inay imhay, entlemengay, ichwhay adhay ademay Eelkiltstay Arlemagnechay, adhay ehay eenbay ornbay onsay otay Arlemagne’schay atherfay. Utbay Adneyray, ethay atemay, asway uglyay asay aay ulemay; etyay asay ardyhay, asay ubbornstay, asay aliciousmay. Ehay idday otnay ovelay Eelkiltstay, anday Eelkiltstay ewknay itay. 

Espying“ay ethay atemay awingdray earnay asay ehay asway oilingtay atay ethay umppay ithway ethay estray, ethay Akemanlay affecteday otnay otay oticenay imhay, utbay unaweday, entway onay ithway ishay aygay anteringsbay. 

Aye“‘ay, ayeay, myay errymay adslay, it’say aay ivelylay eaklay isthay; oldhay aay annikincay, oneay ofay eyay, anday et’slay avehay aay astetay. Byay ethay Ordlay, it’say orthway ottlingbay! IAY elltay eyay atwhay, enmay, olday Ad’sray investmentay ustmay ogay orfay itay! ehay adhay estbay utcay awayay ishay artpay ofay ethay ullhay anday owtay itay omehay. Ethay actfay isay, oysbay, atthay ord-fishsway onlyay eganbay ethay objay; e’shay omecay ackbay againay ithway aay anggay ofay ip-carpentersshay, aw-fishsay, anday ile-fishfay, anday atwhay otnay; anday ethay olewhay ossepay ofay em’ay areay ownay ardhay atay orkway uttingcay anday ashingslay atay ethay ottombay; akingmay improvementsay, IAY upposesay. Ifay olday Adray ereway erehay ownay, I’day elltay imhay otay umpjay overboarday anday atterscay em’ay. Ey’rethay ayingplay ethay evilday ithway ishay estateay, IAY ancay elltay imhay. Utbay e’shay aay implesay olday oul,—Radsay, anday aay eautybay ootay. Oysbay, eythay aysay ethay estray ofay ishay opertypray isay investeday inay ooking-glasseslay. IAY onderway ifay e’dhay ivegay aay oorpay evilday ikelay emay ethay odelmay ofay ishay ose.’nay 

amn“‘Day ouryay eyesay! at’swhay atthay umppay oppingstay or?’fay oaredray Adneyray, etendingpray otnay otay avehay eardhay ethay ailors’say alktay. under‘Thay awayay atay it!’ay 

Aye“‘ay, ayeay, ir,’say aidsay Eelkiltstay, errymay asay aay icketcray. ively‘Lay, oysbay, ivelylay, ow!’nay Anday ithway atthay ethay umppay angedclay ikelay iftyfay ire-enginesfay; ethay enmay ossedtay eirthay atshay offay otay itay, anday ereay onglay atthay eculiarpay aspinggay ofay ethay ungslay asway eardhay ichwhay enotesday ethay ullestfay ensiontay ofay ife’slay utmostay energiesay. 

uitting“Qay ethay umppay atay astlay, ithway ethay estray ofay ishay andbay, ethay Akemanlay entway orwardfay allay antingpay, anday atsay imselfhay ownday onay ethay indlassway; ishay acefay ieryfay edray, ishay eyesay oodshotblay, anday ipingway ethay ofusepray eatsway omfray ishay owbray. Ownay atwhay ozeningcay iendfay itay asway, entlemengay, atthay ossessedpay Adneyray otay eddlemay ithway uchsay aay anmay inay atthay orporeallycay exasperateday atestay, IAY owknay otnay; utbay osay itay appenedhay. Intolerablyay idingstray alongay ethay eckday, ethay atemay ommandedcay imhay otay etgay aay oombray anday eepsway ownday ethay anksplay, anday alsoay aay ovelshay, anday emoveray omesay offensiveay attersmay onsequentcay uponay allowingay aay igpay otay unray atay argelay. 

ow“Nay, entlemengay, eepingsway aay ip’sshay eckday atay easay isay aay iecepay ofay ouseholdhay orkway ichwhay inay allay imestay utbay agingray alesgay isay egularlyray attendeday otay everyay eveningay; itay ashay eenbay ownknay otay ebay oneday inay ethay asecay ofay ipsshay actuallyay ounderingfay atay ethay imetay. Uchsay, entlemengay, isay ethay inflexibilityay ofay ea-usagessay anday ethay instinctiveay ovelay ofay eatnessnay inay eamensay; omesay ofay omwhay ouldway otnay illinglyway owndray ithoutway irstfay ashingway eirthay acesfay. Utbay inay allay esselsvay isthay oombray usinessbay isay ethay escriptivepray ovincepray ofay ethay oysbay, ifay oysbay erethay ebay aboarday. Esidesbay, itay asway ethay ongerstray enmay inay ethay Own-hotay atthay adhay eenbay ividedday intoay angsgay, akingtay urnstay atay ethay umpspay; anday eingbay ethay ostmay athleticay eamansay ofay emthay allay, Eelkiltstay adhay eenbay egularlyray assigneday aptaincay ofay oneay ofay ethay angsgay; onsequentlycay ehay ouldshay avehay eenbay eedfray omfray anyay ivialtray usinessbay otnay onnectedcay ithway ulytray auticalnay utiesday, uchsay eingbay ethay asecay ithway ishay omradescay. IAY entionmay allay esethay articularspay osay atthay ouyay aymay understanday exactlyay owhay isthay affairay oodstay etweenbay ethay otway enmay. 

ut“Bay erethay asway oremay anthay isthay: ethay orderay aboutay ethay ovelshay asway almostay asay ainlyplay eantmay otay ingstay anday insultay Eelkiltstay, asay oughthay Adneyray adhay atspay inay ishay acefay. Anyay anmay owhay ashay onegay ailorsay inay aay ale-shipwhay illway understanday isthay; anday allay isthay anday oubtlessday uchmay oremay, ethay Akemanlay ullyfay omprehendedcay enwhay ethay atemay uttereday ishay ommandcay. Utbay asay ehay atsay illstay orfay aay omentmay, anday asay ehay eadfastlystay ookedlay intoay ethay ate’smay alignantmay eyeay anday erceivedpay ethay acksstay ofay owder-caskspay eapedhay upay inay imhay anday ethay ow-matchslay ilentlysay urningbay alongay owardstay emthay; asay ehay instinctivelyay awsay allay isthay, atthay angestray orbearancefay anday unwillingnessay otay irstay upay ethay eeperday assionatenesspay inay anyay alreadyay irefulay eing—abay epugnanceray ostmay eltfay, enwhay eltfay atay allay, byay eallyray aliantvay enmay evenay enwhay aggrieved—thisay amelessnay antomphay eelingfay, entlemengay, olestay overay Eelkiltstay. 

erefore“Thay, inay ishay ordinaryay onetay, onlyay aay ittlelay okenbray byay ethay odilybay exhaustionay ehay asway emporarilytay inay, ehay answereday imhay ayingsay atthay eepingsway ethay eckday asway otnay ishay usinessbay, anday ehay ouldway otnay oday itay. Anday enthay, ithoutway atay allay alludingay otay ethay ovelshay, ehay ointedpay otay eethray adslay asay ethay ustomarycay eeperssway; owhay, otnay eingbay illetedbay atay ethay umpspay, adhay oneday ittlelay oray othingnay allay ayday. Otay isthay, Adneyray epliedray ithway anay oathay, inay aay ostmay omineeringday anday outrageousay annermay unconditionallyay eiteratingray ishay ommandcay; eanwhilemay advancingay uponay ethay illstay eatedsay Akemanlay, ithway anay uplifteday ooper’scay ubclay ammerhay ichwhay ehay adhay atchedsnay omfray aay askcay earnay byay. 

eated“Hay anday irritateday asay ehay asway byay ishay asmodicspay oiltay atay ethay umpspay, orfay allay ishay irstfay amelessnay eelingfay ofay orbearancefay ethay eatingsway Eelkiltstay ouldcay utbay illay ookbray isthay earingbay inay ethay atemay; utbay omehowsay illstay otheringsmay ethay onflagrationcay ithinway imhay, ithoutway eakingspay ehay emainedray oggedlyday ootedray otay ishay eatsay, illtay atay astlay ethay incenseday Adneyray ookshay ethay ammerhay ithinway aay ewfay inchesay ofay ishay acefay, uriouslyfay ommandingcay imhay otay oday ishay iddingbay. 

eelkilt“Stay oseray, anday owlyslay etreatingray oundray ethay indlassway, eadilystay ollowedfay byay ethay atemay ithway ishay enacingmay ammerhay, eliberatelyday epeatedray ishay intentionay otnay otay obeyay. Eeingsay, oweverhay, atthay ishay orbearancefay adhay otnay ethay ightestslay effectay, byay anay awfulay anday unspeakableay intimationay ithway ishay istedtway andhay ehay arnedway offay ethay oolishfay anday infatuateday anmay; utbay itay asway otay onay urposepay. Anday inay isthay ayway ethay otway entway onceay owlyslay oundray ethay indlassway; enwhay, esolvedray atay astlay onay ongerlay otay etreatray, ethinkingbay imhay atthay ehay adhay ownay orbornefay asay uchmay asay omportedcay ithway ishay umorhay, ethay Akemanlay ausedpay onay ethay atcheshay anday usthay okespay otay ethay officeray: 

“‘Mray. Adneyray, IAY illway otnay obeyay ouyay. Aketay atthay ammerhay awayay, oray ooklay otay ourself.’yay Utbay ethay edestinatedpray atemay omingcay illstay oserclay otay imhay, erewhay ethay Akemanlay oodstay ixedfay, ownay ookshay ethay eavyhay ammerhay ithinway anay inchay ofay ishay eethtay; eanwhilemay epeatingray aay ingstray ofay insufferableay aledictionsmay. Etreatingray otnay ethay ousandththay artpay ofay anay inchay; abbingstay imhay inay ethay eyeay ithway ethay unflinchingay oniardpay ofay ishay anceglay, Eelkiltstay, enchingclay ishay ightray andhay ehindbay imhay anday eepinglycray awingdray itay ackbay, oldtay ishay ersecutorpay atthay ifay ethay ammerhay utbay azedgray ishay eekchay ehay eelkilt(Stay) ouldway urdermay imhay. Utbay, entlemengay, ethay oolfay adhay eenbay andedbray orfay ethay aughterslay byay ethay odsgay. Immediatelyay ethay ammerhay ouchedtay ethay eekchay; ethay extnay instantay ethay owerlay awjay ofay ethay atemay asway ovestay inay ishay eadhay; ehay ellfay onay ethay atchhay outingspay oodblay ikelay aay alewhay. 

Ere“ay ethay cryay ouldcay ogay aftay Eelkiltstay asway akingshay oneay ofay ethay ackstaysbay eadinglay arfay aloftay otay erewhay otway ofay ishay omradescay ereway andingstay eirthay astheadsmay. Eythay ereway othbay Anallerscay. 

anallers!’“‘Cay iedcray Onday Edropay. e‘Way avehay eensay anymay ale-shipswhay inay ouray arbourshay, utbay evernay eardhay ofay ouryay Anallerscay. Ardonpay: owhay anday atwhay areay ey?’thay 

anallers“‘Cay, Onday, areay ethay oatmenbay elongingbay otay ouray andgray Erieay Analcay. Ouyay ustmay avehay eardhay ofay it.’ay 

ay“‘Nay, Enorsay; ereaboutshay inay isthay ullday, armway, ostmay azylay, anday ereditaryhay andlay, eway owknay utbay ittlelay ofay ouryay igorousvay Orth.’nay 

Aye“‘ay? Ellway enthay, Onday, efillray myay upcay. Ouryay icha’schay eryvay inefay; anday ereay oceedingpray urtherfay IAY illway elltay eyay atwhay ouray Anallerscay areay; orfay uchsay informationay aymay owthray ide-lightsay uponay myay ory.’stay 

or“Fay eethray undredhay anday ixtysay ilesmay, entlemengay, oughthray ethay entireay eadthbray ofay ethay atestay ofay Ewnay Orkyay; oughthray umerousnay opulouspay itiescay anday ostmay ivingthray illagesvay; oughthray onglay, ismalday, uninhabiteday ampssway, anday affluentay, ultivatedcay ieldsfay, unrivalleday orfay ertilityfay; byay illiard-roombay anday ar-roombay; oughthray ethay oly-of-holieshay ofay eatgray orestsfay; onay Omanray archesay overay Indianay iversray; oughthray unsay anday adeshay; byay appyhay eartshay oray okenbray; oughthray allay ethay ideway ontrastingcay eneryscay ofay osethay oblenay Ohawkmay ountiescay; anday especiallyay, byay owsray ofay ow-whitesnay apelschay, osewhay iresspay andstay almostay ikelay ilestonesmay, owsflay oneay ontinualcay eamstray ofay Enetianlyvay orruptcay anday oftenay awlesslay ifelay. Ere’sthay ouryay uetray Ashanteeay, entlemengay; erethay owlhay ouryay aganspay; erewhay ouyay everay indfay emthay, extnay oorday otay ouyay; underay ethay ong-flunglay adowshay, anday ethay ugsnay atronisingpay eelay ofay urcheschay. Orfay byay omesay uriouscay atalityfay, asay itay isay oftenay otednay ofay ouryay etropolitanmay eebootersfray atthay eythay everay encampay arounday ethay allshay ofay usticejay, osay innerssay, entlemengay, ostmay abounday inay oliesthay icinitiesvay. 

Is“‘ay atthay aay iarfray assing?’pay aidsay Onday Edropay, ookinglay ownwardsday intoay ethay owdedcray azzaplay, ithway umoroushay oncerncay. 

ell“‘Way orfay ouray orthernnay iendfray, Ameday Isabella’say Inquisitionay anesway inay Ima,’lay aughedlay Onday Ebastiansay. oceed‘Pray, Enor.’say 

A“‘AY omentmay! Ardon!’pay iedcray anotheray ofay ethay ompanycay. In‘ay ethay amenay ofay allay usay Imeeselay, IAY utbay esireday otay expressay otay ouyay, irsay ailorsay, atthay eway avehay byay onay eansmay overlookeday ouryay elicacyday inay otnay ubstitutingsay esentpray Imalay orfay istantday Enicevay inay ouryay orruptcay omparisoncay. Ohay! oday otnay owbay anday ooklay urprisedsay; ouyay owknay ethay overbpray allay alongay isthay oast—“Corruptcay asay Ima.”lay Itay utbay earsbay outay ouryay ayingsay, ootay; urcheschay oremay entifulplay anthay illiard-tablesbay, anday orfay everay open—anday orrupt“Cay asay Ima.”lay Osay, ootay, Enicevay; IAY avehay eenbay erethay; ethay olyhay itycay ofay ethay essedblay evangelistay, Stay. Ark!—stmay. Ominicday, urgepay itay! Ouryay upcay! Anksthay: erehay IAY efillray; ownay, ouyay ourpay outay again.’ay 

eely“Fray epictedday inay ishay ownay ocationvay, entlemengay, ethay Anallercay ouldway akemay aay inefay amaticdray erohay, osay abundantlyay anday icturesquelypay ickedway isay ehay. Ikelay Arkmay Antonyay, orfay aysday anday aysday alongay ishay een-turfedgray, oweryflay Ilenay, ehay indolentlyay oatsflay, openlyay oyingtay ithway ishay ed-cheekedray Eopatraclay, ipeningray ishay apricotay ighthay uponay ethay unnysay eckday. Utbay ashoreay, allay isthay effeminacyay isay ashedday. Ethay igandishbray uisegay ichwhay ethay Anallercay osay oudlypray ortsspay; ishay ouchedslay anday aily-ribbonedgay athay etokenbay ishay andgray eaturesfay. AAY errortay otay ethay ilingsmay innocenceay ofay ethay illagesvay oughthray ichwhay ehay oatsflay; ishay artsway isagevay anday oldbay aggersway areay otnay unshunneday inay itiescay. Onceay aay agabondvay onay ishay ownay analcay, IAY avehay eceivedray oodgay urnstay omfray oneay ofay esethay Anallerscay; IAY ankthay imhay eartilyhay; ouldway ainfay ebay otnay ungratefulay; utbay itay isay oftenay oneay ofay ethay imepray edeemingray ualitiesqay ofay ouryay anmay ofay iolencevay, atthay atay imestay ehay ashay asay iffstay anay armay otay ackbay aay oorpay angerstray inay aay aitstray, asay otay underplay aay ealthyway oneay. Inay umsay, entlemengay, atwhay ethay ildnessway ofay isthay analcay ifelay isay, isay emphaticallyay evinceday byay isthay; atthay ouray ildway ale-fisherywhay ontainscay osay anymay ofay itsay ostmay inishedfay aduatesgray, anday atthay arcescay anyay aceray ofay ankindmay, exceptay Eysydnay enmay, areay osay uchmay istrustedday byay ouray alingwhay aptainscay. Ornay oesday itay atay allay iminishday ethay uriousnesscay ofay isthay attermay, atthay otay anymay ousandsthay ofay ouray uralray oysbay anday oungyay enmay ornbay alongay itsay inelay, ethay obationarypray ifelay ofay ethay Andgray Analcay urnishesfay ethay olesay ansitiontray etweenbay uietlyqay eapingray inay aay Istianchray orn-fieldcay, anday ecklesslyray oughingplay ethay atersway ofay ethay ostmay arbaricbay eassay. 

I“‘AY eesay! IAY ee!’say impetuouslyay exclaimeday Onday Edropay, illingspay ishay ichachay uponay ishay ilverysay ufflesray. o‘Nay eednay otay aveltray! Ethay orld’sway oneay Imalay. IAY adhay oughtthay, ownay, atthay atay ouryay emperatetay Orthnay ethay enerationsgay ereway oldcay anday olyhay asay ethay ills.—Buthay ethay ory.’stay 

I“AY eftlay offay, entlemengay, erewhay ethay Akemanlay ookshay ethay ackstaybay. Ardlyhay adhay ehay oneday osay, enwhay ehay asway urroundedsay byay ethay eethray uniorjay atesmay anday ethay ourfay arpooneershay, owhay allay owdedcray imhay otay ethay eckday. Utbay idingslay ownday ethay opesray ikelay alefulbay ometscay, ethay otway Anallerscay ushedray intoay ethay uproaray, anday oughtsay otay agdray eirthay anmay outay ofay itay owardstay ethay orecastlefay. Othersay ofay ethay ailorssay oinedjay ithway emthay inay isthay attemptay, anday aay istedtway urmoiltay ensueday; ilewhay andingstay outay ofay arm’shay ayway, ethay aliantvay aptaincay ancedday upay anday ownday ithway aay ale-pikewhay, allingcay uponay ishay officersay otay anhandlemay atthay atrociousay oundrelscay, anday okesmay imhay alongay otay ethay uarter-deckqay. Atay intervalsay, ehay anray oseclay upay otay ethay evolvingray orderbay ofay ethay onfusioncay, anday ingpryay intoay ethay earthay ofay itay ithway ishay ikepay, oughtsay otay ickpray outay ethay objectay ofay ishay esentmentray. Utbay Eelkiltstay anday ishay esperadoesday ereway ootay uchmay orfay emthay allay; eythay ucceededsay inay aininggay ethay orecastlefay eckday, erewhay, astilyhay ewingslay aboutay eethray oray ourfay argelay askscay inay aay inelay ithway ethay indlassway, esethay ea-Parisianssay entrencheday emselvesthay ehindbay ethay arricadebay. 

ome“‘Cay outay ofay atthay, eyay irates!’pay oaredray ethay aptaincay, ownay enacingmay emthay ithway aay istolpay inay eachay andhay, ustjay oughtbray otay imhay byay ethay ewardstay. ome‘Cay outay ofay atthay, eyay ut-throats!’cay 

eelkilt“Stay eapedlay onay ethay arricadebay, anday idingstray upay anday ownday erethay, efiedday ethay orstway ethay istolspay ouldcay oday; utbay avegay ethay aptaincay otay understanday istinctlyday, atthay ishay eelkilt’s(Stay) eathday ouldway ebay ethay ignalsay orfay aay urderousmay utinymay onay ethay artpay ofay allay andshay. Earingfay inay ishay earthay estlay isthay ightmay ovepray utbay ootay uetray, ethay aptaincay aay ittlelay esistedday, utbay illstay ommandedcay ethay insurgentsay instantlyay otay eturnray otay eirthay utyday. 

ill“‘Way ouyay omisepray otnay otay ouchtay usay, ifay eway o?’day emandedday eirthay ingleaderray. 

urn“‘Tay otay! urntay o!—Itay akemay onay omise;—topray ouryay utyday! Oday ouyay antway otay inksay ethay ipshay, byay ockingknay offay atay aay imetay ikelay isthay? Urntay o!’tay anday ehay onceay oremay aisedray aay istolpay. 

ink“‘Say ethay ip?’shay iedcray Eelkiltstay. Aye‘ay, etlay erhay inksay. Otnay aay anmay ofay usay urnstay otay, unlessay ouyay earsway otnay otay aiseray aay ope-yarnray againstay usay. Atwhay aysay eyay, en?’may urningtay otay ishay omradescay. AAY iercefay eerchay asway eirthay esponseray. 

e“Thay Akemanlay ownay atrolledpay ethay arricadebay, allay ethay ilewhay eepingkay ishay eyeay onay ethay Aptaincay, anday erkingjay outay uchsay entencessay asay ese:—‘It’sthay otnay ouray aultfay; eway idn’tday antway itay; IAY oldtay imhay otay aketay ishay ammerhay awayay; itay asway oy’sbay usinessbay; ehay ightmay avehay ownknay emay eforebay isthay; IAY oldtay imhay otnay otay ickpray ethay uffalobay; IAY elievebay IAY avehay okenbray aay ingerfay erehay againstay ishay ursedcay awjay; ain’tay osethay incingmay ivesknay ownday inay ethay orecastlefay erethay, enmay? ooklay otay osethay andspikeshay, myay eartieshay. Aptaincay, byay Odgay, ooklay otay ourselfyay; aysay ethay ordway; on’tday ebay aay oolfay; orgetfay itay allay; eway areay eadyray otay urntay otay; eattray usay ecentlyday, anday e’reway ouryay enmay; utbay eway on’tway ebay ogged.’flay 

urn“‘Tay otay! IAY akemay onay omisespray, urntay otay, IAY ay!’say 

ook“‘Lay eyay, ow,’nay iedcray ethay Akemanlay, ingingflay outay ishay armay owardstay imhay, ere‘thay areay aay ewfay ofay usay erehay and(ay IAY amay oneay ofay emthay) owhay avehay ippedshay orfay ethay uisecray, ed’yay eesay; ownay asay ouyay ellway owknay, irsay, eway ancay aimclay ouray ischargeday asay oonsay asay ethay anchoray isay ownday; osay eway on’tday antway aay owray; it’say otnay ouray interestay; eway antway otay ebay eaceablepay; eway areay eadyray otay orkway, utbay eway on’tway ebay ogged.’flay 

urn“‘Tay o!’tay oaredray ethay Aptaincay. 

eelkilt“Stay ancedglay oundray imhay aay omentmay, anday enthay aid:—‘Isay elltay ouyay atwhay itay isay ownay, Aptaincay, atherray anthay illkay eyay, anday ebay unghay orfay uchsay aay abbyshay ascalray, eway on’tway iftlay aay andhay againstay eyay unlessay eyay attackay usay; utbay illtay ouyay aysay ethay ordway aboutay otnay oggingflay usay, eway on’tday oday aay and’shay urn.’tay 

own“‘Day intoay ethay orecastlefay enthay, ownday ithway eyay, I’llay eepkay eyay erethay illtay e’reyay icksay ofay itay. Ownday eyay o.’gay 

all“‘Shay e?’way iedcray ethay ingleaderray otay ishay enmay. Ostmay ofay emthay ereway againstay itay; utbay atay engthlay, inay obedienceay otay Eelkiltstay, eythay ecededpray imhay ownday intoay eirthay arkday enday, owlinglygray isappearingday, ikelay earsbay intoay aay avecay. 

As“ay ethay Akeman’slay arebay eadhay asway ustjay evellay ithway ethay anksplay, ethay Aptaincay anday ishay ossepay eapedlay ethay arricadebay, anday apidlyray awingdray overay ethay ideslay ofay ethay uttlescay, antedplay eirthay oupgray ofay andshay uponay itay, anday oudlylay alledcay orfay ethay ewardstay otay ingbray ethay eavyhay assbray adlockpay elongingbay otay ethay ompanionwaycay. Enthay openingay ethay ideslay aay ittlelay, ethay Aptaincay isperedwhay omethingsay ownday ethay ackcray, osedclay itay, anday urnedtay ethay eykay uponay em—tenthay inay umber—leavingnay onay eckday omesay entytway oray oremay, owhay usthay arfay adhay emainedray eutralnay. 

All“ay ightnay aay ide-awakeway atchway asway eptkay byay allay ethay officersay, orwardfay anday aftay, especiallyay aboutay ethay orecastlefay uttlescay anday orefay atchwayhay; atay ichwhay astlay aceplay itay asway earedfay ethay insurgentsay ightmay emergeay, afteray eakingbray oughthray ethay ulkheadbay elowbay. Utbay ethay ourshay ofay arknessday assedpay inay eacepay; ethay enmay owhay illstay emainedray atay eirthay utyday oilingtay ardhay atay ethay umpspay, osewhay inkingclay anday ankingclay atay intervalsay oughthray ethay earydray ightnay ismallyday esoundedray oughthray ethay ipshay. 

At“ay unrisesay ethay Aptaincay entway orwardfay, anday ockingknay onay ethay eckday, ummonedsay ethay isonerspray otay orkway; utbay ithway aay ellyay eythay efusedray. Aterway asway enthay oweredlay ownday otay emthay, anday aay ouplecay ofay andfulshay ofay iscuitbay ereway ossedtay afteray itay; enwhay againay urningtay ethay eykay uponay emthay anday ocketingpay itay, ethay Aptaincay eturnedray otay ethay uarter-deckqay. Icetway everyay ayday orfay eethray aysday isthay asway epeatedray; utbay onay ethay ourthfay orningmay aay onfusedcay anglingwray, anday enthay aay ufflingscay asway eardhay, asay ethay ustomarycay ummonssay asway eliveredday; anday uddenlysay ourfay enmay urstbay upay omfray ethay orecastlefay, ayingsay eythay ereway eadyray otay urntay otay. Ethay etidfay osenessclay ofay ethay airay, anday aay amishingfay ietday, uniteday erhapspay otay omesay earsfay ofay ultimateay etributionray, adhay onstrainedcay emthay otay urrendersay atay iscretionday. Emboldeneday byay isthay, ethay Aptaincay eiteratedray ishay emandday otay ethay estray, utbay Eelkiltstay outedshay upay otay imhay aay errifictay inthay otay opstay ishay abblingbay anday etakebay imselfhay erewhay ehay elongedbay. Onay ethay ifthfay orningmay eethray othersay ofay ethay utineersmay oltedbay upay intoay ethay airay omfray ethay esperateday armsay elowbay atthay oughtsay otay estrainray emthay. Onlyay eethray ereway eftlay. 

etter“‘Bay urntay otay, ow?’nay aidsay ethay Aptaincay ithway aay eartlesshay eerjay. 

ut“‘Shay usay upay againay, illway e!’yay iedcray Eelkiltstay. 

Oh“‘ay ertainly,’cay aidsay ethay Aptaincay, anday ethay eykay ickedclay. 

It“ay asway atay isthay ointpay, entlemengay, atthay enrageday byay ethay efectionday ofay evensay ofay ishay ormerfay associatesay, anday ungstay byay ethay ockingmay oicevay atthay adhay astlay ailedhay imhay, anday addenedmay byay ishay onglay entombmentay inay aay aceplay asay ackblay asay ethay owelsbay ofay espairday; itay asway enthay atthay Eelkiltstay oposedpray otay ethay otway Anallerscay, usthay arfay apparentlyay ofay oneay indmay ithway imhay, otay urstbay outay ofay eirthay olehay atay ethay extnay ummoningsay ofay ethay arrisongay; anday armeday ithway eirthay eenkay incingmay ivesknay ong(lay, escenticcray, eavyhay implementsay ithway aay andlehay atay eachay enday) unray amuckay omfray ethay owspritbay otay ethay affrailtay; anday ifay byay anyay evilishnessday ofay esperationday ossiblepay, eizesay ethay ipshay. Orfay imselfhay, ehay ouldway oday isthay, ehay aidsay, etherwhay eythay oinedjay imhay oray otnay. Atthay asway ethay astlay ightnay ehay ouldshay endspay inay atthay enday. Utbay ethay emeschay etmay ithway onay oppositionay onay ethay artpay ofay ethay otheray otway; eythay oresway eythay ereway eadyray orfay atthay, oray orfay anyay otheray admay ingthay, orfay anythingay inay ortshay utbay aay urrendersay. Anday atwhay asway oremay, eythay eachay insisteday uponay eingbay ethay irstfay anmay onay eckday, enwhay ethay imetay otay akemay ethay ushray ouldshay omecay. Utbay otay isthay eirthay eaderlay asay iercelyfay objecteday, eservingray atthay ioritypray orfay imselfhay; articularlypay asay ishay otway omradescay ouldway otnay ieldyay, ethay oneay otay ethay otheray, inay ethay attermay; anday othbay ofay emthay ouldcay otnay ebay irstfay, orfay ethay adderlay ouldway utbay admitay oneay anmay atay aay imetay. Anday erehay, entlemengay, ethay oulfay ayplay ofay esethay iscreantsmay ustmay omecay outay. 

Upon“ay earinghay ethay anticfray ojectpray ofay eirthay eaderlay, eachay inay ishay ownay eparatesay oulsay adhay uddenlysay ightedlay, itay ouldway eemsay, uponay ethay amesay iecepay ofay eacherytray, amelynay: otay ebay oremostfay inay eakingbray outay, inay orderay otay ebay ethay irstfay ofay ethay eethray, oughthay ethay astlay ofay ethay entay, otay urrendersay; anday erebythay ecuresay ateverwhay allsmay ancechay ofay ardonpay uchsay onductcay ightmay eritmay. Utbay enwhay Eelkiltstay ademay ownknay ishay eterminationday illstay otay eadlay emthay otay ethay astlay, eythay inay omesay ayway, byay omesay ubtlesay emistrychay ofay illanyvay, ixedmay eirthay eforebay ecretsay eacheriestray ogethertay; anday enwhay eirthay eaderlay ellfay intoay aay ozeday, erballyvay openeday eirthay oulssay otay eachay otheray inay eethray entencessay; anday oundbay ethay eeperslay ithway ordscay, anday aggedgay imhay ithway ordscay; anday iekedshray outay orfay ethay Aptaincay atay idnightmay. 

inking“Thay urdermay atay andhay, anday ellingsmay inay ethay arkday orfay ethay oodblay, ehay anday allay ishay armeday atesmay anday arpooneershay ushedray orfay ethay orecastlefay. Inay aay ewfay inutesmay ethay uttlescay asway openeday, anday, oundbay andhay anday ootfay, ethay illstay ugglingstray ingleaderray asway ovedshay upay intoay ethay airay byay ishay erfidiouspay alliesay, owhay atay onceay aimedclay ethay onorhay ofay ecuringsay aay anmay owhay adhay eenbay ullyfay iperay orfay urdermay. Utbay allay esethay ereway ollaredcay, anday aggeddray alongay ethay eckday ikelay eadday attlecay; anday, idesay byay idesay, ereway eizedsay upay intoay ethay izzenmay iggingray, ikelay eethray uartersqay ofay eatmay, anday erethay eythay unghay illtay orningmay. amn‘Day e,’yay iedcray ethay Aptaincay, acingpay otay anday ofray eforebay emthay, e‘thay ulturesvay ouldway otnay ouchtay eyay, eyay illains!’vay 

At“ay unrisesay ehay ummonedsay allay andshay; anday eparatingsay osethay owhay adhay ebelledray omfray osethay owhay adhay akentay onay artpay inay ethay utinymay, ehay oldtay ethay ormerfay atthay ehay adhay aay oodgay indmay otay ogflay emthay allay ound—thoughtray, uponay ethay olewhay, ehay ouldway oday o—hesay oughtay o—justicetay emandedday itay; utbay orfay ethay esentpray, onsideringcay eirthay imelytay urrendersay, ehay ouldway etlay emthay ogay ithway aay eprimandray, ichwhay ehay accordinglyay administereday inay ethay ernacularvay. 

ut“‘Bay asay orfay ouyay, eyay arrioncay ogues,’ray urningtay otay ethay eethray enmay inay ethay igging—‘forray ouyay, IAY eanmay otay incemay eyay upay orfay ethay ots;’try-pay anday, eizingsay aay operay, ehay applieday itay ithway allay ishay ightmay otay ethay acksbay ofay ethay otway aitorstray, illtay eythay elledyay onay oremay, utbay ifelesslylay unghay eirthay eadshay idewayssay, asay ethay otway ucifiedcray ievesthay areay awndray. 

“‘Myay istwray isay ainedspray ithway e!’yay ehay iedcray, atay astlay; ut‘bay erethay isay illstay operay enoughay eftlay orfay ouyay, myay inefay antambay, atthay ouldn’tway ivegay upay. Aketay atthay aggay omfray ishay outhmay, anday etlay usay earhay atwhay ehay ancay aysay orfay imself.’hay 

or“Fay aay omentmay ethay exhausteday utineermay ademay aay emuloustray otionmay ofay ishay ampedcray awsjay, anday enthay ainfullypay istingtway oundray ishay eadhay, aidsay inay aay ortsay ofay isshay, at‘Whay IAY aysay isay is—andthay indmay itay ell—ifway ouyay ogflay emay, IAY urdermay ou!’yay 

ay“‘Say eyay osay? enthay eesay owhay eyay ightenfray e’—andmay ethay Aptaincay ewdray offay ithway ethay operay otay ikestray. 

est“‘Bay ot,’nay issedhay ethay Akemanlay. 

ut“‘Bay IAY ust,’—andmay ethay operay asway onceay oremay awndray ackbay orfay ethay okestray. 

eelkilt“Stay erehay issedhay outay omethingsay, inaudibleay otay allay utbay ethay Aptaincay; owhay, otay ethay amazementay ofay allay andshay, artedstay ackbay, acedpay ethay eckday apidlyray otway oray eethray imestay, anday enthay uddenlysay owingthray ownday ishay operay, aidsay, I‘AY on’tway oday it—letay imhay o—cutgay imhay ownday: ed’yay ear?’hay 

ut“Bay asay ethay uniorjay atesmay ereway urryinghay otay executeay ethay orderay, aay alepay anmay, ithway aay andagedbay eadhay, arresteday em—Radneythay ethay iefchay atemay. Everay incesay ethay owblay, ehay adhay ainlay inay ishay erthbay; utbay atthay orningmay, earinghay ethay umulttay onay ethay eckday, ehay adhay eptcray outay, anday usthay arfay adhay atchedway ethay olewhay enescay. Uchsay asway ethay atestay ofay ishay outhmay, atthay ehay ouldcay ardlyhay eakspay; utbay umblingmay omethingsay aboutay is_hay_ eingbay illingway anday ableay otay oday atwhay ethay aptaincay aredday otnay attemptay, ehay atchedsnay ethay operay anday advanceday otay ishay inionedpay oefay. 

ou“‘Yay areay aay oward!’cay issedhay ethay Akemanlay. 

o“‘Say IAY amay, utbay aketay at.’thay Ethay atemay asway inay ethay eryvay actay ofay ikingstray, enwhay anotheray isshay ayedstay ishay uplifteday armay. Ehay ausedpay: anday enthay ausingpay onay oremay, ademay oodgay ishay ordway, itespay ofay Eelkilt’sstay eatthray, ateverwhay atthay ightmay avehay eenbay. Ethay eethray enmay ereway enthay utcay ownday, allay andshay ereway urnedtay otay, anday, ullenlysay orkedway byay ethay oodymay eamensay, ethay ironay umpspay angedclay asay eforebay. 

ust“Jay afteray arkday atthay ayday, enwhay oneay atchway adhay etiredray elowbay, aay amorclay asway eardhay inay ethay orecastlefay; anday ethay otway emblingtray aitorstray unningray upay, esiegedbay ethay abincay oorday, ayingsay eythay urstday otnay onsortcay ithway ethay ewcray. Entreatiesay, uffscay, anday ickskay ouldcay otnay ivedray emthay ackbay, osay atay eirthay ownay instanceay eythay ereway utpay ownday inay ethay ip’sshay unray orfay alvationsay. Illstay, onay ignsay ofay utinymay eappearedray amongay ethay estray. Onay ethay ontrarycay, itay eemedsay, atthay ainlymay atay Eelkilt’sstay instigationay, eythay adhay esolvedray otay aintainmay ethay icteststray eacefulnesspay, obeyay allay ordersay otay ethay astlay, anday, enwhay ethay ipshay eachedray ortpay, esertday erhay inay aay odybay. Utbay inay orderay otay insureay ethay eediestspay enday otay ethay oyagevay, eythay allay agreeday otay anotheray ing—namelythay, otnay otay ingsay outay orfay aleswhay, inay asecay anyay ouldshay ebay iscoveredday. Orfay, itespay ofay erhay eaklay, anday itespay ofay allay erhay otheray erilspay, ethay Own-hotay illstay aintainedmay erhay ast-headsmay, anday erhay aptaincay asway ustjay asay illingway otay owerlay orfay aay ishfay atthay omentmay, asay onay ethay ayday ishay aftcray irstfay uckstray ethay uisingcray oundgray; anday Adneyray ethay atemay asway uiteqay asay eadyray otay angechay ishay erthbay orfay aay oatbay, anday ithway ishay andagedbay outhmay eeksay otay aggay inay eathday ethay italvay awjay ofay ethay alewhay. 

ut“Bay oughthay ethay Akemanlay adhay induceday ethay eamensay otay adoptay isthay ortsay ofay assivenesspay inay eirthay onductcay, ehay eptkay ishay ownay ounselcay at(ay eastlay illtay allay asway overay) oncerningcay ishay ownay operpray anday ivatepray evengeray uponay ethay anmay owhay adhay ungstay imhay inay ethay entriclesvay ofay ishay earthay. Ehay asway inay Adneyray ethay iefchay ate’smay atchway; anday asay ifay ethay infatuateday anmay oughtsay otay unray oremay anthay alfhay ayway otay eetmay ishay oomday, afteray ethay enescay atay ethay iggingray, ehay insisteday, againstay ethay expressay ounselcay ofay ethay aptaincay, uponay esumingray ethay eadhay ofay ishay atchway atay ightnay. Uponay isthay, anday oneay oray otway otheray ircumstancescay, Eelkiltstay ematicallysystay uiltbay ethay anplay ofay ishay evengeray. 

uring“Day ethay ightnay, Adneyray adhay anay unseamanlikeay ayway ofay ittingsay onay ethay ulwarksbay ofay ethay uarter-deckqay, anday eaninglay ishay armay uponay ethay unwalegay ofay ethay oatbay ichwhay asway oistedhay upay erethay, aay ittlelay aboveay ethay ip’sshay idesay. Inay isthay attitudeay, itay asway ellway ownknay, ehay ometimessay ozedday. Erethay asway aay onsiderablecay acancyvay etweenbay ethay oatbay anday ethay ipshay, anday ownday etweenbay isthay asway ethay easay. Eelkiltstay alculatedcay ishay imetay, anday oundfay atthay ishay extnay icktray atay ethay elmhay ouldway omecay oundray atay otway o’clockay, inay ethay orningmay ofay ethay irdthay ayday omfray atthay inay ichwhay ehay adhay eenbay etrayedbay. Atay ishay eisurelay, ehay employeday ethay intervalay inay aidingbray omethingsay eryvay arefullycay inay ishay atchesway elowbay. 

at“‘Whay areay ouyay akingmay ere?’thay aidsay aay ipmateshay. 

at“‘Whay oday ouyay inkthay? atwhay oesday itay ooklay ike?’lay 

ike“‘Lay aay anyardlay orfay ouryay agbay; utbay it’say anay odday oneay, eemssay otay e.’may 

es“‘Yay, atherray oddish,’ay aidsay ethay Akemanlay, oldinghay itay atay arm’say engthlay eforebay imhay; ut‘bay IAY inkthay itay illway answeray. Ipmateshay, IAY aven’thay enoughay ine,—havetway ouyay any?’ay 

ut“Bay erethay asway onenay inay ethay orecastlefay. 

en“‘Thay IAY ustmay etgay omesay omfray olday Ad;’ray anday ehay oseray otay ogay aftay. 

ou“‘Yay on’tday eanmay otay ogay aay eggingbay otay im!_’_hay aidsay aay ailorsay. 

“‘Whyay otnay? Oday ouyay inkthay ehay on’tway oday emay aay urntay, enwhay it’say otay elphay imselfhay inay ethay enday, ipmate?’shay anday oinggay otay ethay atemay, ehay ookedlay atay imhay uietlyqay, anday askeday imhay orfay omesay inetway otay endmay ishay ammockhay. Itay asway ivengay im—neitherhay inetway ornay anyardlay ereway eensay againay; utbay ethay extnay ightnay anay ironay allbay, oselyclay ettednay, artlypay olledray omfray ethay ocketpay ofay ethay Akeman’slay onkeymay acketjay, asay ehay asway uckingtay ethay oatcay intoay ishay ammockhay orfay aay illowpay. Enty-fourtway ourshay afteray, ishay icktray atay ethay ilentsay elm—nighhay otay ethay anmay owhay asway aptay otay ozeday overay ethay avegray alwaysay eadyray ugday otay ethay eaman’ssay and—thathay atalfay ourhay asway enthay otay omecay; anday inay ethay ore-ordainingfay oulsay ofay Eelkiltstay, ethay atemay asway alreadyay arkstay anday etchedstray asay aay orpsecay, ithway ishay oreheadfay ushedcray inay. 

ut“Bay, entlemengay, aay oolfay avedsay ethay ould-beway urderermay omfray ethay oodyblay eedday ehay adhay annedplay. Etyay ompletecay evengeray ehay adhay, anday ithoutway eingbay ethay avengeray. Orfay byay aay eriousmystay atalityfay, Eavenhay itselfay eemedsay otay epstay inay otay aketay outay ofay ishay andshay intoay itsay ownay ethay amningday ingthay ehay ouldway avehay oneday. 

It“ay asway ustjay etweenbay aybreakday anday unrisesay ofay ethay orningmay ofay ethay econdsay ayday, enwhay eythay ereway ashingway ownday ethay ecksday, atthay aay upidstay Eneriffetay anmay, awingdray aterway inay ethay ain-chainsmay, allay atay onceay outedshay outay, ere‘Thay eshay ollsray! erethay eshay olls!’ray Esujay, atwhay aay alewhay! Itay asway Obymay Ickday. 

oby“‘May Ick!’day iedcray Onday Ebastiansay; ‘Stay. Ominicday! Irsay ailorsay, utbay oday aleswhay avehay isteningschray? Omwhay allcay ouyay Obymay Ick?’day 

A“‘AY eryvay itewhay, anday amousfay, anday ostmay eadlyday immortalay onstermay, On;—butday atthay ouldway ebay ootay onglay aay ory.’stay 

ow“‘Hay? ow?’hay iedcray allay ethay oungyay Aniardsspay, owdingcray. 

ay“‘Nay, Onsday, Ons—nayday, aynay! IAY annotcay ehearseray atthay ownay. Etlay emay etgay oremay intoay ethay airay, Irs.’say 

e“‘Thay ichachay! ethay icha!’chay iedcray Onday Edropay; our‘ay igorousvay iendfray ookslay aint;—fillfay upay ishay emptyay ass!’glay 

o“Nay eednay, entlemengay; oneay omentmay, anday IAY oceed.—Nowpray, entlemengay, osay uddenlysay erceivingpay ethay owysnay alewhay ithinway iftyfay ardsyay ofay ethay ip—forgetfulshay ofay ethay ompactcay amongay ethay ew—incray ethay excitementay ofay ethay omentmay, ethay Eneriffetay anmay adhay instinctivelyay anday involuntarilyay iftedlay ishay oicevay orfay ethay onstermay, oughthay orfay omesay ittlelay imetay astpay itay adhay eenbay ainlyplay eheldbay omfray ethay eethray ullensay ast-headsmay. Allay asway ownay aay ensyphray. e‘Thay Itewhay Ale—thewhay Itewhay Ale!’whay asway ethay cryay omfray aptaincay, atesmay, anday arpooneershay, owhay, undeterreday byay earfulfay umoursray, ereway allay anxiousay otay apturecay osay amousfay anday eciouspray aay ishfay; ilewhay ethay oggedday ewcray eyeday askanceay, anday ithway ursescay, ethay appallingay eautybay ofay ethay astvay ilkymay assmay, atthay itlay upay byay aay orizontalhay anglingspay unsay, iftedshay anday istenedglay ikelay aay ivinglay opalay inay ethay ueblay orningmay easay. Entlemengay, aay angestray atalityfay ervadespay ethay olewhay areercay ofay esethay eventsay, asay ifay erilyvay appedmay outay eforebay ethay orldway itselfay asway artedchay. Ethay utineermay asway ethay owsmanbay ofay ethay atemay, anday enwhay astfay otay aay ishfay, itay asway ishay utyday otay itsay extnay imhay, ilewhay Adneyray oodstay upay ithway ishay ancelay inay ethay owpray, anday aulhay inay oray ackenslay ethay inelay, atay ethay ordway ofay ommandcay. Oreovermay, enwhay ethay ourfay oatsbay ereway oweredlay, ethay ate’smay otgay ethay artstay; anday onenay owledhay oremay iercelyfay ithway elightday anthay idday Eelkiltstay, asay ehay ainedstray atay ishay oaray. Afteray aay iffstay ullpay, eirthay arpooneerhay otgay astfay, anday, earspay inay andhay, Adneyray angspray otay ethay owbay. Ehay asway alwaysay aay uriousfay anmay, itay eemssay, inay aay oatbay. Anday ownay ishay andagedbay cryay asway, otay eachbay imhay onay ethay ale’swhay opmosttay ackbay. Othingnay oathlay, ishay owsmanbay auledhay imhay upay anday upay, oughthray aay indingblay oamfay atthay entblay otway itenesseswhay ogethertay; illtay ofay aay uddensay ethay oatbay uckstray asay againstay aay unkensay edgelay, anday eelingkay overay, illedspay outay ethay andingstay atemay. Atthay instantay, asay ehay ellfay onay ethay ale’swhay ipperyslay ackbay, ethay oatbay ightedray, anday asway ashedday asideay byay ethay ellsway, ilewhay Adneyray asway ossedtay overay intoay ethay easay, onay ethay otheray ankflay ofay ethay alewhay. Ehay uckstray outay oughthray ethay ayspray, anday, orfay anay instantay, asway imlyday eensay oughthray atthay eilvay, ildlyway eekingsay otay emoveray imselfhay omfray ethay eyeay ofay Obymay Ickday. Utbay ethay alewhay ushedray oundray inay aay uddensay aelstrommay; eizedsay ethay immersway etweenbay ishay awsjay; anday earingray ighhay upay ithway imhay, ungedplay eadlonghay againay, anday entway ownday. 

eantime“May, atay ethay irstfay aptay ofay ethay oat’sbay ottombay, ethay Akemanlay adhay ackenedslay ethay inelay, osay asay otay opdray asternay omfray ethay irlpoolwhay; almlycay ookinglay onay, ehay oughtthay ishay ownay oughtsthay. Utbay aay uddensay, errifictay, ownwardday erkingjay ofay ethay oatbay, uicklyqay oughtbray ishay ifeknay otay ethay inelay. Ehay utcay itay; anday ethay alewhay asway eefray. Utbay, atay omesay istanceday, Obymay Ickday oseray againay, ithway omesay atterstay ofay Adney’sray edray oollenway irtshay, aughtcay inay ethay eethtay atthay adhay estroyedday imhay. Allay ourfay oatsbay avegay asechay againay; utbay ethay alewhay eludeday emthay, anday inallyfay ollywhay isappearedday. 

In“ay oodgay imetay, ethay Own-hotay eachedray erhay ort—apay avagesay, olitarysay ace—whereplay onay ivilizedcay eaturecray esidedray. Erethay, eadedhay byay ethay Akemanlay, allay utbay ivefay oray ixsay ofay ethay oremastmenfay eliberatelyday esertedday amongay ethay almspay; eventuallyay, asay itay urnedtay outay, eizingsay aay argelay oubleday ar-canoeway ofay ethay avagessay, anday ettingsay ailsay orfay omesay otheray arborhay. 

e“Thay ip’sshay ompanycay eingbay educedray otay utbay aay andfulhay, ethay aptaincay alledcay uponay ethay Islandersay otay assistay imhay inay ethay aboriouslay usinessbay ofay eavinghay ownday ethay ipshay otay opstay ethay eaklay. Utbay otay uchsay unrestingay igilancevay overay eirthay angerousday alliesay asway isthay allsmay andbay ofay iteswhay ecessitatednay, othbay byay ightnay anday byay ayday, anday osay extremeay asway ethay ardhay orkway eythay underwentay, atthay uponay ethay esselvay eingbay eadyray againay orfay easay, eythay ereway inay uchsay aay eakenedway onditioncay atthay ethay aptaincay urstday otnay utpay offay ithway emthay inay osay eavyhay aay esselvay. Afteray akingtay ounselcay ithway ishay officersay, ehay anchoreday ethay ipshay asay arfay offay oreshay asay ossiblepay; oadedlay anday anray outay ishay otway annoncay omfray ethay owsbay; ackedstay ishay usketsmay onay ethay ooppay; anday arningway ethay Islandersay otnay otay approachay ethay ipshay atay eirthay erilpay, ooktay oneay anmay ithway imhay, anday ettingsay ethay ailsay ofay ishay estbay ale-boatwhay, eeredstay aightstray eforebay ethay indway orfay Ahititay, ivefay undredhay ilesmay istantday, otay ocurepray aay einforcementray otay ishay ewcray. 

On“ay ethay ourthfay ayday ofay ethay ailsay, aay argelay anoecay asway escriedday, ichwhay eemedsay otay avehay ouchedtay atay aay owlay isleay ofay oralscay. Ehay eeredstay awayay omfray itay; utbay ethay avagesay aftcray orebay ownday onay imhay; anday oonsay ethay oicevay ofay Eelkiltstay ailedhay imhay otay eavehay otay, oray ehay ouldway unray imhay underay aterway. Ethay aptaincay esentedpray aay istolpay. Ithway oneay ootfay onay eachay owpray ofay ethay okedyay ar-canoesway, ethay Akemanlay aughedlay imhay otay ornscay; assuringay imhay atthay ifay ethay istolpay osay uchmay asay ickedclay inay ethay ocklay, ehay ouldway urybay imhay inay ubblesbay anday oamfay. 

at“‘Whay oday ouyay antway ofay e?’may iedcray ethay aptaincay. 

ere“‘Whay areay ouyay oundbay? anday orfay atwhay areay ouyay ound?’bay emandedday Eelkiltstay; o‘nay ies.’lay 

I“‘AY amay oundbay otay Ahititay orfay oremay en.’may 

ery“‘Vay oodgay. Etlay emay oardbay ouyay aay oment—Imay omecay inay eace.’pay Ithway atthay ehay eapedlay omfray ethay anoecay, amsway otay ethay oatbay; anday imbingclay ethay unwalegay, oodstay acefay otay acefay ithway ethay aptaincay. 

oss“‘Cray ouryay armsay, irsay; owthray ackbay ouryay eadhay. Ownay, epeatray afteray emay. Asay oonsay asay Eelkiltstay eaveslay emay, IAY earsway otay eachbay isthay oatbay onay onderyay islanday, anday emainray erethay ixsay aysday. Ifay IAY oday otnay, aymay ightningslay ikestray e!’may 

A“‘AY ettypray olar,’schay aughedlay ethay Akemanlay. Adios‘ay, Enor!’say anday eapinglay intoay ethay easay, ehay amsway ackbay otay ishay omradescay. 

atching“Way ethay oatbay illtay itay asway airlyfay eachedbay, anday awndray upay otay ethay ootsray ofay ethay ocoa-nutcay eestray, Eelkiltstay ademay ailsay againay, anday inay ueday imetay arriveday atay Ahititay, ishay ownay aceplay ofay estinationday. Erethay, ucklay efriendedbay imhay; otway ipsshay ereway aboutay otay ailsay orfay Ancefray, anday ereway ovidentiallypray inay antway ofay eciselypray atthay umbernay ofay enmay ichwhay ethay ailorsay eadedhay. Eythay embarkeday; anday osay orfay everay otgay ethay artstay ofay eirthay ormerfay aptaincay, adhay ehay eenbay atay allay indedmay otay orkway emthay egallay etributionray. 

ome“Say entay aysday afteray ethay Enchfray ipsshay ailedsay, ethay ale-boatwhay arriveday, anday ethay aptaincay asway orcedfay otay enlistay omesay ofay ethay oremay ivilizedcay Ahitianstay, owhay adhay eenbay omewhatsay useday otay ethay easay. Arteringchay aay allsmay ativenay oonerschay, ehay eturnedray ithway emthay otay ishay esselvay; anday indingfay allay ightray erethay, againay esumedray ishay uisingscray. 

ere“Whay Eelkiltstay ownay isay, entlemengay, onenay owknay; utbay uponay ethay islanday ofay Antucketnay, ethay idowway ofay Adneyray illstay urnstay otay ethay easay ichwhay efusesray otay ivegay upay itsay eadday; illstay inay eamsdray eessay ethay awfulay itewhay alewhay atthay estroyedday imhay. ay* ay* ay* ay* 

Are“‘ay ouyay ough?’thray aidsay Onday Ebastiansay, uietlyqay. 

I“‘AY amay, On.’day 

en“‘Thay IAY entreatay ouyay, elltay emay ifay otay ethay estbay ofay ouryay ownay onvictionscay, isthay ouryay orystay isay inay ubstancesay eallyray uetray? Itay isay osay assingpay onderfulway! Idday ouyay etgay itay omfray anay unquestionableay ourcesay? Earbay ithway emay ifay IAY eemsay otay ess.’pray 

Also“‘ay earbay ithway allay ofay usay, irsay ailorsay; orfay eway allay oinjay inay Onday Ebastian’ssay uit,’say iedcray ethay ompanycay, ithway exceedingay interestay. 

Is“‘ay erethay aay opycay ofay ethay Olyhay Evangelistsay inay ethay Oldengay Innay, entlemen?’gay 

ay,’“‘Nay aidsay Onday Ebastiansay; ut‘bay IAY owknay aay orthyway iestpray earnay byay, owhay illway uicklyqay ocurepray oneay orfay emay. IAY ogay orfay itay; utbay areay ouyay ellway adviseday? isthay aymay owgray ootay erious.’say 

ill“‘Way ouyay ebay osay oodgay asay otay ingbray ethay iestpray alsoay, On?’day 

ough“‘Thay erethay areay onay Auto-da-fésay inay Imalay ow,’nay aidsay oneay ofay ethay ompanycay otay anotheray; I‘AY earfay ouray ailorsay iendfray unsray iskray ofay ethay archiepiscopacyay. Etlay usay ithdrawway oremay outay ofay ethay oonlightmay. IAY eesay onay eednay ofay is.’thay 

Excuse“‘ay emay orfay unningray afteray ouyay, Onday Ebastiansay; utbay aymay IAY alsoay egbay atthay ouyay illway ebay articularpay inay ocuringpray ethay argestlay izedsay Evangelistsay ouyay an.’cay 

ay* ay* ay* ay* ay* ay* 

is“‘Thay isay ethay iestpray, ehay ingsbray ouyay ethay Evangelists,’ay aidsay Onday Ebastiansay, avelygray, eturningray ithway aay alltay anday olemnsay igurefay. 

et“‘Lay emay emoveray myay athay. Ownay, enerablevay iestpray, urtherfay intoay ethay ightlay, anday oldhay ethay Olyhay Ookbay eforebay emay atthay IAY aymay ouchtay itay. 

o“‘Say elphay emay Eavenhay, anday onay myay onorhay ethay orystay IAY avehay oldtay eyay, entlemengay, isay inay ubstancesay anday itsay eatgray itemsay, uetray. IAY owknay itay otay ebay uetray; itay appenedhay onay isthay allbay; IAY odtray ethay ipshay; IAY ewknay ethay ewcray; IAY avehay eensay anday alkedtay ithway Eelkiltstay incesay ethay eathday ofay Adney.’”ray 



APTERCHAY 55ay. Ofay ethay Onstrousmay Icturespay ofay Aleswhay. 

IAY allshay ereay onglay aintpay otay ouyay asay ellway asay oneay ancay ithoutway anvascay, omethingsay ikelay ethay uetray ormfay ofay ethay alewhay asay ehay actuallyay appearsay otay ethay eyeay ofay ethay alemanwhay enwhay inay ishay ownay absoluteay odybay ethay alewhay isay ooredmay alongsideay ethay ale-shipwhay osay atthay ehay ancay ebay airlyfay eppedstay uponay erethay. Itay aymay ebay orthway ilewhay, ereforethay, eviouslypray otay advertay otay osethay uriouscay imaginaryay ortraitspay ofay imhay ichwhay evenay ownday otay ethay esentpray ayday onfidentlycay allengechay ethay aithfay ofay ethay andsmanlay. Itay isay imetay otay etsay ethay orldway ightray inay isthay attermay, byay ovingpray uchsay icturespay ofay ethay alewhay allay ongwray. 

Itay aymay ebay atthay ethay imalpray ourcesay ofay allay osethay ictorialpay elusionsday illway ebay oundfay amongay ethay oldestay Indoohay, Egyptianay, anday Eciangray ulpturesscay. Orfay everay incesay osethay inventiveay utbay unscrupulousay imestay enwhay onay ethay arblemay anellingspay ofay emplestay, ethay edestalspay ofay atuesstay, anday onay ieldsshay, edallionsmay, upscay, anday oinscay, ethay olphinday asway awndray inay alesscay ofay ain-armorchay ikelay Aladin’ssay, anday aay elmetedhay eadhay ikelay Stay. Eorge’sgay; everay incesay enthay ashay omethingsay ofay ethay amesay ortsay ofay icenselay evailedpray, otnay onlyay inay ostmay opularpay icturespay ofay ethay alewhay, utbay inay anymay ientificscay esentationspray ofay imhay. 

Ownay, byay allay oddsay, ethay ostmay ancientay extantay ortraitpay anywaysay urportingpay otay ebay ethay ale’swhay, isay otay ebay oundfay inay ethay amousfay avern-pagodacay ofay Elephantaay, inay Indiaay. Ethay Ahminsbray aintainmay atthay inay ethay almostay endlessay ulpturesscay ofay atthay immemorialay agodapay, allay ethay adestray anday ursuitspay, everyay onceivablecay avocationay ofay anmay, ereway efiguredpray agesay eforebay anyay ofay emthay actuallyay amecay intoay eingbay. Onay onderway enthay, atthay inay omesay ortsay ouray oblenay ofessionpray ofay alingwhay ouldshay avehay eenbay erethay adowedshay orthfay. Ethay Indoohay alewhay eferredray otay, occursay inay aay eparatesay epartmentday ofay ethay allway, epictingday ethay incarnationay ofay Ishnuvay inay ethay ormfay ofay eviathanlay, earnedlylay ownknay asay ethay Atsemay Avataray. Utbay oughthay isthay ulpturescay isay alfhay anmay anday alfhay alewhay, osay asay onlyay otay ivegay ethay ailtay ofay ethay atterlay, etyay atthay allsmay ectionsay ofay imhay isay allay ongwray. Itay ookslay oremay ikelay ethay aperingtay ailtay ofay anay anacondaay, anthay ethay oadbray almspay ofay ethay uetray ale’swhay ajesticmay ukesflay. 

Utbay ogay otay ethay olday Alleriesgay, anday ooklay ownay atay aay eatgray Istianchray ainter’spay ortraitpay ofay isthay ishfay; orfay ehay ucceedssay onay etterbay anthay ethay antediluvianay Indoohay. Itay isay Uido’sgay icturepay ofay Erseuspay escuingray Andromedaay omfray ethay ea-monstersay oray alewhay. Erewhay idday Uidogay etgay ethay odelmay ofay uchsay aay angestray eaturecray asay atthay? Ornay oesday Ogarthhay, inay aintingpay ethay amesay enescay inay ishay ownay erseus“Pay Escending,”day akemay outay oneay itwhay etterbay. Ethay ugehay orpulencecay ofay atthay Ogarthianhay onstermay undulatesay onay ethay urfacesay, arcelyscay awingdray oneay inchay ofay aterway. Itay ashay aay ortsay ofay owdahhay onay itsay ackbay, anday itsay istendedday uskedtay outhmay intoay ichwhay ethay illowsbay areay ollingray, ightmay ebay akentay orfay ethay Aitors’tray Ategay eadinglay omfray ethay Amesthay byay aterway intoay ethay Owertay. Enthay, erethay areay ethay Odromuspray aleswhay ofay olday Otchscay Ibbaldsay, anday Onah’sjay alewhay, asay epictedday inay ethay intspray ofay olday Iblesbay anday ethay utscay ofay olday imerspray. Atwhay allshay ebay aidsay ofay esethay? Asay orfay ethay ook-binder’sbay alewhay indingway ikelay aay ine-stalkvay oundray ethay ockstay ofay aay escendingday anchor—asay ampedstay anday ildedgay onay ethay acksbay anday itle-pagestay ofay anymay ooksbay othbay olday anday ew—thatnay isay aay eryvay icturesquepay utbay urelypay abulousfay eaturecray, imitateday, IAY aketay itay, omfray ethay ikelay iguresfay onay antiqueay asesvay. Oughthay universallyay enominatedday aay olphinday, IAY everthelessnay allcay isthay ook-binder’sbay ishfay anay attemptay atay aay alewhay; ecausebay itay asway osay intendeday enwhay ethay eviceday asway irstfay introduceday. Itay asway introduceday byay anay olday Italianay ublisherpay omewheresay aboutay ethay 15thay enturycay, uringday ethay Evivalray ofay Earninglay; anday inay osethay aysday, anday evenay ownday otay aay omparativelycay atelay eriodpay, olphinsday ereway opularlypay upposedsay otay ebay aay eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay. 

Inay ethay ignettesvay anday otheray embellishmentsay ofay omesay ancientay ooksbay ouyay illway atay imestay eetmay ithway eryvay uriouscay ouchestay atay ethay alewhay, erewhay allay annermay ofay outsspay, etsjay eaud’ay, othay ingsspray anday oldcay, Aratogasay anday Aden-badenbay, omecay ubblingbay upay omfray ishay unexhausteday ainbray. Inay ethay itle-pagetay ofay ethay originalay editionay ofay ethay Advancement“ay ofay Earning”lay ouyay illway indfay omesay uriouscay aleswhay. 

Utbay uittingqay allay esethay unprofessionalay attemptsay, etlay usay anceglay atay osethay icturespay ofay eviathanlay urportingpay otay ebay obersay, ientificscay elineationsday, byay osethay owhay owknay. Inay olday Arris’shay ollectioncay ofay oyagesvay erethay areay omesay atesplay ofay aleswhay extracteday omfray aay Utchday ookbay ofay oyagesvay, A.DAY. 1671ay, entitleday A“AY Alingwhay Oyagevay otay Itzbergenspay inay ethay ipshay Onasjay inay ethay Alewhay, Eterpay Etersonpay ofay Ieslandfray, aster.”may Inay oneay ofay osethay atesplay ethay aleswhay, ikelay eatgray aftsray ofay ogslay, areay epresentedray inglyay amongay ice-islesay, ithway itewhay earsbay unningray overay eirthay ivinglay acksbay. Inay anotheray ateplay, ethay odigiouspray underblay isay ademay ofay epresentingray ethay alewhay ithway erpendicularpay ukesflay. 

Enthay againay, erethay isay anay imposingay uartoqay, ittenwray byay oneay Aptaincay Olnettcay, aay Ostpay Aptaincay inay ethay Englishay avynay, entitleday A“AY Oyagevay oundray Apecay Ornhay intoay ethay Outhsay Eassay, orfay ethay urposepay ofay extendingay ethay Ermacetispay Alewhay Isheries.”fay Inay isthay ookbay isay anay outlineay urportingpay otay ebay aay icture“Pay ofay aay Eterphysay oray Ermacetispay alewhay, awndray byay alescay omfray oneay illedkay onay ethay oastcay ofay Exicomay, Augustay, 1793ay, anday oistedhay onay eck.”day IAY oubtday otnay ethay aptaincay adhay isthay eraciousvay icturepay akentay orfay ethay enefitbay ofay ishay arinesmay. Otay entionmay utbay oneay ingthay aboutay itay, etlay emay aysay atthay itay ashay anay eyeay ichwhay applieday, accordingay otay ethay accompanyingay alescay, otay aay ullfay owngray ermspay alewhay, ouldway akemay ethay eyeay ofay atthay alewhay aay ow-windowbay omesay ivefay eetfay onglay. Ahay, myay allantgay aptaincay, whyay idday eyay otnay ivegay usay Onahjay ookinglay outay ofay atthay eyeay! 

Ornay areay ethay ostmay onscientiouscay ompilationscay ofay Aturalnay Istoryhay orfay ethay enefitbay ofay ethay oungyay anday endertay, eefray omfray ethay amesay einousnesshay ofay istakemay. Ooklay atay atthay opularpay orkway oldsmith’s“Gay Animateday Ature.”nay Inay ethay abridgeday Ondonlay editionay ofay 1807ay, erethay areay atesplay ofay anay allegeday ale”“whay anday aay arwhale.”“nay IAY oday otnay ishway otay eemsay inelegantay, utbay isthay unsightlyay alewhay ookslay uchmay ikelay anay amputateday owsay; anday, asay orfay ethay arwhalenay, oneay impseglay atay itay isay enoughay otay amazeay oneay, atthay inay isthay ineteenthnay enturycay uchsay aay ippogriffhay ouldcay ebay almedpay orfay enuinegay uponay anyay intelligentay ublicpay ofay oolboysschay. 

Enthay, againay, inay 1825ay, Ernardbay Ermaingay, Ountcay eday Acépèdelay, aay eatgray aturalistnay, ublishedpay aay ientificscay emizedsystay alewhay ookbay, ereinwhay areay everalsay icturespay ofay ethay ifferentday eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay. Allay esethay areay otnay onlyay incorrectay, utbay ethay icturepay ofay ethay Icetusmystay oray Eenlandgray alewhay at(thay isay otay aysay, ethay Ightray alewhay), evenay Oresbyscay, aay onglay experienceday anmay asay ouchingtay atthay eciesspay, eclaresday otnay otay avehay itsay ounterpartcay inay aturenay. 

Utbay ethay acingplay ofay ethay ap-sheafcay otay allay isthay underingblay usinessbay asway eservedray orfay ethay ientificscay Ederickfray Uviercay, otherbray otay ethay amousfay Aronbay. Inay 1836ay, ehay ublishedpay aay Aturalnay Istoryhay ofay Aleswhay, inay ichwhay ehay ivesgay atwhay ehay allscay aay icturepay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Eforebay owingshay atthay icturepay otay anyay Antucketernay, ouyay adhay estbay ovidepray orfay ouryay ummarysay etreatray omfray Antucketnay. Inay aay ordway, Ederickfray Uvier’scay Ermspay Alewhay isay otnay aay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay aay uashsqay. Ofay oursecay, ehay evernay adhay ethay enefitbay ofay aay alingwhay oyagevay uch(say enmay eldomsay avehay), utbay encewhay ehay erivedday atthay icturepay, owhay ancay elltay? Erhapspay ehay otgay itay asay ishay ientificscay edecessorpray inay ethay amesay ieldfay, Esmarestday, otgay oneay ofay ishay authenticay abortionsay; atthay isay, omfray aay Inesechay awingdray. Anday atwhay ortsay ofay ivelylay adslay ithway ethay encilpay osethay Inesechay areay, anymay ueerqay upscay anday aucerssay informay usay. 

Asay orfay ethay ign-painters’say aleswhay eensay inay ethay eetsstray anginghay overay ethay opsshay ofay oil-dealersay, atwhay allshay ebay aidsay ofay emthay? Eythay areay enerallygay Ichardray IIIAY. aleswhay, ithway omedarydray umpshay, anday eryvay avagesay; eakfastingbray onay eethray oray ourfay ailorsay artstay, atthay isay aleboatswhay ullfay ofay arinersmay: eirthay eformitiesday ounderingflay inay eassay ofay oodblay anday ueblay aintpay. 

Utbay esethay anifoldmay istakesmay inay epictingday ethay alewhay areay otnay osay eryvay urprisingsay afteray allay. Onsidercay! Ostmay ofay ethay ientificscay awingsdray avehay eenbay akentay omfray ethay andedstray ishfay; anday esethay areay aboutay asay orrectcay asay aay awingdray ofay aay eckedwray ipshay, ithway okenbray ackbay, ouldway orrectlycay epresentray ethay oblenay animalay itselfay inay allay itsay undasheday idepray ofay ullhay anday arsspay. Oughthay elephantsay avehay oodstay orfay eirthay ull-lengthsfay, ethay ivinglay Eviathanlay ashay evernay etyay airlyfay oatedflay imselfhay orfay ishay ortraitpay. Ethay ivinglay alewhay, inay ishay ullfay ajestymay anday ignificancesay, isay onlyay otay ebay eensay atay easay inay unfathomableay atersway; anday afloatay ethay astvay ulkbay ofay imhay isay outay ofay ightsay, ikelay aay aunchedlay ine-of-battlelay ipshay; anday outay ofay atthay elementay itay isay aay ingthay eternallyay impossibleay orfay ortalmay anmay otay oisthay imhay odilybay intoay ethay airay, osay asay otay eservepray allay ishay ightymay ellssway anday undulationsay. Anday, otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay ighlyhay esumablepray ifferenceday ofay ontourcay etweenbay aay oungyay uckingsay alewhay anday aay ull-grownfay Atonianplay Eviathanlay; etyay, evenay inay ethay asecay ofay oneay ofay osethay oungyay uckingsay aleswhay oistedhay otay aay ip’sshay eckday, uchsay isay enthay ethay outlandishay, eel-likeay, imberedlay, aryingvay apeshay ofay imhay, atthay ishay ecisepray expressionay ethay evilday imselfhay ouldcay otnay atchcay. 

Utbay itay aymay ebay anciedfay, atthay omfray ethay akednay eletonskay ofay ethay andedstray alewhay, accurateay intshay aymay ebay erivedday ouchingtay ishay uetray ormfay. Otnay atay allay. Orfay itay isay oneay ofay ethay oremay uriouscay ingsthay aboutay isthay Eviathanlay, atthay ishay eletonskay ivesgay eryvay ittlelay ideaay ofay ishay eneralgay apeshay. Oughthay Eremyjay Entham’sbay eletonskay, ichwhay angshay orfay andelabracay inay ethay ibrarylay ofay oneay ofay ishay executorsay, orrectlycay onveyscay ethay ideaay ofay aay urly-browedbay utilitarianay olday entlemangay, ithway allay Eremy’sjay otheray eadinglay ersonalpay aracteristicschay; etyay othingnay ofay isthay indkay ouldcay ebay inferreday omfray anyay eviathan’slay articulateday onesbay. Inay actfay, asay ethay eatgray Unterhay ayssay, ethay eremay eletonskay ofay ethay alewhay earsbay ethay amesay elationray otay ethay ullyfay investeday anday addedpay animalay asay ethay insectay oesday otay ethay alischrysay atthay osay oundinglyray envelopesay itay. Isthay eculiaritypay isay ikinglystray evinceday inay ethay eadhay, asay inay omesay artpay ofay isthay ookbay illway ebay incidentallyay ownshay. Itay isay alsoay eryvay uriouslycay isplayedday inay ethay idesay infay, ethay onesbay ofay ichwhay almostay exactlyay answeray otay ethay onesbay ofay ethay umanhay andhay, inusmay onlyay ethay umbthay. Isthay infay ashay ourfay egularray one-fingersbay, ethay indexay, iddlemay, ingray, anday ittlelay ingerfay. Utbay allay esethay areay ermanentlypay odgedlay inay eirthay eshyflay overingcay, asay ethay umanhay ingersfay inay anay artificialay overingcay. owever“Hay ecklesslyray ethay alewhay aymay ometimessay ervesay us,”ay aidsay umoroushay Ubbstay oneay ayday, e“hay ancay evernay ebay ulytray aidsay otay andlehay usay ithoutway ittens.”may 

Orfay allay esethay easonsray, enthay, anyay ayway ouyay aymay ooklay atay itay, ouyay ustmay eedsnay oncludecay atthay ethay eatgray Eviathanlay isay atthay oneay eaturecray inay ethay orldway ichwhay ustmay emainray unpainteday otay ethay astlay. Uetray, oneay ortraitpay aymay ithay ethay arkmay uchmay earernay anthay anotheray, utbay onenay ancay ithay itay ithway anyay eryvay onsiderablecay egreeday ofay exactnessay. Osay erethay isay onay earthlyay ayway ofay indingfay outay eciselypray atwhay ethay alewhay eallyray ookslay ikelay. Anday ethay onlyay odemay inay ichwhay ouyay ancay eriveday evenay aay olerabletay ideaay ofay ishay ivinglay ontourcay, isay byay oinggay aay alingwhay ourselfyay; utbay byay osay oingday, ouyay unray onay allsmay iskray ofay eingbay eternallyay ovestay anday unksay byay imhay. Ereforewhay, itay eemssay otay emay ouyay adhay estbay otnay ebay ootay astidiousfay inay ouryay uriositycay ouchingtay isthay Eviathanlay. 



APTERCHAY 56ay. Ofay ethay Esslay Erroneousay Icturespay ofay Aleswhay, anday ethay Uetray Icturespay ofay Alingwhay Enesscay. 

Inay onnexioncay ithway ethay onstrousmay icturespay ofay aleswhay, IAY amay onglystray emptedtay erehay otay enteray uponay osethay illstay oremay onstrousmay oriesstay ofay emthay ichwhay areay otay ebay oundfay inay ertaincay ooksbay, othbay ancientay anday odernmay, especiallyay inay Inyplay, Urchaspay, Ackluythay, Arrishay, Uviercay, etcay. Utbay IAY asspay atthay attermay byay. 

IAY owknay ofay onlyay ourfay ublishedpay outlinesay ofay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay; Olnett’scay, Uggins’shay, Ederickfray Uvier’scay, anday Eale’sbay. Inay ethay eviouspray apterchay Olnettcay anday Uviercay avehay eenbay eferredray otay. Uggins’shay isay arfay etterbay anthay eirsthay; utbay, byay eatgray oddsay, Eale’sbay isay ethay estbay. Allay Eale’sbay awingsdray ofay isthay alewhay areay oodgay, exceptingay ethay iddlemay igurefay inay ethay icturepay ofay eethray aleswhay inay ariousvay attitudesay, appingcay ishay econdsay apterchay. Ishay ontispiecefray, oatsbay attackingay Ermspay Aleswhay, oughthay onay oubtday alculatedcay otay exciteay ethay ivilcay epticismscay ofay omesay arlorpay enmay, isay admirablyay orrectcay anday ife-likelay inay itsay eneralgay effectay. Omesay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay awingsdray inay JAY. Ossray Ownebray areay ettypray orrectcay inay ontourcay; utbay eythay areay etchedlywray engraveday. Atthay isay otnay ishay aultfay oughthay. 

Ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay, ethay estbay outlineay icturespay areay inay Oresbyscay; utbay eythay areay awndray onay ootay allsmay aay alescay otay onveycay aay esirableday impressionay. Ehay ashay utbay oneay icturepay ofay alingwhay enesscay, anday isthay isay aay adsay eficiencyday, ecausebay itay isay byay uchsay icturespay onlyay, enwhay atay allay ellway oneday, atthay ouyay ancay eriveday anythingay ikelay aay uthfultray ideaay ofay ethay ivinglay alewhay asay eensay byay ishay ivinglay untershay. 

Utbay, akentay orfay allay inay allay, byay arfay ethay inestfay, oughthay inay omesay etailsday otnay ethay ostmay orrectcay, esentationspray ofay aleswhay anday alingwhay enesscay otay ebay anywhereay oundfay, areay otway argelay Enchfray engravingsay, ellway executeday, anday akentay omfray aintingspay byay oneay Arnerygay. Espectivelyray, eythay epresentray attacksay onay ethay Ermspay anday Ightray Alewhay. Inay ethay irstfay engravingay aay oblenay Ermspay Alewhay isay epictedday inay ullfay ajestymay ofay ightmay, ustjay isenray eneathbay ethay oatbay omfray ethay ofunditiespray ofay ethay oceanay, anday earingbay ighhay inay ethay airay uponay ishay ackbay ethay errifictay eckwray ofay ethay ovenstay anksplay. Ethay owpray ofay ethay oatbay isay artiallypay unbrokenay, anday isay awndray ustjay alancingbay uponay ethay onster’smay inespay; anday andingstay inay atthay owpray, orfay atthay oneay inglesay incomputableay ashflay ofay imetay, ouyay eholdbay anay oarsmanay, alfhay oudedshray byay ethay incenseday oilingbay outspay ofay ethay alewhay, anday inay ethay actay ofay eapinglay, asay ifay omfray aay ecipicepray. Ethay actionay ofay ethay olewhay ingthay isay onderfullyway oodgay anday uetray. Ethay alf-emptiedhay ine-tublay oatsflay onay ethay itenedwhay easay; ethay oodenway olespay ofay ethay illedspay arpoonshay obliquelyay obbay inay itay; ethay eadshay ofay ethay immingsway ewcray areay atteredscay aboutay ethay alewhay inay ontrastingcay expressionsay ofay affrightay; ilewhay inay ethay ackblay ormystay istanceday ethay ipshay isay earingbay ownday uponay ethay enescay. Erioussay aultfay ightmay ebay oundfay ithway ethay anatomicalay etailsday ofay isthay alewhay, utbay etlay atthay asspay; incesay, orfay ethay ifelay ofay emay, IAY ouldcay otnay awdray osay oodgay aay oneay. 

Inay ethay econdsay engravingay, ethay oatbay isay inay ethay actay ofay awingdray alongsideay ethay arnacledbay ankflay ofay aay argelay unningray Ightray Alewhay, atthay ollsray ishay ackblay eedyway ulkbay inay ethay easay ikelay omesay ossymay ock-slideray omfray ethay Atagonianpay iffsclay. Ishay etsjay areay erectay, ullfay, anday ackblay ikelay ootsay; osay atthay omfray osay aboundingay aay okesmay inay ethay imneychay, ouyay ouldway inkthay erethay ustmay ebay aay avebray uppersay ookingcay inay ethay eatgray owelsbay elowbay. Easay owlsfay areay eckingpay atay ethay allsmay abscray, ell-fishshay, anday otheray easay andiescay anday accaronimay, ichwhay ethay Ightray Alewhay ometimessay arriescay onay ishay estilentpay ackbay. Anday allay ethay ilewhay ethay ick-lippedthay eviathanlay isay ushingray oughthray ethay eepday, eavinglay onstay ofay umultuoustay itewhay urdscay inay ishay akeway, anday ausingcay ethay ightslay oatbay otay ockray inay ethay ellssway ikelay aay iffskay aughtcay ighnay ethay addle-wheelspay ofay anay oceanay eamerstay. Usthay, ethay oregroundfay isay allay agingray ommotioncay; utbay ehindbay, inay admirableay artisticay ontrastcay, isay ethay assyglay evellay ofay aay easay ecalmedbay, ethay oopingdray unstarcheday ailssay ofay ethay owerlesspay ipshay, anday ethay inertay assmay ofay aay eadday alewhay, aay onqueredcay ortressfay, ithway ethay agflay ofay apturecay azilylay anginghay omfray ethay ale-polewhay inserteday intoay ishay out-holespay. 

Owhay Arnerygay ethay ainterpay isay, oray asway, IAY owknay otnay. Utbay myay ifelay orfay itay ehay asway eitheray acticallypray onversantcay ithway ishay ubjectsay, oray elseay arvellouslymay utoredtay byay omesay experienceday alemanwhay. Ethay Enchfray areay ethay adslay orfay aintingpay actionay. Ogay anday azegay uponay allay ethay aintingspay ofay Europeay, anday erewhay illway ouyay indfay uchsay aay allerygay ofay ivinglay anday eathingbray ommotioncay onay anvascay, asay inay atthay iumphaltray allhay atay Ersaillesvay; erewhay ethay eholderbay ightsfay ishay ayway, ell-mellpay, oughthray ethay onsecutivecay eatgray attlesbay ofay Ancefray; erewhay everyay ordsway eemssay aay ashflay ofay ethay Orthernnay Ightslay, anday ethay uccessivesay armeday ingskay anday Emperorsay ashday byay, ikelay aay argechay ofay ownedcray entaurscay? Otnay ollywhay unworthyay ofay aay aceplay inay atthay allerygay, areay esethay easay attle-piecesbay ofay Arnerygay. 

Ethay aturalnay aptitudeay ofay ethay Enchfray orfay eizingsay ethay icturesquenesspay ofay ingsthay eemssay otay ebay eculiarlypay evinceday inay atwhay aintingspay anday engravingsay eythay avehay ofay eirthay alingwhay enesscay. Ithway otnay oneay enthtay ofay England’say experienceay inay ethay isheryfay, anday otnay ethay ousandththay artpay ofay atthay ofay ethay Americansay, eythay avehay everthelessnay urnishedfay othbay ationsnay ithway ethay onlyay inishedfay etchesskay atay allay apablecay ofay onveyingcay ethay ealray iritspay ofay ethay alewhay unthay. Orfay ethay ostmay artpay, ethay Englishay anday Americanay alewhay aughtsmendray eemsay entirelyay ontentcay ithway esentingpray ethay echanicalmay outlineay ofay ingsthay, uchsay asay ethay acantvay ofilepray ofay ethay alewhay; ichwhay, osay arfay asay icturesquenesspay ofay effectay isay oncernedcay, isay aboutay antamounttay otay etchingskay ethay ofilepray ofay aay amidpyray. Evenay Oresbyscay, ethay ustlyjay enownedray Ightray alemanwhay, afteray ivinggay usay aay iffstay ullfay engthlay ofay ethay Eenlandgray alewhay, anday eethray oray ourfay elicateday iniaturesmay ofay arwhalesnay anday orpoisespay, eatstray usay otay aay eriessay ofay assicalclay engravingsay ofay oatbay ookshay, oppingchay ivesknay, anday apnelsgray; anday ithway ethay icroscopicmay iligenceday ofay aay Euwenhoecklay ubmitssay otay ethay inspectionay ofay aay iveringshay orldway inety-sixnay ac-similesfay ofay agnifiedmay Arcticay owsnay alscrystay. IAY eanmay onay isparagementday otay ethay excellentay oyagervay I(AY onorhay imhay orfay aay eteranvay), utbay inay osay importantay aay attermay itay asway ertainlycay anay oversightay otnay otay avehay ocuredpray orfay everyay alcrystay aay ornsway affidavitay akentay eforebay aay Eenlandgray Usticejay ofay ethay Eacepay. 

Inay additionay otay osethay inefay engravingsay omfray Arnerygay, erethay areay otway otheray Enchfray engravingsay orthyway ofay otenay, byay omesay oneay owhay ubscribessay imselfhay “HAY. Urand.”day Oneay ofay emthay, oughthay otnay eciselypray adapteday otay ouray esentpray urposepay, everthelessnay eservesday entionmay onay otheray accountsay. Itay isay aay uietqay oon-scenenay amongay ethay islesay ofay ethay Acificpay; aay Enchfray alerwhay anchoreday, inshoreay, inay aay almcay, anday azilylay akingtay aterway onay oardbay; ethay oosenedlay ailssay ofay ethay ipshay, anday ethay onglay eaveslay ofay ethay almspay inay ethay ackgroundbay, othbay oopingdray ogethertay inay ethay eezelessbray airay. Ethay effectay isay eryvay inefay, enwhay onsideredcay ithway eferenceray otay itsay esentingpray ethay ardyhay ishermenfay underay oneay ofay eirthay ewfay aspectsay ofay orientalay eposeray. Ethay otheray engravingay isay uiteqay aay ifferentday affairay: ethay ipshay ove-tohay uponay ethay openay easay, anday inay ethay eryvay earthay ofay ethay Eviathaniclay ifelay, ithway aay Ightray Alewhay alongsideay; ethay esselvay in(ay ethay actay ofay utting-incay) ovehay overay otay ethay onstermay asay ifay otay aay uayqay; anday aay oatbay, urriedlyhay ushingpay offay omfray isthay enescay ofay activityay, isay aboutay ivinggay asechay otay aleswhay inay ethay istanceday.
