Atthay ortalmay anmay ouldshay eedfay uponay ethay eaturecray atthay eedsfay ishay amplay, anday, ikelay Ubbstay, eatay imhay byay ishay ownay ightlay, asay ouyay aymay aysay; isthay eemssay osay outlandishay aay ingthay atthay oneay ustmay eedsnay ogay aay ittlelay intoay ethay istoryhay anday ilosophyphay ofay itay. 

Itay isay uponay ecordray, atthay eethray enturiescay agoay ethay onguetay ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay asway esteemeday aay eatgray elicacyday inay Ancefray, anday ommandedcay argelay icespray erethay. Alsoay, atthay inay Enryhay Iiith’svay imetay, aay ertaincay ookcay ofay ethay ourtcay obtaineday aay andsomehay ewardray orfay inventingay anay admirableay aucesay otay ebay eatenay ithway arbacuedbay orpoisespay, ichwhay, ouyay ememberray, areay aay eciesspay ofay alewhay. Orpoisespay, indeeday, areay otay isthay ayday onsideredcay inefay eatingay. Ethay eatmay isay ademay intoay allsbay aboutay ethay izesay ofay illiardbay allsbay, anday eingbay ellway easonedsay anday icedspay ightmay ebay akentay orfay urtle-ballstay oray ealvay allsbay. Ethay olday onksmay ofay Unfermlineday ereway eryvay ondfay ofay emthay. Eythay adhay aay eatgray orpoisepay antgray omfray ethay owncray. 

Ethay actfay isay, atthay amongay ishay untershay atay eastlay, ethay alewhay ouldway byay allay andshay ebay onsideredcay aay oblenay ishday, ereway erethay otnay osay uchmay ofay imhay; utbay enwhay ouyay omecay otay itsay ownday eforebay aay eat-piemay earlynay oneay undredhay eetfay onglay, itay akestay awayay ouryay appetiteay. Onlyay ethay ostmay unprejudiceday ofay enmay ikelay Ubbstay, owadaysnay artakepay ofay ookedcay aleswhay; utbay ethay Esquimauxay areay otnay osay astidiousfay. Eway allay owknay owhay eythay ivelay uponay aleswhay, anday avehay areray olday intagesvay ofay imepray olday aintray oilay. Ograndazay, oneay ofay eirthay ostmay amousfay octorsday, ecommendsray ipsstray ofay ubberblay orfay infantsay, asay eingbay exceedinglyay uicyjay anday ourishingnay. Anday isthay emindsray emay atthay ertaincay Englishmenay, owhay onglay agoay ereway accidentallyay eftlay inay Eenlandgray byay aay alingwhay essel—thatvay esethay enmay actuallyay ivedlay orfay everalsay onthsmay onay ethay ouldymay apsscray ofay aleswhay ichwhay adhay eenbay eftlay ashoreay afteray ingtryay outay ethay ubberblay. Amongay ethay Utchday alemenwhay esethay apsscray areay alledcay itters”“fray; ichwhay, indeeday, eythay eatlygray esembleray, eingbay ownbray anday ispcray, anday ellingsmay omethingsay ikelay olday Amsterdamay ousewives’hay ough-nutsday oray oly-cooksay, enwhay eshfray. Eythay avehay uchsay anay eatableay ooklay atthay ethay ostmay elf-denyingsay angerstray ancay ardlyhay eepkay ishay andshay offay. 

Utbay atwhay urtherfay epreciatesday ethay alewhay asay aay ivilizedcay ishday, isay ishay exceedingay ichnessray. Ehay isay ethay eatgray izepray oxay ofay ethay easay, ootay atfay otay ebay elicatelyday oodgay. Ooklay atay ishay umphay, ichwhay ouldway ebay asay inefay eatingay asay ethay uffalo’sbay ich(whay isay esteemeday aay areray ishday), ereway itay otnay uchsay aay olidsay amidpyray ofay atfay. Utbay ethay ermacetispay itselfay, owhay andblay anday eamycray atthay isay; ikelay ethay ansparenttray, alf-jelliedhay, itewhay eatmay ofay aay ocoanutcay inay ethay irdthay onthmay ofay itsay owthgray, etyay arfay ootay ichray otay upplysay aay ubstitutesay orfay utterbay. Everthelessnay, anymay alemenwhay avehay aay ethodmay ofay absorbingay itay intoay omesay otheray ubstancesay, anday enthay artakingpay ofay itay. Inay ethay onglay tryay atchesway ofay ethay ightnay itay isay aay ommoncay ingthay orfay ethay eamensay otay ipday eirthay ip-biscuitshay intoay ethay ugehay oil-potsay anday etlay emthay fryay erethay awhileay. Anymay aay oodgay uppersay avehay IAY usthay ademay. 

Inay ethay asecay ofay aay allsmay Ermspay Alewhay ethay ainsbray areay accounteday aay inefay ishday. Ethay asketcay ofay ethay ullskay isay okenbray intoay ithway anay axeay, anday ethay otway umpplay, itishwhay obeslay eingbay ithdrawnway ecisely(pray esemblingray otway argelay uddingspay), eythay areay enthay ixedmay ithway ourflay, anday ookedcay intoay aay ostmay electableday essmay, inay avorflay omewhatsay esemblingray alves’cay eadhay, ichwhay isay uiteqay aay ishday amongay omesay epicuresay; anday everyay oneay owsknay atthay omesay oungyay ucksbay amongay ethay epicuresay, byay ontinuallycay iningday uponay alves’cay ainsbray, byay anday byay etgay otay avehay aay ittlelay ainsbray ofay eirthay ownay, osay asay otay ebay ableay otay elltay aay alf’scay eadhay omfray eirthay ownay eadshay; ichwhay, indeeday, equiresray uncommonay iscriminationday. Anday atthay isay ethay easonray whyay aay oungyay uckbay ithway anay intelligentay ookinglay alf’scay eadhay eforebay imhay, isay omehowsay oneay ofay ethay addestsay ightssay ouyay ancay eesay. Ethay eadhay ookslay aay ortsay ofay eproachfullyray atay imhay, ithway anay Et“ay utay Ute!”bray expressionay. 

Itay isay otnay, erhapspay, entirelyay ecausebay ethay alewhay isay osay excessivelyay unctuousay atthay andsmenlay eemsay otay egardray ethay eatingay ofay imhay ithway abhorrenceay; atthay appearsay otay esultray, inay omesay ayway, omfray ethay onsiderationcay eforebay entionedmay: i.e_ay._ atthay aay anmay ouldshay eatay aay ewlynay urderedmay ingthay ofay ethay easay, anday eatay itay ootay byay itsay ownay ightlay. Utbay onay oubtday ethay irstfay anmay atthay everay urderedmay anay oxay asway egardedray asay aay urderermay; erhapspay ehay asway unghay; anday ifay ehay adhay eenbay utpay onay ishay ialtray byay oxenay, ehay ertainlycay ouldway avehay eenbay; anday ehay ertainlycay eservedday itay ifay anyay urderermay oesday. Ogay otay ethay eat-marketmay ofay aay Aturdaysay ightnay anday eesay ethay owdscray ofay ivelay ipedsbay aringstay upay atay ethay onglay owsray ofay eadday uadrupedsqay. Oesday otnay atthay ightsay aketay aay oothtay outay ofay ethay annibal’scay awjay? Annibalscay? owhay isay otnay aay annibalcay? IAY elltay ouyay itay illway ebay oremay olerabletay orfay ethay Ejeefay atthay altedsay ownday aay eanlay issionarymay inay ishay ellarcay againstay aay omingcay aminefay; itay illway ebay oremay olerabletay orfay atthay ovidentpray Ejeefay, IAY aysay, inay ethay ayday ofay udgmentjay, anthay orfay eethay, ivilizedcay anday enlighteneday ourmandgay, owhay ailestnay eesegay otay ethay oundgray anday eastestfay onay eirthay oatedblay iverslay inay thyay até-de-foie-graspay. 

Utbay Ubbstay, ehay eatsay ethay alewhay byay itsay ownay ightlay, oesday ehay? anday atthay isay addingay insultay otay injuryay, isay itay? Ooklay atay ouryay ife-handleknay, erethay, myay ivilizedcay anday enlighteneday ourmandgay iningday offay atthay oastray eefbay, atwhay isay atthay andlehay ademay of?—whatay utbay ethay onesbay ofay ethay otherbray ofay ethay eryvay oxay ouyay areay eatingay? Anday atwhay oday ouyay ickpay ouryay eethtay ithway, afteray evouringday atthay atfay oosegay? Ithway aay eatherfay ofay ethay amesay owlfay. Anday ithway atwhay uillqay idday ethay Ecretarysay ofay ethay Ocietysay orfay ethay Uppressionsay ofay Ueltycray otay Andersgay ormallyfay inditeay ishay ircularscay? Itay isay onlyay ithinway ethay astlay onthmay oray otway atthay atthay ocietysay assedpay aay esolutionray otay atronizepay othingnay utbay eelstay enspay. 



APTERCHAY 66ay. Ethay Arkshay Assacremay. 

Enwhay inay ethay Outhernsay Isheryfay, aay apturedcay Ermspay Alewhay, afteray onglay anday earyway oiltay, isay oughtbray alongsideay atelay atay ightnay, itay isay otnay, asay aay eneralgay ingthay atay eastlay, ustomarycay otay oceedpray atay onceay otay ethay usinessbay ofay uttingcay imhay inay. Orfay atthay usinessbay isay anay exceedinglyay aboriouslay oneay; isay otnay eryvay oonsay ompletedcay; anday equiresray allay andshay otay etsay aboutay itay. Ereforethay, ethay ommoncay usageay isay otay aketay inay allay ailsay; ashlay ethay elmhay a’leeay; anday enthay endsay everyay oneay elowbay otay ishay ammockhay illtay aylightday, ithway ethay eservationray atthay, untilay atthay imetay, anchor-watchesay allshay ebay eptkay; atthay isay, otway anday otway orfay anay ourhay, eachay ouplecay, ethay ewcray inay otationray allshay ountmay ethay eckday otay eesay atthay allay oesgay ellway. 

Utbay ometimessay, especiallyay uponay ethay Inelay inay ethay Acificpay, isthay anplay illway otnay answeray atay allay; ecausebay uchsay incalculableay ostshay ofay arksshay athergay oundray ethay ooredmay arcasecay, atthay ereway ehay eftlay osay orfay ixsay ourshay, aysay, onay aay etchstray, ittlelay oremay anthay ethay eletonskay ouldway ebay isiblevay byay orningmay. Inay ostmay otheray artspay ofay ethay oceanay, oweverhay, erewhay esethay ishfay oday otnay osay argelylay abounday, eirthay ondrousway oracityvay ancay ebay atay imestay onsiderablycay iminishedday, byay igorouslyvay irringstay emthay upay ithway arpshay aling-spadeswhay, aay ocedurepray otwithstandingnay, ichwhay, inay omesay instancesay, onlyay eemssay otay ickletay emthay intoay illstay eatergray activityay. Utbay itay asway otnay usthay inay ethay esentpray asecay ithway ethay Equod’spay arksshay; oughthay, otay ebay uresay, anyay anmay unaccustomeday otay uchsay ightssay, otay avehay ookedlay overay erhay idesay atthay ightnay, ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay ethay olewhay oundray easay asway oneay ugehay eesechay, anday osethay arksshay ethay aggotsmay inay itay. 

Everthelessnay, uponay Ubbstay ettingsay ethay anchor-watchay afteray ishay uppersay asway oncludedcay; anday enwhay, accordinglyay, Ueequegqay anday aay orecastlefay eamansay amecay onay eckday, onay allsmay excitementay asway eatedcray amongay ethay arksshay; orfay immediatelyay uspendingsay ethay uttingcay agesstay overay ethay idesay, anday oweringlay eethray anternslay, osay atthay eythay astcay onglay eamsglay ofay ightlay overay ethay urbidtay easay, esethay otway arinersmay, artingday eirthay onglay aling-spadeswhay, eptkay upay anay incessantay urderingmay ofay ethay arksshay,* byay ikingstray ethay eenkay eelstay eepday intoay eirthay ullsskay, eeminglysay eirthay onlyay italvay artpay. Utbay inay ethay oamyfay onfusioncay ofay eirthay ixedmay anday ugglingstray ostshay, ethay arksmenmay ouldcay otnay alwaysay ithay eirthay arkmay; anday isthay oughtbray aboutay ewnay evelationsray ofay ethay incredibleay erocityfay ofay ethay oefay. Eythay iciouslyvay appedsnay, otnay onlyay atay eachay other’say isembowelmentsday, utbay ikelay exibleflay owsbay, entbay oundray, anday itbay eirthay ownay; illtay osethay entrailsay eemedsay allowedsway overay anday overay againay byay ethay amesay outhmay, otay ebay oppositelyay oidedvay byay ethay apinggay oundway. Ornay asway isthay allay. Itay asway unsafeay otay eddlemay ithway ethay orpsescay anday ostsghay ofay esethay eaturescray. AAY ortsay ofay enericgay oray Antheisticpay italityvay eemedsay otay urklay inay eirthay eryvay ointsjay anday onesbay, afteray atwhay ightmay ebay alledcay ethay individualay ifelay adhay epartedday. Illedkay anday oistedhay onay eckday orfay ethay akesay ofay ishay inskay, oneay ofay esethay arksshay almostay ooktay oorpay Ueequeg’sqay andhay offay, enwhay ehay iedtray otay utshay ownday ethay eadday idlay ofay ishay urderousmay awjay. 

e*Thay aling-spadewhay useday orfay utting-incay isay ademay ofay ethay eryvay estbay eelstay; isay aboutay ethay ignessbay ofay aay an’smay eadspray andhay; anday inay eneralgay apeshay, orrespondscay otay ethay ardengay implementay afteray ichwhay itay isay amednay; onlyay itsay idessay areay erfectlypay atflay, anday itsay upperay enday onsiderablycay arrowernay anthay ethay owerlay. Isthay eaponway isay alwaysay eptkay asay arpshay asay ossiblepay; anday enwhay eingbay useday isay occasionallyay onedhay, ustjay ikelay aay azorray. Inay itsay ocketsay, aay iffstay olepay, omfray entytway otay irtythay eetfay onglay, isay inserteday orfay aay andlehay. 

ueequeg“Qay onay arecay atwhay odgay ademay imhay ark,”shay aidsay ethay avagesay, agonizinglyay iftinglay ishay andhay upay anday ownday; edder“way Ejeefay odgay oray Antucketnay odgay; utbay eday odgay atway ademay arkshay ustmay ebay oneay amday Ingin.”ay 



APTERCHAY 67ay. Uttingcay Inay. 

Itay asway aay Aturdaysay ightnay, anday uchsay aay Abbathsay asay ollowedfay! Exay officioay ofessorspray ofay Abbathsay eakingbray areay allay alemenwhay. Ethay ivoryay Equodpay asway urnedtay intoay atwhay eemedsay aay ambleshay; everyay ailorsay aay utcherbay. Ouyay ouldway avehay oughtthay eway ereway offeringay upay entay ousandthay edray oxenay otay ethay easay odsgay. 

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ethay enormousay uttingcay acklestay, amongay otheray onderouspay ingsthay omprisingcay aay usterclay ofay ocksblay enerallygay aintedpay eengray, anday ichwhay onay inglesay anmay ancay ossiblypay ift—thislay astvay unchbay ofay apesgray asway ayedsway upay otay ethay ain-topmay anday irmlyfay ashedlay otay ethay owerlay ast-headmay, ethay ongeststray ointpay anywhereay aboveay aay ip’sshay eckday. Ethay enday ofay ethay awser-likehay operay indingway oughthray esethay intricaciesay, asway enthay onductedcay otay ethay indlassway, anday ethay ugehay owerlay ockblay ofay ethay acklestay asway ungsway overay ethay alewhay; otay isthay ockblay ethay eatgray ubberblay ookhay, eighingway omesay oneay undredhay oundspay, asway attacheday. Anday ownay uspendedsay inay agesstay overay ethay idesay, Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay, ethay atesmay, armeday ithway eirthay onglay adesspay, eganbay uttingcay aay olehay inay ethay odybay orfay ethay insertionay ofay ethay ookhay ustjay aboveay ethay earestnay ofay ethay otway ide-finssay. Isthay oneday, aay oadbray, emicircularsay inelay isay utcay oundray ethay olehay, ethay ookhay isay inserteday, anday ethay ainmay odybay ofay ethay ewcray ikingstray upay aay ildway oruschay, ownay ommencecay eavinghay inay oneay enseday owdcray atay ethay indlassway. Enwhay instantlyay, ethay entireay ipshay areenscay overay onay erhay idesay; everyay oltbay inay erhay artsstay ikelay ethay ail-headsnay ofay anay olday ousehay inay ostyfray eatherway; eshay emblestray, uiversqay, anday odsnay erhay ightedfray ast-headsmay otay ethay skyay. Oremay anday oremay eshay eanslay overay otay ethay alewhay, ilewhay everyay aspinggay eavehay ofay ethay indlassway isay answereday byay aay elpinghay eavehay omfray ethay illowsbay; illtay atay astlay, aay iftsway, artlingstay apsnay isay eardhay; ithway aay eatgray ashsway ethay ipshay ollsray upwardsay anday ackwardsbay omfray ethay alewhay, anday ethay iumphanttray ackletay isesray intoay ightsay aggingdray afteray itay ethay isengagedday emicircularsay enday ofay ethay irstfay ipstray ofay ubberblay. Ownay asay ethay ubberblay envelopesay ethay alewhay eciselypray asay ethay indray oesday anay orangeay, osay isay itay ippedstray offay omfray ethay odybay eciselypray asay anay orangeay isay ometimessay ippedstray byay iralizingspay itay. Orfay ethay ainstray onstantlycay eptkay upay byay ethay indlassway ontinuallycay eepskay ethay alewhay ollingray overay anday overay inay ethay aterway, anday asay ethay ubberblay inay oneay ipstray uniformlyay eelspay offay alongay ethay inelay alledcay ethay arf,”“scay imultaneouslysay utcay byay ethay adesspay ofay Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay, ethay atesmay; anday ustjay asay astfay asay itay isay usthay eeledpay offay, anday indeeday byay atthay eryvay actay itselfay, itay isay allay ethay imetay eingbay oistedhay igherhay anday igherhay aloftay illtay itsay upperay enday azesgray ethay ain-topmay; ethay enmay atay ethay indlassway enthay easecay eavinghay, anday orfay aay omentmay oray otway ethay odigiouspray ood-drippingblay assmay ayssway otay anday ofray asay ifay etlay ownday omfray ethay skyay, anday everyay oneay esentpray ustmay aketay oodgay eedhay otay odgeday itay enwhay itay ingssway, elseay itay aymay oxbay ishay earsay anday itchpay imhay eadlonghay overboarday. 

Oneay ofay ethay attendingay arpooneershay ownay advancesay ithway aay onglay, eenkay eaponway alledcay aay oarding-swordbay, anday atchingway ishay ancechay ehay exterouslyday icesslay outay aay onsiderablecay olehay inay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay ayingsway assmay. Intoay isthay olehay, ethay enday ofay ethay econdsay alternatingay eatgray ackletay isay enthay ookedhay osay asay otay etainray aay oldhay uponay ethay ubberblay, inay orderay otay eparepray orfay atwhay ollowsfay. Ereuponwhay, isthay accomplisheday ordsmansway, arningway allay andshay otay andstay offay, onceay oremay akesmay aay ientificscay ashday atay ethay assmay, anday ithway aay ewfay idelongsay, esperateday, unginglay icingsslay, everssay itay ompletelycay inay aintway; osay atthay ilewhay ethay ortshay owerlay artpay isay illstay astfay, ethay onglay upperay ipstray, alledcay aay anket-pieceblay, ingssway earclay, anday isay allay eadyray orfay oweringlay. Ethay eavershay orwardfay ownay esumeray eirthay ongsay, anday ilewhay ethay oneay ackletay isay eelingpay anday oistinghay aay econdsay ipstray omfray ethay alewhay, ethay otheray isay owlyslay ackenedslay awayay, anday ownday oesgay ethay irstfay ipstray oughthray ethay ainmay atchwayhay ightray eneathbay, intoay anay unfurnisheday arlorpay alledcay ethay ubber-roomblay. Intoay isthay ilighttway apartmentay undrysay imblenay andshay eepkay oilingcay awayay ethay onglay anket-pieceblay asay ifay itay ereway aay eatgray ivelay assmay ofay aitedplay erpentssay. Anday usthay ethay orkway oceedspray; ethay otway acklestay oistinghay anday oweringlay imultaneouslysay; othbay alewhay anday indlassway eavinghay, ethay eavershay ingingsay, ethay ubber-roomblay entlemengay oilingcay, ethay atesmay arfingscay, ethay ipshay ainingstray, anday allay andshay earingsway occasionallyay, byay ayway ofay assuagingay ethay eneralgay ictionfray. 



APTERCHAY 68ay. Ethay Anketblay. 

IAY avehay ivengay onay allsmay attentionay otay atthay otnay unvexeday ubjectsay, ethay inskay ofay ethay alewhay. IAY avehay adhay ontroversiescay aboutay itay ithway experienceday alemenwhay afloatay, anday earnedlay aturalistsnay ashoreay. Myay originalay opinionay emainsray unchangeday; utbay itay isay onlyay anay opinionay. 

Ethay uestionqay isay, atwhay anday erewhay isay ethay inskay ofay ethay alewhay? Alreadyay ouyay owknay atwhay ishay ubberblay isay. Atthay ubberblay isay omethingsay ofay ethay onsistencecay ofay irmfay, ose-grainedclay eefbay, utbay oughertay, oremay elasticay anday ompactcay, anday angesray omfray eightay oray entay otay elvetway anday ifteenfay inchesay inay icknessthay. 

Ownay, oweverhay eposterouspray itay aymay atay irstfay eemsay otay alktay ofay anyay eature’scray inskay asay eingbay ofay atthay ortsay ofay onsistencecay anday icknessthay, etyay inay ointpay ofay actfay esethay areay onay argumentsay againstay uchsay aay esumptionpray; ecausebay ouyay annotcay aiseray anyay otheray enseday envelopingay ayerlay omfray ethay ale’swhay odybay utbay atthay amesay ubberblay; anday ethay outermostay envelopingay ayerlay ofay anyay animalay, ifay easonablyray enseday, atwhay ancay atthay ebay utbay ethay inskay? Uetray, omfray ethay unmarreday eadday odybay ofay ethay alewhay, ouyay aymay apescray offay ithway ouryay andhay anay infinitelyay inthay, ansparenttray ubstancesay, omewhatsay esemblingray ethay innestthay edsshray ofay isinglassay, onlyay itay isay almostay asay exibleflay anday oftsay asay atinsay; atthay isay, eviouspray otay eingbay ieddray, enwhay itay otnay onlyay ontractscay anday ickensthay, utbay ecomesbay atherray ardhay anday ittlebray. IAY avehay everalsay uchsay ieddray itsbay, ichwhay IAY useay orfay arksmay inay myay ale-bookswhay. Itay isay ansparenttray, asay IAY aidsay eforebay; anday eingbay aidlay uponay ethay intedpray agepay, IAY avehay ometimessay easedplay elfmysay ithway ancyingfay itay exerteday aay agnifyingmay influenceay. Atay anyay ateray, itay isay easantplay otay eadray aboutay aleswhay oughthray eirthay ownay ectaclesspay, asay ouyay aymay aysay. Utbay atwhay IAY amay ivingdray atay erehay isay isthay. Atthay amesay infinitelyay inthay, isinglassay ubstancesay, ichwhay, IAY admitay, investsay ethay entireay odybay ofay ethay alewhay, isay otnay osay uchmay otay ebay egardedray asay ethay inskay ofay ethay eaturecray, asay ethay inskay ofay ethay inskay, osay otay eakspay; orfay itay ereway implysay idiculousray otay aysay, atthay ethay operpray inskay ofay ethay emendoustray alewhay isay innerthay anday oremay endertay anthay ethay inskay ofay aay ew-bornnay ildchay. Utbay onay oremay ofay isthay. 

Assumingay ethay ubberblay otay ebay ethay inskay ofay ethay alewhay; enthay, enwhay isthay inskay, asay inay ethay asecay ofay aay eryvay argelay Ermspay Alewhay, illway ieldyay ethay ulkbay ofay oneay undredhay arrelsbay ofay oilay; anday, enwhay itay isay onsideredcay atthay, inay uantityqay, oray atherray eightway, atthay oilay, inay itsay expresseday atestay, isay onlyay eethray ourthsfay, anday otnay ethay entireay ubstancesay ofay ethay oatcay; omesay ideaay aymay encehay ebay adhay ofay ethay enormousnessay ofay atthay animateday assmay, aay eremay artpay ofay osewhay eremay integumentay ieldsyay uchsay aay akelay ofay iquidlay asay atthay. Eckoningray entay arrelsbay otay ethay ontay, ouyay avehay entay onstay orfay ethay etnay eightway ofay onlyay eethray uartersqay ofay ethay uffstay ofay ethay ale’swhay inskay. 

Inay ifelay, ethay isiblevay urfacesay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay otnay ethay eastlay amongay ethay anymay arvelsmay ehay esentspray. Almostay invariablyay itay isay allay overay obliquelyay ossedcray anday e-crossedray ithway umberlessnay aightstray arksmay inay ickthay arrayay, omethingsay ikelay osethay inay ethay inestfay Italianay inelay engravingsay. Utbay esethay arksmay oday otnay eemsay otay ebay impresseday uponay ethay isinglassay ubstancesay aboveay entionedmay, utbay eemsay otay ebay eensay oughthray itay, asay ifay eythay ereway engraveday uponay ethay odybay itselfay. Ornay isay isthay allay. Inay omesay instancesay, otay ethay uickqay, observantay eyeay, osethay inearlay arksmay, asay inay aay eritablevay engravingay, utbay afforday ethay oundgray orfay arfay otheray elineationsday. Esethay areay ieroglyphicalhay; atthay isay, ifay ouyay allcay osethay eriousmystay erscyphay onay ethay allsway ofay amidspyray ieroglyphicshay, enthay atthay isay ethay operpray ordway otay useay inay ethay esentpray onnexioncay. Byay myay etentiveray emorymay ofay ethay ieroglyphicshay uponay oneay Ermspay Alewhay inay articularpay, IAY asway uchmay uckstray ithway aay ateplay epresentingray ethay olday Indianay aracterschay iselledchay onay ethay amousfay ieroglyphichay alisadespay onay ethay anksbay ofay ethay Upperay Ississippimay. Ikelay osethay icmystay ocksray, ootay, ethay ic-markedmystay alewhay emainsray undecipherableay. Isthay allusionay otay ethay Indianay ocksray emindsray emay ofay anotheray ingthay. Esidesbay allay ethay otheray enomenaphay ichwhay ethay exterioray ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay esentspray, ehay otnay eldomsay isplaysday ethay ackbay, anday oremay especiallyay ishay anksflay, effaceday inay eatgray artpay ofay ethay egularray inearlay appearanceay, byay easonray ofay umerousnay uderay atchesscray, altogetheray ofay anay irregularay, andomray aspectay. IAY ouldshay aysay atthay osethay Ewnay Englanday ocksray onay ethay ea-coastsay, ichwhay Agassizay imaginesay otay earbay ethay arksmay ofay iolentvay apingscray ontactcay ithway astvay oatingflay icebergs—Iay ouldshay aysay, atthay osethay ocksray ustmay otnay aay ittlelay esembleray ethay Ermspay Alewhay inay isthay articularpay. Itay alsoay eemssay otay emay atthay uchsay atchesscray inay ethay alewhay areay obablypray ademay byay ostilehay ontactcay ithway otheray aleswhay; orfay IAY avehay ostmay emarkedray emthay inay ethay argelay, ull-grownfay ullsbay ofay ethay eciesspay. 

AAY ordway oray otway oremay oncerningcay isthay attermay ofay ethay inskay oray ubberblay ofay ethay alewhay. Itay ashay alreadyay eenbay aidsay, atthay itay isay iptstray omfray imhay inay onglay iecespay, alledcay anket-piecesblay. Ikelay ostmay ea-termssay, isthay oneay isay eryvay appyhay anday ignificantsay. Orfay ethay alewhay isay indeeday aptwray upay inay ishay ubberblay asay inay aay ealray anketblay oray ounterpanecay; oray, illstay etterbay, anay Indianay onchopay iptslay overay ishay eadhay, anday irtingskay ishay extremityay. Itay isay byay easonray ofay isthay osycay anketingblay ofay ishay odybay, atthay ethay alewhay isay enableday otay eepkay imselfhay omfortablecay inay allay eathersway, inay allay eassay, imestay, anday idestay. Atwhay ouldway ecomebay ofay aay Eenlandgray alewhay, aysay, inay osethay udderingshay, icyay eassay ofay ethay Orthnay, ifay unsupplieday ithway ishay osycay urtoutsay? Uetray, otheray ishfay areay oundfay exceedinglyay iskbray inay osethay Erboreanhypay atersway; utbay esethay, ebay itay observeday, areay ouryay old-bloodedcay, unglesslay ishfay, osewhay eryvay elliesbay areay efrigeratorsray; eaturescray, atthay armway emselvesthay underay ethay eelay ofay anay icebergay, asay aay avellertray inay interway ouldway askbay eforebay anay innay irefay; ereaswhay, ikelay anmay, ethay alewhay ashay ungslay anday armway oodblay. Eezefray ishay oodblay, anday ehay iesday. Owhay onderfulway isay itay en—exceptthay afteray explanation—thatay isthay eatgray onstermay, otay omwhay orporealcay armthway isay asay indispensableay asay itay isay otay anmay; owhay onderfulway atthay ehay ouldshay ebay oundfay atay omehay, immerseday otay ishay ipslay orfay ifelay inay osethay Arcticay atersway! erewhay, enwhay eamensay allfay overboarday, eythay areay ometimessay oundfay, onthsmay afterwardsay, erpendicularlypay ozenfray intoay ethay eartshay ofay ieldsfay ofay iceay, asay aay flyay isay oundfay uedglay inay amberay. Utbay oremay urprisingsay isay itay otay owknay, asay ashay eenbay ovedpray byay experimentay, atthay ethay oodblay ofay aay Olarpay alewhay isay armerway anthay atthay ofay aay Orneobay egronay inay ummersay. 

Itay oesday eemsay otay emay, atthay ereinhay eway eesay ethay areray irtuevay ofay aay ongstray individualay italityvay, anday ethay areray irtuevay ofay ickthay allsway, anday ethay areray irtuevay ofay interioray aciousnessspay. Ohay, anmay! admireay anday odelmay elfthysay afteray ethay alewhay! Oday outhay, ootay, emainray armway amongay iceay. Oday outhay, ootay, ivelay inay isthay orldway ithoutway eingbay ofay itay. Ebay oolcay atay ethay equatoray; eepkay thyay oodblay uidflay atay ethay Olepay. Ikelay ethay eatgray omeday ofay Stay. Eter’spay, anday ikelay ethay eatgray alewhay, etainray, OAY anmay! inay allay easonssay aay emperaturetay ofay inethay ownay. 

Utbay owhay easyay anday owhay opelesshay otay eachtay esethay inefay ingsthay! Ofay erectionsay, owhay ewfay areay omedday ikelay Stay. Eter’spay! ofay eaturescray, owhay ewfay astvay asay ethay alewhay! 



APTERCHAY 69ay. Ethay Uneralfay. 

aul“Hay inay ethay ainschay! Etlay ethay arcasecay ogay astern!”ay 

Ethay astvay acklestay avehay ownay oneday eirthay utyday. Ethay eeledpay itewhay odybay ofay ethay eheadedbay alewhay ashesflay ikelay aay arblemay epulchresay; oughthay angedchay inay uehay, itay ashay otnay erceptiblypay ostlay anythingay inay ulkbay. Itay isay illstay olossalcay. Owlyslay itay oatsflay oremay anday oremay awayay, ethay aterway oundray itay orntay anday ashedsplay byay ethay insatiateay arksshay, anday ethay airay aboveay exedvay ithway apaciousray ightsflay ofay eamingscray owlsfay, osewhay eaksbay areay ikelay osay anymay insultingay oniardspay inay ethay alewhay. Ethay astvay itewhay eadlesshay antomphay oatsflay urtherfay anday urtherfay omfray ethay ipshay, anday everyay odray atthay itay osay oatsflay, atwhay eemsay uaresqay oodsray ofay arksshay anday ubiccay oodsray ofay owlsfay, augmentay ethay urderousmay inday. Orfay ourshay anday ourshay omfray ethay almostay ationarystay ipshay atthay ideoushay ightsay isay eensay. Eneathbay ethay uncloudeday anday ildmay azureay skyay, uponay ethay airfay acefay ofay ethay easantplay easay, aftedway byay ethay oyousjay eezesbray, atthay eatgray assmay ofay eathday oatsflay onay anday onay, illtay ostlay inay infiniteay erspectivespay. 

Ere’sthay aay ostmay olefulday anday ostmay ockingmay uneralfay! Ethay ea-vulturessay allay inay iouspay ourningmay, ethay air-sharksay allay unctiliouslypay inay ackblay oray eckledspay. Inay ifelay utbay ewfay ofay emthay ouldway avehay elpedhay ethay alewhay, IAY eenway, ifay eradventurepay ehay adhay eedednay itay; utbay uponay ethay anquetbay ofay ishay uneralfay eythay ostmay iouslypay oday ouncepay. Ohay, orriblehay ultureismvay ofay earthay! omfray ichwhay otnay ethay ightiestmay alewhay isay eefray. 

Ornay isay isthay ethay enday. Esecratedday asay ethay odybay isay, aay engefulvay ostghay urvivessay anday overshay overay itay otay arescay. Espieday byay omesay imidtay an-of-warmay oray underingblay iscovery-vesselday omfray afaray, enwhay ethay istanceday obscuringay ethay armingsway owlsfay, everthelessnay illstay owsshay ethay itewhay assmay oatingflay inay ethay unsay, anday ethay itewhay ayspray eavinghay ighhay againstay itay; aightwaystray ethay ale’swhay unharmingay orpsecay, ithway emblingtray ingersfay isay etsay ownday inay ethay og—_shoalslay, ocksray, anday eakersbray ereaboutshay: ewarebay!_ Anday orfay earsyay afterwardsay, erhapspay, ipsshay unshay ethay aceplay; eapinglay overay itay asay illysay eepshay eaplay overay aay acuumvay, ecausebay eirthay eaderlay originallyay eapedlay erethay enwhay aay ickstay asway eldhay. Ere’sthay ouryay awlay ofay ecedentspray; ere’sthay ouryay utilityay ofay aditionstray; ere’sthay ethay orystay ofay ouryay obstinateay urvivalsay ofay olday eliefsbay evernay ottomedbay onay ethay earthay, anday ownay otnay evenay overinghay inay ethay airay! Ere’sthay orthodoxyay! 

Usthay, ilewhay inay ifelay ethay eatgray ale’swhay odybay aymay avehay eenbay aay ealray errortay otay ishay oesfay, inay ishay eathday ishay ostghay ecomesbay aay owerlesspay anicpay otay aay orldway. 

Areay ouyay aay elieverbay inay ostsghay, myay iendfray? Erethay areay otheray ostsghay anthay ethay Ock-lanecay oneay, anday arfay eeperday enmay anthay Octorday Ohnsonjay owhay elievebay inay emthay. 



APTERCHAY 70ay. Ethay Sphynxay. 

Itay ouldshay otnay avehay eenbay omitteday atthay eviouspray otay ompletelycay ippingstray ethay odybay ofay ethay eviathanlay, ehay asway eheadedbay. Ownay, ethay eheadingbay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay aay ientificscay anatomicalay eatfay, uponay ichwhay experienceday alewhay urgeonssay eryvay uchmay idepray emselvesthay: anday otnay ithoutway easonray. 

Onsidercay atthay ethay alewhay ashay othingnay atthay ancay operlypray ebay alledcay aay ecknay; onay ethay ontrarycay, erewhay ishay eadhay anday odybay eemsay otay oinjay, erethay, inay atthay eryvay aceplay, isay ethay ickestthay artpay ofay imhay. Ememberray, alsoay, atthay ethay urgeonsay ustmay operateay omfray aboveay, omesay eightay oray entay eetfay interveningay etweenbay imhay anday ishay ubjectsay, anday atthay ubjectsay almostay iddenhay inay aay iscolouredday, ollingray, anday oftentimesay umultuoustay anday urstingbay easay. Earbay inay indmay, ootay, atthay underay esethay untowarday ircumstancescay ehay ashay otay utcay anymay eetfay eepday inay ethay eshflay; anday inay atthay ubterraneoussay annermay, ithoutway osay uchmay asay ettinggay oneay inglesay eeppay intoay ethay ever-contractingay ashgay usthay ademay, ehay ustmay ilfullyskay eerstay earclay ofay allay adjacentay, interdicteday artspay, anday exactlyay ivideday ethay inespay atay aay iticalcray ointpay ardhay byay itsay insertionay intoay ethay ullskay. Oday ouyay otnay arvelmay, enthay, atay Ubb’sstay oastbay, atthay ehay emandedday utbay entay inutesmay otay eheadbay aay ermspay alewhay? 

Enwhay irstfay everedsay, ethay eadhay isay oppeddray asternay anday eldhay erethay byay aay ablecay illtay ethay odybay isay ippedstray. Atthay oneday, ifay itay elongbay otay aay allsmay alewhay itay isay oistedhay onay eckday otay ebay eliberatelyday isposedday ofay. Utbay, ithway aay ullfay owngray eviathanlay isthay isay impossibleay; orfay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay embracesay earlynay oneay irdthay ofay ishay entireay ulkbay, anday ompletelycay otay uspendsay uchsay aay urdenbay asay atthay, evenay byay ethay immenseay acklestay ofay aay alerwhay, isthay ereway asay ainvay aay ingthay asay otay attemptay eighingway aay Utchday arnbay inay ewellers’jay alesscay. 

Ethay Equod’spay alewhay eingbay ecapitatedday anday ethay odybay ippedstray, ethay eadhay asway oistedhay againstay ethay ip’sshay ide—aboutsay alfhay ayway outay ofay ethay easay, osay atthay itay ightmay etyay inay eatgray artpay ebay uoyedbay upay byay itsay ativenay elementay. Anday erethay ithway ethay ainedstray aftcray eeplystay eaninglay overay otay itay, byay easonray ofay ethay enormousay ownwardday agdray omfray ethay owerlay ast-headmay, anday everyay ard-armyay onay atthay idesay ojectingpray ikelay aay anecray overay ethay avesway; erethay, atthay ood-drippingblay eadhay unghay otay ethay Equod’spay aistway ikelay ethay iantgay Olofernes’shay omfray ethay irdlegay ofay Udithjay. 

Enwhay isthay astlay asktay asway accomplisheday itay asway oonnay, anday ethay eamensay entway elowbay otay eirthay innerday. Ilencesay eignedray overay ethay eforebay umultuoustay utbay ownay esertedday eckday. Anay intenseay oppercay almcay, ikelay aay universalay ellowyay otuslay, asway oremay anday oremay unfoldingay itsay oiselessnay easurelessmay eaveslay uponay ethay easay. 

AAY ortshay acespay elapseday, anday upay intoay isthay oiselessnessnay amecay Ahabay aloneay omfray ishay abincay. Akingtay aay ewfay urnstay onay ethay uarter-deckqay, ehay ausedpay otay azegay overay ethay idesay, enthay owlyslay ettinggay intoay ethay ain-chainsmay ehay ooktay Ubb’sstay onglay ade—stillspay emainingray erethay afteray ethay ale’swhay ecapitation—andday ikingstray itay intoay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay alf-suspendedhay assmay, acedplay itsay otheray enday utch-wisecray underay oneay armay, anday osay oodstay eaninglay overay ithway eyesay attentivelyay ixedfay onay isthay eadhay. 

Itay asway aay ackblay anday oodedhay eadhay; anday anginghay erethay inay ethay idstmay ofay osay intenseay aay almcay, itay eemedsay ethay Sphynx’say inay ethay esertday. eak“Spay, outhay astvay anday enerablevay ead,”hay utteredmay Ahabay, ich“whay, oughthay ungarnisheday ithway aay eardbay, etyay erehay anday erethay ookestlay oaryhay ithway ossesmay; eakspay, ightymay eadhay, anday elltay usay ethay ecretsay ingthay atthay isay inay eethay. Ofay allay iversday, outhay asthay ivedday ethay eepestday. Atthay eadhay uponay ichwhay ethay upperay unsay ownay eamsglay, ashay ovedmay amiday isthay orld’sway oundationsfay. Erewhay unrecordeday amesnay anday aviesnay ustray, anday untolday opeshay anday anchorsay otray; erewhay inay erhay urderousmay oldhay isthay igatefray earthay isay allastedbay ithway onesbay ofay illionsmay ofay ethay owneddray; erethay, inay atthay awfulay ater-landway, erethay asway thyay ostmay amiliarfay omehay. Outhay asthay eenbay erewhay ellbay oray iverday evernay entway; asthay eptslay byay anymay aay ailor’ssay idesay, erewhay eeplessslay othersmay ouldway ivegay eirthay iveslay otay aylay emthay ownday. Outhay aw’stsay ethay ockedlay overslay enwhay eapinglay omfray eirthay amingflay ipshay; earthay otay earthay eythay anksay eneathbay ethay exultingay aveway; uetray otay eachay otheray, enwhay eavenhay eemedsay alsefay otay emthay. Outhay aw’stsay ethay urderedmay atemay enwhay ossedtay byay iratespay omfray ethay idnightmay eckday; orfay ourshay ehay ellfay intoay ethay eeperday idnightmay ofay ethay insatiateay awmay; anday ishay urderersmay illstay ailedsay onay unharmed—whileay iftsway ightningslay iveredshay ethay eighboringnay ipshay atthay ouldway avehay ornebay aay ighteousray usbandhay otay outstretcheday, onginglay armsay. OAY eadhay! outhay asthay eensay enoughay otay itsplay ethay anetsplay anday akemay anay infidelay ofay Abrahamay, anday otnay oneay ablesyllay isay ine!”thay 

ail“Say o!”hay iedcray aay iumphanttray oicevay omfray ethay ain-mast-headmay. 

Aye“ay? Ellway, ownay, at’sthay eering,”chay iedcray Ahabay, uddenlysay erectingay imselfhay, ilewhay olewhay under-cloudsthay eptsway asideay omfray ishay owbray. at“Thay ivelylay cryay uponay isthay eadlyday almcay ightmay almostay onvertcay aay etterbay an.—Wheremay away?”ay 

ee“Thray ointspay onay ethay arboardstay owbay, irsay, anday ingingbray ownday erhay eezebray otay usay! 

etter“Bay anday etterbay, anmay. Ouldway ownay Stay. Aulpay ouldway omecay alongay atthay ayway, anday otay myay eezelessnessbray ingbray ishay eezebray! OAY Aturenay, anday OAY oulsay ofay anmay! owhay arfay eyondbay allay utteranceay areay ouryay inkedlay analogiesay! otnay ethay allestsmay atomay irsstay oray iveslay onay attermay, utbay ashay itsay unningcay uplicateday inay ind.”may 



APTERCHAY 71ay. Ethay Eroboam’sjay Orystay. 

Andhay inay andhay, ipshay anday eezebray ewblay onay; utbay ethay eezebray amecay asterfay anthay ethay ipshay, anday oonsay ethay Equodpay eganbay otay ockray. 

Byay anday byay, oughthray ethay assglay ethay anger’sstray oatsbay anday annedmay ast-headsmay ovedpray erhay aay ale-shipwhay. Utbay asay eshay asway osay arfay otay indwardway, anday ootingshay byay, apparentlyay akingmay aay assagepay otay omesay otheray oundgray, ethay Equodpay ouldcay otnay opehay otay eachray erhay. Osay ethay ignalsay asway etsay otay eesay atwhay esponseray ouldway ebay ademay. 

Erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay ikelay ethay esselsvay ofay ilitarymay arinesmay, ethay ipsshay ofay ethay Americanay Alewhay Eetflay avehay eachay aay ivatepray ignalsay; allay ichwhay ignalssay eingbay ollectedcay inay aay ookbay ithway ethay amesnay ofay ethay espectiveray esselsvay attacheday, everyay aptaincay isay ovidedpray ithway itay. Erebythay, ethay alewhay ommanderscay areay enableday otay ecogniseray eachay otheray uponay ethay oceanay, evenay atay onsiderablecay istancesday anday ithway onay allsmay acilityfay. 

Ethay Equod’spay ignalsay asway atay astlay espondedray otay byay ethay anger’sstray ettingsay erhay ownay; ichwhay ovedpray ethay ipshay otay ebay ethay Eroboamjay ofay Antucketnay. Uaringsqay erhay ardsyay, eshay orebay ownday, angedray abeamay underay ethay Equod’spay eelay, anday oweredlay aay oatbay; itay oonsay ewdray ighnay; utbay, asay ethay ide-laddersay asway eingbay iggedray byay Arbuck’sstay orderay otay accommodateay ethay isitingvay aptaincay, ethay angerstray inay uestionqay avedway ishay andhay omfray ishay oat’sbay ernstay inay okentay ofay atthay oceedingpray eingbay entirelyay unnecessaryay. Itay urnedtay outay atthay ethay Eroboamjay adhay aay alignantmay epidemicay onay oardbay, anday atthay Ayhewmay, erhay aptaincay, asway earfulfay ofay infectingay ethay Equod’spay ompanycay. Orfay, oughthay imselfhay anday oat’sbay ewcray emainedray untainteday, anday oughthay ishay ipshay asway alfhay aay ifle-shotray offay, anday anay incorruptibleay easay anday airay ollingray anday owingflay etweenbay; etyay onscientiouslycay adheringay otay ethay imidtay uarantineqay ofay ethay andlay, ehay eremptorilypay efusedray otay omecay intoay irectday ontactcay ithway ethay Equodpay. 

Utbay isthay idday byay onay eansmay eventpray allay ommunicationscay. Eservingpray anay intervalay ofay omesay ewfay ardsyay etweenbay itselfay anday ethay ipshay, ethay Eroboam’sjay oatbay byay ethay occasionalay useay ofay itsay oarsay ontrivedcay otay eepkay arallelpay otay ethay Equodpay, asay eshay eavilyhay orgedfay oughthray ethay easay or(fay byay isthay imetay itay ewblay eryvay eshfray), ithway erhay ain-topsailmay abackay; oughthay, indeeday, atay imestay byay ethay uddensay onsetay ofay aay argelay ollingray aveway, ethay oatbay ouldway ebay ushedpay omesay ayway aheaday; utbay ouldway ebay oonsay ilfullyskay oughtbray otay erhay operpray earingsbay againay. Ubjectsay otay isthay, anday otheray ethay ikelay interruptionsay ownay anday enthay, aay onversationcay asway ustainedsay etweenbay ethay otway artiespay; utbay atay intervalsay otnay ithoutway illstay anotheray interruptionay ofay aay eryvay ifferentday ortsay. 

Ullingpay anay oaray inay ethay Eroboam’sjay oatbay, asway aay anmay ofay aay ingularsay appearanceay, evenay inay atthay ildway alingwhay ifelay erewhay individualay otabilitiesnay akemay upay allay otalitiestay. Ehay asway aay allsmay, ortshay, oungishyay anmay, inkledspray allay overay ishay acefay ithway ecklesfray, anday earingway edundantray ellowyay airhay. AAY ong-skirtedlay, abalistically-cutcay oatcay ofay aay adedfay alnutway ingetay envelopeday imhay; ethay overlappingay eevesslay ofay ichwhay ereway olledray upay onay ishay istswray. AAY eepday, ettledsay, anaticfay eliriumday asway inay ishay eyesay. 

Osay oonsay asay isthay igurefay adhay eenbay irstfay escriedday, Ubbstay adhay exclaimed—“That’say ehay! at’sthay e!—thehay ong-toggedlay aramouchscay ethay Own-ho’stay ompanycay oldtay usay of!”ay Ubbstay erehay alludeday otay aay angestray orystay oldtay ofay ethay Eroboamjay, anday aay ertaincay anmay amongay erhay ewcray, omesay imetay eviouspray enwhay ethay Equodpay okespay ethay Own-hotay. Accordingay otay isthay accountay anday atwhay asway ubsequentlysay earnedlay, itay eemedsay atthay ethay aramouchscay inay uestionqay adhay ainedgay aay onderfulway ascendencyay overay almostay everybodyay inay ethay Eroboamjay. Ishay orystay asway isthay: 

Ehay adhay eenbay originallyay urturednay amongay ethay azycray ocietysay ofay Eskyeunanay Akersshay, erewhay ehay adhay eenbay aay eatgray ophetpray; inay eirthay ackedcray, ecretsay eetingsmay avinghay everalsay imestay escendedday omfray eavenhay byay ethay ayway ofay aay ap-doortray, announcingay ethay eedyspay openingay ofay ethay eventhsay ialvay, ichwhay ehay arriedcay inay ishay est-pocketvay; utbay, ichwhay, insteaday ofay ontainingcay unpowdergay, asway upposedsay otay ebay argedchay ithway audanumlay. AAY angestray, apostolicay imwhay avinghay eizedsay imhay, ehay adhay eftlay Eskyeunanay orfay Antucketnay, erewhay, ithway atthay unningcay eculiarpay otay azinesscray, ehay assumeday aay eadystay, ommon-sensecay exterioray, anday offereday imselfhay asay aay een-handgray andidatecay orfay ethay Eroboam’sjay alingwhay oyagevay. Eythay engageday imhay; utbay aightwaystray uponay ethay ip’sshay ettinggay outay ofay ightsay ofay andlay, ishay insanityay okebray outay inay aay eshetfray. Ehay announceday imselfhay asay ethay archangelay Abrielgay, anday ommandedcay ethay aptaincay otay umpjay overboarday. Ehay ublishedpay ishay anifestomay, erebywhay ehay etsay imselfhay orthfay asay ethay elivererday ofay ethay islesay ofay ethay easay anday icar-generalvay ofay allay Oceanicaay. Ethay unflinchingay earnestnessay ithway ichwhay ehay eclaredday esethay ings;—thethay arkday, aringday ayplay ofay ishay eeplessslay, exciteday imaginationay, anday allay ethay eternaturalpray errorstay ofay ealray eliriumday, uniteday otay investay isthay Abrielgay inay ethay indsmay ofay ethay ajoritymay ofay ethay ignorantay ewcray, ithway anay atmosphereay ofay acrednesssay. Oreovermay, eythay ereway afraiday ofay imhay. Asay uchsay aay anmay, oweverhay, asway otnay ofay uchmay acticalpray useay inay ethay ipshay, especiallyay asay ehay efusedray otay orkway exceptay enwhay ehay easedplay, ethay incredulousay aptaincay ouldway ainfay avehay eenbay idray ofay imhay; utbay appriseday atthay atthay individual’say intentionay asway otay andlay imhay inay ethay irstfay onvenientcay ortpay, ethay archangelay orthwithfay openeday allay ishay ealssay anday ials—devotingvay ethay ipshay anday allay andshay otay unconditionalay erditionpay, inay asecay isthay intentionay asway arriedcay outay. Osay onglystray idday ehay orkway uponay ishay isciplesday amongay ethay ewcray, atthay atay astlay inay aay odybay eythay entway otay ethay aptaincay anday oldtay imhay ifay Abrielgay asway entsay omfray ethay ipshay, otnay aay anmay ofay emthay ouldway emainray. Ehay asway ereforethay orcedfay otay elinquishray ishay anplay. Ornay ouldway eythay ermitpay Abrielgay otay ebay anyay ayway altreatedmay, aysay oray oday atwhay ehay ouldway; osay atthay itay amecay otay asspay atthay Abrielgay adhay ethay ompletecay eedomfray ofay ethay ipshay. Ethay onsequencecay ofay allay isthay asway, atthay ethay archangelay aredcay ittlelay oray othingnay orfay ethay aptaincay anday atesmay; anday incesay ethay epidemicay adhay okenbray outay, ehay arriedcay aay igherhay andhay anthay everay; eclaringday atthay ethay agueplay, asay ehay alledcay itay, asway atay ishay olesay ommandcay; ornay ouldshay itay ebay ayedstay utbay accordingay otay ishay oodgay easureplay. Ethay ailorssay, ostlymay oorpay evilsday, ingedcray, anday omesay ofay emthay awnedfay eforebay imhay; inay obedienceay otay ishay instructionsay, ometimessay enderingray imhay ersonalpay omagehay, asay otay aay odgay. Uchsay ingsthay aymay eemsay incredibleay; utbay, oweverhay ondrousway, eythay areay uetray. Ornay isay ethay istoryhay ofay anaticsfay alfhay osay ikingstray inay espectray otay ethay easurelessmay elf-deceptionsay ofay ethay anaticfay imselfhay, asay ishay easurelessmay owerpay ofay eceivingday anday edevillingbay osay anymay othersay. Utbay itay isay imetay otay eturnray otay ethay Equodpay. 

I“AY earfay otnay thyay epidemicay, an,”may aidsay Ahabay omfray ethay ulwarksbay, otay Aptaincay Ayhewmay, owhay oodstay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay; ome“cay onay oard.”bay 

Utbay ownay Abrielgay artedstay otay ishay eetfay. 

ink“Thay, inkthay ofay ethay eversfay, ellowyay anday iliousbay! Ewarebay ofay ethay orriblehay ague!”play 

abriel“Gay! Abriel!”gay iedcray Aptaincay Ayhewmay; ou“thay ustmay either—”ay Utbay atthay instantay aay eadlonghay aveway otshay ethay oatbay arfay aheaday, anday itsay eethingssay owneddray allay eechspay. 

ast“Hay outhay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay emandedday Ahabay, enwhay ethay oatbay ifteddray ackbay. 

ink“Thay, inkthay ofay thyay ale-boatwhay, ovenstay anday unksay! Ewarebay ofay ethay orriblehay ail!”tay 

I“AY elltay eethay againay, Abrielgay, at—”thay Utbay againay ethay oatbay oretay aheaday asay ifay aggeddray byay iendsfay. Othingnay asway aidsay orfay omesay omentsmay, ilewhay aay uccessionsay ofay iotousray avesway olledray byay, ichwhay byay oneay ofay osethay occasionalay apricescay ofay ethay eassay ereway umblingtay, otnay eavinghay itay. Eantimemay, ethay oistedhay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay oggedjay aboutay eryvay iolentlyvay, anday Abrielgay asway eensay eyeingay itay ithway atherray oremay apprehensivenessay anthay ishay archangelay aturenay eemedsay otay arrantway. 

Enwhay isthay interludeay asway overay, Aptaincay Ayhewmay eganbay aay arkday orystay oncerningcay Obymay Ickday; otnay, oweverhay, ithoutway equentfray interruptionsay omfray Abrielgay, eneverwhay ishay amenay asway entionedmay, anday ethay azycray easay atthay eemedsay eaguedlay ithway imhay. 

Itay eemedsay atthay ethay Eroboamjay adhay otnay onglay eftlay omehay, enwhay uponay eakingspay aay ale-shipwhay, erhay eoplepay ereway eliablyray appriseday ofay ethay existenceay ofay Obymay Ickday, anday ethay avochay ehay adhay ademay. Eedilygray uckingsay inay isthay intelligenceay, Abrielgay olemnlysay arnedway ethay aptaincay againstay attackingay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, inay asecay ethay onstermay ouldshay ebay eensay; inay ishay ibberinggay insanityay, onouncingpray ethay Itewhay Alewhay otay ebay onay esslay aay eingbay anthay ethay Akershay Odgay incarnateday; ethay Akersshay eceivingray ethay Iblebay. Utbay enwhay, omesay earyay oray otway afterwardsay, Obymay Ickday asway airlyfay ightedsay omfray ethay ast-headsmay, Aceymay, ethay iefchay atemay, urnedbay ithway ardouray otay encounteray imhay; anday ethay aptaincay imselfhay eingbay otnay unwillingay otay etlay imhay avehay ethay opportunityay, espiteday allay ethay archangel’say enunciationsday anday orewarningsfay, Aceymay ucceededsay inay ersuadingpay ivefay enmay otay anmay ishay oatbay. Ithway emthay ehay ushedpay offay; anday, afteray uchmay earyway ullingpay, anday anymay erilouspay, unsuccessfulay onsetsay, ehay atay astlay ucceededsay inay ettinggay oneay ironay astfay. Eantimemay, Abrielgay, ascendingay otay ethay ain-royalmay ast-headmay, asway ossingtay oneay armay inay anticfray esturesgay, anday urlinghay orthfay opheciespray ofay eedyspay oomday otay ethay acrilegioussay assailantsay ofay ishay ivinityday. Ownay, ilewhay Aceymay, ethay atemay, asway andingstay upay inay ishay oat’sbay owbay, anday ithway allay ethay ecklessray energyay ofay ishay ibetray asway entingvay ishay ildway exclamationsay uponay ethay alewhay, anday essayingay otay etgay aay airfay ancechay orfay ishay oisedpay ancelay, olay! aay oadbray itewhay adowshay oseray omfray ethay easay; byay itsay uickqay, anningfay otionmay, emporarilytay akingtay ethay eathbray outay ofay ethay odiesbay ofay ethay oarsmenay. Extnay instantay, ethay ucklesslay atemay, osay ullfay ofay uriousfay ifelay, asway ittensmay odilybay intoay ethay airay, anday akingmay aay onglay arcay inay ishay escentday, ellfay intoay ethay easay atay ethay istanceday ofay aboutay iftyfay ardsyay. Otnay aay ipchay ofay ethay oatbay asway armedhay, ornay aay airhay ofay anyay oarsman’say eadhay; utbay ethay atemay orfay everay anksay. 

Itay isay ellway otay arenthesizepay erehay, atthay ofay ethay atalfay accidentsay inay ethay Erm-whalespay Isheryfay, isthay indkay isay erhapspay almostay asay equentfray asay anyay. Ometimessay, othingnay isay injureday utbay ethay anmay owhay isay usthay annihilateday; ofteneray ethay oat’sbay owbay isay ockedknay offay, oray ethay igh-boardthay, inay ichwhay ethay eadsmanhay andsstay, isay orntay omfray itsay aceplay anday accompaniesay ethay odybay. Utbay angeststray ofay allay isay ethay ircumstancecay, atthay inay oremay instancesay anthay oneay, enwhay ethay odybay ashay eenbay ecoveredray, otnay aay inglesay arkmay ofay iolencevay isay iscernibleday; ethay anmay eingbay arkstay eadday. 

Ethay olewhay alamitycay, ithway ethay allingfay ormfay ofay Aceymay, asway ainlyplay escriedday omfray ethay ipshay. Aisingray aay iercingpay iek—“Theshray ialvay! ethay ial!”vay Abrielgay alledcay offay ethay error-strickentay ewcray omfray ethay urtherfay untinghay ofay ethay alewhay. Isthay erribletay eventay othedclay ethay archangelay ithway addeday influenceay; ecausebay ishay edulouscray isciplesday elievedbay atthay ehay adhay ecificallyspay ore-announcedfay itay, insteaday ofay onlyay akingmay aay eneralgay ophecypray, ichwhay anyay oneay ightmay avehay oneday, anday osay avehay ancedchay otay ithay oneay ofay anymay arksmay inay ethay ideway arginmay alloweday. Ehay ecamebay aay amelessnay errortay otay ethay ipshay. 

Ayhewmay avinghay oncludedcay ishay arrationnay, Ahabay utpay uchsay uestionsqay otay imhay, atthay ethay angerstray aptaincay ouldcay otnay orbearfay inquiringay etherwhay ehay intendeday otay unthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, ifay opportunityay ouldshay offeray. Otay ichwhay Ahabay answered—“Aye.”ay Aightwaystray, enthay, Abrielgay onceay oremay artedstay otay ishay eetfay, aringglay uponay ethay olday anmay, anday ehementlyvay exclaimeday, ithway ownwardday ointedpay inger—“Thinkfay, inkthay ofay ethay asphemer—deadblay, anday ownday ere!—bewarethay ofay ethay asphemer’sblay end!”ay 

Ahabay olidlystay urnedtay asideay; enthay aidsay otay Ayhewmay, aptain“Cay, IAY avehay ustjay ethoughtbay emay ofay myay etter-baglay; erethay isay aay etterlay orfay oneay ofay thyay officersay, ifay IAY istakemay otnay. Arbuckstay, ooklay overay ethay ag.”bay 

Everyay ale-shipwhay akestay outay aay oodlygay umbernay ofay etterslay orfay ariousvay ipsshay, osewhay eliveryday otay ethay ersonspay otay omwhay eythay aymay ebay addresseday, ependsday uponay ethay eremay ancechay ofay encounteringay emthay inay ethay ourfay oceansay. Usthay, ostmay etterslay evernay eachray eirthay arkmay; anday anymay areay onlyay eceivedray afteray attainingay anay ageay ofay otway oray eethray earsyay oray oremay. 

Oonsay Arbuckstay eturnedray ithway aay etterlay inay ishay andhay. Itay asway orelysay umbledtay, ampday, anday overedcay ithway aay ullday, ottedspay, eengray ouldmay, inay onsequencecay ofay eingbay eptkay inay aay arkday ockerlay ofay ethay abincay. Ofay uchsay aay etterlay, Eathday imselfhay ightmay ellway avehay eenbay ethay ost-boypay. 

an’st“Cay otnay eadray it?”ay iedcray Ahabay. ive“Gay itay emay, anmay. Ayeay, ayeay, it’say utbay aay imday awl;—what’sscray is?”thay Asay ehay asway udyingstay itay outay, Arbuckstay ooktay aay onglay utting-spadecay olepay, anday ithway ishay ifeknay ightlyslay itsplay ethay enday, otay insertay ethay etterlay erethay, anday inay atthay ayway, andhay itay otay ethay oatbay, ithoutway itsay omingcay anyay oserclay otay ethay ipshay. 

Eantimemay, Ahabay oldinghay ethay etterlay, utteredmay, “Mray. Ar—yeshay, Mray. Arry—(ahay oman’sway innypay and,—thehay an’smay ifeway, I’llay ager)—Aye—Mrway. Arryhay Aceymay, Ipshay Eroboam;—whyjay it’say Aceymay, anday e’shay ead!”day 

oor“Pay ellowfay! oorpay ellowfay! anday omfray ishay ife,”way ighedsay Ayhewmay; ut“bay etlay emay avehay it.”ay 

ay“Nay, eepkay itay elf,”thysay iedcray Abrielgay otay Ahabay; ou“thay artay oonsay oinggay atthay ay.”way 

urses“Cay ottlethray ee!”thay elledyay Ahabay. aptain“Cay Ayhewmay, andstay byay ownay otay eceiveray it”ay; anday akingtay ethay atalfay issivemay omfray Arbuck’sstay andshay, ehay aughtcay itay inay ethay itslay ofay ethay olepay, anday eachedray itay overay owardstay ethay oatbay. Utbay asay ehay idday osay, ethay oarsmenay expectantlyay esistedday omfray owingray; ethay oatbay ifteddray aay ittlelay owardstay ethay ip’sshay ernstay; osay atthay, asay ifay byay agicmay, ethay etterlay uddenlysay angedray alongay ithway Abriel’sgay eageray andhay. Ehay utchedclay itay inay anay instantay, eizedsay ethay oat-knifebay, anday impalingay ethay etterlay onay itay, entsay itay usthay oadedlay ackbay intoay ethay ipshay. Itay ellfay atay Ahab’say eetfay. Enthay Abrielgay iekedshray outay otay ishay omradescay otay ivegay ayway ithway eirthay oarsay, anday inay atthay annermay ethay utinousmay oatbay apidlyray otshay awayay omfray ethay Equodpay. 

Asay, afteray isthay interludeay, ethay eamensay esumedray eirthay orkway uponay ethay acketjay ofay ethay alewhay, anymay angestray ingsthay ereway intedhay inay eferenceray otay isthay ildway affairay. 



APTERCHAY 72ay. Ethay Onkey-ropemay. 

Inay ethay umultuoustay usinessbay ofay utting-incay anday attendingay otay aay alewhay, erethay isay uchmay unningray ackwardsbay anday orwardsfay amongay ethay ewcray. Ownay andshay areay antedway erehay, anday enthay againay andshay areay antedway erethay. Erethay isay onay ayingstay inay anyay oneay aceplay; orfay atay oneay anday ethay amesay imetay everythingay ashay otay ebay oneday everywhereay. Itay isay uchmay ethay amesay ithway imhay owhay endeavorsay ethay escriptionday ofay ethay enescay. Eway ustmay ownay etraceray ouray ayway aay ittlelay. Itay asway entionedmay atthay uponay irstfay eakingbray oundgray inay ethay ale’swhay ackbay, ethay ubber-hookblay asway inserteday intoay ethay originalay olehay erethay utcay byay ethay adesspay ofay ethay atesmay. Utbay owhay idday osay umsyclay anday eightyway aay assmay asay atthay amesay ookhay etgay ixedfay inay atthay olehay? Itay asway inserteday erethay byay myay articularpay iendfray Ueequegqay, osewhay utyday itay asway, asay arpooneerhay, otay escendday uponay ethay onster’smay ackbay orfay ethay ecialspay urposepay eferredray otay. Utbay inay eryvay anymay asescay, ircumstancescay equireray atthay ethay arpooneerhay allshay emainray onay ethay alewhay illtay ethay olewhay ensingflay oray ippingstray operationay isay oncludedcay. Ethay alewhay, ebay itay observeday, ieslay almostay entirelyay ubmergedsay, exceptingay ethay immediateay artspay operateday uponay. Osay ownday erethay, omesay entay eetfay elowbay ethay evellay ofay ethay eckday, ethay oorpay arpooneerhay oundersflay aboutay, alfhay onay ethay alewhay anday alfhay inay ethay aterway, asay ethay astvay assmay evolvesray ikelay aay ead-milltray eneathbay imhay. Onay ethay occasionay inay uestionqay, Ueequegqay iguredfay inay ethay Ighlandhay ostume—acay irtshay anday ocks—insay ichwhay otay myay eyesay, atay eastlay, ehay appeareday otay uncommonay advantageay; anday onay oneay adhay aay etterbay ancechay otay observeay imhay, asay illway esentlypray ebay eensay. 

Eingbay ethay avage’ssay owsmanbay, atthay isay, ethay ersonpay owhay ulledpay ethay ow-oarbay inay ishay oatbay e(thay econdsay oneay omfray orwardfay), itay asway myay eerfulchay utyday otay attenday uponay imhay ilewhay akingtay atthay ard-scrabblehay amblescray uponay ethay eadday ale’swhay ackbay. Ouyay avehay eensay Italianay organ-boysay oldinghay aay ancing-apeday byay aay onglay ordcay. Ustjay osay, omfray ethay ip’sshay eepstay idesay, idday IAY oldhay Ueequegqay ownday erethay inay ethay easay, byay atwhay isay echnicallytay alledcay inay ethay isheryfay aay onkey-ropemay, attacheday otay aay ongstray ipstray ofay anvascay eltedbay oundray ishay aistway. 

Itay asway aay umorouslyhay erilouspay usinessbay orfay othbay ofay usay. Orfay, eforebay eway oceedpray urtherfay, itay ustmay ebay aidsay atthay ethay onkey-ropemay asway astfay atay othbay endsay; astfay otay Ueequeg’sqay oadbray anvascay eltbay, anday astfay otay myay arrownay eatherlay oneay. Osay atthay orfay etterbay oray orfay orseway, eway otway, orfay ethay imetay, ereway eddedway; anday ouldshay oorpay Ueequegqay inksay otay iseray onay oremay, enthay othbay usageay anday onorhay emandedday, atthay insteaday ofay uttingcay ethay ordcay, itay ouldshay agdray emay ownday inay ishay akeway. Osay, enthay, anay elongateday Iamesesay igaturelay uniteday usay. Ueequegqay asway myay ownay inseparableay intway otherbray; ornay ouldcay IAY anyay ayway etgay idray ofay ethay angerousday iabilitieslay ichwhay ethay empenhay ondbay entaileday. 

Osay onglystray anday etaphysicallymay idday IAY onceivecay ofay myay ituationsay enthay, atthay ilewhay earnestlyay atchingway ishay otionsmay, IAY eemedsay istinctlyday otay erceivepay atthay myay ownay individualityay asway ownay ergedmay inay aay ointjay ockstay ompanycay ofay otway; atthay myay eefray illway adhay eceivedray aay ortalmay oundway; anday atthay another’say istakemay oray isfortunemay ightmay ungeplay innocentay emay intoay unmeriteday isasterday anday eathday. Ereforethay, IAY awsay atthay erehay asway aay ortsay ofay interregnumay inay Ovidencepray; orfay itsay even-handeday equityay evernay ouldcay avehay osay ossgray anay injusticeay. Anday etyay illstay urtherfay ondering—whilepay IAY erkedjay imhay ownay anday enthay omfray etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ipshay, ichwhay ouldway eatenthray otay amjay im—stillhay urtherfay onderingpay, IAY aysay, IAY awsay atthay isthay ituationsay ofay inemay asway ethay ecisepray ituationsay ofay everyay ortalmay atthay eathesbray; onlyay, inay ostmay asescay, ehay, oneay ayway oray otheray, ashay isthay Iamesesay onnexioncay ithway aay uralityplay ofay otheray ortalsmay. Ifay ouryay ankerbay eaksbray, ouyay apsnay; ifay ouryay apothecaryay byay istakemay endssay ouyay oisonpay inay ouryay illspay, ouyay ieday. Uetray, ouyay aymay aysay atthay, byay exceedingay autioncay, ouyay aymay ossiblypay escapeay esethay anday ethay ultitudinousmay otheray evilay anceschay ofay ifelay. Utbay andlehay Ueequeg’sqay onkey-ropemay eedfullyhay asay IAY ouldway, ometimessay ehay erkedjay itay osay, atthay IAY amecay eryvay earnay idingslay overboarday. Ornay ouldcay IAY ossiblypay orgetfay atthay, oday atwhay IAY ouldway, IAY onlyay adhay ethay anagementmay ofay oneay enday ofay itay.* 

e*Thay onkey-ropemay isay oundfay inay allay alerswhay; utbay itay asway onlyay inay ethay Equodpay atthay ethay onkeymay anday ishay olderhay ereway everay iedtay ogethertay. Isthay improvementay uponay ethay originalay usageay asway introduceday byay onay esslay aay anmay anthay Ubbstay, inay orderay otay afforday ethay imperilleday arpooneerhay ethay ongeststray ossiblepay uaranteegay orfay ethay aithfulnessfay anday igilancevay ofay ishay onkey-ropemay olderhay. 

IAY avehay intedhay atthay IAY ouldway oftenay erkjay oorpay Ueequegqay omfray etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ethay ip—whereshay ehay ouldway occasionallyay allfay, omfray ethay incessantay ollingray anday ayingsway ofay othbay. Utbay isthay asway otnay ethay onlyay ammingjay eopardyjay ehay asway exposeday otay. Unappalleday byay ethay assacremay ademay uponay emthay uringday ethay ightnay, ethay arksshay ownay eshlyfray anday oremay eenlykay allureday byay ethay eforebay entpay oodblay ichwhay eganbay otay owflay omfray ethay arcass—thecay abidray eaturescray armedsway oundray itay ikelay eesbay inay aay eehivebay. 

Anday ightray inay amongay osethay arksshay asway Ueequegqay; owhay oftenay ushedpay emthay asideay ithway ishay ounderingflay eetfay. AAY ingthay altogetheray incredibleay ereway itay otnay atthay attracteday byay uchsay eypray asay aay eadday alewhay, ethay otherwiseay iscellaneouslymay arnivorouscay arkshay illway eldomsay ouchtay aay anmay. 

Everthelessnay, itay aymay ellway ebay elievedbay atthay incesay eythay avehay uchsay aay avenousray ingerfay inay ethay iepay, itay isay eemedday utbay iseway otay ooklay arpshay otay emthay. Accordinglyay, esidesbay ethay onkey-ropemay, ithway ichwhay IAY ownay anday enthay erkedjay ethay oorpay ellowfay omfray ootay oseclay aay icinityvay otay ethay awmay ofay atwhay eemedsay aay eculiarlypay erociousfay ark—heshay asway ovidedpray ithway illstay anotheray otectionpray. Uspendedsay overay ethay idesay inay oneay ofay ethay agesstay, Ashtegotay anday Aggooday ontinuallycay ourishedflay overay ishay eadhay aay ouplecay ofay eenkay ale-spadeswhay, erewithwhay eythay aughteredslay asay anymay arksshay asay eythay ouldcay eachray. Isthay ocedurepray ofay eirsthay, otay ebay uresay, asway eryvay isinterestedday anday enevolentbay ofay emthay. Eythay eantmay Ueequeg’sqay estbay appinesshay, IAY admitay; utbay inay eirthay astyhay ealzay otay efriendbay imhay, anday omfray ethay ircumstancecay atthay othbay ehay anday ethay arksshay ereway atay imestay alfhay iddenhay byay ethay ood-muddledblay aterway, osethay indiscreetay adesspay ofay eirsthay ouldway omecay earernay amputatingay aay eglay anthay aay ailtay. Utbay oorpay Ueequegqay, IAY upposesay, ainingstray anday aspinggay erethay ithway atthay eatgray ironay ook—poorhay Ueequegqay, IAY upposesay, onlyay ayedpray otay ishay Ojoyay, anday avegay upay ishay ifelay intoay ethay andshay ofay ishay odsgay. 

Ellway, ellway, myay earday omradecay anday in-brothertway, oughtthay IAY, asay IAY ewdray inay anday enthay ackedslay offay ethay operay otay everyay ellsway ofay ethay ea—whatsay attersmay itay, afteray allay? Areay ouyay otnay ethay eciouspray imageay ofay eachay anday allay ofay usay enmay inay isthay alingwhay orldway? Atthay unsoundeday oceanay ouyay aspgay inay, isay Ifelay; osethay arksshay, ouryay oesfay; osethay adesspay, ouryay iendsfray; anday atwhay etweenbay arksshay anday adesspay ouyay areay inay aay adsay icklepay anday erilpay, oorpay adlay. 

Utbay ouragecay! erethay isay oodgay eerchay inay orestay orfay ouyay, Ueequegqay. Orfay ownay, asay ithway ueblay ipslay anday ood-shotblay eyesay ethay exhausteday avagesay atay astlay imbsclay upay ethay ainschay anday andsstay allay ippingdray anday involuntarilyay emblingtray overay ethay idesay; ethay ewardstay advancesay, anday ithway aay enevolentbay, onsolatorycay anceglay andshay im—whathay? Omesay othay Ognaccay? Onay! andshay imhay, eyay odsgay! andshay imhay aay upcay ofay epidtay ingergay anday aterway! 

inger“Gay? Oday IAY ellsmay inger?”gay uspiciouslysay askeday Ubbstay, omingcay earnay. es“Yay, isthay ustmay ebay inger,”gay eeringpay intoay ethay asay etyay untasteday upcay. Enthay andingstay asay ifay incredulousay orfay aay ilewhay, ehay almlycay alkedway owardstay ethay astonisheday ewardstay owlyslay ayingsay, inger“Gay? ingergay? anday illway ouyay avehay ethay oodnessgay otay elltay emay, Mray. Ough-boyday, erewhay ieslay ethay irtuevay ofay ingergay? Ingergay! isay ingergay ethay ortsay ofay uelfay ouyay useay, Ough-boyday, otay indlekay aay irefay inay isthay iveringshay annibalcay? Inger!—whatgay ethay evilday isay ingergay? Ea-coalsay? irewood?—luciferfay atches?—tinder?—gunpowder?—whatmay ethay evilday isay ingergay, IAY aysay, atthay ouyay offeray isthay upcay otay ouray oorpay Ueequegqay ere.”hay 

ere“Thay isay omesay eakingsnay Emperancetay Ocietysay ovementmay aboutay isthay usiness,”bay ehay uddenlysay addeday, ownay approachingay Arbuckstay, owhay adhay ustjay omecay omfray orwardfay. ill“Way ouyay ooklay atay atthay annakinkay, irsay: ellsmay ofay itay, ifay ouyay ease.”play Enthay atchingway ethay ate’smay ountenancecay, ehay addeday, e“Thay ewardstay, Mray. Arbuckstay, adhay ethay acefay otay offeray atthay alomelcay anday alapjay otay Ueequegqay, erethay, isthay instantay offay ethay alewhay. Isay ethay ewardstay anay apothecaryay, irsay? anday aymay IAY askay etherwhay isthay isay ethay ortsay ofay ittersbay byay ichwhay ehay owsblay ackbay ethay ifelay intoay aay alf-drownedhay an?”may 

I“AY usttray ot,”nay aidsay Arbuckstay, it“ay isay oorpay uffstay enough.”ay 

Aye“ay, ayeay, eward,”stay iedcray Ubbstay, e’ll“way eachtay ouyay otay ugdray aay arpooneerhay; onenay ofay ouryay apothecary’say edicinemay erehay; ouyay antway otay oisonpay usay, oday eyay? Ouyay avehay otgay outay insurancesay onay ouray iveslay anday antway otay urdermay usay allay, anday ocketpay ethay oceedspray, oday e?”yay 

It“ay asway otnay e,”may iedcray Ough-boyday, it“ay asway Auntay Aritychay atthay oughtbray ethay ingergay onay oardbay; anday adebay emay evernay ivegay ethay arpooneershay anyay iritsspay, utbay onlyay isthay inger-jub—sogay eshay alledcay it.”ay 

inger-jub“Gay! ouyay ingerlygay ascalray! aketay atthay! anday unray alongay ithway eyay otay ethay ockerslay, anday etgay omethingsay etterbay. IAY opehay IAY oday onay ongwray, Mray. Arbuckstay. Itay isay ethay aptain’scay orders—grogay orfay ethay arpooneerhay onay aay ale.”whay 

Enough,”“ay epliedray Arbuckstay, only“ay on’tday ithay imhay againay, ut—”bay 

Oh“ay, IAY evernay urthay enwhay IAY ithay, exceptay enwhay IAY ithay aay alewhay oray omethingsay ofay atthay ortsay; anday isthay ellow’sfay aay eazelway. Atwhay ereway ouyay aboutay ayingsay, ir?”say 

Only“ay isthay: ogay ownday ithway imhay, anday etgay atwhay outhay antestway elf.”thysay 

Enwhay Ubbstay eappearedray, ehay amecay ithway aay arkday askflay inay oneay andhay, anday aay ortsay ofay ea-caddytay inay ethay otheray. Ethay irstfay ontainedcay ongstray iritsspay, anday asway andedhay otay Ueequegqay; ethay econdsay asway Auntay Arity’schay iftgay, anday atthay asway eelyfray ivengay otay ethay avesway. 



APTERCHAY 73ay. Ubbstay anday Askflay illkay aay Ightray Alewhay; anday Enthay Avehay aay Alktay overay Imhay. 

Itay ustmay ebay ornebay inay indmay atthay allay isthay imetay eway avehay aay Ermspay Ale’swhay odigiouspray eadhay anginghay otay ethay Equod’spay idesay. Utbay eway ustmay etlay itay ontinuecay anginghay erethay aay ilewhay illtay eway ancay etgay aay ancechay otay attenday otay itay. Orfay ethay esentpray otheray attersmay esspray, anday ethay estbay eway ancay oday ownay orfay ethay eadhay, isay otay aypray eavenhay ethay acklestay aymay oldhay. 

Ownay, uringday ethay astpay ightnay anday orenoonfay, ethay Equodpay adhay aduallygray ifteddray intoay aay easay, ichwhay, byay itsay occasionalay atchespay ofay ellowyay itbray, avegay unusualay okenstay ofay ethay icinityvay ofay Ightray Aleswhay, aay eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay atthay utbay ewfay upposedsay otay ebay atay isthay articularpay imetay urkinglay anywhereay earnay. Anday oughthay allay andshay ommonlycay isdainedday ethay apturecay ofay osethay inferioray eaturescray; anday oughthay ethay Equodpay asway otnay ommissionedcay otay uisecray orfay emthay atay allay, anday oughthay eshay adhay assedpay umbersnay ofay emthay earnay ethay Ozettscray ithoutway oweringlay aay oatbay; etyay ownay atthay aay Ermspay Alewhay adhay eenbay oughtbray alongsideay anday eheadedbay, otay ethay urprisesay ofay allay, ethay announcementay asway ademay atthay aay Ightray Alewhay ouldshay ebay apturedcay atthay ayday, ifay opportunityay offereday. 

Ornay asway isthay onglay antingway. Alltay outsspay ereway eensay otay eewardlay; anday otway oatsbay, Ubb’sstay anday Ask’sflay, ereway etachedday inay ursuitpay. Ullingpay urtherfay anday urtherfay awayay, eythay atay astlay ecamebay almostay invisibleay otay ethay enmay atay ethay ast-headmay. Utbay uddenlysay inay ethay istanceday, eythay awsay aay eatgray eaphay ofay umultuoustay itewhay aterway, anday oonsay afteray ewsnay amecay omfray aloftay atthay oneay oray othbay ethay oatsbay ustmay ebay astfay. Anay intervalay assedpay anday ethay oatsbay ereway inay ainplay ightsay, inay ethay actay ofay eingbay aggeddray ightray owardstay ethay ipshay byay ethay owingtay alewhay. Osay oseclay idday ethay onstermay omecay otay ethay ullhay, atthay atay irstfay itay eemedsay asay ifay ehay eantmay itay alicemay; utbay uddenlysay oinggay ownday inay aay aelstrommay, ithinway eethray odsray ofay ethay anksplay, ehay ollywhay isappearedday omfray iewvay, asay ifay ivingday underay ethay eelkay. ut“Cay, ut!”cay asway ethay cryay omfray ethay ipshay otay ethay oatsbay, ichwhay, orfay oneay instantay, eemedsay onay ethay ointpay ofay eingbay oughtbray ithway aay eadlyday ashday againstay ethay essel’svay idesay. Utbay avinghay entyplay ofay inelay etyay inay ethay ubstay, anday ethay alewhay otnay oundingsay eryvay apidlyray, eythay aidpay outay abundanceay ofay operay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay ulledpay ithway allay eirthay ightmay osay asay otay etgay aheaday ofay ethay ipshay. Orfay aay ewfay inutesmay ethay ugglestray asway intenselyay iticalcray; orfay ilewhay eythay illstay ackedslay outay ethay ightenedtay inelay inay oneay irectionday, anday illstay iedplay eirthay oarsay inay anotheray, ethay ontendingcay ainstray eatenedthray otay aketay emthay underay. Utbay itay asway onlyay aay ewfay eetfay advanceay eythay oughtsay otay aingay. Anday eythay uckstay otay itay illtay eythay idday aingay itay; enwhay instantlyay, aay iftsway emortray asway eltfay unningray ikelay ightninglay alongay ethay eelkay, asay ethay ainedstray inelay, apingscray eneathbay ethay ipshay, uddenlysay oseray otay iewvay underay erhay owsbay, appingsnay anday uiveringqay; anday osay ingingflay offay itsay ippingsdray, atthay ethay opsdray ellfay ikelay itsbay ofay okenbray assglay onay ethay aterway, ilewhay ethay alewhay eyondbay alsoay oseray otay ightsay, anday onceay oremay ethay oatsbay ereway eefray otay flyay. Utbay ethay aggedfay alewhay abateday ishay eedspay, anday indlyblay alteringay ishay oursecay, entway oundray ethay ernstay ofay ethay ipshay owingtay ethay otway oatsbay afteray imhay, osay atthay eythay erformedpay aay ompletecay ircuitcay. 

Eantimemay, eythay auledhay oremay anday oremay uponay eirthay ineslay, illtay oseclay ankingflay imhay onay othbay idessay, Ubbstay answereday Askflay ithway ancelay orfay ancelay; anday usthay oundray anday oundray ethay Equodpay ethay attlebay entway, ilewhay ethay ultitudesmay ofay arksshay atthay adhay eforebay umsway oundray ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay odybay, ushedray otay ethay eshfray oodblay atthay asway illedspay, irstilythay inkingdray atay everyay ewnay ashgay, asay ethay eageray Israelitesay idday atay ethay ewnay urstingbay ountainsfay atthay ouredpay omfray ethay ittensmay ockray. 

Atay astlay ishay outspay ewgray ickthay, anday ithway aay ightfulfray ollray anday omitvay, ehay urnedtay uponay ishay ackbay aay orpsecay. 

Ilewhay ethay otway eadsmenhay ereway engageday inay akingmay astfay ordscay otay ishay ukesflay, anday inay otheray aysway ettinggay ethay assmay inay eadinessray orfay owingtay, omesay onversationcay ensueday etweenbay emthay. 

I“AY onderway atwhay ethay olday anmay antsway ithway isthay umplay ofay oulfay ard,”lay aidsay Ubbstay, otnay ithoutway omesay isgustday atay ethay oughtthay ofay avinghay otay oday ithway osay ignobleay aay eviathanlay. 

ants“Way ithway it?”ay aidsay Askflay, oilingcay omesay arespay inelay inay ethay oat’sbay owbay, id“day ouyay evernay earhay atthay ethay ipshay ichwhay utbay onceay ashay aay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay oistedhay onay erhay arboardstay idesay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay aay Ightray Ale’swhay onay ethay arboardlay; idday ouyay evernay earhay, Ubbstay, atthay atthay ipshay ancay evernay afterwardsay apsize?”cay 

“Whyay otnay? 

I“AY on’tday owknay, utbay IAY eardhay atthay ambogegay ostghay ofay aay Edallahfay ayingsay osay, anday ehay eemssay otay owknay allay aboutay ips’shay armschay. Utbay IAY ometimessay inkthay e’llhay armchay ethay ipshay otay onay oodgay atay astlay. IAY on’tday alfhay ikelay atthay apchay, Ubbstay. Idday ouyay everay oticenay owhay atthay usktay ofay ishay isay aay ortsay ofay arvedcay intoay aay ake’ssnay eadhay, Ubb?”stay 

ink“Say imhay! IAY evernay ooklay atay imhay atay allay; utbay ifay everay IAY etgay aay ancechay ofay aay arkday ightnay, anday ehay andingstay ardhay byay ethay ulwarksbay, anday onay oneay byay; ooklay ownday erethay, Ask”—pointingflay intoay ethay easay ithway aay eculiarpay otionmay ofay othbay ands—“Ayehay, illway IAY! Askflay, IAY aketay atthay Edallahfay otay ebay ethay evilday inay isguiseday. Oday ouyay elievebay atthay ockcay anday ullbay orystay aboutay ishay avinghay eenbay owedstay awayay onay oardbay ipshay? E’shay ethay evilday, IAY aysay. Ethay easonray whyay ouyay on’tday eesay ishay ailtay, isay ecausebay ehay uckstay itay upay outay ofay ightsay; ehay arriescay itay oiledcay awayay inay ishay ocketpay, IAY uessgay. Astblay imhay! ownay atthay IAY inkthay ofay itay, e’shay alwaysay antingway oakumay otay uffstay intoay ethay oestay ofay ishay oots.”bay 

e“Hay eepsslay inay ishay ootsbay, on’tday ehay? Ehay asn’thay otgay anyay ammockhay; utbay I’veay eensay imhay aylay ofay ightsnay inay aay oilcay ofay igging.”ray 

o“Nay oubtday, anday it’say ecausebay ofay ishay ursedcay ailtay; ehay oilscay itay ownday, oday eyay eesay, inay ethay eyeay ofay ethay igging.”ray 

at’s“Whay ethay olday anmay avehay osay uchmay otay oday ithway imhay or?”fay 

iking“Stray upay aay apsway oray aay argainbay, IAY uppose.”say 

argain?—about“Bay at?”whay 

“Whyay, oday eyay eesay, ethay olday anmay isay ardhay entbay afteray atthay Itewhay Alewhay, anday ethay evilday erethay isay ingtryay otay omecay oundray imhay, anday etgay imhay otay apsway awayay ishay ilversay atchway, oray ishay oulsay, oray omethingsay ofay atthay ortsay, anday enthay e’llhay urrendersay Obymay Ick.”day 

ooh“Pay! Ubbstay, ouyay areay arkingskylay; owhay ancay Edallahfay oday at?”thay 

I“AY on’tday owknay, Askflay, utbay ethay evilday isay aay uriouscay apchay, anday aay ickedway oneay, IAY elltay eyay. Whyay, eythay aysay asay owhay ehay entway aay aunteringsay intoay ethay olday ag-shipflay onceay, itchingsway ishay ailtay aboutay evilishday easyay anday entlemanlikegay, anday inquiringay ifay ethay olday overnorgay asway atay omehay. Ellway, ehay asway atay omehay, anday askeday ethay evilday atwhay ehay antedway. Ethay evilday, itchingsway ishay oofshay, upay anday ayssay, I‘AY antway Ohn.’jay at‘Whay or?’fay ayssay ethay olday overnorgay. at‘Whay usinessbay isay atthay ofay ours,’yay ayssay ethay evilday, ettinggay ad,—‘Imay antway otay useay im.’hay ake‘Tay im,’hay ayssay ethay overnor—andgay byay ethay Ordlay, Askflay, ifay ethay evilday idn’tday ivegay Ohnjay ethay Asiaticay olerachay eforebay ehay otgay oughthray ithway imhay, I’llay eatay isthay alewhay inay oneay outhfulmay. Utbay ooklay arp—ain’tshay ouyay allay eadyray erethay? Ellway, enthay, ullpay aheaday, anday et’slay etgay ethay alewhay alongside.”ay 

I“AY inkthay IAY ememberray omesay uchsay orystay asay ouyay ereway elling,”tay aidsay Askflay, enwhay atay astlay ethay otway oatsbay ereway owlyslay advancingay ithway eirthay urdenbay owardstay ethay ipshay, ut“bay IAY an’tcay ememberray ere.”whay 

ee“Thray Aniardsspay? Adventuresay ofay osethay eethray oody-mindedblay oldadoessay? Idday eyay eadray itay erethay, Askflay? IAY uessgay eyay id?”day 

o“Nay: evernay awsay uchsay aay ookbay; eardhay ofay itay, oughthay. Utbay ownay, elltay emay, Ubbstay, oday ouyay upposesay atthay atthay evilday ouyay asway eakingspay ofay ustjay ownay, asway ethay amesay ouyay aysay isay ownay onay oardbay ethay Equod?”pay 

Am“ay IAY ethay amesay anmay atthay elpedhay illkay isthay alewhay? Oesn’tday ethay evilday ivelay orfay everay; owhay everay eardhay atthay ethay evilday asway eadday? Idday ouyay everay eesay anyay arsonpay aay earingway ourningmay orfay ethay evilday? Anday ifay ethay evilday ashay aay atch-keylay otay etgay intoay ethay admiral’say abincay, on’tday ouyay upposesay ehay ancay awlcray intoay aay ortholepay? Elltay emay atthay, Mray. Ask?”flay 

ow“Hay olday oday ouyay upposesay Edallahfay isay, Ubb?”stay 

o“Day ouyay eesay atthay ainmastmay ere?”thay ointingpay otay ethay ipshay; ell“way, at’sthay ethay igurefay oneay; ownay aketay allay ethay oopshay inay ethay Equod’spay oldhay, anday ingstray alongay inay aay owray ithway atthay astmay, orfay oughtsay, oday ouyay eesay; ellway, atthay ouldn’tway eginbay otay ebay Edallah’sfay ageay. Ornay allay ethay ooperscay inay eationcray ouldn’tcay owshay oopshay enoughay otay akemay oughtsay enough.”ay 

ut“Bay eesay erehay, Ubbstay, IAY oughtthay ouyay aay ittlelay oastedbay ustjay ownay, atthay ouyay eantmay otay ivegay Edallahfay aay ea-tosssay, ifay ouyay otgay aay oodgay ancechay. Ownay, ifay e’shay osay olday asay allay osethay oopshay ofay oursyay omecay otay, anday ifay ehay isay oinggay otay ivelay orfay everay, atwhay oodgay illway itay oday otay itchpay imhay overboard—tellay emay atthay? 

ive“Gay imhay aay oodgay uckingday, anyhow.”ay 

ut“Bay e’dhay awlcray ack.”bay 

uck“Day imhay againay; anday eepkay uckingday im.”hay 

uppose“Say ehay ouldshay aketay itay intoay ishay eadhay otay uckday ouyay, ough—yesthay, anday owndray ou—whatyay en?”thay 

I“AY ouldshay ikelay otay eesay imhay tryay itay; I’day ivegay imhay uchsay aay airpay ofay ackblay eyesay atthay ehay ouldn’tway areday otay owshay ishay acefay inay ethay admiral’say abincay againay orfay aay onglay ilewhay, etlay aloneay ownday inay ethay orlopay erethay, erewhay ehay iveslay, anday ereaboutshay onay ethay upperay ecksday erewhay ehay eakssnay osay uchmay. Amnday ethay evilday, Askflay; osay ouyay upposesay I’may afraiday ofay ethay evilday? O’swhay afraiday ofay imhay, exceptay ethay olday overnorgay owhay aresn’tday atchcay imhay anday utpay imhay inay ouble-darbiesday, asay ehay eservesday, utbay etslay imhay ogay aboutay idnappingkay eoplepay; ayeay, anday ignedsay aay ondbay ithway imhay, atthay allay ethay eoplepay ethay evilday idnappedkay, e’dhay oastray orfay imhay? Ere’sthay aay overnor!”gay 

o“Day ouyay upposesay Edallahfay antsway otay idnapkay Aptaincay Ahab?”ay
