o“Day IAY upposesay itay? Ou’llyay owknay itay eforebay onglay, Askflay. Utbay IAY amay oinggay ownay otay eepkay aay arpshay ook-outlay onay imhay; anday ifay IAY eesay anythingay eryvay uspicioussay oinggay onay, I’llay ustjay aketay imhay byay ethay apenay ofay ishay ecknay, anday ay—Looksay erehay, Eelzebubbay, ouyay on’tday oday itay; anday ifay ehay akesmay anyay ussfay, byay ethay Ordlay I’llay akemay aay abgray intoay ishay ocketpay orfay ishay ailtay, aketay itay otay ethay apstancay, anday ivegay imhay uchsay aay enchingwray anday eavinghay, atthay ishay ailtay illway omecay ortshay offay atay ethay ump—dostay ouyay eesay; anday enthay, IAY atherray uessgay enwhay ehay indsfay imselfhay ockedday inay atthay ueerqay ashionfay, e’llhay eaksnay offay ithoutway ethay oorpay atisfactionsay ofay eelingfay ishay ailtay etweenbay ishay egs.”lay 

And“ay atwhay illway ouyay oday ithway ethay ailtay, Ubb?”stay 

o“Day ithway itay? Ellsay itay orfay anay oxay ipwhay enwhay eway etgay ome;—whathay else?”ay 

ow“Nay, oday ouyay eanmay atwhay ouyay aysay, anday avehay eenbay ayingsay allay alongay, Ubb?”stay 

ean“May oray otnay eanmay, erehay eway areay atay ethay ip.”shay 

Ethay oatsbay ereway erehay ailedhay, otay owtay ethay alewhay onay ethay arboardlay idesay, erewhay ukeflay ainschay anday otheray ecessariesnay ereway alreadyay eparedpray orfay ecuringsay imhay. 

idn’t“Day IAY elltay ouyay o?”say aidsay Askflay; es“yay, ou’llyay oonsay eesay isthay ightray ale’swhay eadhay oistedhay upay oppositeay atthay armacetti’s.”pay 

Inay oodgay imetay, Ask’sflay ayingsay ovedpray uetray. Asay eforebay, ethay Equodpay eeplystay eanedlay overay owardstay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay, ownay, byay ethay ounterpoisecay ofay othbay eadshay, eshay egainedray erhay evenay eelkay; oughthay orelysay ainedstray, ouyay aymay ellway elievebay. Osay, enwhay onay oneay idesay ouyay oisthay inay Ocke’slay eadhay, ouyay ogay overay atthay ayway; utbay ownay, onay ethay otheray idesay, oisthay inay Ant’skay anday ouyay omecay ackbay againay; utbay inay eryvay oorpay ightplay. Usthay, omesay indsmay orfay everay eepkay immingtray oatbay. Ohay, eyay oolishfay! owthray allay esethay under-headsthay overboarday, anday enthay ouyay illway oatflay ightlay anday ightray. 

Inay isposingday ofay ethay odybay ofay aay ightray alewhay, enwhay oughtbray alongsideay ethay ipshay, ethay amesay eliminarypray oceedingspray ommonlycay aketay aceplay asay inay ethay asecay ofay aay ermspay alewhay; onlyay, inay ethay atterlay instanceay, ethay eadhay isay utcay offay olewhay, utbay inay ethay ormerfay ethay ipslay anday onguetay areay eparatelysay emovedray anday oistedhay onay eckday, ithway allay ethay ellway ownknay ackblay onebay attacheday otay atwhay isay alledcay ethay own-piececray. Utbay othingnay ikelay isthay, inay ethay esentpray asecay, adhay eenbay oneday. Ethay arcasescay ofay othbay aleswhay adhay oppeddray asternay; anday ethay ead-ladenhay ipshay otnay aay ittlelay esembledray aay ulemay arryingcay aay airpay ofay overburdeningay annierspay. 

Eantimemay, Edallahfay asway almlycay eyeingay ethay ightray ale’swhay eadhay, anday everay anday anonay ancingglay omfray ethay eepday inkleswray erethay otay ethay ineslay inay ishay ownay andhay. Anday Ahabay ancedchay osay otay andstay, atthay ethay Arseepay occupieday ishay adowshay; ilewhay, ifay ethay Arsee’spay adowshay asway erethay atay allay itay eemedsay onlyay otay endblay ithway, anday engthenlay Ahab’say. Asay ethay ewcray oiledtay onay, Aplandishlay eculationsspay ereway andiedbay amongay emthay, oncerningcay allay esethay assingpay ingsthay. 



APTERCHAY 74ay. Ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay Ead—contrastedhay Iewvay. 

Erehay, ownay, areay otway eatgray aleswhay, ayinglay eirthay eadshay ogethertay; etlay usay oinjay emthay, anday aylay ogethertay ouray ownay. 

Ofay ethay andgray orderay ofay oliofay eviathanslay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay anday ethay Ightray Alewhay areay byay arfay ethay ostmay oteworthynay. Eythay areay ethay onlyay aleswhay egularlyray untedhay byay anmay. Otay ethay Antucketernay, eythay esentpray ethay otway extremesay ofay allay ethay ownknay arietiesvay ofay ethay alewhay. Asay ethay externalay ifferenceday etweenbay emthay isay ainlymay observableay inay eirthay eadshay; anday asay aay eadhay ofay eachay isay isthay omentmay anginghay omfray ethay Equod’spay idesay; anday asay eway aymay eelyfray ogay omfray oneay otay ethay otheray, byay erelymay eppingstay acrossay ethay eck:—whereday, IAY ouldshay ikelay otay owknay, illway ouyay obtainay aay etterbay ancechay otay udystay acticalpray etologycay anthay erehay? 

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ouyay areay uckstray byay ethay eneralgay ontrastcay etweenbay esethay eadshay. Othbay areay assivemay enoughay inay allay onsciencecay; utbay erethay isay aay ertaincay athematicalmay etrysymmay inay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay ichwhay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay adlysay ackslay. Erethay isay oremay aracterchay inay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay. Asay ouyay eholdbay itay, ouyay involuntarilyay ieldyay ethay immenseay uperioritysay otay imhay, inay ointpay ofay ervadingpay ignityday. Inay ethay esentpray instanceay, ootay, isthay ignityday isay eightenedhay byay ethay epperpay anday altsay olourcay ofay ishay eadhay atay ethay ummitsay, ivinggay okentay ofay advanceday ageay anday argelay experienceay. Inay ortshay, ehay isay atwhay ethay ishermenfay echnicallytay allcay aay ey-headed“gray ale.”whay 

Etlay usay ownay otenay atwhay isay eastlay issimilarday inay esethay eads—namelyhay, ethay otway ostmay importantay organsay, ethay eyeay anday ethay earay. Arfay ackbay onay ethay idesay ofay ethay eadhay, anday owlay ownday, earnay ethay angleay ofay eitheray ale’swhay awjay, ifay ouyay arrowlynay earchsay, ouyay illway atay astlay eesay aay ashlesslay eyeay, ichwhay ouyay ouldway ancyfay otay ebay aay oungyay olt’scay eyeay; osay outay ofay allay oportionpray isay itay otay ethay agnitudemay ofay ethay eadhay. 

Ownay, omfray isthay eculiarpay idewaysay ositionpay ofay ethay ale’swhay eyesay, itay isay ainplay atthay ehay ancay evernay eesay anay objectay ichwhay isay exactlyay aheaday, onay oremay anthay ehay ancay oneay exactlyay asternay. Inay aay ordway, ethay ositionpay ofay ethay ale’swhay eyesay orrespondscay otay atthay ofay aay an’smay earsay; anday ouyay aymay ancyfay, orfay ourselfyay, owhay itay ouldway arefay ithway ouyay, idday ouyay idewayssay urveysay objectsay oughthray ouryay earsay. Ouyay ouldway indfay atthay ouyay ouldcay onlyay ommandcay omesay irtythay egreesday ofay isionvay inay advanceay ofay ethay aightstray ide-linesay ofay ightsay; anday aboutay irtythay oremay ehindbay itay. Ifay ouryay itterestbay oefay ereway alkingway aightstray owardstay ouyay, ithway aggerday uplifteday inay oadbray ayday, ouyay ouldway otnay ebay ableay otay eesay imhay, anyay oremay anthay ifay ehay ereway ealingstay uponay ouyay omfray ehindbay. Inay aay ordway, ouyay ouldway avehay otway acksbay, osay otay eakspay; utbay, atay ethay amesay imetay, alsoay, otway ontsfray ide(say ontsfray): orfay atwhay isay itay atthay akesmay ethay ontfray ofay aay an—whatmay, indeeday, utbay ishay eyesay? 

Oreovermay, ilewhay inay ostmay otheray animalsay atthay IAY ancay ownay inkthay ofay, ethay eyesay areay osay antedplay asay imperceptiblyay otay endblay eirthay isualvay owerpay, osay asay otay oducepray oneay icturepay anday otnay otway otay ethay ainbray; ethay eculiarpay ositionpay ofay ethay ale’swhay eyesay, effectuallyay ividedday asay eythay areay byay anymay ubiccay eetfay ofay olidsay eadhay, ichwhay owerstay etweenbay emthay ikelay aay eatgray ountainmay eparatingsay otway akeslay inay alleysvay; isthay, ofay oursecay, ustmay ollywhay eparatesay ethay impressionsay ichwhay eachay independentay organay impartsay. Ethay alewhay, ereforethay, ustmay eesay oneay istinctday icturepay onay isthay idesay, anday anotheray istinctday icturepay onay atthay idesay; ilewhay allay etweenbay ustmay ebay ofoundpray arknessday anday othingnessnay otay imhay. Anmay aymay, inay effectay, ebay aidsay otay ooklay outay onay ethay orldway omfray aay entry-boxsay ithway otway oinedjay ashessay orfay ishay indowway. Utbay ithway ethay alewhay, esethay otway ashessay areay eparatelysay inserteday, akingmay otway istinctday indowsway, utbay adlysay impairingay ethay iewvay. Isthay eculiaritypay ofay ethay ale’swhay eyesay isay aay ingthay alwaysay otay ebay ornebay inay indmay inay ethay isheryfay; anday otay ebay ememberedray byay ethay eaderray inay omesay ubsequentsay enesscay. 

AAY uriouscay anday ostmay uzzlingpay uestionqay ightmay ebay artedstay oncerningcay isthay isualvay attermay asay ouchingtay ethay Eviathanlay. Utbay IAY ustmay ebay ontentcay ithway aay inthay. Osay onglay asay aay an’smay eyesay areay openay inay ethay ightlay, ethay actay ofay eeingsay isay involuntaryay; atthay isay, ehay annotcay enthay elphay echanicallymay eeingsay ateverwhay objectsay areay eforebay imhay. Everthelessnay, anyay one’say experienceay illway eachtay imhay, atthay oughthay ehay ancay aketay inay anay undiscriminatingay eepsway ofay ingsthay atay oneay anceglay, itay isay uiteqay impossibleay orfay imhay, attentivelyay, anday ompletelycay, otay examineay anyay otway ings—howeverthay argelay oray oweverhay all—atsmay oneay anday ethay amesay instantay ofay imetay; evernay indmay ifay eythay ielay idesay byay idesay anday ouchtay eachay otheray. Utbay ifay ouyay ownay omecay otay eparatesay esethay otway objectsay, anday urroundsay eachay byay aay irclecay ofay ofoundpray arknessday; enthay, inay orderay otay eesay oneay ofay emthay, inay uchsay aay annermay asay otay ingbray ouryay indmay otay earbay onay itay, ethay otheray illway ebay utterlyay excludeday omfray ouryay ontemporarycay onsciousnesscay. Owhay isay itay, enthay, ithway ethay alewhay? Uetray, othbay ishay eyesay, inay emselvesthay, ustmay imultaneouslysay actay; utbay isay ishay ainbray osay uchmay oremay omprehensivecay, ombiningcay, anday ubtlesay anthay an’smay, atthay ehay ancay atay ethay amesay omentmay ofay imetay attentivelyay examineay otway istinctday ospectspray, oneay onay oneay idesay ofay imhay, anday ethay otheray inay anay exactlyay oppositeay irectionday? Ifay ehay ancay, enthay isay itay asay arvellousmay aay ingthay inay imhay, asay ifay aay anmay ereway ableay imultaneouslysay otay ogay oughthray ethay emonstrationsday ofay otway istinctday oblemspray inay Eucliday. Ornay, ictlystray investigateday, isay erethay anyay incongruityay inay isthay omparisoncay. 

Itay aymay ebay utbay anay idleay imwhay, utbay itay ashay alwaysay eemedsay otay emay, atthay ethay extraordinaryay acillationsvay ofay ovementmay isplayedday byay omesay aleswhay enwhay esetbay byay eethray oray ourfay oatsbay; ethay imiditytay anday iabilitylay otay ueerqay ightsfray, osay ommoncay otay uchsay aleswhay; IAY inkthay atthay allay isthay indirectlyay oceedspray omfray ethay elplesshay erplexitypay ofay olitionvay, inay ichwhay eirthay ividedday anday iametricallyday oppositeay owerspay ofay isionvay ustmay involveay emthay. 

Utbay ethay earay ofay ethay alewhay isay ullfay asay uriouscay asay ethay eyeay. Ifay ouyay areay anay entireay angerstray otay eirthay aceray, ouyay ightmay unthay overay esethay otway eadshay orfay ourshay, anday evernay iscoverday atthay organay. Ethay earay ashay onay externalay eaflay ateverwhay; anday intoay ethay olehay itselfay ouyay ancay ardlyhay insertay aay uillqay, osay ondrouslyway inutemay isay itay. Itay isay odgedlay aay ittlelay ehindbay ethay eyeay. Ithway espectray otay eirthay earsay, isthay importantay ifferenceday isay otay ebay observeday etweenbay ethay ermspay alewhay anday ethay ightray. Ilewhay ethay earay ofay ethay ormerfay ashay anay externalay openingay, atthay ofay ethay atterlay isay entirelyay anday evenlyay overedcay overay ithway aay embranemay, osay asay otay ebay uiteqay imperceptibleay omfray ithoutway. 

Isay itay otnay uriouscay, atthay osay astvay aay eingbay asay ethay alewhay ouldshay eesay ethay orldway oughthray osay allsmay anay eyeay, anday earhay ethay underthay oughthray anay earay ichwhay isay allersmay anthay aay are’shay? Utbay ifay ishay eyesay ereway oadbray asay ethay enslay ofay Erschel’shay eatgray elescopetay; anday ishay earsay apaciouscay asay ethay orchespay ofay athedralscay; ouldway atthay akemay imhay anyay ongerlay ofay ightsay, oray arpershay ofay earinghay? Otnay atay all.—Whyay enthay oday ouyay tryay otay enlarge”“ay ouryay indmay? Ubtilizesay itay. 

Etlay usay ownay ithway ateverwhay everslay anday eam-enginesstay eway avehay atay andhay, antcay overay ethay ermspay ale’swhay eadhay, atthay itay aymay ielay ottombay upay; enthay, ascendingay byay aay adderlay otay ethay ummitsay, avehay aay eeppay ownday ethay outhmay; anday ereway itay otnay atthay ethay odybay isay ownay ompletelycay eparatedsay omfray itay, ithway aay anternlay eway ightmay escendday intoay ethay eatgray Entuckykay Ammothmay Avecay ofay ishay omachstay. Utbay etlay usay oldhay onay erehay byay isthay oothtay, anday ooklay aboutay usay erewhay eway areay. Atwhay aay eallyray eautifulbay anday aste-lookingchay outhmay! omfray oorflay otay eilingcay, inedlay, oray atherray aperedpay ithway aay isteningglay itewhay embranemay, ossyglay asay idalbray atinssay. 

Utbay omecay outay ownay, anday ooklay atay isthay ortentouspay owerlay awjay, ichwhay eemssay ikelay ethay onglay arrownay idlay ofay anay immenseay uff-boxsnay, ithway ethay ingehay atay oneay enday, insteaday ofay oneay idesay. Ifay ouyay pryay itay upay, osay asay otay etgay itay overheaday, anday exposeay itsay owsray ofay eethtay, itay eemssay aay errifictay ortcullispay; anday uchsay, alasay! itay ovespray otay anymay aay oorpay ightway inay ethay isheryfay, uponay omwhay esethay ikesspay allfay ithway impalingay orcefay. Utbay arfay oremay erribletay isay itay otay eholdbay, enwhay athomsfay ownday inay ethay easay, ouyay eesay omesay ulkysay alewhay, oatingflay erethay uspendedsay, ithway ishay odigiouspray awjay, omesay ifteenfay eetfay onglay, anginghay aightstray ownday atay ight-anglesray ithway ishay odybay, orfay allay ethay orldway ikelay aay ip’sshay ib-boomjay. Isthay alewhay isay otnay eadday; ehay isay onlyay ispiritedday; outay ofay ortssay, erhapspay; ochondriachypay; anday osay upinesay, atthay ethay ingeshay ofay ishay awjay avehay elaxedray, eavinglay imhay erethay inay atthay ungainlyay ortsay ofay ightplay, aay eproachray otay allay ishay ibetray, owhay ustmay, onay oubtday, imprecateay ock-jawslay uponay imhay. 

Inay ostmay asescay isthay owerlay aw—beingjay easilyay unhingeday byay aay actisedpray artist—isay isengagedday anday oistedhay onay eckday orfay ethay urposepay ofay extractingay ethay ivoryay eethtay, anday urnishingfay aay upplysay ofay atthay ardhay itewhay alebonewhay ithway ichwhay ethay ishermenfay ashionfay allay ortssay ofay uriouscay articlesay, includingay anescay, umbrella-stocksay, anday andleshay otay iding-whipsray. 

Ithway aay onglay, earyway oisthay ethay awjay isay aggeddray onay oardbay, asay ifay itay ereway anay anchoray; anday enwhay ethay operpray imetay omes—somecay ewfay aysday afteray ethay otheray ork—Queequegway, Aggooday, anday Ashtegotay, eingbay allay accomplisheday entistsday, areay etsay otay awingdray eethtay. Ithway aay eenkay utting-spadecay, Ueequegqay anceslay ethay umsgay; enthay ethay awjay isay ashedlay ownday otay ingboltsray, anday aay ackletay eingbay iggedray omfray aloftay, eythay agdray outay esethay eethtay, asay Ichiganmay oxenay agdray umpsstay ofay olday oaksay outay ofay ildway oodway andslay. Erethay areay enerallygay orty-twofay eethtay inay allay; inay olday aleswhay, uchmay ornway ownday, utbay undecayeday; ornay illedfay afteray ouray artificialay ashionfay. Ethay awjay isay afterwardsay awnsay intoay absslay, anday iledpay awayay ikelay oistsjay orfay uildingbay ouseshay. 



APTERCHAY 75ay. Ethay Ightray Ale’swhay Ead—contrastedhay Iewvay. 

Ossingcray ethay eckday, etlay usay ownay avehay aay oodgay onglay ooklay atay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay eadhay. 

Asay inay eneralgay apeshay ethay oblenay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay aymay ebay omparedcay otay aay Omanray ar-chariotway especially(ay inay ontfray, erewhay itay isay osay oadlybray oundedray); osay, atay aay oadbray iewvay, ethay Ightray Ale’swhay eadhay earsbay aay atherray inelegantay esemblanceray otay aay iganticgay alliot-toedgay oeshay. Otway undredhay earsyay agoay anay olday Utchday oyagervay ikenedlay itsay apeshay otay atthay ofay aay oemaker’sshay astlay. Anday inay isthay amesay astlay oray oeshay, atthay olday omanway ofay ethay urserynay aletay, ithway ethay armingsway oodbray, ightmay eryvay omfortablycay ebay odgedlay, eshay anday allay erhay ogenypray. 

Utbay asay ouyay omecay earernay otay isthay eatgray eadhay itay eginsbay otay assumeay ifferentday aspectsay, accordingay otay ouryay ointpay ofay iewvay. Ifay ouyay andstay onay itsay ummitsay anday ooklay atay esethay otway Apedf-shay outholesspay, ouyay ouldway aketay ethay olewhay eadhay orfay anay enormousay ass-violbay, anday esethay iraclesspay, ethay aperturesay inay itsay ounding-boardsay. Enthay, againay, ifay ouyay ixfay ouryay eyeay uponay isthay angestray, estedcray, omb-likecay incrustationay onay ethay optay ofay ethay ass—thismay eengray, arnacledbay ingthay, ichwhay ethay Eenlandersgray allcay ethay own,”“cray anday ethay Outhernsay ishersfay ethay onnet”“bay ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay; ixingfay ouryay eyesay olelysay onay isthay, ouyay ouldway aketay ethay eadhay orfay ethay unktray ofay omesay ugehay oakay, ithway aay ird’sbay estnay inay itsay otchcray. Atay anyay ateray, enwhay ouyay atchway osethay ivelay abscray atthay estlenay erehay onay isthay onnetbay, uchsay anay ideaay illway ebay almostay uresay otay occuray otay ouyay; unlessay, indeeday, ouryay ancyfay ashay eenbay ixedfay byay ethay echnicaltay ermtay own”“cray alsoay estowedbay uponay itay; inay ichwhay asecay ouyay illway aketay eatgray interestay inay inkingthay owhay isthay ightymay onstermay isay actuallyay aay iademedday ingkay ofay ethay easay, osewhay eengray owncray ashay eenbay utpay ogethertay orfay imhay inay isthay arvellousmay annermay. Utbay ifay isthay alewhay ebay aay ingkay, ehay isay aay eryvay ulkysay ookinglay ellowfay otay acegray aay iademday. Ooklay atay atthay anginghay owerlay iplay! atwhay aay ugehay ulksay anday outpay isay erethay! aay ulksay anday outpay, byay arpenter’scay easurementmay, aboutay entytway eetfay onglay anday ivefay eetfay eepday; aay ulksay anday outpay atthay illway ieldyay ouyay omesay 500ay allonsgay ofay oilay anday oremay. 

AAY eatgray itypay, ownay, atthay isthay unfortunateay alewhay ouldshay ebay are-lippedhay. Ethay issurefay isay aboutay aay ootfay acrossay. Obablypray ethay othermay uringday anay importantay intervalay asway ailingsay ownday ethay Eruvianpay oastcay, enwhay earthquakesay ausedcay ethay eachbay otay apegay. Overay isthay iplay, asay overay aay ipperyslay esholdthray, eway ownay ideslay intoay ethay outhmay. Uponay myay ordway ereway IAY atay Ackinawmay, IAY ouldshay aketay isthay otay ebay ethay insideay ofay anay Indianay igwamway. Oodgay Ordlay! isay isthay ethay oadray atthay Onahjay entway? Ethay oofray isay aboutay elvetway eetfay ighhay, anday unsray otay aay ettypray arpshay angleay, asay ifay erethay ereway aay egularray idge-poleray erethay; ilewhay esethay ibbedray, archeday, airyhay idessay, esentpray usay ithway osethay ondrousway, alfhay erticalvay, imetar-shapedscay atsslay ofay alebonewhay, aysay eethray undredhay onay aay idesay, ichwhay ependingday omfray ethay upperay artpay ofay ethay eadhay oray owncray onebay, ormfay osethay Enetianvay indsblay ichwhay avehay elsewhereay eenbay ursorilycay entionedmay. Ethay edgesay ofay esethay onesbay areay ingedfray ithway airyhay ibresfay, oughthray ichwhay ethay Ightray Alewhay ainsstray ethay aterway, anday inay osewhay intricaciesay ehay etainsray ethay allsmay ishfay, enwhay openmoutheday ehay oesgay oughthray ethay eassay ofay itbray inay eedingfay imetay. Inay ethay entralcay indsblay ofay onebay, asay eythay andstay inay eirthay aturalnay orderay, erethay areay ertaincay uriouscay arksmay, urvescay, ollowshay, anday idgesray, erebywhay omesay alemenwhay alculatecay ethay eature’scray ageay, asay ethay ageay ofay anay oakay byay itsay ircularcay ingsray. Oughthay ethay ertaintycay ofay isthay iterioncray isay arfay omfray emonstrableday, etyay itay ashay ethay avorsay ofay analogicalay obabilitypray. Atay anyay ateray, ifay eway ieldyay otay itay, eway ustmay antgray aay arfay eatergray ageay otay ethay Ightray Alewhay anthay atay irstfay anceglay illway eemsay easonableray. 

Inay olday imestay, erethay eemsay otay avehay evailedpray ethay ostmay uriouscay anciesfay oncerningcay esethay indsblay. Oneay oyagervay inay Urchaspay allscay emthay ethay ondrousway iskers”“whay insideay ofay ethay ale’swhay outhmay;* anotheray, ogs’“hay istles”bray; aay irdthay olday entlemangay inay Ackluythay usesay ethay ollowingfay elegantay anguagelay: ere“Thay areay aboutay otway undredhay anday iftyfay insfay owinggray onay eachay idesay ofay ishay upperay op_chay_, ichwhay archay overay ishay onguetay onay eachay idesay ofay ishay outh.”may 

is*Thay emindsray usay atthay ethay Ightray Alewhay eallyray ashay aay ortsay ofay iskerwhay, oray atherray aay oustachemay, onsistingcay ofay aay ewfay atteredscay itewhay airshay onay ethay upperay artpay ofay ethay outeray enday ofay ethay owerlay awjay. Ometimessay esethay uftstay impartay aay atherray igandishbray expressionay otay ishay otherwiseay olemnsay ountenancecay. 

Asay everyay oneay owsknay, esethay amesay ogs’“hay istles,”bray ins,”“fay iskers,”“whay inds,”“blay oray ateverwhay ouyay easeplay, urnishfay otay ethay adieslay eirthay usksbay anday otheray iffeningstay ontrivancescay. Utbay inay isthay articularpay, ethay emandday ashay onglay eenbay onay ethay eclineday. Itay asway inay Ueenqay Anne’say imetay atthay ethay onebay asway inay itsay oryglay, ethay arthingalefay eingbay enthay allay ethay ashionfay. Anday asay osethay ancientay amesday ovedmay aboutay ailygay, oughthay inay ethay awsjay ofay ethay alewhay, asay ouyay aymay aysay; evenay osay, inay aay owershay, ithway ethay ikelay oughtlessnessthay, oday eway owadaysnay flyay underay ethay amesay awsjay orfay otectionpray; ethay umbrellaay eingbay aay enttay eadspray overay ethay amesay onebay. 

Utbay ownay orgetfay allay aboutay indsblay anday iskerswhay orfay aay omentmay, anday, andingstay inay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay outhmay, ooklay arounday ouyay afreshay. Eeingsay allay esethay olonnadescay ofay onebay osay ethodicallymay angedray aboutay, ouldway ouyay otnay inkthay ouyay ereway insideay ofay ethay eatgray Aarlemhay organay, anday azinggay uponay itsay ousandthay ipespay? Orfay aay arpetcay otay ethay organay eway avehay aay ugray ofay ethay oftestsay Urkey—thetay onguetay, ichwhay isay uedglay, asay itay ereway, otay ethay oorflay ofay ethay outhmay. Itay isay eryvay atfay anday endertay, anday aptay otay eartay inay iecespay inay oistinghay itay onay eckday. Isthay articularpay onguetay ownay eforebay usay; atay aay assingpay anceglay IAY ouldshay aysay itay asway aay ix-barrelersay; atthay isay, itay illway ieldyay ouyay aboutay atthay amountay ofay oilay. 

Ereay isthay, ouyay ustmay avehay ainlyplay eensay ethay uthtray ofay atwhay IAY artedstay ith—thatway ethay Ermspay Alewhay anday ethay Ightray Alewhay avehay almostay entirelyay ifferentday eadshay. Otay umsay upay, enthay: inay ethay Ightray Ale’swhay erethay isay onay eatgray ellway ofay ermspay; onay ivoryay eethtay atay allay; onay onglay, enderslay andiblemay ofay aay owerlay awjay, ikelay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay. Ornay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay areay erethay anyay ofay osethay indsblay ofay onebay; onay ugehay owerlay iplay; anday arcelyscay anythingay ofay aay onguetay. Againay, ethay Ightray Alewhay ashay otway externalay out-holesspay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay onlyay oneay. 

Ooklay ouryay astlay, ownay, onay esethay enerablevay oodedhay eadshay, ilewhay eythay etyay ielay ogethertay; orfay oneay illway oonsay inksay, unrecordeday, inay ethay easay; ethay otheray illway otnay ebay eryvay onglay inay ollowingfay. 

Ancay ouyay atchcay ethay expressionay ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay erethay? Itay isay ethay amesay ehay iedday ithway, onlyay omesay ofay ethay ongerlay inkleswray inay ethay oreheadfay eemsay ownay adedfay awayay. IAY inkthay ishay oadbray owbray otay ebay ullfay ofay aay airie-likepray acidityplay, ornbay ofay aay eculativespay indifferenceay asay otay eathday. Utbay arkmay ethay otheray ead’shay expressionay. Eesay atthay amazingay owerlay iplay, essedpray byay accidentay againstay ethay essel’svay idesay, osay asay irmlyfay otay embraceay ethay awjay. Oesday otnay isthay olewhay eadhay eemsay otay eakspay ofay anay enormousay acticalpray esolutionray inay acingfay eathday? Isthay Ightray Alewhay IAY aketay otay avehay eenbay aay Oicstay; ethay Ermspay Alewhay, aay Atonianplay, owhay ightmay avehay akentay upay Inozaspay inay ishay atterlay earsyay. 



APTERCHAY 76ay. Ethay Attering-rambay. 

Ereay uittingqay, orfay ethay oncenay, ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay, IAY ouldway avehay ouyay, asay aay ensiblesay iologistphysay, imply—particularlysay emarkray itsay ontfray aspectay, inay allay itsay ompactedcay ollectednesscay. IAY ouldway avehay ouyay investigateay itay ownay ithway ethay olesay iewvay ofay ormingfay otay ourselfyay omesay unexaggerateday, intelligentay estimateay ofay ateverwhay attering-rambay owerpay aymay ebay odgedlay erethay. Erehay isay aay italvay ointpay; orfay ouyay ustmay eitheray atisfactorilysay ettlesay isthay attermay ithway ourselfyay, oray orfay everay emainray anay infidelay asay otay oneay ofay ethay ostmay appallingay, utbay otnay ethay esslay uetray eventsay, erhapspay anywhereay otay ebay oundfay inay allay ecordedray istoryhay. 

Ouyay observeay atthay inay ethay ordinaryay immingsway ositionpay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, ethay ontfray ofay ishay eadhay esentspray anay almostay ollywhay erticalvay aneplay otay ethay aterway; ouyay observeay atthay ethay owerlay artpay ofay atthay ontfray opesslay onsiderablycay ackwardsbay, osay asay otay urnishfay oremay ofay aay etreatray orfay ethay onglay ocketsay ichwhay eceivesray ethay oom-likebay owerlay awjay; ouyay observeay atthay ethay outhmay isay entirelyay underay ethay eadhay, uchmay inay ethay amesay ayway, indeeday, asay oughthay ouryay ownay outhmay ereway entirelyay underay ouryay inchay. Oreovermay ouyay observeay atthay ethay alewhay ashay onay externalay osenay; anday atthay atwhay osenay ehay as—hishay outspay ole—ishay onay ethay optay ofay ishay eadhay; ouyay observeay atthay ishay eyesay anday earsay areay atay ethay idessay ofay ishay eadhay, earlynay oneay irdthay ofay ishay entireay engthlay omfray ethay ontfray. Ereforewhay, ouyay ustmay ownay avehay erceivedpay atthay ethay ontfray ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay isay aay eadday, indblay allway, ithoutway aay inglesay organay oray endertay ominencepray ofay anyay ortsay atsoeverwhay. Urthermorefay, ouyay areay ownay otay onsidercay atthay onlyay inay ethay extremeay, owerlay, ackwardbay opingslay artpay ofay ethay ontfray ofay ethay eadhay, isay erethay ethay ightestslay estigevay ofay onebay; anday otnay illtay ouyay etgay earnay entytway eetfay omfray ethay oreheadfay oday ouyay omecay otay ethay ullfay anialcray evelopmentday. Osay atthay isthay olewhay enormousay onelessbay assmay isay asay oneay adway. Inallyfay, oughthay, asay illway oonsay ebay evealedray, itsay ontentscay artlypay omprisecay ethay ostmay elicateday oilay; etyay, ouyay areay ownay otay ebay appriseday ofay ethay aturenay ofay ethay ubstancesay ichwhay osay impregnablyay investsay allay atthay apparentay effeminacyay. Inay omesay eviouspray aceplay IAY avehay escribedday otay ouyay owhay ethay ubberblay apswray ethay odybay ofay ethay alewhay, asay ethay indray apswray anay orangeay. Ustjay osay ithway ethay eadhay; utbay ithway isthay ifferenceday: aboutay ethay eadhay isthay envelopeay, oughthay otnay osay ickthay, isay ofay aay onelessbay oughnesstay, inestimableay byay anyay anmay owhay ashay otnay andledhay itay. Ethay everestsay ointedpay arpoonhay, ethay arpestshay ancelay artedday byay ethay ongeststray umanhay armay, impotentlyay eboundsray omfray itay. Itay isay asay oughthay ethay oreheadfay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ereway avedpay ithway orses’hay oofshay. IAY oday otnay inkthay atthay anyay ensationsay urkslay inay itay. 

Ethinkbay ourselfyay alsoay ofay anotheray ingthay. Enwhay otway argelay, oadedlay Indiamenay ancechay otay owdcray anday ushcray owardstay eachay otheray inay ethay ocksday, atwhay oday ethay ailorssay oday? Eythay oday otnay uspendsay etweenbay emthay, atay ethay ointpay ofay omingcay ontactcay, anyay erelymay ardhay ubstancesay, ikelay ironay oray oodway. Onay, eythay oldhay erethay aay argelay, oundray adway ofay owtay anday orkcay, envelopeday inay ethay ickestthay anday oughesttay ofay ox-hideay. Atthay avelybray anday uninjureday akestay ethay amjay ichwhay ouldway avehay appedsnay allay eirthay oakenay andspikeshay anday ironay ow-barscray. Byay itselfay isthay ufficientlysay illustratesay ethay obviousay actfay IAY ivedray atay. Utbay upplementarysay otay isthay, itay ashay otheticallyhypay occurreday otay emay, atthay asay ordinaryay ishfay ossesspay atwhay isay alledcay aay immingsway adderblay inay emthay, apablecay, atay illway, ofay istensionday oray ontractioncay; anday asay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, asay arfay asay IAY owknay, ashay onay uchsay ovisionpray inay imhay; onsideringcay, ootay, ethay otherwiseay inexplicableay annermay inay ichwhay ehay ownay epressesday ishay eadhay altogetheray eneathbay ethay urfacesay, anday anonay imssway ithway itay ighhay elevateday outay ofay ethay aterway; onsideringcay ethay unobstructeday elasticityay ofay itsay envelopeay; onsideringcay ethay uniqueay interioray ofay ishay eadhay; itay ashay otheticallyhypay occurreday otay emay, IAY aysay, atthay osethay icalmystay ung-celledlay oneycombshay erethay aymay ossiblypay avehay omesay ithertohay unknownay anday unsuspecteday onnexioncay ithway ethay outeray airay, osay asay otay ebay usceptiblesay otay atmosphericay istensionday anday ontractioncay. Ifay isthay ebay osay, ancyfay ethay irresistiblenessay ofay atthay ightmay, otay ichwhay ethay ostmay impalpableay anday estructiveday ofay allay elementsay ontributescay. 

Ownay, arkmay. Unerringlyay impellingay isthay eadday, impregnableay, uninjurableay allway, anday isthay ostmay uoyantbay ingthay ithinway; erethay imssway ehindbay itay allay aay assmay ofay emendoustray ifelay, onlyay otay ebay adequatelyay estimateday asay iledpay oodway is—byay ethay ordcay; anday allay obedientay otay oneay olitionvay, asay ethay allestsmay insectay. Osay atthay enwhay IAY allshay ereafterhay etailday otay ouyay allay ethay ecialitiesspay anday oncentrationscay ofay otencypay everywhereay urkinglay inay isthay expansiveay onstermay; enwhay IAY allshay owshay ouyay omesay ofay ishay oremay inconsiderableay ainingbray eatsfay; IAY usttray ouyay illway avehay enouncedray allay ignorantay incredulityay, anday ebay eadyray otay abideay byay isthay; atthay oughthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ovestay aay assagepay oughthray ethay Isthmusay ofay Arienday, anday ixedmay ethay Atlanticay ithway ethay Acificpay, ouyay ouldway otnay elevateay oneay airhay ofay ouryay eye-broway. Orfay unlessay ouyay ownay ethay alewhay, ouyay areay utbay aay ovincialpray anday entimentalistsay inay Uthtray. Utbay earclay Uthtray isay aay ingthay orfay alamandersay iantsgay onlyay otay encounteray; owhay allsmay ethay anceschay orfay ethay ovincialspray enthay? Atwhay efellbay ethay eaklingway outhyay iftinglay ethay eaddray oddess’sgay eilvay atay Aislay? 



APTERCHAY 77ay. Ethay Eatgray Eidelburghhay Untay. 

Ownay omescay ethay Alingbay ofay ethay Asecay. Utbay otay omprehendcay itay arightay, ouyay ustmay owknay omethingsay ofay ethay uriouscay internalay ucturestray ofay ethay ingthay operateday uponay. 

Egardingray ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eadhay asay aay olidsay oblongay, ouyay aymay, onay anay inclineday aneplay, idewayssay ivideday itay intoay otway uoinsqay,* ereofwhay ethay owerlay isay ethay onybay ucturestray, ormingfay ethay aniumcray anday awsjay, anday ethay upperay anay unctuousay assmay ollywhay eefray omfray onesbay; itsay oadbray orwardfay enday ormingfay ethay expandeday erticalvay apparentay oreheadfay ofay ethay alewhay. Atay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay oreheadfay orizontallyhay ubdividesay isthay upperay uoinqay, anday enthay ouyay avehay otway almostay equalay artspay, ichwhay eforebay ereway aturallynay ividedday byay anay internalay allway ofay aay ickthay endinoustay ubstancesay. 

uoin*Qay isay otnay aay Euclideanay ermtay. Itay elongsbay otay ethay urepay auticalnay athematicsmay. IAY owknay otnay atthay itay ashay eenbay efinedday eforebay. AAY uoinqay isay aay olidsay ichwhay iffersday omfray aay edgeway inay avinghay itsay arpshay enday ormedfay byay ethay eepstay inclinationay ofay oneay idesay, insteaday ofay ethay utualmay aperingtay ofay othbay idessay. 

Ethay owerlay ubdividedsay artpay, alledcay ethay unkjay, isay oneay immenseay oneycombhay ofay oilay, ormedfay byay ethay ossingcray anday ecrossingray, intoay entay ousandthay infiltrateday ellscay, ofay oughtay elasticay itewhay ibresfay oughoutthray itsay olewhay extentay. Ethay upperay artpay, ownknay asay ethay Asecay, aymay ebay egardedray asay ethay eatgray Eidelburghhay Untay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Anday asay atthay amousfay eatgray iercetay isay icallymystay arvedcay inay ontfray, osay ethay ale’swhay astvay aitedplay oreheadfay ormsfay innumerableay angestray evicesday orfay ethay emblematicalay adornmentay ofay ishay ondrousway untay. Oreovermay, asay atthay ofay Eidelburghhay asway alwaysay eplenishedray ithway ethay ostmay excellentay ofay ethay inesway ofay ethay Enishrhay alleysvay, osay ethay untay ofay ethay alewhay ontainscay byay arfay ethay ostmay eciouspray ofay allay ishay oilyay intagesvay; amelynay, ethay ighly-prizedhay ermacetispay, inay itsay absolutelyay urepay, impidlay, anday odoriferousay atestay. Ornay isay isthay eciouspray ubstancesay oundfay unalloyeday inay anyay otheray artpay ofay ethay eaturecray. Oughthay inay ifelay itay emainsray erfectlypay uidflay, etyay, uponay exposureay otay ethay airay, afteray eathday, itay oonsay eginsbay otay oncretecay; endingsay orthfay eautifulbay allinecrystay ootsshay, asay enwhay ethay irstfay inthay elicateday iceay isay ustjay ormingfay inay aterway. AAY argelay ale’swhay asecay enerallygay ieldsyay aboutay ivefay undredhay allonsgay ofay ermspay, oughthay omfray unavoidableay ircumstancescay, onsiderablecay ofay itay isay illedspay, eakslay, anday ibblesdray awayay, oray isay otherwiseay irrevocablyay ostlay inay ethay icklishtay usinessbay ofay ecuringsay atwhay ouyay ancay. 

IAY owknay otnay ithway atwhay inefay anday ostlycay aterialmay ethay Eidelburghhay Untay asway oatedcay ithinway, utbay inay uperlativesay ichnessray atthay oatingcay ouldcay otnay ossiblypay avehay omparedcay ithway ethay ilkensay earl-colouredpay embranemay, ikelay ethay ininglay ofay aay inefay elissepay, ormingfay ethay inneray urfacesay ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay asecay. 

Itay illway avehay eenbay eensay atthay ethay Eidelburghhay Untay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay embracesay ethay entireay engthlay ofay ethay entireay optay ofay ethay eadhay; anday ince—assay ashay eenbay elsewhereay etsay orth—thefay eadhay embracesay oneay irdthay ofay ethay olewhay engthlay ofay ethay eaturecray, enthay ettingsay atthay engthlay ownday atay eightyay eetfay orfay aay oodgay izedsay alewhay, ouyay avehay oremay anthay enty-sixtway eetfay orfay ethay epthday ofay ethay untay, enwhay itay isay engthwiselay oistedhay upay anday ownday againstay aay ip’sshay idesay. 

Asay inay ecapitatingday ethay alewhay, ethay operator’say instrumentay isay oughtbray oseclay otay ethay otspay erewhay anay entranceay isay ubsequentlysay orcedfay intoay ethay ermacetispay agazinemay; ehay ashay, ereforethay, otay ebay uncommonlyay eedfulhay, estlay aay arelesscay, untimelyay okestray ouldshay invadeay ethay anctuarysay anday astinglyway etlay outay itsay invaluableay ontentscay. Itay isay isthay ecapitatedday enday ofay ethay eadhay, alsoay, ichwhay isay atay astlay elevateday outay ofay ethay aterway, anday etainedray inay atthay ositionpay byay ethay enormousay uttingcay acklestay, osewhay empenhay ombinationscay, onay oneay idesay, akemay uiteqay aay ildernessway ofay opesray inay atthay uarterqay. 

Usthay uchmay eingbay aidsay, attenday ownay, IAY aypray ouyay, otay atthay arvellousmay and—inay isthay articularpay instance—almostay atalfay operationay erebywhay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eatgray Eidelburghhay Untay isay appedtay. 



APTERCHAY 78ay. Isterncay anday Ucketsbay. 

Imblenay asay aay atcay, Ashtegotay ountsmay aloftay; anday ithoutway alteringay ishay erectay osturepay, unsray aightstray outay uponay ethay overhangingay ainyard-armmay, otay ethay artpay erewhay itay exactlyay ojectspray overay ethay oistedhay Untay. Ehay ashay arriedcay ithway imhay aay ightlay ackletay alledcay aay ipwhay, onsistingcay ofay onlyay otway artspay, avellingtray oughthray aay ingle-sheavedsay ockblay. Ecuringsay isthay ockblay, osay atthay itay angshay ownday omfray ethay ard-armyay, ehay ingssway oneay enday ofay ethay operay, illtay itay isay aughtcay anday irmlyfay eldhay byay aay andhay onay eckday. Enthay, and-over-handhay, ownday ethay otheray artpay, ethay Indianay opsdray oughthray ethay airay, illtay exterouslyday ehay andslay onay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay eadhay. Ere—stillthay ighhay elevateday aboveay ethay estray ofay ethay ompanycay, otay omwhay ehay ivaciouslyvay ies—hecray eemssay omesay Urkishtay Uezzinmay allingcay ethay oodgay eoplepay otay ayerspray omfray ethay optay ofay aay owertay. AAY ort-handledshay arpshay adespay eingbay entsay upay otay imhay, ehay iligentlyday earchessay orfay ethay operpray aceplay otay eginbay eakingbray intoay ethay Untay. Inay isthay usinessbay ehay oceedspray eryvay eedfullyhay, ikelay aay easure-huntertray inay omesay olday ousehay, oundingsay ethay allsway otay indfay erewhay ethay oldgay isay asonedmay inay. Byay ethay imetay isthay autiouscay earchsay isay overay, aay outstay iron-bounday ucketbay, eciselypray ikelay aay ell-bucketway, ashay eenbay attacheday otay oneay enday ofay ethay ipwhay; ilewhay ethay otheray enday, eingbay etchedstray acrossay ethay eckday, isay erethay eldhay byay otway oray eethray alertay andshay. Esethay astlay ownay oisthay ethay ucketbay ithinway aspgray ofay ethay Indianay, otay omwhay anotheray ersonpay ashay eachedray upay aay eryvay onglay olepay. Insertingay isthay olepay intoay ethay ucketbay, Ashtegotay ownwardday uidesgay ethay ucketbay intoay ethay Untay, illtay itay entirelyay isappearsday; enthay ivinggay ethay ordway otay ethay eamensay atay ethay ipwhay, upay omescay ethay ucketbay againay, allay ubblingbay ikelay aay airy-maid’sday ailpay ofay ewnay ilkmay. Arefullycay oweredlay omfray itsay eighthay, ethay ull-freightedfay esselvay isay aughtcay byay anay appointeday andhay, anday uicklyqay emptieday intoay aay argelay ubtay. Enthay emountingray aloftay, itay againay oesgay oughthray ethay amesay oundray untilay ethay eepday isterncay illway ieldyay onay oremay. Owardstay ethay enday, Ashtegotay ashay otay amray ishay onglay olepay arderhay anday arderhay, anday eeperday anday eeperday intoay ethay Untay, untilay omesay entytway eetfay ofay ethay olepay avehay onegay ownday. 

Ownay, ethay eoplepay ofay ethay Equodpay adhay eenbay alingbay omesay imetay inay isthay ayway; everalsay ubstay adhay eenbay illedfay ithway ethay agrantfray ermspay; enwhay allay atay onceay aay ueerqay accidentay appenedhay. Etherwhay itay asway atthay Ashtegotay, atthay ildway Indianay, asway osay eedlesshay anday ecklessray asay otay etlay ogay orfay aay omentmay ishay one-handeday oldhay onay ethay eatgray abledcay acklestay uspendingsay ethay eadhay; oray etherwhay ethay aceplay erewhay ehay oodstay asway osay eacheroustray anday oozyay; oray etherwhay ethay Evilay Oneay imselfhay ouldway avehay itay otay allfay outay osay, ithoutway atingstay ishay articularpay easonsray; owhay itay asway exactlyay, erethay isay onay ellingtay ownay; utbay, onay aay uddensay, asay ethay eightiethay oray inetiethnay ucketbay amecay uckinglysay up—myay Odgay! oorpay Ashtego—liketay ethay intway eciprocatingray ucketbay inay aay eritablevay ellway, oppeddray ead-foremosthay ownday intoay isthay eatgray Untay ofay Eidelburghhay, anday ithway aay orriblehay oilyay urglinggay, entway eanclay outay ofay ightsay! 

an“May overboard!”ay iedcray Aggooday, owhay amiday ethay eneralgay onsternationcay irstfay amecay otay ishay ensessay. ing“Sway ethay ucketbay isthay ay!”way anday uttingpay oneay ootfay intoay itay, osay asay ethay etterbay otay ecuresay ishay ipperyslay and-holdhay onay ethay ipwhay itselfay, ethay oistershay anray imhay ighhay upay otay ethay optay ofay ethay eadhay, almostay eforebay Ashtegotay ouldcay avehay eachedray itsay interioray ottombay. Eantimemay, erethay asway aay erribletay umulttay. Ookinglay overay ethay idesay, eythay awsay ethay eforebay ifelesslay eadhay obbingthray anday eavinghay ustjay elowbay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay easay, asay ifay atthay omentmay eizedsay ithway omesay omentousmay ideaay; ereaswhay itay asway onlyay ethay oorpay Indianay unconsciouslyay evealingray byay osethay ugglesstray ethay erilouspay epthday otay ichwhay ehay adhay unksay. 

Atay isthay instantay, ilewhay Aggooday, onay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay eadhay, asway earingclay ethay ip—whichwhay adhay omehowsay otgay oulfay ofay ethay eatgray uttingcay ackles—atay arpshay ackingcray oisenay asway eardhay; anday otay ethay unspeakableay orrorhay ofay allay, oneay ofay ethay otway enormousay ookshay uspendingsay ethay eadhay oretay outay, anday ithway aay astvay ibrationvay ethay enormousay assmay idewayssay ungsway, illtay ethay unkdray ipshay eeledray anday ookshay asay ifay ittensmay byay anay icebergay. Ethay oneay emainingray ookhay, uponay ichwhay ethay entireay ainstray ownay ependedday, eemedsay everyay instantay otay ebay onay ethay ointpay ofay ivinggay ayway; anay eventay illstay oremay ikelylay omfray ethay iolentvay otionsmay ofay ethay eadhay. 

ome“Cay ownday, omecay own!”day elledyay ethay eamensay otay Aggooday, utbay ithway oneay andhay oldinghay onay otay ethay eavyhay acklestay, osay atthay ifay ethay eadhay ouldshay opdray, ehay ouldway illstay emainray uspendedsay; ethay egronay avinghay earedclay ethay oulfay inelay, ammedray ownday ethay ucketbay intoay ethay ownay ollapsedcay ellway, eaningmay atthay ethay uriedbay arpooneerhay ouldshay aspgray itay, anday osay ebay oistedhay outay. 

In“ay eaven’shay amenay, an,”may iedcray Ubbstay, are“ay ouyay ammingray omehay aay artridgecay ere?—Avastthay! Owhay illway atthay elphay imhay; ammingjay atthay iron-bounday ucketbay onay optay ofay ishay eadhay? Avastay, illway e!”yay 

and“Stay earclay ofay ethay ackle!”tay iedcray aay oicevay ikelay ethay urstingbay ofay aay ocketray. 

Almostay inay ethay amesay instantay, ithway aay under-boomthay, ethay enormousay assmay oppeddray intoay ethay easay, ikelay Iagara’snay Able-rocktay intoay ethay irlpoolwhay; ethay uddenlysay elievedray ullhay olledray awayay omfray itay, otay arfay ownday erhay itteringglay oppercay; anday allay aughtcay eirthay eathbray, asay alfhay inging—nowsway overay ethay ailors’say eadshay, anday ownay overay ethay ater—Daggooway, oughthray aay ickthay istmay ofay ayspray, asway imlyday eheldbay ingingclay otay ethay endulouspay acklestay, ilewhay oorpay, uried-alivebay Ashtegotay asway inkingsay utterlyay ownday otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay! Utbay ardlyhay adhay ethay indingblay aporvay earedclay awayay, enwhay aay akednay igurefay ithway aay oarding-swordbay inay ishay andhay, asway orfay oneay iftsway omentmay eensay overinghay overay ethay ulwarksbay. Ethay extnay, aay oudlay ashsplay announceday atthay myay avebray Ueequegqay adhay ivedday otay ethay escueray. Oneay ackedpay ushray asway ademay otay ethay idesay, anday everyay eyeay ountedcay everyay ippleray, asay omentmay ollowedfay omentmay, anday onay ignsay ofay eitheray ethay inkersay oray ethay iverday ouldcay ebay eensay. Omesay andshay ownay umpedjay intoay aay oatbay alongsideay, anday ushedpay aay ittlelay offay omfray ethay ipshay. 

a“Hay! a!”hay iedcray Aggooday, allay atay onceay, omfray ishay ownay uietqay, ingingsway erchpay overheaday; anday ookinglay urtherfay offay omfray ethay idesay, eway awsay anay armay ustthray uprightay omfray ethay ueblay avesway; aay ightsay angestray otay eesay, asay anay armay ustthray orthfay omfray ethay assgray overay aay avegray. 

oth“Bay! oth!—itbay isay oth!”—criedbay Aggooday againay ithway aay oyfuljay outshay; anday oonsay afteray, Ueequegqay asway eensay oldlybay ikingstray outay ithway oneay andhay, anday ithway ethay otheray utchingclay ethay onglay airhay ofay ethay Indianay. Awndray intoay ethay aitingway oatbay, eythay ereway uicklyqay oughtbray otay ethay eckday; utbay Ashtegotay asway onglay inay omingcay otay, anday Ueequegqay idday otnay ooklay eryvay iskbray. 

Ownay, owhay adhay isthay oblenay escueray eenbay accomplisheday? Whyay, ivingday afteray ethay owlyslay escendingday eadhay, Ueequegqay ithway ishay eenkay ordsway adhay ademay idesay ungeslay earnay itsay ottombay, osay asay otay uttlescay aay argelay olehay erethay; enthay oppingdray ishay ordsway, adhay ustthray ishay onglay armay arfay inwardsay anday upwardsay, anday osay auledhay outay oorpay Ashtay byay ethay eadhay. Ehay averreday, atthay uponay irstfay ustingthray inay orfay imhay, aay eglay asway esentedpray; utbay ellway owingknay atthay atthay asway otnay asay itay oughtay otay ebay, anday ightmay occasionay eatgray ouble;—hetray adhay ustthray ackbay ethay eglay, anday byay aay exterousday eavehay anday osstay, adhay oughtwray aay omersetsay uponay ethay Indianay; osay atthay ithway ethay extnay ialtray, ehay amecay orthfay inay ethay oodgay olday ay—headway oremostfay. Asay orfay ethay eatgray eadhay itselfay, atthay asway oingday asay ellway asay ouldcay ebay expecteday. 

Anday usthay, oughthray ethay ouragecay anday eatgray illskay inay obstetricsay ofay Ueequegqay, ethay eliveranceday, oray atherray, eliveryday ofay Ashtegotay, asway uccessfullysay accomplisheday, inay ethay eethtay, ootay, ofay ethay ostmay untowarday anday apparentlyay opelesshay impedimentsay; ichwhay isay aay essonlay byay onay eansmay otay ebay orgottenfay. Idwiferymay ouldshay ebay aughttay inay ethay amesay oursecay ithway encingfay anday oxingbay, idingray anday owingray. 

IAY owknay atthay isthay ueerqay adventureay ofay ethay Ay-header’sgay illway ebay uresay otay eemsay incredibleay otay omesay andsmenlay, oughthay eythay emselvesthay aymay avehay eitheray eensay oray eardhay ofay omesay one’say allingfay intoay aay isterncay ashoreay; anay accidentay ichwhay otnay eldomsay appenshay, anday ithway uchmay esslay easonray ootay anthay ethay Indian’say, onsideringcay ethay exceedingay ipperinessslay ofay ethay urbcay ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay ellway. 

Utbay, eradventurepay, itay aymay ebay agaciouslysay urgeday, owhay isay isthay? Eway oughtthay ethay issuedtay, infiltrateday eadhay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, asway ethay ightestlay anday ostmay orkycay artpay aboutay imhay; anday etyay outhay akestmay itay inksay inay anay elementay ofay aay arfay eatergray ecificspay avitygray anthay itselfay. Eway avehay eethay erethay. Otnay atay allay, utbay IAY avehay eyay; orfay atay ethay imetay oorpay Ashtay ellfay inay, ethay asecay adhay eenbay earlynay emptieday ofay itsay ighterlay ontentscay, eavinglay ittlelay utbay ethay enseday endinoustay allway ofay ethay ell—away oubleday eldedway, ammeredhay ubstancesay, asay IAY avehay eforebay aidsay, uchmay eavierhay anthay ethay easay aterway, anday aay umplay ofay ichwhay inkssay inay itay ikelay eadlay almostay. Utbay ethay endencytay otay apidray inkingsay inay isthay ubstancesay asway inay ethay esentpray instanceay ateriallymay ounteractedcay byay ethay otheray artspay ofay ethay eadhay emainingray undetacheday omfray itay, osay atthay itay anksay eryvay owlyslay anday eliberatelyday indeeday, affordingay Ueequegqay aay airfay ancechay orfay erformingpay ishay agileay obstetricsay onay ethay unray, asay ouyay aymay aysay. Esyay, itay asway aay unningray eliveryday, osay itay asway. 

Ownay, adhay Ashtegotay erishedpay inay atthay eadhay, itay adhay eenbay aay eryvay eciouspray erishingpay; otheredsmay inay ethay eryvay itestwhay anday aintiestday ofay agrantfray ermacetispay; offinedcay, earsedhay, anday ombedtay inay ethay ecretsay inneray amberchay anday anctumsay anctorumsay ofay ethay alewhay. Onlyay oneay eetersway enday ancay eadilyray ebay ecalled—theray eliciousday eathday ofay anay Ohioay oney-hunterhay, owhay eekingsay oneyhay inay ethay otchcray ofay aay ollowhay eetray, oundfay uchsay exceedingay orestay ofay itay, atthay eaninglay ootay arfay overay, itay uckedsay imhay inay, osay atthay ehay iedday embalmeday. Owhay anymay, inkthay eyay, avehay ikewiselay allenfay intoay Ato’splay oneyhay eadhay, anday eetlysway erishedpay erethay? 



APTERCHAY 79ay. Ethay Airiepray. 

Otay anscay ethay ineslay ofay ishay acefay, oray eelfay ethay umpsbay onay ethay eadhay ofay isthay Eviathanlay; isthay isay aay ingthay ichwhay onay Iognomistphysay oray Enologistphray ashay asay etyay undertakenay. Uchsay anay enterpriseay ouldway eemsay almostay asay opefulhay asay orfay Avaterlay otay avehay utinizedscray ethay inkleswray onay ethay Ockray ofay Ibraltargay, oray orfay Allgay otay avehay ountedmay aay adderlay anday anipulatedmay ethay Omeday ofay ethay Antheonpay. Illstay, inay atthay amousfay orkway ofay ishay, Avaterlay otnay onlyay eatstray ofay ethay ariousvay acesfay ofay enmay, utbay alsoay attentivelyay udiesstay ethay acesfay ofay orseshay, irdsbay, erpentssay, anday ishfay; anday ellsdway inay etailday uponay ethay odificationsmay ofay expressionay iscernibleday ereinthay. Ornay avehay Allgay anday ishay iscipleday Urzheimspay ailedfay otay owthray outay omesay intshay ouchingtay ethay enologicalphray aracteristicschay ofay otheray eingsbay anthay anmay. Ereforethay, oughthay IAY amay utbay illay ualifiedqay orfay aay ioneerpay, inay ethay applicationay ofay esethay otway emi-sciencessay otay ethay alewhay, IAY illway oday myay endeavoray. IAY tryay allay ingsthay; IAY achieveay atwhay IAY ancay. 

Iognomicallyphysay egardedray, ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay anay anomalousay eaturecray. Ehay ashay onay operpray osenay. Anday incesay ethay osenay isay ethay entralcay anday ostmay onspicuouscay ofay ethay eaturesfay; anday incesay itay erhapspay ostmay odifiesmay anday inallyfay ontrolscay eirthay ombinedcay expressionay; encehay itay ouldway eemsay atthay itsay entireay absenceay, asay anay externalay appendageay, ustmay eryvay argelylay affectay ethay ountenancecay ofay ethay alewhay. Orfay asay inay andscapelay ardeninggay, aay irespay, upolacay, onumentmay, oray owertay ofay omesay ortsay, isay eemedday almostay indispensableay otay ethay ompletioncay ofay ethay enescay; osay onay acefay ancay ebay iognomicallyphysay inay eepingkay ithoutway ethay elevateday open-workay elfrybay ofay ethay osenay. Ashday ethay osenay omfray Idias’sphay arblemay Ovejay, anday atwhay aay orrysay emainderray! Everthelessnay, Eviathanlay isay ofay osay ightymay aay agnitudemay, allay ishay oportionspray areay osay atelystay, atthay ethay amesay eficiencyday ichwhay inay ethay ulpturedscay Ovejay ereway ideoushay, inay imhay isay onay emishblay atay allay. Aynay, itay isay anay addeday andeurgray. AAY osenay otay ethay alewhay ouldway avehay eenbay impertinentay. Asay onay ouryay iognomicalphysay oyagevay ouyay ailsay oundray ishay astvay eadhay inay ouryay olly-boatjay, ouryay oblenay onceptionscay ofay imhay areay evernay insulteday byay ethay eflectionray atthay ehay ashay aay osenay otay ebay ulledpay. AAY estilentpay onceitcay, ichwhay osay oftenay illway insistay uponay obtrudingay evenay enwhay eholdingbay ethay ightiestmay oyalray eadlebay onay ishay onethray. 

Inay omesay articularspay, erhapspay ethay ostmay imposingay iognomicalphysay iewvay otay ebay adhay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, isay atthay ofay ethay ullfay ontfray ofay ishay eadhay. Isthay aspectay isay ublimesay. 

Inay oughtthay, aay inefay umanhay owbray isay ikelay ethay Eastay enwhay oubledtray ithway ethay orningmay. Inay ethay eposeray ofay ethay asturepay, ethay urledcay owbray ofay ethay ullbay ashay aay ouchtay ofay ethay andgray inay itay. Ushingpay eavyhay annoncay upay ountainmay efilesday, ethay elephant’say owbray isay ajesticmay. Umanhay oray animalay, ethay icalmystay owbray isay asay atthay eatgray oldengay ealsay affixeday byay ethay Ermangay emperorsay otay eirthay ecreesday. Itay ignifies—“Godsay: oneday isthay ayday byay myay and.”hay Utbay inay ostmay eaturescray, aynay inay anmay imselfhay, eryvay oftenay ethay owbray isay utbay aay eremay ipstray ofay alpineay andlay inglyay alongay ethay owsnay inelay. Ewfay areay ethay oreheadsfay ichwhay ikelay Akespeare’sshay oray Elancthon’smay iseray osay ighhay, anday escendday osay owlay, atthay ethay eyesay emselvesthay eemsay earclay, eternalay, idelesstay ountainmay akeslay; anday allay aboveay emthay inay ethay orehead’sfay inkleswray, ouyay eemsay otay acktray ethay antlereday oughtsthay escendingday erethay otay inkdray, asay ethay Ighlandhay untershay acktray ethay owsnay intspray ofay ethay eerday. Utbay inay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay, isthay ighhay anday ightymay od-likegay ignityday inherentay inay ethay owbray isay osay immenselyay amplifieday, atthay azinggay onay itay, inay atthay ullfay ontfray iewvay, ouyay eelfay ethay Eityday anday ethay eaddray owerspay oremay orciblyfay anthay inay eholdingbay anyay otheray objectay inay ivinglay aturenay. Orfay ouyay eesay onay oneay ointpay eciselypray; otnay oneay istinctday eaturefay isay evealedray; onay osenay, eyesay, earsay, oray outhmay; onay acefay; ehay ashay onenay, operpray; othingnay utbay atthay oneay oadbray irmamentfay ofay aay oreheadfay, eatedplay ithway iddlesray; umblyday oweringlay ithway ethay oomday ofay oatsbay, anday ipsshay, anday enmay. Ornay, inay ofilepray, oesday isthay ondrousway owbray iminishday; oughthay atthay ayway iewedvay itsay andeurgray oesday otnay omineerday uponay ouyay osay. Inay ofilepray, ouyay ainlyplay erceivepay atthay orizontalhay, emi-crescenticsay epressionday inay ethay orehead’sfay iddlemay, ichwhay, inay anmay, isay Avater’slay arkmay ofay eniusgay. 

Utbay owhay? Eniusgay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay? Ashay ethay Ermspay Alewhay everay ittenwray aay ookbay, okenspay aay eechspay? Onay, ishay eatgray eniusgay isay eclaredday inay ishay oingday othingnay articularpay otay ovepray itay. Itay isay oreovermay eclaredday inay ishay amidicalpyray ilencesay. Anday isthay emindsray emay atthay adhay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay eenbay ownknay otay ethay oungyay Orientay Orldway, ehay ouldway avehay eenbay eifiedday byay eirthay ild-magianchay oughtsthay. Eythay eifiedday ethay ocodilecray ofay ethay Ilenay, ecausebay ethay ocodilecray isay onguelesstay; anday ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay onay onguetay, oray atay eastlay itay isay osay exceedinglyay allsmay, asay otay ebay incapableay ofay otrusionpray. Ifay ereafterhay anyay ighlyhay ulturedcay, oeticalpay ationnay allshay urelay ackbay otay eirthay irth-rightbay, ethay errymay Ay-daymay odsgay ofay olday; anday ivinglylay enthroneay emthay againay inay ethay ownay egotisticalay skyay; inay ethay ownay unhaunteday illhay; enthay ebay uresay, exalteday otay Ove’sjay ighhay eatsay, ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay allshay ordlay itay. 

Ampollionchay ecipheredday ethay inkledwray anitegray ieroglyphicshay. Utbay erethay isay onay Ampollionchay otay ecipherday ethay Egyptay ofay everyay an’smay anday everyay eing’sbay acefay. Iognomyphysay, ikelay everyay otheray umanhay iencescay, isay utbay aay assingpay ablefay. Ifay enthay, Irsay Illiamway Onesjay, owhay eadray inay irtythay anguageslay, ouldcay otnay eadray ethay implestsay easant’spay acefay inay itsay ofounderpray anday oremay ubtlesay eaningsmay, owhay aymay unlettereday Ishmaelay opehay otay eadray ethay awfulay Aldeechay ofay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay owbray? IAY utbay utpay atthay owbray eforebay ouyay. Eadray itay ifay ouyay ancay. 



APTERCHAY 80ay. Ethay Utnay. 

Ifay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ebay iognomicallyphysay aay Inxsphay, otay ethay enologistphray ishay ainbray eemssay atthay eometricalgay irclecay ichwhay itay isay impossibleay otay uaresqay. 

Inay ethay ull-grownfay eaturecray ethay ullskay illway easuremay atay eastlay entytway eetfay inay engthlay. Unhingeay ethay owerlay awjay, anday ethay idesay iewvay ofay isthay ullskay isay asay ethay idesay ofay aay oderatelymay inclineday aneplay estingray oughoutthray onay aay evellay asebay. Utbay inay ife—aslay eway avehay elsewhereay een—thissay inclineday aneplay isay angularlyay illedfay upay, anday almostay uaredsqay byay ethay enormousay uperincumbentsay assmay ofay ethay unkjay anday ermspay. Atay ethay ighhay enday ethay ullskay ormsfay aay atercray otay edbay atthay artpay ofay ethay assmay; ilewhay underay ethay onglay oorflay ofay isthay ater—incray anotheray avitycay eldomsay exceedingay entay inchesay inay engthlay anday asay anymay inay epth—reposesday ethay eremay andfulhay ofay isthay onster’smay ainbray. Ethay ainbray isay atay eastlay entytway eetfay omfray ishay apparentay oreheadfay inay ifelay; itay isay iddenhay awayay ehindbay itsay astvay outworksay, ikelay ethay innermostay itadelcay ithinway ethay amplifieday ortificationsfay ofay Uebecqay. Osay ikelay aay oicechay asketcay isay itay ecretedsay inay imhay, atthay IAY avehay ownknay omesay alemenwhay owhay eremptorilypay enyday atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay anyay otheray ainbray anthay atthay alpablepay emblancesay ofay oneay ormedfay byay ethay ubic-yardscay ofay ishay ermspay agazinemay. Inglyay inay angestray oldsfay, oursescay, anday onvolutionscay, otay eirthay apprehensionsay, itay eemssay oremay inay eepingkay ithway ethay ideaay ofay ishay eneralgay ightmay otay egardray atthay icmystay artpay ofay imhay asay ethay eatsay ofay ishay intelligenceay. 

Itay isay ainplay, enthay, atthay enologicallyphray ethay eadhay ofay isthay Eviathanlay, inay ethay eature’scray ivinglay intactay atestay, isay anay entireay elusionday. Asay orfay ishay uetray ainbray, ouyay ancay enthay eesay onay indicationsay ofay itay, ornay eelfay anyay. Ethay alewhay, ikelay allay ingsthay atthay areay ightymay, earsway aay alsefay owbray otay ethay ommoncay orldway. 

Ifay ouyay unloaday ishay ullskay ofay itsay ermyspay eapshay anday enthay aketay aay earray iewvay ofay itsay earray enday, ichwhay isay ethay ighhay enday, ouyay illway ebay uckstray byay itsay esemblanceray otay ethay umanhay ullskay, eheldbay inay ethay amesay ituationsay, anday omfray ethay amesay ointpay ofay iewvay. Indeeday, aceplay isthay eversedray ullskay aled(scay ownday otay ethay umanhay agnitudemay) amongay aay ateplay ofay en’smay ullsskay, anday ouyay ouldway involuntarilyay onfoundcay itay ithway emthay; anday emarkingray ethay epressionsday onay oneay artpay ofay itsay ummitsay, inay enologicalphray asephray ouyay ouldway ay—Thissay anmay adhay onay elf-esteemsay, anday onay enerationvay. Anday byay osethay egationsnay, onsideredcay alongay ithway ethay affirmativeay actfay ofay ishay odigiouspray ulkbay anday owerpay, ouyay ancay estbay ormfay otay ourselfyay ethay uesttray, oughthay otnay ethay ostmay exhilaratingay onceptioncay ofay atwhay ethay ostmay exalteday otencypay isay. 

Utbay ifay omfray ethay omparativecay imensionsday ofay ethay ale’swhay operpray ainbray, ouyay eemday itay incapableay ofay eingbay adequatelyay artedchay, enthay IAY avehay anotheray ideaay orfay ouyay. Ifay ouyay attentivelyay egardray almostay anyay uadruped’sqay inespay, ouyay illway ebay uckstray ithway ethay esemblanceray ofay itsay ertebrævay otay aay ungstray ecklacenay ofay arfeddway ullsskay, allay earingbay udimentalray esemblanceray otay ethay ullskay operpray. Itay isay aay Ermangay onceitcay, atthay ethay ertebrævay areay absolutelyay undevelopeday ullsskay. Utbay ethay uriouscay externalay esemblanceray, IAY aketay itay ethay Ermansgay ereway otnay ethay irstfay enmay otay erceivepay. AAY oreignfay iendfray onceay ointedpay itay outay otay emay, inay ethay eletonskay ofay aay oefay ehay adhay ainslay, anday ithway ethay ertebrævay ofay ichwhay ehay asway inlayingay, inay aay ortsay ofay asso-relievobay, ethay eakedbay owpray ofay ishay anoecay. Ownay, IAY onsidercay atthay ethay enologistsphray avehay omitteday anay importantay ingthay inay otnay ushingpay eirthay investigationsay omfray ethay erebellumcay oughthray ethay inalspay analcay. Orfay IAY elievebay atthay uchmay ofay aay an’smay aracterchay illway ebay oundfay etokenedbay inay ishay ackbonebay. IAY ouldway atherray eelfay ouryay inespay anthay ouryay ullskay, oeverwhay ouyay areay. AAY inthay oistjay ofay aay inespay evernay etyay uphelday aay ullfay anday oblenay oulsay. IAY ejoiceray inay myay inespay, asay inay ethay irmfay audaciousay affstay ofay atthay agflay ichwhay IAY ingflay alfhay outay otay ethay orldway. 

Applyay isthay inalspay anchbray ofay enologyphray otay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Ishay anialcray avitycay isay ontinuouscay ithway ethay irstfay eck-vertebranay; anday inay atthay ertebravay ethay ottombay ofay ethay inalspay analcay illway easuremay entay inchesay acrossay, eingbay eightay inay eighthay, anday ofay aay iangulartray igurefay ithway ethay asebay ownwardsday. Asay itay assespay oughthray ethay emainingray ertebrævay ethay analcay aperstay inay izesay, utbay orfay aay onsiderablecay istanceday emainsray ofay argelay apacitycay. Ownay, ofay oursecay, isthay analcay isay illedfay ithway uchmay ethay amesay angelystray ibrousfay ubstance—thesay inalspay ord—ascay ethay ainbray; anday irectlyday ommunicatescay ithway ethay ainbray. Anday atwhay isay illstay oremay, orfay anymay eetfay afteray emergingay omfray ethay ain’sbray avitycay, ethay inalspay ordcay emainsray ofay anay undecreasingay irthgay, almostay equalay otay atthay ofay ethay ainbray. Underay allay esethay ircumstancescay, ouldway itay ebay unreasonableay otay urveysay anday apmay outay ethay ale’swhay inespay enologicallyphray? Orfay, iewedvay inay isthay ightlay, ethay onderfulway omparativecay allnesssmay ofay ishay ainbray operpray isay oremay anthay ompensatedcay byay ethay onderfulway omparativecay agnitudemay ofay ishay inalspay ordcay. 

Utbay eavinglay isthay inthay otay operateay asay itay aymay ithway ethay enologistsphray, IAY ouldway erelymay assumeay ethay inalspay eorythay orfay aay omentmay, inay eferenceray otay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay umphay. Isthay augustay umphay, ifay IAY istakemay otnay, isesray overay oneay ofay ethay argerlay ertebrævay, anday isay, ereforethay, inay omesay ortsay, ethay outeray onvexcay ouldmay ofay itay. Omfray itsay elativeray ituationsay enthay, IAY ouldshay allcay isthay ighhay umphay ethay organay ofay irmnessfay oray indomitablenessay inay ethay Ermspay Alewhay. Anday atthay ethay eatgray onstermay isay indomitableay, ouyay illway etyay avehay easonray otay owknay. 



APTERCHAY 81ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Irginvay. 

Ethay edestinatedpray ayday arriveday, anday eway ulyday etmay ethay ipshay Ungfraujay, Erickday Eday Eerday, astermay, ofay Emenbray. 

Atay oneay imetay ethay eatestgray alingwhay eoplepay inay ethay orldway, ethay Utchday anday Ermansgay areay ownay amongay ethay eastlay; utbay erehay anday erethay atay eryvay ideway intervalsay ofay atitudelay anday ongitudelay, ouyay illstay occasionallyay eetmay ithway eirthay agflay inay ethay Acificpay. 

Orfay omesay easonray, ethay Ungfraujay eemedsay uiteqay eageray otay aypay erhay espectsray. Ilewhay etyay omesay istanceday omfray ethay Equodpay, eshay oundedray otay, anday oppingdray aay oatbay, erhay aptaincay asway impelleday owardstay usay, impatientlyay andingstay inay ethay owsbay insteaday ofay ethay ernstay. 

at“Whay ashay ehay inay ishay andhay ere?”thay iedcray Arbuckstay, ointingpay otay omethingsay avinglyway eldhay byay ethay Ermangay. Impossible!—a“ay amp-feeder!”lay 

ot“Nay at,”thay aidsay Ubbstay, o“nay, onay, it’say aay offee-potcay, Mray. Arbuckstay; e’shay omingcay offay otay akemay usay ouray offeecay, isay ethay Armanyay; on’tday ouyay eesay atthay igbay intay ancay erethay alongsideay ofay im?—that’shay ishay oilingbay aterway. Ohay! e’shay allay ightray, isay ethay Arman.”yay 

o“Gay alongay ithway ou,”yay iedcray Askflay, it’s“ay aay amp-feederlay anday anay oil-canay. E’shay outay ofay oilay, anday ashay omecay a-begging.”ay 

Oweverhay uriouscay itay aymay eemsay orfay anay oil-shipay otay ebay orrowingbay oilay onay ethay ale-groundwhay, anday oweverhay uchmay itay aymay invertedlyay ontradictcay ethay olday overbpray aboutay arryingcay oalscay otay Ewcastlenay, etyay ometimessay uchsay aay ingthay eallyray appenshay; anday inay ethay esentpray asecay Aptaincay Erickday Eday Eerday idday indubitablyay onductcay aay amp-feederlay asay Askflay idday eclareday. 

Asay ehay ountedmay ethay eckday, Ahabay abruptlyay accosteday imhay, ithoutway atay allay eedinghay atwhay ehay adhay inay ishay andhay; utbay inay ishay okenbray ingolay, ethay Ermangay oonsay evinceday ishay ompletecay ignoranceay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay; immediatelyay urningtay ethay onversationcay otay ishay amp-feederlay anday oilay ancay, ithway omesay emarksray ouchingtay ishay avinghay otay urntay intoay ishay ammockhay atay ightnay inay ofoundpray arkness—hisday astlay opdray ofay Emenbray oilay eingbay onegay, anday otnay aay inglesay ing-fishflyay etyay apturedcay otay upplysay ethay eficiencyday; oncludingcay byay intinghay atthay ishay ipshay asway indeeday atwhay inay ethay Isheryfay isay echnicallytay alledcay aay ean_clay_ oneay at(thay isay, anay emptyay oneay), ellway eservingday ethay amenay ofay Ungfraujay oray ethay Irginvay. 

Ishay ecessitiesnay uppliedsay, Erickday epartedday; utbay ehay adhay otnay ainedgay ishay ip’sshay idesay, enwhay aleswhay ereway almostay imultaneouslysay aisedray omfray ethay ast-headsmay ofay othbay esselsvay; anday osay eageray orfay ethay asechay asway Erickday, atthay ithoutway ausingpay otay utpay ishay oil-canay anday amp-feederlay aboarday, ehay ewedslay oundray ishay oatbay anday ademay afteray ethay eviathanlay amp-feederslay. 

Ownay, ethay amegay avinghay isenray otay eewardlay, ehay anday ethay otheray eethray Ermangay oatsbay atthay oonsay ollowedfay imhay, adhay onsiderablycay ethay artstay ofay ethay Equod’spay eelskay. Erethay ereway eightay aleswhay, anay averageay odpay. Awareay ofay eirthay angerday, eythay ereway oinggay allay abreastay ithway eatgray eedspay aightstray eforebay ethay indway, ubbingray eirthay anksflay asay oselyclay asay osay anymay ansspay ofay orseshay inay arnesshay. Eythay eftlay aay eatgray, ideway akeway, asay oughthay ontinuallycay unrollingay aay eatgray ideway archmentpay uponay ethay easay. 

Ullfay inay isthay apidray akeway, anday anymay athomsfay inay ethay earray, amsway aay ugehay, umpedhay olday ullbay, ichwhay byay ishay omparativelycay owslay ogresspray, asay ellway asay byay ethay unusualay ellowishyay incrustationsay overgrowingay imhay, eemedsay afflicteday ithway ethay aundicejay, oray omesay otheray infirmityay. Etherwhay isthay alewhay elongedbay otay ethay odpay inay advanceay, eemedsay uestionableqay; orfay itay isay otnay ustomarycay orfay uchsay enerablevay eviathanslay otay ebay atay allay ocialsay. Everthelessnay, ehay uckstay otay eirthay akeway, oughthay indeeday eirthay ackbay aterway ustmay avehay etardedray imhay, ecausebay ethay ite-bonewhay oray ellsway atay ishay oadbray uzzlemay asway aay ashedday oneay, ikelay ethay ellsway ormedfay enwhay otway ostilehay urrentscay eetmay. Ishay outspay asway ortshay, owslay, anday aboriouslay; omingcay orthfay ithway aay okingchay ortsay ofay ushgay, anday endingspay itselfay inay orntay edsshray, ollowedfay byay angestray ubterraneansay ommotionscay inay imhay, ichwhay eemedsay otay avehay egressay atay ishay otheray uriedbay extremityay, ausingcay ethay atersway ehindbay imhay otay upbubbleay. 

o’s“Whay otgay omesay aregoric?”pay aidsay Ubbstay, e“hay ashay ethay omach-achestay, I’may afraiday. Ordlay, inkthay ofay avinghay alfhay anay acreay ofay omach-achestay! Adverseay indsway areay oldinghay admay Istmaschray inay imhay, oysbay. It’say ethay irstfay oulfay indway IAY everay ewknay otay owblay omfray asternay; utbay ooklay, idday everay alewhay awyay osay eforebay? itay ustmay ebay, e’shay ostlay ishay iller.”tay 

Asay anay overladenay Indiamanay earingbay ownday ethay Indostanhay oastcay ithway aay eckday oadlay ofay ightenedfray orseshay, areenscay, uriesbay, ollsray, anday allowsway onay erhay ayway; osay idday isthay olday alewhay eavehay ishay ageday ulkbay, anday ownay anday enthay artlypay urningtay overay onay ishay umbrouscay ib-endsray, exposeay ethay ausecay ofay ishay eviousday akeway inay ethay unnaturalay umpstay ofay ishay arboardstay infay. Etherwhay ehay adhay ostlay atthay infay inay attlebay, oray adhay eenbay ornbay ithoutway itay, itay ereway ardhay otay aysay. 

Only“ay aitway aay itbay, olday apchay, anday I’llay ivegay eyay aay ingslay orfay atthay oundedway arm,”ay iedcray uelcray Askflay, ointingpay otay ethay ale-linewhay earnay imhay. 

ind“May ehay on’tday ingslay eethay ithway it,”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. ive“Gay ayway, oray ethay Ermangay illway avehay im.”hay 

Ithway oneay intentay allay ethay ombinedcay ivalray oatsbay ereway ointedpay orfay isthay oneay ishfay, ecausebay otnay onlyay asway ehay ethay argestlay, anday ereforethay ethay ostmay aluablevay alewhay, utbay ehay asway earestnay otay emthay, anday ethay otheray aleswhay ereway oinggay ithway uchsay eatgray elocityvay, oreovermay, asay almostay otay efyday ursuitpay orfay ethay imetay. Atay isthay uncturejay ethay Equod’spay eelskay adhay otshay byay ethay eethray Ermangay oatsbay astlay oweredlay; utbay omfray ethay eatgray artstay ehay adhay adhay, Erick’sday oatbay illstay edlay ethay asechay, oughthay everyay omentmay earednay byay ishay oreignfay ivalsray. Ethay onlyay ingthay eythay earedfay, asway, atthay omfray eingbay alreadyay osay ighnay otay ishay arkmay, ehay ouldway ebay enableday otay artday ishay ironay eforebay eythay ouldcay ompletelycay overtakeay anday asspay imhay. Asay orfay Erickday, ehay eemedsay uiteqay onfidentcay atthay isthay ouldway ebay ethay asecay, anday occasionallyay ithway aay eridingday esturegay ookshay ishay amp-feederlay atay ethay otheray oatsbay. 

e“Thay ungraciousay anday ungratefulay og!”day iedcray Arbuckstay; e“hay ocksmay anday aresday emay ithway ethay eryvay oor-boxpay IAY illedfay orfay imhay otnay ivefay inutesmay ago!”—thenay inay ishay olday intenseay isper—“Givewhay ayway, eyhoundsgray! Ogday otay it!”ay 

I“AY elltay eyay atwhay itay isay, en”—criedmay Ubbstay otay ishay ew—“it’scray againstay myay eligionray otay etgay admay; utbay I’day ikelay otay eatay atthay illainousvay Arman—pull—won’tyay eyay? Areay eyay oinggay otay etlay atthay ascalray eatbay eyay? Oday eyay ovelay andybray? AAY ogsheadhay ofay andybray, enthay, otay ethay estbay anmay. Omecay, whyay on’tday omesay ofay eyay urstbay aay ood-vesselblay? O’swhay atthay eenbay oppingdray anay anchoray overboard—weay on’tday udgebay anay inch—we’reay ecalmedbay. Alloohay, ere’shay assgray owinggray inay ethay oat’sbay ottom—andbay byay ethay Ordlay, ethay astmay ere’sthay uddingbay. Isthay on’tway oday, oysbay. Ooklay atay atthay Armanyay! Ethay ortshay anday onglay ofay itay isay, enmay, illway eyay itspay irefay oray ot?”nay 

Oh“ay! eesay ethay udssay ehay akes!”may iedcray Askflay, ancingday upay anday own—“Whatday aay ump—Ohhay, o_day_ ilepay onay ethay eef—laysbay ikelay aay oglay! Ohay! myay adslay, o_day_ ing—slap-jacksspray anday uahogsqay orfay uppersay, ouyay owknay, myay ads—bakedlay amsclay anday uffins—ohmay, o_day_, o_day_, ing,—he’sspray aay undredhay arreller—don’tbay oselay imhay ow—don’tnay ohay, on’t!_—see_day atthay Arman—ohyay, on’tway eyay ullpay orfay ouryay uffday, myay ads—suchlay aay ogsay! uchsay aay oggersay! On’tday eyay ovelay ermspay? Erethay oesgay eethray ousandthay ollarsday, en!—amay ank!—abay olewhay ankbay! Ethay ankbay ofay England!—ohay, o_day_, o_day_, o!_—What’s_day atthay Armanyay aboutay ow?”nay 

Atay isthay omentmay Erickday asway inay ethay actay ofay itchingpay ishay amp-feederlay atay ethay advancingay oatsbay, anday alsoay ishay oil-canay; erhapspay ithway ethay oubleday iewvay ofay etardingray ishay ivals’ray ayway, anday atay ethay amesay imetay economicallyay acceleratingay ishay ownay byay ethay omentarymay impetusay ofay ethay ackwardbay osstay. 

e“Thay unmannerlyay Utchday ogger!”day iedcray Ubbstay. ull“Pay ownay, enmay, ikelay iftyfay ousandthay ine-of-battle-shiplay oadslay ofay ed-hairedray evilsday. Atwhay ed’yay aysay, Ashtegotay; areay ouyay ethay anmay otay apsnay ouryay inespay inay o-and-twentytway iecespay orfay ethay onorhay ofay olday Ayheadgay? Atwhay ed’yay ay?”say 

I“AY aysay, ullpay ikelay od-dam,”—criedgay ethay Indianay. 

Iercelyfay, utbay evenlyay inciteday byay ethay auntstay ofay ethay Ermangay, ethay Equod’spay eethray oatsbay ownay eganbay angingray almostay abreastay; anday, osay isposedday, omentarilymay earednay imhay. Inay atthay inefay, ooselay, ivalrouschay attitudeay ofay ethay eadsmanhay enwhay awingdray earnay otay ishay eypray, ethay eethray atesmay oodstay upay oudlypray, occasionallyay ackingbay ethay afteray oarsmanay ithway anay exhilaratingay cryay ofay, ere“Thay eshay idesslay, ownay! Urrahhay orfay ethay ite-ashwhay eezebray! Ownday ithway ethay Armanyay! Ailsay overay im!”hay 

Utbay osay ecidedday anay originalay artstay adhay Erickday adhay, atthay itespay ofay allay eirthay allantrygay, ehay ouldway avehay ovedpray ethay ictorvay inay isthay aceray, adhay otnay aay ighteousray udgmentjay escendedday uponay imhay inay aay abcray ichwhay aughtcay ethay adeblay ofay ishay idshipmay oarsmanay. Ilewhay isthay umsyclay ubberlay asway ivingstray otay eefray ishay ite-ashwhay, anday ilewhay, inay onsequencecay, Erick’sday oatbay asway ighnay otay apsizingcay, anday ehay underingthay awayay atay ishay enmay inay aay ightymay age;—thatray asway aay oodgay imetay orfay Arbuckstay, Ubbstay, anday Askflay. Ithway aay outshay, eythay ooktay aay ortalmay artstay orwardsfay, anday antinglyslay angedray upay onay ethay Erman’sgay uarterqay. Anay instantay oremay, anday allay ourfay oatsbay ereway iagonicallyday inay ethay ale’swhay immediateay akeway, ilewhay etchingstray omfray emthay, onay othbay idessay, asway ethay oamingfay ellsway atthay ehay ademay. 

Itay asway aay errifictay, ostmay itiablepay, anday addeningmay ightsay. Ethay alewhay asway ownay oinggay eadhay outay, anday endingsay ishay outspay eforebay imhay inay aay ontinualcay ormentedtay etjay; ilewhay ishay oneay oorpay infay eatbay ishay idesay inay anay agonyay ofay ightfray. Ownay otay isthay andhay, ownay otay atthay, ehay awedyay inay ishay alteringfay ightflay, anday illstay atay everyay illowbay atthay ehay okebray, ehay asmodicallyspay anksay inay ethay easay, oray idewayssay olledray owardstay ethay skyay ishay oneay eatingbay infay. Osay avehay IAY eensay aay irdbay ithway ippedclay ingway akingmay affrighteday okenbray irclescay inay ethay airay, ainlyvay ivingstray otay escapeay ethay iraticalpay awkshay. Utbay ethay irdbay ashay aay oicevay, anday ithway aintiveplay iescray illway akemay ownknay erhay earfay; utbay ethay earfay ofay isthay astvay umbday utebray ofay ethay easay, asway ainedchay upay anday enchanteday inay imhay; ehay adhay onay oicevay, avesay atthay okingchay espirationray oughthray ishay iraclespay, anday isthay ademay ethay ightsay ofay imhay unspeakablyay itiablepay; ilewhay illstay, inay ishay amazingay ulkbay, ortcullispay awjay, anday omnipotentay ailtay, erethay asway enoughay otay appalay ethay outeststay anmay owhay osay itiedpay. 

Eeingsay ownay atthay utbay aay eryvay ewfay omentsmay oremay ouldway ivegay ethay Equod’spay oatsbay ethay advantageay, anday atherray anthay ebay usthay oiledfay ofay ishay amegay, Erickday osechay otay azardhay atwhay otay imhay ustmay avehay eemedsay aay ostmay unusuallyay onglay artday, ereay ethay astlay ancechay ouldway orfay everay escapeay. 

Utbay onay oonersay idday ishay arpooneerhay andstay upay orfay ethay okestray, anthay allay eethray igers—Queequegtay, Ashtegotay, Aggoo—instinctivelyday angspray otay eirthay eetfay, anday andingstay inay aay iagonalday owray, imultaneouslysay ointedpay eirthay arbsbay; anday artedday overay ethay eadhay ofay ethay Ermangay arpooneerhay, eirthay eethray Antucketnay ironsay entereday ethay alewhay. Indingblay aporsvay ofay oamfay anday ite-firewhay! Ethay eethray oatsbay, inay ethay irstfay uryfay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadlonghay ushray, umpedbay ethay Erman’sgay asideay ithway uchsay orcefay, atthay othbay Erickday anday ishay affledbay arpooneerhay ereway illedspay outay, anday ailedsay overay byay ethay eethray ingflyay eelskay. 

on’t“Day ebay afraiday, myay utter-boxes,”bay iedcray Ubbstay, astingcay aay assingpay anceglay uponay emthay asay ehay otshay byay; e’ll“yay ebay ickedpay upay esently—allpray ight—Iray awsay omesay arksshay astern—Stay. Ernard’sbay ogsday, ouyay ow—relieveknay istressedday avellerstray. Urrahhay! isthay isay ethay ayway otay ailsay ownay. Everyay eelkay aay unbeamsay! Urrah!—herehay eway ogay ikelay eethray intay ettleskay atay ethay ailtay ofay aay admay ougarcay! Isthay utspay emay inay indmay ofay asteningfay otay anay elephantay inay aay ilburytay onay aay ain—makesplay ethay eel-spokeswhay flyay, oysbay, enwhay ouyay astenfay otay imhay atthay ayway; anday ere’sthay angerday ofay eingbay itchedpay outay ootay, enwhay ouyay ikestray aay illhay. Urrahhay! isthay isay ethay ayway aay ellowfay eelsfay enwhay e’shay oinggay otay Avyday Ones—alljay aay ushray ownday anay endlessay inclineday aneplay! Urrahhay! isthay alewhay arriescay ethay everlastingay ail!”may 

Utbay ethay onster’smay unray asway aay iefbray oneay. Ivinggay aay uddensay aspgay, ehay umultuouslytay oundedsay. Ithway aay atinggray ushray, ethay eethray ineslay ewflay oundray ethay oggerheadslay ithway uchsay aay orcefay asay otay ougegay eepday oovesgray inay emthay; ilewhay osay earfulfay ereway ethay arpooneershay atthay isthay apidray oundingsay ouldway oonsay exhaustay ethay ineslay, atthay usingay allay eirthay exterousday ightmay, eythay aughtcay epeatedray okingsmay urnstay ithway ethay operay otay oldhay onay; illtay atay ast—owinglay otay ethay erpendicularpay ainstray omfray ethay ead-linedlay ockschay ofay ethay oatsbay, encewhay ethay eethray opesray entway aightstray ownday intoay ethay ue—theblay unwalesgay ofay ethay owsbay ereway almostay evenay ithway ethay aterway, ilewhay ethay eethray ernsstay iltedtay ighhay inay ethay airay.
