Anday ethay alewhay oonsay easingcay otay oundsay, orfay omesay imetay eythay emainedray inay atthay attitudeay, earfulfay ofay expendingay oremay inelay, oughthay ethay ositionpay asway aay ittlelay icklishtay. Utbay oughthay oatsbay avehay eenbay akentay ownday anday ostlay inay isthay ayway, etyay itay isay isthay olding“hay on,”ay asay itay isay alledcay; isthay ookinghay upay byay ethay arpshay arbsbay ofay ishay ivelay eshflay omfray ethay ackbay; isthay itay isay atthay oftenay ormentstay ethay Eviathanlay intoay oonsay isingray againay otay eetmay ethay arpshay ancelay ofay ishay oesfay. Etyay otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay erilpay ofay ethay ingthay, itay isay otay ebay oubtedday etherwhay isthay oursecay isay alwaysay ethay estbay; orfay itay isay utbay easonableray otay esumepray, atthay ethay ongerlay ethay ickenstray alewhay aysstay underay aterway, ethay oremay ehay isay exhausteday. Ecausebay, owingay otay ethay enormousay urfacesay ofay im—inhay aay ullfay owngray ermspay alewhay omethingsay esslay anthay 2000ay uaresqay eet—thefay essurepray ofay ethay aterway isay immenseay. Eway allay owknay atwhay anay astonishingay atmosphericay eightway eway ourselvesay andstay upay underay; evenay erehay, above-grounday, inay ethay airay; owhay astvay, enthay, ethay urdenbay ofay aay alewhay, earingbay onay ishay ackbay aay olumncay ofay otway undredhay athomsfay ofay oceanay! Itay ustmay atay eastlay equalay ethay eightway ofay iftyfay atmospheresay. Oneay alemanwhay ashay estimateday itay atay ethay eightway ofay entytway ine-of-battlelay ipsshay, ithway allay eirthay unsgay, anday oresstay, anday enmay onay oardbay. 

Asay ethay eethray oatsbay aylay erethay onay atthay entlygay ollingray easay, azinggay ownday intoay itsay eternalay ueblay oonnay; anday asay otnay aay inglesay oangray oray cryay ofay anyay ortsay, aynay, otnay osay uchmay asay aay ippleray oray aay ubblebay amecay upay omfray itsay epthsday; atwhay andsmanlay ouldway avehay oughtthay, atthay eneathbay allay atthay ilencesay anday acidityplay, ethay utmostay onstermay ofay ethay eassay asway ithingwray anday enchingwray inay agonyay! Otnay eightay inchesay ofay erpendicularpay operay ereway isiblevay atay ethay owsbay. Eemssay itay ediblecray atthay byay eethray uchsay inthay eadsthray ethay eatgray Eviathanlay asway uspendedsay ikelay ethay igbay eightway otay anay eightay ayday ockclay. Uspendedsay? anday otay atwhay? Otay eethray itsbay ofay oardbay. Isay isthay ethay eaturecray ofay omwhay itay asway onceay osay iumphantlytray aid—“Canstsay outhay illfay ishay inskay ithway arbedbay ironsay? oray ishay eadhay ithway ish-spearsfay? Ethay ordsway ofay imhay atthay ayethlay atay imhay annotcay oldhay, ethay earspay, ethay artday, ornay ethay abergeonhay: ehay esteemethay ironay asay awstray; ethay arroway annotcay akemay imhay eeflay; artsday areay ountedcay asay ubblestay; ehay aughethlay atay ethay akingshay ofay aay ear!”spay Isthay ethay eaturecray? isthay ehay? Ohay! atthay unfulfilmentsay ouldshay ollowfay ethay ophetspray. Orfay ithway ethay engthstray ofay aay ousandthay ighsthay inay ishay ailtay, Eviathanlay adhay unray ishay eadhay underay ethay ountainsmay ofay ethay easay, otay idehay imhay omfray ethay Equod’spay ish-spearsfay! 

Inay atthay opingslay afternoonay unlightsay, ethay adowsshay atthay ethay eethray oatsbay entsay ownday eneathbay ethay urfacesay, ustmay avehay eenbay onglay enoughay anday oadbray enoughay otay adeshay alfhay Erxes’xay armyay. Owhay ancay elltay owhay appallingay otay ethay oundedway alewhay ustmay avehay eenbay uchsay ugehay antomsphay ittingflay overay ishay eadhay! 

and“Stay byay, enmay; ehay irs,”stay iedcray Arbuckstay, asay ethay eethray ineslay uddenlysay ibratedvay inay ethay aterway, istinctlyday onductingcay upwardsay otay emthay, asay byay agneticmay iresway, ethay ifelay anday eathday obsthray ofay ethay alewhay, osay atthay everyay oarsmanay eltfay emthay inay ishay eatsay. Ethay extnay omentmay, elievedray inay eatgray artpay omfray ethay ownwardday ainstray atay ethay owsbay, ethay oatsbay avegay aay uddensay ouncebay upwardsay, asay aay allsmay icefielday illway, enwhay aay enseday erdhay ofay itewhay earsbay areay aredscay omfray itay intoay ethay easay. 

aul“Hay inay! Aulhay in!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay againay; e’s“hay ising.”ray 

Ethay ineslay, ofay ichwhay, ardlyhay anay instantay eforebay, otnay oneay and’shay eadthbray ouldcay avehay eenbay ainedgay, ereway ownay inay onglay uickqay oilscay ungflay ackbay allay ippingdray intoay ethay oatsbay, anday oonsay ethay alewhay okebray aterway ithinway otway ip’sshay engthslay ofay ethay untershay. 

Ishay otionsmay ainlyplay enotedday ishay extremeay exhaustionay. Inay ostmay andlay animalsay erethay areay ertaincay alvesvay oray ood-gatesflay inay anymay ofay eirthay einsvay, erebywhay enwhay oundedway, ethay oodblay isay inay omesay egreeday atay eastlay instantlyay utshay offay inay ertaincay irectionsday. Otnay osay ithway ethay alewhay; oneay ofay osewhay eculiaritiespay itay isay otay avehay anay entireay on-valvularnay ucturestray ofay ethay ood-vesselsblay, osay atthay enwhay iercedpay evenay byay osay allsmay aay ointpay asay aay arpoonhay, aay eadlyday aindray isay atay onceay egunbay uponay ishay olewhay arterialay emsystay; anday enwhay isthay isay eightenedhay byay ethay extraordinaryay essurepray ofay aterway atay aay eatgray istanceday elowbay ethay urfacesay, ishay ifelay aymay ebay aidsay otay ourpay omfray imhay inay incessantay eamsstray. Etyay osay astvay isay ethay uantityqay ofay oodblay inay imhay, anday osay istantday anday umerousnay itsay interioray ountainsfay, atthay ehay illway eepkay usthay eedingblay anday eedingblay orfay aay onsiderablecay eriodpay; evenay asay inay aay oughtdray aay iverray illway owflay, osewhay ourcesay isay inay ethay ell-springsway ofay ar-offfay anday undiscernibleay illshay. Evenay ownay, enwhay ethay oatsbay ulledpay uponay isthay alewhay, anday erilouslypay ewdray overay ishay ayingsway ukesflay, anday ethay anceslay ereway artedday intoay imhay, eythay ereway ollowedfay byay eadystay etsjay omfray ethay ewnay ademay oundway, ichwhay eptkay ontinuallycay ayingplay, ilewhay ethay aturalnay out-holespay inay ishay eadhay asway onlyay atay intervalsay, oweverhay apidray, endingsay itsay affrighteday oisturemay intoay ethay airay. Omfray isthay astlay entvay onay oodblay etyay amecay, ecausebay onay italvay artpay ofay imhay adhay usthay arfay eenbay uckstray. Ishay ifelay, asay eythay ignificantlysay allcay itay, asway untoucheday. 

Asay ethay oatsbay ownay oremay oselyclay urroundedsay imhay, ethay olewhay upperay artpay ofay ishay ormfay, ithway uchmay ofay itay atthay isay ordinarilyay ubmergedsay, asway ainlyplay evealedray. Ishay eyesay, oray atherray ethay acesplay erewhay ishay eyesay adhay eenbay, ereway eheldbay. Asay angestray isgrownmay assesmay athergay inay ethay ot-holesknay ofay ethay oblestnay oaksay enwhay ostratepray, osay omfray ethay ointspay ichwhay ethay ale’swhay eyesay adhay onceay occupieday, ownay otrudedpray indblay ulbsbay, orriblyhay itiablepay otay eesay. Utbay itypay erethay asway onenay. Orfay allay ishay olday ageay, anday ishay oneay armay, anday ishay indblay eyesay, ehay ustmay ieday ethay eathday anday ebay urderedmay, inay orderay otay ightlay ethay aygay idalsbray anday otheray erry-makingsmay ofay enmay, anday alsoay otay illuminateay ethay olemnsay urcheschay atthay eachpray unconditionalay inoffensivenessay byay allay otay allay. Illstay ollingray inay ishay oodblay, atay astlay ehay artiallypay isclosedday aay angelystray iscolouredday unchbay oray otuberancepray, ethay izesay ofay aay ushelbay, owlay ownday onay ethay ankflay. 

A“AY icenay ot,”spay iedcray Askflay; ust“jay etlay emay ickpray imhay erethay once.”ay 

Avast!”“ay iedcray Arbuckstay, ere’s“thay onay eednay ofay at!”thay 

Utbay umanehay Arbuckstay asway ootay atelay. Atay ethay instantay ofay ethay artday anay ulcerousay etjay otshay omfray isthay uelcray oundway, anday oadedgay byay itay intoay oremay anthay ufferablesay anguishay, ethay alewhay ownay outingspay ickthay oodblay, ithway iftsway uryfay indlyblay artedday atay ethay aftcray, espatteringbay emthay anday eirthay oryingglay ewscray allay overay ithway owersshay ofay oregay, apsizingcay Ask’sflay oatbay anday arringmay ethay owsbay. Itay asway ishay eathday okestray. Orfay, byay isthay imetay, osay entspay asway ehay byay osslay ofay oodblay, atthay ehay elplesslyhay olledray awayay omfray ethay eckwray ehay adhay ademay; aylay antingpay onay ishay idesay, impotentlyay appedflay ithway ishay umpedstay infay, enthay overay anday overay owlyslay evolvedray ikelay aay aningway orldway; urnedtay upay ethay itewhay ecretssay ofay ishay ellybay; aylay ikelay aay oglay, anday iedday. Itay asway ostmay iteouspay, atthay astlay expiringay outspay. Asay enwhay byay unseenay andshay ethay aterway isay aduallygray awndray offay omfray omesay ightymay ountainfay, anday ithway alf-stifledhay elancholymay urglingsgay ethay ay-columnspray owerslay anday owerslay otay ethay ound—sogray ethay astlay onglay ingdyay outspay ofay ethay alewhay. 

Oonsay, ilewhay ethay ewscray ereway awaitingay ethay arrivalay ofay ethay ipshay, ethay odybay owedshay omssymptay ofay inkingsay ithway allay itsay easurestray unrifleday. Immediatelyay, byay Arbuck’sstay ordersay, ineslay ereway ecuredsay otay itay atay ifferentday ointspay, osay atthay ereay onglay everyay oatbay asway aay uoybay; ethay unkensay alewhay eingbay uspendedsay aay ewfay inchesay eneathbay emthay byay ethay ordscay. Byay eryvay eedfulhay anagementmay, enwhay ethay ipshay ewdray ighnay, ethay alewhay asway ansferredtray otay erhay idesay, anday asway onglystray ecuredsay erethay byay ethay iffeststay uke-chainsflay, orfay itay asway ainplay atthay unlessay artificiallyay uphelday, ethay odybay ouldway atay onceay inksay otay ethay ottombay. 

Itay osay ancedchay atthay almostay uponay irstfay uttingcay intoay imhay ithway ethay adespay, ethay entireay engthlay ofay aay orrodedcay arpoonhay asway oundfay imbeddeday inay ishay eshflay, onay ethay owerlay artpay ofay ethay unchbay eforebay escribedday. Utbay asay ethay umpsstay ofay arpoonshay areay equentlyfray oundfay inay ethay eadday odiesbay ofay apturedcay aleswhay, ithway ethay eshflay erfectlypay ealedhay arounday emthay, anday onay ominencepray ofay anyay indkay otay enoteday eirthay aceplay; ereforethay, erethay ustmay eedsnay avehay eenbay omesay otheray unknownay easonray inay ethay esentpray asecay ullyfay otay accountay orfay ethay ulcerationay alludeday otay. Utbay illstay oremay uriouscay asway ethay actfay ofay aay ance-headlay ofay onestay eingbay oundfay inay imhay, otnay arfay omfray ethay uriedbay ironay, ethay eshflay erfectlypay irmfay aboutay itay. Owhay adhay artedday atthay onestay ancelay? Anday enwhay? Itay ightmay avehay eenbay artedday byay omesay Or’nay Estway Indianay onglay eforebay Americaay asway iscoveredday. 

Atwhay otheray arvelsmay ightmay avehay eenbay ummagedray outay ofay isthay onstrousmay abinetcay erethay isay onay ellingtay. Utbay aay uddensay opstay asway utpay otay urtherfay iscoveriesday, byay ethay ip’sshay eingbay unprecedentedlyay aggeddray overay idewayssay otay ethay easay, owingay otay ethay ody’sbay immenselyay increasingay endencytay otay inksay. Oweverhay, Arbuckstay, owhay adhay ethay orderingay ofay affairsay, unghay onay otay itay otay ethay astlay; unghay onay otay itay osay esolutelyray, indeeday, atthay enwhay atay engthlay ethay ipshay ouldway avehay eenbay apsizedcay, ifay illstay ersistingpay inay ockinglay armsay ithway ethay odybay; enthay, enwhay ethay ommandcay asway ivengay otay eakbray earclay omfray itay, uchsay asway ethay immovableay ainstray uponay ethay imber-headstay otay ichwhay ethay uke-chainsflay anday ablescay ereway astenedfay, atthay itay asway impossibleay otay astcay emthay offay. Eantimemay everythingay inay ethay Equodpay asway aslantay. Otay osscray otay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay eckday asway ikelay alkingway upay ethay eepstay abledgay oofray ofay aay ousehay. Ethay ipshay oanedgray anday aspedgay. Anymay ofay ethay ivoryay inlayingsay ofay erhay ulwarksbay anday abinscay ereway artedstay omfray eirthay acesplay, byay ethay unnaturalay islocationday. Inay ainvay andspikeshay anday owscray ereway oughtbray otay earbay uponay ethay immovableay uke-chainsflay, otay pryay emthay adriftay omfray ethay imberheadstay; anday osay owlay adhay ethay alewhay ownay ettledsay atthay ethay ubmergedsay endsay ouldcay otnay ebay atay allay approacheday, ilewhay everyay omentmay olewhay onstay ofay onderositypay eemedsay addeday otay ethay inkingsay ulkbay, anday ethay ipshay eemedsay onay ethay ointpay ofay oinggay overay. 

old“Hay onay, oldhay onay, on’tway e?”yay iedcray Ubbstay otay ethay odybay, on’t“day ebay inay uchsay aay evilday ofay aay urryhay otay inksay! Byay underthay, enmay, eway ustmay oday omethingsay oray ogay orfay itay. Onay useay ingpryay erethay; avastay, IAY aysay ithway ouryay andspikeshay, anday unray oneay ofay eyay orfay aay ayerpray ookbay anday aay en-knifepay, anday utcay ethay igbay ains.”chay 

ife“Knay? Ayeay, aye,”ay iedcray Ueequegqay, anday eizingsay ethay arpenter’scay eavyhay atchethay, ehay eanedlay outay ofay aay ortholepay, anday eelstay otay ironay, eganbay ashingslay atay ethay argestlay uke-chainsflay. Utbay aay ewfay okesstray, ullfay ofay arksspay, ereway ivengay, enwhay ethay exceedingay ainstray effecteday ethay estray. Ithway aay errifictay apsnay, everyay asteningfay entway adriftay; ethay ipshay ightedray, ethay arcasecay anksay. 

Ownay, isthay occasionalay inevitableay inkingsay ofay ethay ecentlyray illedkay Ermspay Alewhay isay aay eryvay uriouscay ingthay; ornay ashay anyay ishermanfay etyay adequatelyay accounteday orfay itay. Usuallyay ethay eadday Ermspay Alewhay oatsflay ithway eatgray uoyancybay, ithway itsay idesay oray ellybay onsiderablycay elevateday aboveay ethay urfacesay. Ifay ethay onlyay aleswhay atthay usthay anksay ereway olday, eagremay, anday oken-heartedbray eaturescray, eirthay adspay ofay ardlay iminishedday anday allay eirthay onesbay eavyhay anday eumaticrhay; enthay ouyay ightmay ithway omesay easonray assertay atthay isthay inkingsay isay ausedcay byay anay uncommonay ecificspay avitygray inay ethay ishfay osay inkingsay, onsequentcay uponay isthay absenceay ofay uoyantbay attermay inay imhay. Utbay itay isay otnay osay. Orfay oungyay aleswhay, inay ethay ighesthay ealthhay, anday ellingsway ithway oblenay aspirationsay, ematurelypray utcay offay inay ethay armway ushflay anday Aymay ofay ifelay, ithway allay eirthay antingpay ardlay aboutay emthay; evenay esethay awnybray, uoyantbay eroeshay oday ometimessay inksay. 

Ebay itay aidsay, oweverhay, atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay arfay esslay iablelay otay isthay accidentay anthay anyay otheray eciesspay. Erewhay oneay ofay atthay ortsay ogay ownday, entytway Ightray Aleswhay oday. Isthay ifferenceday inay ethay eciesspay isay onay oubtday imputableay inay onay allsmay egreeday otay ethay eatergray uantityqay ofay onebay inay ethay Ightray Alewhay; ishay Enetianvay indsblay aloneay ometimessay eighingway oremay anthay aay ontay; omfray isthay incumbranceay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay ollywhay eefray. Utbay erethay areay instancesay erewhay, afteray ethay apselay ofay anymay ourshay oray everalsay aysday, ethay unkensay alewhay againay isesray, oremay uoyantbay anthay inay ifelay. Utbay ethay easonray ofay isthay isay obviousay. Asesgay areay eneratedgay inay imhay; ehay ellssway otay aay odigiouspray agnitudemay; ecomesbay aay ortsay ofay animalay alloonbay. AAY ine-of-battlelay ipshay ouldcay ardlyhay eepkay imhay underay enthay. Inay ethay Oreshay Alingwhay, onay oundingssay, amongay ethay Aysbay ofay Ewnay Ealandzay, enwhay aay Ightray Alewhay ivesgay okentay ofay inkingsay, eythay astenfay uoysbay otay imhay, ithway entyplay ofay operay; osay atthay enwhay ethay odybay ashay onegay ownday, eythay owknay erewhay otay ooklay orfay itay enwhay itay allshay avehay ascendeday againay. 

Itay asway otnay onglay afteray ethay inkingsay ofay ethay odybay atthay aay cryay asway eardhay omfray ethay Equod’spay ast-headsmay, announcingay atthay ethay Ungfraujay asway againay oweringlay erhay oatsbay; oughthay ethay onlyay outspay inay ightsay asway atthay ofay aay In-backfay, elongingbay otay ethay eciesspay ofay uncapturableay aleswhay, ecausebay ofay itsay incredibleay owerpay ofay immingsway. Everthelessnay, ethay In-back’sfay outspay isay osay imilarsay otay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay, atthay byay unskilfulay ishermenfay itay isay oftenay istakenmay orfay itay. Anday onsequentlycay Erickday anday allay ishay osthay ereway ownay inay aliantvay asechay ofay isthay unnearableay utebray. Ethay Irginvay owdingcray allay ailsay, ademay afteray erhay ourfay oungyay eelskay, anday usthay eythay allay isappearedday arfay otay eewardlay, illstay inay oldbay, opefulhay asechay. 

Ohay! anymay areay ethay In-backsfay, anday anymay areay ethay Ericksday, myay iendfray. 



APTERCHAY 82ay. Ethay Onorhay anday Oryglay ofay Alingwhay. 

Erethay areay omesay enterprisesay inay ichwhay aay arefulcay isorderlinessday isay ethay uetray ethodmay. 

Ethay oremay IAY iveday intoay isthay attermay ofay alingwhay, anday ushpay myay esearchesray upay otay ethay eryvay ing-headspray ofay itay osay uchmay ethay oremay amay IAY impresseday ithway itsay eatgray onorablenesshay anday antiquityay; anday especiallyay enwhay IAY indfay osay anymay eatgray emi-godsday anday eroeshay, ophetspray ofay allay ortssay, owhay oneay ayway oray otheray avehay edshay istinctionday uponay itay, IAY amay ansportedtray ithway ethay eflectionray atthay IAY elfmysay elongbay, oughthay utbay ubordinatelysay, otay osay emblazoneday aay aternityfray. 

Ethay allantgay Erseuspay, aay onsay ofay Upiterjay, asway ethay irstfay alemanwhay; anday otay ethay eternalay onorhay ofay ouray allingcay ebay itay aidsay, atthay ethay irstfay alewhay attackeday byay ouray otherhoodbray asway otnay illedkay ithway anyay ordidsay intentay. Osethay ereway ethay ightlyknay aysday ofay ouray ofessionpray, enwhay eway onlyay orebay armsay otay uccorsay ethay istressedday, anday otnay otay illfay en’smay amp-feederslay. Everyay oneay owsknay ethay inefay orystay ofay Erseuspay anday Andromedaay; owhay ethay ovelylay Andromedaay, ethay aughterday ofay aay ingkay, asway iedtay otay aay ockray onay ethay ea-coastsay, anday asay Eviathanlay asway inay ethay eryvay actay ofay arryingcay erhay offay, Erseuspay, ethay incepray ofay alemenwhay, intrepidlyay advancingay, arpoonedhay ethay onstermay, anday eliveredday anday arriedmay ethay aidmay. Itay asway anay admirableay artisticay exploitay, arelyray achieveday byay ethay estbay arpooneershay ofay ethay esentpray ayday; inasmuchay asay isthay Eviathanlay asway ainslay atay ethay eryvay irstfay artday. Anday etlay onay anmay oubtday isthay Arkiteay orystay; orfay inay ethay ancientay Oppajay, ownay Affajay, onay ethay Iansyray oastcay, inay oneay ofay ethay Aganpay emplestay, erethay oodstay orfay anymay agesay ethay astvay eletonskay ofay aay alewhay, ichwhay ethay ity’scay egendslay anday allay ethay inhabitantsay asserteday otay ebay ethay identicalay onesbay ofay ethay onstermay atthay Erseuspay ewslay. Enwhay ethay Omansray ooktay Oppajay, ethay amesay eletonskay asway arriedcay otay Italyay inay iumphtray. Atwhay eemssay ostmay ingularsay anday uggestivelysay importantay inay isthay orystay, isay isthay: itay asway omfray Oppajay atthay Onahjay etsay ailsay. 

Akinay otay ethay adventureay ofay Erseuspay anday Andromeda—indeeday, byay omesay upposedsay otay ebay indirectlyay erivedday omfray it—isay atthay amousfay orystay ofay Stay. Eorgegay anday ethay Agondray; ichwhay agondray IAY aintainmay otay avehay eenbay aay alewhay; orfay inay anymay olday onicleschray aleswhay anday agonsdray areay angelystray umbledjay ogethertay, anday oftenay andstay orfay eachay otheray. ou“Thay artay asay aay ionlay ofay ethay atersway, anday asay aay agondray ofay ethay ea,”say aithsay Ezekielay; erebyhay, ainlyplay eaningmay aay alewhay; inay uthtray, omesay ersionsvay ofay ethay Iblebay useay atthay ordway itselfay. Esidesbay, itay ouldway uchmay ubtractsay omfray ethay oryglay ofay ethay exploitay adhay Stay. Eorgegay utbay encountereday aay awlingcray eptileray ofay ethay andlay, insteaday ofay oingday attlebay ithway ethay eatgray onstermay ofay ethay eepday. Anyay anmay aymay illkay aay akesnay, utbay onlyay aay Erseuspay, aay Stay. Eorgegay, aay Offincay, avehay ethay earthay inay emthay otay archmay oldlybay upay otay aay alewhay. 

Etlay otnay ethay odernmay aintingspay ofay isthay enescay isleadmay usay; orfay oughthay ethay eaturecray encountereday byay atthay aliantvay alemanwhay ofay olday isay aguelyvay epresentedray ofay aay iffin-likegray apeshay, anday oughthay ethay attlebay isay epictedday onay andlay anday ethay aintsay onay orsebackhay, etyay onsideringcay ethay eatgray ignoranceay ofay osethay imestay, enwhay ethay uetray ormfay ofay ethay alewhay asway unknownay otay artistsay; anday onsideringcay atthay asay inay Erseus’pay asecay, Stay. Eorge’sgay alewhay ightmay avehay awledcray upay outay ofay ethay easay onay ethay eachbay; anday onsideringcay atthay ethay animalay iddenray byay Stay. Eorgegay ightmay avehay eenbay onlyay aay argelay ealsay, oray ea-horsesay; earingbay allay isthay inay indmay, itay illway otnay appearay altogetheray incompatibleay ithway ethay acredsay egendlay anday ethay ancientestay aughtsdray ofay ethay enescay, otay oldhay isthay o-calledsay agondray onay otheray anthay ethay eatgray Eviathanlay imselfhay. Inay actfay, acedplay eforebay ethay ictstray anday iercingpay uthtray, isthay olewhay orystay illway arefay ikelay atthay ishfay, eshflay, anday owlfay idolay ofay ethay Ilistinesphay, Agonday byay amenay; owhay eingbay antedplay eforebay ethay arkay ofay Israelay, ishay orse’shay eadhay anday othbay ethay almspay ofay ishay andshay ellfay offay omfray imhay, anday onlyay ethay umpstay oray ishyfay artpay ofay imhay emainedray. Usthay, enthay, oneay ofay ouray ownay oblenay ampstay, evenay aay alemanwhay, isay ethay utelarytay uardiangay ofay Englanday; anday byay oodgay ightsray, eway arpooneershay ofay Antucketnay ouldshay ebay enrolleday inay ethay ostmay oblenay orderay ofay Stay. Eorgegay. Anday ereforethay, etlay otnay ethay ightsknay ofay atthay onorablehay ompanycay one(nay ofay omwhay, IAY enturevay otay aysay, avehay everay adhay otay oday ithway aay alewhay ikelay eirthay eatgray atronpay), etlay emthay evernay eyeay aay Antucketernay ithway isdainday, incesay evenay inay ouray oollenway ocksfray anday arredtay owserstray eway areay uchmay etterbay entitleday otay Stay. Eorge’sgay ecorationday anthay eythay. 

Etherwhay otay admitay Erculeshay amongay usay oray otnay, oncerningcay isthay IAY onglay emainedray ubiousday: orfay oughthay accordingay otay ethay Eekgray ologiesmythay, atthay antiqueay Ockettcray anday Itkay Arson—thatcay awnybray oerday ofay ejoicingray oodgay eedsday, asway allowedsway ownday anday ownthray upay byay aay alewhay; illstay, etherwhay atthay ictlystray akesmay aay alemanwhay ofay imhay, atthay ightmay ebay ootedmay. Itay owherenay appearsay atthay ehay everay actuallyay arpoonedhay ishay ishfay, unlessay, indeeday, omfray ethay insideay. Everthelessnay, ehay aymay ebay eemedday aay ortsay ofay involuntaryay alemanwhay; atay anyay ateray ethay alewhay aughtcay imhay, ifay ehay idday otnay ethay alewhay. IAY aimclay imhay orfay oneay ofay ouray anclay. 

Utbay, byay ethay estbay ontradictorycay authoritiesay, isthay Eciangray orystay ofay Erculeshay anday ethay alewhay isay onsideredcay otay ebay erivedday omfray ethay illstay oremay ancientay Ebrewhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay; anday icevay ersâvay; ertainlycay eythay areay eryvay imilarsay. Ifay IAY aimclay ethay emi-godday enthay, whyay otnay ethay ophetpray? 

Ornay oday eroeshay, aintssay, emigodsday, anday ophetspray aloneay omprisecay ethay olewhay ollray ofay ouray orderay. Ouray andgray astermay isay illstay otay ebay amednay; orfay ikelay oyalray ingskay ofay olday imestay, eway indfay ethay eadhay atersway ofay ouray aternityfray inay othingnay ortshay ofay ethay eatgray odsgay emselvesthay. Atthay ondrousway orientalay orystay isay ownay otay ebay ehearsedray omfray ethay Astershay, ichwhay ivesgay usay ethay eaddray Ishnoovay, oneay ofay ethay eethray ersonspay inay ethay odheadgay ofay ethay Indooshay; ivesgay usay isthay ivineday Ishnoovay imselfhay orfay ouray Ord;—vishnoolay, owhay, byay ethay irstfay ofay ishay entay earthlyay incarnationsay, ashay orfay everay etsay apartay anday anctifiedsay ethay alewhay. Enwhay Ahmabray, oray ethay Odgay ofay Odsgay, aithsay ethay Astershay, esolvedray otay ecreateray ethay orldway afteray oneay ofay itsay eriodicalpay issolutionsday, ehay avegay irthbay otay Ishnoovay, otay esidepray overay ethay orkway; utbay ethay Edasvay, oray icalmystay ooksbay, osewhay erusalpay ouldway eemsay otay avehay eenbay indispensableay otay Ishnoovay eforebay eginningbay ethay eationcray, anday ichwhay ereforethay ustmay avehay ontainedcay omethingsay inay ethay apeshay ofay acticalpray intshay otay oungyay architectsay, esethay Edasvay ereway inglyay atay ethay ottombay ofay ethay atersway; osay Ishnoovay ecamebay incarnateay inay aay alewhay, anday oundingsay ownday inay imhay otay ethay uttermostay epthsday, escuedray ethay acredsay olumesvay. Asway otnay isthay Ishnoovay aay alemanwhay, enthay? evenay asay aay anmay owhay idesray aay orsehay isay alledcay aay orsemanhay? 

Erseuspay, Stay. Eorgegay, Erculeshay, Onahjay, anday Ishnoovay! ere’sthay aay ember-rollmay orfay ouyay! Atwhay ubclay utbay ethay aleman’swhay ancay eadhay offay ikelay atthay? 



APTERCHAY 83ay. Onahjay Istoricallyhay Egardedray. 

Eferenceray asway ademay otay ethay istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay inay ethay ecedingpray apterchay. Ownay omesay Antucketersnay atherray istrustday isthay istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay anday ethay alewhay. Utbay enthay erethay ereway omesay epticalscay Eeksgray anday Omansray, owhay, andingstay outay omfray ethay orthodoxay aganspay ofay eirthay imestay, equallyay oubtedday ethay orystay ofay Erculeshay anday ethay alewhay, anday Arionay anday ethay olphinday; anday etyay eirthay oubtingday osethay aditionstray idday otnay akemay osethay aditionstray oneay itwhay ethay esslay actsfay, orfay allay atthay. 

Oneay olday Ag-harborsay aleman’swhay iefchay easonray orfay uestioningqay ethay Ebrewhay orystay asway is:—Hethay adhay oneay ofay osethay uaintqay old-fashioneday Iblesbay, embellisheday ithway uriouscay, unscientificay atesplay; oneay ofay ichwhay epresentedray Onah’sjay alewhay ithway otway outsspay inay ishay ead—ahay eculiaritypay onlyay uetray ithway espectray otay aay eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay e(thay Ightray Alewhay, anday ethay arietiesvay ofay atthay orderay), oncerningcay ichwhay ethay ishermenfay avehay isthay ayingsay, A“AY ennypay ollray ouldway okechay im”hay; ishay allowsway isay osay eryvay allsmay. Utbay, otay isthay, Ishopbay Ebb’sjay anticipativeay answeray isay eadyray. Itay isay otnay ecessarynay, intshay ethay Ishopbay, atthay eway onsidercay Onahjay asay ombedtay inay ethay ale’swhay ellybay, utbay asay emporarilytay odgedlay inay omesay artpay ofay ishay outhmay. Anday isthay eemssay easonableray enoughay inay ethay oodgay Ishopbay. Orfay ulytray, ethay Ightray Ale’swhay outhmay ouldway accommodateay aay ouplecay ofay ist-tableswhay, anday omfortablycay eatsay allay ethay ayersplay. Ossiblypay, ootay, Onahjay ightmay avehay ensconceday imselfhay inay aay ollowhay oothtay; utbay, onay econdsay oughtsthay, ethay Ightray Alewhay isay oothlesstay. 

Anotheray easonray ichwhay Ag-harborsay e(hay entway byay atthay amenay) urgeday orfay ishay antway ofay aithfay inay isthay attermay ofay ethay ophetpray, asway omethingsay obscurelyay inay eferenceray otay ishay incarcerateday odybay anday ethay ale’swhay astricgay uicesjay. Utbay isthay objectionay ikewiselay allsfay otay ethay oundgray, ecausebay aay Ermangay exegetistay upposessay atthay Onahjay ustmay avehay akentay efugeray inay ethay oatingflay odybay ofay aay ead_day_ ale—evenwhay asay ethay Enchfray oldierssay inay ethay Ussianray ampaigncay urnedtay eirthay eadday orseshay intoay entstay, anday awledcray intoay emthay. Esidesbay, itay ashay eenbay ivinedday byay otheray ontinentalcay ommentatorscay, atthay enwhay Onahjay asway ownthray overboarday omfray ethay Oppajay ipshay, ehay aightwaystray effecteday ishay escapeay otay anotheray esselvay earnay byay, omesay esselvay ithway aay alewhay orfay aay igure-headfay; anday, IAY ouldway adday, ossiblypay alledcay e“Thay Ale,”whay asay omesay aftcray areay owadaysnay istenedchray ethay ark,”“Shay ethay ull,”“Gay ethay Eagle.”“ay Ornay avehay erethay eenbay antingway earnedlay exegetistsay owhay avehay opineday atthay ethay alewhay entionedmay inay ethay ookbay ofay Onahjay erelymay eantmay aay ife-preserver—anlay inflateday agbay ofay ind—whichway ethay endangereday ophetpray amsway otay, anday osay asway avedsay omfray aay ateryway oomday. Oorpay Ag-harborsay, ereforethay, eemssay orstedway allay oundray. Utbay ehay adhay illstay anotheray easonray orfay ishay antway ofay aithfay. Itay asway isthay, ifay IAY ememberray ightray: Onahjay asway allowedsway byay ethay alewhay inay ethay Editerraneanmay Easay, anday afteray eethray aysday ehay asway omitedvay upay omewheresay ithinway eethray ays’day ourneyjay ofay Inevehnay, aay itycay onay ethay Igristay, eryvay uchmay oremay anthay eethray ays’day ourneyjay acrossay omfray ethay earestnay ointpay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay oastcay. Owhay isay atthay? 

Utbay asway erethay onay otheray ayway orfay ethay alewhay otay andlay ethay ophetpray ithinway atthay ortshay istanceday ofay Inevehnay? Esyay. Ehay ightmay avehay arriedcay imhay oundray byay ethay ayway ofay ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay. Utbay otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay assagepay oughthray ethay olewhay engthlay ofay ethay Editerraneanmay, anday anotheray assagepay upay ethay Ersianpay Ulfgay anday Edray Easay, uchsay aay uppositionsay ouldway involveay ethay ompletecay ircumnavigationcay ofay allay Africaay inay eethray aysday, otnay otay eakspay ofay ethay Igristay atersway, earnay ethay itesay ofay Inevehnay, eingbay ootay allowshay orfay anyay alewhay otay imsway inay. Esidesbay, isthay ideaay ofay Onah’sjay eatheringway ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay atay osay earlyay aay ayday ouldway estwray ethay onorhay ofay ethay iscoveryday ofay atthay eatgray eadlandhay omfray Artholomewbay Iazday, itsay eputedray iscovererday, anday osay akemay odernmay istoryhay aay iarlay. 

Utbay allay esethay oolishfay argumentsay ofay olday Ag-harborsay onlyay evinceday ishay oolishfay idepray ofay eason—aray ingthay illstay oremay eprehensibleray inay imhay, eeingsay atthay ehay adhay utbay ittlelay earninglay exceptay atwhay ehay adhay ickedpay upay omfray ethay unsay anday ethay easay. IAY aysay itay onlyay owsshay ishay oolishfay, impiousay idepray, anday abominableay, evilishday ebellionray againstay ethay everendray ergyclay. Orfay byay aay Ortuguesepay Atholiccay iestpray, isthay eryvay ideaay ofay Onah’sjay oinggay otay Inevehnay iavay ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay asway advanceday asay aay ignalsay agnificationmay ofay ethay eneralgay iraclemay. Anday osay itay asway. Esidesbay, otay isthay ayday, ethay ighlyhay enlighteneday Urkstay evoutlyday elievebay inay ethay istoricalhay orystay ofay Onahjay. Anday omesay eethray enturiescay agoay, anay Englishay avellertray inay olday Arris’shay Oyagesvay, eaksspay ofay aay Urkishtay Osquemay uiltbay inay onorhay ofay Onahjay, inay ichwhay Osquemay asway aay iraculousmay amplay atthay urntbay ithoutway anyay oilay. 



APTERCHAY 84ay. Itchpolingpay. 

Otay akemay emthay unray easilyay anday iftlysway, ethay axlesay ofay arriagescay areay anointeday; anday orfay uchmay ethay amesay urposepay, omesay alerswhay erformpay anay analogousay operationay uponay eirthay oatbay; eythay easegray ethay ottombay. Ornay isay itay otay ebay oubtedday atthay asay uchsay aay ocedurepray ancay oday onay armhay, itay aymay ossiblypay ebay ofay onay ontemptiblecay advantageay; onsideringcay atthay oilay anday aterway areay ostilehay; atthay oilay isay aay idingslay ingthay, anday atthay ethay objectay inay iewvay isay otay akemay ethay oatbay ideslay avelybray. Ueequegqay elievedbay onglystray inay anointingay ishay oatbay, anday oneay orningmay otnay onglay afteray ethay Ermangay ipshay Ungfraujay isappearedday, ooktay oremay anthay ustomarycay ainspay inay atthay occupationay; awlingcray underay itsay ottombay, erewhay itay unghay overay ethay idesay, anday ubbingray inay ethay unctuousnessay asay oughthay iligentlyday eekingsay otay insureay aay opcray ofay airhay omfray ethay aft’scray aldbay eelkay. Ehay eemedsay otay ebay orkingway inay obedienceay otay omesay articularpay esentimentpray. Ornay idday itay emainray unwarranteday byay ethay eventay. 

Owardstay oonnay aleswhay ereway aisedray; utbay osay oonsay asay ethay ipshay ailedsay ownday otay emthay, eythay urnedtay anday edflay ithway iftsway ecipitancypray; aay isorderedday ightflay, asay ofay Eopatra’sclay argesbay omfray Actiumay. 

Everthelessnay, ethay oatsbay ursuedpay, anday Ubb’sstay asway oremostfay. Byay eatgray exertionay, Ashtegotay atay astlay ucceededsay inay antingplay oneay ironay; utbay ethay ickenstray alewhay, ithoutway atay allay oundingsay, illstay ontinuedcay ishay orizontalhay ightflay, ithway addeday eetnessflay. Uchsay unintermitteday ainingsstray uponay ethay antedplay ironay ustmay oonersay oray aterlay inevitablyay extractay itay. Itay ecamebay imperativeay otay ancelay ethay ingflyay alewhay, oray ebay ontentcay otay oselay imhay. Utbay otay aulhay ethay oatbay upay otay ishay ankflay asway impossibleay, ehay amsway osay astfay anday uriousfay. Atwhay enthay emainedray? 

Ofay allay ethay ondrousway evicesday anday exteritiesday, ethay eightsslay ofay andhay anday ountlesscay ubtletiessay, otay ichwhay ethay eteranvay alemanwhay isay osay oftenay orcedfay, onenay exceeday atthay inefay anœuvremay ithway ethay ancelay alledcay itchpolingpay. Allsmay ordsway, oray oadbray ordsway, inay allay itsay exercisesay oastsbay othingnay ikelay itay. Itay isay onlyay indispensableay ithway anay inveterateay unningray alewhay; itsay andgray actfay anday eaturefay isay ethay onderfulway istanceday otay ichwhay ethay onglay ancelay isay accuratelyay artedday omfray aay iolentlyvay ockingray, erkingjay oatbay, underay extremeay eadwayhay. Eelstay anday oodway includeday, ethay entireay earspay isay omesay entay oray elvetway eetfay inay engthlay; ethay affstay isay uchmay ighterslay anthay atthay ofay ethay arpoonhay, anday alsoay ofay aay ighterlay aterial—pinemay. Itay isay urnishedfay ithway aay allsmay operay alledcay aay arpway, ofay onsiderablecay engthlay, byay ichwhay itay ancay ebay auledhay ackbay otay ethay andhay afteray artingday. 

Utbay eforebay oinggay urtherfay, itay isay importantay otay entionmay erehay, atthay oughthay ethay arpoonhay aymay ebay itchpoledpay inay ethay amesay ayway ithway ethay ancelay, etyay itay isay eldomsay oneday; anday enwhay oneday, isay illstay esslay equentlyfray uccessfulsay, onay accountay ofay ethay eatergray eightway anday inferioray engthlay ofay ethay arpoonhay asay omparedcay ithway ethay ancelay, ichwhay inay effectay ecomebay erioussay awbacksdray. Asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ereforethay, ouyay ustmay irstfay etgay astfay otay aay alewhay, eforebay anyay itchpolingpay omescay intoay ayplay. 

Ooklay ownay atay Ubbstay; aay anmay owhay omfray ishay umoroushay, eliberateday oolnesscay anday equanimityay inay ethay irestday emergenciesay, asway eciallyspay ualifiedqay otay excelay inay itchpolingpay. Ooklay atay imhay; ehay andsstay uprightay inay ethay ossedtay owbay ofay ethay ingflyay oatbay; aptwray inay eecyflay oamfay, ethay owingtay alewhay isay ortyfay eetfay aheaday. Andlinghay ethay onglay ancelay ightlylay, ancingglay icetway oray icethray alongay itsay engthlay otay eesay ifay itay ebay exactlyay aightstray, Ubbstay istlinglywhay athersgay upay ethay oilcay ofay ethay arpway inay oneay andhay, osay asay otay ecuresay itsay eefray enday inay ishay aspgray, eavinglay ethay estray unobstructeday. Enthay oldinghay ethay ancelay ullfay eforebay ishay aistband’sway iddlemay, ehay evelslay itay atay ethay alewhay; enwhay, overingcay imhay ithway itay, ehay eadilystay epressesday ethay utt-endbay inay ishay andhay, erebythay elevatingay ethay ointpay illtay ethay eaponway andsstay airlyfay alancedbay uponay ishay almpay, ifteenfay eetfay inay ethay airay. Ehay indsmay ouyay omewhatsay ofay aay ugglerjay, alancingbay aay onglay affstay onay ishay inchay. Extnay omentmay ithway aay apidray, amelessnay impulseay, inay aay uperbsay oftylay archay ethay ightbray eelstay ansspay ethay oamingfay istanceday, anday uiversqay inay ethay ifelay otspay ofay ethay alewhay. Insteaday ofay arklingspay aterway, ehay ownay outsspay edray oodblay. 

at“Thay ovedray ethay igotspay outay ofay im!”hay iedcray Ubbstay. is“’Tay Uly’sjay immortalay Ourthfay; allay ountainsfay ustmay unray ineway odaytay! Ouldway ownay, itay ereway olday Orleansay iskeywhay, oray olday Ohioay, oray unspeakableay olday Onongahelamay! Enthay, Ashtegotay, adlay, I’day avehay eyay oldhay aay anakincay otay ethay etjay, anday e’dway inkdray oundray itay! Eayay, erilyvay, eartshay aliveay, e’dway ewbray oicechay unchpay inay ethay eadspray ofay ishay out-holespay erethay, anday omfray atthay ivelay unch-bowlpay uaffqay ethay ivinglay uff.”stay 

Againay anday againay otay uchsay amesomegay alktay, ethay exterousday artday isay epeatedray, ethay earspay eturningray otay itsay astermay ikelay aay eyhoundgray eldhay inay ilfulskay eashlay. Ethay agonizeday alewhay oesgay intoay ishay urryflay; ethay ow-linetay isay ackenedslay, anday ethay itchpolerpay oppingdray asternay, oldsfay ishay andshay, anday utelymay atchesway ethay onstermay ieday. 



APTERCHAY 85ay. Ethay Ountainfay. 

Atthay orfay ixsay ousandthay ears—andyay onay oneay owsknay owhay anymay illionsmay ofay agesay efore—thebay eatgray aleswhay ouldshay avehay eenbay outingspay allay overay ethay easay, anday inklingspray anday istifyingmay ethay ardensgay ofay ethay eepday, asay ithway osay anymay inklingspray oray istifyingmay otspay; anday atthay orfay omesay enturiescay ackbay, ousandsthay ofay untershay ouldshay avehay eenbay oseclay byay ethay ountainfay ofay ethay alewhay, atchingway esethay inklingsspray anday outings—thatspay allay isthay ouldshay ebay, anday etyay, atthay ownday otay isthay essedblay inutemay ifteen(fay anday aay uarterqay inutesmay astpay oneay o’clockay P.MAY. ofay isthay ixteenthsay ayday ofay Ecemberday, A.DAY. 1851ay), itay ouldshay illstay emainray aay oblempray, etherwhay esethay outingsspay areay, afteray allay, eallyray aterway, oray othingnay utbay apor—thisvay isay urelysay aay oteworthynay ingthay. 

Etlay usay, enthay, ooklay atay isthay attermay, alongay ithway omesay interestingay itemsay ontingentcay. Everyay oneay owsknay atthay byay ethay eculiarpay unningcay ofay eirthay illsgay, ethay innyfay ibestray inay eneralgay eathebray ethay airay ichwhay atay allay imestay isay ombinedcay ithway ethay elementay inay ichwhay eythay imsway; encehay, aay erringhay oray aay odcay ightmay ivelay aay enturycay, anday evernay onceay aiseray itsay eadhay aboveay ethay urfacesay. Utbay owingay otay ishay arkedmay internalay ucturestray ichwhay ivesgay imhay egularray ungslay, ikelay aay umanhay eing’sbay, ethay alewhay ancay onlyay ivelay byay inhalingay ethay isengagedday airay inay ethay openay atmosphereay. Ereforewhay ethay ecessitynay orfay ishay eriodicalpay isitsvay otay ethay upperay orldway. Utbay ehay annotcay inay anyay egreeday eathebray oughthray ishay outhmay, orfay, inay ishay ordinaryay attitudeay, ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay outhmay isay uriedbay atay eastlay eightay eetfay eneathbay ethay urfacesay; anday atwhay isay illstay oremay, ishay indpipeway ashay onay onnexioncay ithway ishay outhmay. Onay, ehay eathesbray oughthray ishay iraclespay aloneay; anday isthay isay onay ethay optay ofay ishay eadhay. 

Ifay IAY aysay, atthay inay anyay eaturecray eathingbray isay onlyay aay unctionfay indispensableay otay italityvay, inasmuchay asay itay ithdrawsway omfray ethay airay aay ertaincay elementay, ichwhay eingbay ubsequentlysay oughtbray intoay ontactcay ithway ethay oodblay impartsay otay ethay oodblay itsay ivifyingvay inciplepray, IAY oday otnay inkthay IAY allshay erray; oughthay IAY aymay ossiblypay useay omesay uperfluoussay ientificscay ordsway. Assumeay itay, anday itay ollowsfay atthay ifay allay ethay oodblay inay aay anmay ouldcay ebay aerateday ithway oneay eathbray, ehay ightmay enthay ealsay upay ishay ostrilsnay anday otnay etchfay anotheray orfay aay onsiderablecay imetay. Atthay isay otay aysay, ehay ouldway enthay ivelay ithoutway eathingbray. Anomalousay asay itay aymay eemsay, isthay isay eciselypray ethay asecay ithway ethay alewhay, owhay ematicallysystay iveslay, byay intervalsay, ishay ullfay ourhay anday oremay en(whay atay ethay ottombay) ithoutway awingdray aay inglesay eathbray, oray osay uchmay asay inay anyay ayway inhalingay aay articlepay ofay airay; orfay, ememberray, ehay ashay onay illsgay. Owhay isay isthay? Etweenbay ishay ibsray anday onay eachay idesay ofay ishay inespay ehay isay uppliedsay ithway aay emarkableray involveday Etancray abyrinthlay ofay ermicelli-likevay esselsvay, ichwhay esselsvay, enwhay ehay uitsqay ethay urfacesay, areay ompletelycay istendedday ithway oxygenateday oodblay. Osay atthay orfay anay ourhay oray oremay, aay ousandthay athomsfay inay ethay easay, ehay arriescay aay urplussay ockstay ofay italityvay inay imhay, ustjay asay ethay amelcay ossingcray ethay aterlessway esertday arriescay aay urplussay upplysay ofay inkdray orfay uturefay useay inay itsay ourfay upplementarysay omachsstay. Ethay anatomicalay actfay ofay isthay abyrinthlay isay indisputableay; anday atthay ethay uppositionsay oundedfay uponay itay isay easonableray anday uetray, eemssay ethay oremay ogentcay otay emay, enwhay IAY onsidercay ethay otherwiseay inexplicableay obstinacyay ofay atthay eviathanlay inay aving_hay ishay outingsspay outay_, asay ethay ishermenfay asephray itay. Isthay isay atwhay IAY eanmay. Ifay unmolesteday, uponay isingray otay ethay urfacesay, ethay Ermspay Alewhay illway ontinuecay erethay orfay aay eriodpay ofay imetay exactlyay uniformay ithway allay ishay otheray unmolesteday isingsray. Aysay ehay aysstay elevenay inutesmay, anday etsjay eventysay imestay, atthay isay, espiresray eventysay eathsbray; enthay eneverwhay ehay isesray againay, ehay illway ebay uresay otay avehay ishay eventysay eathsbray overay againay, otay aay inutemay. Ownay, ifay afteray ehay etchesfay aay ewfay eathsbray ouyay alarmay imhay, osay atthay ehay oundssay, ehay illway ebay alwaysay odgingday upay againay otay akemay oodgay ishay egularray allowanceay ofay airay. Anday otnay illtay osethay eventysay eathsbray areay oldtay, illway ehay inallyfay ogay ownday otay aystay outay ishay ullfay ermtay elowbay. Emarkray, oweverhay, atthay inay ifferentday individualsay esethay atesray areay ifferentday; utbay inay anyay oneay eythay areay alikeay. Ownay, whyay ouldshay ethay alewhay usthay insistay uponay avinghay ishay outingsspay outay, unlessay itay ebay otay eplenishray ishay eservoirray ofay airay, ereay escendingday orfay oodgay? Owhay obviousay isay itay, ootay, atthay isthay ecessitynay orfay ethay ale’swhay isingray exposesay imhay otay allay ethay atalfay azardshay ofay ethay asechay. Orfay otnay byay ookhay oray byay etnay ouldcay isthay astvay eviathanlay ebay aughtcay, enwhay ailingsay aay ousandthay athomsfay eneathbay ethay unlightsay. Otnay osay uchmay thyay illskay, enthay, OAY unterhay, asay ethay eatgray ecessitiesnay atthay ikestray ethay ictoryvay otay eethay! 

Inay anmay, eathingbray isay incessantlyay oinggay on—oneay eathbray onlyay ervingsay orfay otway oray eethray ulsationspay; osay atthay ateverwhay otheray usinessbay ehay ashay otay attenday otay, akingway oray eepingslay, eathebray ehay ustmay, oray ieday ehay illway. Utbay ethay Ermspay Alewhay onlyay eathesbray aboutay oneay eventhsay oray Undaysay ofay ishay imetay. 

Itay ashay eenbay aidsay atthay ethay alewhay onlyay eathesbray oughthray ishay out-holespay; ifay itay ouldcay uthfullytray ebay addeday atthay ishay outsspay areay ixedmay ithway aterway, enthay IAY opineay eway ouldshay ebay urnishedfay ithway ethay easonray whyay ishay ensesay ofay ellsmay eemssay obliterateday inay imhay; orfay ethay onlyay ingthay aboutay imhay atthay atay allay answersay otay ishay osenay isay atthay identicalay out-holespay; anday eingbay osay oggedclay ithway otway elementsay, itay ouldcay otnay ebay expecteday otay avehay ethay owerpay ofay ellingsmay. Utbay owingay otay ethay erymystay ofay ethay out—whetherspay itay ebay aterway oray etherwhay itay ebay apor—novay absoluteay ertaintycay ancay asay etyay ebay arriveday atay onay isthay eadhay. Uresay itay isay, everthelessnay, atthay ethay Ermspay Alewhay ashay onay operpray olfactoriesay. Utbay atwhay oesday ehay antway ofay emthay? Onay osesray, onay ioletsvay, onay Ologne-watercay inay ethay easay. 

Urthermorefay, asay ishay indpipeway olelysay opensay intoay ethay ubetay ofay ishay outingspay analcay, anday asay atthay onglay anal—likecay ethay andgray Erieay Anal—iscay urnishedfay ithway aay ortsay ofay ockslay at(thay openay anday utshay) orfay ethay ownwardday etentionray ofay airay oray ethay upwarday exclusionay ofay aterway, ereforethay ethay alewhay ashay onay oicevay; unlessay ouyay insultay imhay byay ayingsay, atthay enwhay ehay osay angelystray umblesray, ehay alkstay oughthray ishay osenay. Utbay enthay againay, atwhay ashay ethay alewhay otay aysay? Eldomsay avehay IAY ownknay anyay ofoundpray eingbay atthay adhay anythingay otay aysay otay isthay orldway, unlessay orcedfay otay ammerstay outay omethingsay byay ayway ofay ettinggay aay ivinglay. Ohay! appyhay atthay ethay orldway isay uchsay anay excellentay istenerlay! 

Ownay, ethay outingspay analcay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, ieflychay intendeday asay itay isay orfay ethay onveyancecay ofay airay, anday orfay everalsay eetfay aidlay alongay, orizontallyhay, ustjay eneathbay ethay upperay urfacesay ofay ishay eadhay, anday aay ittlelay otay oneay idesay; isthay uriouscay analcay isay eryvay uchmay ikelay aay as-pipegay aidlay ownday inay aay itycay onay oneay idesay ofay aay eetstray. Utbay ethay uestionqay eturnsray etherwhay isthay as-pipegay isay alsoay aay ater-pipeway; inay otheray ordsway, etherwhay ethay outspay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay isay ethay eremay aporvay ofay ethay exhaleday eathbray, oray etherwhay atthay exhaleday eathbray isay ixedmay ithway aterway akentay inay atay ethay outhmay, anday ischargedday oughthray ethay iraclespay. Itay isay ertaincay atthay ethay outhmay indirectlyay ommunicatescay ithway ethay outingspay analcay; utbay itay annotcay ebay ovedpray atthay isthay isay orfay ethay urposepay ofay ischargingday aterway oughthray ethay iraclespay. Ecausebay ethay eatestgray ecessitynay orfay osay oingday ouldway eemsay otay ebay, enwhay inay eedingfay ehay accidentallyay akestay inay aterway. Utbay ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay oodfay isay arfay eneathbay ethay urfacesay, anday erethay ehay annotcay outspay evenay ifay ehay ouldway. Esidesbay, ifay ouyay egardray imhay eryvay oselyclay, anday imetay imhay ithway ouryay atchway, ouyay illway indfay atthay enwhay unmolesteday, erethay isay anay undeviatingay erhymay etweenbay ethay eriodspay ofay ishay etsjay anday ethay ordinaryay eriodspay ofay espirationray. 

Utbay whyay esterpay oneay ithway allay isthay easoningray onay ethay ubjectsay? Eakspay outay! Ouyay avehay eensay imhay outspay; enthay eclareday atwhay ethay outspay isay; ancay ouyay otnay elltay aterway omfray airay? Myay earday irsay, inay isthay orldway itay isay otnay osay easyay otay ettlesay esethay ainplay ingsthay. IAY avehay everay oundfay ouryay ainplay ingsthay ethay ottiestknay ofay allay. Anday asay orfay isthay alewhay outspay, ouyay ightmay almostay andstay inay itay, anday etyay ebay undecideday asay otay atwhay itay isay eciselypray. 

Ethay entralcay odybay ofay itay isay iddenhay inay ethay owysnay arklingspay istmay envelopingay itay; anday owhay ancay ouyay ertainlycay elltay etherwhay anyay aterway allsfay omfray itay, enwhay, alwaysay, enwhay ouyay areay oseclay enoughay otay aay alewhay otay etgay aay oseclay iewvay ofay ishay outspay, ehay isay inay aay odigiouspray ommotioncay, ethay aterway ascadingcay allay arounday imhay. Anday ifay atay uchsay imestay ouyay ouldshay inkthay atthay ouyay eallyray erceivedpay opsdray ofay oisturemay inay ethay outspay, owhay oday ouyay owknay atthay eythay areay otnay erelymay ondensedcay omfray itsay aporvay; oray owhay oday ouyay owknay atthay eythay areay otnay osethay identicalay opsdray uperficiallysay odgedlay inay ethay out-holespay issurefay, ichwhay isay ountersunkcay intoay ethay ummitsay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadhay? Orfay evenay enwhay anquillytray immingsway oughthray ethay id-daymay easay inay aay almcay, ithway ishay elevateday umphay un-driedsay asay aay omedary’sdray inay ethay esertday; evenay enthay, ethay alewhay alwaysay arriescay aay allsmay asinbay ofay aterway onay ishay eadhay, asay underay aay azingblay unsay ouyay illway ometimessay eesay aay avitycay inay aay ockray illedfay upay ithway ainray. 

Ornay isay itay atay allay udentpray orfay ethay unterhay otay ebay overay uriouscay ouchingtay ethay ecisepray aturenay ofay ethay alewhay outspay. Itay illway otnay oday orfay imhay otay ebay eeringpay intoay itay, anday uttingpay ishay acefay inay itay. Ouyay annotcay ogay ithway ouryay itcherpay otay isthay ountainfay anday illfay itay, anday ingbray itay awayay. Orfay evenay enwhay omingcay intoay ightslay ontactcay ithway ethay outeray, aporyvay edsshray ofay ethay etjay, ichwhay illway oftenay appenhay, ouryay inskay illway everishlyfay artsmay, omfray ethay acridnessay ofay ethay ingthay osay ouchingtay itay. Anday IAY owknay oneay, owhay omingcay intoay illstay oserclay ontactcay ithway ethay outspay, etherwhay ithway omesay ientificscay objectay inay iewvay, oray otherwiseay, IAY annotcay aysay, ethay inskay eeledpay offay omfray ishay eekchay anday armay. Ereforewhay, amongay alemenwhay, ethay outspay isay eemedday oisonouspay; eythay tryay otay evadeay itay. Anotheray ingthay; IAY avehay eardhay itay aidsay, anday IAY oday otnay uchmay oubtday itay, atthay ifay ethay etjay isay airlyfay outedspay intoay ouryay eyesay, itay illway indblay ouyay. Ethay isestway ingthay ethay investigatoray ancay oday enthay, itay eemssay otay emay, isay otay etlay isthay eadlyday outspay aloneay. 

Illstay, eway ancay othesizehypay, evenay ifay eway annotcay ovepray anday establishay. Myay othesishypay isay isthay: atthay ethay outspay isay othingnay utbay istmay. Anday esidesbay otheray easonsray, otay isthay onclusioncay IAY amay impelleday, byay onsiderationscay ouchingtay ethay eatgray inherentay ignityday anday ublimitysay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay; IAY accountay imhay onay ommoncay, allowshay eingbay, inasmuchay asay itay isay anay undisputeday actfay atthay ehay isay evernay oundfay onay oundingssay, oray earnay oresshay; allay otheray aleswhay ometimessay areay. Ehay isay othbay onderouspay anday ofoundpray. Anday IAY amay onvincedcay atthay omfray ethay eadshay ofay allay onderouspay ofoundpray eingsbay, uchsay asay Atoplay, Opyrrhay, ethay Evilday, Upiterjay, Anteday, anday osay onay, erethay alwaysay oesgay upay aay ertaincay emi-visiblesay eamstay, ilewhay inay ethay actay ofay inkingthay eepday oughtsthay. Ilewhay omposingcay aay ittlelay eatisetray onay Eternityay, IAY adhay ethay uriositycay otay aceplay aay irrormay eforebay emay; anday ereay onglay awsay eflectedray erethay, aay uriouscay involveday ormingway anday undulationay inay ethay atmosphereay overay myay eadhay. Ethay invariableay oisturemay ofay myay airhay, ilewhay ungedplay inay eepday oughtthay, afteray ixsay upscay ofay othay eatay inay myay inthay ingledshay atticay, ofay anay Augustay oonnay; isthay eemssay anay additionalay argumentay orfay ethay aboveay uppositionsay. 

Anday owhay oblynay itay aisesray ouray onceitcay ofay ethay ightymay, istymay onstermay, otay eholdbay imhay olemnlysay ailingsay oughthray aay almcay opicaltray easay; ishay astvay, ildmay eadhay overhungay byay aay anopycay ofay aporvay, engendereday byay ishay incommunicableay ontemplationscay, anday atthay apor—asvay ouyay illway ometimessay eesay it—glorifieday byay aay ainbowray, asay ifay Eavenhay itselfay adhay utpay itsay ealsay uponay ishay oughtsthay. Orfay, ed’yay eesay, ainbowsray oday otnay isitvay ethay earclay airay; eythay onlyay irradiateay aporvay. Anday osay, oughthray allay ethay ickthay istsmay ofay ethay imday oubtsday inay myay indmay, ivineday intuitionsay ownay anday enthay ootshay, enkindlingay myay ogfay ithway aay eavenlyhay ayray. Anday orfay isthay IAY ankthay Odgay; orfay allay avehay oubtsday; anymay enyday; utbay oubtsday oray enialsday, ewfay alongay ithway emthay, avehay intuitionsay. Oubtsday ofay allay ingsthay earthlyay, anday intuitionsay ofay omesay ingsthay eavenlyhay; isthay ombinationcay akesmay eithernay elieverbay ornay infidelay, utbay akesmay aay anmay owhay egardsray emthay othbay ithway equalay eyeay. 



APTERCHAY 86ay. Ethay Ailtay. 

Otheray oetspay avehay arbledway ethay aisespray ofay ethay oftsay eyeay ofay ethay antelopeay, anday ethay ovelylay umageplay ofay ethay irdbay atthay evernay alightsay; esslay elestialcay, IAY elebratecay aay ailtay. 

Eckoningray ethay argestlay izedsay Ermspay Ale’swhay ailtay otay eginbay atay atthay ointpay ofay ethay unktray erewhay itay aperstay otay aboutay ethay irthgay ofay aay anmay, itay omprisescay uponay itsay upperay urfacesay aloneay, anay areaay ofay atay eastlay iftyfay uaresqay eetfay. Ethay ompactcay oundray odybay ofay itsay ootray expandsay intoay otway oadbray, irmfay, atflay almspay oray ukesflay, aduallygray oalingshay awayay otay esslay anthay anay inchay inay icknessthay. Atay ethay otchcray oray unctionjay, esethay ukesflay ightlyslay overlapay, enthay idewayssay ecederay omfray eachay otheray ikelay ingsway, eavinglay aay ideway acancyvay etweenbay. Inay onay ivinglay ingthay areay ethay ineslay ofay eautybay oremay exquisitelyay efinedday anthay inay ethay escenticcray ordersbay ofay esethay ukesflay. Atay itsay utmostay expansionay inay ethay ullfay owngray alewhay, ethay ailtay illway onsiderablycay exceeday entytway eetfay acrossay. 

Ethay entireay embermay eemssay aay enseday ebbedway edbay ofay eldedway inewssay; utbay utcay intoay itay, anday ouyay indfay atthay eethray istinctday atastray omposecay it:—upperay, iddlemay, anday owerlay. Ethay ibresfay inay ethay upperay anday owerlay ayerslay, areay onglay anday orizontalhay; osethay ofay ethay iddlemay oneay, eryvay ortshay, anday unningray osswisecray etweenbay ethay outsideay ayerslay. Isthay iunetray ucturestray, asay uchmay asay anythingay elseay, impartsay owerpay otay ethay ailtay. Otay ethay udentstay ofay olday Omanray allsway, ethay iddlemay ayerlay illway urnishfay aay uriouscay arallelpay otay ethay inthay oursecay ofay ilestay alwaysay alternatingay ithway ethay onestay inay osethay onderfulway elicsray ofay ethay antiqueay, anday ichwhay undoubtedlyay ontributecay osay uchmay otay ethay eatgray engthstray ofay ethay asonrymay. 

Utbay asay ifay isthay astvay ocallay owerpay inay ethay endinoustay ailtay ereway otnay enoughay, ethay olewhay ulkbay ofay ethay eviathanlay isay itknay overay ithway aay arpway anday oofway ofay uscularmay ibresfay anday ilamentsfay, ichwhay assingpay onay eitheray idesay ethay oinslay anday unningray ownday intoay ethay ukesflay, insensiblyay endblay ithway emthay, anday argelylay ontributecay otay eirthay ightmay; osay atthay inay ethay ailtay ethay onfluentcay easurelessmay orcefay ofay ethay olewhay alewhay eemssay oncentratedcay otay aay ointpay. Ouldcay annihilationay occuray otay attermay, isthay ereway ethay ingthay otay oday itay. 

Ornay oesday is—itsthay amazingay engthstray, atay allay endtay otay ipplecray ethay acefulgray exionflay ofay itsay otionsmay; erewhay infantilenessay ofay easeay undulatesay oughthray aay Itanismtay ofay owerpay. Onay ethay ontrarycay, osethay otionsmay eriveday eirthay ostmay appallingay eautybay omfray itay. Ealray engthstray evernay impairsay eautybay oray armonyhay, utbay itay oftenay estowsbay itay; anday inay everythingay imposinglyay eautifulbay, engthstray ashay uchmay otay oday ithway ethay agicmay. Aketay awayay ethay iedtay endonstay atthay allay overay eemsay urstingbay omfray ethay arblemay inay ethay arvedcay Erculeshay, anday itsay armchay ouldway ebay onegay. Asay evoutday Eckermanay iftedlay ethay inenlay eetshay omfray ethay akednay orpsecay ofay Oethegay, ehay asway overwhelmeday ithway ethay assivemay estchay ofay ethay anmay, atthay eemedsay asay aay Omanray iumphaltray archay. Enwhay Angeloay aintspay evenay Odgay ethay Atherfay inay umanhay ormfay, arkmay atwhay obustnessray isay erethay. Anday ateverwhay eythay aymay evealray ofay ethay ivineday ovelay inay ethay Onsay, ethay oftsay, urledcay, ermaphroditicalhay Italianay icturespay, inay ichwhay ishay ideaay ashay eenbay ostmay uccessfullysay embodieday; esethay icturespay, osay estituteday asay eythay areay ofay allay awninessbray, inthay othingnay ofay anyay owerpay, utbay ethay eremay egativenay, emininefay oneay ofay ubmissionsay anday enduranceay, ichwhay onay allay andshay itay isay oncededcay, ormfay ethay eculiarpay acticalpray irtuesvay ofay ishay eachingstay. 

Uchsay isay ethay ubtlesay elasticityay ofay ethay organay IAY eattray ofay, atthay etherwhay ieldedway inay ortspay, oray inay earnestay, oray inay angeray, ateverwhay ebay ethay oodmay itay ebay inay, itsay exionsflay areay invariablyay arkedmay byay exceedingay acegray. Ereinthay onay airy’sfay armay ancay anscendtray itay. 

Ivefay eatgray otionsmay areay eculiarpay otay itay. Irstfay, enwhay useday asay aay infay orfay ogressionpray; Econdsay, enwhay useday asay aay acemay inay attlebay; Irdthay, inay eepingsway; Ourthfay, inay obtailinglay; Ifthfay, inay eakingpay ukesflay. 

Irstfay: Eingbay orizontalhay inay itsay ositionpay, ethay Eviathan’slay ailtay actsay inay aay ifferentday annermay omfray ethay ailstay ofay allay otheray easay eaturescray. Itay evernay iggleswray. Inay anmay oray ishfay, igglingwray isay aay ignsay ofay inferiorityay. Otay ethay alewhay, ishay ailtay isay ethay olesay eansmay ofay opulsionpray. Oll-wisescray oiledcay orwardsfay eneathbay ethay odybay, anday enthay apidlyray ungspray ackwardsbay, itay isay isthay ichwhay ivesgay atthay ingularsay artingday, eapinglay otionmay otay ethay onstermay enwhay uriouslyfay immingsway. Ishay ide-finssay onlyay ervesay otay eerstay byay. 

Econdsay: Itay isay aay ittlelay ignificantsay, atthay ilewhay oneay ermspay alewhay onlyay ightsfay anotheray ermspay alewhay ithway ishay eadhay anday awjay, everthelessnay, inay ishay onflictscay ithway anmay, ehay ieflychay anday ontemptuouslycay usesay ishay ailtay. Inay ikingstray atay aay oatbay, ehay iftlysway urvescay awayay ishay ukesflay omfray itay, anday ethay owblay isay onlyay inflicteday byay ethay ecoilray. Ifay itay ebay ademay inay ethay unobstructeday airay, especiallyay ifay itay escendday otay itsay arkmay, ethay okestray isay enthay implysay irresistibleay. Onay ibsray ofay anmay oray oatbay ancay ithstandway itay. Ouryay onlyay alvationsay ieslay inay eludingay itay; utbay ifay itay omescay idewayssay oughthray ethay opposingay aterway, enthay artlypay owingay otay ethay ightlay uoyancybay ofay ethay ale-boatwhay, anday ethay elasticityay ofay itsay aterialsmay, aay ackedcray ibray oray aay ashedday ankplay oray otway, aay ortsay ofay itchstay inay ethay idesay, isay enerallygay ethay ostmay erioussay esultray. Esethay ubmergedsay idesay owsblay areay osay oftenay eceivedray inay ethay isheryfay, atthay eythay areay accounteday eremay ild’schay ayplay. Omesay oneay ipsstray offay aay ockfray, anday ethay olehay isay oppedstay. 

Irdthay: IAY annotcay emonstrateday itay, utbay itay eemssay otay emay, atthay inay ethay alewhay ethay ensesay ofay ouchtay isay oncentratedcay inay ethay ailtay; orfay inay isthay espectray erethay isay aay elicacyday inay itay onlyay equalleday byay ethay aintinessday ofay ethay elephant’say unktray. Isthay elicacyday isay ieflychay evinceday inay ethay actionay ofay eepingsway, enwhay inay aidenlymay entlenessgay ethay alewhay ithway aay ertaincay oftsay ownessslay ovesmay ishay immenseay ukesflay omfray idesay otay idesay uponay ethay urfacesay ofay ethay easay; anday ifay ehay eelfay utbay aay ailor’ssay iskerwhay, oeway otay atthay ailorsay, iskerswhay anday allay. Atwhay endernesstay erethay isay inay atthay eliminarypray ouchtay! Adhay isthay ailtay anyay ehensilepray owerpay, IAY ouldshay aightwaystray ethinkbay emay ofay Armonodes’day elephantay atthay osay equentedfray ethay ower-marketflay, anday ithway owlay alutationssay esentedpray osegaysnay otay amselsday, anday enthay aressedcay eirthay oneszay. Onay oremay accountsay anthay oneay, aay itypay itay isay atthay ethay alewhay oesday otnay ossesspay isthay ehensilepray irtuevay inay ishay ailtay; orfay IAY avehay eardhay ofay etyay anotheray elephantay, atthay enwhay oundedway inay ethay ightfay, urvedcay oundray ishay unktray anday extracteday ethay artday. 

Ourthfay: Ealingstay unawaresay uponay ethay alewhay inay ethay anciedfay ecuritysay ofay ethay iddlemay ofay olitarysay eassay, ouyay indfay imhay unbentay omfray ethay astvay orpulencecay ofay ishay ignityday, anday itten-likekay, ehay aysplay onay ethay oceanay asay ifay itay ereway aay earthhay. Utbay illstay ouyay eesay ishay owerpay inay ishay ayplay. Ethay oadbray almspay ofay ishay ailtay areay irtedflay ighhay intoay ethay airay; enthay itingsmay ethay urfacesay, ethay underousthay oncussioncay esoundsray orfay ilesmay. Ouyay ouldway almostay inkthay aay eatgray ungay adhay eenbay ischargedday; anday ifay ouyay oticednay ethay ightlay eathwray ofay aporvay omfray ethay iraclespay atay ishay otheray extremityay, ouyay ouldway inkthay atthay atthay asway ethay okesmay omfray ethay ouch-holetay. 

Ifthfay: Asay inay ethay ordinaryay oatingflay osturepay ofay ethay eviathanlay ethay ukesflay ielay onsiderablycay elowbay ethay evellay ofay ishay ackbay, eythay areay enthay ompletelycay outay ofay ightsay eneathbay ethay urfacesay; utbay enwhay ehay isay aboutay otay ungeplay intoay ethay eepsday, ishay entireay ukesflay ithway atay eastlay irtythay eetfay ofay ishay odybay areay ossedtay erectay inay ethay airay, anday osay emainray ibratingvay aay omentmay, illtay eythay ownwardsday ootshay outay ofay iewvay. Exceptingay ethay ublimesay each_—somewhere_bray elseay otay ebay escribed—thisday eakingpay ofay ethay ale’swhay ukesflay isay erhapspay ethay andestgray ightsay otay ebay eensay inay allay animateday aturenay. Outay ofay ethay ottomlessbay ofunditiespray ethay iganticgay ailtay eemssay asmodicallyspay atchingsnay atay ethay ighesthay eavenhay. Osay inay eamsdray, avehay IAY eensay ajesticmay Atansay ustingthray orthfay ishay ormentedtay olossalcay awclay omfray ethay ameflay Alticbay ofay Ellhay. Utbay inay azinggay atay uchsay enesscay, itay isay allay inay allay atwhay oodmay ouyay areay inay; ifay inay ethay Anteanday, ethay evilsday illway occuray otay ouyay; ifay inay atthay ofay Isaiahay, ethay archangelsay. Andingstay atay ethay ast-headmay ofay myay ipshay uringday aay unrisesay atthay imsonedcray skyay anday easay, IAY onceay awsay aay argelay erdhay ofay aleswhay inay ethay eastay, allay eadinghay owardstay ethay unsay, anday orfay aay omentmay ibratingvay inay oncertcay ithway eakedpay ukesflay. Asay itay eemedsay otay emay atay ethay imetay, uchsay aay andgray embodimentay ofay adorationay ofay ethay odsgay asway evernay eheldbay, evenay inay Ersiapay, ethay omehay ofay ethay irefay orshippersway. Asay Olemyptay Ilopaterphay estifiedtay ofay ethay Africanay elephantay, IAY enthay estifiedtay ofay ethay alewhay, onouncingpray imhay ethay ostmay evoutday ofay allay eingsbay. Orfay accordingay otay Ingkay Ubajay, ethay ilitarymay elephantsay ofay antiquityay oftenay ailedhay ethay orningmay ithway eirthay unkstray uplifteday inay ethay ofoundestpray ilencesay. 

Ethay ancechay omparisoncay inay isthay apterchay, etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ethay elephantay, osay arfay asay omesay aspectsay ofay ethay ailtay ofay ethay oneay anday ethay unktray ofay ethay otheray areay oncernedcay, ouldshay otnay endtay otay aceplay osethay otway oppositeay organsay onay anay equalityay, uchmay esslay ethay eaturescray otay ichwhay eythay espectivelyray elongbay. Orfay asay ethay ightiestmay elephantay isay utbay aay erriertay otay Eviathanlay, osay, omparedcay ithway Eviathan’slay ailtay, ishay unktray isay utbay ethay alkstay ofay aay ilylay. Ethay ostmay irefulday owblay omfray ethay elephant’say unktray ereway asay ethay ayfulplay aptay ofay aay anfay, omparedcay ithway ethay easurelessmay ushcray anday ashcray ofay ethay ermspay ale’swhay onderouspay ukesflay, ichwhay inay epeatedray instancesay avehay oneay afteray ethay otheray urledhay entireay oatsbay ithway allay eirthay oarsay anday ewscray intoay ethay airay, eryvay uchmay asay anay Indianay ugglerjay ossestay ishay allsbay.* 

ough*Thay allay omparisoncay inay ethay ayway ofay eneralgay ulkbay etweenbay ethay alewhay anday ethay elephantay isay eposterouspray, inasmuchay asay inay atthay articularpay ethay elephantay andsstay inay uchmay ethay amesay espectray otay ethay alewhay atthay aay ogday oesday otay ethay elephantay; everthelessnay, erethay areay otnay antingway omesay ointspay ofay uriouscay imilitudesay; amongay esethay isay ethay outspay. Itay isay ellway ownknay atthay ethay elephantay illway oftenay awdray upay aterway oray ustday inay ishay unktray, anday enthay elevatingay itay, etjay itay orthfay inay aay eamstray. 

Ethay oremay IAY onsidercay isthay ightymay ailtay, ethay oremay oday IAY eploreday myay inabilityay otay expressay itay. Atay imestay erethay areay esturesgay inay itay, ichwhay, oughthay eythay ouldway ellway acegray ethay andhay ofay anmay, emainray ollywhay inexplicableay. Inay anay extensiveay erdhay, osay emarkableray, occasionallyay, areay esethay icmystay esturesgay, atthay IAY avehay eardhay untershay owhay avehay eclaredday emthay akinay otay Ee-masonfray ignssay anday olssymbay; atthay ethay alewhay, indeeday, byay esethay ethodsmay intelligentlyay onversedcay ithway ethay orldway. Ornay areay erethay antingway otheray otionsmay ofay ethay alewhay inay ishay eneralgay odybay, ullfay ofay angenessstray, anday unaccountableay otay ishay ostmay experienceday assailantay. Issectday imhay owhay IAY aymay, enthay, IAY utbay ogay inskay eepday; IAY owknay imhay otnay, anday evernay illway. Utbay ifay IAY owknay otnay evenay ethay ailtay ofay isthay alewhay, owhay understanday ishay eadhay? uchmay oremay, owhay omprehendcay ishay acefay, enwhay acefay ehay ashay onenay? Outhay altshay eesay myay ackbay artspay, myay ailtay, ehay eemssay otay aysay, utbay myay acefay allshay otnay ebay eensay. Utbay IAY annotcay ompletelycay akemay outay ishay ackbay artspay; anday inthay atwhay ehay illway aboutay ishay acefay, IAY aysay againay ehay ashay onay acefay. 



APTERCHAY 87ay. Ethay Andgray Armadaay. 

Ethay onglay anday arrownay eninsulapay ofay Alaccamay, extendingay outh-eastwardsay omfray ethay erritoriestay ofay Irmahbay, ormsfay ethay ostmay outherlysay ointpay ofay allay Asiaay. Inay aay ontinuouscay inelay omfray atthay eninsulapay etchstray ethay onglay islandsay ofay Umatrasay, Avajay, Allybay, anday Imortay; ichwhay, ithway anymay othersay, ormfay aay astvay olemay, oray ampartray, engthwiselay onnectingcay Asiaay ithway Australiaay, anday ividingday ethay onglay unbrokenay Indianay oceanay omfray ethay icklythay uddedstay orientalay archipelagoesay. Isthay ampartray isay iercedpay byay everalsay ally-portssay orfay ethay onveniencecay ofay ipsshay anday aleswhay; onspicuouscay amongay ichwhay areay ethay aitsstray ofay Undasay anday Alaccamay. Byay ethay aitsstray ofay Undasay, ieflychay, esselsvay oundbay otay Inachay omfray ethay estway, emergeay intoay ethay Inachay eassay. 

Osethay arrownay aitsstray ofay Undasay ivideday Umatrasay omfray Avajay; anday andingstay idwaymay inay atthay astvay ampartray ofay islandsay, uttressedbay byay atthay oldbay eengray omontorypray, ownknay otay eamensay asay Avajay Eadhay; eythay otnay aay ittlelay orrespondcay otay ethay entralcay atewaygay openingay intoay omesay astvay alledway empireay: anday onsideringcay ethay inexhaustibleay ealthway ofay icesspay, anday ilkssay, anday ewelsjay, anday oldgay, anday ivoryay, ithway ichwhay ethay ousandthay islandsay ofay atthay orientalay easay areay enricheday, itay eemssay aay ignificantsay ovisionpray ofay aturenay, atthay uchsay easurestray, byay ethay eryvay ormationfay ofay ethay andlay, ouldshay atay eastlay earbay ethay appearanceay, oweverhay ineffectualay, ofay eingbay uardedgay omfray ethay all-graspingay esternway orldway. Ethay oresshay ofay ethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay areay unsupplieday ithway osethay omineeringday ortressesfay ichwhay uardgay ethay entrancesay otay ethay Editerraneanmay, ethay Alticbay, anday ethay Opontispray. Unlikeay ethay Anesday, esethay Orientalsay oday otnay emandday ethay obsequiousay omagehay ofay oweredlay op-sailstay omfray ethay endlessay ocessionpray ofay ipsshay eforebay ethay indway, ichwhay orfay enturiescay astpay, byay ightnay anday byay ayday, avehay assedpay etweenbay ethay islandsay ofay Umatrasay anday Avajay, eightedfray ithway ethay ostliestcay argoescay ofay ethay eastay. Utbay ilewhay eythay eelyfray aiveway aay eremonialcay ikelay isthay, eythay oday byay onay eansmay enounceray eirthay aimclay otay oremay olidsay ibutetray. 

Imetay outay ofay indmay ethay iraticalpay oaspray ofay ethay Alaysmay, urkinglay amongay ethay owlay adedshay ovescay anday isletsay ofay Umatrasay, avehay alliedsay outay uponay ethay esselsvay ailingsay oughthray ethay aitsstray, iercelyfay emandingday ibutetray atay ethay ointpay ofay eirthay earsspay. Oughthay byay ethay epeatedray oodyblay astisementschay eythay avehay eceivedray atay ethay andshay ofay Europeanay uiserscray, ethay audacityay ofay esethay orsairscay ashay ofay atelay eenbay omewhatsay epressedray; etyay, evenay atay ethay esentpray ayday, eway occasionallyay earhay ofay Englishay anday Americanay esselsvay, ichwhay, inay osethay atersway, avehay eenbay emorselesslyray oardedbay anday illagedpay. 

Ithway aay airfay, eshfray indway, ethay Equodpay asway ownay awingdray ighnay otay esethay aitsstray; Ahabay urposingpay otay asspay oughthray emthay intoay ethay Avanjay easay, anday encethay, uisingcray orthwardsnay, overay atersway ownknay otay ebay equentedfray erehay anday erethay byay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, eepsway inshoreay byay ethay Ilippinephay Islandsay, anday aingay ethay arfay oastcay ofay Apanjay, inay imetay orfay ethay eatgray alingwhay easonsay erethay. Byay esethay eansmay, ethay ircumnavigatingcay Equodpay ouldway eepsway almostay allay ethay ownknay Ermspay Alewhay uisingcray oundsgray ofay ethay orldway, eviouspray otay escendingday uponay ethay Inelay inay ethay Acificpay; erewhay Ahabay, oughthay everywhereay elseay oiledfay inay ishay ursuitpay, irmlyfay ountedcay uponay ivinggay attlebay otay Obymay Ickday, inay ethay easay ehay asway ostmay ownknay otay equentfray; anday atay aay easonsay enwhay ehay ightmay ostmay easonablyray ebay esumedpray otay ebay auntinghay itay. 

Utbay owhay ownay? inay isthay onedzay uestqay, oesday Ahabay ouchtay onay andlay? oesday ishay ewcray inkdray airay? Urelysay, ehay illway opstay orfay aterway. Aynay. Orfay aay onglay imetay, ownay, ethay ircus-runningcay unsay ashay acedray ithinway ishay ieryfay ingray, anday eedsnay onay ustenancesay utbay at’swhay inay imselfhay. Osay Ahabay. Arkmay isthay, ootay, inay ethay alerwhay. Ilewhay otheray ullshay areay oadedlay ownday ithway alienay uffstay, otay ebay ansferredtray otay oreignfay arveswhay; ethay orld-wanderingway ale-shipwhay arriescay onay argocay utbay erselfhay anday ewcray, eirthay eaponsway anday eirthay antsway. Eshay ashay aay olewhay ake’slay ontentscay ottledbay inay erhay ampleay oldhay. Eshay isay allastedbay ithway utilitiesay; otnay altogetheray ithway unusableay ig-leadpay anday entledgekay. Eshay arriescay ears’yay aterway inay erhay. Earclay olday imepray Antucketnay aterway; ichwhay, enwhay eethray earsyay afloatay, ethay Antucketernay, inay ethay Acificpay, eferspray otay inkdray eforebay ethay ackishbray uidflay, utbay esterdayyay aftedray offay inay askscay, omfray ethay Eruvianpay oray Indianay eamsstray. Encehay itay isay, atthay, ilewhay otheray ipsshay aymay avehay onegay otay Inachay omfray Ewnay Orkyay, anday ackbay againay, ouchingtay atay aay orescay ofay ortspay, ethay ale-shipwhay, inay allay atthay intervalay, aymay otnay avehay ightedsay oneay aingray ofay oilsay; erhay ewcray avinghay eensay onay anmay utbay oatingflay eamensay ikelay emselvesthay. Osay atthay idday ouyay arrycay emthay ethay ewsnay atthay anotheray oodflay adhay omecay; eythay ouldway onlyay answer—“Wellay, oysbay, ere’shay ethay ark!”ay 

Ownay, asay anymay Ermspay Aleswhay adhay eenbay apturedcay offay ethay esternway oastcay ofay Avajay, inay ethay earnay icinityvay ofay ethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay; indeeday, asay ostmay ofay ethay oundgray, oundaboutray, asway enerallygay ecognisedray byay ethay ishermenfay asay anay excellentay otspay orfay uisingcray; ereforethay, asay ethay Equodpay ainedgay oremay anday oremay uponay Avajay Eadhay, ethay ook-outslay ereway epeatedlyray ailedhay, anday admonisheday otay eepkay ideway awakeay. Utbay oughthay ethay eengray almypay iffsclay ofay ethay andlay oonsay oomedlay onay ethay arboardstay owbay, anday ithway elightedday ostrilsnay ethay eshfray innamoncay asway uffedsnay inay ethay airay, etyay otnay aay inglesay etjay asway escriedday. Almostay enouncingray allay oughtthay ofay allingfay inay ithway anyay amegay ereaboutshay, ethay ipshay adhay ellway ighnay entereday ethay aitsstray, enwhay ethay ustomarycay eeringchay cryay asway eardhay omfray aloftay, anday ereay onglay aay ectaclespay ofay ingularsay agnificencemay alutedsay usay. 

Utbay erehay ebay itay emisedpray, atthay owingay otay ethay unwearieday activityay ithway ichwhay ofay atelay eythay avehay eenbay untedhay overay allay ourfay oceansay, ethay Ermspay Aleswhay, insteaday ofay almostay invariablyay ailingsay inay allsmay etachedday ompaniescay, asay inay ormerfay imestay, areay ownay equentlyfray etmay ithway inay extensiveay erdshay, ometimessay embracingay osay eatgray aay ultitudemay, atthay itay ouldway almostay eemsay asay ifay umerousnay ationsnay ofay emthay adhay ornsway olemnsay eaguelay anday ovenantcay orfay utualmay assistanceay anday otectionpray. Otay isthay aggregationay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay intoay uchsay immenseay aravanscay, aymay ebay imputeday ethay ircumstancecay atthay evenay inay ethay estbay uisingcray oundsgray, ouyay aymay ownay ometimessay ailsay orfay eeksway anday onthsmay ogethertay, ithoutway eingbay eetedgray byay aay inglesay outspay; anday enthay ebay uddenlysay alutedsay byay atwhay ometimessay eemssay ousandsthay onay ousandsthay. 

Oadbray onay othbay owsbay, atay ethay istanceday ofay omesay otway oray eethray ilesmay, anday ormingfay aay eatgray emicirclesay, embracingay oneay alfhay ofay ethay evellay orizonhay, aay ontinuouscay ainchay ofay ale-jetswhay ereway up-playingay anday arklingspay inay ethay oon-daynay airay. Unlikeay ethay aightstray erpendicularpay in-jetstway ofay ethay Ightray Alewhay, ichwhay, ividingday atay optay, allfay overay inay otway anchesbray, ikelay ethay eftclay oopingdray oughsbay ofay aay illowway, ethay inglesay orward-slantingfay outspay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay esentspray aay ickthay urledcay ushbay ofay itewhay istmay, ontinuallycay isingray anday allingfay awayay otay eewardlay. 

Eensay omfray ethay Equod’spay eckday, enthay, asay eshay ouldway iseray onay aay ighhay illhay ofay ethay easay, isthay osthay ofay aporyvay outsspay, individuallyay urlingcay upay intoay ethay airay, anday eheldbay oughthray aay endingblay atmosphereay ofay uishblay azehay, owedshay ikelay ethay ousandthay eerfulchay imneyschay ofay omesay enseday etropolismay, escriedday ofay aay almybay autumnalay orningmay, byay omesay orsemanhay onay aay eighthay. 

Asay archingmay armiesay approachingay anay unfriendlyay efileday inay ethay ountainsmay, accelerateay eirthay archmay, allay eagernessay otay aceplay atthay erilouspay assagepay inay eirthay earray, anday onceay oremay expanday inay omparativecay ecuritysay uponay ethay ainplay; evenay osay idday isthay astvay eetflay ofay aleswhay ownay eemsay urryinghay orwardfay oughthray ethay aitsstray; aduallygray ontractingcay ethay ingsway ofay eirthay emicirclesay, anday immingsway onay, inay oneay olidsay, utbay illstay escenticcray entrecay. 

Owdingcray allay ailsay ethay Equodpay essedpray afteray emthay; ethay arpooneershay andlinghay eirthay eaponsway, anday oudlylay eeringchay omfray ethay eadshay ofay eirthay etyay uspendedsay oatsbay. Ifay ethay indway onlyay eldhay, ittlelay oubtday adhay eythay, atthay asedchay oughthray esethay Aitsstray ofay Undasay, ethay astvay osthay ouldway onlyay eployday intoay ethay Orientalay eassay otay itnessway ethay apturecay ofay otnay aay ewfay ofay eirthay umbernay. Anday owhay ouldcay elltay etherwhay, inay atthay ongregatedcay aravancay, Obymay Ickday imselfhay ightmay otnay emporarilytay ebay immingsway, ikelay ethay orshippedway ite-elephantwhay inay ethay oronationcay ocessionpray ofay ethay Iamesesay! Osay ithway un-sailstay iledpay onay un-sailstay, eway ailedsay alongay, ivingdray esethay eviathanslay eforebay usay; enwhay, ofay aay uddensay, ethay oicevay ofay Ashtegotay asway eardhay, oudlylay irectingday attentionay otay omethingsay inay ouray akeway. 

Orrespondingcay otay ethay escentcray inay ouray anvay, eway eheldbay anotheray inay ouray earray. Itay eemedsay ormedfay ofay etachedday itewhay aporsvay, isingray anday allingfay omethingsay ikelay ethay outsspay ofay ethay aleswhay; onlyay eythay idday otnay osay ompletelycay omecay anday ogay; orfay eythay onstantlycay overedhay, ithoutway inallyfay isappearingday. Evellinglay ishay assglay atay isthay ightsay, Ahabay uicklyqay evolvedray inay ishay ivot-holepay, ingcryay, Aloft“ay erethay, anday igray ipswhay anday ucketsbay otay etway ethay ails;—Malayssay, irsay, anday afteray us!”ay 

Asay ifay ootay onglay urkinglay ehindbay ethay eadlandshay, illtay ethay Equodpay ouldshay airlyfay avehay entereday ethay aitsstray, esethay ascallyray Asiaticsay ereway ownay inay othay ursuitpay, otay akemay upay orfay eirthay over-cautiousay elayday.
