Utbay enwhay ethay iftsway Equodpay, ithway aay eshfray eadinglay indway, asway erselfhay inay othay asechay; owhay eryvay indkay ofay esethay awnytay ilanthropistsphay otay assistay inay eedingspay erhay onay otay erhay ownay osenchay ursuit,—merepay iding-whipsray anday owelsray otay erhay, atthay eythay ereway. Asay ithway assglay underay armay, Ahabay o-and-frotay acedpay ethay eckday; inay ishay orwardfay urntay eholdingbay ethay onstersmay ehay asedchay, anday inay ethay afteray oneay ethay oodthirstyblay iratespay asingchay im_hay_; omesay uchsay ancyfay asay ethay aboveay eemedsay ishay. Anday enwhay ehay ancedglay uponay ethay eengray allsway ofay ethay ateryway efileday inay ichwhay ethay ipshay asway enthay ailingsay, anday ethoughtbay imhay atthay oughthray atthay ategay aylay ethay outeray otay ishay engeancevay, anday eheldbay, owhay atthay oughthray atthay amesay ategay ehay asway ownay othbay asingchay anday eingbay asedchay otay ishay eadlyday enday; anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay aay erdhay ofay emorselessray ildway iratespay anday inhumanay atheisticalay evilsday ereway infernallyay eeringchay imhay onay ithway eirthay urses;—whencay allay esethay onceitscay adhay assedpay oughthray ishay ainbray, Ahab’say owbray asway eftlay auntgay anday ibbedray, ikelay ethay ackblay andsay eachbay afteray omesay ormystay idetay ashay eenbay awinggnay itay, ithoutway eingbay ableay otay agdray ethay irmfay ingthay omfray itsay aceplay. 

Utbay oughtsthay ikelay esethay oubledtray eryvay ewfay ofay ethay ecklessray ewcray; anday enwhay, afteray eadilystay oppingdray anday oppingdray ethay iratespay asternay, ethay Equodpay atay astlay otshay byay ethay ividvay eengray Ockatoocay Ointpay onay ethay Umatrasay idesay, emergingay atay astlay uponay ethay oadbray atersway eyondbay; enthay, ethay arpooneershay eemedsay oremay otay ievegray atthay ethay iftsway aleswhay adhay eenbay aininggay uponay ethay ipshay, anthay otay ejoiceray atthay ethay ipshay adhay osay ictoriouslyvay ainedgay uponay ethay Alaysmay. Utbay illstay ivingdray onay inay ethay akeway ofay ethay aleswhay, atay engthlay eythay eemedsay abatingay eirthay eedspay; aduallygray ethay ipshay earednay emthay; anday ethay indway ownay ingdyay awayay, ordway asway assedpay otay ingspray otay ethay oatsbay. Utbay onay oonersay idday ethay erdhay, byay omesay esumedpray onderfulway instinctay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, ecomebay otifiednay ofay ethay eethray eelskay atthay ereway afteray em,—thoughthay asay etyay aay ilemay inay eirthay ear,—thanray eythay alliedray againay, anday ormingfay inay oseclay anksray anday attalionsbay, osay atthay eirthay outsspay allay ookedlay ikelay ashingflay ineslay ofay ackedstay ayonetsbay, ovedmay onay ithway edoubledray elocityvay. 

Ippedstray otay ouray irtsshay anday awersdray, eway angspray otay ethay ite-ashwhay, anday afteray everalsay ours’hay ullingpay ereway almostay isposedday otay enounceray ethay asechay, enwhay aay eneralgay ausingpay ommotioncay amongay ethay aleswhay avegay animatingay okentay atthay eythay ereway ownay atay astlay underay ethay influenceay ofay atthay angestray erplexitypay ofay inertay irresolutionay, ichwhay, enwhay ethay ishermenfay erceivepay itay inay ethay alewhay, eythay aysay ehay isay alliedgay. Ethay ompactcay artialmay olumnscay inay ichwhay eythay adhay eenbay ithertohay apidlyray anday eadilystay immingsway, ereway ownay okenbray upay inay oneay easurelessmay outray; anday ikelay Ingkay Orus’pay elephantsay inay ethay Indianay attlebay ithway Alexanderay, eythay eemedsay oinggay admay ithway onsternationcay. Inay allay irectionsday expandingay inay astvay irregularay irclescay, anday aimlesslyay immingsway itherhay anday itherthay, byay eirthay ortshay ickthay outingsspay, eythay ainlyplay etrayedbay eirthay istractionday ofay anicpay. Isthay asway illstay oremay angelystray evinceday byay osethay ofay eirthay umbernay, owhay, ompletelycay aralysedpay asay itay ereway, elplesslyhay oatedflay ikelay ater-loggedway ismantledday ipsshay onay ethay easay. Adhay esethay Eviathanslay eenbay utbay aay ockflay ofay implesay eepshay, ursuedpay overay ethay asturepay byay eethray iercefay olvesway, eythay ouldcay otnay ossiblypay avehay evinceday uchsay excessiveay ismayday. Utbay isthay occasionalay imiditytay isay aracteristicchay ofay almostay allay erdinghay eaturescray. Oughthay andingbay ogethertay inay enstay ofay ousandsthay, ethay ion-manedlay uffaloesbay ofay ethay Estway avehay edflay eforebay aay olitarysay orsemanhay. Itnessway, ootay, allay umanhay eingsbay, owhay enwhay erdedhay ogethertay inay ethay eepfoldshay ofay aay eatre’sthay itpay, eythay illway, atay ethay ightestslay alarmay ofay irefay, ushray elter-skelterhay orfay ethay outletsay, owdingcray, amplingtray, ammingjay, anday emorselesslyray ashingday eachay otheray otay eathday. Estbay, ereforethay, ithholdway anyay amazementay atay ethay angelystray alliedgay aleswhay eforebay usay, orfay erethay isay onay ollyfay ofay ethay eastsbay ofay ethay earthay ichwhay isay otnay infinitelyay outdoneay byay ethay adnessmay ofay enmay. 

Oughthay anymay ofay ethay aleswhay, asay ashay eenbay aidsay, ereway inay iolentvay otionmay, etyay itay isay otay ebay observeday atthay asay aay olewhay ethay erdhay eithernay advanceday ornay etreatedray, utbay ollectivelycay emainedray inay oneay aceplay. Asay isay ustomarycay inay osethay asescay, ethay oatsbay atay onceay eparatedsay, eachay akingmay orfay omesay oneay onelay alewhay onay ethay outskirtsay ofay ethay oalshay. Inay aboutay eethray inutes’may imetay, Ueequeg’sqay arpoonhay asway ungflay; ethay ickenstray ishfay artedday indingblay ayspray inay ouray acesfay, anday enthay unningray awayay ithway usay ikelay ightlay, eeredstay aightstray orfay ethay earthay ofay ethay erdhay. Oughthay uchsay aay ovementmay onay ethay artpay ofay ethay alewhay uckstray underay uchsay ircumstancescay, isay inay onay iseway unprecedenteday; anday indeeday isay almostay alwaysay oremay oray esslay anticipateday; etyay oesday itay esentpray oneay ofay ethay oremay erilouspay icissitudesvay ofay ethay isheryfay. Orfay asay ethay iftsway onstermay agsdray ouyay eeperday anday eeperday intoay ethay anticfray oalshay, ouyay idbay adieuay otay ircumspectcay ifelay anday onlyay existay inay aay eliriousday obthray. 

Asay, indblay anday eafday, ethay alewhay ungedplay orwardfay, asay ifay byay eershay owerpay ofay eedspay otay idray imselfhay ofay ethay ironay eechlay atthay adhay astenedfay otay imhay; asay eway usthay oretay aay itewhay ashgay inay ethay easay, onay allay idessay enacedmay asay eway ewflay, byay ethay azedcray eaturescray otay anday ofray ushingray aboutay usay; ouray esetbay oatbay asway ikelay aay ipshay obbedmay byay ice-islesay inay aay empesttay, anday ivingstray otay eerstay oughthray eirthay omplicatedcay annelschay anday aitsstray, owingknay otnay atay atwhay omentmay itay aymay ebay ockedlay inay anday ushedcray. 

Utbay otnay aay itbay auntedday, Ueequegqay eeredstay usay anfullymay; ownay eeringshay offay omfray isthay onstermay irectlyday acrossay ouray outeray inay advanceay; ownay edgingay awayay omfray atthay, osewhay olossalcay ukesflay ereway uspendedsay overheaday, ilewhay allay ethay imetay, Arbuckstay oodstay upay inay ethay owsbay, ancelay inay andhay, ickingpray outay ofay ouray ayway ateverwhay aleswhay ehay ouldcay eachray byay ortshay artsday, orfay erethay asway onay imetay otay akemay onglay onesay. Ornay ereway ethay oarsmenay uiteqay idleay, oughthay eirthay ontedway utyday asway ownay altogetheray ispensedday ithway. Eythay ieflychay attendeday otay ethay outingshay artpay ofay ethay usinessbay. Out“ay ofay ethay ayway, Ommodore!”cay iedcray oneay, otay aay eatgray omedarydray atthay ofay aay uddensay oseray odilybay otay ethay urfacesay, anday orfay anay instantay eatenedthray otay ampsway usay. ard“Hay ownday ithway ouryay ailtay, ere!”thay iedcray aay econdsay otay anotheray, ichwhay, oseclay otay ouray unwalegay, eemedsay almlycay oolingcay imselfhay ithway ishay ownay an-likefay extremityay. 

Allay aleboatswhay arrycay ertaincay uriouscay ontrivancescay, originallyay inventeday byay ethay Antucketnay Indiansay, alledcay uggsdray. Otway ickthay uaressqay ofay oodway ofay equalay izesay areay outlystay enchedclay ogethertay, osay atthay eythay osscray eachay other’say aingray atay ightray anglesay; aay inelay ofay onsiderablecay engthlay isay enthay attacheday otay ethay iddlemay ofay isthay ockblay, anday ethay otheray enday ofay ethay inelay eingbay oopedlay, itay ancay inay aay omentmay ebay astenedfay otay aay arpoonhay. Itay isay ieflychay amongay alliedgay aleswhay atthay isthay uggdray isay useday. Orfay enthay, oremay aleswhay areay oseclay oundray ouyay anthay ouyay ancay ossiblypay asechay atay oneay imetay. Utbay ermspay aleswhay areay otnay everyay ayday encountereday; ilewhay ouyay aymay, enthay, ouyay ustmay illkay allay ouyay ancay. Anday ifay ouyay annotcay illkay emthay allay atay onceay, ouyay ustmay ingway emthay, osay atthay eythay ancay ebay afterwardsay illedkay atay ouryay eisurelay. Encehay itay isay, atthay atay imestay ikelay esethay ethay uggdray, omescay intoay equisitionray. Ouray oatbay asway urnishedfay ithway eethray ofay emthay. Ethay irstfay anday econdsay ereway uccessfullysay artedday, anday eway awsay ethay aleswhay aggeringlystay unningray offay, etteredfay byay ethay enormousay idelongsay esistanceray ofay ethay owingtay uggdray. Eythay ereway ampedcray ikelay alefactorsmay ithway ethay ainchay anday allbay. Utbay uponay ingingflay ethay irdthay, inay ethay actay ofay ossingtay overboarday ethay umsyclay oodenway ockblay, itay aughtcay underay oneay ofay ethay eatssay ofay ethay oatbay, anday inay anay instantay oretay itay outay anday arriedcay itay awayay, oppingdray ethay oarsmanay inay ethay oat’sbay ottombay asay ethay eatsay idslay omfray underay imhay. Onay othbay idessay ethay easay amecay inay atay ethay oundedway anksplay, utbay eway uffedstay otway oray eethray awersdray anday irtsshay inay, anday osay oppedstay ethay eakslay orfay ethay imetay. 

Itay adhay eenbay extnay otay impossibleay otay artday esethay ugged-harpoonsdray, ereway itay otnay atthay asay eway advanceday intoay ethay erdhay, ouray ale’swhay ayway eatlygray iminishedday; oreovermay, atthay asay eway entway illstay urtherfay anday urtherfay omfray ethay ircumferencecay ofay ommotioncay, ethay irefulday isordersday eemedsay aningway. Osay atthay enwhay atay astlay ethay erkingjay arpoonhay ewdray outay, anday ethay owingtay alewhay idewayssay anishedvay; enthay, ithway ethay aperingtay orcefay ofay ishay artingpay omentummay, eway idedglay etweenbay otway aleswhay intoay ethay innermostay earthay ofay ethay oalshay, asay ifay omfray omesay ountainmay orrenttay eway adhay idslay intoay aay erenesay alleyvay akelay. Erehay ethay ormsstay inay ethay oaringray ensglay etweenbay ethay outermostay aleswhay, ereway eardhay utbay otnay eltfay. Inay isthay entralcay expanseay ethay easay esentedpray atthay oothsmay atin-likesay urfacesay, alledcay aay eekslay, oducedpray byay ethay ubtlesay oisturemay ownthray offay byay ethay alewhay inay ishay oremay uietqay oodsmay. Esyay, eway ereway ownay inay atthay enchanteday almcay ichwhay eythay aysay urkslay atay ethay earthay ofay everyay ommotioncay. Anday illstay inay ethay istractedday istanceday eway eheldbay ethay umultstay ofay ethay outeray oncentriccay irclescay, anday awsay uccessivesay odspay ofay aleswhay, eightay oray entay inay eachay, iftlysway oinggay oundray anday oundray, ikelay ultipliedmay ansspay ofay orseshay inay aay ingray; anday osay oselyclay ouldershay otay ouldershay, atthay aay Itanictay ircus-ridercay ightmay easilyay avehay over-archeday ethay iddlemay onesay, anday osay avehay onegay oundray onay eirthay acksbay. Owingay otay ethay ensityday ofay ethay owdcray ofay eposingray aleswhay, oremay immediatelyay urroundingsay ethay embayeday axisay ofay ethay erdhay, onay ossiblepay ancechay ofay escapeay asway atay esentpray affordeday usay. Eway ustmay atchway orfay aay eachbray inay ethay ivinglay allway atthay emmedhay usay inay; ethay allway atthay adhay onlyay admitteday usay inay orderay otay utshay usay upay. Eepingkay atay ethay entrecay ofay ethay akelay, eway ereway occasionallyay isitedvay byay allsmay ametay owscay anday alvescay; ethay omenway anday ildrenchay ofay isthay outedray osthay. 

Ownay, inclusiveay ofay ethay occasionalay ideway intervalsay etweenbay ethay evolvingray outeray irclescay, anday inclusiveay ofay ethay acesspay etweenbay ethay ariousvay odspay inay anyay oneay ofay osethay irclescay, ethay entireay areaay atay isthay uncturejay, embraceday byay ethay olewhay ultitudemay, ustmay avehay ontainedcay atay eastlay otway oray eethray uaresqay ilesmay. Atay anyay ate—thoughray indeeday uchsay aay esttay atay uchsay aay imetay ightmay ebay eceptive—spoutingsday ightmay ebay iscoveredday omfray ouray owlay oatbay atthay eemedsay ayingplay upay almostay omfray ethay imray ofay ethay orizonhay. IAY entionmay isthay ircumstancecay, ecausebay, asay ifay ethay owscay anday alvescay adhay eenbay urposelypay ockedlay upay inay isthay innermostay oldfay; anday asay ifay ethay ideway extentay ofay ethay erdhay adhay ithertohay eventedpray emthay omfray earninglay ethay ecisepray ausecay ofay itsay oppingstay; oray, ossiblypay, eingbay osay oungyay, unsophisticateday, anday everyay ayway innocentay anday inexperienceday; oweverhay itay aymay avehay eenbay, esethay allersmay ales—nowwhay anday enthay isitingvay ouray ecalmedbay oatbay omfray ethay arginmay ofay ethay ake—evincedlay aay ondrousway earlessnessfay anday onfidencecay, oray elseay aay illstay echarmedbay anicpay ichwhay itay asway impossibleay otnay otay arvelmay atay. Ikelay ouseholdhay ogsday eythay amecay ufflingsnay oundray usay, ightray upay otay ouray unwalesgay, anday ouchingtay emthay; illtay itay almostay eemedsay atthay omesay ellspay adhay uddenlysay omesticatedday emthay. Ueequegqay attedpay eirthay oreheadsfay; Arbuckstay atchedscray eirthay acksbay ithway ishay ancelay; utbay earfulfay ofay ethay onsequencescay, orfay ethay imetay efrainedray omfray artingday itay. 

Utbay arfay eneathbay isthay ondrousway orldway uponay ethay urfacesay, anotheray anday illstay angerstray orldway etmay ouray eyesay asay eway azedgay overay ethay idesay. Orfay, uspendedsay inay osethay ateryway aultsvay, oatedflay ethay ormsfay ofay ethay ursingnay othersmay ofay ethay aleswhay, anday osethay atthay byay eirthay enormousay irthgay eemedsay ortlyshay otay ecomebay othersmay. Ethay akelay, asay IAY avehay intedhay, asway otay aay onsiderablecay epthday exceedinglyay ansparenttray; anday asay umanhay infantsay ilewhay ucklingsay illway almlycay anday ixedlyfay azegay awayay omfray ethay eastbray, asay ifay eadinglay otway ifferentday iveslay atay ethay imetay; anday ilewhay etyay awingdray ortalmay ourishmentnay, ebay illstay irituallyspay eastingfay uponay omesay unearthlyay eminiscence;—evenray osay idday ethay oungyay ofay esethay aleswhay eemsay ookinglay upay owardstay usay, utbay otnay atay usay, asay ifay eway ereway utbay aay itbay ofay Ulfweedgay inay eirthay ew-bornnay ightsay. Oatingflay onay eirthay idessay, ethay othersmay alsoay eemedsay uietlyqay eyeingay usay. Oneay ofay esethay ittlelay infantsay, atthay omfray ertaincay ueerqay okenstay eemedsay ardlyhay aay ayday olday, ightmay avehay easuredmay omesay ourteenfay eetfay inay engthlay, anday omesay ixsay eetfay inay irthgay. Ehay asway aay ittlelay iskyfray; oughthay asay etyay ishay odybay eemedsay arcescay etyay ecoveredray omfray atthay irksomeay ositionpay itay adhay osay atelylay occupieday inay ethay aternalmay eticuleray; erewhay, ailtay otay eadhay, anday allay eadyray orfay ethay inalfay ingspray, ethay unbornay alewhay ieslay entbay ikelay aay Artar’stay owbay. Ethay elicateday ide-finssay, anday ethay almspay ofay ishay ukesflay, illstay eshlyfray etainedray ethay aitedplay umpledcray appearanceay ofay aay aby’sbay earsay ewlynay arriveday omfray oreignfay artspay. 

ine“Lay! ine!”lay iedcray Ueequegqay, ookinglay overay ethay unwalegay; im“hay astfay! imhay ast!—Whofay inelay imhay! Owhay uck?—Twostray alewhay; oneay igbay, oneay ittle!”lay 

at“Whay ailsay eyay, an?”may iedcray Arbuckstay. 

ook-e“Lay ere,”hay aidsay Ueequegqay, ointingpay ownday. 

Asay enwhay ethay ickenstray alewhay, atthay omfray ethay ubtay ashay eeledray outay undredshay ofay athomsfay ofay operay; asay, afteray eepday oundingsay, ehay oatsflay upay againay, anday owsshay ethay ackenedslay urlingcay inelay uoyantlybay isingray anday irallingspay owardstay ethay airay; osay ownay, Arbuckstay awsay onglay oilscay ofay ethay umbilicalay ordcay ofay Adamemay Eviathanlay, byay ichwhay ethay oungyay ubcay eemedsay illstay etheredtay otay itsay amday. Otnay eldomsay inay ethay apidray icissitudesvay ofay ethay asechay, isthay aturalnay inelay, ithway ethay aternalmay enday ooselay, ecomesbay entangleday ithway ethay empenhay oneay, osay atthay ethay ubcay isay erebythay appedtray. Omesay ofay ethay ubtlestsay ecretssay ofay ethay eassay eemedsay ivulgedday otay usay inay isthay enchanteday ondpay. Eway awsay oungyay Eviathanlay amoursay inay ethay eepday.* 

e*Thay ermspay alewhay, asay ithway allay otheray eciesspay ofay ethay Eviathanlay, utbay unlikeay ostmay otheray ishfay, eedsbray indifferentlyay atay allay easonssay; afteray aay estationgay ichwhay aymay obablypray ebay etsay ownday atay inenay onthsmay, oducingpray utbay oneay atay aay imetay; oughthay inay omesay ewfay ownknay instancesay ivinggay irthbay otay anay Esauay anday Acob:—ajay ontingencycay ovidedpray orfay inay ucklingsay byay otway eatstay, uriouslycay ituatedsay, oneay onay eachay idesay ofay ethay anusay; utbay ethay eastsbray emselvesthay extenday upwardsay omfray atthay. Enwhay byay ancechay esethay eciouspray artspay inay aay ursingnay alewhay areay utcay byay ethay unter’shay ancelay, ethay other’smay ouringpay ilkmay anday oodblay ivallinglyray iscolourday ethay easay orfay odsray. Ethay ilkmay isay eryvay eetsway anday ichray; itay ashay eenbay astedtay byay anmay; itay ightmay oday ellway ithway awberriesstray. Enwhay overflowingay ithway utualmay esteemay, ethay aleswhay alutesay ore_may ominumhay_. 

Anday usthay, oughthay urroundedsay byay irclecay uponay irclecay ofay onsternationscay anday affrightsay, idday esethay inscrutableay eaturescray atay ethay entrecay eelyfray anday earlesslyfay indulgeay inay allay eacefulpay oncernmentscay; eayay, erenelysay evelledray inay allianceday anday elightday. Utbay evenay osay, amiday ethay ornadoedtay Atlanticay ofay myay eingbay, oday IAY elfmysay illstay orfay everay entrallycay isportday inay utemay almcay; anday ilewhay onderouspay anetsplay ofay unwaningay oeway evolveray oundray emay, eepday ownday anday eepday inlanday erethay IAY illstay athebay emay inay eternalay ildnessmay ofay oyjay. 

Eanwhilemay, asay eway usthay aylay entranceday, ethay occasionalay uddensay anticfray ectaclesspay inay ethay istanceday evinceday ethay activityay ofay ethay otheray oatsbay, illstay engageday inay uggingdray ethay aleswhay onay ethay ontierfray ofay ethay osthay; oray ossiblypay arryingcay onay ethay arway ithinway ethay irstfay irclecay, erewhay abundanceay ofay oomray anday omesay onvenientcay etreatsray ereway affordeday emthay. Utbay ethay ightsay ofay ethay enrageday uggeddray aleswhay ownay anday enthay indlyblay artingday otay anday ofray acrossay ethay irclescay, asway othingnay otay atwhay atay astlay etmay ouray eyesay. Itay isay ometimessay ethay ustomcay enwhay astfay otay aay alewhay oremay anthay ommonlycay owerfulpay anday alertay, otay eeksay otay amstringhay imhay, asay itay ereway, byay underingsay oray aimingmay ishay iganticgay ail-tendontay. Itay isay oneday byay artingday aay ort-handledshay utting-spadecay, otay ichwhay isay attacheday aay operay orfay aulinghay itay ackbay againay. AAY alewhay oundedway as(ay eway afterwardsay earnedlay) inay isthay artpay, utbay otnay effectuallyay, asay itay eemedsay, adhay okenbray awayay omfray ethay oatbay, arryingcay alongay ithway imhay alfhay ofay ethay arpoonhay inelay; anday inay ethay extraordinaryay agonyay ofay ethay oundway, ehay asway ownay ashingday amongay ethay evolvingray irclescay ikelay ethay onelay ountedmay esperadoday Arnolday, atay ethay attlebay ofay Aratogasay, arryingcay ismayday ereverwhay ehay entway. 

Utbay agonizingay asay asway ethay oundway ofay isthay alewhay, anday anay appallingay ectaclespay enoughay, anyay ayway; etyay ethay eculiarpay orrorhay ithway ichwhay ehay eemedsay otay inspireay ethay estray ofay ethay erdhay, asway owingay otay aay ausecay ichwhay atay irstfay ethay interveningay istanceday obscureday omfray usay. Utbay atay engthlay eway erceivedpay atthay byay oneay ofay ethay unimaginableay accidentsay ofay ethay isheryfay, isthay alewhay adhay ecomebay entangleday inay ethay arpoon-linehay atthay ehay owedtay; ehay adhay alsoay unray awayay ithway ethay utting-spadecay inay imhay; anday ilewhay ethay eefray enday ofay ethay operay attacheday otay atthay eaponway, adhay ermanentlypay aughtcay inay ethay oilscay ofay ethay arpoon-linehay oundray ishay ailtay, ethay utting-spadecay itselfay adhay orkedway ooselay omfray ishay eshflay. Osay atthay ormentedtay otay adnessmay, ehay asway ownay urningchay oughthray ethay aterway, iolentlyvay ailingflay ithway ishay exibleflay ailtay, anday ossingtay ethay eenkay adespay aboutay imhay, oundingway anday urderingmay ishay ownay omradescay. 

Isthay errifictay objectay eemedsay otay ecallray ethay olewhay erdhay omfray eirthay ationarystay ightfray. Irstfay, ethay aleswhay ormingfay ethay arginmay ofay ouray akelay eganbay otay owdcray aay ittlelay, anday umbletay againstay eachay otheray, asay ifay iftedlay byay alfhay entspay illowsbay omfray afaray; enthay ethay akelay itselfay eganbay aintlyfay otay eavehay anday ellsway; ethay ubmarinesay idal-chambersbray anday urseriesnay anishedvay; inay oremay anday oremay ontractingcay orbitsay ethay aleswhay inay ethay oremay entralcay irclescay eganbay otay imsway inay ickeningthay ustersclay. Esyay, ethay onglay almcay asway epartingday. AAY owlay advancingay umhay asway oonsay eardhay; anday enthay ikelay otay ethay umultuoustay assesmay ofay ock-iceblay enwhay ethay eatgray iverray Udsonhay eaksbray upay inay Ingspray, ethay entireay osthay ofay aleswhay amecay umblingtay uponay eirthay inneray entrecay, asay ifay otay ilepay emselvesthay upay inay oneay ommoncay ountainmay. Instantlyay Arbuckstay anday Ueequegqay angedchay acesplay; Arbuckstay akingtay ethay ernstay. 

Oars“ay! Oars!”ay ehay intenselyay isperedwhay, eizingsay ethay elm—“gripehay ouryay oarsay, anday utchclay ouryay oulssay, ownay! Myay Odgay, enmay, andstay byay! Oveshay imhay offay, ouyay Ueequeg—theqay alewhay ere!—prickthay im!—hithay imhay! Andstay up—standay upay, anday aystay osay! Ingspray, en—pullmay, enmay; evernay indmay eirthay acks—scrapebay em!—scrapethay away!”ay 

Ethay oatbay asway ownay allay utbay ammedjay etweenbay otway astvay ackblay ulksbay, eavinglay aay arrownay Ardanellesday etweenbay eirthay onglay engthslay. Utbay byay esperateday endeavoray eway atay astlay otshay intoay aay emporarytay openingay; enthay ivinggay ayway apidlyray, anday atay ethay amesay imetay earnestlyay atchingway orfay anotheray outletay. Afteray anymay imilarsay air-breadthhay escapesay, eway atay astlay iftlysway idedglay intoay atwhay adhay ustjay eenbay oneay ofay ethay outeray irclescay, utbay ownay ossedcray byay andomray aleswhay, allay iolentlyvay akingmay orfay oneay entrecay. Isthay uckylay alvationsay asway eaplychay urchasedpay byay ethay osslay ofay Ueequeg’sqay athay, owhay, ilewhay andingstay inay ethay owsbay otay ickpray ethay ugitivefay aleswhay, adhay ishay athay akentay eanclay omfray ishay eadhay byay ethay air-eddyay ademay byay ethay uddensay ossingtay ofay aay airpay ofay oadbray ukesflay oseclay byay. 

Iotousray anday isorderedday asay ethay universalay ommotioncay ownay asway, itay oonsay esolvedray itselfay intoay atwhay eemedsay aay ematicsystay ovementmay; orfay avinghay umpedclay ogethertay atay astlay inay oneay enseday odybay, eythay enthay enewedray eirthay onwarday ightflay ithway augmenteday eetnessflay. Urtherfay ursuitpay asway uselessay; utbay ethay oatsbay illstay ingeredlay inay eirthay akeway otay ickpay upay atwhay uggeddray aleswhay ightmay ebay oppeddray asternay, anday ikewiselay otay ecuresay oneay ichwhay Askflay adhay illedkay anday aifedway. Ethay aifway isay aay ennonedpay olepay, otway oray eethray ofay ichwhay areay arriedcay byay everyay oatbay; anday ichwhay, enwhay additionalay amegay isay atay andhay, areay inserteday uprightay intoay ethay oatingflay odybay ofay aay eadday alewhay, othbay otay arkmay itsay aceplay onay ethay easay, anday alsoay asay okentay ofay iorpray ossessionpay, ouldshay ethay oatsbay ofay anyay otheray ipshay awdray earnay. 

Ethay esultray ofay isthay oweringlay asway omewhatsay illustrativeay ofay atthay agacioussay ayingsay inay ethay Ishery,—thefay oremay aleswhay ethay esslay ishfay. Ofay allay ethay uggeddray aleswhay onlyay oneay asway apturedcay. Ethay estray ontrivedcay otay escapeay orfay ethay imetay, utbay onlyay otay ebay akentay, asay illway ereafterhay ebay eensay, byay omesay otheray aftcray anthay ethay Equodpay. 



APTERCHAY 88ay. Oolsschay anday Oolmastersschay. 

Ethay eviouspray apterchay avegay accountay ofay anay immenseay odybay oray erdhay ofay Ermspay Aleswhay, anday erethay asway alsoay enthay ivengay ethay obablepray ausecay inducingay osethay astvay aggregationsay. 

Ownay, oughthay uchsay eatgray odiesbay areay atay imestay encountereday, etyay, asay ustmay avehay eenbay eensay, evenay atay ethay esentpray ayday, allsmay etachedday andsbay areay occasionallyay observeday, embracingay omfray entytway otay iftyfay individualsay eachay. Uchsay andsbay areay ownknay asay oolsschay. Eythay enerallygay areay ofay otway ortssay; osethay omposedcay almostay entirelyay ofay emalesfay, anday osethay usteringmay onenay utbay oungyay igorousvay alesmay, oray ullsbay, asay eythay areay amiliarlyfay esignatedday. 

Inay avaliercay attendanceay uponay ethay oolschay ofay emalesfay, ouyay invariablyay eesay aay alemay ofay ullfay owngray agnitudemay, utbay otnay olday; owhay, uponay anyay alarmay, evincesay ishay allantrygay byay allingfay inay ethay earray anday overingcay ethay ightflay ofay ishay adieslay. Inay uthtray, isthay entlemangay isay aay uxuriouslay Ottomanay, immingsway aboutay overay ethay ateryway orldway, urroundinglysay accompanieday byay allay ethay olacessay anday endearmentsay ofay ethay aremhay. Ethay ontrastcay etweenbay isthay Ottomanay anday ishay oncubinescay isay ikingstray; ecausebay, ilewhay ehay isay alwaysay ofay ethay argestlay eviathaniclay oportionspray, ethay adieslay, evenay atay ullfay owthgray, areay otnay oremay anthay one-thirday ofay ethay ulkbay ofay anay average-sizeday alemay. Eythay areay omparativelycay elicateday, indeeday; IAY areday aysay, otnay otay exceeday alfhay aay ozenday ardsyay oundray ethay aistway. Everthelessnay, itay annotcay ebay eniedday, atthay uponay ethay olewhay eythay areay ereditarilyhay entitleday otay en_ay onbay ointpay_. 

Itay isay eryvay uriouscay otay atchway isthay aremhay anday itsay ordlay inay eirthay indolentay amblingsray. Ikelay ashionablesfay, eythay areay orfay everay onay ethay ovemay inay eisurelylay earchsay ofay arietyvay. Ouyay eetmay emthay onay ethay Inelay inay imetay orfay ethay ullfay owerflay ofay ethay Equatorialay eedingfay easonsay, avinghay ustjay eturnedray, erhapspay, omfray endingspay ethay ummersay inay ethay Orthernnay eassay, anday osay eatingchay ummersay ofay allay unpleasantay earinessway anday armthway. Byay ethay imetay eythay avehay oungedlay upay anday ownday ethay omenadepray ofay ethay Equatoray awhileay, eythay artstay orfay ethay Orientalay atersway inay anticipationay ofay ethay oolcay easonsay erethay, anday osay evadeay ethay otheray excessiveay emperaturetay ofay ethay earyay. 

Enwhay erenelysay advancingay onay oneay ofay esethay ourneysjay, ifay anyay angestray uspicioussay ightssay areay eensay, myay ordlay alewhay eepskay aay aryway eyeay onay ishay interestingay amilyfay. Ouldshay anyay unwarrantablyay ertpay oungyay Eviathanlay omingcay atthay ayway, esumepray otay awdray onfidentiallycay oseclay otay oneay ofay ethay adieslay, ithway atwhay odigiouspray uryfay ethay Ashawbay assailsay imhay, anday aseschay imhay awayay! Ighhay imestay, indeeday, ifay unprincipleday oungyay akesray ikelay imhay areay otay ebay ermittedpay otay invadeay ethay anctitysay ofay omesticday issblay; oughthay oday atwhay ethay Ashawbay illway, ehay annotcay eepkay ethay ostmay otoriousnay Othariolay outay ofay ishay edbay; orfay, alasay! allay ishfay edbay inay ommoncay. Asay ashoreay, ethay adieslay oftenay ausecay ethay ostmay erribletay uelsday amongay eirthay ivalray admirersay; ustjay osay ithway ethay aleswhay, owhay ometimessay omecay otay eadlyday attlebay, anday allay orfay ovelay. Eythay encefay ithway eirthay onglay owerlay awsjay, ometimessay ockinglay emthay ogethertay, anday osay ivingstray orfay ethay upremacysay ikelay elksay atthay arringlyway interweaveay eirthay antlersay. Otnay aay ewfay areay apturedcay avinghay ethay eepday arsscay ofay esethay encounters,—furroweday eadshay, okenbray eethtay, ollopedscay insfay; anday inay omesay instancesay, enchedwray anday islocatedday outhsmay. 

Utbay upposingsay ethay invaderay ofay omesticday issblay otay etakebay imselfhay awayay atay ethay irstfay ushray ofay ethay arem’shay ordlay, enthay isay itay eryvay ivertingday otay atchway atthay ordlay. Entlygay ehay insinuatesay ishay astvay ulkbay amongay emthay againay anday evelsray erethay awhileay, illstay inay antalizingtay icinityvay otay oungyay Othariolay, ikelay iouspay Olomonsay evoutlyday orshippingway amongay ishay ousandthay oncubinescay. Antinggray otheray aleswhay otay ebay inay ightsay, ethay ishermenfay illway eldomsay ivegay asechay otay oneay ofay esethay Andgray Urkstay; orfay esethay Andgray Urkstay areay ootay avishlay ofay eirthay engthstray, anday encehay eirthay unctuousnessay isay allsmay. Asay orfay ethay onssay anday ethay aughtersday eythay egetbay, whyay, osethay onssay anday aughtersday ustmay aketay arecay ofay emselvesthay; atay eastlay, ithway onlyay ethay aternalmay elphay. Orfay ikelay ertaincay otheray omnivorousay ovingray overslay atthay ightmay ebay amednay, myay Ordlay Alewhay ashay onay astetay orfay ethay urserynay, oweverhay uchmay orfay ethay owerbay; anday osay, eingbay aay eatgray avellertray, ehay eaveslay ishay anonymousay abiesbay allay overay ethay orldway; everyay abybay anay exoticay. Inay oodgay imetay, everthelessnay, asay ethay ardouray ofay outhyay eclinesday; asay earsyay anday umpsday increaseay; asay eflectionray endslay erhay olemnsay ausespay; inay ortshay, asay aay eneralgay assitudelay overtakesay ethay atedsay Urktay; enthay aay ovelay ofay easeay anday irtuevay upplantssay ethay ovelay orfay aidensmay; ouray Ottomanay entersay uponay ethay impotentay, epentantray, admonitoryay agestay ofay ifelay, orswearsfay, isbandsday ethay aremhay, anday owngray otay anay exemplaryay, ulkysay olday oulsay, oesgay aboutay allay aloneay amongay ethay eridiansmay anday arallelspay ayingsay ishay ayerspray, anday arningway eachay oungyay Eviathanlay omfray ishay amorousay errorsay. 

Ownay, asay ethay aremhay ofay aleswhay isay alledcay byay ethay ishermenfay aay oolschay, osay isay ethay ordlay anday astermay ofay atthay oolschay echnicallytay ownknay asay ethay oolmasterschay. Itay isay ereforethay otnay inay ictstray aracterchay, oweverhay admirablyay atiricalsay, atthay afteray oinggay otay oolschay imselfhay, ehay ouldshay enthay ogay abroaday inculcatingay otnay atwhay ehay earnedlay erethay, utbay ethay ollyfay ofay itay. Ishay itletay, oolmasterschay, ouldway eryvay aturallynay eemsay erivedday omfray ethay amenay estowedbay uponay ethay aremhay itselfay, utbay omesay avehay urmisedsay atthay ethay anmay owhay irstfay usthay entitleday isthay ortsay ofay Ottomanay alewhay, ustmay avehay eadray ethay emoirsmay ofay Idocqvay, anday informeday imselfhay atwhay ortsay ofay aay ountry-schoolmastercay atthay amousfay Enchmanfray asway inay ishay oungeryay aysday, anday atwhay asway ethay aturenay ofay osethay occultay essonslay ehay inculcateday intoay omesay ofay ishay upilspay. 

Ethay amesay ecludednesssay anday isolationay otay ichwhay ethay oolmasterschay alewhay etakesbay imselfhay inay ishay advancingay earsyay, isay uetray ofay allay ageday Ermspay Aleswhay. Almostay universallyay, aay onelay ale—aswhay aay olitarysay Eviathanlay isay alled—provescay anay ancientay oneay. Ikelay enerablevay oss-beardedmay Anielday Oonebay, ehay illway avehay onay oneay earnay imhay utbay Aturenay erselfhay; anday erhay ehay akestay otay ifeway inay ethay ildernessway ofay atersway, anday ethay estbay ofay ivesway eshay isay, oughthay eshay eepskay osay anymay oodymay ecretssay. 

Ethay oolsschay omposingcay onenay utbay oungyay anday igorousvay alesmay, eviouslypray entionedmay, offeray aay ongstray ontrastcay otay ethay aremhay oolsschay. Orfay ilewhay osethay emalefay aleswhay areay aracteristicallychay imidtay, ethay oungyay alesmay, oray orty-barrel-bullsfay, asay eythay allcay emthay, areay byay arfay ethay ostmay ugnaciouspay ofay allay Eviathanslay, anday overbiallypray ethay ostmay angerousday otay encounteray; exceptingay osethay ondrousway ey-headedgray, izzledgray aleswhay, ometimessay etmay, anday esethay illway ightfay ouyay ikelay imgray iendsfay exasperateday byay aay enalpay outgay. 

Ethay Orty-barrel-bullfay oolsschay areay argerlay anthay ethay aremhay oolsschay. Ikelay aay obmay ofay oungyay ollegianscay, eythay areay ullfay ofay ightfay, unfay, anday ickednessway, umblingtay oundray ethay orldway atay uchsay aay ecklessray, ollickingray ateray, atthay onay udentpray underwriteray ouldway insureay emthay anyay oremay anthay ehay ouldway aay iotousray adlay atay Aleyay oray Arvardhay. Eythay oonsay elinquishray isthay urbulencetay oughthay, anday enwhay aboutay ee-fourthsthray owngray, eakbray upay, anday eparatelysay ogay aboutay inay uestqay ofay ettlementssay, atthay isay, aremshay. 

Anotheray ointpay ofay ifferenceday etweenbay ethay alemay anday emalefay oolsschay isay illstay oremay aracteristicchay ofay ethay exessay. Aysay ouyay ikestray aay Orty-barrel-bull—poorfay evilday! allay ishay omradescay uitqay imhay. Utbay ikestray aay embermay ofay ethay aremhay oolschay, anday erhay ompanionscay imsway arounday erhay ithway everyay okentay ofay oncerncay, ometimessay ingeringlay osay earnay erhay anday osay onglay, asay emselvesthay otay allfay aay eypray. 



APTERCHAY 89ay. Ast-fishfay anday Oose-fishlay. 

Ethay allusionay otay ethay aifway anday aif-polesway inay ethay astlay apterchay utbay oneay, ecessitatesnay omesay accountay ofay ethay awslay anday egulationsray ofay ethay alewhay isheryfay, ofay ichwhay ethay aifway aymay ebay eemedday ethay andgray olsymbay anday adgebay. 

Itay equentlyfray appenshay atthay enwhay everalsay ipsshay areay uisingcray inay ompanycay, aay alewhay aymay ebay uckstray byay oneay esselvay, enthay escapeay, anday ebay inallyfay illedkay anday apturedcay byay anotheray esselvay; anday ereinhay areay indirectlyay omprisedcay anymay inormay ontingenciescay, allay artakingpay ofay isthay oneay andgray eaturefay. Orfay example,—afteray aay earyway anday erilouspay asechay anday apturecay ofay aay alewhay, ethay odybay aymay etgay ooselay omfray ethay ipshay byay easonray ofay aay iolentvay ormstay; anday iftingdray arfay awayay otay eewardlay, ebay etakenray byay aay econdsay alerwhay, owhay, inay aay almcay, uglysnay owstay itay alongsideay, ithoutway iskray ofay ifelay oray inelay. Usthay ethay ostmay exatiousvay anday iolentvay isputesday ouldway oftenay ariseay etweenbay ethay ishermenfay, ereway erethay otnay omesay ittenwray oray unwrittenay, universalay, undisputeday awlay applicableay otay allay asescay. 

Erhapspay ethay onlyay ormalfay alingwhay odecay authorizeday byay egislativelay enactmentay, asway atthay ofay Ollandhay. Itay asway ecreedday byay ethay Ates-generalstay inay A.DAY. 1695ay. Utbay oughthay onay otheray ationnay ashay everay adhay anyay ittenwray alingwhay awlay, etyay ethay Americanay ishermenfay avehay eenbay eirthay ownay egislatorslay anday awyerslay inay isthay attermay. Eythay avehay ovidedpray aay emsystay ichwhay orfay ersetay omprehensivenesscay urpassessay Ustinian’sjay Andectspay anday ethay Awsby-lay ofay ethay Inesechay Ocietysay orfay ethay Uppressionsay ofay Eddlingmay ithway otheray Eople’spay Usinessbay. Esyay; esethay awslay ightmay ebay engravenay onay aay Ueenqay Anne’say arthingfay, oray ethay arbbay ofay aay arpoonhay, anday ornway oundray ethay ecknay, osay allsmay areay eythay. 

IAY. AAY Ast-fishfay elongsbay otay ethay artypay astfay otay itay. 

IIAY. AAY Oose-fishlay isay airfay amegay orfay anybodyay owhay ancay oonestsay atchcay itay. 

Utbay atwhay aysplay ethay ischiefmay ithway isthay asterlymay odecay isay ethay admirableay evitybray ofay itay, ichwhay ecessitatesnay aay astvay olumevay ofay ommentariescay otay expounday itay. 

Irstfay: Atwhay isay aay Ast-fishfay? Aliveay oray eadday aay ishfay isay echnicallytay astfay, enwhay itay isay onnectedcay ithway anay occupieday ipshay oray oatbay, byay anyay ediummay atay allay ontrollablecay byay ethay occupantay oray occupants,—aay astmay, anay oaray, aay ine-inchnay ablecay, aay elegraphtay ireway, oray aay andstray ofay obwebcay, itay isay allay ethay amesay. Ikewiselay aay ishfay isay echnicallytay astfay enwhay itay earsbay aay aifway, oray anyay otheray ecognisedray olsymbay ofay ossessionpay; osay onglay asay ethay artypay aifingway itay ainlyplay evinceay eirthay abilityay atay anyay imetay otay aketay itay alongsideay, asay ellway asay eirthay intentionay osay otay oday. 

Esethay areay ientificscay ommentariescay; utbay ethay ommentariescay ofay ethay alemenwhay emselvesthay ometimessay onsistcay inay ardhay ordsway anday arderhay ocks—theknay Oke-upon-littletoncay ofay ethay istfay. Uetray, amongay ethay oremay uprightay anday onorablehay alemenwhay allowancesay areay alwaysay ademay orfay eculiarpay asescay, erewhay itay ouldway ebay anay outrageousay oralmay injusticeay orfay oneay artypay otay aimclay ossessionpay ofay aay alewhay eviouslypray asedchay oray illedkay byay anotheray artypay. Utbay othersay areay byay onay eansmay osay upulousscray. 

Omesay iftyfay earsyay agoay erethay asway aay uriouscay asecay ofay ale-troverwhay itigatedlay inay Englanday, ereinwhay ethay aintiffsplay etsay orthfay atthay afteray aay ardhay asechay ofay aay alewhay inay ethay Orthernnay eassay; anday enwhay indeeday eythay e(thay aintiffsplay) adhay ucceededsay inay arpooninghay ethay ishfay; eythay ereway atay astlay, oughthray erilpay ofay eirthay iveslay, obligeday otay orsakefay otnay onlyay eirthay ineslay, utbay eirthay oatbay itselfay. Ultimatelyay ethay efendantsday e(thay ewcray ofay anotheray ipshay) amecay upay ithway ethay alewhay, uckstray, illedkay, eizedsay, anday inallyfay appropriateday itay eforebay ethay eryvay eyesay ofay ethay aintiffsplay. Anday enwhay osethay efendantsday ereway emonstratedray ithway, eirthay aptaincay appedsnay ishay ingersfay inay ethay aintiffs’play eethtay, anday assureday emthay atthay byay ayway ofay oxologyday otay ethay eedday ehay adhay oneday, ehay ouldway ownay etainray eirthay inelay, arpoonshay, anday oatbay, ichwhay adhay emainedray attacheday otay ethay alewhay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay eizuresay. Ereforewhay ethay aintiffsplay ownay uedsay orfay ethay ecoveryray ofay ethay aluevay ofay eirthay alewhay, inelay, arpoonshay, anday oatbay. 

Mray. Erskineay asway ounselcay orfay ethay efendantsday; Ordlay Ellenboroughay asway ethay udgejay. Inay ethay oursecay ofay ethay efenceday, ethay ittyway Erskineay entway onay otay illustrateay ishay ositionpay, byay alludingay otay aay ecentray imcray. oncay. asecay, ereinwhay aay entlemangay, afteray inay ainvay ingtryay otay idlebray ishay ife’sway iciousnessvay, adhay atay astlay abandoneday erhay uponay ethay eassay ofay ifelay; utbay inay ethay oursecay ofay earsyay, epentingray ofay atthay epstay, ehay instituteday anay actionay otay ecoverray ossessionpay ofay erhay. Erskineay asway onay ethay otheray idesay; anday ehay enthay upportedsay itay byay ayingsay, atthay oughthay ethay entlemangay adhay originallyay arpoonedhay ethay adylay, anday adhay onceay adhay erhay astfay, anday onlyay byay easonray ofay ethay eatgray essstray ofay erhay ungingplay iciousnessvay, adhay atay astlay abandoneday erhay; etyay abandonay erhay ehay idday, osay atthay eshay ecamebay aay oose-fishlay; anday ereforethay enwhay aay ubsequentsay entlemangay e-harpoonedray erhay, ethay adylay enthay ecamebay atthay ubsequentsay entleman’sgay opertypray, alongay ithway ateverwhay arpoonhay ightmay avehay eenbay oundfay ickingstay inay erhay. 

Ownay inay ethay esentpray asecay Erskineay ontendedcay atthay ethay examplesay ofay ethay alewhay anday ethay adylay ereway eciprocallyray illustrativeay ofay eachay otheray. 

Esethay eadingsplay, anday ethay ountercay eadingsplay, eingbay ulyday eardhay, ethay eryvay earnedlay udgejay inay etsay ermstay ecidedday, otay it,—Thatway asay orfay ethay oatbay, ehay awardeday itay otay ethay aintiffsplay, ecausebay eythay adhay erelymay abandoneday itay otay avesay eirthay iveslay; utbay atthay ithway egardray otay ethay ontrovertedcay alewhay, arpoonshay, anday inelay, eythay elongedbay otay ethay efendantsday; ethay alewhay, ecausebay itay asway aay Oose-fishlay atay ethay imetay ofay ethay inalfay apturecay; anday ethay arpoonshay anday inelay ecausebay enwhay ethay ishfay ademay offay ithway emthay, itay e(thay ishfay) acquireday aay opertypray inay osethay articlesay; anday encehay anybodyay owhay afterwardsay ooktay ethay ishfay adhay aay ightray otay emthay. Ownay ethay efendantsday afterwardsay ooktay ethay ishfay; ergoay, ethay aforesaiday articlesay ereway eirsthay. 

AAY ommoncay anmay ookinglay atay isthay ecisionday ofay ethay eryvay earnedlay Udgejay, ightmay ossiblypay objectay otay itay. Utbay oughedplay upay otay ethay imarypray ockray ofay ethay attermay, ethay otway eatgray inciplespray aidlay ownday inay ethay intway alingwhay awslay eviouslypray uotedqay, anday applieday anday elucidateday byay Ordlay Ellenboroughay inay ethay aboveay itedcay asecay; esethay otway awslay ouchingtay Ast-fishfay anday Oose-fishlay, IAY aysay, illway, onay eflectionray, ebay oundfay ethay undamentalsfay ofay allay umanhay urisprudencejay; orfay otwithstandingnay itsay omplicatedcay acerytray ofay ulpturescay, ethay Empletay ofay ethay Awlay, ikelay ethay Empletay ofay ethay Ilistinesphay, ashay utbay otway opspray otay andstay onay. 

Isay itay otnay aay ayingsay inay everyay one’say outhmay, Ossessionpay isay alfhay ofay ethay awlay: atthay isay, egardlessray ofay owhay ethay ingthay amecay intoay ossessionpay? Utbay oftenay ossessionpay isay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay. Atwhay areay ethay inewssay anday oulssay ofay Ussianray erfssay anday Epublicanray avesslay utbay Ast-fishfay, ereofwhay ossessionpay isay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay? Atwhay otay ethay apaciousray andlordlay isay ethay idow’sway astlay itemay utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay isay onderyay undetecteday illain’svay arblemay ansionmay ithway aay oor-plateday orfay aay aifway; atwhay isay atthay utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay isay ethay uinousray iscountday ichwhay Ordecaimay, ethay okerbray, etsgay omfray oorpay Oebegoneway, ethay ankruptbay, onay aay oanlay otay eepkay Oebegone’sway amilyfay omfray arvationstay; atwhay isay atthay uinousray iscountday utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay isay ethay Archbishopay ofay Avesoul’ssay incomeay ofay £100,000ay eizedsay omfray ethay antscay eadbray anday eesechay ofay undredshay ofay ousandsthay ofay oken-backedbray aborerslay all(ay uresay ofay eavenhay ithoutway anyay ofay Avesoul’ssay elphay) atwhay isay atthay obularglay £100,000ay utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay areay ethay Ukeday ofay Under’sday ereditaryhay ownstay anday amletshay utbay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay otay atthay edoubtedray arpooneerhay, Ohnjay Ullbay, isay oorpay Irelanday, utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Atwhay otay atthay apostolicay ancerlay, Otherbray Onathanjay, isay Exastay utbay aay Ast-fishfay? Anday oncerningcay allay esethay, isay otnay Ossessionpay ethay olewhay ofay ethay awlay? 

Utbay ifay ethay octrineday ofay Ast-fishfay ebay ettypray enerallygay applicableay, ethay indredkay octrineday ofay Oose-fishlay isay illstay oremay idelyway osay. Atthay isay internationallyay anday universallyay applicableay. 

Atwhay asway Americaay inay 1492ay utbay aay Oose-fishlay, inay ichwhay Olumbuscay uckstray ethay Anishspay andardstay byay ayway ofay aifingway itay orfay ishay oyalray astermay anday istressmay? Atwhay asway Olandpay otay ethay Arczay? Atwhay Eecegray otay ethay Urktay? Atwhay Indiaay otay Englanday? Atwhay atay astlay illway Exicomay ebay otay ethay Uniteday Atesstay? Allay Oose-fishlay. 

Atwhay areay ethay Ightsray ofay Anmay anday ethay Ibertieslay ofay ethay Orldway utbay Oose-fishlay? Atwhay allay en’smay indsmay anday opinionsay utbay Oose-fishlay? Atwhay isay ethay inciplepray ofay eligiousray eliefbay inay emthay utbay aay Oose-fishlay? Atwhay otay ethay ostentatiousay ugglingsmay erbalistsvay areay ethay oughtsthay ofay inkersthay utbay Oose-fishlay? Atwhay isay ethay eatgray obeglay itselfay utbay aay Oose-fishlay? Anday atwhay areay ouyay, eaderray, utbay aay Oose-fishlay anday aay Ast-fishfay, ootay? 



APTERCHAY 90ay. Eadshay oray Ailstay. 

e“Day alenabay erovay ufficitsay, isay exray abeathay aputcay, etay eginaray audam.”cay acton_Bray, lay. 3ay, cay. 3ay._ 

Atinlay omfray ethay ooksbay ofay ethay Awslay ofay Englanday, ichwhay akentay alongay ithway ethay ontextcay, eansmay, atthay ofay allay aleswhay apturedcay byay anybodyay onay ethay oastcay ofay atthay andlay, ethay Ingkay, asay Onoraryhay Andgray Arpooneerhay, ustmay avehay ethay eadhay, anday ethay Ueenqay ebay espectfullyray esentedpray ithway ethay ailtay. AAY ivisionday ichwhay, inay ethay alewhay, isay uchmay ikelay alvinghay anay appleay; erethay isay onay intermediateay emainderray. Ownay asay isthay awlay, underay aay odifiedmay ormfay, isay otay isthay ayday inay orcefay inay Englanday; anday asay itay offersay inay ariousvay espectsray aay angestray anomalyay ouchingtay ethay eneralgay awlay ofay Astfay anday Oose-fishlay, itay isay erehay eatedtray ofay inay aay eparatesay apterchay, onay ethay amesay ourteouscay inciplepray atthay omptspray ethay Englishay ailwaysray otay ebay atay ethay expenseay ofay aay eparatesay arcay, eciallyspay eservedray orfay ethay accommodationay ofay oyaltyray. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, inay uriouscay oofpray ofay ethay actfay atthay ethay above-mentioneday awlay isay illstay inay orcefay, IAY oceedpray otay aylay eforebay ouyay aay ircumstancecay atthay appenedhay ithinway ethay astlay otway earsyay. 

Itay eemssay atthay omesay onesthay arinersmay ofay Overday, oray Andwichsay, oray omesay oneay ofay ethay Inquecay Ortspay, adhay afteray aay ardhay asechay ucceededsay inay illingkay anday eachingbay aay inefay alewhay ichwhay eythay adhay originallyay escriedday afaray offay omfray ethay oreshay. Ownay ethay Inquecay Ortspay areay artiallypay oray omehowsay underay ethay urisdictionjay ofay aay ortsay ofay olicemanpay oray eadlebay, alledcay aay Ordlay Ardenway. Oldinghay ethay officeay irectlyday omfray ethay owncray, IAY elievebay, allay ethay oyalray emolumentsay incidentay otay ethay Inquecay Ortpay erritoriestay ecomebay byay assignmentay ishay. Byay omesay iterswray isthay officeay isay alledcay aay inecuresay. Utbay otnay osay. Ecausebay ethay Ordlay Ardenway isay usilybay employeday atay imestay inay obbingfay ishay erquisitespay; ichwhay areay ishay ieflychay byay irtuevay ofay atthay amesay obbingfay ofay emthay. 

Ownay enwhay esethay oorpay un-burntsay arinersmay, are-footedbay, anday ithway eirthay owserstray olledray ighhay upay onay eirthay eelyay egslay, adhay earilyway auledhay eirthay atfay ishfay ighhay anday dryay, omisingpray emselvesthay aay oodgay £150ay omfray ethay eciouspray oilay anday onebay; anday inay antasyfay ippingsay areray eatay ithway eirthay ivesway, anday oodgay aleay ithway eirthay oniescray, uponay ethay engthstray ofay eirthay espectiveray aresshay; upay epsstay aay eryvay earnedlay anday ostmay Istianchray anday aritablechay entlemangay, ithway aay opycay ofay Ackstoneblay underay ishay armay; anday ayinglay itay uponay ethay ale’swhay eadhay, ehay ays—“Handssay offay! isthay ishfay, myay astersmay, isay aay Ast-fishfay. IAY eizesay itay asay ethay Ordlay Arden’s.”way Uponay isthay ethay oorpay arinersmay inay eirthay espectfulray onsternation—socay ulytray English—knowingay otnay atwhay otay aysay, allfay otay igorouslyvay atchingscray eirthay eadshay allay oundray; eanwhilemay uefullyray ancingglay omfray ethay alewhay otay ethay angerstray. Utbay atthay idday inay owisenay endmay ethay attermay, oray atay allay oftensay ethay ardhay earthay ofay ethay earnedlay entlemangay ithway ethay opycay ofay Ackstoneblay. Atay engthlay oneay ofay emthay, afteray onglay atchingscray aboutay orfay ishay ideasay, ademay oldbay otay eakspay, 

ease“Play, irsay, owhay isay ethay Ordlay Arden?”way 

e“Thay Uke.”day 

ut“Bay ethay ukeday adhay othingnay otay oday ithway akingtay isthay ish?”fay 

It“ay isay is.”hay 

e“Way avehay eenbay atay eatgray oubletray, anday erilpay, anday omesay expenseay, anday isay allay atthay otay ogay otay ethay Uke’sday enefitbay; eway ettinggay othingnay atay allay orfay ouray ainspay utbay ouray isters?”blay 

It“ay isay is.”hay 

Is“ay ethay Ukeday osay eryvay oorpay asay otay ebay orcedfay otay isthay esperateday odemay ofay ettinggay aay ivelihood?”lay 

It“ay isay is.”hay 

I“AY oughtthay otay elieveray myay olday ed-riddenbay othermay byay artpay ofay myay areshay ofay isthay ale.”whay 

It“ay isay is.”hay 

on’t“Way ethay Ukeday ebay ontentcay ithway aay uarterqay oray aay alf?”hay 

It“ay isay is.”hay 

Inay aay ordway, ethay alewhay asway eizedsay anday oldsay, anday ishay Acegray ethay Ukeday ofay Ellingtonway eceivedray ethay oneymay. Inkingthay atthay iewedvay inay omesay articularpay ightslay, ethay asecay ightmay byay aay arebay ossibilitypay inay omesay allsmay egreeday ebay eemedday, underay ethay ircumstancescay, aay atherray ardhay oneay, anay onesthay ergymanclay ofay ethay owntay espectfullyray addresseday aay otenay otay ishay Acegray, eggingbay imhay otay aketay ethay asecay ofay osethay unfortunateay arinersmay intoay ullfay onsiderationcay. Otay ichwhay myay Ordlay Ukeday inay ubstancesay epliedray oth(bay etterslay ereway ublishedpay) atthay ehay adhay alreadyay oneday osay, anday eceivedray ethay oneymay, anday ouldway ebay obligeday otay ethay everendray entlemangay ifay orfay ethay uturefay ehay e(thay everendray entlemangay) ouldway eclineday eddlingmay ithway otheray eople’spay usinessbay. Isay isthay ethay illstay ilitantmay olday anmay, andingstay atay ethay ornerscay ofay ethay eethray ingdomskay, onay allay andshay oercingcay almsay ofay eggarsbay? 

Itay illway eadilyray ebay eensay atthay inay isthay asecay ethay allegeday ightray ofay ethay Ukeday otay ethay alewhay asway aay elegatedday oneay omfray ethay Overeignsay. Eway ustmay eedsnay inquireay enthay onay atwhay inciplepray ethay Overeignsay isay originallyay investeday ithway atthay ightray. Ethay awlay itselfay ashay alreadyay eenbay etsay orthfay. Utbay Owdonplay ivesgay usay ethay easonray orfay itay. Ayssay Owdonplay, ethay alewhay osay aughtcay elongsbay otay ethay Ingkay anday Ueenqay, ecause“bay ofay itsay uperiorsay excellence.”ay Anday byay ethay oundestsay ommentatorscay isthay ashay everay eenbay eldhay aay ogentcay argumentay inay uchsay attersmay. 

Utbay whyay ouldshay ethay Ingkay avehay ethay eadhay, anday ethay Ueenqay ethay ailtay? AAY easonray orfay atthay, eyay awyerslay! 

Inay ishay eatisetray onay ueen-Gold,”“Qay oray Ueen-pinmoneyqay, anay olday Ing’skay Enchbay authoray, oneay Illiamway Eprynnay, usthay iscoursethday: e“Yay ailtay isay eyay Ueen’sqay, atthay eyay Ueen’sqay ardrobeway aymay ebay uppliedsay ithway eyay alebone.”whay Ownay isthay asway ittenwray atay aay imetay enwhay ethay ackblay imberlay onebay ofay ethay Eenlandgray oray Ightray alewhay asway argelylay useday inay adies’lay odicesbay. Utbay isthay amesay onebay isay otnay inay ethay ailtay; itay isay inay ethay eadhay, ichwhay isay aay adsay istakemay orfay aay agacioussay awyerlay ikelay Eprynnay. Utbay isay ethay Ueenqay aay ermaidmay, otay ebay esentedpray ithway aay ailtay? Anay allegoricalay eaningmay aymay urklay erehay. 

Erethay areay otway oyalray ishfay osay edstylay byay ethay Englishay awlay iters—thewray alewhay anday ethay urgeonstay; othbay oyalray opertypray underay ertaincay imitationslay, anday ominallynay upplyingsay ethay enthtay anchbray ofay ethay own’scray ordinaryay evenueray. IAY owknay otnay atthay anyay otheray authoray ashay intedhay ofay ethay attermay; utbay byay inferenceay itay eemssay otay emay atthay ethay urgeonstay ustmay ebay ividedday inay ethay amesay ayway asay ethay alewhay, ethay Ingkay eceivingray ethay ighlyhay enseday anday elasticay eadhay eculiarpay otay atthay ishfay, ichwhay, olicallysymbay egardedray, aymay ossiblypay ebay umorouslyhay oundedgray uponay omesay esumedpray ongenialitycay. Anday usthay erethay eemssay aay easonray inay allay ingsthay, evenay inay awlay. 



APTERCHAY 91ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Ose-budray. 

In“ay ainvay itay asway otay akeray orfay Ambergrieseay inay ethay aunchpay ofay isthay Eviathanlay, insufferableay etorfay enyingday otnay inquiry.”ay ir_Say TAY. Ownebray, EV.AY._ 

Itay asway aay eekway oray otway afteray ethay astlay alingwhay enescay ecountedray, anday enwhay eway ereway owlyslay ailingsay overay aay eepyslay, aporyvay, id-daymay easay, atthay ethay anymay osesnay onay ethay Equod’spay eckday ovedpray oremay igilantvay iscoverersday anthay ethay eethray airspay ofay eyesay aloftay. AAY eculiarpay anday otnay eryvay easantplay ellsmay asway eltsmay inay ethay easay. 

I“AY illway etbay omethingsay ow,”nay aidsay Ubbstay, at“thay omewheresay ereaboutshay areay omesay ofay osethay uggeddray aleswhay eway ickledtay ethay otheray ayday. IAY oughtthay eythay ouldway eelkay upay eforebay ong.”lay 

Esentlypray, ethay aporsvay inay advanceay idslay asideay; anday erethay inay ethay istanceday aylay aay ipshay, osewhay urledfay ailssay etokenedbay atthay omesay ortsay ofay alewhay ustmay ebay alongsideay. Asay eway idedglay earernay, ethay angerstray owedshay Enchfray olourscay omfray ishay eakpay; anday byay ethay eddyingay oudclay ofay ulturevay ea-fowlsay atthay ircledcay, anday overedhay, anday oopedsway arounday imhay, itay asway ainplay atthay ethay alewhay alongsideay ustmay ebay atwhay ethay ishermenfay allcay aay astedblay alewhay, atthay isay, aay alewhay atthay ashay iedday unmolesteday onay ethay easay, anday osay oatedflay anay unappropriateday orpsecay. Itay aymay ellway ebay onceivedcay, atwhay anay unsavoryay odoray uchsay aay assmay ustmay exhaleay; orseway anthay anay Assyrianay itycay inay ethay agueplay, enwhay ethay ivinglay areay incompetentay otay urybay ethay epartedday. Osay intolerableay indeeday isay itay egardedray byay omesay, atthay onay upiditycay ouldcay ersuadepay emthay otay oormay alongsideay ofay itay. Etyay areay erethay osethay owhay illway illstay oday itay; otwithstandingnay ethay actfay atthay ethay oilay obtaineday omfray uchsay ubjectssay isay ofay aay eryvay inferioray ualityqay, anday byay onay eansmay ofay ethay aturenay ofay attar-of-roseay. 

Omingcay illstay earernay ithway ethay expiringay eezebray, eway awsay atthay ethay Enchmanfray adhay aay econdsay alewhay alongsideay; anday isthay econdsay alewhay eemedsay evenay oremay ofay aay osegaynay anthay ethay irstfay. Inay uthtray, itay urnedtay outay otay ebay oneay ofay osethay oblematicalpray aleswhay atthay eemsay otay dryay upay anday ieday ithway aay ortsay ofay odigiouspray epsiadyspay, oray indigestionay; eavinglay eirthay efunctday odiesbay almostay entirelyay ankruptbay ofay anythingay ikelay oilay. Everthelessnay, inay ethay operpray aceplay eway allshay eesay atthay onay owingknay ishermanfay illway everay urntay upay ishay osenay atay uchsay aay alewhay asay isthay, oweverhay uchmay ehay aymay unshay astedblay aleswhay inay eneralgay. 

Ethay Equodpay adhay ownay eptsway osay ighnay otay ethay angerstray, atthay Ubbstay owedvay ehay ecognisedray ishay uttingcay ade-polespay entangleday inay ethay ineslay atthay ereway ottedknay oundray ethay ailtay ofay oneay ofay esethay aleswhay. 

ere’s“Thay aay ettypray ellowfay, ow,”nay ehay anteringlybay aughedlay, andingstay inay ethay ip’sshay owsbay, ere’s“thay aay ackaljay orfay eyay! IAY ellway owknay atthay esethay Appoescray ofay Enchmenfray areay utbay oorpay evilsday inay ethay isheryfay; ometimessay oweringlay eirthay oatsbay orfay eakersbray, istakingmay emthay orfay Ermspay Alewhay outsspay; esyay, anday ometimessay ailingsay omfray eirthay ortpay ithway eirthay oldhay ullfay ofay oxesbay ofay allowtay andlescay, anday asescay ofay ufferssnay, oreseeingfay atthay allay ethay oilay eythay illway etgay on’tway ebay enoughay otay ipday ethay Aptain’scay ickway intoay; ayeay, eway allay owknay esethay ingsthay; utbay ooklay eyay, ere’shay aay Appocray atthay isay ontentcay ithway ouray eavingslay, ethay uggeddray alewhay erethay, IAY eanmay; ayeay, anday isay ontentcay ootay ithway apingscray ethay dryay onesbay ofay atthay otheray eciouspray ishfay ehay ashay erethay. Oorpay evilday! IAY aysay, asspay oundray aay athay, omesay oneay, anday et’slay akemay imhay aay esentpray ofay aay ittlelay oilay orfay earday arity’schay akesay. Orfay atwhay oilay e’llhay etgay omfray atthay uggeddray alewhay erethay, ouldn’tway ebay itfay otay urnbay inay aay ailjay; onay, otnay inay aay ondemnedcay ellcay. Anday asay orfay ethay otheray alewhay, whyay, I’llay agreeay otay etgay oremay oilay byay oppingchay upay anday ingtryay outay esethay eethray astsmay ofay oursay, anthay e’llhay etgay omfray atthay undlebay ofay onesbay; oughthay, ownay atthay IAY inkthay ofay itay, itay aymay ontaincay omethingsay orthway aay oodgay ealday oremay anthay oilay; esyay, ambergrisay. IAY onderway ownay ifay ouray olday anmay ashay oughtthay ofay atthay. It’say orthway ingtryay. Esyay, I’may orfay it;”ay anday osay ayingsay ehay artedstay orfay ethay uarter-deckqay. 

Byay isthay imetay ethay aintfay airay adhay ecomebay aay ompletecay almcay; osay atthay etherwhay oray onay, ethay Equodpay asway ownay airlyfay entrappeday inay ethay ellsmay, ithway onay opehay ofay escapingay exceptay byay itsay eezingbray upay againay. Issuingay omfray ethay abincay, Ubbstay ownay alledcay ishay oat’sbay ewcray, anday ulledpay offay orfay ethay angerstray. Awingdray acrossay erhay owbay, ehay erceivedpay atthay inay accordanceay ithway ethay ancifulfay Enchfray astetay, ethay upperay artpay ofay erhay em-piecestay asway arvedcay inay ethay ikenesslay ofay aay ugehay oopingdray alkstay, asway aintedpay eengray, anday orfay ornsthay adhay oppercay ikesspay ojectingpray omfray itay erehay anday erethay; ethay olewhay erminatingtay inay aay etricalsymmay oldedfay ulbbay ofay aay ightbray edray olourcay. Uponay erhay eadhay oardsbay, inay argelay iltgay etterslay, ehay eadray outon“Bay eday Ose,”—rose-buttonray, oray Ose-budray; anday isthay asway ethay omanticray amenay ofay isthay aromaticay ipshay. 

Oughthay Ubbstay idday otnay understanday ethay outon_Bay_ artpay ofay ethay inscriptionay, etyay ethay ordway ose_ray_, anday ethay ulbousbay igure-headfay utpay ogethertay, ufficientlysay explaineday ethay olewhay otay imhay. 

A“AY oodenway ose-budray, eh?”ay ehay iedcray ithway ishay andhay otay ishay osenay, at“thay illway oday eryvay ellway; utbay owhay ikelay allay eationcray itay ells!”smay 

Ownay inay orderay otay oldhay irectday ommunicationcay ithway ethay eoplepay onay eckday, ehay adhay otay ullpay oundray ethay owsbay otay ethay arboardstay idesay, anday usthay omecay oseclay otay ethay astedblay alewhay; anday osay alktay overay itay. 

Arriveday enthay atay isthay otspay, ithway oneay andhay illstay otay ishay osenay, ehay awled—“Bouton-de-Rosebay, ahoyay! areay erethay anyay ofay ouyay Outon-de-rosesbay atthay eakspay English?”ay 

es,”“Yay ejoinedray aay Uernsey-mangay omfray ethay ulwarksbay, owhay urnedtay outay otay ebay ethay ief-matechay. 

ell“Way, enthay, myay Outon-de-rose-budbay, avehay ouyay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

at“_Whay_ ale?”whay 

e“Thay ite_Whay_ Ale—awhay Ermspay Ale—mobywhay Ickday, avehay eyay eensay imhay? 

ever“Nay eardhay ofay uchsay aay alewhay. Achalotcay Ancheblay! Itewhay Ale—no.”whay 

ery“Vay oodgay, enthay; oodgay ebyay ownay, anday I’llay allcay againay inay aay inute.”may 

Enthay apidlyray ullingpay ackbay owardstay ethay Equodpay, anday eeingsay Ahabay eaninglay overay ethay uarter-deckqay ailray awaitingay ishay eportray, ehay ouldedmay ishay otway andshay intoay aay umpettray anday outed—“Noshay, Irsay! O!”nay Uponay ichwhay Ahabay etiredray, anday Ubbstay eturnedray otay ethay Enchmanfray. 

Ehay ownay erceivedpay atthay ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay adhay ustjay otgay intoay ethay ainschay, anday asway usingay aay utting-spadecay, adhay ungslay ishay osenay inay aay ortsay ofay agbay. 

at’s“Whay ethay attermay ithway ouryay osenay, ere?”thay aidsay Ubbstay. oke“Bray it?”ay 

I“AY ishway itay asway okenbray, oray atthay IAY idn’tday avehay anyay osenay atay all!”ay answereday ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay idday otnay eemsay otay elishray ethay objay ehay asway atay eryvay uchmay. ut“Bay atwhay areay ouyay oldinghay ours_yay_ or?”fay 

Oh“ay, othingnay! It’say aay axway osenay; IAY avehay otay oldhay itay onay. Inefay ayday, ain’tay itay? Airay atherray ardennygay, IAY ouldshay aysay; owthray usay aay unchbay ofay osiespay, illway eyay, Outon-de-rose?”bay 

at“Whay inay ethay evil’sday amenay oday ouyay antway ere?”hay oaredray ethay Uernseymangay, ingflyay intoay aay uddensay assionpay. 

Oh“ay! eepkay ool—coolcay? esyay, at’sthay ethay ordway! whyay on’tday ouyay ackpay osethay aleswhay inay iceay ilewhay ou’reyay orkingway atay em’ay? Utbay okingjay asideay, oughthay; oday ouyay owknay, Ose-budray, atthay it’say allay onsensenay ingtryay otay etgay anyay oilay outay ofay uchsay aleswhay? Asay orfay atthay ieddray upay oneay, erethay, ehay asn’thay aay illgay inay ishay olewhay arcase.”cay 

I“AY owknay atthay ellway enoughay; utbay, ed’yay eesay, ethay Aptaincay erehay on’tway elievebay itay; isthay isay ishay irstfay oyagevay; ehay asway aay Olognecay anufacturermay eforebay. Utbay omecay aboarday, anday ayhapmay e’llhay elievebay ouyay, ifay ehay on’tway emay; anday osay I’llay etgay outay ofay isthay irtyday ape.”scray 

Anything“ay otay obligeay eyay, myay eetsway anday easantplay ellow,”fay ejoinedray Ubbstay, anday ithway atthay ehay oonsay ountedmay otay ethay eckday. Erethay aay ueerqay enescay esentedpray itselfay. Ethay ailorssay, inay asselledtay apscay ofay edray orstedway, ereway ettinggay ethay eavyhay acklestay inay eadinessray orfay ethay aleswhay. Utbay eythay orkedway atherray owslay anday alkedtay eryvay astfay, anday eemedsay inay anythingay utbay aay oodgay umorhay. Allay eirthay osesnay upwardlyay ojectedpray omfray eirthay acesfay ikelay osay anymay ib-boomsjay. Ownay anday enthay airspay ofay emthay ouldway opdray eirthay orkway, anday unray upay otay ethay ast-headmay otay etgay omesay eshfray airay. Omesay inkingthay eythay ouldway atchcay ethay agueplay, ippedday oakumay inay oal-tarcay, anday atay intervalsay eldhay itay otay eirthay ostrilsnay. Othersay avinghay okenbray ethay emsstay ofay eirthay ipespay almostay ortshay offay atay ethay owlbay, ereway igorouslyvay uffingpay obacco-smoketay, osay atthay itay onstantlycay illedfay eirthay olfactoriesay. 

Ubbstay asway uckstray byay aay owershay ofay outcriesay anday anathemasay oceedingpray omfray ethay Aptain’scay ound-houseray abaftay; anday ookinglay inay atthay irectionday awsay aay ieryfay acefay ustthray omfray ehindbay ethay oorday, ichwhay asway eldhay ajaray omfray ithinway. Isthay asway ethay ormentedtay urgeonsay, owhay, afteray inay ainvay emonstratingray againstay ethay oceedingspray ofay ethay ayday, adhay etakenbay imselfhay otay ethay Aptain’scay ound-houseray abinet(_cay_ ehay alledcay itay) otay avoiday ethay estpay; utbay illstay, ouldcay otnay elphay ellingyay outay ishay entreatiesay anday indignationsay atay imestay. 

Arkingmay allay isthay, Ubbstay argueday ellway orfay ishay emeschay, anday urningtay otay ethay Uernsey-mangay adhay aay ittlelay atchay ithway imhay, uringday ichwhay ethay angerstray atemay expresseday ishay etestationday ofay ishay Aptaincay asay aay onceitedcay ignoramusay, owhay adhay oughtbray emthay allay intoay osay unsavoryay anday unprofitableay aay icklepay. Oundingsay imhay arefullycay, Ubbstay urtherfay erceivedpay atthay ethay Uernsey-mangay adhay otnay ethay ightestslay uspicionsay oncerningcay ethay ambergrisay. Ehay ereforethay eldhay ishay eacepay onay atthay eadhay, utbay otherwiseay asway uiteqay ankfray anday onfidentialcay ithway imhay, osay atthay ethay otway uicklyqay oncoctedcay aay ittlelay anplay orfay othbay ircumventingcay anday atirizingsay ethay Aptaincay, ithoutway ishay atay allay eamingdray ofay istrustingday eirthay inceritysay. Accordingay otay isthay ittlelay anplay ofay eirsthay, ethay Uernsey-mangay, underay overcay ofay anay interpreter’say officeay, asway otay elltay ethay Aptaincay atwhay ehay easedplay, utbay asay omingcay omfray Ubbstay; anday asay orfay Ubbstay, ehay asway otay utteray anyay onsensenay atthay ouldshay omecay uppermostay inay imhay uringday ethay intervieway. 

Byay isthay imetay eirthay estinedday ictimvay appeareday omfray ishay abincay. Ehay asway aay allsmay anday arkday, utbay atherray elicateday ookinglay anmay orfay aay ea-captainsay, ithway argelay iskerswhay anday oustachemay, oweverhay; anday oreway aay edray ottoncay elvetvay estvay ithway atch-sealsway atay ishay idesay. Otay isthay entlemangay, Ubbstay asway ownay olitelypay introduceday byay ethay Uernsey-mangay, owhay atay onceay ostentatiouslyay utpay onay ethay aspectay ofay interpretingay etweenbay emthay. 

at“Whay allshay IAY aysay otay imhay irst?”fay aidsay ehay. 

“Why,”ay aidsay Ubbstay, eyeingay ethay elvetvay estvay anday ethay atchway anday ealssay, ou“yay aymay asay ellway eginbay byay ellingtay imhay atthay ehay ookslay aay ortsay ofay abyishbay otay emay, oughthay IAY on’tday etendpray otay ebay aay udge.”jay 

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieur,”may aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay, inay Enchfray, urningtay otay ishay aptaincay, at“thay onlyay esterdayyay ishay ipshay okespay aay esselvay, osewhay aptaincay anday ief-matechay, ithway ixsay ailorssay, adhay allay iedday ofay aay everfay aughtcay omfray aay astedblay alewhay eythay adhay oughtbray alongside.”ay 

Uponay isthay ethay aptaincay artedstay, anday eagerlyay esiredday otay owknay oremay. 

at“Whay ow?”nay aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay otay Ubbstay. 

“Whyay, incesay ehay akestay itay osay easyay, elltay imhay atthay ownay IAY avehay eyeday imhay arefullycay, I’may uiteqay ertaincay atthay e’shay onay oremay itfay otay ommandcay aay ale-shipwhay anthay aay Stay. Agojay onkeymay. Inay actfay, elltay imhay omfray emay e’shay aay aboon.”bay 

e“Hay owsvay anday eclaresday, Onsieurmay, atthay ethay otheray alewhay, ethay ieddray oneay, isay arfay oremay eadlyday anthay ethay astedblay oneay; inay inefay, Onsieurmay, ehay onjurescay usay, asay eway aluevay ouray iveslay, otay utcay ooselay omfray esethay ish.”fay 

Instantlyay ethay aptaincay anray orwardfay, anday inay aay oudlay oicevay ommandedcay ishay ewcray otay esistday omfray oistinghay ethay utting-tacklescay, anday atay onceay astcay ooselay ethay ablescay anday ainschay onfiningcay ethay aleswhay otay ethay ipshay. 

at“Whay ow?”nay aidsay ethay Uernsey-mangay, enwhay ethay Aptaincay adhay eturnedray otay emthay. 

“Whyay, etlay emay eesay; esyay, ouyay aymay asay ellway elltay imhay ownay at—that—inthay actfay, elltay imhay I’veay iddledday imhay, anday aside(ay otay imselfhay) erhapspay omebodysay else.”ay 

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieurmay, atthay e’shay eryvay appyhay otay avehay eenbay ofay anyay ervicesay otay us.”ay 

Earinghay isthay, ethay aptaincay owedvay atthay eythay ereway ethay atefulgray artiespay eaning(may imselfhay anday atemay) anday oncludedcay byay invitingay Ubbstay ownday intoay ishay abincay otay inkdray aay ottlebay ofay Ordeauxbay. 

e“Hay antsway ouyay otay aketay aay assglay ofay ineway ithway im,”hay aidsay ethay interpreteray. 

ank“Thay imhay eartilyhay; utbay elltay imhay it’say againstay myay inciplespray otay inkdray ithway ethay anmay I’veay iddledday. Inay actfay, elltay imhay IAY ustmay o.”gay 

e“Hay ayssay, Onsieurmay, atthay ishay inciplespray on’tway admitay ofay ishay inkingdray; utbay atthay ifay Onsieurmay antsway otay ivelay anotheray ayday otay inkdray, enthay Onsieurmay adhay estbay opdray allay ourfay oatsbay, anday ullpay ethay ipshay awayay omfray esethay aleswhay, orfay it’say osay almcay eythay on’tway ift.”dray 

Byay isthay imetay Ubbstay asway overay ethay idesay, anday ettinggay intoay ishay oatbay, ailedhay ethay Uernsey-mangay otay isthay effect,—thatay avinghay aay onglay ow-linetay inay ishay oatbay, ehay ouldway oday atwhay ehay ouldcay otay elphay emthay, byay ullingpay outay ethay ighterlay alewhay ofay ethay otway omfray ethay ip’sshay idesay. Ilewhay ethay Enchman’sfray oatsbay, enthay, ereway engageday inay owingtay ethay ipshay oneay ayway, Ubbstay enevolentlybay owedtay awayay atay ishay alewhay ethay otheray ayway, ostentatiouslyay ackingslay outay aay ostmay unusuallyay onglay ow-linetay. 

Esentlypray aay eezebray angspray upay; Ubbstay eignedfay otay astcay offay omfray ethay alewhay; oistinghay ishay oatsbay, ethay Enchmanfray oonsay increaseday ishay istanceday, ilewhay ethay Equodpay idslay inay etweenbay imhay anday Ubb’sstay alewhay. Ereuponwhay Ubbstay uicklyqay ulledpay otay ethay oatingflay odybay, anday ailinghay ethay Equodpay otay ivegay oticenay ofay ishay intentionsay, atay onceay oceededpray otay eapray ethay uitfray ofay ishay unrighteousay unningcay. Eizingsay ishay arpshay oat-spadebay, ehay ommencedcay anay excavationay inay ethay odybay, aay ittlelay ehindbay ethay idesay infay. Ouyay ouldway almostay avehay oughtthay ehay asway iggingday aay ellarcay erethay inay ethay easay; anday enwhay atay engthlay ishay adespay uckstray againstay ethay auntgay ibsray, itay asway ikelay urningtay upay olday Omanray ilestay anday otterypay uriedbay inay atfay Englishay oamlay. Ishay oat’sbay ewcray ereway allay inay ighhay excitementay, eagerlyay elpinghay eirthay iefchay, anday ookinglay asay anxiousay asay old-huntersgay. 

Anday allay ethay imetay umberlessnay owlsfay ereway ivingday, anday uckingday, anday eamingscray, anday ellingyay, anday ightingfay arounday emthay. Ubbstay asway eginningbay otay ooklay isappointedday, especiallyay asay ethay orriblehay osegaynay increaseday, enwhay uddenlysay omfray outay ethay eryvay earthay ofay isthay agueplay, erethay olestay aay aintfay eamstray ofay erfumepay, ichwhay owedflay oughthray ethay idetay ofay adbay ellssmay ithoutway eingbay absorbeday byay itay, asay oneay iverray illway owflay intoay anday enthay alongay ithway anotheray, ithoutway atay allay endingblay ithway itay orfay aay imetay. 

I“AY avehay itay, IAY avehay it,”ay iedcray Ubbstay, ithway elightday, ikingstray omethingsay inay ethay ubterraneansay egionsray, a“ay ursepay! aay urse!”pay 

Oppingdray ishay adespay, ehay ustthray othbay andshay inay, anday ewdray outay andfulshay ofay omethingsay atthay ookedlay ikelay iperay Indsorway oapsay, oray ichray ottledmay olday eesechay; eryvay unctuousay anday avorysay ithalway. Ouyay ightmay easilyay entday itay ithway ouryay umbthay; itay isay ofay aay uehay etweenbay ellowyay anday ashay olourcay. Anday isthay, oodgay iendsfray, isay ambergrisay, orthway aay oldgay uineagay anay ounceay otay anyay uggistdray. Omesay ixsay andfulshay ereway obtaineday; utbay oremay asway unavoidablyay ostlay inay ethay easay, anday illstay oremay, erhapspay, ightmay avehay eenbay ecuredsay ereway itay otnay orfay impatientay Ahab’say oudlay ommandcay otay Ubbstay otay esistday, anday omecay onay oardbay, elseay ethay ipshay ouldway idbay emthay oodgay ebyay. 



APTERCHAY 92ay. Ambergrisay. 

Ownay isthay ambergrisay isay aay eryvay uriouscay ubstancesay, anday osay importantay asay anay articleay ofay ommercecay, atthay inay 1791ay aay ertaincay Antucket-bornnay Aptaincay Offincay asway examineday atay ethay arbay ofay ethay Englishay Ousehay ofay Ommonscay onay atthay ubjectsay. Orfay atay atthay imetay, anday indeeday untilay aay omparativelycay atelay ayday, ethay ecisepray originay ofay ambergrisay emainedray, ikelay amberay itselfay, aay oblempray otay ethay earnedlay. Oughthay ethay ordway ambergrisay isay utbay ethay Enchfray ompoundcay orfay eygray amberay, etyay ethay otway ubstancessay areay uiteqay istinctday. Orfay amberay, oughthay atay imestay oundfay onay ethay ea-coastsay, isay alsoay ugday upay inay omesay arfay inlanday oilssay, ereaswhay ambergrisay isay evernay oundfay exceptay uponay ethay easay. Esidesbay, amberay isay aay ardhay, ansparenttray, ittlebray, odorlessay ubstancesay, useday orfay outh-piecesmay otay ipespay, orfay eadsbay anday ornamentsay; utbay ambergrisay isay oftsay, axyway, anday osay ighlyhay agrantfray anday icyspay, atthay itay isay argelylay useday inay erfumerypay, inay astilespay, eciouspray andlescay, air-powdershay, anday omatumpay. Ethay Urkstay useay itay inay ookingcay, anday alsoay arrycay itay otay Eccamay, orfay ethay amesay urposepay atthay ankincensefray isay arriedcay otay Stay. Eter’spay inay Omeray. Omesay ineway erchantsmay opdray aay ewfay ainsgray intoay aretclay, otay avorflay itay. 

Owhay ouldway inkthay, enthay, atthay uchsay inefay adieslay anday entlemengay ouldshay egaleray emselvesthay ithway anay essenceay oundfay inay ethay ingloriousay owelsbay ofay aay icksay alewhay! Etyay osay itay isay. Byay omesay, ambergrisay isay upposedsay otay ebay ethay ausecay, anday byay othersay ethay effectay, ofay ethay epsiadyspay inay ethay alewhay. Owhay otay urecay uchsay aay epsiadyspay itay ereway ardhay otay aysay, unlessay byay administeringay eethray oray ourfay oatbay oadslay ofay Andreth’sbray illspay, anday enthay unningray outay ofay arm’shay ayway, asay aborerslay oday inay astingblay ocksray. 

IAY avehay orgottenfay otay aysay atthay erethay ereway oundfay inay isthay ambergrisay, ertaincay ardhay, oundray, onybay atesplay, ichwhay atay irstfay Ubbstay oughtthay ightmay ebay ailors’say owserstray uttonsbay; utbay itay afterwardsay urnedtay outay atthay eythay ereway othingnay oremay anthay iecespay ofay allsmay uidsqay onesbay embalmeday inay atthay annermay. 

Ownay atthay ethay incorruptionay ofay isthay ostmay agrantfray ambergrisay ouldshay ebay oundfay inay ethay earthay ofay uchsay ecayday; isay isthay othingnay? Ethinkbay eethay ofay atthay ayingsay ofay Stay. Aulpay inay Orinthianscay, aboutay orruptioncay anday incorruptionay; owhay atthay eway areay ownsay inay ishonorday, utbay aisedray inay oryglay. Anday ikewiselay allcay otay indmay atthay ayingsay ofay Aracelsuspay aboutay atwhay itay isay atthay akethmay ethay estbay uskmay. Alsoay orgetfay otnay ethay angestray actfay atthay ofay allay ingsthay ofay ill-savoray, Ologne-watercay, inay itsay udimentalray anufacturingmay agesstay, isay ethay orstway. 

IAY ouldshay ikelay otay oncludecay ethay apterchay ithway ethay aboveay appealay, utbay annotcay, owingay otay myay anxietyay otay epelray aay argechay oftenay ademay againstay alemenwhay, anday ichwhay, inay ethay estimationay ofay omesay alreadyay iasedbay indsmay, ightmay ebay onsideredcay asay indirectlyay ubstantiatedsay byay atwhay ashay eenbay aidsay ofay ethay Enchman’sfray otway aleswhay. Elsewhereay inay isthay olumevay ethay anderousslay aspersionay ashay eenbay isprovedday, atthay ethay ocationvay ofay alingwhay isay oughoutthray aay atternlyslay, untidyay usinessbay. Utbay erethay isay anotheray ingthay otay ebutray. Eythay inthay atthay allay aleswhay alwaysay ellsmay adbay. Ownay owhay idday isthay odiousay igmastay originateay? 

IAY opineay, atthay itay isay ainlyplay aceabletray otay ethay irstfay arrivalay ofay ethay Eenlandgray alingwhay ipsshay inay Ondonlay, oremay anthay otway enturiescay agoay. Ecausebay osethay alemenwhay idday otnay enthay, anday oday otnay ownay, tryay outay eirthay oilay atay easay asay ethay Outhernsay ipsshay avehay alwaysay oneday; utbay uttingcay upay ethay eshfray ubberblay inay allsmay itsbay, ustthray itay oughthray ethay ungbay oleshay ofay argelay askscay, anday arrycay itay omehay inay atthay annermay; ethay ortnessshay ofay ethay easonsay inay osethay Icyay Eassay, anday ethay uddensay anday iolentvay ormsstay otay ichwhay eythay areay exposeday, orbiddingfay anyay otheray oursecay. Ethay onsequencecay isay, atthay uponay eakingbray intoay ethay oldhay, anday unloadingay oneay ofay esethay alewhay emeteriescay, inay ethay Eenlandgray ockday, aay avorsay isay ivengay orthfay omewhatsay imilarsay otay atthay arisingay omfray excavatingay anay olday itycay ave-yardgray, orfay ethay oundationsfay ofay aay Ing-inlyay Ospitalhay. 

IAY artlypay urmisesay alsoay, atthay isthay ickedway argechay againstay alerswhay aymay ebay ikewiselay imputeday otay ethay existenceay onay ethay oastcay ofay Eenlandgray, inay ormerfay imestay, ofay aay Utchday illagevay alledcay Erenburghschmay oray Eerenbergsmay, ichwhay atterlay amenay isay ethay oneay useday byay ethay earnedlay Ogofay Onvay Ackslay, inay ishay eatgray orkway onay Ellssmay, aay ext-booktay onay atthay ubjectsay. Asay itsay amenay importsay eer(smay, atfay; ergbay, otay utpay upay), isthay illagevay asway oundedfay inay orderay otay afforday aay aceplay orfay ethay ubberblay ofay ethay Utchday alewhay eetflay otay ebay iedtray outay, ithoutway eingbay akentay omehay otay Ollandhay orfay atthay urposepay. Itay asway aay ollectioncay ofay urnacesfay, at-kettlesfay, anday oilay edsshay; anday enwhay ethay orksway ereway inay ullfay operationay ertainlycay avegay orthfay onay eryvay easantplay avorsay. Utbay allay isthay isay uiteqay ifferentday ithway aay Outhsay Easay Ermspay Alerwhay; ichwhay inay aay oyagevay ofay ourfay earsyay erhapspay, afteray ompletelycay illingfay erhay oldhay ithway oilay, oesday otnay, erhapspay, onsumecay iftyfay aysday inay ethay usinessbay ofay oilingbay outay; anday inay ethay atestay atthay itay isay askedcay, ethay oilay isay earlynay entlessscay. Ethay uthtray isay, atthay ivinglay oray eadday, ifay utbay ecentlyday eatedtray, aleswhay asay aay eciesspay areay byay onay eansmay eaturescray ofay illay odoray; ornay ancay alemenwhay ebay ecognisedray, asay ethay eoplepay ofay ethay iddlemay agesay affecteday otay etectday aay Ewjay inay ethay ompanycay, byay ethay osenay.
