Ornay indeeday ancay ethay alewhay ossiblypay ebay otherwiseay anthay agrantfray, enwhay, asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ehay enjoysay uchsay ighhay ealthhay; akingtay abundanceay ofay exerciseay; alwaysay outay ofay oorsday; oughthay, itay isay uetray, eldomsay inay ethay openay airay. IAY aysay, atthay ethay otionmay ofay aay Ermspay Ale’swhay ukesflay aboveay aterway ispensesday aay erfumepay, asay enwhay aay usk-scentedmay adylay ustlesray erhay essdray inay aay armway arlorpay. Atwhay enthay allshay IAY ikenlay ethay Ermspay Alewhay otay orfay agrancefray, onsideringcay ishay agnitudemay? Ustmay itay otnay ebay otay atthay amousfay elephantay, ithway ewelledjay uskstay, anday edolentray ithway myrrhay, ichwhay asway edlay outay ofay anay Indianay owntay otay oday onorhay otay Alexanderay ethay Eatgray? 



APTERCHAY 93ay. Ethay Astawaycay. 

Itay asway utbay omesay ewfay aysday afteray encounteringay ethay Enchmanfray, atthay aay ostmay ignificantsay eventay efellbay ethay ostmay insignificantay ofay ethay Equod’spay ewcray; anay eventay ostmay amentablelay; anday ichwhay endeday inay ovidingpray ethay ometimessay adlymay errymay anday edestinatedpray aftcray ithway aay ivinglay anday everay accompanyingay ophecypray ofay ateverwhay atteredshay equelsay ightmay ovepray erhay ownay. 

Ownay, inay ethay alewhay ipshay, itay isay otnay everyay oneay atthay oesgay inay ethay oatsbay. Omesay ewfay andshay areay eservedray alledcay ip-keepersshay, osewhay ovincepray itay isay otay orkway ethay esselvay ilewhay ethay oatsbay areay ursuingpay ethay alewhay. Asay aay eneralgay ingthay, esethay ip-keepersshay areay asay ardyhay ellowsfay asay ethay enmay omprisingcay ethay oats’bay ewscray. Utbay ifay erethay appenhay otay ebay anay undulyay enderslay, umsyclay, oray imoroustay ightway inay ethay ipshay, atthay ightway isay ertaincay otay ebay ademay aay ip-keepershay. Itay asway osay inay ethay Equodpay ithway ethay ittlelay egronay Ippinpay byay ick-namenay, Ippay byay abbreviationay. Oorpay Ippay! eyay avehay eardhay ofay imhay eforebay; eyay ustmay ememberray ishay ambourinetay onay atthay amaticdray idnightmay, osay oomy-jollyglay. 

Inay outeray aspectay, Ippay anday Ough-boyday ademay aay atchmay, ikelay aay ackblay onypay anday aay itewhay oneay, ofay equalay evelopmentsday, oughthay ofay issimilarday olourcay, ivendray inay oneay eccentricay anspay. Utbay ilewhay aplesshay Ough-boyday asway byay aturenay ullday anday orpidtay inay ishay intellectsay, Ippay, oughthay overay ender-heartedtay, asway atay ottombay eryvay ightbray, ithway atthay easantplay, enialgay, ollyjay ightnessbray eculiarpay otay ishay ibetray; aay ibetray, ichwhay everay enjoyay allay olidayshay anday estivitiesfay ithway inerfay, eerfray elishray anthay anyay otheray aceray. Orfay acksblay, ethay ear’syay alendarcay ouldshay owshay aughtnay utbay eethray undredhay anday ixty-fivesay Ourthfay ofay Ulysjay anday Ewnay Ear’syay Aysday. Ornay ilesmay osay, ilewhay IAY itewray atthay isthay ittlelay ackblay asway illiantbray, orfay evenay acknessblay ashay itsay illiancybray; eholdbay onyay ustrouslay ebonyay, anelledpay inay ing’skay abinetscay. Utbay Ippay ovedlay ifelay, anday allay ife’slay eaceablepay ecuritiessay; osay atthay ethay anic-strikingpay usinessbay inay ichwhay ehay adhay omehowsay unaccountablyay ecomebay entrappeday, adhay ostmay adlysay urredblay ishay ightnessbray; oughthay, asay ereay onglay illway ebay eensay, atwhay asway usthay emporarilytay ubduedsay inay imhay, inay ethay enday asway estinedday otay ebay uridlylay illumineday byay angestray ildway iresfay, atthay ictitiouslyfay owedshay imhay offay otay entay imestay ethay aturalnay ustrelay ithway ichwhay inay ishay ativenay Ollandtay Ountycay inay Onnecticutcay, ehay adhay onceay enliveneday anymay aay iddler’sfay olicfray onay ethay eengray; anday atay elodiousmay even-tideay, ithway ishay aygay a-hahay! adhay urnedtay ethay oundray orizonhay intoay oneay ar-belledstay ambourinetay. Osay, oughthay inay ethay earclay airay ofay ayday, uspendedsay againstay aay ue-veinedblay ecknay, ethay ure-wateredpay iamondday opdray illway ealthfulhay owglay; etyay, enwhay ethay unningcay ewellerjay ouldway owshay ouyay ethay iamondday inay itsay ostmay impressiveay ustrelay, ehay ayslay itay againstay aay oomyglay oundgray, anday enthay ightslay itay upay, otnay byay ethay unsay, utbay byay omesay unnaturalay asesgay. Enthay omecay outay osethay ieryfay effulgencesay, infernallyay uperbsay; enthay ethay evil-blazingay iamondday, onceay ethay ivinestday olsymbay ofay ethay alcrystay iesskay, ookslay ikelay omesay own-jewelcray olenstay omfray ethay Ingkay ofay Ellhay. Utbay etlay usay otay ethay orystay. 

Itay amecay otay asspay, atthay inay ethay ambergrisay affairay Ubb’sstay after-oarsmanay ancedchay osay otay ainspray ishay andhay, asay orfay aay imetay otay ecomebay uiteqay aimedmay; anday, emporarilytay, Ippay asway utpay intoay ishay aceplay. 

Ethay irstfay imetay Ubbstay oweredlay ithway imhay, Ippay evinceday uchmay ervousnessnay; utbay appilyhay, orfay atthay imetay, escapeday oseclay ontactcay ithway ethay alewhay; anday ereforethay amecay offay otnay altogetheray iscreditablyday; oughthay Ubbstay observingay imhay, ooktay arecay, afterwardsay, otay exhortay imhay otay erishchay ishay ourageousnesscay otay ethay utmostay, orfay ehay ightmay oftenay indfay itay eedfulnay. 

Ownay uponay ethay econdsay oweringlay, ethay oatbay addledpay uponay ethay alewhay; anday asay ethay ishfay eceivedray ethay artedday ironay, itay avegay itsay ustomarycay apray, ichwhay appenedhay, inay isthay instanceay, otay ebay ightray underay oorpay Ip’spay eatsay. Ethay involuntaryay onsternationcay ofay ethay omentmay ausedcay imhay otay eaplay, addlepay inay andhay, outay ofay ethay oatbay; anday inay uchsay aay ayway, atthay artpay ofay ethay ackslay alewhay inelay omingcay againstay ishay estchay, ehay eastedbray itay overboarday ithway imhay, osay asay otay ecomebay entangleday inay itay, enwhay atay astlay umpingplay intoay ethay aterway. Atthay instantay ethay ickenstray alewhay artedstay onay aay iercefay unray, ethay inelay iftlysway aightenedstray; anday estopray! oorpay Ippay amecay allay oamingfay upay otay ethay ockschay ofay ethay oatbay, emorselesslyray aggeddray erethay byay ethay inelay, ichwhay adhay akentay everalsay urnstay arounday ishay estchay anday ecknay. 

Ashtegotay oodstay inay ethay owsbay. Ehay asway ullfay ofay ethay irefay ofay ethay unthay. Ehay atedhay Ippay orfay aay oltroonpay. Atchingsnay ethay oat-knifebay omfray itsay eathshay, ehay uspendedsay itsay arpshay edgeay overay ethay inelay, anday urningtay owardstay Ubbstay, exclaimeday interrogativelyay, ut?”“Cay Eantimemay Ip’spay ueblay, okedchay acefay ainlyplay ookedlay, Oday, orfay Od’sgay akesay! Allay assedpay inay aay ashflay. Inay esslay anthay alfhay aay inutemay, isthay entireay ingthay appenedhay. 

amn“Day imhay, ut!”cay oaredray Ubbstay; anday osay ethay alewhay asway ostlay anday Ippay asway avedsay. 

Osay oonsay asay ehay ecoveredray imselfhay, ethay oorpay ittlelay egronay asway assaileday byay ellsyay anday execrationsay omfray ethay ewcray. Anquillytray ermittingpay esethay irregularay ursingscay otay evaporateay, Ubbstay enthay inay aay ainplay, usiness-likebay, utbay illstay alfhay umoroushay annermay, ursedcay Ippay officiallyay; anday atthay oneday, unofficiallyay avegay imhay uchmay olesomewhay adviceay. Ethay ubstancesay asway, Evernay umpjay omfray aay oatbay, Ippay, except—butay allay ethay estray asway indefiniteay, asay ethay oundestsay adviceay everay isay. Ownay, inay eneralgay, ick_Stay otay ethay oatbay_, isay ouryay uetray ottomay inay alingwhay; utbay asescay illway ometimessay appenhay enwhay eap_Lay omfray ethay oatbay_, isay illstay etterbay. Oreovermay, asay ifay erceivingpay atay astlay atthay ifay ehay ouldshay ivegay undiluteday onscientiouscay adviceay otay Ippay, ehay ouldway ebay eavinglay imhay ootay ideway aay arginmay otay umpjay inay orfay ethay uturefay; Ubbstay uddenlysay oppeddray allay adviceay, anday oncludedcay ithway aay eremptorypay ommandcay, ick“Stay otay ethay oatbay, Ippay, oray byay ethay Ordlay, IAY on’tway ickpay ouyay upay ifay ouyay umpjay; indmay atthay. Eway an’tcay afforday otay oselay aleswhay byay ethay ikeslay ofay ouyay; aay alewhay ouldway ellsay orfay irtythay imestay atwhay ouyay ouldway, Ippay, inay Alabamaay. Earbay atthay inay indmay, anday on’tday umpjay anyay ore.”may Erebyhay erhapspay Ubbstay indirectlyay intedhay, atthay oughthay anmay ovedlay ishay ellowfay, etyay anmay isay aay oney-makingmay animalay, ichwhay opensitypray ootay oftenay interferesay ithway ishay enevolencebay. 

Utbay eway areay allay inay ethay andshay ofay ethay Odsgay; anday Ippay umpedjay againay. Itay asway underay eryvay imilarsay ircumstancescay otay ethay irstfay erformancepay; utbay isthay imetay ehay idday otnay eastbray outay ethay inelay; anday encehay, enwhay ethay alewhay artedstay otay unray, Ippay asway eftlay ehindbay onay ethay easay, ikelay aay urriedhay aveller’stray unktray. Alasay! Ubbstay asway utbay ootay uetray otay ishay ordway. Itay asway aay eautifulbay, ounteousbay, ueblay ayday; ethay angledspay easay almcay anday oolcay, anday atlyflay etchingstray awayay, allay oundray, otay ethay orizonhay, ikelay old-beater’sgay inskay ammeredhay outay otay ethay extremestay. Obbingbay upay anday ownday inay atthay easay, Ip’spay ebonay eadhay owedshay ikelay aay eadhay ofay ovesclay. Onay oat-knifebay asway iftedlay enwhay ehay ellfay osay apidlyray asternay. Ubb’sstay inexorableay ackbay asway urnedtay uponay imhay; anday ethay alewhay asway ingedway. Inay eethray inutesmay, aay olewhay ilemay ofay orelessshay oceanay asway etweenbay Ippay anday Ubbstay. Outay omfray ethay entrecay ofay ethay easay, oorpay Ippay urnedtay ishay ispcray, urlingcay, ackblay eadhay otay ethay unsay, anotheray onelylay astawaycay, oughthay ethay oftiestlay anday ethay ightestbray. 

Ownay, inay almcay eatherway, otay imsway inay ethay openay oceanay isay asay easyay otay ethay actisedpray immersway asay otay ideray inay aay ing-carriagespray ashoreay. Utbay ethay awfulay onesomenesslay isay intolerableay. Ethay intenseay oncentrationcay ofay elfsay inay ethay iddlemay ofay uchsay aay eartlesshay immensityay, myay Odgay! owhay ancay elltay itay? Arkmay, owhay enwhay ailorssay inay aay eadday almcay athebay inay ethay openay ea—marksay owhay oselyclay eythay ughay eirthay ipshay anday onlyay oastcay alongay erhay idessay. 

Utbay adhay Ubbstay eallyray abandoneday ethay oorpay ittlelay egronay otay ishay atefay? Onay; ehay idday otnay eanmay otay, atay eastlay. Ecausebay erethay ereway otway oatsbay inay ishay akeway, anday ehay upposedsay, onay oubtday, atthay eythay ouldway ofay oursecay omecay upay otay Ippay eryvay uicklyqay, anday ickpay imhay upay; oughthay, indeeday, uchsay onsiderationscay owardstay oarsmenay eopardizedjay oughthray eirthay ownay imiditytay, isay otnay alwaysay anifestedmay byay ethay untershay inay allay imilarsay instancesay; anday uchsay instancesay otnay unfrequentlyay occuray; almostay invariablyay inay ethay isheryfay, aay owardcay, osay alledcay, isay arkedmay ithway ethay amesay uthlessray etestationday eculiarpay otay ilitarymay aviesnay anday armiesay. 

Utbay itay osay appenedhay, atthay osethay oatsbay, ithoutway eeingsay Ippay, uddenlysay ingspyay aleswhay oseclay otay emthay onay oneay idesay, urnedtay, anday avegay asechay; anday Ubb’sstay oatbay asway ownay osay arfay awayay, anday ehay anday allay ishay ewcray osay intentay uponay ishay ishfay, atthay Ip’spay ingedray orizonhay eganbay otay expanday arounday imhay iserablymay. Byay ethay erestmay ancechay ethay ipshay itselfay atay astlay escuedray imhay; utbay omfray atthay ourhay ethay ittlelay egronay entway aboutay ethay eckday anay idiotay; uchsay, atay eastlay, eythay aidsay ehay asway. Ethay easay adhay eeringlyjay eptkay ishay initefay odybay upay, utbay owneddray ethay infiniteay ofay ishay oulsay. Otnay owneddray entirelyay, oughthay. Atherray arriedcay ownday aliveay otay ondrousway epthsday, erewhay angestray apesshay ofay ethay unwarpeday imalpray orldway idedglay otay anday ofray eforebay ishay assivepay eyesay; anday ethay iser-mermanmay, Isdomway, evealedray ishay oardedhay eapshay; anday amongay ethay oyousjay, eartlesshay, ever-juvenileay eternitiesay, Ippay awsay ethay ultitudinousmay, Od-omnipresentgay, oralcay insectsay, atthay outay ofay ethay irmamentfay ofay atersway eavedhay ethay olossalcay orbsay. Ehay awsay Od’sgay ootfay uponay ethay eadletray ofay ethay oomlay, anday okespay itay; anday ereforethay ishay ipmatesshay alledcay imhay admay. Osay an’smay insanityay isay eaven’shay ensesay; anday anderingway omfray allay ortalmay easonray, anmay omescay atay astlay otay atthay elestialcay oughtthay, ichwhay, otay easonray, isay absurday anday anticfray; anday ealway oray oeway, eelsfay enthay uncompromiseday, indifferentay asay ishay Odgay. 

Orfay ethay estray, ameblay otnay Ubbstay ootay ardlyhay. Ethay ingthay isay ommoncay inay atthay isheryfay; anday inay ethay equelsay ofay ethay arrativenay, itay illway enthay ebay eensay atwhay ikelay abandonmentay efellbay elfmysay. 



APTERCHAY 94ay. AAY Ueezesqay ofay ethay Andhay. 

Atthay alewhay ofay Ubb’sstay, osay earlyday urchasedpay, asway ulyday oughtbray otay ethay Equod’spay idesay, erewhay allay osethay uttingcay anday oistinghay operationsay eviouslypray etailedday, ereway egularlyray onegay oughthray, evenay otay ethay alingbay ofay ethay Eidelburghhay Untay, oray Asecay. 

Ilewhay omesay ereway occupieday ithway isthay atterlay utyday, othersay ereway employeday inay aggingdray awayay ethay argerlay ubstay, osay oonsay asay illedfay ithway ethay ermspay; anday enwhay ethay operpray imetay arriveday, isthay amesay ermspay asway arefullycay anipulatedmay ereay oinggay otay ethay orkstry-way, ofay ichwhay anonay. 

Itay adhay ooledcay anday allizedcrystay otay uchsay aay egreeday, atthay enwhay, ithway everalsay othersay, IAY atsay ownday eforebay aay argelay Onstantine’scay athbay ofay itay, IAY oundfay itay angelystray oncretedcay intoay umpslay, erehay anday erethay ollingray aboutay inay ethay iquidlay artpay. Itay asway ouray usinessbay otay ueezesqay esethay umpslay ackbay intoay uidflay. AAY eetsway anday unctuousay utyday! Onay onderway atthay inay olday imestay isthay ermspay asway uchsay aay avouritefay osmeticcay. Uchsay aay earerclay! uchsay aay eetenersway! uchsay aay oftenersay! uchsay aay eliciousday olifiermay! Afteray avinghay myay andshay inay itay orfay onlyay aay ewfay inutesmay, myay ingersfay eltfay ikelay eelsay, anday eganbay, asay itay ereway, otay erpentinesay anday iralisespay. 

Asay IAY atsay erethay atay myay easeay, oss-leggedcray onay ethay eckday; afteray ethay itterbay exertionay atay ethay indlassway; underay aay ueblay anquiltray skyay; ethay ipshay underay indolentay ailsay, anday idingglay osay erenelysay alongay; asay IAY athedbay myay andshay amongay osethay oftsay, entlegay obulesglay ofay infiltrateday issuestay, ovenway almostay ithinway ethay ourhay; asay eythay ichlyray okebray otay myay ingersfay, anday ischargedday allay eirthay opulenceay, ikelay ullyfay iperay apesgray eirthay ineway; asay IAY uffedsnay upay atthay uncontaminateday aroma,—literallyay anday ulytray, ikelay ethay ellsmay ofay ingspray ioletsvay; IAY eclareday otay ouyay, atthay orfay ethay imetay IAY ivedlay asay inay aay uskymay eadowmay; IAY orgotfay allay aboutay ouray orriblehay oathay; inay atthay inexpressibleay ermspay, IAY ashedway myay andshay anday myay earthay ofay itay; IAY almostay eganbay otay editcray ethay olday Aracelsanpay uperstitionsay atthay ermspay isay ofay areray irtuevay inay allayingay ethay eathay ofay angeray; ilewhay athingbay inay atthay athbay, IAY eltfay ivinelyday eefray omfray allay ill-willay, oray etulancepay, oray alicemay, ofay anyay ortsay atsoeverwhay. 

Ueezesqay! ueezesqay! ueezesqay! allay ethay orningmay onglay; IAY ueezedsqay atthay ermspay illtay IAY elfmysay almostay eltedmay intoay itay; IAY ueezedsqay atthay ermspay illtay aay angestray ortsay ofay insanityay amecay overay emay; anday IAY oundfay elfmysay unwittinglyay ueezingsqay myay o-laborers’cay andshay inay itay, istakingmay eirthay andshay orfay ethay entlegay obulesglay. Uchsay anay aboundingay, affectionateay, iendlyfray, ovinglay eelingfay idday isthay avocationay egetbay; atthay atay astlay IAY asway ontinuallycay ueezingsqay eirthay andshay, anday ookinglay upay intoay eirthay eyesay entimentallysay; asay uchmay asay otay ay,—Ohsay! myay earday ellowfay eingsbay, whyay ouldshay eway ongerlay erishchay anyay ocialsay acerbitiesay, oray owknay ethay ightestslay ill-humoray oray envyay! Omecay; etlay usay ueezesqay andshay allay oundray; aynay, etlay usay allay ueezesqay ourselvesay intoay eachay otheray; etlay usay ueezesqay ourselvesay universallyay intoay ethay eryvay ilkmay anday ermspay ofay indnesskay. 

Ouldway atthay IAY ouldcay eepkay ueezingsqay atthay ermspay orfay everay! Orfay ownay, incesay byay anymay olongedpray, epeatedray experiencesay, IAY avehay erceivedpay atthay inay allay asescay anmay ustmay eventuallyay owerlay, oray atay eastlay iftshay, ishay onceitcay ofay attainableay elicityfay; otnay acingplay itay anywhereay inay ethay intellectay oray ethay ancyfay; utbay inay ethay ifeway, ethay earthay, ethay edbay, ethay abletay, ethay addlesay, ethay iresidefay, ethay ountrycay; ownay atthay IAY avehay erceivedpay allay isthay, IAY amay eadyray otay ueezesqay asecay eternallyay. Inay oughtsthay ofay ethay isionsvay ofay ethay ightnay, IAY awsay onglay owsray ofay angelsay inay aradisepay, eachay ithway ishay andshay inay aay arjay ofay ermacetispay. 

Ownay, ilewhay iscoursingday ofay ermspay, itay ehoovesbay otay eakspay ofay otheray ingsthay akinay otay itay, inay ethay usinessbay ofay eparingpray ethay ermspay alewhay orfay ethay orkstry-way. 

Irstfay omescay ite-horsewhay, osay alledcay, ichwhay isay obtaineday omfray ethay aperingtay artpay ofay ethay ishfay, anday alsoay omfray ethay ickerthay ortionspay ofay ishay ukesflay. Itay isay oughtay ithway ongealedcay endons—atay adway ofay uscle—butmay illstay ontainscay omesay oilay. Afteray eingbay everedsay omfray ethay alewhay, ethay ite-horsewhay isay irstfay utcay intoay ortablepay oblongsay ereay oinggay otay ethay incermay. Eythay ooklay uchmay ikelay ocksblay ofay Erkshirebay arblemay. 

Um-puddingplay isay ethay ermtay estowedbay uponay ertaincay agmentaryfray artspay ofay ethay ale’swhay eshflay, erehay anday erethay adheringay otay ethay anketblay ofay ubberblay, anday oftenay articipatingpay otay aay onsiderablecay egreeday inay itsay unctuousnessay. Itay isay aay ostmay efreshingray, onvivialcay, eautifulbay objectay otay eholdbay. Asay itsay amenay importsay, itay isay ofay anay exceedinglyay ichray, ottledmay inttay, ithway aay estreakedbay owysnay anday oldengay oundgray, ottedday ithway otsspay ofay ethay eepestday imsoncray anday urplepay. Itay isay umsplay ofay ubiesray, inay icturespay ofay itroncay. Itespay ofay easonray, itay isay ardhay otay eepkay ourselfyay omfray eatingay itay. IAY onfesscay, atthay onceay IAY olestay ehindbay ethay oremastfay otay tryay itay. Itay astedtay omethingsay asay IAY ouldshay onceivecay aay oyalray utletcay omfray ethay ighthay ofay Ouislay elay Osgray ightmay avehay astedtay, upposingsay imhay otay avehay eenbay illedkay ethay irstfay ayday afteray ethay enisonvay easonsay, anday atthay articularpay enisonvay easonsay ontemporarycay ithway anay unusuallyay inefay intagevay ofay ethay ineyardsvay ofay Ampagnechay. 

Erethay isay anotheray ubstancesay, anday aay eryvay ingularsay oneay, ichwhay urnstay upay inay ethay oursecay ofay isthay usinessbay, utbay ichwhay IAY eelfay itay otay ebay eryvay uzzlingpay adequatelyay otay escribeday. Itay isay alledcay obgollionslay; anay appellationay originalay ithway ethay alemenwhay, anday evenay osay isay ethay aturenay ofay ethay ubstancesay. Itay isay anay ineffablyay oozyay, ingystray affairay, ostmay equentlyfray oundfay inay ethay ubstay ofay ermspay, afteray aay olongedpray ueezingsqay, anday ubsequentsay ecantingday. IAY oldhay itay otay ebay ethay ondrouslyway inthay, upturedray embranesmay ofay ethay asecay, oalescingcay. 

Urrygay, osay alledcay, isay aay ermtay operlypray elongingbay otay ightray alemenwhay, utbay ometimessay incidentallyay useday byay ethay ermspay ishermenfay. Itay esignatesday ethay arkday, utinousglay ubstancesay ichwhay isay apedscray offay ethay ackbay ofay ethay Eenlandgray oray ightray alewhay, anday uchmay ofay ichwhay overscay ethay ecksday ofay osethay inferioray oulssay owhay unthay atthay ignobleay Eviathanlay. 

Ippersnay. Ictlystray isthay ordway isay otnay indigenousay otay ethay ale’swhay ocabularyvay. Utbay asay applieday byay alemenwhay, itay ecomesbay osay. AAY aleman’swhay ippernay isay aay ortshay irmfay ipstray ofay endinoustay uffstay utcay omfray ethay aperingtay artpay ofay Eviathan’slay ailtay: itay averagesay anay inchay inay icknessthay, anday orfay ethay estray, isay aboutay ethay izesay ofay ethay ironay artpay ofay aay oehay. Edgewiseay ovedmay alongay ethay oilyay eckday, itay operatesay ikelay aay eathernlay uilgeesqay; anday byay amelessnay andishmentsblay, asay ofay agicmay, alluresay alongay ithway itay allay impuritiesay. 

Utbay otay earnlay allay aboutay esethay econditeray attersmay, ouryay estbay ayway isay atay onceay otay escendday intoay ethay ubber-roomblay, anday avehay aay onglay alktay ithway itsay inmatesay. Isthay aceplay ashay eviouslypray eenbay entionedmay asay ethay eceptacleray orfay ethay anket-piecesblay, enwhay iptstray anday oistedhay omfray ethay alewhay. Enwhay ethay operpray imetay arrivesay orfay uttingcay upay itsay ontentscay, isthay apartmentay isay aay enescay ofay errortay otay allay ostyray, especiallyay byay ightnay. Onay oneay idesay, itlay byay aay ullday anternlay, aay acespay ashay eenbay eftlay earclay orfay ethay orkmenway. Eythay enerallygay ogay inay airs,—apay ike-and-gaffmanpay anday aay ade-manspay. Ethay aling-pikewhay isay imilarsay otay aay igate’sfray oarding-weaponbay ofay ethay amesay amenay. Ethay affgay isay omethingsay ikelay aay oat-hookbay. Ithway ishay affgay, ethay affmangay ookshay onay otay aay eetshay ofay ubberblay, anday ivesstray otay oldhay itay omfray ippingslay, asay ethay ipshay itchespay anday urcheslay aboutay. Eanwhilemay, ethay ade-manspay andsstay onay ethay eetshay itselfay, erpendicularlypay oppingchay itay intoay ethay ortablepay orse-pieceshay. Isthay adespay isay arpshay asay onehay ancay akemay itay; ethay ademan’sspay eetfay areay oelessshay; ethay ingthay ehay andsstay onay illway ometimessay irresistiblyay ideslay awayay omfray imhay, ikelay aay edgeslay. Ifay ehay utscay offay oneay ofay ishay ownay oestay, oray oneay ofay ishay assistants’ay, ouldway ouyay ebay eryvay uchmay astonisheday? Oestay areay arcescay amongay eteranvay ubber-roomblay enmay. 



APTERCHAY 95ay. Ethay Assockcay. 

Adhay ouyay eppedstay onay oardbay ethay Equodpay atay aay ertaincay uncturejay ofay isthay ost-mortemizingpay ofay ethay alewhay; anday adhay ouyay olledstray orwardfay ighnay ethay indlassway, ettypray uresay amay IAY atthay ouyay ouldway avehay annedscay ithway onay allsmay uriositycay aay eryvay angestray, enigmaticalay objectay, ichwhay ouyay ouldway avehay eensay erethay, inglyay alongay engthwiselay inay ethay eelay uppersscay. Otnay ethay ondrousway isterncay inay ethay ale’swhay ugehay eadhay; otnay ethay odigypray ofay ishay unhingeday owerlay awjay; otnay ethay iraclemay ofay ishay etricalsymmay ailtay; onenay ofay esethay ouldway osay urprisesay ouyay, asay alfhay aay impseglay ofay atthay unaccountableay one,—longercay anthay aay Entuckiankay isay alltay, ighnay aay ootfay inay iameterday atay ethay asebay, anday et-blackjay asay Ojoyay, ethay ebonyay idolay ofay Ueequegqay. Anday anay idolay, indeeday, itay isay; oray, atherray, inay olday imestay, itsay ikenesslay asway. Uchsay anay idolay asay atthay oundfay inay ethay ecretsay ovesgray ofay Ueenqay Aachahmay inay Udeajay; anday orfay orshippingway ichwhay, Ingkay Asaay, erhay onsay, idday eposeday erhay, anday estroyedday ethay idolay, anday urntbay itay orfay anay abominationay atay ethay ookbray Edronkay, asay arklyday etsay orthfay inay ethay 15thay apterchay ofay ethay Irstfay Ookbay ofay Ingskay. 

Ooklay atay ethay ailorsay, alledcay ethay incermay, owhay ownay omescay alongay, anday assisteday byay otway alliesay, eavilyhay acksbay ethay andissimusgray, asay ethay arinersmay allcay itay, anday ithway owedbay ouldersshay, aggersstay offay ithway itay asay ifay ehay ereway aay enadiergray arryingcay aay eadday omradecay omfray ethay ieldfay. Extendingay itay uponay ethay orecastlefay eckday, ehay ownay oceedspray indricallycylay otay emoveray itsay arkday eltpay, asay anay Africanay unterhay ethay eltpay ofay aay oabay. Isthay oneday ehay urnstay ethay eltpay insideay outay, ikelay aay antaloonpay eglay; ivesgay itay aay oodgay etchingstray, osay asay almostay otay oubleday itsay iameterday; anday atay astlay angshay itay, ellway eadspray, inay ethay iggingray, otay dryay. Ereay onglay, itay isay akentay ownday; enwhay emovingray omesay eethray eetfay ofay itay, owardstay ethay ointedpay extremityay, anday enthay uttingcay otway itsslay orfay arm-holesay atay ethay otheray enday, ehay engthwiselay ipsslay imselfhay odilybay intoay itay. Ethay incermay ownay andsstay eforebay ouyay investeday inay ethay ullfay anonicalscay ofay ishay allingcay. Immemorialay otay allay ishay orderay, isthay investitureay aloneay illway adequatelyay otectpray imhay, ilewhay employeday inay ethay eculiarpay unctionsfay ofay ishay officeay. 

Atthay officeay onsistscay inay incingmay ethay orse-pieceshay ofay ubberblay orfay ethay otspay; anay operationay ichwhay isay onductedcay atay aay uriouscay oodenway orsehay, antedplay endwiseay againstay ethay ulwarksbay, anday ithway aay apaciouscay ubtay eneathbay itay, intoay ichwhay ethay incedmay iecespay opdray, astfay asay ethay eetsshay omfray aay aptray orator’say eskday. Arrayeday inay ecentday ackblay; occupyingay aay onspicuouscay ulpitpay; intentay onay iblebay eaveslay; atwhay aay andidatecay orfay anay archbishopricay, atwhay aay adlay orfay aay Opepay ereway isthay incermay!* 

ible*Bay eaveslay! Iblebay eaveslay! Isthay isay ethay invariableay cryay omfray ethay atesmay otay ethay incermay. Itay enjoinsay imhay otay ebay arefulcay, anday utcay ishay orkway intoay asay inthay icesslay asay ossiblepay, inasmuchay asay byay osay oingday ethay usinessbay ofay oilingbay outay ethay oilay isay uchmay accelerateday, anday itsay uantityqay onsiderablycay increaseday, esidesbay erhapspay improvingay itay inay ualityqay. 



APTERCHAY 96ay. Ethay Orkstry-way. 

Esidesbay erhay oistedhay oatsbay, anay Americanay alerwhay isay outwardlyay istinguishedday byay erhay orkstry-way. Eshay esentspray ethay uriouscay anomalyay ofay ethay ostmay olidsay asonrymay oiningjay ithway oakay anday emphay inay onstitutingcay ethay ompletedcay ipshay. Itay isay asay ifay omfray ethay openay ieldfay aay ick-kilnbray ereway ansportedtray otay erhay anksplay. 

Ethay orkstry-way areay antedplay etweenbay ethay oremastfay anday ainmastmay, ethay ostmay oomyray artpay ofay ethay eckday. Ethay imberstay eneathbay areay ofay aay eculiarpay engthstray, ittedfay otay ustainsay ethay eightway ofay anay almostay olidsay assmay ofay ickbray anday ortarmay, omesay entay eetfay byay eightay uaresqay, anday ivefay inay eighthay. Ethay oundationfay oesday otnay enetratepay ethay eckday, utbay ethay asonrymay isay irmlyfay ecuredsay otay ethay urfacesay byay onderouspay eesknay ofay ironay acingbray itay onay allay idessay, anday ewingscray itay ownday otay ethay imberstay. Onay ethay anksflay itay isay asedcay ithway oodway, anday atay optay ompletelycay overedcay byay aay argelay, opingslay, attenedbay atchwayhay. Emovingray isthay atchhay eway exposeay ethay eatgray otstry-pay, otway inay umbernay, anday eachay ofay everalsay arrels’bay apacitycay. Enwhay otnay inay useay, eythay areay eptkay emarkablyray eanclay. Ometimessay eythay areay olishedpay ithway oapstonesay anday andsay, illtay eythay ineshay ithinway ikelay ilversay unch-bowlspay. Uringday ethay ight-watchesnay omesay icalcynay olday ailorssay illway awlcray intoay emthay anday oilcay emselvesthay awayay erethay orfay aay apnay. Ilewhay employeday inay olishingpay em—onethay anmay inay eachay otpay, idesay byay ide—manysay onfidentialcay ommunicationscay areay arriedcay onay, overay ethay ironay ipslay. Itay isay aay aceplay alsoay orfay ofoundpray athematicalmay editationmay. Itay asway inay ethay eftlay andhay ottry-pay ofay ethay Equodpay, ithway ethay oapstonesay iligentlyday irclingcay oundray emay, atthay IAY asway irstfay indirectlyay uckstray byay ethay emarkableray actfay, atthay inay eometrygay allay odiesbay idingglay alongay ethay oidcyclay, myay oapstonesay orfay exampleay, illway escendday omfray anyay ointpay inay eciselypray ethay amesay imetay. 

Emovingray ethay ire-boardfay omfray ethay ontfray ofay ethay orkstry-way, ethay arebay asonrymay ofay atthay idesay isay exposeday, enetratedpay byay ethay otway ironay outhsmay ofay ethay urnacesfay, irectlyday underneathay ethay otspay. Esethay outhsmay areay ittedfay ithway eavyhay oorsday ofay ironay. Ethay intenseay eathay ofay ethay irefay isay eventedpray omfray ommunicatingcay itselfay otay ethay eckday, byay eansmay ofay aay allowshay eservoirray extendingay underay ethay entireay incloseday urfacesay ofay ethay orksway. Byay aay unneltay inserteday atay ethay earray, isthay eservoirray isay eptkay eplenishedray ithway aterway asay astfay asay itay evaporatesay. Erethay areay onay externalay imneyschay; eythay openay irectday omfray ethay earray allway. Anday erehay etlay usay ogay ackbay orfay aay omentmay. 

Itay asway aboutay inenay o’clockay atay ightnay atthay ethay Equod’spay orkstry-way ereway irstfay artedstay onay isthay esentpray oyagevay. Itay elongedbay otay Ubbstay otay overseeay ethay usinessbay. 

All“ay eadyray erethay? Offay atchhay, enthay, anday artstay erhay. Ouyay ookcay, irefay ethay orks.”way Isthay asway anay easyay ingthay, orfay ethay arpentercay adhay eenbay ustingthray ishay avingsshay intoay ethay urnacefay oughoutthray ethay assagepay. Erehay ebay itay aidsay atthay inay aay alingwhay oyagevay ethay irstfay irefay inay ethay orkstry-way ashay otay ebay edfay orfay aay imetay ithway oodway. Afteray atthay onay oodway isay useday, exceptay asay aay eansmay ofay uickqay ignitionay otay ethay aplestay uelfay. Inay aay ordway, afteray eingbay iedtray outay, ethay ispcray, ivelledshray ubberblay, ownay alledcay apsscray oray ittersfray, illstay ontainscay onsiderablecay ofay itsay unctuousay opertiespray. Esethay ittersfray eedfay ethay amesflay. Ikelay aay ethoricplay urningbay artyrmay, oray aay elf-consumingsay isanthropemay, onceay igniteday, ethay alewhay uppliessay ishay ownay uelfay anday urnsbay byay ishay ownay odybay. Ouldway atthay ehay onsumedcay ishay ownay okesmay! orfay ishay okesmay isay orriblehay otay inhaleay, anday inhaleay itay ouyay ustmay, anday otnay onlyay atthay, utbay ouyay ustmay ivelay inay itay orfay ethay imetay. Itay ashay anay unspeakableay, ildway, Indoohay odoray aboutay itay, uchsay asay aymay urklay inay ethay icinityvay ofay unerealfay espyray. Itay ellssmay ikelay ethay eftlay ingway ofay ethay ayday ofay udgmentjay; itay isay anay argumentay orfay ethay itpay. 

Byay idnightmay ethay orksway ereway inay ullfay operationay. Eway ereway earclay omfray ethay arcasecay; ailsay adhay eenbay ademay; ethay indway asway esheningfray; ethay ildway oceanay arknessday asway intenseay. Utbay atthay arknessday asway ickedlay upay byay ethay iercefay amesflay, ichwhay atay intervalsay orkedfay orthfay omfray ethay ootysay uesflay, anday illuminateday everyay oftylay operay inay ethay iggingray, asay ithway ethay amedfay Eekgray irefay. Ethay urningbay ipshay ovedray onay, asay ifay emorselesslyray ommissionedcay otay omesay engefulvay eedday. Osay ethay itchpay anday ulphur-freightedsay igsbray ofay ethay oldbay Iotehydray, Anariscay, issuingay omfray eirthay idnightmay arborshay, ithway oadbray eetsshay ofay ameflay orfay ailssay, orebay ownday uponay ethay Urkishtay igatesfray, anday oldedfay emthay inay onflagrationscay. 

Ethay atchhay, emovedray omfray ethay optay ofay ethay orksway, ownay affordeday aay ideway earthhay inay ontfray ofay emthay. Andingstay onay isthay ereway ethay Artareantay apesshay ofay ethay aganpay arpooneershay, alwaysay ethay ale-ship’swhay okersstay. Ithway ugehay ongedpray olespay eythay itchedpay issinghay assesmay ofay ubberblay intoay ethay aldingscay otspay, oray irredstay upay ethay iresfay eneathbay, illtay ethay akysnay amesflay artedday, urlingcay, outay ofay ethay oorsday otay atchcay emthay byay ethay eetfay. Ethay okesmay olledray awayay inay ullensay eapshay. Otay everyay itchpay ofay ethay ipshay erethay asway aay itchpay ofay ethay oilingbay oilay, ichwhay eemedsay allay eagernessay otay eaplay intoay eirthay acesfay. Oppositeay ethay outhmay ofay ethay orksway, onay ethay urtherfay idesay ofay ethay ideway oodenway earthhay, asway ethay indlassway. Isthay ervedsay orfay aay ea-sofasay. Erehay oungedlay ethay atchway, enwhay otnay otherwiseay employeday, ookinglay intoay ethay edray eathay ofay ethay irefay, illtay eirthay eyesay eltfay orchedscay inay eirthay eadshay. Eirthay awnytay eaturesfay, ownay allay egrimedbay ithway okesmay anday eatsway, eirthay attedmay eardsbay, anday ethay ontrastingcay arbaricbay illiancybray ofay eirthay eethtay, allay esethay ereway angelystray evealedray inay ethay apriciouscay emblazoningsay ofay ethay orksway. Asay eythay arratednay otay eachay otheray eirthay unholyay adventuresay, eirthay alestay ofay errortay oldtay inay ordsway ofay irthmay; asay eirthay uncivilizeday aughterlay orkedfay upwardsay outay ofay emthay, ikelay ethay amesflay omfray ethay urnacefay; asay otay anday ofray, inay eirthay ontfray, ethay arpooneershay ildlyway esticulatedgay ithway eirthay ugehay ongedpray orksfay anday ippersday; asay ethay indway owledhay onay, anday ethay easay eapedlay, anday ethay ipshay oanedgray anday ivedday, anday etyay eadfastlystay otshay erhay edray ellhay urtherfay anday urtherfay intoay ethay acknessblay ofay ethay easay anday ethay ightnay, anday ornfullyscay ampedchay ethay itewhay onebay inay erhay outhmay, anday iciouslyvay atspay oundray erhay onay allay idessay; enthay ethay ushingray Equodpay, eightedfray ithway avagessay, anday adenlay ithway irefay, anday urningbay aay orpsecay, anday ungingplay intoay atthay acknessblay ofay arknessday, eemedsay ethay aterialmay ounterpartcay ofay erhay onomaniacmay ommander’scay oulsay. 

Osay eemedsay itay otay emay, asay IAY oodstay atay erhay elmhay, anday orfay onglay ourshay ilentlysay uidedgay ethay ayway ofay isthay ire-shipfay onay ethay easay. Appedwray, orfay atthay intervalay, inay arknessday elfmysay, IAY utbay ethay etterbay awsay ethay ednessray, ethay adnessmay, ethay astlinessghay ofay othersay. Ethay ontinualcay ightsay ofay ethay iendfay apesshay eforebay emay, aperingcay alfhay inay okesmay anday alfhay inay irefay, esethay atay astlay egatbay indredkay isionsvay inay myay oulsay, osay oonsay asay IAY eganbay otay ieldyay otay atthay unaccountableay owsinessdray ichwhay everay ouldway omecay overay emay atay aay idnightmay elmhay. 

Utbay atthay ightnay, inay articularpay, aay angestray and(ay everay incesay inexplicableay) ingthay occurreday otay emay. Artingstay omfray aay iefbray andingstay eepslay, IAY asway orriblyhay onsciouscay ofay omethingsay atallyfay ongwray. Ethay aw-bonejay illertay otesmay myay idesay, ichwhay eanedlay againstay itay; inay myay earsay asway ethay owlay umhay ofay ailssay, ustjay eginningbay otay akeshay inay ethay indway; IAY oughtthay myay eyesay ereway openay; IAY asway alfhay onsciouscay ofay uttingpay myay ingersfay otay ethay idslay anday echanicallymay etchingstray emthay illstay urtherfay apartay. Utbay, itespay ofay allay isthay, IAY ouldcay eesay onay ompasscay eforebay emay otay eerstay byay; oughthay itay eemedsay utbay aay inutemay incesay IAY adhay eenbay atchingway ethay ardcay, byay ethay eadystay innaclebay amplay illuminatingay itay. Othingnay eemedsay eforebay emay utbay aay etjay oomglay, ownay anday enthay ademay astlyghay byay ashesflay ofay ednessray. Uppermostay asway ethay impressionay, atthay ateverwhay iftsway, ushingray ingthay IAY oodstay onay asway otnay osay uchmay oundbay otay anyay avenhay aheaday asay ushingray omfray allay avenshay asternay. AAY arkstay, ewilderedbay eelingfay, asay ofay eathday, amecay overay emay. Onvulsivelycay myay andshay aspedgray ethay illertay, utbay ithway ethay azycray onceitcay atthay ethay illertay asway, omehowsay, inay omesay enchanteday ayway, inverteday. Myay Odgay! atwhay isay ethay attermay ithway emay? oughtthay IAY. Olay! inay myay iefbray eepslay IAY adhay urnedtay elfmysay aboutay, anday asway ontingfray ethay ip’sshay ernstay, ithway myay ackbay otay erhay owpray anday ethay ompasscay. Inay anay instantay IAY acedfay ackbay, ustjay inay imetay otay eventpray ethay esselvay omfray ingflyay upay intoay ethay indway, anday eryvay obablypray apsizingcay erhay. Owhay adglay anday owhay atefulgray ethay eliefray omfray isthay unnaturalay allucinationhay ofay ethay ightnay, anday ethay atalfay ontingencycay ofay eingbay oughtbray byay ethay eelay! 

Ooklay otnay ootay onglay inay ethay acefay ofay ethay irefay, OAY anmay! Evernay eamdray ithway thyay andhay onay ethay elmhay! Urntay otnay thyay ackbay otay ethay ompasscay; acceptay ethay irstfay inthay ofay ethay itchinghay illertay; elievebay otnay ethay artificialay irefay, enwhay itsay ednessray akesmay allay ingsthay ooklay astlyghay. O-morrowtay, inay ethay aturalnay unsay, ethay iesskay illway ebay ightbray; osethay owhay aredglay ikelay evilsday inay ethay orkingfay amesflay, ethay ornmay illway owshay inay arfay otheray, atay eastlay entlergay, eliefray; ethay oriousglay, oldengay, adglay unsay, ethay onlyay uetray amp—alllay othersay utbay iarslay! 

Everthelessnay ethay unsay ideshay otnay Irginia’svay Ismalday Ampsway, ornay Ome’sray accurseday Ampagnacay, ornay ideway Aharasay, ornay allay ethay illionsmay ofay ilesmay ofay esertsday anday ofay iefsgray eneathbay ethay oonmay. Ethay unsay ideshay otnay ethay oceanay, ichwhay isay ethay arkday idesay ofay isthay earthay, anday ichwhay isay otway irdsthay ofay isthay earthay. Osay, ereforethay, atthay ortalmay anmay owhay athhay oremay ofay oyjay anthay orrowsay inay imhay, atthay ortalmay anmay annotcay ebay ue—nottray uetray, oray undevelopeday. Ithway ooksbay ethay amesay. Ethay uesttray ofay allay enmay asway ethay Anmay ofay Orrowssay, anday ethay uesttray ofay allay ooksbay isay Olomon’ssay, anday Ecclesiastesay isay ethay inefay ammeredhay eelstay ofay oeway. All“ay isay anity.”vay ALLAY. Isthay ilfulway orldway athhay otnay otgay oldhay ofay unchristianay Olomon’ssay isdomway etyay. Utbay ehay owhay odgesday ospitalshay anday ailsjay, anday alksway astfay ossingcray aveyardsgray, anday ouldway atherray alktay ofay operasay anthay ellhay; allscay Owpercay, Oungyay, Ascalpay, Ousseauray, oorpay evilsday allay ofay icksay enmay; anday oughoutthray aay are-freecay ifetimelay earssway byay Abelaisray asay assingpay iseway, anday ereforethay olly;—notjay atthay anmay isay ittedfay otay itsay ownday onay omb-stonestay, anday eakbray ethay eengray ampday ouldmay ithway unfathomablyay ondrousway Olomonsay. 

Utbay evenay Olomonsay, ehay ayssay, e“thay anmay atthay anderethway outay ofay ethay ayway ofay understandingay allshay emain”ray i.e(_ay.,_ evenay ilewhay ivinglay) in“ay ethay ongregationcay ofay ethay ead.”day Ivegay otnay elfthysay upay, enthay, otay irefay, estlay itay invertay eethay, eadenday eethay; asay orfay ethay imetay itay idday emay. Erethay isay aay isdomway atthay isay oeway; utbay erethay isay aay oeway atthay isay adnessmay. Anday erethay isay aay Atskillcay eagleay inay omesay oulssay atthay ancay alikeay iveday ownday intoay ethay ackestblay orgesgay, anday oarsay outay ofay emthay againay anday ecomebay invisibleay inay ethay unnysay acesspay. Anday evenay ifay ehay orfay everay iesflay ithinway ethay orgegay, atthay orgegay isay inay ethay ountainsmay; osay atthay evenay inay ishay owestlay oopsway ethay ountainmay eagleay isay illstay igherhay anthay otheray irdsbay uponay ethay ainplay, evenay oughthay eythay oarsay. 



APTERCHAY 97ay. Ethay Amplay. 

Adhay ouyay escendedday omfray ethay Equod’spay orkstry-way otay ethay Equod’spay orecastlefay, erewhay ethay offay utyday atchway ereway eepingslay, orfay oneay inglesay omentmay ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay ouyay ereway andingstay inay omesay illuminateday ineshray ofay anonizedcay ingskay anday ounsellorscay. Erethay eythay aylay inay eirthay iangulartray oakenay aultsvay, eachay arinermay aay iselledchay utenessmay; aay orescay ofay ampslay ashingflay uponay ishay oodedhay eyesay. 

Inay erchantmenmay, oilay orfay ethay ailorsay isay oremay arcescay anthay ethay ilkmay ofay ueensqay. Otay essdray inay ethay arkday, anday eatay inay ethay arkday, anday umblestay inay arknessday otay ishay alletpay, isthay isay ishay usualay otlay. Utbay ethay alemanwhay, asay ehay eekssay ethay oodfay ofay ightlay, osay ehay iveslay inay ightlay. Ehay akesmay ishay erthbay anay Aladdin’say amplay, anday ayslay imhay ownday inay itay; osay atthay inay ethay itchiestpay ightnay ethay ip’sshay ackblay ullhay illstay ouseshay anay illuminationay. 

Eesay ithway atwhay entireay eedomfray ethay alemanwhay akestay ishay andfulhay ofay amps—oftenlay utbay olday ottlesbay anday ialsvay, ough—tothay ethay oppercay oolercay atay ethay orkstry-way, anday eplenishesray emthay erethay, asay ugsmay ofay aleay atay aay atvay. Ehay urnsbay, ootay, ethay urestpay ofay oilay, inay itsay unmanufactureday, anday, ereforethay, unvitiateday atestay; aay uidflay unknownay otay olarsay, unarlay, oray astralay ontrivancescay ashoreay. Itay isay eetsway asay earlyay assgray utterbay inay Aprilay. Ehay oesgay anday untshay orfay ishay oilay, osay asay otay ebay uresay ofay itsay eshnessfray anday enuinenessgay, evenay asay ethay avellertray onay ethay airiepray untshay upay ishay ownay uppersay ofay amegay. 



APTERCHAY 98ay. Owingstay Ownday anday Earingclay Upay. 

Alreadyay ashay itay eenbay elatedray owhay ethay eatgray eviathanlay isay afaray offay escriedday omfray ethay ast-headmay; owhay ehay isay asedchay overay ethay ateryway oorsmay, anday aughteredslay inay ethay alleysvay ofay ethay eepday; owhay ehay isay enthay owedtay alongsideay anday eheadedbay; anday owhay on(ay ethay inciplepray ichwhay entitleday ethay eadsmanhay ofay olday otay ethay armentsgay inay ichwhay ethay eheadedbay asway illedkay) ishay eatgray addedpay urtoutsay ecomesbay ethay opertypray ofay ishay executioneray; owhay, inay ueday imetay, ehay isay ondemnedcay otay ethay otspay, anday, ikelay Adrachshay, Eshachmay, anday Abednegoay, ishay ermacetispay, oilay, anday onebay asspay unscatheday oughthray ethay ire;—butfay ownay itay emainsray otay oncludecay ethay astlay apterchay ofay isthay artpay ofay ethay escriptionday byay ehearsing—singingray, ifay IAY ay—themay omanticray oceedingpray ofay ecantingday offay ishay oilay intoay ethay askscay anday ikingstray emthay ownday intoay ethay oldhay, erewhay onceay againay eviathanlay eturnsray otay ishay ativenay ofunditiespray, idingslay alongay eneathbay ethay urfacesay asay eforebay; utbay, alasay! evernay oremay otay iseray anday owblay. 

Ilewhay illstay armway, ethay oilay, ikelay othay unchpay, isay eceivedray intoay ethay ix-barrelsay askscay; anday ilewhay, erhapspay, ethay ipshay isay itchingpay anday ollingray isthay ayway anday atthay inay ethay idnightmay easay, ethay enormousay askscay areay ewedslay oundray anday eadedhay overay, enday orfay enday, anday ometimessay erilouslypay ootscay acrossay ethay ipperyslay eckday, ikelay osay anymay andlay idesslay, illtay atay astlay an-handledmay anday ayedstay inay eirthay oursecay; anday allay oundray ethay oopshay, apray, apray, ogay asay anymay ammershay asay ancay ayplay uponay emthay, orfay ownay, ex_ay officioay_, everyay ailorsay isay aay oopercay. 

Atay engthlay, enwhay ethay astlay intpay isay askedcay, anday allay isay oolcay, enthay ethay eatgray atchwayshay areay unsealeday, ethay owelsbay ofay ethay ipshay areay ownthray openay, anday ownday ogay ethay askscay otay eirthay inalfay estray inay ethay easay. Isthay oneday, ethay atcheshay areay eplacedray, anday ermeticallyhay osedclay, ikelay aay osetclay alledway upay. 

Inay ethay ermspay isheryfay, isthay isay erhapspay oneay ofay ethay ostmay emarkableray incidentsay inay allay ethay usinessbay ofay alingwhay. Oneay ayday ethay anksplay eamstray ithway eshetsfray ofay oodblay anday oilay; onay ethay acredsay uarter-deckqay enormousay assesmay ofay ethay ale’swhay eadhay areay ofanelypray iledpay; eatgray ustyray askscay ielay aboutay, asay inay aay ewerybray ardyay; ethay okesmay omfray ethay orkstry-way ashay esootedbay allay ethay ulwarksbay; ethay arinersmay ogay aboutay uffusedsay ithway unctuousnessay; ethay entireay ipshay eemssay eatgray eviathanlay imselfhay; ilewhay onay allay andshay ethay inday isay eafeningday. 

Utbay aay ayday oray otway afteray, ouyay ooklay aboutay ouyay, anday ickpray ouryay earsay inay isthay elf-samesay ipshay; anday ereway itay otnay orfay ethay ell-taletay oatsbay anday orkstry-way, ouyay ouldway allay utbay earsway ouyay odtray omesay ilentsay erchantmay esselvay, ithway aay ostmay upulouslyscray eatnay ommandercay. Ethay unmanufactureday ermspay oilay ossessespay aay ingularlysay eansingclay irtuevay. Isthay isay ethay easonray whyay ethay ecksday evernay ooklay osay itewhay asay ustjay afteray atwhay eythay allcay anay affairay ofay oilay. Esidesbay, omfray ethay ashesay ofay ethay urnedbay apsscray ofay ethay alewhay, aay otentpay elyay isay eadilyray ademay; anday eneverwhay anyay adhesivenessay omfray ethay ackbay ofay ethay alewhay emainsray ingingclay otay ethay idesay, atthay elyay uicklyqay exterminatesay itay. Andshay ogay iligentlyday alongay ethay ulwarksbay, anday ithway ucketsbay ofay aterway anday agsray estoreray emthay otay eirthay ullfay idinesstay. Ethay ootsay isay ushedbray omfray ethay owerlay iggingray. Allay ethay umerousnay implementsay ichwhay avehay eenbay inay useay areay ikewiselay aithfullyfay eansedclay anday utpay awayay. Ethay eatgray atchhay isay ubbedscray anday acedplay uponay ethay orkstry-way, ompletelycay idinghay ethay otspay; everyay askcay isay outay ofay ightsay; allay acklestay areay oiledcay inay unseenay ooksnay; anday enwhay byay ethay ombinedcay anday imultaneoussay industryay ofay almostay ethay entireay ip’sshay ompanycay, ethay olewhay ofay isthay onscientiouscay utyday isay atay astlay oncludedcay, enthay ethay ewcray emselvesthay oceedpray otay eirthay ownay ablutionsay; iftshay emselvesthay omfray optay otay oetay; anday inallyfay issueay otay ethay immaculateay eckday, eshfray anday allay agloway, asay idegroomsbray ew-leapednay omfray outay ethay aintiestday Ollandhay. 

Ownay, ithway elateday epstay, eythay acepay ethay anksplay inay ostway anday eesthray, anday umorouslyhay iscourseday ofay arlorspay, ofassay, arpetscay, anday inefay ambricscay; oposepray otay atmay ethay eckday; inkthay ofay avinghay anginghay otay ethay optay; objectay otnay otay akingtay eatay byay oonlightmay onay ethay iazzapay ofay ethay orecastlefay. Otay inthay otay uchsay uskedmay arinersmay ofay oilay, anday onebay, anday ubberblay, ereway ittlelay ortshay ofay audacityay. Eythay owknay otnay ethay ingthay ouyay istantlyday alludeay otay. Awayay, anday ingbray usay apkinsnay! 

Utbay arkmay: aloftay erethay, atay ethay eethray astmay eadshay, andstay eethray enmay intentay onay ingspyay outay oremay aleswhay, ichwhay, ifay aughtcay, infalliblyay illway againay oilsay ethay olday oakenay urniturefay, anday opdray atay eastlay oneay allsmay ease-spotgray omewheresay. Esyay; anday anymay isay ethay imetay, enwhay, afteray ethay everestsay uninterrupteday aborslay, ichwhay owknay onay ightnay; ontinuingcay aightstray oughthray orfay inety-sixnay ourshay; enwhay omfray ethay oatbay, erewhay eythay avehay elledsway eirthay istswray ithway allay ayday owingray onay ethay Ine,—theylay onlyay epstay otay ethay eckday otay arrycay astvay ainschay, anday eavehay ethay eavyhay indlassway, anday utcay anday ashslay, eayay, anday inay eirthay eryvay eatingssway otay ebay okedsmay anday urnedbay aneway byay ethay ombinedcay iresfay ofay ethay equatorialay unsay anday ethay equatorialay orkstry-way; enwhay, onay ethay eelhay ofay allay isthay, eythay avehay inallyfay estirredbay emselvesthay otay eanseclay ethay ipshay, anday akemay aay otlessspay airyday oomray ofay itay; anymay isay ethay imetay ethay oorpay ellowsfay, ustjay uttoningbay ethay ecksnay ofay eirthay eanclay ocksfray, areay artledstay byay ethay cryay ofay ere“Thay eshay ows!”blay anday awayay eythay flyay otay ightfay anotheray alewhay, anday ogay oughthray ethay olewhay earyway ingthay againay. Ohay! myay iendsfray, utbay isthay isay an-killingmay! Etyay isthay isay ifelay. Orfay ardlyhay avehay eway ortalsmay byay onglay oilingstay extracteday omfray isthay orld’sway astvay ulkbay itsay allsmay utbay aluablevay ermspay; anday enthay, ithway earyway atiencepay, eansedclay ourselvesay omfray itsay efilementsday, anday earnedlay otay ivelay erehay inay eanclay abernaclestay ofay ethay oulsay; ardlyhay isay isthay oneday, en—_Therewhay eshay ows!_—theblay ostghay isay outedspay upay, anday awayay eway ailsay otay ightfay omesay otheray orldway, anday ogay oughthray oungyay ife’slay olday outineray againay. 

Ohay! ethay etempsychosismay! Ohay! Agoraspythay, atthay inay ightbray Eecegray, otway ousandthay earsyay agoay, idday ieday, osay oodgay, osay iseway, osay ildmay; IAY ailedsay ithway eethay alongay ethay Eruvianpay oastcay astlay oyage—andvay, oolishfay asay IAY amay, aughttay eethay, aay eengray implesay oybay, owhay otay icesplay aay operay! 



APTERCHAY 99ay. Ethay Oubloonday. 

Ereay ownay itay ashay eenbay elatedray owhay Ahabay asway ontway otay acepay ishay uarter-deckqay, akingtay egularray urnstay atay eitheray imitlay, ethay innaclebay anday ainmastmay; utbay inay ethay ultiplicitymay ofay otheray ingsthay equiringray arrationnay itay ashay otnay eenbay addeday owhay atthay ometimessay inay esethay alksway, enwhay ostmay ungedplay inay ishay oodmay, ehay asway ontway otay ausepay inay urntay atay eachay otspay, anday andstay erethay angelystray eyeingay ethay articularpay objectay eforebay imhay. Enwhay ehay altedhay eforebay ethay innaclebay, ithway ishay anceglay astenedfay onay ethay ointedpay eedlenay inay ethay ompasscay, atthay anceglay otshay ikelay aay avelinjay ithway ethay ointedpay intensityay ofay ishay urposepay; anday enwhay esumingray ishay alkway ehay againay ausedpay eforebay ethay ainmastmay, enthay, asay ethay amesay ivetedray anceglay astenedfay uponay ethay ivetedray oldgay oincay erethay, ehay illstay oreway ethay amesay aspectay ofay ailednay irmnessfay, onlyay ashedday ithway aay ertaincay ildway onginglay, ifay otnay opefulnesshay. 

Utbay oneay orningmay, urningtay otay asspay ethay oubloonday, ehay eemedsay otay ebay ewlynay attracteday byay ethay angestray iguresfay anday inscriptionsay ampedstay onay itay, asay oughthay ownay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eginningbay otay interpretay orfay imselfhay inay omesay onomaniacmay ayway ateverwhay ignificancesay ightmay urklay inay emthay. Anday omesay ertaincay ignificancesay urkslay inay allay ingsthay, elseay allay ingsthay areay ittlelay orthway, anday ethay oundray orldway itselfay utbay anay emptyay iphercay, exceptay otay ellsay byay ethay artloadcay, asay eythay oday illshay aboutay Ostonbay, otay illfay upay omesay orassmay inay ethay Ilkymay Ayway. 

Ownay isthay oubloonday asway ofay urestpay, irginvay oldgay, akedray omewheresay outay ofay ethay earthay ofay orgeousgay illshay, encewhay, eastay anday estway, overay oldengay andssay, ethay ead-watershay ofay anymay aay Actoluspay owsflay. Anday oughthay ownay ailednay amidstay allay ethay ustinessray ofay ironay oltsbay anday ethay erdigrisvay ofay oppercay ikesspay, etyay, untouchableay anday immaculateay otay anyay oulnessfay, itay illstay eservedpray itsay Uitoqay owglay. Ornay, oughthay acedplay amongstay aay uthlessray ewcray anday everyay ourhay assedpay byay uthlessray andshay, anday oughthray ethay ivelonglay ightsnay oudedshray ithway ickthay arknessday ichwhay ightmay overcay anyay ilferingpay approachay, everthelessnay everyay unrisesay oundfay ethay oubloonday erewhay ethay unsetsay eftlay itay astlay. Orfay itay asway etsay apartay anday anctifiedsay otay oneay awe-strikingay enday; anday oweverhay antonway inay eirthay ailorsay aysway, oneay anday allay, ethay arinersmay everedray itay asay ethay itewhay ale’swhay alismantay. Ometimessay eythay alkedtay itay overay inay ethay earyway atchway byay ightnay, onderingway osewhay itay asway otay ebay atay astlay, anday etherwhay ehay ouldway everay ivelay otay endspay itay. 

Ownay osethay oblenay oldengay oinscay ofay Outhsay Americaay areay asay edalsmay ofay ethay unsay anday opictray oken-piecestay. Erehay almspay, alpacasay, anday olcanoesvay; un’ssay isksday anday arsstay; eclipticsay, orns-of-plentyhay, anday ichray annersbay avingway, areay inay uxuriantlay ofusionpray ampedstay; osay atthay ethay eciouspray oldgay eemssay almostay otay eriveday anay addeday eciousnesspray anday enhancingay oriesglay, byay assingpay oughthray osethay ancyfay intsmay, osay Anishlyspay oeticpay. 

Itay osay ancedchay atthay ethay oubloonday ofay ethay Equodpay asway aay ostmay ealthyway exampleay ofay esethay ingsthay. Onay itsay oundray orderbay itay orebay ethay etterslay, EPUBLICARAY ELDAY ECUADORAY: UITOQAY. Osay isthay ightbray oincay amecay omfray aay ountrycay antedplay inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay orldway, anday eneathbay ethay eatgray equatoray, anday amednay afteray itay; anday itay adhay eenbay astcay idwaymay upay ethay Andesay, inay ethay unwaningay imeclay atthay owsknay onay autumnay. Onedzay byay osethay etterslay ouyay awsay ethay ikenesslay ofay eethray Andes’ay ummitssay; omfray oneay aay ameflay; aay owertay onay anotheray; onay ethay irdthay aay owingcray ockcay; ilewhay archingay overay allay asway aay egmentsay ofay ethay artitionedpay odiaczay, ethay ignssay allay arkedmay ithway eirthay usualay abalisticscay, anday ethay eystonekay unsay enteringay ethay equinoctialay ointpay atay Ibralay. 

Eforebay isthay equatorialay oincay, Ahabay, otnay unobserveday byay othersay, asway ownay ausingpay. 

ere’s“Thay omethingsay everay egotisticalay inay ountain-topsmay anday owerstay, anday allay otheray andgray anday oftylay ingsthay; ooklay ere,—threehay eakspay asay oudpray asay Uciferlay. Ethay irmfay owertay, atthay isay Ahabay; ethay olcanovay, atthay isay Ahabay; ethay ourageouscay, ethay undaunteday, anday ictoriousvay owlfay, atthay, ootay, isay Ahabay; allay areay Ahabay; anday isthay oundray oldgay isay utbay ethay imageay ofay ethay ounderray obeglay, ichwhay, ikelay aay agician’smay assglay, otay eachay anday everyay anmay inay urntay utbay irrorsmay ackbay ishay ownay eriousmystay elfsay. Eatgray ainspay, allsmay ainsgay orfay osethay owhay askay ethay orldway otay olvesay emthay; itay annotcay olvesay itselfay. Ethinksmay ownay isthay oinedcay unsay earsway aay uddyray acefay; utbay eesay! ayeay, ehay entersay ethay ignsay ofay ormsstay, ethay equinoxay! anday utbay ixsay onthsmay eforebay ehay eeledwhay outay ofay aay ormerfay equinoxay atay Ariesay! Omfray ormstay otay ormstay! Osay ebay itay, enthay. Ornbay inay oesthray, is’tay itfay atthay anmay ouldshay ivelay inay ainspay anday ieday inay angspay! Osay ebay itay, enthay! Ere’shay outstay uffstay orfay oeway otay orkway onay. Osay ebay itay, en.”thay 

o“Nay airyfay ingersfay ancay avehay essedpray ethay oldgay, utbay evil’sday awsclay ustmay avehay eftlay eirthay ouldingsmay erethay incesay esterday,”yay urmuredmay Arbuckstay otay imselfhay, eaninglay againstay ethay ulwarksbay. e“Thay olday anmay eemssay otay eadray Elshazzar’sbay awfulay itingwray. IAY avehay evernay arkedmay ethay oincay inspectinglyay. Ehay oesgay elowbay; etlay emay eadray. AAY arkday alleyvay etweenbay eethray ightymay, eaven-abidinghay eakspay, atthay almostay eemsay ethay Initytray, inay omesay aintfay earthlyay olsymbay. Osay inay isthay alevay ofay Eathday, Odgay irdsgay usay oundray; anday overay allay ouray oomglay, ethay unsay ofay Ighteousnessray illstay inesshay aay eaconbay anday aay opehay. Ifay eway endbay ownday ouray eyesay, ethay arkday alevay owsshay erhay ouldymay oilsay; utbay ifay eway iftlay emthay, ethay ightbray unsay eetsmay ouray anceglay alfhay ayway, otay eerchay. Etyay, ohay, ethay eatgray unsay isay onay ixturefay; anday ifay, atay idnightmay, eway ouldway ainfay atchsnay omesay eetsway olacesay omfray imhay, eway azegay orfay imhay inay ainvay! Isthay oincay eaksspay iselyway, ildlymay, ulytray, utbay illstay adlysay otay emay. IAY illway uitqay itay, estlay Uthtray akeshay emay alsely.”fay 

ere“Thay ow’snay ethay olday Ogul,”may oliloquizedsay Ubbstay byay ethay orkstry-way, e’s“hay eenbay iggingtway itay; anday erethay oesgay Arbuckstay omfray ethay amesay, anday othbay ithway acesfay ichwhay IAY ouldshay aysay ightmay ebay omewheresay ithinway inenay athomsfay onglay. Anday allay omfray ookinglay atay aay iecepay ofay oldgay, ichwhay idday IAY avehay itay ownay onay Egronay Illhay oray inay Orlaer’scay Ookhay, I’day otnay ooklay atay itay eryvay onglay ereay endingspay itay. Umphhay! inay myay oorpay, insignificantay opinionay, IAY egardray isthay asay ueerqay. IAY avehay eensay oubloonsday eforebay ownay inay myay oyagingsvay; ouryay oubloonsday ofay olday Ainspay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Erupay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Ilichay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Oliviabay, ouryay oubloonsday ofay Opayanpay; ithway entyplay ofay oldgay oidoresmay anday istolespay, anday oesjay, anday alfhay oesjay, anday uarterqay oesjay. Atwhay enthay ouldshay erethay ebay inay isthay oubloonday ofay ethay Equatoray atthay isay osay illingkay onderfulway? Byay Olcondagay! etlay emay eadray itay onceay. Alloahay! ere’shay ignssay anday ondersway ulytray! Atthay, ownay, isay atwhay olday Owditchbay inay ishay Epitomeay allscay ethay odiaczay, anday atwhay myay almanacay elowbay allscay ittoday. I’llay etgay ethay almanacay anday asay IAY avehay eardhay evilsday ancay ebay aisedray ithway Aboll’sday arithmeticay, I’llay tryay myay andhay atay aisingray aay eaningmay outay ofay esethay ueerqay urvicuescay erehay ithway ethay Assachusettsmay alendarcay. Ere’shay ethay ookbay. Et’slay eesay ownay. Ignssay anday ondersway; anday ethay unsay, e’shay alwaysay amongay em’ay. Emhay, emhay, emhay; erehay eythay are—hereay eythay o—allgay alive:—Ariesay, oray ethay Amray; Aurustay, oray ethay Ullbay anday Imimijay! ere’shay Eminigay imselfhay, oray ethay Instway. Ellway; ethay unsay ehay eelswhay amongay em’ay. Ayeay, erehay onay ethay oincay e’shay ustjay ossingcray ethay esholdthray etweenbay otway ofay elvetway itting-roomssay allay inay aay ingray. Ookbay! ouyay ielay erethay; ethay actfay isay, ouyay ooksbay ustmay owknay ouryay acesplay. Ou’llyay oday otay ivegay usay ethay arebay ordsway anday actsfay, utbay eway omecay inay otay upplysay ethay oughtsthay. At’sthay myay allsmay experienceay, osay arfay asay ethay Assachusettsmay alendarcay, anday Owditch’sbay avigatornay, anday Aboll’sday arithmeticay ogay. Ignssay anday ondersway, ehay? Itypay ifay erethay isay othingnay onderfulway inay ignssay, anday ignificantsay inay ondersway! Ere’sthay aay ueclay omewheresay; aitway aay itbay; ist—harkhay! Byay Ovejay, IAY avehay itay! Ooklay ouyay, Oubloonday, ouryay odiaczay erehay isay ethay ifelay ofay anmay inay oneay oundray apterchay; anday ownay I’llay eadray itay offay, aightstray outay ofay ethay ookbay. Omecay, Almanackay! Otay eginbay: ere’sthay Ariesay, oray ethay Am—lecherousray ogday, ehay egetsbay usay; enthay, Aurustay, oray ethay Ull—hebay umpsbay usay ethay irstfay ingthay; enthay Eminigay, oray ethay Ins—thattway isay, Irtuevay anday Icevay; eway tryay otay eachray Irtuevay, enwhay olay! omescay Ancercay ethay Abcray, anday agsdray usay ackbay; anday erehay, oinggay omfray Irtuevay, Eolay, aay oaringray Ionlay, ieslay inay ethay ath—hepay ivesgay aay ewfay iercefay itesbay anday urlysay absday ithway ishay awpay; eway escapeay, anday ailhay Irgovay, ethay Irginvay! at’sthay ouray irstfay ovelay; eway arrymay anday inkthay otay ebay appyhay orfay ayeay, enwhay oppay omescay Ibralay, oray ethay Ales—happinessscay eighedway anday oundfay antingway; anday ilewhay eway areay eryvay adsay aboutay atthay, Ordlay! owhay eway uddenlysay umpjay, asay Orpioscay, oray ethay Orpionscay, ingsstay usay inay ethay earray; eway areay uringcay ethay oundway, enwhay angwhay omecay ethay arrowsay allay oundray; Agittariussay, oray ethay Archeray, isay amusingay imselfhay. Asay eway uckplay outay ethay aftsshay, andstay asideay! ere’shay ethay attering-rambay, Apricornuscay, oray ethay Oatgay; ullfay ilttay, ehay omescay ushingray, anday eadlonghay eway areay ossedtay; enwhay Aquariusay, oray ethay Ater-bearerway, ourspay outay ishay olewhay elugeday anday ownsdray usay; anday otay indway upay ithway Iscespay, oray ethay Ishesfay, eway eepslay. Ere’sthay aay ermonsay ownay, itwray inay ighhay eavenhay, anday ethay unsay oesgay oughthray itay everyay earyay, anday etyay omescay outay ofay itay allay aliveay anday eartyhay. Ollilyjay ehay, aloftay erethay, eelswhay oughthray oiltay anday oubletray; anday osay, aloway erehay, oesday ollyjay Ubbstay. Ohay, olly’sjay ethay ordway orfay ayeay! Adieuay, Oubloonday! Utbay opstay; erehay omescay ittlelay Ing-postkay; odgeday oundray ethay orkstry-way, ownay, anday et’slay earhay atwhay e’llhay avehay otay aysay. Erethay; e’shay eforebay itay; e’llhay outay ithway omethingsay esentlypray. Osay, osay; e’shay eginning.”bay 

I“AY eesay othingnay erehay, utbay aay oundray ingthay ademay ofay oldgay, anday oeverwhay aisesray aay ertaincay alewhay, isthay oundray ingthay elongsbay otay imhay. Osay, at’swhay allay isthay aringstay eenbay aboutay? Itay isay orthway ixteensay ollarsday, at’sthay uetray; anday atay otway entscay ethay igarcay, at’sthay inenay undredhay anday ixtysay igarscay. IAY on’tway okesmay irtyday ipespay ikelay Ubbstay, utbay IAY ikelay igarscay, anday ere’shay inenay undredhay anday ixtysay ofay emthay; osay erehay oesgay Askflay aloftay otay spyay em’ay out.”ay 

all“Shay IAY allcay atthay iseway oray oolishfay, ownay; ifay itay ebay eallyray iseway itay ashay aay oolishfay ooklay otay itay; etyay, ifay itay ebay eallyray oolishfay, enthay ashay itay aay ortsay ofay iseishway ooklay otay itay. Utbay, avastay; erehay omescay ouray olday Anxman—themay olday earse-driverhay, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay, atthay isay, eforebay ehay ooktay otay ethay easay. Ehay uffslay upay eforebay ethay oubloonday; alloahay, anday oesgay oundray onay ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay astmay; whyay, ere’sthay aay orse-shoehay ailednay onay atthay idesay; anday ownay e’shay ackbay againay; atwhay oesday atthay eanmay? Arkhay! e’shay uttering—voicemay ikelay anay olday orn-outway offee-millcay. Ickpray earsay, anday isten!”lay 

If“ay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ebay aisedray, itay ustmay ebay inay aay onthmay anday aay ayday, enwhay ethay unsay andsstay inay omesay oneay ofay esethay ignssay. I’veay udiedstay ignssay, anday owknay eirthay arksmay; eythay ereway aughttay emay otway orescay earsyay agoay, byay ethay olday itchway inay Openhagencay. Ownay, inay atwhay ignsay illway ethay unsay enthay ebay? Ethay orse-shoehay ignsay; orfay erethay itay isay, ightray oppositeay ethay oldgay. Anday at’swhay ethay orse-shoehay ignsay? Ethay ionlay isay ethay orse-shoehay ign—thesay oaringray anday evouringday ionlay. Ipshay, olday ipshay! myay olday eadhay akesshay otay inkthay ofay ee.”thay 

ere’s“Thay anotheray enderingray ownay; utbay illstay oneay exttay. Allay ortssay ofay enmay inay oneay indkay ofay orldway, ouyay eesay. Odgeday againay! erehay omescay Ueequeg—allqay attooing—lookstay ikelay ethay ignssay ofay ethay Odiaczay imselfhay. Atwhay ayssay ethay Annibalcay? Asay IAY ivelay e’shay omparingcay otesnay; ookinglay atay ishay ighthay onebay; inksthay ethay unsay isay inay ethay ighthay, oray inay ethay alfcay, oray inay ethay owelsbay, IAY upposesay, asay ethay olday omenway alktay Urgeon’ssay Astronomyay inay ethay ackbay ountrycay. Anday byay Ovejay, e’shay oundfay omethingsay erethay inay ethay icinityvay ofay ishay igh—Ithay uessgay it’say Agittariussay, oray ethay Archeray. Onay: ehay on’tday owknay atwhay otay akemay ofay ethay oubloonday; ehay akestay itay orfay anay olday uttonbay offay omesay ing’skay owserstray. Utbay, asideay againay! erehay omescay atthay ost-devilghay, Edallahfay; ailtay oiledcay outay ofay ightsay asay usualay, oakumay inay ethay oestay ofay ishay umpspay asay usualay. Atwhay oesday ehay aysay, ithway atthay ooklay ofay ishay? Ahay, onlyay akesmay aay ignsay otay ethay ignsay anday owsbay imselfhay; erethay isay aay unsay onay ethay oin—firecay orshipperway, ependday uponay itay. Ohay! oremay anday oremay. Isthay ayway omescay Ip—poorpay oybay! ouldway ehay adhay iedday, oray IAY; e’shay alfhay orriblehay otay emay. Ehay ootay ashay eenbay atchingway allay ofay esethay interpreters—myselfay included—anday ooklay ownay, ehay omescay otay eadray, ithway atthay unearthlyay idiotay acefay. Andstay awayay againay anday earhay imhay. Ark!”hay 

I“AY ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay 

Upon“ay myay oulsay, e’shay eenbay udyingstay Urray’smay Ammargray! Improvingay ishay indmay, oorpay ellowfay! Utbay at’swhay atthay ehay ayssay ow—hist!”nay 

I“AY ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay 

“Whyay, e’shay ettinggay itay byay eart—histhay! again.”ay 

I“AY ooklay, ouyay ooklay, ehay ookslay; eway ooklay, eyay ooklay, eythay ook.”lay 

ell“Way, at’sthay unny.”fay 

And“ay IAY, ouyay, anday ehay; anday eway, eyay, anday eythay, areay allay atsbay; anday I’may aay owcray, especiallyay enwhay IAY andstay a’topay ofay isthay inepay eetray erehay. Awcay! awcay! awcay! awcay! awcay! awcay! Ain’tay IAY aay owcray? Anday ere’swhay ethay are-crowscay? Erethay ehay andsstay; otway onesbay uckstay intoay aay airpay ofay olday owserstray, anday otway oremay okedpay intoay ethay eevesslay ofay anay olday acket.”jay 

onder“Way ifay ehay eansmay e?—complimentary!—poormay ad!—Ilay ouldcay ogay anghay elfmysay. Anyay ayway, orfay ethay esentpray, I’llay uitqay Ip’spay icinityvay. IAY ancay andstay ethay estray, orfay eythay avehay ainplay itsway; utbay e’shay ootay azy-wittycray orfay myay anitysay. Osay, osay, IAY eavelay imhay uttering.”may 

ere’s“Hay ethay ip’sshay avelnay, isthay oubloonday erehay, anday eythay areay allay onay irefay otay unscreway itay. Utbay, unscreway ouryay avelnay, anday at’swhay ethay onsequencecay? Enthay againay, ifay itay aysstay erehay, atthay isay uglyay, ootay, orfay enwhay aught’say ailednay otay ethay astmay it’say aay ignsay atthay ingsthay owgray esperateday. Ahay, ahay! olday Ahabay! ethay Itewhay Alewhay; e’llhay ailnay eyay! Isthay isay aay inepay eetray. Myay atherfay, inay olday Ollandtay ountycay, utcay ownday aay inepay eetray onceay, anday oundfay aay ilversay ingray owngray overay inay itay; omesay olday arkey’sday eddingway ingray. Owhay idday itay etgay erethay? Anday osay ey’llthay aysay inay ethay esurrectionray, enwhay eythay omecay otay ishfay upay isthay olday astmay, anday indfay aay oubloonday odgedlay inay itay, ithway eddedbay oystersay orfay ethay aggyshay arkbay. Ohay, ethay oldgay! ethay eciouspray, eciouspray, oldgay! ethay eengray iser’llmay oardhay eyay oonsay! Ishhay! ishhay! Odgay oesgay ong’may ethay orldsway ackberryingblay. Ookcay! ohay, ookcay! anday ookcay usay! Ennyjay! eyhay, eyhay, eyhay, eyhay, eyhay, Ennyjay, Ennyjay! anday etgay ouryay oe-cakehay one!”day 



APTERCHAY 100ay. Eglay anday Armay. 

Ethay Equodpay, ofay Antucketnay, Eetsmay ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay, ofay Ondonlay. 

ip“Shay, ahoyay! Asthay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

Osay iedcray Ahabay, onceay oremay ailinghay aay ipshay owingshay Englishay olourscay, earingbay ownday underay ethay ernstay. Umpettray otay outhmay, ethay olday anmay asway andingstay inay ishay oistedhay uarter-boatqay, ishay ivoryay eglay ainlyplay evealedray otay ethay angerstray aptaincay, owhay asway arelesslycay ecliningray inay ishay ownay oat’sbay owbay. Ehay asway aay arkly-tannedday, urlybay, ood-naturedgay, ine-lookingfay anmay, ofay ixtysay oray ereaboutsthay, esseddray inay aay aciousspay oundaboutray, atthay unghay oundray imhay inay estoonsfay ofay ueblay ilot-clothpay; anday oneay emptyay armay ofay isthay acketjay eamedstray ehindbay imhay ikelay ethay oideredbray armay ofay aay ussar’shay urcoatsay. 

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

ee“Say ouyay is?”thay anday ithdrawingway itay omfray ethay oldsfay atthay adhay iddenhay itay, ehay eldhay upay aay itewhay armay ofay ermspay alewhay onebay, erminatingtay inay aay oodenway eadhay ikelay aay alletmay. 

an“May myay oat!”bay iedcray Ahabay, impetuouslyay, anday ossingtay aboutay ethay oarsay earnay im—“Standhay byay otay ower!”lay 

Inay esslay anthay aay inutemay, ithoutway uittingqay ishay ittlelay aftcray, ehay anday ishay ewcray ereway oppeddray otay ethay aterway, anday ereway oonsay alongsideay ofay ethay angerstray. Utbay erehay aay uriouscay ifficultyday esentedpray itselfay. Inay ethay excitementay ofay ethay omentmay, Ahabay adhay orgottenfay atthay incesay ethay osslay ofay ishay eglay ehay adhay evernay onceay eppedstay onay oardbay ofay anyay esselvay atay easay utbay ishay ownay, anday enthay itay asway alwaysay byay anay ingeniousay anday eryvay andyhay echanicalmay ontrivancecay eculiarpay otay ethay Equodpay, anday aay ingthay otnay otay ebay iggedray anday ippedshay inay anyay otheray esselvay atay aay oment’smay arningway. Ownay, itay isay onay eryvay easyay attermay orfay anybody—exceptay osethay owhay areay almostay ourlyhay useday otay itay, ikelay alemen—towhay amberclay upay aay ip’sshay idesay omfray aay oatbay onay ethay openay easay; orfay ethay eatgray ellssway ownay iftlay ethay oatbay ighhay upay owardstay ethay ulwarksbay, anday enthay instantaneouslyay opdray itay alfhay ayway ownday otay ethay elsonkay. Osay, eprivedday ofay oneay eglay, anday ethay angestray ipshay ofay oursecay eingbay altogetheray unsupplieday ithway ethay indlykay inventionay, Ahabay ownay oundfay imselfhay abjectlyay educedray otay aay umsyclay andsmanlay againay; opelesslyhay eyeingay ethay uncertainay angefulchay eighthay ehay ouldcay ardlyhay opehay otay attainay. 

Itay ashay eforebay eenbay intedhay, erhapspay, atthay everyay ittlelay untowarday ircumstancecay atthay efellbay imhay, anday ichwhay indirectlyay angspray omfray ishay ucklesslay ishapmay, almostay invariablyay irritateday oray exasperateday Ahabay. Anday inay ethay esentpray instanceay, allay isthay asway eightenedhay byay ethay ightsay ofay ethay otway officersay ofay ethay angestray ipshay, eaninglay overay ethay idesay, byay ethay erpendicularpay adderlay ofay ailednay eetsclay erethay, anday ingingsway owardstay imhay aay airpay ofay astefully-ornamentedtay an-ropesmay; orfay atay irstfay eythay idday otnay eemsay otay ethinkbay emthay atthay aay one-leggeday anmay ustmay ebay ootay uchmay ofay aay ipplecray otay useay eirthay easay annistersbay. Utbay isthay awkwardnessay onlyay astedlay aay inutemay, ecausebay ethay angestray aptaincay, observingay atay aay anceglay owhay affairsay oodstay, iedcray outay, I“AY eesay, IAY ee!—avastsay eavinghay erethay! Umpjay, oysbay, anday ingsway overay ethay utting-tackle.”cay 

Asay oodgay ucklay ouldway avehay itay, eythay adhay adhay aay alewhay alongsideay aay ayday oray otway eviouspray, anday ethay eatgray acklestay ereway illstay aloftay, anday ethay assivemay urvedcay ubber-hookblay, ownay eanclay anday dryay, asway illstay attacheday otay ethay enday. Isthay asway uicklyqay oweredlay otay Ahabay, owhay atay onceay omprehendingcay itay allay, idslay ishay olitarysay ighthay intoay ethay urvecay ofay ethay ookhay it(ay asway ikelay ittingsay inay ethay ukeflay ofay anay anchoray, oray ethay otchcray ofay anay appleay eetray), anday enthay ivinggay ethay ordway, eldhay imselfhay astfay, anday atay ethay amesay imetay alsoay elpedhay otay oisthay ishay ownay eightway, byay ullingpay and-over-handhay uponay oneay ofay ethay unningray artspay ofay ethay ackletay. Oonsay ehay asway arefullycay ungsway insideay ethay ighhay ulwarksbay, anday entlygay andedlay uponay ethay apstancay eadhay. Ithway ishay ivoryay armay anklyfray ustthray orthfay inay elcomeway, ethay otheray aptaincay advanceday, anday Ahabay, uttingpay outay ishay ivoryay eglay, anday ossingcray ethay ivoryay armay ike(lay otway ord-fishsway adesblay) iedcray outay inay ishay alrusway ayway, Aye“ay, ayeay, eartyhay! etlay usay akeshay onesbay ogether!—antay armay anday aay eg!—anlay armay atthay evernay ancay inkshray, ed’yay eesay; anday aay eglay atthay evernay ancay unray. Erewhay id’stday outhay eesay ethay Itewhay Ale?—howwhay onglay ago?”ay 

e“Thay Itewhay Ale,”whay aidsay ethay Englishmanay, ointingpay ishay ivoryay armay owardstay ethay Eastay, anday akingtay aay uefulray ightsay alongay itay, asay ifay itay adhay eenbay aay elescopetay; ere“thay IAY awsay imhay, onay ethay Inelay, astlay eason.”say 

And“ay ehay ooktay atthay armay offay, idday e?”hay askeday Ahabay, ownay idingslay ownday omfray ethay apstancay, anday estingray onay ethay Englishman’say ouldershay, asay ehay idday osay. 

Aye“ay, ehay asway ethay ausecay ofay itay, atay eastlay; anday atthay eglay, oo?”tay 

in“Spay emay ethay arn,”yay aidsay Ahabay; ow“hay asway it?”ay 

It“ay asway ethay irstfay imetay inay myay ifelay atthay IAY everay uisedcray onay ethay Ine,”lay eganbay ethay Englishmanay. I“AY asway ignorantay ofay ethay Itewhay Alewhay atay atthay imetay. Ellway, oneay ayday eway oweredlay orfay aay odpay ofay ourfay oray ivefay aleswhay, anday myay oatbay astenedfay otay oneay ofay emthay; aay egularray ircuscay orsehay ehay asway, ootay, atthay entway illingmay anday illingmay oundray osay, atthay myay oat’sbay ewcray ouldcay onlyay imtray ishday, byay ittingsay allay eirthay ernsstay onay ethay outeray unwalegay. Esentlypray upay eachesbray omfray ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay aay ouncingbay eatgray alewhay, ithway aay ilky-whitemay eadhay anday umphay, allay ows’cray eetfay anday inkles.”wray 

It“ay asway ehay, itay asway e!”hay iedcray Ahabay, uddenlysay ettinglay outay ishay uspendedsay eathbray. 

And“ay arpoonshay ickingstay inay earnay ishay arboardstay in.”fay 

Aye“ay, aye—theyay ereway ine—_mymay_ irons,”ay iedcray Ahabay, exultingly—“butay on!”ay 

ive“Gay emay aay ancechay, en,”thay aidsay ethay Englishmanay, ood-humoredlygay. ell“Way, isthay olday eat-grandfathergray, ithway ethay itewhay eadhay anday umphay, unsray allay afoamay intoay ethay odpay, anday oesgay otay appingsnay uriouslyfay atay myay ast-linefay! 

Aye“ay, IAY ee!—wantedsay otay artpay itay; eefray ethay ast-fish—anfay olday ick—Itray owknay im.”hay 

ow“Hay itay asway exactly,”ay ontinuedcay ethay one-armeday ommandercay, I“AY oday otnay owknay; utbay inay itingbay ethay inelay, itay otgay oulfay ofay ishay eethtay, aughtcay erethay omehowsay; utbay eway idn’tday owknay itay enthay; osay atthay enwhay eway afterwardsay ulledpay onay ethay inelay, ouncebay eway amecay umpplay onay otay ishay umphay! insteaday ofay ethay otheray ale’swhay; atthay entway offay otay indwardway, allay ukingflay. Eeingsay owhay attersmay oodstay, anday atwhay aay oblenay eatgray alewhay itay as—theway oblestnay anday iggestbay IAY everay awsay, irsay, inay myay ife—Ilay esolvedray otay apturecay imhay, itespay ofay ethay oilingbay ageray ehay eemedsay otay ebay inay. Anday inkingthay ethay ap-hazardhay inelay ouldway etgay ooselay, oray ethay oothtay itay asway angledtay otay ightmay awdray or(fay IAY avehay aay evilday ofay aay oat’sbay ewcray orfay aay ullpay onay aay ale-linewhay); eeingsay allay isthay, IAY aysay, IAY umpedjay intoay myay irstfay ate’smay oat—Mrbay. Ounttop’smay erehay (byay ethay ayway, Aptain—mounttopcay; Ounttop—themay aptain);—ascay IAY asway ayingsay, IAY umpedjay intoay Ounttop’smay oatbay, ichwhay, ed’yay eesay, asway unwalegay anday unwalegay ithway inemay, enthay; anday atchingsnay ethay irstfay arpoonhay, etlay isthay olday eat-grandfathergray avehay itay. Utbay, Ordlay, ooklay ouyay, ir—heartssay anday oulssay aliveay, an—themay extnay instantay, inay aay iffjay, IAY asway indblay asay aay at—bothbay eyesay out—allay efoggedbay anday edeadenedbay ithway ackblay oam—thefay ale’swhay ailtay oominglay aightstray upay outay ofay itay, erpendicularpay inay ethay airay, ikelay aay arblemay eeplestay. Onay useay erningstay allay, enthay; utbay asay IAY asway opinggray atay iddaymay, ithway aay indingblay unsay, allay own-jewelscray; asay IAY asway opinggray, IAY aysay, afteray ethay econdsay ironay, otay osstay itay overboard—downay omescay ethay ailtay ikelay aay Imalay owertay, uttingcay myay oatbay inay otway, eavinglay eachay alfhay inay interssplay; anday, ukesflay irstfay, ethay itewhay umphay ackedbay oughthray ethay eckwray, asay oughthay itay asway allay ipschay. Eway allay uckstray outay. Otay escapeay ishay erribletay ailingsflay, IAY eizedsay oldhay ofay myay arpoon-polehay ickingstay inay imhay, anday orfay aay omentmay ungclay otay atthay ikelay aay uckingsay ishfay. Utbay aay ombingcay easay ashedday emay offay, anday atay ethay amesay instantay, ethay ishfay, akingtay oneay oodgay artday orwardsfay, entway ownday ikelay aay ashflay; anday ethay arbbay ofay atthay ursedcay econdsay ironay owingtay alongay earnay emay aughtcay emay ere”hay apping(clay ishay andhay ustjay elowbay ishay ouldershay); es“yay, aughtcay emay ustjay erehay, IAY aysay, anday orebay emay ownday otay Ell’shay amesflay, IAY asway inkingthay; enwhay, enwhay, allay ofay aay uddensay, ankthay ethay oodgay Odgay, ethay arbbay iptray itsay ayway alongay ethay esh—clearflay alongay ethay olewhay engthlay ofay myay arm—cameay outay ighnay myay istwray, anday upay IAY oated;—andflay atthay entlemangay erethay illway elltay ouyay ethay estray (byay ethay ayway, aptain—Drcay. Ungerbay, ip’sshay urgeonsay: Ungerbay, myay ad,—thelay aptaincay). Ownay, Ungerbay oybay, inspay ouryay artpay ofay ethay arn.”yay 

Ethay ofessionalpray entlemangay usthay amiliarlyfay ointedpay outay, adhay eenbay allay ethay imetay andingstay earnay emthay, ithway othingnay ecificspay isiblevay, otay enoteday ishay entlemanlygay ankray onay oardbay.
