Ishay acefay asway anay exceedinglyay oundray utbay obersay oneay; ehay asway esseddray inay aay adedfay ueblay oollenway ockfray oray irtshay, anday atchedpay owserstray; anday adhay usthay arfay eenbay ividingday ishay attentionay etweenbay aay arlingspikemay ehay eldhay inay oneay andhay, anday aay ill-boxpay eldhay inay ethay otheray, occasionallyay astingcay aay iticalcray anceglay atay ethay ivoryay imbslay ofay ethay otway ippledcray aptainscay. Utbay, atay ishay uperior’ssay introductionay ofay imhay otay Ahabay, ehay olitelypay owedbay, anday aightwaystray entway onay otay oday ishay aptain’scay iddingbay. 

It“ay asway aay ockingshay adbay ound,”way eganbay ethay ale-surgeonwhay; and“ay, akingtay myay adviceay, Aptaincay Oomerbay erehay, oodstay ouray olday Ammy—”say 

amuel“Say Enderbyay isay ethay amenay ofay myay ip,”shay interrupteday ethay one-armeday aptaincay, addressingay Ahabay; o“gay onay, oy.”bay 

ood“Stay ouray olday Ammysay offay otay ethay orthwardnay, otay etgay outay ofay ethay azingblay othay eatherway erethay onay ethay Inelay. Utbay itay asway onay use—Iay idday allay IAY ouldcay; atsay upay ithway imhay ightsnay; asway eryvay everesay ithway imhay inay ethay attermay ofay iet—”day 

Oh“ay, eryvay evere!”say imedchay inay ethay atientpay imselfhay; enthay uddenlysay alteringay ishay oicevay, inking“Dray othay umray oddiestay ithway emay everyay ightnay, illtay ehay ouldn’tcay eesay otay utpay onay ethay andagesbay; anday endingsay emay otay edbay, alfhay eassay overay, aboutay eethray o’clockay inay ethay orningmay. Ohay, eyay arsstay! ehay atsay upay ithway emay indeeday, anday asway eryvay everesay inay myay ietday. Ohay! aay eatgray atcherway, anday eryvay ieteticallyday everesay, isay Dray. Ungerbay. unger(Bay, ouyay ogday, aughlay outay! whyay on’tday eyay? Ouyay owknay ou’reyay aay eciouspray ollyjay ascalray.) Utbay, eavehay aheaday, oybay, I’day atherray ebay illedkay byay ouyay anthay eptkay aliveay byay anyay otheray an.”may 

“Myay aptaincay, ouyay ustmay avehay ereay isthay erceivedpay, espectedray ir”—saidsay ethay imperturbableay odly-lookinggay Ungerbay, ightlyslay owingbay otay Ahab—“isay aptay otay ebay acetiousfay atay imestay; ehay insspay usay anymay everclay ingsthay ofay atthay ortsay. Utbay IAY aymay asay ellway ay—ensay assantpay, asay ethay Enchfray emark—thatray IAY elf—thatmysay isay otay aysay, Ackjay Ungerbay, atelay ofay ethay everendray ergy—amclay aay ictstray otaltay abstinenceay anmay; IAY evernay ink—”dray 

ater!”“Way iedcray ethay aptaincay; e“hay evernay inksdray itay; it’say aay ortsay ofay itsfay otay imhay; eshfray aterway owsthray imhay intoay ethay ophobiahydray; utbay ogay on—goay onay ithway ethay armay ory.”stay 

es“Yay, IAY aymay asay ell,”way aidsay ethay urgeonsay, oollycay. I“AY asway aboutay observingay, irsay, eforebay Aptaincay Oomer’sbay acetiousfay interruptionay, atthay itespay ofay myay estbay anday everestsay endeavorsay, ethay oundway eptkay ettinggay orseway anday orseway; ethay uthtray asway, irsay, itay asway asay uglyay apinggay oundway asay urgeonsay everay awsay; oremay anthay otway eetfay anday everalsay inchesay onglay. IAY easuredmay itay ithway ethay eadlay inelay. Inay ortshay, itay ewgray ackblay; IAY ewknay atwhay asway eatenedthray, anday offay itay amecay. Utbay IAY adhay onay andhay inay ippingshay atthay ivoryay armay erethay; atthay ingthay isay againstay allay ule”—pointingray atay itay ithway ethay arlingspike—“thatmay isay ethay aptain’scay orkway, otnay inemay; ehay ordereday ethay arpentercay otay akemay itay; ehay adhay atthay ub-hammerclay erethay utpay otay ethay enday, otay ockknay omesay one’say ainsbray outay ithway, IAY upposesay, asay ehay iedtray inemay onceay. Ehay iesflay intoay iabolicalday assionspay ometimessay. Oday eyay eesay isthay entday, ir”—removingsay ishay athay, anday ushingbray asideay ishay airhay, anday exposingay aay owl-likebay avitycay inay ishay ullskay, utbay ichwhay orebay otnay ethay ightestslay arryscay acetray, oray anyay okentay ofay everay avinghay eenbay aay ound—“Wellway, ethay aptaincay erethay illway elltay ouyay owhay atthay amecay erehay; ehay ows.”knay 

o“Nay, IAY on’t,”day aidsay ethay aptaincay, ut“bay ishay othermay idday; ehay asway ornbay ithway itay. Ohay, ouyay olemnsay ogueray, ou—youyay Ungerbay! asway erethay everay uchsay anotheray Ungerbay inay ethay ateryway orldway? Ungerbay, enwhay ouyay ieday, ouyay oughtay otay ieday inay icklepay, ouyay ogday; ouyay ouldshay ebay eservedpray otay uturefay agesay, ouyay ascal.”ray 

at“Whay ecamebay ofay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay ownay iedcray Ahabay, owhay usthay arfay adhay eenbay impatientlyay isteninglay otay isthay ayby-play etweenbay ethay otway Englishmenay. 

Oh!”“ay iedcray ethay one-armeday aptaincay, oh“ay, esyay! Ellway; afteray ehay oundedsay, eway idn’tday eesay imhay againay orfay omesay imetay; inay actfay, asay IAY eforebay intedhay, IAY idn’tday enthay owknay atwhay alewhay itay asway atthay adhay ervedsay emay uchsay aay icktray, illtay omesay imetay afterwardsay, enwhay omingcay ackbay otay ethay Inelay, eway eardhay aboutay Obymay Ick—asday omesay allcay im—andhay enthay IAY ewknay itay asway e.”hay 

id’st“Day outhay osscray ishay akeway again?”ay 

ice.”“Tway 

ut“Bay ouldcay otnay asten?”fay 

idn’t“Day antway otay tryay otay: ain’tay oneay imblay enoughay? Atwhay ouldshay IAY oday ithoutway isthay otheray armay? Anday I’may inkingthay Obymay Ickday oesn’tday itebay osay uchmay asay ehay allows.”sway 

ell“Way, en,”thay interrupteday Ungerbay, ive“gay imhay ouryay eftlay armay orfay aitbay otay etgay ethay ightray. Oday ouyay owknay, entlemen”—verygay avelygray anday athematicallymay owingbay otay eachay Aptaincay inay uccession—“Dosay ouyay owknay, entlemengay, atthay ethay igestiveday organsay ofay ethay alewhay areay osay inscrutablyay onstructedcay byay Ivineday Ovidencepray, atthay itay isay uiteqay impossibleay orfay imhay otay ompletelycay igestday evenay aay an’smay armay? Anday ehay owsknay itay ootay. Osay atthay atwhay ouyay aketay orfay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay alicemay isay onlyay ishay awkwardnessay. Orfay ehay evernay eansmay otay allowsway aay inglesay imblay; ehay onlyay inksthay otay errifytay byay eintsfay. Utbay ometimessay ehay isay ikelay ethay olday ugglingjay ellowfay, ormerlyfay aay atientpay ofay inemay inay Eyloncay, atthay akingmay elievebay allowsway ack-knivesjay, onceay uponay aay imetay etlay oneay opdray intoay imhay inay oodgay earnestay, anday erethay itay ayedstay orfay aay elvemonthtway oray oremay; enwhay IAY avegay imhay anay emeticay, anday ehay eavedhay itay upay inay allsmay ackstay, ed’yay eesay. Onay ossiblepay ayway orfay imhay otay igestday atthay ack-knifejay, anday ullyfay incorporateay itay intoay ishay eneralgay odilybay emsystay. Esyay, Aptaincay Oomerbay, ifay ouyay areay uickqay enoughay aboutay itay, anday avehay aay indmay otay awnpay oneay armay orfay ethay akesay ofay ethay ivilegepray ofay ivinggay ecentday urialbay otay ethay otheray, whyay inay atthay asecay ethay armay isay oursyay; onlyay etlay ethay alewhay avehay anotheray ancechay atay ouyay ortlyshay, at’sthay all.”ay 

o“Nay, ankthay eyay, Unger,”bay aidsay ethay Englishay Aptaincay, e’s“hay elcomeway otay ethay armay ehay ashay, incesay IAY an’tcay elphay itay, anday idn’tday owknay imhay enthay; utbay otnay otay anotheray oneay. Onay oremay Itewhay Aleswhay orfay emay; I’veay oweredlay orfay imhay onceay, anday atthay ashay atisfiedsay emay. Erethay ouldway ebay eatgray oryglay inay illingkay imhay, IAY owknay atthay; anday erethay isay aay ip-loadshay ofay eciouspray ermspay inay imhay, utbay, arkhay eyay, e’shay estbay etlay aloneay; on’tday ouyay inkthay osay, Aptain?”—glancingcay atay ethay ivoryay eglay. 

e“Hay isay. Utbay ehay illway illstay ebay untedhay, orfay allay atthay. Atwhay isay estbay etlay aloneay, atthay accurseday ingthay isay otnay alwaysay atwhay eastlay alluresay. E’shay allay aay agnetmay! Owhay onglay incesay outhay aw’stsay imhay astlay? Ichwhay ayway eading?”hay 

ess“Blay myay oulsay, anday ursecay ethay oulfay iend’s,”fay iedcray Ungerbay, oopinglystay alkingway oundray Ahabay, anday ikelay aay ogday, angelystray uffingsnay; is“thay an’smay ood—bringblay ethay ermometer!—it’sthay atay ethay oilingbay oint!—hispay ulsepay akesmay esethay anksplay eat!—sir!”—takingbay aay ancetlay omfray ishay ocketpay, anday awingdray earnay otay Ahab’say armay. 

Avast!”“ay oaredray Ahabay, ashingday imhay againstay ethay ulwarks—“Manbay ethay oatbay! Ichwhay ayway eading?”hay 

ood“Gay Od!”gay iedcray ethay Englishay Aptaincay, otay omwhay ethay uestionqay asway utpay. at’s“Whay ethay attermay? Ehay asway eadinghay eastay, IAY ink.—Isthay ouryay Aptaincay azy?”cray isperingwhay Edallahfay. 

Utbay Edallahfay, uttingpay aay ingerfay onay ishay iplay, idslay overay ethay ulwarksbay otay aketay ethay oat’sbay eeringstay oaray, anday Ahabay, ingingsway ethay utting-tacklecay owardstay imhay, ommandedcay ethay ip’sshay ailorssay otay andstay byay otay owerlay. 

Inay aay omentmay ehay asway andingstay inay ethay oat’sbay ernstay, anday ethay Anillamay enmay ereway ingingspray otay eirthay oarsay. Inay ainvay ethay Englishay Aptaincay ailedhay imhay. Ithway ackbay otay ethay angerstray ipshay, anday acefay etsay ikelay aay intflay otay ishay ownay, Ahabay oodstay uprightay illtay alongsideay ofay ethay Equodpay. 



APTERCHAY 101ay. Ethay Ecanterday. 

Ereay ethay Englishay ipshay adesfay omfray ightsay, ebay itay etsay ownday erehay, atthay eshay ailedhay omfray Ondonlay, anday asway amednay afteray ethay atelay Amuelsay Enderbyay, erchantmay ofay atthay itycay, ethay originalay ofay ethay amousfay alingwhay ousehay ofay Enderbyay ay& Onssay; aay ousehay ichwhay inay myay oorpay aleman’swhay opinionay, omescay otnay arfay ehindbay ethay uniteday oyalray ouseshay ofay ethay Udorstay anday Ourbonsbay, inay ointpay ofay ealray istoricalhay interestay. Owhay onglay, iorpray otay ethay earyay ofay ouray Ordlay 1775ay, isthay eatgray alingwhay ousehay asway inay existenceay, myay umerousnay ish-documentsfay oday otnay akemay ainplay; utbay inay atthay earyay (1775ay) itay ittedfay outay ethay irstfay Englishay ipsshay atthay everay egularlyray untedhay ethay Ermspay Alewhay; oughthay orfay omesay orescay ofay earsyay eviouspray ever(ay incesay 1726ay) ouray aliantvay Offinscay anday Aceysmay ofay Antucketnay anday ethay Ineyardvay adhay inay argelay eetsflay ursuedpay atthay Eviathanlay, utbay onlyay inay ethay Orthnay anday Outhsay Atlanticay: otnay elsewhereay. Ebay itay istinctlyday ecordedray erehay, atthay ethay Antucketersnay ereway ethay irstfay amongay ankindmay otay arpoonhay ithway ivilizedcay eelstay ethay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay; anday atthay orfay alfhay aay enturycay eythay ereway ethay onlyay eoplepay ofay ethay olewhay obeglay owhay osay arpoonedhay imhay. 

Inay 1778ay, aay inefay ipshay, ethay Ameliaay, ittedfay outay orfay ethay expressay urposepay, anday atay ethay olesay argechay ofay ethay igorousvay Enderbysay, oldlybay oundedray Apecay Ornhay, anday asway ethay irstfay amongay ethay ationsnay otay owerlay aay ale-boatwhay ofay anyay ortsay inay ethay eatgray Outhsay Easay. Ethay oyagevay asway aay ilfulskay anday uckylay oneay; anday eturningray otay erhay erthbay ithway erhay oldhay ullfay ofay ethay eciouspray ermspay, ethay Amelia’say exampleay asway oonsay ollowedfay byay otheray ipsshay, Englishay anday Americanay, anday usthay ethay astvay Ermspay Alewhay oundsgray ofay ethay Acificpay ereway ownthray openay. Utbay otnay ontentcay ithway isthay oodgay eedday, ethay indefatigableay ousehay againay estirredbay itselfay: Amuelsay anday allay ishay Ons—howsay anymay, eirthay othermay onlyay ows—andknay underay eirthay immediateay auspicesay, anday artlypay, IAY inkthay, atay eirthay expenseay, ethay Itishbray overnmentgay asway induceday otay endsay ethay oop-of-warslay Attlerray onay aay alingwhay oyagevay ofay iscoveryday intoay ethay Outhsay Easay. Ommandedcay byay aay avalnay Ost-captainpay, ethay Attlerray ademay aay attlingray oyagevay ofay itay, anday idday omesay ervicesay; owhay uchmay oesday otnay appearay. Utbay isthay isay otnay allay. Inay 1819ay, ethay amesay ousehay ittedfay outay aay iscoveryday alewhay ipshay ofay eirthay ownay, otay ogay onay aay astingtay uisecray otay ethay emoteray atersway ofay Apanjay. Atthay ip—wellshay alledcay ethay en”—made“Syray aay oblenay experimentalay uisecray; anday itay asway usthay atthay ethay eatgray Apanesejay Alingwhay Oundgray irstfay ecamebay enerallygay ownknay. Ethay Ensyray inay isthay amousfay oyagevay asway ommandedcay byay aay Aptaincay Offincay, aay Antucketernay. 

Allay onorhay otay ethay Enderbiesay, ereforethay, osewhay ousehay, IAY inkthay, existsay otay ethay esentpray ayday; oughthay oubtlessday ethay originalay Amuelsay ustmay onglay agoay avehay ippedslay ishay ablecay orfay ethay eatgray Outhsay Easay ofay ethay otheray orldway. 

Ethay ipshay amednay afteray imhay asway orthyway ofay ethay onorhay, eingbay aay eryvay astfay ailersay anday aay oblenay aftcray everyay ayway. IAY oardedbay erhay onceay atay idnightmay omewheresay offay ethay Atagonianpay oastcay, anday ankdray oodgay ipflay ownday inay ethay orecastlefay. Itay asway aay inefay amgay eway adhay, anday eythay ereway allay umps—everytray oulsay onay oardbay. AAY ortshay ifelay otay emthay, anday aay ollyjay eathday. Anday atthay inefay amgay IAY ad—longhay, eryvay onglay afteray olday Ahabay ouchedtay erhay anksplay ithway ishay ivoryay eel—ithay indsmay emay ofay ethay oblenay, olidsay, Axonsay ospitalityhay ofay atthay ipshay; anday aymay myay arsonpay orgetfay emay, anday ethay evilday ememberray emay, ifay IAY everay oselay ightsay ofay itay. Ipflay? Idday IAY aysay eway adhay ipflay? Esyay, anday eway ippedflay itay atay ethay ateray ofay entay allonsgay ethay ourhay; anday enwhay ethay uallsqay amecay or(fay it’say uallysqay offay erethay byay Atagoniapay), anday allay ands—visitorshay anday all—wereay alledcay otay eefray opsailstay, eway ereway osay op-heavytay atthay eway adhay otay ingsway eachay otheray aloftay inay owlinesbay; anday eway ignorantlyay urledfay ethay irtsskay ofay ouray acketsjay intoay ethay ailssay, osay atthay eway unghay erethay, eefedray astfay inay ethay owlinghay alegay, aay arningway exampleay otay allay unkendray arstay. Oweverhay, ethay astsmay idday otnay ogay overboarday; anday byay anday byay eway ambledscray ownday, osay obersay, atthay eway adhay otay asspay ethay ipflay againay, oughthay ethay avagesay altsay ayspray urstingbay ownday ethay orecastlefay uttlescay, atherray ootay uchmay ilutedday anday ickledpay itay otay myay astetay. 

Ethay eefbay asway ine—toughfay, utbay ithway odybay inay itay. Eythay aidsay itay asway ull-beefbay; othersay, atthay itay asway omedarydray eefbay; utbay IAY oday otnay owknay, orfay ertaincay, owhay atthay asway. Eythay adhay umplingsday ootay; allsmay, utbay ubstantialsay, etricallysymmay obularglay, anday indestructibleay umplingsday. IAY anciedfay atthay ouyay ouldcay eelfay emthay, anday ollray emthay aboutay inay ouyay afteray eythay ereway allowedsway. Ifay ouyay oopedstay overay ootay arfay orwardfay, ouyay iskedray eirthay itchingpay outay ofay ouyay ikelay illiard-ballsbay. Ethay ead—butbray atthay ouldn’tcay ebay elpedhay; esidesbay, itay asway anay anti-scorbuticay; inay ortshay, ethay eadbray ontainedcay ethay onlyay eshfray arefay eythay adhay. Utbay ethay orecastlefay asway otnay eryvay ightlay, anday itay asway eryvay easyay otay epstay overay intoay aay arkday ornercay enwhay ouyay ateay itay. Utbay allay inay allay, akingtay erhay omfray ucktray otay elmhay, onsideringcay ethay imensionsday ofay ethay ook’scay oilersbay, includingay ishay ownay ivelay archmentpay oilersbay; orefay anday aftay, IAY aysay, ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay asway aay ollyjay ipshay; ofay oodgay arefay anday entyplay; inefay ipflay anday ongstray; ackcray ellowsfay allay, anday apitalcay omfray ootbay eelshay otay at-bandhay. 

Utbay whyay asway itay, inkthay eyay, atthay ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay, anday omesay otheray Englishay alerswhay IAY owknay of—notay allay ough—werethay uchsay amousfay, ospitablehay ipsshay; atthay assedpay oundray ethay eefbay, anday ethay eadbray, anday ethay ancay, anday ethay okejay; anday ereway otnay oonsay earyway ofay eatingay, anday inkingdray, anday aughinglay? IAY illway elltay ouyay. Ethay aboundingay oodgay eerchay ofay esethay Englishay alerswhay isay attermay orfay istoricalhay esearchray. Ornay avehay IAY eenbay atay allay aringspay ofay istoricalhay alewhay esearchray, enwhay itay ashay eemedsay eedednay. 

Ethay Englishay ereway ecededpray inay ethay alewhay isheryfay byay ethay Ollandershay, Ealanderszay, anday Anesday; omfray omwhay eythay erivedday anymay ermstay illstay extantay inay ethay isheryfay; anday atwhay isay etyay oremay, eirthay atfay olday ashionsfay, ouchingtay entyplay otay eatay anday inkdray. Orfay, asay aay eneralgay ingthay, ethay Englishay erchant-shipmay impsscray erhay ewcray; utbay otnay osay ethay Englishay alerwhay. Encehay, inay ethay Englishay, isthay ingthay ofay alingwhay oodgay eerchay isay otnay ormalnay anday aturalnay, utbay incidentalay anday articularpay; anday, ereforethay, ustmay avehay omesay ecialspay originay, ichwhay isay erehay ointedpay outay, anday illway ebay illstay urtherfay elucidateday. 

Uringday myay esearchesray inay ethay Eviathaniclay istorieshay, IAY umbledstay uponay anay ancientay Utchday olumevay, ichwhay, byay ethay ustymay alingwhay ellsmay ofay itay, IAY ewknay ustmay ebay aboutay alerswhay. Ethay itletay asway, an“Day Oopman,”cay ereforewhay IAY oncludedcay atthay isthay ustmay ebay ethay invaluableay emoirsmay ofay omesay Amsterdamay oopercay inay ethay isheryfay, asay everyay alewhay ipshay ustmay arrycay itsay oopercay. IAY asway einforcedray inay isthay opinionay byay eeingsay atthay itay asway ethay oductionpray ofay oneay itz“Fay Ackhammer.”sway Utbay myay iendfray Dray. Odheadsnay, aay eryvay earnedlay anmay, ofessorpray ofay Owlay Utchday anday Ighhay Ermangay inay ethay ollegecay ofay Antasay Ausclay anday Stay. Ott’spay, otay omwhay IAY andedhay ethay orkway orfay anslationtray, ivinggay imhay aay oxbay ofay ermspay andlescay orfay ishay ouble—thistray amesay Dray. Odheadsnay, osay oonsay asay ehay iedspay ethay ookbay, assureday emay atthay an“Day Oopman”cay idday otnay eanmay e“Thay Ooper,”cay utbay e“Thay Erchant.”may Inay ortshay, isthay ancientay anday earnedlay Owlay Utchday ookbay eatedtray ofay ethay ommercecay ofay Ollandhay; anday, amongay otheray ubjectssay, ontainedcay aay eryvay interestingay accountay ofay itsay alewhay isheryfay. Anday inay isthay apterchay itay asway, eadedhay, eer,”“Smay oray at,”“Fay atthay IAY oundfay aay onglay etailedday istlay ofay ethay outfitsay orfay ethay arderslay anday ellarscay ofay 180ay ailsay ofay Utchday alemenwhay; omfray ichwhay istlay, asay anslatedtray byay Dray. Odheadsnay, IAY anscribetray ethay ollowingfay: 

400,000ay lbsay. ofay eefbay. 60,000ay lbsay. Ieslandfray orkpay. 150,000ay lbsay. ofay ockstay ishfay. 550,000ay lbsay. ofay iscuitbay. 72,000ay lbsay. ofay oftsay eadbray. 2,800ay irkinsfay ofay utterbay. 20,000ay lbsay. Exeltay ay& Eydenlay eesechay. 144,000ay lbsay. eesechay obably(pray anay inferioray articleay). 550ay ankersay ofay Enevagay. 10,800ay arrelsbay ofay eerbay. 

Ostmay atisticalstay ablestay areay archinglypay dryay inay ethay eadingray; otnay osay inay ethay esentpray asecay, oweverhay, erewhay ethay eaderray isay oodedflay ithway olewhay ipespay, arrelsbay, uartsqay, anday illsgay ofay oodgay ingay anday oodgay eerchay. 

Atay ethay imetay, IAY evotedday eethray aysday otay ethay udiousstay igestingday ofay allay isthay eerbay, eefbay, anday eadbray, uringday ichwhay anymay ofoundpray oughtsthay ereway incidentallyay uggestedsay otay emay, apablecay ofay aay anscendentaltray anday Atonicplay applicationay; anday, urthermorefay, IAY ompiledcay upplementarysay ablestay ofay myay ownay, ouchingtay ethay obablepray uantityqay ofay ock-fishstay, etcay., onsumedcay byay everyay Owlay Utchday arpooneerhay inay atthay ancientay Eenlandgray anday Itzbergenspay alewhay isheryfay. Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, ethay amountay ofay utterbay, anday Exeltay anday Eydenlay eesechay onsumedcay, eemssay amazingay. IAY imputeay itay, oughthay, otay eirthay aturallynay unctuousay aturesnay, eingbay enderedray illstay oremay unctuousay byay ethay aturenay ofay eirthay ocationvay, anday especiallyay byay eirthay ursuingpay eirthay amegay inay osethay igidfray Olarpay Eassay, onay ethay eryvay oastscay ofay atthay Esquimauxay ountrycay erewhay ethay onvivialcay ativesnay edgeplay eachay otheray inay umpersbay ofay aintray oilay. 

Ethay uantityqay ofay eerbay, ootay, isay eryvay argelay, 10,800ay arrelsbay. Ownay, asay osethay olarpay isheriesfay ouldcay onlyay ebay osecutedpray inay ethay ortshay ummersay ofay atthay imateclay, osay atthay ethay olewhay uisecray ofay oneay ofay esethay Utchday alemenwhay, includingay ethay ortshay oyagevay otay anday omfray ethay Itzbergenspay easay, idday otnay uchmay exceeday eethray onthsmay, aysay, anday eckoningray 30ay enmay otay eachay ofay eirthay eetflay ofay 180ay ailsay, eway avehay 5,400ay Owlay Utchday eamensay inay allay; ereforethay, IAY aysay, eway avehay eciselypray otway arrelsbay ofay eerbay erpay anmay, orfay aay elvetway eeks’way allowanceay, exclusiveay ofay ishay airfay oportionpray ofay atthay 550ay ankersay ofay ingay. Ownay, etherwhay esethay ingay anday eerbay arpooneershay, osay uddledfay asay oneay ightmay ancyfay emthay otay avehay eenbay, ereway ethay ightray ortsay ofay enmay otay andstay upay inay aay oat’sbay eadhay, anday aketay oodgay aimay atay ingflyay aleswhay; isthay ouldway eemsay omewhatsay improbableay. Etyay eythay idday aimay atay emthay, anday ithay emthay ootay. Utbay isthay asway eryvay arfay Orthnay, ebay itay ememberedray, erewhay eerbay agreesay ellway ithway ethay onstitutioncay; uponay ethay Equatoray, inay ouray outhernsay isheryfay, eerbay ouldway ebay aptay otay akemay ethay arpooneerhay eepyslay atay ethay ast-headmay anday oozybay inay ishay oatbay; anday ievousgray osslay ightmay ensueay otay Antucketnay anday Ewnay Edfordbay. 

Utbay onay oremay; enoughay ashay eenbay aidsay otay owshay atthay ethay olday Utchday alerswhay ofay otway oray eethray enturiescay agoay ereway ighhay iverslay; anday atthay ethay Englishay alerswhay avehay otnay eglectednay osay excellentay anay exampleay. Orfay, aysay eythay, enwhay uisingcray inay anay emptyay ipshay, ifay ouyay ancay etgay othingnay etterbay outay ofay ethay orldway, etgay aay oodgay innerday outay ofay itay, atay eastlay. Anday isthay emptiesay ethay ecanterday. 



APTERCHAY 102ay. AAY Owerbay inay ethay Arsacidesay. 

Ithertohay, inay escriptivelyday eatingtray ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, IAY avehay ieflychay eltdway uponay ethay arvelsmay ofay ishay outeray aspectay; oray eparatelysay anday inay etailday uponay omesay ewfay interioray ucturalstray eaturesfay. Utbay otay aay argelay anday oroughthay eepingsway omprehensioncay ofay imhay, itay ehoovesbay emay ownay otay unbuttonay imhay illstay urtherfay, anday untaggingay ethay ointspay ofay ishay osehay, unbucklingay ishay artersgay, anday astingcay ooselay ethay ookshay anday ethay eyesay ofay ethay ointsjay ofay ishay innermostay onesbay, etsay imhay eforebay ouyay inay ishay ultimatumay; atthay isay otay aysay, inay ishay unconditionalay eletonskay. 

Utbay owhay ownay, Ishmaelay? Owhay isay itay, atthay ouyay, aay eremay oarsmanay inay ethay isheryfay, etendpray otay owknay aughtay aboutay ethay ubterraneansay artspay ofay ethay alewhay? Idday eruditeay Ubbstay, ountedmay uponay ouryay apstancay, eliverday ectureslay onay ethay anatomyay ofay ethay Etaceacay; anday byay elphay ofay ethay indlassway, oldhay upay aay ecimenspay ibray orfay exhibitionay? Explainay elfthysay, Ishmaelay. Ancay ouyay andlay aay ull-grownfay alewhay onay ouryay eckday orfay examinationay, asay aay ookcay ishesday aay oast-pigray? Urelysay otnay. AAY eritablevay itnessway avehay ouyay ithertohay eenbay, Ishmaelay; utbay avehay aay arecay owhay ouyay eizesay ethay ivilegepray ofay Onahjay aloneay; ethay ivilegepray ofay iscoursingday uponay ethay oistsjay anday eamsbay; ethay aftersray, idge-poleray, eepersslay, anday under-pinningsay, akingmay upay ethay ame-workfray ofay eviathanlay; anday elikebay ofay ethay allow-vatstay, airy-roomsday, utteriesbay, anday eeserieschay inay ishay owelsbay. 

IAY onfesscay, atthay incesay Onahjay, ewfay alemenwhay avehay enetratedpay eryvay arfay eneathbay ethay inskay ofay ethay adultay alewhay; everthelessnay, IAY avehay eenbay essedblay ithway anay opportunityay otay issectday imhay inay iniaturemay. Inay aay ipshay IAY elongedbay otay, aay allsmay ubcay Ermspay Alewhay asway onceay odilybay oistedhay otay ethay eckday orfay ishay okepay oray agbay, otay akemay eathsshay orfay ethay arbsbay ofay ethay arpoonshay, anday orfay ethay eadshay ofay ethay anceslay. Inkthay ouyay IAY etlay atthay ancechay ogay, ithoutway usingay myay oat-hatchetbay anday ack-knifejay, anday eakingbray ethay ealsay anday eadingray allay ethay ontentscay ofay atthay oungyay ubcay? 

Anday asay orfay myay exactay owledgeknay ofay ethay onesbay ofay ethay eviathanlay inay eirthay iganticgay, ullfay owngray evelopmentday, orfay atthay areray owledgeknay IAY amay indebteday otay myay atelay oyalray iendfray Anquotray, ingkay ofay Anquetray, oneay ofay ethay Arsacidesay. Orfay eingbay atay Anquetray, earsyay agoay, enwhay attacheday otay ethay ading-shiptray Eyday ofay Algiersay, IAY asway inviteday otay endspay artpay ofay ethay Arsacideanay olidayshay ithway ethay ordlay ofay Anquetray, atay ishay etiredray almpay illavay atay Upellapay; aay ea-sidesay englay otnay eryvay arfay istantday omfray atwhay ouray ailorssay alledcay Amboo-townbay, ishay apitalcay. 

Amongay anymay otheray inefay ualitiesqay, myay oyalray iendfray Anquotray, eingbay iftedgay ithway aay evoutday ovelay orfay allay attersmay ofay arbaricbay ertuvay, adhay oughtbray ogethertay inay Upellapay ateverwhay areray ingsthay ethay oremay ingeniousay ofay ishay eoplepay ouldcay inventay; ieflychay arvedcay oodsway ofay onderfulway evicesday, iselledchay ellsshay, inlaiday earsspay, ostlycay addlespay, aromaticay anoescay; anday allay esethay istributedday amongay ateverwhay aturalnay ondersway, ethay onder-freightedway, ibute-renderingtray avesway adhay astcay uponay ishay oresshay. 

Iefchay amongay esethay atterlay asway aay eatgray Ermspay Alewhay, ichwhay, afteray anay unusuallyay onglay agingray alegay, adhay eenbay oundfay eadday anday andedstray, ithway ishay eadhay againstay aay ocoa-nutcay eetray, osewhay umage-likeplay, uftedtay oopingsdray eemedsay ishay erdantvay etjay. Enwhay ethay astvay odybay adhay atay astlay eenbay ippedstray ofay itsay athom-deepfay enfoldingsay, anday ethay onesbay ecomebay ustday dryay inay ethay unsay, enthay ethay eletonskay asway arefullycay ansportedtray upay ethay Upellapay englay, erewhay aay andgray empletay ofay ordlylay almspay ownay elteredshay itay. 

Ethay ibsray ereway unghay ithway ophiestray; ethay ertebrævay ereway arvedcay ithway Arsacideanay annalsay, inay angestray ieroglyphicshay; inay ethay ullskay, ethay iestspray eptkay upay anay unextinguisheday aromaticay ameflay, osay atthay ethay icmystay eadhay againay entsay orthfay itsay aporyvay outspay; ilewhay, uspendedsay omfray aay oughbay, ethay errifictay owerlay awjay ibratedvay overay allay ethay evoteesday, ikelay ethay air-hunghay ordsway atthay osay affrighteday Amoclesday. 

Itay asway aay ondrousway ightsay. Ethay oodway asway eengray asay ossesmay ofay ethay Icyay Englay; ethay eestray oodstay ighhay anday aughtyhay, eelingfay eirthay ivinglay apsay; ethay industriousay earthay eneathbay asway asay aay eaver’sway oomlay, ithway aay orgeousgay arpetcay onay itay, ereofwhay ethay ound-vinegray endrilstay ormedfay ethay arpway anday oofway, anday ethay ivinglay owersflay ethay iguresfay. Allay ethay eestray, ithway allay eirthay adenlay anchesbray; allay ethay ubsshray, anday ernsfay, anday assesgray; ethay essage-carryingmay airay; allay esethay unceasinglyay ereway activeay. Oughthray ethay acingslay ofay ethay eaveslay, ethay eatgray unsay eemedsay aay ingflyay uttleshay eavingway ethay unwearieday erdurevay. Ohay, usybay eaverway! unseenay eaver!—pause!—oneway ord!—whitherway owsflay ethay abricfay? atwhay alacepay aymay itay eckday? ereforewhay allay esethay easelesscay oilingstay? Eakspay, eaver!—stayway thyay and!—buthay oneay inglesay ordway ithway eethay! Ay—thenay uttleshay ies—theflay iguresfay oatflay omfray orthfay ethay oomlay; ethay eshet-rushingfray arpetcay orfay everay idesslay awayay. Ethay eaver-godway, ehay eavesway; anday byay atthay eavingway isay ehay eafenedday, atthay ehay earshay onay ortalmay oicevay; anday byay atthay umminghay, eway, ootay, owhay ooklay onay ethay oomlay areay eafenedday; anday onlyay enwhay eway escapeay itay allshay eway earhay ethay ousandthay oicesvay atthay eakspay oughthray itay. Orfay evenay osay itay isay inay allay aterialmay actoriesfay. Ethay okenspay ordsway atthay areay inaudibleay amongay ethay ingflyay indlesspay; osethay amesay ordsway areay ainlyplay eardhay ithoutway ethay allsway, urstingbay omfray ethay openeday asementscay. Erebythay avehay illainiesvay eenbay etectedday. Ahay, ortalmay! enthay, ebay eedfulhay; orfay osay, inay allay isthay inday ofay ethay eatgray orld’sway oomlay, thyay ubtlestsay inkingsthay aymay ebay overhearday afaray. 

Ownay, amiday ethay eengray, ife-restlesslay oomlay ofay atthay Arsacideanay oodway, ethay eatgray, itewhay, orshippedway eletonskay aylay ounging—alay iganticgay idleray! Etyay, asay ethay ever-wovenay erdantvay arpway anday oofway intermixeday anday ummedhay arounday imhay, ethay ightymay idleray eemedsay ethay unningcay eaverway; imselfhay allay ovenway overay ithway ethay inesvay; everyay onthmay assumingay eenergray, esherfray erdurevay; utbay imselfhay aay eletonskay. Ifelay oldedfay Eathday; Eathday ellisedtray Ifelay; ethay imgray odgay ivedway ithway outhfulyay Ifelay, anday egatbay imhay urly-headedcay oriesglay. 

Ownay, enwhay ithway oyalray Anquotray IAY isitedvay isthay ondrousway alewhay, anday awsay ethay ullskay anay altaray, anday ethay artificialay okesmay ascendingay omfray erewhay ethay ealray etjay adhay issueday, IAY arvelledmay atthay ethay ingkay ouldshay egardray aay apelchay asay anay objectay ofay ertuvay. Ehay aughedlay. Utbay oremay IAY arvelledmay atthay ethay iestspray ouldshay earsway atthay okysmay etjay ofay ishay asway enuinegay. Otay anday ofray IAY acedpay eforebay isthay eleton—brushedskay ethay inesvay aside—brokeay oughthray ethay ibs—andray ithway aay allbay ofay Arsacideanay inetway, anderedway, eddieday onglay amiday itsay anymay indingway, adedshay olonnadescay anday arboursay. Utbay oonsay myay inelay asway outay; anday ollowingfay itay ackbay, IAY emergeday omfray ethay openingay erewhay IAY entereday. IAY awsay onay ivinglay ingthay ithinway; aughtnay asway erethay utbay onesbay. 

Uttingcay emay aay eengray easuring-rodmay, IAY onceay oremay ivedday ithinway ethay eletonskay. Omfray eirthay arrow-slitay inay ethay ullskay, ethay iestspray erceivedpay emay akingtay ethay altitudeay ofay ethay inalfay ibray, ow“Hay ow!”nay eythay outedshay; ar’st“Day outhay easuremay isthay ouray odgay! At’sthay orfay us.”ay Aye“ay, iests—wellpray, owhay onglay oday eyay akemay imhay, en?”thay Utbay ereuponhay aay iercefay ontestcay oseray amongay emthay, oncerningcay eetfay anday inchesay; eythay ackedcray eachay other’say oncesscay ithway eirthay ard-sticks—theyay eatgray ullskay echoed—anday eizingsay atthay uckylay ancechay, IAY uicklyqay oncludedcay myay ownay admeasurementsay. 

Esethay admeasurementsay IAY ownay oposepray otay etsay eforebay ouyay. Utbay irstfay, ebay itay ecordedray, atthay, inay isthay attermay, IAY amay otnay eefray otay utteray anyay anciedfay easurementmay IAY easeplay. Ecausebay erethay areay eletonskay authoritiesay ouyay ancay eferray otay, otay esttay myay accuracyay. Erethay isay aay Eviathaniclay Useummay, eythay elltay emay, inay Ullhay, Englanday, oneay ofay ethay alingwhay ortspay ofay atthay ountrycay, erewhay eythay avehay omesay inefay ecimensspay ofay in-backsfay anday otheray aleswhay. Ikewiselay, IAY avehay eardhay atthay inay ethay useummay ofay Anchestermay, inay Ewnay Ampshirehay, eythay avehay atwhay ethay oprietorspray allcay e“thay onlyay erfectpay ecimenspay ofay aay Eenlandgray oray Iverray Alewhay inay ethay Uniteday Ates.”stay Oreovermay, atay aay aceplay inay Orkshireyay, Englanday, Urtonbay Onstablecay byay amenay, aay ertaincay Irsay Iffordclay Onstablecay ashay inay ishay ossessionpay ethay eletonskay ofay aay Ermspay Alewhay, utbay ofay oderatemay izesay, byay onay eansmay ofay ethay ull-grownfay agnitudemay ofay myay iendfray Ingkay Anquo’stray. 

Inay othbay asescay, ethay andedstray aleswhay otay ichwhay esethay otway eletonsskay elongedbay, ereway originallyay aimedclay byay eirthay oprietorspray uponay imilarsay oundsgray. Ingkay Anquotray eizingsay ishay ecausebay ehay antedway itay; anday Irsay Iffordclay, ecausebay ehay asway ordlay ofay ethay eignoriessay ofay osethay artspay. Irsay Ifford’sclay alewhay ashay eenbay articulateday oughoutthray; osay atthay, ikelay aay eatgray estchay ofay awersdray, ouyay ancay openay anday utshay imhay, inay allay ishay onybay avities—spreadcay outay ishay ibsray ikelay aay iganticgay an—andfay ingsway allay ayday uponay ishay owerlay awjay. Ockslay areay otay ebay utpay uponay omesay ofay ishay ap-doorstray anday uttersshay; anday aay ootmanfay illway owshay oundray uturefay isitorsvay ithway aay unchbay ofay eyskay atay ishay idesay. Irsay Iffordclay inksthay ofay argingchay opencetway orfay aay eeppay atay ethay isperingwhay allerygay inay ethay inalspay olumncay; eepencethray otay earhay ethay echoay inay ethay ollowhay ofay ishay erebellumcay; anday ixpencesay orfay ethay unrivalleday iewvay omfray ishay oreheadfay. 

Ethay eletonskay imensionsday IAY allshay ownay oceedpray otay etsay ownday areay opiedcay erbatimvay omfray myay ightray armay, erewhay IAY adhay emthay attooedtay; asay inay myay ildway anderingsway atay atthay eriodpay, erethay asway onay otheray ecuresay ayway ofay eservingpray uchsay aluablevay atisticsstay. Utbay asay IAY asway owdedcray orfay acespay, anday ishedway ethay otheray artspay ofay myay odybay otay emainray aay ankblay agepay orfay aay oempay IAY asway enthay omposing—atcay eastlay, atwhay untattooeday artspay ightmay emain—Iray idday otnay oubletray elfmysay ithway ethay odday inchesay; ornay, indeeday, ouldshay inchesay atay allay enteray intoay aay ongenialcay admeasurementay ofay ethay alewhay. 



APTERCHAY 103ay. Easurementmay ofay Ethay Ale’swhay Eletonskay. 

Inay ethay irstfay aceplay, IAY ishway otay aylay eforebay ouyay aay articularpay, ainplay atementstay, ouchingtay ethay ivinglay ulkbay ofay isthay eviathanlay, osewhay eletonskay eway areay ieflybray otay exhibitay. Uchsay aay atementstay aymay ovepray usefulay erehay. 

Accordingay otay aay arefulcay alculationcay IAY avehay ademay, anday ichwhay IAY artlypay asebay uponay Aptaincay Oresby’sscay estimateay, ofay eventysay onstay orfay ethay argestlay izedsay Eenlandgray alewhay ofay ixtysay eetfay inay engthlay; accordingay otay myay arefulcay alculationcay, IAY aysay, aay Ermspay Alewhay ofay ethay argestlay agnitudemay, etweenbay eighty-fiveay anday inetynay eetfay inay engthlay, anday omethingsay esslay anthay ortyfay eetfay inay itsay ullestfay ircumferencecay, uchsay aay alewhay illway eighway atay eastlay inetynay onstay; osay atthay, eckoningray irteenthay enmay otay aay ontay, ehay ouldway onsiderablycay outweighay ethay ombinedcay opulationpay ofay aay olewhay illagevay ofay oneay ousandthay oneay undredhay inhabitantsay. 

Inkthay ouyay otnay enthay atthay ainsbray, ikelay okedyay attlecay, ouldshay ebay utpay otay isthay eviathanlay, otay akemay imhay atay allay udgebay otay anyay andsman’slay imaginationay? 

Avinghay alreadyay inay ariousvay aysway utpay eforebay ouyay ishay ullskay, out-holespay, awjay, eethtay, ailtay, oreheadfay, insfay, anday iversday otheray artspay, IAY allshay ownay implysay ointpay outay atwhay isay ostmay interestingay inay ethay eneralgay ulkbay ofay ishay unobstructeday onesbay. Utbay asay ethay olossalcay ullskay embracesay osay eryvay argelay aay oportionpray ofay ethay entireay extentay ofay ethay eletonskay; asay itay isay byay arfay ethay ostmay omplicatedcay artpay; anday asay othingnay isay otay ebay epeatedray oncerningcay itay inay isthay apterchay, ouyay ustmay otnay ailfay otay arrycay itay inay ouryay indmay, oray underay ouryay armay, asay eway oceedpray, otherwiseay ouyay illway otnay aingay aay ompletecay otionnay ofay ethay eneralgay ucturestray eway areay aboutay otay iewvay. 

Inay engthlay, ethay Ermspay Ale’swhay eletonskay atay Anquetray easuredmay eventy-twosay eetfay; osay atthay enwhay ullyfay investeday anday extendeday inay ifelay, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay inetynay eetfay onglay; orfay inay ethay alewhay, ethay eletonskay oseslay aboutay oneay ifthfay inay engthlay omparedcay ithway ethay ivinglay odybay. Ofay isthay eventy-twosay eetfay, ishay ullskay anday awjay omprisedcay omesay entytway eetfay, eavinglay omesay iftyfay eetfay ofay ainplay ack-bonebay. Attacheday otay isthay ack-bonebay, orfay omethingsay esslay anthay aay irdthay ofay itsay engthlay, asway ethay ightymay ircularcay asketbay ofay ibsray ichwhay onceay encloseday ishay italsvay. 

Otay emay isthay astvay ivory-ribbeday estchay, ithway ethay onglay, unrelieveday inespay, extendingay arfay awayay omfray itay inay aay aightstray inelay, otnay aay ittlelay esembledray ethay ullhay ofay aay eatgray ipshay ew-laidnay uponay ethay ocksstay, enwhay onlyay omesay entytway ofay erhay akednay ow-ribsbay areay inserteday, anday ethay eelkay isay otherwiseay, orfay ethay imetay, utbay aay onglay, isconnectedday imbertay. 

Ethay ibsray ereway entay onay aay idesay. Ethay irstfay, otay eginbay omfray ethay ecknay, asway earlynay ixsay eetfay onglay; ethay econdsay, irdthay, anday ourthfay ereway eachay uccessivelysay ongerlay, illtay ouyay amecay otay ethay imaxclay ofay ethay ifthfay, oray oneay ofay ethay iddlemay ibsray, ichwhay easuredmay eightay eetfay anday omesay inchesay. Omfray atthay artpay, ethay emainingray ibsray iminishedday, illtay ethay enthtay anday astlay onlyay annedspay ivefay eetfay anday omesay inchesay. Inay eneralgay icknessthay, eythay allay orebay aay eemlysay orrespondencecay otay eirthay engthlay. Ethay iddlemay ibsray ereway ethay ostmay archeday. Inay omesay ofay ethay Arsacidesay eythay areay useday orfay eamsbay ereonwhay otay aylay ootpathfay idgesbray overay allsmay eamsstray. 

Inay onsideringcay esethay ibsray, IAY ouldcay otnay utbay ebay uckstray aneway ithway ethay ircumstancecay, osay ariouslyvay epeatedray inay isthay ookbay, atthay ethay eletonskay ofay ethay alewhay isay byay onay eansmay ethay ouldmay ofay ishay investeday ormfay. Ethay argestlay ofay ethay Anquetray ibsray, oneay ofay ethay iddlemay onesay, occupieday atthay artpay ofay ethay ishfay ichwhay, inay ifelay, isay eatestgray inay epthday. Ownay, ethay eatestgray epthday ofay ethay investeday odybay ofay isthay articularpay alewhay ustmay avehay eenbay atay eastlay ixteensay eetfay; ereaswhay, ethay orrespondingcay ibray easuredmay utbay ittlelay oremay anthay eightay eetfay. Osay atthay isthay ibray onlyay onveyedcay alfhay ofay ethay uetray otionnay ofay ethay ivinglay agnitudemay ofay atthay artpay. Esidesbay, orfay omesay ayway, erewhay IAY ownay awsay utbay aay akednay inespay, allay atthay adhay eenbay onceay appedwray oundray ithway onstay ofay addeday ulkbay inay eshflay, usclemay, oodblay, anday owelsbay. Illstay oremay, orfay ethay ampleay insfay, IAY erehay awsay utbay aay ewfay isorderedday ointsjay; anday inay aceplay ofay ethay eightyway anday ajesticmay, utbay onelessbay ukesflay, anay utteray ankblay! 

Owhay ainvay anday oolishfay, enthay, oughtthay IAY, orfay imidtay untravelleday anmay otay tryay otay omprehendcay arightay isthay ondrousway alewhay, byay erelymay oringpay overay ishay eadday attenuateday eletonskay, etchedstray inay isthay eacefulpay oodway. Onay. Onlyay inay ethay earthay ofay uickestqay erilspay; onlyay enwhay ithinway ethay eddyingsay ofay ishay angryay ukesflay; onlyay onay ethay ofoundpray unboundeday easay, ancay ethay ullyfay investeday alewhay ebay ulytray anday ivinglylay oundfay outay. 

Utbay ethay inespay. Orfay atthay, ethay estbay ayway eway ancay onsidercay itay isay, ithway aay anecray, otay ilepay itsay onesbay ighhay upay onay enday. Onay eedyspay enterpriseay. Utbay ownay it’say oneday, itay ookslay uchmay ikelay Ompey’spay Illarpay. 

Erethay areay ortyfay anday odday ertebrævay inay allay, ichwhay inay ethay eletonskay areay otnay ockedlay ogethertay. Eythay ostlymay ielay ikelay ethay eatgray obbedknay ocksblay onay aay Othicgay irespay, ormingfay olidsay oursescay ofay eavyhay asonrymay. Ethay argestlay, aay iddlemay oneay, isay inay idthway omethingsay esslay anthay eethray eetfay, anday inay epthday oremay anthay ourfay. Ethay allestsmay, erewhay ethay inespay aperstay awayay intoay ethay ailtay, isay onlyay otway inchesay inay idthway, anday ookslay omethingsay ikelay aay itewhay illiard-ballbay. IAY asway oldtay atthay erethay ereway illstay allersmay onesay, utbay eythay adhay eenbay ostlay byay omesay ittlelay annibalcay urchinsay, ethay iest’spray ildrenchay, owhay adhay olenstay emthay otay ayplay arblesmay ithway. Usthay eway eesay owhay atthay ethay inespay ofay evenay ethay ugesthay ofay ivinglay ingsthay aperstay offay atay astlay intoay implesay ild’schay ayplay. 



APTERCHAY 104ay. Ethay Ossilfay Alewhay. 

Omfray ishay ightymay ulkbay ethay alewhay affordsay aay ostmay ongenialcay emethay ereonwhay otay enlargeay, amplifyay, anday enerallygay expatiateay. Ouldway ouyay, ouyay ouldcay otnay ompresscay imhay. Byay oodgay ightsray ehay ouldshay onlyay ebay eatedtray ofay inay imperialay oliofay. Otnay otay elltay overay againay ishay urlongsfay omfray iraclespay otay ailtay, anday ethay ardsyay ehay easuresmay aboutay ethay aistway; onlyay inkthay ofay ethay iganticgay involutionsay ofay ishay intestinesay, erewhay eythay ielay inay imhay ikelay eatgray ablescay anday awsershay oiledcay awayay inay ethay ubterraneansay orlop-deckay ofay aay ine-of-battle-shiplay. 

Incesay IAY avehay undertakenay otay anhandlemay isthay Eviathanlay, itay ehoovesbay emay otay approveay elfmysay omniscientlyay exhaustiveay inay ethay enterpriseay; otnay overlookingay ethay inutestmay eminalsay ermsgay ofay ishay oodblay, anday inningspay imhay outay otay ethay uttermostay oilcay ofay ishay owelsbay. Avinghay alreadyay escribedday imhay inay ostmay ofay ishay esentpray abitatoryhay anday anatomicalay eculiaritiespay, itay ownay emainsray otay agnifymay imhay inay anay archæologicalay, ossiliferousfay, anday antediluvianay ointpay ofay iewvay. Applieday otay anyay otheray eaturecray anthay ethay Eviathan—tolay anay antay oray aay ea—suchflay ortlypay ermstay ightmay ustlyjay ebay eemedday unwarrantablyay andiloquentgray. Utbay enwhay Eviathanlay isay ethay exttay, ethay asecay isay altereday. Ainfay amay IAY otay aggerstay otay isthay empriseay underay ethay eightiestway ordsway ofay ethay ictionaryday. Anday erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay eneverwhay itay ashay eenbay onvenientcay otay onsultcay oneay inay ethay oursecay ofay esethay issertationsday, IAY avehay invariablyay useday aay ugehay uartoqay editionay ofay Ohnsonjay, expresslyay urchasedpay orfay atthay urposepay; ecausebay atthay amousfay exicographer’slay uncommonay ersonalpay ulkbay oremay ittedfay imhay otay ompilecay aay exiconlay otay ebay useday byay aay alewhay authoray ikelay emay. 

Oneay oftenay earshay ofay iterswray atthay iseray anday ellsway ithway eirthay ubjectsay, oughthay itay aymay eemsay utbay anay ordinaryay oneay. Owhay, enthay, ithway emay, itingwray ofay isthay Eviathanlay? Unconsciouslyay myay irographychay expandsay intoay acardplay apitalscay. Ivegay emay aay ondor’scay uillqay! Ivegay emay Esuvius’vay atercray orfay anay inkstanday! Iendsfray, oldhay myay armsay! Orfay inay ethay eremay actay ofay enningpay myay oughtsthay ofay isthay Eviathanlay, eythay earyway emay, anday akemay emay aintfay ithway eirthay outreachingay omprehensivenesscay ofay eepsway, asay ifay otay includeay ethay olewhay irclecay ofay ethay iencesscay, anday allay ethay enerationsgay ofay aleswhay, anday enmay, anday astodonsmay, astpay, esentpray, anday otay omecay, ithway allay ethay evolvingray anoramaspay ofay empireay onay earthay, anday oughoutthray ethay olewhay universeay, otnay excludingay itsay uburbssay. Uchsay, anday osay agnifyingmay, isay ethay irtuevay ofay aay argelay anday iberallay emethay! Eway expanday otay itsay ulkbay. Otay oducepray aay ightymay ookbay, ouyay ustmay oosechay aay ightymay emethay. Onay eatgray anday enduringay olumevay ancay everay ebay ittenwray onay ethay eaflay, oughthay anymay erethay ebay owhay avehay iedtray itay. 

Ereay enteringay uponay ethay ubjectsay ofay Ossilfay Aleswhay, IAY esentpray myay edentialscray asay aay eologistgay, byay atingstay atthay inay myay iscellaneousmay imetay IAY avehay eenbay aay one-masonstay, anday alsoay aay eatgray iggerday ofay itchesday, analscay anday ellsway, ine-vaultsway, ellarscay, anday isternscay ofay allay ortssay. Ikewiselay, byay ayway ofay eliminarypray, IAY esireday otay emindray ethay eaderray, atthay ilewhay inay ethay earlieray eologicalgay atastray erethay areay oundfay ethay ossilsfay ofay onstersmay ownay almostay ompletelycay extinctay; ethay ubsequentsay elicsray iscoveredday inay atwhay areay alledcay ethay Ertiarytay ormationsfay eemsay ethay onnectingcay, oray atay anyay ateray intercepteday inkslay, etweenbay ethay antichronicalay eaturescray, anday osethay osewhay emoteray osteritypay areay aidsay otay avehay entereday ethay Arkay; allay ethay Ossilfay Aleswhay ithertohay iscoveredday elongbay otay ethay Ertiarytay eriodpay, ichwhay isay ethay astlay ecedingpray ethay uperficialsay ormationsfay. Anday oughthay onenay ofay emthay eciselypray answeray otay anyay ownknay eciesspay ofay ethay esentpray imetay, eythay areay etyay ufficientlysay akinay otay emthay inay eneralgay espectsray, otay ustifyjay eirthay akingtay ankray asay Etaceancay ossilsfay. 

Etachedday okenbray ossilsfay ofay e-adamitepray aleswhay, agmentsfray ofay eirthay onesbay anday eletonsskay, avehay ithinway irtythay earsyay astpay, atay ariousvay intervalsay, eenbay oundfay atay ethay asebay ofay ethay Alpsay, inay Ombardylay, inay Ancefray, inay Englanday, inay Otlandscay, anday inay ethay Atesstay ofay Ouisianalay, Ississippimay, anday Alabamaay. Amongay ethay oremay uriouscay ofay uchsay emainsray isay artpay ofay aay ullskay, ichwhay inay ethay earyay 1779ay asway isinterredday inay ethay Ueray Auphineday inay Arispay, aay ortshay eetstray openingay almostay irectlyday uponay ethay alacepay ofay ethay Uileriestay; anday onesbay isinterredday inay excavatingay ethay eatgray ocksday ofay Antwerpay, inay Apoleon’snay imetay. Uviercay onouncedpray esethay agmentsfray otay avehay elongedbay otay omesay utterlyay unknownay Eviathaniclay eciesspay. 

Utbay byay arfay ethay ostmay onderfulway ofay allay Etaceancay elicsray asway ethay almostay ompletecay astvay eletonskay ofay anay extinctay onstermay, oundfay inay ethay earyay 1842ay, onay ethay antationplay ofay Udgejay Eaghcray, inay Alabamaay. Ethay awe-strickenay edulouscray avesslay inay ethay icinityvay ooktay itay orfay ethay onesbay ofay oneay ofay ethay allenfay angelsay. Ethay Alabamaay octorsday eclaredday itay aay ugehay eptileray, anday estowedbay uponay itay ethay amenay ofay Asilosaurusbay. Utbay omesay ecimenspay onesbay ofay itay eingbay akentay acrossay ethay easay otay Owenay, ethay Englishay Anatomistay, itay urnedtay outay atthay isthay allegeday eptileray asway aay alewhay, oughthay ofay aay epartedday eciesspay. AAY ignificantsay illustrationay ofay ethay actfay, againay anday againay epeatedray inay isthay ookbay, atthay ethay eletonskay ofay ethay alewhay urnishesfay utbay ittlelay ueclay otay ethay apeshay ofay ishay ullyfay investeday odybay. Osay Owenay echristenedray ethay onstermay Euglodonzay; anday inay ishay aperpay eadray eforebay ethay Ondonlay Eologicalgay Ocietysay, onouncedpray itay, inay ubstancesay, oneay ofay ethay ostmay extraordinaryay eaturescray ichwhay ethay utationsmay ofay ethay obeglay avehay ottedblay outay ofay existenceay. 

Enwhay IAY andstay amongay esethay ightymay Eviathanlay eletonsskay, ullsskay, uskstay, awsjay, ibsray, anday ertebrævay, allay aracterizedchay byay artialpay esemblancesray otay ethay existingay eedsbray ofay ea-monsterssay; utbay atay ethay amesay imetay earingbay onay ethay otheray andhay imilarsay affinitiesay otay ethay annihilateday antichronicalay Eviathanslay, eirthay incalculableay eniorssay; IAY amay, byay aay oodflay, ornebay ackbay otay atthay ondrousway eriodpay, ereay imetay itselfay ancay ebay aidsay otay avehay egunbay; orfay imetay eganbay ithway anmay. Erehay Aturn’ssay eygray aoschay ollsray overay emay, anday IAY obtainay imday, udderingshay impsesglay intoay osethay Olarpay eternitiesay; enwhay edgedway astionsbay ofay iceay essedpray ardhay uponay atwhay areay ownay ethay Opicstray; anday inay allay ethay 25,000ay ilesmay ofay isthay orld’sway ircumferencecay, otnay anay inhabitableay and’shay eadthbray ofay andlay asway isiblevay. Enthay ethay olewhay orldway asway ethay ale’swhay; anday, ingkay ofay eationcray, ehay eftlay ishay akeway alongay ethay esentpray ineslay ofay ethay Andesay anday ethay Immalehshay. Owhay ancay owshay aay edigreepay ikelay Eviathanlay? Ahab’say arpoonhay adhay edshay olderay oodblay anthay ethay Araoh’sphay. Ethuselahmay eemssay aay ool-boyschay. IAY ooklay oundray otay akeshay andshay ithway Emshay. IAY amay orror-struckhay atay isthay antemosaicay, unsourceday existenceay ofay ethay unspeakableay errorstay ofay ethay alewhay, ichwhay, avinghay eenbay eforebay allay imetay, ustmay eedsnay existay afteray allay umanehay agesay areay overay. 

Utbay otnay aloneay ashay isthay Eviathanlay eftlay ishay e-adamitepray acestray inay ethay ereotypestay atesplay ofay aturenay, anday inay imestonelay anday arlmay equeathedbay ishay ancientay ustbay; utbay uponay Egyptianay abletstay, osewhay antiquityay eemssay otay aimclay orfay emthay anay almostay ossiliferousfay aracterchay, eway indfay ethay unmistakableay intpray ofay ishay infay. Inay anay apartmentay ofay ethay eatgray empletay ofay Enderahday, omesay iftyfay earsyay agoay, erethay asway iscoveredday uponay ethay anitegray eilingcay aay ulpturedscay anday aintedpay anisphereplay, aboundingay inay entaurscay, iffinsgray, anday olphinsday, imilarsay otay ethay otesquegray iguresfay onay ethay elestialcay obeglay ofay ethay odernsmay. Idingglay amongay emthay, olday Eviathanlay amsway asay ofay oreyay; asway erethay immingsway inay atthay anisphereplay, enturiescay eforebay Olomonsay asway adledcray. 

Ornay ustmay erethay ebay omitteday anotheray angestray attestationay ofay ethay antiquityay ofay ethay alewhay, inay ishay ownay osseousay ost-diluvianpay ealityray, asay etsay ownday byay ethay enerablevay Ohnjay Eolay, ethay olday Arbarybay avellertray. 

ot“Nay arfay omfray ethay Ea-sidesay, eythay avehay aay Empletay, ethay Aftersray anday Eamsbay ofay ichwhay areay ademay ofay Ale-boneswhay; orfay Aleswhay ofay aay onstrousmay izesay areay oftentimesay astcay upay eadday uponay atthay oreshay. Ethay Ommoncay Eoplepay imagineay, atthay byay aay ecretsay Owerpay estowedbay byay Odgay uponay ethay Empletay, onay Alewhay ancay asspay itay ithoutway immediateay eathday. Utbay ethay uthtray ofay ethay Attermay isay, atthay onay eitheray idesay ofay ethay Empletay, erethay areay Ocksray atthay ootshay otway Ilesmay intoay ethay Easay, anday oundway ethay Aleswhay enwhay eythay ightlay uponay em’ay. Eythay eepkay aay Ale’swhay Ibray ofay anay incredibleay engthlay orfay aay Iraclemay, ichwhay inglyay uponay ethay Oundgray ithway itsay onvexcay artpay uppermostay, akesmay anay Archay, ethay Eadhay ofay ichwhay annotcay ebay eachedray byay aay Anmay uponay aay Amel’scay Ackbay. Isthay Ibray ays(say Ohnjay Eolay) isay aidsay otay avehay aynlay erethay aay undredhay Earsyay eforebay IAY awsay itay. Eirthay Istorianshay affirmay, atthay aay Ophetpray owhay ophesy’dpray ofay Ahometmay, amecay omfray isthay Empletay, anday omesay oday otnay andstay otay assertay, atthay ethay Ophetpray Onasjay asway astcay orthfay byay ethay Alewhay atay ethay Asebay ofay ethay Emple.”tay 

Inay isthay Africay Empletay ofay ethay Alewhay IAY eavelay ouyay, eaderray, anday ifay ouyay ebay aay Antucketernay, anday aay alemanwhay, ouyay illway ilentlysay orshipway erethay. 



APTERCHAY 105ay. Oesday ethay Ale’swhay Agnitudemay Iminish?—willday Ehay Erishpay? 

Inasmuchay, enthay, asay isthay Eviathanlay omescay ounderingflay ownday uponay usay omfray ethay ead-watershay ofay ethay Eternitiesay, itay aymay ebay itlyfay inquireday, etherwhay, inay ethay onglay oursecay ofay ishay enerationsgay, ehay ashay otnay egeneratedday omfray ethay originalay ulkbay ofay ishay iressay. 

Utbay uponay investigationay eway indfay, atthay otnay onlyay areay ethay aleswhay ofay ethay esentpray ayday uperiorsay inay agnitudemay otay osethay osewhay ossilfay emainsray areay oundfay inay ethay Ertiarytay emsystay embracing(ay aay istinctday eologicalgay eriodpay iorpray otay anmay), utbay ofay ethay aleswhay oundfay inay atthay Ertiarytay emsystay, osethay elongingbay otay itsay atterlay ormationsfay exceeday inay izesay osethay ofay itsay earlieray onesay. 

Ofay allay ethay e-adamitepray aleswhay etyay exhumeday, byay arfay ethay argestlay isay ethay Alabamaay oneay entionedmay inay ethay astlay apterchay, anday atthay asway esslay anthay eventysay eetfay inay engthlay inay ethay eletonskay. Ereaswhay, eway avehay alreadyay eensay, atthay ethay ape-measuretay ivesgay eventy-twosay eetfay orfay ethay eletonskay ofay aay argelay izedsay odernmay alewhay. Anday IAY avehay eardhay, onay alemen’swhay authorityay, atthay Ermspay Aleswhay avehay eenbay apturedcay earnay aay undredhay eetfay onglay atay ethay imetay ofay apturecay. 

Utbay aymay itay otnay ebay, atthay ilewhay ethay aleswhay ofay ethay esentpray ourhay areay anay advanceay inay agnitudemay uponay osethay ofay allay eviouspray eologicalgay eriodspay; aymay itay otnay ebay, atthay incesay Adam’say imetay eythay avehay egeneratedday? 

Assuredlyay, eway ustmay oncludecay osay, ifay eway areay otay editcray ethay accountsay ofay uchsay entlemengay asay Inyplay, anday ethay ancientay aturalistsnay enerallygay. Orfay Inyplay ellstay usay ofay aleswhay atthay embraceday acresay ofay ivinglay ulkbay, anday Aldrovandusay ofay othersay ichwhay easuredmay eightay undredhay eetfay inay ength—Ropelay Alksway anday Amesthay Unnelstay ofay Aleswhay! Anday evenay inay ethay aysday ofay Anksbay anday Olandersay, Ooke’scay aturalistsnay, eway indfay aay Anishday embermay ofay ethay Academyay ofay Iencesscay ettingsay ownday ertaincay Icelanday Aleswhay eydan-siskur(ray, oray Inkledwray Elliesbay) atay oneay undredhay anday entytway ardsyay; atthay isay, eethray undredhay anday ixtysay eetfay. Anday Acépèdelay, ethay Enchfray aturalistnay, inay ishay elaborateay istoryhay ofay aleswhay, inay ethay eryvay eginningbay ofay ishay orkway age(pay 3ay), etssay ownday ethay Ightray Alewhay atay oneay undredhay etresmay, eethray undredhay anday enty-eighttway eetfay. Anday isthay orkway asway ublishedpay osay atelay asay A.DAY. 1825ay. 

Utbay illway anyay alemanwhay elievebay esethay oriesstay? Onay. Ethay alewhay ofay o-daytay isay asay igbay asay ishay ancestorsay inay Iny’splay imetay. Anday ifay everay IAY ogay erewhay Inyplay isay, IAY, aay alemanwhay ore(may anthay ehay asway), illway akemay oldbay otay elltay imhay osay. Ecausebay IAY annotcay understanday owhay itay isay, atthay ilewhay ethay Egyptianay ummiesmay atthay ereway uriedbay ousandsthay ofay earsyay eforebay evenay Inyplay asway ornbay, oday otnay easuremay osay uchmay inay eirthay offinscay asay aay odernmay Entuckiankay inay ishay ockssay; anday ilewhay ethay attlecay anday otheray animalsay ulpturedscay onay ethay oldestay Egyptianay anday Inevehnay abletstay, byay ethay elativeray oportionspray inay ichwhay eythay areay awndray, ustjay asay ainlyplay ovepray atthay ethay igh-bredhay, all-fedstay, izepray attlecay ofay Ithfieldsmay, otnay onlyay equalay, utbay arfay exceeday inay agnitudemay ethay attestfay ofay Araoh’sphay atfay inekay; inay ethay acefay ofay allay isthay, IAY illway otnay admitay atthay ofay allay animalsay ethay alewhay aloneay ouldshay avehay egeneratedday. 

Utbay illstay anotheray inquiryay emainsray; oneay oftenay agitateday byay ethay oremay econditeray Antucketersnay. Etherwhay owingay otay ethay almostay omniscientay ook-outslay atay ethay ast-headsmay ofay ethay ale-shipswhay, ownay enetratingpay evenay oughthray Ehring’sbay aitsstray, anday intoay ethay emotestray ecretsay awersdray anday ockerslay ofay ethay orldway; anday ethay ousandthay arpoonshay anday anceslay artedday alongay allay ontinentalcay oastscay; ethay ootmay ointpay isay, etherwhay Eviathanlay ancay onglay endureay osay ideway aay asechay, anday osay emorselessray aay avochay; etherwhay ehay ustmay otnay atay astlay ebay exterminateday omfray ethay atersway, anday ethay astlay alewhay, ikelay ethay astlay anmay, okesmay ishay astlay ipepay, anday enthay imselfhay evaporateay inay ethay inalfay uffpay. 

Omparingcay ethay umpedhay erdshay ofay aleswhay ithway ethay umpedhay erdshay ofay uffalobay, ichwhay, otnay ortyfay earsyay agoay, overspreaday byay enstay ofay ousandsthay ethay airiespray ofay Illinoisay anday Issourimay, anday ookshay eirthay ironay anesmay anday owledscay ithway eirthay under-clottedthay owsbray uponay ethay itessay ofay opulouspay iver-capitalsray, erewhay ownay ethay olitepay okerbray ellssay ouyay andlay atay aay ollarday anay inchay; inay uchsay aay omparisoncay anay irresistibleay argumentay ouldway eemsay urnishedfay, otay owshay atthay ethay untedhay alewhay annotcay ownay escapeay eedyspay extinctionay. 

Utbay ouyay ustmay ooklay atay isthay attermay inay everyay ightlay. Oughthay osay ortshay aay eriodpay ago—notay aay oodgay ifetime—thelay ensuscay ofay ethay uffalobay inay Illinoisay exceededay ethay ensuscay ofay enmay ownay inay Ondonlay, anday oughthay atay ethay esentpray ayday otnay oneay ornhay oray oofhay ofay emthay emainsray inay allay atthay egionray; anday oughthay ethay ausecay ofay isthay ondrousway exterminationay asway ethay earspay ofay anmay; etyay ethay arfay ifferentday aturenay ofay ethay ale-huntwhay eremptorilypay orbidsfay osay ingloriousay anay enday otay ethay Eviathanlay. Ortyfay enmay inay oneay ipshay untinghay ethay Ermspay Aleswhay orfay orty-eightfay onthsmay inkthay eythay avehay oneday extremelyay ellway, anday ankthay Odgay, ifay atay astlay eythay arrycay omehay ethay oilay ofay ortyfay ishfay. Ereaswhay, inay ethay aysday ofay ethay olday Anadiancay anday Indianay untershay anday apperstray ofay ethay Estway, enwhay ethay arfay estway in(ay osewhay unsetsay unssay illstay iseray) asway aay ildernessway anday aay irginvay, ethay amesay umbernay ofay occasinedmay enmay, orfay ethay amesay umbernay ofay onthsmay, ountedmay onay orsehay insteaday ofay ailingsay inay ipsshay, ouldway avehay ainslay otnay ortyfay, utbay ortyfay ousandthay anday oremay uffaloesbay; aay actfay atthay, ifay eednay ereway, ouldcay ebay atisticallystay atedstay. 

Ornay, onsideredcay arightay, oesday itay eemsay anyay argumentay inay avourfay ofay ethay adualgray extinctionay ofay ethay Ermspay Alewhay, orfay exampleay, atthay inay ormerfay earsyay e(thay atterlay artpay ofay ethay astlay enturycay, aysay) esethay Eviathanslay, inay allsmay odspay, ereway encountereday uchmay ofteneray anthay atay esentpray, anday, inay onsequencecay, ethay oyagesvay ereway otnay osay olongedpray, anday ereway alsoay uchmay oremay emunerativeray. Ecausebay, asay ashay eenbay elsewhereay oticednay, osethay aleswhay, influenceday byay omesay iewsvay otay afetysay, ownay imsway ethay eassay inay immenseay aravanscay, osay atthay otay aay argelay egreeday ethay atteredscay olitariessay, okesyay, anday odspay, anday oolsschay ofay otheray aysday areay ownay aggregateday intoay astvay utbay idelyway eparatedsay, unfrequentay armiesay. Atthay isay allay. Anday equallyay allaciousfay eemssay ethay onceitcay, atthay ecausebay ethay o-calledsay ale-bonewhay aleswhay onay ongerlay aunthay anymay oundsgray inay ormerfay earsyay aboundingay ithway emthay, encehay atthay eciesspay alsoay isay ecliningday. Orfay eythay areay onlyay eingbay ivendray omfray omontorypray otay apecay; anday ifay oneay oastcay isay onay ongerlay enliveneday ithway eirthay etsjay, enthay, ebay uresay, omesay otheray anday emoterray andstray ashay eenbay eryvay ecentlyray artledstay byay ethay unfamiliaray ectaclespay. 

Urthermorefay: oncerningcay esethay astlay entionedmay Eviathanslay, eythay avehay otway irmfay ortressesfay, ichwhay, inay allay umanhay obabilitypray, illway orfay everay emainray impregnableay. Anday asay uponay ethay invasionay ofay eirthay alleysvay, ethay ostyfray Isssway avehay etreatedray otay eirthay ountainsmay; osay, untedhay omfray ethay avannassay anday adesglay ofay ethay iddlemay eassay, ethay ale-bonewhay aleswhay ancay atay astlay esortray otay eirthay Olarpay itadelscay, anday ivingday underay ethay ultimateay assyglay arriersbay anday allsway erethay, omecay upay amongay icyay ieldsfay anday oesflay; anday inay aay armedchay irclecay ofay everlastingay Ecemberday, idbay efianceday otay allay ursuitpay omfray anmay. 

Utbay asay erhapspay iftyfay ofay esethay ale-bonewhay aleswhay areay arpoonedhay orfay oneay achalotcay, omesay ilosophersphay ofay ethay orecastlefay avehay oncludedcay atthay isthay ositivepay avochay ashay alreadyay eryvay eriouslysay iminishedday eirthay attalionsbay. Utbay oughthay orfay omesay imetay astpay aay umbernay ofay esethay aleswhay, otnay esslay anthay 13,000ay, avehay eenbay annuallyay ainslay onay ethay or’nay estway oastcay byay ethay Americansay aloneay; etyay erethay areay onsiderationscay ichwhay enderray evenay isthay ircumstancecay ofay ittlelay oray onay accountay asay anay opposingay argumentay inay isthay attermay. 

Aturalnay asay itay isay otay ebay omewhatsay incredulousay oncerningcay ethay opulousnesspay ofay ethay oremay enormousay eaturescray ofay ethay obeglay, etyay atwhay allshay eway aysay otay Artohay, ethay istorianhay ofay Oagay, enwhay ehay ellstay usay atthay atay oneay untinghay ethay Ingkay ofay Iamsay ooktay 4,000ay elephantsay; atthay inay osethay egionsray elephantsay areay umerousnay asay ovesdray ofay attlecay inay ethay emperatetay imesclay. Anday erethay eemssay onay easonray otay oubtday atthay ifay esethay elephantsay, ichwhay avehay ownay eenbay untedhay orfay ousandsthay ofay earsyay, byay Emiramissay, byay Oruspay, byay Annibalhay, anday byay allay ethay uccessivesay onarchsmay ofay ethay East—ifay eythay illstay urvivesay erethay inay eatgray umbersnay, uchmay oremay aymay ethay eatgray alewhay outlastay allay untinghay, incesay ehay ashay aay asturepay otay expatiateay inay, ichwhay isay eciselypray icetway asay argelay asay allay Asiaay, othbay Americasay, Europeay anday Africaay, Ewnay Ollandhay, anday allay ethay Islesay ofay ethay easay ombinedcay. 

Oreovermay: eway areay otay onsidercay, atthay omfray ethay esumedpray eatgray ongevitylay ofay aleswhay, eirthay obablypray attainingay ethay ageay ofay aay enturycay anday oremay, ereforethay atay anyay oneay eriodpay ofay imetay, everalsay istinctday adultay enerationsgay ustmay ebay ontemporarycay. Anday atwhay atthay isay, eway aymay oonsay aingay omesay ideaay ofay, byay imaginingay allay ethay ave-yardsgray, emeteriescay, anday amilyfay aultsvay ofay eationcray ieldingyay upay ethay ivelay odiesbay ofay allay ethay enmay, omenway, anday ildrenchay owhay ereway aliveay eventy-fivesay earsyay agoay; anday addingay isthay ountlesscay osthay otay ethay esentpray umanhay opulationpay ofay ethay obeglay. 

Ereforewhay, orfay allay esethay ingsthay, eway accountay ethay alewhay immortalay inay ishay eciesspay, oweverhay erishablepay inay ishay individualityay. Ehay amsway ethay eassay eforebay ethay ontinentscay okebray aterway; ehay onceay amsway overay ethay itesay ofay ethay Uileriestay, anday Indsorway Astlecay, anday ethay Emlinkray. Inay Oah’snay oodflay ehay espisedday Oah’snay Arkay; anday ifay everay ethay orldway isay otay ebay againay oodedflay, ikelay ethay Etherlandsnay, otay illkay offay itsay atsray, enthay ethay eternalay alewhay illway illstay urvivesay, anday earingray uponay ethay opmosttay estcray ofay ethay equatorialay oodflay, outspay ishay othedfray efianceday otay ethay iesskay. 



APTERCHAY 106ay. Ahab’say Eglay. 

Ethay ecipitatingpray annermay inay ichwhay Aptaincay Ahabay adhay uittedqay ethay Amuelsay Enderbyay ofay Ondonlay, adhay otnay eenbay unattendeday ithway omesay allsmay iolencevay otay ishay ownay ersonpay. Ehay adhay ightedlay ithway uchsay energyay uponay aay artthway ofay ishay oatbay atthay ishay ivoryay eglay adhay eceivedray aay alf-splinteringhay ockshay. Anday enwhay afteray aininggay ishay ownay eckday, anday ishay ownay ivot-holepay erethay, ehay osay ehementlyvay eeledwhay oundray ithway anay urgentay ommandcay otay ethay eersmanstay it(ay asway, asay everay, omethingsay aboutay ishay otnay eeringstay inflexiblyay enoughay); enthay, ethay alreadyay akenshay ivoryay eceivedray uchsay anay additionalay isttway anday enchwray, atthay oughthay itay illstay emainedray entireay, anday otay allay appearancesay ustylay, etyay Ahabay idday otnay eemday itay entirelyay ustworthytray. 

Anday, indeeday, itay eemedsay allsmay attermay orfay onderway, atthay orfay allay ishay ervadingpay, admay ecklessnessray, Ahabay idday atay imestay ivegay arefulcay eedhay otay ethay onditioncay ofay atthay eadday onebay uponay ichwhay ehay artlypay oodstay. Orfay itay adhay otnay eenbay eryvay onglay iorpray otay ethay Equod’spay ailingsay omfray Antucketnay, atthay ehay adhay eenbay oundfay oneay ightnay inglyay onepray uponay ethay oundgray, anday insensibleay; byay omesay unknownay, anday eeminglysay inexplicableay, unimaginableay asualtycay, ishay ivoryay imblay avinghay eenbay osay iolentlyvay isplacedday, atthay itay adhay ake-wisestay ittensmay, anday allay utbay iercedpay ishay oingray; ornay asway itay ithoutway extremeay ifficultyday atthay ethay agonizingay oundway asway entirelyay uredcay. 

Ornay, atay ethay imetay, adhay itay ailedfay otay enteray ishay onomaniacmay indmay, atthay allay ethay anguishay ofay atthay enthay esentpray ufferingsay asway utbay ethay irectday issueay ofay aay ormerfay oeway; anday ehay ootay ainlyplay eemedsay otay eesay, atthay asay ethay ostmay oisonouspay eptileray ofay ethay arshmay erpetuatespay ishay indkay asay inevitablyay asay ethay eetestsway ongstersay ofay ethay ovegray; osay, equallyay ithway everyay elicityfay, allay iserablemay eventsay oday aturallynay egetbay eirthay ikelay. Eayay, oremay anthay equallyay, oughtthay Ahabay; incesay othbay ethay ancestryay anday osteritypay ofay Iefgray ogay urtherfay anthay ethay ancestryay anday osteritypay ofay Oyjay. Orfay, otnay otay inthay ofay isthay: atthay itay isay anay inferenceay omfray ertaincay anoniccay eachingstay, atthay ilewhay omesay aturalnay enjoymentsay erehay allshay avehay onay ildrenchay ornbay otay emthay orfay ethay otheray orldway, utbay, onay ethay ontrarycay, allshay ebay ollowedfay byay ethay oy-childlessnessjay ofay allay ell’shay espairday; ereaswhay, omesay uiltygay ortalmay iseriesmay allshay illstay ertilelyfay egetbay otay emselvesthay anay eternallyay ogressivepray ogenypray ofay iefsgray eyondbay ethay avegray; otnay atay allay otay inthay ofay isthay, erethay illstay eemssay anay inequalityay inay ethay eeperday analysisay ofay ethay ingthay. Orfay, oughtthay Ahabay, ilewhay evenay ethay ighesthay earthlyay elicitiesfay everay avehay aay ertaincay unsignifyingay ettinesspay urkinglay inay emthay, utbay, atay ottombay, allay eartwoeshay, aay icmystay ignificancesay, anday, inay omesay enmay, anay archangelicay andeurgray; osay oday eirthay iligentday acings-outtray otnay eliebay ethay obviousay eductionday. Otay ailtray ethay enealogiesgay ofay esethay ighhay ortalmay iseriesmay, arriescay usay atay astlay amongay ethay ourcelesssay imogeniturespray ofay ethay odsgay; osay atthay, inay ethay acefay ofay allay ethay adglay, ay-makinghay unssay, anday oftsay allingcymbay, oundray arvest-moonshay, eway ustmay eedsnay ivegay inay otay isthay: atthay ethay odsgay emselvesthay areay otnay orfay everay adglay. Ethay ineffaceableay, adsay irth-markbay inay ethay owbray ofay anmay, isay utbay ethay ampstay ofay orrowsay inay ethay ignerssay. 

Unwittinglyay erehay aay ecretsay ashay eenbay ivulgedday, ichwhay erhapspay ightmay oremay operlypray, inay etsay ayway, avehay eenbay isclosedday eforebay. Ithway anymay otheray articularspay oncerningcay Ahabay, alwaysay adhay itay emainedray aay erymystay otay omesay, whyay itay asway, atthay orfay aay ertaincay eriodpay, othbay eforebay anday afteray ethay ailingsay ofay ethay Equodpay, ehay adhay iddenhay imselfhay awayay ithway uchsay And-lama-likegray exclusivenessay; anday, orfay atthay oneay intervalay, oughtsay eechlessspay efugeray, asay itay ereway, amongay ethay arblemay enatesay ofay ethay eadday. Aptaincay Eleg’spay uitedbray easonray orfay isthay ingthay appeareday byay onay eansmay adequateay; oughthay, indeeday, asay ouchingtay allay Ahab’say eeperday artpay, everyay evelationray artookpay oremay ofay ignificantsay arknessday anthay ofay explanatoryay ightlay. Utbay, inay ethay enday, itay allay amecay outay; isthay oneay attermay idday, atay eastlay. Atthay irefulday ishapmay asway atay ethay ottombay ofay ishay emporarytay eclusenessray. Anday otnay onlyay isthay, utbay otay atthay ever-contractingay, oppingdray irclecay ashoreay, owhay, orfay anyay easonray, ossessedpay ethay ivilegepray ofay aay esslay annedbay approachay otay imhay; otay atthay imidtay irclecay ethay aboveay intedhay asualty—remainingcay, asay itay idday, oodilymay unaccounteday orfay byay Ahab—investeday itselfay ithway errorstay, otnay entirelyay underiveday omfray ethay andlay ofay iritsspay anday ofay ailsway. Osay atthay, oughthray eirthay ealzay orfay imhay, eythay adhay allay onspiredcay, osay arfay asay inay emthay aylay, otay ufflemay upay ethay owledgeknay ofay isthay ingthay omfray othersay; anday encehay itay asway, atthay otnay illtay aay onsiderablecay intervalay adhay elapseday, idday itay anspiretray uponay ethay Equod’spay ecksday. 

Utbay ebay allay isthay asay itay aymay; etlay ethay unseenay, ambiguousay odsynay inay ethay airay, oray ethay indictivevay incespray anday otentatespay ofay irefay, avehay otay oday oray otnay ithway earthlyay Ahabay, etyay, inay isthay esentpray attermay ofay ishay eglay, ehay ooktay ainplay acticalpray ocedures;—hepray alledcay ethay arpentercay. 

Anday enwhay atthay unctionaryfay appeareday eforebay imhay, ehay adebay imhay ithoutway elayday etsay aboutay akingmay aay ewnay eglay, anday irectedday ethay atesmay otay eesay imhay uppliedsay ithway allay ethay udsstay anday oistsjay ofay aw-ivoryjay erm(Spay Alewhay) ichwhay adhay usthay arfay eenbay accumulateday onay ethay oyagevay, inay orderay atthay aay arefulcay electionsay ofay ethay outeststay, earest-grainedclay uffstay ightmay ebay ecuredsay. Isthay oneday, ethay arpentercay eceivedray ordersay otay avehay ethay eglay ompletedcay atthay ightnay; anday otay ovidepray allay ethay ittingsfay orfay itay, independentay ofay osethay ertainingpay otay ethay istrustedday oneay inay useay. Oreovermay, ethay ip’sshay orgefay asway ordereday otay ebay oistedhay outay ofay itsay emporarytay idlenessay inay ethay oldhay; anday, otay accelerateay ethay affairay, ethay acksmithblay asway ommandedcay otay oceedpray atay onceay otay ethay orgingfay ofay ateverwhay ironay ontrivancescay ightmay ebay eedednay. 



APTERCHAY 107ay. Ethay Arpentercay. 

Eatsay elfthysay ultanicallysay amongay ethay oonsmay ofay Aturnsay, anday aketay ighhay abstracteday anmay aloneay; anday ehay eemssay aay onderway, aay andeurgray, anday aay oeway. Utbay omfray ethay amesay ointpay, aketay ankindmay inay assmay, anday orfay ethay ostmay artpay, eythay eemsay aay obmay ofay unnecessaryay uplicatesday, othbay ontemporarycay anday ereditaryhay. Utbay ostmay umblehay oughthay ehay asway, anday arfay omfray urnishingfay anay exampleay ofay ethay ighhay, umanehay abstractionay; ethay Equod’spay arpentercay asway onay uplicateday; encehay, ehay ownay omescay inay ersonpay onay isthay agestay. 

Ikelay allay ea-goingsay ipshay arpenterscay, anday oremay especiallyay osethay elongingbay otay alingwhay esselsvay, ehay asway, otay aay ertaincay off-handeday, acticalpray extentay, alikeay experienceday inay umerousnay adestray anday allingscay ollateralcay otay ishay ownay; ethay arpenter’scay ursuitpay eingbay ethay ancientay anday outbranchingay unktray ofay allay osethay umerousnay andicraftshay ichwhay oremay oray esslay avehay otay oday ithway oodway asay anay auxiliaryay aterialmay. Utbay, esidesbay ethay applicationay otay imhay ofay ethay enericgay emarkray aboveay, isthay arpentercay ofay ethay Equodpay asway ingularlysay efficientay inay osethay ousandthay amelessnay echanicalmay emergenciesay ontinuallycay ecurringray inay aay argelay ipshay, uponay aay eethray oray ourfay ears’yay oyagevay, inay uncivilizeday anday ar-distantfay eassay. Orfay otnay otay eakspay ofay ishay eadinessray inay ordinaryay uties:—repairingday ovestay oatsbay, ungspray arsspay, eformingray ethay apeshay ofay umsy-bladedclay oarsay, insertingay ull’sbay eyesay inay ethay eckday, oray ewnay ee-nailstray inay ethay idesay anksplay, anday otheray iscellaneousmay attersmay oremay irectlyday ertainingpay otay ishay ecialspay usinessbay; ehay asway oreovermay unhesitatinglyay expertay inay allay annermay ofay onflictingcay aptitudesay, othbay usefulay anday apriciouscay. 

Ethay oneay andgray agestay erewhay ehay enacteday allay ishay ariousvay artspay osay anifoldmay, asway ishay ice-benchvay; aay onglay uderay onderouspay abletay urnishedfay ithway everalsay icesvay, ofay ifferentday izessay, anday othbay ofay ironay anday ofay oodway. Atay allay imestay exceptay enwhay aleswhay ereway alongsideay, isthay enchbay asway ecurelysay ashedlay athwartshipsay againstay ethay earray ofay ethay Orkstry-way. 

AAY elayingbay inpay isay oundfay ootay argelay otay ebay easilyay inserteday intoay itsay olehay: ethay arpentercay apsclay itay intoay oneay ofay ishay ever-readyay icesvay, anday aightwaystray ilesfay itay allersmay. AAY ostlay and-birdlay ofay angestray umageplay aysstray onay oardbay, anday isay ademay aay aptivecay: outay ofay eanclay avedshay odsray ofay ight-whaleray onebay, anday oss-beamscray ofay ermspay alewhay ivoryay, ethay arpentercay akesmay aay agoda-lookingpay agecay orfay itay. Anay oarsmanay ainsspray ishay istwray: ethay arpentercay oncoctscay aay oothingsay otionlay. Ubbstay ongedlay orfay ermillionvay arsstay otay ebay aintedpay uponay ethay adeblay ofay ishay everyay oaray; ewingscray eachay oaray inay ishay igbay icevay ofay oodway, ethay arpentercay etricallysymmay uppliessay ethay onstellationcay. AAY ailorsay akestay aay ancyfay otay earway ark-boneshay ear-ringsay: ethay arpentercay illsdray ishay earsay. Anotheray ashay ethay oothachetay: ethay arpentercay outay incerspay, anday appingclay oneay andhay uponay ishay enchbay idsbay imhay ebay eatedsay erethay; utbay ethay oorpay ellowfay unmanageablyay incesway underay ethay unconcludeday operationay; irlingwhay oundray ethay andlehay ofay ishay oodenway icevay, ethay arpentercay ignssay imhay otay apclay ishay awjay inay atthay, ifay ehay ouldway avehay imhay awdray ethay oothtay. 

Usthay, isthay arpentercay asway eparedpray atay allay ointspay, anday alikeay indifferentay anday ithoutway espectray inay allay. Eethtay ehay accounteday itsbay ofay ivoryay; eadshay ehay eemedday utbay op-blockstay; enmay emselvesthay ehay ightlylay eldhay orfay apstanscay. Utbay ilewhay ownay uponay osay ideway aay ieldfay usthay ariouslyvay accomplisheday anday ithway uchsay ivelinesslay ofay expertnessay inay imhay, ootay; allay isthay ouldway eemsay otay argueay omesay uncommonay ivacityvay ofay intelligenceay. Utbay otnay eciselypray osay. Orfay othingnay asway isthay anmay oremay emarkableray, anthay orfay aay ertaincay impersonalay oliditystay asay itay ereway; impersonalay, IAY aysay; orfay itay osay adedshay offay intoay ethay urroundingsay infiniteay ofay ingsthay, atthay itay eemedsay oneay ithway ethay eneralgay oliditystay iscernibleday inay ethay olewhay isiblevay orldway; ichwhay ilewhay auselesslypay activeay inay uncounteday odesmay, illstay eternallyay oldshay itsay eacepay, anday ignoresay ouyay, oughthay ouyay igday oundationsfay orfay athedralscay. Etyay asway isthay alf-horriblehay oliditystay inay imhay, involvingay, ootay, asay itay appeareday, anay all-ramifyingay eartlessness;—yethay asway itay oddlyay ashedday atay imestay, ithway anay olday, utch-likecray, antediluvianay, eezingwhay umorousnesshay, otnay unstreakeday ownay anday enthay ithway aay ertaincay izzledgray ittinessway; uchsay asay ightmay avehay ervedsay otay asspay ethay imetay uringday ethay idnightmay atchway onay ethay eardedbay orecastlefay ofay Oah’snay arkay. Asway itay atthay isthay olday arpentercay adhay eenbay aay ife-longlay andererway, osewhay uchmay ollingray, otay anday ofray, otnay onlyay adhay atheredgay onay ossmay; utbay atwhay isay oremay, adhay ubbedray offay ateverwhay allsmay outwarday ingingsclay ightmay avehay originallyay ertainedpay otay imhay? Ehay asway aay iptstray abstractay; anay unfractioneday integralay; uncompromiseday asay aay ew-bornnay abebay; ivinglay ithoutway emeditatedpray eferenceray otay isthay orldway oray ethay extnay. Ouyay ightmay almostay aysay, atthay isthay angestray uncompromisednessay inay imhay involveday aay ortsay ofay unintelligenceay; orfay inay ishay umerousnay adestray, ehay idday otnay eemsay otay orkway osay uchmay byay easonray oray byay instinctay, oray implysay ecausebay ehay adhay eenbay utoredtay otay itay, oray byay anyay intermixtureay ofay allay esethay, evenay oray unevenay; utbay erelymay byay aay indkay ofay eafday anday umbday, ontaneousspay iterallay ocesspray. Ehay asway aay urepay anipulatormay; ishay ainbray, ifay ehay adhay everay adhay oneay, ustmay avehay earlyay oozeday alongay intoay ethay usclesmay ofay ishay ingersfay. Ehay asway ikelay oneay ofay osethay unreasoningay utbay illstay ighlyhay usefulay, ultum_may inay arvopay_, Effieldshay ontrivancescay, assumingay ethay exterior—thoughay aay ittlelay elled—ofsway aay ommoncay ocketpay ifeknay; utbay ontainingcay, otnay onlyay adesblay ofay ariousvay izessay, utbay alsoay ew-driversscray, ork-screwscay, eezerstway, awlsay, enspay, ulersray, ail-filersnay, ountersinkerscay.
