Osay, ifay ishay uperiorssay antedway otay useay ethay arpentercay orfay aay ew-driverscray, allay eythay adhay otay oday asway otay openay atthay artpay ofay imhay, anday ethay ewscray asway astfay: oray ifay orfay eezerstway, aketay imhay upay byay ethay egslay, anday erethay eythay ereway. 

Etyay, asay eviouslypray intedhay, isthay omnitooleday, open-and-shutay arpentercay, asway, afteray allay, onay eremay achinemay ofay anay automatonay. Ifay ehay idday otnay avehay aay ommoncay oulsay inay imhay, ehay adhay aay ubtlesay omethingsay atthay omehowsay anomalouslyay idday itsay utyday. Atwhay atthay asway, etherwhay essenceay ofay uicksilverqay, oray aay ewfay opsdray ofay artshornhay, erethay isay onay ellingtay. Utbay erethay itay asway; anday erethay itay adhay abideday orfay ownay omesay ixtysay earsyay oray oremay. Anday isthay itay asway, isthay amesay unaccountableay, unningcay ife-principlelay inay imhay; isthay itay asway, atthay eptkay imhay aay eatgray artpay ofay ethay imetay oliloquizingsay; utbay onlyay ikelay anay unreasoningay eelwhay, ichwhay alsoay umminglyhay oliloquizessay; oray atherray, ishay odybay asway aay entry-boxsay anday isthay oliloquizersay onay uardgay erethay, anday alkingtay allay ethay imetay otay eepkay imselfhay awakeay. 



APTERCHAY 108ay. Ahabay anday ethay Arpentercay. 

Ethay Eck—firstday Ightnay Atchway. 

arpenter(_Cay andingstay eforebay ishay ice-benchvay, anday byay ethay ightlay ofay otway anternslay usilybay ilingfay ethay ivoryay oistjay orfay ethay eglay, ichwhay oistjay isay irmlyfay ixedfay inay ethay icevay. Absslay ofay ivoryay, eatherlay apsstray, adspay, ewsscray, anday ariousvay oolstay ofay allay ortssay inglyay aboutay ethay enchbay. Orwardfay, ethay edray ameflay ofay ethay orgefay isay eensay, erewhay ethay acksmithblay isay atay orkway.)_ 

Atdray ethay ilefay, anday atdray ethay onebay! Atthay isay ardhay ichwhay ouldshay ebay oftsay, anday atthay isay oftsay ichwhay ouldshay ebay ardhay. Osay eway ogay, owhay ilefay olday awsjay anday inbonesshay. Et’slay tryay anotheray. Ayeay, ownay, isthay orksway etterbay eezes(_snay_.) Alloahay, isthay onebay ustday isay eezes_)—why(_snay it’say eezes_)—yes(_snay it’say eezes_)—bless(_snay myay oulsay, itay on’tway etlay emay eakspay! Isthay isay atwhay anay olday ellowfay etsgay ownay orfay orkingway inay eadday umberlay. Awsay aay ivelay eetray, anday ouyay on’tday etgay isthay ustday; amputateay aay ivelay onebay, anday ouyay on’tday etgay itay eezes(_snay_.) Omecay, omecay, ouyay olday Utsmay, erethay, earbay aay andhay, anday et’slay avehay atthay erulefay anday uckle-screwbay; I’llay ebay eadyray orfay emthay esentlypray. Uckylay ownay eezes(_snay_) ere’sthay onay ee-jointknay otay akemay; atthay ightmay uzzlepay aay ittlelay; utbay aay eremay inbone—whyshay it’say easyay asay akingmay op-poleshay; onlyay IAY ouldshay ikelay otay utpay aay oodgay inishfay onay. Imetay, imetay; ifay IAY utbay onlyay adhay ethay imetay, IAY ouldcay urntay imhay outay asay eatnay aay eglay ownay asay everay eezes(_snay_) apedscray otay aay adylay inay aay arlorpay. Osethay uckskinbay egslay anday alvescay ofay egslay I’veay eensay inay opshay indowsway ouldn’tway omparecay atay allay. Eythay oaksay aterway, eythay oday; anday ofay oursecay etgay eumaticrhay, anday avehay otay ebay octoredday eezes(_snay_) ithway ashesway anday otionslay, ustjay ikelay ivelay egslay. Erethay; eforebay IAY awsay itay offay, ownay, IAY ustmay allcay ishay olday Ogulshipmay, anday eesay etherwhay ethay engthlay illway ebay allay ightray; ootay ortshay, ifay anythingay, IAY uessgay. Ahay! at’sthay ethay eelhay; eway areay inay ucklay; erehay ehay omescay, oray it’say omebodysay elseay, at’sthay ertaincay. 

AHABAY advancing(_ay_.) uring(_Day ethay ensuingay enescay, ethay arpentercay ontinuescay eezingsnay atay imestay.)_ 

Ellway, anmakermay! 

Ustjay inay imetay, irsay. Ifay ethay aptaincay easesplay, IAY illway ownay arkmay ethay engthlay. Etlay emay easuremay, irsay. 

Easuredmay orfay aay eglay! oodgay. Ellway, it’say otnay ethay irstfay imetay. Aboutay itay! Erethay; eepkay thyay ingerfay onay itay. Isthay isay aay ogentcay icevay outhay asthay erehay, arpentercay; etlay emay eelfay itsay ipgray onceay. Osay, osay; itay oesday inchpay omesay. 

Ohay, irsay, itay illway eakbray ones—bewarebay, ewarebay! 

Onay earfay; IAY ikelay aay oodgay ipgray; IAY ikelay otay eelfay omethingsay inay isthay ipperyslay orldway atthay ancay oldhay, anmay. At’swhay Ometheuspray aboutay ere?—thethay acksmithblay, IAY ean—what’smay ehay aboutay? 

Ehay ustmay ebay orgingfay ethay uckle-screwbay, irsay, ownay. 

Ightray. It’say aay artnershippay; ehay uppliessay ethay usclemay artpay. Ehay akesmay aay iercefay edray ameflay erethay! 

Ayeay, irsay; ehay ustmay avehay ethay itewhay eathay orfay isthay indkay ofay inefay orkway. 

Um-may. Osay ehay ustmay. IAY oday eemday itay ownay aay ostmay eaningmay ingthay, atthay atthay olday Eekgray, Ometheuspray, owhay ademay enmay, eythay aysay, ouldshay avehay eenbay aay acksmithblay, anday animateday emthay ithway irefay; orfay at’swhay ademay inay irefay ustmay operlypray elongbay otay irefay; anday osay ell’shay obablepray. Owhay ethay ootsay iesflay! Isthay ustmay ebay ethay emainderray ethay Eekgray ademay ethay Africansay ofay. Arpentercay, enwhay e’shay oughthray ithway atthay ucklebay, elltay imhay otay orgefay aay airpay ofay eelstay oulder-bladesshay; ere’sthay aay edlarpay aboarday ithway aay ushingcray ackpay. 

Irsay? 

Oldhay; ilewhay Ometheuspray isay aboutay itay, I’llay orderay aay ompletecay anmay afteray aay esirableday atternpay. Imprimisay, iftyfay eetfay ighhay inay ishay ockssay; enthay, estchay odelledmay afteray ethay Amesthay Unneltay; enthay, egslay ithway ootsray otay em’ay, otay aystay inay oneay aceplay; enthay, armsay eethray eetfay oughthray ethay istwray; onay earthay atay allay, assbray oreheadfay, anday aboutay aay uarterqay ofay anay acreay ofay inefay ainsbray; anday etlay emay ee—shallsay IAY orderay eyesay otay eesay outwardsay? Onay, utbay utpay aay ightsky-lay onay optay ofay ishay eadhay otay illuminateay inwardsay. Erethay, aketay ethay orderay, anday awayay. 

Ownay, at’swhay ehay eakingspay aboutay, anday o’swhay ehay eakingspay otay, IAY ouldshay ikelay otay owknay? Allshay IAY eepkay andingstay erehay? aside(_ay_.) 

is’Tay utbay indifferentay architectureay otay akemay aay indblay omeday; ere’shay oneay. Onay, onay, onay; IAY ustmay avehay aay anternlay. 

Ohay, ohay! At’sthay itay, eyhay? Erehay areay otway, irsay; oneay illway ervesay myay urntay. 

Atwhay artay outhay ustingthray atthay ief-catcherthay intoay myay acefay orfay, anmay? Ustedthray ightlay isay orseway anthay esentedpray istolspay. 

IAY oughtthay, irsay, atthay ouyay okespay otay arpentercay. 

Arpentercay? whyay at’s—butthay o;—anay eryvay idytay, anday, IAY aymay aysay, anay extremelyay entlemanlikegay ortsay ofay usinessbay outhay artay inay erehay, arpenter;—orcay ould’stway outhay atherray orkway inay ayclay? 

Ir?—claysay? ayclay, irsay? At’sthay udmay; eway eavelay ayclay otay itchersday, irsay. 

Ethay ellow’sfay impiousay! Atwhay artay outhay eezingsnay aboutay? 

Onebay isay atherray ustyday, irsay. 

Aketay ethay inthay, enthay; anday enwhay outhay artay eadday, evernay urybay elfthysay underay ivinglay eople’spay osesnay. 

Ir?—ohsay! ah!—Iay uessgay o;—yes—ohsay, earday! 

Ooklay eyay, arpentercay, IAY areday aysay outhay allestcay elfthysay aay ightray oodgay orkmanlikeway orkmanway, ehay? Ellway, enthay, illway itay eakspay oroughlythay ellway orfay thyay orkway, ifay, enwhay IAY omecay otay ountmay isthay eglay outhay akestmay, IAY allshay everthelessnay eelfay anotheray eglay inay ethay amesay identicalay aceplay ithway itay; atthay isay, arpentercay, myay olday ostlay eglay; ethay eshflay anday oodblay oneay, IAY eanmay. Anstcay outhay otnay ivedray atthay olday Adamay awayay? 

Ulytray, irsay, IAY eginbay otay understanday omewhatsay ownay. Esyay, IAY avehay eardhay omethingsay uriouscay onay atthay orescay, irsay; owhay atthay aay ismastedday anmay evernay entirelyay oseslay ethay eelingfay ofay ishay olday arspay, utbay itay illway ebay illstay ickingpray imhay atay imestay. Aymay IAY umblyhay askay ifay itay ebay eallyray osay, irsay? 

Itay isay, anmay. Ooklay, utpay thyay ivelay eglay erehay inay ethay aceplay erewhay inemay onceay asway; osay, ownay, erehay isay onlyay oneay istinctday eglay otay ethay eyeay, etyay otway otay ethay oulsay. Erewhay outhay eelestfay inglingtay ifelay; erethay, exactlyay erethay, erethay otay aay airhay, oday IAY. Is’tay aay iddleray? 

IAY ouldshay umblyhay allcay itay aay oserpay, irsay. 

Isthay, enthay. Owhay ostday outhay owknay atthay omesay entireay, ivinglay, inkingthay ingthay aymay otnay ebay invisiblyay anday uninterpenetratinglyay andingstay eciselypray erewhay outhay ownay andeststay; ayeay, anday andingstay erethay inay thyay itespay? Inay thyay ostmay olitarysay ourshay, enthay, ostday outhay otnay earfay eavesdroppersay? Oldhay, on’tday eakspay! Anday ifay IAY illstay eelfay ethay artsmay ofay myay ushedcray eglay, oughthay itay ebay ownay osay onglay issolvedday; enthay, whyay aystmay otnay outhay, arpentercay, eelfay ethay ieryfay ainspay ofay ellhay orfay everay, anday ithoutway aay odybay? Ahhay! 

Oodgay Ordlay! Ulytray, irsay, ifay itay omescay otay atthay, IAY ustmay alculatecay overay againay; IAY inkthay IAY idn’tday arrycay aay allsmay igurefay, irsay. 

Ooklay eyay, udding-headspay ouldshay evernay antgray emises.—Howpray onglay eforebay ethay eglay isay oneday? 

Erhapspay anay ourhay, irsay. 

Unglebay awayay atay itay enthay, anday ingbray itay otay emay urns(_tay otay ogay_.) Ohay, Ifelay! Erehay IAY amay, oudpray asay Eekgray odgay, anday etyay andingstay ebtorday otay isthay ockheadblay orfay aay onebay otay andstay onay! Ursedcay ebay atthay ortalmay inter-indebtednessay ichwhay illway otnay oday awayay ithway edgerslay. IAY ouldway ebay eefray asay airay; anday I’may ownday inay ethay olewhay orld’sway ooksbay. IAY amay osay ichray, IAY ouldcay avehay ivengay idbay orfay idbay ithway ethay ealthiestway Oriansprætay atay ethay auctionay ofay ethay Omanray empireay ich(whay asway ethay orld’sway); anday etyay IAY oweay orfay ethay eshflay inay ethay onguetay IAY agbray ithway. Byay eavenshay! I’llay etgay aay uciblecray, anday intoay itay, anday issolveday elfmysay ownday otay oneay allsmay, ompendiouscay ertebravay. Osay. 

ARPENTERCAY esuming(_ray ishay orkway_.) 

Ellway, ellway, ellway! Ubbstay owsknay imhay estbay ofay allay, anday Ubbstay alwaysay ayssay e’shay ueerqay; ayssay othingnay utbay atthay oneay ufficientsay ittlelay ordway ueerqay; e’shay ueerqay, ayssay Ubbstay; e’shay ueer—queerqay, ueerqay; anday eepskay inningday itay intoay Mray. Arbuckstay allay ethay ime—queer—sir—queertay, ueerqay, eryvay ueerqay. Anday ere’shay ishay eglay! Esyay, ownay atthay IAY inkthay ofay itay, ere’shay ishay edfellowbay! ashay aay ickstay ofay ale’swhay aw-bonejay orfay aay ifeway! Anday isthay isay ishay eglay; e’llhay andstay onay isthay. Atwhay asway atthay ownay aboutay oneay eglay andingstay inay eethray acesplay, anday allay eethray acesplay andingstay inay oneay ell—howhay asway atthay? Ohay! IAY on’tday onderway ehay ookedlay osay ornfulscay atay emay! I’may aay ortsay ofay ange-thoughtedstray ometimessay, eythay aysay; utbay at’sthay onlyay aphazard-likehay. Enthay, aay ortshay, ittlelay olday odybay ikelay emay, ouldshay evernay undertakeay otay adeway outay intoay eepday atersway ithway alltay, eron-builthay aptainscay; ethay aterway uckschay ouyay underay ethay inchay ettypray uickqay, anday ere’sthay aay eatgray cryay orfay ife-boatslay. Anday ere’shay ethay eron’shay eglay! onglay anday imslay, uresay enoughay! Ownay, orfay ostmay olksfay oneay airpay ofay egslay astslay aay ifetimelay, anday atthay ustmay ebay ecausebay eythay useay emthay ercifullymay, asay aay ender-heartedtay olday adylay usesay erhay oly-polyray olday oach-horsescay. Utbay Ahabay; ohay e’shay aay ardhay iverdray. Ooklay, ivendray oneay eglay otay eathday, anday avinedspay ethay otheray orfay ifelay, anday ownay earsway outay onebay egslay byay ethay ordcay. Alloahay, erethay, ouyay Utsmay! earbay aay andhay erethay ithway osethay ewsscray, anday et’slay inishfay itay eforebay ethay esurrectionray ellowfay omescay a-callingay ithway ishay ornhay orfay allay egslay, uetray oray alsefay, asay ewery-menbray ogay oundray ollectingcay olday eerbay arrelsbay, otay illfay em’ay upay againay. Atwhay aay eglay isthay isay! Itay ookslay ikelay aay ealray ivelay eglay, iledfay ownday otay othingnay utbay ethay orecay; e’llhay ebay andingstay onay isthay o-morrowtay; e’llhay ebay akingtay altitudesay onay itay. Alloahay! IAY almostay orgotfay ethay ittlelay ovalay ateslay, oothedsmay ivoryay, erewhay ehay iguresfay upay ethay atitudelay. Osay, osay; iselchay, ilefay, anday and-papersay, ownay! 



APTERCHAY 109ay. Ahabay anday Arbuckstay inay ethay Abincay. 

Accordingay otay usageay eythay ereway umpingpay ethay ipshay extnay orningmay; anday olay! onay inconsiderableay oilay amecay upay ithway ethay aterway; ethay askscay elowbay ustmay avehay ungspray aay adbay eaklay. Uchmay oncerncay asway ownshay; anday Arbuckstay entway ownday intoay ethay abincay otay eportray isthay unfavourableay affairay.* 

In*ay Erm-whalemenspay ithway anyay onsiderablecay uantityqay ofay oilay onay oardbay, itay isay aay egularray emi-weeklysay utyday otay onductcay aay osehay intoay ethay oldhay, anday enchdray ethay askscay ithway ea-watersay; ichwhay afterwardsay, atay aryingvay intervalsay, isay emovedray byay ethay ip’sshay umpspay. Erebyhay ethay askscay areay oughtsay otay ebay eptkay amplyday ighttay; ilewhay byay ethay angedchay aracterchay ofay ethay ithdrawnway aterway, ethay arinersmay eadilyray etectday anyay erioussay eakagelay inay ethay eciouspray argocay. 

Ownay, omfray ethay Outhsay anday Estway ethay Equodpay asway awingdray ighnay otay Ormosafay anday ethay Asheebay Islesay, etweenbay ichwhay ieslay oneay ofay ethay opicaltray outletsay omfray ethay Inachay atersway intoay ethay Acificpay. Anday osay Arbuckstay oundfay Ahabay ithway aay eneralgay artchay ofay ethay orientalay archipelagoesay eadspray eforebay imhay; anday anotheray eparatesay oneay epresentingray ethay onglay easternay oastscay ofay ethay Apanesejay islands—Niphonay, Atsmaimay, anday Ikokesay. Ithway ishay ow-whitesnay ewnay ivoryay eglay acedbray againstay ethay ewedscray eglay ofay ishay abletay, anday ithway aay onglay uning-hookpray ofay aay ack-knifejay inay ishay andhay, ethay ondrousway olday anmay, ithway ishay ackbay otay ethay angwaygay oorday, asway inklingwray ishay owbray, anday acingtray ishay olday oursescay againay. 

o’s“Whay ere?”thay earinghay ethay ootstepfay atay ethay oorday, utbay otnay urningtay oundray otay itay. On“ay eckday! Egone!”bay 

aptain“Cay Ahabay istakesmay; itay isay IAY. Ethay oilay inay ethay oldhay isay eakinglay, irsay. Eway ustmay upay Urtonsbay anday eakbray out.”ay 

Up“ay Urtonsbay anday eakbray outay? Ownay atthay eway areay earingnay Apanjay; eave-tohay erehay orfay aay eekway otay inkertay aay arcelpay ofay olday oops?”hay 

Either“ay oday atthay, irsay, oray asteway inay oneay ayday oremay oilay anthay eway aymay akemay oodgay inay aay earyay. Atwhay eway omecay entytway ousandthay ilesmay otay etgay isay orthway avingsay, ir.”say 

o“Say itay isay, osay itay isay; ifay eway etgay it.”ay 

I“AY asway eakingspay ofay ethay oilay inay ethay oldhay, ir.”say 

And“ay IAY asway otnay eakingspay oray inkingthay ofay atthay atay allay. Egonebay! Etlay itay eaklay! I’may allay aleakay elfmysay. Ayeay! eakslay inay eakslay! otnay onlyay ullfay ofay eakylay askscay, utbay osethay eakylay askscay areay inay aay eakylay ipshay; anday at’sthay aay arfay orseway ightplay anthay ethay Equod’spay, anmay. Etyay IAY on’tday opstay otay ugplay myay eaklay; orfay owhay ancay indfay itay inay ethay eep-loadedday ullhay; oray owhay opehay otay ugplay itay, evenay ifay oundfay, inay isthay ife’slay owlinghay alegay? Arbuckstay! I’llay otnay avehay ethay Urtonsbay oisted.”hay 

at“Whay illway ethay ownersay aysay, ir?”say 

et“Lay ethay ownersay andstay onay Antucketnay eachbay anday outyellay ethay Oonstyphay. Atwhay arescay Ahabay? Ownersay, ownersay? Outhay artay alwaysay atingpray otay emay, Arbuckstay, aboutay osethay iserlymay ownersay, asay ifay ethay ownersay ereway myay onsciencecay. Utbay ooklay eyay, ethay onlyay ealray owneray ofay anythingay isay itsay ommandercay; anday arkhay eyay, myay onsciencecay isay inay isthay ip’sshay eel.—Onkay eck!”day 

aptain“Cay Ahab,”ay aidsay ethay eddeningray atemay, ovingmay urtherfay intoay ethay abincay, ithway aay aringday osay angelystray espectfulray anday autiouscay atthay itay almostay eemedsay otnay onlyay everyay ayway eekingsay otay avoiday ethay ightestslay outwarday anifestationmay ofay itselfay, utbay ithinway alsoay eemedsay oremay anthay alfhay istrustfulday ofay itselfay; A“AY etterbay anmay anthay IAY ightmay ellway asspay overay inay eethay atwhay ehay ouldway uicklyqay enoughay esentray inay aay oungeryay anmay; ayeay, anday inay aay appierhay, Aptaincay Ahab.”ay 

evils“Day! Ostday outhay enthay osay uchmay asay areday otay iticallycray inkthay ofay e?—Onmay eck!”day 

ay“Nay, irsay, otnay etyay; IAY oday entreatay. Anday IAY oday areday, ir—tosay ebay orbearingfay! Allshay eway otnay understanday eachay otheray etterbay anthay ithertohay, Aptaincay Ahab?”ay 

Ahabay eizedsay aay oadedlay usketmay omfray ethay ackray orming(fay artpay ofay ostmay Outh-sea-men’ssay abincay urniturefay), anday ointingpay itay owardstay Arbuckstay, exclaimeday: ere“Thay isay oneay Odgay atthay isay Ordlay overay ethay earthay, anday oneay Aptaincay atthay isay ordlay overay ethay Equod.—onpay eck!”day 

Orfay anay instantay inay ethay ashingflay eyesay ofay ethay atemay, anday ishay ieryfay eekschay, ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay atthay ehay adhay eallyray eceivedray ethay azeblay ofay ethay evelledlay ubetay. Utbay, asteringmay ishay emotionay, ehay alfhay almlycay oseray, anday asay ehay uittedqay ethay abincay, ausedpay orfay anay instantay anday aidsay: ou“Thay asthay outrageday, otnay insulteday emay, irsay; utbay orfay atthay IAY askay eethay otnay otay ewarebay ofay Arbuckstay; outhay ouldstway utbay aughlay; utbay etlay Ahabay ewarebay ofay Ahabay; ewarebay ofay elfthysay, olday an.”may 

e“Hay axesway avebray, utbay everthelessnay obeysay; ostmay arefulcay averybray at!”thay urmuredmay Ahabay, asay Arbuckstay isappearedday. at’s“Whay atthay ehay aid—Ahabsay ewarebay ofay Ahab—there’say omethingsay ere!”thay Enthay unconsciouslyay usingay ethay usketmay orfay aay affstay, ithway anay ironay owbray ehay acedpay otay anday ofray inay ethay ittlelay abincay; utbay esentlypray ethay ickthay aitsplay ofay ishay oreheadfay elaxedray, anday eturningray ethay ungay otay ethay ackray, ehay entway otay ethay eckday. 

ou“Thay artay utbay ootay oodgay aay ellowfay, Arbuck,”stay ehay aidsay owlylay otay ethay atemay; enthay aisingray ishay oicevay otay ethay ewcray: url“Fay ethay allant-sailst’gay, anday ose-reefclay ethay op-sailstay, orefay anday aftay; ackbay ethay ain-yardmay; upay Urtonbay, anday eakbray outay inay ethay ain-hold.”may 

Itay ereway erhapspay ainvay otay urmisesay exactlyay whyay itay asway, atthay asay espectingray Arbuckstay, Ahabay usthay acteday. Itay aymay avehay eenbay aay ashflay ofay onestyhay inay imhay; oray eremay udentialpray olicypay ichwhay, underay ethay ircumstancecay, imperiouslyay orbadefay ethay ightestslay omsymptay ofay openay isaffectionday, oweverhay ansienttray, inay ethay importantay iefchay officeray ofay ishay ipshay. Oweverhay itay asway, ishay ordersay ereway executeday; anday ethay Urtonsbay ereway oistedhay. 



APTERCHAY 110ay. Ueequegqay inay Ishay Offincay. 

Uponay earchingsay, itay asway oundfay atthay ethay askscay astlay uckstray intoay ethay oldhay ereway erfectlypay oundsay, anday atthay ethay eaklay ustmay ebay urtherfay offay. Osay, itay eingbay almcay eatherway, eythay okebray outay eeperday anday eeperday, isturbingday ethay umbersslay ofay ethay ugehay ound-tiergray uttsbay; anday omfray atthay ackblay idnightmay endingsay osethay iganticgay olesmay intoay ethay aylightday aboveay. Osay eepday idday eythay ogay; anday osay ancientay, anday orrodedcay, anday eedyway ethay aspectay ofay ethay owermostlay uncheonspay, atthay ouyay almostay ookedlay extnay orfay omesay ouldymay orner-stonecay askcay ontainingcay oinscay ofay Aptaincay Oahnay, ithway opiescay ofay ethay ostedpay acardsplay, ainlyvay arningway ethay infatuateday olday orldway omfray ethay oodflay. Iercetay afteray iercetay, ootay, ofay aterway, anday eadbray, anday eefbay, anday ooksshay ofay avesstay, anday ironay undlesbay ofay oopshay, ereway oistedhay outay, illtay atay astlay ethay iledpay ecksday ereway ardhay otay etgay aboutay; anday ethay ollowhay ullhay echoeday underay ootfay, asay ifay ouyay ereway eadingtray overay emptyay atacombscay, anday eeledray anday olledray inay ethay easay ikelay anay air-freighteday emijohnday. Op-heavytay asway ethay ipshay asay aay innerlessday udentstay ithway allay Aristotleay inay ishay eadhay. Ellway asway itay atthay ethay Oonstyphay idday otnay isitvay emthay enthay. 

Ownay, atay isthay imetay itay asway atthay myay oorpay aganpay ompanioncay, anday astfay osom-friendbay, Ueequegqay, asway eizedsay ithway aay everfay, ichwhay oughtbray imhay ighnay otay ishay endlessay enday. 

Ebay itay aidsay, atthay inay isthay ocationvay ofay alingwhay, inecuressay areay unknownay; ignityday anday angerday ogay andhay inay andhay; illtay ouyay etgay otay ebay Aptaincay, ethay igherhay ouyay iseray ethay arderhay ouyay oiltay. Osay ithway oorpay Ueequegqay, owhay, asay arpooneerhay, ustmay otnay onlyay acefay allay ethay ageray ofay ethay ivinglay alewhay, ut—asbay eway avehay elsewhereay een—mountsay ishay eadday ackbay inay aay ollingray easay; anday inallyfay escendday intoay ethay oomglay ofay ethay oldhay, anday itterlybay eatingsway allay ayday inay atthay ubterraneoussay onfinementcay, esolutelyray anhandlemay ethay umsiestclay askscay anday eesay otay eirthay owagestay. Otay ebay ortshay, amongay alemenwhay, ethay arpooneershay areay ethay oldershay, osay alledcay. 

Oorpay Ueequegqay! enwhay ethay ipshay asway aboutay alfhay isembowelledday, ouyay ouldshay avehay oopedstay overay ethay atchwayhay, anday eeredpay ownday uponay imhay erethay; erewhay, ippedstray otay ishay oollenway awersdray, ethay attooedtay avagesay asway awlingcray aboutay amiday atthay ampnessday anday imeslay, ikelay aay eengray ottedspay izardlay atay ethay ottombay ofay aay ellway. Anday aay ellway, oray anay ice-houseay, itay omehowsay ovedpray otay imhay, oorpay aganpay; erewhay, angestray otay aysay, orfay allay ethay eathay ofay ishay eatingssway, ehay aughtcay aay erribletay illchay ichwhay apsedlay intoay aay everfay; anday atay astlay, afteray omesay ays’day ufferingsay, aidlay imhay inay ishay ammockhay, oseclay otay ethay eryvay illsay ofay ethay oorday ofay eathday. Owhay ehay astedway anday astedway awayay inay osethay ewfay ong-lingeringlay aysday, illtay erethay eemedsay utbay ittlelay eftlay ofay imhay utbay ishay amefray anday attooingtay. Utbay asay allay elseay inay imhay innedthay, anday ishay eek-boneschay ewgray arpershay, ishay eyesay, everthelessnay, eemedsay owinggray ullerfay anday ullerfay; eythay ecamebay ofay aay angestray oftnesssay ofay ustrelay; anday ildlymay utbay eeplyday ookedlay outay atay ouyay erethay omfray ishay icknesssay, aay ondrousway estimonytay otay atthay immortalay ealthhay inay imhay ichwhay ouldcay otnay ieday, oray ebay eakenedway. Anday ikelay irclescay onay ethay aterway, ichwhay, asay eythay owgray ainterfay, expanday; osay ishay eyesay eemedsay oundingray anday oundingray, ikelay ethay ingsray ofay Eternityay. Anay aweay atthay annotcay ebay amednay ouldway ealstay overay ouyay asay ouyay atsay byay ethay idesay ofay isthay aningway avagesay, anday awsay asay angestray ingsthay inay ishay acefay, asay anyay eheldbay owhay ereway andersbystay enwhay Oroasterzay iedday. Orfay ateverwhay isay ulytray ondrousway anday earfulfay inay anmay, evernay etyay asway utpay intoay ordsway oray ooksbay. Anday ethay awingdray earnay ofay Eathday, ichwhay alikeay evelslay allay, alikeay impressesay allay ithway aay astlay evelationray, ichwhay onlyay anay authoray omfray ethay eadday ouldcay adequatelyay elltay. Osay at—letthay usay aysay itay again—noay ingdyay Aldeechay oray Eekgray adhay igherhay anday olierhay oughtsthay anthay osethay, osewhay eriousmystay adesshay ouyay awsay eepingcray overay ethay acefay ofay oorpay Ueequegqay, asay ehay uietlyqay aylay inay ishay ayingsway ammockhay, anday ethay ollingray easay eemedsay entlygay ockingray imhay otay ishay inalfay estray, anday ethay ocean’say invisibleay ood-tideflay iftedlay imhay igherhay anday igherhay owardstay ishay estinedday eavenhay. 

Otnay aay anmay ofay ethay ewcray utbay avegay imhay upay; anday, asay orfay Ueequegqay imselfhay, atwhay ehay oughtthay ofay ishay asecay asway orciblyfay ownshay byay aay uriouscay avourfay ehay askeday. Ehay alledcay oneay otay imhay inay ethay eygray orningmay atchway, enwhay ethay ayday asway ustjay eakingbray, anday akingtay ishay andhay, aidsay atthay ilewhay inay Antucketnay ehay adhay ancedchay otay eesay ertaincay ittlelay anoescay ofay arkday oodway, ikelay ethay ichray ar-woodway ofay ishay ativenay isleay; anday uponay inquiryay, ehay adhay earnedlay atthay allay alemenwhay owhay iedday inay Antucketnay, ereway aidlay inay osethay amesay arkday anoescay, anday atthay ethay ancyfay ofay eingbay osay aidlay adhay uchmay easedplay imhay; orfay itay asway otnay unlikeay ethay ustomcay ofay ishay ownay aceray, owhay, afteray embalmingay aay eadday arriorway, etchedstray imhay outay inay ishay anoecay, anday osay eftlay imhay otay ebay oatedflay awayay otay ethay arrystay archipelagoesay; orfay otnay onlyay oday eythay elievebay atthay ethay arsstay areay islesay, utbay atthay arfay eyondbay allay isiblevay orizonshay, eirthay ownay ildmay, uncontinenteday eassay, interfloway ithway ethay ueblay eavenshay; anday osay ormfay ethay itewhay eakersbray ofay ethay ilkymay ayway. Ehay addeday, atthay ehay udderedshay atay ethay oughtthay ofay eingbay uriedbay inay ishay ammockhay, accordingay otay ethay usualay ea-customsay, ossedtay ikelay omethingsay ilevay otay ethay eath-devouringday arksshay. Onay: ehay esiredday aay anoecay ikelay osethay ofay Antucketnay, allay ethay oremay ongenialcay otay imhay, eingbay aay alemanwhay, atthay ikelay aay ale-boatwhay esethay offin-canoescay ereway ithoutway aay eelkay; oughthay atthay involveday utbay uncertainay eeringstay, anday uchmay ee-waylay adownay ethay imday agesay. 

Ownay, enwhay isthay angestray ircumstancecay asway ademay ownknay aftay, ethay arpentercay asway atay onceay ommandedcay otay oday Ueequeg’sqay iddingbay, ateverwhay itay ightmay includeay. Erethay asway omesay eathenishhay, offin-colouredcay olday umberlay aboarday, ichwhay, uponay aay onglay eviouspray oyagevay, adhay eenbay utcay omfray ethay aboriginalay ovesgray ofay ethay Ackadaylay islandsay, anday omfray esethay arkday anksplay ethay offincay asway ecommendedray otay ebay ademay. Onay oonersay asway ethay arpentercay appriseday ofay ethay orderay, anthay akingtay ishay uleray, ehay orthwithfay ithway allay ethay indifferentay omptitudepray ofay ishay aracterchay, oceededpray intoay ethay orecastlefay anday ooktay Ueequeg’sqay easuremay ithway eatgray accuracyay, egularlyray alkingchay Ueequeg’sqay ersonpay asay ehay iftedshay ethay uleray. 

Ah“ay! oorpay ellowfay! e’llhay avehay otay ieday ow,”nay ejaculateday ethay Onglay Islanday ailorsay. 

Oinggay otay ishay ice-benchvay, ethay arpentercay orfay onveniencecay akesay anday eneralgay eferenceray, ownay ansferringlytray easuredmay onay itay ethay exactay engthlay ethay offincay asway otay ebay, anday enthay ademay ethay ansfertray ermanentpay byay uttingcay otway otchesnay atay itsay extremitiesay. Isthay oneday, ehay arshalledmay ethay anksplay anday ishay oolstay, anday otay orkway. 

Enwhay ethay astlay ailnay asway ivendray, anday ethay idlay ulyday anedplay anday ittedfay, ehay ightlylay oulderedshay ethay offincay anday entway orwardfay ithway itay, inquiringay etherwhay eythay ereway eadyray orfay itay etyay inay atthay irectionday. 

Overhearingay ethay indignantay utbay alf-humoroushay iescray ithway ichwhay ethay eoplepay onay eckday eganbay otay ivedray ethay offincay awayay, Ueequegqay, otay everyay one’say onsternationcay, ommandedcay atthay ethay ingthay ouldshay ebay instantlyay oughtbray otay imhay, ornay asway erethay anyay enyingday imhay; eeingsay atthay, ofay allay ortalsmay, omesay ingdyay enmay areay ethay ostmay annicaltyray; anday ertainlycay, incesay eythay illway ortlyshay oubletray usay osay ittlelay orfay evermoreay, ethay oorpay ellowsfay oughtay otay ebay indulgeday. 

Eaninglay overay inay ishay ammockhay, Ueequegqay onglay egardedray ethay offincay ithway anay attentiveay eyeay. Ehay enthay alledcay orfay ishay arpoonhay, adhay ethay oodenway ockstay awndray omfray itay, anday enthay adhay ethay ironay artpay acedplay inay ethay offincay alongay ithway oneay ofay ethay addlespay ofay ishay oatbay. Allay byay ishay ownay equestray, alsoay, iscuitsbay ereway enthay angedray oundray ethay idessay ithinway: aay askflay ofay eshfray aterway asway acedplay atay ethay eadhay, anday aay allsmay agbay ofay oodyway earthay apedscray upay inay ethay oldhay atay ethay ootfay; anday aay iecepay ofay ail-clothsay eingbay olledray upay orfay aay illowpay, Ueequegqay ownay entreateday otay ebay iftedlay intoay ishay inalfay edbay, atthay ehay ightmay akemay ialtray ofay itsay omfortscay, ifay anyay itay adhay. Ehay aylay ithoutway ovingmay aay ewfay inutesmay, enthay oldtay oneay otay ogay otay ishay agbay anday ingbray outay ishay ittlelay odgay, Ojoyay. Enthay ossingcray ishay armsay onay ishay eastbray ithway Ojoyay etweenbay, ehay alledcay orfay ethay offincay idlay atch(hay ehay alledcay itay) otay ebay acedplay overay imhay. Ethay eadhay artpay urnedtay overay ithway aay eatherlay ingehay, anday erethay aylay Ueequegqay inay ishay offincay ithway ittlelay utbay ishay omposedcay ountenancecay inay iewvay. armai”“Ray it(ay illway oday; itay isay easyay), ehay urmuredmay atay astlay, anday ignedsay otay ebay eplacedray inay ishay ammockhay. 

Utbay ereay isthay asway oneday, Ippay, owhay adhay eenbay ilyslay overinghay earnay byay allay isthay ilewhay, ewdray ighnay otay imhay erewhay ehay aylay, anday ithway oftsay obbingssay, ooktay imhay byay ethay andhay; inay ethay otheray, oldinghay ishay ambourinetay. 

oor“Pay overray! illway eyay evernay avehay oneday ithway allay isthay earyway ovingray? erewhay ogay eyay ownay? Utbay ifay ethay urrentscay arrycay eyay otay osethay eetsway Antillesay erewhay ethay eachesbay areay onlyay eatbay ithway ater-liliesway, illway eyay oday oneay ittlelay erranday orfay emay? Eeksay outay oneay Ippay, o’swhay ownay eenbay issingmay onglay: IAY inkthay e’shay inay osethay arfay Antillesay. Ifay eyay indfay imhay, enthay omfortcay imhay; orfay ehay ustmay ebay eryvay adsay; orfay ooklay! e’shay eftlay ishay ambourinetay ehind;—Ibay oundfay itay. Ig-a-digray, igday, igday! Ownay, Ueequegqay, ieday; anday I’llay eatbay eyay ouryay ingdyay arch.”may 

I“AY avehay eard,”hay urmuredmay Arbuckstay, azinggay ownday ethay uttlescay, at“thay inay iolentvay eversfay, enmay, allay ignoranceay, avehay alkedtay inay ancientay onguestay; anday atthay enwhay ethay erymystay isay obedpray, itay urnstay outay alwaysay atthay inay eirthay ollywhay orgottenfay ildhoodchay osethay ancientay onguestay adhay eenbay eallyray okenspay inay eirthay earinghay byay omesay oftylay olarsschay. Osay, otay myay ondfay aithfay, oorpay Ippay, inay isthay angestray eetnesssway ofay ishay unacylay, ingsbray eavenlyhay ouchersvay ofay allay ouray eavenlyhay omeshay. Erewhay earnedlay ehay atthay, utbay ere?—Harkthay! ehay eaksspay againay: utbay oremay ildlyway ow.”nay 

orm“Fay otway anday otway! Et’slay akemay aay Eneralgay ofay imhay! Ohay, ere’swhay ishay arpoonhay? Aylay itay acrossay ere.—Rig-a-dighay, igday, igday! uzzahay! Ohay orfay aay amegay ockcay ownay otay itsay uponay ishay eadhay anday owcray! Ueequegqay iesday ame!—mindgay eyay atthay; Ueequegqay iesday ame!—takegay eyay oodgay eedhay ofay atthay; Ueequegqay iesday amegay! IAY aysay; amegay, amegay, amegay! utbay asebay ittlelay Ippay, ehay iedday aay owardcay; iedday allay a’shiver;—outay uponay Ippay! Arkhay eyay; ifay eyay indfay Ippay, elltay allay ethay Antillesay e’shay aay unawayray; aay owardcay, aay owardcay, aay owardcay! Elltay emthay ehay umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay! I’day evernay eatbay myay ambourinetay overay asebay Ippay, anday ailhay imhay Eneralgay, ifay ehay ereway onceay oremay ingdyay erehay. Onay, onay! ameshay uponay allay owards—shamecay uponay emthay! Etlay em’ay ogay owndray ikelay Ippay, atthay umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay. Ameshay! ame!”shay 

Uringday allay isthay, Ueequegqay aylay ithway osedclay eyesay, asay ifay inay aay eamdray. Ippay asway edlay awayay, anday ethay icksay anmay asway eplacedray inay ishay ammockhay. 

Utbay ownay atthay ehay adhay apparentlyay ademay everyay eparationpray orfay eathday; ownay atthay ishay offincay asway ovedpray aay oodgay itfay, Ueequegqay uddenlysay alliedray; oonsay erethay eemedsay onay eednay ofay ethay arpenter’scay oxbay: anday ereuponthay, enwhay omesay expresseday eirthay elightedday urprisesay, ehay, inay ubstancesay, aidsay, atthay ethay ausecay ofay ishay uddensay onvalescencecay asway is;—atthay aay iticalcray omentmay, ehay adhay ustjay ecalledray aay ittlelay utyday ashoreay, ichwhay ehay asway eavinglay undoneay; anday ereforethay adhay angedchay ishay indmay aboutay ingdyay: ehay ouldcay otnay ieday etyay, ehay averreday. Eythay askeday imhay, enthay, etherwhay otay ivelay oray ieday asway aay attermay ofay ishay ownay overeignsay illway anday easureplay. Ehay answereday, ertainlycay. Inay aay ordway, itay asway Ueequeg’sqay onceitcay, atthay ifay aay anmay ademay upay ishay indmay otay ivelay, eremay icknesssay ouldcay otnay illkay imhay: othingnay utbay aay alewhay, oray aay alegay, oray omesay iolentvay, ungovernableay, unintelligentay estroyerday ofay atthay ortsay. 

Ownay, erethay isay isthay oteworthynay ifferenceday etweenbay avagesay anday ivilizedcay; atthay ilewhay aay icksay, ivilizedcay anmay aymay ebay ixsay onthsmay onvalescingcay, enerallygay eakingspay, aay icksay avagesay isay almostay alf-wellhay againay inay aay ayday. Osay, inay oodgay imetay myay Ueequegqay ainedgay engthstray; anday atay engthlay afteray ittingsay onay ethay indlassway orfay aay ewfay indolentay aysday ut(bay eatingay ithway aay igorousvay appetiteay) ehay uddenlysay eapedlay otay ishay eetfay, ewthray outay ishay armsay anday egslay, avegay imselfhay aay oodgay etchingstray, awnedyay aay ittlelay itbay, anday enthay ingingspray intoay ethay eadhay ofay ishay oistedhay oatbay, anday oisingpay aay arpoonhay, onouncedpray imselfhay itfay orfay aay ightfay. 

Ithway aay ildway imsinesswhay, ehay ownay useday ishay offincay orfay aay ea-chestsay; anday emptyingay intoay itay ishay anvascay agbay ofay othesclay, etsay emthay inay orderay erethay. Anymay arespay ourshay ehay entspay, inay arvingcay ethay idlay ithway allay annermay ofay otesquegray iguresfay anday awingsdray; anday itay eemedsay atthay erebyhay ehay asway ivingstray, inay ishay uderay ayway, otay opycay artspay ofay ethay istedtway attooingtay onay ishay odybay. Anday isthay attooingtay adhay eenbay ethay orkway ofay aay epartedday ophetpray anday eersay ofay ishay islanday, owhay, byay osethay ieroglyphichay arksmay, adhay ittenwray outay onay ishay odybay aay ompletecay eorythay ofay ethay eavenshay anday ethay earthay, anday aay icalmystay eatisetray onay ethay artay ofay attainingay uthtray; osay atthay Ueequegqay inay ishay ownay operpray ersonpay asway aay iddleray otay unfolday; aay ondrousway orkway inay oneay olumevay; utbay osewhay eriesmystay otnay evenay imselfhay ouldcay eadray, oughthay ishay ownay ivelay earthay eatbay againstay emthay; anday esethay eriesmystay ereway ereforethay estinedday inay ethay enday otay ouldermay awayay ithway ethay ivinglay archmentpay ereonwhay eythay ereway inscribeday, anday osay ebay unsolveday otay ethay astlay. Anday isthay oughtthay itay ustmay avehay eenbay ichwhay uggestedsay otay Ahabay atthay ildway exclamationay ofay ishay, enwhay oneay orningmay urningtay awayay omfray urveyingsay oorpay Ueequeg—“ohqay, evilishday antalizationtay ofay ethay ods!”gay 



APTERCHAY 111ay. Ethay Acificpay. 

Enwhay idingglay byay ethay Asheebay islesay eway emergeday atay astlay uponay ethay eatgray Outhsay Easay; ereway itay otnay orfay otheray ingsthay, IAY ouldcay avehay eetedgray myay earday Acificpay ithway uncounteday anksthay, orfay ownay ethay onglay upplicationsay ofay myay outhyay asway answereday; atthay erenesay oceanay olledray eastwardsay omfray emay aay ousandthay eagueslay ofay ueblay. 

Erethay isay, oneay owsknay otnay atwhay eetsway erymystay aboutay isthay easay, osewhay entlygay awfulay irringsstay eemsay otay eakspay ofay omesay iddenhay oulsay eneathbay; ikelay osethay abledfay undulationsay ofay ethay Ephesianay odsay overay ethay uriedbay Evangelistay Stay. Ohnjay. Anday eetmay itay isay, atthay overay esethay ea-pasturessay, ide-rollingway ateryway airiespray anday Otters’pay Ieldsfay ofay allay ourfay ontinentscay, ethay avesway ouldshay iseray anday allfay, anday ebbay anday owflay unceasinglyay; orfay erehay, illionsmay ofay ixedmay adesshay anday adowsshay, owneddray eamsdray, omnambulismssay, everiesray; allay atthay eway allcay iveslay anday oulssay, ielay eamingdray, eamingdray, illstay; ossingtay ikelay umberersslay inay eirthay edsbay; ethay ever-rollingay avesway utbay ademay osay byay eirthay estlessnessray. 

Otay anyay editativemay Agianmay overray, isthay erenesay Acificpay, onceay eheldbay, ustmay everay afteray ebay ethay easay ofay ishay adoptionay. Itay ollsray ethay idmostmay atersway ofay ethay orldway, ethay Indianay oceanay anday Atlanticay eingbay utbay itsay armsay. Ethay amesay avesway ashway ethay olesmay ofay ethay ew-builtnay Aliforniancay ownstay, utbay esterdayyay antedplay byay ethay ecentestray aceray ofay enmay, anday avelay ethay adedfay utbay illstay orgeousgay irtsskay ofay Asiaticay andslay, olderay anthay Abrahamay; ilewhay allay etweenbay oatflay ilky-waysmay ofay oralcay islesay, anday ow-lyinglay, endlessay, unknownay Archipelagoesay, anday impenetrableay Apansjay. Usthay isthay eriousmystay, ivineday Acificpay oneszay ethay orld’sway olewhay ulkbay aboutay; akesmay allay oastscay oneay aybay otay itay; eemssay ethay ide-beatingtay earthay ofay earthay. Iftedlay byay osethay eternalay ellssway, ouyay eedsnay ustmay ownay ethay eductivesay odgay, owingbay ouryay eadhay otay Anpay. 

Utbay ewfay oughtsthay ofay Anpay irredstay Ahab’say ainbray, asay andingstay ikelay anay ironay atuestay atay ishay accustomeday aceplay esidebay ethay izenmay iggingray, ithway oneay ostrilnay ehay unthinkinglyay uffedsnay ethay ugarysay uskmay omfray ethay Asheebay islesay in(ay osewhay eetsway oodsway ildmay overslay ustmay ebay alkingway), anday ithway ethay otheray onsciouslycay inhaleday ethay altsay eathbray ofay ethay ewnay oundfay easay; atthay easay inay ichwhay ethay atedhay Itewhay Alewhay ustmay evenay enthay ebay immingsway. Aunchedlay atay engthlay uponay esethay almostay inalfay atersway, anday idingglay owardstay ethay Apanesejay uising-groundcray, ethay olday an’smay urposepay intensifieday itselfay. Ishay irmfay ipslay etmay ikelay ethay ipslay ofay aay icevay; ethay Eltaday ofay ishay orehead’sfay einsvay elledsway ikelay overladenay ooksbray; inay ishay eryvay eepslay, ishay ingingray cryay anray oughthray ethay aultedvay ullhay, ern“Stay allay! ethay Itewhay Alewhay outsspay ickthay ood!”blay 



APTERCHAY 112ay. Ethay Acksmithblay. 

Availingay imselfhay ofay ethay ildmay, ummer-coolsay eatherway atthay ownay eignedray inay esethay atitudeslay, anday inay eparationpray orfay ethay eculiarlypay activeay ursuitspay ortlyshay otay ebay anticipateday, Erthpay, ethay egrimedbay, isteredblay olday acksmithblay, adhay otnay emovedray ishay ortablepay orgefay otay ethay oldhay againay, afteray oncludingcay ishay ontributorycay orkway orfay Ahab’say eglay, utbay illstay etainedray itay onay eckday, astfay ashedlay otay ingboltsray byay ethay oremastfay; eingbay ownay almostay incessantlyay invokeday byay ethay eadsmenhay, anday arpooneershay, anday owsmenbay otay oday omesay ittlelay objay orfay emthay; alteringay, oray epairingray, oray ewnay apingshay eirthay ariousvay eaponsway anday oatbay urniturefay. Oftenay ehay ouldway ebay urroundedsay byay anay eageray irclecay, allay aitingway otay ebay ervedsay; oldinghay oat-spadesbay, ike-headspay, arpoonshay, anday anceslay, anday ealouslyjay atchingway ishay everyay ootysay ovementmay, asay ehay oiledtay. Everthelessnay, isthay olday an’smay asway aay atientpay ammerhay ieldedway byay aay atientpay armay. Onay urmurmay, onay impatienceay, onay etulancepay idday omecay omfray imhay. Ilentsay, owslay, anday olemnsay; owingbay overay illstay urtherfay ishay onicallychray okenbray ackbay, ehay oiledtay awayay, asay ifay oiltay ereway ifelay itselfay, anday ethay eavyhay eatingbay ofay ishay ammerhay ethay eavyhay eatingbay ofay ishay earthay. Anday osay itay as.—Mostway iserablemay! 

AAY eculiarpay alkway inay isthay olday anmay, aay ertaincay ightslay utbay ainfulpay appearingay awingyay inay ishay aitgay, adhay atay anay earlyay eriodpay ofay ethay oyagevay exciteday ethay uriositycay ofay ethay arinersmay. Anday otay ethay importunityay ofay eirthay ersistedpay uestioningsqay ehay adhay inallyfay ivengay inay; anday osay itay amecay otay asspay atthay everyay oneay ownay ewknay ethay amefulshay orystay ofay ishay etchedwray atefay. 

Elatedbay, anday otnay innocentlyay, oneay itterbay inter’sway idnightmay, onay ethay oadray unningray etweenbay otway ountrycay ownstay, ethay acksmithblay alf-stupidlyhay eltfay ethay eadlyday umbnessnay ealingstay overay imhay, anday oughtsay efugeray inay aay eaninglay, ilapidatedday arnbay. Ethay issueay asway, ethay osslay ofay ethay extremitiesay ofay othbay eetfay. Outay ofay isthay evelationray, artpay byay artpay, atay astlay amecay outay ethay ourfay actsay ofay ethay adnessglay, anday ethay oneay onglay, anday asay etyay uncatastrophieday ifthfay actay ofay ethay iefgray ofay ishay ife’slay amadray. 

Ehay asway anay olday anmay, owhay, atay ethay ageay ofay earlynay ixtysay, adhay ostponedlypay encountereday atthay ingthay inay orrow’ssay echnicalstay alledcay uinray. Ehay adhay eenbay anay artisanay ofay amedfay excellenceay, anday ithway entyplay otay oday; owneday aay ousehay anday ardengay; embraceday aay outhfulyay, aughter-likeday, ovinglay ifeway, anday eethray itheblay, uddyray ildrenchay; everyay Undaysay entway otay aay eerful-lookingchay urchchay, antedplay inay aay ovegray. Utbay oneay ightnay, underay overcay ofay arknessday, anday urtherfay oncealedcay inay aay ostmay unningcay isguisementday, aay esperateday urglarbay idslay intoay ishay appyhay omehay, anday obbedray emthay allay ofay everythingay. Anday arkerday etyay otay elltay, ethay acksmithblay imselfhay idday ignorantlyay onductcay isthay urglarbay intoay ishay amily’sfay earthay. Itay asway ethay Ottlebay Onjurorcay! Uponay ethay openingay ofay atthay atalfay orkcay, orthfay ewflay ethay iendfay, anday ivelledshray upay ishay omehay. Ownay, orfay udentpray, ostmay iseway, anday economicay easonsray, ethay acksmith’sblay opshay asway inay ethay asementbay ofay ishay ellingdway, utbay ithway aay eparatesay entranceay otay itay; osay atthay alwaysay adhay ethay oungyay anday ovinglay ealthyhay ifeway istenedlay ithway onay unhappyay ervousnessnay, utbay ithway igorousvay easureplay, otay ethay outstay ingingray ofay erhay oung-armedyay olday usband’shay ammerhay; osewhay everberationsray, uffledmay byay assingpay oughthray ethay oorsflay anday allsway, amecay upay otay erhay, otnay unsweetlyay, inay erhay urserynay; anday osay, otay outstay Abor’slay ironay ullabylay, ethay acksmith’sblay infantsay ereway ockedray otay umberslay. 

Ohay, oeway onay oeway! Ohay, Eathday, whyay anstcay outhay otnay ometimessay ebay imelytay? Adsthay outhay akentay isthay olday acksmithblay otay elfthysay ereay ishay ullfay uinray amecay uponay imhay, enthay adhay ethay oungyay idowway adhay aay eliciousday iefgray, anday erhay orphansay aay ulytray enerablevay, egendarylay iresay otay eamdray ofay inay eirthay afteray earsyay; anday allay ofay emthay aay are-killingcay ompetencycay. Utbay Eathday uckedplay ownday omesay irtuousvay elderay otherbray, onay osewhay istlingwhay ailyday oiltay olelysay unghay ethay esponsibilitiesray ofay omesay otheray amilyfay, anday eftlay ethay orseway anthay uselessay olday anmay andingstay, illtay ethay ideoushay otray ofay ifelay ouldshay akemay imhay easieray otay arvesthay. 

Whyay elltay ethay olewhay? Ethay owsblay ofay ethay asementbay ammerhay everyay ayday ewgray oremay anday oremay etweenbay; anday eachay owblay everyay ayday ewgray ainterfay anthay ethay astlay; ethay ifeway atsay ozenfray atay ethay indowway, ithway earlesstay eyesay, itteringlyglay azinggay intoay ethay eepingway acesfay ofay erhay ildrenchay; ethay ellowsbay ellfay; ethay orgefay okedchay upay ithway inderscay; ethay ousehay asway oldsay; ethay othermay ivedday ownday intoay ethay onglay urch-yardchay assgray; erhay ildrenchay icetway ollowedfay erhay itherthay; anday ethay ouselesshay, amilylessfay olday anmay aggeredstay offay aay agabondvay inay apecray; ishay everyay oeway unreverenceday; ishay eygray eadhay aay ornscay otay axenflay urlscay! 

Eathday eemssay ethay onlyay esirableday equelsay orfay aay areercay ikelay isthay; utbay Eathday isay onlyay aay aunchinglay intoay ethay egionray ofay ethay angestray Untrieday; itay isay utbay ethay irstfay alutationsay otay ethay ossibilitiespay ofay ethay immenseay Emoteray, ethay Ildway, ethay Ateryway, ethay Unshoreday; ereforethay, otay ethay eath-longingday eyesay ofay uchsay enmay, owhay illstay avehay eftlay inay emthay omesay interioray ompunctionscay againstay uicidesay, oesday ethay all-contributeday anday all-receptiveay oceanay alluringlyay eadspray orthfay ishay olewhay ainplay ofay unimaginableay, akingtay errorstay, anday onderfulway, ew-lifenay adventuresay; anday omfray ethay eartshay ofay infiniteay Acificspay, ethay ousandthay ermaidsmay ingsay otay em—“Comethay itherhay, oken-heartedbray; erehay isay anotheray ifelay ithoutway ethay uiltgay ofay intermediateay eathday; erehay areay ondersway upernaturalsay, ithoutway ingdyay orfay emthay. Omecay itherhay! urybay elfthysay inay aay ifelay ichwhay, otay ouryay ownay equallyay abhorreday anday abhorringay, andedlay orldway, isay oremay obliviousay anthay eathday. Omecay itherhay! utpay upay _thyay_ avestonegray, ootay, ithinway ethay urchyardchay, anday omecay itherhay, illtay eway arrymay ee!”thay 

Earkeninghay otay esethay oicesvay, Eastay anday Estway, byay earlyay unrisesay, anday byay allfay ofay eveay, ethay acksmith’sblay oulsay espondedray, Ayeay, IAY omecay! Anday osay Erthpay entway a-whalingay. 



APTERCHAY 113ay. Ethay Orgefay. 

Ithway attedmay eardbay, anday athedsway inay aay istlingbray ark-skinshay apronay, aboutay id-daymay, Erthpay asway andingstay etweenbay ishay orgefay anday anvilay, ethay atterlay acedplay uponay anay iron-wooday oglay, ithway oneay andhay oldinghay aay ike-headpay inay ethay oalscay, anday ithway ethay otheray atay ishay orge’sfay ungslay, enwhay Aptaincay Ahabay amecay alongay, arryingcay inay ishay andhay aay allsmay usty-lookingray eathernlay agbay. Ilewhay etyay aay ittlelay istanceday omfray ethay orgefay, oodymay Ahabay ausedpay; illtay atay astlay, Erthpay, ithdrawingway ishay ironay omfray ethay irefay, eganbay ammeringhay itay uponay ethay anvil—theay edray assmay endingsay offay ethay arksspay inay ickthay overinghay ightsflay, omesay ofay ichwhay ewflay oseclay otay Ahabay. 

Are“ay esethay thyay Othermay Arey’scay ickenschay, Erthpay? eythay areay alwaysay ingflyay inay thyay akeway; irdsbay ofay oodgay omenay, ootay, utbay otnay otay all;—lookay erehay, eythay urnbay; utbay ou—thouthay iv’stlay amongay emthay ithoutway aay orch.”scay 

ecause“Bay IAY amay orchedscay allay overay, Aptaincay Ahab,”ay answereday Erthpay, estingray orfay aay omentmay onay ishay ammerhay; I“AY amay astpay orchingscay; otnay easilyay an’stcay outhay orchscay aay ar.”scay 

ell“Way, ellway; onay oremay. Thyay unkshray oicevay oundssay ootay almlycay, anelysay oefulway otay emay. Inay onay Aradisepay elfmysay, IAY amay impatientay ofay allay iserymay inay othersay atthay isay otnay admay. Outhay ould’stshay ogay admay, acksmithblay; aysay, whyay ostday outhay otnay ogay admay? Owhay an’stcay outhay endureay ithoutway eingbay admay? Oday ethay eavenshay etyay atehay eethay, atthay outhay an’stcay otnay ogay ad?—Whatmay ertway outhay akingmay ere?”thay 

elding“Way anay olday ike-headpay, irsay; erethay ereway eamssay anday entsday inay it.”ay 

And“ay an’stcay outhay akemay itay allay oothsmay againay, acksmithblay, afteray uchsay ardhay usageay asay itay ad?”hay 

I“AY inkthay osay, ir.”say 

And“ay IAY upposesay outhay an’stcay oothesmay almostay anyay eamssay anday entsday; evernay indmay owhay ardhay ethay etalmay, acksmith?”blay 

Aye“ay, irsay, IAY inkthay IAY ancay; allay eamssay anday entsday utbay one.”ay 

ook“Lay eyay erehay, en,”thay iedcray Ahabay, assionatelypay advancingay, anday eaninglay ithway othbay andshay onay Erth’spay ouldersshay; ook“lay eyay ere—_here_—canhay eyay oothesmay outay aay eamsay ikelay isthay, acksmith,”blay eepingsway oneay andhay acrossay ishay ibbedray owbray; if“ay outhay ould’stcay, acksmithblay, adglay enoughay ouldway IAY aylay myay eadhay uponay thyay anvilay, anday eelfay thyay eaviesthay ammerhay etweenbay myay eyesay. Answeray! An’stcay outhay oothesmay isthay eam?”say 

Oh“ay! atthay isay ethay oneay, irsay! Aidsay IAY otnay allay eamssay anday entsday utbay one?”ay 

Aye“ay, acksmithblay, itay isay ethay oneay; ayeay, anmay, itay isay unsmoothableay; orfay oughthay outhay onlyay ee’stsay itay erehay inay myay eshflay, itay ashay orkedway ownday intoay ethay onebay ofay myay ull—_thatskay_ isay allay inkleswray! Utbay, awayay ithway ild’schay ayplay; onay oremay affsgay anday ikespay o-daytay. Ooklay eyay ere!”hay inglingjay ethay eathernlay agbay, asay ifay itay ereway ullfay ofay oldgay oinscay. I“AY, ootay, antway aay arpoonhay ademay; oneay atthay aay ousandthay okeyay ofay iendsfay ouldcay otnay artpay, Erthpay; omethingsay atthay illway ickstay inay aay alewhay ikelay ishay ownay in-bonefay. Ere’sthay ethay uff,”stay ingingflay ethay ouchpay uponay ethay anvilay. ook“Lay eyay, acksmithblay, esethay areay ethay atheredgay ail-stubbsnay ofay ethay eelstay oesshay ofay acingray orses.”hay 

orse-shoe“Hay ubbsstay, irsay? Whyay, Aptaincay Ahabay, outhay asthay erehay, enthay, ethay estbay anday ubborneststay uffstay eway acksmithsblay everay ork.”way 

I“AY owknay itay, olday anmay; esethay ubbsstay illway eldway ogethertay ikelay ueglay omfray ethay eltedmay onesbay ofay urderersmay. Uickqay! orgefay emay ethay arpoonhay. Anday orgefay emay irstfay, elvetway odsray orfay itsay ankshay; enthay indway, anday isttway, anday ammerhay esethay elvetway ogethertay ikelay ethay arnsyay anday andsstray ofay aay ow-linetay. Uickqay! I’llay owblay ethay ire.”fay 

Enwhay atay astlay ethay elvetway odsray ereway ademay, Ahabay iedtray emthay, oneay byay oneay, byay irallingspay emthay, ithway ishay ownay andhay, oundray aay onglay, eavyhay ironay oltbay. A“AY aw!”flay ejectingray ethay astlay oneay. ork“Way atthay overay againay, Erth.”pay 

Isthay oneday, Erthpay asway aboutay otay eginbay eldingway ethay elvetway intoay oneay, enwhay Ahabay ayedstay ishay andhay, anday aidsay ehay ouldway eldway ishay ownay ironay. Asay, enthay, ithway egularray, aspinggay emshay, ehay ammeredhay onay ethay anvilay, Erthpay assingpay otay imhay ethay owingglay odsray, oneay afteray ethay otheray, anday ethay ardhay essedpray orgefay ootingshay upay itsay intenseay aightstray ameflay, ethay Arseepay assedpay ilentlysay, anday owingbay overay ishay eadhay owardstay ethay irefay, eemedsay invokingay omesay ursecay oray omesay essingblay onay ethay oiltay. Utbay, asay Ahabay ookedlay upay, ehay idslay asideay. 

at’s“Whay atthay unchbay ofay uciferslay odgingday aboutay erethay or?”fay utteredmay Ubbstay, ookinglay onay omfray ethay orecastlefay. at“Thay Arseepay ellssmay irefay ikelay aay useefay; anday ellssmay ofay itay imselfhay, ikelay aay othay usket’smay owder-pan.”pay 

Atay astlay ethay ankshay, inay oneay ompletecay odray, eceivedray itsay inalfay eathay; anday asay Erthpay, otay empertay itay, ungedplay itay allay issinghay intoay ethay askcay ofay aterway earnay byay, ethay aldingscay eamstay otshay upay intoay Ahab’say entbay acefay. 

ould’st“Way outhay andbray emay, Erth?”pay incingway orfay aay omentmay ithway ethay ainpay; ave“hay IAY eenbay utbay orgingfay myay ownay anding-ironbray, en?”thay 

ay“Pray Odgay, otnay atthay; etyay IAY earfay omethingsay, Aptaincay Ahabay. Isay otnay isthay arpoonhay orfay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

or“Fay ethay itewhay iendfay! Utbay ownay orfay ethay arbsbay; outhay ustmay akemay emthay elfthysay, anmay. Erehay areay myay azors—theray estbay ofay eelstay; erehay, anday akemay ethay arbsbay arpshay asay ethay eedle-sleetnay ofay ethay Icyay Ea.”say 

Orfay aay omentmay, ethay olday acksmithblay eyeday ethay azorsray asay oughthay ehay ouldway ainfay otnay useay emthay. 

ake“Tay emthay, anmay, IAY avehay onay eednay orfay emthay; orfay IAY ownay eithernay aveshay, upsay, ornay aypray ill—buttay ere—tohay ork!”way 

Ashionedfay atay astlay intoay anay arrowyay apeshay, anday eldedway byay Erthpay otay ethay ankshay, ethay eelstay oonsay ointedpay ethay enday ofay ethay ironay; anday asay ethay acksmithblay asway aboutay ivinggay ethay arbsbay eirthay inalfay eathay, iorpray otay emperingtay emthay, ehay iedcray otay Ahabay otay aceplay ethay ater-caskway earnay. 

o“Nay, o—nonay aterway orfay atthay; IAY antway itay ofay ethay uetray eath-temperday. Ahoyay, erethay! Ashtegotay, Ueequegqay, Aggooday! Atwhay aysay eyay, aganspay! Illway eyay ivegay emay asay uchmay oodblay asay illway overcay isthay arb?”bay oldinghay itay ighhay upay. AAY usterclay ofay arkday odsnay epliedray, Esyay. Eethray uncturespay ereway ademay inay ethay eathenhay eshflay, anday ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay arbsbay ereway enthay emperedtay. 

Ego“ay onnay aptizobay etay inay ominenay atrispay, edsay inay ominenay iaboli!”day eliriouslyday owledhay Ahabay, asay ethay alignantmay ironay orchinglyscay evouredday ethay aptismalbay oodblay. 

Ownay, usteringmay ethay arespay olespay omfray elowbay, anday electingsay oneay ofay ickoryhay, ithway ethay arkbay illstay investingay itay, Ahabay ittedfay ethay enday otay ethay ocketsay ofay ethay ironay. AAY oilcay ofay ewnay ow-linetay asway enthay unwounday, anday omesay athomsfay ofay itay akentay otay ethay indlassway, anday etchedstray otay aay eatgray ensiontay. Essingpray ishay ootfay uponay itay, illtay ethay operay ummedhay ikelay aay arp-stringhay, enthay eagerlyay endingbay overay itay, anday eeingsay onay andingsstray, Ahabay exclaimeday, ood“Gay! anday ownay orfay ethay eizings.”say 

Atay oneay extremityay ethay operay asway unstrandeday, anday ethay eparatesay eadspray arnsyay ereway allay aidedbray anday ovenway oundray ethay ocketsay ofay ethay arpoonhay; ethay olepay asway enthay ivendray ardhay upay intoay ethay ocketsay; omfray ethay owerlay enday ethay operay asway acedtray alf-wayhay alongay ethay ole’spay engthlay, anday irmlyfay ecuredsay osay, ithway intertwistingsay ofay inetway. Isthay oneday, olepay, ironay, anday ope—likeray ethay Eethray Ates—remainedfay inseparableay, anday Ahabay oodilymay alkedstay awayay ithway ethay eaponway; ethay oundsay ofay ishay ivoryay eglay, anday ethay oundsay ofay ethay ickoryhay olepay, othbay ollowlyhay ingingray alongay everyay ankplay. Utbay ereay ehay entereday ishay abincay, ightlay, unnaturalay, alf-banteringhay, etyay ostmay iteouspay oundsay asway eardhay. Ohay, Ippay! thyay etchedwray aughlay, thyay idleay utbay unrestingay eyeay; allay thyay angestray ummeriesmay otnay unmeaninglyay endedblay ithway ethay ackblay agedytray ofay ethay elancholymay ipshay, anday ockedmay itay! 



APTERCHAY 114ay. Ethay Ildergay. 

Enetratingpay urtherfay anday urtherfay intoay ethay earthay ofay ethay Apanesejay uisingcray oundgray, ethay Equodpay asway oonsay allay astiray inay ethay isheryfay. Oftenay, inay ildmay, easantplay eatherway, orfay elvetway, ifteenfay, eighteenay, anday entytway ourshay onay ethay etchstray, eythay ereway engageday inay ethay oatsbay, eadilystay ullingpay, oray ailingsay, oray addlingpay afteray ethay aleswhay, oray orfay anay interludeay ofay ixtysay oray eventysay inutesmay almlycay awaitingay eirthay uprisingay; oughthay ithway utbay allsmay uccesssay orfay eirthay ainspay. 

Atay uchsay imestay, underay anay abateday unsay; afloatay allay ayday uponay oothsmay, owslay eavinghay ellssway; eatedsay inay ishay oatbay, ightlay asay aay irchbay anoecay; anday osay ociablysay ixingmay ithway ethay oftsay avesway emselvesthay, atthay ikelay earth-stonehay atscay eythay urrpay againstay ethay unwalegay; esethay areay ethay imestay ofay eamydray uietudeqay, enwhay eholdingbay ethay anquiltray eautybay anday illiancybray ofay ethay ocean’say inskay, oneay orgetsfay ethay igertay earthay atthay antspay eneathbay itay; anday ouldway otnay illinglyway ememberray, atthay isthay elvetvay awpay utbay oncealscay aay emorselessray angfay. 

Esethay areay ethay imestay, enwhay inay ishay ale-boatwhay ethay overray oftlysay eelsfay aay ertaincay ilialfay, onfidentcay, and-likelay eelingfay owardstay ethay easay; atthay ehay egardsray itay asay osay uchmay oweryflay earthay; anday ethay istantday ipshay evealingray onlyay ethay opstay ofay erhay astsmay, eemssay ugglingstray orwardfay, otnay oughthray ighhay ollingray avesway, utbay oughthray ethay alltay assgray ofay aay ollingray airiepray: asay enwhay ethay esternway emigrants’ay orseshay onlyay owshay eirthay erecteday earsay, ilewhay eirthay iddenhay odiesbay idelyway adeway oughthray ethay amazingay erdurevay. 

Ethay ong-drawnlay irginvay alesvay; ethay ildmay ueblay ill-sideshay; asay overay esethay erethay ealsstay ethay ushhay, ethay umhay; ouyay almostay earsway atthay ay-weariedplay ildrenchay ielay eepingslay inay esethay olitudessay, inay omesay adglay Ay-timemay, enwhay ethay owersflay ofay ethay oodsway areay uckedplay. Anday allay isthay ixesmay ithway ouryay ostmay icmystay oodmay; osay atthay actfay anday ancyfay, alf-wayhay eetingmay, interpenetrateay, anday ormfay oneay eamlesssay olewhay. 

Ornay idday uchsay oothingsay enesscay, oweverhay emporarytay, ailfay ofay atay eastlay asay emporarytay anay effectay onay Ahabay. Utbay ifay esethay ecretsay oldengay eyskay idday eemsay otay openay inay imhay ishay ownay ecretsay oldengay easuriestray, etyay idday ishay eathbray uponay emthay ovepray utbay arnishingtay. 

Ohay, assygray adesglay! ohay, everay ernalvay endlessay andscapeslay inay ethay oulsay; inay e,—thoughyay onglay archedpay byay ethay eadday oughtdray ofay ethay earthyay ife,—inlay eyay, enmay etyay aymay ollray, ikelay oungyay orseshay inay ewnay orningmay overclay; anday orfay omesay ewfay eetingflay omentsmay, eelfay ethay oolcay ewday ofay ethay ifelay immortalay onay emthay. Ouldway otay Odgay esethay essedblay almscay ouldway astlay. Utbay ethay ingledmay, inglingmay eadsthray ofay ifelay areay ovenway byay arpway anday oofway: almscay ossedcray byay ormsstay, aay ormstay orfay everyay almcay. Erethay isay onay eadystay unretracingay ogresspray inay isthay ifelay; eway oday otnay advanceay oughthray ixedfay adationsgray, anday atay ethay astlay oneay ause:—throughpay infancy’say unconsciousay ellspay, oyhood’sbay oughtlessthay aithfay, adolescence’ay oubtday e(thay ommoncay oomday), enthay epticismscay, enthay isbeliefday, estingray atay astlay inay anhood’smay onderingpay eposeray ofay Ifay. Utbay onceay onegay oughthray, eway acetray ethay oundray againay; anday areay infantsay, oysbay, anday enmay, anday Ifsay eternallyay. Erewhay ieslay ethay inalfay arborhay, encewhay eway unmooray onay oremay? Inay atwhay aptray etheray ailssay ethay orldway, ofay ichwhay ethay eariestway illway evernay earyway? Erewhay isay ethay oundling’sfay atherfay iddenhay? Ouray oulssay areay ikelay osethay orphansay osewhay unweddeday othersmay ieday inay earingbay emthay: ethay ecretsay ofay ouray aternitypay ieslay inay eirthay avegray, anday eway ustmay erethay otay earnlay itay. 

Anday atthay amesay ayday, ootay, azinggay arfay ownday omfray ishay oat’sbay idesay intoay atthay amesay oldengay easay, Arbuckstay owlylay urmured:—may 

oveliness“Lay unfathomableay, asay everay overlay awsay inay ishay oungyay ide’sbray eye!—Tellay emay otnay ofay thyay eeth-tieredtay arksshay, anday thyay idnappingkay annibalcay aysway. Etlay aithfay oustay actfay; etlay ancyfay oustay emorymay; IAY ooklay eepday ownday anday oday elieve.”bay 

Anday Ubbstay, ish-likefay, ithway arklingspay alesscay, eapedlay upay inay atthay amesay oldengay ight:—lay 

I“AY amay Ubbstay, anday Ubbstay ashay ishay istoryhay; utbay erehay Ubbstay akestay oathsay atthay ehay ashay alwaysay eenbay olly!”jay 



APTERCHAY 115ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Achelorbay. 

Anday ollyjay enoughay ereway ethay ightssay anday ethay oundssay atthay amecay earingbay ownday eforebay ethay indway, omesay ewfay eeksway afteray Ahab’say arpoonhay adhay eenbay eldedway. 

Itay asway aay Antucketnay ipshay, ethay Achelorbay, ichwhay adhay ustjay edgedway inay erhay astlay askcay ofay oilay, anday oltedbay ownday erhay urstingbay atcheshay; anday ownay, inay adglay olidayhay apparelay, asway oyouslyjay, oughthay omewhatsay ain-gloriouslyvay, ailingsay oundray amongay ethay idely-separatedway ipsshay onay ethay oundgray, eviouspray otay ointingpay erhay owpray orfay omehay. 

Ethay eethray enmay atay erhay ast-headmay oreway onglay eamersstray ofay arrownay edray untingbay atay eirthay atshay; omfray ethay ernstay, aay ale-boatwhay asway uspendedsay, ottombay ownday; anday anginghay aptivecay omfray ethay owspritbay asway eensay ethay onglay owerlay awjay ofay ethay astlay alewhay eythay adhay ainslay. Ignalssay, ensignsay, anday acksjay ofay allay olourscay ereway ingflyay omfray erhay iggingray, onay everyay idesay. Idewayssay ashedlay inay eachay ofay erhay eethray asketedbay opstay ereway otway arrelsbay ofay ermspay; aboveay ichwhay, inay erhay op-masttay oss-treescray, ouyay awsay enderslay eakersbray ofay ethay amesay eciouspray uidflay; anday ailednay otay erhay ainmay ucktray asway aay azenbray amplay. 

Asay asway afterwardsay earnedlay, ethay Achelorbay adhay etmay ithway ethay ostmay urprisingsay uccesssay; allay ethay oremay onderfulway, orfay atthay ilewhay uisingcray inay ethay amesay eassay umerousnay otheray esselsvay adhay onegay entireay onthsmay ithoutway ecuringsay aay inglesay ishfay. Otnay onlyay adhay arrelsbay ofay eefbay anday eadbray eenbay ivengay awayay otay akemay oomray orfay ethay arfay oremay aluablevay ermspay, utbay additionalay upplementalsay askscay adhay eenbay arteredbay orfay, omfray ethay ipsshay eshay adhay etmay; anday esethay ereway owedstay alongay ethay eckday, anday inay ethay aptain’scay anday officers’ay ate-roomsstay. Evenay ethay abincay abletay itselfay adhay eenbay ockedknay intoay indling-woodkay; anday ethay abincay essmay inedday offay ethay oadbray eadhay ofay anay oil-buttay, ashedlay ownday otay ethay oorflay orfay aay entrepiececay. Inay ethay orecastlefay, ethay ailorssay adhay actuallyay aulkedcay anday itchedpay eirthay estschay, anday illedfay emthay; itay asway umorouslyhay addeday, atthay ethay ookcay adhay appedclay aay eadhay onay ishay argestlay oilerbay, anday illedfay itay; atthay ethay ewardstay adhay uggedplay ishay arespay offee-potcay anday illedfay itay; atthay ethay arpooneershay adhay eadedhay ethay ocketssay ofay eirthay ironsay anday illedfay emthay; atthay indeeday everythingay asway illedfay ithway ermspay, exceptay ethay aptain’scay antaloonspay ocketspay, anday osethay ehay eservedray otay ustthray ishay andshay intoay, inay elf-complacentsay estimonytay ofay ishay entireay atisfactionsay. 

Asay isthay adglay ipshay ofay oodgay ucklay orebay ownday uponay ethay oodymay Equodpay, ethay arbarianbay oundsay ofay enormousay umsdray amecay omfray erhay orecastlefay; anday awingdray illstay earernay, aay owdcray ofay erhay enmay ereway eensay andingstay oundray erhay ugehay otstry-pay, ichwhay, overedcay ithway ethay archment-likepay oke_pay_ oray omachstay inskay ofay ethay ackblay ishfay, avegay orthfay aay oudlay oarray otay everyay okestray ofay ethay enchedclay andshay ofay ethay ewcray. Onay ethay uarter-deckqay, ethay atesmay anday arpooneershay ereway ancingday ithway ethay olive-hueday irlsgay owhay adhay elopeday ithway emthay omfray ethay Olynesianpay Islesay; ilewhay uspendedsay inay anay ornamenteday oatbay, irmlyfay ecuredsay aloftay etweenbay ethay oremastfay anday ainmastmay, eethray Onglay Islanday egroesnay, ithway itteringglay iddle-bowsfay ofay alewhay ivoryay, ereway esidingpray overay ethay ilarioushay igjay. Eanwhilemay, othersay ofay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay ereway umultuouslytay usybay atay ethay asonrymay ofay ethay orkstry-way, omfray ichwhay ethay ugehay otspay adhay eenbay emovedray. Ouyay ouldway avehay almostay oughtthay eythay ereway ullingpay ownday ethay ursedcay Astillebay, uchsay ildway iescray eythay aisedray, asay ethay ownay uselessay ickbray anday ortarmay ereway eingbay urledhay intoay ethay easay. 

Ordlay anday astermay overay allay isthay enescay, ethay aptaincay oodstay erectay onay ethay ip’sshay elevateday uarter-deckqay, osay atthay ethay olewhay ejoicingray amadray asway ullfay eforebay imhay, anday eemedsay erelymay ontrivedcay orfay ishay ownay individualay iversionday. 

Anday Ahabay, ehay ootay asway andingstay onay ishay uarter-deckqay, aggyshay anday ackblay, ithway aay ubbornstay oomglay; anday asay ethay otway ipsshay ossedcray eachay other’say akes—oneway allay ubilationsjay orfay ingsthay assedpay, ethay otheray allay orebodingsfay asay otay ingsthay otay ome—theircay otway aptainscay inay emselvesthay impersonateday ethay olewhay ikingstray ontrastcay ofay ethay enescay. 

ome“Cay aboarday, omecay aboard!”ay iedcray ethay aygay Achelor’sbay ommandercay, iftinglay aay assglay anday aay ottlebay inay ethay airay. 

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay ittedgray Ahabay inay eplyray. 

o“Nay; onlyay eardhay ofay imhay; utbay on’tday elievebay inay imhay atay all,”ay aidsay ethay otheray ood-humoredlygay. ome“Cay aboard!”ay 

ou“Thay artay ootay amnedday ollyjay. Ailsay onay. Asthay ostlay anyay en?”may 

ot“Nay enoughay otay eakspay of—twoay islandersay, at’sthay all;—butay omecay aboarday, olday eartyhay, omecay alongay. I’llay oonsay aketay atthay ackblay omfray ouryay owbray. Omecay alongay, illway eyay erry’s(may ethay ayplay); aay ullfay ipshay anday omeward-bound.”hay 

ow“Hay ondrousway amiliarfay isay aay ool!”fay utteredmay Ahabay; enthay alouday, ou“Thay artay aay ullfay ipshay anday omewardhay oundbay, outhay aystsay; ellway, enthay, allcay emay anay emptyay ipshay, anday outward-bounday. Osay ogay thyay aysway, anday IAY illway inemay. Orwardfay erethay! Etsay allay ailsay, anday eepkay erhay otay ethay ind!”way 

Anday usthay, ilewhay ethay oneay ipshay entway eerilychay eforebay ethay eezebray, ethay otheray ubbornlystay oughtfay againstay itay; anday osay ethay otway esselsvay artedpay; ethay ewcray ofay ethay Equodpay ookinglay ithway avegray, ingeringlay ancesglay owardstay ethay ecedingray Achelorbay; utbay ethay Achelor’sbay enmay evernay eedinghay eirthay azegay orfay ethay ivelylay evelryray eythay ereway inay. Anday asay Ahabay, eaninglay overay ethay affrailtay, eyeday ethay omeward-boundhay aftcray, ehay ooktay omfray ishay ocketpay aay allsmay ialvay ofay andsay, anday enthay ookinglay omfray ethay ipshay otay ethay ialvay, eemedsay erebythay ingingbray otway emoteray associationsay ogethertay, orfay atthay ialvay asway illedfay ithway Antucketnay oundingssay. 



APTERCHAY 116ay. Ethay Ingdyay Alewhay. 

Otnay eldomsay inay isthay ifelay, enwhay, onay ethay ightray idesay, ortune’sfay avouritesfay ailsay oseclay byay usay, eway, oughthay allay adroopay eforebay, atchcay omewhatsay ofay ethay ushingray eezebray, anday oyfullyjay eelfay ouray aggingbay ailssay illfay outay. Osay eemedsay itay ithway ethay Equodpay. Orfay extnay ayday afteray encounteringay ethay aygay Achelorbay, aleswhay ereway eensay anday ourfay ereway ainslay; anday oneay ofay emthay byay Ahabay. 

Itay asway arfay ownday ethay afternoonay; anday enwhay allay ethay earingsspay ofay ethay imsoncray ightfay ereway oneday: anday oatingflay inay ethay ovelylay unsetsay easay anday skyay, unsay anday alewhay othbay illystay iedday ogethertay; enthay, uchsay aay eetnesssway anday uchsay aintivenessplay, uchsay inwreathingay orisonsay urledcay upay inay atthay osyray airay, atthay itay almostay eemedsay asay ifay arfay overay omfray ethay eepday eengray onventcay alleysvay ofay ethay Anillamay islesay, ethay Anishspay and-breezelay, antonlyway urnedtay ailorsay, adhay onegay otay easay, eightedfray ithway esethay espervay hymnsay. 

Oothedsay againay, utbay onlyay oothedsay otay eeperday oomglay, Ahabay, owhay adhay ernedstay offay omfray ethay alewhay, atsay intentlyay atchingway ishay inalfay aningsway omfray ethay ownay anquiltray oatbay. Orfay atthay angestray ectaclespay observableay inay allay ermspay aleswhay ing—thedyay urningtay unwardssay ofay ethay eadhay, anday osay expiring—thatay angestray ectaclespay, eheldbay ofay uchsay aay acidplay eveningay, omehowsay otay Ahabay onveyedcay aay ondrousnessway unknownay eforebay. 

e“Hay urnstay anday urnstay imhay otay it,—howay owlyslay, utbay owhay eadfastlystay, ishay omage-renderinghay anday invokingay owbray, ithway ishay astlay ingdyay otionsmay. Ehay ootay orshipsway irefay; ostmay aithfulfay, oadbray, aronialbay assalvay ofay ethay un!—Ohsay atthay esethay oo-favouringtay eyesay ouldshay eesay esethay oo-favouringtay ightssay. Ooklay! erehay, arfay ater-lockedway; eyondbay allay umhay ofay umanhay ealway oray oeway; inay esethay ostmay andidcay anday impartialay eassay; erewhay otay aditionstray onay ocksray urnishfay abletstay; erewhay orfay onglay Inesechay agesay, ethay illowsbay avehay illstay olledray onay eechlessspay anday unspokenay otay, asay arsstay atthay ineshay uponay ethay Iger’snay unknownay ourcesay; erehay, ootay, ifelay iesday unwardssay ullfay ofay aithfay; utbay eesay! onay oonersay eadday, anthay eathday irlswhay oundray ethay orpsecay, anday itay eadshay omesay otheray ayway. 

Oh“ay, outhay arkday Indoohay alfhay ofay aturenay, owhay ofay owneddray onesbay asthay uildedbay thyay eparatesay onethray omewheresay inay ethay earthay ofay esethay unverdureday eassay; outhay artay anay infidelay, outhay ueenqay, anday ootay ulytray eakestspay otay emay inay ethay ide-slaughteringway Oontyphay, anday ethay ushedhay urialbay ofay itsay afteray almcay. Ornay ashay isthay thyay alewhay unwardssay urnedtay ishay ingdyay eadhay, anday enthay onegay oundray againay, ithoutway aay essonlay otay emay. 

Oh“ay, eblytray oopedhay anday eldedway iphay ofay owerpay! Ohay, ighhay aspiringay, ainbowedray et!—thatjay oneay iveststray, isthay oneay ettestjay allay inay ainvay! Inay ainvay, ohay alewhay, ostday outhay eeksay intercedingsay ithway onyay all-quickeningay unsay, atthay onlyay allscay orthfay ifelay, utbay ivesgay itay otnay againay. Etyay ostday outhay, arkerday alfhay, ockray emay ithway aay ouderpray, ifay aay arkerday aithfay. Allay thyay unnamableay imminglingsay oatflay eneathbay emay erehay; IAY amay uoyedbay byay eathsbray ofay onceay ivinglay ingsthay, exhaleday asay airay, utbay aterway ownay. 

en“Thay ailhay, orfay everay ailhay, OAY easay, inay osewhay eternalay ossingstay ethay ildway owlfay indsfay ishay onlyay estray. Ornbay ofay earthay, etyay uckledsay byay ethay easay; oughthay illhay anday alleyvay otheredmay emay, eyay illowsbay areay myay oster-brothers!”fay 



APTERCHAY 117ay. Ethay Alewhay Atchway. 

Ethay ourfay aleswhay ainslay atthay eveningay adhay iedday ideway apartay; oneay, arfay otay indwardway; oneay, esslay istantday, otay eewardlay; oneay aheaday; oneay asternay. Esethay astlay eethray ereway oughtbray alongsideay ereay ightfallnay; utbay ethay indwardway oneay ouldcay otnay ebay eachedray illtay orningmay; anday ethay oatbay atthay adhay illedkay itay aylay byay itsay idesay allay ightnay; anday atthay oatbay asway Ahab’say. 

Ethay aif-poleway asway ustthray uprightay intoay ethay eadday ale’swhay out-holespay; anday ethay anternlay anginghay omfray itsay optay, astcay aay oubledtray ickeringflay areglay uponay ethay ackblay, ossyglay ackbay, anday arfay outay uponay ethay idnightmay avesway, ichwhay entlygay afedchay ethay ale’swhay oadbray ankflay, ikelay oftsay urfsay uponay aay eachbay. 

Ahabay anday allay ishay oat’sbay ewcray eemedsay asleepay utbay ethay Arseepay; owhay ouchingcray inay ethay owbay, atsay atchingway ethay arksshay, atthay ectrallyspay ayedplay oundray ethay alewhay, anday appedtay ethay ightlay edarcay anksplay ithway eirthay ailstay. AAY oundsay ikelay ethay oaningmay inay uadronssqay overay Asphaltitesay ofay unforgivenay ostsghay ofay Omorrahgay, anray udderingshay oughthray ethay airay. 

Artedstay omfray ishay umbersslay, Ahabay, acefay otay acefay, awsay ethay Arseepay; anday oopedhay oundray byay ethay oomglay ofay ethay ightnay eythay eemedsay ethay astlay enmay inay aay oodedflay orldway. I“AY avehay eameddray itay again,”ay aidsay ehay. 

Of“ay ethay earseshay? Avehay IAY otnay aidsay, olday anmay, atthay eithernay earsehay ornay offincay ancay ebay ine?”thay 

And“ay owhay areay earsedhay atthay ieday onay ethay ea?”say 

ut“Bay IAY aidsay, olday anmay, atthay ereay outhay ouldstcay ieday onay isthay oyagevay, otway earseshay ustmay erilyvay ebay eensay byay eethay onay ethay easay; ethay irstfay otnay ademay byay ortalmay andshay; anday ethay isiblevay oodway ofay ethay astlay oneay ustmay ebay owngray inay America.”ay 

Aye“ay, ayeay! aay angestray ightsay atthay, Arsee:—apay earsehay anday itsay umesplay oatingflay overay ethay oceanay ithway ethay avesway orfay ethay all-bearerspay. Ahay! Uchsay aay ightsay eway allshay otnay oonsay ee.”say 

elieve“Bay itay oray otnay, outhay anstcay otnay ieday illtay itay ebay eensay, olday an.”may 

And“ay atwhay asway atthay ayingsay aboutay elf?”thysay 

ough“Thay itay omecay otay ethay astlay, IAY allshay illstay ogay eforebay eethay thyay ilot.”pay 

And“ay enwhay outhay artay osay onegay efore—ifbay atthay everay efall—thenbay ereay IAY ancay ollowfay, outhay ustmay illstay appearay otay emay, otay ilotpay emay ill?—Wasstay itay otnay osay? Ellway, enthay, idday IAY elievebay allay eyay aysay, ohay myay ilotpay! IAY avehay erehay otway edgesplay atthay IAY allshay etyay ayslay Obymay Ickday anday urvivesay it.”ay 

ake“Tay anotheray edgeplay, olday an,”may aidsay ethay Arseepay, asay ishay eyesay ightedlay upay ikelay ire-fliesfay inay ethay oom—“Hempglay onlyay ancay illkay ee.”thay 

e“Thay allowsgay, eyay ean.—Imay amay immortalay enthay, onay andlay anday onay ea,”say iedcray Ahabay, ithway aay aughlay ofay erision;—“Immortalday onay andlay anday onay ea!”say 

Othbay ereway ilentsay againay, asay oneay anmay. Ethay eygray awnday amecay onay, anday ethay umberingslay ewcray aroseay omfray ethay oat’sbay ottombay, anday ereay oonnay ethay eadday alewhay asway oughtbray otay ethay ipshay. 



APTERCHAY 118ay. Ethay Uadrantqay. 

Ethay easonsay orfay ethay Inelay atay engthlay ewdray earnay; anday everyay ayday enwhay Ahabay, omingcay omfray ishay abincay, astcay ishay eyesay aloftay, ethay igilantvay elmsmanhay ouldway ostentatiouslyay andlehay ishay okesspay, anday ethay eageray arinersmay uicklyqay unray otay ethay acesbray, anday ouldway andstay erethay ithway allay eirthay eyesay entrallycay ixedfay onay ethay ailednay oubloonday; impatientay orfay ethay orderay otay ointpay ethay ip’sshay owpray orfay ethay equatoray. Inay oodgay imetay ethay orderay amecay. Itay asway ardhay uponay ighhay oonnay; anday Ahabay, eatedsay inay ethay owsbay ofay ishay igh-hoistedhay oatbay, asway aboutay akingtay ishay ontedway ailyday observationay ofay ethay unsay otay etermineday ishay atitudelay. 

Ownay, inay atthay Apanesejay easay, ethay aysday inay ummersay areay asay eshetsfray ofay effulgencesay. Atthay unblinkinglyay ividvay Apanesejay unsay eemssay ethay azingblay ocusfay ofay ethay assyglay ocean’say immeasurableay urning-glassbay. Ethay skyay ookslay acqueredlay; oudsclay erethay areay onenay; ethay orizonhay oatsflay; anday isthay akednessnay ofay unrelieveday adianceray isay asay ethay insufferableay endorssplay ofay Od’sgay onethray. Ellway atthay Ahab’say uadrantqay asway urnishedfay ithway olouredcay assesglay, oughthray ichwhay otay aketay ightsay ofay atthay olarsay irefay. Osay, ingingsway ishay eatedsay ormfay otay ethay ollray ofay ethay ipshay, anday ithway ishay astrological-lookingay instrumentay acedplay otay ishay eyeay, ehay emainedray inay atthay osturepay orfay omesay omentsmay otay atchcay ethay ecisepray instantay enwhay ethay unsay ouldshay aingay itsay ecisepray eridianmay. Eantimemay ilewhay ishay olewhay attentionay asway absorbeday, ethay Arseepay asway eelingknay eneathbay imhay onay ethay ip’sshay eckday, anday ithway acefay ownthray upay ikelay Ahab’say, asway eyeingay ethay amesay unsay ithway imhay; onlyay ethay idslay ofay ishay eyesay alfhay oodedhay eirthay orbsay, anday ishay ildway acefay asway ubduedsay otay anay earthlyay assionlessnesspay. Atay engthlay ethay esiredday observationay asway akentay; anday ithway ishay encilpay uponay ishay ivoryay eglay, Ahabay oonsay alculatedcay atwhay ishay atitudelay ustmay ebay atay atthay ecisepray instantay. Enthay allingfay intoay aay oment’smay everyray, ehay againay ookedlay upay owardstay ethay unsay anday urmuredmay otay imselfhay: ou“Thay ea-marksay! outhay ighhay anday ightymay Ilotpay! outhay ellesttay emay ulytray erewhay IAY am_—but_ay anstcay outhay astcay ethay eastlay inthay erewhay IAY all_shay_ ebay? Oray anstcay outhay elltay erewhay omesay otheray ingthay esidesbay emay isay isthay omentmay ivinglay? Erewhay isay Obymay Ickday? Isthay instantay outhay ustmay ebay eyeingay imhay. Esethay eyesay ofay inemay ooklay intoay ethay eryvay eyeay atthay isay evenay ownay eholdingbay imhay; ayeay, anday intoay ethay eyeay atthay isay evenay ownay equallyay eholdingbay ethay objectsay onay ethay unknownay, itherthay idesay ofay eethay, outhay un!”say
