Enthay azinggay atay ishay uadrantqay, anday andlinghay, oneay afteray ethay otheray, itsay umerousnay abalisticalcay ontrivancescay, ehay onderedpay againay, anday utteredmay: oolish“Fay oytay! abies’bay aythingplay ofay aughtyhay Admiralsay, anday Ommodorescay, anday Aptainscay; ethay orldway agsbray ofay eethay, ofay thyay unningcay anday ightmay; utbay atwhay afteray allay anstcay outhay oday, utbay elltay ethay oorpay, itifulpay ointpay, erewhay outhay elfthysay appenesthay otay ebay onay isthay ideway anetplay, anday ethay andhay atthay oldshay eethay: onay! otnay oneay otjay oremay! Outhay anstcay otnay elltay erewhay oneay opdray ofay aterway oray oneay aingray ofay andsay illway ebay o-morrowtay oonnay; anday etyay ithway thyay impotenceay outhay insultestay ethay unsay! Iencescay! Ursecay eethay, outhay ainvay oytay; anday ursedcay ebay allay ethay ingsthay atthay astcay an’smay eyesay aloftay otay atthay eavenhay, osewhay ivelay ividnessvay utbay orchesscay imhay, asay esethay olday eyesay areay evenay ownay orchedscay ithway thyay ightlay, OAY unsay! Evellay byay aturenay otay isthay earth’say orizonhay areay ethay ancesglay ofay an’smay eyesay; otnay otshay omfray ethay owncray ofay ishay eadhay, asay ifay Odgay adhay eantmay imhay otay azegay onay ishay irmamentfay. Ursecay eethay, outhay uadrant!”qay ashingday itay otay ethay eckday, o“nay ongerlay illway IAY uidegay myay earthlyay ayway byay eethay; ethay evellay ip’sshay ompasscay, anday ethay evellay ead-reckoningday, byay oglay anday byay inelay; ese_thay_ allshay onductcay emay, anday owshay emay myay aceplay onay ethay easay. Aye,”ay ightinglay omfray ethay oatbay otay ethay eckday, us“thay IAY ampletray onay eethay, outhay altrypay ingthay atthay eeblyfay ointestpay onay ighhay; usthay IAY itsplay anday estroyday ee!”thay 

Asay ethay anticfray olday anmay usthay okespay anday usthay ampledtray ithway ishay ivelay anday eadday eetfay, aay eeringsnay iumphtray atthay eemedsay eantmay orfay Ahabay, anday aay atalisticfay espairday atthay eemedsay eantmay orfay imself—thesehay assedpay overay ethay utemay, otionlessmay Arsee’spay acefay. Unobserveday ehay oseray anday idedglay awayay; ilewhay, awestruckay byay ethay aspectay ofay eirthay ommandercay, ethay eamensay usteredclay ogethertay onay ethay orecastlefay, illtay Ahabay, oubledlytray acingpay ethay eckday, outedshay out—“Toay ethay acesbray! Upay elm!—squarehay in!”ay 

Inay anay instantay ethay ardsyay ungsway oundray; anday asay ethay ipshay alf-wheeledhay uponay erhay eelhay, erhay eethray irm-seatedfay acefulgray astsmay erectlyay oisedpay uponay erhay onglay, ibbedray ullhay, eemedsay asay ethay eethray Oratiihay irouettingpay onay oneay ufficientsay eedstay. 

Andingstay etweenbay ethay ight-headsknay, Arbuckstay atchedway ethay Equod’spay umultuoustay ayway, anday Ahab’say alsoay, asay ehay entway urchinglay alongay ethay eckday. 

I“AY avehay atsay eforebay ethay enseday oalcay irefay anday atchedway itay allay agloway, ullfay ofay itsay ormentedtay amingflay ifelay; anday IAY avehay eensay itay aneway atay astlay, ownday, ownday, otay umbestday ustday. Olday anmay ofay oceansay! ofay allay isthay ieryfay ifelay ofay inethay, atwhay illway atay engthlay emainray utbay oneay ittlelay eaphay ofay ashes!”ay 

Aye,”“ay iedcray Ubbstay, ut“bay ea-coalsay ashes—minday eyay atthay, Mray. Arbuck—sea-coalstay, otnay ouryay ommoncay arcoalchay. Ellway, ellway; IAY eardhay Ahabay uttermay, ere‘Hay omesay oneay uststhray esethay ardscay intoay esethay olday andshay ofay inemay; earssway atthay IAY ustmay ayplay emthay, anday onay others.’ay Anday amnday emay, Ahabay, utbay outhay actestay ightray; ivelay inay ethay amegay, anday ieday inay it!”ay 



APTERCHAY 119ay. Ethay Andlescay. 

Armestway imesclay utbay ursenay ethay uellestcray angsfay: ethay igertay ofay Engalbay ouchescray inay icedspay ovesgray ofay easelesscay erdurevay. Iesskay ethay ostmay effulgentay utbay asketbay ethay eadliestday understhay: orgeousgay Ubacay owsknay ornadoestay atthay evernay eptsway ametay orthernnay andslay. Osay, ootay, itay isay, atthay inay esethay esplendentray Apanesejay eassay ethay arinermay encountersay ethay irestday ofay allay ormsstay, ethay Oontyphay. Itay illway ometimessay urstbay omfray outay atthay oudlessclay skyay, ikelay anay explodingay ombbay uponay aay azedday anday eepyslay owntay. 

Owardstay eveningay ofay atthay ayday, ethay Equodpay asway orntay ofay erhay anvascay, anday are-poledbay asway eftlay otay ightfay aay Oontyphay ichwhay adhay uckstray erhay irectlyday aheaday. Enwhay arknessday amecay onay, skyay anday easay oaredray anday itsplay ithway ethay underthay, anday azedblay ithway ethay ightninglay, atthay owedshay ethay isabledday astsmay utteringflay erehay anday erethay ithway ethay agsray ichwhay ethay irstfay uryfay ofay ethay empesttay adhay eftlay orfay itsay afteray ortspay. 

Oldinghay byay aay oudshray, Arbuckstay asway andingstay onay ethay uarter-deckqay; atay everyay ashflay ofay ethay ightninglay ancingglay aloftay, otay eesay atwhay additionalay isasterday ightmay avehay efallenbay ethay intricateay amperhay erethay; ilewhay Ubbstay anday Askflay ereway irectingday ethay enmay inay ethay igherhay oistinghay anday irmerfay ashinglay ofay ethay oatsbay. Utbay allay eirthay ainspay eemedsay aughtnay. Oughthay iftedlay otay ethay eryvay optay ofay ethay anescray, ethay indwardway uarterqay oatbay Ahab’s(ay) idday otnay escapeay. AAY eatgray ollingray easay, ashingday ighhay upay againstay ethay eelingray ip’sshay ighhay eeteringtay idesay, ovestay inay ethay oat’sbay ottombay atay ethay ernstay, anday eftlay itay againay, allay ippingdray oughthray ikelay aay ievesay. 

ad“Bay orkway, adbay orkway! Mray. Arbuck,”stay aidsay Ubbstay, egardingray ethay eckwray, ut“bay ethay easay illway avehay itsay ayway. Ubbstay, orfay oneay, an’tcay ightfay itay. Ouyay eesay, Mray. Arbuckstay, aay aveway ashay uchsay aay eatgray onglay artstay eforebay itay eapslay, allay oundray ethay orldway itay unsray, anday enthay omescay ethay ingspray! Utbay asay orfay emay, allay ethay artstay IAY avehay otay eetmay itay, isay ustjay acrossay ethay eckday erehay. Utbay evernay indmay; it’say allay inay unfay: osay ethay olday ongsay ays;”—(_singssay_). 



Ohay! ollyjay isay ethay alegay, Anday aay okerjay isay ethay alewhay, A’AY ourishin’flay ishay ail,—tay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay, isay ethay Oceanay, ohay! 

Ethay udscay allay aay in’flyay, At’sthay ishay ipflay onlyay oamin’fay; Enwhay ehay irsstay inay ethay icin’,—spay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay, isay ethay Oceanay, ohay! 

Underthay itssplay ethay ipsshay, Utbay ehay onlyay ackssmay ishay ipslay, AAY astin’tay ofay isthay ip,—flay Uchsay aay unnyfay, ortyspay, amygay, estyjay, okyjay, oky-pokyhay adlay, isay ethay Oceanay, ohay! 





Avast“ay Ubb,”stay iedcray Arbuckstay, et“lay ethay Oontyphay ingsay, anday ikestray ishay arphay erehay inay ouray iggingray; utbay ifay outhay artay aay avebray anmay outhay iltway oldhay thyay eace.”pay 

ut“Bay IAY amay otnay aay avebray anmay; evernay aidsay IAY asway aay avebray anmay; IAY amay aay owardcay; anday IAY ingsay otay eepkay upay myay iritsspay. Anday IAY elltay ouyay atwhay itay isay, Mray. Arbuckstay, ere’sthay onay ayway otay opstay myay ingingsay inay isthay orldway utbay otay utcay myay oatthray. Anday enwhay at’sthay oneday, entay otay oneay IAY ingsay eyay ethay oxologyday orfay aay ind-up.”way 

adman“May! ooklay oughthray myay eyesay ifay outhay asthay onenay ofay inethay own.”ay 

at“Whay! owhay ancay ouyay eesay etterbay ofay aay arkday ightnay anthay anybodyay elseay, evernay indmay owhay oolish?”fay 

ere!”“Hay iedcray Arbuckstay, eizingsay Ubbstay byay ethay ouldershay, anday ointingpay ishay andhay owardstay ethay eatherway owbay, arkest“may outhay otnay atthay ethay alegay omescay omfray ethay eastwarday, ethay eryvay oursecay Ahabay isay otay unray orfay Obymay Ickday? ethay eryvay oursecay ehay ungsway otay isthay ayday oonnay? ownay arkmay ishay oatbay erethay; erewhay isay atthay ovestay? Inay ethay ern-sheetsstay, anmay; erewhay ehay isay ontway otay and—hisstay and-pointstay isay ovestay, anmay! Ownay umpjay overboarday, anday ingsay awayay, ifay outhay ustmay! 

I“AY on’tday alfhay understanday eyay: at’swhay inay ethay ind?”way 

es“Yay, esyay, oundray ethay Apecay ofay Oodgay Opehay isay ethay ortestshay ayway otay Antucket,”nay oliloquizedsay Arbuckstay uddenlysay, eedlesshay ofay Ubb’sstay uestionqay. e“Thay alegay atthay ownay ammershay atay usay otay avestay usay, eway ancay urntay itay intoay aay airfay indway atthay illway ivedray usay owardstay omehay. Onderyay, otay indwardway, allay isay acknessblay ofay oomday; utbay otay eewardlay, omeward—Ihay eesay itay ightenslay upay erethay; utbay otnay ithway ethay ightning.”lay 

Atay atthay omentmay inay oneay ofay ethay intervalsay ofay ofoundpray arknessday, ollowingfay ethay ashesflay, aay oicevay asway eardhay atay ishay idesay; anday almostay atay ethay amesay instantay aay olleyvay ofay underthay ealspay olledray overheaday. 

o’s“Whay ere?”thay 

Old“ay Under!”thay aidsay Ahabay, opinggray ishay ayway alongay ethay ulwarksbay otay ishay ivot-holepay; utbay uddenlysay indingfay ishay athpay ademay ainplay otay imhay byay elboweday anceslay ofay irefay. 

Ownay, asay ethay ightninglay odray otay aay irespay onay oreshay isay intendeday otay arrycay offay ethay erilouspay uidflay intoay ethay oilsay; osay ethay indredkay odray ichwhay atay easay omesay ipsshay arrycay otay eachay astmay, isay intendeday otay onductcay itay intoay ethay aterway. Utbay asay isthay onductorcay ustmay escendday otay onsiderablecay epthday, atthay itsay enday aymay avoiday allay ontactcay ithway ethay ullhay; anday asay oreovermay, ifay eptkay onstantlycay owingtay erethay, itay ouldway ebay iablelay otay anymay ishapsmay, esidesbay interferingay otnay aay ittlelay ithway omesay ofay ethay iggingray, anday oremay oray esslay impedingay ethay essel’svay ayway inay ethay aterway; ecausebay ofay allay isthay, ethay owerlay artspay ofay aay ip’sshay ightning-rodslay areay otnay alwaysay overboarday; utbay areay enerallygay ademay inay onglay enderslay inkslay, osay asay otay ebay ethay oremay eadilyray auledhay upay intoay ethay ainschay outsideay, oray ownthray ownday intoay ethay easay, asay occasionay aymay equireray. 

e“Thay odsray! ethay ods!”ray iedcray Arbuckstay otay ethay ewcray, uddenlysay admonisheday otay igilancevay byay ethay ividvay ightninglay atthay adhay ustjay eenbay artingday ambeauxflay, otay ightlay Ahabay otay ishay ostpay. Are“ay eythay overboarday? opdray emthay overay, orefay anday aftay. Uick!”qay 

Avast!”“ay iedcray Ahabay; et’s“lay avehay airfay ayplay erehay, oughthay eway ebay ethay eakerway idesay. Etyay I’llay ontributecay otay aiseray odsray onay ethay Immalehshay anday Andesay, atthay allay ethay orldway aymay ebay ecuredsay; utbay outay onay ivilegespray! Etlay emthay ebay, ir.”say 

ook“Lay aloft!”ay iedcray Arbuckstay. e“Thay orpusantscay! ethay orpusants!”cay 

Allay ethay ard-armsyay ereway ippedtay ithway aay allidpay irefay; anday ouchedtay atay eachay i-pointedtray ightning-rod-endlay ithway eethray aperingtay itewhay amesflay, eachay ofay ethay eethray alltay astsmay asway ilentlysay urningbay inay atthay ulphuroussay airay, ikelay eethray iganticgay axway aperstay eforebay anay altaray. 

ast“Blay ethay oatbay! etlay itay o!”gay iedcray Ubbstay atay isthay instantay, asay aay ashingsway easay eavedhay upay underay ishay ownay ittlelay aftcray, osay atthay itsay unwalegay iolentlyvay ammedjay ishay andhay, asay ehay asway assingpay aay ashinglay. ast“Blay it!”—butay ippingslay ackwardbay onay ethay eckday, ishay uplifteday eyesay aughtcay ethay amesflay; anday immediatelyay iftingshay ishay onetay ehay ied—“Thecray orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay all!”ay 

Otay ailorssay, oathsay areay ouseholdhay ordsway; eythay illway earsway inay ethay ancetray ofay ethay almcay, anday inay ethay eethtay ofay ethay empesttay; eythay illway imprecateay ursescay omfray ethay opsail-yard-armstay, enwhay ostmay eythay eetertay overay otay aay eethingsay easay; utbay inay allay myay oyagingsvay, eldomsay avehay IAY eardhay aay ommoncay oathay enwhay Od’sgay urningbay ingerfay ashay eenbay aidlay onay ethay ipshay; enwhay Ishay ene“May, Enemay, Ekeltay Upharsin”ay ashay eenbay ovenway intoay ethay oudsshray anday ethay ordagecay. 

Ilewhay isthay allidnesspay asway urningbay aloftay, ewfay ordsway ereway eardhay omfray ethay enchanteday ewcray; owhay inay oneay ickthay usterclay oodstay onay ethay orecastlefay, allay eirthay eyesay eamingglay inay atthay alepay osphorescencephay, ikelay aay arfay awayay onstellationcay ofay arsstay. Elievedray againstay ethay ostlyghay ightlay, ethay iganticgay etjay egronay, Aggooday, oomedlay upay otay icethray ishay ealray aturestay, anday eemedsay ethay ackblay oudclay omfray ichwhay ethay underthay adhay omecay. Ethay artedpay outhmay ofay Ashtegotay evealedray ishay ark-whiteshay eethtay, ichwhay angelystray eamedglay asay ifay eythay ootay adhay eenbay ippedtay byay orpusantscay; ilewhay itlay upay byay ethay eternaturalpray ightlay, Ueequeg’sqay attooingtay urnedbay ikelay Atanicsay ueblay amesflay onay ishay odybay. 

Ethay ableautay allay anedway atay astlay ithway ethay allidnesspay aloftay; anday onceay oremay ethay Equodpay anday everyay oulsay onay erhay ecksday ereway appedwray inay aay allpay. AAY omentmay oray otway assedpay, enwhay Arbuckstay, oinggay orwardfay, ushedpay againstay omesay oneay. Itay asway Ubbstay. at“Whay inkestthay outhay ownay, anmay; IAY eardhay thyay cryay; itay asway otnay ethay amesay inay ethay ong.”say 

o“Nay, onay, itay asn’tway; IAY aidsay ethay orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay allay; anday IAY opehay eythay illway, illstay. Utbay oday eythay onlyay avehay ercymay onay onglay aces?—havefay eythay onay owelsbay orfay aay aughlay? Anday ooklay eyay, Mray. Arbuck—butstay it’say ootay arkday otay ooklay. Earhay emay, enthay: IAY aketay atthay ast-headmay ameflay eway awsay orfay aay ignsay ofay oodgay ucklay; orfay osethay astsmay areay ootedray inay aay oldhay atthay isay oinggay otay ebay ockchay a’ay ockblay ithway erm-oilspay, ed’yay eesay; anday osay, allay atthay ermspay illway orkway upay intoay ethay astsmay, ikelay apsay inay aay eetray. Esyay, ouray eethray astsmay illway etyay ebay asay eethray ermacetispay andles—that’scay ethay oodgay omisepray eway aw.”say 

Atay atthay omentmay Arbuckstay aughtcay ightsay ofay Ubb’sstay acefay owlyslay eginningbay otay immerglay intoay ightsay. Ancingglay upwardsay, ehay iedcray: ee“Say! ee!”say anday onceay oremay ethay ighhay aperingtay amesflay ereway eheldbay ithway atwhay eemedsay edoubledray upernaturalnesssay inay eirthay allorpay. 

e“Thay orpusantscay avehay ercymay onay usay all,”ay iedcray Ubbstay, againay. 

Atay ethay asebay ofay ethay ainmastmay, ullfay eneathbay ethay oubloonday anday ethay ameflay, ethay Arseepay asway eelingknay inay Ahab’say ontfray, utbay ithway ishay eadhay owedbay awayay omfray imhay; ilewhay earnay byay, omfray ethay archeday anday overhangingay iggingray, erewhay eythay adhay ustjay eenbay engageday ecuringsay aay arspay, aay umbernay ofay ethay eamensay, arresteday byay ethay areglay, ownay oheredcay ogethertay, anday unghay endulouspay, ikelay aay otknay ofay umbednay aspsway omfray aay oopingdray, orcharday igtway. Inay ariousvay enchanteday attitudesay, ikelay ethay andingstay, oray eppingstay, oray unningray eletonsskay inay Erculaneumhay, othersay emainedray ootedray otay ethay eckday; utbay allay eirthay eyesay upcastay. 

Aye“ay, ayeay, en!”may iedcray Ahabay. ook“Lay upay atay itay; arkmay itay ellway; ethay itewhay ameflay utbay ightslay ethay ayway otay ethay Itewhay Alewhay! Andhay emay osethay ainmastmay inkslay erethay; IAY ouldway ainfay eelfay isthay ulsepay, anday etlay inemay eatbay againstay itay; oodblay againstay irefay! O.”say 

Enthay urning—thetay astlay inklay eldhay astfay inay ishay eftlay andhay, ehay utpay ishay ootfay uponay ethay Arseepay; anday ithway ixedfay upwarday eyeay, anday igh-flunghay ightray armay, ehay oodstay erectay eforebay ethay oftylay i-pointedtray initytray ofay amesflay. 

Oh“ay! outhay earclay iritspay ofay earclay irefay, omwhay onay esethay eassay IAY asay Ersianpay onceay idday orshipway, illtay inay ethay acramentalsay actay osay urnedbay byay eethay, atthay otay isthay ourhay IAY earbay ethay arscay; IAY ownay owknay eethay, outhay earclay iritspay, anday IAY ownay owknay atthay thyay ightray orshipway isay efianceday. Otay eithernay ovelay ornay everenceray iltway outhay ebay indkay; anday e’enay orfay atehay outhay anstcay utbay illkay; anday allay areay illedkay. Onay earlessfay oolfay ownay ontsfray eethay. IAY ownay thyay eechlessspay, acelessplay owerpay; utbay otay ethay astlay aspgay ofay myay earthquakeay ifelay illway isputeday itsay unconditionalay, unintegralay asterymay inay emay. Inay ethay idstmay ofay ethay ersonifiedpay impersonalay, aay ersonalitypay andsstay erehay. Oughthay utbay aay ointpay atay estbay; encesoe’erwhay IAY amecay; eresoe’erwhay IAY ogay; etyay ilewhay IAY earthlyay ivelay, ethay ueenlyqay ersonalitypay iveslay inay emay, anday eelsfay erhay oyalray ightsray. Utbay arway isay ainpay, anday atehay isay oeway. Omecay inay thyay owestlay ormfay ofay ovelay, anday IAY illway eelknay anday isskay eethay; utbay atay thyay ighesthay, omecay asay eremay upernalsay owerpay; anday oughthay outhay aunchestlay aviesnay ofay ull-freightedfay orldsway, ere’sthay atthay inay erehay atthay illstay emainsray indifferentay. Ohay, outhay earclay iritspay, ofay thyay irefay outhay adestmay emay, anday ikelay aay uetray ildchay ofay irefay, IAY eathebray itay ackbay otay ee.”thay 

udden[_Say, epeatedray ashesflay ofay ightninglay; ethay inenay amesflay eaplay engthwiselay otay icethray eirthay eviouspray eighthay; Ahabay, ithway ethay estray, osesclay ishay eyesay, ishay ightray andhay essedpray ardhay uponay emthay.]_ 

I“AY ownay thyay eechlessspay, acelessplay owerpay; aidsay IAY otnay osay? Ornay asway itay ungwray omfray emay; ornay oday IAY ownay opdray esethay inkslay. Outhay anstcay indblay; utbay IAY ancay enthay opegray. Outhay anstcay onsumecay; utbay IAY ancay enthay ebay ashesay. Aketay ethay omagehay ofay esethay oorpay eyesay, anday utter-handsshay. IAY ouldway otnay aketay itay. Ethay ightninglay ashesflay oughthray myay ullskay; inemay eye-ballsay acheay anday acheay; myay olewhay eatenbay ainbray eemssay asay eheadedbay, anday ollingray onay omesay unningstay oundgray. Ohay, ohay! Etyay indfoldblay, etyay illway IAY alktay otay eethay. Ightlay oughthay outhay ebay, outhay eapestlay outay ofay arknessday; utbay IAY amay arknessday eapinglay outay ofay ightlay, eapinglay outay ofay eethay! Ethay avelinsjay easecay; openay eyesay; eesay, oray otnay? Erethay urnbay ethay amesflay! Ohay, outhay agnanimousmay! ownay IAY oday oryglay inay myay enealogygay. Utbay outhay artay utbay myay ieryfay atherfay; myay eetsway othermay, IAY owknay otnay. Ohay, uelcray! atwhay asthay outhay oneday ithway erhay? Erethay ieslay myay uzzlepay; utbay inethay isay eatergray. Outhay owestknay otnay owhay amecay eyay, encehay allestcay elfthysay unbegottenay; ertainlycay owestknay otnay thyay eginningbay, encehay allestcay elfthysay unbegunay. IAY owknay atthay ofay emay, ichwhay outhay owestknay otnay ofay elfthysay, ohay, outhay omnipotentay. Erethay isay omesay unsuffusingay ingthay eyondbay eethay, outhay earclay iritspay, otay omwhay allay thyay eternityay isay utbay imetay, allay thyay eativenesscray echanicalmay. Oughthray eethay, thyay amingflay elfsay, myay orchedscay eyesay oday imlyday eesay itay. Ohay, outhay oundlingfay irefay, outhay ermithay immemorialay, outhay ootay asthay thyay incommunicableay iddleray, thyay unparticipateday iefgray. Erehay againay ithway aughtyhay agonyay, IAY eadray myay iresay. Eaplay! eaplay upay, anday icklay ethay skyay! IAY eaplay ithway eethay; IAY urnbay ithway eethay; ouldway ainfay ebay eldedway ithway eethay; efyinglyday IAY orshipway ee!”thay 

e“Thay oatbay! ethay oat!”bay iedcray Arbuckstay, ook“lay atay thyay oatbay, olday an!”may 

Ahab’say arpoonhay, ethay oneay orgedfay atay Erth’spay irefay, emainedray irmlyfay ashedlay inay itsay onspicuouscay otchcray, osay atthay itay ojectedpray eyondbay ishay ale-boat’swhay owbay; utbay ethay easay atthay adhay ovestay itsay ottombay adhay ausedcay ethay ooselay eatherlay eathshay otay opdray offay; anday omfray ethay eenkay eelstay arbbay erethay ownay amecay aay evelledlay ameflay ofay alepay, orkedfay irefay. Asay ethay ilentsay arpoonhay urnedbay erethay ikelay aay erpent’ssay onguetay, Arbuckstay aspedgray Ahabay byay ethay arm—“Goday, Odgay isay againstay eethay, olday anmay; orbearfay! is’tay anay illay oyagevay! illay egunbay, illay ontinuedcay; etlay emay uaresqay ethay ardsyay, ilewhay eway aymay, olday anmay, anday akemay aay airfay indway ofay itay omewardshay, otay ogay onay aay etterbay oyagevay anthay is.”thay 

Overhearingay Arbuckstay, ethay anic-strickenpay ewcray instantlyay anray otay ethay aces—thoughbray otnay aay ailsay asway eftlay aloftay. Orfay ethay omentmay allay ethay aghastay ate’smay oughtsthay eemedsay eirsthay; eythay aisedray aay alfhay utinousmay cryay. Utbay ashingday ethay attlingray ightninglay inkslay otay ethay eckday, anday atchingsnay ethay urningbay arpoonhay, Ahabay avedway itay ikelay aay orchtay amongay emthay; earingsway otay ansfixtray ithway itay ethay irstfay ailorsay atthay utbay astcay ooselay aay ope’sray enday. Etrifiedpay byay ishay aspectay, anday illstay oremay inkingshray omfray ethay ieryfay artday atthay ehay eldhay, ethay enmay ellfay ackbay inay ismayday, anday Ahabay againay oke:—spay 

All“ay ouryay oathsay otay unthay ethay Itewhay Alewhay areay asay indingbay asay inemay; anday earthay, oulsay, anday odybay, ungslay anday ifelay, olday Ahabay isay oundbay. Anday atthay eyay aymay owknay otay atwhay unetay isthay earthay eatsbay; ooklay eyay erehay; usthay IAY owblay outay ethay astlay ear!”fay Anday ithway oneay astblay ofay ishay eathbray ehay extinguisheday ethay ameflay. 

Asay inay ethay urricanehay atthay eepssway ethay ainplay, enmay flyay ethay eighborhoodnay ofay omesay onelay, iganticgay elmay, osewhay eryvay eighthay anday engthstray utbay enderray itay osay uchmay ethay oremay unsafeay, ecausebay osay uchmay ethay oremay aay arkmay orfay underboltsthay; osay atay osethay astlay ordsway ofay Ahab’say anymay ofay ethay arinersmay idday unray omfray imhay inay aay errortay ofay ismayday. 



APTERCHAY 120ay. Ethay Eckday Owardstay ethay Enday ofay ethay Irstfay Ightnay Atchway. 

Ahab_ay andingstay byay ethay elmhay. Arbuckstay approachingay imhay._ 

e“Way ustmay endsay ownday ethay ain-top-sailmay ardyay, irsay. Ethay andbay isay orkingway ooselay anday ethay eelay iftlay isay alf-strandedhay. Allshay IAY ikestray itay, ir?”say 

ike“Stray othingnay; ashlay itay. Ifay IAY adhay ailsky-say olespay, I’day aysway emthay upay ow.”nay 

ir!—in“Say Od’sgay ame!—sir?”nay 

ell.”“Way 

e“Thay anchorsay areay orkingway, irsay. Allshay IAY etgay emthay inboard?”ay 

ike“Stray othingnay, anday irstay othingnay, utbay ashlay everythingay. Ethay indway isesray, utbay itay ashay otnay otgay upay otay myay able-landstay etyay. Uickqay, anday eesay otay it.—Byay astsmay anday eelskay! ehay akestay emay orfay ethay unch-backedhay ipperskay ofay omesay oastingcay acksmay. Endsay ownday myay ain-top-sailmay ardyay! Ohay, uepotsglay! Oftiestlay uckstray ereway ademay orfay ildestway indsway, anday isthay ain-truckbray ofay inemay ownay ailssay amiday ethay oud-scudclay. Allshay IAY ikestray atthay? Ohay, onenay utbay owardscay endsay ownday eirthay ain-trucksbray inay empesttay imetay. Atwhay aay oorooshhay aloftay erethay! IAY ouldway e’enay aketay itay orfay ublimesay, idday IAY otnay owknay atthay ethay oliccay isay aay oisynay aladymay. Ohay, aketay edicinemay, aketay edicine!”may 



APTERCHAY 121ay. Idnight.—themay Orecastlefay Ulwarksbay. 

ubb_Stay anday Askflay ountedmay onay emthay, anday assingpay additionalay ashingslay overay ethay anchorsay erethay anginghay._ 

o“Nay, Ubbstay; ouyay aymay oundpay atthay otknay erethay asay uchmay asay ouyay easeplay, utbay ouyay illway evernay oundpay intoay emay atwhay ouyay ereway ustjay ownay ayingsay. Anday owhay onglay agoay isay itay incesay ouyay aidsay ethay eryvay ontrarycay? Idn’tday ouyay onceay aysay atthay ateverwhay ipshay Ahabay ailssay inay, atthay ipshay ouldshay aypay omethingsay extraay onay itsay insuranceay olicypay, ustjay asay oughthay itay ereway oadedlay ithway owderpay arrelsbay aftay anday oxesbay ofay uciferslay orwardfay? Opstay, ownay; idn’tday ouyay aysay o?”say 

ell“Way, upposesay IAY idday? Atwhay enthay? I’veay artpay angedchay myay eshflay incesay atthay imetay, whyay otnay myay indmay? Esidesbay, upposingsay eway are_ay_ oadedlay ithway owderpay arrelsbay aftay anday uciferslay orwardfay; owhay ethay evilday ouldcay ethay uciferslay etgay afireay inay isthay enchingdray ayspray erehay? Whyay, myay ittlelay anmay, ouyay avehay ettypray edray airhay, utbay ouyay ouldn’tcay etgay afireay ownay. Akeshay ourselfyay; ou’reyay Aquariusay, oray ethay ater-bearerway, Askflay; ightmay illfay itcherspay atay ouryay oatcay ollarcay. On’tday ouyay eesay, enthay, atthay orfay esethay extraay isksray ethay Arinemay Insuranceay ompaniescay avehay extraay uaranteesgay? Erehay areay antshydray, Askflay. Utbay arkhay, againay, anday I’llay answeray eyay ethay otheray ingthay. Irstfay aketay ouryay eglay offay omfray ethay owncray ofay ethay anchoray erehay, oughthay, osay IAY ancay asspay ethay operay; ownay istenlay. At’swhay ethay ightymay ifferenceday etweenbay oldinghay aay ast’smay ightning-rodlay inay ethay ormstay, anday andingstay oseclay byay aay astmay atthay asn’thay otgay anyay ightning-rodlay atay allay inay aay ormstay? On’tday ouyay eesay, ouyay imber-headtay, atthay onay armhay ancay omecay otay ethay olderhay ofay ethay odray, unlessay ethay astmay isay irstfay uckstray? Atwhay areay ouyay alkingtay aboutay, enthay? Otnay oneay ipshay inay aay undredhay arriescay odsray, anday Ahab,—ayeay, anmay, anday allay ofay us,—wereay inay onay oremay angerday enthay, inay myay oorpay opinionay, anthay allay ethay ewscray inay entay ousandthay ipsshay ownay ailingsay ethay eassay. Whyay, ouyay Ing-postkay, ouyay, IAY upposesay ouyay ouldway avehay everyay anmay inay ethay orldway ogay aboutay ithway aay allsmay ightning-rodlay unningray upay ethay ornercay ofay ishay athay, ikelay aay ilitiamay officer’say eweredskay eatherfay, anday ailingtray ehindbay ikelay ishay ashsay. Whyay on’tday eyay ebay ensiblesay, Askflay? it’say easyay otay ebay ensiblesay; whyay on’tday eyay, enthay? anyay anmay ithway alfhay anay eyeay ancay ebay ensible.”say 

I“AY on’tday owknay atthay, Ubbstay. Ouyay ometimessay indfay itay atherray ard.”hay 

es“Yay, enwhay aay ellow’sfay oakedsay oughthray, it’say ardhay otay ebay ensiblesay, at’sthay aay actfay. Anday IAY amay aboutay encheddray ithway isthay ayspray. Evernay indmay; atchcay ethay urntay erethay, anday asspay itay. Eemssay otay emay eway areay ashinglay ownday esethay anchorsay ownay asay ifay eythay ereway evernay oinggay otay ebay useday againay. Ingtyay esethay otway anchorsay erehay, Askflay, eemssay ikelay ingtyay aay an’smay andshay ehindbay imhay. Anday atwhay igbay enerousgay andshay eythay areay, otay ebay uresay. Esethay areay ouryay ironay istsfay, eyhay? Atwhay aay oldhay eythay avehay, ootay! IAY onderway, Askflay, etherwhay ethay orldway isay anchoreday anywhereay; ifay eshay isay, eshay ingssway ithway anay uncommonay onglay ablecay, oughthay. Erethay, ammerhay atthay otknay ownday, anday e’veway oneday. Osay; extnay otay ouchingtay andlay, ightinglay onay eckday isay ethay ostmay atisfactorysay. IAY aysay, ustjay ingwray outay myay acketjay irtsskay, illway eyay? Ankthay eyay. Eythay aughlay atay ong-togslay osay, Askflay; utbay eemssay otay emay, aay onglay ailedtay oatcay oughtay alwaysay otay ebay ornway inay allay ormsstay afloatay. Ethay ailstay aperingtay ownday atthay ayway, ervesay otay arrycay offay ethay aterway, ed’yay eesay. Amesay ithway ockedcay atshay; ethay ockscay ormfay able-endgay eave-troughsay, Askflay. Onay oremay onkey-jacketsmay anday arpaulinstay orfay emay; IAY ustmay ountmay aay allow-tailsway, anday ivedray ownday aay eaverbay; osay. Alloahay! ewwhay! erethay oesgay myay arpaulintay overboarday; Ordlay, Ordlay, atthay ethay indsway atthay omecay omfray eavenhay ouldshay ebay osay unmannerlyay! Isthay isay aay astynay ightnay, ad.”lay 



APTERCHAY 122ay. Idnightmay Aloft.—thunderay anday Ightninglay. 

e_Thay ain-top-sailmay ard_.—_Tashtegoyay assingpay ewnay ashingslay arounday itay_. 

Um“ay, umay, umay. Opstay atthay underthay! Entyplay ootay uchmay underthay upay erehay. At’swhay ethay useay ofay underthay? Umay, umay, umay. Eway on’tday antway underthay; eway antway umray; ivegay usay aay assglay ofay umray. Umay, umay, um!”ay 



APTERCHAY 123ay. Ethay Usketmay. 

Uringday ethay ostmay iolentvay ocksshay ofay ethay Oontyphay, ethay anmay atay ethay Equod’spay aw-bonejay illertay adhay everalsay imestay eenbay eelinglyray urledhay otay ethay eckday byay itsay asmodicspay otionsmay, evenay oughthay eventerpray acklestay adhay eenbay attacheday otay it—foray eythay ereway ack—becauseslay omesay ayplay otay ethay illertay asway indispensableay. 

Inay aay everesay alegay ikelay isthay, ilewhay ethay ipshay isay utbay aay ossedtay uttlecockshay otay ethay astblay, itay isay byay onay eansmay uncommonay otay eesay ethay eedlesnay inay ethay ompassescay, atay intervalsay, ogay oundray anday oundray. Itay asway usthay ithway ethay Equod’spay; atay almostay everyay ockshay ethay elmsmanhay adhay otnay ailedfay otay oticenay ethay irlingwhay elocityvay ithway ichwhay eythay evolvedray uponay ethay ardscay; itay isay aay ightsay atthay ardlyhay anyoneay ancay eholdbay ithoutway omesay ortsay ofay unwonteday emotionay. 

Omesay ourshay afteray idnightmay, ethay Oontyphay abateday osay uchmay, atthay oughthray ethay enuousstray exertionsay ofay Arbuckstay anday Ubb—onestay engageday orwardfay anday ethay otheray aft—theay iveredshay emnantsray ofay ethay ibjay anday orefay anday ain-top-sailsmay ereway utcay adriftay omfray ethay arsspay, anday entway eddyingay awayay otay eewardlay, ikelay ethay eathersfay ofay anay albatrossay, ichwhay ometimessay areay astcay otay ethay indsway enwhay atthay orm-tossedstay irdbay isay onay ethay ingway. 

Ethay eethray orrespondingcay ewnay ailssay ereway ownay entbay anday eefedray, anday aay orm-trysailstay asway etsay urtherfay aftay; osay atthay ethay ipshay oonsay entway oughthray ethay aterway ithway omesay ecisionpray againay; anday ethay ourse—forcay ethay esentpray, East-south-east—whichay ehay asway otay eerstay, ifay acticablepray, asway onceay oremay ivengay otay ethay elmsmanhay. Orfay uringday ethay iolencevay ofay ethay alegay, ehay adhay onlyay eeredstay accordingay otay itsay icissitudesvay. Utbay asay ehay asway ownay ingingbray ethay ipshay asay earnay erhay oursecay asay ossiblepay, atchingway ethay ompasscay eanwhilemay, olay! aay oodgay ignsay! ethay indway eemedsay omingcay oundray asternay; ayeay, ethay oulfay eezebray ecamebay airfay! 

Instantlyay ethay ardsyay ereway uaredsqay, otay ethay ivelylay ongsay ofay o“_Hay! ethay airfay indway! oh-ye-hoay, eerlychay en!_”may ethay ewcray ingingsay orfay oyjay, atthay osay omisingpray anay eventay ouldshay osay oonsay avehay alsifiedfay ethay evilay ortentspay ecedingpray itay. 

Inay ompliancecay ithway ethay andingstay orderay ofay ishay ommander—tocay eportray immediatelyay, anday atay anyay oneay ofay ethay enty-fourtway ourshay, anyay ecidedday angechay inay ethay affairsay ofay ethay eck,—Starbuckday adhay onay oonersay immedtray ethay ardsyay otay ethay eeze—howeverbray eluctantlyray anday oomily,—thanglay ehay echanicallymay entway elowbay otay appriseay Aptaincay Ahabay ofay ethay ircumstancecay. 

Ereay ockingknay atay ishay ate-roomstay, ehay involuntarilyay ausedpay eforebay itay aay omentmay. Ethay abincay amp—takinglay onglay ingssway isthay ayway anday at—wasthay urningbay itfullyfay, anday astingcay itfulfay adowsshay uponay ethay olday an’smay oltedbay oor,—aday inthay oneay, ithway ixedfay indsblay inserteday, inay aceplay ofay upperay anelspay. Ethay isolateday ubterraneousnesssay ofay ethay abincay ademay aay ertaincay umminghay ilencesay otay eignray erethay, oughthay itay asway oopedhay oundray byay allay ethay oarray ofay ethay elementsay. Ethay oadedlay usketsmay inay ethay ackray ereway ininglyshay evealedray, asay eythay oodstay uprightay againstay ethay orwardfay ulkheadbay. Arbuckstay asway anay onesthay, uprightay anmay; utbay outay ofay Arbuck’sstay earthay, atay atthay instantay enwhay ehay awsay ethay usketsmay, erethay angelystray evolveday anay evilay oughtthay; utbay osay entblay ithway itsay eutralnay oray oodgay accompanimentsay atthay orfay ethay instantay ehay ardlyhay ewknay itay orfay itselfay. 

e“Hay ouldway avehay otshay emay once,”ay ehay urmuredmay, es“yay, ere’sthay ethay eryvay usketmay atthay ehay ointedpay atay e;—thatmay oneay ithway ethay uddedstay ockstay; etlay emay ouchtay it—liftay itay. Angestray, atthay IAY, owhay avehay andledhay osay anymay eadlyday anceslay, angestray, atthay IAY ouldshay akeshay osay ownay. Oadedlay? IAY ustmay eesay. Ayeay, ayeay; anday owderpay inay ethay an;—that’spay otnay oodgay. Estbay illspay it?—waitay. I’llay urecay elfmysay ofay isthay. I’llay oldhay ethay usketmay oldlybay ilewhay IAY ink.—Ithay omecay otay eportray aay airfay indway otay imhay. Utbay owhay airfay? Airfay orfay eathday anday oom,—_that’sday_ airfay orfay Obymay Ickday. It’say aay airfay indway at’sthay onlyay airfay orfay atthay accurseday ish.—Thefay eryvay ubetay ehay ointedpay atay e!—themay eryvay oneay; is_thay_ one—Iay oldhay itay erehay; ehay ouldway avehay illedkay emay ithway ethay eryvay ingthay IAY andlehay ow.—Ayenay anday ehay ouldway ainfay illkay allay ishay ewcray. Oesday ehay otnay aysay ehay illway otnay ikestray ishay arsspay otay anyay alegay? Ashay ehay otnay ashedday ishay eavenlyhay uadrantqay? anday inay esethay amesay erilouspay eassay, opesgray ehay otnay ishay ayway byay eremay eadday eckoningray ofay ethay error-aboundingay oglay? anday inay isthay eryvay Oontyphay, idday ehay otnay earsway atthay ehay ouldway avehay onay ightning-rodslay? Utbay allshay isthay azedcray olday anmay ebay amelytay ufferedsay otay agdray aay olewhay ip’sshay ompanycay ownday otay oomday ithway im?—Yeshay, itay ouldway akemay imhay ethay ilfulway urderermay ofay irtythay enmay anday oremay, ifay isthay ipshay omecay otay anyay eadlyday armhay; anday omecay otay eadlyday armhay, myay oulsay earssway isthay ipshay illway, ifay Ahabay avehay ishay ayway. Ifay, enthay, ehay ereway isthay instant—putay asideay, atthay imecray ouldway otnay ebay ishay. Ahay! isay ehay utteringmay inay ishay eepslay? Esyay, ustjay ere,—inthay erethay, e’shay eepingslay. Eepingslay? ayeay, utbay illstay aliveay, anday oonsay awakeay againay. IAY an’tcay ithstandway eethay, enthay, olday anmay. Otnay easoningray; otnay emonstranceray; otnay entreatyay iltway outhay earkenhay otay; allay isthay outhay ornestscay. Atflay obedienceay otay thyay ownay atflay ommandscay, isthay isay allay outhay eathestbray. Ayeay, anday ay’stsay ethay enmay avehay ow’dvay thyay owvay; ay’stsay allay ofay usay areay Ahabsay. Eatgray Odgay orbid!—Butfay isay erethay onay otheray ayway? onay awfullay ay?—Makeway imhay aay isonerpray otay ebay akentay omehay? Atwhay! opehay otay estwray isthay olday an’smay ivinglay owerpay omfray ishay ownay ivinglay andshay? Onlyay aay oolfay ouldway tryay itay. Aysay ehay ereway inionedpay evenay; ottedknay allay overay ithway opesray anday awsershay; ainedchay ownday otay ing-boltsray onay isthay abincay oorflay; ehay ouldway ebay oremay ideoushay anthay aay agedcay igertay, enthay. IAY ouldcay otnay endureay ethay ightsay; ouldcay otnay ossiblypay flyay ishay owlingshay; allay omfortcay, eepslay itselfay, inestimableay easonray ouldway eavelay emay onay ethay onglay intolerableay oyagevay. Atwhay, enthay, emainsray? Ethay andlay isay undredshay ofay eagueslay awayay, anday ockedlay Apanjay ethay earestnay. IAY andstay aloneay erehay uponay anay openay easay, ithway otway oceansay anday aay olewhay ontinentcay etweenbay emay anday aw.—Ayelay, ayeay, is’tay o.—Issay eavenhay aay urderermay enwhay itsay ightninglay ikesstray aay ould-beway urderermay inay ishay edbay, inderingtay eetsshay anday inskay ogether?—Andtay ouldway IAY ebay aay urderermay, enthay, if”—anday owlyslay, ealthilystay, anday alfhay idewayssay ookinglay, ehay acedplay ethay oadedlay usket’smay enday againstay ethay oorday. 

On“ay isthay evellay, Ahab’say ammockhay ingssway ithinway; ishay eadhay isthay ayway. AAY ouchtay, anday Arbuckstay aymay urvivesay otay ughay ishay ifeway anday ildchay again.—Ohay Arymay! Ary!—boymay! oybay! oy!—Butbay ifay IAY akeway eethay otnay otay eathday, olday anmay, owhay ancay elltay otay atwhay unsoundeday eepsday Arbuck’sstay odybay isthay ayday eekway aymay inksay, ithway allay ethay ewcray! Eatgray Odgay, erewhay artay Outhay? Allshay IAY? allshay I?—theay indway ashay onegay ownday anday iftedshay, irsay; ethay orefay anday ainmay opsailstay areay eefedray anday etsay; eshay eadshay erhay ourse.”cay 

ern“Stay allay! Ohay Obymay Ickday, IAY utchclay thyay earthay atay ast!”lay 

Uchsay ereway ethay oundssay atthay ownay amecay urtlinghay omfray outay ethay olday an’smay ormentedtay eepslay, asay ifay Arbuck’sstay oicevay adhay ausedcay ethay onglay umbday eamdray otay eakspay. 

Ethay etyay evelledlay usketmay ookshay ikelay aay unkard’sdray armay againstay ethay anelpay; Arbuckstay eemedsay estlingwray ithway anay angelay; utbay urningtay omfray ethay oorday, ehay acedplay ethay eath-tubeday inay itsay ackray, anday eftlay ethay aceplay. 

e’s“Hay ootay oundsay asleepay, Mray. Ubbstay; ogay outhay ownday, anday akeway imhay, anday elltay imhay. IAY ustmay eesay otay ethay eckday erehay. Outhay ow’stknay atwhay otay ay.”say 



APTERCHAY 124ay. Ethay Eedlenay. 

Extnay orningmay ethay ot-yet-subsidednay easay olledray inay onglay owslay illowsbay ofay ightymay ulkbay, anday ivingstray inay ethay Equod’spay urglinggay acktray, ushedpay erhay onay ikelay iants’gay almspay outspreaday. Ethay ongstray, unstaggeringay eezebray aboundeday osay, atthay skyay anday airay eemedsay astvay outbellyingay ailssay; ethay olewhay orldway oomedbay eforebay ethay indway. Uffledmay inay ethay ullfay orningmay ightlay, ethay invisibleay unsay asway onlyay ownknay byay ethay eadspray intensityay ofay ishay aceplay; erewhay ishay ayonetbay aysray ovedmay onay inay acksstay. Emblazoningsay, asay ofay ownedcray Abylonianbay ingskay anday ueensqay, eignedray overay everythingay. Ethay easay asway asay aay uciblecray ofay oltenmay oldgay, atthay ubblinglybay eapslay ithway ightlay anday eathay. 

Onglay aintainingmay anay enchanteday ilencesay, Ahabay oodstay apartay; anday everyay imetay ethay eteringtay ipshay oweringlylay itchedpay ownday erhay owspritbay, ehay urnedtay otay eyeay ethay ightbray un’ssay aysray oducedpray aheaday; anday enwhay eshay ofoundlypray ettledsay byay ethay ernstay, ehay urnedtay ehindbay, anday awsay ethay un’ssay earwardray aceplay, anday owhay ethay amesay ellowyay aysray ereway endingblay ithway ishay undeviatingay akeway. 

a“Hay, ahay, myay ipshay! outhay ightestmay ellway ebay akentay ownay orfay ethay ea-chariotsay ofay ethay unsay. Ohay, ohay! allay eyay ationsnay eforebay myay owpray, IAY ingbray ethay unsay otay eyay! Okeyay onay ethay urtherfay illowsbay; allohay! aay andemtay, IAY ivedray ethay ea!”say 

Utbay uddenlysay einedray ackbay byay omesay ountercay oughtthay, ehay urriedhay owardstay ethay elmhay, uskilyhay emandingday owhay ethay ipshay asway eadinghay. 

East-sou-east“ay, ir,”say aidsay ethay ightenedfray eersmanstay. 

ou“Thay iest!”lay itingsmay imhay ithway ishay enchedclay istfay. eading“Hay Eastay atay isthay ourhay inay ethay orningmay, anday ethay unsay astern?”ay 

Uponay isthay everyay oulsay asway onfoundedcay; orfay ethay enomenonphay ustjay enthay observeday byay Ahabay adhay unaccountablyay escapeday everyay oneay elseay; utbay itsay eryvay indingblay alpablenesspay ustmay avehay eenbay ethay ausecay. 

Ustingthray ishay eadhay alfhay ayway intoay ethay innaclebay, Ahabay aughtcay oneay impseglay ofay ethay ompassescay; ishay uplifteday armay owlyslay ellfay; orfay aay omentmay ehay almostay eemedsay otay aggerstay. Andingstay ehindbay imhay Arbuckstay ookedlay, anday olay! ethay otway ompassescay ointedpay Eastay, anday ethay Equodpay asway asay infalliblyay oinggay Estway. 

Utbay ereay ethay irstfay ildway alarmay ouldcay etgay outay abroaday amongay ethay ewcray, ethay olday anmay ithway aay igidray aughlay exclaimeday, I“AY avehay itay! Itay ashay appenedhay eforebay. Mray. Arbuckstay, astlay ight’snay underthay urnedtay ouray ompasses—that’scay allay. Outhay asthay eforebay ownay eardhay ofay uchsay aay ingthay, IAY aketay it.”ay 

Aye“ay; utbay evernay eforebay ashay itay appenedhay otay emay, ir,”say aidsay ethay alepay atemay, oomilyglay. 

Erehay, itay ustmay eedsnay ebay aidsay, atthay accidentsay ikelay isthay avehay inay oremay anthay oneay asecay occurreday otay ipsshay inay iolentvay ormsstay. Ethay agneticmay energyay, asay evelopedday inay ethay ariner’smay eedlenay, isay, asay allay owknay, essentiallyay oneay ithway ethay electricityay eheldbay inay eavenhay; encehay itay isay otnay otay ebay uchmay arvelledmay atay, atthay uchsay ingsthay ouldshay ebay. Instancesay erewhay ethay ightninglay ashay actuallyay uckstray ethay esselvay, osay asay otay itesmay ownday omesay ofay ethay arsspay anday iggingray, ethay effectay uponay ethay eedlenay ashay atay imestay eenbay illstay oremay atalfay; allay itsay oadstonelay irtuevay eingbay annihilateday, osay atthay ethay eforebay agneticmay eelstay asway ofay onay oremay useay anthay anay olday ife’sway ittingknay eedlenay. Utbay inay eitheray asecay, ethay eedlenay evernay againay, ofay itselfay, ecoversray ethay originalay irtuevay usthay arredmay oray ostlay; anday ifay ethay innaclebay ompassescay ebay affecteday, ethay amesay atefay eachesray allay ethay othersay atthay aymay ebay inay ethay ipshay; evenay ereway ethay owermostlay oneay inserteday intoay ethay elsonkay. 

Eliberatelyday andingstay eforebay ethay innaclebay, anday eyeingay ethay anspointedtray ompassescay, ethay olday anmay, ithway ethay arpshay ofay ishay extendeday andhay, ownay ooktay ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay unsay, anday atisfiedsay atthay ethay eedlesnay ereway exactlyay inverteday, outedshay outay ishay ordersay orfay ethay ip’sshay oursecay otay ebay angedchay accordinglyay. Ethay ardsyay ereway ardhay upay; anday onceay oremay ethay Equodpay ustthray erhay undaunteday owsbay intoay ethay opposingay indway, orfay ethay upposedsay airfay oneay adhay onlyay eenbay ugglingjay erhay. 

Eanwhilemay, ateverwhay ereway ishay ownay ecretsay oughtsthay, Arbuckstay aidsay othingnay, utbay uietlyqay ehay issueday allay equisiteray ordersay; ilewhay Ubbstay anday Ask—whoflay inay omesay allsmay egreeday eemedsay enthay otay ebay aringshay ishay eelings—likewisefay unmurmuringlyay acquiesceday. Asay orfay ethay enmay, oughthay omesay ofay emthay owlylay umbledray, eirthay earfay ofay Ahabay asway eatergray anthay eirthay earfay ofay Atefay. Utbay asay everay eforebay, ethay aganpay arpooneershay emainedray almostay ollywhay unimpresseday; oray ifay impresseday, itay asway onlyay ithway aay ertaincay agnetismmay otshay intoay eirthay ongenialcay eartshay omfray inflexibleay Ahab’say. 

Orfay aay acespay ethay olday anmay alkedway ethay eckday inay ollingray everiesray. Utbay ancingchay otay ipslay ithway ishay ivoryay eelhay, ehay awsay ethay ushedcray oppercay ight-tubessay ofay ethay uadrantqay ehay adhay ethay ayday eforebay ashedday otay ethay eckday. 

ou“Thay oorpay, oudpray eaven-gazerhay anday un’ssay ilotpay! esterdayyay IAY eckedwray eethay, anday o-daytay ethay ompassescay ouldway ainfay avehay eckedwray emay. Osay, osay. Utbay Ahabay isay ordlay overay ethay evellay oadstonelay etyay. Mray. Arbuck—astay ancelay ithoutway aay olepay; aay op-maultay, anday ethay allestsmay ofay ethay ail-maker’ssay eedlesnay. Uick!”qay 

Accessoryay, erhapspay, otay ethay impulseay ictatingday ethay ingthay ehay asway ownay aboutay otay oday, ereway ertaincay udentialpray otivesmay, osewhay objectay ightmay avehay eenbay otay eviveray ethay iritsspay ofay ishay ewcray byay aay okestray ofay ishay ubtilesay illskay, inay aay attermay osay ondrousway asay atthay ofay ethay inverteday ompassescay. Esidesbay, ethay olday anmay ellway ewknay atthay otay eerstay byay anspointedtray eedlesnay, oughthay umsilyclay acticablepray, asway otnay aay ingthay otay ebay assedpay overay byay uperstitioussay ailorssay, ithoutway omesay udderingsshay anday evilay ortentspay. 

en,”“May aidsay ehay, eadilystay urningtay uponay ethay ewcray, asay ethay atemay andedhay imhay ethay ingsthay ehay adhay emandedday, “myay enmay, ethay underthay urnedtay olday Ahab’say eedlesnay; utbay outay ofay isthay itbay ofay eelstay Ahabay ancay akemay oneay ofay ishay ownay, atthay illway ointpay asay uetray asay any.”ay 

Abasheday ancesglay ofay ervilesay onderway ereway exchangeday byay ethay ailorssay, asay isthay asway aidsay; anday ithway ascinatedfay eyesay eythay awaiteday ateverwhay agicmay ightmay ollowfay. Utbay Arbuckstay ookedlay awayay. 

Ithway aay owblay omfray ethay op-maultay Ahabay ockedknay offay ethay eelstay eadhay ofay ethay ancelay, anday enthay andinghay otay ethay atemay ethay onglay ironay odray emainingray, adebay imhay oldhay itay uprightay, ithoutway itsay ouchingtay ethay eckday. Enthay, ithway ethay aulmay, afteray epeatedlyray itingsmay ethay upperay enday ofay isthay ironay odray, ehay acedplay ethay untedblay eedlenay endwiseay onay ethay optay ofay itay, anday esslay onglystray ammeredhay atthay, everalsay imestay, ethay atemay illstay oldinghay ethay odray asay eforebay. Enthay oinggay oughthray omesay allsmay angestray otionsmay ithway it—whetheray indispensableay otay ethay agnetizingmay ofay ethay eelstay, oray erelymay intendeday otay augmentay ethay aweay ofay ethay ewcray, isay uncertain—heay alledcay orfay inenlay eadthray; anday ovingmay otay ethay innaclebay, ippedslay outay ethay otway eversedray eedlesnay erethay, anday orizontallyhay uspendedsay ethay ail-needlesay byay itsay iddlemay, overay oneay ofay ethay ompass-cardscay. Atay irstfay, ethay eelstay entway oundray anday oundray, uiveringqay anday ibratingvay atay eitheray enday; utbay atay astlay itay ettledsay otay itsay aceplay, enwhay Ahabay, owhay adhay eenbay intentlyay atchingway orfay isthay esultray, eppedstay anklyfray ackbay omfray ethay innaclebay, anday ointingpay ishay etchedstray armay owardstay itay, exclaimed,—“Lookay eyay, orfay ourselvesyay, ifay Ahabay ebay otnay ordlay ofay ethay evellay oadstonelay! Ethay unsay isay Eastay, anday atthay ompasscay earssway it!”ay 

Oneay afteray anotheray eythay eeredpay inay, orfay othingnay utbay eirthay ownay eyesay ouldcay ersuadepay uchsay ignoranceay asay eirsthay, anday oneay afteray anotheray eythay unkslay awayay. 

Inay ishay ieryfay eyesay ofay ornscay anday iumphtray, ouyay enthay awsay Ahabay inay allay ishay atalfay idepray. 



APTERCHAY 125ay. Ethay Oglay anday Inelay. 

Ilewhay ownay ethay atedfay Equodpay adhay eenbay osay onglay afloatay isthay oyagevay, ethay oglay anday inelay adhay utbay eryvay eldomsay eenbay inay useay. Owingay otay aay onfidentcay elianceray uponay otheray eansmay ofay eterminingday ethay essel’svay aceplay, omesay erchantmenmay, anday anymay alemenwhay, especiallyay enwhay uisingcray, ollywhay eglectnay otay eavehay ethay oglay; oughthay atay ethay amesay imetay, anday equentlyfray oremay orfay orm’sfay akesay anthay anythingay elseay, egularlyray uttingpay ownday uponay ethay ustomarycay ateslay ethay oursecay eeredstay byay ethay ipshay, asay ellway asay ethay esumedpray averageay ateray ofay ogressionpray everyay ourhay. Itay adhay eenbay usthay ithway ethay Equodpay. Ethay oodenway eelray anday angularay oglay attacheday unghay, onglay untoucheday, ustjay eneathbay ethay ailingray ofay ethay afteray ulwarksbay. Ainsray anday ayspray adhay ampedday itay; unsay anday indway adhay arpedway itay; allay ethay elementsay adhay ombinedcay otay otray aay ingthay atthay unghay osay idlyay. Utbay eedlesshay ofay allay isthay, ishay oodmay eizedsay Ahabay, asay ehay appenedhay otay anceglay uponay ethay eelray, otnay anymay ourshay afteray ethay agnetmay enescay, anday ehay ememberedray owhay ishay uadrantqay asway onay oremay, anday ecalledray ishay anticfray oathay aboutay ethay evellay oglay anday inelay. Ethay ipshay asway ailingsay unginglyplay; asternay ethay illowsbay olledray inay iotsray. 

orward“Fay, erethay! Eavehay ethay og!”lay 

Otway eamensay amecay. Ethay olden-huedgay Ahitiantay anday ethay izzlygray Anxmanmay. ake“Tay ethay eelray, oneay ofay eyay, I’llay eave.”hay 

Eythay entway owardstay ethay extremeay ernstay, onay ethay ip’sshay eelay idesay, erewhay ethay eckday, ithway ethay obliqueay energyay ofay ethay indway, asway ownay almostay ippingday intoay ethay eamycray, idelong-rushingsay easay. 

Ethay Anxmanmay ooktay ethay eelray, anday oldinghay itay ighhay upay, byay ethay ojectingpray andle-endshay ofay ethay indlespay, oundray ichwhay ethay oolspay ofay inelay evolvedray, osay oodstay ithway ethay angularay oglay anginghay ownwardsday, illtay Ahabay advanceday otay imhay. 

Ahabay oodstay eforebay imhay, anday asway ightlylay unwindingay omesay irtythay oray ortyfay urnstay otay ormfay aay eliminarypray and-coilhay otay osstay overboarday, enwhay ethay olday Anxmanmay, owhay asway intentlyay eyeingay othbay imhay anday ethay inelay, ademay oldbay otay eakspay. 

ir“Say, IAY istrustmay itay; isthay inelay ookslay arfay onegay, onglay eathay anday etway avehay oiledspay it.”ay 

ill“’Tway oldhay, olday entlemangay. Onglay eathay anday etway, avehay eythay oiledspay eethay? Outhay eem’stsay otay oldhay. Oray, uertray erhapspay, ifelay oldshay eethay; otnay outhay it.”ay 

I“AY oldhay ethay oolspay, irsay. Utbay ustjay asay myay aptaincay ayssay. Ithway esethay eygray airshay ofay inemay is’tay otnay orthway ilewhay isputingday, ecially’spay ithway aay uperiorsay, o’llwhay e’ernay onfess.”cay 

at’s“Whay atthay? Erethay ow’snay aay atchedpay ofessorpray inay Ueenqay Ature’snay anite-foundedgray Ollegecay; utbay ethinksmay e’shay ootay ubservientsay. Erewhay ertway outhay orn?”bay 

In“ay ethay ittlelay ockyray Isleay ofay Anmay, ir.”say 

Excellent“ay! Ou’stthay ithay ethay orldway byay at.”thay 

I“AY owknay otnay, irsay, utbay IAY asway ornbay ere.”thay 

In“ay ethay Isleay ofay Anmay, eyhay? Ellway, ethay otheray ayway, it’say oodgay. Ere’shay aay anmay omfray Anmay; aay anmay ornbay inay onceay independentay Anmay, anday ownay unmanneday ofay Anmay; ichwhay isay uckedsay in—byay atwhay? Upay ithway ethay eelray! Ethay eadday, indblay allway uttsbay allay inquiringay eadshay atay astlay. Upay ithway itay! O.”say 

Ethay oglay asway eavedhay. Ethay ooselay oilscay apidlyray aightenedstray outay inay aay onglay aggingdray inelay asternay, anday enthay, instantlyay, ethay eelray eganbay otay irlwhay. Inay urntay, erkinglyjay aisedray anday oweredlay byay ethay ollingray illowsbay, ethay owingtay esistanceray ofay ethay oglay ausedcay ethay olday eelmanray otay aggerstay angelystray. 

old“Hay ard!”hay 

Apsnay! ethay overstraineday inelay aggedsay ownday inay oneay onglay estoonfay; ethay uggingtay oglay asway onegay. 

I“AY ushcray ethay uadrantqay, ethay underthay urnstay ethay eedlesnay, anday ownay ethay admay easay artspay ethay og-linelay. Utbay Ahabay ancay endmay allay. Aulhay inay erehay, Ahitiantay; eelray upay, Anxmanmay. Anday ooklay eyay, etlay ethay arpentercay akemay anotheray oglay, anday endmay outhay ethay inelay. Eesay otay it.”ay 

ere“Thay ehay oesgay ownay; otay imhay othing’snay appenedhay; utbay otay emay, ethay ewerskay eemssay ooseninglay outay ofay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay orldway. Aulhay inay, aulhay inay, Ahitiantay! Esethay ineslay unray olewhay, anday irlingwhay outay: omecay inay okenbray, anday aggingdray owslay. Ahay, Ippay? omecay otay elphay; ehay, Ip?”pay 

ip“Pay? omwhay allcay eyay Ippay? Ippay umpedjay omfray ethay ale-boatwhay. Ip’spay issingmay. Et’slay eesay ownay ifay eyay aven’thay ishedfay imhay upay erehay, ishermanfay. Itay agsdray ardhay; IAY uessgay e’shay oldinghay onay. Erkjay imhay, Ahititay! Erkjay imhay offay; eway aulhay inay onay owardscay erehay. Ohay! ere’sthay ishay armay ustjay eakingbray aterway. AAY atchethay! aay atchethay! utcay itay off—weay aulhay inay onay owardscay erehay. Aptaincay Ahabay! irsay, irsay! ere’shay Ippay, ingtryay otay etgay onay oardbay again.”ay 

eace“Pay, outhay azycray oon,”lay iedcray ethay Anxmanmay, eizingsay imhay byay ethay armay. Away“ay omfray ethay uarter-deck!”qay 

e“Thay eatergray idiotay everay oldsscay ethay esser,”lay utteredmay Ahabay, advancingay. ands“Hay offay omfray atthay olinesshay! Erewhay ayestsay outhay Ippay asway, oybay? 

Astern“ay erethay, irsay, asternay! Olay! o!”lay 

And“ay owhay artay outhay, oybay? IAY eesay otnay myay eflectionray inay ethay acantvay upilspay ofay thyay eyesay. Ohay Odgay! atthay anmay ouldshay ebay aay ingthay orfay immortalay oulssay otay ievesay oughthray! Owhay artay outhay, oy?”bay 

ell-boy“Bay, irsay; ip’s-criershay; ingday, ongday, ingday! Ippay! Ippay! Ippay! Oneay undredhay oundspay ofay ayclay ewardray orfay Ippay; ivefay eetfay igh—lookshay owardly—quickestcay ownknay byay atthay! Ingday, ongday, ingday! O’swhay eensay Ippay ethay oward?”cay 

ere“Thay ancay ebay onay eartshay aboveay ethay ow-linesnay. Ohay, eyay ozenfray eavenshay! ooklay ownday erehay. Eyay idday egetbay isthay ucklesslay ildchay, anday avehay abandoneday imhay, eyay eativecray ibertineslay. Erehay, oybay; Ahab’say abincay allshay ebay Ip’spay omehay enceforthhay, ilewhay Ahabay iveslay. Outhay ouchesttay myay inmostay entrecay, oybay; outhay artay iedtay otay emay byay ordscay ovenway ofay myay eart-stringshay. Omecay, et’slay own.”day 

at’s“Whay isthay? ere’shay elvetvay ark-skin,”shay intentlyay azinggay atay Ahab’say andhay, anday eelingfay itay. Ah“ay, ownay, adhay oorpay Ippay utbay eltfay osay indkay aay ingthay asay isthay, erhapspay ehay adhay e’ernay eenbay ostlay! Isthay eemssay otay emay, irsay, asay aay an-ropemay; omethingsay atthay eakway oulssay aymay oldhay byay. Ohay, irsay, etlay olday Erthpay ownay omecay anday ivetray esethay otway andshay ogethertay; ethay ackblay oneay ithway ethay itewhay, orfay IAY illway otnay etlay isthay o.”gay 

Oh“ay, oybay, ornay illway IAY eethay, unlessay IAY ouldshay erebythay agdray eethay otay orseway orrorshay anthay areay erehay. Omecay, enthay, otay myay abincay. Olay! eyay elieversbay inay odsgay allay oodnessgay, anday inay anmay allay illay, olay ouyay! eesay ethay omniscientay odsgay obliviousay ofay ufferingsay anmay; anday anmay, oughthay idioticay, anday owingknay otnay atwhay ehay oesday, etyay ullfay ofay ethay eetsway ingsthay ofay ovelay anday atitudegray. Omecay! IAY eelfay ouderpray eadinglay eethay byay thyay ackblay andhay, anthay oughthay IAY aspedgray anay Emperor’s!”ay 

ere“Thay ogay otway aftday onesay ow,”nay utteredmay ethay olday Anxmanmay. One“ay aftday ithway engthstray, ethay otheray aftday ithway eaknessway. Utbay ere’shay ethay enday ofay ethay ottenray ine—alllay ippingdray, ootay. Endmay itay, ehay? IAY inkthay eway adhay estbay avehay aay ewnay inelay altogetheray. I’llay eesay Mray. Ubbstay aboutay it.”ay 



APTERCHAY 126ay. Ethay Ife-buoylay. 

Eeringstay ownay outh-eastwardsay byay Ahab’say evelledlay eelstay, anday erhay ogresspray olelysay eterminedday byay Ahab’say evellay oglay anday inelay; ethay Equodpay eldhay onay erhay athpay owardstay ethay Equatoray. Akingmay osay onglay aay assagepay oughthray uchsay unfrequenteday atersway, escryingday onay ipsshay, anday ereay onglay, idewayssay impelleday byay unvaryingay adetray indsway, overay avesway onotonouslymay ildmay; allay esethay eemedsay ethay angestray almcay ingsthay eludingpray omesay iotousray anday esperateday enescay. 

Atay astlay, enwhay ethay ipshay ewdray earnay otay ethay outskirtsay, asay itay ereway, ofay ethay Equatorialay ishing-groundfay, anday inay ethay eepday arknessday atthay oesgay eforebay ethay awnday, asway ailingsay byay aay usterclay ofay ockyray isletsay; ethay atch—thenway eadedhay byay Ask—wasflay artledstay byay aay cryay osay aintivelyplay ildway anday unearthly—likeay alf-articulatedhay ailingsway ofay ethay ostsghay ofay allay Erod’shay urderedmay Innocents—thatay oneay anday allay, eythay artedstay omfray eirthay everiesray, anday orfay ethay acespay ofay omesay omentsmay oodstay, oray atsay, oray eanedlay allay ansfixedlytray isteninglay, ikelay ethay arvedcay Omanray aveslay, ilewhay atthay ildway cryay emainedray ithinway earinghay. Ethay Istianchray oray ivilizedcay artpay ofay ethay ewcray aidsay itay asway ermaidsmay, anday udderedshay; utbay ethay aganpay arpooneershay emainedray unappalleday. Etyay ethay eygray Anxman—themay oldestay arinermay ofay all—declareday atthay ethay ildway illingthray oundssay atthay ereway eardhay, ereway ethay oicesvay ofay ewlynay owneddray enmay inay ethay easay. 

Elowbay inay ishay ammockhay, Ahabay idday otnay earhay ofay isthay illtay eygray awnday, enwhay ehay amecay otay ethay eckday; itay asway enthay ecountedray otay imhay byay Askflay, otnay unaccompanieday ithway intedhay arkday eaningsmay. Ehay ollowlyhay aughedlay, anday usthay explaineday ethay onderway. 

Osethay ockyray islandsay ethay ipshay adhay assedpay ereway ethay esortray ofay eatgray umbersnay ofay ealssay, anday omesay oungyay ealssay atthay adhay ostlay eirthay amsday, oray omesay amsday atthay adhay ostlay eirthay ubscay, ustmay avehay isenray ighnay ethay ipshay anday eptkay ompanycay ithway erhay, ingcryay anday obbingsay ithway eirthay umanhay ortsay ofay ailway. Utbay isthay onlyay ethay oremay affecteday omesay ofay emthay, ecausebay ostmay arinersmay erishchay aay eryvay uperstitioussay eelingfay aboutay ealssay, arisingay otnay onlyay omfray eirthay eculiarpay onestay enwhay inay istressday, utbay alsoay omfray ethay umanhay ooklay ofay eirthay oundray eadshay anday emi-intelligentsay acesfay, eensay eeringlypay uprisingay omfray ethay aterway alongsideay. Inay ethay easay, underay ertaincay ircumstancescay, ealssay avehay oremay anthay onceay eenbay istakenmay orfay enmay. 

Utbay ethay odingsbay ofay ethay ewcray ereway estinedday otay eceiveray aay ostmay ausibleplay onfirmationcay inay ethay atefay ofay oneay ofay eirthay umbernay atthay orningmay. Atay un-risesay isthay anmay entway omfray ishay ammockhay otay ishay ast-headmay atay ethay orefay; anday etherwhay itay asway atthay ehay asway otnay etyay alfhay akedway omfray ishay eepslay or(fay ailorssay ometimessay ogay aloftay inay aay ansitiontray atestay), etherwhay itay asway usthay ithway ethay anmay, erethay isay ownay onay ellingtay; utbay, ebay atthay asay itay aymay, ehay adhay otnay eenbay onglay atay ishay erchpay, enwhay aay cryay asway eard—ahay cryay anday aay ushing—andray ookinglay upay, eythay awsay aay allingfay antomphay inay ethay airay; anday ookinglay ownday, aay ittlelay ossedtay eaphay ofay itewhay ubblesbay inay ethay ueblay ofay ethay easay. 

Ethay ife-buoy—alay onglay enderslay ask—wascay oppeddray omfray ethay ernstay, erewhay itay alwaysay unghay obedientay otay aay unningcay ingspray; utbay onay andhay oseray otay eizesay itay, anday ethay unsay avinghay onglay eatbay uponay isthay askcay itay adhay unkenshray, osay atthay itay owlyslay illedfay, anday atthay archedpay oodway alsoay illedfay atay itsay everyay orepay; anday ethay uddedstay iron-bounday askcay ollowedfay ethay ailorsay otay ethay ottombay, asay ifay otay ieldyay imhay ishay illowpay, oughthay inay oothsay utbay aay ardhay oneay. 

Anday usthay ethay irstfay anmay ofay ethay Equodpay atthay ountedmay ethay astmay otay ooklay outay orfay ethay Itewhay Alewhay, onay ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay ownay eculiarpay oundgray; atthay anmay asway allowedsway upay inay ethay eepday. Utbay ewfay, erhapspay, oughtthay ofay atthay atay ethay imetay. Indeeday, inay omesay ortsay, eythay ereway otnay ievedgray atay isthay eventay, atay eastlay asay aay ortentpay; orfay eythay egardedray itay, otnay asay aay oreshadowingfay ofay evilay inay ethay uturefay, utbay asay ethay ulfilmentfay ofay anay evilay alreadyay esagedpray. Eythay eclaredday atthay ownay eythay ewknay ethay easonray ofay osethay ildway ieksshray eythay adhay eardhay ethay ightnay eforebay. Utbay againay ethay olday Anxmanmay aidsay aynay. 

Ethay ostlay ife-buoylay asway ownay otay ebay eplacedray; Arbuckstay asway irectedday otay eesay otay itay; utbay asay onay askcay ofay ufficientsay ightnesslay ouldcay ebay oundfay, anday asay inay ethay everishfay eagernessay ofay atwhay eemedsay ethay approachingay isiscray ofay ethay oyagevay, allay andshay ereway impatientay ofay anyay oiltay utbay atwhay asway irectlyday onnectedcay ithway itsay inalfay enday, ateverwhay atthay ightmay ovepray otay ebay; ereforethay, eythay ereway oinggay otay eavelay ethay ip’sshay ernstay unprovideday ithway aay uoybay, enwhay byay ertaincay angestray ignssay anday inuendoesay Ueequegqay intedhay aay inthay oncerningcay ishay offincay. 

A“AY ife-buoylay ofay aay offin!”cay iedcray Arbuckstay, artingstay. 

ather“Ray ueerqay, atthay, IAY ouldshay ay,”say aidsay Ubbstay. 

It“ay illway akemay aay oodgay enoughay one,”ay aidsay Askflay, e“thay arpentercay erehay ancay arrangeay itay easily.”ay 

ing“Bray itay upay; ere’sthay othingnay elseay orfay it,”ay aidsay Arbuckstay, afteray aay elancholymay ausepay. ig“Ray itay, arpentercay; oday otnay ooklay atay emay o—thesay offincay, IAY eanmay. Ostday outhay earhay emay? Igray it.”ay 

And“ay allshay IAY ailnay ownday ethay idlay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay asay ithway aay ammerhay. 

Aye.”“ay 

And“ay allshay IAY aulkcay ethay eamssay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay asay ithway aay aulking-ironcay. 

Aye.”“ay 

And“ay allshay IAY enthay aypay overay ethay amesay ithway itchpay, ir?”say ovingmay ishay andhay asay ithway aay itch-potpay. 

Away“ay! atwhay ossessespay eethay otay isthay? Akemay aay ife-buoylay ofay ethay offincay, anday onay ore.—Mrmay. Ubbstay, Mray. Askflay, omecay orwardfay ithway e.”may 

e“Hay oesgay offay inay aay uffhay. Ethay olewhay ehay ancay endureay; atay ethay artspay ehay aulksbay. Ownay IAY on’tday ikelay isthay. IAY akemay aay eglay orfay Aptaincay Ahabay, anday ehay earsway itay ikelay aay entlemangay; utbay IAY akemay aay andboxbay orfay Ueequegqay, anday ehay on’tway utpay ishay eadhay intoay itay. Areay allay myay ainspay otay ogay orfay othingnay ithway atthay offincay? Anday ownay I’may ordereday otay akemay aay ife-buoylay ofay itay. It’say ikelay urningtay anay olday oatcay; oinggay otay ingbray ethay eshflay onay ethay otheray idesay ownay. IAY on’tday ikelay isthay obblingcay ortsay ofay usiness—Ibay on’tday ikelay itay atay allay; it’say undignifieday; it’say otnay myay aceplay. Etlay inkers’tay atsbray oday inkeringstay; eway areay eirthay ettersbay. IAY ikelay otay aketay inay andhay onenay utbay eanclay, irginvay, air-and-squarefay athematicalmay obsjay, omethingsay atthay egularlyray eginsbay atay ethay eginningbay, anday isay atay ethay iddlemay enwhay idwaymay, anday omescay otay anay enday atay ethay onclusioncay; otnay aay obbler’scay objay, at’sthay atay anay enday inay ethay iddlemay, anday atay ethay eginningbay atay ethay enday. It’say ethay olday oman’sway ickstray otay ebay ivinggay obblingcay obsjay. Ordlay! atwhay anay affectionay allay olday omenway avehay orfay inkerstay. IAY owknay anay olday omanway ofay ixty-fivesay owhay anray awayay ithway aay ald-headedbay oungyay inkertay onceay. Anday at’sthay ethay easonray IAY evernay ouldway orkway orfay onelylay idowway olday omenway ashoreay, enwhay IAY eptkay myay ob-shopjay inay ethay Ineyardvay; eythay ightmay avehay akentay itay intoay eirthay onelylay olday eadshay otay unray offay ithway emay. Utbay eigh-hohay! erethay areay onay apscay atay easay utbay ow-capssnay. Etlay emay eesay. Ailnay ownday ethay idlay; aulkcay ethay eamssay; aypay overay ethay amesay ithway itchpay; attenbay emthay ownday ighttay, anday anghay itay ithway ethay ap-springsnay overay ethay ip’sshay ernstay. Ereway everay uchsay ingsthay oneday eforebay ithway aay offincay? Omesay uperstitioussay olday arpenterscay, ownay, ouldway ebay iedtay upay inay ethay iggingray, ereay eythay ouldway oday ethay objay. Utbay I’may ademay ofay ottyknay Aroostookay emlockhay; IAY on’tday udgebay. Upperedcray ithway aay offincay! Ailingsay aboutay ithway aay ave-yardgray aytray! Utbay evernay indmay. Eway orkersway inay oodsway akemay idal-bedsteadsbray anday ard-tablescay, asay ellway asay offinscay anday earseshay. Eway orkway byay ethay onthmay, oray byay ethay objay, oray byay ethay ofitpray; otnay orfay usay otay askay ethay whyay anday ereforewhay ofay ouray orkway, unlessay itay ebay ootay onfoundedcay obblingcay, anday enthay eway ashstay itay ifay eway ancay. Emhay! I’llay oday ethay objay, ownay, enderlytay. I’llay avehay e—let’smay ee—howsay anymay inay ethay ip’sshay ompanycay, allay oldtay? Utbay I’veay orgottenfay. Anyay ayway, I’llay avehay emay irtythay eparatesay, Urk’s-headedtay ife-lineslay, eachay eethray eetfay onglay anginghay allay oundray otay ethay offincay. Enthay, ifay ethay ullhay ogay ownday, ere’llthay ebay irtythay ivelylay ellowsfay allay ightingfay orfay oneay offincay, aay ightsay otnay eensay eryvay oftenay eneathbay ethay unsay! Omecay ammerhay, aulking-ironcay, itch-potpay, anday arling-spikemay! Et’slay otay it.”ay 



APTERCHAY 127ay. Ethay Eckday. 

e_Thay offincay aidlay uponay otway ine-tubslay, etweenbay ethay ice-benchvay anday ethay openay atchwayhay; ethay Arpentercay aulkingcay itsay eamssay; ethay ingstray ofay istedtway oakumay owlyslay unwindingay omfray aay argelay ollray ofay itay acedplay inay ethay osombay ofay ishay ock.—Ahabfray omescay owlyslay omfray ethay abin-gangwaycay, anday earshay Ippay ollowingfay imhay._ 

ack“Bay, adlay; IAY illway ebay ithway eyay againay esentlypray. Ehay oesgay! Otnay isthay andhay ompliescay ithway myay umorhay oremay eniallygay anthay atthay oy.—Middlebay aisleay ofay aay urchchay! At’swhay ere?”hay 

ife-buoy“Lay, irsay. Mray. Arbuck’sstay ordersay. Ohay, ooklay, irsay! Ewarebay ethay atchway!”hay 

ank“Thay eyay, anmay. Thyay offincay ieslay andyhay otay ethay ault.”vay 

ir“Say? Ethay atchwayhay? ohay! Osay itay oesday, irsay, osay itay oes.”day 

Art“ay otnay outhay ethay eg-makerlay? Ooklay, idday otnay isthay umpstay omecay omfray thyay op?”shay 

I“AY elievebay itay idday, irsay; oesday ethay errulefay andstay, ir?”say 

ell“Way enoughay. Utbay artay outhay otnay alsoay ethay undertaker?”ay 

Aye“ay, irsay; IAY atchedpay upay isthay ingthay erehay asay aay offincay orfay Ueequegqay; utbay ey’vethay etsay emay ownay otay urningtay itay intoay omethingsay else.”ay 

en“Thay elltay emay; artay outhay otnay anay arrantay, all-graspingay, intermeddlingay, onopolisingmay, eathenishhay olday ampscay, otay ebay oneay ayday akingmay egslay, anday ethay extnay ayday offinscay otay apclay emthay inay, anday etyay againay ife-buoyslay outay ofay osethay amesay offinscay? Outhay artay asay unprincipleday asay ethay odsgay, anday asay uchmay ofay aay ack-of-all-trades.”jay 

ut“Bay IAY oday otnay eanmay anythingay, irsay. IAY oday asay IAY o.”day 

e“Thay odsgay againay. Arkhay eyay, ostday outhay otnay everay ingsay orkingway aboutay aay offincay? Ethay Itanstay, eythay aysay, ummedhay atchessnay enwhay ippingchay outay ethay aterscray orfay olcanoesvay; anday ethay ave-diggergray inay ethay ayplay ingssay, adespay inay andhay. Ostday outhay ever?”nay 

ing“Say, irsay? Oday IAY ingsay? Ohay, I’may indifferentay enoughay, irsay, orfay atthay; utbay ethay easonray whyay ethay ave-diggergray ademay usicmay ustmay avehay eenbay ecausebay erethay asway onenay inay ishay adespay, irsay. Utbay ethay aulkingcay alletmay isay ullfay ofay itay. Arkhay otay it.”ay 

Aye“ay, anday at’sthay ecausebay ethay idlay ere’sthay aay ounding-boardsay; anday atwhay inay allay ingsthay akesmay ethay ounding-boardsay isay is—there’sthay aughtnay eneathbay. Anday etyay, aay offincay ithway aay odybay inay itay ingsray ettypray uchmay ethay amesay, Arpentercay. Asthay outhay everay elpedhay arrycay aay ierbay, anday eardhay ethay offincay ockknay againstay ethay urchyardchay ategay, oinggay inay? 

aith“Fay, irsay, I’ve——”ay 

aith“Fay? At’swhay at?”thay 

“Whyay, aithfay, irsay, it’say onlyay aay ortsay ofay exclamation-like—that’say allay, ir.”say 

Um“ay, umay; ogay on.”ay 

I“AY asway aboutay otay aysay, irsay, at——”thay 

Art“ay outhay aay ilk-wormsay? Ostday outhay inspay thyay ownay oudshray outay ofay elfthysay? Ooklay atay thyay osombay! Espatchday! anday etgay esethay apstray outay ofay ight.”say 

e“Hay oesgay aftay. Atthay asway uddensay, ownay; utbay uallssqay omecay uddensay inay othay atitudeslay. I’veay eardhay atthay ethay Isleay ofay Albemarleay, oneay ofay ethay Allipagosgay, isay utcay byay ethay Equatoray ightray inay ethay iddlemay. Eemssay otay emay omesay ortsay ofay Equatoray utscay onyay olday anmay, ootay, ightray inay ishay iddlemay. E’shay alwaysay underay ethay Ine—fierylay othay, IAY elltay eyay! E’shay ookinglay isthay ay—comeway, oakumay; uickqay. Erehay eway ogay againay. Isthay oodenway alletmay isay ethay orkcay, anday I’may ethay ofessorpray ofay usicalmay asses—tapglay, ap!”tay 

Ahab(_ay otay imselfhay_). 

ere’s“Thay aay ightsay! Ere’sthay aay oundsay! Ethay eyheadedgray oodpeckerway appingtay ethay ollowhay eetray! Indblay anday umbday ightmay ellway ebay envieday ownay. Eesay! atthay ingthay estsray onay otway ine-tubslay, ullfay ofay ow-linestay. AAY ostmay aliciousmay agway, atthay ellowfay. At-tatray! Osay an’smay econdssay icktay! Ohay! owhay immaterialay areay allay aterialsmay! Atwhay ingsthay ealray areay erethay, utbay imponderableay oughtsthay? Erehay ow’snay ethay eryvay eadeddray olsymbay ofay imgray eathday, byay aay eremay aphay, ademay ethay expressiveay ignsay ofay ethay elphay anday opehay ofay ostmay endangereday ifelay. AAY ife-buoylay ofay aay offincay! Oesday itay ogay urtherfay? Ancay itay ebay atthay inay omesay iritualspay ensesay ethay offincay isay, afteray allay, utbay anay immortality-preserveray! I’llay inkthay ofay atthay. Utbay onay. Osay arfay onegay amay IAY inay ethay arkday idesay ofay earthay, atthay itsay otheray idesay, ethay eoreticthay ightbray oneay, eemssay utbay uncertainay ilighttway otay emay. Illway eyay evernay avehay oneday, Arpentercay, ithway atthay accurseday oundsay? IAY ogay elowbay; etlay emay otnay eesay atthay ingthay erehay enwhay IAY eturnray againay. Ownay, enthay, Ippay, e’llway alktay isthay overay; IAY oday ucksay ostmay ondrousway ilosophiesphay omfray eethay! Omesay unknownay onduitscay omfray ethay unknownay orldsway ustmay emptyay intoay ee!”thay 



APTERCHAY 128ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Achelray. 

Extnay ayday, aay argelay ipshay, ethay Achelray, asway escriedday, earingbay irectlyday ownday uponay ethay Equodpay, allay erhay arsspay icklythay usteringclay ithway enmay. Atay ethay imetay ethay Equodpay asway akingmay oodgay eedspay oughthray ethay aterway; utbay asay ethay oad-wingedbray indwardway angerstray otshay ighnay otay erhay, ethay oastfulbay ailssay allay ellfay ogethertay asay ankblay addersblay atthay areay urstbay, anday allay ifelay edflay omfray ethay ittensmay ullhay. 

ad“Bay ewsnay; eshay ingsbray adbay ews,”nay utteredmay ethay olday Anxmanmay. Utbay ereay erhay ommandercay, owhay, ithway umpettray otay outhmay, oodstay upay inay ishay oatbay; ereay ehay ouldcay opefullyhay ailhay, Ahab’say oicevay asway eardhay. 

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

Aye“ay, esterdayyay. Avehay eyay eensay aay ale-boatwhay adrift?”ay 

Ottlingthray ishay oyjay, Ahabay egativelynay answereday isthay unexpecteday uestionqay; anday ouldway enthay avehay ainfay oardedbay ethay angerstray, enwhay ethay angerstray aptaincay imselfhay, avinghay oppedstay ishay essel’svay ayway, asway eensay escendingday erhay idesay. AAY ewfay eenkay ullspay, anday ishay oat-hookbay oonsay inchedclay ethay Equod’spay ain-chainsmay, anday ehay angspray otay ethay eckday. Immediatelyay ehay asway ecognisedray byay Ahabay orfay aay Antucketernay ehay ewknay. Utbay onay ormalfay alutationsay asway exchangeday. 

ere“Whay asway e?—nothay illed!—notkay illed!”kay iedcray Ahabay, oselyclay advancingay. ow“Hay asway it?”ay 

Itay eemedsay atthay omewhatsay atelay onay ethay afternoonay ofay ethay ayday eviouspray, ilewhay eethray ofay ethay anger’sstray oatsbay ereway engageday ithway aay oalshay ofay aleswhay, ichwhay adhay edlay emthay omesay ourfay oray ivefay ilesmay omfray ethay ipshay; anday ilewhay eythay ereway etyay inay iftsway asechay otay indwardway, ethay itewhay umphay anday eadhay ofay Obymay Ickday adhay uddenlysay oomedlay upay outay ofay ethay aterway, otnay eryvay arfay otay eewardlay; ereuponwhay, ethay ourthfay iggedray oat—abay eservedray one—haday eenbay instantlyay oweredlay inay asechay. Afteray aay eenkay ailsay eforebay ethay indway, isthay ourthfay oat—thebay iftestsway eeledkay ofay all—seemeday otay avehay ucceededsay inay astening—atfay eastlay, asay ellway asay ethay anmay atay ethay ast-headmay ouldcay elltay anythingay aboutay itay. Inay ethay istanceday ehay awsay ethay iminishedday ottedday oatbay; anday enthay aay iftsway eamglay ofay ubblingbay itewhay aterway; anday afteray atthay othingnay oremay; encewhay itay asway oncludedcay atthay ethay ickenstray alewhay ustmay avehay indefinitelyay unray awayay ithway ishay ursuerspay, asay oftenay appenshay. Erethay asway omesay apprehensionay, utbay onay ositivepay alarmay, asay etyay. Ethay ecallray ignalssay ereway acedplay inay ethay iggingray; arknessday amecay onay; anday orcedfay otay ickpay upay erhay eethray arfay otay indwardway oats—erebay oinggay inay uestqay ofay ethay ourthfay oneay inay ethay eciselypray oppositeay irection—theday ipshay adhay otnay onlyay eenbay ecessitatednay otay eavelay atthay oatbay otay itsay atefay illtay earnay idnightmay, utbay, orfay ethay imetay, otay increaseay erhay istanceday omfray itay. Utbay ethay estray ofay erhay ewcray eingbay atay astlay afesay aboarday, eshay owdedcray allay ail—stunsailsay onay unsail—afterstay ethay issingmay oatbay; indlingkay aay irefay inay erhay otstry-pay orfay aay eaconbay; anday everyay otheray anmay aloftay onay ethay ook-outlay. Utbay oughthay enwhay eshay adhay usthay ailedsay aay ufficientsay istanceday otay aingay ethay esumedpray aceplay ofay ethay absentay onesay enwhay astlay eensay; oughthay eshay enthay ausedpay otay owerlay erhay arespay oatsbay otay ullpay allay arounday erhay; anday otnay indingfay anythingay, adhay againay ashedday onay; againay ausedpay, anday oweredlay erhay oatsbay; anday oughthay eshay adhay usthay ontinuedcay oingday illtay aylightday; etyay otnay ethay eastlay impseglay ofay ethay issingmay eelkay adhay eenbay eensay. 

Ethay orystay oldtay, ethay angerstray Aptaincay immediatelyay entway onay otay evealray ishay objectay inay oardingbay ethay Equodpay. Ehay esiredday atthay ipshay otay uniteay ithway ishay ownay inay ethay earchsay; byay ailingsay overay ethay easay omesay ourfay oray ivefay ilesmay apartay, onay arallelpay ineslay, anday osay eepingsway aay oubleday orizonhay, asay itay ereway. 

I“AY illway agerway omethingsay ow,”nay isperedwhay Ubbstay otay Askflay, at“thay omesay oneay inay atthay issingmay oatbay oreway offay atthay Aptain’scay estbay oatcay; ayhapmay, ishay atch—he’sway osay ursedcay anxiousay otay etgay itay ackbay. Owhay everay eardhay ofay otway iouspay ale-shipswhay uisingcray afteray oneay issingmay ale-boatwhay inay ethay eighthay ofay ethay alingwhay easonsay? Eesay, Askflay, onlyay eesay owhay alepay ehay ooks—palelay inay ethay eryvay uttonsbay ofay ishay eyes—look—itay asn’tway ethay oat—itcay ustmay avehay eenbay e—”thay 

“Myay oybay, myay ownay oybay isay amongay emthay. Orfay Od’sgay ake—Isay egbay, IAY onjure”—herecay exclaimeday ethay angerstray Aptaincay otay Ahabay, owhay usthay arfay adhay utbay icilyay eceivedray ishay etitionpay. or“Fay eight-and-fortyay ourshay etlay emay arterchay ouryay ip—Ishay illway adlyglay aypay orfay itay, anday oundlyray aypay orfay it—ifay erethay ebay onay otheray ay—forway eight-and-fortyay ourshay only—onlyay at—youthay ustmay, ohay, ouyay ustmay, anday ouyay all_shay_ oday isthay ing.”thay 

is“Hay on!”say iedcray Ubbstay, oh“ay, it’say ishay onsay e’shay ostlay! IAY aketay ackbay ethay oatcay anday atch—whatway ayssay Ahabay? Eway ustmay avesay atthay oy.”bay 

e’s“Hay owneddray ithway ethay estray onay em’ay, astlay ight,”nay aidsay ethay olday Anxmay ailorsay andingstay ehindbay emthay; I“AY eardhay; allay ofay eyay eardhay eirthay irits.”spay 

Ownay, asay itay ortlyshay urnedtay outay, atwhay ademay isthay incidentay ofay ethay Achel’sray ethay oremay elancholymay, asway ethay ircumstancecay, atthay otnay onlyay asway oneay ofay ethay Aptain’scay onssay amongay ethay umbernay ofay ethay issingmay oat’sbay ewcray; utbay amongay ethay umbernay ofay ethay otheray oat’sbay ewscray, atay ethay amesay imetay, utbay onay ethay otheray andhay, eparatedsay omfray ethay ipshay uringday ethay arkday icissitudesvay ofay ethay asechay, erethay adhay eenbay illstay anotheray onsay; asay atthay orfay aay imetay, ethay etchedwray atherfay asway ungedplay otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay uellestcray erplexitypay; ichwhay asway onlyay olvedsay orfay imhay byay ishay iefchay ate’smay instinctivelyay adoptingay ethay ordinaryay ocedurepray ofay aay ale-shipwhay inay uchsay emergenciesay, atthay isay, enwhay acedplay etweenbay eopardizedjay utbay ividedday oatsbay, alwaysay otay ickpay upay ethay ajoritymay irstfay. Utbay ethay aptaincay, orfay omesay unknownay onstitutionalcay easonray, adhay efrainedray omfray entioningmay allay isthay, anday otnay illtay orcedfay otay itay byay Ahab’say icinessay idday ehay alludeay otay ishay oneay etyay issingmay oybay; aay ittlelay adlay, utbay elvetway earsyay olday, osewhay atherfay ithway ethay earnestay utbay unmisgivingay ardihoodhay ofay aay Antucketer’snay aternalpay ovelay, adhay usthay earlyay oughtsay otay initiateay imhay inay ethay erilspay anday ondersway ofay aay ocationvay almostay immemoriallyay ethay estinyday ofay allay ishay aceray. Ornay oesday itay unfrequentlyay occuray, atthay Antucketnay aptainscay illway endsay aay onsay ofay uchsay endertay ageay awayay omfray emthay, orfay aay otractedpray eethray oray ourfay ears’yay oyagevay inay omesay otheray ipshay anthay eirthay ownay; osay atthay eirthay irstfay owledgeknay ofay aay aleman’swhay areercay allshay ebay unenervateday byay anyay ancechay isplayday ofay aay ather’sfay aturalnay utbay untimelyay artialitypay, oray undueay apprehensivenessay anday oncerncay.
