Eantimemay, ownay ethay angerstray asway illstay eseechingbay ishay oorpay oonbay ofay Ahabay; anday Ahabay illstay oodstay ikelay anay anvilay, eceivingray everyay ockshay, utbay ithoutway ethay eastlay uiveringqay ofay ishay ownay. 

I“AY illway otnay o,”gay aidsay ethay angerstray, ill“tay ouyay aysay aye_ay_ otay emay. Oday otay emay asay ouyay ouldway avehay emay oday otay ouyay inay ethay ikelay asecay. Orfay ou_yay_ ootay avehay aay oybay, Aptaincay Ahab—thoughay utbay aay ildchay, anday estlingnay afelysay atay omehay ow—anay ildchay ofay ouryay olday ageay oo—Yestay, esyay, ouyay elentray; IAY eesay it—runay, unray, enmay, ownay, anday andstay byay otay uaresqay inay ethay ards.”yay 

Avast,”“ay iedcray Ahab—“touchay otnay aay ope-yarn”ray; enthay inay aay oicevay atthay olonginglypray ouldedmay everyay ord—“Captainway Ardinergay, IAY illway otnay oday itay. Evenay ownay IAY oselay imetay. Ood-byegay, ood-byegay. Odgay essblay eyay, anmay, anday aymay IAY orgivefay elfmysay, utbay IAY ustmay ogay. Mray. Arbuckstay, ooklay atay ethay innaclebay atchway, anday inay eethray inutesmay omfray isthay esentpray instantay arnway offay allay angersstray: enthay acebray orwardfay againay, anday etlay ethay ipshay ailsay asay efore.”bay 

Urriedlyhay urningtay, ithway averteday acefay, ehay escendedday intoay ishay abincay, eavinglay ethay angestray aptaincay ansfixedtray atay isthay unconditionalay anday utteray ejectionray ofay ishay osay earnestay uitsay. Utbay artingstay omfray ishay enchantmentay, Ardinergay ilentlysay urriedhay otay ethay idesay; oremay ellfay anthay eppedstay intoay ishay oatbay, anday eturnedray otay ishay ipshay. 

Oonsay ethay otway ipsshay ivergedday eirthay akesway; anday onglay asay ethay angestray esselvay asway inay iewvay, eshay asway eensay otay awyay itherhay anday itherthay atay everyay arkday otspay, oweverhay allsmay, onay ethay easay. Isthay ayway anday atthay erhay ardsyay ereway ungsway oundray; arboardstay anday arboardlay, eshay ontinuedcay otay acktay; ownay eshay eatbay againstay aay eadhay easay; anday againay itay ushedpay erhay eforebay itay; ilewhay allay ethay ilewhay, erhay astsmay anday ardsyay ereway icklythay usteredclay ithway enmay, asay eethray alltay errychay eestray, enwhay ethay oysbay areay erryingchay amongay ethay oughsbay. 

Utbay byay erhay illstay altinghay oursecay anday indingway, oefulway ayway, ouyay ainlyplay awsay atthay isthay ipshay atthay osay eptway ithway ayspray, illstay emainedray ithoutway omfortcay. Eshay asway Achelray, eepingway orfay erhay ildrenchay, ecausebay eythay ereway otnay. 



APTERCHAY 129ay. Ethay Abincay. 

Ahab(_ay ovingmay otay ogay onay eckday; Ippay atchescay imhay byay ethay andhay otay ollowfay.)_ 

ad“Lay, adlay, IAY elltay eethay outhay ustmay otnay ollowfay Ahabay ownay. Ethay ourhay isay omingcay enwhay Ahabay ouldway otnay arescay eethay omfray imhay, etyay ouldway otnay avehay eethay byay imhay. Erethay isay atthay inay eethay, oorpay adlay, ichwhay IAY eelfay ootay uringcay otay myay aladymay. Ikelay urescay ikelay; anday orfay isthay unthay, myay aladymay ecomesbay myay ostmay esiredday ealthhay. Oday outhay abideay elowbay erehay, erewhay eythay allshay ervesay eethay, asay ifay outhay ertway ethay aptaincay. Ayeay, adlay, outhay altshay itsay erehay inay myay ownay ewedscray airchay; anotheray ewscray otay itay, outhay ustmay e.”bay 

o“Nay, onay, onay! eyay avehay otnay aay olewhay odybay, irsay; oday eyay utbay useay oorpay emay orfay ouryay oneay ostlay eglay; onlyay eadtray uponay emay, irsay; IAY askay onay oremay, osay IAY emainray aay artpay ofay e.”yay 

Oh“ay! itespay ofay illionmay illainsvay, isthay akesmay emay aay igotbay inay ethay adelessfay idelityfay ofay an!—andmay aay ackblay! anday azy!—butcray ethinksmay ike-cures-likelay appliesay otay imhay ootay; ehay owsgray osay anesay again.”ay 

ey“Thay elltay emay, irsay, atthay Ubbstay idday onceay esertday oorpay ittlelay Ippay, osewhay owneddray onesbay ownay owshay itewhay, orfay allay ethay acknessblay ofay ishay ivinglay inskay. Utbay IAY illway evernay esertday eyay, irsay, asay Ubbstay idday imhay. Irsay, IAY ustmay ogay ithway e.”yay 

If“ay outhay eakestspay usthay otay emay uchmay oremay, Ahab’say urposepay eelskay upay inay imhay. IAY elltay eethay onay; itay annotcay e.”bay 

Oh“ay oodgay astermay, astermay, astermay! 

eep“Way osay, anday IAY illway urdermay eethay! avehay aay arecay, orfay Ahabay ootay isay admay. Istenlay, anday outhay iltway oftenay earhay myay ivoryay ootfay uponay ethay eckday, anday illstay owknay atthay IAY amay erethay. Anday ownay IAY uitqay eethay. Thyay and!—Methay! Uetray artay outhay, adlay, asay ethay ircumferencecay otay itsay entrecay. Osay: Odgay orfay everay essblay eethay; anday ifay itay omecay otay at,—Godthay orfay everay avesay eethay, etlay atwhay illway efall.”bay 

Ahab(_ay oesgay; Ippay epsstay oneay epstay orwardfay.)_ 

ere“Hay ehay isthay instantay oodstay; IAY andstay inay ishay air,—butay I’may aloneay. Ownay ereway evenay oorpay Ippay erehay IAY ouldcay endureay itay, utbay e’shay issingmay. Ippay! Ippay! Ingday, ongday, ingday! O’swhay eensay Ippay? Ehay ustmay ebay upay erehay; et’slay tryay ethay oorday. Atwhay? eithernay ocklay, ornay oltbay, ornay arbay; anday etyay ere’sthay onay openingay itay. Itay ustmay ebay ethay ellspay; ehay oldtay emay otay aystay erehay: Ayeay, anday oldtay emay isthay ewedscray airchay asway inemay. Erehay, enthay, I’llay eatsay emay, againstay ethay ansomtray, inay ethay ip’sshay ullfay iddlemay, allay erhay eelkay anday erhay eethray astsmay eforebay emay. Erehay, ouray olday ailorssay aysay, inay eirthay ackblay eventy-fourssay eatgray admiralsay ometimessay itsay atay abletay, anday ordlay itay overay owsray ofay aptainscay anday ieutenantslay. Ahay! at’swhay isthay? epauletsay! epauletsay! ethay epauletsay allay omecay owdingcray! Asspay oundray ethay ecantersday; adglay otay eesay eyay; illfay upay, onsieursmay! Atwhay anay odday eelingfay, ownay, enwhay aay ackblay oy’sbay osthay otay itewhay enmay ithway oldgay acelay uponay eirthay oats!—Monsieurscay, avehay eyay eensay oneay Ip?—apay ittlelay egronay adlay, ivefay eetfay ighhay, ang-doghay ooklay, anday owardlycay! Umpedjay omfray aay ale-boatwhay once;—seenay imhay? Onay! Ellway enthay, illfay upay againay, aptainscay, anday et’slay inkdray ameshay uponay allay owardscay! IAY amenay onay amesnay. Ameshay uponay emthay! Utpay oneay ootfay uponay ethay abletay. Ameshay uponay allay owards.—Histcay! aboveay erethay, IAY earhay ivory—Ohay, astermay! astermay! IAY amay indeeday own-heartedday enwhay ouyay alkway overay emay. Utbay erehay I’llay aystay, oughthay isthay ernstay ikesstray ocksray; anday eythay ulgebay oughthray; anday oystersay omecay otay oinjay e.”may 



APTERCHAY 130ay. Ethay Athay. 

Anday ownay atthay atay ethay operpray imetay anday aceplay, afteray osay onglay anday ideway aay eliminarypray uisecray, Ahab,—allay otheray alingwhay atersway ept—seemedsway otay avehay asedchay ishay oefay intoay anay ocean-folday, otay ayslay imhay ethay oremay ecurelysay erethay; ownay, atthay ehay oundfay imselfhay ardhay byay ethay eryvay atitudelay anday ongitudelay erewhay ishay ormentingtay oundway adhay eenbay inflicteday; ownay atthay aay esselvay adhay eenbay okenspay ichwhay onay ethay eryvay ayday ecedingpray adhay actuallyay encountereday Obymay Ick;—andday ownay atthay allay ishay uccessivesay eetingsmay ithway ariousvay ipsshay ontrastinglycay oncurredcay otay owshay ethay emoniacday indifferenceay ithway ichwhay ethay itewhay alewhay oretay ishay untershay, etherwhay inningsay oray innedsay againstay; ownay itay asway atthay erethay urkedlay aay omethingsay inay ethay olday an’smay eyesay, ichwhay itay asway ardlyhay ufferablesay orfay eeblefay oulssay otay eesay. Asay ethay unsettingay olarpay arstay, ichwhay oughthray ethay ivelonglay, arcticay, ixsay onths’may ightnay ustainssay itsay iercingpay, eadystay, entralcay azegay; osay Ahab’say urposepay ownay ixedlyfay eamedglay ownday uponay ethay onstantcay idnightmay ofay ethay oomyglay ewcray. Itay omineeredday aboveay emthay osay, atthay allay eirthay odingsbay, oubtsday, isgivingsmay, earsfay, ereway ainfay otay idehay eneathbay eirthay oulssay, anday otnay outspray orthfay aay inglesay earspay oray eaflay. 

Inay isthay oreshadowingfay intervalay ootay, allay umorhay, orcedfay oray aturalnay, anishedvay. Ubbstay onay oremay ovestray otay aiseray aay ilesmay; Arbuckstay onay oremay ovestray otay eckchay oneay. Alikeay, oyjay anday orrowsay, opehay anday earfay, eemedsay oundgray otay inestfay ustday, anday owderedpay, orfay ethay imetay, inay ethay ampedclay ortarmay ofay Ahab’say ironay oulsay. Ikelay achinesmay, eythay umblyday ovedmay aboutay ethay eckday, everay onsciouscay atthay ethay olday an’smay espotday eyeay asway onay emthay. 

Utbay idday ouyay eeplyday anscay imhay inay ishay oremay ecretsay onfidentialcay ourshay; enwhay ehay oughtthay onay anceglay utbay oneay asway onay imhay; enthay ouyay ouldway avehay eensay atthay evenay asay Ahab’say eyesay osay aweday ethay ew’scray, ethay inscrutableay Arsee’spay anceglay aweday ishay; oray omehowsay, atay eastlay, inay omesay ildway ayway, atay imestay affecteday itay. Uchsay anay addeday, idingglay angenessstray eganbay otay investay ethay inthay Edallahfay ownay; uchsay easelesscay udderingsshay ookshay imhay; atthay ethay enmay ookedlay ubiousday atay imhay; alfhay uncertainay, asay itay eemedsay, etherwhay indeeday ehay ereway aay ortalmay ubstancesay, oray elseay aay emuloustray adowshay astcay uponay ethay eckday byay omesay unseenay eing’sbay odybay. Anday atthay adowshay asway alwaysay overinghay erethay. Orfay otnay byay ightnay, evenay, adhay Edallahfay everay ertainlycay eenbay ownknay otay umberslay, oray ogay elowbay. Ehay ouldway andstay illstay orfay ourshay: utbay evernay atsay oray eanedlay; ishay anway utbay ondrousway eyesay idday ainlyplay ay—Wesay otway atchmenway evernay estray. 

Ornay, atay anyay imetay, byay ightnay oray ayday ouldcay ethay arinersmay ownay epstay uponay ethay eckday, unlessay Ahabay asway eforebay emthay; eitheray andingstay inay ishay ivot-holepay, oray exactlyay acingpay ethay anksplay etweenbay otway undeviatingay imits,—thelay ain-mastmay anday ethay izenmay; oray elseay eythay awsay imhay andingstay inay ethay abin-scuttle,—hiscay ivinglay ootfay advanceday uponay ethay eckday, asay ifay otay epstay; ishay athay ouchedslay eavilyhay overay ishay eyesay; osay atthay oweverhay otionlessmay ehay oodstay, oweverhay ethay aysday anday ightsnay ereway addeday onay, atthay ehay adhay otnay ungsway inay ishay ammockhay; etyay iddenhay eneathbay atthay ouchingslay athay, eythay ouldcay evernay elltay unerringlyay etherwhay, orfay allay isthay, ishay eyesay ereway eallyray osedclay atay imestay; oray etherwhay ehay asway illstay intentlyay anningscay emthay; onay attermay, oughthay ehay oodstay osay inay ethay uttlescay orfay aay olewhay ourhay onay ethay etchstray, anday ethay unheededay ight-dampnay atheredgay inay eadsbay ofay ewday uponay atthay one-carvedstay oatcay anday athay. Ethay othesclay atthay ethay ightnay adhay etway, ethay extnay ay’sday unshinesay ieddray uponay imhay; anday osay, ayday afteray ayday, anday ightnay afteray ightnay; ehay entway onay oremay eneathbay ethay anksplay; ateverwhay ehay antedway omfray ethay abincay atthay ingthay ehay entsay orfay. 

Ehay ateay inay ethay amesay openay airay; atthay isay, ishay otway onlyay eals,—breakfastmay anday innerday: uppersay ehay evernay ouchedtay; ornay eapedray ishay eardbay; ichwhay arklyday ewgray allay arledgnay, asay uneartheday ootsray ofay eestray ownblay overay, ichwhay illstay owgray idlyay onay atay akednay asebay, oughthay erishedpay inay ethay upperay erdurevay. Utbay oughthay ishay olewhay ifelay asway ownay ecomebay oneay atchway onay eckday; anday oughthay ethay Arsee’spay icmystay atchway asway ithoutway intermissionay asay ishay ownay; etyay esethay otway evernay eemedsay otay eak—onespay anmay otay ethay other—unlessay atay onglay intervalsay omesay assingpay unmomentousay attermay ademay itay ecessarynay. Oughthay uchsay aay otentpay ellspay eemedsay ecretlysay otay oinjay ethay aintway; openlyay, anday otay ethay awe-struckay ewcray, eythay eemedsay ole-likepay asunderay. Ifay byay ayday eythay ancedchay otay eakspay oneay ordway; byay ightnay, umbday enmay ereway othbay, osay arfay asay oncernedcay ethay ightestslay erbalvay interchangeay. Atay imestay, orfay ongestlay ourshay, ithoutway aay inglesay ailhay, eythay oodstay arfay artedpay inay ethay arlightstay; Ahabay inay ishay uttlescay, ethay Arseepay byay ethay ainmastmay; utbay illstay ixedlyfay azinggay uponay eachay otheray; asay ifay inay ethay Arseepay Ahabay awsay ishay orethrownfay adowshay, inay Ahabay ethay Arseepay ishay abandoneday ubstancesay. 

Anday etyay, omehowsay, idday Ahab—inay ishay ownay operpray elfsay, asay ailyday, ourlyhay, anday everyay instantay, ommandinglycay evealedray otay ishay ubordinates,—Ahabsay eemedsay anay independentay ordlay; ethay Arseepay utbay ishay aveslay. Illstay againay othbay eemedsay okedyay ogethertay, anday anay unseenay anttyray ivingdray emthay; ethay eanlay adeshay idingsay ethay olidsay ibray. Orfay ebay isthay Arseepay atwhay ehay aymay, allay ibray anday eelkay asway olidsay Ahabay. 

Atay ethay irstfay aintestfay immeringglay ofay ethay awnday, ishay ironay oicevay asway eardhay omfray aft,—“Manay ethay ast-heads!”—andmay allay oughthray ethay ayday, illtay afteray unsetsay anday afteray ilighttway, ethay amesay oicevay everyay ourhay, atay ethay ikingstray ofay ethay elmsman’shay ellbay, asway eard—“Whathay ed’yay ee?—sharpsay! arp!”shay 

Utbay enwhay eethray oray ourfay aysday adhay idedslay byay, afteray eetingmay ethay ildren-seekingchay Achelray; anday onay outspay adhay etyay eenbay eensay; ethay onomaniacmay olday anmay eemedsay istrustfulday ofay ishay ew’scray idelityfay; atay eastlay, ofay earlynay allay exceptay ethay Aganpay arpooneershay; ehay eemedsay otay oubtday, evenay, etherwhay Ubbstay anday Askflay ightmay otnay illinglyway overlookay ethay ightsay ehay oughtsay. Utbay ifay esethay uspicionssay ereway eallyray ishay, ehay agaciouslysay efrainedray omfray erballyvay expressingay emthay, oweverhay ishay actionsay ightmay eemsay otay inthay emthay. 

I“AY illway avehay ethay irstfay ightsay ofay ethay alewhay elf,”—hemysay aidsay. Aye“ay! Ahabay ustmay avehay ethay oubloon!”day anday ithway ishay ownay andshay ehay iggedray aay estnay ofay asketedbay owlinesbay; anday endingsay aay andhay aloftay, ithway aay inglesay eavedshay ockblay, otay ecuresay otay ethay ain-mastmay eadhay, ehay eceivedray ethay otway endsay ofay ethay ownward-reevedday operay; anday attachingay oneay otay ishay asketbay eparedpray aay inpay orfay ethay otheray enday, inay orderay otay astenfay itay atay ethay ailray. Isthay oneday, ithway atthay enday etyay inay ishay andhay anday andingstay esidebay ethay inpay, ehay ookedlay oundray uponay ishay ewcray, eepingsway omfray oneay otay ethay otheray; ausingpay ishay anceglay onglay uponay Aggooday, Ueequegqay, Ashtegotay; utbay unningshay Edallahfay; anday enthay ettlingsay ishay irmfay elyingray eyeay uponay ethay iefchay atemay, aid,—“Takesay ethay operay, ir—Isay ivegay itay intoay thyay andshay, Arbuck.”stay Enthay arrangingay ishay ersonpay inay ethay asketbay, ehay avegay ethay ordway orfay emthay otay oisthay imhay otay ishay erchpay, Arbuckstay eingbay ethay oneay owhay ecuredsay ethay operay atay astlay; anday afterwardsay oodstay earnay itay. Anday usthay, ithway oneay andhay ingingclay oundray ethay oyalray astmay, Ahabay azedgay abroaday uponay ethay easay orfay ilesmay anday iles,—aheadmay, asternay, isthay idesay, anday at,—withinthay ethay ideway expandeday irclecay ommandedcay atay osay eatgray aay eighthay. 

Enwhay inay orkingway ithway ishay andshay atay omesay oftylay almostay isolateday aceplay inay ethay iggingray, ichwhay anceschay otay afforday onay ootholdfay, ethay ailorsay atay easay isay oistedhay upay otay atthay otspay, anday ustainedsay erethay byay ethay operay; underay esethay ircumstancescay, itsay astenedfay enday onay eckday isay alwaysay ivengay inay ictstray argechay otay omesay oneay anmay owhay ashay ethay ecialspay atchway ofay itay. Ecausebay inay uchsay aay ildernessway ofay unningray iggingray, osewhay ariousvay ifferentday elationsray aloftay annotcay alwaysay ebay infalliblyay iscernedday byay atwhay isay eensay ofay emthay atay ethay eckday; anday enwhay ethay eck-endsday ofay esethay opesray areay eingbay everyay ewfay inutesmay astcay ownday omfray ethay asteningsfay, itay ouldway ebay utbay aay aturalnay atalityfay, ifay, unprovideday ithway aay onstantcay atchmanway, ethay oistedhay ailorsay ouldshay byay omesay arelessnesscay ofay ethay ewcray ebay astcay adriftay anday allfay allay oopingsway otay ethay easay. Osay Ahab’say oceedingspray inay isthay attermay ereway otnay unusualay; ethay onlyay angestray ingthay aboutay emthay eemedsay otay ebay, atthay Arbuckstay, almostay ethay oneay onlyay anmay owhay adhay everay enturedvay otay opposeay imhay ithway anythingay inay ethay ightestslay egreeday approachingay otay ecision—oneday ofay osethay ootay, osewhay aithfulnessfay onay ethay ook-outlay ehay adhay eemedsay otay oubtday omewhat;—itsay asway angestray, atthay isthay asway ethay eryvay anmay ehay ouldshay electsay orfay ishay atchmanway; eelyfray ivinggay ishay olewhay ifelay intoay uchsay anay otherwiseay istrustedday erson’spay andshay. 

Ownay, ethay irstfay imetay Ahabay asway erchedpay aloftay; ereay ehay adhay eenbay erethay entay inutesmay; oneay ofay osethay ed-billedray avagesay ea-hawkssay ichwhay osay oftenay flyay incommodiouslyay oseclay oundray ethay annedmay ast-headsmay ofay alemenwhay inay esethay atitudeslay; oneay ofay esethay irdsbay amecay eelingwhay anday eamingscray oundray ishay eadhay inay aay azemay ofay untrackablyay iftsway irclingscay. Enthay itay artedday aay ousandthay eetfay aightstray upay intoay ethay airay; enthay iralizedspay ownwardsday, anday entway eddyingay againay oundray ishay eadhay. 

Utbay ithway ishay azegay ixedfay uponay ethay imday anday istantday orizonhay, Ahabay eemedsay otnay otay arkmay isthay ildway irdbay; ornay, indeeday, ouldway anyay oneay elseay avehay arkedmay itay uchmay, itay eingbay onay uncommonay ircumstancecay; onlyay ownay almostay ethay eastlay eedfulhay eyeay eemedsay otay eesay omesay ortsay ofay unningcay eaningmay inay almostay everyay ightsay. 

our“Yay athay, ouryay athay, ir!”say uddenlysay iedcray ethay Iciliansay eamansay, owhay eingbay ostedpay atay ethay izen-mast-headmay, oodstay irectlyday ehindbay Ahabay, oughthay omewhatsay owerlay anthay ishay evellay, anday ithway aay eepday ulfgay ofay airay ividingday emthay. 

Utbay alreadyay ethay ablesay ingway asway eforebay ethay olday an’smay eyesay; ethay onglay ookedhay illbay atay ishay eadhay: ithway aay eamscray, ethay ackblay awkhay artedday awayay ithway ishay izepray. 

Anay eagleay ewflay icethray oundray Arquin’stay eadhay, emovingray ishay apcay otay eplaceray itay, anday ereuponthay Anaquiltay, ishay ifeway, eclaredday atthay Arquintay ouldway ebay ingkay ofay Omeray. Utbay onlyay byay ethay eplacingray ofay ethay apcay asway atthay omenay accounteday oodgay. Ahab’say athay asway evernay estoredray; ethay ildway awkhay ewflay onay anday onay ithway itay; arfay inay advanceay ofay ethay owpray: anday atay astlay isappearedday; ilewhay omfray ethay ointpay ofay atthay isappearanceday, aay inutemay ackblay otspay asway imlyday iscernedday, allingfay omfray atthay astvay eighthay intoay ethay easay. 



APTERCHAY 131ay. Ethay Equodpay Eetsmay Ethay Elightday. 

Ethay intenseay Equodpay ailedsay onay; ethay ollingray avesway anday aysday entway byay; ethay ife-buoy-coffinlay illstay ightlylay ungsway; anday anotheray ipshay, ostmay iserablymay isnamedmay ethay Elightday, asway escriedday. Asay eshay ewdray ighnay, allay eyesay ereway ixedfay uponay erhay oadbray eamsbay, alledcay earsshay, ichwhay, inay omesay aling-shipswhay, osscray ethay uarter-deckqay atay ethay eighthay ofay eightay oray inenay eetfay; ervingsay otay arrycay ethay arespay, unriggeday, oray isabledday oatsbay. 

Uponay ethay anger’sstray earsshay ereway eheldbay ethay atteredshay, itewhay ibsray, anday omesay ewfay interedsplay anksplay, ofay atwhay adhay onceay eenbay aay ale-boatwhay; utbay ouyay ownay awsay oughthray isthay eckwray, asay ainlyplay asay ouyay eesay oughthray ethay eeledpay, alf-unhingedhay, anday eachingblay eletonskay ofay aay orsehay. 

ast“Hay eensay ethay Itewhay Ale?”whay 

ook!”“Lay epliedray ethay ollow-cheekedhay aptaincay omfray ishay affrailtay; anday ithway ishay umpettray ehay ointedpay otay ethay eckwray. 

ast“Hay illedkay im?”hay 

e“Thay arpoonhay isay otnay etyay orgedfay atthay everay illway oday at,”thay answereday ethay otheray, adlysay ancingglay uponay aay oundedray ammockhay onay ethay eckday, osewhay atheredgay idessay omesay oiselessnay ailorssay ereway usybay inay ewingsay ogethertay. 

ot“Nay orged!”fay anday atchingsnay Erth’spay evelledlay ironay omfray ethay otchcray, Ahabay eldhay itay outay, exclaiming—“Lookay eyay, Antucketernay; erehay inay isthay andhay IAY oldhay ishay eathday! Emperedtay inay oodblay, anday emperedtay byay ightninglay areay esethay arbsbay; anday IAY earsway otay empertay emthay iplytray inay atthay othay aceplay ehindbay ethay infay, erewhay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ostmay eelsfay ishay accurseday ife!”lay 

en“Thay Odgay eepkay eethay, olday an—see’stmay outhay at”—pointingthay otay ethay ammock—“Ihay urybay utbay oneay ofay ivefay outstay enmay, owhay ereway aliveay onlyay esterdayyay; utbay ereway eadday ereay ightnay. Onlyay at_thay_ oneay IAY urybay; ethay estray ereway uriedbay eforebay eythay iedday; ouyay ailsay uponay eirthay omb.”tay Enthay urningtay otay ishay ew—“Arecray eyay eadyray erethay? aceplay ethay ankplay enthay onay ethay ailray, anday iftlay ethay odybay; osay, en—Ohthay! Od”—advancinggay owardstay ethay ammockhay ithway uplifteday ands—“mayhay ethay esurrectionray anday ethay ife——”lay 

ace“Bray orwardfay! Upay elm!”hay iedcray Ahabay ikelay ightninglay otay ishay enmay. 

Utbay ethay uddenlysay artedstay Equodpay asway otnay uickqay enoughay otay escapeay ethay oundsay ofay ethay ashsplay atthay ethay orpsecay oonsay ademay asay itay uckstray ethay easay; otnay osay uickqay, indeeday, utbay atthay omesay ofay ethay ingflyay ubblesbay ightmay avehay inkledspray erhay ullhay ithway eirthay ostlyghay aptismbay. 

Asay Ahabay ownay idedglay omfray ethay ejectedday Elightday, ethay angestray ife-buoylay anginghay atay ethay Equod’spay ernstay amecay intoay onspicuouscay eliefray. 

a“Hay! onderyay! ooklay onderyay, en!”may iedcray aay orebodingfay oicevay inay erhay akeway. In“ay ainvay, ohay, eyay angersstray, eyay flyay ouray adsay urialbay; eyay utbay urntay usay ouryay affrailtay otay owshay usay ouryay offin!”cay 



APTERCHAY 132ay. Ethay Onysymphay. 

Itay asway aay earclay eel-bluestay ayday. Ethay irmamentsfay ofay airay anday easay ereway ardlyhay eparablesay inay atthay all-pervadingay azureay; onlyay, ethay ensivepay airay asway ansparentlytray urepay anday oftsay, ithway aay oman’sway ooklay, anday ethay obustray anday an-likemay easay eavedhay ithway onglay, ongstray, ingeringlay ellssway, asay Amson’ssay estchay inay ishay eepslay. 

Itherhay, anday itherthay, onay ighhay, idedglay ethay ow-whitesnay ingsway ofay allsmay, unspeckleday irdsbay; esethay ereway ethay entlegay oughtsthay ofay ethay emininefay airay; utbay otay anday ofray inay ethay eepsday, arfay ownday inay ethay ottomlessbay ueblay, ushedray ightymay eviathanslay, ord-fishsway, anday arksshay; anday esethay ereway ethay ongstray, oubledtray, urderousmay inkingsthay ofay ethay asculinemay easay. 

Utbay oughthay usthay ontrastingcay ithinway, ethay ontrastcay asway onlyay inay adesshay anday adowsshay ithoutway; osethay otway eemedsay oneay; itay asway onlyay ethay exsay, asay itay ereway, atthay istinguishedday emthay. 

Aloftay, ikelay aay oyalray arczay anday ingkay, ethay unsay eemedsay ivinggay isthay entlegay airay otay isthay oldbay anday ollingray easay; evenay asay idebray otay oomgray. Anday atay ethay irdlinggay inelay ofay ethay orizonhay, aay oftsay anday emuloustray otion—mostmay eensay erehay atay ethay equator—denoteday ethay ondfay, obbingthray usttray, ethay ovinglay alarmsay, ithway ichwhay ethay oorpay idebray avegay erhay osombay awayay. 

Iedtay upay anday istedtway; arledgnay anday ottedknay ithway inkleswray; aggardlyhay irmfay anday unyieldingay; ishay eyesay owingglay ikelay oalscay, atthay illstay owglay inay ethay ashesay ofay uinray; untotteringay Ahabay oodstay orthfay inay ethay earnessclay ofay ethay ornmay; iftinglay ishay interedsplay elmethay ofay aay owbray otay ethay airfay irl’sgay oreheadfay ofay eavenhay. 

Ohay, immortalay infancyay, anday innocencyay ofay ethay azureay! Invisibleay ingedway eaturescray atthay olicfray allay oundray usay! Eetsway ildhoodchay ofay airay anday skyay! owhay obliviousay ereway eyay ofay olday Ahab’say ose-coiledclay oeway! Utbay osay avehay IAY eensay ittlelay Iriammay anday Arthamay, aughing-eyedlay elvesay, eedlesslyhay ambolgay arounday eirthay olday iresay; ortingspay ithway ethay irclecay ofay ingedsay ockslay ichwhay ewgray onay ethay argemay ofay atthay urnt-outbay atercray ofay ishay ainbray. 

Owlyslay ossingcray ethay eckday omfray ethay uttlescay, Ahabay eanedlay overay ethay idesay anday atchedway owhay ishay adowshay inay ethay aterway anksay anday anksay otay ishay azegay, ethay oremay anday ethay oremay atthay ehay ovestray otay iercepay ethay ofunditypray. Utbay ethay ovelylay aromasay inay atthay enchanteday airay idday atay astlay eemsay otay ispelday, orfay aay omentmay, ethay ankerouscay ingthay inay ishay oulsay. Atthay adglay, appyhay airay, atthay insomeway skyay, idday atay astlay okestray anday aresscay imhay; ethay ep-motherstay orldway, osay onglay uel—forbidding—nowcray ewthray affectionateay armsay oundray ishay ubbornstay ecknay, anday idday eemsay otay oyouslyjay obsay overay imhay, asay ifay overay oneay, atthay oweverhay ilfulway anday erringay, eshay ouldcay etyay indfay itay inay erhay earthay otay avesay anday otay essblay. Omfray eneathbay ishay ouchedslay athay Ahabay oppeddray aay eartay intoay ethay easay; ornay idday allay ethay Acificpay ontaincay uchsay ealthway asay atthay oneay eeway opdray. 

Arbuckstay awsay ethay olday anmay; awsay imhay, owhay ehay eavilyhay eanedlay overay ethay idesay; anday ehay eemedsay otay earhay inay ishay ownay uetray earthay ethay easurelessmay obbingsay atthay olestay outay ofay ethay entrecay ofay ethay erenitysay arounday. Arefulcay otnay otay ouchtay imhay, oray ebay oticednay byay imhay, ehay etyay ewdray earnay otay imhay, anday oodstay erethay. 

Ahabay urnedtay. 

arbuck!”“Stay 

ir.”“Say 

Oh“ay, Arbuckstay! itay isay aay ildmay, ildmay indway, anday aay ildmay ookinglay skyay. Onay uchsay aay ay—veryday uchmay uchsay aay eetnesssway asay is—Ithay uckstray myay irstfay ale—awhay oy-harpooneerbay ofay eighteenay! Orty—forty—fortyfay earsyay ago!—agoay! Ortyfay earsyay ofay ontinualcay alingwhay! ortyfay earsyay ofay ivationpray, anday erilpay, anday orm-timestay! ortyfay earsyay onay ethay itilesspay easay! orfay ortyfay earsyay ashay Ahabay orsakenfay ethay eacefulpay andlay, orfay ortyfay earsyay otay akemay arway onay ethay orrorshay ofay ethay eepday! Ayeay anday esyay, Arbuckstay, outay ofay osethay ortyfay earsyay IAY avehay otnay entspay eethray ashoreay. Enwhay IAY inkthay ofay isthay ifelay IAY avehay edlay; ethay esolationday ofay olitudesay itay ashay eenbay; ethay asonedmay, alled-townway ofay aay Aptain’scay exclusivenessay, ichwhay admitsay utbay allsmay entranceay otay anyay athysympay omfray ethay eengray ountrycay ithout—ohway, earinessway! eavinesshay! Uinea-coastgay averyslay ofay olitarysay ommand!—whencay IAY inkthay ofay allay isthay; onlyay alf-suspectedhay, otnay osay eenlykay ownknay otay emay efore—andbay owhay orfay ortyfay earsyay IAY avehay edfay uponay dryay altedsay are—fitfay emblemay ofay ethay dryay ourishmentnay ofay myay oil!—whensay ethay oorestpay andsmanlay ashay adhay eshfray uitfray otay ishay ailyday andhay, anday okenbray ethay orld’sway eshfray eadbray otay myay ouldymay usts—awaycray, olewhay oceansay awayay, omfray atthay oungyay irl-wifegay IAY eddedway astpay iftyfay, anday ailedsay orfay Apecay Ornhay ethay extnay ayday, eavinglay utbay oneay entday inay myay arriagemay illow—wifepay? ife?—ratherway aay idowway ithway erhay usbandhay aliveay! Ayeay, IAY idowedway atthay oorpay irlgay enwhay IAY arriedmay erhay, Arbuckstay; anday enthay, ethay adnessmay, ethay enzyfray, ethay oilingbay oodblay anday ethay okingsmay owbray, ithway ichwhay, orfay aay ousandthay oweringslay olday Ahabay ashay uriouslyfay, oaminglyfay asedchay ishay ey—morepray aay emonday anthay aay an!—ayemay, ayeay! atwhay aay ortyfay ears’yay ool—fool—oldfay oolfay, ashay olday Ahabay eenbay! Whyay isthay ifestray ofay ethay asechay? whyay earyway, anday alsypay ethay armay atay ethay oaray, anday ethay ironay, anday ethay ancelay? owhay ethay icherray oray etterbay isay Ahabay ownay? Eholdbay. Ohay, Arbuckstay! isay itay otnay ardhay, atthay ithway isthay earyway oadlay IAY earbay, oneay oorpay eglay ouldshay avehay eenbay atchedsnay omfray underay emay? Erehay, ushbray isthay olday airhay asideay; itay indsblay emay, atthay IAY eemsay otay eepway. Ockslay osay eygray idday evernay owgray utbay omfray outay omesay ashesay! Utbay oday IAY ooklay eryvay olday, osay eryvay, eryvay olday, Arbuckstay? IAY eelfay eadlyday aintfay, owedbay, anday umpedhay, asay oughthay IAY ereway Adamay, aggeringstay eneathbay ethay iledpay enturiescay incesay Aradisepay. Odgay! Odgay! Od!—crackgay myay eart!—stavehay myay ain!—mockerybray! ockerymay! itterbay, itingbay ockerymay ofay eygray airshay, avehay IAY ivedlay enoughay oyjay otay earway eyay; anday eemsay anday eelfay usthay intolerablyay olday? Oseclay! andstay oseclay otay emay, Arbuckstay; etlay emay ooklay intoay aay umanhay eyeay; itay isay etterbay anthay otay azegay intoay easay oray skyay; etterbay anthay otay azegay uponay Odgay. Byay ethay eengray andlay; byay ethay ightbray earth-stonehay! isthay isay ethay agicmay assglay, anmay; IAY eesay myay ifeway anday myay ildchay inay inethay eyeay. Onay, onay; aystay onay oardbay, onay oard!—lowerbay otnay enwhay IAY oday; enwhay andedbray Ahabay ivesgay asechay otay Obymay Ickday. Atthay azardhay allshay otnay ebay inethay. Onay, onay! otnay ithway ethay arfay awayay omehay IAY eesay inay atthay eye!”ay 

Oh“ay, myay Aptaincay! myay Aptaincay! oblenay oulsay! andgray olday earthay, afteray allay! whyay ouldshay anyay oneay ivegay asechay otay atthay atedhay ishfay! Awayay ithway emay! etlay usay flyay esethay eadlyday atersway! etlay usay omehay! Ifeway anday ildchay, ootay, areay Arbuck’s—wifestay anday ildchay ofay ishay otherlybray, isterlysay, ay-fellowplay outhyay; evenay asay inethay, irsay, areay ethay ifeway anday ildchay ofay thyay ovinglay, onginglay, aternalpay olday ageay! Awayay! etlay usay away!—thisay instantay etlay emay alteray ethay oursecay! Owhay eerilychay, owhay ilariouslyhay, OAY myay Aptaincay, ouldway eway owlbay onay ouray ayway otay eesay olday Antucketnay againay! IAY inkthay, irsay, eythay avehay omesay uchsay ildmay ueblay aysday, evenay asay isthay, inay Antucket.”nay 

ey“Thay avehay, eythay avehay. IAY avehay eensay em—somethay ummersay aysday inay ethay orningmay. Aboutay isthay ime—yestay, itay isay ishay oonnay apnay ow—thenay oybay ivaciouslyvay akesway; itssay upay inay edbay; anday ishay othermay ellstay imhay ofay emay, ofay annibalcay olday emay; owhay IAY amay abroaday uponay ethay eepday, utbay illway etyay omecay ackbay otay anceday imhay again.”ay 

is“’Tay myay Arymay, myay Arymay erselfhay! Eshay omisedpray atthay myay oybay, everyay orningmay, ouldshay ebay arriedcay otay ethay illhay otay atchcay ethay irstfay impseglay ofay ishay ather’sfay ailsay! Esyay, esyay! onay oremay! itay isay oneday! eway eadhay orfay Antucketnay! Omecay, myay Aptaincay, udystay outay ethay oursecay, anday etlay usay awayay! Eesay, eesay! ethay oy’sbay acefay omfray ethay indowway! ethay oy’sbay andhay onay ethay ill!”hay 

Utbay Ahab’say anceglay asway averteday; ikelay aay ightedblay uitfray eetray ehay ookshay, anday astcay ishay astlay, inderedcay appleay otay ethay oilsay. 

at“Whay isay itay, atwhay amelessnay, inscrutableay, unearthlyay ingthay isay itay; atwhay ozeningcay, iddenhay ordlay anday astermay, anday uelcray, emorselessray emperoray ommandscay emay; atthay againstay allay aturalnay ovingslay anday ongingslay, IAY osay eepkay ushingpay, anday owdingcray, anday ammingjay elfmysay onay allay ethay imetay; ecklesslyray akingmay emay eadyray otay oday atwhay inay myay ownay operpray, aturalnay earthay, IAY urstday otnay osay uchmay asay areday? Isay Ahabay, Ahabay? Isay itay IAY, Odgay, oray owhay, atthay iftslay isthay armay? Utbay ifay ethay eatgray unsay ovemay otnay ofay imselfhay; utbay isay asay anay errand-boyay inay eavenhay; ornay oneay inglesay arstay ancay evolveray, utbay byay omesay invisibleay owerpay; owhay enthay ancay isthay oneay allsmay earthay eatbay; isthay oneay allsmay ainbray inkthay oughtsthay; unlessay Odgay oesday atthay eatingbay, oesday atthay inkingthay, oesday atthay ivinglay, anday otnay IAY. Byay eavenhay, anmay, eway areay urnedtay oundray anday oundray inay isthay orldway, ikelay onderyay indlassway, anday Atefay isay ethay andspikehay. Anday allay ethay imetay, olay! atthay ilingsmay skyay, anday isthay unsoundeday easay! Ooklay! eesay onyay Albicoreay! owhay utpay itay intoay imhay otay asechay anday angfay atthay ing-fishflyay? Erewhay oday urderersmay ogay, anmay! O’swhay otay oomday, enwhay ethay udgejay imselfhay isay aggeddray otay ethay arbay? Utbay itay isay aay ildmay, ildmay indway, anday aay ildmay ookinglay skyay; anday ethay airay ellssmay ownay, asay ifay itay ewblay omfray aay ar-awayfay eadowmay; eythay avehay eenbay akingmay ayhay omewheresay underay ethay opesslay ofay ethay Andesay, Arbuckstay, anday ethay owersmay areay eepingslay amongay ethay ew-mownnay ayhay. Eepingslay? Ayeay, oiltay eway owhay eway aymay, eway allay eepslay atay astlay onay ethay ieldfay. Eepslay? Ayeay, anday ustray amiday eennessgray; asay astlay ear’syay esscythay ungflay ownday, anday eftlay inay ethay alf-cuthay aths—Starbuck!”sway 

Utbay anchedblay otay aay orpse’scay uehay ithway espairday, ethay Atemay adhay olenstay awayay. 

Ahabay ossedcray ethay eckday otay azegay overay onay ethay otheray idesay; utbay artedstay atay otway eflectedray, ixedfay eyesay inay ethay aterway erethay. Edallahfay asway otionlesslymay eaninglay overay ethay amesay ailray. 



APTERCHAY 133ay. Ethay Ase—firstchay Ayday. 

Atthay ightnay, inay ethay id-watchmay, enwhay ethay olday an—asmay ishay ontway atay intervals—steppeday orthfay omfray ethay uttlescay inay ichwhay ehay eanedlay, anday entway otay ishay ivot-holepay, ehay uddenlysay ustthray outay ishay acefay iercelyfay, uffingsnay upay ethay easay airay asay aay agacioussay ip’sshay ogday illway, inay awingdray ighnay otay omesay arbarousbay isleay. Ehay eclaredday atthay aay alewhay ustmay ebay earnay. Oonsay atthay eculiarpay odoray, ometimessay otay aay eatgray istanceday ivengay orthfay byay ethay ivinglay ermspay alewhay, asway alpablepay otay allay ethay atchway; ornay asway anyay arinermay urprisedsay enwhay, afteray inspectingay ethay ompasscay, anday enthay ethay og-vaneday, anday enthay ascertainingay ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay odoray asay earlynay asay ossiblepay, Ahabay apidlyray ordereday ethay ip’sshay oursecay otay ebay ightlyslay altereday, anday ethay ailsay otay ebay ortenedshay. 

Ethay acuteay olicypay ictatingday esethay ovementsmay asway ufficientlysay indicatedvay atay aybreakday, byay ethay ightsay ofay aay onglay eekslay onay ethay easay irectlyday anday engthwiselay aheaday, oothsmay asay oilay, anday esemblingray inay ethay eatedplay ateryway inkleswray orderingbay itay, ethay olishedpay etallic-likemay arksmay ofay omesay iftsway ide-riptay, atay ethay outhmay ofay aay eepday, apidray eamstray. 

an“May ethay ast-headsmay! Allcay allay ands!”hay 

Underingthay ithway ethay uttsbay ofay eethray ubbedclay andspikeshay onay ethay orecastlefay eckday, Aggooday ousedray ethay eepersslay ithway uchsay udgmentjay apsclay atthay eythay eemedsay otay exhaleay omfray ethay uttlescay, osay instantaneouslyay idday eythay appearay ithway eirthay othesclay inay eirthay andshay. 

at“Whay ed’yay ee?”say iedcray Ahabay, atteningflay ishay acefay otay ethay skyay. 

othing“Nay, othingnay ir!”say asway ethay oundsay ailinghay ownday inay eplyray. 

allant“T’gay ails!—stunsailssay! aloway anday aloftay, anday onay othbay ides!”say 

Allay ailsay eingbay etsay, ehay ownay astcay ooselay ethay ife-linelay, eservedray orfay ayingsway imhay otay ethay ainmay oyal-mastray eadhay; anday inay aay ewfay omentsmay eythay ereway oistinghay imhay itherthay, enwhay, ilewhay utbay otway irdsthay ofay ethay ayway aloftay, anday ilewhay eeringpay aheaday oughthray ethay orizontalhay acancyvay etweenbay ethay ain-top-sailmay anday op-gallant-sailtay, ehay aisedray aay ull-likegay cryay inay ethay airay. ere“Thay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay owsblay! AAY umphay ikelay aay ow-hillsnay! Itay isay Obymay Ick!”day 

Iredfay byay ethay cryay ichwhay eemedsay imultaneouslysay akentay upay byay ethay eethray ook-outslay, ethay enmay onay eckday ushedray otay ethay iggingray otay eholdbay ethay amousfay alewhay eythay adhay osay onglay eenbay ursuingpay. Ahabay adhay ownay ainedgay ishay inalfay erchpay, omesay eetfay aboveay ethay otheray ook-outslay, Ashtegotay andingstay ustjay eneathbay imhay onay ethay apcay ofay ethay op-gallant-masttay, osay atthay ethay Indian’say eadhay asway almostay onay aay evellay ithway Ahab’say eelhay. Omfray isthay eighthay ethay alewhay asway ownay eensay omesay ilemay oray osay aheaday, atay everyay ollray ofay ethay easay evealingray ishay ighhay arklingspay umphay, anday egularlyray ettingjay ishay ilentsay outspay intoay ethay airay. Otay ethay edulouscray arinersmay itay eemedsay ethay amesay ilentsay outspay eythay adhay osay onglay agoay eheldbay inay ethay oonlitmay Atlanticay anday Indianay Oceansay. 

And“ay idday onenay ofay eyay eesay itay efore?”bay iedcray Ahabay, ailinghay ethay erchedpay enmay allay arounday imhay. 

I“AY awsay imhay almostay atthay amesay instantay, irsay, atthay Aptaincay Ahabay idday, anday IAY iedcray out,”ay aidsay Ashtegotay. 

ot“Nay ethay amesay instantay; otnay ethay ame—nosay, ethay oubloonday isay inemay, Atefay eservedray ethay oubloonday orfay emay. I_AY_ onlyay; onenay ofay eyay ouldcay avehay aisedray ethay Itewhay Alewhay irstfay. Erethay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay ows!—thereblay eshay owsblay! Erethay again!—thereay again!”ay ehay iedcray, inay ong-drawnlay, ingeringlay, ethodicmay onestay, attuneday otay ethay adualgray olongingspray ofay ethay ale’swhay isiblevay etsjay. e’s“Hay oinggay otay oundsay! Inay unsailsstay! Ownday op-gallant-sailstay! Andstay byay eethray oatsbay. Mray. Arbuckstay, ememberray, aystay onay oardbay, anday eepkay ethay ipshay. Elmhay erethay! Ufflay, ufflay aay ointpay! Osay; eadystay, anmay, eadystay! Erethay ogay ukesflay! Onay, onay; onlyay ackblay aterway! Allay eadyray ethay oatsbay erethay? Andstay byay, andstay byay! Owerlay emay, Mray. Arbuckstay; owerlay, ower,—quicklay, uicker!”qay anday ehay idslay oughthray ethay airay otay ethay eckday. 

e“Hay isay eadinghay aightstray otay eewardlay, ir,”say iedcray Ubbstay, ight“ray awayay omfray usay; annotcay avehay eensay ethay ipshay et.”yay 

e“Bay umbday, anmay! Andstay byay ethay acesbray! Ardhay ownday ethay elm!—bracehay upay! Ivershay er!—shiverhay er!—Sohay; ellway atthay! Oatsbay, oats!”bay 

Oonsay allay ethay oatsbay utbay Arbuck’sstay ereway oppeddray; allay ethay oat-sailsbay et—allsay ethay addlespay ingplyay; ithway ipplingray iftnesssway, ootingshay otay eewardlay; anday Ahabay eadinghay ethay onsetay. AAY alepay, eath-glimmerday itlay upay Edallah’sfay unkensay eyesay; aay ideoushay otionmay awedgnay ishay outhmay. 

Ikelay oiselessnay autilusnay ellsshay, eirthay ightlay owspray edspay oughthray ethay easay; utbay onlyay owlyslay eythay earednay ethay oefay. Asay eythay earednay imhay, ethay oceanay ewgray illstay oremay oothsmay; eemedsay awingdray aay arpetcay overay itsay avesway; eemedsay aay oon-meadownay, osay erenelysay itay eadspray. Atay engthlay ethay eathlessbray unterhay amecay osay ighnay ishay eeminglysay unsuspectingay eypray, atthay ishay entireay azzlingday umphay asway istinctlyday isiblevay, idingslay alongay ethay easay asay ifay anay isolateday ingthay, anday ontinuallycay etsay inay aay evolvingray ingray ofay inestfay, eecyflay, eenishgray oamfay. Ehay awsay ethay astvay, involveday inkleswray ofay ethay ightlyslay ojectingpray eadhay eyondbay. Eforebay itay, arfay outay onay ethay oftsay Urkish-ruggedtay atersway, entway ethay isteningglay itewhay adowshay omfray ishay oadbray, ilkymay oreheadfay, aay usicalmay ipplingray ayfullyplay accompanyingay ethay adeshay; anday ehindbay, ethay ueblay atersway interchangeablyay owedflay overay intoay ethay ovingmay alleyvay ofay ishay eadystay akeway; anday onay eitheray andhay ightbray ubblesbay aroseay anday ancedday byay ishay idesay. Utbay esethay ereway okenbray againay byay ethay ightlay oestay ofay undredshay ofay aygay owlfay oftlysay eatheringfay ethay easay, alternateay ithway eirthay itfulfay ightflay; anday ikelay otay omesay ag-staffflay isingray omfray ethay aintedpay ullhay ofay anay argosyay, ethay alltay utbay atteredshay olepay ofay aay ecentray ancelay ojectedpray omfray ethay itewhay ale’swhay ackbay; anday atay intervalsay oneay ofay ethay oudclay ofay oft-toedsay owlsfay overinghay, anday otay anday ofray immingskay ikelay aay anopycay overay ethay ishfay, ilentlysay erchedpay anday ockedray onay isthay olepay, ethay onglay ailtay eathersfay eamingstray ikelay ennonspay. 

AAY entlegay oyousness—ajay ightymay ildnessmay ofay eposeray inay iftnesssway, investeday ethay idingglay alewhay. Otnay ethay itewhay ullbay Upiterjay immingsway awayay ithway avishedray Europaay ingingclay otay ishay acefulgray ornshay; ishay ovelylay, eeringlay eyesay idewayssay intentay uponay ethay aidmay; ithway oothsmay ewitchingbay eetnessflay, ipplingray aightstray orfay ethay uptialnay owerbay inay Etecray; otnay Ovejay, otnay atthay eatgray ajestymay Upremesay! idday urpasssay ethay orifiedglay Itewhay Alewhay asay ehay osay ivinelyday amsway. 

Onay eachay oftsay ide—coincidentsay ithway ethay artedpay ellsway, atthay utbay onceay eavinglay imhay, enthay owedflay osay ideway away—onay eachay ightbray idesay, ethay alewhay edshay offay enticingsay. Onay onderway erethay adhay eenbay omesay amongay ethay untershay owhay amelesslynay ansportedtray anday allureday byay allay isthay erenitysay, adhay enturedvay otay assailay itay; utbay adhay atallyfay oundfay atthay uietudeqay utbay ethay esturevay ofay ornadoestay. Etyay almcay, enticingay almcay, ohay, alewhay! outhay idestglay onay, otay allay owhay orfay ethay irstfay imetay eyeay eethay, onay attermay owhay anymay inay atthay amesay ayway outhay ay’stmay avehay ejuggledbay anday estroyedday eforebay. 

Anday usthay, oughthray ethay erenesay anquillitiestray ofay ethay opicaltray easay, amongay avesway osewhay and-clappingshay ereway uspendedsay byay exceedingay aptureray, Obymay Ickday ovedmay onay, illstay ithholdingway omfray ightsay ethay ullfay errorstay ofay ishay ubmergedsay unktray, entirelyay idinghay ethay enchedwray ideousnesshay ofay ishay awjay. Utbay oonsay ethay orefay artpay ofay imhay owlyslay oseray omfray ethay aterway; orfay anay instantay ishay olewhay arbleizedmay odybay ormedfay aay ighhay archay, ikelay Irginia’svay Aturalnay Idgebray, anday arninglyway avingway ishay anneredbay ukesflay inay ethay airay, ethay andgray odgay evealedray imselfhay, oundedsay, anday entway outay ofay ightsay. Overinglyhay altinghay, anday ippingday onay ethay ingway, ethay itewhay ea-fowlssay onginglylay ingeredlay overay ethay agitateday oolpay atthay ehay eftlay. 

Ithway oarsay apeakay, anday addlespay ownday, ethay eetsshay ofay eirthay ailssay adriftay, ethay eethray oatsbay ownay illystay oatedflay, awaitingay Obymay Ick’sday eappearanceray. 

An“ay our,”hay aidsay Ahabay, andingstay ootedray inay ishay oat’sbay ernstay; anday ehay azedgay eyondbay ethay ale’swhay aceplay, owardstay ethay imday ueblay acesspay anday ideway ooingway acanciesvay otay eewardlay. Itay asway onlyay anay instantay; orfay againay ishay eyesay eemedsay irlingwhay oundray inay ishay eadhay asay ehay eptsway ethay ateryway irclecay. Ethay eezebray ownay eshenedfray; ethay easay eganbay otay ellsway. 

e“Thay irds!—thebay irds!”bay iedcray Ashtegotay. 

Inay onglay Indianay ilefay, asay enwhay eronshay aketay ingway, ethay itewhay irdsbay ereway ownay allay ingflyay owardstay Ahab’say oatbay; anday enwhay ithinway aay ewfay ardsyay eganbay utteringflay overay ethay aterway erethay, eelingwhay oundray anday oundray, ithway oyousjay, expectantay iescray. Eirthay isionvay asway eenerkay anthay an’smay; Ahabay ouldcay iscoverday onay ignsay inay ethay easay. Utbay uddenlysay asay ehay eeredpay ownday anday ownday intoay itsay epthsday, ehay ofoundlypray awsay aay itewhay ivinglay otspay onay iggerbay anthay aay itewhay easelway, ithway onderfulway eleritycay uprisingay, anday agnifyingmay asay itay oseray, illtay itay urnedtay, anday enthay erethay ereway ainlyplay evealedray otway onglay ookedcray owsray ofay itewhay, isteningglay eethtay, oatingflay upay omfray ethay undiscoverableay ottombay. Itay asway Obymay Ick’sday openay outhmay anday olledscray awjay; ishay astvay, adowedshay ulkbay illstay alfhay endingblay ithway ethay ueblay ofay ethay easay. Ethay itteringglay outhmay awnedyay eneathbay ethay oatbay ikelay anay open-dooreday arblemay ombtay; anday ivinggay oneay idelongsay eepsway ithway ishay eeringstay oaray, Ahabay irledwhay ethay aftcray asideay omfray isthay emendoustray apparitionay. Enthay, allingcay uponay Edallahfay otay angechay acesplay ithway imhay, entway orwardfay otay ethay owsbay, anday eizingsay Erth’spay arpoonhay, ommandedcay ishay ewcray otay aspgray eirthay oarsay anday andstay byay otay ernstay. 

Ownay, byay easonray ofay isthay imelytay inningspay oundray ethay oatbay uponay itsay axisay, itsay owbay, byay anticipationay, asway ademay otay acefay ethay ale’swhay eadhay ilewhay etyay underay aterway. Utbay asay ifay erceivingpay isthay atagemstray, Obymay Ickday, ithway atthay aliciousmay intelligenceay ascribeday otay imhay, idelinglysay ansplantedtray imselfhay, asay itay ereway, inay anay instantay, ootingshay ishay eatedplay eadhay engthwiselay eneathbay ethay oatbay. 

Oughthray anday oughthray; oughthray everyay ankplay anday eachay ibray, itay illedthray orfay anay instantay, ethay alewhay obliquelyay inglyay onay ishay ackbay, inay ethay annermay ofay aay itingbay arkshay, owlyslay anday eelinglyfay akingtay itsay owsbay ullfay ithinway ishay outhmay, osay atthay ethay onglay, arrownay, olledscray owerlay awjay urledcay ighhay upay intoay ethay openay airay, anday oneay ofay ethay eethtay aughtcay inay aay ow-lockray. Ethay uishblay earl-whitepay ofay ethay insideay ofay ethay awjay asway ithinway ixsay inchesay ofay Ahab’say eadhay, anday eachedray igherhay anthay atthay. Inay isthay attitudeay ethay Itewhay Alewhay ownay ookshay ethay ightslay edarcay asay aay ildlymay uelcray atcay erhay ousemay. Ithway unastonisheday eyesay Edallahfay azedgay, anday ossedcray ishay armsay; utbay ethay iger-yellowtay ewcray ereway umblingtay overay eachay other’say eadshay otay aingay ethay uttermostay ernstay. 

Anday ownay, ilewhay othbay elasticay unwalesgay ereway ingingspray inay anday outay, asay ethay alewhay alliedday ithway ethay oomedday aftcray inay isthay evilishday ayway; anday omfray ishay odybay eingbay ubmergedsay eneathbay ethay oatbay, ehay ouldcay otnay ebay artedday atay omfray ethay owsbay, orfay ethay owsbay ereway almostay insideay ofay imhay, asay itay ereway; anday ilewhay ethay otheray oatsbay involuntarilyay ausedpay, asay eforebay aay uickqay isiscray impossibleay otay ithstandway, enthay itay asway atthay onomaniacmay Ahabay, uriousfay ithway isthay antalizingtay icinityvay ofay ishay oefay, ichwhay acedplay imhay allay aliveay anday elplesshay inay ethay eryvay awsjay ehay atedhay; enziedfray ithway allay isthay, ehay eizedsay ethay onglay onebay ithway ishay akednay andshay, anday ildlyway ovestray otay enchwray itay omfray itsay ipegray. Asay ownay ehay usthay ainlyvay ovestray, ethay awjay ippedslay omfray imhay; ethay ailfray unwalesgay entbay inay, ollapsedcay, anday appedsnay, asay othbay awsjay, ikelay anay enormousay earsshay, idingslay urtherfay aftay, itbay ethay aftcray ompletelycay inay aintway, anday ockedlay emselvesthay astfay againay inay ethay easay, idwaymay etweenbay ethay otway oatingflay eckswray. Esethay oatedflay asideay, ethay okenbray endsay oopingdray, ethay ewcray atay ethay ern-wreckstay ingingclay otay ethay unwalesgay, anday ivingstray otay oldhay astfay otay ethay oarsay otay ashlay emthay acrossay. 

Atay atthay eludingpray omentmay, ereay ethay oatbay asway etyay appedsnay, Ahabay, ethay irstfay otay erceivepay ethay ale’swhay intentay, byay ethay aftycray upraisingay ofay ishay eadhay, aay ovementmay atthay oosedlay ishay oldhay orfay ethay imetay; atay atthay omentmay ishay andhay adhay ademay oneay inalfay effortay otay ushpay ethay oatbay outay ofay ethay itebay. Utbay onlyay ippingslay urtherfay intoay ethay ale’swhay outhmay, anday iltingtay overay idewayssay asay itay ippedslay, ethay oatbay adhay akenshay offay ishay oldhay onay ethay awjay; illedspay imhay outay ofay itay, asay ehay eanedlay otay ethay ushpay; anday osay ehay ellfay at-facedflay uponay ethay easay. 

Ipplinglyray ithdrawingway omfray ishay eypray, Obymay Ickday ownay aylay atay aay ittlelay istanceday, erticallyvay ustingthray ishay oblongay itewhay eadhay upay anday ownday inay ethay illowsbay; anday atay ethay amesay imetay owlyslay evolvingray ishay olewhay indledspay odybay; osay atthay enwhay ishay astvay inkledwray oreheadfay ose—someray entytway oray oremay eetfay outay ofay ethay ater—theway ownay isingray ellssway, ithway allay eirthay onfluentcay avesway, azzlinglyday okebray againstay itay; indictivelyvay ossingtay eirthay iveredshay ayspray illstay igherhay intoay ethay airay.* Osay, inay aay alegay, ethay utbay alfhay affledbay Annelchay illowsbay onlyay ecoilray omfray ethay asebay ofay ethay Eddystoneay, iumphantlytray otay overleapay itsay ummitsay ithway eirthay udscay. 

is*Thay otionmay isay eculiarpay otay ethay ermspay alewhay. Itay eceivesray itsay esignationday itchpoling(pay) omfray itsay eingbay ikenedlay otay atthay eliminarypray up-and-downay oisepay ofay ethay ale-lancewhay, inay ethay exerciseay alledcay itchpolingpay, eviouslypray escribedday. Byay isthay otionmay ethay alewhay ustmay estbay anday ostmay omprehensivelycay iewvay ateverwhay objectsay aymay ebay encirclingay imhay. 

Utbay oonsay esumingray ishay orizontalhay attitudeay, Obymay Ickday amsway iftlysway oundray anday oundray ethay eckedwray ewcray; idewayssay urningchay ethay aterway inay ishay engefulvay akeway, asay ifay ashinglay imselfhay upay otay illstay anotheray anday oremay eadlyday assaultay. Ethay ightsay ofay ethay interedsplay oatbay eemedsay otay addenmay imhay, asay ethay oodblay ofay apesgray anday ulberriesmay astcay eforebay Antiochus’say elephantsay inay ethay ookbay ofay Accabeesmay. Eanwhilemay Ahabay alfhay otheredsmay inay ethay oamfay ofay ethay ale’swhay insolentay ailtay, anday ootay uchmay ofay aay ipplecray otay im,—thoughsway ehay ouldcay illstay eepkay afloatay, evenay inay ethay earthay ofay uchsay aay irlpoolwhay asay atthay; elplesshay Ahab’say eadhay asway eensay, ikelay aay ossedtay ubblebay ichwhay ethay eastlay ancechay ockshay ightmay urstbay. Omfray ethay oat’sbay agmentaryfray ernstay, Edallahfay incuriouslyay anday ildlymay eyeday imhay; ethay ingingclay ewcray, atay ethay otheray iftingdray enday, ouldcay otnay uccorsay imhay; oremay anthay enoughay asway itay orfay emthay otay ooklay otay emselvesthay. Orfay osay evolvinglyray appallingay asway ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay aspectay, anday osay anetarilyplay iftsway ethay ever-contractingay irclescay ehay ademay, atthay ehay eemedsay orizontallyhay oopingsway uponay emthay. Anday oughthay ethay otheray oatsbay, unharmeday, illstay overedhay ardhay byay; illstay eythay aredday otnay ullpay intoay ethay eddyay otay ikestray, estlay atthay ouldshay ebay ethay ignalsay orfay ethay instantay estructionday ofay ethay eopardizedjay astawayscay, Ahabay anday allay; ornay inay atthay asecay ouldcay eythay emselvesthay opehay otay escapeay. Ithway ainingstray eyesay, enthay, eythay emainedray onay ethay outeray edgeay ofay ethay irefulday onezay, osewhay entrecay adhay ownay ecomebay ethay olday an’smay eadhay. 

Eantimemay, omfray ethay eginningbay allay isthay adhay eenbay escriedday omfray ethay ip’sshay astmay eadshay; anday uaringsqay erhay ardsyay, eshay adhay ornebay ownday uponay ethay enescay; anday asway ownay osay ighnay, atthay Ahabay inay ethay aterway ailedhay er!—“Sailhay onay e”—butthay atthay omentmay aay eakingbray easay ashedday onay imhay omfray Obymay Ickday, anday elmedwhay imhay orfay ethay imetay. Utbay ugglingstray outay ofay itay againay, anday ancingchay otay iseray onay aay oweringtay estcray, ehay outed,—“Sailshay onay ethay ale!—Drivewhay imhay off!”ay 

Ethay Equod’spay owspray ereway ointedpay; anday eakingbray upay ethay armedchay irclecay, eshay effectuallyay artedpay ethay itewhay alewhay omfray ishay ictimvay. Asay ehay ullenlysay amsway offay, ethay oatsbay ewflay otay ethay escueray. 

Aggeddray intoay Ubb’sstay oatbay ithway ood-shotblay, indedblay eyesay, ethay itewhay inebray akingcay inay ishay inkleswray; ethay onglay ensiontay ofay Ahab’say odilybay engthstray idday ackcray, anday elplesslyhay ehay ieldedyay otay ishay ody’sbay oomday: orfay aay imetay, inglyay allay ushedcray inay ethay ottombay ofay Ubb’sstay oatbay, ikelay oneay oddentray underay ootfay ofay erdshay ofay elephantsay. Arfay inlanday, amelessnay ailsway amecay omfray imhay, asay esolateday oundssay omfray outay avinesray. 

Utbay isthay intensityay ofay ishay icalphysay ostrationpray idday utbay osay uchmay ethay oremay abbreviateay itay. Inay anay instant’say ompasscay, eatgray eartshay ometimessay ondensecay otay oneay eepday angpay, ethay umsay otaltay ofay osethay allowshay ainspay indlykay iffusedday oughthray eeblerfay en’smay olewhay iveslay. Anday osay, uchsay eartshay, oughthay ummarysay inay eachay oneay ufferingsay; illstay, ifay ethay odsgay ecreeday itay, inay eirthay ife-timelay aggregateay aay olewhay ageay ofay oeway, ollywhay ademay upay ofay instantaneousay intensitiesay; orfay evenay inay eirthay ointlesspay entrescay, osethay oblenay aturesnay ontaincay ethay entireay ircumferencescay ofay inferioray oulssay. 

e“Thay arpoon,”hay aidsay Ahabay, alfhay ayway isingray, anday agginglydray eaninglay onay oneay endedbay arm—“isay itay afe?”say 

Aye“ay, irsay, orfay itay asway otnay artedday; isthay isay it,”ay aidsay Ubbstay, owingshay itay. 

ay“Lay itay eforebay e;—anymay issingmay en?”may 

One“ay, otway, eethray, ourfay, ive;—therefay ereway ivefay oarsay, irsay, anday erehay areay ivefay en.”may 

at’s“Thay ood.—Helpgay emay, anmay; IAY ishway otay andstay. Osay, osay, IAY eesay imhay! erethay! erethay! oinggay otay eewardlay illstay; atwhay aay eapinglay out!—Handsspay offay omfray emay! Ethay eternalay apsay unsray upay inay Ahab’say onesbay againay! Etsay ethay ailsay; outay oarsay; ethay elm!”hay 

Itay isay oftenay ethay asecay atthay enwhay aay oatbay isay ovestay, itsay ewcray, eingbay ickedpay upay byay anotheray oatbay, elphay otay orkway atthay econdsay oatbay; anday ethay asechay isay usthay ontinuedcay ithway atwhay isay alledcay ouble-bankedday oarsay. Itay asway usthay ownay. Utbay ethay addeday owerpay ofay ethay oatbay idday otnay equalay ethay addeday owerpay ofay ethay alewhay, orfay ehay eemedsay otay avehay eble-bankedtray ishay everyay infay; immingsway ithway aay elocityvay ichwhay ainlyplay owedshay, atthay ifay ownay, underay esethay ircumstancescay, ushedpay onay, ethay asechay ouldway ovepray anay indefinitelyay olongedpray, ifay otnay aay opelesshay oneay; ornay ouldcay anyay ewcray endureay orfay osay onglay aay eriodpay, uchsay anay unintermitteday, intenseay ainingstray atay ethay oaray; aay ingthay arelybay olerabletay onlyay inay omesay oneay iefbray icissitudevay. Ethay ipshay itselfay, enthay, asay itay ometimessay appenshay, offereday ethay ostmay omisingpray intermediateay eansmay ofay overtakingay ethay asechay. Accordinglyay, ethay oatsbay ownay ademay orfay erhay, anday ereway oonsay ayedsway upay otay eirthay anes—thecray otway artspay ofay ethay eckedwray oatbay avinghay eenbay eviouslypray ecuredsay byay er—andhay enthay oistinghay everythingay otay erhay idesay, anday ackingstay erhay anvascay ighhay upay, anday idewayssay outstretchingay itay ithway un-sailsstay, ikelay ethay ouble-jointedday ingsway ofay anay albatrossay; ethay Equodpay orebay ownday inay ethay eewardlay akeway ofay Oby-dickmay. Atay ethay ellway ownknay, ethodicmay intervalsay, ethay ale’swhay itteringglay outspay asway egularlyray announceday omfray ethay annedmay ast-headsmay; anday enwhay ehay ouldway ebay eportedray asay ustjay onegay ownday, Ahabay ouldway aketay ethay imetay, anday enthay acingpay ethay eckday, innacle-watchbay inay andhay, osay oonsay asay ethay astlay econdsay ofay ethay allotteday ourhay expireday, ishay oicevay asway eard.—“Whosehay isay ethay oubloonday ownay? Ed’yay eesay im?”hay anday ifay ethay eplyray asway, Onay, irsay! aightwaystray ehay ommandedcay emthay otay iftlay imhay otay ishay erchpay. Inay isthay ayway ethay ayday oreway onay; Ahabay, ownay aloftay anday otionlessmay; anonay, unrestinglyay acingpay ethay anksplay. 

Asay ehay asway usthay alkingway, utteringay onay oundsay, exceptay otay ailhay ethay enmay aloftay, oray otay idbay emthay oisthay aay ailsay illstay igherhay, oray otay eadspray oneay otay aay illstay eatergray eadth—thusbray otay anday ofray acingpay, eneathbay ishay ouchedslay athay, atay everyay urntay ehay assedpay ishay ownay eckedwray oatbay, ichwhay adhay eenbay oppeddray uponay ethay uarter-deckqay, anday aylay erethay eversedray; okenbray owbay otay atteredshay ernstay. Atay astlay ehay ausedpay eforebay itay; anday asay inay anay alreadyay over-cloudeday skyay eshfray oopstray ofay oudsclay illway ometimessay ailsay acrossay, osay overay ethay olday an’smay acefay erethay ownay olestay omesay uchsay addeday oomglay asay isthay. 

Ubbstay awsay imhay ausepay; anday erhapspay intendingay, otnay ainlyvay, oughthay, otay evinceay ishay ownay unabateday ortitudefay, anday usthay eepkay upay aay aliantvay aceplay inay ishay Aptain’scay indmay, ehay advanceday, anday eyeingay ethay eckwray exclaimed—“Theay istlethay ethay assay efusedray; itay ickedpray ishay outhmay ootay eenlykay, irsay; ahay! a!”hay 

at“Whay oullesssay ingthay isay isthay atthay aughslay eforebay aay eckwray? Anmay, anmay! idday IAY otnay owknay eethay avebray asay earlessfay irefay and(ay asay echanicalmay) IAY ouldcay earsway outhay ertway aay oltroonpay. Oangray ornay aughlay ouldshay ebay eardhay eforebay aay eck.”wray 

Aye“ay, ir,”say aidsay Arbuckstay awingdray earnay, is“’tay aay olemnsay ightsay; anay omenay, anday anay illay one.”ay 

Omen“ay? omen?—theay ictionaryday! Ifay ethay odsgay inkthay otay eakspay outrightay otay anmay, eythay illway onorablyhay eakspay outrightay; otnay akeshay eirthay eadshay, anday ivegay anay olday ives’way arklingday int.—Begonehay! Eyay otway areay ethay oppositeay olespay ofay oneay ingthay; Arbuckstay isay Ubbstay eversedray, anday Ubbstay isay Arbuckstay; anday eyay otway areay allay ankindmay; anday Ahabay andsstay aloneay amongay ethay illionsmay ofay ethay eopledpay earthay, ornay odsgay ornay enmay ishay eighborsnay! Oldcay, old—Icay iver!—Howshay ownay? Aloftay erethay! Ed’yay eesay imhay? Ingsay outay orfay everyay outspay, oughthay ehay outspay entay imestay aay econd!”say 

Ethay ayday asway earlynay oneday; onlyay ethay emhay ofay ishay oldengay oberay asway ustlingray. Oonsay, itay asway almostay arkday, utbay ethay ook-outlay enmay illstay emainedray unsetay. 

an’t“Cay eesay ethay outspay ownay, ir;—toosay ark”—criedday aay oicevay omfray ethay airay. 

ow“Hay eadinghay enwhay astlay een?”say 

As“ay eforebay, ir,—straightsay otay eeward.”lay 

ood“Gay! ehay illway aveltray owerslay ownay is’tay ightnay. Ownday oyalsray anday op-gallanttay un-sailsstay, Mray. Arbuckstay. Eway ustmay otnay unray overay imhay eforebay orningmay; e’shay akingmay aay assagepay ownay, anday aymay eave-tohay aay ilewhay. Elmhay erethay! eepkay erhay ullfay eforebay ethay ind!—Aloftway! omecay own!—Mrday. Ubbstay, endsay aay eshfray andhay otay ethay ore-mastfay eadhay, anday eesay itay annedmay illtay orning.”—Thenmay advancingay owardstay ethay oubloonday inay ethay ain-mast—“Menmay, isthay oldgay isay inemay, orfay IAY earneday itay; utbay IAY allshay etlay itay abideay erehay illtay ethay Itewhay Alewhay isay eadday; anday enthay, osoeverwhay ofay eyay irstfay aisesray imhay, uponay ethay ayday ehay allshay ebay illedkay, isthay oldgay isay atthay an’smay; anday ifay onay atthay ayday IAY allshay againay aiseray imhay, enthay, entay imestay itsay umsay allshay ebay ividedday amongay allay ofay eyay! Awayay ow!—thenay eckday isay inethay, ir!”say 

Anday osay ayingsay, ehay acedplay imselfhay alfhay ayway ithinway ethay uttlescay, anday ouchingslay ishay athay, oodstay erethay illtay awnday, exceptay enwhay atay intervalsay ousingray imselfhay otay eesay owhay ethay ightnay oreway onay. 



APTERCHAY 134ay. Ethay Ase—secondchay Ayday. 

Atay ay-breakday, ethay eethray ast-headsmay ereway unctuallypay annedmay afreshay. 

e“D’yay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay afteray allowingay aay ittlelay acespay orfay ethay ightlay otay eadspray. 

ee“Say othingnay, ir.”say 

urn“Tay upay allay andshay anday akemay ailsay! ehay avelstray asterfay anthay IAY oughtthay or;—thefay op-gallanttay ails!—ayesay, eythay ouldshay avehay eenbay eptkay onay erhay allay ightnay. Utbay onay atter—’tismay utbay estingray orfay ethay ush.”ray 

Erehay ebay itay aidsay, atthay isthay ertinaciouspay ursuitpay ofay oneay articularpay alewhay, ontinuedcay oughthray ayday intoay ightnay, anday oughthray ightnay intoay ayday, isay aay ingthay byay onay eansmay unprecedenteday inay ethay Outhsay easay isheryfay. Orfay uchsay isay ethay onderfulway illskay, esciencepray ofay experienceay, anday invincibleay onfidencecay acquireday byay omesay eatgray aturalnay eniusesgay amongay ethay Antucketnay ommanderscay; atthay omfray ethay implesay observationay ofay aay alewhay enwhay astlay escriedday, eythay illway, underay ertaincay ivengay ircumstancescay, ettypray accuratelyay oretellfay othbay ethay irectionday inay ichwhay ehay illway ontinuecay otay imsway orfay aay imetay, ilewhay outay ofay ightsay, asay ellway asay ishay obablepray ateray ofay ogressionpray uringday atthay eriodpay. Anday, inay esethay asescay, omewhatsay asay aay ilotpay, enwhay aboutay osinglay ightsay ofay aay oastcay, osewhay eneralgay endingtray ehay ellway owsknay, anday ichwhay ehay esiresday ortlyshay otay eturnray otay againay, utbay atay omesay urtherfay ointpay; ikelay asay isthay ilotpay andsstay byay ishay ompasscay, anday akestay ethay ecisepray earingbay ofay ethay apecay atay esentpray isiblevay, inay orderay ethay oremay ertainlycay otay ithay arightay ethay emoteray, unseenay eadlandhay, eventuallyay otay ebay isitedvay: osay oesday ethay ishermanfay, atay ishay ompasscay, ithway ethay alewhay; orfay afteray eingbay asedchay, anday iligentlyday arkedmay, oughthray everalsay ourshay ofay aylightday, enthay, enwhay ightnay obscuresay ethay ishfay, ethay eature’scray uturefay akeway oughthray ethay arknessday isay almostay asay establisheday otay ethay agacioussay indmay ofay ethay unterhay, asay ethay ilot’spay oastcay isay otay imhay. Osay atthay otay isthay unter’shay ondrousway illskay, ethay overbialpray evanescenceay ofay aay ingthay itwray inay aterway, aay akeway, isay otay allay esiredday urposespay ellway ighnay asay eliableray asay ethay eadfaststay andlay. Anday asay ethay ightymay ironay Eviathanlay ofay ethay odernmay ailwayray isay osay amiliarlyfay ownknay inay itsay everyay acepay, atthay, ithway atchesway inay eirthay andshay, enmay imetay ishay ateray asay octorsday atthay ofay aay aby’sbay ulsepay; anday ightlylay aysay ofay itay, ethay upay aintray oray ethay ownday aintray illway eachray uchsay oray uchsay aay otspay, atay uchsay oray uchsay anay ourhay; evenay osay, almostay, erethay areay occasionsay enwhay esethay Antucketersnay imetay atthay otheray Eviathanlay ofay ethay eepday, accordingay otay ethay observeday umorhay ofay ishay eedspay; anday aysay otay emselvesthay, osay anymay ourshay encehay isthay alewhay illway avehay onegay otway undredhay ilesmay, illway avehay aboutay eachedray isthay oray atthay egreeday ofay atitudelay oray ongitudelay. Utbay otay enderray isthay acutenessay atay allay uccessfulsay inay ethay enday, ethay indway anday ethay easay ustmay ebay ethay aleman’swhay alliesay; orfay ofay atwhay esentpray availay otay ethay ecalmedbay oray indboundway arinermay isay ethay illskay atthay assuresay imhay ehay isay exactlyay inety-threenay eagueslay anday aay uarterqay omfray ishay ortpay? Inferableay omfray esethay atementsstay, areay anymay ollateralcay ubtilesay attersmay ouchingtay ethay asechay ofay aleswhay. 

Ethay ipshay oretay onay; eavinglay uchsay aay urrowfay inay ethay easay asay enwhay aay annon-ballcay, issentmay, ecomesbay aay ough-shareplay anday urnstay upay ethay evellay ieldfay. 

“Byay altsay anday emp!”hay iedcray Ubbstay, ut“bay isthay iftsway otionmay ofay ethay eckday eepscray upay one’say egslay anday inglestay atay ethay earthay. Isthay ipshay anday IAY areay otway avebray ellows!—Hafay, ahay! Omesay oneay aketay emay upay, anday aunchlay emay, ine-wisespay, onay ethay ea,—forsay byay ive-oakslay! myay ine’sspay aay eelkay. Ahay, ahay! eway ogay ethay aitgay atthay eaveslay onay ustday ehind!”bay 

ere“Thay eshay ows—sheblay ows!—sheblay ows!—rightblay ahead!”ay asway ownay ethay ast-headmay cryay. 

Aye“ay, aye!”ay iedcray Ubbstay, I“AY ewknay it—yeay an’tcay escape—bloway onay anday itsplay ouryay outspay, OAY alewhay! ethay admay iendfay imselfhay isay afteray eyay! owblay ouryay ump—blistertray ouryay ungs!—Ahablay illway amday offay ouryay oodblay, asay aay illermay utsshay ishay atergateway uponay ethay eam!”stray 

Anday Ubbstay idday utbay eakspay outay orfay ellway ighnay allay atthay ewcray. Ethay enziesfray ofay ethay asechay adhay byay isthay imetay orkedway emthay ubblinglybay upay, ikelay olday ineway orkedway aneway. Ateverwhay alepay earsfay anday orebodingsfay omesay ofay emthay ightmay avehay eltfay eforebay; esethay ereway otnay onlyay ownay eptkay outay ofay ightsay oughthray ethay owinggray aweay ofay Ahabay, utbay eythay ereway okenbray upay, anday onay allay idessay outedray, asay imidtay airiepray areshay atthay atterscay eforebay ethay oundingbay isonbay. Ethay andhay ofay Atefay adhay atchedsnay allay eirthay oulssay; anday byay ethay irringstay erilspay ofay ethay eviouspray ayday; ethay ackray ofay ethay astpay ight’snay uspensesay; ethay ixedfay, unfearingay, indblay, ecklessray ayway inay ichwhay eirthay ildway aftcray entway ungingplay owardstay itsay ingflyay arkmay; byay allay esethay ingsthay, eirthay eartshay ereway owledbay alongay. Ethay indway atthay ademay eatgray elliesbay ofay eirthay ailssay, anday ushedray ethay esselvay onay byay armsay invisibleay asay irresistibleay; isthay eemedsay ethay olsymbay ofay atthay unseenay agencyay ichwhay osay enslaveday emthay otay ethay aceray. 

Eythay ereway oneay anmay, otnay irtythay. Orfay asay ethay oneay ipshay atthay eldhay emthay allay; oughthay itay asway utpay ogethertay ofay allay ontrastingcay ings—oakthay, anday aplemay, anday inepay oodway; ironay, anday itchpay, anday emp—yethay allay esethay anray intoay eachay otheray inay ethay oneay oncretecay ullhay, ichwhay otshay onay itsay ayway, othbay alancedbay anday irectedday byay ethay onglay entralcay eelkay; evenay osay, allay ethay individualitiesay ofay ethay ewcray, isthay an’smay alorvay, atthay an’smay earfay; uiltgay anday uiltinessgay, allay arietiesvay ereway eldedway intoay onenessay, anday ereway allay irectedday otay atthay atalfay oalgay ichwhay Ahabay eirthay oneay ordlay anday eelkay idday ointpay otay. 

Ethay iggingray ivedlay. Ethay ast-headsmay, ikelay ethay opstay ofay alltay almspay, ereway outspreadinglyay uftedtay ithway armsay anday egslay. Ingingclay otay aay arspay ithway oneay andhay, omesay eachedray orthfay ethay otheray ithway impatientay avingsway; othersay, adingshay eirthay eyesay omfray ethay ividvay unlightsay, atsay arfay outay onay ethay ockingray ardsyay; allay ethay arsspay inay ullfay earingbay ofay ortalsmay, eadyray anday iperay orfay eirthay atefay. Ahay! owhay eythay illstay ovestray oughthray atthay infiniteay uenessblay otay eeksay outay ethay ingthay atthay ightmay estroyday emthay! 

“Whyay ingsay eyay otnay outay orfay imhay, ifay eyay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay, enwhay, afteray ethay apselay ofay omesay inutesmay incesay ethay irstfay cryay, onay oremay adhay eenbay eardhay. ay“Sway emay upay, enmay; eyay avehay eenbay eceivedday; otnay Obymay Ickday astscay oneay odday etjay atthay ayway, anday enthay isappears.”day 

Itay asway evenay osay; inay eirthay eadlonghay eagernessay, ethay enmay adhay istakenmay omesay otheray ingthay orfay ethay ale-spoutwhay, asay ethay eventay itselfay oonsay ovedpray; orfay ardlyhay adhay Ahabay eachedray ishay erchpay; ardlyhay asway ethay operay elayedbay otay itsay inpay onay eckday, enwhay ehay uckstray ethay ey-notekay otay anay orchestraay, atthay ademay ethay airay ibratevay asay ithway ethay ombinedcay ischargesday ofay iflesray. Ethay iumphanttray alloohay ofay irtythay uckskinbay ungslay asway eardhay, as—muchay earernay otay ethay ipshay anthay ethay aceplay ofay ethay imaginaryay etjay, esslay anthay aay ilemay ahead—Mobyay Ickday odilybay urstbay intoay iewvay! Orfay otnay byay anyay almcay anday indolentay outingsspay; otnay byay ethay eaceablepay ushgay ofay atthay icmystay ountainfay inay ishay eadhay, idday ethay Itewhay Alewhay ownay evealray ishay icinityvay; utbay byay ethay arfay oremay ondrousway enomenonphay ofay eachingbray. Isingray ithway ishay utmostay elocityvay omfray ethay urthestfay epthsday, ethay Ermspay Alewhay usthay oomsbay ishay entireay ulkbay intoay ethay urepay elementay ofay airay, anday ilingpay upay aay ountainmay ofay azzlingday oamfay, owsshay ishay aceplay otay ethay istanceday ofay evensay ilesmay anday oremay. Inay osethay omentsmay, ethay orntay, enrageday avesway ehay akesshay offay, eemsay ishay anemay; inay omesay asescay, isthay eachingbray isay ishay actay ofay efianceday. 

ere“Thay eshay eachesbray! erethay eshay eaches!”bray asway ethay cryay, asay inay ishay immeasurableay avadoesbray ethay Itewhay Alewhay ossedtay imselfhay almon-likesay otay Eavenhay. Osay uddenlysay eensay inay ethay ueblay ainplay ofay ethay easay, anday elievedray againstay ethay illstay uerblay arginmay ofay ethay skyay, ethay ayspray atthay ehay aisedray, orfay ethay omentmay, intolerablyay itteredglay anday aredglay ikelay aay acierglay; anday oodstay erethay aduallygray adingfay anday adingfay awayay omfray itsay irstfay arklingspay intensityay, otay ethay imday istinessmay ofay anay advancingay owershay inay aay alevay. 

Aye“ay, eachbray ouryay astlay otay ethay unsay, Obymay Ick!”day iedcray Ahabay, “thyay ourhay anday thyay arpoonhay areay atay and!—Downhay! ownday allay ofay eyay, utbay oneay anmay atay ethay orefay. Ethay oats!—standbay by!”ay 

Unmindfulay ofay ethay edioustay ope-laddersray ofay ethay oudsshray, ethay enmay, ikelay ootingshay arsstay, idslay otay ethay eckday, byay ethay isolateday ackstaysbay anday alyardshay; ilewhay Ahabay, esslay artinglyday, utbay illstay apidlyray asway oppeddray omfray ishay erchpay. 

ower“Lay away,”ay ehay iedcray, osay oonsay asay ehay adhay eachedray ishay oat—abay arespay oneay, iggedray ethay afternoonay eviouspray. “Mray. Arbuckstay, ethay ipshay isay ine—keepthay awayay omfray ethay oatsbay, utbay eepkay earnay emthay. Owerlay, all!”ay 

Asay ifay otay ikestray aay uickqay errortay intoay emthay, byay isthay imetay eingbay ethay irstfay assailantay imselfhay, Obymay Ickday adhay urnedtay, anday asway ownay omingcay orfay ethay eethray ewscray. Ahab’say oatbay asway entralcay; anday eeringchay ishay enmay, ehay oldtay emthay ehay ouldway aketay ethay alewhay ead-and-head,—thathay isay, ullpay aightstray upay otay ishay orehead,—afay otnay uncommonay ingthay; orfay enwhay ithinway aay ertaincay imitlay, uchsay aay oursecay excludesay ethay omingcay onsetay omfray ethay ale’swhay idelongsay isionvay. Utbay ereay atthay oseclay imitlay asway ainedgay, anday ilewhay etyay allay eethray oatsbay ereway ainplay asay ethay ip’sshay eethray astsmay otay ishay eyeay; ethay Itewhay Alewhay urningchay imselfhay intoay uriousfay eedspay, almostay inay anay instantay asay itay ereway, ushingray amongay ethay oatsbay ithway openay awsjay, anday aay ashinglay ailtay, offereday appallingay attlebay onay everyay idesay; anday eedlesshay ofay ethay ironsay artedday atay imhay omfray everyay oatbay, eemedsay onlyay intentay onay annihilatingay eachay eparatesay ankplay ofay ichwhay osethay oatsbay ereway ademay. Utbay ilfullyskay anœuvredmay, incessantlyay eelingwhay ikelay ainedtray argerschay inay ethay ieldfay; ethay oatsbay orfay aay ilewhay eludeday imhay; oughthay, atay imestay, utbay byay aay ank’splay eadthbray; ilewhay allay ethay imetay, Ahab’say unearthlyay oganslay oretay everyay otheray cryay utbay ishay otay edsshray. 

Utbay atay astlay inay ishay untraceableay evolutionsay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay osay ossedcray anday ecrossedray, anday inay aay ousandthay aysway entangleday ethay ackslay ofay ethay eethray ineslay ownay astfay otay imhay, atthay eythay oreshortenedfay, anday, ofay emselvesthay, arpedway ethay evotedday oatsbay owardstay ethay antedplay ironsay inay imhay; oughthay ownay orfay aay omentmay ethay alewhay ewdray asideay aay ittlelay, asay ifay otay allyray orfay aay oremay emendoustray argechay. Eizingsay atthay opportunityay, Ahabay irstfay aidpay outay oremay inelay: anday enthay asway apidlyray aulinghay anday erkingjay inay uponay itay again—hopingay atthay ayway otay isencumberday itay ofay omesay arls—whensnay o!—alay ightsay oremay avagesay anthay ethay embattleday eethtay ofay arksshay! 

Aughtcay anday isted—corkscrewedtway inay ethay azesmay ofay ethay inelay, ooselay arpoonshay anday anceslay, ithway allay eirthay istlingbray arbsbay anday ointspay, amecay ashingflay anday ippingdray upay otay ethay ockschay inay ethay owsbay ofay Ahab’say oatbay. Onlyay oneay ingthay ouldcay ebay oneday. Eizingsay ethay oat-knifebay, ehay iticallycray eachedray ithin—through—andway enthay, ithout—theway aysray ofay eelstay; aggeddray inay ethay inelay eyondbay, assedpay itay, inboarday, otay ethay owsmanbay, anday enthay, icetway underingsay ethay operay earnay ethay ocks—droppedchay ethay intercepteday agotfay ofay eelstay intoay ethay easay; anday asway allay astfay againay. Atthay instantay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay ademay aay uddensay ushray amongay ethay emainingray anglestay ofay ethay otheray ineslay; byay osay oingday, irresistiblyay aggeddray ethay oremay involveday oatsbay ofay Ubbstay anday Askflay owardstay ishay ukesflay; ashedday emthay ogethertay ikelay otway ollingray uskshay onay aay urf-beatensay eachbay, anday enthay, ivingday ownday intoay ethay easay, isappearedday inay aay oilingbay aelstrommay, inay ichwhay, orfay aay acespay, ethay odorousay edarcay ipschay ofay ethay eckswray ancedday oundray anday oundray, ikelay ethay atedgray utmegnay inay aay iftlysway irredstay owlbay ofay unchpay. 

Ilewhay ethay otway ewscray ereway etyay irclingcay inay ethay atersway, eachingray outay afteray ethay evolvingray ine-tubslay, oarsay, anday otheray oatingflay urniturefay, ilewhay aslopeay ittlelay Askflay obbedbay upay anday ownday ikelay anay emptyay ialvay, itchingtway ishay egslay upwardsay otay escapeay ethay eadeddray awsjay ofay arksshay; anday Ubbstay asway ustilylay ingingsay outay orfay omesay oneay otay adlelay imhay upay; anday ilewhay ethay olday an’smay ine—nowlay arting—admittedpay ofay ishay ullingpay intoay ethay eamycray oolpay otay escueray omwhay ehay ould;—incay atthay ildway imultaneousnesssay ofay aay ousandthay oncretedcay erils,—Ahab’spay etyay unstrickenay oatbay eemedsay awndray upay owardstay Eavenhay byay invisibleay ires,—asway, arrow-likeay, ootingshay erpendicularlypay omfray ethay easay, ethay Itewhay Alewhay ashedday ishay oadbray oreheadfay againstay itsay ottombay, anday entsay itay, urningtay overay anday overay, intoay ethay airay; illtay itay ellfay again—gunwaleay ownwards—andday Ahabay anday ishay enmay uggledstray outay omfray underay itay, ikelay ealssay omfray aay ea-sidesay avecay. 

Ethay irstfay uprisingay omentummay ofay ethay ale—modifyingwhay itsay irectionday asay ehay uckstray ethay urface—involuntarilysay aunchedlay imhay alongay itay, otay aay ittlelay istanceday omfray ethay entrecay ofay ethay estructionday ehay adhay ademay; anday ithway ishay ackbay otay itay, ehay ownay aylay orfay aay omentmay owlyslay eelingfay ithway ishay ukesflay omfray idesay otay idesay; anday eneverwhay aay aystray oaray, itbay ofay ankplay, ethay eastlay ipchay oray umbcray ofay ethay oatsbay ouchedtay ishay inskay, ishay ailtay iftlysway ewdray ackbay, anday amecay idewayssay itingsmay ethay easay. Utbay oonsay, asay ifay atisfiedsay atthay ishay orkway orfay atthay imetay asway oneday, ehay ushedpay ishay eatedplay oreheadfay oughthray ethay oceanay, anday ailingtray afteray imhay ethay intertangleday ineslay, ontinuedcay ishay eewardlay ayway atay aay aveller’stray ethodicmay acepay. 

Asay eforebay, ethay attentiveay ipshay avinghay escriedday ethay olewhay ightfay, againay amecay earingbay ownday otay ethay escueray, anday oppingdray aay oatbay, ickedpay upay ethay oatingflay arinersmay, ubstay, oarsay, anday ateverwhay elseay ouldcay ebay aughtcay atay, anday afelysay andedlay emthay onay erhay ecksday. Omesay ainedspray ouldersshay, istswray, anday anklesay; ividlay ontusionscay; enchedwray arpoonshay anday anceslay; inextricableay intricaciesay ofay operay; atteredshay oarsay anday anksplay; allay esethay ereway erethay; utbay onay atalfay oray evenay erioussay illay eemedsay otay avehay efallenbay anyay oneay. Asay ithway Edallahfay ethay ayday eforebay, osay Ahabay asway ownay oundfay imlygray ingingclay otay ishay oat’sbay okenbray alfhay, ichwhay affordeday aay omparativelycay easyay oatflay; ornay idday itay osay exhaustay imhay asay ethay eviouspray ay’sday ishapmay.
