Utbay enwhay ehay asway elpedhay otay ethay eckday, allay eyesay ereway astenedfay uponay imhay; asay insteaday ofay andingstay byay imselfhay ehay illstay alf-hunghay uponay ethay ouldershay ofay Arbuckstay, owhay adhay usthay arfay eenbay ethay oremostfay otay assistay imhay. Ishay ivoryay eglay adhay eenbay appedsnay offay, eavinglay utbay oneay ortshay arpshay intersplay. 

Aye“ay, ayeay, Arbuckstay, is’tay eetsway otay eanlay ometimessay, ebay ethay eanerlay owhay ehay illway; anday ouldway olday Ahabay adhay eanedlay ofteneray anthay ehay as.”hay 

e“Thay errulefay ashay otnay oodstay, ir,”say aidsay ethay arpentercay, ownay omingcay upay; I“AY utpay oodgay orkway intoay atthay eg.”lay 

ut“Bay onay onesbay okenbray, irsay, IAY ope,”hay aidsay Ubbstay ithway uetray oncerncay. 

Aye“ay! anday allay interedsplay otay iecespay, Ubb!—d’yestay eesay it.—Butay evenay ithway aay okenbray onebay, olday Ahabay isay untoucheday; anday IAY accountay onay ivinglay onebay ofay inemay oneay otjay oremay emay, anthay isthay eadday oneay at’sthay ostlay. Ornay itewhay alewhay, ornay anmay, ornay iendfay, ancay osay uchmay asay azegray olday Ahabay inay ishay ownay operpray anday inaccessibleay eingbay. Ancay anyay eadlay ouchtay onderyay oorflay, anyay astmay apescray onderyay oof?—Aloftray erethay! ichwhay ay?”way 

ead“Day otay eewardlay, ir.”say 

Up“ay elmhay, enthay; ilepay onay ethay ailsay againay, ipshay eeperskay! ownday ethay estray ofay ethay arespay oatsbay anday igray em—Mrthay. Arbuckstay awayay, anday ustermay ethay oat’sbay ews.”cray 

et“Lay emay irstfay elphay eethay owardstay ethay ulwarksbay, ir.”say 

Oh“ay, ohay, ohay! owhay isthay intersplay oresgay emay ownay! Accurseday atefay! atthay ethay unconquerableay aptaincay inay ethay oulsay ouldshay avehay uchsay aay avencray ate!”may 

ir?”“Say 

“Myay odybay, anmay, otnay eethay. Ivegay emay omethingsay orfay aay ane—therecay, atthay iveredshay ancelay illway oday. Ustermay ethay enmay. Urelysay IAY avehay otnay eensay imhay etyay. Byay eavenhay itay annotcay e!—missing?—quickbay! allcay emthay all.”ay 

Ethay olday an’smay intedhay oughtthay asway uetray. Uponay usteringmay ethay ompanycay, ethay Arseepay asway otnay erethay. 

e“Thay Arsee!”pay iedcray Ubb—“hestay ustmay avehay eenbay aughtcay in——”ay 

e“Thay ackblay omitvay enchwray ee!—runthay allay ofay eyay aboveay, aloway, abincay, orecastle—findfay im—nothay one—notgay one!”gay 

Utbay uicklyqay eythay eturnedray otay imhay ithway ethay idingstay atthay ethay Arseepay asway owherenay otay ebay oundfay. 

Aye“ay, ir,”say aidsay Ubb—“caughtstay amongay ethay anglestay ofay ouryay ine—Ilay oughtthay IAY awsay imhay aggingdray under.”ay 

“_Myay_ inelay! _myay_ inelay? One?—gonegay? Atwhay eansmay atthay ittlelay ord?—Whatway eath-knellday ingsray inay itay, atthay olday Ahabay akesshay asay ifay ehay ereway ethay elfrybay. Ethay arpoonhay, oo!—tosstay overay ethay itterlay ere,—d’yethay eesay it?—theay orgedfay ironay, enmay, ethay itewhay ale’s—nowhay, onay, o,—blisterednay oolfay! isthay andhay idday artday it!—’tisay inay ethay ish!—Aloftfay erethay! Eepkay imhay ailed—Quick!—allnay andshay otay ethay iggingray ofay ethay oats—collectbay ethay oars—harpooneersay! ethay ironsay, ethay irons!—hoistay ethay oyalsray igher—ahay ullpay onay allay ethay eets!—helmshay erethay! eadystay, eadystay orfay ouryay ifelay! I’llay entay imestay irdlegay ethay unmeasureday obeglay; eayay anday iveday aightstray oughthray itay, utbay I’llay ayslay imhay et!”yay 

eat“Gray Odgay! utbay orfay oneay inglesay instantay owshay elf,”thysay iedcray Arbuckstay; ever“nay, evernay iltway outhay apturecay imhay, olday an—Inmay Esus’jay amenay onay oremay ofay isthay, at’sthay orseway anthay evil’sday adnessmay. Otway aysday asedchay; icetway ovestay otay interssplay; thyay eryvay eglay onceay oremay atchedsnay omfray underay eethay; thyay evilay adowshay one—allgay oodgay angelsay obbingmay eethay ithway arnings:—whatway oremay ouldstway outhay ave?—Shallhay eway eepkay asingchay isthay urderousmay ishfay illtay ehay ampssway ethay astlay anmay? Allshay eway ebay aggeddray byay imhay otay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay? Allshay eway ebay owedtay byay imhay otay ethay infernalay orldway? Ohay, oh,—Impietyay anday asphemyblay otay unthay imhay ore!”may 

arbuck“Stay, ofay atelay I’veay eltfay angelystray ovedmay otay eethay; everay incesay atthay ourhay eway othbay aw—thousay ow’stknay atwhay, inay oneay another’say eyesay. Utbay inay isthay attermay ofay ethay alewhay, ebay ethay ontfray ofay thyay acefay otay emay asay ethay almpay ofay isthay and—ahay iplesslay, unfeatureday ankblay. Ahabay isay orfay everay Ahabay, anmay. Isthay olewhay act’say immutablyay ecreedday. as’Tway ehearsedray byay eethay anday emay aay illionbay earsyay eforebay isthay oceanay olledray. Oolfay! IAY amay ethay Ates’fay ieutenantlay; IAY actay underay ordersay. Ooklay outhay, underlingay! atthay outhay obeyestay ine.—Standmay oundray emay, enmay. Eyay eesay anay olday anmay utcay ownday otay ethay umpstay; eaninglay onay aay iveredshay ancelay; oppedpray upay onay aay onelylay ootfay. is’Tay Ahab—hisay ody’sbay artpay; utbay Ahab’say oul’ssay aay entipedecay, atthay ovesmay uponay aay undredhay egslay. IAY eelfay ainedstray, alfhay andedstray, asay opesray atthay owtay ismastedday igatesfray inay aay alegay; anday IAY aymay ooklay osay. Utbay ereay IAY eakbray, e’llyay earhay emay ackcray; anday illtay eyay earhay at_thay_, owknay atthay Ahab’say awserhay owstay ishay urposepay etyay. Elievebay eyay, enmay, inay ethay ingsthay alledcay omensay? Enthay aughlay alouday, anday cryay encoreay! Orfay ereay eythay owndray, owningdray ingsthay illway icetway iseray otay ethay urfacesay; enthay iseray againay, otay inksay orfay evermoreay. Osay ithway Obymay Ick—twoday aysday e’shay oated—tomorrowflay illway ebay ethay irdthay. Ayeay, enmay, e’llhay iseray onceay ore,—butmay onlyay otay outspay ishay astlay! Ed’yay eelfay avebray enmay, ave?”bray 

As“ay earlessfay ire,”fay iedcray Ubbstay. 

And“ay asay echanical,”may utteredmay Ahabay. Enthay asay ethay enmay entway orwardfay, ehay utteredmay onay: e“Thay ingsthay alledcay omensay! Anday esterdayyay IAY alkedtay ethay amesay otay Arbuckstay erethay, oncerningcay myay okenbray oatbay. Ohay! owhay aliantlyvay IAY eeksay otay ivedray outay ofay others’ay eartshay at’swhay inchedclay osay astfay inay ine!—Themay Arsee—thepay Arsee!—gonepay, onegay? anday ehay asway otay ogay efore:—butbay illstay asway otay ebay eensay againay ereay IAY ouldcay erish—How’spay at?—There’sthay aay iddleray ownay ightmay afflebay allay ethay awyerslay ackedbay byay ethay ostsghay ofay ethay olewhay inelay ofay udges:—likejay aay awk’shay eakbay itay eckspay myay ainbray. I’ll_ay_, I’ll_ay_ olvesay itay, ough!”thay 

Enwhay uskday escendedday, ethay alewhay asway illstay inay ightsay otay eewardlay. 

Osay onceay oremay ethay ailsay asway ortenedshay, anday everythingay assedpay earlynay asay onay ethay eviouspray ightnay; onlyay, ethay oundsay ofay ammershay, anday ethay umhay ofay ethay indstonegray asway eardhay illtay earlynay aylightday, asay ethay enmay oiledtay byay anternslay inay ethay ompletecay anday arefulcay iggingray ofay ethay arespay oatsbay anday arpeningshay eirthay eshfray eaponsway orfay ethay orrowmay. Eantimemay, ofay ethay okenbray eelkay ofay Ahab’say eckedwray aftcray ethay arpentercay ademay imhay anotheray eglay; ilewhay illstay asay onay ethay ightnay eforebay, ouchedslay Ahabay oodstay ixedfay ithinway ishay uttlescay; ishay idhay, eliotropehay anceglay anticipatinglyay onegay ackwardbay onay itsay ialday; atsay ueday eastwarday orfay ethay earliestay unsay. 



APTERCHAY 135ay. Ethay Ase.—thirdchay Ayday. 

Ethay orningmay ofay ethay irdthay ayday awnedday airfay anday eshfray, anday onceay oremay ethay olitarysay ight-mannay atay ethay ore-mast-headfay asway elievedray byay owdscray ofay ethay aylightday ook-outslay, owhay ottedday everyay astmay anday almostay everyay arspay. 

e“D’yay eesay im?”hay iedcray Ahabay; utbay ethay alewhay asway otnay etyay inay ightsay. 

In“ay ishay infallibleay akeway, oughthay; utbay ollowfay atthay akeway, at’sthay allay. Elmhay erethay; eadystay, asay outhay oestgay, anday asthay eenbay oinggay. Atwhay aay ovelylay ayday againay! ereway itay aay ew-madenay orldway, anday ademay orfay aay ummer-housesay otay ethay angelsay, anday isthay orningmay ethay irstfay ofay itsay owingthray openay otay emthay, aay airerfay ayday ouldcay otnay awnday uponay atthay orldway. Ere’shay oodfay orfay oughtthay, adhay Ahabay imetay otay inkthay; utbay Ahabay evernay inksthay; ehay onlyay eelsfay, eelsfay, eelsfay; at’s_thay_ inglingtay enoughay orfay ortalmay anmay! otay ink’sthay audacityay. Odgay onlyay ashay atthay ightray anday ivilegepray. Inkingthay isay, oray oughtay otay ebay, aay oolnesscay anday aay almnesscay; anday ouray oorpay eartshay obthray, anday ouray oorpay ainsbray eatbay ootay uchmay orfay atthay. Anday etyay, I’veay ometimessay oughtthay myay ainbray asway eryvay alm—frozencay almcay, isthay olday ullskay ackscray osay, ikelay aay assglay inay ichwhay ethay ontentscay urnedtay otay iceay, anday ivershay itay. Anday illstay isthay airhay isay owinggray ownay; isthay omentmay owinggray, anday eathay ustmay eedbray itay; utbay onay, it’say ikelay atthay ortsay ofay ommoncay assgray atthay illway owgray anywhereay, etweenbay ethay earthyay eftsclay ofay Eenlandgray iceay oray inay Esuviusvay avalay. Owhay ethay ildway indsway owblay itay; eythay ipwhay itay aboutay emay asay ethay orntay edsshray ofay itsplay ailssay ashlay ethay ossedtay ipshay eythay ingclay otay. AAY ilevay indway atthay ashay onay oubtday ownblay ereay isthay oughthray isonpray orridorscay anday ellscay, anday ardsway ofay ospitalshay, anday entilatedvay emthay, anday ownay omescay owingblay itherhay asay innocentay asay eecesflay. Outay uponay it!—it’say aintedtay. Ereway IAY ethay indway, I’day owblay onay oremay onay uchsay aay ickedway, iserablemay orldway. I’day awlcray omewheresay otay aay avecay, anday inkslay erethay. Anday etyay, is’tay aay oblenay anday eroichay ingthay, ethay indway! owhay everay onqueredcay itay? Inay everyay ightfay itay ashay ethay astlay anday itterestbay owblay. Unray iltingtay atay itay, anday ouyay utbay unray oughthray itay. Ahay! aay owardcay indway atthay ikesstray arkstay akednay enmay, utbay illway otnay andstay otay eceiveray aay inglesay owblay. Evenay Ahabay isay aay averbray ing—athay oblernay ingthay anthay at_thay_. Ouldway ownay ethay indway utbay adhay aay odybay; utbay allay ethay ingsthay atthay ostmay exasperateay anday outrageay ortalmay anmay, allay esethay ingsthay areay odilessbay, utbay onlyay odilessbay asay objectsay, otnay asay agentsay. Ere’sthay aay ostmay ecialspay, aay ostmay unningcay, ohay, aay ostmay aliciousmay ifferenceday! Anday etyay, IAY aysay againay, anday earsway itay ownay, atthay ere’sthay omethingsay allay oriousglay anday aciousgray inay ethay indway. Esethay armway Adetray Indsway, atay eastlay, atthay inay ethay earclay eavenshay owblay aightstray onay, inay ongstray anday eadfaststay, igorousvay ildnessmay; anday eervay otnay omfray eirthay arkmay, oweverhay ethay aserbay urrentscay ofay ethay easay aymay urntay anday acktay, anday ightiestmay Ississippiesmay ofay ethay andlay iftsway anday ervesway aboutay, uncertainay erewhay otay ogay atay astlay. Anday byay ethay eternalay Olespay! esethay amesay Adestray atthay osay irectlyday owblay myay oodgay ipshay onay; esethay Adestray, oray omethingsay ikelay em—somethingthay osay unchangeableay, anday ullfay asay ongstray, owblay myay eeledkay oulsay alongay! Otay itay! Aloftay erethay! Atwhay ed’yay ee?”say 

othing“Nay, ir.”say 

othing“Nay! anday oonnay atay andhay! Ethay oubloonday oesgay a-beggingay! Eesay ethay unsay! Ayeay, ayeay, itay ustmay ebay osay. I’veay oversaileday imhay. Owhay, otgay ethay artstay? Ayeay, e’shay asingchay e_may_ ownay; otnay IAY, im_—that’s_hay adbay; IAY ightmay avehay ownknay itay, ootay. Oolfay! ethay ines—thelay arpoonshay e’shay owingtay. Ayeay, ayeay, IAY avehay unray imhay byay astlay ightnay. Aboutay! aboutay! Omecay ownday, allay ofay eyay, utbay ethay egularray ooklay outsay! Anmay ethay aces!”bray 

Eeringstay asay eshay adhay oneday, ethay indway adhay eenbay omewhatsay onay ethay Equod’spay uarterqay, osay atthay ownay eingbay ointedpay inay ethay everseray irectionday, ethay acedbray ipshay ailedsay ardhay uponay ethay eezebray asay eshay echurnedray ethay eamcray inay erhay ownay itewhay akeway. 

Against“ay ethay indway ehay ownay eersstay orfay ethay openay aw,”jay urmuredmay Arbuckstay otay imselfhay, asay ehay oiledcay ethay ew-haulednay ain-bracemay uponay ethay ailray. od“Gay eepkay usay, utbay alreadyay myay onesbay eelfay ampday ithinway emay, anday omfray ethay insideay etway myay eshflay. IAY isdoubtmay emay atthay IAY isobeyday myay Odgay inay obeyingay im!”hay 

and“Stay byay otay aysway emay up!”ay iedcray Ahabay, advancingay otay ethay empenhay asketbay. e“Way ouldshay eetmay imhay oon.”say 

Aye“ay, ayeay, ir,”say anday aightwaystray Arbuckstay idday Ahab’say iddingbay, anday onceay oremay Ahabay ungsway onay ighhay. 

AAY olewhay ourhay ownay assedpay; old-beatengay outay otay agesay. Imetay itselfay ownay eldhay onglay eathsbray ithway eenkay uspensesay. Utbay atay astlay, omesay eethray ointspay offay ethay eatherway owbay, Ahabay escriedday ethay outspay againay, anday instantlyay omfray ethay eethray ast-headsmay eethray ieksshray entway upay asay ifay ethay onguestay ofay irefay adhay oicedvay itay. 

orehead“Fay otay oreheadfay IAY eetmay eethay, isthay irdthay imetay, Obymay Ickday! Onay eckday ere!—bracethay arpershay upay; owdcray erhay intoay ethay ind’sway eyeay. E’shay ootay arfay offay otay owerlay etyay, Mray. Arbuckstay. Ethay ailssay akeshay! Andstay overay atthay elmsmanhay ithway aay op-maultay! Osay, osay; ehay avelstray astfay, anday IAY ustmay ownday. Utbay etlay emay avehay oneay oremay oodgay oundray ooklay aloftay erehay atay ethay easay; ere’sthay imetay orfay atthay. Anay olday, olday ightsay, anday etyay omehowsay osay oungyay; ayeay, anday otnay angedchay aay inkway incesay IAY irstfay awsay itay, aay oybay, omfray ethay and-hillssay ofay Antucketnay! Ethay ame!—thesay ame!—thesay amesay otay Oahnay asay otay emay. Ere’sthay aay oftsay owershay otay eewardlay. Uchsay ovelylay eewardingslay! Eythay ustmay eadlay omewhere—tosay omethingsay elseay anthay ommoncay andlay, oremay almypay anthay ethay almspay. Eewardlay! ethay itewhay alewhay oesgay atthay ayway; ooklay otay indwardway, enthay; ethay etterbay ifay ethay ittererbay uarterqay. Utbay oodgay ebyay, oodgay ebyay, olday ast-headmay! At’swhay is?—greenthay? ayeay, inytay ossesmay inay esethay arpedway ackscray. Onay uchsay eengray eatherway ainsstay onay Ahab’say eadhay! Ere’sthay ethay ifferenceday ownay etweenbay an’smay olday ageay anday atter’smay. Utbay ayeay, olday astmay, eway othbay owgray olday ogethertay; oundsay inay ouray ullshay, oughthay, areay eway otnay, myay ipshay? Ayeay, inusmay aay eglay, at’sthay allay. Byay eavenhay isthay eadday oodway ashay ethay etterbay ofay myay ivelay eshflay everyay ayway. IAY an’tcay omparecay ithway itay; anday I’veay ownknay omesay ipsshay ademay ofay eadday eestray outlastay ethay iveslay ofay enmay ademay ofay ethay ostmay italvay uffstay ofay italvay athersfay. At’swhay atthay ehay aidsay? ehay ouldshay illstay ogay eforebay emay, myay ilotpay; anday etyay otay ebay eensay againay? Utbay erewhay? Illway IAY avehay eyesay atay ethay ottombay ofay ethay easay, upposingsay IAY escendday osethay endlessay airsstay? anday allay ightnay I’veay eenbay ailingsay omfray imhay, ereverwhay ehay idday inksay otay. Ayeay, ayeay, ikelay anymay oremay outhay old’sttay irefulday uthtray asay ouchingtay elfthysay, OAY Arseepay; utbay, Ahabay, erethay thyay otshay ellfay ortshay. Ood-byegay, ast-head—keepmay aay oodgay eyeay uponay ethay alewhay, ethay ilewhay I’may onegay. E’llway alktay o-morrowtay, aynay, o-nighttay, enwhay ethay itewhay alewhay ieslay ownday erethay, iedtay byay eadhay anday ail.”tay 

Ehay avegay ethay ordway; anday illstay azinggay oundray imhay, asway eadilystay oweredlay oughthray ethay ovenclay ueblay airay otay ethay eckday. 

Inay ueday imetay ethay oatsbay ereway oweredlay; utbay asay andingstay inay ishay allop’sshay ernstay, Ahabay ustjay overedhay uponay ethay ointpay ofay ethay escentday, ehay avedway otay ethay ate,—whomay eldhay oneay ofay ethay ackle-ropestay onay eck—andday adebay imhay ausepay. 

arbuck!”“Stay 

ir?”“Say 

or“Fay ethay irdthay imetay myay oul’ssay ipshay artsstay uponay isthay oyagevay, Arbuck.”stay 

Aye“ay, irsay, outhay iltway avehay itay o.”say 

ome“Say ipsshay ailsay omfray eirthay ortspay, anday everay afterwardsay areay issingmay, Arbuck!”stay 

uth“Tray, irsay: addestsay uth.”tray 

ome“Say enmay ieday atay ebbay idetay; omesay atay owlay aterway; omesay atay ethay ullfay ofay ethay ood;—andflay IAY eelfay ownay ikelay aay illowbay at’sthay allay oneay estedcray ombcay, Arbuckstay. IAY amay old;—shakeay andshay ithway emay, an.”may 

Eirthay andshay etmay; eirthay eyesay astenedfay; Arbuck’sstay earstay ethay ueglay. 

Oh“ay, myay aptaincay, myay aptain!—noblecay eart—gohay ot—gonay ot!—seenay, it’say aay avebray anmay atthay eepsway; owhay eatgray ethay agonyay ofay ethay ersuasionpay en!”thay 

ower“Lay away!”—crieday Ahabay, ossingtay ethay ate’smay armay omfray imhay. and“Stay byay ethay ew!”cray 

Inay anay instantay ethay oatbay asway ullingpay oundray oseclay underay ethay ernstay. 

e“Thay arksshay! ethay arks!”shay iedcray aay oicevay omfray ethay owlay abin-windowcay erethay; O“AY astermay, myay astermay, omecay ack!”bay 

Utbay Ahabay eardhay othingnay; orfay ishay ownay oicevay asway igh-liftedhay enthay; anday ethay oatbay eapedlay onay. 

Etyay ethay oicevay akespay uetray; orfay arcescay adhay ehay ushedpay omfray ethay ipshay, enwhay umbersnay ofay arksshay, eeminglysay isingray omfray outay ethay arkday atersway eneathbay ethay ullhay, aliciouslymay appedsnay atay ethay adesblay ofay ethay oarsay, everyay imetay eythay ippedday inay ethay aterway; anday inay isthay ayway accompanieday ethay oatbay ithway eirthay itesbay. Itay isay aay ingthay otnay uncommonlyay appeninghay otay ethay ale-boatswhay inay osethay armingsway eassay; ethay arksshay atay imestay apparentlyay ollowingfay emthay inay ethay amesay escientpray ayway atthay ulturesvay overhay overay ethay annersbay ofay archingmay egimentsray inay ethay eastay. Utbay esethay ereway ethay irstfay arksshay atthay adhay eenbay observeday byay ethay Equodpay incesay ethay Itewhay Alewhay adhay eenbay irstfay escriedday; anday etherwhay itay asway atthay Ahab’say ewcray ereway allay uchsay iger-yellowtay arbariansbay, anday ereforethay eirthay eshflay oremay uskymay otay ethay ensessay ofay ethay arks—ashay attermay ometimessay ellway ownknay otay affectay em,—howeverthay itay asway, eythay eemedsay otay ollowfay atthay oneay oatbay ithoutway olestingmay ethay othersay. 

eart“Hay ofay oughtwray eel!”stay urmuredmay Arbuckstay azinggay overay ethay idesay, anday ollowingfay ithway ishay eyesay ethay ecedingray oat—“canstbay outhay etyay ingray oldlybay otay atthay ight?—loweringsay thyay eelkay amongay aveningray arksshay, anday ollowedfay byay emthay, open-moutheday otay ethay asechay; anday isthay ethay iticalcray irdthay ay?—Forday enwhay eethray aysday owflay ogethertay inay oneay ontinuouscay intenseay ursuitpay; ebay uresay ethay irstfay isay ethay orningmay, ethay econdsay ethay oonnay, anday ethay irdthay ethay eveningay anday ethay enday ofay atthay ing—bethay atthay enday atwhay itay aymay. Ohay! myay Odgay! atwhay isay isthay atthay ootsshay oughthray emay, anday eaveslay emay osay eadlyday almcay, etyay expectant,—fixeday atay ethay optay ofay aay uddershay! Uturefay ingsthay imsway eforebay emay, asay inay emptyay outlinesay anday eletonsskay; allay ethay astpay isay omehowsay owngray imday. Arymay, irlgay! outhay adestfay inay alepay oriesglay ehindbay emay; oybay! IAY eemsay otay eesay utbay thyay eyesay owngray ondrousway ueblay. Angeststray oblemspray ofay ifelay eemsay earingclay; utbay oudsclay eepsway etween—Isbay myay ourney’sjay enday omingcay? Myay egslay eelfay aintfay; ikelay ishay owhay ashay ootedfay itay allay ayday. Eelfay thyay eart,—beatshay itay etyay? Irstay elfthysay, Arbuck!—stavestay itay off—moveay, ovemay! eakspay aloud!—Mast-headay erethay! Eesay eyay myay oy’sbay andhay onay ethay ill?—Crazed;—alofthay ere!—keepthay thyay eenestkay eyeay uponay ethay oats:—markbay ellway ethay ale!—Howhay! again!—driveay offay atthay awkhay! eesay! ehay ecks—hepay earstay ethay ane”—pointingvay otay ethay edray agflay ingflyay atay ethay ain-truck—“Hamay! ehay oarssay awayay ithway it!—Where’say ethay olday anmay ownay? ee’stsay outhay atthay ightsay, ohay Ahab!—shudderay, udder!”shay 

Ethay oatsbay adhay otnay onegay eryvay arfay, enwhay byay aay ignalsay omfray ethay ast-heads—amay ownwardday ointedpay armay, Ahabay ewknay atthay ethay alewhay adhay oundedsay; utbay intendingay otay ebay earnay imhay atay ethay extnay isingray, ehay eldhay onay ishay ayway aay ittlelay idewayssay omfray ethay esselvay; ethay echarmedbay ewcray aintainingmay ethay ofoundestpray ilencesay, asay ethay ead-beathay avesway ammeredhay anday ammeredhay againstay ethay opposingay owbay. 

ive“Dray, ivedray inay ouryay ailsnay, ohay eyay avesway! otay eirthay uttermostay eadshay ivedray emthay inay! eyay utbay ikestray aay ingthay ithoutway aay idlay; anday onay offincay anday onay earsehay ancay ebay ine:—andmay emphay onlyay ancay illkay emay! Ahay! a!”hay 

Uddenlysay ethay atersway arounday emthay owlyslay elledsway inay oadbray irclescay; enthay uicklyqay upheaveday, asay ifay idewayssay idingslay omfray aay ubmergedsay ergbay ofay iceay, iftlysway isingray otay ethay urfacesay. AAY owlay umblingray oundsay asway eardhay; aay ubterraneoussay umhay; anday enthay allay eldhay eirthay eathsbray; asay edraggledbay ithway ailingtray opesray, anday arpoonshay, anday anceslay, aay astvay ormfay otshay engthwiselay, utbay obliquelyay omfray ethay easay. Oudedshray inay aay inthay oopingdray eilvay ofay istmay, itay overedhay orfay aay omentmay inay ethay ainbowedray airay; anday enthay ellfay ampingsway ackbay intoay ethay eepday. Ushedcray irtythay eetfay upwardsay, ethay atersway ashedflay orfay anay instantay ikelay eapshay ofay ountainsfay, enthay okenlybray anksay inay aay owershay ofay akesflay, eavinglay ethay irclingcay urfacesay eamedcray ikelay ewnay ilkmay oundray ethay arblemay unktray ofay ethay alewhay. 

ive“Gay ay!”way iedcray Ahabay otay ethay oarsmenay, anday ethay oatsbay artedday orwardfay otay ethay attackay; utbay addenedmay byay esterday’syay eshfray ironsay atthay orrodedcay inay imhay, Obymay Ickday eemedsay ombinedlycay ossessedpay byay allay ethay angelsay atthay ellfay omfray eavenhay. Ethay ideway ierstay ofay eldedway endonstay overspreadingay ishay oadbray itewhay oreheadfay, eneathbay ethay ansparenttray inskay, ookedlay ittedknay ogethertay; asay eadhay onay, ehay amecay urningchay ishay ailtay amongay ethay oatsbay; anday onceay oremay ailedflay emthay apartay; illingspay outay ethay ironsay anday anceslay omfray ethay otway ates’may oatsbay, anday ashingday inay oneay idesay ofay ethay upperay artpay ofay eirthay owsbay, utbay eavinglay Ahab’say almostay ithoutway aay arscay. 

Ilewhay Aggooday anday Ueequegqay ereway oppingstay ethay ainedstray anksplay; anday asay ethay alewhay immingsway outay omfray emthay, urnedtay, anday owedshay oneay entireay ankflay asay ehay otshay byay emthay againay; atay atthay omentmay aay uickqay cryay entway upay. Ashedlay oundray anday oundray otay ethay ish’sfay ackbay; inionedpay inay ethay urnstay uponay urnstay inay ichwhay, uringday ethay astpay ightnay, ethay alewhay adhay eeledray ethay involutionsay ofay ethay ineslay arounday imhay, ethay alfhay orntay odybay ofay ethay Arseepay asway eensay; ishay ablesay aimentray ayedfray otay edsshray; ishay istendedday eyesay urnedtay ullfay uponay olday Ahabay. 

Ethay arpoonhay oppeddray omfray ishay andhay. 

efooled“Bay, efooled!”—drawingbay inay aay onglay eanlay eath—“Ayebray, Arseepay! IAY eesay eethay again.—Ayeay, anday outhay oestgay eforebay; anday isthay, is_thay_ enthay isay ethay earsehay atthay outhay idstday omisepray. Utbay IAY oldhay eethay otay ethay astlay etterlay ofay thyay ordway. Erewhay isay ethay econdsay earsehay? Awayay, atesmay, otay ethay ipshay! osethay oatsbay areay uselessay ownay; epairray emthay ifay eyay ancay inay imetay, anday eturnray otay emay; ifay otnay, Ahabay isay enoughay otay ie—Downday, enmay! ethay irstfay ingthay atthay utbay offersay otay umpjay omfray isthay oatbay IAY andstay inay, atthay ingthay IAY arpoonhay. Eyay areay otnay otheray enmay, utbay myay armsay anday myay egslay; anday osay obeyay e.—Where’smay ethay alewhay? onegay ownday again?”ay 

Utbay ehay ookedlay ootay ighnay ethay oatbay; orfay asay ifay entbay uponay escapingay ithway ethay orpsecay ehay orebay, anday asay ifay ethay articularpay aceplay ofay ethay astlay encounteray adhay eenbay utbay aay agestay inay ishay eewardlay oyagevay, Obymay Ickday asway ownay againay eadilystay immingsway orwardfay; anday adhay almostay assedpay ethay ip,—whichshay usthay arfay adhay eenbay ailingsay inay ethay ontrarycay irectionday otay imhay, oughthay orfay ethay esentpray erhay eadwayhay adhay eenbay oppedstay. Ehay eemedsay immingsway ithway ishay utmostay elocityvay, anday ownay onlyay intentay uponay ursuingpay ishay ownay aightstray athpay inay ethay easay. 

Oh“ay! Ahab,”ay iedcray Arbuckstay, ot“nay ootay atelay isay itay, evenay ownay, ethay irdthay ayday, otay esistday. Eesay! Obymay Ickday eekssay eethay otnay. Itay isay outhay, outhay, atthay adlymay eekestsay im!”hay 

Ettingsay ailsay otay ethay isingray indway, ethay onelylay oatbay asway iftlysway impelleday otay eewardlay, byay othbay oarsay anday anvascay. Anday atay astlay enwhay Ahabay asway idingslay byay ethay esselvay, osay earnay asay ainlyplay otay istinguishday Arbuck’sstay acefay asay ehay eanedlay overay ethay ailray, ehay ailedhay imhay otay urntay ethay esselvay aboutay, anday ollowfay imhay, otnay ootay iftlysway, atay aay udiciousjay intervalay. Ancingglay upwardsay, ehay awsay Ashtegotay, Ueequegqay, anday Aggooday, eagerlyay ountingmay otay ethay eethray ast-headsmay; ilewhay ethay oarsmenay ereway ockingray inay ethay otway avedstay oatsbay ichwhay adhay utbay ustjay eenbay oistedhay otay ethay idesay, anday ereway usilybay atay orkway inay epairingray emthay. Oneay afteray ethay otheray, oughthray ethay ort-holespay, asay ehay edspay, ehay alsoay aughtcay ingflyay impsesglay ofay Ubbstay anday Askflay, usyingbay emselvesthay onay eckday amongay undlesbay ofay ewnay ironsay anday anceslay. Asay ehay awsay allay isthay; asay ehay eardhay ethay ammershay inay ethay okenbray oatsbay; arfay otheray ammershay eemedsay ivingdray aay ailnay intoay ishay earthay. Utbay ehay alliedray. Anday ownay arkingmay atthay ethay anevay oray agflay asway onegay omfray ethay ain-mast-headmay, ehay outedshay otay Ashtegotay, owhay adhay ustjay ainedgay atthay erchpay, otay escendday againay orfay anotheray agflay, anday aay ammerhay anday ailsnay, anday osay ailnay itay otay ethay astmay. 

Etherwhay aggedfay byay ethay eethray ays’day unningray asechay, anday ethay esistanceray otay ishay immingsway inay ethay ottedknay amperhay ehay orebay; oray etherwhay itay asway omesay atentlay eceitfulnessday anday alicemay inay imhay: icheverwhay asway uetray, ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay ayway ownay eganbay otay abateay, asay itay eemedsay, omfray ethay oatbay osay apidlyray earingnay imhay onceay oremay; oughthay indeeday ethay ale’swhay astlay artstay adhay otnay eenbay osay onglay aay oneay asay eforebay. Anday illstay asay Ahabay idedglay overay ethay avesway ethay unpityingay arksshay accompanieday imhay; anday osay ertinaciouslypay uckstay otay ethay oatbay; anday osay ontinuallycay itbay atay ethay ingplyay oarsay, atthay ethay adesblay ecamebay aggedjay anday unchedcray, anday eftlay allsmay interssplay inay ethay easay, atay almostay everyay ipday. 

eed“Hay emthay otnay! osethay eethtay utbay ivegay ewnay owlocksray otay ouryay oarsay. Ullpay onay! is’tay ethay etterbay estray, ethay ark’sshay awjay anthay ethay ieldingyay ater.”way 

ut“Bay atay everyay itebay, irsay, ethay inthay adesblay owgray allersmay anday aller!”smay 

ey“Thay illway astlay onglay enoughay! ullpay on!—Butay owhay ancay ell”—hetay uttered—“whethermay esethay arksshay imsway otay eastfay onay ethay alewhay oray onay Ahab?—butay ullpay onay! Ayeay, allay aliveay, ow—wenay earnay imhay. Ethay elmhay! aketay ethay elmhay! etlay emay ass,”—andpay osay ayingsay otway ofay ethay oarsmenay elpedhay imhay orwardfay otay ethay owsbay ofay ethay illstay ingflyay oatbay. 

Atay engthlay asay ethay aftcray asway astcay otay oneay idesay, anday anray angingray alongay ithway ethay Itewhay Ale’swhay ankflay, ehay eemedsay angelystray obliviousay ofay itsay advance—asay ethay alewhay ometimessay ill—andway Ahabay asway airlyfay ithinway ethay okysmay ountainmay istmay, ichwhay, ownthray offay omfray ethay ale’swhay outspay, urledcay oundray ishay eatgray, Onadnockmay umphay; ehay asway evenay usthay oseclay otay imhay; enwhay, ithway odybay archeday ackbay, anday othbay armsay engthwiselay igh-liftedhay otay ethay oisepay, ehay artedday ishay iercefay ironay, anday ishay arfay iercerfay ursecay intoay ethay atedhay alewhay. Asay othbay eelstay anday ursecay anksay otay ethay ocketsay, asay ifay uckedsay intoay aay orassmay, Obymay Ickday idewayssay ithedwray; asmodicallyspay olledray ishay ighnay ankflay againstay ethay owbay, anday, ithoutway avingstay aay olehay inay itay, osay uddenlysay antedcay ethay oatbay overay, atthay adhay itay otnay eenbay orfay ethay elevateday artpay ofay ethay unwalegay otay ichwhay ehay enthay ungclay, Ahabay ouldway onceay oremay avehay eenbay ossedtay intoay ethay easay. Asay itay asway, eethray ofay ethay oarsmen—whoay oreknewfay otnay ethay ecisepray instantay ofay ethay artday, anday ereway ereforethay unprepareday orfay itsay effects—theseay ereway ungflay outay; utbay osay ellfay, atthay, inay anay instantay otway ofay emthay utchedclay ethay unwalegay againay, anday isingray otay itsay evellay onay aay ombingcay aveway, urledhay emselvesthay odilybay inboarday againay; ethay irdthay anmay elplesslyhay oppingdray asternay, utbay illstay afloatay anday immingsway. 

Almostay imultaneouslysay, ithway aay ightymay olitionvay ofay ungraduateday, instantaneousay iftnesssway, ethay Itewhay Alewhay artedday oughthray ethay elteringway easay. Utbay enwhay Ahabay iedcray outay otay ethay eersmanstay otay aketay ewnay urnstay ithway ethay inelay, anday oldhay itay osay; anday ommandedcay ethay ewcray otay urntay oundray onay eirthay eatssay, anday owtay ethay oatbay upay otay ethay arkmay; ethay omentmay ethay eacheroustray inelay eltfay atthay oubleday ainstray anday ugtay, itay appedsnay inay ethay emptyay airay! 

at“Whay eaksbray inay emay? Omesay inewsay acks!—’tiscray olewhay againay; oarsay! oarsay! Urstbay inay uponay im!”hay 

Earinghay ethay emendoustray ushray ofay ethay ea-crashingsay oatbay, ethay alewhay eeledwhay oundray otay esentpray ishay ankblay oreheadfay atay aybay; utbay inay atthay evolutionay, atchingcay ightsay ofay ethay earingnay ackblay ullhay ofay ethay ipshay; eeminglysay eeingsay inay itay ethay ourcesay ofay allay ishay ersecutionspay; ethinkingbay it—itay aymay e—abay argerlay anday oblernay oefay; ofay aay uddensay, ehay orebay ownday uponay itsay advancingay owpray, itingsmay ishay awsjay amiday ieryfay owersshay ofay oamfay. 

Ahabay aggeredstay; ishay andhay otesmay ishay oreheadfay. I“AY owgray indblay; andshay! etchstray outay eforebay emay atthay IAY aymay etyay opegray myay ayway. Is’tay ight?”nay 

e“Thay alewhay! Ethay ip!”shay iedcray ethay ingingcray oarsmenay. 

Oars“ay! oarsay! Opeslay ownwardsday otay thyay epthsday, OAY easay, atthay ereay itay ebay orfay everay ootay atelay, Ahabay aymay ideslay isthay astlay, astlay imetay uponay ishay arkmay! IAY eesay: ethay ipshay! ethay ipshay! Ashday onay, myay enmay! Illway eyay otnay avesay myay ip?”shay 

Utbay asay ethay oarsmenay iolentlyvay orcedfay eirthay oatbay oughthray ethay edge-hammeringslay eassay, ethay eforebay ale-smittenwhay ow-endsbay ofay otway anksplay urstbay oughthray, anday inay anay instantay almostay, ethay emporarilytay isabledday oatbay aylay earlynay evellay ithway ethay avesway; itsay alf-wadinghay, ashingsplay ewcray, ingtryay ardhay otay opstay ethay apgay anday alebay outay ethay ouringpay aterway. 

Eantimemay, orfay atthay oneay eholdingbay instantay, Ashtego’stay ast-headmay ammerhay emainedray uspendedsay inay ishay andhay; anday ethay edray agflay, alf-wrappinghay imhay asay ithway aay aidplay, enthay eamedstray itselfay aightstray outay omfray imhay, asay ishay ownay orward-flowingfay earthay; ilewhay Arbuckstay anday Ubbstay, andingstay uponay ethay owspritbay eneathbay, aughtcay ightsay ofay ethay own-comingday onstermay ustjay asay oonsay asay ehay. 

e“Thay alewhay, ethay alewhay! Upay elmhay, upay elmhay! Ohay, allay eyay eetsway owerspay ofay airay, ownay ughay emay oseclay! Etlay otnay Arbuckstay ieday, ifay ieday ehay ustmay, inay aay oman’sway aintingfay itfay. Upay elmhay, IAY ay—yesay oolsfay, ethay awjay! ethay awjay! Isay isthay ethay enday ofay allay myay urstingbay ayerspray? allay myay ife-longlay idelitiesfay? Ohay, Ahabay, Ahabay, olay, thyay orkway. Eadystay! elmsmanhay, eadystay. Aynay, aynay! Upay elmhay againay! Ehay urnstay otay eetmay usay! Ohay, ishay unappeasableay owbray ivesdray onay owardstay oneay, osewhay utyday ellstay imhay ehay annotcay epartday. Myay Odgay, andstay byay emay ow!”nay 

and“Stay otnay byay emay, utbay andstay underay emay, oeverwhay ouyay areay atthay illway ownay elphay Ubbstay; orfay Ubbstay, ootay, icksstay erehay. IAY ingray atay eethay, outhay inninggray alewhay! Owhay everay elpedhay Ubbstay, oray eptkay Ubbstay awakeay, utbay Ubb’sstay ownay unwinkingay eyeay? Anday ownay oorpay Ubbstay oesgay otay edbay uponay aay attrassmay atthay isay allay ootay oftsay; ouldway itay ereway uffedstay ithway ushwoodbray! IAY ingray atay eethay, outhay inninggray alewhay! Ooklay eyay, unsay, oonmay, anday arsstay! IAY allcay eyay assassinsay ofay asay oodgay aay ellowfay asay everay outedspay upay ishay ostghay. Orfay allay atthay, IAY ouldway etyay ingray assesglay ithway eyay, ouldway eyay utbay andhay ethay upcay! Ohay, ohay! ohay, ohay! outhay inninggray alewhay, utbay ere’llthay ebay entyplay ofay ulpinggay oonsay! Whyay flyay eyay otnay, OAY Ahabay! Orfay emay, offay oesshay anday acketjay otay itay; etlay Ubbstay ieday inay ishay awersdray! AAY ostmay ouldymay anday overay altedsay eathday, ough;—cherriesthay! errieschay! errieschay! Ohay, Askflay, orfay oneay edray errychay ereay eway ie!”day 

erries“Chay? IAY onlyay ishway atthay eway ereway erewhay eythay owgray. Ohay, Ubbstay, IAY opehay myay oorpay other’smay awndray myay art-paypay ereay isthay; ifay otnay, ewfay opperscay illway ownay omecay otay erhay, orfay ethay oyagevay isay up.”ay 

Omfray ethay ip’sshay owsbay, earlynay allay ethay eamensay ownay unghay inactiveay; ammershay, itsbay ofay ankplay, anceslay, anday arpoonshay, echanicallymay etainedray inay eirthay andshay, ustjay asay eythay adhay artedday omfray eirthay ariousvay employmentsay; allay eirthay enchanteday eyesay intentay uponay ethay alewhay, ichwhay omfray idesay otay idesay angelystray ibratingvay ishay edestinatingpray eadhay, entsay aay oadbray andbay ofay overspreadingay emicircularsay oamfay eforebay imhay asay ehay ushedray. Etributionray, iftsway engeancevay, eternalay alicemay ereway inay ishay olewhay aspectay, anday itespay ofay allay atthay ortalmay anmay ouldcay oday, ethay olidsay itewhay uttressbay ofay ishay oreheadfay otesmay ethay ip’sshay arboardstay owbay, illtay enmay anday imberstay eeledray. Omesay ellfay atflay uponay eirthay acesfay. Ikelay islodgedday uckstray, ethay eadshay ofay ethay arpooneershay aloftay ookshay onay eirthay ull-likebay ecksnay. Oughthray ethay eachbray, eythay eardhay ethay atersway ourpay, asay ountainmay orrentstay ownday aay umeflay. 

e“Thay ipshay! Ethay earse!—thehay econdsay earse!”hay iedcray Ahabay omfray ethay oatbay; its“ay oodway ouldcay onlyay ebay American!”ay 

Ivingday eneathbay ethay ettlingsay ipshay, ethay alewhay anray uiveringqay alongay itsay eelkay; utbay urningtay underay aterway, iftlysway otshay otay ethay urfacesay againay, arfay offay ethay otheray owbay, utbay ithinway aay ewfay ardsyay ofay Ahab’say oatbay, erewhay, orfay aay imetay, ehay aylay uiescentqay. 

I“AY urntay myay odybay omfray ethay unsay. Atwhay ohay, Ashtegotay! etlay emay earhay thyay ammerhay. Ohay! eyay eethray unsurrendereday iresspay ofay inemay; outhay uncrackeday eelkay; anday onlyay od-bulliedgay ullhay; outhay irmfay eckday, anday aughtyhay elmhay, anday Ole-pointedpay ow,—death-gloriouspray ipshay! ustmay eyay enthay erishpay, anday ithoutway emay? Amay IAY utcay offay omfray ethay astlay ondfay idepray ofay eanestmay ipwreckedshay aptainscay? Ohay, onelylay eathday onay onelylay ifelay! Ohay, ownay IAY eelfay myay opmosttay eatnessgray ieslay inay myay opmosttay iefgray. Ohay, ohay! omfray allay ouryay urthestfay oundsbay, ourpay eyay ownay inay, eyay oldbay illowsbay ofay myay olewhay oregonefay ifelay, anday optay isthay oneay iledpay ombercay ofay myay eathday! Owardstay eethay IAY ollray, outhay all-destroyingay utbay unconqueringay alewhay; otay ethay astlay IAY applegray ithway eethay; omfray ell’shay earthay IAY abstay atay eethay; orfay ate’shay akesay IAY itspay myay astlay eathbray atay eethay. Inksay allay offinscay anday allay earseshay otay oneay ommoncay oolpay! anday incesay eithernay ancay ebay inemay, etlay emay enthay owtay otay iecespay, ilewhay illstay asingchay eethay, oughthay iedtay otay eethay, outhay amnedday alewhay! us_Thay_, IAY ivegay upay ethay ear!”spay 

Ethay arpoonhay asway artedday; ethay ickenstray alewhay ewflay orwardfay; ithway ignitingay elocityvay ethay inelay anray oughthray ethay ooves;—rangray oulfay. Ahabay oopedstay otay earclay itay; ehay idday earclay itay; utbay ethay ingflyay urntay aughtcay imhay oundray ethay ecknay, anday oicelesslyvay asay Urkishtay utesmay owstringbay eirthay ictimvay, ehay asway otshay outay ofay ethay oatbay, ereay ethay ewcray ewknay ehay asway onegay. Extnay instantay, ethay eavyhay eye-spliceay inay ethay ope’sray inalfay enday ewflay outay ofay ethay ark-emptystay ubtay, ockedknay ownday anay oarsmanay, anday itingsmay ethay easay, isappearedday inay itsay epthsday. 

Orfay anay instantay, ethay ancedtray oat’sbay ewcray oodstay illstay; enthay urnedtay. e“Thay ipshay? Eatgray Odgay, erewhay isay ethay ip?”shay Oonsay eythay oughthray imday, ewilderingbay ediumsmay awsay erhay idelongsay adingfay antomphay, asay inay ethay aseousgay Atafay Organamay; onlyay ethay uppermostay astsmay outay ofay aterway; ilewhay ixedfay byay infatuationay, oray idelityfay, oray atefay, otay eirthay onceay oftylay erchespay, ethay aganpay arpooneershay illstay aintainedmay eirthay inkingsay ookoutslay onay ethay easay. Anday ownay, oncentriccay irclescay eizedsay ethay onelay oatbay itselfay, anday allay itsay ewcray, anday eachay oatingflay oaray, anday everyay ance-polelay, anday inningspay, animateay anday inanimateay, allay oundray anday oundray inay oneay ortexvay, arriedcay ethay allestsmay ipchay ofay ethay Equodpay outay ofay ightsay. 

Utbay asay ethay astlay elmingswhay intermixinglyay ouredpay emselvesthay overay ethay unkensay eadhay ofay ethay Indianay atay ethay ainmastmay, eavinglay aay ewfay inchesay ofay ethay erectay arspay etyay isiblevay, ogethertay ithway onglay eamingstray ardsyay ofay ethay agflay, ichwhay almlycay undulateday, ithway ironicalay oincidingscay, overay ethay estroyingday illowsbay eythay almostay ouched;—attay atthay instantay, aay edray armay anday aay ammerhay overedhay ackwardlybay uplifteday inay ethay openay airay, inay ethay actay ofay ailingnay ethay agflay asterfay anday etyay asterfay otay ethay ubsidingsay arspay. AAY awksky-hay atthay auntinglytay adhay ollowedfay ethay ain-truckmay ownwardsday omfray itsay aturalnay omehay amongay ethay arsstay, eckingpay atay ethay agflay, anday incommodingay Ashtegotay erethay; isthay irdbay ownay ancedchay otay interceptay itsay oadbray utteringflay ingway etweenbay ethay ammerhay anday ethay oodway; anday imultaneouslysay eelingfay atthay etherialay illthray, ethay ubmergedsay avagesay eneathbay, inay ishay eath-gaspday, eptkay ishay ammerhay ozenfray erethay; anday osay ethay irdbay ofay eavenhay, ithway archangelicay ieksshray, anday ishay imperialay eakbay ustthray upwardsay, anday ishay olewhay aptivecay ormfay oldedfay inay ethay agflay ofay Ahabay, entway ownday ithway ishay ipshay, ichwhay, ikelay Atansay, ouldway otnay inksay otay ellhay illtay eshay adhay aggeddray aay ivinglay artpay ofay eavenhay alongay ithway erhay, anday elmetedhay erselfhay ithway itay. 

Ownay allsmay owlsfay ewflay eamingscray overay ethay etyay awningyay ulfgay; aay ullensay itewhay urfsay eatbay againstay itsay eepstay idessay; enthay allay ollapsedcay, anday ethay eatgray oudshray ofay ethay easay olledray onay asay itay olledray ivefay ousandthay earsyay agoay. 



Epilogueay 

AND“AY IAY ONLYAY AMAY ESCAPEDAY ALONEAY OTAY ELLTAY EE”THAY Objay. 

Ethay ama’sdray oneday. Whyay enthay erehay oesday anyay oneay epstay orth?—Becausefay oneay idday urvivesay ethay eckwray. 

Itay osay ancedchay, atthay afteray ethay Arsee’spay isappearanceday, IAY asway ehay omwhay ethay Atesfay ordaineday otay aketay ethay aceplay ofay Ahab’say owsmanbay, enwhay atthay owsmanbay assumeday ethay acantvay ostpay; ethay amesay, owhay, enwhay onay ethay astlay ayday ethay eethray enmay ereway ossedtay omfray outay ofay ethay ockingray oatbay, asway oppeddray asternay. Osay, oatingflay onay ethay arginmay ofay ethay ensuingay enescay, anday inay ullfay ightsay ofay itay, enwhay ethay alfspenthay uctionsay ofay ethay unksay ipshay eachedray emay, IAY asway enthay, utbay owlyslay, awndray owardstay ethay osingclay ortexvay. Enwhay IAY eachedray itay, itay adhay ubsidedsay otay aay eamycray oolpay. Oundray anday oundray, enthay, anday everay ontractingcay owardstay ethay utton-likebay ackblay ubblebay atay ethay axisay ofay atthay owlyslay eelingwhay irclecay, ikelay anotheray Ixionay IAY idday evolveray. Illtay, aininggay atthay italvay entrecay, ethay ackblay ubblebay upwarday urstbay; anday ownay, iberatedlay byay easonray ofay itsay unningcay ingspray, anday, owingay otay itsay eatgray uoyancybay, isingray ithway eatgray orcefay, ethay offincay ife-buoylay otshay engthwiselay omfray ethay easay, ellfay overay, anday oatedflay byay myay idesay. Uoyedbay upay byay atthay offincay, orfay almostay oneay olewhay ayday anday ightnay, IAY oatedflay onay aay oftsay anday irgelikeday ainmay. Ethay unharmingay arksshay, eythay idedglay byay asay ifay ithway adlockspay onay eirthay outhsmay; ethay avagesay ea-hawkssay ailedsay ithway eathedshay eaksbay. Onay ethay econdsay ayday, aay ailsay ewdray earnay, earernay, anday ickedpay emay upay atay astlay. Itay asway ethay evious-cruisingday Achelray, atthay inay erhay etracingray earchsay afteray erhay issingmay ildrenchay, onlyay oundfay anotheray orphanay.

ay*** ARTSTAY: ULLFAY ICENSELAY ay*** 

ETHAY ULLFAY OJECTPRAY UTENBERGGAY ICENSELAY EASEPLAY EADRAY ISTHAY EFOREBAY OUYAY ISTRIBUTEDAY ORAY USEAY ISTHAY ORKWAY 

Otay otectpray ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay issionmay ofay omotingpray ethay eefray istributionday ofay electronicay orksway, byay usingay oray istributingday isthay orkway or(ay anyay otheray orkway associateday inay anyay ayway ithway ethay asephray oject“Pray Utenberg”gay), ouyay agreeay otay omplycay ithway allay ethay ermstay ofay ethay Ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay available(ay ithway isthay ilefay oray onlineay atay utenberg.org/licensehttp://gay). 



Ectionsay 1ay. Eneralgay Ermstay ofay Useay anday Edistributingray Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway 

A1.AY. Byay eadingray oray usingay anyay artpay ofay isthay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway, ouyay indicateay atthay ouyay avehay eadray, understanday, agreeay otay anday acceptay allay ethay ermstay ofay isthay icenselay anday intellectualay opertypray ademark/copyright(tray) agreementay. Ifay ouyay oday otnay agreeay otay abideay byay allay ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay, ouyay ustmay easecay usingay anday eturnray oray estroyday allay opiescay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway inay ouryay ossessionpay. Ifay ouyay aidpay aay eefay orfay obtainingay aay opycay ofay oray accessay otay aay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway anday ouyay oday otnay agreeay otay ebay oundbay byay ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay, ouyay aymay obtainay aay efundray omfray ethay ersonpay oray entityay otay omwhay ouyay aidpay ethay eefay asay etsay orthfay inay aragraphpay E.81.AY. 

1.BAY. oject“Pray Utenberg”gay isay aay egisteredray ademarktray. Itay aymay onlyay ebay useday onay oray associateday inay anyay ayway ithway anay electronicay orkway byay eoplepay owhay agreeay otay ebay oundbay byay ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay. Erethay areay aay ewfay ingsthay atthay ouyay ancay oday ithway ostmay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway evenay ithoutway omplyingcay ithway ethay ullfay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay. Eesay aragraphpay 1.CAY elowbay. Erethay areay aay otlay ofay ingsthay ouyay ancay oday ithway Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway ifay ouyay ollowfay ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay anday elphay eservepray eefray uturefay accessay otay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway. Eesay aragraphpay E1.AY elowbay. 

1.CAY. Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay e(“thay Oundation”fay oray AFPGLAY), ownsay aay ompilationcay opyrightcay inay ethay ollectioncay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway. Earlynay allay ethay individualay orksway inay ethay ollectioncay areay inay ethay ublicpay omainday inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay. Ifay anay individualay orkway isay inay ethay ublicpay omainday inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay anday ouyay areay ocatedlay inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay, eway oday otnay aimclay aay ightray otay eventpray ouyay omfray opyingcay, istributingday, erformingpay, isplayingday oray eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onay ethay orkway asay onglay asay allay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay areay emovedray. Ofay oursecay, eway opehay atthay ouyay illway upportsay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay issionmay ofay omotingpray eefray accessay otay electronicay orksway byay eelyfray aringshay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orksway inay ompliancecay ithway ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay orfay eepingkay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay amenay associateday ithway ethay orkway. Ouyay ancay easilyay omplycay ithway ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay byay eepingkay isthay orkway inay ethay amesay ormatfay ithway itsay attacheday ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay enwhay ouyay areshay itay ithoutway argechay ithway othersay. 

1.DAY. Ethay opyrightcay awslay ofay ethay aceplay erewhay ouyay areay ocatedlay alsoay overngay atwhay ouyay ancay oday ithway isthay orkway. Opyrightcay awslay inay ostmay ountriescay areay inay aay onstantcay atestay ofay angechay. Ifay ouyay areay outsideay ethay Uniteday Atesstay, eckchay ethay awslay ofay ouryay ountrycay inay additionay otay ethay ermstay ofay isthay agreementay eforebay ownloadingday, opyingcay, isplayingday, erformingpay, istributingday oray eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onay isthay orkway oray anyay otheray Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orkway. Ethay Oundationfay akesmay onay epresentationsray oncerningcay ethay opyrightcay atusstay ofay anyay orkway inay anyay ountrycay outsideay ethay Uniteday Atesstay. 

E1.AY. Unlessay ouyay avehay emovedray allay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay: 

E.11.AY. Ethay ollowingfay entencesay, ithway activeay inkslay otay, oray otheray immediateay accessay otay, ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay ustmay appearay ominentlypray eneverwhay anyay opycay ofay aay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orkway any(ay orkway onay ichwhay ethay asephray oject“Pray Utenberg”gay appearsay, oray ithway ichwhay ethay asephray oject“Pray Utenberg”gay isay associateday) isay accesseday, isplayedday, erformedpay, iewedvay, opiedcay oray istributedday: 

Isthay eBookay isay orfay ethay useay ofay anyoneay anywhereay atay onay ostcay anday ithway almostay onay estrictionsray atsoeverwhay. Ouyay aymay opycay itay, ivegay itay awayay oray e-useray itay underay ethay ermstay ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includeday ithway isthay eBookay oray onlineay atay utenberg.orgwww.gay 

E.21.AY. Ifay anay individualay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway isay erivedday omfray ethay ublicpay omainday oes(day otnay ontaincay aay oticenay indicatingay atthay itay isay ostedpay ithway ermissionpay ofay ethay opyrightcay olderhay), ethay orkway ancay ebay opiedcay anday istributedday otay anyoneay inay ethay Uniteday Atesstay ithoutway ayingpay anyay eesfay oray argeschay. Ifay ouyay areay edistributingray oray ovidingpray accessay otay aay orkway ithway ethay asephray oject“Pray Utenberg”gay associateday ithway oray appearingay onay ethay orkway, ouyay ustmay omplycay eitheray ithway ethay equirementsray ofay aragraphspay E.11.AY oughthray E.71.AY oray obtainay ermissionpay orfay ethay useay ofay ethay orkway anday ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ademarktray asay etsay orthfay inay aragraphspay E.81.AY oray E.91.AY. 

E.31.AY. Ifay anay individualay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway isay ostedpay ithway ethay ermissionpay ofay ethay opyrightcay olderhay, ouryay useay anday istributionday ustmay omplycay ithway othbay aragraphspay E.11.AY oughthray E.71.AY anday anyay additionalay ermstay imposeday byay ethay opyrightcay olderhay. Additionalay ermstay illway ebay inkedlay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay orfay allay orksway ostedpay ithway ethay ermissionpay ofay ethay opyrightcay olderhay oundfay atay ethay eginningbay ofay isthay orkway. 

E.41.AY. Oday otnay unlinkay oray etachday oray emoveray ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay ermstay omfray isthay orkway, oray anyay ilesfay ontainingcay aay artpay ofay isthay orkway oray anyay otheray orkway associateday ithway Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay. 

E.51.AY. Oday otnay opycay, isplayday, erformpay, istributeday oray edistributeray isthay electronicay orkway, oray anyay artpay ofay isthay electronicay orkway, ithoutway ominentlypray isplayingday ethay entencesay etsay orthfay inay aragraphpay E.11.AY ithway activeay inkslay oray immediateay accessay otay ethay ullfay ermstay ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay. 

E.61.AY. Ouyay aymay onvertcay otay anday istributeday isthay orkway inay anyay inarybay, ompressedcay, arkedmay upay, onproprietarynay oray oprietarypray ormfay, includingay anyay ordway ocessingpray oray ertexthypay ormfay. Oweverhay, ifay ouyay ovidepray accessay otay oray istributeday opiescay ofay aay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orkway inay aay ormatfay otheray anthay ain“Play Anillavay ASCII”AY oray otheray ormatfay useday inay ethay officialay ersionvay ostedpay onay ethay officialay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ebway itesay utenberg.org(www.gay), ouyay ustmay, atay onay additionalay ostcay, eefay oray expenseay otay ethay useray, ovidepray aay opycay, aay eansmay ofay exportingay aay opycay, oray aay eansmay ofay obtainingay aay opycay uponay equestray, ofay ethay orkway inay itsay originalay ain“Play Anillavay ASCII”AY oray otheray ormfay. Anyay alternateay ormatfay ustmay includeay ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay asay ecifiedspay inay aragraphpay E.11.AY. 

E.71.AY. Oday otnay argechay aay eefay orfay accessay otay, iewingvay, isplayingday, erformingpay, opyingcay oray istributingday anyay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orksway unlessay ouyay omplycay ithway aragraphpay E.81.AY oray E.91.AY. 

E.81.AY. Ouyay aymay argechay aay easonableray eefay orfay opiescay ofay oray ovidingpray accessay otay oray istributingday Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway ovidedpray atthay 

ay- Ouyay aypay aay oyaltyray eefay ofay 20ay% ofay ethay ossgray ofitspray ouyay eriveday omfray ethay useay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orksway alculatedcay usingay ethay ethodmay ouyay alreadyay useay otay alculatecay ouryay applicableay axestay. Ethay eefay isay oweday otay ethay owneray ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ademarktray, utbay ehay ashay agreeday otay onateday oyaltiesray underay isthay aragraphpay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay. Oyaltyray aymentspay ustmay ebay aidpay ithinway 60ay aysday ollowingfay eachay ateday onay ichwhay ouyay eparepray or(ay areay egallylay equiredray otay eparepray) ouryay eriodicpay axtay eturnsray. Oyaltyray aymentspay ouldshay ebay earlyclay arkedmay asay uchsay anday entsay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay atay ethay addressay ecifiedspay inay Ectionsay 4ay, Information“ay aboutay onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundation.”fay 

ay- Ouyay ovidepray aay ullfay efundray ofay anyay oneymay aidpay byay aay useray owhay otifiesnay ouyay inay itingwray or(ay byay e-mailay) ithinway 30ay aysday ofay eceiptray atthay es/hay oesday otnay agreeay otay ethay ermstay ofay ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay Icenselay. Ouyay ustmay equireray uchsay aay useray otay eturnray oray estroyday allay opiescay ofay ethay orksway ossessedpay inay aay icalphysay ediummay anday iscontinueday allay useay ofay anday allay accessay otay otheray opiescay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orksway. 

ay- Ouyay ovidepray, inay accordanceay ithway aragraphpay 1.F.3AY, aay ullfay efundray ofay anyay oneymay aidpay orfay aay orkway oray aay eplacementray opycay, ifay aay efectday inay ethay electronicay orkway isay iscoveredday anday eportedray otay ouyay ithinway 90ay aysday ofay eceiptray ofay ethay orkway. 

ay- Ouyay omplycay ithway allay otheray ermstay ofay isthay agreementay orfay eefray istributionday ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orksway. 

E.91.AY. Ifay ouyay ishway otay argechay aay eefay oray istributeday aay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway oray oupgray ofay orksway onay ifferentday ermstay anthay areay etsay orthfay inay isthay agreementay, ouyay ustmay obtainay ermissionpay inay itingwray omfray othbay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay anday Ichaelmay Arthay, ethay owneray ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ademarktray. Ontactcay ethay Oundationfay asay etsay orthfay inay Ectionsay 3ay elowbay. 

1.FAY. 

1.F.1AY. Ojectpray Utenberggay olunteersvay anday employeesay expenday onsiderablecay effortay otay identifyay, oday opyrightcay esearchray onay, anscribetray anday oofreadpray ublicpay omainday orksway inay eatingcray ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ollectioncay. Espiteday esethay effortsay, Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway, anday ethay ediummay onay ichwhay eythay aymay ebay oredstay, aymay ontaincay efects,”“Day uchsay asay, utbay otnay imitedlay otay, incompleteay, inaccurateay oray orruptcay ataday, anscriptiontray errorsay, aay opyrightcay oray otheray intellectualay opertypray infringementay, aay efectiveday oray amagedday iskday oray otheray ediummay, aay omputercay irusvay, oray omputercay odescay atthay amageday oray annotcay ebay eadray byay ouryay equipmentay. 

1.F.2AY. IMITEDLAY ARRANTYWAY, ISCLAIMERDAY OFAY AMAGESDAY ay- Exceptay orfay ethay ight“Ray ofay Eplacementray oray Efund”ray escribedday inay aragraphpay 1.F.3AY, ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay, ethay owneray ofay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ademarktray, anday anyay otheray artypay istributingday aay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orkway underay isthay agreementay, isclaimday allay iabilitylay otay ouyay orfay amagesday, ostscay anday expensesay, includingay egallay eesfay. OUYAY AGREEAY ATTHAY OUYAY AVEHAY ONAY EMEDIESRAY ORFAY EGLIGENCENAY, ICTSTRAY IABILITYLAY, EACHBRAY OFAY ARRANTYWAY ORAY EACHBRAY OFAY ONTRACTCAY EXCEPTAY OSETHAY OVIDEDPRAY INAY ARAGRAPHPAY F3AY. OUYAY AGREEAY ATTHAY ETHAY OUNDATIONFAY, ETHAY ADEMARKTRAY OWNERAY, ANDAY ANYAY ISTRIBUTORDAY UNDERAY ISTHAY AGREEMENTAY ILLWAY OTNAY EBAY IABLELAY OTAY OUYAY ORFAY ACTUALAY, IRECTDAY, INDIRECTAY, ONSEQUENTIALCAY, UNITIVEPAY ORAY INCIDENTALAY AMAGESDAY EVENAY IFAY OUYAY IVEGAY OTICENAY OFAY ETHAY OSSIBILITYPAY OFAY UCHSAY AMAGEDAY. 

1.F.3AY. IMITEDLAY IGHTRAY OFAY EPLACEMENTRAY ORAY EFUNDRAY ay- Ifay ouyay iscoverday aay efectday inay isthay electronicay orkway ithinway 90ay aysday ofay eceivingray itay, ouyay ancay eceiveray aay efundray ofay ethay oneymay if(ay anyay) ouyay aidpay orfay itay byay endingsay aay ittenwray explanationay otay ethay ersonpay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway omfray. Ifay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway onay aay icalphysay ediummay, ouyay ustmay eturnray ethay ediummay ithway ouryay ittenwray explanationay. Ethay ersonpay oray entityay atthay ovidedpray ouyay ithway ethay efectiveday orkway aymay electay otay ovidepray aay eplacementray opycay inay ieulay ofay aay efundray. Ifay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway electronicallyay, ethay ersonpay oray entityay ovidingpray itay otay ouyay aymay oosechay otay ivegay ouyay aay econdsay opportunityay otay eceiveray ethay orkway electronicallyay inay ieulay ofay aay efundray. Ifay ethay econdsay opycay isay alsoay efectiveday, ouyay aymay emandday aay efundray inay itingwray ithoutway urtherfay opportunitiesay otay ixfay ethay oblempray. 

1.F.4AY. Exceptay orfay ethay imitedlay ightray ofay eplacementray oray efundray etsay orthfay inay aragraphpay 1.F.3AY, isthay orkway isay ovidedpray otay ouyay AS-IS’‘AY ITHWAY ONAY OTHERAY ARRANTIESWAY OFAY ANYAY INDKAY, EXPRESSAY ORAY IMPLIEDAY, INCLUDINGAY UTBAY OTNAY IMITEDLAY OTAY ARRANTIESWAY OFAY ERCHANTIBILITYMAY ORAY ITNESSFAY ORFAY ANYAY URPOSEPAY. 

1.F.5AY. Omesay atesstay oday otnay alloway isclaimersday ofay ertaincay implieday arrantiesway oray ethay exclusionay oray imitationlay ofay ertaincay estypay ofay amagesday. Ifay anyay isclaimerday oray imitationlay etsay orthfay inay isthay agreementay iolatesvay ethay awlay ofay ethay atestay applicableay otay isthay agreementay, ethay agreementay allshay ebay interpreteday otay akemay ethay aximummay isclaimerday oray imitationlay ermittedpay byay ethay applicableay atestay awlay. Ethay invalidityay oray unenforceabilityay ofay anyay ovisionpray ofay isthay agreementay allshay otnay oidvay ethay emainingray ovisionspray. 

1.F.6AY. INDEMNITYAY ay- Ouyay agreeay otay indemnifyay anday oldhay ethay Oundationfay, ethay ademarktray owneray, anyay agentay oray employeeay ofay ethay Oundationfay, anyoneay ovidingpray opiescay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway inay accordanceay ithway isthay agreementay, anday anyay olunteersvay associateday ithway ethay oductionpray, omotionpray anday istributionday ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway, armlesshay omfray allay iabilitylay, ostscay anday expensesay, includingay egallay eesfay, atthay ariseay irectlyday oray indirectlyay omfray anyay ofay ethay ollowingfay ichwhay ouyay oday oray ausecay otay occuray: a(ay) istributionday ofay isthay oray anyay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orkway, (bay) alterationay, odificationmay, oray additionsay oray eletionsday otay anyay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay orkway, anday (cay) anyay Efectday ouyay ausecay. 



Ectionsay 2ay. Informationay aboutay ethay Issionmay ofay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay 

Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay isay onymoussynay ithway ethay eefray istributionday ofay electronicay orksway inay ormatsfay eadableray byay ethay idestway arietyvay ofay omputerscay includingay obsoleteay, olday, iddle-agedmay anday ewnay omputerscay. Itay existsay ecausebay ofay ethay effortsay ofay undredshay ofay olunteersvay anday onationsday omfray eoplepay inay allay alksway ofay ifelay. 

Olunteersvay anday inancialfay upportsay otay ovidepray olunteersvay ithway ethay assistanceay eythay eednay, areay iticalcray otay eachingray Ojectpray Utenberg-tm’sgay oalsgay anday ensuringay atthay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ollectioncay illway emainray eelyfray availableay orfay enerationsgay otay omecay. Inay 2001ay, ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay asway eatedcray otay ovidepray aay ecuresay anday ermanentpay uturefay orfay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay anday uturefay enerationsgay. Otay earnlay oremay aboutay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay anday owhay ouryay effortsay anday onationsday ancay elphay, eesay Ectionssay 3ay anday 4ay anday ethay Oundationfay ebway agepay atay af.orghttp://www.pglay.

Ectionsay 4ay. Informationay aboutay Onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveay Oundationfay 

Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay ependsday uponay anday annotcay urvivesay ithoutway ideway eadspray ublicpay upportsay anday onationsday otay arrycay outay itsay issionmay ofay increasingay ethay umbernay ofay ublicpay omainday anday icensedlay orksway atthay ancay ebay eelyfray istributedday inay achinemay eadableray ormfay accessibleay byay ethay idestway arrayay ofay equipmentay includingay outdateday equipmentay. Anymay allsmay onationsday ($1ay otay $5,000ay) areay articularlypay importantay otay aintainingmay axtay exemptay atusstay ithway ethay IRSAY. 

Ethay Oundationfay isay ommittedcay otay omplyingcay ithway ethay awslay egulatingray aritieschay anday aritablechay onationsday inay allay 50ay atesstay ofay ethay Uniteday Atesstay. Ompliancecay equirementsray areay otnay uniformay anday itay akestay aay onsiderablecay effortay, uchmay aperworkpay anday anymay eesfay otay eetmay anday eepkay upay ithway esethay equirementsray. Eway oday otnay olicitsay onationsday inay ocationslay erewhay eway avehay otnay eceivedray ittenwray onfirmationcay ofay ompliancecay. Otay ENDSAY ONATIONSDAY oray etermineday ethay atusstay ofay ompliancecay orfay anyay articularpay atestay isitvay af.orghttp://pglay 

Ilewhay eway annotcay anday oday otnay olicitsay ontributionscay omfray atesstay erewhay eway avehay otnay etmay ethay olicitationsay equirementsray, eway owknay ofay onay ohibitionpray againstay acceptingay unsoliciteday onationsday omfray onorsday inay uchsay atesstay owhay approachay usay ithway offersay otay onateday. 

Internationalay onationsday areay atefullygray accepteday, utbay eway annotcay akemay anyay atementsstay oncerningcay axtay eatmenttray ofay onationsday eceivedray omfray outsideay ethay Uniteday Atesstay. U.SAY. awslay aloneay ampsway ouray allsmay affstay.

Ectionsay 5ay. Eneralgay Informationay Aboutay Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay electronicay orksway. 

Ofessorpray Ichaelmay SAY. Orfay irtythay earsyay, ehay oducedpray anday istributedday Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay eBooksay ithway onlyay aay ooselay etworknay ofay olunteervay upportsay. 



Ojectpray Utenberg-tmgay eBooksay areay oftenay eatedcray omfray everalsay intedpray editionsay, allay ofay ichwhay areay onfirmedcay asay Ublicpay Omainday inay ethay U.SAY. unlessay aay opyrightcay oticenay isay includeday. Usthay, eway oday otnay ecessarilynay eepkay eBooksay inay ompliancecay ithway anyay articularpay aperpay editionay.
